The disciples speculated while they admired the spacious interior of the store. They forgot about their purposes here.
Leo lightly snorted and shook his head. He found them odd.
'There's a guy with a strange ring that can make large objects disappear over here. Why are they surprised because my store is bigger than it looks? Man, cultivators are weird.'
He planned to research the rings later. For now, he had to attend to the customers.
After admiring the store enough, the disciples began inspecting the vegetables, immortal grass, and pills. As usual, most of them purchased two metal element pills, except Gao Yan.
Gao Yan didn't care for metal element grain pills. He grabbed 15 wood element pills at once.
Leo frowned at Gao Yan. As the leftover inferior-grade pills would cost him 150 years, he wondered if this guy was sane.
"Boy, you will have 40 years lifespan remaining. Are you sure you want to buy those?"
Gao Yan snickered, "My master hasn't refined the immortal grass that I got from you yet, senior. I can gain my years back after eating the immortal pills. Also, if my cultivation base rises, my lifespan will go up naturally, right? I learned it from the sect's library!"
"..."
Since Gao Yan looked like a smart hardworking kid, Leo hoped that he would succeed one day. He agreed to sell the wood grain pills to the boy. Afterward, the others also paid for the goodies.
Gao Yan and the group didn't linger in the store after the purchases. They bid farewell and returned home happy as they got rare cultivation resources for them to use. The deacon received 53 years of lifespan in total as a commission as the total transaction was 530 years of lifespan.
Leo gained 477 years in total after the cut. After sending the group off, Leo closed the store's door and hummed, resuming his chore. He also checked the shelves if some of the pills needed to be restocked.
Life was good. Leo hoped that every day could be peaceful and quiet like this in the future.
*JIGGLE*
While Leo was sweeping the store with a broom, the rings in his pockets jiggled again. He paused and pulled out a ring to inspect.
It was a ruby ring. The gemstone was slightly small, but the workmanship was world-class as it glittered under the sunlight like a diamond.
Thinking of what Gao Yan did to his ring, Leo mimicked him. He rubbed the ruby several times as if he was caressing Djinn's lamp.
Five minutes later, nothing happened.
Leo furrowed his eyebrows, confused. Trying harder, he swiped his index fingertip on his tongue and touched the ring with it.
CRACK
The gemstone and the ring cracked. However, countless streaks of light shot out from the ruby like a water fountain. The lights transformed into ten thousand objects, rolling and piling on the floor. Then, the ring crumbled into dust.
"Wut da hail?"
Leo was speechless. He looked at the random junk on the floor and picked a blue marble stone among 50 thousand balls around him. Then, he brought it closer to his eyes.
This blue ball emitted blue smoke. Leo sniffed at it.
It smelled like ocean wind mixed with vapor from boiled water.
PIKI
After holding the marble stone for a few seconds, it changed color from blue to black. Leo tilted his head, wondering if this material just mutated. Interested in the object, Leo carried it to the workshop cauldron and waited there.
After the cauldron finished making a new batch of pills, Leo collected the goodies and tossed the black stone in there. Then, he pressed the research button to get some information.
DING
<You have discovered Essence Stone!>
.
[Essence Stone]
Can be found underground in any mystic realm. Unlike spirit stones, it contains a great amount of Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Element Qi.
[Traits]
Increase Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Element Essence by 10 years' worth of cultivation. (Consumption)
[Alchemy Recipe : Soul Stone]
1,000 Essence Stones
Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Catalyst
Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Essence
.
"Hah?"
Leo found something weird again. He scratched his head in confusion and returned to the store.
Looking at the piles of random scraps on the floor, Leo regretted playing with the ruby ring. He deeply sighed and purchased plastic bins to store the items.
Leo didn't think much. He gathered the blue stones in one bin. Random clean clothes, except loincloths and underwear, were arranged to the side as he might try them on later. Bolts and arrows were put into the second bin.
Then, there were strange books with Chinese words. Although the shop domain automatically translated everybody's speech into English, it didn't translate written words.I think you should take a look at
'Goddammit. I need a full translation function. Rather, is there anything that can make me learn an ancient Chinese language with a click?'
Leo searched his online store system for Chinese linguistic ability, hoping for a miracle.
DING
A list showed up. However, everything was pricy.
[Universal Auto-Speech Translation] : 1,000,000 Years of Lifespan
[Universal Linguistic Knowledge] : 5,000,000,000 Years of Lifespan
[Goblin Linguistic Knowledge] - 100,000,000 Years of Lifespan
[Cathulhu Linguistic Knowledge] - 100,000,000 Years of Lifespan
[Canine Linguistic Knowledge] - 100,000,000 Years of Lifespan
Skimming through the list of linguistic skills, Leo was glad that he wasn't thrown into one of the weird planets, such as goblin or cathulhu ones.
As the list was too long, Leo opened the filter menu and narrowed it down to only the Chinese language or anything related.
DING
[Divine Shang Language Auto-Speech Translation] : 20,000 Years of Lifespan
[Divine Shang Language Reading Comprehension Knowledge] : 10,000 Years of Lifespan
Instead of showing as Chinese, the language was called "Divine Shang". Finally, they looked affordable. Still, even the cheapest knowledge cost 10,000 years of lifespan.
Leo looked at the moon rune language on the book cover for a moment and tossed them to the third plastic bin.
"Meh, I can't read it now. I swear I'll read them someday. Next..."
Aside from the book, there were other scrolls and bundles of talisman papers. Leo threw scrolls and books into the third bin while the talismans went to the fourth container.
Once the small stones, the arrows, and the books were sorted, the store looked a lot cleaner. However, miscellaneous items, such as bottles of pills, sealed wine jars, throwing knives, and random weaponry remained.
Leo threw the weapons to the backyard, where he had collected swords and crossbows. Then, he turned his attention to the pills next. Opening the lid and pouring the content out, Leo found something familiar. As he had made so many pills, he instantly recognized its features and texture.
These were compressed rice balls, aka the regular grain pills. They contained no value.
As Leo didn't need the rice balls, he played with them. Leo spat on the small pills.
*SIZZLE*
All grain balls turned white, and they started to rot. Strangely, mushrooms grew from the pills.
As usual, Leo laughed at his weird creation. He brought the sample to the workshop and threw one in the pot for research.
DING
<You have discovered Sweet Dream Mushroom Seed!>
.
[Sweet Dream Mushroom Seed]
This is a seed of the notorious mushroom that once terrorized the Jianghu 500 years ago. It can be grown in any place with thick Qi, and it's resilient to temperature changes. However, it is not advised to domesticate it unless your mental strength is the same as Buddha's. Can be used as a catalyst for every element.
.
"MUSHROOM, YOU SAY?!"
Leo chortled. As a cultured man, he was overjoyed.
"Hoh, boy. The cultivation world is so much fun!"
No one was there to retort Leo - No martial artist in this world cultivated mushrooms, especially the ones with dubious names. Also, Leo completely ignored the important warning.
The crazy Florida Man rushed back into his store and mutated all the non-element grain pills into moldy mushroom seeds. He carried them in his arms as if they were precious treasures and brought them to the second workshop's building.
As this building was empty, he chose it as a place to cultivate mushrooms. He put all the rotten pills there and opened the shopping menu. He purchased a hundred shelves and pots, spending 200 years of his lifespan. Then, he ran around, digging mutated soil around the store and filling the small pots.
After filling the pots with mutated soil, Leo buried the rotten pills in there, two for each tank. Then, he watered them, giving the dirt enough moisture. Then, he cut some holes in the sides of the pots, allowing the shrooms to come out from there. Although Leo had no idea how to grow shrooms, he proceeded with it as he had nothing to lose.
*JIGGLE*
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm While working, the remaining 18 rings in his pocket jiggled. Leo patted his pants and widely grinned.
He would be very busy today.
.
.
Meanwhile, Gao Yan, the deacon, and the group traveled to the sect.
On the way home, Gao Yan was absentminded. He thought of the ingredients in the store, wondering how he would use them to concoct pills in the future if he could.
As Gao Yan daydreamed, he accidentally stepped on something slippery and fell on his butt.
The group heard about the fall of Gao Yan. They turned around and laughed at him.
"Gao Yan, you're our future alchemist. Why are you so clumsy? How can we entrust you to make cultivation pills if you clumsily explode cauldrons?" The deacon jeered.
Gao Yan pouted and pushed the ground, getting ready to stand. However, his hands touched something that wasn't supposed to be there. He turned around to see what he sat on.
It was a pile of ash and black clothes. A crossbow, a sword, a spatial ring, and a token of Hound Squad were there.
"Huh?"
As Gao Yan picked up a spatial ring from the ground, the others noticed the black clothes and the items.
"What are those?"
The deacon picked up the token of the Hound Squad. He flipped it around and frowned.
There was a signature of the Ouyang Clan behind the token.

chapters.title: Chapter 39 Florida Man's “Cat” Feeds On National Treasures
chapters.content:
﻿Chapter 39 – Florida Man's "Cat" Feeds on National Treasures
"Spatial ring?"
Gao Yan picked up a spatial ring from the pile of assassin's ash. He cheerfully laughed and tried to access it.
PIKI
Unfortunately, as soon as Gao Yan inserted his Qi into the ring, it released a strong electric current, repelling Gao Yan's Qi and zapping him.
"Ouch!"
The deacon noticed that Gao Yan got his hands on the spatial ring. He warned the alchemist trainee.
"Be careful with the no-name spatial rings. A strong cultivator usually locks their rings with their element essence or Qi. Unless you're stronger than the ring's owner, its residual Qi will repel you and might kill you on the spot."
Gao Yan and the other disciples were surprised. The former looked at his spatial ring, which he had gotten as a gift from Wu Buyi. He wondered if he could lock it, too.
"Senior, how do you unlock or lock a spatial ring?"
The deacon coughed, "Simple. When your strength is at the golden core stage, you can start using complex Qi threads to form an array spell. There are a thousand lock techniques that you can learn from the sect's library. Only if you understand the techniques, you can unlock someone else's rings, granted that you manage to memorize ten thousand locking techniques on the mainland."
"… Wow," everybody was flabbergasted by the profound of the lock techniques. They wondered if they could learn all of them and unlock the no-name rings.
Teasing the disciples enough, the deacon revealed a hidden technique, "But that's a very troublesome method. Unless you want to preserve the rings and the content inside, you can do so. But if you're like me and other elders, we simply inject our Qi or essence into it and destroy the locking spell inside. Then, all items in there will be ejected from the ring. You just have to be stronger than the ring owner as I mentioned earlier."
"Oh!"
"Be warned though. If the ring has a large inventory space, you might find yourself buried in a mountain of items. In the past, a sick bastard store an entire mansion in his ring, and it was stolen. The thief overrode the locking spell and got himself buried under the mansion alive. It's a risky method. Be sure to unlock the ring in an open space while you're hovering in the sky. Let the items fall under you, not on top of you."
"…"
Gao Yan's hands trembled as he imagined himself being crushed under a mountain of heavy items in the ring. He put it in his pocket, waiting to ask Wu Buyi to unlock it for him later on.
The deacon silently collected the clothes of the assassin. He kept the clan token and urged, "Let's move. We need to return to the sect before nightfall. Oh, I almost forgot. The sect now forbids everybody from collecting the spirit grasses around here. Senior Florida Man might be growing them, and we don't want to provoke him."
"Y-Yes, sir."
Gao Yan and the disciples gulped as they looked at the grasses around them. They were all blue, and they emitted strong spiritual energy. Everybody wanted to pick them up, but the deacon glared at them.
Without permission, the group swallowed their greed and continued their journey home.
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo had fun.
CHING-CHING-CHING
After cleaning the mess in his store, Leo played with more rings, wondering if he could get more items. Blue stones and similar items gushed out from the rings, and they were destroyed in the process. Leo sorted all items and repeated until the last ring.
When everything was over, Leo looked at thirty 2000-liter bins, full of blue stones. He clicked his tongue and pushed the wheeled bins through the back door, bringing them to the storehouse in the first workshop. As for the regular grain pills that he got from other rings, he brought them to the second workshop and left them there for the time being.
.
The next day morning, Leo came out to check his mushroom farm in the second workshop building, and he was pleasantly surprised - The surface of the soil was all white. At this rate, they would grow up into fine mushrooms soon. Every pot was the same. The black soil turned white as the mushroom spores rapidly grew and consumed its nutrition.
Celebrating this occasion, Leo added more spit to every pot, hoping that his fluid contained enough nutrition for the unknown mushrooms. He wondered if it would taste like Truffles.
"Grow up quickly, okay? Even if you're zombie cordyceps, I can still eat you. Actually, I ate them a lot when my age was still 4 digits. I'm immune to your zombie fungi. Hehehehe."
Leo left the mushroom farm alone. He exited through the front door and collected two more batches of grain pills.
Carrying the grain pills to the store, Leo put them into the same Tupperware boxes on the shelves. He also separated the leftover inferior and lesser-grade ones into other boxes and placed them near the Bloodmelons.
As the newly made batches were better in quality, Leo decided to get rid of the old pills by selling them a bit cheaper than the other pills.
The new low-graded pills were all sold for 20 years of lifespan each. However, as for the old ones, Leo retained the old price, aka 10 years of lifespan.
After sorting the new products, Leo returned to the workshop. Instead of making more grain pills, he carried the iron pine lumber there and chopped them into 1-cubic-foot blocks. Then, he tossed one into each cauldron and refined them.
10 minutes later, two sacred wood blocks came out. The edges had been sharpened, and the size expanded to one cubic meter.
Leo hummed as he threw more lumber cubes into the cauldrons and let them run. Then, he carried the two blocks of sacred wood and lined them in front of his store, displaying his wealth, hoping to lure some thieves into attacking this store again.
After making 20 blocks of sacred wood, Leo was bored. He switched the products to rejuvenate juice so that he could get something delicious to drink. He also thought of the corianders, which he had been using to make coffee.
Leo finally remembered that he had forgotten to research them.
"Ah, silly me. I should have done that several days ago. I'm getting old."
Leo waited for ten minutes. After collecting his favorite root beer, he tossed a stalk of coriander to check its usefulness.
.
[Aroma Coriander]
Aroma Corianders are a common weed, commonly found in Unicorn-infested areas. As the corianders constantly gain nutrition from the unicorn's stool, they produce a similar scent to the stool. Although they feed on dubious resources, many humans may find them flagrant and use them as garnish to dress their food. Can be used as an Earth Element catalyst in alchemy.
[Traits]I think you should take a look at
Contain strong caffeine. Might rupture some blood veins if it's consumed directly.
.
It was just another catalyst. Still, as Leo didn't plan to sleep tonight, he picked one and put it in his mouth, checking how much he could get from eating this plant.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by one year.>
Leo was disappointed.
'Not suitable in cooking. I guess I'll keep using them as coffee beans.'
He resumed making rejuvenate root beer and walked toward the field, east of the store building.
.
.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
While Leo was busy at the workshop, Cat played with a sacred wood block in front of the store as it found the cubes interesting. It tried sitting on it and hitting it with its whips.
BOOM
As clumsy as a cat, Cat made an accident - One of the sacred wood blocks was broken in half.
"Myaaa?!"
Cat panicked, afraid that Leo might scold it. It grabbed the broken pieces and tried to patch them together. However, it kept failing.
As all hope was lost, Cat used a drastic measure - It copied Leo's actions by spitting on the wooden block and attaching the pieces like jigsaw puzzles.
As Cat clumsily tried to repair things without knowledge, its roots got stuck in the middle of the broken sacred wood block.
"MYAAA?!"
Shocked and confused, Cat ran around with the sacred wood block in tow like a panicking cat with a plastic bag getting stuck on its hind leg. It ran into the forest and hit many things on its path.
By the time that Cat came back to its sense, the wooden block was gone. However, Cat sensed something odd about its roots. It looked down to see the weird roots that had been itchy.
The root merged with the broken sacred wood cube, turning it white.
"Meow?"
Cat tilted its head and swung the root around. It pierced an iron pine tree nearby. A few seconds later, the tree withered and dissipated into dust. On the other hand, Cat sensed that it had absorbed the tree's Qi, making it stronger.
"Meow <3"
Addicted to the feeling, Cat ran back to the store. It grabbed the sacred wood blocks that Leo had previously arranged. Then, it broke them and tried to attach the wood blocks with the remaining roots.
"Nom-Nom Meow <3"
.
.
RUMBLE
Ouyang Long and Wu Buyi left Cauliflower City. They both boarded the former's airship and flew to Magpie City.
The airship arrived at noon. However, it didn't stop there. It changed course and flew east, heading toward a certain place first.
Wu Buyi was delighted when Ouyang Long was enthusiastic about visiting Leo. He never stopped talking.
"Daoist Florida Man's techniques are profound and mysterious. He doesn't need to move, but he can let us see our lifespan. Actually, he can see through our true names with just a thought! Anyone that introduces themselves using false names is easily exposed. It's better if you be honest in front of him."
Ouyang Long was patient. He kept listening, learning more about the so-called Florida Man. However, as Ouyang Long learned more, his anxiety rose.
Somehow, this Florida Man's strength seemed illogical. From the last vision of Ouyang Ting, the Florida Man was overwhelmingly strong to the point that he could destroy the Situ Clan's Qi Sealing Array with one punch. However, Wu Buyi expressed that the Florida Man's aura was a soul-formation cultivator, which was unusual. Even Ouyang Long couldn't destroy Situ's Qi Sealing Array in one or two strikes.
Ouyang Long was concerned - If Florida Man's strength was not the soul formation stage, then how strong was he?
"Damn Buyi, stop talking for a moment," Ouyang Long coughed and asked. "Is Daoist Florida Man really a soul formation cultivator?"
Wu Buyi snickered, "Yes, he is. I saw him myself. His aura is definitely the soul formation stage."
"I've been thinking. You said that he came from a higher realm, right? What if he has been suppressing his aura to the soul formation stage? What if he's actually stronger than that?"
Hearing the theory, Wu Buyi burst into laughter.
"That's possible, but it's very unlikely. You see. If he's really stronger than the soul formation stage... Let's say he's a soul transformation stage cultivator. He would have had a presence of a quasi-immortal, and his body would have produced thick element essence around him. If he was an immortal, everything living beings around him would have been mutated because of his aura. Regular plants and weeds would have evolved into spirit grasses or spirit plants. Everything he touched would also transform like the plants in the mystic… realm?"
Wu Buyi paused mid-sentence. He slightly opened his mouth as he remembered something. He thought of Leo's past requests and the items in his store.
"Immortal grass? Fruits and vegetables… Wait a minute?!"
Wu Buyi sweated profusely. He realized something scary.

chapters.title: Chapter 40 Forklift Certified Florida Man Worshiped As Immortal
chapters.content:
﻿Chapter 40 : Forklift Certified Florida Man Worshiped as Immortal
Looking at Wu Buyi's reaction, Ouyang Long snorted in disgust. He shook his head and rebuked him.
"Immortals cannot stay or enter this world, Buyi. Our world is protected by Shang Emperor. The natural laws of this world repel every native immortal. Any immortal from a higher realm trying to enter this world will be instantly killed by the Heavenly Tribulations."
Ouyang Long was a studious type. When he was young, he researched a lot about the immortals and the world's nature.
From his perspective, there was a limit to how strong a cultivator could climb up the ranks. A total of 9 stages separated mortals apart;
Commoners, aka the regular people,
1st stage : Muscle Tempering Stage,
2nd stage : Qi Condensation Stage,
3rd stage : Foundation Establishment Stage,
4th stage : Golden Core Stage,
5th stage : Nascent Soul Stage,
6th stage : Soul Formation Stage,
7th stage : Soul Transformation Stage,
And the 8th stage : Quasi-Immortal Stage.
Only commoners and cultivators with the cultivation stages could live in this mortal world. If one managed to advance to the 9th stage or higher, they would be automatically expelled from this world by the laws. Everybody who had prolonged their stay was killed by the Heavenly Tribulations.
"Err... are you sure?" Wu Buyi doubted if that was the case.
"WE FREAKING LEARNED THIS FROM THE SCHOOL TOGETHER! Dammit, how could you forget about common sense!?"
"But that is not..."
Wu Buyi thought of the abundant immortal grass in Leo's store. He also remembered that he gifted cabbages and bananas to Leo. But when he revisited him, he found golden sand bananas and yin cabbages instead.
Again, Wu Buyi believed that Leo's past actions made a lot of sense if he could transform everything he touched into rare herbs or treasures, such as immortal grass, vegetables, and fruits. He still clearly remembered Leo's expression when he asked for local fruits, vegetables, and seeds.
The alchemist didn't know what to feel. If this theory was true, he would have hit the jackpot as his business partner was a powerhouse expert instead of a soul formation cultivator. But if everything was his delusion, the future trades might be complicated as someone stronger than Ouyang Long might try to rob the store.
Wu Buyi prayed. He wished that Leo was a real immortal.
.
10 minutes later, the airship hovered over the store. Ouyang Long looked down and found three buildings in the forest. Wu Buyi also noticed the two alchemy workshops behind the store for the first time.
As Leo had been clearing the land, many trees were uprooted and piled behind the two workshops. The cleared land spread toward the east stream, which was the only source of water in this area.
Wu Buyi gazed at the cauldrons. Sensing that they were in the middle of making something, he was interested in the content. However, when Wu Buyi recalled the theory that Leo was an immortal, he gulped and prayed hard.
Ouyang Long ordered the ship captain to maintain the altitude. He jumped down from the ship and landed in front of the store. Wu Buyi also quickly followed the guy.
As soon as they landed, the chomper plant monster crawled on the roof and approached them. It smiled at the duo.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
Wu Buyi ejected a monster carcass and tossed it to Cat in a hurry. He also prostrated to the monster plant.
"Sir Guardian, please tell your master that Wu Buyi has brought a new customer!"
"Meow?"
Cat tilted its head and smiled. As nobody had shown this much respect to it before, it started to like Wu Buyi. Cat extended its vine and patted his head like how Leo always used to. Then, it took the carcass and crawled back to its usual spot.
Meanwhile, Ouyang Long looked at Wu Buyi in disgust.
"I can't believe you've fallen so low, Wu Buyi. Why do you, a nascent soul cultivator, kowtow to a 4th-stage monster? This is unsightly."
Wu Buyi looked up and shushed. He glared into Ouyang Long's eyes, "Mind your words, idiot! Don't provoke it."
Noticing how flustered Wu Buyi was, Ouyang Long gave up on the alchemist. He rolled his eyes and turned his attention to the store building.
Wu Buyi didn't tell Ouyang Long - The growth rate of a plant monster was usually slow. It took a hundred years for them to advance or evolve one minor rank.
However, when Wu Buyi first came to the store, Cat was just a 2nd-stage monster at best. The last time he visited the store, Cat was a 3rd-stage monster, whose strength was on par with golden core cultivators, aka 4th-stage cultivators. But after a few days, it got stronger again.
It might even be stronger than him at the moment!
Although Wu Buyi respected Leo and Cat, Ouyang Long didn't. The latter looked at Cat's branches, vines, and roots.
Cat's luster roots gleamed in white, as bright as white jade. Moreover, it produced the same aura as sacred wood, which repelled all evil energy around the creature.
Behind the chomper plant, a transparent dao spirit of the creature hovered behind its master. It had the appearance of a dark-skinned humanoid infant with long ears.
Only Ouyang Long, who was a soul formation cultivator, could see the spirit. He smirked and muttered to himself.
"A 4th-stage monster manages to realize the Dao? This is a rare specimen indeed. Wu Buyi, help me kill the monster so we can share its monster parts. Its roots are made of sacred woods. They're the best ingredient for making anti-undead weapons!"
Wu Buyi widened his eyes in shock. He yelled at his friend and stood between Ouyang Long and Cat.
"NO! YOU'RE CRAZY! THAT IS DAOIST FLORIDA MAN'S PET!"I think you should take a look at
Ouyang Long had enough of Wu Buyi's idiocy. He snorted and hit the alchemist with a palm strike.
BOOM
The palm hit the alchemist's chest, sending him flying toward the glass window of the store.
Wu Buyi's back hit the glass window. However, it remained intact. Wu Buyi also sensed something soft supported him, acting as a cushion to prevent injuries.
Then, for the first time, Wu Buyi heard a system voice.
<An employee has been assaulted by a visitor.>
.
.
Leo had been looking at the back door of the store. He pouted and looked at the backdoor.
Previously when Leo transferred the blue stones out, Leo discovered that the bins were a lot bigger than the door frame. Thus, he brought them out by removing the glass windows of the front store and carried them through the window frames. After transporting everything out, he put the glass windows back.
The transportation took a long time, but he managed to bring the unnecessary items out. Still, Leo learned from his mistake : Never bought large stuff while he was inside the store!
Annoyed by the limitation of the doors, Leo unscrewed the hinges and removed the entire backdoor. Then, he started slicing the door frame, expanding its space.
Leo's fingernail extended upon his will. Using his fingernail as a knife, he cut through the wood with ease. After five minutes, Leo tripled the size of the backdoor.
"I should have done this earlier. Man, I wasted my time for nothing."
Leo looked at the wide door and thought of turning the sacred wood blocks into DIY doors and door frames. However, he didn't have sufficient tools for carpentry as modern tools were incapable of cutting through iron pine lumber.
As Leo couldn't leave the wall with a large hole, he stacked some rough iron pine lumber on top of each other, serving as a temporary blockade. Then, he moved on to the backyard.
Leo looked at the bins behind the store. Some of them still contained books, arrows, bolts, and weapons of the assassins. He sighed and pushed them to the back of the alchemy workshops. As there were three mountains of items there, Leo chose to use the empty large bins to store the precious materials, such as iron pine nuts, iron pine leaves, and immortal grass.
When Leo was done, all 30 large bins were full, and the field was clean. He gazed at the grain pill ingredients and deeply sighed.
"I probably can't refine all of you in my lifetime. How many million pills do I have to make to get rid of y'all?"
Leo left the bins behind the workshops. He then entered the alchemy workshop storeroom, which was filled with transparent plastic boxes of blue stones. Containers stacked on top of each other, reaching the ceiling. Every box was full to the brim. The baskets of fruits and vegetables were placed in front of the second workshop as there was no other place for him to store them.
His warehouse was full!
Leo regretted what he did. He lamented that he shouldn't have played with the spatial rings of the fallen cultivators.
While grumbling, Leo looked at the black ring on the middle finger of his left hand, which had been with him for 50,000 years.
"Hey, little alien parasite. Can you become one of those fancy Doraemon rings? I want to store these things inside you. Can you open a pocket dimension for me?"
Leo rubbed the ring. However, the system didn't react to his wish, and it didn't break.
He was disappointed. Still, Leo checked the online shopping system to see if he could buy the feature from the system.
DING
<Such a feature doesn't exist.>
Once again, Leo was hit with the cruel reality. He didn't get the luxury that many main characters in cultivation novels had.
Leo didn't give up - he explored the shop domain system next and stared at one of the building icons.
.
Warehouse
Requirement : Humble General Store Level 4
Price : 500 Years of Lifespan
Space : 5 x 5
.
Leo frowned as the 5x5 meters space might be too small for a warehouse. He wondered if it was worth the investment. Still, even though Leo wanted to build it, he didn't have enough lifespan to afford it.
"Hah. I wish a stupid cultivator visited me at night and attacked my store."
As soon as Leo finished his prayer, he heard a loud noise from the front of the store.
BOOM
In addition, the system gave him an alert.
DING
<One of your employees has been assaulted by a visitor.>
Leo widened his eyes. He looked up and moved his fingers, praying.
"Praise Jesus! God bless Florida."

chapters.title: Chapter 41 Male Karen And Two Pets Killed By Florida Man During Pokemon Fight
chapters.content:
﻿Chapter 41 – Male Karen and Two Pets Killed by Florida Man During Pokemon Fight
"Hmm?"
Ouyang Long furrowed his brow. He stared at Wu Buyi, whose body was suspended in the floating bubble barrier in front of the glass windows. He scanned the surroundings, checking if another cultivator was nearby.
It wasn't hard to find Leo in the backyard. The guy was slowly walking toward them.
Ouyang Long clicked his tongue. It seemed that the store owner was there. Getting ready to meet the rumored man, he stopped paying attention to a weak alchemist.
DING
Suddenly, a series of texts appeared in front of Ouyang Long. It showed his age and his remaining lifespan.
.
Name: Ouyang Long
Age: 251
Remaining Lifespan: 1,599 Years, 9 Months, 22 Days, 1 Hour, and 13 Minutes
.
Seeing his lifespan, Ouyang Long was stunned for a moment. Then, he revealed a proud smile. As someone from a rich family, he managed to purchase five elixir pills, which increased his lifespan by 100 years each. He believed that the medicines worked perfectly.
However, Ouyang Long never had someone who could identify one's remaining lifespan. The Florida Man's ability made him envious.
He wanted to learn this technique!
There were many ways to get his hands on this technique – Kill and steal the technique book, force the store owner to reveal the secret, or make him submit and reveal the secret.
'That's it. I'm going to kill you and get that technique! I'll avenge Ting'er and kill that idiot Buyi later. Everything in his store will be mine, and no one can blame me that I kill two alchemists.'
Ouyang Long crossed his arms behind his back and faced the approaching cultivator. A few seconds later, an elderly man with long white hair and a white beard walked out from the shade and showed himself.
'Hmm?'
Strangely, the clothes of the old man were weird. He didn't wear respectable clothes or robes. Instead, he wore an oversized white cotton t-shirt, baggy shorts, and a pair of crocs. Had Ouyang Long never paid attention to the elder's rainbow aura, he would have mistaken him as a weird commoner.
He didn't notice that Leo's body was built like a fitness gym coach. His thick arms, firm chest, muscular calves, and refined thighs were bigger than average cultivators, but they were hidden under the wrinkled skins and baggy clothes.
'No presence of a cultivator. No pressure from an expert. No charisma. No manner. Tsk. Am I looking at a country bumpkin? Rather, he must be a fake cultivator. He must have used many artifacts and tricks when he killed the Hound Squad and Ting'er. That must be it! Since he's an alchemist, he must have used some forbidden medicines on himself that day, and he's powerless right now. Most strength boost pills have a long drawback effect. Since Ting'er just died a few days ago, he should not have recovered his strength yet. Yes, that must be the case!'
After making the conclusion, Ouyang Long sneered. He decided not to show respect to this person to exert dominance. Once he could get Florida Man to submit, he would enslave him and extort for the techniques and wealth later.
Ouyang Long shouted, "Florida Man! How dare you provoke the Ouyang Clan and the Jianghu Alliance?! How dare you kill my son!?"
Florida Man's expression was complicated. He looked at Ouyang Long in disdain, but the corners of his mouth curved up as if he was laughing. He said with a deep voice.
"I don't even know who you are."
.
Leo was confused. He really meant it when he said he didn't know who the guy was.
This guy showed up on a fancy flying ship and attacked one of Leo's employees. Then, he acted like a male Karen.
Leo always hated Karens. When he was still a human, he always wanted to punch every loudmouth Karen regardless of their pronouns and genders. From his point of view, they were the enemies of common sense and a civilized world.
Looking at the Karen Man, Leo gave up talking common sense. He looked at the lifespan status of Ouyang Long to see how many years he could get from this guy.
'Oh! 1,599! This guy is loaded!'
Nothing made Leo happier than seeing a hoodlum with a long life. He rubbed his hands and licked his lips, preparing to order the system to harvest the lifespan.
While Leo was absentminded, Ouyang Long shouted again.
"I said – Who do you think you are?! Kneel and beg for forgiveness at once, and I'll spare your sorry life!"
Hearing the threat, Leo was amused. He brightly grinned and walked closer toward Ouyang Long, wanting to see his angry face up close. He also slightly tilted his head, giving the visitor an obnoxious look.
"… Why should I?"
Seeing Leo's reactions, Ouyang Long was annoyed. His two dao avatars manifested behind him, showing off his abilities and cultivation base. The two spirits transformed into a long fire dragon and a water dragon. Unlike western dragons, they had long body like a snake, but they had short arms. Both dragons floated in the air, mimicking Shenlong from Dragon Ball Series. The two dragons roared and bore fangs.
Ouyang Long looked at his dao avatars and sneered at Leo, "See this? This is what a soul formation cultivator can do. I wonder if a fake like you can do this much."
"… Okay?"
Leo blankly looked at the spirit dragons. He pursed his lips, hiding his astonishment. He had faced countless Godzillas, monsters, and mutants before. However, he had never seen materialized ghosts, especially ghost dragons.
As soon as Leo looked at them, the shop domain system activated and automatically showed their statuses.
.
Name: Dao of Water Dragon
Age: 39
Remaining Lifespan: 1,139 Years, 8 Months, 2 Days, 4 Hours, and 1 Minute
.
Name: Dao of Fire Dragon
Age: 72I think you should take a look at
Remaining Lifespan: 1,823 Years, 11 Months, 4 Days, 22 Hours, and 40 Minutes
.
"Huh?"
Leo was stunned. He never knew that ghosts had a lifespan. He was pleasantly surprised.
'1,599 + 1,139 + 1,823… How much? Oh, I forgot to include the months. Meh, I'm not Asian. Forget about math. The system will calculate everything for me anyway.'
Although the number looked enticing, Leo had worries – If he recklessly killed Ouyang Long right away, he might not be able to steal these dragons' lifespan as they hadn't attacked the store yet. For the sake of exploiting the system loophole, Leo came up with a plan.
"Ahem. I don't want to be rude, but using Pokemons in combat is animal cruelty, mister. If you're looking for a Pokemon duel, I suggest you look elsewhere. For example, far off the distance is where you should F off and jack off to a Vaporean."
Meanwhile, Wu Buyi listened to their interactions in shock and fear. The latter couldn't stop sweating as he expected a big battle soon.
The alchemist opened his mouth and tried to speak. However, the shop domain system still suspended him in mid-air. It also disabled his ability to speak or move.
Wu Buyi was helpless. He could only watch his idiot friend commit suicide.
'Rest in peace, Ouyang Long. I'll burn gold papers for you.'
.
Ouyang Long didn't know if he should be enraged or amused as Leo's words made no sense to him. However, he figured that Leo looked down on his Dao Avatars, which he had spent years nurturing.
Daos, in cultivation terms, referred to beliefs, goals, and way of life. Every person, even commoners, walked a different path to pursue their Dao.
Meanwhile, a Dao Avatar was the manifestation of a cultivator's Dao Spirit. When a cultivator realized their Dao or was enlightened, their dao would gain sentient and become an independent spirit, which would help their creators in their journey to pursue the daos.
Usually, Dao Avatars manifested when a cultivator reached the nascent soul stage. However, many talented cultivators and monsters could awaken their Dao Avatars early, such as Cat.
Ouyang Long's eyes could see through hidden dao avatars of every cultivator. He didn't see anything in Leo's aura, so he concluded that Leo was a trashy cultivator that couldn't realize his dao. Thus, he had no reason to be civil.
He pointed his hand at Leo's face.
"Go! Pull out his tongue and sever his legs. But don't kill him, though. I want him to be my alchemy slave!"
Wu Buyi wanted to yell and threaten that every alchemist in Jianghu wouldn't forgive him if he touched Leo. However, his voice couldn't come out.
The two giant dragons moved. The red dragon opened their mouths and unleashed a fire breath. The blue one glared at Leo's feet, and turned the ground into ice.
CRACK
The lower half of Leo's body was frozen in ice. The fire beam descended and devoured Leo directly!
Wu Buyi was still in the floating bubble barrier. The fire and the ice attack didn't reach him, but he could feel the extreme temperature. He trembled, getting nervous.
He was not worried about Leo, but he was afraid of Ouyang Long's fate. Thus, Wu Buyi closed his eyes, not wanting to see the result.
Ouyang Long laughed and waited for the attacks to finish. When the two dragons ceased their attacks, he created an ice lance and a flame spear in both hands. Then, he threw them toward Leo.
The lance and the spear entwined in mid-flight. As soon as it hit Leo's stomach, they exploded.
BOOM
Fragments of ice and fireballs scattered everywhere. Several flame balls landed on the rooftop while the ice shards hit the ground and pine trees at a distance, yet none of them hit Ouyang Long and the dragons.
Because of the explosion of fire and ice, it generated a thick fog of vapor. It shrouded Leo's silhouette and the result of the attacks.
Ouyang Long was not in a hurry. He waited for the fog to subside. While he was waiting, he glanced at the store building. Strangely, it did not catch fire after the explosion. The glass windows, the walls, the rooftop, and the doors remained intact.
He turned his attention to the floating bubble in front of the store's glass windows next. The alchemist was still alive, and the barrier was undamaged.
Something was not right about this store.
Not letting his guard down, Ouyang Long swung his hand, generating a strong gale. The wind blew away the fog, revealing the result of the previous attacks.
"W-WHAT?!"
Leo still stood there, blinking and frowning. His t-shirt was burnt to ash, leaving with only his pants and crocs. Moreover, his hair and beard weren't damaged. As for the ice, they were all melted.
DING
<Warning, the store is under attack.>
<You may collect lifespan from the assailant as compensation for the damage.>
Both Leo and Wu Buyi received the same messages. The former grinned while the latter's face lost all color.
"Oh, no," Wu Buyi discovered another scary secret of Leo.
"Oh, yes," Leo was overjoyed. He slow-clapped and congratulated Ouyang Long.
"Congratulations. You played yourself."
"What?"
Ouyang Long didn't understand anything. His attacks were enough to injure any soul transformation as the dragon dao spirits were the strongest among all elemental avatars. However, Leo seemed to be unaffected by the fire and ice power.
*SNAP*
The sound of a finger snap stunned Ouyang Long. He didn't understand why, but everything in the world seemed to grow bigger. Moreover, he could no longer feel his arms, legs, or body.
Ouyang Long didn't realize that his entire body but his eyes instantly turned to ash. The eyes slowly melted and dried a few seconds later. As for the dragons, they dispersed into small gem shards and fell to the ground.

chapters.title: Chapter 42 Florida Man Hijacked Plane To Sell His Homemade Meds
chapters.content:
﻿Chapter 42 : Florida Man Hijacked Plane to Sell His Homemade Meds
"HEHEHEHE! Profits!"
Leo ignored Wu Buyi's gaze. He walked toward the ash pile of Ouyang Long and picked up his clothes. He swung them five times, shaking the items out of the robes' pockets.
PU
PU
Two rings, five throwing knives, two long swords, and blue stones came out. Leo glanced at the throwing knives and the two swords in disgust and picked up the rings and blue stones. Then, he checked his lifespan.
<Current Lifespan: 4,988 Years, 11 Months, 4 Days, 3 Hours, and 54 Minutes.>
Leo brightly smiled. His wish had been granted, and he had enough lifespan to upgrade his store again. Because of the joy, he forgot about Wu Buyi.
The store system released Wu Buyi. The alchemist gasped for air and panted. Then, he gazed at Leo in awe and respect.
"S-Senior immortal. I was wrong! Please forgive my past offense!" Wu Buyi prostrated to the ground. He threw away his shame and wailed like a baby.
Leo finally remembered that somebody else was nearby, and this alchemist witnessed everything. In addition, the giant flying ship was still around.
Although Leo didn't mind that Wu Buyi brought stupid cultivators here, the capitalist side of him didn't want to share the lifespan that he had gotten from Ouyang Long. Thus, he came up with an excuse.
"I can't give you commission this time since your customers attacked me and my store. Next time, you should bring better customers."
"I-I understand, senior!"
Wu Buyi didn't dare to ask for rewards. Even if he had the right to claim it, he wasn't brave enough to demand his share. After all, Ouyang Long downright attacked Leo, and the latter could easily claim that Wu Buyi betrayed him.
Meanwhile, Leo inwardly laughed. As he didn't have to pay Wu Buyi a commission, he got to keep everything. He then turned his attention to the flying ship.
"Won't you invite the people up there to see my store?"
"I-ugh."
Wu Buyi hesitated. As the servants belonged to Ouyang Long, he was afraid that they might seek vengeance. However, after thinking of Ouyang Long's personality, they might not be loyal.
Leo looked at Wu Buyi again. He frowned, "There's still an issue about you running away with my elixir. If you don't feel like working, we can end our contract here."
"N-No! I'll work, senior! I'll work my hardest!"
Afraid of Leo, Wu Buyi flew to the airship.
.
Upon returning to the airship, Wu Buyi rushed to the ship captain. He whispered in a hushed voice.
"Alright. Whatever you hear, do not panic. I repeat, do not panic."
"Y-Yes, sir?"
"Ahem, well." Wu Buyi cleared his throat and looked around him. As he didn't see anybody nearby but the captain, he revealed the truth.
"Ouyang Long is dead."
"..."
"He offended an immortal and got himself killed. Now, the immortal wants everybody on the ship to come down and trade with him. If you refuse, he will kill everybody here."
"..."
"I don't know what Ouyang Long has done to you or how loyal you are to him. But know this : The person down there is a thousand times scarier than your lord. So if you value your life, convince everybody to go and pay respect to the immortal. If possible, buy something from his shop, and nobody gets hurt."
"..."
The ship captain was just a golden core cultivator. The rest of the servants and crew were all foundation establishment stage. Thus, nobody here could disobey Wu Buyi's order.
The captain silently bowed and picked up a crystal, which was a sound amplification artifact. Although his face was as pale as a sheet, he announced to the crew and Ouyang Long's servants.
"Attention, all crew. Ouyang Long is dead, and we have received a new order. We shall park our ship in a few minutes, and all crew must come down to pay respect to an immortal expert. Please be calm and act accordingly for your safety."
Wu Buyi left the quarterdeck and observed the crowd on board. As he had expected, their expressions were complicated. Still, there was no sign of resistance as nobody was loyal to the cruel master : They only served Ouyang Long out of fear.
A few minutes later, the ship descended and hovered over the forest. The crowd jumped down from the flying ship and gathered in front of the general store.
A certain plant monster instantly noticed their arrival. It came out to greet them with its usual catchphrase.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
"..."
The people were confused. They came here to greet an immortal, not a monster plant. Fortunately, Wu Buyi escorted them and translated Cat's language.
"That's the pet of the immortal expert. It just wants a toll fee. As long as you give it a monster carcass or food, it will leave quietly."
"Oh."
Not every cultivator sustained on grain pills. As common food was cheaper, many servants stored real food in their spatial rings and clothes. Everybody brought out commoner's food, such as jerkies, hard bread, and animal carcasses. Then, they put them on the ground in front of the chomper plant.I think you should take a look at
Cat bobbed its head up and down like a vibing bird. It gathered everything in its arms, aka branches. Then, it crawled away in glee.
Looking at the monster, a few servants giggled, finding it cute. As for the rest of the crew, they were astonished as they had never seen such a smart monster plant.
CREAK
The sound of an opening door disrupted their attention. An elderly man with a long beard came out of the building and gazed at them. As soon as they noticed Leo's rainbow aura, everybody knelt and prostrated on the ground, paying respect to Leo.
.
Leo had changed his clothes. He temporarily put on Hound Squad's uniform as his previous clothes were burnt and destroyed. Upon seeing the crowd of 200 people, Leo crossed his arms while he stroked his long beard.
"Welcome to my general store. You can come inside and have a look at my items. If you have any questions, you can either ask me or Wu Buyi over there. Also, we only accept lifespan as currency."
"L-Lifespan?! Our lifespan?" Everybody gulped. None of them dared to look up or raise their heads.
Leo glanced at Wu Buyi, who was the only one standing. The latter wiped his sweat with a handkerchief and elaborated to the crew, explaining how this store worked.
A minute later, the 200 cultivators raised their heads. They understood the instructions, but nobody was brave enough to enter the building.
Seeing that nobody moved, the captain of the ship, Zhong, volunteered so that Leo wouldn't be offended.
Zhong was born an orphan, so he had no surname. This year, he was 75. Although his strength reached the golden core stage, he was considered trash as his cultivation base stagnated for 40 years. Ouyang Long found him and enslaved him, forcing the guy to work here. And today, he ran into a new tyrant.
Preparing to die, Zhong took three steps forward. He politely cupped his fist, saluting the Florida Man.
"I wish to purchase your items. Could I see what you have for sale?"
Leo shrugged, gesturing him to enter the store. He also enabled Zhong to see his own lifespan.
.
Name: Zhong
Age: 75
Lifespan: 465 Years, 1 Month, 12 Days, 4 Hours, and 54 Minutes.
.
Seeing his lifespan for the first time, Zhong was astonished. His knees became as soft as jelly, and he fell on his knees.
"M-My lifespan?"
Leo didn't stop there : He allowed everybody else to see their lifespans. When 200 status menus appeared at once, the crowd murmured. They looked at their remaining years and compared them with their friends as if they were children comparing grade sheets.
Wu Buyi bitterly smiled while Leo widely grinned. The latter turned around, planning to walk into his store. But after walking two steps, he uttered.
"Mister Wu Buyi, you can keep the swords and the knives. I have no use for them."
"E-Eh?"
Wu Buyi widened his eyes and looked at the swords near Ouyang Long's remaining ash. His jaw slightly dropped.
"T-The swords? I can have those swords?!"
Leo rolled his eyes, "Don't make me repeat myself. Take them away or I'll smelt them into ores. I'm not into fencing."
"..."
Wu Buyi rushed toward the swords and picked them up. He rubbed the hilts and appraised them up close.
One of them was Ouyang Long's flying sword, which he often used as a personal flying vehicle. As for the other one, it was a Chinese thin broadsword. From a glance, it looked fragile as it could bend and curve like waves. However, Wu Buyi noticed its hidden properties.
It could store Fire and Water Essence inside the blades, and Wu Buyi could borrow its power at will. Moreover, it automatically regenerated its Qi and Essence.
In short, this broadsword was a treasure!
Wu Buyi kowtowed again. He slammed his head on the ground, "THANK YOU, SENIOR! I SWEAR WITH MY DAO OATH! I'LL FOLLOW YOU FOR LIFE!"
Leo rolled his eyes to avoid the cringe. He gazed at Zhong next.
"Come. I'm in a good mood today. All items are 50% off. Just tell me if you need something."
Zhong nodded and followed Leo into the store. He glanced at Wu Buyi, who received Ouyang Long's personal items as gifts. He thought to himself.
'Ouyang Long was selfish. He never gifts anybody except his son. But if this person is kind enough to reward others, maybe he is not as selfish as Ouyang Long.'
Zhong got his hopes up. He wondered what Leo had in store.
He was not disappointed. As soon as Zhong entered the building, he was greeted with unique refrigerators, shelves, and rare fruits. A large basket of Bloodmelons stood out like a sore thumb while a table nearby highlighted transparent boxes of pills.
"Grain pills?" Zhong was curious.
Leo nodded and explained, "Yes. Those are element grain pills. Normally, I sold them for 10 years of lifespan per pill, but I'll sell them for five years per pill. How about it?"
"WHAT?!"

chapters.title: Chapter 43 Local Laborers Idolize Florida Man As Savior
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 43 – Local Laborers Idolize Florida Man as Savior
Zhong cultivated Earth Qi, which was commonly known as an unpopular element. Cultivators commonly pursued offensive power and techniques so that they could have a strong signature skill or legacy, boosting their reputation and obtaining a cool Daoist Title.
Fire and Metal Elements were every cultivator's favorite as fire symbolized destruction while metal was versatile in offense and defense. Water Element came third as it prioritized support techniques, but it could still be useful in combat. Wood was also popular among alchemists and botanists, making it on the same tier as Water.
On the other hand, Earth seemed lackluster compared to Water or other elements. Mostly, Earth-based techniques focused on defensive abilities and craftsmanship. A few martial arts focused on Earth Elements, but they were far weaker than other elements in fights. As a result, alchemists avoided making earth element cultivation pills as they weren't marketable.
Without cultivation resources in the market, Zhong couldn't cultivate. Moreover, Zhong was old and weaker than his peers, so he couldn't enter any mystic realm.
However, in front of Zhong, there were so many earth grain pills. Although they weren't proper cultivation resources, they were enough to strengthen his dantian and foundation.
He saw hope!
"F-Five years of lifespan per pill?" Zhong trembled in excitement.
"Yes. Oh, those are old pills. If you want new ones with better quality, they are on the shelves. The price is 10 years per pill, though."
"Better quality?!"
Zhong ran toward the shelves and looked at the pills in the Tupperware boxes. As Leo said - they looked bigger and glossier. He began counting the pills in the box.
'20… 22… 25… there aren't many. I need to get all of these.'
Zhong reached out for the pills, planning to buy everything.
TOK-TOK
KLUK-KLUK
"Ah."
The sound of a marble hitting the wood floor and rolling distracted Zhong. He looked at Leo and noticed that the latter accidentally dropped two black marble balls. He helped the elder pick them up.
Leo wryly smiled, "Ah, thanks. Oh, you can put them anyway on the shelf. I can't touch you. If you touch me even the slightest, you will die."
"…"
Zhong gulped, thinking that Leo was threatening him. He obediently put the black stones on a shelf. Before Zhong let go of the stone, he noticed something.
The stones contained a thick amount of Earth Essence!
Not Qi, but Essence!
Furthermore, Zhong sensed other elements in there!
"S-Senior!" Zhong picked the two black balls and showed them to Leo, "Can I buy these?"
"Oh, that?"
Leo deeply sighed. They were once the blue stones that Ouyang Long dropped. Leo touched these stones with his bare hands, and they all mutated into essence stones.
.
[Essence Stone]
Can be found underground in any mystic realm. Unlike spirit stones, it contains a great amount of Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Element Qi.
[Traits]
Increase Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Element Essence by 10 years' worth of cultivation. (Consumption)
[Alchemy Recipe – Soul Stone]
1,000 Essence Stones
Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Catalyst
Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Essence
.
As Leo still remembered the detail, he came up with a price on the spot.
"Those are essence stones. One of them can give you about 10 years' worth of fire, water, metal, wood, and earth element essence. I'll sell you for 100 years of lifespan per stone. Oh, wait. That's the full price. How about 50 per stone after the discount?"
Leo learned from his past mistake. He used the amount of obtainable Qi as a base and add zero behind it to name the price. As Leo was in a good mood, he gave the captain a special discount.
Zhong almost fell to his knees while he held the two black stones in his hands. He repeatedly nodded, "E-Essence?! I-I'll buy them, senior! I'll also take all Earth grain pills!"
"Hoh?"
Leo rechecked Zhong's lifespan, worrying that he might not have enough to pay the bill. Fortunately, he had enough.
"That will cost 350 years of your life. Do you want the inferior earth grain pill, too?"
"Y-Yes, please."
"Good. There are five left, so… 375 years."
Leo walked picked up an empty Tupperware box and gathered the pills into one container. After closing the box, he put on rubber gloves to prevent accidents and passed the box to Zhong. He deducted the lifespan afterward.
Zhong received the container and put it in his spatial ring. Then, he bowed 90 degrees.
"THANK YOU VERY MUCH, SENIOR!"
"You're welcome. Alright. You can call the others to come in."
"Yes, senior!"
With this many pills and the two essence cores, he could finally break through the bottleneck and reached the nascent soul stage, becoming a true expert. Moreover, he might awaken new elements after consuming the essence stone.
Unbeknownst to both parties, Leo underpriced his items once again.
One year's worth of Qi in cultivator's terms meant 100 strands of Qi. However, when it came to essence, it translated as one drop of essence. Because cultivators needed 1,000 strands of Qi to condense one drop of essence, the value differed.
In summary, one year's worth of essence translated into 1,000 strands of Qi, which was equivalent to 10 years' worth of Qi!
As such, Zhong would gain a total of 100 years' worth of five elements Qi per essence stone, and he only needed to pay 50 years of lifespan!
That was a bargain!
Zhong was grateful. He shed a tear of gratitude, and he swore in his heart that he would never forget this kindness.
Meanwhile, Leo had no idea that he miscalculated once again. He thought that he got smarter as he managed to scam 375 years of life from a random dude.
Leo returned to his bedroom and collected more earth grain pills to refill the stock. While he was at it, he put a new box and filled it with the essence stones. Then, he placed the box on a shelf and waited for the next customer.
"NEXT, PLEASE!"
.
200 servants of Ouyang Long were skeptical at first as they didn't want to waste their lifespan buying useless pills or unknown objects. However, Zhong came out happy and showed them the two essence cores that he got. He also praised Leo.
"The elder is very kind! Don't be afraid and exchange your lifespan for the pills or items in there. You won't regret it."
The crowd didn't have as many years to live as Zhong as they were all foundation establishment cultivators - Their average lifespan was 280-350 years, which was not a lot.
Still, five of Zhong's colleagues braced for danger and entered the store.
Five minutes later, the five men came out with a wide smile on their faces. They rushed toward Zhong to thank him.I think you should take a look at
"Brother Zhong! You're right. The elder is generous!"
"Look at the pills and the essence stones! With these, we might even catch up to you!"
The five men all bought two essence stones and a dozen grain pills of their choice. Zhong looked at their items and was happy for them.
Noticing their reactions, the other servants stopped hesitating. They queued and entered the store, five people at a time. Wu Buyi acted as a bouncer, managing the number of people inside the store so they wouldn't be crowded.
.
Hours later, the sun rose. All servants got their items, and nobody could stop smiling.
After the last customer left the store, Leo came out to see the crowd. As soon as he came out, everybody saluted.
"THANK YOU, SENIOR!"
"WE ARE FOREVER GRATEFUL!"
Seeing the crowd's reactions, Leo was confused. He raised his brow and looked at Wu Buyi, but the latter shook his head.
Leo sighed and shrugged. He got so much from the transactions, so he didn't care what they thought. He parted them with a few words.
"Come back when you're stronger. This place will always open the door for you, regardless of your past or background."
"!!!"
Leo wanted them to come back as customers. However, his wording and the auto-translation system made it vague, and the crowd interpreted it differently.
"W-We can come back?"
"He will accept us?"
"H-He doesn't care about our backgrounds?"
The crowd thought that Leo would hire or take them in as his servants. They were astonished.
Leo coughed and waited for them to leave so that he could finalize his share with Wu Buyi. However, the crowd lingered as if they were confused about something.
Since they continued staying, Leo came up with a plan to make them leave. He gave them a random sermon.
"Listen. Indeed, everybody wasn't born equal. Some lucky bastards were born with a silver spoon in their mouths and got everything handed to them. On the other hand, people like us fought for clean water and competed for scraps to live for another day. We struggled our hardest to survive."
Listening to Leo's speech, half of the grown men shed manly tears, thinking of their bitter past struggles. His words resonated with their lives.
Leo coughed and borrowed some philosophies from his old world. "What do you think the difference between you and your former master is?"
Zhong swiped his tear. He answered, "Wealth and status?"
"Wrong."
"Eh?"
Wu Buyi also raised his brow. He asked, "S-Senior. What is it, then?"
Leo brightly smiled, "Opportunity."
"???"
Wu Buyi and the crowd still doubted Leo's word, but the latter continued asking them.
"What do you think you and your former master have in common?"
"…"
The crowd murmured. They weren't prepared for a sudden quiz, but Wu Buyi tried answering, "Two arms and legs?"
"Physically, that's correct, but that's not entirely right either."
"Then… what's the answer, senior?"
Leo giggled and looked at the crowd, "Opportunity."
"Huh?!"
The crowd and Wu Buyi were even more confused. Leo just said that Ouyang Long's opportunity and their opportunity were different. But a minute later, Leo flipped his words and said that they had the same opportunity.
After capturing the crowd's full attention, Leo got to his point.
"My point is – You and your master have the same opportunity, but his opportunity is different from yours since his parents and his family spoon-fed him everything. But for you, you actually have an equal opportunity, but nobody teaches you that you have. They're right in front of you, but you never realized it."
"!!?"
Leo pointed at the pills and essence stones they bought, "Those are your opportunity."
"!!!"
The crowd widened their eyes as everyone started to get the general idea of what opportunity Leo was talking about. As long as they could digest the element essence in the stones, their cultivation base would rise, which enabled their future opportunity.
Before they started imagining or interpreting his words the other way, Leo turned around and pointed at the store, "That is also your opportunity."
"T-This… I SEE!!"
Everybody finally understood what Leo tried to say. Had they cowered in fear and never taken a step in, they wouldn't have had the pills in their hands.
Leo pointed at Wu Buyi with his thumb, "That guy is also your opportunity."
"EH?!"
Again, the crowd was enlightened. Without Wu Buyi, nobody could have come down and gotten their pills and essence stones.
Leo clapped and laughed, "You see. Opportunities are around you. You see it, but you never seized it. In general, you lack information, but your ex-master has it. While you're in the dark, he seized almost every opportunity around him. You and your ex-master have equal opportunity, but you can't seize it because you don't know. That makes your opportunities different."
"W-Wow."
After sidetracking enough, Leo connected the point and made use of the teaching.
"Therefore, I want you to remember me, my store, and our encounter when you go home. Right now, you are still in trouble. Your master is dead, and you have no place to go. You might be lost, but you're not hopeless anymore. Opportunities are around you. Let me give you a push, aka another opportunity. This is a new page of your life. Go start anew with the pills and stones in your hands. Get stronger. Become someone successful. Once you overcome the hurdles or become successful, you can come back to my store with your heads held high. If you fail and encounter a roadblock, you can still come back to gain another opportunity from me. Got it?"
"…"
Zhong and his colleagues all knelt and cupped their fists. They lowered their head in unison while their tears covered their faces.
"I SWEAR WITH MY DAO OATH! I WILL NEVER FORGET YOUR TEACHINGS!"
"I'LL BECOME SOMEONE WORTHY TO BE YOUR SERVANT, SENIOR!"
"WE'LL BE STRONGER, AND WE WILL COME BACK TO REPAY YOU, SIR!"
Leo blankly gazed at the crowd, confused about what they were doing.
'Err… What the hell is wrong with you? I just want you peeps to get stronger and get more lifespan to spend in my store.'
Leo had no idea what they were thinking. He looked at Wu Buyi, asking him with his expression.
Meanwhile, Wu Buyi was still crying. He wiped his tear with his handkerchief and muttered, "Senior, your wisdom is profound and boundless. I'm so glad I'm following you."
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 44 Florida Man Teaches Elderly Man Nutting Techniques
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 44 – Florida Man Teaches Elderly Man Nutting Techniques
After the speech, Zhong brought his people back on the ship. Wu Buyi handed him the personal token of Ouyang Long and bid him farewell.
The flying ship took off. It was unknown if Zhong would bring them back to Cauliflower City or somewhere else. It was up to them to decide their fate.
After the people had left, Leo rechecked his gain.
All grain pills were sold out. After there was no pill left, everybody purchased three or four essence stones instead. Leo sat in front of his store and wrote a few numbers, calculating the sales.
750 low-graded grain pills, 150 lesser grain pills, and 650 essence stones sold.
7,500 + 750 + 32,500 = 40,750
Wu Buyi took a 10% share. He got a whopping 4,075 years as commission!
However, Leo was 36,675 richer. Combined with what he had, he got 41,663 to spend!
He was rich!
Both Wu Buyi and Leo laughed in unison. The former's laughter was the loudest as he never imagined that he would get this much after one trip. However, his laughter was not long.
While wearing rubber gloves, Leo poked Wu Buyi from behind. The former brightly smiled and opened his palm.
"The payment for the elixir pills?"
"…"
Wu Buyi's smiling face was frozen. A second later, he sweated profusely. Wu Buyi took a step back and presented Leo with a spatial ring.
"I-I have sold the elixir for spirit stones, senior. Everything I have is in my ring. You can check it."
Leo deeply frowned as he still remembered how items could burst out of these rings. He clicked his tongue, not wanting to explode another ring.
Noticing Leo's dark expression, Wu Buyi trembled in fear. He kowtowed, "PLEASE FORGIVE ME! I TRIED MY BEST TO GET THE BEST VALUE OUT OF THE PILLS, SIR!"
Leo rolled his eyes and calculated what he should do with Wu Buyi. He wasn't angry at him, but he didn't know how to use the ring. Leo was also concerned if he should ask Wu Buyi directly.
After a brief thought, Leo decided to reveal more secrets to the alchemist.
"Listen, Wu Buyi. I don't know how to use the rings. Can you teach me?"
Wu Buyi's ears perked up. He raised his head and cheerfully smiled, "Of course, I can teach you anything… eh?"
Finally, Wu Buyi realized something wrong – It was common knowledge that cultivators could use spatial rings to carry items in the ring's pocket space. Every foundation establishment cultivator had at least one ring with them, and these rings could be purchased in any big city or big sect. Even young adults knew how to use one.
However, Leo, who looked like an ancient figure, had no idea how to use a spatial ring?
Wasn't he an immortal?
Ouyang Long's words when they were on the airship haunted him.
[He's a fake cultivator!]
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm Wu Buyi shook his head, getting rid of the thought. However, his doubt lingered and drove the alchemist crazy. Unable to figure it out, Wu Buyi probed for information.
"S-Senior, can you turn normal grass into immortal grass?"
Leo snorted, "What if I say I can."
"Y-YOU CAN?!"
Again, Leo scoffed and wiggled his finger, asking Wu Buyi to follow after him. The latter nodded and followed Leo into the woods.
After walking 200 meters, they left the contaminated soil and found regular pine trees and grasses. Although there were traces of Cat's rampage in the area, most of the plants were green.
Leo pointed at the grass and plants, "Are they immortal grasses?"
"No. Of course not, senior. Those are plain grasses."I think you should take a look at
"Good."
Leo took off his gloves and uprooted a stalk of grass. The grass blades instantly turned black. He then showed it to Wu Buyi.
"Is this immortal grass?"
Wu Buyi gasped for a moment. Then, he bit his lower lip and prostrate to the ground.
"PLEASE FORGIVE ME! I DIDN'T MEAN TO OFFEND YOU!"
"Meh, forget it. Now that you know, keep your mouth shut."
"YES, SENIOR!"
Leo placed his hand on a pine tree, mutating it into an iron pine tree. As usual, he hugged and uprooted it. He put the entire log on the ground and began harvesting iron nuts and leaves. He also tossed a handful of mutated pine nuts toward Wu Buyi.
"Do you know what they are?"
"Umm, pine nuts, senior?"
"Wrong. They are iron pine nuts. You can make iron grain pills with them. One iron pine nut, one starch, one metal catalyst, and Fire Qi is all you need. But if you use multiple essences like me, you will get element grain pills."
"Y-Yes, senior!"
Wu Buyi never heard of this recipe before even though he was an expert alchemist for decades. He took notes and kept the nuts in his spatial rings.
However, Leo didn't stop there. He pointed at the fallen tree and ordered Wu buyi.
"The leaves of the tree can be used as metal element catalysts. There are also plenty of nuts here. Go and collect everything."
"YES, SENIOR!"
Wu Buyi quickly collected nuts and leaves. With a spatial ring, Wu Buyi finished harvesting within two minutes. Meanwhile, Leo observed Wu Buyi how the latter used the ring as storage, learning from watching.
.
Leo led Wu Buyi back to the store. While walking Leo resumed asking him about spatial rings.
"Tell me about the rings. How can I use them? Teach me like I'm six years old."
"Y-Yes, senior."
Wu Buyi stopped hesitating or questioning Leo. He taught the Florida Man like how he taught his disciples.
"These rings are called "Spatial Rings". The Situ Clan and the Fang Clan are in charge of mass-producing them. There are two types of rings – locked rings and ownerless rings, but we'll talk about them later. Every cultivator can simply insert a strand of Qi into the ring and fetch the items you seek from the pocket space, granted that they are ownerless rings. Also…"
Wu Buyi explained the nature of locked rings and ownerless ones. He also taught Leo how to deposit items into the rings.
By the time they returned to the store, Wu Buyi finished his lecture. However, Leo looked dissatisfied.
Leo had no idea what Qi or essence was. So far, he had been using his saliva as "Essence" instead of using inner energy or superpower. He wanted to ask Wu Buyi to teach him how to use Qi, but his face wasn't thick enough to do so.
For the moment, Leo got what he wanted. As for the ring issues, he would eventually solve them. He kept the ring that Wu Buyi had given him. Then, he entered the store and fetched a new bottle of Rejuvenate Tea and threw it toward Wu Buyi.
The alchemist received it and noticed the tea's quality. He widely grinned, "Thank you, master!"
Leo scoffed, "Next time, buy it with your own lifespan. If you don't have anything else to do, go home. I'm going to work on my store."
"Yes, master!"
Wu Buyi deeply bowed and flew back to Magpie City, heading back to Life Sword Sect.
Meanwhile, Leo didn't notice how Wu Buyi had been addressing him. It changed from "Fellow Daoist" to "Senior", and then "Senior" to "Master". His mind was occupied with countless plans and the shopping system.
After Wu Buyi was gone, Leo rushed and began upgrading his store, aiming to raise the alchemy workshop's quality to the max.

chapters.title: Chapter 45 Florida Man Discovers New Giant Potato Species, Turns Everything Into French Fries
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 45 – Florida Man Discovers New Giant Potato Species, Turns Everything into French Fries
With 41,663 years of lifespan to spend, Leo planned his expansion. He upgraded the workshops to level 4, using 2,000 years. Then, he increased the pill quality to level 3.
.
Basic Alchemy Workshop Level 4
Production Quality Level – (3/5)
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
[Research New Ingredient]
[Pill Making]
.
As usual, the next upgrade required the general store building level 5, and it would be costly. Since Leo had no issue with lifespan, he continued upgrading the general store building.
DING
<Will you upgrade the Humble General Store to Level 5?>
<Upgrading requires 4,000 years of lifespan.>
"No problem! Do it!"
DING
DING
<Humble General Store has been upgraded to Level 5.>
<New Construction Options!>
RUMBLE
The store building trembled as the interior space expanded once again. Leo inspected the size and widely grinned.
Previously, the interior space was 20x20. After the upgrade, it became 25x25. The 625 square meters of space, modern LED lighting, and air conditioners had the same standard as modern convenience stores. The wooden floor was covered by seamless white marble tiles, making the store brighter.
Leo rushed to the store's back room right away, wondering if his bedroom expanded.
"YESSSS!"
As Leo had expected, it got bigger, but there were changes. The previous one-door entrance became a double-door model, and the backdoor behind the storeroom also became the same type. The previous hole that Leo had made were sealed and replaced with double metal doors.
Satisfied with the changes, Leo scanned the corners of the store next, hoping for a modern toilet.
"NOOO!!"
Unfortunately, the humble general store didn't follow Japan's standards. No restroom or toilet existed for customers.
Leo was dejected. He walked randomly into the store and deeply sighed, preparing to rearrange the fridges and shelves once again. As Leo kept walking, he found a partitioned section next to his bedroom. He stopped thinking, then he checked the new area.
There was a small room hiding in a corner. Leo approached the wooden door and opened it. Then, he discovered what he always desired.
A modern toilet for employees was right in front of him.
"YEEEEEEEAAAAAAHHH!!"
Leo fell on his knees and kissed the toilet bowl. He hugged it and cried.
"I missed you so much! I'm tired of outhouses!"
At long last, Leo could take the number two without getting stalked by a certain dung eater. Although this toilet came without a bidet, Leo was fine with it. If he wanted to, he could always purchase a bidet from the online shopping system to install it later.
Still, the existence of the toilet brought new questions.
Where does the water go?
Where does the waste go?
Leo didn't remember installing a water system or a septic tank under the store. He was also afraid that the toilet wasn't connected to any drainage system, and that the toilet's content might flood the restroom as soon as he flushed the toilet.
He looked inside the room and found the standard face-washing basin and a mirror. He opened the faucet, checking if the water ran.
ZAAAA
The water ran, and Leo was baffled.
Where does this water come from?!
Leo scooped the water and drank it. It tasted exactly like tap water in the modern world.
As disciplined as he was, Leo turned off the faucet, saving the water. He then flushed the toilet to see if the water would flood the restroom.
ZAAAA
The water flowed normally as the blue water refilled the bowl. Nothing leaked from the bottom of the toilet, and there was no smell.
Leo had the urge to remove the toilet to see the water system. But since the system could magically upgrade electric appliances, he left the toilet be. After all, there was no point in learning how every atom in the world worked or existed.
After getting the store to level five, Leo resumed his routine. He upgraded the two workshops to level five as well.
.
Basic Alchemy Workshop Level 5
Production Quality Level – (4/5)
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
[Research New Ingredient]
[Pill Making]
.
If Leo could upgrade the workshops one more time, the production quality level would max out. He was excited to see how his future pills would come out.
After spending 8,000 years of lifespan, Leo was left with 33,663 years. He continued shopping and browsed the domain system, looking at the buildable structures.
.
Warehouse
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 4
Price – 500 Years of Lifespan
Space – 5 x 5
.
Small House
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 4
Price – 500 Years of Lifespan
Space – 5 x 5
.
Farm Plot
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 4
Price – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 10 x 10
.
Farm Plot (2)
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 5
Price – 1,000 Years of LifespanI think you should take a look at
Space – 10 x 10
.
Granary
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 5
Price – 500 Years of Lifespan
Space – 5 x 5
.
Stone Road
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 4
Price – 1 Year of Lifespan
Space – 1 x 1
.
Asphalt Road
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 4
Price – 3 Years of Lifespan
Space – 1 x 1
.
Concrete Road
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 4
Price – 5 Years of Lifespan
Space – 1 x 1
.
Only the second farm plot and a granary were added to the list. Looking at the icons, Leo couldn't decide which structure to build first. But since Leo loved being productive, he chose to build two farm plots first.
Leo came out of the store and opened the domain map menu. As he had cleared the land around the main general store, he had plenty of room to place new farms. Leo dropped the two 10x10 farmland ten grids south of the store, aka in front of the store.
As soon as Leo confirmed the construction, the land in front of the store was flattened. The dark dirt was automatically plowed and softened, suitable to plant any seed.
Leo giggled and carried a sack of seeds that Wu Buyi had given him days ago. He dropped the sack in the middle of the first farm plot and touched the soil.
DING
Suddenly, the area lit up, and the system showed the farm's status.
<Please allocate your point. Your current free point: 1.>
.
Basic Farmland Level 1
Automaton Farmer – (0/1)
Growth Speed Level – (0/5)
Production Quality Level – (0/5)
Production Quantity Level – (0/5)
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
.
"Hmm?"
It was different from the workshop - Alchemy workshops came with a pre-assigned point, but the farmland allowed Leo to choose.
Without hesitation, Leo spent 4,000 years of his lifespan, upgrading the two farmlands to level five. Then, he assigned five points to quality. He rushed to the second farm and did the same.
