Instantly, 8,000 years of lifespan were gone. Leo was left with 23,663 years of lifespan.
.
Basic Farmland Level 5
Automaton Farmer – (0/1)
Growth Speed Level – (0/5)
Production Quality Level – (5/5) (Max)
Production Quantity Level – (0/5)
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
.
"Alright!"
Leo hummed as he bought a hoe from the shopping system to plow the land. But again, as soon as his tool hit the farmland, the system prompted him with a message.
<Please drop your seeds on the farm to cultivate (0/100).>
"…"
Leo crossed his arms, looking at the system message. He deeply sighed.
"I guess I'm a real CULTIVATOR (farmer), now. Damn!"
Without adequate farming knowledge, Leo randomly picked one hundred seeds from the sack and scattered them around the farmland.
DING
<27/100>
<40/100>
The number kept going up. Leo giggled and kept spreading the seeds. When the number hit the requirement, the message changed.
DING
<Cultivating…>
Similar to the workshop cauldrons, a timer appeared above the farmland. However, there was a piece of additional information.
<Time: 59 Minutes, 55 Seconds…>
<Possible Result: Unidentified Potato 100 %.>
"One hour?!" Leo was stunned. "Are you beansprouts?! Why do you grow so fast?!"
While standing on the farm, the seeds that Leo had randomly thrown sank into the soil. Then, gold sprouts emerged from the ground.
Leo gulped and stood there, waiting for the plants to mature. Leo forgot that he had another farm he hadn't planted anything yet.
10 minutes passed. The potato plants reached knee height. At a glance, they looked mature enough to be harvested, but they continued growing.
30 minutes later, every potato plant was chest high. The farmland turned into a mini jungle.
When the timer was over, every plant was a head taller than Leo. He gasped and gazed at the massive plants in awe. Then, he slowly uprooted a plant, and a massive head of potato came out.
The massive potato was three meters deep in the soil, and its glossy skin lustered in gold color. The potato was boiling hot even though Leo hadn't done anything to it, and it gave out a burnt sweet potato scent.
Leo salivated. The smell reminded him of a fast-food franchise.
"How many French Fries can I make with these?!"

chapters.title: Chapter 46 Florida Man Hides Expensive French Fries In Impenetrable Granary, Raided By His Cat
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 46 – Florida Man Hides Expensive French Fries in Impenetrable Granary, Raided by His Cat
Planting crops was fine and dandy, but harvesting and storing such a massive potato could be a chore. After pulling out the 3-meter-long gold potato, Leo harvested more.
When Leo was done, the farmland self-repaired itself, reverting to the soft-plowed land with black dirt. Meanwhile, Leo gawked at the pile of massive radioactive potatoes, sitting on the south of the farmland. The majority of potatoes came out smaller than the first one while a few had the same size. They emitted the pleasant scent of boiled sweet potatoes even though they were raw.
Leo picked the smallest piece, which was as big as his entire body. He patted off the dirt and peeled its skin with his fingernails. Then, he took a bite.
The texture was soft and hot. It also tasted exactly like sweet potatoes.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 1 year.>
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm Similar to wolf meat – A mouthful of potato gave Leo a year of lifespan. Moreover, it was delicious.
However, it lacked something important. It lacked sauces!
Leo cut a small piece of potato there to research. He rushed to the first workshop and fetch a handful of tomatoes. Then, he brought them to the alchemy cauldron.
DING
He researched the potato first, hoping to see something good.
.
Virgin Yang Potato (Perfect-Grade)
Can only be found in a mystic realm with a hot and wet climate. It's a rare breed that instantly grows by absorbing fire essence from the ground and environment. However, it also instantly withers within a few minutes after it has been harvested. Alchemists value it highly as Virgin Yang Potatoes are a rare catalyst for yang-type cultivation pills. Can also be used as a substitute for starch in cooking.
[Traits]
Increase a massive amount of lifespan (consumption)
Guarantee 100% pill-refinement success chance if used as a catalyst
Extremely delicious!
.
Fiery Yang Tomato
Can only be found in a mystic realm in a hot climate. It contains a thick amount of Fire Essence, and it can be refined into fire-type cultivation pills. Chefs also love them as they make good tomato sauce, though they are a little spicier than regular tomatoes.
[Pill Recipe – Yang Flame Dan]
One Virgin Yang Tomato
One Yang Catalyst
Fire Element Catalyst
Fire Essence
.
Leo giggled as the tomatoes and the new potatoes suited each other. He tested them by trying to make some pills first. As Leo hated multi-tasking, he brought two sets of ingredients and filled the two cauldrons at once.
DING
The cauldrons rumbled and automatically closed the lids. A timer appeared.
2 Hours, 59 Minutes, 58 Seconds
"Three hours, huh?"
Leo disliked the long waiting time. Moreover, he had one more issue – The potatoes could quickly go bad!
Leo rushed back to the pile of potatoes, hoping that they would still be fresh. Unfortunately, it was too late. When Leo got back, all potatoes, including the half-eaten one, already turned purple. It only took less than five minutes for them to rot.
Leo shrugged and deeply sighed. They might look inedible by a human standard, but his stomach was different. Not wasting the food, he grabbed the purple potatoes and continued eating them as if nothing had happened. The premium taste was gone, replaced by the moldy odor and moss.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 1 year.>
<You are immune to Yang Poison.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 1 year.>
<You are immune to Yang Poison.>
<Your lifespan…>
…
An hour later, all harvested potatoes withered and transformed into black soil. Leo gazed at the half-eaten potato, which turned into black dirt.
This was the primary issue of this plant - They grew fast, but they also died early. Leo wished he could have magic that could stop food from going bad.
Thinking of a place to store food, Leo recalled that he hadn't constructed some system buildings yet. He threw the dirt away and explored the shop domain system.
Granary and warehouse building icons in the system window shone, standing out from the rest. Leo pursed his lips, wondering if they were a waste of lifespan or if they could solve the storage issues. As he had nothing to lose but lifespan, Leo tried building a granary, placing the 5x5-grid building south of the farmland.
A small 25-square-meter hut appeared. Leo deeply sighed in disappointment and touched the small frame of the hut's door, wondering if it was upgradeable.
Leo was surprised. The system prompted him with a message.
<Will you upgrade the Granary Level 1 to Level 2?>
.
Granary Level 1
Storage Size Level – (1/5)
Food Preservation Level – (0/5)
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
.
There weren't many things to choose from. However, the food preservation option was the most attractive here. Leo pressed the text, wondering if the system would be kind enough to tell him what effect it would give.
DING
A new window popped up, showing the detail.
.
Food Preservation Level 1I think you should take a look at
– Prevent pests, worms, insects, and rats from entering the granary.
- Preserve food and prevent food deterioration for one week.
Food Preservation Level 2
– Prevent small animals from entering the granary.
- Preserve food and prevent food deterioration for two weeks.
Food Preservation Level 3
– Prevent large animals from entering the granary.
- Preserve food and prevent food deterioration for one month.
Food Preservation Level 4
- No unauthorized humans, cultivators, spirits, monsters, or demons can enter the granary.
- Preserve food and prevent food deterioration for three months.
Food Preservation Level 5
- No microorganism, germ, bacteria, fungi, or virus can enter the granary.
- Preserve food and prevent food deterioration for one year.
.
Leo's jaw dropped. He finally understood the usefulness of the granary. Without hesitation, Leo quickly upgraded the granary to level 5. Then, he put two points to the food preservation level right away.
But before Leo put any point to the storage size level, he examined the interior of the granary first. He opened the small door and looked inside.
It was as small as the exterior as it only covered 25 square meters. It was not enough to store Leo's massive crops.
Leo left the granary and put two points into the storage level. Then, he rechecked the structure again.
RUMBLE
The outward appearance of the granary improved, but it still looked like a small cabin. The building had a double-door entrance, and it was 2.5 meters high, which seemed too big for a small structure.
But when Leo got inside, he had a déjà vu. The storage room was many times larger than it appeared. Similar to what had happened to his general store, the interior space was expanded while the exterior remained the same.
Leo looked at the ceiling and measured it with his eyes. It was as least 5-6 meters high. Then, he paced in the store and looked at the clean marble floor. After walking for 30 minutes, he managed to roughly guess the dimension.
'At least 100x100 dimension. DAMN, it's huge!'
He reopened the granary status and rechecked its description. This time, he pressed the storage size level text to see the detail.
.
Granary Level 5
Storage Size Level – (3/5)
Food Preservation Level – (2/5)
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
.
Storage Size Level 1 – 25 x 25 m
Storage Size Level 2 –50 x 50 m
Storage Size Level 3 – 100 x 100 m
Storage Size Level 4 – 150 x 150 m
Storage Size Level 5 – 250 x 250 m
.
Leo almost cried. For once, his investment was worth every penny. He wished he had known about its secret and built it earlier.
As the food issues were solved, Leo resumed growing crops. He scattered seeds to the two farmland, growing more potatoes.
One hour later, the two 100sqmt farmlands produced 200 giant heads of Virgin Yang Potatoes. Leo dug them all by hand and stored them in the massive granary. Then, he sat there, watching the mountain of gold.
10 minutes passed. The food didn't change.
30 minutes later, nothing rotted. The hot potatoes still looked fresh and the sweet scent made Leo hungry again.
Leo shed a manly tear. He prostrated to the ground and kissed the marble floor of the granary.
His food was secured. He had enough French fries for life!
After securing his source of French fries, Leo returned to his original plan, aka making ketchup and sauces. He skipped and danced back to the workshop.
.
Meanwhile, Leo's action didn't escape Cat's eyes. It widely grinned.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
It stalked Leo and waited for him to go into the workshop building. As soon as he went in to fetch some tomatoes, Cat nimbly climbed down and sprinted toward the granary. As the doors were large, Cat managed to slip inside to see the interior.
Food Preservation Level 2 did not grant Leo enough security to repel Cat, who was a monster plant, from accessing the granary. As a result, Cat easily got in.
"MYAAA?!"
Cat was surprised when it found the massive interior space and the mountain of gold potatoes. It salivated as the scent was irresistible.
As the previous elixir grain pill's effect had already worn off, Cat could eat hard food again. It climbed the potato mountain. Then, it started nom-noming.
Nobody noticed Cat's dao avatar spirit, who had been following the plant around. The infant shone in gold light as it absorbed the virgin yang energy from its master.
The infant spirit's eyes glittered, and she widely smiled. She faded and disappeared into Cat's body, and the plant also emitted gold light.
CREAK
The eye parasites suddenly sank into Cat's skin. Then, a small head of a tan-skinned little girl emerged, and the prosthetic eyes became her eyes. She slowly pushed her head out, extending her body out of the chomper's head.
The little baby girl laughed. As she and the large chomper mouth were the same body and soul, they meowed in unison.
"Meow <3"

chapters.title: Chapter 47 Florida Man Invents AI Robot, Neighbor Panics
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 47 – Florida Man Invents AI Robot, Neighbor Panics
While Cat ransacked Leo's granary, the latter was busy shopping. As he had learned from the granary, he built a warehouse behind the first alchemy workshop. Then, he checked its upgradeable features.
.
Warehouse Level 1
Warehouse Automaton Level - (0/5)
Storage Size Level – (1/5)
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
.
Different from the granary, the warehouse offered automaton workers, which seemed odd. Leo was puzzled about what the warehouse workers could contribute to this building, so he pressed on the text, hoping to see its detail.
DING
Leo wasn't disappointed. A new window appeared, explaining how the worker would do.
.
Automaton Worker Level 1
- Enable one warehouse automaton
- Automaton will automatically gather items in the shop domain that exists in your warehouse.
Automaton Worker Level 2
- Enable two warehouse automatons
- Retain the previous operation function.
- Increase automatons' traveling speed by 20%.
Automaton Worker Level 3
- Enable three warehouse automatons
- Retain the previous operation function.
- Automatons can explore outside of the shop domain for resources.
- Increase automatons' traveling speed and gathering speed by 30%.
Automaton Worker Level 4
- Enable four warehouse automatons
- Retain the previous operation functions.
- Automatons can mine minerals, chop wood, and collect food resources inside and outside the shop domain.
- Increase automatons' traveling speed, gathering speed, and carry limit by 50%.
Automaton Worker Level 5
- Enable five warehouse automatons
- Retain the previous operation functions.
- Automatons can hunt and butcher animals for meat and other resources.
- Automatons can retaliate if provoked or attacked first.
- Increase automatons' traveling speed, gathering speed, and carry limit by 100%.
- Increase automatons' strength, stamina, agility, and dexterity by 100%.
.
Once again, Leo regretted not building a warehouse earlier. He smacked his forehead and upgraded the warehouse to level five. Then, he increased the workshop size to level four and added one level to the automaton feature.
The physical appearance of the warehouse changed from a hut to a concrete house with a massive double door. However, the interior of the building expanded to 22,500 sqm, which was larger than the general store's space. The ceiling was also taller than the granary.
CRACK-CREAK
A wooden humanoid mannequin rose up from the ground. It stood on two legs while its arms dangled. Its face had two camera lenses, serving as its eyes. However, it had no mouth or nose.
Looking at the round head of the human-sized wooden doll, Leo wondered how he would order it to work. It simply stood there, staring forward in a daze.
Leo patted its head, checking if he could summon a system window to command it. Unfortunately, nothing happened. After pondering for a few minutes, Leo remembered that the description told him to add an item to the warehouse first.
He pushed a large bin of blue stones and essence stones into the warehouse. Then, he placed it at the center of the building.
Before Leo could walk out, the automaton mannequin turned around and walked toward another large bin behind the workshop. Although it walked like a ragdoll, it moved its arms, pushing the bin toward the warehouse.
Leo watched it work. The doll was a lot slower than him as it didn't have the same superman strength. It took a few minutes for the doll to bring a large bin full of blue stones to the building.
The automaton didn't stop there. As soon as the bin entered the warehouse, its head turned 360 degrees as it observed the warehouse's space. Then, it pushed the second bin toward the deepest part of the warehouse and carefully arranged it there. It moved to the first bin and brought it next to the second container afterward.
Seeing how it automatically arranged the warehouse, Leo was satisfied. He left the doll alone to fetch other resources, which he had stored in the first alchemy workshop. He spent hours moving the food-related alchemy ingredients to the granary, and he tossed in some iron tree bark and iron pine nuts into the warehouse, letting the automaton recognize the collectible resources.
DING
After three hours passed, the workshops completed the Yang Flame Dan. Leo stopped what he was doing and went to the cauldron to see the result.
When Leo opened the first cauldron's lid, 30 red Ping-Pong-sized balls were covered in flame, and they hovered over the pot. The flame balls were suspended there, waiting to be collected.
Not afraid of the fire, Leo took off his gloves and grabbed one of them with his bare hand.
DING
<The Basic Alchemy Workshop Level 5 has refined 15 Medium-Grade, 13 High-Grade, and 2 Superior Yang Flame Dans.>
.
Medium-Grade Yang Flame Dan
Increase physical strength by 25% for 120 Hours
Increase fire essence by 50 years' worth of cultivation
Increase yang Qi by 50 Years' worth of cultivation
Increase lifespan by 5 years
.
High-Grade Yang Flame Dan
Increase physical strength by 35% for 168 Hours
Increase fire essence by 70 years' worth of cultivation
Increase yang Qi by 70 Years' worth of cultivation
Increase lifespan by 7 years
.
Superior-Grade Yang Flame Dan
Increase physical strength by 50% for 240 Hours
Increase fire essence by 100 years' worth of cultivation
Increase yang Qi by 100 Years' worth of cultivation
Increase lifespan by 10 years
.
The pill quality made a difference. Leo was glad that he had upgraded the workshop correctly. At long last, Leo had proper cultivation pills for cultivators.
'These balls are similar to wolf Fenrir Dantian Pills. Speaking of which, I only have two sets of materials. I should upgrade the workshop's quality to the max first.'
Leo collected the cultivation balls and stored them in an empty Tupperware in the warehouse. Afterward, he queued the cauldrons to make more cultivation pills. Then, he rechecked his remaining lifespan.
<Current Lifespan: 14,688 Years…>
"Hold up. Where does all my lifespan go?"
Noticing that a lot of his lifespan was gone, Leo was shocked. A shopping spree could sometimes be financially dangerous as money could vanish in a flash.
Leo had planned to upgrade the store to level six, but upon seeing how little he had, Leo changed his mind. He stopped the upgrade project and summoned the shopping system. Afterward, he searched for a language skill that he had bookmarked a few days ago.
DING
[Divine Shang Language Auto-Speech Translation] – 20,000 Years of Lifespan
[Divine Shang Language Reading Comprehension Knowledge] – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
Leo smacked his forehead. He no longer had enough lifespan to buy the auto-speech translation feature. However, he still had enough for the reading skill.
Although vexing, Leo purchased the reading comprehension skill so that he could read books of this world.I think you should take a look at
DING
<Integrating knowledge, please do not move…>
Two hundred small floating system panels appeared and surrounded Leo. Strong rays of light burst out, followed by the intense pain that stunned Leo. His vision blurred, and he was forced to kneel.
Leo remembered this feeling. It always happened whenever his cancer cells and his DNA evolved. Every time it happened, he always fell unconscious for days or months. The last time, it took him six months to recover. Leo was afraid that he might black out for a year this time.
The two hundred system windows vanished, and the system congratulated him.
DING
<Divine Shang Language Reading Comprehension Skill has been successfully installed.>
"…"
Surprisingly, Leo didn't faint. The pain vanished like smoke. His vision slowly recovered, and he regained his body balance. Leo stood up while he massaged his temples.
"What was that?"
Leo dragged his feet and looked for a sacred wood block to sit on. However, as Cat stole all sacred wood, he found nothing in front of his store. Noticing that his precious sacred wood chairs were gone, Leo yelled at Cat.
"DAMN CAT! DID YOU EAT MY FREAKING CHAIRS?!"
Because of his loud noise, Cat rushed out of the granary. As soon as "she" left the building, Leo noticed her.
Seeing how Cat emerged from his precious granary, Leo was enraged. He felt like his pet had sneaked into his fridge and eaten the food inside.
"DAMN CAT! YOU ATE MY POTATOES, DIDN'T YOU?!"
"MYAAA!!"
Cat ran away. She sprinted, using her roots like spider legs.
After Cat vanished into the forest, Leo scratched his head and rushed inside the granary to see the carnage - Pieces of potatoes and dirt scattered all over the floor. Two of the giant potatoes were half-eaten, but the rest was soiled and scratched by Cat's thorny vines, roots, and branches.
"…"
Leo deeply sighed. Although he was angry, he wasn't heartless enough to hit the innocent creature. Moreover, Leo could simply grow more potatoes to replace the damaged ones, so there was no point getting mad at Cat. He fetched a broom in the alchemy workshop and cleaned the place. As for the small pieces of potatoes, he collected them to a corner, planning to either use them as cat food or alchemy materials later.
.
.
Late morning of the same day, Wu Buyi returned to Life Sword Sect. He headed back to the alchemy quarter, but he ran into his colleague.
Han Hao, who was in charge of preparing the mystic realm gate, found the returning alchemist. He stopped what he was doing to greet the guy.
"Hey, how's business, you lazy bum?" Han Hao sneered at Wu Buyi.
"Excellent! My lifespan is now over 4,000!"
"…"
The corners of Han Hao's mouth twitched. He was envious and annoyed that Wu Buyi ditched the sect's work for a side job. Thus, he reminded Wu Buyi.
"Don't forget about the mystic realm opening. There are less than 2 weeks left, and we don't have enough healing pills for the participants."
Hearing about the mystic realm, Wu Buyi remembered that he hadn't heard about the quota of the sect yet, "What about the quota selection? Have the sect master decided?"
"Yeah. Five elders, two deacons, one core disciple, one inner disciple, and one outer disciple."
"What about me? Do I get the elder slot?"
Han Hao cackled, "Of course not. You missed the selection meeting. Why would anybody vote to send you?"
"Tsk!"
Wu Buyi's expression turned ugly as he missed this season's expedition. Still, he instantly recovered and grinned as he no longer needed to rely on the mystic realm to grow stronger.
He had 4,000 years to live. Why should he compete for a trivial travel ticket?
"Fine. Anyway, care for a drink?"
Wu Buyi brought out a bottle of rejuvenate tea that he got from Leo. Seeing the juice, Han Hao drooled and repeatedly nodded, "Yes! Yes! Right away, my good friend."
"Tsk, you two-face geezer."
"Hehehe. Why should I decline such a delicacy? Come on, let us drink that premium tea!"
Both men laughed and flew toward Han Hao's pagoda.
.
Wu Buyi and Han Hao forgot about work and enjoyed the delicious tea. However, one liter of tea could not last long. 20 minutes later, the bottle was empty.
Both men looked at the empty bottle and deeply sighed. They wished they had a dozen bottles of rejuvenate tea to enjoy.
Wu Buyi thought of Leo's shop. He remembered that there were a dozen bottles in the fridges, and it only cost 200 years of lifespan per bottle. With his membership, the price would only be 180. He counted his fingers, calculating if he should sacrifice a couple thousand years of his life for such luxury.
While Wu Buyi was in deep thought, Han Hao asked, "Stinky crook, you went to the capital city, right?"
"Yeah, what about it?"
"Have you met Ouyang Long?"
"Ah…"
Wu Buyi remembered the incident. He sweated profusely, wondering if he should tell his friend.
Han Hao continued asking, "I bet Ouyang Long knows about his son's death, and he must be dying to come here and find the killer. Say, damn crook, I heard an airship pass by. Was it Ouyang Long's ship?"
"…"
Wu Buyi didn't know what to explain. He was afraid that Han Hao might have a heart attack if he revealed the truth.
Meanwhile, Han Hao noticed the strange expression of Wu Buyi. He frowned, "Why are you nervous? Something happened?"
"Umm, there is an issue…" Wu Buyi fidgeted, unable to craft the right words to explain.
"…"
Han Hao suspected his colleague. He stopped looking at his face and scanned through Wu Buyi's clothes and belongings with his eyes and Qi. Then, he noticed an aura of a premium flying sword, which Wu Buyi had put it next to his chair.
"Where did you get that flying sword? I have a feeling that I have seen it somewhere before."
"…"
"Also, isn't that a treasure sword behind you? I thought you hated practicing swordsmanship. Why are you carrying a sword artifact? And why the hell hasn't your aura merged with the sword? Is it not yours?"
"…"
Wu Buyi couldn't hide it anymore. He slowly pulled out a name token from his sleeve pocket and put it on a table in front of them.
It was the name token of Ouyang Long.
Wu Buyi took several deep breaths to calm down while Han Hao's eyes were almost ejected out from the eye sockets due to shock. Then, the former confessed.
"Daoist Florida Man has killed Ouyang Long. He's dead."
"…"
"…"
Both men remained quiet for five minutes, and their expressions were dark and solemn, maintaining Kenshiro-like faces. Han Hao's hand didn't stop shaking as he reached out to pick up the name token to see up close. Then, he asked in a hoarse voice.
"… When did it happen?"
"Umm, last night."
"… Wasn't Ouyang Long as strong as our sect master?"
"Yes."
"… And how is Daoist Florida Man? Is he injured?"
"No."
"… And how did Ouyang Long die?"
"Daoist Florida Man instantly turns him to ash. I don't know how."
"… Was the fight fierce?"
"One-sided. Ouyang Long died in one move."
"…"
Han Hao and Wu Buyi's expressions were solemn. The former slowly stood and muttered.
"... Let's run away."
"But why?!"
"I DON'T CARE!" Han Hao cried a river, "I DON'T WANNA DIE! THE JIANGHU ALLIANCE'S GOONS ARE GOING TO SWARM OUR SECT! WE NEED TO CONVINCE OUR SECT MASTER TO GET THE HELL OUTTA HERE RIGHT NOW!"

chapters.title: Chapter 48 Arrest Warrants Issued Against Florida Man For Allegedly Disintegrating Corrupted Cop To Ash
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 48 – Arrest Warrants Issued against Florida Man for Allegedly Disintegrating Corrupted Cop to Ash
200 kilometers north of Cauliflower City was Frozen King City, the home of the Ouyang Clan. Unlike regular towns and cities, the entire population consisted of slaves and servants of the family while the people with Ouyang surname controlled the administrative offices.
In short, this place was the Ouyang Clan's domain.
Not only the Ouyang Clan was wealthy enough to establish and govern a city, but they also had a deep background. Every daughter and maiden of the Ouyang Clan was sent to marry prominent lords and talented cultivators around the world, drawing in top experts to join their clan and serve as their underlings. They used these top experts to train their combat slaves and soldiers, increasing their military prowess.
Because of their military power and wealth, their family earned a seat in the Jianghu Alliance, which upheld the judicial system – Their purpose was to eliminate evil sects and enforce the laws in this chaotic world, where cultivators ran rampant.
With the authority power in their hands, Ouyang Clan became the most influential family on the mainland. However, someone recently offended them.
.
In the main house of the Ouyang Family, the patriarch of the Ouyang Clan, Ouyang Zi, sat on the throne in a large meeting hall, gazing at the 11 elders and the grand elder of the Ouyang Clan, who gathered here to answer the summon.
A red carpet at the center of the room was the only empty place. The elders sat on their honored seats, located on the sides of the carpet. Their chairs faced the center of the room, forcing them to look at the other elders on the opposite side of the room. Meanwhile, two hundred entourage, servants, and children of the elders stood behind them, listening and observing the meeting.
Ouyang Zi had a long grey braided beard. His fur helmet hid his hairless head, and he wore a black fur coat on top of his robes as the temperature of the Phoenix city was always under minus 30 degrees Celsius (-22 Fahrenheit). Because of his large physique, big muscle, and his 7'4 height, he was a giant among men.
The crowd also wore multiple layers of robes while some sported fur coats like the patriarch. However, they looked tiny in front of their clan leader.
Ouyang Zi tossed the broken Life Candle of Ouyang Long to the middle of the room and informed everybody of disturbing news.
"Ouyang Long is dead."
"…"
All elders stared at the broken candle in silence. The grand elder closed his eyes while the other members frowned.
The grand elder asked, "Patriarch, who killed him?"
"A soul formation rogue cultivator."
"A rogue cultivator? Soul formation stage?"
The elders were puzzled. Considering Ouyang Long's strength and wisdom, he shouldn't have been so weak to the point that he got killed by a soul formation cultivator. Even if he lost, he should have easily escaped.
"Doesn't he have the fastest flying sword, the Cugatti? Even if he lost all his limbs, he shouldn't have died."
The patriarch shook his head, "Ouyang Long didn't have a chance. He died in one move."
The elders widened their eyes and murmured, exclaiming and chatting with their subordinates behind them. The noise was so loud that Ouyang Zi smacked the armrest with his fist to silence them.
BOOM
The wooden armrest was broken. However, Ouyang Zi opened his palm and released his wood essence. A few seconds later, the wooden armrest grew from the wooden chair and restored itself.
After repairing his chair with his power, Ouyang Zi bellowed.
"Order!"
The crowd stopped talking. They looked at their clan leader, waiting for further instructions.
Seeing that the crowd shut their mouths, Ouyang Zi proceeded with the first agenda, "We will select a new representative to replace Ouyang Long. I want new candidates. Any suggestion?"
Every elder looked at each other for a moment before they turned to the grand elder, whose strength was second after the patriarch. One of them stepped up and saluted Ouyang Zi.
"I would like to nominate Lord Ouyang Ke."
The rest of the elders also stood up, "We believe senior Ouyang Ke is the right candidate."
Ouyang Zi nodded. He then looked at the grand elder, "What do you think? Care to work at the Jianghu Alliance?"
Ouyang Ke was already 330 years old. His thin stature and wrinkled skin made him look like a dried mummy. His long white hair and thick white eyebrows covered half of his face but highlighted his deep eyes. Every youngster often mistook him for a ghost, and they were scared of him. In addition, his cultivation base was at the soul formation stage, and he was one step away from reaching the soul transformation rank, which was where Ouyang Zi had reached.
After getting nominated, Ouyang Ke laughed. He leaned against his chair and sipped the rejuvenate tea, which he made for himself.
"I'm afraid I have to decline. I'm an alchemist, and I'm also a guest elder of World Tree Sect. I don't have time for politics."
Ouyang Zi agreed with Ouyang Ke. He turned to the elders, "You heard him. My uncle is busy. Anybody else wishes to nominate another candidate?"
The elders were disappointed. They looked at each other as nobody dared to nominate each other. After all, they didn't want to stand out and ire a certain someone.
As nobody spoke, the patriarch was disappointed. He baited them to get their attention.
"The next mystic realm expedition is 12 days away. The candidates will get to participate using our family's quota."
The elders were tempted, but they were afraid of something. They bit their lower lips, waiting for the others to take the bait.
Suddenly, a young man behind the grand elder coughed. He looked at the patriarch and made a suggestion.
"Can I nominate myself?"
"…"
The elders bitterly smiled. Some of them let out a sigh of relief as THAT PERSON made a move himself.
The grand elder giggled while the patriarch deeply frowned. The latter asked the former.
"Are you allowing this, uncle?"
"Why not?" Ouyang Ke couldn't stop smiling. "Sometimes, adults like us have to step back and let the next generation basks in the limelight. Since my grandson is confident, let him have it."
"We're talking about the Jianghu Alliance here. Do you think those undying geezers will allow it?"
"It doesn't matter. Let him learn the ropes and expand his horizon."
"…"
Ouyang Zi deeply sighed. He gazed at the youngster, whose cultivation base surpassed most of the people here.
He was Ouyang Feng, the grandchild of Ouyang Ke. He joined the Death Sword Sect and became the youngest nascent soul cultivator at the age of 18. Ouyang Feng was 25 this year, and he was at the pinnacle of the nascent soul realm, waiting for the right opportunity to break through.I think you should take a look at
Ouyang Feng was a stud among men. He had a handsome face, toned muscle, a tall physique, and light skin. His kept hair, black robes, and perfectly smooth skin made him attractive among the female servants and daughters of other clan members.
Looking at the handsome youth, Ouyang Zi was reluctant.
"Are you sure you want this? Your opponents will be those soul-formation geezers in the alliance. They're going to bully you."
Ouyang Feng brightly smiled, "More like they will offer their granddaughters to me as soon as they notice my talent!"
Everybody in the room burst into laughter. Even Ouyang Zi grinned.
"Alright. If you say so, go and dominate the alliance. Make it yours for our family!"
"Yes, patriarch!"
The elders in the room smiled, relieved that the scary guy got what he wanted. However, they still remembered an issue, which involved the death of Ouyang Long.
Ouyang Zi also noticed their expressions. He concluded the agenda.
"Alright. Since there is only one candidate, Ouyang Feng will be chosen as the new representative of our clan by default. Is that alright with you?"
The elders saluted, "We agree with you, patriarch!"
"Good," Ouyang Zi paused to take a deep breath. Then, he moved on to the next important agenda.
"Next agenda, the killer of Ouyang Long. Justice must be upheld, and we will not allow anybody to tarnish our reputation! Unfortunately, we must also prepare for the mystic realm expedition so we cannot focus on revenge at the moment."
The elders looked disappointed as the patriarch didn't reveal the identity of the killer. They could only give up pursuing the matter until the end of the mystic realm season.
"However," Ouyang Zi continued. "That doesn't mean we will give up on the criminal. I have the complete sketchs of the rogue cultivator that killed Ouyang Long!"
Ouyang Zi waved his hand, and a thousand papers were ejected from his spatial rings. Everybody in the room immediately used their Qi to pull one of the papers into their hands.
The portrait of Leo was neatly drawn, and all papers were identical. Ouyang Feng also got his hand on it.
"Remember his face. Since he's strong, one of the sects might invite him to join their expedition team, and we might encounter him in the mystic realm. If anybody finds him in the mystic realm or somewhere on the mainland, contact me! Do not pick a fight with him or provoke him. Got it?!"
Ouyang Feng, Ouyang Ke, and every clan member put the warrant papers in their clothes. Then, they saluted Ouyang Zi.
"We understand, patriarch!"
"Good. You're dismissed, except for Ouyang Ke and Ouyang Feng. You two stay behind. We need to teach you what you need to do as a representative."
The elders deeply bowed and guided their followers to leave the meeting hall. As for the grand elder and his grandson, they remained in the hall.
After everybody had left, Ouyang Zi brought out a cultivation pill and gave it to Ouyang Feng. Coincidentally, it was a Fenrir Dantian Pill, which another alchemist had made long ago. However, it was medium-grade, and it took the alchemist one entire year to refine this pill using three sets of ingredients.
"Feng'er. You cultivate poison Qi, right? This pill should bring you to the soul formation stage. Eat it when you find the right place to cultivate in the mystic realm."
Ouyang Feng accepted the pill in glee. He looked at the Fenrir Dantian Pill and smiled, "Did Uncle Situ make this?"
"No. It was someone from the Tang Clan. Tang Clan is the best in poison, and this pill is one of their specialties."
"Hahaha! Thank you, patriarch. I won't disappoint you!"
"Good. Also, we need to talk about what you need to do…"
Ouyang Ke and Ouyang Zi began teaching the young man about the etiquette, rules, and tasks he had to do. Also, they revealed the secret warehouse that they had entrusted to Ouyang Long.
Two hours later, they finished their lecture. Ouyang Zi reminded him, "Be careful about your status as well. You might be as strong as many geezers out there, but you're still a member of the Death Sword Sect. Those hypocrites from the Life Sword Sect won't work with you, and the alchemist sects won't talk to you. However, you can always ask the Situ Clan to sell you some talismans and artifacts. Also, if possible, seduce the fairies of the Amazonian Sanctuary. As long you get their favor, you can use them to coax those virgin alchemists for their treasures and pills."
"I get it, patriarch! That's my forte!"
"Haha. Good. Now, go!"
Ouyang Feng bowed and left the meeting hall in joy. He looked forward to courting the fairies of the all-female cult, which only trained female cultivators.
.
.
Meanwhile, Cat ran around in the forest. Her human infant torso practiced moving while her waist was still attached to the chomper's head. She ordered her lower parts to sit and rest while her branches extended and grabbed a few pine nuts to eat.
Cat put a raw pine nut in her human mouth at first. She tried crushing it with teethless gum.
"MYA!!"
She regretted it. Her humanoid gum were too soft to crack the nut, and she hurt herself.
Still, Cat didn't give up. She circulated metal Qi into her mouth, reinforcing the gum. A minute later, she retried.
CRACK
Her hardened gums easily crush the metal-like nut like a press machine, and she savored the wood-like taste. After chewing the entire outer skin of the nut to small pieces, she swallowed them all.
"Meow <3"
Eating with a human mouth was different than the monster mouth as the tastebud was more sensitive. As for the monster's mouth, it was still useful for eating large food.
While eating pine nuts in the forest, a small flying ship passed by, but it immediately turned around. One of the cultivators onboard jumped down and landed in front of Cat.
The person wore a thick triangle straw hat, and a thick veil covered the person's face. The long robes covered most of the skin, but the small wrinkled hands revealed her age and gender.
Cat looked at the female cultivator and tilted her head. Although the person looked different from the cultivators she had seen, Cat asked for a toll fee anyway.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
The old lady giggled. She took off her hat and opened her cloth veil, revealing the face of a kind grandmother.
"Hello, child. How does an infant dryad like you manage to survive here all alone? Where is your parent?"
"Meow?"

chapters.title: Chapter 49 Child Welfare Agents Concerned As Florida Man Let Infant Daughter Wander In Forest
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 49 – Child Welfare Agents Concerned as Florida Man Let Infant Daughter Wander in Forest
Amazonian Sanctuary was a lot different from cultivator sects and clans – It was similar to a charity organization, which sheltered and nurtured female martial artists and cultivators without seeking profits.
In this world, cultivators ran rampant and used their strength advantage to bully the weak. Beautiful women, elders, children, and commoners were usually abused and exploited. As a result, female cultivators banded together and created Amazonian Sanctuary to shelter and protect themselves. They also educated women on self-defense techniques. If they had a high aptitude for cultivation, elders of the sanctuary always took them in and trained them. However, they only accepted female disciples.
Commoners favored the Sanctuary. Many people donated their food to show support for these female cultivators. Slowly over time, the sanctuary became a famous place for female cultivators to join. More young girls joined the sanctuary.
When cultivators advanced through the ranks, their physique and appearance were refined. And when adult women refined their physiques, they became more beautiful. Soon, their reputation preceded them and brought them danger. Many sects and clans heard their fames and sent delegations to befriend them, hoping to seduce a few of their members to become their brides.
Their motives disgusted and terrified the sanctuary's women. As they were afraid of being seized by male cultivators, they trained harder, and they actively recruited strong prospects to become their sanctuary guardians.
Xu Nuan was a 113-year-old headhunting elder of the Amazonian Sanctuary, and she was in charge of recruiting prospects and talented women. Her specialties were monster beast taming and veterinary.
Per the regulations of the sanctuary, Xu Nuan covered her appearance under the long thick veils that extended from her triangle straw hat. Her cloth mask and her green robes also hid most of her skin, except her hands.
Originally, Xu Nuan and her scout team planned to visit Magpie City in searching for talented young girls among the commoners. Their flying ship flew from Eiei Province from the east to the west, heading directly to the Life Sword Sect.
However, along the way, Xu Nuan noticed a strong aura of a monster. As a tamer, she was interested in how a monster managed to survive near a cultivator city. Xu Nuan ordered the ship to stop. She then jumped down from her ship to inspect the monster.
Then, Xu Nuan found a chomper plant monster. She noticed that the monster had already evolved several times, and she was about to condense her humanoid physique, judging from the upper torso that grew out from the monster's head.
'A plant monster… Isn't this a dryad?'
Xu Nuan was surprised. She looked at the brown-skinned infant, who flailed her arms around as if she was not used to her new body. As an experienced veterinarian, she identified Cat's age instantly.
'A-An infant?! She has just been born recently?! But her strength…'
Xu Nuan gulped. As a nascent soul cultivator, she could see her aura, but she couldn't see Cat's hidden dao avatar. Judging from the the intensity of Cat's Qi volume, the monster was as strong as her.
'A 4th-stage monster? But she's still an infant! How can she reach this stage so fast? Even monster beasts in the mystic realms require at least 300 to 400 years to reach this stage. Right, does she have an owner or a parent?'
While Xu Nuan pondered, Cat initiated the conversation first.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
'Huh? Hehe, she's funny.'
Xu Nuan felt like she was looking at an innocent monster child. She asked for Cat's origin.
"Hello, child. How does an infant dryad like you manage to survive here all alone? Where is your parent?"
"Meow?" Cat tilted both her heads.
Noticing that Cat didn't understand her, Xu Nuan giggled and summoned her Dao Avatar. A spirit of a 5-meter-tall gorgeous maiden appeared. Her celestial robes barely covered anything, but nobody was there to admire the spirit's seductive body.
The spirit extended her hand and patted Cat's humanoid head. The large finger gently stroke her head and wiped the dirt off her face. Then, it disappeared.
Cat purred. She felt nice. Moreover, she felt like she understood Xu Nuan's thoughts.
"What's your name?" Asked Xu Nuan.
"Meow!"
Xu Nuan nodded. Just now, she connected her mind with Cat's, allowing them to directly communicate via telepathy. She slowly adapted to Cat's thoughts.
"Your name is Cat? Oh, you have a master, I see. Who is your master?"
"Muu… Meow?"
"Your master is… your father?"
"Meow <3"
"You love him, I see. He must be a good father."
"Meow! Meow, meow. Meow meow!"
Cat didn't stop meowing. She narrated the battle between her and the mysterious assassins in black clothes. And then, when she was injured, Leo came to save her. He then defeated everybody instantly.
Xu Nuan didn't understand the meow language, but she perceived the thoughts and Cat's memory. She was astonished by the story, and she respected Leo, who fought to protect the little girl.
At first, Xu Nuan thought of taming Cat and bringing her back to the sanctuary. But after listening to her, Xu Nuan changed her mind.
There was no point in taking her away from a good parent. Instead, Xu Nuan wanted to meet Leo to satisfy her curiosity. After all, a man who treated a monster nicely couldn't be a bad person.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
Unfortunately, Cat was a glutton. She never forgot that Xu Nuan hadn't paid the toll fee yet.
Xu Nuan couldn't stop laughing. She ejected a skinned deer's carcass and gave it to the chomper. Cat caught it with her monster mouth and chew it in glee.
After feeding the dryad, Xu Nuan asked her again.
"Where is your parent? Can you tell me?"
"Meow <3"
Cat hummed and started walking back to the general store. Xu Nuan smiled and followed after her. While she was at it, she sent a telepathic message to her disciples and followers on her ship.
'Park the ship and follow me. Do not cause trouble.'
.I think you should take a look at
.
"Finally done."
Leo finished cleaning the granary. He looked at the half-eaten potato piles that he separated for Cat, thinking about how quick they rot. He also thought about the Yang Poison that the system mentioned.
'Should I research the rotting potato?'
Leo went to check on the alchemy workshops. Unfortunately, they were still in the middle of making Yang Flame Dan, so Leo couldn't do anything about them.
Since the cauldrons were busy, Leo postponed the research project for now. He turned his attention to the warehouse automaton – It still worked at its own pace, collecting nuts and pine leaves around the warehouse.
Leo was relieved that he got a helper. He left it alone and walked toward the stacks of iron pine logs, which hadn't been processed or peeled yet. For the sake of killing time, Leo cut the branches and roots with his hands. Then, he threw everything except the main trunk to the side and began peeling the tree's bark.
Working was one of the best ways to strengthen one's concentration and prevent ADHD. Leo forgot about everything else and was absorbed in the job.
A few hours later, Cat returned. She visited him in the backyard and nudged her head against his back.
"Meow <3"
Leo rolled his eyes and stopped working on the 4th log of the day. He wiped his hands using a robe of a dead assassin. Then, he patted the chomper.
"What? Are you reflecting on your mistake?"
"Meow."
"Huh? Do we have a guest?"
Leo looked up and noticed that Cat had developed an upper torso of a baby girl. She looked like a newborn infant, and her chubby arms and face looked adorable.
He deeply sighed. Leo was aware of Cat's identity as a dryad, and he already expected this to happen.
"You've evolved well."
"Meow <3"
Leo snickered and softly pinched the chubby cheek of the infant girl. Then, he pointed at the mutated corpse of Ouyang Ting, "Don't bring guests to the backyard. Also, that stupid corpse is getting smelly. Get rid of it for me. I have no use for it anymore."
"Nom-Nom Meow <3"
Cat giggled and ran toward the hanging corpse. She skillfully pulled the body out of the hook and threw it into the large mouth. The sound of broken bones and crushed meat followed.
Leo put on a newly washed robe, which once belonged to one of the assassins. He then rushed to the front store to welcome the guest. When Leo got to the front store, he saw an elderly lady in green robes. Moreover, he sensed 20 life signatures behind her, but they were 200 meters away.
The woman frowned as soon as she noticed the uniform of the Hound Squad. Although she looked disturbed, she fixed her expression and cupped her fist.
"Greetings, senior. My Daoist Name is Beast Mother, and I come from the Amazonian Sanctuary. Excuse me for the sudden visit, but is it you who raises the dryad?"
"Oh," Leo glanced at the backyard. He sighed, "Hello, ma'am. Did my kid cause you trouble?"
"No, not at all."
Xu Nuan glanced at Leo's uniform. She also noticed that Leo had the same aura as a soul formation cultivator. As someone with a lower cultivation base, Xu Nuan didn't dare to be rude.
'Is he someone from the Hound Squad of the despicable Ouyang Clan? He doesn't look like one. I heard their members were trash-like cultivators. I never heard that a soul formation cultivator was one of their members… Ah, right. I'm stupid. That girl just told me.'
Xu Nuan wanted to smack her head as she recalled Cat's story.
'The dryad said her master slaughtered a group of assassins that hurt her. Did he destroy the Hound Squad and got their clothes? Doesn't he have better clothes to wear? Why is he wearing that cursed uniform?'
She no longer suspected that Leo had any connection to the Hound Squad. However, she asked him to make sure.
"Senior, sir. I see that you're wearing the uniform of an assassin trope. May I ask what your relationship with the Ouyang family is?"
"Ouyang family?" Leo raised his brow. He felt like he heard that name before, but he couldn't remember. It sounded important, but Leo completely forgot about it.
Seeing Leo's confused expression, Xu Nuan dryly laughed, "If you aren't willing to disclose the detail, then please forget it. Forgive this junior for stepping out of the line."
Leo didn't listen to Xu Nuan. He kept thinking, trying to recall his memory. Afraid that he might have dementia, Leo worked hard to think.
Then, he remembered.
"Ah, Ouyang guys. I remember someone by the name of Ouyang… Size. No, Ouyang… Width? Ouyang Short? Ah, stupid me. Ouyang Long! Yes, Ouyang Long! That Long-Long-Man. Right. Oh, please excuse me. I'm getting old and forgetful. That Ouyang Long guy said something about I killed his son, and then, he tried to kill me. Of course, I clapped his butt cheeks and sent him to the afterlife. Are you looking for him or related to him?"
"…"
Xu Nuan heard something unbelievable. She widened her eyes and swallowed her saliva in shock.
'Is he insane?! Did he kill Ouyang Long? That Ouyang Long, one of Jianghu Alliance's elders?!'
Xu Nuan coughed and secretly wiped her sweat. She lowered her head and asked again.
"May I know your name, sir?"
Leo widely grinned. He loved it when people asked for his name. Although he wanted to say "John Cena" for a laugh, he minded his manner and used his old alias.
"Florida Man. That's my Daoist Title."
"… Florida?"

chapters.title: Chapter 50 Florida Man Searches For Sexy Alligator To Be His Wife
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 50 – Florida Man Searches for Sexy Alligator to be His  Wife
While Xu Nuan and Leo chatted, the followers and disciples of Amazonian Sanctuary caught up with the former. They came out of the forest and stood behind her.
The young women in green robes wore thick veils to hide their faces. However, their clothes highlighted their figures and showed their sexy long legs.
Leo inwardly laughed at the women and shook his head.
'You're hiding your faces, but you're showing your legs. Are you seeking attention or do you want to hide your beauty? Make up your mind!'
Leo looked away from the young girls. Even though he hadn't seen a woman in 50,000 years, he didn't feel the excitement or drive like when he was a human. Moreover, none of them was his type.
He was into something otherworldly that no sane person could comprehend.
"Ahem," Leo coughed. "I see that you bring companions. Well, welcome to my store. Are you looking for something peculiar? Maybe you might need something from my store."
Xu Nuan came back to her senses. She turned around and found her 20 disciples, who tagged along to gain experience. Xu Nuan wryly smiled and informed the women.
"Be respectful toward this senior. His Daoist title is Florida Man. Also, keep the veils on."
"Yes, senior," The young women cupped their fists.
Xu Nuan turned her attention to Leo. She asked, "What kind of store are you running, senior?"
"Just general stuff, food, pills, and random consumables," Leo turned around and opened the doors for them. The cool air from the air conditioner left the building, and the ladies were surprised.
"Cold air?"
"Y-Yin Qi?!"
"No, I sense other elements! T-There are other Qi!"
Leo rolled his eyes and ignored the exclamation. He entered the building, inviting the group in.
Xu Nuan swallowed her pride and fear. She glanced at her disciples, "Stay here. Come in when I tell you."
"Y-Yes, master."
Xu Nuan followed Leo into the store for the first time.
When Xu Nuan entered the building, she gasped in astonishment. Like the others, she was interested in the spatial distortion array and the secret of the store.
"Spatial Array? Senior Florida Man, are you an array master?"
Leo shrugged and made an excuse, "More like an alchemist. As for the store, you can say that I'm relying on a friend's help."
"Friend?" Xu Nuan was curious, "Can I know the name, senior? Maybe, I could ask him to help my sect expand my warehouse."
Leo shook his head. As he couldn't tell that he got this perk from a system, he made up a fake identity of his friend, "He's dead."
"Oh, I'm so sorry… What was his name?"
"His Daoist name was Wilson. He was a silent guy, and his head was very round – like a volleyball. He… died in a sea."
"Wilson?"
Leo giggled as he was sure that nobody in this world would understand the reference and the real identity of Wilson, "Do you know him?"
"I'm afraid I don't. Umm, anyway," Xu Nuan dryly laughed and looked around. Instantly, her eyes fixated on a showcase refrigerator, which contained hundreds of Yin Cabbages.
Xu Nuan was a monster tamer, and many monster pets under her care needed Yin Qi from food. She also tried to grow Yin Cabbages in her sanctuary, but she always failed. Seeing so many cabbages in the store, Xu Nuan was excited.
"Senior, how much are the cabbages? Can I buy all of them?"
Leo widely grinned. He immediately activated the shop domain system, allowing Xu Nuan to see her lifespan.
DING
.
Name: Xu Nuan
Age: 113
Remaining Lifespan: 1,077 Years, 9 Months, 5 Days, 5 Hours, 6 Minutes
.
Leo raised his eyebrows, impressed by the woman's vitality. She had more lifespan than Han Hao, Han Meng, and other geezers around her age.
Meanwhile, Xu Nuan almost fell on her butt in shock. Her shaking hand pointed at her status window as she had never seen anything like it.
"W-What is this?!"
"Your lifespan, ma'am."
"My… lifespan?"
"Yes, your remaining days. It slowly ticks down. Once it reaches zero, you will die by a natural cause."
"O-Oh…"
Xu Nuan gulped. She extended her hand to touch the floating screen, but her arms went through it. She then asked Leo, "A-Are you a life force cultivator, sir?"
"You can say that," Leo giggled and explained how his store worked. "Also, my store only accepts lifespan. Normally, I sell one yin cabbage for 50 years of lifespan. But since this is your first visit, I'll only sell it for 10 years per cabbage. How about it?"
"…"
.
[Cabbage of Extreme Yin]I think you should take a look at
This poisonous cabbage can only be found in a demonic realm as it is one of demon's staple food. No cultivator should consume this as it is full of Poison Qi and yin miasma. However, it can be used in alchemy to make potent poison.
[Alchemy Recipe – Demonic Poison Potion]
One Cabbage of Extreme Yin
One Liter of Yin Fluid
One of any Poison Element Catalyst
Poison Qi
.
Xu Nuan was taken aback. She only wanted the cabbages as pet food. However, 10 years per cabbage was still expensive.
"Can I pay with spirit stones, senior?"
Leo rubbed his chin, "Spirit stones?"
"Yes. Can I pay one million spirit stones per cabbage?"
Xu Nuan was aware that yin cabbages were rare, and they could only be found in a mystic realm with thick Yin Qi. Still, she didn't know that it could be used in alchemy.
Leo closed his eyes and pondered. He thought of the blue stones that he got from the assassins and wondered if they were spirit stones.
'If those blue stones are spirit stones, I should gather more of them. Every spirit stone can be turned into essence stones, right? And those essence stones seem more valuable than spirit stones.'
For the sake of securing a returning customer, Leo compromised and made a counteroffer.
"You're quite a bargainer. Alright. I'll sell you these cabbages. However, there's a condition."
"A condition?"
"For every cabbage you buy, I want 100 regular cabbages on top of the one million spirit stones. How about it?"
"Regular cabbages?"
Xu Nuan was confused. She paused to think and look around the store, looking at Golden Sand Bananas, Immortal grass, Bloodmelons, grain pills, and Yang Flame Dans.
Pills and Dans?
Xu Nuan recalled Leo's words that he was an alchemist. Then, she began putting pieces of a puzzle together.
'He has plenty of resources from mystic realms. He can kill a soul formation cultivator like Ouyang Long. He isn't afraid of the Ouyang Family. Wait a second. Aren't those dans emitting fire essence? Only grand master alchemists can make flame essence cultivation pills! Also, he makes a strange request for regular cabbages. Does that mean…'
Xu Nuan took several deep breaths. Unlike Han Hao or Wu Buyi, she directly asked Leo to confirm her theories.
"Senior Florida Man, are you an immortal?"
Once again, Leo was taken aback. He tried to avoid the question, "Define immortal."
"Well, for example, you can freely travel between worlds. Your cultivation base is at the Celestial Stage or higher, or you have been living over 3,000 years."
"Does living more than 3,000 years count?" Leo was amused.
"Well, mortals can't live longer than 3,000 years. The highest record that a quasi-immortal made long ago was 2,950 years or so before he turns into ash."
"Oh," Leo stroked his beard and laughed. He joked with Xu Nuan. "If I go by your logic, wouldn't I be a deity? I've been living for 50,000 years."
"WHAT!?!" Xu Nuan was shocked once again. Her face was as pale as a sheet, and she sweated profusely.
Leo paused and covered his mouth. He had the urge to slap his lips for revealing sensitive information. He feigned laughing and changed the subject, "It was a joke. Please forget about it. Let's talk about the cabbages. Do you accept my condition?"
Xu Nuan came back to her senses. She knelt and cupped her fist, "I'm willing to work for you, senior!"
"Err…"
"Just say the word. As long as you won't harm me or my disciples, I'm willing to do anything even if you ask for my purity."
"…"
Leo's expression turned dark. He inwardly cursed.
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm 'Who would want to bed an old hag like you?! I'd rather bang a sexy alligator than doing it with an old woman! I just want your lifespan. Gimme your lifespan, dammit!'
He coughed and averted from the subject, "Don't go overboard. I only need normal cabbages. Do you think I'm a sex fiend?"
Xu Nuan looked up and blushed in embarrassment. She also let out a sigh of relief.
"Thank you very much for your benevolence. If you need anything else, please tell me!"
Once again, Xu Nuan spoke like a robot, trying to get on his good side.
Seeing how Xu Nuan was humble, Leo had an idea, "How about you can do that now? I need customers and lifespan. Do you think your followers might find my items useful? I can sell them for cheap, but they have to pay with their lifespan, though."
Xu Nuan nodded in agreement, "That won't be a problem. Actually, our sanctuary's training method focuses on Water Techniques, and water Qi from the Bloodmelons will be very useful."
Hearing that Xu Nuan's people might love Bloodmelons, Leo gave her an incentive. He secretly added her as an employee of the store, encouraging her to bring more customers to his shop.
DING
<You have been enlisted as the general store's employee.>
Xu Nuan heard a mysterious voice. Once again, she was surprised.
Leo explained, "From now on, every time you buy items from me, I'll give you a discount. If you introduce customers to me, I'll pay you a 10% commission from what I receive from the transactions, okay? If they pay with lifespan, I'll share you the lifespan I obtain. If they pay with spirit stones, I'll give you spirit stones. Deal?"

chapters.title: Chapter 51 Parents Shocked - Florida Man Seduces Underage Girl Using Fairy
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 51 – Parents Shocked - Florida Man Seduces Underage Girl Using Fairy
Xu Nuan was still confused, but she followed his instructions anyway. She exited the building, and her spatial ring ejected a thousand sacks, containing 10,000 spirit stones each. Then, she cupped her fist and bowed at Leo.
"I'd like to buy 10 yin cabbages, senior. This is my payment. As for the regular cabbages, I have to make a return trip to fetch them for you."
Leo nodded in approval. Since she paid more than what Leo had requested, he packed 12 yin cabbages and gave them to Xu Nuan.
"Consider two extra cabbages as your discount. Oh, you can invite the others to see the Bloodmelons if they want them. I promise that I'll sell them at an affordable price."
Xu Nuan brightly smiled and stored the 12 cabbages in her spatial ring. She bowed again and turned around, facing her disciples.
Meanwhile, the young maidens observed their mentor in a daze. They saw how Xu Nuan behave in front of Leo and were stunned.
Xu Nuan returned to their side. She brightly smiled at them, "Everybody can rest assured. Senior Florida Man is an ally of the sanctuary. I just got 12 Cabbages of Extreme Yin from him with only 10 million spirit stones. They're very cheap!"
"T-Ten million spirit stones?!"
For the disciples, 10 spirit stones could change their lives. However, their master just paid 10 million spirit stones for 12 cabbages, which didn't make sense.
Xu Nuan giggled and explained the value of the cabbages, "The cabbages are beneficial to the Frost Unicorn back in our sanctuary. One cabbage is enough to raise one's cultivation strength by one major stage. I have 12, so we can evolve 12 unicorns. It is worth it."
"O-Oh."
The girls thought of the sanctuary guardians back home. They stopped making a fuss and gazed at the sacks of spirit stones. Still, they were envious of Leo, who just scored 10 million spirit stones from their master.
One of them gulped as she had a bold idea. She deeply inhaled and mustered her courage. Then, he approached Leo.
The woman gracefully saluted, placing her hands on her knee and slightly bent forward.
"Greetings, senior. My name is Qi Niu. I don't have a Daoist title yet, but I'm a 5th-rank foundation establishment beast tamer. I heard from my master that you provide her rare herbs, and I wish to see your merchandise."
Leo brightly smiled. He liked well-manner women the most.
The girl suddenly took off her veils and headwear, revealing her beauty and stright long brown hair. She had the face of a Chinese idol even though she didn't put on makeup. Then, Qi Niu purposely unbuttoned a few buttons, showing her chest skin. With with a long stride, she walked while showing her thighs and moving her butt to attract Leo's gaze.
Leo's smiling face turned stiff. The corners of his mouth curved down as his instinct kicked in – The PTSD in the past when he was a human returned. He shook his head and rolled his eyes.
'Oh, boy.'
Without saying anything, Leo summoned the shop domain menu, revealing all the disciples' lifespan statuses. He also checked the age of Qi Niu.
.
Name: Qi Niu
Age: 16
Remaining Lifespan: 265 Years, 9 Months, 4 Days, 5 Hours, 36 Minutes.
.
Leo facepalmed.
'I knew it. My radar isn't wrong. This girl is a jailbait.'
The moral integrity of Leo was still as strong as ever. He was disturbed by the teenager's seductive behavior. While Leo was massaging his temples, he glanced at the sacks of spirit stones outside the building. Leo instantly figured Qi Niu's ulterior motive.
'That must be why. Haiya. Everywhere is the same.'
.
.
While Leo secretly cursed the immoral teenager, Qi Niu and the other disciples were stunned when blue screens showed their remaining lifespan and age.
Averagely, a 3rd-stage cultivator, aka foundation establishment cultivator, had about 180-280 years of lifespan. The followers of Xu Nuan all had the same lifespan range, except for one little girl.
One of them was a new prospect of the sanctuary, and she was still a very young. She had not even learned a cultivation method yet, and she was still a commoner without a cultivation base. However, her status appeared and showed her hidden talent and superior constitution.
.
Name: Yao Qiqi
Age: 6
Remaining Lifespan: 196 Years, 6 Months, 9 Days, 9 Hours, and 7 Minutes
.
When Yao Qiqi was born, the little girl had an ill fate. Her parents were killed by bandits. Fortunately, the people of the sanctuary found her near her parents' corpses and agreed to bring her along. Since then, she had been tagging along with the disciples of Xu Nuan as she couldn't stay on the flying ship.
Yao Qiqi was the youngest among the group, and she still wore a commoner's clothing. Moreover, she carried a stuffed teddy bear doll in her arms.
The little girl's brown hairs were tied in two bundles. The grey one-piece dress reached her knee, and the inner robes were thick enough to hide her thighs and skin. She still wore straw sandals that were made by the other disciples, and her round eyes sparkled as her mind was filled with hope and dream.
To everybody in the sanctuary, including Xu Nuan, Yao Qiqi was an innocent child that they had to protect and raise carefully. Nobody was allowed to taint this little angel.
Looking at her lifespan, Yao Qiqi was curious. Like other people, she tried to touch it and failed to grasp the screen.
"This looks fun!"
Yao Qiqi waved her hands around, trying to catch or disperse the menu. However, the screen rippled like the surface of the water and was reconstructed.
Xu Nuan noticed the little girl's action. She patted her shoulder and warned her.
"Qiqi, behave."
"Y-Yes, master."
Yao Qiqi pouted and hugged the teddy bear. Then, she looked at her elder sisters and the grandpa in the store building, wondering what they were doing.
A minute later, Yao Qiqi was bored as she didn't understand worldly matters. She looked at the nature to see if there was anything interesting around here.
Then, Yao Qiqi found an area with grass flowers. The grasses were blue, and the flowers were bright pink.
"So beautiful!"
Yao Qiqi giggled and ran toward the flowers. While carrying the doll, she leaned closer to look at the flowers. Then, she reached out to touch it.
VIIING
Suddenly, a transparent spirit flew by and emerged from the flowers. An infant dark elf girl floated in the air and orbited around Yao Qiqi.
The little girl's eyes followed the spirit of the dark elf. She clamored.
"Wow. A fairy!"
"???"
Xu Nuan and the other disciples turned around and found Yao Qiqi 10 meters away. One of the disciples rushed to her side and warned her.
"Qiqi, don't wander around on your own. Also, don't touch anything here. They have an owner."
Yao Qiqi pouted and looked at her senior, "But Qiqi wants to see flowers."
The disciple looked at the flower and discovered that they were spirit grasses. She gulped and turned around, looking at her master.
"M-Master? There's a spirit grass patch here."
Xu Nuan's expression turned dark. She hushed them, "Don't touch it! Leave them alone!"
"Y-Yes, master."
The disciple turned to Yao Qiqi, "Qiqi, we can't steal flowers from this place. They have an owner, okay?"
"Muuu."
Yao Qiqi pouted. She turned to look at the flowers again as she really wanted to bring them home.
WHOOSH
Suddenly, the dark elf spirit early floated in front of Yao Qiqi again. She tilted her head and stared into her eyes.
Meow
Yao Qiqi also tilted her head as she heard the spirit's voice. She mimicked it.
"Meow?"
Meow-Meow?
"Yes, I can hear you. Meow-Meow!"
Yao Qiqi looked up and pulled the disciple's pinky finger. Then, she pointed at the spirit in front of her.I think you should take a look at
"Sister Lu. There's a flower fairy in front of me."
The disciple next to Yao Qiqi looked at the girl in bemusement. She around, but she couldn't see anything. Then, she sighed.
"Qiqi, there is no fairy around here."
Yao Qiqi jumped and pointed at the dark elf spirit's face, pinpointing her location, "But she's here!"
The other disciples turned around. Again, none of them found anything unusual except the little girl pointing at empty air.
Xu Nuan deeply sighed. She walked toward Yao Qiqi and picked her up. She carried the girl in her arms, stopping her from wandering around.
"Mind your manner, Qiqi. We're visiting a guest."
Yao Qiqi's eyes were moist. She was on the verge of crying as nobody believed her.
"But there is a fairy in front of me…"
"…"
A crying little girl could break every compassionate human's heart. Seeing how the girl crying, everybody surrounded the girl and tried to soothe her.
Unfortunately, the more they tried to console Yao Qiqi, the more depressed she was. Qiqi wailed.
"But the fairy is really there. Why doesn't anybody believe in me?"
"…"
Xu Nuan and the girls were at a loss for words. They tried to distract Qiqi with candies and a new doll, but none of them worked.
.
.
"Meow?"
Cat, who was in the middle of chewing Ouyang Ting's corpse, suddenly turned around. She spat the half-eaten body and picked up a toilet brush and the earth jar that Leo had stored stream water. She brushed her teeth, poured the flesh water into her mouth, and gargled. Afterward, she swallowed the water and tossed her toothbrush and earth jar away, breaking the container in the process. Cat crawled toward the crowd to see the commotion.
As soon as Cat crawled over the store building and saw the commotion, she tilted her head for a moment.
"Meow <3"
The dryad torso gazed at the little girl among the crowd. She waved her hands at the latter, but the little girl didn't notice.
"Meow?"
Cat noticed that people around Yao Qiqi were in the way. She pouted and came up with an idea. Then, she clapped her little hands.
"Meow <3"
Cat wiggled her roots, vines, and branches, preparing for a long leap.
.
.
*Hic* *Hic*
Facing a sobbing child, everybody was helpless. They could do nothing but hug her, waiting for Yao Qiqi to calm down.
Xu Nuan deeply sighed and ordered her disciples, "After Qi Niu comes back, I'll ask her to bring Qiqi back to the ship."
The disciples sighed and agreed with their master. They gave up on Qiqi as there was nothing they could do.
WHOOSH
Suddenly, a shadow of a large figure flew over their heads.
BOOM
Cat landed 50 meters behind the group of women. Then, she dashed toward the granary next to the empty farmland.
The women turned around to look. Then, everybody found the monster plant.
"M-Monster?!"
"EEEK!!"
The disciples panicked and pulled out their weapons. Xu Nuan immediately stood between them and Cat, trying to calm everybody down.
"Stand down! That is Daoist Florida Man's pet. It won't hurt us!"
"P-Pet?"
"M-Monster plant as a pet?"
The disciples gulped and shrank back in fear. A moment later, they slightly relaxed and put away their swords.
When everybody thought that everything was over, Cat slipped into the granary and came out. She carried a bundle newly harvested of fully grown immortal grass. Moreover, a hundred white flowers bloomed, emitting strong Qi and life force.
"Meow <3"
Cat crawled toward the group. One of her vines coiled around the bundle of flowers and extended them toward Qiqi.
"!!!"
The group of disciples was stunned. They almost drew their swords. But seeing that the monster was carrying a bouquet of flowers and offering it to Yao Qiqi, they looked at Cat and Yao Qiqi in confusion and astonishment.
On the other hand, Xu Nuan covered her mouth with one hand, finding the situation cute and adorable.
None of them had noticed it yet. The flowers were not ordinary flowers.
They were flowers of the immortal grass.
VIIING
The dark elf spirit's arm and hand overlapped with the vine. It was as if the infant spirit held the flower bouquet in her hand, and she gave it to Qiqi.
Yao Qiqi stopped crying. She gazed at the fairy and Cat.
"Miss Fairy?"
"Meow," Cat giggled.
"Is this for me?"
"Meow!"
Finally, Yao Qiqi brightly smiled, "Thank you very much, Miss Fairy!"
"Meow-Meow <3"
Yao Qiqi accepted the flowers. She hugged the banquet and her teddy bear.
FLUTTER
Some of the flower's spore spread, and Yao Qiqi directly inhaled them. Instantly, her body brightened in a silver light.
"Eh?"
"WHAT?!"
Yao Qiqi floated and slipped off from Xu Nuan's arms. Everybody then exclaimed in shock.
"QIQI!"
"WHAT IS HAPPENING!?"
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo looked outside the window and stared at the crowd.
"Wut da hail?"
He was confused about why they were making such a loud noise. He scratched his head, planning to educate Cat later.
Meanwhile, the seductive teenager continued to reveal her skin, showing her thigh and cleavage.
"Senior, do you have a girlfriend?"
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 52 Florida Man Revives 6-YO Girl Using Tea And Food After Allegedly Killing Her With Radiation
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 52 – Florida Man Revives 6-YO Girl Using Tea and Food after Allegedly Killing Her with Radiation
Leo had no time to play with Qi Niu. He put on rubber gloves, preventing the girl from touching his skin.
"Lady, my body is hazardous. If you touch me, you will die."
Qi Niu didn't give up. She undid two more buttons, revealing more of her skin.
"Senior, what is your type? Big breasts? Small breasts? Or, are you into something special? I know a few techniques. Do you want me to show you?"
Again, Leo started to get annoyed. He bellowed, "Stop that. If you don't, I'll kick you out of the store. This is my last warning!"
"…"
Qi Niu paused and glared into Leo's eyes. She was offended, but she couldn't voice her frustration.
'I swallow humiliation and lower myself, yet you ignore me?! How dare you!? Do you think you're better than the others? You're not the only rich man in this world! Fine, I'll find another man!'
The girl gave up seducing Leo. She snorted and stomped out of the store without purchasing anything.
Seeing how the girl reacted, Leo snorted. He was relieved that he managed to shake off a troublemaker.
"Next!" Leo called for a new customer. He looked out the window.
However, Xu Nuan and the disciples didn't hear him. They surrounded a floating little girl and shouted in panic.
"QIQI!"
"WHAT'S HAPPENING?!"
"MEOW?!" Even Cat was among them.
Qi Niu was also shocked. However, she clicked her tongue and observed the group from the side, not participating in the commotion.
Leo was different. He observed Yao Qiqi and Cat. Then, he noticed that the girl was holding a bundle of immortal grass flowers.
"Flowers?! Flowers from the immortal grass?!"
Leo approached the crowd. He was planning to ask Cat and Xu Nuan about the girl. But suddenly, Yao Qiqi emitted a strange aura, which didn't belong in this world. Xu Nuan and others could only see a rainbow aura from Qiqi, but Leo saw something familair.
'Isn't that…?'
Leo remembered the phenomenon. He gazed at Xu Nuan, and their eyes met.
"S-Senior Florida Man. We're so sorry. I've never imagined that one of my people will experience a breakthrough like this."
"Breakthrough?"
Leo inwardly laughed. This was not a cultivation breakthrough.
50,000 years ago when Leo was still a regular human, he went through a similar ordeal. The fallout radiation turned every cell in his body into cancer cells, and they mutated everything – arms, hands, feet, legs, stomach, chest, face, eyes, ears, mouths, and innards. However, the cells kept him alive. Leo remembered that he begged other people to kill him as he couldn't tolerate the pain, but everybody was also hit by the radiation and died. In the end, Leo waited for his death alone on the street of corpses.
His cancerous cells destroyed all human cells, organs, bones, and a portion of his brain. Leo remembered that his consciousness went back and forth between the ray of light and the abyssal darkness several times during the process. When Leo came back to his senses, he found himself in the same body, but he aged significantly. In exchange for the rapid aging, the cancer cells reverted to good cells, and his bones and muscle fibers were stronger than before.
Moreover, Leo found himself inside a strange spaceship of an alien, but that was a story for another time.
Looking at Yao Qiqi in the ray of light, Leo recalled the bright light that he had seen during his first mutation. He wondered if it was the same.
'Poor girl. If she goes through what I did, she would lose her mind. The pain is not something a kid can endure.'
Leo gave Cat a meaningful look, scolding her with his eyes.
Cat was taken aback. She shook her head, denying her responsibility. She also pointed at the flowers and blamed them for the phenomenon.
"…"
Leo snorted and turned around. He ran into the store and entered his bedroom. Looking under the bed, Leo grabbed a Tupperware box of the newly made elixir grain pill, which he had hidden from Cat and Wu Buyi.
.
Medium-Grade Elixir Grain Pill
Satisfy the hunger for 120 hours.
Increase metabolism and regenerative abilities for 25 days.
Increase lifespan by 50 years.
Increase five elemental Qi by 50 years' worth of cultivation.
.
Had Wu Buyi seen it, it would have driven him crazy. However, Leo kept these pills in case of emergency as they could be used as a temporary healing pill.
Leo picked one of them from the box and stored the container in the same place. He then picked a bottle of rejuvenate tea and rushed out to see the little girl.
As soon as Leo arrived, he witnessed a nightmarish scene – Yao Qiqi's arms and legs swelled and bloated like a heinous t-virus-infected zombie in Resident Evil Series. The disciples screamed in fright while Xu Nuan's face was as pale as a sheet. Even Cat started crying, regretting that she had given Qiqi the flowers.
Leo walked with long strides. He jumped and caught the floating girl. Then, he landed on the ground with the little girl in his arm. Then, Leo tossed the banquet of immortal grass flowers away.
Noticing that Leo touched the girl, Xu Nuan and the girls were shocked. It was common knowledge that a cultivator during a breakthrough was sensitive to bodily contact. Had a cultivator been touched during their advancement, the cultivator would have suffered from the Qi deviation as the touch might destroy the Qi flow.
In this case, Yao Qiqi was in danger of Qi deviation! Her Qi could go berserk!
"NO! HER ADVANCEMENT WILL BE RUINED!" Xu Nuan panicked.
On the other hand, Leo didn't care. He crushed the grain pill into small pieces. As Leo was not into romantic stuff, he simply poured the crushed pill into her mouth. Then, he opened the cog of Rejuvenate Tea bottle and slowly poured the content down her throat, forcing her to swallow the grain pill along with the tea.
.
High-Grade Rejuvenate Tea
Regenerate and restore bone marrow.
Decrease physical age by 7 years per liter.
Increase metabolism by 35% for 168 hours.
Medium chance to increase appetite.
.
Leo had no idea if the tea could help, but he had to risk it all. After all, every medicine he got was her last hope.
CREAK-CRACK
