The sound of cracking bones scared Leo. He bitterly gazed at the little girl in his arm, begging heaven and hell to spare her. While Leo gazed at Yao Qiqi's face, he also checked her lifespan status.I think you should take a look at
.
Name: Yao Qiqi
Age: 6
Remaining Lifespan: 399 Years, 6 Months, 9 Days, 9 Hours, and 2 Minutes
.
"399 Years?!"
As Leo hadn't checked Qiqi's lifespan earlier, he didn't know if the tea and the pill worked. Still, as she had a long life, Leo didn't believe that she would perish because of a simple radiation mutation.
CREAK
The swelling arms and legs slowly subsided and reverted back to normal limbs. Yao Qiqi's complexion got a lot better, but she sweated profusely. She was still in pain, and Leo could feel the heat coming from her skin.
Leo let out a long sigh as she survived the critical condition. He took off one of his gloves and swiped the sweat drops on her face.
"Ah…"
"Meow!!!"
At that moment, Leo and Cat's hearts sank. The former made a mistake.
He touched Yao Qiqi with his bare hand!
Leo tightly closed his eyes, blaming his stupidity and muscle memory. He just wanted to help the little girl, but he might have harmed her instead.
Without saying anything, Leo bit his lower lip and gestured for Xu Nuan to carry her instead.
Xu Nuan carefully received Yao Qiqi and princess-carried her. Leo was also careful not to touch Xu Nuan with the hand without a glove. After passing the responsibility to the woman, Leo deeply sighed.
"I did my best to help. Let's pray that she can turn this ordeal into a fortuitous encounter and become a main character of this era."
Leo said without thinking as his mind was still in chaos. He wanted to apologize to Xu Nuan for his blunder, but his brain couldn't come up with the right words.
Meanwhile, Xu Nuan and the girls gazed at Leo in awe and respect as his mysterious medicine and tea suppressed the swelling and bloating symptoms instantly. They believed that Leo sincerely helped Yao Qiqi.
While carrying Yao Qiqi, Xu Nuan lowered her head, "Thank you for saving her, senior! Without you, I don't know how Qiqi would survive this!"
The other girls also knelt. They cupped their fists and spoke in unison, "Thank you for saving our little sister!"
Leo heavily scratched the back of his head and grumbled. He felt bad, and he wanted to confess.
Suddenly…
RUMBLE
Yao Qiqi's body emitted rainbow light again!
However, this time, Xu Nuan could sense Qi inside the little girl. She sensed a small dantian crystal in her belly.
Yao Qiqi just condensed a dantian, which every Qi Condensation Stage cultivator strived to complete. However, this little girl did it instantly. Her cultivation base skipped the Muscle Tempering Stage and the Qi Condensation Stage! Her status rose to the Foundation Establishment Stage!
That was not all, Xu Nuan sensed more than one type of element Qi inside her!
"Qiqi… Oh, my goodness. You…"
Xu Nuan found a trace of Fire Qi, Water Qi, Wood Qi, Earth Qi, and Metal Qi inside her!
Yao Qiqi could cultivate five elements at once!
The little girl slowly opened her eyes and blinked several times. She gazed at Xu Nuan's face, which was full of tears.
"Grandma. I had a bad dream and a good dream."
"Yes, Qiqi?"
"I dreamt that I was eaten alive by blood monsters. I was drowning in a blood pool, and the blood pool turned into a monster. It was so painful."
Xu Nuan slowly put the girl down. She brought out a handkerchief and wiped Yao Qiqi's sweat. The other girls also surrounded the little girl and fanned them with their skirts, circulating the airflow for the two.
Leo immediately raised his hand and blocked his view. Then, he turned around. He didn't want to take advantage of these adolescent girls and looked at their underwear. After turning around, he raised his eyebrows.
'Wait, she's okay?'
Leo patted his chest and deeply exhaled. He almost had a heart attack. While he stood there, he eavesdropped their conversation.
Yao Qiqi continued narrating her dream, "But then, grandma. I saw a handsome angel."
"An angel?" Xu Nuan and the girls were curious. Some of them glanced at Leo and repeated her word.
"Handsome angel?"
"Yes, sister! A handsome angel rescued me from the monster and fed me a delicious pill and water. Then, he gave me a blessing touch. When he touched my face, I was no longer in pain!"
"…"
While his back faced the group of women, Leo widened his eyes in bemusement. He thought that his touch would have killed her.
'Wait. My touch helped her? But how?!'
Leo coughed several times as he choked. He also facepalmed and shook his head, confused and baffled by this event.
On the other hand, Xu Nuan and the girls quickly connected the dots. They gazed at Leo in respect.
Xu Nuan concluded her thought and explained to everybody, "Senior Florida Man is your savior, Qiqi. He fed you a medicine pill and healing water. Then, he cured you."
The girls nodded in agreement as they saw everything. Even Qi Niu who had a malicious thought couldn't help but agree.
"AHEM!"
Leo was still choking. He cleared his throat and walked back to his store, hiding the complex expression on his face. He tried to change the subject.
"Well, everything is my fault since I didn't teach my pet correctly. As an apology, I'll give everybody a bottle of rejuvenate tea for free, but I'll only give it to those who buy at least one of my items by using their lifespan."
The girls deeply bowed toward Leo. Even Xu Nuan had the urge to kowtow to him.
Yao Qiqi got back on her feet. She turned to Leo and bowed 90 degrees. Then, she shouted, "THANK YOU FOR SAVING MY LIFE, SENIOR HANDSOME ANGEL! YAO QIQI WILL NEVER FORGET THIS FAVOR!"
The girls giggled while Leo's face reddened in embarrassment. He was bad at taking compliments, especially if someone suddenly called him handsome.
Leo coughed, "AHEM! Alright. Next person, please. I don't have all day to entertain you."

chapters.title: Chapter 53 Florida Man Distributes Drugs To Underage Girls, Parent Is Happy
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 53 – Florida Man Distributes Drugs to Underage Girls. Parent is Happy.
After the hectic, Xu Nuan asked Qi Niu to bring Yao Qiqi back to the ship. The girl obeyed the order and escorted the little girl back. As for the others, they followed Leo into the store and browsed his items.
Because of Leo's deeds, the girls stopped being on guard around Leo. They treated him as a respectable senior and took off their veils and headwear. They were all gorgeous and beautiful.
The group looked around the store and inspected the vegetables. Some of them gawked at the yang flame pills while others fixated on grain pills.
"Senior. How much is this?"
"Is this expensive?"
"What can this pill do?"
Leo patiently answered them one by one.
"The grain pills are 20 years of lifespan each. Oh, be careful with that glass jar. Those are Prosthetic Eyeballs of Fenrir, and I sell one for 500 years of lifespan. And about that yang flame dans, it boosts your physical strength for a few days and permanently increases your fire essence, yang Qi, and lifespan. The medium-grade one is 40 years each. The high grade is 70 years."
The girls gulped as they were oblivious of the pill's true value. Most of them returned the item to the shelves as they didn't think it was worth losing their lifespan for rare pills. However, everybody couldn't look away from the Bloodmelon, which gave off a bloody scent.
One of them pointed at the melon, "Senior, how much for this?"
Leo deeply sighed as these girls were hard customers. Since he figured that the girls valued their lifespan highly, he cut down the price tag and gave them a bargain.
"10 years of lifespan each."
"Eh?" Some of the girls were surprised. They surrounded the Bloodmelon basket and started picking them up. One of them carried five in her arms.
Young girls could be terrifying when they saw discounted items in a store. In less than 10 seconds,  the baskets of bloodmelons were empty.
Leo frowned and gazed at the disciples, who hoarded several melons in their arms. He asked them.
"Do you even realize what they can do?"
The girls widely grinned. One of them nodded, "I'm a simple girl. I sense water Qi, I buy!"
"…"
.
Bloodmelon
Can only be found in Blood Swamps of demon-infested mystic realms. The melons grow from absorbing blood from the swamps, and their juice is filled with demonic Qi and Yin Energy. It is one of many fruits that Vampires and plant monsters are very fond of. Can be used as a water element catalyst.
Traits
Increase water element Qi and demonic Qi by 10 years' worth of cultivation (If consumed)
Increase water-based pill's success chance by 30%. (If used in alchemy)
.
Leo was aware of this item's description. Since he couldn't eat all of them to get lifespan, he might as well sell them for some changes.
The 19 disciples each took five melons. Leo absorbed their lifespan, and everybody stored the items in their spatial rings in glee. Then, everybody saluted Leo, thanking him for selling them for cheap.
However, one of them hesitated. She turned around and gazed at the refrigerator chest, which contained rejuvenate tea.
Leo noticed her gaze. He laughed.
"Fine. Nobody is going to buy that expensive tea anyway. I'll give everybody one bottle each. Oh, I forgot to mention. The medium-grade rejuvenate tea can decrease your physical age by five years. What I fed that little girl was a high-graded one. I didn't give her a lot, so she will just look one or two years younger."
"!!!"
All girls stopped their feet in their tracks. Their round eyes glinted in red light as if they transformed into predators.
Leo broke a sweat. Their dark expressions were the same as Yandere girls in anime. Still, Leo quietly passed 19 bottles of medium-grade tea to the disciples.
After everybody got their tea of youth, they quickly stored them in their spatial ring and kowtowed to Leo.
"Senior! I'll definitely return here to buy more one day!"
"Senior Florida Man, please save more of that tea. I'll get stronger and come back!"
"Please tell us when you have another promotion! I won't miss it!"
"…"
Leo blankly waved his hand and dully stared at the girls. He wondered if he should start selling cosmetic items, dresses, or women's shoes in the future. He might as well purchase stylish evening dresses from the online shopping system and resell them to these girls.
Putting his idea into action, Leo secretly opened his online store system and searched for woman's dresses. He randomly picked one of them, which looked like something that a Hollywood star would wear at a movie premiere.
DING
It cost Leo only one year of lifespan.
The box of dress appeared in front of Leo. He opened it and pulled the dress out.
As soon as the dress came out, the girls stared at it with round eyes. One of them clattered their jaws in astonishment while the others drooled.
The girl that had asked for rejuvenate tea asked first. She dropped the formality and got to the point.
"How much?"
Leo gazed at them with a poker face. He coughed as he felt bad for doing this.
"10 yea-"
"BUY! MINE!"
The girl leaped at the dress and snatched it from Leo's hands, leaving the latter stunned. Then, she triggered something unbelievable. The 18 girls that had already exited the store rushed back in and surrounded him.
"SENIOR, I WANT ONE, TOO!"
"SELL IT TO ME, TOO!"
"I WANT THREE OF THOSE! CAN I HAVE RED, WHITE, AND BLACK PLEASE?!"
"…"
Once again, Leo witnessed women's terrifying purchase power and their weird logic. They treated useful pills and immortal grass as expensive items, but they didn't hesitate to buy anything that could improve their appearance and look.
For the girls, their looks, dresses, and cosmetic items were their social statuses. They might look calm and disciplined, but they were competitive when they compared their beauty with their peers.
"Relax. Give me a moment. Let me check the stock first."
Leo politely asked them to open a way for him to return to his bedroom, to which they agreed. Upon entering his bedroom, he closed the door behind him and reopened the online store.
Due to the demand, he bought 19 sets of the same dress in three different colors. A large box appeared, and a total of 57 dresses were inside. Everything cost only 57 years of lifespan.
Leo returned to the girls and showed them the dresses.I think you should take a look at
"WOW!"
"MINE!"
"I'LL TAKE THOSE!"
Like vultures, the 19 girls quickly took three dresses each. Even the previous girl that already had a dress took three more.
CHA-CHING
58 dresses blessed Leo with 580 years of lifespan. Combined with the Bloodmelon, this transaction gave him 1,530 years of lifespan. Unfortunately, after cutting the dress cost and Xu Nuan's share, Leo's profit was only 1,319 years.
The girls started squealing and pressed their dresses on their bodies, checking the sizes. Their noise got so loud that Xu Nuan, who had been watching them from outside, coughed and reminded them of their manner.
"BEHAVE, GIRLS! WHAT ARE YOU, LITTLE KIDS?!"
The girls stopped talking and closed their mouths. However, they couldn't stop smiling, looking forward to trying their new dresses.
Leo shook his head and deeply sighed. He watched them leave the building.
Xu Nuan proceeded to yell and ordered the girls to sit. She gave them a loud sermon for minutes. Afterward, she chased them back to the ship.
After sending them away, Leo approached Xu Nuan and gave her a bottle of high-grade rejuvenate tea and a medium-grade elixir grain pill. He also asked her.
"If that little girl's condition worsens, feed her the tea, but don't give her the pill. When she can start eating food again, give her the pill so that her inner energy can stabilize."
Again, Xu Nuan bowed, "Thank you very much, senior. Without you, I don't know what would happen to Qiqi."
"Don't mention it. Oh, be sure to check your lifespan. You got your commission from those kids."
"Eh?"
.
Name: Xu Nuan
Age: 113
Remaining Lifespan: 1,230 Years, 9 Months, 5 Days, 4 Hours, 13 Minutes
.
Upon seeing the increase in her lifespan, Xu Nuan was stunned. She remembered that it was only 1000ish when it appeared.
"S-Senior, how?"
Leo shrugged, "It's your incentive. If you introduce me to more customers, you will get one-tenth of what they spend in my store."
"…"
Xu Nuan bitterly laughed as she understood the purpose of this scheme. Still, she appreciated it.
"Those girls must have spent a lot. I think my lifespan increases by 150 years or so."
"Yeah, they spent a lot on those dresses. Anyway, thank you for doing business. If you need more Bloodmelons or this tea, do come again."
"I will. Oh, by the way."
Xu Nuan noticed that Leo didn't seem to be affiliated with anybody. She tried asking him.
"Would you like to accompany us to the mystic realm this season? We have an available spot open for you."
Leo dryly laughed, 'This again?'
The mystic realm seemed interesting, but Leo hadn't solved the language barrier issue yet. He needed 20,000 years of lifespan for the auto-speech translation.
"I'm afraid I…"
Leo was about to refuse. But then, Xu Nuan suddenly described her previous expedition.
"Our sanctuary's gateway brought us to the wetland last season. Our people ran into countless strong crocodiles and alligators, and we got a lot of water-based herbs and 4th-grade monster cores. We also managed to capture a few specimens. Actually, I tamed several lizardmen and a three-tailed alligator queen during the last expedition. In this season, we expect the gateway to take us back to the previous wetland since we failed to conquer it. I wonder if you are inter-"
"DID YOU SAY, ALLIGATOR QUEEN?!"
"Est, err…"
Leo accidentally grabbed Xu Nuan's shoulders and shook her. Fortunately, he still wore rubber gloves, so she wasn't infected.
Xu Nuan was taken aback. She didn't expect that Leo would get excited over a monster. Still, she was delighted that Leo showed interest in their expedition and her story.
"Yes. Would you like to see it?"
Leo widely grinned and almost said yes. Fortunately, he closed his mouth before a word could slip out of his mouth. Leo then facepalmed.
"I-I'm so sorry. I'm in a bit predicament. I can't join your expedition right now, or I might bring trouble to you and your girls."
"Oh, I see."
Xu Nuan nodded in understanding.
'I see. Since Daoist Florida Man killed Ouyang Long, the Ouyang Clan might be targeting him. Therefore, if he joined the Amazonian Sanctuary, he might bring trouble to us. What a considerate senior!'
On the other hand, Leo had another thought.
'No matter how tempting it is, I must stay here and wait for stupid cultivators to raid my store again! I need more lifespan for that juicy auto-speech translation! Without it, I can't go on an adventure! But man, I miss my alligator.'
As Xu Nuan failed to invite Leo to visit her sanctuary, she bid farewell.
"Then, I would like to excuse myself. Again, thank you for saving Qiqi."
"Don't mention it."
Xu Nuan turned around and flew back to her flying ship.
.
.
After the women were gone, Leo glanced at Cat.
The culprit behind the commotion noticed Leo's stare and ran away. However, she ran into his granary.
Leo facepalmed for the nth time. He ignored the mischievous plant and turned his attention to the bouquet of grass flowers. They were still blooming and fresh even though they were left on the ground for a long time.
"Hah. What a day. Because of you, I almost killed a little girl."
Leo picked the bundle of grass up and inspected the white flowers. He pursed his lips and brought them to the alchemy workshop.

chapters.title: Chapter 54 Florida Man Threatens To Cut Cat’s Legs For Food
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 54 – Florida Man Threatens to Cut Cat's Legs for Food
DING
<Current Lifespan: 6,007 Years, 11 Months, 2 Days, 13 Hours, 26 Minutes.>
Leo grumbled as his lifespan wasn't enough to purchase the auto-speech feature. He needed 14,000 more. However, he had enough to upgrade his store to level six.
He could upgrade the store to level 6 right now, but there was nothing to gain other than expanding the store's interior space.
"Meh, what the hell."
Leo chose to save up his lifespan for the language. After all, 20,000 years of lifespan was harder to collect.
DING
While Leo was in deep thought, the cauldrons finished making two batches of yang flame dans. Leo wasted no time and tossed a white flower into the pot and pressed the research button.
DING
<You have discovered Immortal Flower.>
.
Immortal Flower
Can only be found on matured immortal grasses. It contained a thick amount of life force and five element Qi. However, it is not suitable to be consumed raw as it contains poisonous pores. Can be refined into True Immortal Pill, which can instantly unlock the potential of any cultivator.
Alchemy Recipe – True Immortal Pill
10 Immortal Flowers
100 Blades of Immortal Grass
10 Fire Element Catalyst
10 Water Element Catalyst
10 Wood Element Catalyst
10 Earth Element Catalyst
10 Poison Element Catalyst
10 Yang Element Catalyst or one liter of Yang Fluid
10 Yin Element Catalyst or one liter of Yin Fluid
Fire, Water, Metal, Earth, Wood, Yang, and Yin Essence
.
This one was unusual. Other pills and alchemy recipes only required one main ingredient and a few miscellaneous items, but this recipe asked for 10 of each catalyst and main ingredient. Moreover, it demanded 100 blades of immortal grass.
"Yang Element and Yin Element? This is new."
From a glance, this recipe seemed difficult, but Leo believed that he might have enough ingredients. He wondered if yin liquid could be used as a yin catalyst. Testing the possibilities, Leo brought a bucket of Ouyang Ting's blood to the workshop and researched it one more time.
DING
<You have already discovered Yin Fluid.>
.
Yin Fluid
Can be found in a monster's blood or a demon's blood. Alchemists usually dilute their blood in freshwater to increase the yin fluid quantity. Consuming it raw can be dangerous as it can mutate ordinary cultivators into fiendish cultivators. Can be used as a substitute for Yin Catalysts in alchemy.
Traits
Increase Yin Qi by one year's worth of cultivation (100cc) (Consumption)
.
Leo had almost ingredients. However, the issue was the yang fluid or yang catalyst. Leo remembered that he had potatoes that could be used as yang catalysts, so he turned around and was about to go check the granary.
While looking around, his eyes noticed the broken earth jar that he had been using to store fresh water from the stream. Leo massaged his forehead, suppressing his anger.
'That damn plant did it again. Can't she just behave like a normal plant?!'
Leo deeply sighed. He spent two years, purchasing a 100-liter earth jar from the system store and replacing the broken one. As for the broken pieces, Leo crushed them into small fragments so that he could use them to decorate his front yard.
While Leo tidied the field, he finally came to a realization. He wondered if his bathing water could be researched.
Putting his theory to the test, Leo grabbed the giant jar and dashed toward the stream. He scooped the water using the container until it was 70% full. Then, he ran back to the store with the freshwater and some small fish inside.
BOOM
Leo put the jar near the alchemy workshop. He took off his clothes and jumped into the large jar.
ZAAA
As soon as Leo got in the water, the transparent liquid became green, and the fish floated on top of the water. He glanced at the small fish and picked them up. Like a professional basketball player, he threw one into the first alchemy cauldron.
PLOP
It went in. Leo immediately researched the fish, hoping to get something useful.
DING
<You have discovered poisonous fish.>
.
Poisonous Fish
This fish is long dead. Cannot be used in alchemy or consumption. Please throw it away.
.
Unfortunately, it was useless. Leo discarded the rest of the fish in the jar. Then, he scooped a handful of water and got out of the unlikely bathtub. He put the content into the cauldron and researched it.
DING
<You have discovered Pinnacle-Grade Holy Water.>
.
Pinnacle-Grade Holy Water
Can be found in Unicorn's blood or an angel's blood. It is one of the most precious alchemy ingredients because of its rarity and usefulness in various high-ranked pills.
Traits
Either kill or bless anyone that touches the water. Not recommended for consumption.
.I think you should take a look at
"… I was hoping for Yang Fluid. Why the hell does it turn out to be the holy water?!"
Leo never felt this blessed in his life. He wondered if his body was made of god's blood or something.
As Leo had all ingredients at hand, he began putting stuff into the first alchemy cauldron.
10 Immortal Flowers – Checked.
100 Blades of Immortal Grass – Checked.
Yin Fluid – Easy! Checked.
Yang Fluid – Simple! Checked.
Fire Catalyst?
Leo tilted his head for a moment. Then, he smacked his forehead. He had been making Yang Flame Pills using Fiery Yang Tomatoes, Virgin Yang Potatoes, and the fire catalyst that Leo got from fruits.
He gazed at the basket near the cauldron and the tomatoes. It was full of red oranges
.
Tiger Killing Orange
Can be found in volcanic mystic realms. It produces great aroma and burning hot air. Rumor said that it can be used to make a delicacy drink. Can be used as a substitute for Fire Element Catalyst in alchemy.
Trait
Very delicious
.
These oranges were among the mutated fruits that Leo had gotten from Wu Buyi. Unfortunately, it could only be used as a catalyst, so Leo hadn't been using it much until he got the tomatoes.
Leo continued his checklist.
Water Catalysts – Bloodmelons, Checked.
Earth Catalysts – Golden Bananas, Checked.
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm Metal Catalysts – Iron Tree Barks, Checked.
Wood Catalysts…
Where are Cat's roots?
Leo paused. He turned around and dashed toward the granary. Upon entering the building, Leo found Cat, who was busy eating potatoes.
Cat shrank in fear. She hissed at Leo, warning him not to punish her.
Leo widely grinned. He rubbed his hands and glanced at her long roots.
"Listen here, Cat. I need a portion of your roots for alchemy. Can I get some?"
HISS!
Noticing Leo's strange expression and malicious aura, Cat climbed the building and latched onto the ceiling, hissing at him.
Leo deeply sighed, "I just want 10 pieces of your roots. What's the big deal? You ate a lot of my food, but I only want something that you will eventually discard. Why resisting?"
HISS!
"…"
Leo pursed his lips. Since Cat refused to cooperate, he could only return to his workshop to look for another alternative. He was not shameless enough to forcefully cut her roots and get the necessary ingredients.
He turned to another corner of the granary, which stored a hundred baskets of other fruits and vegetables that Leo hadn't used yet. He grabbed an item, which continuously emitted brown gas.
.
Weeping Onion
Can be found in a mystic realm with dense earth miasma. It produces brown tear gas to protect itself. Can be used as an earth element catalyst in alchemy.
Trait
Produce deadly tear gas.
.
Leo always avoided it as it smelled, and the gas made his eyes itchy. Even Cat avoided them.
He picked 20 of the onions and brought them back to the alchemy workshop. He put 10 in the pots, completing the last set of ingredients. After spitting a few times into the fireplace, Leo completed feeding the workshop some essence.
DING
<Refining True Immortal Pills…>
167 Hours, 59 Minutes, 57 Seconds…
Leo almost cursed out loud. This pill needed a whole week to complete!
Because of the long refining time, Leo aborted the plan to make another batch of True Immortal Pills. He put in ingredients to make rejuvenate tea instead as he needed one active workshop to make some goodies to sell.
Leo grumbled and brought the prepared ingredients back to the granary. He put everything in its place and looked at the ceiling, gazing at Cat.
Cat was still paranoid. Even though she was at fault, she was still behaving like a spoiled brat.
"Alright. I guess I didn't educate you enough. Come down here, Cat!"
HISS!
Even though Leo no longer wished to harm or cut her roots, Cat was still afraid of him. She kept crawling and running on the ceiling.
As Cat started to get on his nerve, Leo warned her, "If you don't come down here, I'll go and grab you myself. And if I catch you, you'll get some spanking, okay? Will you come down obediently and work with me, or will you be forced to work and get spanked? Choose one."
"Meow…"
Cat was smart. Upon noticing Leo's voice tone, she paused to contemplate the pros and cons. A few seconds later, she crawled down and approached Leo.
MLEM
Trying to reduce her penalties, Cat licked his face. She also tried to kiss him, but her chomper mouth ended up sucking his head in her mouth instead.
"…"
CHU-CHU
Leo's entire head was wet and smelly. He patiently pulled his head out and gently pinched her lips.
"Cat. We have to talk, okay? I've been feeding you a lot of things. It's about time that I need your lifespan again."
"Meow?"
Leo opened her lifespan status, checking her balance.

chapters.title: Chapter 55 Florida Man Challenges Thunderstorm By Standing On Open Field
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 55 – Florida Man Challenges Thunderstorm by Standing on Open Field
Name: Cat
Age: 0
Remaining Lifespan: 6,300 Years
.
Sometimes, Leo wondered, how much did Cat eat to get her lifespan to this point? He deeply sighed in envy.
"Cat. I need some of your lifespans. Can you share them with me? You don't have to give me everything. Just give me half."
"Meow?" Cat mischievously smirked.
"What? You dare to ask me what I will give you in return?! You ate my potatoes and other food, you little brat! You've been freeloading me for several days now. You need to pay rent!"
"Meow!" Cat pouted and pointed at the remaining pile of giant potatoes.
"You want all of those? You greedy punk!"
"Meow <3"
Leo gave up on Cat's gluttony and greed. He compromised as he didn't want to take advantage of this little kid.
"Fine. I'll give you the entire stock of potatoes as long as you spit out the seeds. I need those to regrow them, okay?"
"Meow <3"
The two came to a term. Cat obediently gave 4,000 years of her life force to Leo.
DING
After getting the lifespan, Leo's life force reached 10,000, which was halfway to his goal. He could only wait for more customers or hoodlums to show up again.
.
Without a visitor, Leo killed his time by farming and clearing land. He also didn't forget to make pills, sacred wood blocks, and tea. The mannequin doll also helped him collect resources.
The next morning, Leo resumed working as usual. However, for the entire day, nobody visited his store. He hummed in a good mood as he got to enjoy a quiet and slow life for once.
The next day, nobody showed up. However, Leo was happy as he got to replenish grain pills, tea, and yang flame pills in the store.
On the third day, no one visited him. Not even a beast showed up to attack his store.
After three days of idling, Leo felt like something was missing in his life, yet he was in a good mood as he managed to stock up on sacred wood blocks. He focused on making wood blocks for an entire day and fill the backyard behind the workshop with hundreds of them.
Seven days passed since Xu Nuan last visited him, and Leo was bored.
He sat in his store, gazing at the shelves full of yang flame pills, grain pills, and vegetables. He deeply sighed.
"Where are all the customers? Where are those crazy cultivators?"
He was tired of uprooting woods and making random items with the alchemy cauldrons. He wondered where all the people went.
Because of boredom, Leo finally took a day off from the farmland and alchemy workshop. Leo spent the rest of the afternoon in his bedroom, chilling and enjoying the afternoon nap.
BOOM
Suddenly, a loud boom came from the first workshop. Leo jumped out of his bed and rushed toward the cauldron.
When Leo came out of the store through the backdoors, he saw a pillar of rainbow light, trekking to the sky. It shone upon the cauldron, highlighting its location. Leo looked up, but he couldn't find the source of the light beacon.
RUMBLE
Black clouds gathered above the beacon of light. A lightning storm brewed, and thunder sounds followed.
Meanwhile, Cat had been sitting on the rooftop. When the thunder sound echoed in the sky, she shrieked and sprinted to the granary building. Upon getting inside, she shivered in a corner, burying herself under the mountain of potatoes.
Leo stared at the sky and the dark clouds. He bitterly smiled.
"It's you again. Are you following me to this world, too?"I think you should take a look at
This was not the first time that Leo encountered the sentient thunderclouds. He still remembered vividly as if he had just met the clouds yesterday as the experience that day imprinted in his mind.
.
.
Life Sword Sect, Magpie City
It had been over a week since Ouyang Long was dead. Because of the incident, Wu Buyi and Han Hao summoned all elders of the sect for an emergency meeting. Then, they gathered at the foot of the Claymore Mountain.
The Claymore Mountain was a billion years old tall mountain. It was three times taller than Mt. Everest, and its shape was similar to a massive long sword. The local cultivators and commoners called it Claymore Mountain, paying homage to the founder of the Life Sword Sect, who used a claymore as his personal weapon.
At the top of the mountain, Life Sword Sect's master resided. He rarely spent time managing his sect as he was usually in seclusion. Every time he went into seclusion, he always remained on the mountain for decades.
However, Han Hao could no longer wait for the sect master to come out. He gathered everybody in the sect at the foot of the mountain and knelt.
"Sect Master, we need your help!"
"Sect Master! Our sect is in danger!"
The elders kept shouting, hoping that the sect master could hear them. Although everybody wanted to climb the mountain and visit the sect master directly, they couldn't enter as it was heavily protected by a killing array.
After a week of kneeling, the elders started to lose hope. They looked at each other, wondering if they should flee the sect before the Ouyang Family and the Jianghu Alliance invaded them.
RUMBLE
While kneeling, the thunderous sound from afar distracted everybody. Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, and a dozen elders stood up and gazed east.
"Tribulation Clouds?"
"Is someone breaking through? Those tribulation clouds seem a bit thick."
"When I advanced to the nascent soul realm, my tribulation clouds were as big as a small hill. But those clouds are…"
The elders gulped. The clouds kept expanding and condensing larger. A few minutes later, they reached Magpie City, and the clouds slowly descended.
Han Hao narrowed his eyes. He had been living for over a hundred years, but he had never seen tribulation clouds this thick. Moreover, Han Hao suspected that they came from a certain place.
"Say, Wu Buyi."
Wu Buyi stood up and gazed at the clouds, "Yeah?"
"I heard that when an alchemist makes a pill that transcends the mortal world, tribulation clouds will appear to destroy the pill. Is that true?"
Wu Buyi deeply sighed, "Correct. Heaven Tribulations appear to test cultivators during their breakthroughs, but they can also test the newly made immortal pills. If the pill quality is not the pinnacle grade or high grade, the made pills will be destroyed. But this tribulation also depends on the maker of the pills. We, the alchemists, can share the burden of the Heaven Tribulations. Half of the lightning bolts will strike the pill owner if they carry the pills. However, if the alchemists choose to avoid trouble, all lightning bolts will concentrate on the pills. Well, in short, if the alchemist is strong enough, he can actually protect the low-grade immortal pills from being destroyed."
Han Hao silently thought of Leo, "Do you think those clouds come for Daoist Florida Man?"
Wu Buyi sweated profusely. He repeatedly nodded, "Considering the size of the clouds, I think so. He must have made an immortal pill!"
While the crowd spectated and speculated, an elderly man came out from his cave. He had a long white beard, but he had no hair. His thick droopy eyebrows covered half of his eyes. However, his aura was the same as Ouyang Long's.
Sect Master Hua Jiashan used his cane as he walked. He gazed at the east, where the tribulation clouds had been gathering. He solemnly pondered.
"The world is full of surprises. It has been 500 years since I last saw the Heavenly Tribulation of Immortal Pills. The last soul formation alchemist died protecting the pill in vain, and Ouyang Tong stole the pill and ascended to the higher realm. Since the pill appears again, I'm sure the despicable Ouyang Clan will swarm there to steal the pill. No, I forgot about the demon clans and unorthodox cultivators. Those undying bastards will definitely go there to snatch the immortal pill after the tribulation."
Hua Jiashan snorted and sent a voice transmission to his subordinates.
"All elders, prepare to depart after the tribulation is over. We must protect the alchemist at all costs. Do not allow his pill to be stolen by unorthodox cultivators or despicable thieves!"
The elders at the mountain foot widened their eyes in astonishment. They cheered as their sect master finally came out from seclusion.
"FINALLY!" Han Hao was delighted. He sent his voice transmission to Hua Jiashan to inform him about Leo and Ouyang Long's death.
.
Meanwhile, Leo jumped on top of the alchemist workshop. He deeply sighed as he baited the lightning bolts.
"COME HERE, YOU LITTLE SHIT! I WON'T LET YOU DESTROY MY PRECIOUS ARTIFACTS AGAIN! I MADE THIS, SO THIS IS MINE!"
Leo remembered how the tribulation lightning bolts destroyed some of the alien artifacts when he brought them out of the spaceship. In the end, only the ring survived.

chapters.title: Chapter 56 Florida Man Struck By Lightning Bolts, Becomes Super Florida Man
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 56 – Florida Man Struck by Lightning Bolts, Becomes Super Florida Man
50,000 Years Ago…
In a dark room inside a round structure with a flat metal surface, 10,000 3-meter-tall capsules trapped mutated humans inside while the green fluid prevented them from rotting. However, nobody was there to monitor their conditions. On the floor, a dozen corpses of humanoid creatures were already dried and decayed.
WHOOSH
The only entrance to this room was a sci-fi door. It automatically slid to the side as someone stood at the other side of the door. From a circular passageway, a thin silhouette of a human entered the dark lab.
The skeleton-thin middle-aged man with white hair looked around the room with his green eyes. He grumbled as he inspected the room, searching for survivors.
"Anybody there?! HELLOOOO?!"
HELLOOO
ELLOO
LOO
His voice echoed in the strange lab. The man scanned the room, searching for anything that he could use or eat.
Leo, who hadn't eaten anything since he woke up in the strange place, was desperate. He was starving, and he slowly lost the strength to walk or move. He looked around the room and found that it was similar to the place that he came from.
"WHERE IS THIS PLACE?!"
Because of the shock and panic, Leo forgot about the horror movie flags as one shouldn't shout or make a loud noise in a foreign place. Instead, he should have remained quiet to keep his presence hidden from potentially unknown entities.
As Leo dragged his feet to explore the room, he accidentally stumbled upon a corpse on the ground. As he fell, his hand reached out to grab something to balance himself.
BEEP
Leo's hand touched a console panel, and it lit up in green color. The strange machine activated, and the control panel became bright, including the large tube in front.
Leo looked up and found another mutated human in the tube. It looked like something from Resident Evil games as it had a zombie-like face and disfigured limbs. Fortunately, this was not Leo's first time that he saw another mutant.
The thin middle-aged man sighed and looked at his arms and hands. His hands were twice bigger than Shaq's hands, and the green cysts on his face were the same as many zombie monsters in the capsules.
*COUGH*
Leo vomited a mouthful of green liquid. His stomach churned as if something inside was eating his innards.
"Damn cancer cells! Just kill me!"
Confused and frustrated, Leo punched his stomach. The impact dizzied him, but he somehow felt better.
*BLECH*
Again, Leo hurled more liquid from his mouth. This time, a one-foot-long larva came out along with the puke. As if it knew that it was no longer inside its host, it turned around and looked at Leo.
HISS
Its face split open like a flower. Then, it crawled toward Leo.
"GO TO HELL!"
Leo mustered his feeble strength and stomped it.
SPLASH
It was crushed and splattered green liquid everywhere.
Leo panted in exhaustion. He slightly leaned backward to bend his back while he shut his eyes tight.
"UGH!"
After the stretch, Leo felt a lot better. The pain in his stomach was gone.
While Leo was about to give up living, the capsule in front of him suddenly released the pressure inside the container. The green liquid decreased, and the mutated zombie in the tube collapsed to the bottom of the container.
Leo sighed and looked at the dead zombie in pity.
"Sucks to be you. Just don't wake up."
Fortunately, such a scenario didn't happen. A long metal, attached with sharp blades, slowly descended from the top of the capsule. It pressed the corpse to the bottom of the container, and it started spinning.
WHIZZ WHIZZ
Leo felt nauseous. That capsule turned into a blending machine, slicing and grinding the mutated corpse inside into mincemeat. Despite the disgust, Leo kept watching, wondering what the machine tried to do.
A few minutes later, the capsule finished turning the zombie into red juice. It retracted the blades and filled the tube with yellow liquid.
Red blood and mysterious yellow fluid turned into orange HUMAN juice. Leo's expression turned dark as he imagined himself drinking it.
GROWL
Because of such a thought, Leo got hungry. His stomach rebelled, forcing him to bend forward in pain.
The capsule didn't end there. After mixing the juices together, the machine added strange powder into the container. Then, the same blades descended to stir the juice.
WHIZZ WHIZZ
Nothing traumatized and captivated Leo more than watching this strange machine mixing something inhuman. Leo noticed that it started throwing random grass, leaves, monster bones, and strange meat into the container.
WHOOSH
While Leo kept watching, the other capsules also activated. They repeated what the machine in front of Leo did, crushing the mutants inside and militating them into red juice.
Leo no longer had the strength to walk or leave this room. He sat there and looked at his side, finally noticing the dried corpse that he had stumbled on.
"Oh, you. What are you?"
It was not a human corpse as its skull was too big. It also had big hands and long fingers like Leo. Moreover, it had white hair.
Leo bitterly smiled. He remembered that he woke up on a single bed, and many tubes were inside him, filling his body with white fluid. His mouth was also covered by a strange mask, feeding him nitrogen-like gas.
Thinking of how his current state looked like the corpse of this creature, Leo wondered if this alien mistook him as one of its kind and tried to resurrect him. Unfortunately, something killed the alien before Leo could find out the truth behind the experiment and his resurrection.
PZZSSSHHHH
Finally, the machine in front of Leo finished blending and mixing random substances. The capsule glass turned red, and Leo could feel the heat.
However, inside the glass, only a suspicious finger-sized ball was left behind. Moreover, the capsule glass was open, allowing Leo to access the content.
Seeing the strange ball, Leo had a sick thought. He wondered if it was edible. Because of hunger, he no longer cared about the ingredient of this weird ball.
Leo stood up and reached out to grab it.
SCREECH
Unfortunately, the ball immediately transformed into a larva, similar to the thing that Leo had crushed earlier. It jumped and opened its flower mouth, trying to bite him.
"DAMMIT"
Leo punched the creature by reflex. Although he didn't use much strength, the creature was shattered upon impact, splashing its green blood everywhere.
After killing the monster, Leo bitterly smiled. He turned toward the other capsules in the large room as they were also creating a similar creature.
"I take it back. This is hell."
Leo turned around and gathered his last bit of strength to leave. But as he looked at the alien corpse, he noticed glittering objects on him.
On the alien's fingers, Leo found five rings of different colors.
Curious, Leo returned to the corpse and pulled out the rings. Again, it was his reflex as a former Florida Man.
"Ah, crap."
Unfortunately, out of five rings, four were broken in half upon touch. Only one remained intact. Leo put the clear gold ring on his finger and admired it.
WHOOSH-CLICK
Leo's luck was downright terrible. The door automatically closed and locked Leo inside the room. At the same time, the 9,999 capsules finished creating 9,999 alien larvae.
Seeing how his situation changed from bad to worse, Leo was on the verge of giving up. He sat down and waited for the larvae to find him.
"That's enough. I'm out. Let me die."I think you should take a look at
Leo bitterly laughed and rubbed the gold ring. He deeply sighed and prayed for a quick death.
DING
As Leo was about to close his eyes and lie down, a semi-transparent blue screen appeared in front of Leo. It showed strange moon rune language at first, but Leo somehow understood them. He read the first sentences on the screen.
<Identifying New User…>
"Huh?"
<Confirming New User's Data...>
<Confirming New User's Identity…>
<New User's Karma Identified.>
<New User's Gnosis Identified.>
<Evaluating Compatibility with Entity Fate Crystal…>
<Evaluating Completed! Compatibility Rate: 99.10 %!>
<Merging New User's Gnosis and Karma with Entity Fate Crystal…>
"What?"
Leo didn't understand anything as the message popped up so fast. Before he could even comprehend what the message meant, the golden ring already merged with his finger.
Instantly, Leo could no longer breathe. His body slowly floated, and his skin emitted rainbow light. A million small worms suddenly emerged from the pores of his skin, and they extended everywhere, turning him into a porcupine.
CLANK-CLANK
The tiny tentacles from Leo's skin crushed the machine, ceiling, floor, walls, larvae, corpses, and random objects. They melt every metal and creature. Then, they sucked the liquid into Leo's body.
The thin body of Leo absorbed the nutrition from the tiny tentacles even though they were made of metal material or glass. He even took in the green fluid of the larvae and the corpses of aliens.
The tentacles kept melting and sucking fluid while Leo looked around in confusion. Then, his consciousness slowly faded, and his heart stopped beating.
.
"Umm."
Leo didn't know how long he had died or slept. He felt like something zappy and tingling hit his chest so hard that his heart resumed beating. Slowly, Leo opened his eyes.
When Leo could see everything clearly again, his first sight was a thick black thundercloud. It rumbled and flashed countless strings of light.
"Oh, a thunderstorm?"
BANG
As soon as Leo talked, a lightning bolt struck his chest. The terrifying heat and the electricity instantly burnt half of his body. He could even sense the heat frying his soft brain.
However, a blue screen showed up, informing Leo.
DING
<Warning: You are under attack.>
<Your current lifespan: 1,150 Years, 10 Months, 16 Days, 14 Hours, 43 Minutes.>
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm "What?"
Leo was confused. He didn't even have enough time to check his current appearance or the surroundings as the new lightning bolt came for him.
BOOM
Once again, Leo felt like he was burnt alive.
DING
<Warning: You are under attack.>
<Your current lifespan: 650 Years, 10 Months, 16 Days, 14 Hours, 43 Minutes.>
In one hit, Leo's lifespan decreased by 500 years. However, it was far from over.
"Son of a…!"
Leo grasped the gist of the situation. He looked up and tried to predict the timing to dodge the lightning bolt.
However, before the next lightning bolt came, Leo's constitution changed. He felt that some of the heat transferred to his hair and fingers. Moreover, some of the residual energy merged with his muscle fibers and blood cells.
DING
<Your current lifespan: 1,350 Years, 10 Months, 16 Days, 14 Hours, 43 Minutes.>
Leo's lifespan bounced back. Not only it refunded the decreased years, but Leo also gained 200 years extra!
"Eh? How?"
BOOM
Before Leo could react, the next strike landed directly on his head. Leo's consciousness blacked out for a few seconds, and he fell to his knees.
DING
<Warning: You are under attack.>
<Your current lifespan: 350 Years, 10 Months, 16 Days, 14 Hours, 43 Minutes.>
RUMBLE
The thunderclouds echoed in the sky. As if heaven waited for Leo to recuperate, no lightning came for him when he was unconscious.
A few minutes later, Leo regained his sense. He swore that he saw the River Styx and the Grim Reaper on a ferry boat. However, the reaper chased him away, saying that Samsara God rejected him.
DING
<Your current lifespan: 1,550 Years, 10 Months, 16 Days, 14 Hours, 43 Minutes.>
Leo didn't know how, but the fried brain cells were resurrected, and he could feel their presence inside him. He could even command them to move around. Furthermore, he could tell what each cell thought of him.
"What the hell? What am I?"
BOOM
The next strike came when Leo least expected it. Again, the thunderclouds headshot him. However, this time, Leo didn't fall unconscious.
DING
<Your current lifespan: 1,350 Years, 10 Months, 16 Days, 14 Hours, 43 Minutes.>
DING
<Your current lifespan: 1,750 Years, 10 Months, 16 Days, 14 Hours, 43 Minutes.>
The damage was also a lot less, and his body somehow adapted to the recovery process. Leo was no longer injured by the lightning anymore.
Getting addicted to the lightning strikes, Leo looked up and challenged heaven, "Do it again! I love it!"
BOOM
Unfortunately, the next strike didn't come for him. It hit something else.
Finally, Leo looked around the check his surroundings. He then found himself in the same mysterious room, but the ceilings were blasted open. Upon further inspection, Leo found several floors and the rough structure of a massive damaged spaceship.
BOOM
BOOM
It was too late for Leo to inspect the spaceship as lightning bolts started destroying modules and melting metal objects. The white lightning bolt changed their color to red, and they were as sharp as lightsabers. Everything that the red lightning bolts hit, they left behind red melting holes and lava.
"Shit. WAIT! THERE ARE THINGS THAT I HAVEN'T EXPLORED YET!"

chapters.title: Chapter 57 Naked Florida Man Challenges Lightning Storm, Waving Nation Flag And Cursing God
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 57 – Naked Florida Man Challenges Lightning Storm, Waving Nation Flag and Cursing God
= Present =
Standing on the alchemist workshop's ceiling was Leo. He spread his arms, taunting the heaven.
"Smite me, I dare you! I broke promises. I slept with your mother… your sister and your dad, too!"
BANG
A yellowish lightning bolt directly struck down and the light pierced through Leo's chest. An electric current ran through his body, but his muscle fibers and cells absorbed everything.
Leo burst into laughter. He was not the same as when he first came out from the alien spaceship. Green lightning bolts did nothing to him.
He had seen seven types of lightning bolts. The first type was white bolts, which only caused electricity and heat damage. Leo had never measured the voltage, but he used to struggle with it after the first evolution. But after the second mutation, Leo was no longer affected by simple heat and electric current.
The second type was the memorable green lightning bolts. It defied physics as it had a physical form. Leo got struck by it once when he successfully survived the second mutation. Despite being stronger than most mutants and monsters on Earth, the lightning used to leave a gaping hole in his chest, and Leo almost died.
The purple lightning belonged to the third category. Its destructive force and heat exceeded that of the previous tier, and it was a homing type. Leo once faced them during his third mutation, and the lightning bolts followed him to the underground bunker, where he sheltered from the outside world.
There were four more colors – Yellow, Orange, Red, and Black. Every rank was stronger than the previous color. So far, Leo had gone through everything in the previous world.
"IS THAT ALL YOU CAN DO?! GIMME MORE!"
Leo chortled as he glanced at his lifespan status.
<Current Lifespan: 11,557 Years…>
Leo had been hit three times so far, and every strike increased his lifespan by 500 years. He could never be happier.
BOOM
"Again!"
BOOM
BOOM
"Oh, yes! Baby!"
BOOM-BOOM-BOOM
"Ahn! Kimoji---!"
Leo's clothes were burnt, leaving him naked. However, he and his brother stared at heaven in enthusiasm. Had any modern people seen him at the moment, they would have called the cops to take the pervert exhibitionist away.
Windstorm picked up as the lightning bolts zapped Leo's chest. His hair and beard fluttered by the strong gale, and tree leaves were sucked into the sky.
Seeing how nature stole his precious iron pine leaves in the nearby forest, Leo was enraged. He purchased a flag pole and a red-blue flag. Then, he waved them.
"See this? This is Florida! Come down here and catch me if you can! I'll let you touch my butt cheeks!"
As if the tribulation clouds were offended, the lightning bolts changed color from green to purple.
BOOM
The lightning bolts were no longer random. Like homing missiles, they concentrated on Leo's chest and head as if Heaven tried to roast or burn him alive.
Unfortunately, Leo received no punishment. He was rewarded with the heavenly energy, which increased his life force.
DING
<Current Lifespan: 14,641 Years…>
<Current Lifespan: 15,154 Years…>
<Current Lifespan: 15,666 Years…>
The national flags were instantly burnt to ash, but Leo's skin remained smooth and flawless. He sneered and waited for the clouds to upgrade their power.
BOOM
BOOM
DING
<Current Lifespan: 16,173 Years…>
<Current Lifespan: 16,689 Years…>
..
<Current Lifespan: 22,745 Years…>
Patience was key. Leo counted his fingers and whistled in a good mood.
BOOM-BOOM
Two purple lightning bolts came for his crotch. However, the long glossy thing was harmless.
"Nope. Can't touch dis."
BOOM-BOOM
Two purple lightning bolts attacked his eyes in unison. Extreme heat and electric current blurred his vision for a moment, but they did nothing to his eyeballs other than temporarily blinded him.
DING
<Current Lifespan: 24,819 Years…>
When Leo's sight adapted to the collective heat and statics, he noticed that the dark clouds slowly dispersed. He pouted in disappointment.
"Only 30? Lame! You used to hit me 100 times straight. How come you're so lazy?"
Leo rested his hands on his shoulders. His boner was killed.
DING
<Repairing!>
Despite being the only one that got hit, the first workshop's rooftop was charred black. However, the blackened part slowly regained color as the building automatically self-repaired.
Leo looked around. The forest around the store was devastated by the windstorm, but most of the mutated pine trees stood tall. Only the blue trees and regular pine trees lost most of their branches.
Fortunately, Leo stored most of his merchandise in his warehouse. Sacred wood blocks and processed items were safe in the building. As for the store and the second workshop, it was still intact.
Leo returned to his room and put on a new set of clothes. Then, he returned to the cauldron, which just completed the pills.
The cauldron was glittering in rainbow colors. Leo widely grinned and touched it to see what the workshop made for him.
DING
<You have refined 16 Medium-Grade, 13 High-Grade, and 1 Superior-Grade True Immortal Pills.>
.
Medium Grade True Immortal Pill
Permanently increase physical strength by 25%
Increase Yin and Yang Qi by 500 years' worth of cultivation.
Increase Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Element Essence by 500 years' worth of cultivation.
Increase Lifespan by 500 years.
.
High Grade True Immortal Pill
Permanently increase physical strength by 35%
Increase Yin and Yang Qi by 700 years' worth of cultivation.
Increase Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Element Essence by 700 years' worth of cultivation.
Increase Lifespan by 700 years.
.
Superior Grade True Immortal Pill
Permanently increase physical strength by 50%I think you should take a look at
Increase Yin and Yang Qi by 1,000 years' worth of cultivation.
Increase Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Element Essence by 1,000 years' worth of cultivation.
Increase Lifespan by 1,000 years.
.
Leo's eyes almost jumped out of the eyes sockets as soon as he saw the funny numbers. He also choked.
"ONE THOUSAND YEARS PER PILL?!"
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm He fell to his knees, praying to Jesus while hugging the cauldron. He was never this happy.
"I'VE FOUND A CHEAT! THIS IS SO BROKEN, AND I LOVE IT!"
After kissing the black pot, Leo gazed at the hovering rainbow pills over the cauldron. He reached out to collect them. As soon as Leo touched the superior pill, it zapped him. He could also sense strong radiation coming from it.
Leo smirked as the radiation was harmless to him. He popped the pill into his mouth. Although he didn't care about strength boost or Qi, the one thousand years of lifespan booster was necessary to him.
"NOOOOOOO!!"
Leo frowned as he heard someone's desperate cry from afar. He chewed the pill like a snack while his hands collected the floating rainbow pills. Then, he turned around to look where the noise came from.
When Leo turned around and looked up, he found a dozen jetski boat-like flying ships and a hundred people standing on floating swords to the south. To the north, a thousand cultivators also surrounded the forest while they rode on their floating weapons. Moreover, a dozen old men on a massive flying claymore sword observed Leo from the sky.
Leo was stunned. He didn't know that he got so many visitors.
"This must be my lucky day!"
Leo rubbed his hands, looking forward to welcoming customers. Unfortunately, the next words of a cultivator from the south stunned him.
"HAND OVER THE IMMORTAL PILLS!!"
Leo's smiling face froze. His friendly expression turned dark, but the corners of his mouth curved up wider.
"I beg your pardon?"
.
.
An Hour Earlier
The South Peninsula of the main continent belonged to the Situ Clan, the prestige craftsmen clan. This family produced over a thousand elite alchemists, scribes, blacksmiths, and merchants, and they also joined prominent alchemy sects, blacksmith unions, and array schools. Aside from the Ouyang Clan, they were considered the wealthiest family.
However, no matter how rich they were, mortals had a finite lifespan. Every clan member desired nothing more but a way to increase their longevity and restore their youth.
At a harbor town, one of the Situ Clan's elders sat on a peer, holding a fishing rod. He waited for a fish to bite the bait while he meditated, circulating his Qi. Because of the deep meditation, the fisherman somewhat dozed off, being half-asleep.
The fisherman was a skinny old man with a white goatee. He wore a ragged grey robe, which barely covered his skin. He was also short as his height was merely 5 feet tall. His tattered straw hat latched onto his head, hiding his bald head.
BZZ
While the fisherman enjoyed his daydream, something in his hat buzzed. The fisherman slowly opened his eyes as he heard someone's voice entering his mind.
'Grandfather, our scouts from Magpie City have reported that pill tribulation clouds are gathering there. Someone has made an immortal pill. Should we take a look?'
"Immortal pill, you say?"
Situ Nantian stood up. He rubbed his goatee beard and nodded, "Send someone to snatch the alchemist before the likes of Ouyang get him! If he can make an immortal pill, he must know the recipe! Capture him, ALIVE!"
'Will do. Say, grandfather. When will you return? The Tang Clan's grand elder is looking for you. He said something about he needed your help to make some poison arrays for his clansmen.'
"That damn pest Tang Tian, I assume."
'Y-Yes, grandfather.'
"Alright. I'll head back right now. Oh, send the strongest elders there. Since the alchemist can make the pill, he must be at a soul formation stage or higher. Don't send nascent soul soldiers there to die in vain. Tell the men to expect a bitter fight since the other clans will be there, too."
'On it!'
Situ Nantian deeply sighed. He cut the voice transmission and collected his fishing rod. Coincidentally, something took the bait. He grinned and pulled the fishing pole.
ZAAA
A 5th-stage giant octopus caught the bait. From a glance, it was at least 100 feet long.
"Ah, how nice. I finally get my ink ingredient for my talismans."
Situ Nantian laughed. He waved his hand and placed a yellowish talisman on the monster's forehead.
BOOM
The talisman shattered, and so did its brain. The monster instantly died.
The elder collected the monster and the fishing rod in his spatial ring. He then turned around and paused.
WHOOSH
An array appeared around him. Then, he vanished.
.
WHOOSH
A few seconds later, Situ Nantian appeared in an enclosed chamber. The walls and the ceiling had countless symbols drawn on them, forming a teleportation array for the Situ Clan's family members.
The elder exited the room. As he came out, he found four nascent soul cultivators, standing guard in front of the room. They all saluted Situ Nantian.
"Welcome back, Grand Elder!"
"Welcome back, sir."
Situ Nantian nodded and looked around. He lightly took a step, but he vanished from where he had stood. Instantly, his body reappeared 300 meters away from the place, exiting the underground structure and standing in front of the underground dungeon's entrance.
Again, a dozen nascent soul guards bowed to him. Situ Nantian ignored them and took a long stride.
WHOOSH
This time, he traveled 10 kilometers, leaving behind his afterimage.
WHOOSH
With every step Situ Nantian took, he teleported 10 kilometers away. In less than a minute, he arrived at the Situ Clan's headquarters city – The Zenith Sith.
As Situ Nantian entered the main courtyard of the family and was about to visit the main hall to report his arrival, a hundred streaks of lights shot out from the grand palace, heading north.
Situ Nantian gazed at them. He noticed that two of the clan elders were with the people. He then deeply sighed.
"They must have gone for that alchemist. Well, it's not like they can get him before me."
He took his time, taking another stride. He appeared directly in front of the palace. After all, he had other business to do as he was the only quasi-immortal of the clan.
.
.
Meanwhile, among the cultivators that came from the north, one of the groups belonged to the Ouyang Clan. Leading the group was none other than Ouyang Feng, the grandchild of Ouyang Ke. He led the battalion of 20 nascent soul cultivators and two soul formation cultivators here to scout the place. However, he was ordered not to attack or provoke Leo.
Unfortunately, the youth failed to realize the gravity of the situation. He took the initiative to intimidate Leo first.
Not only Ouyang Feng came here to steal the pills, but the other cultivators from the north and south also had the same idea. They locked on their killing intent on Leo, and they all bellowed.
"SURRENDER AND COME WITH US, OR YOU'LL DIE HERE!"
"HAND OVER THE PILLS, OR DIE!"
"I AM BO CAI, THE KING OF MOUNTAIN BANDIT! Y'ALL CAN GET LOST OR STAY HERE AS A CORPSE!"
"YOU DARE?!"
"YOU WANNA DIE, PUNK?! I SAW HIM FIRST! THOSE PILLS BELONG TO THE FATUI CULT!"
"DEATH SWORD SECT CALLS DIBS ON THOSE PILLS. NOBODY INTERFERE!"
The noise kept getting louder as the guests started yelling and bickering at each other.
On the other hand, Leo drooled, gazing at the shop domain map, counting the number of red dots.
"225… 230… 235… Damn, I'm gonna be rich."

chapters.title: Chapter 58 Florida Man Destroys Illegally Parked Wooden Boat, Kills The Ship Owners
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 58 – Florida Man Destroys Illegally Parked Wooden Boat, Kills the Ship Owners
Hua Jiashan, Wu Buyi, Han Hao, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman observed the situation on a massive flying sword 10 kilometers away from the store. They had been watching Leo ever since the lightning storm turned purple.
Aside from Hua Jiashan, everybody sweated profusely. They had gone through a heaven tribulation at least once in their lifetime, but nobody had seen purple lightning bolts.
"Why are the lightning bolts purple, sect master? Do you know anything?" Asked Han Hao.
Hua Jiashan deeply exhaled. He reminisced about the past, "It's the same tribulation as the soul transformation stage ascension. You should be prepared for it."
"Soul Transformation Ascension?"
The elders nodded as they understood the term. After the nascent soul stage, every major realm advancement required them to go through a deadly heaven tribulation.
The prerequisite of the soul formation stage was getting hit by green lightning bolts. To get to the soul transformation stage, one had to overcome the purple lightning, which was capable of destroying any weak soul formation cultivators upon touch.
Hua Jiashan explained the ranks of heaven tribulation to everybody here.
"As fellow mortals, we have to overcome heaven's trials to attain immortality. Transparent Heaven Tribulation got us to the nascent soul stage. The Nature Tribulation made us… I mean, me… a soul formation cultivator. The purple one represents Poisonous and Hypocrisy that can torment soul formation cultivators' minds and break them. It tested your character as a human if you are determined enough to reach the next stage, which I have already failed once."
From Hua Jiashan's experience, the purple heaven tribulation's specialty was the power to inflict great pain and confusion on the cultivators. Every strike from heaven could potentially make grown men and a geezer like him beg for death because of the excruciating pain.
Hua Jiashan deeply sighed as he gazed at Leo in envy. He was certain that the latter was not a soul formation cultivator but a quasi-immortal or someone with a higher status, judging how he overcame the purple lightning bolts with ease.
"I witnessed how Situ Nantian went through a similar heaven tribulation years ago. After the purple tribulation, there is the Gold Tribulation. One strike from the yellow heaven was a hundred times stronger than 100 purple lightning strikes. I still couldn't believe how Situ Nantian survived heaven's onslaught that day. Did you know that the south of our continent wasn't a peninsula 500 years ago? There were a dozen provinces back then, but everything sank into the sea after Situ Nantian advanced to the quasi-immortal stage. The Gold Tribulation Lightning destroyed everything."
"…"
The elders gasped in shock and astonishment. As they were a lot younger than Hua Jiashan, they couldn't imagine what the mainland's map was like before Situ Nantian and the heavenly tribulation destroyed a portion of the land.
RUMBLE
While they chatted, the black clouds dispersed. Leo already got down from the rooftop and put on some clothes. He then reached out to collect the pills.
Hua Jiashan gazed at the empty sky. However, his eyes saw hundreds of cultivators from the north and south, rushing toward the general store at a frightening speed. He deeply sighed.
"The hyenas have arrived. We have to go in and help our friend. Right? Wu Buyi?"
Wu Buyi, who had been standing behind Hua Jiashan, dryly laughed. He was embarrassed, "T-That's right, sect master. He's our ally. He has been providing aid to our disciples. We must return the favor. Also, his store has a lot of good stuff. Speaking of which, I still need to concoct some Longevity Pill since I got plenty of immortal grass from Daoist Florida Man."
"…"
Hua Jiashan gave Wu Buyi a meaningful look. He knew that the guest alchemist was greedy. However, as Han Hao and Wu Buyi were sworn brothers, he left the guy be.
WHOOSH
The flying sword rushed toward the store. In a few seconds, it covered five kilometers. However, the greedy cultivators from the north and south already reached the place. They started shouting.
"HAND OVER THE IMMORTAL PILLS!!"
The voice was so loud that Hua Jiashan and everybody could hear it from afar. Their expression turned dark.
Tiger Swordsman recognized the owner of the voice. He grumbled, "That's Bo Cai, the Mountain Bandit King. I don't know if he's stupid or reckless, but he's only a nascent soul cultivator. Why is he trying to provoke Daoist Florida Man?"
Han Meng shook his head, "He probably thought that Daoist Florida Man is not in full condition after transcending the purple heaven tribulation. Well, he's a thief. I doubt his intelligence is half of a baboon."
Hua Jiashan snorted. He taught the elders, "Remember. When we cultivate, we improve our physique and physical strength. For example, if I'm injured, I'm still a soul formation stage cultivator by its core. My punch still holds the same strength. Even if my Qi is depleted, one or two punches are enough to kill a nascent soul cultivator!"
Everybody nodded. They learned the lesson by heart as they never challenged a stronger foe regardless of how injured they were.
"That's right. An injured tiger is still a tiger. A rabbit can't possibly kill an injured tiger no matter how hard it tries."
Again, Hua Jiashan bitterly sighed, "Unless those rabbits are carnivorous and they come in groups."
"…"
"Another lesson for you. When facing foes with a weaker cultivation base, you must account for their number. If they have ten or more people, you can easily win. If they have a hundred people, you must utilize strategies and avoid fighting all of them at once. Against a thousand, you must flee!"
"Y-Yes, sect master."
As they listened to Hua Jiashan, they noticed an infamous celebrity among the northern people. Han Meng was the first to notice the guy.
Among the flying ships from the north, one of them carried the insignia of the Ouyang Clan. Moreover, it was a luxurious cruiser ship that could house over a thousand cultivators.
"That ship… Isn't that from the Ouyang Clan's main headquarters?!"
Everybody's face turned white, especially Han Hao. He thought that Ouyang Zi came here personally.
"Is Ouyang Zi there? Is he coming for Daoist Florida Man?!"
Hua Jiashan narrowed his eyes, scanning the ship from afar. A moment later, he shook his head.
"No. I don't sense Ouyang Zi or Ouyang Ke on that ship. No soul transformation cultivator is onboard."
Hearing that the scary guys were not around, everybody let out a long sigh of relief. Still, there were two hundred nascent soul cultivators and a dozen soul formation cultivators there.
Wu Buyi widely grinned as he didn't see any quasi-immortal or strong guys among the crowd. He laughed, "I guess we don't have to do anything after all."
"Why?" Han Hao and others squinted their brows and stared at the alchemist.
Wu Buyi mimicked Leo's fingers-napping posture, "Trust me. He only needs one snap to kill everybody. Sect Master, can you hang back and keep the flying sword higher? We don't want to miss the show."
"???"
Hua Jiashan was puzzled by Wu Buyi's strange behavior. Thus, he turned his attention to Leo and rescanned the latter's cultivation base.
The next minute, Hua Jiashan dropped his jaw.
"Your friend... has no cultivation base?!"
"WHAT?!"
"No… This is not it!"
Hua Jiashan could differentiate between quasi-immortals and soul transformation cultivators as he had seen them in action. However, Leo's constitution was a lot different from those men.
Leo's body didn't gather Qi or essence from the surroundings. On the contrary, his body PRODUCED Qi and element essence, filling the environment with his strange aura. The area around the store was filled with dense essence!I think you should take a look at
There was only one explanation.
"A True Immortal! A Celestial Being! That man is not a mortal!"
"!!!"
.
.
Leo pursed his lips and smiled at the crowd. He grabbed another pill in his hand and popped it in his mouth.
"So, what are you going to do about it? This is my snack."
Although the crowd bickered and yelled at each other, they didn't forget that Leo was still in possession of immortal pills. They bellowed at him when Leo started eating more pills.
"GIVE IT HERE!"
One of the flying ships dove down. A dozen nascent soul cultivators jumped off and brandished their weapons, charging at Leo.
The Florida Man didn't do anything fancy. He kept chewing immortal pills as if they were popcorn.
Ten spearheads and ten swords, cladded in element Qi, hit Leo's head, but none of them penetrated his skin.
DING
DING
DING
<You have been attacked.>
Leo widely grinned. He ignored the people and activated the shop domain system, revealing their lifespan.
"Thank you very much, dear customers," Laughed Leo.
"Huh?"
As usual, Leo commanded the system to take their lifespan in his mind. The group of 20 nascent soul cultivators saw their numbers decrease to zero instantly, but they failed to comprehend what had happened – Their bodies dried and disintegrated into dust.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 14,154 years, 1 Month, 5 Days, 20 Hours, and 52 Minutes.>
Leo couldn't stop smiling. Killing thieves and hoodlums was more profitable than selling goodies. He wondered how many cultivators would be stupid enough to attack him again.
"So?" Leo looked at the crowd from above.
Unfortunately, the previous diving flying ship was unmanned. It fell on top of Leo.
"…"
Leo's expression turned stiff. He raised his free hand and caught the bow of the ship.
BOOM
The ship stopped moving. Leo silently held the 100-meter-long wooden ship with one hand and stared at the weird vehicle.
"Umm, excuse me, dear customers. You cannot park your ship on top of my head. Please think logically before you drive. Rather, do you even have a boat license?"
Leo jumped up 200 meters in the sky, appearing 200 meters away from Ouyang Feng's cruiser ship. While he still held the ship. He lightly flickered his fingers and knocked the ship.
BOOM
The finger flick shattered the entire ship into fragments. Shrapnel, wood pieces, and random objects scattered everywhere and flew toward the massive ship of Ouyang.
Small wooden planks hit Ouyang Feng's crew. The young master also got hit by a small piece of metal, but he didn't flinch.
Everybody stopped bickering and glared at Leo. They reevaluated his condition, but none of them could measure his true strength.
While floating in the sky, Leo gave Ouyang Feng a meaningful look. As his hand was freed, he grabbed three more pills and shoved them in his mouth. He loudly chewed them to troll the young master.
"So… What's your problem again?"
"…"
Leo didn't wait for Ouyang Feng to respond. As he didn't know how to fly, he descended and landed on top of his store building. Instead of sinking through the roof tiles upon landing, the tiles shone and created a thin layer of barrier, protecting the tiles from Leo's weight and momentum.
After the rough landing, Leo picked three more pills to eat. He looked away from Ouyang Feng and gazed at the crowd from the south.
"What about you? What did you say again? I remember that there was a Genshin Impact fan among the crowd. Where is the Fatui?"
"…"
.
.
Wu Buyi burst into laughter while Hua Jiashan, Han Hao, and others were speechless. They had never seen Leo in action before, and they were curious how he turned 20 nascent soul cultivators into ash without touching them.
"Yeah, he's an immortal, alright," Hua Jiashan nodded.
Han Hao was curious, "Have you seen an immortal before, sect master?"
"Just a glimpse, but I can't say how strong an immortal truly is."
"I see."
Wu Buyi patted Han Hao's shoulder and pointed at Leo, "Look no further, friend. Witness the greatness of my business partner! BEHOLD… THE DAO OF FLORIDA!"
"… You don't even know what Florida means," Han Hao facepalmed and shook his head.
Meanwhile, Hua Jiashan pondered, trying to figure out the true meaning of "Florida".
'What is Florida? Is it a unique plant, place, name, or a mystic art that I don't know about?'

chapters.title: Chapter 59 Florida Man Complains As Thieves Refuse To Attack Him
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 59 – Florida Man Complains as Thieves Refuse to Attack Him
Bo Cai was a burly middle-aged cultivator. He had a messy beard and unkempt brown short hair. His strength stagnated at the nascent soul stage for decades, and he was worried about his future potential.
Like the others, he was attracted to the tribulation clouds. At first, he thought that a powerful expert attempted to break through. However, when he arrived, he overheard a conversation.
He heard someone speaking about pill tribulation.
'If I remember correctly, a geezer said this was a pill tribulation. Someone made an immortal pill. I don't know what it's for, but I need those. Any free pill is necessary for my advancement!'
Although Bo Cai wished to steal Leo's pills, he was afraid of his strength. He believed that Leo was a soul-formation cultivator, and he should be injured.
However, Leo's performance didn't indicate that he was injured. He seemed too healthy for someone who had transcended purple heaven tribulation. He had doubts.
.
Bo Cai was not the only one with the same thought. Ouyang Feng also wondered if Leo was really injured. The young master patted his robes and asked an old man behind him for advice.
"Senior Cheng, do you think that man is injured?"
Cheng Yuanzhi had a trimmed full beard, short hair, and brown skin. He was a soul formation cultivator, and he was an elder of the Death Sword Sect. Ouyang Feng was also his disciple.
As a soul formation cultivator, he could see through other cultivators' hidden dao avatars. However, he couldn't see through Leo's Dao. Confused, Cheng Yuanzhi narrated his thoughts out loud.
"I can't see through his strength. Rather, I can't figure out what he is. He doesn't have a dao avatar, but his aura is definitely a soul formation cultivator."
"Are you sure? He seems strong," Ouyang Feng doubted Leo was really a soul formation cultivator.
"His foundation must be very weak. He doesn't have a dao avatar. I think he's just pretending to be strong and healthy."
"Should we continue besieging him? He will eat all the pills at this rate."
"Please be patient, young master. Let the other guys jump that man first. We'll claim the spoils of the victor. I think the Fatui Cult won't leave him alone."
"… If you say so."
Ouyang Feng took a deep breath and crossed his hands behind his back. He glared at Leo, waiting for his opportunity.
.
Meanwhile, the people from the South all wore black robes. They also wore cone-shaped clothes as headwear. Fortunately, none of them had white clothes or Leo would have branded them as racists.
They came in a group of 20. Fifteen of them were at the nascent soul stage. Four were soul formation, and one was a soul transformation cultivator. However, after witnessing the death of the first group, they didn't dare to make a move.
Everybody glanced at their squad leader, who was the soul transformation cultivator.
"Senior Situ. What do you think?"
Their leader was a part of the Situ Clan, Situ Luan. However, he was also an elder of the Fatui Cult. Like the other elders from the clan, he came here to steal the pills and capture Leo. Similar to Cheng Yuanzhi, the Situ Elder observed Leo, but he couldn't find his dao avatar.
Still, as someone who had gone through purple heaven tribulation, he believed that Leo wasn't so simple. He raised his hand, warning his men not to move recklessly.
"That man is not a simple alchemist. I'm afraid he might be a soul transformation cultivator or a quasi-immortal. I don't think it's possible to kill him."
"Why? Isn't he injured or in bad shape after the tribulation? Those were purple lightning bolts."
"Then, let me ask you this," Situ Luan snorted. "If someone went through a heavenly tribulation and looked fine, which was stronger, Heavenly Tribulation Lightning Bolts or that person?"
The Fatui Cult's members stopped talking. They groaned and glared at Leo.
"Should we abort the mission?"
Situ Luan looked around. He saw a dozen soul formation cultivators and a couple soul transformation cultivators hiding in the crowd. He sneered, "No. We'll poke that alchemist from a distance and bait the others to take action. After they kill each other, we'll kill the guy with the pills."
The cultists nodded. They pulled out talismans, which Situ Luan had supplied them. They threw the talismans into the air, and they moved by themselves, forming a wall array.
100 talisman papers emitted metal essence, and it gathered Qi from the surroundings. An energy ball was formed.
Situ Luan's underlings laughed, "I doubt he can survive the killing array! This formation can replicate heavenly tribulation lightning, and we can control it!"
"That's right. We can create a lightning bolt stronger than purple heavenly tribulation! Even if he can survive the ordeal, he won't survive this!"
Situ Luan frowned and shook his head. He was the creator of these talismans, so he knew their power well.
'It won't be enough to kill him, but it should be able to force the others to move.'
Situ Luan waved his hands and controlled the energy ball. Then, he pointed at Leo.
"Go!"
.
.
Leo blankly stared at the crowd, waiting for the next group of thieves to attack him. He had an eye on the Fatui Cult's people and Ouyang Feng's group as their voices were the loudest.
