"Those wood golems are working non-stop, but they can't harvest everything by themselves. Because of that, helping those golems will be your daily job. Now, put on the boots and follow me outside."
Leo provided them with rubber boots, which he had bought from the online store. The disciples admired the texture of the orange boots and put them on. Some of them laughed as the boots were a lot bigger than their feet.
The crowd visited the farmland. Then, Leo ordered them to help the mannequin farmers.
The disciples were stronger than average adult men. They dug giant potatoes out, and they carried them to the granary. With their help, Leo managed to clean up the three farms of potatoes, allowing him to plant something else.
Leo ordered the first golem to continue growing potatoes. The second farm was allocated to grow tomatoes, while the third was assigned to plant chilies.
As soon as the mannequin dropped the tomato seeds and chili seeds, the timer came out.
23 Hours, 59 Minutes, 57 Seconds…
Strangely, both types of crops had the same timer. Leo was relieved that it took a long time to grow as his granary was almost full even though Cat was there to sabotage his food reserve.
After the potatoes were dealt with, Leo allowed the disciples to have their free time to wander around. However, he refrained from getting out of the domain boundary as the stalkers were still lurking in the woods.
The disciples cheered and rushed toward the alchemy workshops behind the store.
.
.
The lurking stalkers from the Ouyang Clan stared at the disciples while they smirked. They believed they had found Leo's weaknesses.
One of them suggested to their colleagues, "Let's take a few of them to the clan and blackmail that alchemist."
"Agreed."
Everybody let out a long sigh as they could finally go home after this mission.
The Ouyang's spies weren't the only ones with this idea. The Fatui cultists among the lurkers also had an eye on the disciples and Gao Yan. They also communicated with their superior officers in the Cauliflower City.
"We've discovered Florida Man's weaknesses. We shall take some of his disciples back to the cult."
On the other hand, the Situ Clan's agents were wary of Leo. They consulted with their people for hours before Situ Nantian gave them an order. One of them relayed the instruction to his colleague.
"Grand Elder has given us a decree. Do not touch the disciples. Let the foolish people from the Ouyang Clan and the Fatui Cult take the brunt. Once they're gone, we will try to form an amicable relationship with the alchemist and get on his good side. If that doesn't work, we'll think of another approach."
Although Situ Clan had a close tie with the Fatui Cult, they weren't friendly allies. Situ Nantian made a clear stance that they were simply a group of customers to their clan, and they didn't need to avenge their comrades.
The Situ Clan's agents received the order and withdrew from the area.
.
WHOOSH
WHOOSH
While the lurkers from three major organizations made their moves, another group of underlings arrived at the Sword Saint Forest. They rushed toward the cleared area and hid at the border.
They were the agents of the imperial court. Moreover, they brought big shots along with them. Among the nascent soul cultivators, two of them were absurdly stronger than the others.
One of them was the aide of Yan Zhu, the third prince. He went by the name Ye Tianxie, and he was a soul transformation cultivator. Another one was none other than the Imperial Chancellor Tang Xuan, the quasi-immortal.
They had one purpose – investigating the new source of essence stones.
Chancellor Tang didn't bother hiding. He took a long stride and walked out from the shades, approaching the store. His followers hesitated for a moment, but they also came out. Everybody ignored the spirit grasses around them and enter the store domain.
.
.
"Hmm?"
Leo stopped watching over the disciples. He noticed a large group of people coming out from the South, and they had fancy clothes.
The kind-looking old man in front of the group reminded him of his uncle from Ohio. They used to visit a shooting range together and got banned because his uncle accidentally shot the ceiling by mistake. In addition, one of them had a similar rainbow aura to him.
"A comrade?" Leo brightly smiled. "Or dumbass morons? Either way, welcome!"
Leo turned toward the new guests and waited for them to get closer. The crowd crossed the farmland field and arrived in front of the store unhindered.
Chancellor Tang gazed at Leo for a moment. Then, he announced and brought out a golden scroll from his spatial ring.
"Accept the emperor's decree!"
"Hmm?"
Leo was confused. He stood still, waiting for the old man to finish his sentence.
He didn't know. According to the custom, he was supposed to kneel as the scroll represented the emperor's presence. Not bowing to the decree was equivalent to an insult to the monarchy.
The crowd behind Chancellor Tang was enraged as Leo didn't show them courtesy. They unsheathed their swords and pointed at Leo's face.
"KNEEL, PEASANT!"
"KNOW YOUR PLACE!"
Leo widened his eyes in astonishment. A few seconds later, it turned into a bashful smile.
"Well, well, well. This is going to be exciting again. Welcome. Please continue."

chapters.title: Chapter 73 Florida Man Trainee Murders Police Officer Using Pokemon
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 73 – Florida Man Trainee Murders Police Officer Using Pokemon
Chancellor Tang Xuan and Ye Tianxie gave Leo a meaningful look. As the latter didn't kneel, they took it as a clear sign that Leo had no intention to submit to the Yan Empire.
Ye Tianxie was enraged, but his expression was emotionless. He calmly warned Leo.
"Please show respect to the emperor's presence and his decree. Otherwise, we will take you as a rebel, and we will apprehend you, sir."
Hearing the warning, Leo was overjoyed. He laughed, "Come and apprehend me. I won't bow my head to a stupid paper!"
"…"
Ye Tianxie deeply sighed. He wished he could kill Leo right now, but his cultivation base was lower than the quasi-immortal stage. He swallowed his frustration and glanced at the Chancellor.
Chancellor Tang noticed the glance. He slightly shook his head as he had no intention of provoking the mysterious expert. He continued reading the decree even though Leo refused to kneel.
"Hear the decree. The emperor has noticed that you are in possession of contraband items "Essence Stones". By the imperial laws, section 29, all sources of essence stones belong to the imperial court, and all cultivators and citizens must hand over their essence stones to the imperial court officials if they acquire them from an unauthorized source. If refused to comply, the carriers of essence stones will be treated and prosecuted as a rebel, and their seven generations will be executed."
"Oh, cool. What a nice empire. Picking up a stone from a roadside can get your seven generations killed. Superb!"
Leo slowly clapped and snickered in a good mood. Because of his interruption, the officials and agents behind Chancellor Tang and Ye Tianxie gnashed their teeth and circulated their Qi, preparing to strike Leo.
Chancellor Tang deeply sighed and raised one hand to stop them. His other hand still held the paper as he continued reading.
"Still, because Life Sword Sect has never attended any annual meeting in the imperial palace, any related crime committed by the local cultivators in the Life Sword Sect's territory will not be prosecuted. Instead, the emperor wishes to invite you and representatives from Life Sword Sect to the imperial palace so that he can issue you a permit to possess essence stones!"
Ye Tianxie and the others were stunned as they had never heard of this before. When they were in the throne room, the emperor didn't mention anything about the exception.
Noticing the people's expressions, Chancellor Tang sneered at them. He smiled at Leo.
"Secondly, as Death Sword Sect and the Fatui Cult have been secretly and indirectly suppressing the Life Sword Sect, the emperor believes that the sect has a legitimate reason to request compensation. Therefore, the emperor temporarily grants the Life Sword Sect and Cultivator Florida Man the permit to possess unauthorized essence stones for one year, and they are allowed to monopolize the new sources of essence stones until the next annual meeting. This condition persists until further changes. And that's the end of the decree. Please receive the edict."
"WHAT?!"
Ye Tianxie was frustrated. He couldn't believe that the emperor's edict was real as the emperor's order back then was different. He snatched the scroll from Chancellor Tang's hand and reread everything.
Unfortunately, everything in the scroll was exactly as Chancellor Tang had read. No word was exaggerated.
"How can this be?! I thought the emperor ordered us to kill him and seize his essence stones!" Ye Tianxie protested.
Chancellor Tang scoffed, "Are you questioning the emperor?"
"N-No…" Ye Tianxie wasn't Chancellor Tang's opponent. He receded and lowered his head. Still, as he worked for the third prince, he was dissatisfied with this decree.
Meanwhile, someone else was also unhappy. Leo's expression was dark as the guests over here came in peace instead of trying to be a cliché bully. He deeply sighed.
"I'm disappointed," Leo complained.
"Hmm? Why are you disappointed, fellow Daoist?" Chancellor Tang didn't understand Leo. He tried his best to protect the Life Sword Sect and give them a way out of the political strife, yet Leo didn't play along.
Leo waved his hand, "Forget it. I ain't going to the imperial court whatsoever. My essence stones belong to me, and I won't hand them over. The same for the essence stones in the Life Sword Sect, you can't have them."
Chancellor Tang grinned and reminded Leo, "The emperor won't force you. In fact, he has no intention to antagonize you. He simply sends me here to investigate the new source of essence stones. But if you're unhappy with the imperial court's laws, you can always share your opinion with me, and I can report back to the emperor. In fact, if I want to, I can even change the laws."
"Tsk!"
This annoyed Leo more. He wished these guests would attack him so that he could steal their lifespan. But judging from how the old man behaved and his tone, the plan was impossible.
On the other hand, the crowd was raring to attack Leo at any moment. Their red faces, squinted brows, and bulging blood vessels on their faces said it all.
Leo stared at the angry crowd and the friendly old man. Looking at the polarized expressions, he suddenly had an idea. He mischievously grinned and summoned lifespan status menus for them to see. Leo also verified their identities.
DING
Status menu screens appeared in front of the angry visitors. Chancellor Tang and Ye Tianxie could finally see their remaining life.
.
Name: Tang Xuan
Age: 1,209
Remaining Lifespan: 1,720 years, 10 Months, 12 Days, 9 Hours, 37 Minutes
.
Name: Ye Tianxie
Age: 211
Remaining Lifespan: 1,789 Years, 9 Months, 15 Days, 12 Hours, 21 Minutes
.
Looking at their ages and their lifespan, Leo was surprised and amused. His respect toward the thin old man was raised to another level as this person managed to live a thousand years. As for Ye Tianxie, Leo didn't think much about him other than a fat pig waiting to be slaughtered.
The cultivators behind Ye Tianxie and Chancellor Tang were flabbergasted. They looked at their remaining time ticking down while they tried to touch the hologram screens.
On the other hand, Tang Xuan revealed a faint smile and deeply exhaled. He laughed and uttered, "Wow. My secret is exposed. This is quite a useful technique. I wish my clan and the imperial court could use this ability 1,000 years ago. This would have made our lives a lot easier during the war."
"…"
Leo heard something interesting again. Although he wished to ask Tang Xuan what happened 1,000 years ago, he didn't bother asking as it was not the time to learn about their backstories and history. He coughed to get their attention.
"Well, let me introduce myself. My Daoist name is FLORIDA MAN, and I run a lifespan general store. We trade rare herbs, essence stones, and rare items for lifespan. I hope you understand what I'm doing here."
Finally getting Leo's introduction, Tang Xuan merrily laughed and saluted, "Friend Florida Man. Likewise, I hope we can have an amicable relationship. The imperial court is not your enemy, and we will never harm you."
"…"
Again, Leo inwardly cursed Tang Xuan for trying to pacify the situation. Still, Leo baited them into attacking him by revealing one of his bestselling items. He pulled out an essence stone from his pants pocket.
"!!!"
The crowd glared at Leo when the essence stone came out. Unlike the essence stones in the palace or their clan, which passed through many hands and contained thin energy, Leo's stone was brimmed with elemental essence as if its energy had never been extracted. Even Tang Xuan was stunned to see such a fresh stone.
Leo threw a bomb at them, "I'm selling this stone for ten years of lifespan. Anybody wants to buy it?"
"WHAT?!"
Leo burst into laughter in his mind as he added one zero to the price tag. Since these guys ruined Leo's mood, he returned the favor by ruining their opportunity to get his cheap items.
He didn't realize that it was still too cheap for the local's standards.
Ye Tianxie drooled as he was tempted to buy the stone. Still, he and his followers were disciplined, and they instantly suppressed their desire. The former secretly communicated with the crowd.I think you should take a look at
'Do not purchase the item or we might fall into his trap. The stone is still illegal. If we buy them, he will blackmail us later that we also possess illegal items.'
Everybody except Tang Xuan nodded. The latter glanced at his colleagues and shook his head in disappointment. He signed and continued conversing with Leo.
"I assume this stone is from the new source of essence stones, correct?"
Leo shrugged, "Probably."
"Then, could you tell me which mystic realm you got the stones from? I don't sense a spirit mine or a quarry around here."
"…"
Leo's lips twitched. His inner self yearned to flex these guys by converting a spirit stone into an essence stone in front of them. However, his logical thoughts prevented Leo from showing off and doing something stupid.
As Leo remained silent, Tang Xuan teased him.
"If I have to guess, did you, by chance, discover a way to successfully convert spirit stones into essence stones? I heard Celestial Stage Immortals could use every element in the world and could magically terraform wasteland into lush forests. Are you one of them?"
"…"
Bullseye
Leo maintained his pokerface, but his hands were already sweaty.
Seeing that Leo didn't react, Tang Xuan laughed and changed the subject to decrease the tension, "Do you have any other items to sell, Friend Florida Man?"
"Hmm."
Leo gestured and invited them into the building. Tang Xuan brightly smiled and followed Leo, entering the general store.
.
Although Leo and Tang Xuan already entered the building, the others still lingered in front of the store. Ye Tianxie and his men were still reluctant to compromise.
"Look at this!"
"Wow. This is so cool!"
While they were standing idly in front of the store, they heard loud noises from the disciples in the alley. Ye Tianxie and his men gazed in their direction and found several disciples and mannequin golems in the field, chatting and holding thorn vines that they picked up from the junkyard.
As soon as they noticed the thorn vines, the men's eyes gleamed. They sensed raw Qi from the items in their hands, and they seemed to be raw materials for good weapons.
"Hey, aren't those low-grade treasures?"
"Probably. I used to see that in a wood-type mystic realm. An elder from Amazonian Sanctuary turned it into a high-graded weapon. Many clans tried to buy it off her hand and offered her a hundred million spirit stones, but she refused."
"Really? Then, aren't those 100 million spirit stones in front of our eyes?"
"Yeah, I think so."
The crowd smirked. Ye Tianxie also sneered at the disciples as they could take advantage of them.
Without hesitation, Ye Tianxie strode toward the group of disciples. He flared the badge of an imperial official and shouted.
"YOU ARE UNDER ARREST FOR POSSESSING A CONTRABAND ITEM! SURRENDER IMMEDIATELY, OR YOUR THREE GENERATIONS WILL BE EXECUTED!"
"W-What?!"
The disciples took several steps backward in shock and stared at Ye Tianxie in confusion. They looked at each other as they couldn't understand.
As Ye Tianxie took the lead, his men laughed and kicked the ground. They surrounded the group of disciples and snatched the thorn vines from their hands.
"GIVE THEM HERE!"
"NOOO!!"
The men kicked the young disciples away and admired the stolen materials. The adults got 10 thorn vines, and they immediately stored them in their spatial rings.
The commotion was loud enough for another adult to notice. Wu Buyi, who was in the middle of teaching Gao Yan about the workshop, heard the noise and came over. Then, he saw the scene of adults stealing items from kids.
"HEY!"
Even though Wu Buyi was just a nascent soul cultivator, he wasn't afraid of the crowd of cultivators with the same cultivation stage. He stood in front of the disciples and ejected a cauldron from his spatial ring, preparing for combat.
"RETURN THE KIDS' WEAPONS, OR ELSE!"
Ye Tianxie found Wu Buyi amusing. The group of nascent soul cultivators also sneered and mocked Wu Buyi.
"What are you going to do about it? Throwing the cauldron at me?"
"Hahaha! Don't say that. We're not supposed to offend the alchemist. It's common sense that we can't provoke them… unless it's self-defense."
"Heh. Right. Come on, alchemist. Attack me! Try it! We'd love to SELF-DEFENSE and ACCIDENTALLY kill you! After we're done with you, we'll sell those kids as slaves since they offend the imperial officials!"
Hearing the crowd's obnoxious taunt, Wu Buyi was enraged. He glanced at the granary and noticed that a certain plant had been eavesdropping on the conversation. Their eyes met.
Wu Buyi's mouth curved up. He looked at the imperial agents.
Suddenly, Wu Buyi shouted.
"NOM-NOM TIME, PLANT! THESE MEN ARE YOUR FOOD!"
BOOM
As soon as Wu Buyi declared, Cat jumped out from the granary and rushed Ye Tianxie's men.
"NOM-NOM MEOW!!"
CHOMP!
Cat was faster than before. In a blink of an eye, the upper torso of the guy near the granary disappeared into Cat's mouth, leaving only a bloody lower torso and legs.
"WHAT?!"
Cat gleefully chewed the cultivator and killed him in one bite. Her skin absorbed the lifespan of the victim, and her strength soared.
"Nom-Nom?"
Looking at the crowd, Cat maliciously grinned. Wu Buyi also jumped and stood on Cat's head, pointing his finger at the hostile visitors.
"NOM-NOM TIME, PLANT! LET'S EAT!"
"NOM-NOM MEOW!!"

chapters.title: Chapter 74 Cops Panic As Florida Man Trainee Releases Wild Cat On Street
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 74 – Cops Panic as Florida Man Trainee Releases Wild Cat on Street
"Monster!"
The nascent soul cultivators were surprised as the huge chomper suddenly charged out from the granary and ate one of them. Because of their reflex and common sense, they evaluated Cat's strength first. Ye Tianxie was the same.
Everybody soon discovered Cat's cultivation base.
"Fourth stage monster?! Be careful! This monster is as strong as a nascent soul cultivator!"
Although a nascent soul cultivator was considered a 5th stage cultivator, they could only defeat 4th stage monsters or weaker as a monster's standard was stronger than cultivators by one tier - Monsters were physically stronger than humans by nature, and they could defeat cultivators with a higher cultivation base.
Facing the huge monster, they stopped mocking Wu Buyi. They brought out their treasures and artifacts. Floating spears, talismans, jade emblems, daggers, mirrors, and dishes orbited around their masters.
Had Leo seen them, he would have questioned their sense and weapon choice as some of them brought DISHES to battle. He would have been confused that they had come here to beg for food.
Unfortunately, Wu Buyi didn't have Florida Man's mentality. As a local cultivator, he knew exactly what those flying dishes could do.
"Shameless bastards! Bringing out artifacts while ganging on us?! Dishes of Flame Negation on a plant monster? They won't work!"
Hearing Wu Buyi, the crowd laughed at him, "Who said that we brought the Flame Negation Dishes to suppress the monster? They're for you!"
Five of the cultivators formed a hand incantation and pointed at Wu Buyi. All dishes faced him and emitted a blue Chinese character "Water". The floating character then shone and fired a blue beam at Wu Buyi.
Wu Buyi narrowed his eyes as he prepared to dodge. However, Cat suddenly jumped and opened her mouth.
ZAAAA
The beam entered her chomper mouth and was transformed into freshwater as she converted the water element Qi into physical water. She swallowed them and burped. The next second, her skin became glossy and moist.
"…"
The nascent soul cultivators blankly stared at Cat as they didn't think this through. They forgot that water element attacks benefited plant-based monsters. Therefore, using water-based artifacts on Cat was the same as watering a tree.
"Fool! Use fire artifacts and dao avatars on the monster!" Ye Tianxie commanded the men.
"B-But alchemists are fire masters! That man will steal our Qi if we do!"
The agents had the experience of dealing with alchemists in combat. As they primarily cultivated Fire Element Qi to use in alchemy, they were considered the strongest when they faced fire attacks. Some of the alchemist masters even had a domineering Daoist title, such as Phoenix Flame or Inferno Master as no fire attacks could harm them.
"… Tsk!"
Annoyed by his men's incompetency, Ye Tianxie pushed the crowd aside and faced Cat and Wu Buyi himself. He unsheathed his sword and pointed at them.
"Kneel and hand over everything in your possession. If you beg for forgiveness right now, I'll give you a quick death!"
"Ah, yes. The usual threat. This is why I decline the imperial court's invitation,"
Wu Buyi sneered and summoned his dao avatar. A spirit of a moss-cladded hand and a fire wisp appeared behind him. Then, they entered his cauldron, transforming it into a burning hand in green flame.
Cat's human part looked up as she hated fire.
"…Meow."
Wu Buyi laughed at Cat, "Don't worry, kid. My green flame has both flame and wood attributes. It can't harm any tree or plant. Instead, it will only make you stronger!"
"Meow <3"
Cat cheered as she was relieved. She focused and utilized her dao avatar.
The infant spirit returned to her body and merged with her. Then, the rainbow aura and radiation of Leo that she had been collecting emanated from her eyes.
At the same time, Wu Buyi poured the green flame into Cat, enhancing her power and her cultivation base!
Feeling the surge of new energy, Cat rode the momentum and unleashed her trump card.
"MYAAAAA!!"
RUMBLE
The attached humanoid torso on the chomper's head grew up. She became as tall as a 6-year-old little girl, but Cat only had an upper humanoid torso.
Meanwhile, Cat's chomper head, vines, and roots grew larger. She got 10 meters taller while a new eye above her mouth emerged. It slowly opened and glared at the crowd below.
She became a colossus monster, and her true cultivation base was revealed. Her strength jumped from the 4th stage to the 6th stage, which was equivalent to the soul formation stage!
In addition, she still retained her monster's physique. She was capable of fighting soul transformation cultivators! A soul transformation stage cultivator might not even be her opponent.
Wu Buyi laughed. He had expected that Cat had been hiding her true strength. However, instead of being impressed by her potential, he praised Leo.
"Such insight. Lord Florida Man must have known about your potential. That's why he has been raising you and giving you everything. Wow."
"Meow <3"
Cat puffed her chest for a moment, but she soon realized that Wu Buyi didn't praise her. She pouted and crossed her arms.
Meanwhile, the crowd below panicked.
"W-WHAT?! A-A-A SIXTH STAGE MONSTER?! NOT THE FOURTH STAGE?!"
Even Ye Tianxie was shocked. Because of this miscalculation, his whole battalion was in danger. Had Cat attacked them with her full strength, everybody except Tang Xuan and Ye Tianxie would have died instantly.
Instead of maintaining composure and commanding his men, Ye Tianxie pushed the crowd ahead of him and hid among the nascent soul cultivators. He also yelled.
"SOMEBODY GO AND CALL CHANCELLOR TANG!!"I think you should take a look at
"…"
The subordinates had no time to swear or curse their cowardly leader. Two of the people rushed toward the store building and tried to enter.
Unfortunately, the door was locked.
"!!!"
The cultivators slammed on the door and window, trying to break inside. However, their fists hit a transparent barrier a millimeter away from the door and windows.
As they couldn't force their way inside, they shouted, trying to get Tang Xuan's attention.
"CHANCELLOR! HELP US!!"
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo and Tang Xuan were alone in the store. As the former entered the store after Tang Xuan, he locked the door behind him, isolating the old man inside. He didn't want 200 people to stroll into his empty mall and dirty the clean floor with their dirty shoes.
Chancellor Tang admired the space inside the store. His reaction was modest even though his back and palms were already sweaty. Nobody knew what he had been thinking.
"Spatial Formation? I see. You're very impressive, Friend Florida Man."
Leo raised his brow, "You don't look surprised."
"This is not the first time I've seen a spatial distortion array at work. The imperial palace's treasury also has one. But I have to admit. Ours is a bit smaller."
"… I see."
"Mhm… Hmm?!"
Tang Xuan ignored the empty space and walked toward the shelves and showcase refrigerators. He walked straight toward the grain pill shelf and picked up a box of poison grain pills.
Upon picking up the box and noticing the pills inside, Tang Xuan widely smiled, "I didn't expect to see another poison element cultivator. How long have you been making these? Oh, I should change the question. When did you make these?"
Leo didn't think much. He said honestly as it was common sense for merchants to reveal the food's production dates and expiry dates.
"Roughly two weeks ago? What's wrong? Have they gone bad?"
Tang Xuan laughed, "How could it be? Poison pills are better the older they are. They age like wine!"
"…"
Tang Xuan injected his Qi into the box and made it float. Then, he continued shopping, checking the items in the fridges and the shelves. Aside from the poison grain pills, he also picked a bundle of immortal grass.
"How much are the immoral grasses?"
"50 years of lifespan per blade. Please be mindful of how much you take."
"Can I pay with spirit stones or essence stones?"
"I only take spirit stones. Also, the price is 500,000 spirit stones per blade."
"… 10,000 spirit stones instead of a year of lifespan, I see. That's fair."
Tang Xuan's smiling face twitched for a moment. However, his white teeth shone like a flashbang. His eyes also flickered with purple light, but Leo couldn't tell what the old man was thinking.
A few seconds later, Tang Xuan shocked Leo. The elder suddenly pointed at the showcase refrigerator and asked him.
"I'll take every immortal grass in the showcase. I'll pay with spirit stones."
"…Huh?"
"I count the blades just now. There are 520 blades in there, so that comes to 260 million spirit stones, is that correct?"
"Wait, wait, wait." Leo was taken aback, "Are you sure? That's a lot of spirit stones."
Tang Xuan shrugged, "I'm rich, and I'm also an alchemist, so why not?"
"…"
Seeing Leo's speechless expression, Tang Xuan snickered and stored the items that he had chosen in his spatial ring. Then, he flickered a ring, full of spirit stones, toward Leo. The latter caught it with one hand.
"Consider it the price of my sincerity. I really wish to be your friend, not an enemy. We, quasi-immortals, are few. We should be on a friendly terms instead of trying to go after each other's jugular, am I right? We can't have too many friends, but one enemy is too many."
For once, Leo discovered a smart and sensible local man. He nodded as he respected the elder.
"I guess you don't live a thousand years for nothing."
"Compared to you, I'm far inferior. I don't have the guts to provoke the imperial court, you know?"
Again, Tang Xuan's grin was so creepy that Leo had goosebumps. Leo had a bad feeling about the guy.
He knew too much.
BANG-BANG
While Tang Xuan enjoyed shopping, the people outside banged on the door and windows, trying to get in. Their muffled voice was audible.
"CHANCELLOR! HELP US!!"
"Hmm?"

chapters.title: Chapter 75 Hundred Police Officers Brutally Attacking Florida Man’s Pet Faces Retribution
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 75 – Hundred Police Officers Brutally Attacking Florida Man's Pet Faces Retribution
Tang Xuan had been vigilant ever since the start of this journey. As a quasi-immortal, he could see many things that other cultivators couldn't. Thus, he had been on edge.
As soon as he arrived at Florida Man's domain, he noticed a faint energy aura, which drew a square around the store and other buildings. Tang Xuan recognized the pattern right away as he had seen this boundary aura in many mystic realms and his ancestors, who had ascended to the immortal realms, had taught Tang Xuan once.
Boundary Lines were the indicators of a domain, which only immortals and celestial beings could use. In addition, Domains enforced unique laws, and the people inside had to comply. For example, if the domain laws dictated that one must dance before they talk, everybody would be forced to dance according to the domain laws. Otherwise, they would be either kicked out or killed by the domain.
The Tang Clan's subordinate sect, the Sixth Element Sect, which was also one of the three alchemy powerhouse organizations, also had a similar domain. It generated faint poisonous element Qi in a small area, allowing the descendants of the Tang Clan to cultivate them. However, it would instantly kill outsiders and unauthorized cultivators.
Tang Xuan also used to cultivate in the poison element domain, and it slingshotted his status from a regular elder of the sect to an official in the imperial court – He became the strongest poison user and a master alchemist, which earned the respect of his quasi-immortal peers and the emperor.
Although Chancellor Tang had a high status in the clan, sect, and imperial court, he had never seen such as large and expansive domain boundary before. He was in awe and was afraid of the owner of this domain at the same time.
Upon meeting Leo, Tang Xuan had doubts. He couldn't detect Leo's dao avatar or measure his Qi. Instead, his body produced strange air, which caused his instinct to react. It constantly warned him to either run away from this domain or never touch him.
After witnessing the hidden evidence, Tang Xuan came up with a hypothesis. He suspected that Leo might be a celestial stage cultivator, who had been suppressing his strength to prolong his stay in a mortal world.
So far, Tang Xuan had been trying his best to de-escalate the tension to get on Leo's good side. He was ready for every situation, and he was willing to throw away his wealth to befriend Leo.
Unfortunately, someone screwed him over.
BANG-BANG
"CHANCELLOR! HELP US!!"
"…"
Tang Xuan hid his sweaty hands under his long sleeves. He inwardly cursed Ye Tianxie and his goons.
'What the hell are they doing?! Are they stupid?! Can't they tell that they are in an immortal's domain? Right, they can't! They can't possibly see the immortal's boundary. Dammit. I should have warned them.'
There were only two pains that men could choose to swallow – The pain of discipline or the pain of regrets. But in this situation, Tang Xuan regretted that he failed to notify Ye Tianxie about Leo's true strength.
"Those idiots." Tang Xuan maintained his smiling face and walked toward the door. He tried to open it.
CLICK
Unfortunately, it was locked.
"Friend Florida Man, could you please?"
As Tang Xuan had no idea how a modern door worked, he turned around and gazed at Leo.
Betraying Tang Xuan's expectation, Leo stared at the space in front of him in a daze. His wicked smile terrified the chancellor.
.
.
'Oh, yeah. That's right.'
Leo almost couldn't contain his laughter when he received an update from the domain system.
DING
<Your employee, Cat, has been attacked.>
<Self-Defense Mechanism is enabled. Would you like to punish the assailants?>
Leo was overjoyed. He looked at the mini-map, hoping to steal everybody's lifespan with a thought. However, the blinking red dots on the screen were few as not everybody had attacked Cat or Wu Buyi yet.
His smiling face was frozen. He started dissing the assailants in his mind.
'Why don't you just launch a simultaneous attack?! Why are you sending a few people to attack at a time? Oh, wait. They would have died. Never mind. I can't let my precious free laborer and lifespan slave get themselves killed.'
Leo sighed and mumbled.
"Execute Order 66, system. The compensation is their lifespan."
<Affirmative.>
CHING-CHING-CHING
Leo's lifespan was increased, and five blinking red dots in the mini-map disappeared. As this wasn't Leo's first rodeo, he closed his system menu and smiled at Tang Xuan, feigning ignorance.
"It appears that your subordinates cause a scene. Let's go out and find them."
"…"
Tang Xuan opened a way for Leo. The latter unlocked the door and got out. As soon as he and Tang Xuan left the store, they noticed the massive shadow of a certain plant monster.
Leo ignored the crowd and looked up. Then, he found the massive chomper. For a moment, he thought that he was looking at the Pumpkin King from a certain card game as Cat's new big eye resembled it.
"Wut da hail is she doing?"
He pursed his lips while he inspected Cat's large roots and vines, checking if she was sick. Fortunately, there was no sign of a strange mutation other than her black roots, trunk, and vines.I think you should take a look at
Tang Xuan followed Leo outside and looked up as well. He was slightly taken aback when he noticed Cat's cultivation base.
"Friend Florida Man, what's happening here?" Asked Tang Xuan.
Leo shifted his gaze toward the troublemaking group. He stared at Ye Tianxie, "You should ask them, not me."
"…"
Tang Xuan paused for a moment. He turned toward Ye Tianxie. As soon as he turned around, his smiling face vanished from his face. He glared at the henchmen of Yan Zhu.
"What did you do, Ye Tianxie?!"
Ye Tianxie's face was pale. He rushed to Tang Xuan's side and clung to his arm, "S-Senior! Please help! The monster and the alchemist are attacking us! That thing ate one of us at first. But then, but then, five of our men suddenly dry up and turn into ash! T-This is sorcery! We don't know what hit us!!"
"…"
Tang Xuan remained silent, but his back was drenched in sweat. It was confirmed that Leo was an immortal, and he had just used his domain power to kill the men.
The chancellor deeply inhaled and exhaled three times. He had predicted this, but he didn't expect that they would have provoked an immortal and his comrades so soon. By the time Tang Xuan successfully controlled his heart rate, Leo already took several steps back and stood in the middle of a farm.
"Hmm?"
Tang Xuan was confused about why Leo retreated. From his perspective, Leo had nothing to worry about since his pet was as strong as Ye Tianxie. Also, Tang Xuan had no intention of helping these men, so Leo had nothing to be feared.
Little did he know what was about to happen. Leo had faced so many giant monsters before, and his fighting experience compelled him to keep a distance from every monster that could emit a rainbow aura. After all, these monsters were capable of bypassing his defense and wounding him.
"NOM-NOM MEOW!!"
Cat went berserk. She whipped down her thorn vine and smacked the alley between Wu Buyi and the general store.
BOOM
The nascent soul cultivators leaped away from the thick vine and dodged the strike. They bellowed and summoned their dao avatars to unleash their skills. Colorful beams, sword Qi, energy spears, flying daggers, and invisible bullets flew. Everything hit Cat's giant head and her vines as she couldn't dodge.
"HAH!"
Five of the cultivators merged with their dao avatars and transformed into 5-meter-tall giants. Their clothes were destroyed in the process, but they leaped toward Cat and threw their punches.
"MYAAAA!!"
Cat opened her mouth and shot out her long tongue. As if her tongue worked the same way as a frog, she caught one of the giants and pulled him into her mouth. Then, she chewed him alive.
BOOM-BOOM
The four punches of the remaining giants hit the chomper's body. It caused a slight dent, but she didn't flinch.
"NOM-NOM MYAAA!!"
Cat swung her two thorn whips and hit all four giants. They were knocked flying, but they landed at the border of Leo's domain to the west.
The giant cultivators gritted their teeth as the thorn whip grazed their stomachs and left behind deep wounds. They patted their wounds and circulated their Qi to heal.
In just two moves, everybody realized the disparity of their strength. Ye Tianxie also panicked as he didn't want to fight a monster that could potentially kill him. He shook Tang Xuan's clothes.
"Chancellor Tang! Please help me!"
Tang Xuan frowned and looked at Ye Tianxie with cold eyes. Then, he looked up and took a few steps back, breaking Cat's line of sight. Then, he scolded the henchman.
"You did this upon yourself. Why did you provoke that thing? You should have learned about Daoist Florida Man's pet from your spies."
"B-But they said it was just a 4th-stage monster."
"So, you're trying to take advantage of it and escalate the situation?!"
"I-I didn't know!"
"…You fool."
Tang Xuan deeply sighed. He had the urge to grab this guy and poison him to death. However, he was aware of the life brand on him. Had Tang Xuan killed him, the third prince would have learned of it and used the information to kill him or damage his Tang Clan.
The third prince couldn't be trusted, so Tang Xuan didn't let his guard down. Minimizing their losses was the only thing he could do at the moment.
But as Tang Xuan was getting ready to join the fight, he noticed a movement from the corner of his eyes.
Leo had been observing the situation from the farmland. He nonchalantly helped a farmer mannequin pull out a giant potato, and he started eating it raw.
"191? Well, it got what I want. Good job enduring that, Cat."
Leo raised his hand and snapped his fingers. He uttered a word, which would give Tang Xuan PTSD for the rest of his life.
"To cinder."
*SNAP*

chapters.title: Chapter 76 Florida Man Plunders And Murders 200 Police Officers For Rare Dish
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 76 – Florida Man Plunders and Murders 200 Police Officers for Rare Dish
"Hmm?! Oh, no."
As soon as Leo uttered the words and snapped his fingers, Tang Xuan realized the crisis. He gulped and didn't utter another word as he sensed the tremendous pressure coming from the domain.
POOF
POOF
POOF
Tang Xuan witnessed everything - Ye Tianxie's underlings were disintegrated one after another. Life force energy left their bodies and gathered in Leo's chest.
'Those life force, lifespan, domain… could it be?!'
The chancellor figured out the secret of Leo's domain. It forcefully extracted the life force of dead people to its master – the Florida Man. Secondly, as the domain was related to life force, the master could also manipulate other cultivators' lifespan, thus explaining the existence of the store and his weird currency.
Understanding the purposes of the domain, Tang Xuan got enough information to report to the emperor. He compiled the information in his mind.
'This man is too dangerous. The empire and my clan can't afford to provoke him. We must get on his good side to survive! Only fools will charge head-first here to rob his artifacts and rare herbs. Well, this works in my favor. I can manipulate Yan Zhu to launch a full-scale attack on this immortal and get him killed. That way, the Fatui Cult will be disbanded, and one less unorthodox sect will continue to exist.'
Tang Xuan glanced at Leo, who seemed to be in a daze again. Using this opportunity, he kicked the ground and vanished. The next moment, he traveled 10 kilometers away.
After getting out of the domain, Tang Xuan looked at his hands. They were as sweaty as his face and his drenched back. He felt like he was one step away from death.
It took him a few hours to settle down. Tang Xuan quietly returned to the capital by himself, leaving behind Yan Zhu and his men in the forest.
.
.
POOF
POOF
Leo watched how the 190ish nascent soul cultivators turned into ash. He opened his lifespan menu and checked his income in real-time.
<Your lifespan has increased by 716 Years…>
<Your lifespan has increased by 852 Years…>
<Your lifespan has increased by 827 Years…>
Nothing was sweeter than free lifespan from intruders. Leo couldn't stop smiling.
Meanwhile, Wu Buyi blankly stared at the carnage from the top of Cat's chomper head. He looked down from above and noticed that everybody turned into ash.
He nodded in approval, "Yup. That's Lord Florida Man for you. Only fools would pick a fight with him."
Wu Buyi sat and patted Cat's human head. She was surprised for a moment and swatted his hand off. Then, she tried to bite him with her humanoid mouth.
"HISS!"
The alchemist snickered and toyed with Cat, "What? Can't I pat your head, little girl?"
"MEOW!!"
"What do you mean I didn't do anything? Because of me, they fired a water Qi beam at you. Didn't you get a mouthful of precious water Qi?"
"MEOW-MEOW! NOM-NOM MEOW!"
"What?! It doesn't count as food? Look, Missy. You'd better be considerate to your seniors. I know that you're stronger than me, but you need to show some respect to elders-"
PA!
Cat's vine came from above and swatted Wu Buyi away from her head. Her body soon shrank and reduced to the usual size. Her cultivation base also reverted to the 4th-stage. She yawned and retreated into the granary, where her food haven awaited.
Meanwhile, Wu Buyi was knocked down from the sky and landed on the ground. He only sensed a light impact, but he wasn't hurt. Still, he noticed that a thin layer of blue grid barrier blinked in front of him and vanished after he had gotten on the ground.
Wu Buyi patted his clothes to get rid of dust. He snorted and turned his attention to the survivors and the disciples. Upon looking around, he noticed that all disciples gathered in the warehouse next to the junkyard. Gao Yan was also there with them.
Seeing that the disciples were safe, Wu Buyi was relieved. He turned his attention to the remnant next. However, only one cultivator remained.
Ye Tianxie was left behind. As for the chancellor, he was no longer there.
.
.
Ye Tianxie was shocked. When he realized that he wasn't the monster's opponent, he used Tian Xuan as a shield, begging him to do something about the monster. But suddenly, the situation turned for the worse.
All good men, who served Ye Tianxie for decades, got disintegrated into dust for no reason. He was speechless and confused at the same time.
A few seconds later after his subordinates were all killed, Tang Xuan kicked the ground and retreated from this place, leaving Ye Tianxie alone.
Ye Tianxie was vexed. He clenched his fist.
'Damn coward! You're a quasi-immortal, but you don't even have the guts to fight a 6th-stage monster! You don't deserve the chancellor title!'I think you should take a look at
Ye Tianxie swallowed his anger and continued hiding from the giant monster's line of sight. While hiding, he found Leo on the farm, poking something invisible in front of him.
The cultivator swallowed his saliva. As Ye Tianxie was aware of his position and the strength gap between the quasi-immortal stage and the soul transformation stage, he chose not to provoke Leo. He looked around, searching for the gap in their defense and an escape route.
BOOM
While looking, Wu Buyi fell from Cat's head and landed not far away from a mysterious west building. Their eyes accidentally met.
"…"
"…"
Wu Buyi and Ye Tianxie gave each other a meaningful look. As Ye Tianxie was two realms higher than Wu Buyi, the former wasn't afraid. However, he was wary of Leo and the plant monster.
'Tsk. Just you wait. Once I report this to his highness, you people will be reduced to dust! I won't forget this humiliation!'
Ye Tianxie grudgingly stomped the ground and flew east, fleeing from this place and avoiding Leo, Wu Buyi, and Cat. Along the way, he noticed a dozen agents in the forest, who also sneered at him.
Because of the spectators, Ye Tianxie's mind was filled with anger. He swore that he would raze this place to the ground one day. As such, he made a detour around the place and escaped to Magpie City, where Yan Zhu and others had been waiting for him.
.
.
Seeing that the customers were gone, Leo began picking the loot. As so many people died, rings, weapons, artifacts, armor, and clothes were everywhere.
The warehouse mannequins also knew their queue. They came out from hiding and began collecting rings and random weapons As the mannequins moved, the disciples also came out from hiding.
"Is it over?" Gao Yan looked around. He could no longer see Cat in her giant form.
"Probably?" A disciple dryly laughed. They didn't want to get into the crossfire between super experts as Qi condensation cultivators like them could instantly die because of their sneeze.
The group came out and walked toward the workshop, which was their gathering place. As they proceeded further, their feet stepped on the clothes of the dead cultivators. Two of them also noticed a glowing dish on the ground.
"A shining dish?"
Everybody huddled to see the strange thing. One of them tried to pick it up.
BZZZ
The dish rejected the disciple. As if he was hit by a lightning bolt, he was sent flying. Fortunately, a transparent wall blocked the attack and decreased the impact force for the guy.
"OW!"
The disciple landed on his butt and got up in frustration. He didn't notice that the shop domain had saved his life, "What was that for?!"
Gao Yan and others were relieved that the guy was unharmed. They laughed at their friend's misfortune, "Because you suck!"
"You…"
As their friend failed, Gao Yan tried next. He grabbed the dish.
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm BZZZ
The residual water element Qi hit him. However, as Gao Yan's primary Qi was wood, his water attribute resistance was high. It only staggered him until he let go of the treasure.
Gao Yan dropped the plate. However, it didn't break when it hit the solid ground. He fluttered his hand in pain.
"Yeah, it stings. I sense water Qi in this thing. I think it's an artifact that boosts the owner's water element Qi."
Hearing that it was an actual artifact, the disciples were astonished. Some of them ran around, trying to search for other items. Then, they found the remains of another dead cultivator near the junkyard.
"There's another one. I found a red mirror!"
Another disciple also found a pair of white daggers on top of the clothing store's building, "I see daggers on the roof."
Everybody had fun playing a treasure hunt game. However, none of them could touch the artifacts and treasures as they once had an owner. Only nascent soul cultivators or stronger seniors could tame them.
However, a certain group of mannequins ignored the rules. They nonchalantly picked up the dishes, daggers, mirrors, and dangerous items. Then, they carried them to the warehouse as if they did nothing to them.
BZZZ
BZZZ
BZZZ
Qi attacks from the artifacts hit the warehouse mannequins, but they were unfazed. In five minutes, they collected a hundred artifacts and put them in a trash bin inside the warehouse.
The disciples followed the mannequins around as these guys seemed to know where the items were. They hoped to get some souvenirs or leftover items that they could use.
The disciples weren't the only ones with the thoughts. The vultures that had been hiding in the forest also had an eye on the artifacts. Thus, they crept closer to the store and plotted to raid the warehouse tonight.
Because of their greed, their killing intent leaked. Wu Buyi immediately picked up their Qi signature and looked around. He soon noticed their movements.
"Oh, boy. I guess I can't concoct any pill tonight."

chapters.title: Chapter 77 Florida Man Scot-Free After Murdering 200 Local Cops And Establishing Crime Syndicate
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 77 – Florida Man Scot-Free After Murdering 200 Local Cops and Establishing Crime Syndicate
As Wu Buyi sensed the killing intent of the lurkers, he ignored everything and went to find Leo. Fortunately, Leo was busy calculating his lifespan and planning his next expansion. He still stood in the middle of the first farm plot.
"Lord Florida Man, sir." Wu Buyi humbly approached Leo and called for him, "My lord, the lurkers around here will probably attack us tonight. Should I go out and hunt them down?"
Hearing that the store would be attacking soon, Leo snapped back to his senses. He then beamed Wu Buyi with a bright smile.
"Let them come."
"Is that a good idea?"
Wu Buyi doubted it was the right action. After all, the disciples were fragile. The golden core and the nascent soul cultivators around here could easily crush them by just waving hands.
"Nah, they'll be fine as long as they stay in-door after sunset. Tell them to get inside the store when the sun goes down. Remember this. Never go outside when the sun goes down. If they're going to raid the store, let them attack first. I'll deal with them later."
"…If you say so, my lord."
Wu Buyi disagreed with this decision, but he obeyed the order. He called every disciple over and told them to rush into the store when before sunset.
.
.
"And that's the order. Remember, never wander out at night! Lord Florida Man stresses that! This place is not Life Sword Sect. There are beasts and monsters lurking in the forest, and they sometimes wander around the stream."
Gao Yan and others listened to Wu Buyi and nodded. Still, the teenagers and the kids were still immature - The more warning, the more temptation. Everybody was curious about what would happen at night.
Seeing the sparkling pupils of the disciples, Wu Buyi narrowed his eyes as he could see through their thoughts. He threatened them.
"Also, I've spotted multiple nascent soul and golden core cultivators in the forest, and they have been watching this place for days. I believe they will raid this place tonight. Therefore, if you don't wanna die, DON'T. YOU. FREAKING. GO. OUTSIDE!!"
"…"
The threat worked like magic. The mischievous smiles vanished from the disciples' faces. Even Gao Yan, who was the strongest among the bunch, broke a cold sweat.
Noticing that the threat was effective, Wu Buyi taught them about today's event.
"Listen. Just now, we've been attacked by 200 nascent soul cultivators. We're lucky that Lord Florida Man and his pet are around. Now that those lurkers have seen their strength, they will aim for their weaknesses next. Do you know what their weaknesses are?"
"What are they, sir?"
"You!"
"E-Eh?"
Wu Buyi paced back and forth as these disciples were too naïve and clueless about the cultivation world's dark side. This was a world of anarchy where the strong devoured the weak. They were bullied and almost lost their lives, but they didn't learn.
"Brat. Do you remember what they did to you?" Wu Buyi reminded them.
"T-They stole our artifacts."
"Those were the treasures of Lord Florida man. They're not yours to begin with."
"…"
The disciples sulked as they couldn't get back the fancy thorn whips. They wished that they could have an artifact like the adults.
Wu Buyi read them like a book. He snickered at them, "You will get one eventually. For now, you're not strong enough to use a strong artifact. Once you reach where I am, you will be swimming in a pool of spirit stones and artifacts! Just focus on getting stronger!"
Hearing Wu Buyi's encouragement, they felt better. Everybody agreed to work hard in cultivation. Being motivated, they returned to the store building to rest and get used to their new living quarters.
After the disciples were herded into the building, Wu Buyi was relieved. He also entered his house and entered temporary seclusion, waiting for the upcoming night. He prayed that the invaders wouldn't be too strong.
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo rubbed his hands while he stood on the mystic realm platform. He couldn't stop laughing.
<Current Lifespan: 178,072 Years, 6 Months, 27 Days, 9 Hours, 57 Minutes.>
Stealing lifespan from strong cultivators was the best. He managed to gather a lot in less than a day!
"Dear Lord. Please send more my way. I LOVE IT!"
Leo opened the domain menu and checked the available structures.
.
Livestock Shed
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 7
Price – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 10 x 10
.
Parking Lot
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 8
Price – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 30 x 30
.
Warehouse (2)
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 8I think you should take a look at
Price – 500 Years of Lifespan
Space – 5 x 5
.
Granary (2)
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 8
Price – 500 Years of Lifespan
Space – 5 x 5
.
Employee Apartment
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 8
Price – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 20 x 50
.
Domain Expansion
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 8
Price – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
Expansion Range – 100 x 100
.
Although Leo barely used 10% of the available area, he needed more territory for his future buildings and other expansion projects. After all, there were many useless areas that Leo couldn't touch, such as streams and shallow rivers.
Domain Expansion was what Leo desired the most. However, the system's offer seemed lackluster as it could only expand the domain by 10,000 square meters. Comparing it to the domain of one square kilometer, it was insignificant.
Still, it was necessary and useful as Leo could designate the entire area as an empty yard. He could also erect a parking lot there, turning it into an airstrip for the local cultivators from afar to park there.
As Leo planned to purchase the expansion, he studied the item and pressed on it, checking the preview.
DING
The mini-map zoomed out. Instead of showing the 1000x1000 grids, it had another display mode. It showed 3x3 grids while Leo's domain was at the center. The west grid, southeast grid, and northeast grid were marked with red stripes, which disallowed Leo to expand toward the directions.
In the map, all major geographical landmarks were highlighted. In the center, the Sword Saint Boulder and a blue home icon marked the area as Leo's home base.
In the West, Magpie City and Life Sword Sect were the closest neighbors. They were only 10 kilometers away, and their landmarks appeared at the edge of the mini-map. A portion of the area was highlighted in red, which indicated that Leo couldn't expand his domain to that area.
As for the East, Leo could see the stream that Leo had been using as a water source. It flowed down from the north, and it headed southeast. However, the mini-map didn't show the stream's destination. At the southeast edge of the map, an icon of a black cone and three red swords was noticeable as the city was 10 times bigger than Life Sword Sect and Magpie City. It also came with a label.
Fatui Cult, Frozen Fire City
Leo finally understood why those KKK wannabe guys came from the South. Their headquarters was there.
Fatui Cult wasn't the only new hostile neighbor. Directly to the north, a skull and a black sword image icon were directly north of Leo's domain. Furthermore, the territory's borders were connected to the Magpie City's area of influence.
Death Sword Sect and its town, the Mantis Dragon City, expanded from east to west. On the map, Leo could only see the urban town, but he couldn't see the full layout of the city.
Sword Saint Forest was also highlighted, but it only covered the west of Magpie City. One-third of the forest already became an empty field as Leo had removed them.
Looking at the geography, terrain, and map, the expandable area seemed so tiny. He was disappointed in the system.
"Cheapskate system. This is too small."
As Leo was worried about the farm and the mystic realm platform, he expanded toward the south. Then, the system allowed Leo to pick the location.
However, it didn't allow Leo to freely pick an area. It showed 10 locked blocks, which were attached to the southern territory of his domain. When Leo pressed it, the system warned him.
<Will you unlock this area? Cost – 10,000 Years of Lifespan.>
"…"
Leo raised his eyebrows and pressed an adjacent block in curiosity. When he touched the button, the system asked Leo again.
<Will you unlock this area? Cost – 10,000 Years of Lifespan.>
With that information, Leo understood how the system was playing with him. He muttered.
"This is a waste of lifespan. I should wait for more useful facilities. I'll only build it when I don't have a space to build anymore."
Leo canceled the purchase. But as soon as he closed it, the domain system gave him a hint.
<Tips: You can acquire Domain Expansion Tickets by completing a mystic realm exploration. The number you can acquire depends on the difficulty.>
<Tips: Domain Expansion Tickets can be used to unlock more land.>
"…HMM?!"
Leo almost cursed out loud as the system was toying with him.
"System, what do you mean?! Can I get the expansion for FREE?!"
The system didn't answer, but Leo already got enough hints. His widened eyes locked on the mystic realm portal platform as if he had found a fully grown marijuana plant in the wild.
Leo stuck out his tongue. He panted like a perverted old man on crack. He rubbed his hands to get his dry palm wet.
"Well, well, well. I see what the system is trying to do. Encouraging me, eh?"

chapters.title: Chapter 78 Florida Man Digs New River For Local Alligators, Neighbor Complains
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 78 – Florida Man Digs New River for Local Alligators, Neighbor Complains
Leo sensed a déjà vu as the "Free Tickets" reminded him of so many ancient mobile games before the nuclear fallout age. It was similar to base-building games and gacha games, which sometimes gave away gacha tickets for players.
But in this case, the "Free Tickets" came in the form of an exchangeable token. It guaranteed that Leo could use it to expand his domain territory instead of spending 10,000 years of lifespan. However, to get them, he had to work for it.
"So, you finally give me a quest after fifty freaking thousand years! Aside from the online shopping system, you didn't even help me or advise me. But now, you are giving me a lot of free tips and quests?!"
Leo was frustrated. He wished the system could have helped him when he needed it the most. Back then, Leo relied on himself and limited information from the ring to survive the harsh environment. He felt like he was a newborn character from a Fromsoft Game, which he could have been killed in one or two hits from monsters.
After complaining to the system, it went quiet. Leo deeply sighed as it was pointless to pick a fight with the weird system. He sat on the mystic realm portal platform and gazed at the rotating ring at the center.
"I guess I have to upgrade you. You're damn expensive, do you know that?"
WHOOM
The ring frame of the portal hummed. It was unknown if it responded to Leo's word or if it was a coincidence.
As Leo had nothing to lose but his lifespan, he upgraded the portal platform to level 8, investing 70,000 years of lifespan in one go.
RUMBLE
The platform shook. Then, changes occurred. The entire structure lifted itself into the air and started floating higher. Its size also expanded, getting wider and larger. Within three seconds, it transformed from a 400-square-meter platform to a 10,000-square-meter flying island.
The four scorpion obelisk pillars at the edge also grew 100 meters taller. No longer showing only a scorpion tail obelisk, the platform created four statues with scorpion tails.
At the top left corner, a 50-meter-tall red wolf with four feather wings sat still, glaring at the top right statue while baring its fangs. The obelisk and the statue were painted red, and the floor around it had the outline of spilling blood. At the bottom of the statue's feet, there was a label [Unfortunate evil overlord who will find a happy marriage life through fateful encounters].
At the top right corner, a massive ball-like creature statue innocently gazed at the portal. It had eight chubby octopus tentacles. Its eyes and mouth looked like something from Japanese anime as it was too cute. However, the obelisk extended from its tail, and everything was painted green. The label indicated [Unfortunate evil overlord who will find true endings through his companions].
At the bottom left corner, a black-winged angel sat on a throne and smirked at the bottom right statue. Three naked women crawled around him as if they were his servants or concubines. In addition, it was the only statue where the scorpion tail was connected to his throne, not his body. Its represented color was black and the label was the strange [Unfortunate evil overlord who will find endless pleasure through hero's ordeals].
And lastly, at the bottom right, a gigantic elderly man sitting and smiling at the portal situated there. His hands held a fishing rod, and he wore a t-shirt, shorts, rubber boots, and a straw hat. No matter how Leo looked at the statue, it looked exactly like an ordinary fisherman in the modern world, except for the scorpion tail that extended from his back. This was also the only statue without a color. However, the label said something else – [Unfortunate evil overlord who will find true happiness through his family].
Leo had no idea what the statues represented. If they showed up as an azure dragon, phoenix, black tortoise, and white tiger, they would have been relatable. However, these statues were too strange.
"Evil overlords? What the hell?"
Unable to decipher the clues, Leo gave up thinking for now. He turned his attention to the floating platform as it started moving.
It had become a flying island!
The island maintained its altitude at 1,000 meters above Leo's store, casting a shadow upon the land below. Then, it stopped moving, stabilizing its location.
PHOOSH
BOOM
Leo sensed that something was shot down from the platform and hit the top of the store. He rushed to the edge of the platform and jumped down to see what the flying platform had done.
There was a long glass tube extending from the bottom of the platform. Judging from the shape and size, Leo could somewhat guess what it was.
"An elevator? The heck?"
Leo entered his store and discovered that an elevator appeared in the middle of the store. He approached it and discovered that it was also functional.
Curious, Leo got inside the elevator and examined the buttons. However, there were only three buttons – Ground Floor, Second Floor, and the Heaven Icon.
Leo shrugged and pressed the heaven icon, which appeared as a building on a white cloud.
DING
The elevator door was closed. Then, it began ascending. Leo turned around and looked through the glass walls, and he noticed that Wu Buyi and the disciples were still in shock.
Leo held back his laughter and looked up, waiting for the elevator to send him to the top floor. It only took him a few minutes to get there.
DING
The elevator door was reopened. Leo walked out and found himself outside the right foot of the wolf statue.
"Oh." Leo looked up and smiled at the wolf statue, "How nice. I don't have to calculate my jump. I can just take the elevator!"
Leo was happy with the new changes. At least, he wouldn't need to worry about intruders messing with the platform or stealing its entrance quota.I think you should take a look at
Thinking of the quota, Leo managed the status of the mystic realm portal platform, allocating some points to the facility.
.
Mystic Realm Portal – Level 8
Entry Limit (Person) – (3/10)
Portal Cooldown Reduction – (0/5)
Portal Duration – (5/5)
Next Destination: Unknown Low-Mid Plane
[Upgrade] – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
Status: Ready to Open
.
"Anything that can go wrong will go wrong. Safety first."
Maintaining the portal activation was the key here. As Leo had never been to the rumor mystic realms, he made sure that he would have enough time to return. With five points to the portal duration, Leo would have 35 days to finish his first exploration.
As for the entry limit, Leo didn't care. It could be used as a bonus for good-behaving workers or a reward for Wu Buyi.
After setting up the mystic realm portal, Leo jumped down and returned to the place, where the platform used to be. Upon arrival, he found a large square hole.
Looking at the remains, Leo dryly laughed. He wondered what he should do to the empty land.
"Should I just make a fish pond here or what?"
Leo thought of the fisherman statue and got inspiration. He wondered what would happen if he kept some fish in the pond without the system's help.
Putting his thought to practice, Leo went to visit the recycling center mannequins.
The yellow-jacket mannequins were so busy that Leo felt bad for them. Everybody had been collecting leaves, branches, and random junk and placing them in the junkyard, waiting for Leo to filter or sort them.
Every mannequin had no "Exhaustion" or "Tired" in their dictionary. They worked like madmen, running around and competing with each other. They also never dropped their yellow helmets even though they sometimes stumbled on a rock and fell.
"Alright. That's enough for now."
Hearing Leo's order, they put their last items in the junkyard and stood in front of Leo, waiting for the next instructions.
Looking at their attentive attitude, Leo loved them more. He tried asking them something irrelevant to the recycling center.
"Say, can you help me dig a fishing pond? You can use that area. The layout is already there."
The mannequins turned right in unison and started running. In seconds, they reached the place where the mystic realm platform once was. Upon finding the place, three of them turned around and rushed to the granary. They picked up farming tools and carried them to their colleagues. After passing the tools around, they started digging.
Leo came to check on them later. When he noticed that they were capable of using hoes and shovels, Leo was relieved.
"You guys are smart. Alright, keep working! I'll be back to check on you later."
The mannequin didn't respond to Leo's words. They ignored him and continued digging and plowing the soil.
That day was the trigger of something irreversible. Leo failed to tell them when to stop. He also forgot to give them the dimension of the fishing pond.
.
.
Meanwhile, the spies and lurkers looked at the flying island with round eyes. None of them could find the right words to describe what they saw.
Because of Leo's activities, they quickly reported it to their headquarters. The Ouyang Clan, Situ Clan, Fatui Cult, and Death Sword Sect received the new intel. As the situation changed, they received a new order.
They wanted hostages! With hostages, they could force Leo to work for them!
This coincided with the spies' intentions. Everybody lay low and get ready for the night raid.
Their targets – The disciples!

chapters.title: Chapter 79 Florida Man Raids Empty Police Station While Cops Raids His House
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 79 – Florida Man Raids Empty Police Station While Cops Raids His House
Leo upgraded every facility to level 8. He also built a new warehouse and a granary, expanding his storage, and spending additional 27,500 years of lifespan.
With a clothing store, a recycling center, three alchemy workshops, three farm plots, three houses, two warehouses, two granaries, a general store, and a mystic realm portal, Leo got 17 facilities in his domain. Although upgrading cost was cheap, leveling everything was costly.
<Current Lifespan: 80,572 Years…>
Leo had a heartache. In a flash, he lost 97,500 years to the system. However, Leo hadn't had enough. He eyed the new building.
.
Employee Apartment
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 8
Price – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 20 x 50
.
This was necessary. It cost a lot, and it took a lot of space. However, Leo needed a place for his workers to live as he couldn't let them sleep in the general store for too long. It was a place for business, not a hotel.
Leo swallowed his saliva. He was afraid that the apartment upgrades might cost him 10,000 YOL per level. If that were the case, he would need to spend 80,000 YOL.
*YOL = Years of Lifespan*
As this was a big project, Leo contemplated the pros and cons for a long time. He sat on the edge of the flying island, looking at the sunset and the scenery.
The sun escaped, and the night arrived. Leo's glowing green pupils scanned the forest below and spotted the heat signature of a hundred lurkers around his domain.
'Hmm?'
Strangely, they were too close to the domain boundary. They crept into bushes, crawling while hiding from plain sight.
Leo smirked as he found their actions amusing. He took a long leap from the platform and glided toward the back of the junkyard, where the two vulnerable warehouses and the recycling center were.
While gliding, Leo calculated how he would bait them to attack him first. He had a general idea of what he should do.
.
.
As soon as the sky turned dark, 20 spies crawled out of the forest, approaching the junkyard. As their uniforms were black and they wore masks, they had no issue with their disguise.
They were golden core cultivators from the Death Sword Sect. They were weaker than the previous group as they were the supporting team. However, their current mission was not to fight - They only needed to snatch one or two of Life Sword Sect's disciples from here so that they could use them to blackmail Florida Man and enslave him in the process.
Their group was the first to cross the boundary, and everybody jumped out of the bushes. They sprinted toward the recycling center. As the mannequins in yellow jackets were busy, none of them patrolled the facility, making it easy for the spies to infiltrate this area.
Next to the recycling center's junkyard, two warehouse buildings stood next to each other. Five of the spies stopped and looked at the front entrances of these storehouses. One of them whispered to his colleague.
"Let's grab some treasures."
The other spy shook his head, "Let's not. We need to complete our missions first. We're infiltrating the nest of a quasi-immortal and a 6th-stage monster plant. There's also a nascent soul alchemist in the area. We have to hurry."
"Shame."
The spies looked at the warehouse buildings in pity. They looked away and sneaked closer to the back of the west alchemy workshop.
BOOM
While they sneaked to the back of the first alchemy workshop, they heard something loud from the North of Sword Saint Forest, where they had come from. Everybody looked back as they had concerns.
The location of the noise was their operation headquarters. At the camp, they left behind golden core cultivators to act as a messenger and a logistic officer. They were in charge of handling their escape routes.
"Is someone attacking our camp?" One of them muttered.
"…"
Everyone was shaken. Thus, their captain ordered them, "Three of you, go back and check our camp. If something happens, abort the mission and retreat."
"Yes, boss."
Three of the spies rushed back to their base. As for the rest, they proceeded toward the back of the general store.
.
.
The Death Sword Sect's agents weren't the only ones who managed to reach the store building, the Fatui Cult's agents and Ouyang Clan's cultivators dispatched 100 men and surrounded the building as well. However, they came from the south and the east.
The Fatui Cult's agents brazenly waltzed from the front, ignoring the mannequin workers who had been working on the farms and the fish pond. They gathered in front of the general store, where the disciples were hiding inside.
The team warily looked at the nearby house, five meters away from the store. Similar to the Death Sword Sect's agents, they were not confident that they could take on the alchemist and the plant monster.
As they didn't want to waste time, one of them tried to open the front door to get inside.
CLICK
It was locked from the inside.
The team of 70 agents looked at each other. One of them drew a sword and swung at the glass windows.
CLANK
The sword was broken in one hit.
The cultivator frowned as he didn't notice the 1mm thin transparent wall in front of the glass windows. He didn't understand why his steel sword broke because of the fragile-looking glasses.I think you should take a look at
The other agents also tried. They inserted their Qi into the door, trying to break whatever array that sealed the door. However, as the door was never locked by an array, their Qi injection failed.
A smarter agent had keener eyes. They noticed the keyhole under the door handle. Thus, he injected his Qi into the hole, trying to figure out the mechanism behind the lock.
CLICK
Modern locks were no match for psychics and cultivators. He safely unlocked it and opened the door.
Everybody sneered. They believed that this raid would be a walk in the park.
But as soon as the lockpicker pulled the door open, he found a layer of red curtain wall. He couldn't see through the red light.
"What's this?"
The cultivators stood in front of the energy curtain. They looked at each other as if they were afraid of trap arrays. As everybody didn't dare to make a move, they asked their colleagues if anybody was trained in arrays and formations.
Soon, the agents from the Ouyang Family caught up and discovered the Fatui's group. The Death Sword Sect's spies also gathered in front of the store and found everybody.
They were on guard at first. But since they came here for the same goal, the leaders of each team negotiated their terms and came to an agreement – They would cooperate and try to snatch Florida Man's people. As for the blackmail scheme, they would leave it to their bosses to decide.
As the Ouyang Clan's agents were well-versed in formations and arrays, their people inspected the red curtain energy behind the front door. The agent was one of the few nascent soul cultivators alive. He scanned the energy curtain with his Qi.
A few seconds later, the agent informed them of the good news.
"This is not a trap or a killing array. It's just there to remove infectious germs from the visitors."
"Really?"
"Yes, there is no mistake."
The crowd let out a sigh of relief. They sneered and waited for the Ouyang Clan's agents to get in first.
The Ouyang agents took responsibility and got in first. After crossing the red energy curtain, they found a new world inside. The interior of this building was larger than the outside, but they couldn't get to see everything.
There was another hurdle they had to get through.
Beyond the front door, there was a glass room. They were surrounded by glass walls and glass doors with white metal frames. However, there was no door knob or a handle. In addition, behind the glass doors and the walls, another layer of shutter curtains blocked the entrance.
One cultivator entered the small room one after another, but they couldn't open the weird glass doors.
The Ouyang agents tried to pry open the door, but they didn't budge. The nascent soul cultivator earlier tried to use brute force and Qi. However, they stood firm like a mountain. The cultivators behind the nascent soul array master were confused.
"What now?" The agents were baffled.
"Let's just hurry and destroy the walls."
The cultivators could see the movement inside behind the shutters. The lights were on, and the disciples were still touring the empty mall.
As the intruders came from the front door, the disciples already noticed them. They started shouting and warning the others. Then, they started running toward the second floor.
"They've noticed us. We have to hurry!"
They sent their strongest men in and kicked the weaker guys out. Then, they started attacking the glass walls and the doors.
BOOM
BOOM
Punches and kicks ended up hurting the assailants. Some of them brought out hammers. However, they bounced back upon impact.
"SHIT! ATTACK HARDER! THEIR MASTER WILL COME SOON!"
The crowd panicked as they were afraid of Leo and the monster plant. Everybody began channeling their Qi and attacked the store from the front.
Beams, energy balls, flying weapons, and energy spirits hit the glass walls, causing explosions and sparks everywhere.
.
.
DING
<Warning! The humble general store is under attack!>
<You may use the emergency defensive order to eliminate the intruders.>
Leo stood in the middle of a small camp. His right foot stepped on a half-dead golden core cultivator from the Death Sword Sect. As for the others, they were squirming, twisting, and turning as their skins and bodies swelled. Their blood blackened while their guts replaced their outer skin.
He looked back at his domain. At the moment, he was outside the boundary, and he couldn't execute order 66.
"I didn't expect those fools to attack my store. Hey, system. Can the store be destroyed?"
<As long as the humble general store is level 9 or lower, the buildings cannot be destroyed.>
"Wait. Does that mean, if I raise the store level to 10, my buildings can be destroyed?! What the hell?!"
Leo learned something scary from the system when he least expected it. Because of the revelation, he had concerns.
"Dammit. Does that mean I have to stockpile lifespan before I raise the shop to level 10? Am I playing a freaking city-building game or something?!"
Leo spat on the injured cultivator under him. Then, he kicked the ground, heading back to the general store.
The saliva landed on the injured golden core cultivator's face. His entire face instantly turned brown as his blood turned black. Blood vessels swelled, and his eyes were ejected from the eye sockets. Like the others, he squirmed in agony as the cancer cells rapidly grew and expanded.
Nobody could hear his scream or understand their pain. He stopped moving 10 seconds later. However, the soil under him soon turned black. The weeds, bushes, and trees nearby slowly mutated, just like the trees and plants in Leo's domain.
The mutation slowly spread toward the north.

chapters.title: Chapter 80 Kidnappers Hitting Florida Man’s House Captured And Eaten By “Cat”
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 80 – Kidnappers Hitting Florida Man's House Captured and Eaten by "Cat"
A few minutes earlier
BOOM
A loud noise came from the front windows.
Gao Yan, who had been resting in his room along with his two new friends, got up from their makeshift beds. They looked at each other in confusion.
"What's the noise?"
"As much as you know, I don't know!"
"…"
BOOM-BOOM
They heard them again. It got louder and more frequent.
The disciples were never afraid of ghosts. However, they were afraid of the unexplainable phenomenon during the night. Other disciples in the other rooms also got out to see the commotion.
"What's going on?"
Everybody came out and tried to look outside the windows. Gao Yan also followed the others to check the outside.
Then, they found the dark silhouettes of black-clothes cultivators!
"!!!"
The disciples panicked. They remembered what Wu Buyi had warned them earlier that day.
INTRUDERS!
They panicked. Everybody ran around like a headless chicken. Some tried to flee through the backdoors, but they didn't know how to open the modern shutter doors.
