Gao Yan gulped and stood there, observing how the cultivators failed to break the glasses. He narrowed his eyes and noticed that a thin layer of energy wall bounced back the attacks.
"That's…"
Gao Yan wasn't sure, but he was certain that a mysterious power was at work, and senior Florida Man might be responsible for the unknown protection array.
After coming up with the hypothesis, Gao Yan was relieved. He regained his composure, and he began controlling the crowd.
"Relax, people! They can't get inside! Senior Florida Man and Senior Wu will protect us!"
Hearing Gao Yan, everybody stopped running around. Still, their faces were as pale as a sheet.
"Are you sure, Gao Yan?"
"I'm sure. Look carefully. Do you think regular glasses are stronger than hammers and Qi blades?"
"…"
Everybody realized the anomaly. They narrowed their eyes and observed the cultivators in front of the store. As Gao Yan had said, they attacked the glass windows several times, but their weapons broke. Some even tried using Qi attacks on it, but they failed to harm or damage the glasses.
Realizing the strange development, everybody stopped making noise although they were still nervous.
CLICK
Suddenly, the wooden door that served as a disguise was unlocked. The intruders opened the door!
"SHIT!"
"It's opened!"
"We're screwed!"
Gao Yan broke a sweat. He gritted his teeth and was about to tell his friends to run to the back of the mall and hide.
RUMBLE
CLANK-CLANK
As soon as the door was unlocked, modern shutter doors slid down from the ceiling, barricading the outsiders from getting in. Lockpads appeared along with the shutter doors, and they automatically locked them to the floor.
RUMBLE
A new air curtain room was also erected, and they were automatically locked from the inside.
Normally, air curtain rooms were usually served as a filter to eliminate foul air, insects, and contamination from the outside from getting into the building. But in this situation, it was used for security, blocking the intruders from getting in.
Gao Yan and the disciples were astonished and relieved that the senior's building magically protected them. Unfortunately, their mental strength was lacking, so they couldn't stand still. Everybody paced around the mall, waiting and praying for their seniors to come and help them.
While they were waiting and praying, the intruders got inside the air curtain room. The cultivators started banging the glass doors and the walls. Noises from the entrance got louder, and the disciples could sense their killing intent directed toward them.
"This isn't good!" Gao Yan couldn't stand still anymore. For the sake of everybody's safety, he reacted first. "TO THE SECOND FLOOR! MOVE!!"
Hearing the order of Gao Yan, everybody rushed to the staircase and headed to the second floor, leaving unnecessary belongings behind. When everybody reached the empty second floor, they looked around as if they had never got up before. Similar to the first floor, there was nothing here but 20 partitioned rooms and an elevator.
One of the disciples approached the elevator. As he had seen how Leo operated it, he wondered if they could get out through this device.
"Can we use this to leave?"
Gao Yan and others followed the disciple and gathered in front of the elevator. They looked at the arrow buttons, but they had no idea what they were for. Nobody dared to touch them.
BOOM
BOOM
The loud bang sounds from the first floor were audible on the second floor. Everybody trembled in fear.
Gao Yan bit his lower lip and pressed both buttons. Then, they lit up.
"Gao Yan! What are you doing?!" The disciples panicked as they were afraid that he might ruin the mysterious protection array in the building.
Gao Yan yelled, "There's no time to hesitate! We saw Senior Florida Man travels up through this shaft. Maybe, there's a way to escape from here!"
"B-But Elder Wu said we should stay indoors!"
"Then, will you wait?"
"…"
The disciple couldn't answer. He, too, wanted to get out of there. The others were also quiet as they were too young and inexperienced in this situation.
DING
While the disciples were silent, the elevator came down from the portal platform. The door was opened.
Gao Yan took a deep breath and ordered everybody, "Get in there! Quick!"
"!!!"
The disciples rushed into the elevator. However, the small elevator was too small for everybody to enter.
BZZZ
In addition, there was a weight limit. The elevator revealed a red light, and a female voice came out from a speaker.
"Elevator Overburdened. Please mind the weight limit."I think you should take a look at
"…"
The disciples were confused at first, but it took them a few seconds to figure out the hints. They looked at each other as none of them wanted to leave the elevator.
Gao Yan, on the other hand, hadn't entered the elevator yet. He heard the voice, and he understood the general idea. He pulled three people out.
"Gao Yan! Let go of me!" One of them protested.
Gao Yan ignored him, "Not all of us can go. One of you, get out. You can go on the next trip."
Hearing the keyword "Next Trip", the crowd was relieved. One of them sacrificed his spot and got out of the elevator.
DING
The red light was gone, and the elevator was closed. However, it didn't move anywhere as the crowd inside hadn't pressed any buttons.
As the elevator didn't move, the crowd panicked. They started banging on the metal door, trying to get out.
"GAO YAN, HELP!"
"DAMMIT! I SHOULD HAVE STAYED!"
Gao Yan heard their voices, and he frowned. He pressed the arrow button again, and the elevator door was opened. As soon as the people inside could leave, they rushed out of the small place.
Everybody panted and broke a sweat. They thought that they would have been trapped in there forever.
"I ain't going back in! Y'all can go!" One of them pointed his finger at Gao Yan's face.
Gao Yan shook his head. He waved his hand and invited the people that didn't get in earlier.
The left-behind group looked at each other and followed Gao Yan inside. As there were only seven of them, the elevator door was soon closed.
Gao Yan was observant. He noticed the three buttons in the elevator – [1] button, [2] button, and a cloud palace button.
"What are these?"
The others also noticed them, but they weren't courageous enough to press them. On the other hand, Gao Yan already figured out the logic of this elevator. He pressed the cloud icon button.
WHOOM
The elevator slowly moved up.
"WHAT THE HELL?!"
"WHOA!"
The six disciples fell on their butts as if it was their first time riding a modern elevator. As for Gao Yan, he grabbed a rail and managed to maintain his balance.
Soon, the elevator left the second floor, leaving the group of selfish disciples earlier. The people dropped their jaws as they couldn't comprehend how Gao Yan could operate the elevator but they couldn't.
As the elevator exited the building through the absurdly long shaft, the people inside could see through the glass walls and saw the crowd below. They could also see the other buildings from above.
Stunned by the scenery, Gao Yan and everybody forgot about the looming danger. They admired the night view.
Alchemy workshops, clothing store, recycling center, warehouses, granaries, and the three small houses were still bright. LED lights from the facilities were always on during the night. Only the farm plots were in the dark.
.
.
WHOOM
While attacking the store, the cultivators noticed movements from the elevator shaft. One of them climbed the roof to inspect the long glass tube, which connected to the flying platform.
Two of the golden core cultivators tried to attack it. They brought out their low-grade axes and hacked at the shaft.
CLANK
The axe shafts were broken in half upon impact. As for the glasses, they didn't even have a scratch on them.
"How strong is this thing?!"
The cultivators got desperate. They stomped the roof tiles and tried to get in from above. Again, they only hurt their feet and legs.
WHOOM
An elevator moved down from the flying platform and entered the building below. The two golden core cultivators were surprised and took several steps back from the shaft.
"What the hell?!"
"Hey! Something is weird here!"
Although they had been stalking Leo, they didn't understand the logic behind this elevator. They also didn't notice that Leo had once used it to move up to the mystic realm portal platform.
As the two made noise, 30 people that had nothing to do climbed the building and surrounded the shaft.
"What the hell is this?"
"Who cares? Let's crush this thing and get inside. We're wasting too much time!"
30 grown men started hitting the glass walls with their fists and Qi.
BOOM
Again, all attacks were repelled and blocked by weird energy. Everybody hurt themselves in the process.
The agent from the Ouyang Clan had a bad feeling about this. He sent a voice transmission message to his colleagues and talked through their minds.
'Hey, let's retreat. We can't get in!'
Hearing their comrade's voice in their minds, the others also agreed.
'Yeah, it's like a fortress. We should report this to the clan and let the elders handle this. There's no need to risk our lives for achievements.'
'True. We're up against a nascent soul cultivator, a 6th stage monster, and a quasi-immortal. This is not our battlefield.'
After coming to the conclusion, 30 cultivators slipped out of the crowd and began to retreat west, heading to Magpie City. They boldly ran on the road across Wu Buyi's house.
They had no idea that behind the house, a terrifying glutton monster always lurked there. She usually went out at night to find some games in the forest as she was bored of potatoes.
As the Ouyang Clan's agents ran in the dark, they didn't see very far. A few seconds later, their feet hit something large, and they stumbled.
The leader of the group warned his subordinates, "Be careful. There are still logs and trees in the area."
The cultivators grumbled and kicked the ground, planning to fly instead.
WHOOSH
WHOOSH
WHOOSH
As they started flying, 30 thorn vines were shot out from the roof of a house. They coiled around the legs of the Ouyang agents.
"WHAT?! NOOO!!"
They realized it instantly as a pair of glowing red eyes below belonged to a nasty plant monster.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"

chapters.title: Chapter 81 Teens Mimics Parkour Video Game And Climb Florida Man House, Get Shot And Arrested
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 81 – Teens Mimics Parkour Video Game and Climb Florida Man House, Get Shot and Arrested
"NOM-NOM!!"
"DAMMIT!!"
Cat emerged from the dark and pulled 30 cultivators to the ground. Using the newly grown thorn vines, she slammed them to the ground.
Getting hit by the absurd dryad, the cultivators stopped being discreet and pulled out their weapons.
"It's do or die! KILL!"
"We're not afraid of you! DIE!!"
The Ouyang clansmen unleashed their elemental attacks. As they were from the intelligence unit, they came prepared. Fire beams, fireballs, fire lances, and flame swords appeared and rained upon Cat.
The chomper dryad giggled and pulled 10 of the cultivators toward her. Her speed surpassed their attack speed, causing the 10 men to reach her first. Then, Cat threw them at the incoming projectiles.
"NOOO!!"
BOOM
BOOM
The people turned into her human shield, and they exploded into pieces. The flame also cooked their meat, releasing an unpleasant aroma. But for Cat, it was the most delicious scent.
"Nom-Nom Meow <3"
"T-This stupid plant!"
The remaining survivors realized their strength gap. They turned their attention to the thorn vines on their legs and stabbed them with their swords.
CLANK
Regular iron swords and steel swords failed to cut through the vines. In addition, Cat could sense the attack, and she squeezed their legs in retaliation.
CRACK
KRUK
The bone-shattering sounds stunned the cultivators. The next second, they screamed in pain and fell to the ground. Moreover, the thorns cut through their flesh and injected something into their blood circulation.
.
.
The commotion distracted the 70 agents in the building. They stopped working on the doors and walls and rushed out of the building.
The scream was their signal to retreat. They believed that the quasi-immortal started catching the intruders.
"Mission failed. We're retreating,"
"Time's over! We have to leave! GO! GO! GO!"
Death Sword Sect's agents whistled to notify everybody. They systematically retreated, flying straight north. On the other hand, The Fatui cultists grudgingly scrambled in every direction. As they had planned, they would rendezvous at the designated location, 10 kilometers from here.
WHOOSH
But as they were dispersing, a certain daddy landed on the rooftop of his store. He hopped forward and got down, reaching the front yard.
.
After the safety landing, Leo reopened the system's mini-map. Then, he noticed that the number of intruders decreased from 100 to 90. He frowned and looked at the brightest place in front of the three houses.
"That damn cat is stealing my prey again. This is why I can't play around."
Not allowing Cat to eat all of his prey, Leo ordered the system.
*SNAP*
DING
<Collecting compensation from assailants…>
POOF
POOF
90 red dots in the mini-map instantly vanished. Then, a series of notification messages pleased him.
<Your lifespan has increased by 548 years…>
<Your lifespan has increased by 512 years…>
<Your lifespan has increased by 470 years…>
<Your lifespan…>
The gain was a lot less than before as the opponents this time were weak. Leo deeply sighed and counted his fingers, calculating how much he might get from this clean-up.
"90 x 500. Probably 45,000ish or slightly higher, I think. Man, I wish they send more people. Do I need to start hitting some cities and enraging some people? No, no, no. What was I thinking? I'm a peace-loving man and a good seminarian. I ain't a bloodthirsty warmonger or a psychopath murderer. Yeah, maybe I killed so many people before, but self-defense doesn't count. Yeah, that's right. That doesn't count!"
Leo mumbled to himself as his mental health was sometimes unstable whenever he hunted. It was a side effect of living alone in a dangerous environment for too long, and he was prone to self-talking instead of thinking silently. Fortunately, the symptom went away when he was happy.
DING
<Current Lifespan: 129,133 Years…>
Leo got a little more than he had estimated. He had enough for the apartment project and the parking lot. Still, he wasn't satisfied – He was still mad about the earlier system warning.
Every facility would be vulnerable when the humble general store reached level 10. This wouldn't bond well as any cultivator in this world could make his hard-earned investment disappear.
Leo pondered hard. He thought of the Life Sword Sect, wondering if they could merge their sect with his and create a new organization together. That way, Leo could use them to protect his empire.
Still, Leo couldn't relax. He thought of Tang Xuan and Ye Tianxie. As those guys seemed stronger than Hua Jiashan, these guys might not be enough to defend his shop in the future.
Leo turned his attention to Cat, who was busy nom-noming the corpses of 10 men.
Cat didn't waste her precious food. Her roots dug into the ground, absorbing their spilled blood. Her vines collected militated pieces of meat and gathered them in her chomper mouth. As for their clothes, spatial rings, and belongings, she tossed them away.
As the situation was under control, Leo turned his attention to the store building. As usual, it was unscratched even though the front door was wide open. Noticing the opened door, Leo walked in and found the air containment section, which never existed before.
The air conditioner blew cold air from the inside. Leo deeply inhaled and sighed. Then, he approached the automatic glass doors.
CLICKI think you should take a look at
WHOOSH
They were opened and the shutter doors ascended, allowing Leo to enter the store. He turned around and closed the wooden door. Afterward, he entered the store to check on the disciples.
"Hmm?"
Strangely, none of them were on the first floor.
"Are they playing somewhere?"
Curious, Leo looked up and sniffed. He caught the scent of the disciples' bodily odor from above. Following the disciples, Leo walked up the stairs to see everybody. Upon reaching the second floor, he found a group of disciples in front of the elevator.
"What are y'all doing here?" Leo walked to the elevator.
"S-Senior! W-We…"
The disciples were relieved and astonished. They didn't sense his presence or heard his footsteps. Moreover, they were confused about how Leo got inside when the outside was swarmed by hostile cultivators.
One of them mustered his courage and asked Leo, "Senior. W-What happen to the intruders outside?"
"Dead."
"E-EH?!"
"10 becomes cat food. The rest turns to ash. Satisfied?"
"…"
Everybody looked at each other and cheered. They were elated and grateful that Leo protected them.
Meanwhile, Leo counted their heads. He noticed that not everybody was present.
"Where are the rest of you? I only see 13 people here."
"Oh…"
The disciples' faces changed color. They glanced at the elevator, afraid that they had touched something that they shouldn't have. One of them confessed, avoiding trouble.
"G-Gao Yan and others used this… artifact… to leave the building, elder. We were trying to flee from here when those men appeared."
Leo frowned, "Didn't I tell Wu Buyi to tell you not to leave the building at night. What the hell?"
The disciples lowered their heads. They had no excuse as they were afraid of punishment.
Leo didn't scold them. He pressed the up button to call the elevator over as he needed the people up there to come down. After all, the mystic realm portal platform was too high from the ground, and the wind was strong there.
.
.
Meanwhile, Gao Yan and his friends reached the hidden floor. They found themselves on a massive platform with four gigantic statues.
RUMBLE
It was windy on the platform. As soon as everybody came out, no one managed to stand firm. They crawled on all four as they didn't want to be blown off from the sky.
"T-This, what is this place?!"
Unable to walk, they huddled behind the wolf statue, using it as a shelter from the wind. Fortunately, the statue was tall and big. The disciples managed to get their bearings.
After stabilizing themselves, Gao Yan looked around. He found the floating ring, which rotated and collected Qi at the center.
Gao Yan had never seen a mystic realm portal before, so he couldn't tell by just a look. In addition, the obelisks and the statues seemed to hint at something. The disciples also forgot about the intruders – They read the label next to the wolf statue and wondered what they were.
"Evil Overlord?"
One of them was attracted to the round creature with an anime cat face. As he had never seen such a weird creature, he walked toward it and touched the statue's surface.
"An evil overlord? Unfortunate evil overlord who will find a happy marriage life through fateful encounters? What is this, a prophecy?"
WHOOM
Suddenly, the wolf statue's eyes moved. It looked at the disciple and glared at them while the scorpion tail obelisk emitted red light. However, the disciples didn't notice it.
While everybody was mesmerized by the statues and the platform, the elevator moved down. The wolf statue's expression twitched, and the obelisk light dimmed.
DING
A minute later, the elevator door opened, and Leo walked out. As soon as he came out, he shouted at Gao Yan and others.
"Brats! What are you doing over here? This place is off-limits!"
"Y-Yes, sir!"
Gao Yan and his crew were overjoyed. If Leo was here, the assailants would no longer be a threat.
Leo chased them back to the elevator as this place might be too dangerous. While he was at it, he opened his domain system and assigned them as employees.
WHOOM
Gao Yan and Leo never noticed the movements of the statues. Their eyes gleamed as they watched them in silence. The wolf statue's eyes no longer emitted any light. As for the strange anima-face creature with a pair of cat ears, it smiled.
Munya
"Hmm?"
While Gao Yan and others frantically rushed into the elevator, Leo heard a strange noise. He couldn't tell where it came from, but it sounded like a cat making a strange noise.
Leo turned around and looked at the round cat-octopus monster statue. He frowned and gazed into its eyes. For some reason, Leo felt like its expression was different from when it was first built.
"Odd."
Leo ignored the changes and ordered the disciples to head down first. He avoided the risk of directly touching them and killing them by accident.
DING
The elevator moved down. As for Leo, he nonchalantly walked toward the edge of the platform and jumped down as he was immune to fall damage.
.
After Leo had left, the eyes of the four statues shifted. They gazed at the elevator for a moment. However, the cat-octopus creature giggled.
MUNYA

chapters.title: Chapter 82 Philanthropist “Mr. Florida Man” Builds Apartment For Homeless People, Sued By Locals
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 82 – Philanthropist "Mr. Florida Man" Builds Apartment for Homeless People, Sued by Locals
After sending the disciples back to the store, Leo resumed working at night. He walked toward the east and picked a large area near the three small houses.
Leo opened the domain shop menu and browsed the decoration section.
.
Stone Road
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 4
Price – 1 Year of Lifespan
Space – 1 x 1
.
Asphalt Road
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 4
Price – 3 Years of Lifespan
Space – 1 x 1
.
Concrete Road
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 4
Price – 5 Years of Lifespan
Space – 1 x 1
.
There was no point in building stone roads or asphalt roads. Leo picked the best option, the concrete road. Even though he might waste a lot of lifespans, he didn't care.
Leo began drawing, drafting a layout of a short road. He created a ten meters wide and 100 meters long concrete road, cutting between the general store and the farmlands. It headed from west to east, but it didn't connect to other roads.
5 x 10 x 100 = 5,000 years of lifespan. It was a small price to pay as the system would automatically repair and evenly level the ground. This would serve as a walking street. Since no car existed in the cultivation world, there was no need to consider building a sidewalk. Just a plain road was enough.
Moreover, it was more pleasant to look at, and it would somewhat get rid of the wet mud and the dirty soil. In the future, when the disciples or customers would enter and leave the store, their shoes wouldn't be so dirty.
Leo left the road alone for now. He turned his attention to the big project – The apartment.
.
Employee Apartment
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 8
Price – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 20 x 50
.
It would take a lot of space. Leo looked at the grid map while he counted his footsteps as he walked. For three hours, he surveyed the east section of his domain, designing and deciding how he should build it.
After a long contemplating and calculating, Leo chose to build it five meters away from the third small house. The apartment faced toward the south so that the residents would get enough Vitamin D from sunlight all day long. Although a few residents would find it annoying, it was none of Leo's business.
RUMBLE
After choosing the place and pressing the confirm button, a two-story tall apartment was erected.
Leo looked at it and frowned. It looked too shabby to be called an apartment. Instead, they should be called a slum motel. The rusty zinc roof, rotten wood walls, half-broken doors, windows without a cover, and dusty doorknobs looked so nasty that even homeless dudes in California might find it repulsive to live in.
He counted the wooden doors on the first floor and discovered that the building came with 10 rooms. Including the second floor, this motel building featured 20 rooms. However, the entire building was only 50 meters long, so the rooms seemed to be too small for a human.
Still, Leo was optimistic. He remembered that he hadn't upgraded it yet. He touched one of the nasty walls to open the building menu.
DING
.
Employee Apartment Level 1
Apartment Size – (1/10)
Apartment Quality – (0/10)
[Upgrade] – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
.
Looking at the upgrade cost, Leo almost demolished the entire building. He had the urge to punch the creator of his system as the upgrade cost was too expensive.
Still, Leo wanted his employees to have the best living condition and hygiene. He spent 70,000 years of lifespan, raising the apartment to level 8. Then, he put some points to apartment quality, increasing it to level 5. As for the rest of the points, they went to the size.
DING
.
Employee Apartment Level 8
Apartment Size – (3/10)
Apartment Quality – (5/10)
[Upgrade] – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
.
The building transformed. Instead of a slum-like flat, the building had two more floors, expanding the capacity to 40 rooms instead of 20. In addition, the windows, walls, doors, flooring, and the roof were no longer disgusting.
The walls were default brown planks. Judging from the texture, it hadn't been sanded yet. However, it looked new. As for the doors, they were made from metal and plastic. It looked fragile, but it was aesthetic enough for country bumpkins. The glass windows were barred, preventing thieves from getting inside. As for the floor, it was covered by a low-grade linoleum, protecting the hard floor from stains. However, it came in plain white color, so it looked weird.
Leo inspected each room and found out that the rooms were bigger than they appeared on the outside. Once again, the system played with the space to fool outsiders. As for the toilets, they were still a primitive squat toilets without a bidet.
After seeing the toilet, Leo facepalmed. He left the disciples to their fate if they needed to take the number two. After all, there was no tissue in this world.
"Do I need to teach them the three-seashell method? Meh, I don't need to. They're probably better than me."
Leo stopped inspecting the toilet and checked the rooms next. Unfortunately, the apartment had only two electrical outlets, and no air conditioner or heater existed. The disciples might find this place very cold in the winter.
As there was nothing that Leo could do, he left the apartment building and called it a night. He would tell the disciples to move there tomorrow.
.
.
3 AM, the same nightI think you should take a look at
Ye Tianxie finally arrived at Magpie City after a long detour. He slipped into Magpie City and reached the tavern. He mustered his courage and approached the second floor, where Yan Zhu had been staying.
Upon walking up the stairs, two bodyguards of the soul transformation stage raised their hands, preventing Ye Tianxie from getting closer. They wore high-graded artifact armor, which emitted a different color.
The guy on the right had red armor while the other's was green. Strong fire element essence came out from the red man. As for the green guy, he was cladded in wood essence. Despite staying under a roof, they wore a metal mask and battle helmets, covering their faces.
"Ye Tianxie, the prince is resting. If you have anything to say, come back in the morning."
Ye Tianxie looked at the two bodyguards. They were the vice generals of Yan Zhu's army, and both used to be sword saints' disciples. They could use swordsmanship techniques from the Life Sword Sect and the Death Sword Sect.
Facing the two scary swordsmen, Ye Tianxie didn't dare to provoke them. Moreover, there were four others, and they were the master of Earth, Water, Metal, and Wind Elements.
"Alright. Please tell His Highness that I have an urgent report."
The red general snorted, "Just report it to me. I'll tell him."
"…"
Ye Tianxie gave the red general a meaningful look. He turned around and walked away while he confessed his failure.
"The negotiation fails. The scouts are dead. Tang Xuan abandoned me and fled back to the capital."
The two generals were surprised. They rushed down the stairs and stopped Ye Tianxie from leaving. The green general grabbed the man's shoulder.
"Wait. What about the essence stones? What about the secret mine?"
Ye Tianxie snorted, "I'll report to his highness in the morning."
"You…"
Ye Tianxie pushed the green general's hand away. Then, he picked a table to sit and meditate, waiting for the sunrise.
The generals didn't bother him. The red general turned around and went to the prince's room to make the report. He entered the room and discovered the prince and his four mistresses on a king-size bed.
The concubines were none other than the water general, wind general, metal general, and earth general. During the daytime, they served as the prince's vice generals. But during the night, they were his wives.
The prince and his four wives were naked, but a thick curtain blocked the general's view. The latter could only see their naked silhouettes.
The red general lowered his head and ignored the usual scene. He reported, "Ye Tianxie has returned, your highness. It seems that Tang Xuan and Ye Tianxie have failed. His unit is wiped out."
Yan Zhu stopped playing with his wives. He sat up and talked through the curtain.
"What about Tang Xuan? Has that geezer died yet?"
"I'm afraid not. Ye Tianxie said that he fled to the capital and abandoned him."
"That fool… Well, if that geezer fails, that only means one thing. Are we dealing with another quasi-immortal?"
"That… I don't know."
"Hmm."
The prince jumped out of the bed and pushed the curtain aside. He walked toward the red general and glared at him, "Where is Ye Tianxie?"
"He's downstairs, your highness."
"Bring me to him."
"… Yes, your highness."
The prince put on his robes and left the room. He walked to the first floor and found Ye Tianxie waiting for him at a tavern table. However, as it was nighttime, no servant came out to serve him food.
Yan Zhu calmly sat at the same table. The green general went to the kitchen and brought the prince a large wine jar full of premium wine. Then, he gently poured a cup for the prince.
Ye Tianxie also noticed the prince's arrival. He opened his eyes and knelt, "Long live, your highness. Ye Tianxie has returned to make a report."
"Tell me," Yan Zhu drank the cup of wine and slammed it on the table.
BOOM
The wooden table was broken in half.
"Ye Tianxie, where are the essence stones and the mine? Who is Florida Man? How strong is he? Also, why did Tang Xuan retreat? What happened to your unit? Tell me everything!"
Facing the bombardment of questions, Ye Tianxie sweated profusely. He slowly looked up and answered one question at a time.
"W-We face a sixth-stage plant monster. As for my unit, they…"
For hours, Ye Tianxie narrated the events that he had gone through.
.
.
Meanwhile, Tang Xuan reached the Cauliflower City unharmed. He rushed to the imperial palace to inform the emperor about his findings.
As Tang Xuan took several long strides into the palace, another quasi-immortal suddenly appeared behind him. Fortunately, the person had no intention of harming him.
Without looking back, Tang Xuan could tell that the quasi-immortal behind him was a thin and short elderly man from the Situ Clan. He stopped walking and asked the elder.
"What are you doing here, Situ Nantian?"
Situ Nantian snickered and took off his straw hat, "Why? Can't I visit the emperor? I was the chancellor before you took the title from me. Also, I have every right to visit my disciple."
"The emperor doesn't need your guidance anymore, Senior Situ. Please retire quietly and let me do the job."
"Hehe. Can't I even visit my disciple? You have quite a black heart, little Tang?"
"…"
Tang Xuan didn't banter with his rival. He continued walking toward the emperor's palace.
Seeing that Tang Xuan ignored him, Situ Nantian followed him to the emperor's palace. He also complained about Tang Xuan's relative.
"Hey, brat. It has been a while, but I have an issue with your clan's grand elder. Can you tell him not to come after me whenever I'm fishing? I'm not in the mood to make talismans when I'm enjoying my hobby."
"Tell him yourself."
"But he's your son. He will listen to you."
"He's already 800. He's an adult. He can do whatever he wants."
"Tsk. You're an irresponsible parent. No wonder your clan is in decline during these 500 years."
"…"
Tang Xuan remained patient. He kept walking until he reached the entrance to the throne room. There was no guard there, and the doors were wide open as if the emperor was waiting for their arrival.
Both old men entered the throne room and found the emperor sitting on the throne by himself. No attendant or guards remained behind as it was 3 AM.
"You're back early, Chancellor Tang. Also, welcome back, master."

chapters.title: Chapter 83 Florida Man Teaches Children How To Brush Teeth, Eats Toothpaste And Get Hospitalized
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 83 – Florida Man Teaches Children How to Brush Teeth, Eats Toothpaste and Get Hospitalized
4 AM, Imperial Palace
After listening to Tang Xuan's report, Situ Nantian looked at the chancellor in solemn. The emperor also massaged his temples as he had never expected it.
"An emerging celestial being, I see. This is indeed an issue."
Situ Nantian suggested, "Should we contact our ancestors and inform them?"
Yan Xiang shook his head, "No, we can't. He isn't breaking any mortal world's law. He suppresses his strength to the quasi-immortal stage, and he hasn't committed any taboo."
"But he killed junior cultivators?" Situ Nantian frowned.
Tang Xuan had another opinion, "Everything was self-defense. Daoist Florida Man never attacked anybody first. The incident yesterday occurred because the third prince's henchmen picked a fight with his pet."
As Tang Xuan chatted with Leo, he learned a bit about his personality. From his point of view, Leo wasn't a bad immortal. He seemed fair and friendly to talk to.
In order to prevent a mishap, Tang Xuan was determined to convince the emperor not to provoke Leo. After all, he might be the miracle that his Sixth Element Sect and the Tang Clan had been searching for.
Situ Nantian narrowed his eyes as he saw through Tang Xuan's stance. However, as this matter was beyond his power, he shut his mouth and calculated his actions.
Although Situ Nantian couldn't do anything to a celestial being, that didn't mean he would stay idle and do nothing about the matter. He secretly pulled out a communication talisman under his sleeve. When it came out, it turned to ash. However, it delivered Situ Nantian's messages to a higher realm, where his ancestors resided. After sending a cultivator's SMS, he continued observing the emperor and Tang Xuan.
The emperor shifted his gaze between the two seniors. He asked them for advice, "Then, what do you think we should do?"
Tang Xuan took the initiative, "It's simple, actually. First, we should issue him a permanent permit to possess essence stones, so none of the princes or clans will seek trouble with him. Secondly, our status is lower than his. We should be the ones visiting him and showing him respect. That way, we can avoid unnecessary conflict and be on good terms with Celestial Florida Man. And lastly, he cultivates life force and he is selling rare herbs for lifespan. I suggest we form a trade agreement with him so that we can gather precious herbs, artifacts, and rare materials while we get on his good side. Once Celestial Florida Man becomes our friend, our kingdom will benefit from his presence, protection, and his goods."
The emperor nodded as the reason was sounding. He looked at his mentor next, "What about you, master? Any thoughts?"
Situ Nantian smirked. He had another idea.
"Your Majesty, the laws of our mortal world are sacred. Even though Daoist Florida Man suppresses his cultivation base to be in our world, that doesn't mean that he can prolong his stay. I recommend we inform our ancestors so that they can dispatch the Heavenly Court Army to apprehend him. No celestial being should be on a mortal world!"
Tang Xuan was stunned. Situ Nantian's words were the same as a declaration of war, and it might put countless lives in the world in danger.
"Are you insane?! Informing the Heavenly Court?! If they come here, not only regular people will be affected, half of the cultivators will be purged because of their overwhelming aura! Many people will die!"
The emperor agreed with Tang Xuan. He had seen how terrifying his father was when he ascended, and he didn't want to feel that terrifying pressure again.
"He's right, master. Celestial beings are terrifying. They only need to look at us, and we will all die from their aura and presence. There's a reason why immortals create the convention laws and prevent others from descending to a mortal world."
Situ Nantian was disappointed. He snorted, "Your Majesty, I taught you once, remember? Celestial beings that don't stay in their immortal realms are scums. Cowards from those worlds always hide in a mortal world because they can't compete with their peers. They are the losers that should be removed."
"They are stronger and more talented than us, though," Tang Xuan rolled his eyes and mocked Situ Nantian. As the latter was older than him but they had the same cultivation base, it could be said that Situ Nantian was one of the talentless mortals, who failed to become a celestial being.
"…"
Situ Nantian closed his mouth and glared at Tang Xuan. He smacked his lips and stomped. Then, he vanished from the palace.
Noticing that Situ Nantian left, Tang Xuan scoffed, "Talk about cowards, there's one right there. Well, he has escaped because he can't win a debate."
Emperor Yan Xiang shook his head, "Leave it be, Chancellor Tang. By the way, is it true that immortals and celestial beings can convert vegetables and food into rare herbs? Can they turn normal spirit stones into essence stones too?"
"Yes, Your Majesty. There is no mistake. Celestial beings condense a great amount of elemental essence in their bodies. Some of them even transform their dantians into a pocket universe to store extra essence. When one reaches the celestial stage, they can start using "Domain Laws", and those abilities are necessary to survive the immortal realms."
"Is that so…"
Yan Xiang was already aware of this, but he asked Tang Xuan to make sure. He, too, had seen his father using a domain ability, and it was terrifying.
"Anyway," Yan Xiang changed the subject. "Now that we know, there's no point investigating Magpie City and Celestial Florida Man. I'll issue an edict to summon Yan Zhu back, and I'll propose your idea in the next meeting. Also, the mystic realm portals will be open in two days. We should be ready for the expedition."
"Yes, Your Majesty."
Tang Xuan was relieved that the emperor listened to him. For now, the imperial court wouldn't end up becoming an enemy of the mysterious immortal.
.I think you should take a look at
.
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm 6 AM, Leo's Domain
"HEEEOOOW."
Gao Yan opened his mouth wide and yawned. Last night, he barely slept as too many things happened yesterday. Moreover, he slept on the hard floor, and his back was aching.
The others were still asleep. Their expressions were terrible as they also struggled to rest on the hard and flat floor. Everybody was used to straw beds, so the store's cold hard floor was uncomfortable for them.
"Ow. Dammit. Today, I need to build my bed. Otherwise, it will be painful at night again."
Gao Yan stretched, and his back let out a loud crack. He gasped as he felt weird, but his back got better. After tilting his neck hard and adjusting his bones, Gao Yan was ready for the new day. But unlike modern people, he didn't brush his teeth or take a morning bath.
When Gao Yan walked out of his room, he looked at the elevator. He wanted to check the strange place in the sky again as he hadn't toured enough.
Unfortunately, as soon as he came out, he found Leo, who didn't sleep all night. The latter dragged his feet to his bedroom, and their eyes accidentally met.
"Oh, you," Leo waved his hand, calling Gao Yan over.
"Y-Yes, senior?"
"When the others wake up, tell them to move their belongings to the new home. I built it last night."
"E-EH?!"
Gao Yan was stunned. Last night, not only Leo took care of the intruders, but he also built their new home? He was moved.
The alchemy disciple was overjoyed. He saluted Leo, "Thank you, senior! I'll go wake up the others now."
Gao Yan turned around and was about to drag his friends out. However, Leo tossed something light and hard to the back of his head. He stopped and turned around, scratching the back of his head.
"S-Senior?"
Leo pointed at the ground, where he had thrown a package of toothpaste, toothbrushes, and soaps on Gao Yan.
"Y'all stink. Go brush your teeth and take a bath in the toilet. Don't come out to work until you're clean."
"…"
Gao Yan looked at the modern packages of soaps and toothpaste. In his world, the local commoners used ginger and herbs instead of liquid toothpaste. As for cultivators, they cleaned their teeth and bodies with their Qi.
Seeing the bars of soap and toothpaste, Gao Yan was confused. He picked them up and flipped them around like a chimpanzee checking a new toy.
Leo saw Gao Yan's reactions, and he sighed. He strode toward Gao Yan and picked up a toothbrush and a toothpaste tube. Leo unsealed the package and demonstrated how to use them.
"Look here. This is how you brush your teeth. Squeeze it a little, and the toothpaste will come out. Put this thing on the toothbrush. Put a bit of water on it. Then, you put it on your teeth and start brushing it. Also, don't brush them too hard. You only need to gently swipe this thing between your teeth and allow the foam to cover your mouth, not freaking SANDING it. I've seen many fools using toothbrushes as if it was toilet brush, and they leave scratch marks on their teeth. Human teeth are fragile, and they can dent! Be gentle, alright?"
"…"
Only half of the instruction entered Gao Yan's ears. The latter wryly smiled as he didn't understand why Leo said so much. Still, he understood the first part of the instructions.
Leo sighed and gave up on Gao Yan. He returned to his room, "I'mma go to sleep. Do whatever you want today after you move to the new building. Oh, you can pick any room you want."
Leo entered his bedroom and locked the door.
"…"
Gao Yan looked at the soap bars, toothbrushes, and toothpaste tubes. Then, he snickered, "Okay?"
.
Later that morning, there was an incident. One of the disciples mistook a tube of mint toothpaste for a treat. He swallowed the entire tube's worth of modern toothpaste and got a severe stomach ache.
Wu Buyi healed the idiot disciple and scolded him for eating strange things without asking Leo and him. Still, that disciple would have a constipation issue for weeks to come.

chapters.title: Chapter 84 20 Corpses Found Near Florida Man’s Farm, “Munch-Munch, Nom-Nom Meow” Said The Murderer
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 84 – 20 Corpses Found Near Florida Man's Farm, "Munch-Munch, Nom-Nom Meow" Said the Murderer
Late afternoon, Leo woke up and came out to check on the disciples, hoping that nobody messed up anything. When he came out, the first thing he saw was a dried stain of puke and discarded packages of toothpaste, toothbrushes, and soap bars. However, no disciple was in sight.
"Ah, I forget to put a public trash bin in here. My fault."
As Leo was a reasonable man, he rarely blamed others or got angry at the messes someone made. He collected the junk and picked up a mop to clean the floor.
After cleaning up the stains and the trash, it was time for some investigation. He needed to know who caused the messes.
Leo went out and looked at the farmlands. Then, he flinched.
Each farm plot was supposed to be only 100 square meters, and three farmlands shouldn't occupy a lot of lands. However, in front of Leo, each farm plot expanded to 900 square meters.
The first farm plot was directly opposite the general store. As Leo had ordered the farmer mannequin, it was used to grow potatoes. The second and third farm was originally next to the first farm plot. However, it was moved 10 meters away.
Leo paused for a moment to think. Then, he smacked his forehead.
"Right. I moved them last night. Silly me."
.
Basic Farmland Level 8
Automaton Farmer – (1/1) MAX
Growth Speed Level – (0/5)
Production Quality Level – (5/5) MAX
Production Quantity Level – (2/5)
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
Size: 30x30
.
After Leo upgraded the farmland to level 8, they unlocked a new feature. Instead of sticking to the 10x10 area, Leo was allowed to expand them, just like how the domain expansion worked.
Leo spent 1,000 YOL to move a structure in the domain. Afterward, he increased the size of each farm to 30x30, allowing the mannequins and the disciples to have more work to do.
Three 900 square-meter farmlands grew three different crops as planned. The chilies and tomatoes grew up nicely, and they were stored in the second granary.
While Leo admired the farms, he noticed a few disciples in the tomato field. He went to see them and check the newly grown crops.
Just like what had happened to the potatoes, the tomato plants were huge. Their height reach five meters, and each tomato came out in a basketball size.
The sizes were not the only strange thing there. The fully grown tomatoes were dark blue, and they emanated cold air. The plants and leaves were also covered by a thin layer of glacial, and the temperature on the farm was in the minus.
Standing on the giant farm, Leo wryly smiled. He remembered why he moved them far apart.
"Damn farms. Why are you doing this to me? Why are you so big?! Fine. I'll check the chili farm later."
Leo picked up a fresh blue tomato and carried it to the alchemy workshop. When he arrived, he found ten disciples, Gao Yan, and Wu Buyi, staring and learning the concoction method from the third workshop.
Leo ignored them and went to the first workshop. He ordered the neck-twisting mannequin to stop making rejuvenate tea.
The mannequin rotated its neck to look behind. Upon finding Leo, its eyes blinked. Then, it resumed its work. A few minutes later, it completed another batch of tea. As usual, it came out as pinnacle grade, and there were two liters in the cauldron.
.
Basic Alchemy Workshop Level 8
Active Cauldrons: (1/5)
Alchemist Automaton (1/5)
Production Quality Level – (5/5)
Production Quantity Level – [1/5]
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
[Research New Ingredient]
[Pill Making]
.
Investment in the workshop was always a good thing as it kept surprising him. By just one point in the quantity level, each successful batch was doubled. The other workshop also produced 60 yang flame pills every time it completed one batch.
'Next time, I'll add more quantity level. Once I max it, I should start mass-producing those immortal pills. I wonder how many years of lifespan the pinnacle-grade immortal pills can give me.'
As the cauldron was free, Leo tossed the huge tomato in the cauldron and researched it.
It had been a while since Leo last researched new material. He hoped that the new crop was different from the Fiery Yang Tomato in the granary.
.
Arctic Yin Tomato
Can only be found in a mystic realm in a freezing climate. It contains a thick amount of Water Essence, and it can be refined into water-type cultivation pills. As yin tomatoes are freezing cold, it is not recommended to use it for food as it can freeze one's blood upon consumption.
[Pill Recipe – Yin Ice Dan]
One Arctic Yin Tomato
One Yin Catalyst
Water Element Catalyst
Water Essence
.
It was the counterpart of the Fiery Yang Tomatoes. Leo raised his eyebrows as he was happy with this discovery. He already had too many yang flame dans, and he needed something different.I think you should take a look at
"Good timing. But do I have yin catalysts?"
Leo went to check both granaries to see if he had a yin catalyst for the recipe. Then, he checked a chest refrigerator, which he placed there to preserve rare ingredients.
Fenrir's livers, hearts, and a portion of blood were still in there. Fortunately, the fridge was locked, and Cat didn't steal them.
"Right. Can I substitute the yin catalyst with yin liquid? Come to think of it, I haven't collected those mutated guys yet."
Leo thought of the cultivators in the northern camp that he had maimed. At first, he interrogated them about why they invaded his store, but they all died and mutated before they could confess.
He wondered if their blood turned into yin liquid yet. He kicked the ground, leaped over buildings, and headed north.
WHOOSH
In less than a minute, Leo traveled three kilometers. He landed at the former campsite of the Death Sword Sect's agents.
The area was easy to spot as it was pitch black. All trees around the camp turned black, and the grasses mutated into immortal grasses. Thick Qi in the area formed a faint fog, covering the camp area.
Leo found 20 corpses of the agents. Their flesh was already dark, and none of them no longer looked like a mammal creature anymore.
Nonchalantly but skillfully, Leo carried three of the giant corpses back to the domain. As for the others, Leo left them there so that he could come back to pick them up later. He didn't notice that the wind blew toward the north, carrying the radiation toward the Death Sword Sect.
.
Upon coming back, Leo put the corpses behind the junkyard. Then, he began butchering the corpses with his fingernails.
The grotesques bulking meat, purple fat, swelling black muscle fibers, intestine-like blood vessels, and squirming parasites came out from the cut wound. Black blood got on his hands and fingers.
Leo smacked his lips and licked the tips of his fingers because of a habit. It tasted like rotten pork.
Quietly, Leo hung the corpse upside down, using the recycling center's building frame as a tool. He stored the body's black blood in an empty bucket.
Purple fat and mutated parasites came out from the wound and fell into the bucket along with the black blood. Leo rolled his eyes and grabbed one of the worms.
The black parasite had no eyes, but it came with a thousand legs like a centipede. Its shape and length were the same as a python, but its vicious hook mouth and blade-like tail were nightmare-inducing. Leo could tell that the disciples would have squealed like a blond in a horror movie had they seen them.
Leo hurled the parasite into the giant hot pool of the recycling center.
PLOP
The parasite fell into the acid liquid. It screeched for a moment before it vanished into atoms.
KLUK-KLUK
A new spirit stone came out from the recycling machine. Leo left it there and proceeded to remove other useless worms. Because nobody could do this job, Leo sat there, getting rid of the annoying pests.
.
.
A day passed by quickly. Leo looked at the sky, but it was already dark. However, he hadn't finished draining the 20th body's blood and removing the parasites.
"All-nighter, it seems."
Leo shrugged and carried the 19th bucket of black blood to the first granary. He stored them in a new upgraded chest fridge. Then, he locked it.
Cat was there when Leo brought in a new bucket of blood. She salivated and licked Leo, begging to get a dib.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
Leo rolled his eyes, "You ate a lot already. These are my alchemy materials. You can't have it."
"No Nom?"
"No. No nom-nom."
"…"
Cat pouted. She stomped out of the building and sprinted toward the north. It was unknown what she was thinking.
Leo followed after it as he was worried about the last corpse. Unfortunately, Leo was too late. Cat snatched the wet corpse and started eating it.
"DAMMIT, DAMN CAT! That's mine!"
"MUNCH-MUNCH NOM-NOM MEOW!"
Cat chewed it in front of Leo to mock him. She smirked and picked up the bucket of black blood and parasites. She sipped it like tea and chewed the worms inside.
"Oi, that's unhealthy. Those are parasites. They probably have a billion eggs in them, and they will grow inside you. Do you want those worms to eat you from the inside?"
"Nyaha, Meow!"
"You can deal with them? Yeah, right. Keep that attitude, and you will get in trouble. Do you know what the people in my world always said? Around, you fuck. Find out, you will!"
"Meow, Meow?"
"Hah?! Who told you that?"
"Munya Meow <3"
"What do you mean, Great Cathulhu?"
Cat explained to Leo that she had received a revelation from a mysterious voice after Leo had created the flying island. Also, Cat bragged that she would officially challenge the heavenly tribulation and become a proper 7th-stage monster tomorrow morning.
Leo frowned as he found Cat's story unbelievable. He took a mental note that he would check the portal later.
.
.
On the mystic realm portal platform, the four statues remained the same. As usual, the round creature with cat ears and octopus tentacles sang in a voice that no one but Cat could hear.
Munya

chapters.title: Chapter 85 Florida Man Goes Picnic, Forgets Hungry Alligator At Home
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 85 – Florida Man Goes to Picnic, Forgets Hungry Alligator at Home
After losing one of his war trophies, Leo stopped collecting yin fluid. He brought the liquid to the first alchemy workshop and began a new project. He assigned the workshop mannequin to make Yin Ice Dan instead of rejuvenate tea.
After assembling the ingredients, the workshop automatically began the work. The usual timer appeared.
2 Hours, 59 Minutes, 58 Seconds…
Similar to Yang Flame Dans, its counterpart also required three hours to make.
RUMBLE
Purple aura leaked cold air from the cauldron. Soon, the area around the workshop was as chilly as the winter wind. In contrast, the second workshop was still as hot as ever as the yang flame dans increased the temperature around the building.
When the heat and cold air collided, it produced clouds. Under the flying platform, rain clouds gathered.
Wu Buyi quickly noticed the changes. He looked up and found rain clouds under the flying island. Moreover, he sensed thick water and fire element in there. He gulped, unable to imagine what the rain would be like. He wondered if he should wait outside and cultivate.
Unable to contain his curiosity, Wu Buyi approached Leo to ask him.
"Lord Florida Man, sir."
"Hmm?"
"Umm, what have you been doing? A-And, what are the pills that you're making?"
"Yin Ice Dans."
"Y-Yin pills?!"
Wu Buyi was astonished. He was aware that Leo had mastered many elements, but he didn't expect him to be good at Yin Element too.
Yin Element was exclusive to demon races, monsters, and women. In this world, only women and a few talented cultivators could cultivate them. However, if a man carelessly took in too much Yin Qi, he would mutate into monster. To maintain one's physical balance, male cultivators usually took supplements or cultivate yang element to suppress the rampaging yin Qi.
Seeing that Leo could create both Yin and Yang pills, Wu Buyi trembled in excitement. He couldn't wait to learn Leo's cultivation techniques and secrets by observing him up close.
While Wu Buyi was awestruck, Leo remembered that he hadn't used the mystic realm portal yet. He asked the alchemist.
"If I remember correctly, you once said something about the mystic realm expedition. What's an expedition?"
Wu Buyi's eyes sparkled. He thought that Leo would join Life Sword Sect's expedition team.
"Yes, yes! I'll explain. You see, every three months, all mystic realm portals on the mainland automatically open, and we can send 10 people in per gate. Every sect and clan is allowed to control one portal, and Life Sword Sect has one. You see, the mystic realms are rich with element Qi and natural resources, so every cultivator competes to earn a spot to join the expedition. When we enter the mystic realms, we have about 10-15 days to finish exploring, cultivating, and gathering whatever resources we can find. But there's always an issue since there are monster beasts, demons, and unknown creatures in every mystic realm. Sometimes, we ran into immortals, and we were forced to abort the expedition. Well, a lot of stuff happens, and things can go south very quickly."
"And you lunatics compete to get in?"
"... Yes."
Wu Buyi's pupils expanded and glittered as he seemed excited. Leo listened to him and pursed his lips as he still couldn't imagine what it would be like.
"Say, Wu Buyi."
"Y-Yes, my lord?"
"Will you join the Life Sword Sect's expedition team you talked about?"
Wu Buyi sulked as he thought of Han Hao and the sect. He confessed, "I'm afraid I can't. I missed the sect's meetings, and they've already chosen the expedition members. I'm going to sit out this season."
Leo nodded. He wiggled his finger, gesturing for Wu Buyi to follow him. The latter walked after Leo like a puppy following his owner.
Both men entered the store and reached the elevator. Leo put on the hazmat suit and helmet, preventing him from directly touching Wu Buyi by accident. Then, he got in the elevator.
"Come in."
"…"
Wu Buyi nervously entered the small glass room, and the metal doors were closed behind him. Leo pressed the cloud button, and the lift transformed both men to the mystic realm portal platform.
"EH?! WHAT?!"
It was Wu Buyi's first time riding an elevator. Unlike the young disciples, he managed to maintain his balance, but he still panicked.
DING
After the elevator reached the top floor, the doors were open. Leo led the alchemist to the center of the platform.
Wu Buyi gulped and followed Leo to the massive ring. He also looked at the four statues, which seemed to be staring down at him. Although Wu Buyi had seen the mystic realm portal of this place before, it used to be a lot smaller than this. He was shocked when he saw the massive changes.
Leo pointed at the rotating ring, "This is my mystic realm portal, and I'm planning to activate it tomorrow."
"!!!" Wu Buyi's round eyes were so large that they rivaled Japanese anime characters. He prayed that Leo would invite him to join him, "D-Does that mean…?"
"I can bring two people with me. Wanna come along?"
"YES, PLEASE!! YES!! YES!! YES-YES-YES-YES-YEEEEEESSSSSSSSSSSSS!! WOOOOOO!!"
"…"
Wu Buyi jumped around like SpongeBob yes meme. Saliva and drool came out from his mouth while he was in tears.
Unable to look at Wu Buyi's unsightly state, Leo facepalmed and rolled his eyes. He waited for the crazy old man to get back to his senses.
Two minutes later, Wu Buyi panted and clenched his chest. Like a weak and sick elder, he looked like he was having a heart attack after a light workout.
"Oh, god. My heart. Please forgive me, my lord…"
Leo nodded in understanding. He had been in a similar condition before when he was a human, "Don't worry. We're all old. I know how that feels."
Wu Buyi sat down and paced his breathing. Leo tossed him a water canteen, filled with pinnacle rejuvenate tea. The former caught it and drank everything in glee.
The alchemist didn't notice it, but he drastically grew younger. Instead of looking like a 70-year-old mummy, he looked like a well-built man in his 50s. He also grew a fullbeard.
Curious, Leo checked Wu Buyi's status again.I think you should take a look at
.
Name: Wu Buyi
Age: 108
Remaining Lifespan: 1,045 Years, 3 Months, 26 Days, 10 Hours
.
Leo frowned. The last time he checked, Wu Buyi only had 400ish years to live. It seemed that he had been working hard or making progress in cultivation.
"Tell me, Wu Buyi."
"Yes, master?"
"How many pills have you eaten since the last time you received the commission."
Wu Buyi pondered. He counted his fingers and looked up, "Probably 20ish. I usually eat the best pills I concoct while I give the rest to the sect or my customers. Why?"
That was scummy, Leo thought.
"Won't the sect or the customers cuss you that you stole the pills?"
"Even if they know, they can't do anything, master. This is the perk of our occupation. We usually made more than 10 pills per batch so why not eat one or two and tell them we made 8? If they complain about it, we just eat them all and tell the customers that we failed. What are they gonna do if we eat the pills we were supposed to give to the customers? They can't do crap! If they want us to make pills, we get dictate how many pills they will get! Simple!"
Leo gapsed in shock.
"You sick bastard. How could you take advantage of your precious customers? You dirty dog is so dispicaple that I have no word to describe you, Wu Buyi. You're a freaking genius! I love that idea and what you did! Amazing!"
"Hehehe, thank you, master!"
He found Wu Buyi's idea ingenious and nodded at him in approval. Still, Leo suspected that Wu Buyi already made them since he had immortal grass. He ignored the unethical behavior of Wu Buyi and continued asking.
"By the way, did you make longevity pills or something?"
"Of course not, master. How could I? Those pills take years to make, and I need a heart of a 9th-grade monster. I'm planning to get that from the imperial court's auction house after this season's expedition."
"…"
Leo had a bad feeling about this. If the longevity pills took years to make, would the workshop take months to finish one batch? He shook off the thoughts and prevented his ADHD to act up. Then, he went back to the main topic.
"This portal is still new, and it only allows three people to get in at a time. Including you and me, there's one more spot. Go pick one of your disciples here and tell him to get ready by tomorrow morning. Finish everything you need to do."
"YES, MY LORD!"
Wu Buyi laughed and ran toward the edge of the platform. Before Leo could say anything, the guy jumped down and flew toward his house.
"…"
Leo was speechless. He wondered if Wu Buyi had a hysterical issue or if he was infected by the Florida Man's disease.
.
.
While Leo prepared for the expedition, the other sects also prepared theirs. The Life Sword Sect already briefed the expedition members about what to bring along and what not to do inside.
Meanwhile, Tang Xuan returned to his pavilion and rested on a chair. He let out a long sigh and emptied his mind.
BZZ
Unfortunately, someone contacted him via telepathy. A voice transmission rang in his mind, and the voice belonged to his son, Tang Ting. The message echoed.
'Father, will you return home and join us in this season's expedition? I've peeked into the crack, and I think we're going to a forest type next.'
Tang Xuan waved his hand even though Tang Ting couldn't see him.
"Nah, I'm exhausted. You and the Sixth Element's elders can go. Also, don't forget to pick five disciples with you. Our clan has 10 seats, and the sect has 10 seats, right? Allocate five for the disciples in the sect, and give five to the clan's children. As for the rest, share them among the elders."
'If you say so, Father. Well, take care of yourself. You've been working so hard lately. I can't even go and see you.'
"Worry about yourself, you damn brat. You're 800, but you're acting like you're 16. Think of your image as the Clan Leader!"
'Hehe. Sorry, father. Old habit.'
His son hung up the call. Tang Xuan rubbed his temples and leaned back. He then thought about what he had done so far.
"Because of those idiots, we provoked that immortal. This is troublesome…"
.
.
Meanwhile, Sixth Element Sect gathered five promising disciples in front of their mystic realm portal. One of the elders looked at the winners of their sect's internal tournament for a moment before he shifted his gaze toward a young alchemist.
The alchemist used to have pimples everywhere when he was just a Qi condensation stage. But now, he became a refined young man, and many female commoners admired him.
The elder called the champion of the recent tournament, "Jin Yong! You will be the captain of the disciple team! As you're the strongest alchemist here, make sure you protect the others!"
"Yes, senior!"
Jin Yong, a former customer of Leo, smiled at the elder. He once bought poison grain pills from Leo, and he raised his cultivation base to the first rank of the golden core stage by consuming those pills.
He had recently been promoted to a core disciple of the Sixth Element Sect after that tournament. Many elders competed to take him in as their direct disciples, but he coudln't accept them as a master yet. After all, a certain Tang Clan member had an eye on him.
"Go pack your belongings and come back here tomorrow morning. Make sure that you have enough grain pills, healing pills, and life-saving talismans. We're not going on a picnic! Don't forget about the danger, especially you, Jin Yong! Even if Senior Tang Ting favors you, you can always screw up and get yourself killed in there!"
"… Yes, senior." Jin Yong pouted.
"You're dismissed! Don't be late!"

chapters.title: Chapter 86 Florida Man Travels Abroad For A Month And Leaves His Infant Daughter Home
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 86 – Florida Man Travels Abroad for a Month and Leaves His Infant Daughter Home
After sending Wu Buyi away, Leo visited the clothing store. He wondered what the weird mannequin was doing after he had assigned her a job.
Upon getting into the clothing store, Leo dropped his jaw. He thought that he entered a woman's fashion store – Glittering evening dresses lined up in rows and stacked into a wall. After a rough counting, there were at least 200 or so.
The cat-eared mannequin tilted her head when she saw Leo, but her thousand small needle arms never stopped weaving a new dress.
Leo picked one of them up. It was a one-piece dress that Hollywood actresses loved to wear as it revealed a lot of skin. However, there was something special. As Leo touched the dress, the clothing store menu appeared and revealed the attributes of the cloth.
.
Evening Dress of Virgin Yin Yang
Made from the skin of a supreme being. Grant physical attack immunity effects to the wearer. Cannot be destroyed by Qi attacks or physical attacks. Automatically provide yin and yang element essence to the wearer.
You're not planning to wear this, are you?
.
"…"
Leo frowned as the system mocked him. He facepalmed and looked at the cat-ear mannequin.
"Alright. I guess it's time for you to try something new."
Leo explored the online shopping system and purchased something he always wanted to have – a pair of shorts! The temperature never went over 70 Fahrenheit (21 Celsius) at noon, and it dropped to 50 (10 Celsius) at night. However, as someone who had lived 50,000 years in a freezing cold world, this world's temperature was uncomfortable. He always had the urge to take off his robes and roll with his trusty shorts.
He bought the softest shorts that beach-goers loved. Then, he passed it to the maid mannequin.
"Make this instead. I need five of these for my daily wear. I'm tired of wearing loose robes."
"…"
The cat ear maid took the shorts and inspected them. She nodded several times and resumed making the last evening dress. This time, she didn't bother asking for Leo's skin as if she still had plenty of energy to make more threads.
DING
<You have researched swim shorts.>
<Your automaton will try to create a better version of swim shorts.>
Leo left the worker alone. While he was at it, he updated the clothing store's status.
.
Clothing Store Level 8
Automaton Worker (0/5)
Automaton Weaver – (1/5)
Weaver Skills – (5/5) MAX
Store Quality – (2/5)
[Upgrade] – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
[Research]
.
Leo thought about adding more workers, but the quality was a must. Currently, the clothing store still required a lot of improvement as the interior was too small, compared to the other buildings. 90% of the interior was made of wood, which didn't suit the atmosphere of a clothing store.
'Before those women return, I should get this store ready. There are a lot of things to buy – display mannequins, cloth hangers, cloth displays, and changing rooms. Hell, I don't think level 3 or 4 in a quality store is enough. I need to max that, but I might need to upgrade the general store to level 11. Then… the store will be vulnerable… DAMMIT!'
Leo scratched his head, having a headache. He couldn't figure out how he could improve the security in his shop domain in a week as Hua Jiashan and his subordinates were too weak.
He required a more useful underling.
'Haiya. I wish this world was like one of those Chinese novels. I wish a protagonist or heaven's chosen one would visit my store and serve me or something. I need a super strong guy, goddammit!'
.
.
"ACHOOO!!"
Gao Yan sneezed while he listened to Wu Buyi's instructions. He rubbed his nose in confusion, wondering how a cultivator like him got sick.
Wu Buyi smirked at Gao Yan, "What? Are you nervous that I choose you?"
After Leo entrusted Wu Buyi to select someone to come along, the latter went directly to his core disciple, Gao Yan. He was in the middle of teaching his disciple survival skills.
Before Wu Buyi could finish lecturing, Gao Yan sneezed and interrupted him. The former was amused.
"Seriously, cultivators like us rarely get sick, but you actually sneeze? It appears that you haven't solidified your foundation enough. A foundation establishment stage cultivator should be immune to common diseases and illnesses, except external poison. Well, it's different if you cultivate poison element."
Gao Yan tilted his head and showed his master a spirit stone, which Leo had distributed to every disciple as compensation for the previous incident. As it came directly from the recycling center, it contained all types of element Qi.
"Actually, master. I think I'll be able to cultivate a new element soon. I can somewhat manipulate fire and water now, thanks to Senior Florida Man's spirit stone."
"YOU WHAT?!"
Wu Buyi almost vomited blood when he noticed the quality of the spirit stone. It was a hundred times better than spirit stones in the market as its Qi was fresh and thick. Even Wu Buyi was jealous that Gao Yan had it.
Gao Yan also dropped a light bomb, revealing his little secret.
"Also, master. When I went up to the flying island, I had a thought. What if I cultivate all elements at the same time and harmonize them this way? Will that work? Also, I sensed that on the island, there's a lot of an unknown element Qi. I think it's related to wind or storm? Master, what do you think?"
"…"
Wu Buyi widened his eyes and looked at Gao Yan in disbelief. He pressed his finger on Gao Yan's left wrist to feel his pulse and his internal Qi. Then, he sensed multiple elemental Qi inside him.
Fire Qi, Water Qi, Earth Qi, Metal Qi, Wind Qi, Poison Qi, and Wood Qi swirled inside him. Moreover, his virgin blood produced thick yang Qi, maintaining his bodily balance.
"You… are you really my disciple?" Wu Buyi was speechless.
"Of course, I am. Why?"I think you should take a look at
Wu Buyi suddenly burst into laughter. He thought that he had hit the jackpot.
Gao Yan was not just talented, but he might be a genius that every major sect craved for. If Wu Buyi managed to nurture Gao Yan well, the latter might grow up into a supreme expert, surpassing every quasi-immortal in this world.
"I'm glad I chose you, Gao Yan! Very well, I'll make you the strongest alchemist in Yan Empire!"
"…Okay?"
"Be more enthusiastic, damn brat! Recite what I taught you earlier! What will you do if you encounter a stronger monster beast in the mystic realm?!"
"Err… Oh, right. Toss meat at it and slowly walk backward while staring at the monster!"
"Good. What about multiple beasts?"
"Throw a pheromone potion and a blood pack at one of them. Then, run."
"Good. What about a weaker monster?"
"Catch it ASAP!"
"YOU FOOL!"
BONK!
Wu Buyi smacked Gao Yan's head and scolded him, "You can't tame monster beasts! Only soul-formation cultivators or stronger cultivators like Lord Florida Man can tame them!"
The lecture continued…
.
.
The next day morning, Leo and Wu Buyi instructed the disciples to resume their routines and cultivate diligently as they would leave the domain for at least two weeks.
The disciples weren't stupid. They had seen the mystic realm portal platform, and they figured that Wu Buyi and Leo would join the seasonal expedition. Thus, they looked at Gao Yan in envy.
"Lucky you."
"Damn ass kisser."
"Hey, he's Elder Wu's disciple for a reason."
"Tsk!"
Not everybody was happy with Gao Yan, who was chosen behind the scene.
Seeing their expressions, Leo figured out how they felt. He came up with a solution.
"Because of my absence, your work might be more difficult. Therefore, I'll give everybody here a bonus. For every day you do your job perfectly, I'll give you one spirit stone. Don't be sad, okay?"
Hearing that they would get one spirit stone per day, the disciples were delighted. Nobody was mad anymore.
After calming the angry crowd, Leo led Wu Buyi and Gao Yan to the elevator. They then ascended to the flying platform while the disciples sent them off.
Upon getting back to the portal, Leo rechecked Gao Yan and Wu Buyi's status and belongings. As usual, they didn't carry anything on them except a few rings. On the other hand, Leo came with a backpack, full of water supply and a box of grain pills and water element grain pills for emergency.
As everybody was ready, Leo activated the portal. The flying ring stopped spinning. It began consuming Qi and created a three-meter diameter oval portal.
DING
<You have activated the Mystic Realm Portal. The destination is [Planet Rabbit Trent A-3].>
<Generating information and objectives.>
.
Planet Rabbit Trent A-3
Local beasts are the lords of this unexplored world. As it is thick in wood and earth Qi, the local monsters excel in defense and self-regeneration. However, due to the recent infestation of Sweet Dream Mushroom, a portion of this world is not suitable for weak cultivators to explore. Please thread with caution.
Primary Objectives:
1 – Kill Rabbit Trent King.
2 – Absorb Gnosis of Rabbit Trent King.
Secondary Objective:
1 – Locate Entity Fate Crystal in Sweet Dream Mushroom Forest
2 – Absorb Entity Fate Crystal.
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm Exploration Rewards: 3 Free Tickets, Ownership of Planet Rabbit Trent A-3
Secondary Rewards: 1 Lucky Draw
.
<The portal will close in 34 days, 23 hours, 59 minutes, and 57 seconds. Good luck.>
For once, the system finally gave Leo some quests. He was excited to see something different.
Meanwhile, Wu Buyi and Gao Yan couldn't see the quest panel or the system screen. They gazed at the portal and gulped, waiting for Leo to take the lead.
WHOOSH
The wind on the platform got stronger, and Gao Yan fell to his knees as he couldn't maintain his balance. Wu Buyi immediately grabbed his disciple's collar and dragged him to the portal first.
After seeing the two eager cultivators crossing the gate, Leo followed them. But before he went in, he glanced at the four statues.
For an unknown reason, Leo felt like they were laughing at him. He wondered what they were. He ignored them and entered the portal.
As soon as Leo crossed the gate into another world, the ball-like cat statue let out a sound again.
Munya

chapters.title: Chapter 87 Florida Man Bitten By Amazon Crocodile While Catching Wild Chickens For Dinner
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 87 – Florida Man Bitten by Amazon Crocodile While Catching Wild Chickens for Dinner
Entering the portal, Leo found himself in a dense jungle. In front of him was a series of mangroves and a large transparent river. Tropical trees packed together, forming a natural wall. The bushes and plants covered the entire ground that Leo, Gao Yan, and Wu Buyi couldn't see anything underneath.
The greenish smell hit their noses, and Gao Yan coughed. He shut his eyes and sat on the ground, meditating and circulating his Qi right away.
Wu Buyi also narrowed his eyes. He summoned his flame spirit avatar and created a flame dome around them. A few seconds later, the scent vanished, replaced with fresh air.
Leo raised his eyebrows and observed the two. He had no idea what they were doing and why they were doing so. From his perspective, nothing was unusual, and the air was fresh. However, these guys seemed to be worrying about something.
"What's up? Can't handle fresh air?" Leo grinned.
Wu Buyi wryly smiled. He wanted to complain that this mystic realm's wood element essence was too thick, and it was suffocating. He had to create a fire dome to filter out wood essence from getting in. Otherwise, Gao Yan would have died from Qi deviation.
"Please don't mind us, my lord. We can remain here and guard the portal. You can go and explore the mystic realm. Also, if you find anything good, please don't forget a souvenir."
"I'm surprised you know that word. Anyway, there's no hurry. The portal will remain open for 34 days, so I'm going to help you set up a camp here first."
"Wait, what?! 34 DAYS?!"
Wu Buyi was stunned. Normally, gates automatically closed after 10-14 days, depending on the difficulty of each realm. But here, Leo nonchalantly said that the portal would stay for a month.
He was excited. With over 30 days, there were many things they could do. For example, the regular plants and trees around here were rich in wood essence. Just by inhaling a mouthful of air, he already gained one year's worth of Qi.
Leo didn't wait for Wu Buyi to react. He walked toward a palm tree with a barbed red trunk. Similar to the pine trees near the Magpie City, this palm tree was over five meters in diameter. No matter how Leo looked at it, it was abnormally large.
Ignoring the pointy surface and the sharp needles, Leo grabbed it and pulled it up.
RUMBLE
The massive palm tree was uprooted.
Wu Buyi dropped his jaw as he gazed at the giant tree being lifted with one arm. Although he used to work out and lift logs before, he had never seen anybody uproot a tree with one arm. But what came next shocked Wu Buyi.
Leo turned around and threw the massive palm tree into the portal like a javelin!
"!!!"
Wu Buyi gasped and dodged the flying tree. A sharp root grazed his head, cutting a few strands of hair.
WHOOSH
The tree disappeared into the portal, leaving Wu Buyi stunned. He had never seen someone transferring a natural resource through a portal this way as most cultivators simply stored their items in their spatial rings.
Leo didn't stop there. He looked below and grabbed a snake-like Aloe Vera. He uprooted the entire plant and hurled it to the portal. Then, he turned around and began pulling weeds and tropical plants in the area.
Wu Buyi gulped and wanted to tell Leo to entrust this task to him. However, he couldn't utter a word as he noticed something. As soon as Leo's hand touched the dark green plants, everything turned black, and the characteristic of the plants drastically changed.
The alchemist widened his eyes. He finally witnessed how Leo turned regular fruits and plants into fine treasures.
"This… This must be why! This is his power all along!"
Wu Buyi was elated. He believed he had made the right choice following Leo. At the same time, he regretted that his friends didn't get to see it.
'Han Hao, you're a fool! You should have sworn allegiance to Lord Florida Man when you had a chance! Now, I'm going to monopolize everything! Hehehehe!'
Wu Buyi rubbed his hands while he filtered and dilute the wood essence in the air so that both he and Gao Yan wouldn't die from Qi deviation.
For a whole day, Leo did nothing fancy. He uprooted everything and threw them into the portal, collecting every resource he found.
.
At night, changes occurred to Gan Yan. Green aura burst out from his body, followed by a rainbow light. It was faint, but his aura was similar to Leo's.
Fire, water, wind, earth, wood, and metal Qi gathered in Gao Yan's dantian and muscle fibers. As soon as wood essence in the air touched his skin, it got stuck on him, and they were slowly absorbed into his pores.
RUMBLE
The presence of Gao Yan and his cultivation base changed. He reached the golden core stage, aka the 4th stage. His dantian volume expanded, and his dantian began refining a gold core inside him.
Wu Buyi quietly watched over his disciple with a bright smile. He was proud of him, and he was excited for his future.
