"Less than a month ago, you're just a weak Qi condensation stage cultivator. Look at you. You've advanced two major realms within a month!"
While solidifying his cultivation base, body, and dantian, Gao Yan looked at his mentor, "It's thanks to you and Senior Florida Man."
"Of course! Now, take your time and absorb as many drops of wood essence as you can."
Wu Buyi was relieved that Gao Yan was no longer in danger. He sat cross-legged and began meditating, cultivating the surrounding essence as well.
WHOOSH
Both men ignored the whizzed sound of flying logs, plants, and random objects. Soon, their mind entered a trance, and they stopped hearing the noises.I think you should take a look at
Meanwhile, Leo cleared the land and created an elevated area, which was suitable to build a campsite. He lit up a campfire, giving everybody a source of light and heat.
After setting up a place for Wu Buyi and Gao Yan to rest, Leo looked around, scanning the area. As he paid more attention, he noticed that over 300 lifeforms had been lurking and watching his every movement. More than half came from the mangrove river nearby.
Leo's infrared eyes followed their life signature and looked up. Then, he found a dozen lion-sized chickens, standing on the top of mangrove trees. Their red eyes glowed in the dark, but they maintained a distance from him.
After seeing the weird chickens, Leo salivated. He missed the good-old fried chickens.
"…Chickens. Oh, right. I haven't built the goddamn livestock shed. Can I capture these mofos and bring them home?"
Leo chortled like a villain. He kicked the ground and vanished from where he stood. Less than a second later, he stood behind the horde of chickens.
Upon getting a closer look, Leo discovered that they were not ordinary chickens. Each chicken had three snake tails, and they had four legs. In addition, their eyes emitted something that made Leo recall the ancient legends.
CRACK
As soon as his eyes met with the chickens' red pupils, Leo's skin hardened. His muscles became rigid as if they were turning into a stone.
Despite being on the verge of being petrified, Leo shrugged.
"I finally remember. Those yellow lightning bolts back in the day also petrified me as you did. Those days were hell. I even lost two legs when I first got hit by those. Well, thanks to that, my body learns how to regenerate lost body parts and repair my DNA."
BOOM
A thick layer of petrified arm skin came off. Then, Leo's eyes reddened.
"POKOK?!"
The cockatrices were confused about how Leo hadn't been turned into stone yet. They kept staring at him, waiting for him to become a stone statue, so they could feed on him.
However, as soon as Leo's eye color changed, he was no longer affected by the petrification stare. He seized the necks of two cockatrices with bare hands.
"First off, let's see how your meat will taste after I mutate you. If you suck, I'll just put on gloves and put you in a cage!"
"POKOK!!!"
The two cockatrices squirmed in pain. Their feathers and hairs fell off while the sharp claws of their legs scratched Leo's face and chest. However, they failed to leave a scratch wound on him. Two seconds later, their skin turned yellow-brown as if someone had painted them with turmeric. After three additional seconds, they ceased resisting.
"Five seconds. Welp, I don't have to remove your feathers. Thanks a lot."
Leo ignored the remaining cockatrices on the tree and returned to the campsite. He tossed the two lion-sized chickens there and looked at Wu Buyi.
"Wu Buyi, I have a job for you. Can you cook these while I'm hunting?"
Wu Buyi wanted to retort that he had to cultivate. He reopened his eyes and was about to refuse. But then, his eyes noticed the two large carcasses of chickens.
As a veteran, Wu Buyi recognized them right away.
"E-Earth Cockatrices?! Aren't those 6th-stage cockatrices, my lord?!"
"6th stage, 7th stage, I don't care. Just cook these damn chickens. It's unfortunate that we don't have vegetable oil here or I would have deep fried these. Oh, well, just BBQ them, boil them, or sashimi them. I don't care which. I just want some good damn chickens!"
"…"
After entrusting a troublesome job to Wu Buyi, Leo vanished. He reappeared on the same mangrove tree, where the herd of cockatrice chickens were.
"Alright, which one of you wants to be my livestock? If you resist, I'll kill you. If you surrender, I'll spare you for now, but I'll kill you later. Any smart ass that wishes for the third option, I'll deep fry you alive. Now, make your pick."
"…POKOK?!"
The cockatrices seemed to understand a human language. They were fumed with rage, and they swarmed Leo. They pecked, clawed, and bit his arms and legs.
Leo burst into laughter as they did something stupid. Five seconds later, all chickens lost all their feathers, and they fell from the tree one by one.
Florida Man collected his findings and tossed them toward the campsite. However, he failed to catch one of them, and it fell into the river.
PLOP
Rainbow color, the radiation contamination, spread from the corpse. It slowly spread along with a calm wave and turned colorless.
Leo ignored the contamination process as he didn't need to be considerate of the local humans. He got down from the tree and shoved his arm into the river, trying to get the chicken back. He managed to grab one of the chicken's legs.
But as Leo was about to pull it out of the river, something tickled him.
CHOMP
"…"
Leo looked into the river. When he discovered what it was, his eyes sparkled as if he was a child looking at his favorite toy.
There was a black glossy caiman crocodile in the river.

chapters.title: Chapter 88 Florida Man Practices Entomophagy While Touring Amazon Jungle, Gets Bitten By Amazonian Wasps, Tarantula, Black Caiman, And Snakes
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 88 – Florida Man Practices Entomophagy While Touring Amazon Jungle, Gets Bitten by Amazonian Wasps, Tarantula, Black Caiman, and Snakes
Before the fallout apocalypse, alligators were one of many exotic pets that Floridians could own. Leo also used to have a license for keeping a few alligators in his backyard. He loved feeding and toying with these guys as he found them cute regardless of their sizes.
Caimans were different from Florida alligators. Their perky eyes were higher, and their jaws were broader but shorter than alligators. Because of their smaller mouth, their bite strength was incomparable to crocodiles and alligators.
However, black caimans were another story. They were the biggest water monsters among all caimans, which could grow longer than four meters.
Moreover, the guy in the river doubled that size. It had four eyes and a forehead horn as if it cosplayed a unicorn. The sharp fangs and strong jaws also managed to dent Leo's skin by half a centimeter.
ZAAAAA
The caiman's hunting method was similar to other alligators and crocodiles. As soon as it caught Leo's arm, it tried to pull him into the river. However, it failed to move the old man.
Realizing that it failed its first attempt, the black caiman initiated the barrel-roll maneuver, trying to twist Leo's arm off.
CRACK
Unfortunately, what came off was a few of its teeth. Its other fangs also slipped off, and it let go of his arm.
"…"
Leo watched how the cute guy try to eat him. He shook his head and glanced at the contaminated water. Then, he deeply sighed.
"Shame. I wish I could catch you alive. Well, RIP ecology. This entire river is doomed."
Leo pulled up the last cockatrice and threw it to Wu Buyi. He then took off his clothes and jumped into the river to fetch the croc.
The water was clear and transparent. Leo opened his eyes underwater and gazed at the caiman, who seemed indifferent after touching Leo's skin. He crossed his arms and waited for it to mutate.
Betraying Leo's expectation, the caiman regrew its fangs. Moreover, instead of dying because of his radiation, the caiman's scales seemed bigger, and its horn shone. Its four eyes reddened, and they began gathering element essence in the water.
PU-PU
"Hmm?"
Leo looked at his arms as something small and sharp hit his arms again. However, upon looking at the arms, Leo saw nothing but traces of bullets in the water.
"Oh?"
He finally realized that the caiman hit him with invisible water bullets, but they caused no damage.
The attack didn't stop there. The caiman screeched underwater. Then, the horn emitted a strong electric blast and zapped Leo.
BZZZ
Small branches of yellowish static electricity and flashing light around the caiman caused the water to ripple into a small circle wave. The shockwave directly hit Leo and numbed his skin. His hair was also slightly curled because of the electric shock.
The corner of Leo's mouth curved down. Not only this caiman resisted the mutation, but it also benefited from the radiation. It reminded Leo of the monsters on Earth, which became so strong because of the nuclear fallout and natural radiation.
Moreover, the electric shock earlier had the same strength as the yellow lightning bolts that Leo had experienced during his fourth mutation. Because of it, Leo suffered through countless curses and status ailments until his cancer cells became immune to every condition.
As the caiman reminded him of something unpleasant, Leo stopped messing around. He lightly snorted and leaned his body forward. The next second, he jetted through the water at Mach 5, ramming the caiman.
BOOM
The river exploded, and the caiman was sent flying from the river to the sky.
BOOM
Leo also jumped out and caught the caiman's leg. Floating in the sky, he delivered a normal punch to its chest.
BOOM
The punch instantly blasted the caiman's thick skin and the innards through the back, leaving a gaping hole. However, the hole was too large. It separated the head and the lower torso of the caiman.
Because of the momentum, Leo ended up leaping several kilometers away from the river. He used this opportunity to look around him to scout the geography of this place.
To the north, there was a pyramid in the middle of the jungle. To the east, a town of skyscraping pagodas stood out from the rest. In the south, there was nothing worthwhile except the massive river that flowed to the sea. As for the west, a series of dildo-like mountains stood tall, penetrating the clouds in the sky.
Although many landmarks attracted Leo, they were at least 100 kilometers away. Leo could barely see them on the horizon.
WHOOSH
Leo soon descended and landed on the soft ground. The caiman's lower abdomen carcass also fell nearby. Not wasting his food, Leo rushed to pick up his game.
SSSSAAK
Leo had no idea what he had stepped on, but he sensed several small mouths on his legs. He looked down and found five colorful snakes latching on his ankles and shins. As they could do nothing to him, he shrugged and ignored them.
Every step Leo took turned the lush green jungle black. Plants, grass, bushes, trees, and small animals received his blessing and mutated at a rapid rate.
After 10 seconds of pushing through the high bushes, Leo found the caiman's corpse. He picked it up and carried it on his shoulder.
DOK-DOK
Something fell from the wound of the caiman. A hard ball landed on the tip of his right foot's fingers, and Leo flinched. The object was hard. Although it caused him no damage, it reminded him of the greatest pain when he was a human.
Leo crouched and looked at the object. He found a red orb, which was the same size as an apple. He picked it up and brought it with him, hoping that Wu Buyi could identify it.
BOOM
Once again, Leo kicked the ground and leaped to the sky. His destination was the previously cleared land. Unfortunately, he used too much strength, and he flew over the campsite.
While flying in the sky, Leo shouted at Wu Buyi.
"WU BUYI, CATCH!"
Leo threw the caiman's corpse and the apple-sized orb to the ground. Then, he waved his hand at the alchemist.I think you should take a look at
Wu Buyi looked up in confusion. When the corpse smashed to the ground five meters away from him, his brain finally registered the instruction. He widened his eyes and inspected the monster's carcass.
As soon as Wu Buyi noticed the orb, he rushed toward it and measured its strength. He was soon stunned.
"A 9th-stage monster core?! I-Isn't this monster comparable to immortals?!"
.
After handing the corpse to Wu Buyi, Leo looked forward and calculated his landing. He also gazed at the mysterious pyramid from a distance.
'Should I head there now? But there are so many beasts and fast food in the jungle. I can't just leave that precious food alone.'
As greedy as he was, Leo postponed the Indiana Jones project to another date. He landed two kilometers north of his campsite. Then, he turned around, scanning through the jungle for life signatures of mammal creatures and big monsters.
As usual, Leo picked up a hundred life signatures of wild cockatrices. He also found over a thousand 1-meter tall wasps as there was a massive hive 100 meters away.
Leo rubbed his hands as he found them not challenging. He turned his attention to the wasps first as it was always fun to poke a wasp nest. When Leo was on Earth, he destroyed six mutated hornet nests for fun, and he got over a million years of lifespan from eating their nests and the hornets.
He skipped and danced while he mutated the surrounding ecology as usual. A minute later, he reached the three-meter-tall wasp nest.
Looking at the Nope-Hill, Leo wondered how many sane humans would summon Hans after seeing such a large natural architecture and long-legged stingers.
BUZZ
As if the wasps noticed Leo's presence, they rushed out of the nest and swarmed him. Their barbed long legs latched on him while a dozen long needles came for his face, neck, chest, and back.
"…"
The stingers failed to penetrate into his skin. Leo widely grinned and grabbed one of them. Without batting an eye, he shoved its head into his mouth!
CHOMP
CRUNCH
Ozzy would be proud of him. Leo tore the wasp's head in one bite, and he started chewing it in glee. He didn't even wait for them to mutate.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 10 years…>
It was worth every bite. In just one mouthful of the wasp's nasty head, Leo gained 10 years of lifespan.
Looking at the system message, Leo nodded in approval. He commented, "Bugs, bees, and insects are rich in protein, indeed. Now, where's the queen? I should domesticate it so that it can breed more wasps for me to eat."
The wasps looked confused as they thought that Leo was supposed to be their food. However, he nonchalantly ate one of them, and he was unaffected by the stingers. The male wasps also looked at their tail and found that their stingers failed to penetrate Leo's skin. As a result, they worked harder, poking and ramming their butt against him.
The trend continued for one hour. Leo managed to finish the first wasp and burped. Although the taste was disgusting, Leo gained 500 years of lifespan by eating one.
That was not all. Leo found another apple-sized red orb. This time, he ate it and discovered something pleasantly surprising.
<You have eaten a 7th-stage monster core.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 500 years…>
"HOLY ALLIGATOR! I'll freaking do it again!"
Getting 1,000 years of lifespan by just eating a wasp was too good to be true. Leo grabbed another wasp and twisted it in half, planning to eat more.
CRACK
"Hmm?"
Strangely, Leo didn't feel any resistance feedback from the insect. Confused, Leo checked the swarm.
PLOP
The wasps turned stiff and stopped moving. Their former yellowish skin turned black, and murky fluid came out from their butts.
Leo pursed his lips and shrugged. He assumed that the wasps got their DNA modified, and they died because of failed mutation. Since these creatures died too soon, Leo picked the NOPE creatures on his shoulder as he planned to bring them back to the camp.
While Leo was busy stacking the corpses on his shoulder, several trees behind him fell. Then, a two-meter-tall eight-leg creature jumped out of the shade and bit Leo's neck.
Behind Leo, a black hairy tarantula spat green liquid on him. It also injected yellowish Qi into his body.
Leo sensed the weird energy flow entering his body. He slightly shook his head as he recognized it.
"Another yellow lightning user? You know, you've ruined the mood."
Leo raised his arms and grabbed the long fangs of the giant tarantula. He twisted them and pulled the fangs out.
SCREECH!
The tarantula screeched in pain. The next second, she regenerated her lost teeth and ran away.
Leo turned around and frowned. He started counting time in his mind.
'Two… three…four…'
After ten seconds, Leo rescanned the perimeter, checking the life signature of the tarantula earlier – It was still moving, and it sprinted toward the north at Mach speed.
"So, some creatures are immune to my radiation. Now, this is interesting."
Although disappointed, Leo learned something new. He began to have fun as this mystic realm reminded him a lot of the nuclear fallout world – All creatures were immune to radiation, but they provided a lot of lifespans if Leo could eat them.
"Which cookbook should I buy? I doubt Gordon Ramsey knows how to cook spiders and wasps. I should check the Southeast Asia culinary books. They eat grasshoppers and centipedes, so they should know how to cook those, right?"

chapters.title: Chapter 89 Florida Man Pays His Employee's Wage With Cooked Wasps
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 89 – Florida Man Pays His Employee's Wage with Cooked Wasps
50 kilometers north of the mysterious pyramid, five portals brought 50 cultivators to the same world as Leo. Yan Xiang led nine imperial bodyguards with him and formed one team. Tang Xuan brought nine people from the Tang Clan while his son, Tang Ting, led the elders and disciples from the Sixth Element Sect. As for the other two teams, they belonged to the first prince and the second prince, who came with their close aides.
Yan Xiang looked at everybody. When he noticed that the portals of the Tang Clan and the Sixth Element Sect were nearby, he let out a long sigh of relief.
"I'm glad you're here with me, Chancellor."
Tang Xuan was slightly taken aback as he had expected to be separated from the imperial family. Unfortunately, he got stuck with the emperor again.
"I guess this is fate," Tang Xuan humbly bowed.
"Well, the bigger the crowd, the better," Yan Xiang laughed and looked at the juniors of the Tang Clan and the disciples of the Sixth Element Sect. He ignored the subordinates of his two sons as he didn't think highly of them.
The emperor swept his eyes through the golden core and foundation establishment cultivators for a moment before his gaze stopped at a certain disciple of Tang Tian. He looked at the master.
Despite being 800 years old, Tang Tian looked like he was in his early 20s. His pale delicate skin was spotless and smooth as if he was a young maiden. His beautiful face and silky long hair could make any adult man gay as he was too attractive to be a man. Had anybody looked at Tang Tian from behind, they would have always mistaken him for a lady.
Fortunately, Tang Tian was not a member of the LGBT. He was a man through and thorough, but his face and appearance came from the exceptional genes of Tang Xuan and Tang Tian's personal Dao. For the sake of making himself more masculine, he tied his hair into a ponytail and wore green dragon plate armor. His wooden fox mask also covered his face, and nobody could see his true appearance.
Yan Xiang had keen eyes. He saw through the mask, but he immediately disabled his x-ray vision ability when he saw Tang Tian. He coughed to hide his embarrassment.
"Ahem. Tang Tian, I see that you have found exceptional talented disciples yet again."
Tang Tian saluted, "We were just lucky to have your support. Without the imperial family, our sect and our clan wouldn't have been this prosperous. More good men join us because of your prestige, your majesty."
"Stop with the flattery. Anyway…" Yan Xiang got to the point as he had an eye on somebody among the Sixth Element Sect's disciples. He pointed his finger at one of the young men.
It was Jin Yong, whose cultivation base was the highest among the disciple group. In addition, his poison element Qi was the thickest among the disciples.
"What's his name?"
"Oh, him?" Tang Tian narrowed his eyes as he didn't want to let the emperor poach his trophy. "He's Jin Yong, my core disciple."
"Ohoh? Core disciple?"
Yan Xiang sneered as he had already predicted it. Still, he was amused, "Are you sure he's not an illegitimate child of the Tang Clan? How come his poison element Qi is so thick? I think he must have already attained poison element essence."
"You jest, your majesty. If a golden core cultivator managed to condense any element essence, he would have been heaven's chosen child. That type of genius can only exist in 10,000 years."
Yan Xiang scoffed as he had already seen through why Tang Tian avoided praising the disciple. As a quasi-immortal, he could see things that regular mortals couldn't see. Moreover, he also believed that a soul transformation cultivator like Tang Tian should have already noticed Jin Yong's talent.
Floating behind Jin Yong was a Dao Spirit, aka an incomplete dao avatar. Normally, only nascent soul cultivators or soul formation cultivators had them as they were related to Dao, yet Jin Yong got one when he was only a golden core cultivator.
This was proof of Jin Yong's talent. Yan Xiang couldn't help but want this young man to work for him.
"Ah, shame. Indeed. What a shame."
Yan Xiang lamented. He wished that he could find Jin Yong earlier than Tang Tian. That man would have been a fine asset to his imperial assassination squad or agent.
After a brief chat, Yan Xiang didn't continue bothering the Tang Clan and their people. He took flight and scanned the realm. The nine bodyguards also followed the emperor. As for the two princes, they detached from the group, heading west and east respectively.
Yan Xiang looked around him for a long time before he made his decision. He pointed at the pyramid in the south and ordered his bodyguards.
"We'll explore that structure and search for treasures. Cultivation and Qi gathering can be done later. We must secure whatever treasures in that thing before the others take them!"
After delivering his order, his unit rushed south.
Meanwhile, the Tang Clan and the Sixth Element Sect's people remained at the starting place. They scanned the area to secure their exit portals. Then, they began setting up their camps and barricades to ward off beasts.
Weak disciples could do nothing to contribute. They sat on the ground and started cultivating wood Qi and earth Qi in the air. Even Jin Yong got stuck there as the dense Qi of this world suppressed his movements.
The elders of the Tang Clan and the sect were the only ones moving. As they had numbers, they erected tents and cut down strange trees in a flash. An hour later, their camp and tents were operational.
Tang Tian and Tang Xuan's subordinates took their time. They began collecting plants, fruits, tree leaves, and herbs from the jungle. Then, they offered them to Tang Tian to appraise them.
Tang Tian inspected the palm leaves, aloe, moss, and raw coconuts. Then, he started marking them if they were usable. As for Tang Xuan, he explored the camp and made sure that they were secured enough. When he was certain that their defensive arrays were firm and active, he vanished from the camp.
WHOOSH
Tang Xuan traveled 500 meters south. He directly appeared in front of a cockatrice horde.
In front of Tang Xuan, 20 cockatrices minded their businesses, pecking and eating a dead caiman. Strangely, small yellowish mushrooms pierced out from its scales, and the dead monster seemed to bloat.
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm Tang Xuan narrowed his eyes. He had a feeling that he had seen the mushrooms somewhere before, but he couldn't remember. As he came here to remove the monsters, he stopped thinking and got to work.
A green dao spirit emerged from the ground. It had the appearance of his younger self, but it had green skin. In addition, poisonous green gas emanated from its body.
"SQUAK?"
"POKOK?"
The cockatrices looked at the green spirits in confusion. Because of their reflex, their eyes shone as they tried to petrify the floating humanoid mist.
POOF
The dao spirit exploded, but the green mist expanded. The cockatrices inhaled them, but none of them reacted.
Meanwhile, Tang Xuan took several steps back and hid under a bush. Even though he was a quasi-immortal, he didn't let his guard down around a pack of 7th-stage monsters.
These guys had the same strength as him! Fighting them in the open was suicide.
The cockatrices ignored the gas and returned their attention to their prey. They continued enjoying their little buffet.I think you should take a look at
An hour later, they finished eating. The caiman was left with nothing but white bones. Even its monster core was eaten.
Tang Xuan continued to observe the chickens. As he noticed that the group had just finished eating a 9th-stage monster's carcass and its monster core, he let out a sigh of pity.
'What a waste. That's a precious 9th-rank monster core. I could have used that to make longevity pills. Well, it doesn't matter. One of them swallowed it whole. I can just cut open its stomach and get my hands on it.'
After coming up with a solution, Tang Xuan waited for his poison to work.
Five hours later, the chickens started flapping their wings while their heads twitched. Some of them had a seizure while a few rammed their heads against trees.
Tang Xuan frowned. He remembered that his poison dao spirit could only disable one's blood from reaching the brain. However, it didn't have this effect.
"POKOK!"
"SQUAK!!"
The next moment, they started fighting each other. One of them bit the neck of their comrade and tore the latter's flesh.
"Hmm!?"
Something wasn't right with these cockatrices. This symptom reminded him of a nightmarish incident of the ancient past 500 years ago.
Tang Xuan sensed a chill running down his spine as the old memory finally resurfaced. The flashback events when he and Situ Nantian fended off hordes of cultivator zombies and humanoid monsters came back to haunt him.
'The mushroom… SWEET DREAM MUSHROOM?!'
Tang Xuan finally remembered that the cockatrices ate the mushrooms on the caiman's mutated corpse. He connected the dots, and he was horrified.
"SHIT!!"
The chancellor kicked the ground and returned to the campsite. As soon as he returned, he ordered everybody.
"RETREAT! THIS REALM HAS SWEET DREAM MUSHROOMS! WE MUSTN'T LINGER OUR STAY!!"
.
.
The Tang Clan's group was lucky as their portal was opened outside of the mushroom's influence. On the other hand, some sects didn't have that luxury.
Situ Nantian and his Situ Clan controlled two portals. Aside from Situ Nantian, 20 people from their city and clan entered the green realm. However, their portals didn't appear near each other.
Their clan's portal was located on top of a straight mountain, 2,000 meters above sea level. As for the other, it was opened directly on top of the pyramid building.
The cultivators from the pyramid portal were stunned when they found their portals floating high in the sky. They brought out their flying swords to stand on and save their internal Qi.
Everybody looked down. Then, they noticed that the pyramid was covered by yellowish mushrooms. At the foot of the pyramid, all trees were replaced by tall mushrooms of various sizes, and they didn't belong in this Amazon-like jungle and this climate.
Nobody noticed the militated and compressed objects that had fallen on the ground in front of the pyramid entrance. Among them, a distorted and broken spatial ring of a former mountain bandit became one with the mushrooms while its ejected content was hidden under the sea of fungi.
The Situ's clansmen and elders were under 500 years old, and they had never seen the mushrooms. They soon descended to inspect the new specimen. It only took them less than five minutes - they inhaled THEM.
.
.
While some people had a mushroom party, Leo carried 20 mutated corpses of giant wasps back to his base. He calmly dropped them on a cleared plain in front of the camp.
Wu Buyi sweated profusely when he noticed the monsters. As they hadn't been butchered yet, he managed to evaluate their strength by injecting his Qi into their monster cores.
Leo ordered Wu Buyi, "Do me a favor. Throw these guys into the portal for me. I'm gonna eat them later."
"…Are you gonna eat those?!"
Wu Buyi couldn't believe his ears, but his face remained expressionless. He started to get used to Leo's weirdness.
Leo didn't hang around or respond to Wu Buyi. He vanished into the forest. A few seconds later, he returned with more giant wasps.
"…"
Wu Buyi silently stared at the pile of wasps. Those were 7th-stage monsters, and their strength was comparable to a quasi-immortal. However, Leo took care of them without leaving a wound.
As Wu Buyi couldn't think straight, he let his body act on its own. Like a robot, he collected all corpses into his spatial ring and pointed the ring at the portal. Then, he commanded the ring to eject the wasps.
He was efficient. The wasps crossed the portal to the other side.
Unfortunately, Wu Buyi's hard work was underappreciated. When he finished sending 40 wasps to the other side, Leo already piled 40 more on the ground, and the latter didn't stop teleporting.
Wu Buyi turned around and scratched his head. He had a feeling that Leo pranked him.
"Can't he just use his spatial ring to collect everything? This is harassment!"
Again, Wu Buyi collected the wasps and threw them into the portal. However, this time, he kept one in his ring. Secretly, he used his Qi to cut a piece of their leg and brought it out.
Inspired by the Florida Man, Wu Buyi put the small piece into his mouth and chewed it.
It was disgusting. It tasted worse than anything that Wu Buyi had eaten. However, he sensed something from the insect's leg – It had a similar energy as immortal grass!
"Isn't this… life force?!"

chapters.title: Chapter 90 PETA Protests As Florida Man Murders Two Amazon Caimans And Seduces Unicorn
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 90 – PETA Protests as Florida Man Murders Two Amazon Caimans and Seduces Unicorn
Although many sects were sent to the same mystic realm as Leo, not everyone could get this privilege. Yan Zhu's people, the Fatui Cult, the Death Sword Sect, and other major sects were sent to other planets.
Meanwhile, two organizations that Leo knew were in the same realm as his. At the east of Leo's current location was the skyscraper pagoda. At the foot of the structure, Hua Jiashan, Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, and six disciples gathered at looked at the structure in awe. Their mystic realm portal was also behind them.
A hundred meters away, another portal brought the women from the Amazonian Sanctuary there. They also admired the tall building as they had never seen anything like this.
Hua Jiashan noticed the elders from the sanctuary. As he led a smaller sect, he went to greet them to give face. He went to the leader of the group, who was a thin woman in a wooden wheelchair.
Despite sitting in a wheelchair, the grand elder of the Amazonian Sanctuary, Dongfang Mei, was a soul transformation cultivator, a realm higher than Hua Jiashan. Her age was the same as his, but Hua Jiashan had to show respect to this woman.
Dongfang Mei had short white hair, sunken cheeks, and wilted skin. Her hunchback and her condition made her look like a 100-year-old grandma that needed her children's support.
The grand elder gazed at the approaching man and recognized him. After all, he was like her little brother.
"Little Jiashan, you're here, too."
"Senior Dongfang, it's good to see you again. You're still healthy, I see."
"Kekeke, I won't die that easily. I managed to snag a bottle of rejuvenate tea from my disciple! Do you know that I'm looking 10 years younger?"
Hua Jiashan didn't know what to answer as Dongfang Mei still looked the same to him. He changed the subject, "So, are you going to explore this building?"
"Hmm. We don't have a place for my girls to stay and cultivate. We might as well take shelter in that building. Oh, your group should come along. Just be mindful of the distance since my disciples are inexperienced with men."
"… We'll be mindful. I'll warn them."
The two groups came to an agreement that they would explore this place together. However, their disciples couldn't interact as they were too young and inexperienced. In short, romantic relationship between disciples was strictly forbidden.
The elders of the two sects protected their disciples with their arrays and sent them to the pagoda. All 20 explorers entered the building. But as soon as everybody got inside, steel bars slammed down and locked everybody in.
BOOM
"!!!"
Han Hao and Han Meng rushed to the entrance, but the exit was blocked by the steel bars. They brought out their swords and attempted to slice it.
DONG
A semi-transparent energy wall appeared and bounced the swords back. The two swordsmen took two steps backward and stared at the energy wall in shock.
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei looked around. Then, they sighed.
"As usual, a cage trap."
"Yes. It seems this place is either a test site or a ritual temple."
"Probably the former. No sentry is here, and no sign of Qi torrent is around."
"True."
It was not the first time that Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei encountered this situation. They had seen similar traps and mechanisms in the other mystic realms before, and they deemed that this trap wasn't dangerous.
Seeing that their seniors were calm and collected, the disciples and their subordinates didn't make noise. Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei also ordered the people to start cultivating and resting for the day.
.
.
Wu Buyi sweated profusely. After eating the wasp's leg, he sensed a strange life force energy, and he could feel that his foundation was strengthened. However, he couldn't take another bite.
His stomach growled. Because he had never eaten anything solid other than grain pills all his life, his stomach rejected solid food. He felt nauseous and dizzy.
"BLECH!!"
A minute later, Wu Buyi vomited the food out. Some of the life force energy left him, but he managed to absorb a small amount.
While Wu Buyi was vomiting his food, Leo returned and dropped more wasps on the ground. Then, he noticed the condition of his employee.
"Ah, you ate it, didn't you?"
Wu Buyi bitterly looked at his master. He nodded, "Y-Yes, my lord."
Leo shrugged, "This is why you shouldn't be overly dependent on grain pills. Your stomach is very weak right now. If you haven't eaten anything solid for years, you should start off with light food, such as soup or something easy to digest. Chewy stuff is a no-go."
"…"
Wu Buyi wanted to argue that it was against common sense here as hard food was toxic to cultivators. Meat, vegetables, fruits, and other mortal's processed food carried a lot of impurities, and it would take a long time to remove them.
Still, Wu Buyi remembered that Leo had been eating strange stuff. He saw Leo eat immortal grass and golden sand banana before, but he didn't seem to have an issue with impurity.
Fortunately, as an alchemist, Wu Buyi had the mindset of a scientist. Because of Leo's example, he had new inspiration and a theory regarding hard food.
'What if our cultivation method and traditions are wrong all along? What if Lord Florida Man is using a more efficient cultivation method?'
Being inspired, Wu Buyi got rid of his ego. He accepted and learned new things as if he was an empty glass.
"I'll keep that in mind, my lord."
Seeing how obedient Wu Buyi was, Leo felt bad for the guy. He thought of a way to improve Wu Buyi's health and came up with a simple solution – the online store.
Leo opened his system menu, browsing the medicine section in the store. He wondered if the modern antiseptic or any drug for underfeeding or excessive fasting.
However, the drug section was overpriced, just like the food section. Each pallet had a price tag of 10,000 YOL or higher.
As Leo couldn't rely on modern meds or food, he could only come up with local ones. He looked around to see if there was any useful food ingredient for a malnourished man. He looked around the campsite.
While looking, his eyes met with a lurking cockatrice's, who warily stared at Leo 200 meters away.I think you should take a look at
"Right. Chicken soup!"
Not wasting time, Leo put on his gloves and vanished. Two seconds later, he returned as if he teleported back, but his hands twisted the neck of the poor cockatrice.
"I have an idea, Wu Buyi. Let's train your stomach with light soup first. I'll cook chicken soup for you. Oh, I'll cook for Gao Yan too."
"…"
Wu Buyi blankly looked at Leo. Although he heard that unorthodox sects refined monster meat into grain pills, he had never thought of eating monster meat as real food.
Meanwhile, Leo had no idea what Wu Buyi had been through. He hummed and plucked the chicken's feathers without mutating them. After the task, Leo paused for a moment and looked at Wu Buyi.
"Do you have a knife? A sharp one?"
"…"
Wu Buyi silently handed over his treasure short sword that he kept for protection. It could also be used as a lighter or a flame thrower.
Leo received the red knife and inspected it. Upon seeing the fancy carving on the blades, he pursed his lips and flipped the knife around. After getting the hang of it, Leo chopped off the cockatrice's head and the three snake tails.
POK-POK
Skillfully and nimbly, Leo split open the chicken's stomach, removing its innards and blood. A red orb fell off its body and landed on the mushy intestines.
Leo noticed it. He picked it up and looked at Wu Buyi for a moment.
"Catch."
"Eh?"
Leo tossed the monster core to the alchemist. Then, he bragged, "I already ate too many. You keep that. When your stomach gets better, try eating it. It gives you 500 years of lifespan."
"W-WHAT?!" Wu Buyi forgot about his stomach pain and dizziness. His eyes brightened as he learned something absurd and astonishing, "Really, my lord?!"
"Why should I lie to you? I already ate a dozen wasp balls… Whoops, no pun intended. Anyway, I can't let my employee live a short life. What do you think will happen if I show your lifespan status to future customers and find out that you have a shorter lifespan than the others? That's gonna embarrass us. So, as the face of my store, I need you to live a very long life, okay?"
Leo didn't tell Wu Buyi that he was full. As Leo only had one mouth to eat, he believed that having more mouths to eat this good food would earn him extra YOL income. Thus, he planned to mutate Wu Buyi's stomach and enabled him to earn some YOL the same way Leo had done in the past. Once Wu Buyi could eat random things and gain lifespan, Leo could scam Wu Buyi by selling him some random products or essence stones later.
In short, Leo was a witch, and Wu Buyi was either Hansel or Gretel. The former wanted the latter fat, so he could eat him later.
On the other hand, Wu Buyi was moved to tears. He couldn't believe that Leo was so nice to him. He soon wailed, "My lord! I swear with my dao oath! I'll follow you to the end of the world!"
"Yes, yes. You should."
Leo brightly smiled while he hang the chicken upside down, draining more blood from the meat. He also glanced at the large river behind Gao Yan and Wu Buyi as he noticed a horn of another caiman in the water.
For the sake of their safety, Leo tossed the innards into the river. As soon as the bloody intestines and heart entered the water, two caimans jumped out and competed to get the food.
Wu Buyi snapped back to his senses and looked at the river. When he noticed that two 9th-stage monsters appeared, he shrieked in fright and crawled toward Leo.
"Seriously, you… don't you have any pride?" Leo frowned at Wu Buyi.
"B-But they're 9th-stage…"
"Haiya…"
Leo rolled his eyes. He walked closer to the river and raised his right foot. Then, he stomped the ground.
BOOM
The river was split in half, but the two caimans were shot up to the sky because of the pressure. Meanwhile, Leo threw the red knife at one of them.
PU!
It pierced through the first caiman's head.
PU
After going through the first caiman's head, the knife stabbed the forehead of the second caiman. Both monsters widened their eyes in shock before their consciousness faded to black.
BOOM
BOOM
Both gigantic monsters fell into the river. Leo snorted and dove into the river and dragged the two monsters to the river bank. When he returned, the river's surface was painted in rainbow color, and the two caimans started to turn blacker.
Leo pulled out the red knife. But as he was about to reuse it for cooking, it broke.
"…"
Leo felt bad for Wu Buyi. He returned the broken treasure knife to the guy, "I'll find you a new one. My bad."
Wu Buyi quietly received the knife and looked at the two 9th-stage monsters. He had no words to explain the roller-coaster emotions.
'T-Two immortal beasts go down… just like that? With my low-grade treasure sword? B-But does that mean Lord Florida Man will get two extra 9th-grade monster cores?! Oh, dear lord…'
.
.
At 10 kilometers south of Leo's location, a white horse with a long straight horn gazed at Leo from the opposite side of the river. The unicorn neighed and trotted in excitement as if it had found something precious.
The unicorn ran in a circle for a minute. After it had warmed up, silver light glowed on its hooves. Then, it started walking toward the river.
Instead of falling into the river, it walked on the surface. Then, it picked up the pace, charging toward Leo's group at full speed.

chapters.title: Chapter 91 Florida Man Tames Unicorn By Smashing
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 91 – Florida Man Tames Unicorn by Smashing
Wu Buyi no longer had time to cultivate as Leo gave him a lot of work to do. Still, he was happy that he served a strong master, and he got boons from it.
After storing the monster corpses in his spatial ring, Wu Buyi had some questions in his mind. He wondered why Leo never used his spatial ring.
"Senior. I have a question. Could you enlighten me?"
"What is it?"
While listening to Wu Buyi, Leo vanished as he suddenly kicked the ground and went somewhere. Two seconds later, he returned with two more living cockatrices in his hands. He broke their necks and pulled their beaks from their heads. Then, he used the beaks to cut open their stomachs and behead them to drain their blood.
Guts and blood fell to the ground and messed up some of their feathers. Leo ignored the dirty blood and plucked their feathers. As usual, their monster cores fell from their bodies.
Wu Buyi gulped as he kept getting surprised by Leo's antics and weirdness. He mustered his courage and asked.
"My lord. Why don't you use your spatial ring to store the beasts or the treasures? It's faster to store the carcasses into your ring than running around and bringing them to me."
Leo deeply sighed. He wanted to use it too, but he always broke the ring whenever he rubbed them. Since he hated lying and pretending, Leo spoke the truth.
"Truth be told, I can't use the rings."
"Huh?!" Wu Buyi was shocked, "Why? What happened to you, my lord?! You're an immortal, so using a simple spatial ring shouldn't be an issue."
Leo paused from work. He rested his hands on his waists and deeply sighed.
"You see, Wu Buyi. This world's rings are too fragile. Whenever I tried to use them, they broke."
"…"
"The last time I tried, all items burst out and flooded my store. It took me a day to clean everything."
Again, Wu Buyi was astonished. He believed he figured out Leo's trouble.
'I see. Because his Qi is too strong, any mortal spatial ring will break upon touch. No mortal-made spatial rings can handle his power! This must be it!'
Wu Buyi brightly smiled, "I understand, my lord. Our world's spatial rings are indeed too weak for someone with your status. Since you can't use them, I'll help you sort and collect your items!"
The alchemist had an ulterior motive. If he could act as Leo's spatial ring carrier, he could snoop on Leo's precious items and rare collections.
While Wu Buyi fantasized about his sweet future, a rare water sound came from behind. It sounded like someone had been scooping and slashing water. He turned around to see.
"Hmm?"
A three-meter-tall white unicorn was charging toward them. It neighed and showed its teeth.
"WHAT THE HELL?!"
Wu Buyi panicked. He grabbed Gao Yan and leaped out of the horse's way.
The massive unicorn glanced at both men and ignored them. It turned its attention to Leo, who hadn't noticed its arrival yet. The horse smiled and lowered its head, charging toward him.
"MY LORD, WATCH OUT!" Wu Buyi screamed.
"Ah?"
Leo only heard the voice of Wu Buyi. Then, a large shadow loomed, blocking the ray of sunlight. He turned around and found a white unicorn, raising its front hooves and waving them.
BOOM
The horse slammed its front hooves on the ground. Then, it leaned its head forward to nudge Leo's chest. It sniffed him and raised its head to lick his face.
Getting a surprised lick by a weird pony, Leo was taken aback, "Wut da hail?"
Leo looked up and found the long horn and a massive horse. He frowned for a moment as he wondered if he should get rid of the horse. However, as the horse did nothing but lick his face, Leo rolled his eyes.
"Wu Buyi."
"Yes, my lord?"
"What the hell is this… stupid donkey?"
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm "Donkey?!"
Wu Buyi awkwardly smiled as Leo wrongly nicknamed a mythical creature a donkey. The horse also stopped licking Leo to stare at his face.
Leo looked into the unicorn's eyes. He waited for the beast to mutate and die. However, after 10 seconds, it didn't show any symptom of mutation.
"Well? What is this donkey, Wu Buyi?"
Wu Buy came back to his senses and coughed. He glanced at Gao Yan, who sweated profusely after the commotion. Because Wu Buyi interrupted his cultivation midway, his Qi was on a rampage, and he needed help.
Because of the chaos, Wu Buyi half-heartedly answered while he rushed to help Gao Yan stabilize his Qi.
"That's a unicorn, my lord. It's a mythical beast."
Leo rolled his eyes, "I know. I want to know why it is licking me. I don't remember raising a goddamn pony!"
Wu Buyi didn't answer as he no longer listened to Leo. He poured his Qi into Gao Yan's back and drove away bad wood element Qi inside his disciple's body.
Noticing that Wu Buyi got busy, Leo smacked his lips and stared at the troublemaking animal.
"You. What are you?"I think you should take a look at
*NEIGH*
.
.
East of Leo's Location, the Mysterious Pagoda
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei left the crowd and climbed the tower together. As they went up, they discovered that the Qi pressure on each floor got heavier.
"Ah, the Qi compatibility trial. This brings me back," Dongfang Mei giggled.
Hua Jiashan nodded, "Indeed. I miss the days when our world still has one of these towers. It's a shame that the Myriad Pagoda got destroyed because of Situ Nantian's heavenly tribulation back then."
"It can't be helped. He forcefully broke through and drew the heavenly lightning bolts toward the Sweet Dream Mushroom's lair. Without his lightning bolts, the mainland would have been overrun by those Jiangshis."
Hua Jiashan bitterly smiled. He continued to push Dongfang Mei's wheelchair to the upper floors.
After 20 minutes of climbing, they reached the 50 floor. However, instead of finding a blank floor with nothing but a staircase on the other side of the room, they found a large unicorn statue.
"A unicorn?" Dongfang Mei raised her eyebrows in amusement.
"This is going to be bad for your disciples, isn't it?"
"That depends," Dongfang Mei almost burst into laughter. She remembered an event when she was young, "Say, do you remember Elder Tang Tian when we were outer disciples of the old sword saint Sect?"
"Elder Tang? Oh right!" Hua Jiashan laughed as he recalled the weird incident when they were on the same team during a mystic realm expedition.
There was a hilarious moment when they first encountered a unicorn for the first time. At that time, the 9th stage got attached to Tang Tian and followed him around. At first, they had no idea why the beast was attracted to him.
But when Situ Nantian, Yan Xiang, and the other elders found them, everybody learned a weird fact about unicorns.
Female unicorns hated everything. Usually, they attacked everything that wasn't a part of their species. Male unicorns were a lot more docile, but they always avoided cultivators. However, there was an exception.
Unicorns loved virgin cultivators, especially the old cultivators. As virgin cultivators either gathered a lot of virgin yin or virgin yang element essence in their bodies, the unicorns, who primarily cultivated the energy, were naturally attracted to them.
Female unicorns went for male cultivators. Vice versa, male unicorns loved virgin women. Sometimes, male unicorns got attached to male cultivators, causing multiple hilarious scenarios. One of them was when Tang Tian got pushed down by a horny horse.
Remembering the scenes, both Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei could no longer hold their mouth. They cackled and cried laughing.
"Oh, dear. That was funny back then. I thought I would have died from laughter when Elder Situ revealed the nature of the unicorns."
"Me, too. Elder Tang Tian went into seclusion for a year after the incident. I can't just forget that."
The duo continued climbing the pagoda while they chatted, reminiscing the past when they were young. They mimicked the obnoxious unicorn that Tang Tian had tamed.
"SMASH!"
"Hahaha! That's right. Smash!"
.
.
One hour after the encounter, Leo stared at the obnoxious male horse, who was smiling and showing his teeth. Leo complained as he remembered a scene from a movie.
"Wu Buyi, are you available yet?"
Wu Buyi glanced at Leo while he continued to pour his Qi into Gao Yan's body. As Gao Yan got better, he looked up, "Yes, my lord?"
"Say, are unicorns attracted to virgins?"
"Ah, that. I don't know. I've never studied deeply about monster beasts or mythical creatures. Why?"
"Never mind."
Leo facepalmed. A movie scene dialogue echoed in his mind.
'Unicorns are drawn to children and those who are of pure of body… untouched by women.'
The dialogue repeated as if it was mocking him. He was mad and offended.
Because of his bad mood, Leo pushed the horse's face away. He lightly jumped and sat on the unicorn's back.
"Fine. If you like me that much, I'll ride you. Now, I'm a very busy man, and I don't like useless subordinates. If you want to follow me, you must follow my orders from now on, alright?"
*NEIGH*
The unicorn shook his head and smiled again. Although smiling was nice and wholesome, a horse's smile could be creepy.
Again, Leo gave up on the horse. He slapped the back of the unicorn's neck, "At least you neigh like a horse, unlike that damn plant. Anyway, I can tell that you're smart. Can you speak a human language?"
It wasn't hurt to ask. He tested the horse if it could speak.
The unicorn paused for a moment. His throat moved slightly as he mimicked a human's language. However, he could only speak one word.
"SMASH!"
"…"
Wu Buyi and Leo blankly stared at the horse. They had a bad premonition about this.

chapters.title: Chapter 92 Florida Man French-Kisses 100 Wild Horses And Brings Them Home
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 92 – Florida Man French-Kisses 100 Wild Horses and Brings Them Home
After coming to terms with the unicorn, Leo named the pony.
"From now on, your name will be Fake Taxi!"
"Smash!"
The horse smiled even though it didn't understand what Taxi meant. As for Wu Buyi and Gao Yan, they no longer paid attention to Leo and the unicorn.
After getting a weird pet, Leo looked at white horsey. He wondered what he should feed it.
"Say, Taxi. What do you usually eat? Carrots? Apples? Grass?"
"Smash!!"
As if Taxi understood Leo, it looked at the mutated plants and immortal grass nearby. It lowered its head and showed Leo how to eat them.
Seeing that Taxi could eat grass, Leo was relieved. He patted its head and hopped off its back.
"Alright. I'm gonna go back to work. If you want to follow me home, stay here and guard those two. I know you're strong. Can you do it?"
"Smash?"
Leo frowned as he couldn't understand Taxi's smash language. It was different from Cat, whose meowing voice had a distinctive sound frequency, and it was easier to decipher. Moreover, Cat's air was similar to Leo's when he was a weak mutant as she grew up eating his radiation since birth.
"Do I have to waste my YOL for your damn smash language skill?" He complained and shook his head.
Not bothering with Taxi, Leo resumed his work. He leaped forward, traveling one kilometer in one leap. Upon landing, he turned around and lightly jogged back. A hundred afterimages of Leo were left behind as he moved in a zigzag. Every time he turned, he caught a wandering cockatrice or a venomous snake.
10 seconds later, Leo returned to the camp. Then, he dropped 30 cockatrice corpses and 70 fat snakes in front of Taxi. Then, he leaped back into the jungle.
"…"
Taxi looked at the dead cockatrices and snakes. Its eyes gleamed as if it got inspiration from Leo's actions. It raised its head and started neighing out loud. Moreover, it screamed.
"SMAAAAASSSSH!!"
.
.
RUMBLE
"Hmm?"
Yan Xiang and his entourage arrived at the pyramid. However, none of them had the courage to get inside the structure as the mushrooms and the fog below were the bane of their existence.
The emperor recognized these mushrooms. He waved his hand, pointing everybody to stay away from the area.
"Sweet Dream Mushrooms. We can't go inside. Withdraw."
One of their bodyguards circulated his Qi into his eyes to see through the pink fog. Then, he noticed that a team of cultivators was already on the ground. However, they acted weird as their arms, fingers, and back curled while their heads uncontrollably twitched.
"Y-Your Majesty. I think Situ Clan's people are below…"
Yan Xiang shook his head, "It's too late to save them. Don't breathe in the fog if you don't want to be like them. They're no longer humans."
"W-What are they, your majesty?"
"Jiangshi."
"…"
Hearing the keyword, the bodyguards closed their mouths as they understood everything. They quietly followed their emperor north, heading back to the portal.
This season's expedition was too dangerous. As the risk was too high, it was better to remain near the exit and cultivate the local element Qi.
The group looked around, imprinting the scenery to their mind so that they would have a story to tell their peers that couldn't join them. The emperor also scanned the surroundings, hoping to find hidden treasures that others overlooked.
While everybody took their time, far south of the pyramid, a thousand birds suddenly flew up and caused a commotion. Then, a strange sound wave echoed, and Yan Xiang's company could clearly hear them.
SMAAAAAAASSSSSSSSSSHHHHHHHHH!!
SMAAASSSSHHHH
SMAASHH
SMASH
SM…
"…"
The warcry of a certain horse made 15 of the bodyguards flinch. Their Qi stopped responding to their commands, and they could no longer maintain the altitude. Slowly, they glided toward the ground.
"Dammit! That's a male unicorn's summoning cry. There are Thunder Unicorns in this realm! Take the regeneration pill and cover your ears! Their voices are harmful to cultivators!"
Hearing that the unicorn's voice was harmful to cultivators, the bodyguards gulped. Still, four of them seemed fine, and they could still circulate their Qi normally.
"Wait, how are they fine?" An injured bodyguard looked at their colleague in the sky.
Yan Xiang wryly smiled and explained, "They're virgins. Virgin men and women are naturally immune to unicorns' thunder warcry. Rather, I think those guys will benefit from the voice."
"W-What?"
Everybody raised their eyebrows and looked at their virgin friends. The four elderly men in the sky gave them a weird look while they purposely descended to match their colleagues' flight altitude. Upon getting close, the injured cultivators noticed that the four men were cladded in electric statics.
"Isn't that lightning element Qi?"
Yan Xiang looked back while he digested the regeneration pill in his stomach. He looked at the four bodyguards and nodded in approval.
"Yes. Those are lightning element Qi. If they manage to master it, they won't be afraid of the future heavenly tribulation lightning."
"…Wow."
The bodyguards looked at their friends in envy. At the same time, they mocked the lucky elders.
"Yeah, it's good to be virgins, huh? Too bad, you get no bitches."
The four celibates sneered at their colleagues, "We have virgin yang, but you don't. We have the potential to become immortals, but not you. If you lose your virgin yang, your cultivation path is stuck in the mortal realm. Well, sucks to be you."
"You really…"
The group laughed while the emperor shook his head. The group slowly recovered, and they managed to get back their abilities.
RUMBLE
After the warcry, dust and brown mist appeared everywhere as something big was moving toward the source of the noise. Their destination was the south of the pyramid.
"Your majesty, should we check that?" One of the bodyguards pointed at the dust that a hundred unicorns kicked up.
"No. Leave them be. All unicorns are born as 7th-stage monsters. Adult ones are 9th stage. We're not equipped to hunt thunder unicorns."
Everybody sighed in pity. They looked away from the unicorns and headed back to the portal.
.
.
BOOM
"SMASH!"
BOOM-BOOMI think you should take a look at
"SMASH!!"
A hundred three-meter-tall white ponies bit off cockatrices' heads and stomped on small creatures as they ran. Lightning bolts were shot out from their horns, shooting down flying creatures and insects in the area. The stampede knocked down trees and plants along the way and their paths were paved with blood and corpses of other animals.
By the time Leo returned with 50 chickens, three unicorns of the same size as Fake Taxi were already in front of their friend. They neighed as if they were chatting.
"Hmm?"
Leo raised his eyebrows when he discovered that Taxi multiplied into four. He was amused.
"I just got a random zap from nowhere, and you multiplied like an amoeba? Wut da hail is goin' on here?"
The four horses looked at Leo in unison. The newcomer noticed Leo's aura and jumped in joy. Like the predecessor, they rushed toward him and sniffed his armpits and his mouth. Then, they licked his face and his ears.
Being violated by three unicorns, Leo was annoyed.
"Oi, Taxi. Care to explain?"
Taxi widely grinned.
"Smash <3"
"Don't you heart-emoticon me? What's with your friends over here?"
"Smash!"
"…"
Unable to understand the unicorn, Leo facepalmed. He then looked at the ponies, who seemed to be immune to his radiation.
"Fine. Bring over your friends, but I ain't gonna feed everybody. Find your own meal, but you can't eat my underlings."
"… Smash."
The four horses glanced at Wu Buyi and Gao Yan. One of them approached the latter. As soon as it was one meter apart, the curious unicorn sniffed Gao Yan's face.
Gao Yan slowly opened his eyes as he felt a bit better after getting Wu Buyi's help. However, his first sight was the big face and the scary teeth of a massive white horse.
"#$%@!"
Like a human being, Gao Yan shrieked as he got jump-scared. He stood up and took several steps away.
Unfortunately, the pony chased after Gao Yan. Then, it snorted at his face and licked his mouth.
"…"
Leo watched it happen. He laughed at Gao Yan.
"Congratulations. You've been kissed by a pervert pony. If that is your first kiss, then my condolence. Welcome to the maidenless club, tarnished warrior."
RUMBLE
It was too soon for them to rejoice. A few seconds later, more unicorns showed up and surrounded the group.
Leo, Wu Buyi, and Gao Yan silently looked at the crowd of massive unicorns. Their expressions were blank.
"Smash <3"
"Smash <3"
"SMASH!!"
The obnoxious unicorns began chatting, using their native tongue. Nobody could tell what they were scheming or partying about.
RUMBLE
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm Soon, the portal was surrounded by a hundred giant unicorns. They all stared at Leo with sparkling eyes.
"Oh, my lord. There's more," Leo started praying to Jesus. He now understood how a certain tiktoker felt when he was ambushed by a kitten army in the wild.
Taxi walked toward Leo. Then, it whispered.
"Smash?"
Again, Leo had no idea what Taxi wanted. He patted its head and deeply sighed.
"I haven't built a barn or a stable for you yet, but I'll do so later. For now, protect my two employees, okay? After everything is over, you can do whatever you want. If you want to follow me to my world, fine. If you want to stay, that's good too. If you want to be my tour guide, I'd be happy to take the offer. So, what do you want to do?"
"SMASH XD"
"Don't' XD me, you damn donkey!"
Leo gave up on the horses.
While Leo was at a loss, Taxi looked at its friends and the large portal. Then, it took the lead.
"SMASH!!"
The other 99 unicorns neighed in unison. Then, they charged into the portal. Only Taxi remained behind.
"What the hell?"
Wu Buyi, Gao Yan, and Leo had no idea what they had just done. These mythical creatures just crossed the portals to their home world for no reason.
Taxi smiled at Leo. Then, it crouched, inviting Leo to saddle it.
"Smash <3"
"…"
Wu Buyi and Gao Yan looked at Leo in admiration. Judging from Taxi's reaction, Leo had just tamed 100 9th-grade thunder unicorns and brought them to his store.
Teasing Leo, Wu Buyi laughed, "Just smash it, my lord."
"Smash your ass, damn baldy!"
"Hehehehe!"
Leo had a headache. He just wanted to stockpile new food and new alchemy ingredients. However, he accidentally tamed 100 unicorns without even trying, and they invaded his store domain.
He wondered if he should return to manage things or if he should focus on the quests first.
Worrying about his store, Leo walked toward the portal, planning to check the newcomers. However, the system warned him.
<Warning, returning home will abandon the missions. You will not get rewards, and the missions will be canceled.>
It was not easy after all. If Leo wanted the mysterious rewards from the system, he had to stay and completed the two missions. Without a choice, Leo deeply sighed and got on the horse's back.
"Fine. Now, Taxi. Bring me to Rabbit Trent King. I need to get this over with."
Taxi neighed and stood up. It turned east. Then, it charged toward the tall pagoda at a distance.
.
Seeing that Leo had left them to explore the mystic realm, Wu Buyi and Gao Yan gazed at them in envy. They wished that they were strong enough to withstand the local wood element essence's pressure.
"One day, I'll be like him – Live free and unfettered!"
Wu Buyi rolled his eyes, "Before that, reach the nascent soul stage first, and you can daydream about that. Golden Core cultivators can't do anything here. You need to reach my stage to contribute something to the sect or contest against other cultivators. If better, be an immortal like Lord Florida Man!"
"I'll try my best, master!"
Gao Yan was motivated. He closed his eyes and resumed cultivating.

chapters.title: Chapter 93 Florida Man Defeats Horse In Sprinting. Horse Racing Associations Invalid The Race As Florida Man Used Firearms
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 93 – Florida Man Defeats Horse in Sprinting. Horse Racing Associations Invalid the Race as Florida Man Used Firearms
After the pony stampede, cockatrices and other harmful beasts fled from the area. Gao Yan and Wu Buyi no longer sensed any hostile entity around them.
Leo was also relieved. He rode Taxi east, heading to the tall pagoda on the horizon.
Because Taxi was a big horse, Leo found it difficult to saddle him properly. Thus, he stood on Taxi's back, using him as a living skateboard. It was bumpy and hard to balance at first, but Leo quickly adapted to the rhythm.
Taxi was wild. He always charged directly toward trees and rammed them down. Tall plants fell upon impact while some broke in half. Because of the debris and broken trees, Leo deflected random pieces of wood that came his way.
Although Taxi was fast, Leo was disappointed in the pony's speed. Compared to his sprint and leap, the horse was a lot slower than him. Had Leo seriously traveled toward the pagoda, he could have arrived in a few seconds. However, Taxi charged through the woods for a minute, but they were just halfway there.
"You're slow," Leo complained.
"Smash?!"
Taxi widened his eyes as he was offended. Then, he snorted and began allocating lightning Qi into the hooves.
BOOM
A second later, Taxi ascended and ran in midair. His speed tripled and left behind sonic boom shockwaves.
Leo sighed and lowered his stance as the wind almost blew him backward. Although Taxi tried, The pony was still below his standard.
"If you want to show off, make sure you surpass this speed. Remember this well."
Leo decided to show him what the real speed looked like. He jumped off the horseback and landed in the jungle below.
Feeling lightened, Taxi turned around and looked at Leo, wondering what his virgin yang Qi factory was doing.
BOOM
In one kick, Leo shuttled at 20 degrees angle, flying like a cannonball being shot from Death Star. His entire being transformed into a streak of light, surpassing the speed of light.
"SMASH!?"
Because of the sudden acceleration, Taxi was caught off guard. He was knocked back by the blasting shockwaves from Leo's kicking power. Moreover, the place where Leo had landed earlier exploded, and a large crater was left behind.
While standing in midair, the unicorn stared at the crater in shock. Then, he looked at Leo in a new light.
Among unicorns, there was a tradition. Among male unicorns, their social status was determined by their muscle and their speed. Whoever ran the fastest got to reproduce while the slower ones would never find mates.
Taxi was considered one of the strongest and fastest unicorns among the herd. Female unicorns usually offered themselves to him, and everybody called him the herd's alpha. But after witnessing Leo's serious speed, Taxi got humbled.
"SMASH!"
Unicorns were simple creatures. Aside from their weird fetishes and obsession with virgins, they were quick to bow down their heads to the strong. Taxi acknowledged Leo as the new alpha of the herd, and he chased after him.
.
.
RUMBLE
A few seconds later, Leo traveled 500 kilometers and flew over the town of a hundred tall pagodas. Because Leo couldn't fly, he couldn't change the flight course. His head smashed against one of the buildings and broke it in half.
Because of the collision, Leo managed to slow down and landed in the middle of the town. Upon landing on a stone road, he caused a small crater.
RUMBLE
Leo didn't get a chance to admire the city. The broken pagoda earlier fell upon him as if it wanted revenge.
BOOM
Brown and black metals, planks, lumber, and random objects filled the stone road, burying Leo alive. The deafening impact caused the ground to shake, and many buildings trembled.
Two minutes later, Taxi arrived at the crash site. It followed Leo's scent and landed on the pile of debris.
"Smash?'
Using his front hooves, Taxi stomped the mountain of debris. Then, a thundercloud was formed at the bottom of the debris and launched a reverse lightning bolt, shooting into the sky.
BOOM
Everything in the 100-meter-diameter was sent to the sky because of Taxi's stomp. Even a portion of the stone road and its foundation erupted. Taxi then looked up, searching for Leo. He quickly found the old man among the broken bricks and burning pieces of wood.
"That wasn't necessary. I was chilling and playing with some weird metal plate."
Floating in the sky because of Taxi's reverse lightning bolt was Leo. He was holding a round green gong with a rain dragon carving, which had fallen from the broken pagoda tower. Surrendering to gravity, Leo descended and landed on two feet while his back was straightened. Again, he created another small crater upon landing.
Leo put the gong on top of his head. A few seconds later, debris that Taxi blasted upward earlier rained upon them.
GONG
GONG
Hard objects hit the gong, echoing a vibrating sound wave. However, it was not a normal sound wave.
Leo raised his eyebrows while Taxi flinched. The sound waves disturbed their bodily balance. Taxi's internal Qi temporarily stopped responding to his will. As for Leo, he was slightly annoyed as the sound tickled his eardrums. He picked his ears and scooped out a small piece of earwax. As usual, he inspected it up close, sniffed it, and put it in his mouth.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 1 year.>
When civilization is lost, be a monke – Leo.
When everything was over, Leo lowered his gong and patted off the dust. He then turned around and looked at Taxi, who was still shaken by the gong's sound.
Noticing Taxi's condition, Leo snickered, "I guess I score a rare item or something. If you are in that state, this thing might be too dangerous for humans."I think you should take a look at
Taxi repeatedly nodded as it hated the sound. He even got dizzy after hearing the noise.
Leo stopped chatting with Taxi and checked the other pagodas. There were small and big ones, but most of them were at least 20 stories high. As being surrounded by tall buildings blocked their vision range, Leo jumped and landed on the rooftop of a building to expand his view.
When Leo got on top of a 50-story pagoda, the building zapped him with a purple lightning bolt. He grinned and welcomed the attack with open arms.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 256 years…>
"Thanks for the bonus."
After zapping Leo once, the tower stopped attacking him. Leo pursed his lips in disappointment. Then, he turned his attention to the pagoda town.
Aside from the building that he stood on, there were other taller towers. The tallest structure shot up to the sky and penetrated the clouds. Moreover, it was wider and larger than the rest as its foundation was larger than a NASCAR stadium.
"Smash!"
Taxi also came up and looked at the tallest building. He pointed to the tower, hinting to Leo that the Rabbit Trent was in the tower.
Noticing the gesture, Leo made his decision.
"Okay. Let's climb the tower."
"SMASH!"
Both man and unicorn leaped from the building, flying toward the tower.
.
.
Meanwhile, Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei were still inside the tallest pagoda. They reached the 100th floor, but they hadn't reached the top yet. Moreover, they panted as they found it hard to move forward.
Hua Jiashan gave in to the suppressive force of the tower first. He sat at the foot of a unicorn statue on the 100th floor, catching his breaths and recuperating. As for Dongfang Mei, she sighed and rested in her wheelchair.
"I guess this is our limit," Dongfang Mei lamented.
"Probably. This floor depletes our physical strength and suppresses fire, water, wind, earth, metal, and wood element Qi. Unless we master the lightning element Qi, we can't proceed."
Hua Jiashan gazed at the floor tiles, which emitted electric currents. It kept zapping them, but they weren't in danger as the voltage was mild.
As they couldn't go further, they decided to cultivate the lightning element Qi in the tower. Both Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei closed their eyes and meditated.
Meditation sometimes made one forget about time. They lost count of how long they meditated in the tower.
BOOM
Fortunately, one loud noise woke them up from their trance. They stood up and looked at each other.
"What's the noise?"
"Let's take a look."
Hua Jiashan pushed the wheelchair to the west window of the tower. Then, they noticed that one of the pagodas below crumbled. They gazed at the collapsed building in confusion.
"Are test towers supposed to be fragile?" Asked Hua Jiashan.
"A 20-floor tower is as strong as a soul formation cultivator's physique. You can't simply destroy it without being retaliated by the killing arrays or protective arrays of the tower."
"Yeah, that's what I thought. But…"
They continued to observe the collapsed tower. Two minutes later, another loud boom surprised them. After the thunderous noise, a reverse lightning bolt shot up to the sky, carrying debris and burning wood high.
Among the debris, there was a person.
"Hmm?!"
Hua Jiashan had good eyesight. He noticed a man that he knew.
"Daoist Florida Man?!"
Dongfang Mei was surprised, "Someone you know?"
"Yes," Hua Jiashan broke a sweat. He didn't expect to see the rumored immortal here, "He's a quasi-immortal that I talked about. He has been helping my sect and took in some of my disciples under his wings."
"Oh?" Dongfang Mei was interested. She wondered what kind of senior Leo was.
While listening to Hua Jiashan, Leo already descended and safely landed. A moment later, a vibrating sound wave hit both of them.
Upon hearing the sound wave, Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei instantly lost consciousness. As for the elders and disciples on the first floor, they also fainted.
Nobody got to witness that Leo would soon climb the tower.
.
.
A minute later, Leo arrived at the foot of the tallest pagoda. He looked up, wondering if he should take a shortcut and jump to the top.
"Smash-Smash?"
Taxi pointed at the entrance. The steel bars slowly parted, opening a way for them to enter the tower.
Leo shrugged. He didn't think much.
"Mortal Kombat style tower climbing? Well, why not?"

chapters.title: Chapter 94 Florida Man Proved Innocence After Karen Neighbor Accused Him Of Having Intercourse With Horse, Her Husband Did
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 94 – Florida Man Proved Innocence after Karen Neighbor Accused Him of Having Intercourse with Horse, Her Husband Did
"Hmm."
"Smash?"
Leo and Taxi gazed at the unconscious people on the first floor. He noticed several familiar faces in the crowd. Xu Nuan, Yao Qiqi, and a few young maidens were defenseless. Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, and disciples of the Life Sword Sect collapsed on the floor and their mouths foamed.
"Haiya."
Leo put on rubber gloves and adjusted their sleeping posture. He let them sleep on their sides so that they could breathe easier. In addition, he sacrificed a few years of lifespan to purchase soft pillows for them.
After helping the sick people, Leo proceeded forward. He walked toward the staircase, which was located at the north of the hall.
As Leo took a few steps closer to the stairs, his skin got somewhat itchy. He felt like some sort of mold tried to grow on his skin. Because of the itchiness, Leo brought back his hazmat suit and a gas mask. After putting them on, Leo got more confident.
Taxi tilted his head as he couldn't understand why Leo put on clothes. He believed that it would be better for Leo to be naked so that it would be easier for Taxi to leech on Leo's virgin yang Qi.
"Smash?"
Leo patted his suit to check if there was no leak. When Leo was ready, he walked up the stairs and got to the second floor. Taxi also followed him even though the small staircase was not made for a horse.
The second floor, third floor, and the following floors contained nothing. However, the stairs of every floor were located on the opposite side of the hall. Thus, Leo and Taxi had to walk across the halls every time he headed to the next level.
After walking through five floors, Leo got annoyed. He lightly jogged and picked up the pace. Taxi saw it as a challenge. He neighed and charged ahead, accelerating through the halls and stairs.
Ignoring the insignificant pressure from the pagoda, both man and horse proceeded through the first 49 floors in minutes. However, when they reached the 50th floor, Taxi and Leo stopped racing.
They stood in front of a large unicorn statue. The figure raised its front two legs high as if it was about to leap across a ravine or an obstacle. The hind legs and its body were more muscular and larger than Taxi. However, the majestic icon of every unicorn was half broken as the statue's horn was missing.
Leo admired the art and walked around its foundation. While he was at it, he stroked the smooth surface of the silver-like metal that was used as a square foundation for the figure.
On the other hand, Taxi gazed at the statue in a daze. It brightly smiled and neighed.
"SMASH! SMASH! SMASH!!!"
Leo frowned and looked at the weird unicorn, "Wut da hail? Are you insane? This is a statue, not a sex doll. You cannot smash a rock statue's ass, or your PP will be scratched, Haiya."
"SMAAAAASSSHH!!"
"…"
For some reason, Taxi got overexcited. Leo frowned and looked at the statue's face, wondering what the weird horse liked about it.
Then, Leo understood why – The horse statue's eyes moved, and it stared at him.
CRACK
The stone horse statue changed its posture. Instead of raising its two front hooves, it stood firm and faced directly at Leo.
"Surprise boss fight?" Leo smirked. He expected some action as he was bored running.
BOOM
Betraying Leo's expectation, the statue imploded, condensing into a white marble ball the size of a thumb. Then, it floated in front of Leo.
"Hah?!" Leo's disappointment was immeasurable, and his day was ruined. He turned to Taxi, asking him about the marble, "Hey. Do you know what this is?"
Taxi widely grinned, "Smash!"
"…"
"Smash!!"
Leo rubbed his temples. He wondered if Taxi literally meant it, so he brought it closer to his eyes to take a closer look. Leo pulled off his mask and helmet so that they wouldn't get in the way.
PLOP
As soon as the marble got close to Leo, it dissipated into gas. Then, the gas directly entered Leo's nostrils and mouth, becoming one with his body.
Leo snorted and licked the ceiling of his mouth. The gas tasted like low-quality cocaine he used to have when he was young. It brought him bad memories and reminded him of the darkest era of his life.
"Haiya. I'm glad I died and quit those. I was so stupid back then. I even snorted MSG when I was drunk. What was I thinking?"
While Leo's ADHD kicked in and made him absentminded, the system gave him a notification message.
<You acquired the linguistic knowledge of the Thunderous Smasher Tribe.>
"…"
Leo dully stared at the name. Then, he glanced at Taxi. The latter brightly smiled and showed Leo his teeth.
"Smash? XD"
Leo pursed his lips and deeply sighed. At long last, he finally understood its language.
"No, Taxi. I ain't gonna rub it on your back or your crack. Get your mind out of the gutter, damn horse!"
"… Smash. D:"
"And no. You can't rub it on me either. That's gay and wrong AF."
Leo rolled his eyes as he gave up on Taxi's perversion. He proceeded to the next floor. However, as he got minor emotional damage from the language, Leo was no longer enthusiastic about speed-running the pagoda anymore.
.I think you should take a look at
.
The tower climbing process was slow after Leo stopped running. He took his time, walking across one hall after another. A few hours later, Leo and Taxi reached the 100th floor.
Once again, Leo and Taxi found another unicorn statue. They also spotted two cultivators there, resting and meditating under the statue.
As Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei noticed Leo's presence, they opened their eyes and gazed at the newcomer. But upon seeing a 9th-stage unicorn next to Leo, they were surprised.
"Isn't that… Thunder Unicorn?! How is it here?!" Dongfang Mei stood up from her wheelchair, but she got lightheaded. The elder fell back on her chair and rubbed her forehead.
Hua Jiashan stood in front of Dongfang Mei. He confronted Leo.
"Sir Florida Man, I don't know that you'd be here, too. But why are you with that Thunder Unicorn? Do you know that Thunder Unicorns are dangerous species? They always leech one's virgin yin or yang until they die! They will never leave until either you lose your virginity or deplete your Qi first."
Hearing that Taxi would go away if he lose his virginity, Leo's expression turned dark. He coughed and feigned ignorant.
