Leo widened his eyes and paused to think. He didn't understand what he had just done. Thus, he rechecked the mystic realm missions again.
.
Primary Objectives:
1 – Kill Rabbit Trent King. (CLEARED)
2 – Absorb Gnosis of Rabbit Trent King.
Secondary Objective:
1 – Locate Entity Fate Crystal in Sweet Dream Mushroom Forest (CLEARED)
2 – Absorb Entity Fate Crystal. (CLEARED)

chapters.title: Chapter 102 Florida Man Traveling To China To Join Shaolin Temple Discovers Rare Pokemon
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 102 – Florida Man Traveling to China to Join Shaolin Temple Discovers Rare Pokemon
"Since when have I cleared the secondary objective?"
Leo thought of the orb that he ate earlier. He wondered if it was really the entity fate crystal that the system mentioned. If so, he was curious about what it could do.
So far, Leo didn't feel the changes. He was still him, and the cancer cells remained the same, except they seemed cleaner.
"System, what is entity fate crystal? What can it do?" Leo asked the system as he was curious.
Unfortunately, the system reverted back to silent mode. He got no answer or response.
Leo clicked his tongue. He grumbled and kicked the wall, which was fully carved with ancient texts and images. The wall broke, and a portion of the pyramid blocks fell from the structure outside the building.
Because of the new window, the wind blew into the room and removed the stagnate air inside. Leo welcomed the fresh oxygen, and his mood got better.
As Leo's mood improved, his brain functioned better. He remembered that he hadn't found the gnosis thingy or recovered the 10th-rank monster core yet.
Putting his thought to work, Leo created four strings of Qi and injected them into the four remaining spatial rings of Situ Nantian.
CLICK
CLICK
Every array in the rings was removed as Leo's Qi drained all their energy. He could finally access all the rings. Without hesitation, Leo searched for the item that Situ Nantian had stolen.
It was inside a plain iron ring with weird carved texts on it. Moreover, the space inside was as tiny as four cubic meters. Fortunately, it stored the entire dragon fruit plant there.
The plant was also alive. When Leo sent his Qi in, it tried to pull his Qi string and devour it.
Leo was amused. He ejected the entire dragon fruit plant.
WHOOSH
The plant manifested from the ring and fell to the floor. Its branches and roots wiggled, trying to get back up.
Leo seized its roots and stomped its stem. Using his fingernail, he sliced the plant vertically, looking for the 10th-rank monster core that it ate.
It wasn't difficult to find it as the tentacle eyeball earlier was still hiding in the plant's stem. When Leo cut the plant open, it was right before his eyes.
Leo sneered at the eyeball. He grabbed it and picked it up.
*WIGGLE*
The eyeball tried to flee, but it couldn't get out of Leo's hand. Moreover, it sensed a dreadful aura and cancerous cells, which tried to enter its eye.
The eyeball monster wept. Without saying anything, it pleaded, begging for its life.
"…"
Leo deeply frowned. Although he could be ruthless against thieves and aggressive animals, he was weak when he dealt with cute animals or monsters.
He deeply sighed. Since the eyeball cried and begged for its life, it deserved a second chance.
"You know what? You can have that. But I have a condition."
The eyeball tentacle monster widened its eye. Then, it nodded, eager to fulfill the condition.
"I need to absorb the gnosis of rabbit trent king, but I don't know what it is or what it looks like. If you can bring me that stupid gnosis, I'll let you have that monster core, and I'll set you free."
The eyeball paused for a long while. It then turned around and looked at the plant, hesitated. The monster closed its eye and shed a tear. After making its decision, it turned around to face Leo.
The monster pointed its tentacle at the dragon fruit plant.
Leo raised his eyebrows in confusion for a moment before his brain registered the hint. He was astonished.
"So, the plant is the gnosis?"
The eyeball nodded. Still, it looked sad as the plant had been its home for centuries. It didn't want to part from it. Moreover, it was born from one of the dragon fruits. Therefore, the plant was akin to its mother.
Looking at the eyeball, Leo felt bad. He wondered if he could absorb the gnosis without eating the plant.
"Gnosis is the plant? But gnosis means the teaching of a god or knowledge… knowledge?"
Leo's eyes gleamed. If gnosis was knowledge, the gnosis of rabbit trent king could be the king's knowledge. However, as it was related to the dragon fruit plant, it might refer to something else.
"Is gnosis… a dao? A dao that connects to this plant?"
The monster suddenly widened its eye. It repeatedly nodded and jumped around.
Leo continued contemplating, "So, if the gnosis is a dao and I have to absorb the gnosis, all I have to do is to learn that freaking dao, then the quest is completed?"
He gave the eyeball a meaningful look. He slowly nodded.
"Alright. Let's give this crap a try. Let's try not to harm that plant for now. I need to learn what it can do and what I can learn from it."
SCREECH!
The eyeball was overjoyed. It lapped around Leo and hopped on his shoulder, unafraid of his intruding cancer cells.
As soon as the eyeball monster touched Leo's skin, the radiation and cancer cells latched onto its body. However, all cells and radiation disappeared into its fluid, becoming its food.
Nobody noticed – the eyeball monster's tentacle got slightly longer when it digested Leo's dead cancer cells and radiation.I think you should take a look at
Meanwhile, Leo deeply sighed and facepalmed, "Why am I getting soft whenever I see crying monsters or animals. Oh, wait. Those chickens cried too, but I still killed them. Oh, right. They're food. That doesn't count."
Sometimes, Leo laughed at his illogical self for having a double standard. This was one of those times.
Again, whenever Leo was in a good mood, his brain's efficiency rose. He raised the plant up and brought out spirit stones that he found from Situ Nantian's rings. He got an idea of how to connect to the plant.
The white plant's wound was already healed. Moreover, it didn't mutate after Leo had touched it.
Impressed by the plant, Leo put the spirit stones in his hands. A few seconds later, they transformed into essence stones. He put them next to the dragon fruit plant's roots.
The roots crept toward the essence stones as Leo had predicted. The roots coiled around the stones and digested their energy and essence.
PLOP
PLOP
As the plant digested the element energy from the stones, it produced new fruits. It only took the fruits one minute to fall from the plant as they already ripened.
Leo picked up the dragon fruit and looked at it. When he touched it, the white fruit darkened, unlike the plant.
"Hmm. This is difficult. What can I learn from this tree and its fruits? What is the dao or gnosis that I need to learn?"
The eyeball monster looked back and forth between the plant and Leo for a moment. It suddenly got an idea and jumped down from Leo's shoulder. Then, it ran toward the plant and merged into it.
A few seconds later, the eyeball appeared on the plant's stem. Its tentacle also emerged from the plant's skin, transforming into small vines. They pointed at one of the white fruits and gestured for Leo to plant the dragon fruit tree and the fruits.
Leo deeply frowned. He understood its gesture, but he wondered why he needed to plant them. Still, for the sake of uncovering this mystery, Leo accepted the monster's suggestion.
After putting a new pair of rubber gloves on, Leo stored the newly created fruits in the plain iron ring's storage space. He then carried the plant and jumped out of the pyramid.
When Leo looked down, he saw nothing but mutated soil and dead mushrooms. His expression was dark.
"I guess I shouldn't plant you here. This place is too dirty for you, right?"
The eyeball nodded. It then pointed at the west.
"You want me to bring you there?"
The monster moved its eye up and down, answering the question.
"I take that as a yes. Alright."
Leo looked up and noticed that Taxi was still waiting for him. He took aim, wiggling his butt as if he was a cat, preparing to attack somebody's foot.
WHOOSH
Leo vertically jumped while carrying the dragon fruit plant. Accurately, he reached the pervert unicorn and landed on his back.
"Alright, Taxi. Next station, the west! Let's go!"
Taxi looked back at Leo and noticed that he carried the plant with his favorite fruits. The horse widely smiled and showed the eyeball monster his ugly teeth.
The eyeball shivered in fear. It closed its eyes and wept again.
Seeing the trembling plant, Leo lightly patted Taxi's head. However, his "Light" pat was a hard slap from Taxi's perspective.
After getting a hard slap to the back of his head, Taxi protested.
"SMASH?! D:"
Leo rolled his eyes, "You're an elder. Don't bully a kid."
"Smash?! Smash!"
"Huh? You're only a thousand years old but this eyeball guy is over 3,000? That's the more reason you shouldn't be disrespectful to an elder! You damn donkey!"
"Smash… T-T"
No matter how old the eyeball monster was, Taxi got scolded anyway. The unicorn whined while it jetted toward the west at his full speed.
10 minutes later, they flew past the campsite of Wu Buyi and Gao Yan. Not long after, they reached the tall mountain area of the west zone, where only absurdly slim and tall mountains existed.
Taxi panted and landed on one of the mountain tops. Strangely, on top of every mountain, a small tea pavilion and a small courtyard occupied the flat peak. It seemed that cultivators deliberately built these buildings here for some reason.
Leo got down from the horseback and looked around. Upon seeing that many plants already existed in the mountaintop courtyard, Leo decided that he would grow the dragon fruit plant here.
"How about here, eyeball? Is this place good?"
The eyeball repeatedly looked up and down. It also came out of the plant and ran around the courtyard.
Next to the courtyard, there was a small pond, full of transparent liquid. The eyeball monster immediately jumped into it.
DONG
Unfortunately, the water surface was frozen. The eyeball tentacle failed to soak itself in the water.
Leo hadn't noticed the quality of the strange pond yet. He quietly dug into the rocky soil on the mountain and put the plant's roots in there. After he covered the roots, he stood up and looked around.
"I guess I should use this place to study. Should I say… cultivating instead of studying?"

chapters.title: Chapter 103 Florida Man Proclaims Himself As Messiah And Found New Religion To Become True Atheist
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 103 – Florida Man Proclaims Himself as Messiah and Found New Religion to Become True Atheist
While Leo enjoyed himself, many cultivators retreated to their world as they deemed that this place was too dangerous for them.
Yan Xiang swallowed his shame and returned home first. As for his subordinates, he left the decision to them if they wanted to risk their lives and stayed there. Some of them stayed behind to collect plants and rare herbs, but the majority of them followed the emperor.
Meanwhile, Situ Nantian was in bad shape. He had a hole inside him, and he needed to recuperate. Upon returning home, Situ Nantian used the clan's treasures and rare pills to save his life. Then, he cooped in his manor, recuperating.
Situ Nantian was angry. He was on the verge of bringing the legendary gnosis home. Had he gotten his hand on it, he could have consumed it. Then, he would have had a chance to ascend and become an immortal.
The dream was no longer possible. He lost his hand, and his internal organs were in a mess. It would take a few months to heal and a few years to recover his lost organs
Still, Situ Nantian wouldn't let Leo scotch free after what he had done - The old man secretly contacted his ancestor, who had already ascended.
.
.
= Death Sword Sect =
The yellow energy portal of the Death Sword Sect was kept in the underground dungeon. The room that housed the portal was concealed by three layers of protective arrays, preventing outsiders from entering this place accidentally.
The dungeon was made of mud bricks, painted with ox blood. The damp environment and stale air made the returnees uncomfortable, but they endured it.
WHOOSH
WHOOSH
At the mystic realm portal of the Death Sword Sect, a few disciples returned with rare materials in their hands. Some of the elders also returned, but their faces were pale.
This group of elders and disciples went to a different mystic realm. They didn't find the pyramid, pagoda town, or the Amazon jungle. Instead, they went to a desert.
One of the elders staggered a few steps and collapsed on the ground. However, his smile never disappeared from his face. In his spatial rings, he scored a bunch of golden sand bananas. In that package, there were about 40 bananas, which could be used for alchemy ingredients or grain pills.
The golden sand bananas contained the thick earth element Qi. He was excited that he could ask an alchemist to turn them into cultivation pills. Then, once he consumed them, he would gain earth element!
Ouyang Feng, who failed to join this expedition, looked at the returnees in envy. He hadn't recovered from the previous incident yet, and he couldn't even walk. At the moment, he still relied on a wheelchair to go around.
Behind Ouyang Feng, a deacon of the death sword sect looked at the poor disciple and sighed. He felt bad for the guy.
News spread that Cheng Yuanzhi committed suicide out of shame after he saw Ouyang Feng's condition. However, everybody knew that Ouyang Zi killed him, but they didn't utter a word. They held their grudge and retaliated against the Ouyang Clan by ignoring Ouyang Feng.
The deacon and many disciples glanced at Ouyang Feng with cold eyes, but no one talked to him.
Ouyang Feng also realized his position. He grudgingly asked the deacon to bring him away from this place.
The deacon guided the wheelchair of Ouyang Feng to the surface. He had shown the disciple enough.
However, as Ouyang Feng and the deacon were about to leave, one of the returnees called for them. The person was none other than the sect master of the Death Sword Sect, Hua Guanhai. Coincidentally, Hua Guanhai was a distant cousin of Hua Jiashan.
"Stay, Ouyang Feng. I have something to ask you."
Hua Guanhai was a burly 7-foot-tall man with a square face. He wore a black bandana, covering his black long hair. His full black beard was messy and curly that he looked like a barbarian. The two sword scars on his face were left behind by Hua Jiashan, but his cultivation base was at the quasi-immortal stage.
Although Hua Guanhai was tired from the quick expedition, he came to see the troublesome disciple.
Ouyang Feng bit his lower lips and prepared himself for the punishment that his clan had done. He brought his wheelchair around and lowered his head.
"This junior greets sect master Hua. What can I do for you, senior?"
Hua Guanhai coldly stared at Ouyang Feng. He glanced at the latter's legs and stomach, checking his vitality with his eyes.
The brown pupils of Hua Guanhai turned white. They shone as they saw through Ouyang Feng's constitution and hidden injuries. Instantly, he noticed why Ouyang Feng couldn't walk on his own.
"You've been afflicted by a strong element essence attack, I see. I sense strong poison essence in your head that disrupts your ability to balance yourself."
Ouyang Feng was surprised. Nobody, even his grandfather, managed to identify the cause of his injury. He looked at the sect master and asked him.
"Do you know something about it, sect master, sir?"
Hua Guanhai smirked, "I know this kind of attack very well. Those bastards from the Tang Clan are masters of poison. I heard they are researching wind elements so that they can improve their combat abilities. Well, it's not like you need to know"
"T-Then, can you cure me?"
"Not possible. I'm not a poison expert."
"…Oh."
Again, Hua Guanhai grinned as he found it fun to tease the nasty descendant of the obnoxious Ouyang Clan. He snorted and turned around.
"You can leave. I'm busy."
"…"
Ouyang Feng was dejected. The deacon behind him sneered at the youth and guided the wheelchair around. He then brought Ouyang Feng back to the surface.
After Ouyang Feng had left, Hua Guanhai looked at the returnees and the portal. He gave them a new command.
"The desert mystic realm is too dangerous for us to stay there for too long. We will close the portal today and end this season's expedition. I will not allow anyone to go back in there anymore!"
The elders and disciples that didn't get their chance to go were disappointed. As they couldn't go, they only welcomed the lucky disciples and elders. Then, they left in peace.
After everybody was gone, Hua Guanhai snickered. He played with the portal's array, which turned the energy portal's color from yellow to pink.I think you should take a look at
WHOOM
The destination of the portal changed from the desert to a dense pink mushroom forest. Hua Guanhai looked into the portal and noticed that they were rich in wood Qi and earth Qi. However, the presence of the sweet dream mushrooms deterred him.
"Damn mushrooms. This takes me back. But meh, I wish I can find one of those blood realms. We need that legendary blood element from the demon clan."
Hua Guanhai sighed and changed the color of the portal again. This time, it turned red.
He didn't notice the changes in the forest mystic and the tiniest spore of a certain mushroom. A spore managed to slip through the portal and latched onto Hua Guanhai's boot.
.
.
= West Mountain, Forest Mystic Realm =
Leo entered the tea pavilion building after he had left the dragon fruit plant alone to grow. He inspected the interior, checking if there was something he could bring home.
Sure enough, there were plenty of glossy clay pots in the building. The cabinets and the shelves of this place had most of the cooking tools, but they seemed outdated.
Leo picked one of the teapots, made from clay. The shape was a bit crooked, and the pot was not symmetrical. No matter how Leo looked at it, this teapot was made by a beginner craftsman.
He put the teapot away and took his eyes off the ancient arts. He sat at the wooden table to rest.
While resting, Leo contemplated his thoughts and his goal, trying to figure out what the dao, the knowledge, or the gnosis of rabbit trent king was.
"Dao is knowledge. Gnosis is also some form of knowledge. But why is it related to that plant? Dragon fruit knowledge? How to grow dragon fruits? That shouldn't be it."
Leo smacked his lips and returned to the plant. As it would be better to learn the plant from the source, he stopped touring the mountaintop.
After sitting in front of the plant, Leo noticed that the eyeball already digested the 10th-rank monster core. It grew slightly bigger, but nothing else seemed different.
Looking at the eyeball, Leo laughed at it.
"So? Why did you eat the monster core? What do you need it for? Growing bigger?"
The eyeball looked left and right, disagreeing with Leo. It came out of the plant and hopped on the newly grown dragon fruit. It picked the fruit with its tentacle and handed it to Leo.
"Oh? For me? But you didn't answer my question."
The eyeball pointed at the fruit and Leo's skin, gesturing for him to mutate it.
As Leo had nothing else to do, he followed the eyeball's instruction. The white fruit instantly turned dark.
The eyeball seemed overjoyed. He then pointed at the ground, wanting Leo to plant it.
"Plant the mutated fruit?"
The eyeball nodded. As it was overexcited, it used its small tentacles to dig the soil.
Leo laughed at it and helped the eyeball dig the ground. After he created a small hole for the fruit, he dropped it into the pit and covered it.
"Is that it?" Asked Leo.
The eyeball looked left and right, doing its version of shaking heads. It then pointed at the white plant and pointed at the buried fruit.
Leo frowned as he didn't understand the eyeball's intention, "What are you doing?"
The eyeball was frustrated. It kept pointing at the white plant and the buried fruit.
"Hmm."
Leo tried to connect the dots, but he still couldn't get the whole picture. He closed his eyes and fall into a deep thought.
But as Leo kept thinking, a black sprout already emerged from the ground, where Leo had buried the black dragon fruit.
SCREECH
The eyeball jumped on Leo's face and poked him, telling Leo to stop daydreaming. It pointed at the black plant.
Leo opened his eyes and looked at it. Again, he squinted his eyebrows.
"Yeah, it's growing as we speak. So?"
The eyeball was angry that Leo was ignorant and stupid. It poked Leo's eyes with its tiny tentacles, but it did nothing to him. Instead, more cancer cells latched onto the creature and became its food.
Seeing how worked up the eyeball was, Leo threw away his useless thoughts and observed the plant. He had a feeling that he knew this process, but it got stuck at the back of his head.
"Mutation? Dao of Mutation? Gnosis of the rabbit trent king? Wait a minute…"
Leo suddenly had an epiphany. He looked at his hands, then he looked at the growing mutated plant.
"Dao of Mutation and Evolution, is that the case here?"
The eyeball repeatedly nodded. It kept pointing at the white dragon fruit, trying to tell Leo that Rabbit Trent King had been experimenting on it, turning the regular plant into this white plant.
In short, the knowledge or the gnosis that Leo had been looking for was so close to him. It was a part of his ability.
However, turning this knowledge into gnosis or a dao was a different story. Leo had a lot of work to do.

chapters.title: Chapter 104 Florida Man Sings On Mountain, Becomes Disney Princess And Haunted By Ghost
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 104 – Florida Man Sings on Mountain, Becomes Disney Princess and Haunted by Ghost
"Hmm."
"Hmmmm."
"HMMMMMMM!!"
Leo meditated, mimicking how a cultivator in novels always did. However, he knew nothing about Qi circulation and breathing.
After 10 minutes of sitting idly, Leo gave up. He stared at the growing black sprout next to the dragon fruit plant.
"You know what? Screw this. I'm gonna spit on it and accelerate its growth. Once it's big enough, I'm gonna eat it."
Leo picked up another ripened dragon fruit and waited for it to fully mutated. When the fruit turned black, he dug another hole and plant the fruit. After he covered the hole, he spat on it.
Although Leo had the urge to urinate on the mutated plant, he remembered that he planned to eat it. Thus, it would have been a stupid idea.
The saliva fertilizer worked wonders. The first sprout rapidly grew while the second one shot out from the ground. However, both plants were different.
The first mutated plant was identical to the white plant except for its color. On the other hand, the second one transformed into a roper tree as all its branches and leaves became long black tentacles.
Leo's expression turned dark when he saw the second black plant. Before it could grow further, Leo uprooted it and snapped it in half. He cut the tentacles and started eating them even though the shapes and the tips resembled the THING.
The appearance was indeed disgusting and repulsive. Fortunately, it tasted like wasabi and nuts.
The wasabi smell kicked Leo's nose. He paused several times as he got high from the herb.
"WOOO!!"
It was addictive. Leo wished that he had some sashimi to go along with the dildo-looking wasabi plant. However, he was sad that he didn't let it mature and multiply.
Leo looked at the roots of the broken roper. He replanted it and spat on it twice, begging it for forgiveness. Unfortunately, the plant was already dead.
"Hah. Life is hard. Anyway, I need to try again."
Leo picked another ripened fruit from the white tree and mutated it. As usual, he buried the fruit in the ground.
Luck was not on Leo's side. The new one came out looking like the first mutated plant.
Leo's face turned ugly. He felt like he gambled in a gacha game, rolling for a five-star character. Then, he got a 3-star or a 4-star character instead.
"Again!"
Gambling could be addictive. Leo rerolled his life gacha game, growing another plant.
The fourth sprout rapidly grew. But this time, it mutated into a black bamboo tree.
Leo dropped his jaw and watched how the black bamboo tree shot to the sky. It rose up 20 meters before it began growing branches and leaves.
PLOP
Bamboo shoots quickly emerged around the black bamboo tree. In a few seconds, they grew into new black bamboo trees. When they matured, new bamboo shoots came out.
The loop went on for 12 circles before the bamboo trees devoured all nutrients from the soil and Leo's spit. When the growing spree ended, over 500 bamboo trees occupied half of the mountaintop.
Leo smirked and injected his Qi into one of the spatial rings. Then, he pointed the ring at the bamboo.
WHOOSH
All of them entered the ring's pocket space, including a portion of the soil of the mountain.
"Hehehe. This is fun. Again!"
Leo grabbed another ripened fruit from the white tree to roll another gacha. While burying another fruit, he sang Eduard Khil's Trololo Song.
The eyeball and Taxi gave Leo a weird look at first. But after listening to the troll song, they got infected. As the song was not complicated, Taxi quickly learned it.
"YEY-YEY-YEY-YEY-YEY YEY-YEY-YEY YEY-YEY-YEY! HOHOHOHOHO!"
Taxi stopped smashing and sang along. Leo also played with it, singing the entire song from the beginning. The eyeball bobbed its body up and down while the white plant waved left and right. The mutated black plants also started moving.
By the time Leo realized it, he turned into a Disney princess, singing with his wild friends.
The black plants soon matured. They began producing black dragon fruits. However, as if they learned what Leo had been trying to do, the ripened fruits fell from the trees and dove into the soil. They moved deeper into the mountain and traveled away from their mothers.
PLOP
PLOP
Black fruits absorbed the remnant of Leo's radiation and spit. They soon grew on the cliffs of the mountain and remained there.
Leo didn't notice that the black dragon plants multiplied. He was busy singing and relaxing. As Taxi and the plants enjoyed his little concert, Leo kept looping the song over and over again as if he wanted to sing the 10-hour version of the song.
CLINK
CLINK
As Leo kept singing, his rainbow aura produced white glittering light. They spread everywhere on the mountain and sank into local trees. As soon as they touched the particles, the trees mutated.
This time, they didn't turn black. All of them were white, the same color as the white dragon fruit plant. As more of them turned white, the mutated trees returned the favor by producing countless strings of white Qi, sending them back to Leo.
Leo didn't notice the white strings of Qi. They gathered behind him and slowly condensed together. After 10 minutes, the threads evolved into essence droplets, and the water droplets slowly grew larger.
.I think you should take a look at
Four hours later, Leo stopped rolling the mutated plant gacha. He spat at the white plant and the eyeball, giving them some rewards.
"That's enough for the day. I'll try again later. Anyway, it's been fun, guys."
Taxi was bored with the song. His throat was also parched, and it flew away to search for water. As for the eyeball and the plants around Leo, they looked disappointed as they had never listened to a song before – They still wanted more.
Seeing how sad the eyeball was, Leo came up with an idea. He browsed the online shopping system and searched for a high-spec phone with a long-life battery.
AI-PHONE 69 was the latest smartphone model from Leo's era when the nuclear war started. The ads boasted that the phone came with a 69-gigapixel camera, and a cutting-edge A69 Bionic processor, capable of clocking up to 5000 MHz.
Looking at the handheld transparent phone brought Leo back. He remembered that he once used the phone to zoom the moon instead of using a proper telescope.
Fortunately, the price was affordable. It cost only 1,000 years of lifespan.
Leo purchased it. When he got it, he set up the phone and used the internet. But the next moment, he slapped his forehead.
There was no internet in this world. What was the point of having a phone?
"I'm stupid. Welp. What a waste of money."
Leo shook his head. He rubbed the smooth touchscreen, admiring the home screen.
DING
<Would you spend 1,000 years of lifespan to upgrade the AI-PHONE 69?>
"…"
Leo forgot about it. He could upgrade every item that he had purchased from the online store shop. However, the upgrade fee was usually expensive.
"If I upgrade it, can I even use the internet?"
The system didn't answer the question. Once again, it left him in the dark.
"Welp. Screw it. Upgrade it to the max level possible!"
DING
Instantly, the phone was upgraded to level 8.
WHOOSH
The appearance didn't change in the slightest. However, the home screen drastically improved. The top right corner, which showed the status of the battery, revealed the infinite symbol on it. Secondly, it picked up a WiFi signal!
"What in the freaking Florida?! How is there a wifi signal here?"
The phone soon updated all its apps and rebooted. When it was done, Leo checked the setting menu to see the phone's details.
No bloatware came along with the phone. There were only three apps; a weird internet browser with a ring icon, a camera app, and a mysterious app with a picture icon of a general store.
Curious, Leo fiddled with the phone, trying to access the internet. He also checked where the wifi signal came from.
It wasn't hard to find where he got the signal from. The wifi router was registered as "RING".
Leo immediately looked at the alien ring that merged with his finger. He frowned.
"It's you, isn't it?"
He rubbed the ring and tried to inject his Qi string into it. However, the response was different from regular spatial rings – There was no pocket dimension inside.
However, as Leo played with the ring, he sensed something odd. Instead of finding a pocket dimension, he sensed an embryo of a living being.
While Leo was playing with the ring, the condensed essence of light finished condensing itself into a finger-sized water droplet. It then rushed into Leo's alien ring.
"Hmm?!"
The corner of Leo's eyes caught something entering his alien ring. It went into his finger and the embryo.
CLINK
A wisp of something came out. The light wisp orbited around Leo. After lapping him thrice, it phased through nearby plants and the eyeball monster. When it was done, it dove into Leo's chest.
Leo saw the streak of light disappearing into his chest. He frowned and closed his eyes, trying to find the weird thing in his body. Unfortunately, his cancer cells failed to find the weird light.
"What was that?!"
Leo scratched his head and looked around, but he didn't find anything.
.
Behind Leo, a floating male toddler manifested. He looked exactly like Leo was he was young.
The transparent toddler giggled and sat on top of Leo's head. However, the latter didn't sense his presence. On the other hand, the eyeball monster stared at him as if he was the only one who could see his appearance.
The toddler smiled and hushed the eyeball monster. The latter jumped and waved its tentacles, trying to get Leo's attention. The eyeball hinted and pointed at the top of Leo's head, telling Florida Man that something was there.
"What is wrong with you, little eye? Oh, right, not enough song, right? Give me a moment. I'll pick a 10-hour version and let it play for as long as you like."
Leo failed to catch the hint. He browsed the internet and found the YouTube site. He opened the 10-hour version of trololol song and put the phone next to the white plant. Then, he walked to the teahouse pavilion to sleep.
The toddler stuck out its tongue at the eyeball. It turned around and followed Leo to the pavilion while it continued to gather light particles around him.

chapters.title: Chapter 105 Florida Man Criticizes Missionary, Gets Struck By Lightning, And Gains Enlightenment
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 105 – Florida Man Criticizes Missionary, Gets Struck by Lightning, and Gains Enlightenment
After resting for the night, Leo returned to the courtyard and checked on the plants. When he saw the changes in this mountain, he was astonished.
The white dragon fruit plant should be called a "tree" instead. It grew 10 meters high, and it developed a thick trunk. Surrounding the white tree was 12 black dragon fruit trees. Thousands of mutated fruits hung on the branches, waiting for them to be ripened.
Seeing so many fruits, Leo brightly smiled. He collected them in his spatial rings, planning to plant them in his shop domain.
After collecting the black trees, Leo looked at the white tree. As he hadn't achieved his goal yet, Leo stared at the tree, wondering what he lacked to acquire the gnosis or dao.
Leo sat down under the tree. He picked up a white dragon fruit and watched it mutate.
"Hah. What am I missing?"
He didn't notice that the toddler spirit had been sitting on his head, giggling and laughing at Leo. The spirit looked at the mutated fruit and came up with an idea. It flew toward a nearby fruit and touched it.
The ripened dragon fruit instantly dissipated into dust, and its nutrition entered the spirit's body.
The toddler giggled again. As greedy as Leo, it went around and absorbed the life force of the fallen fruits around him. One after another, the fallen fruits around the white tree vanished.
Leo didn't notice at first. But when half of the fruits around him were gone, he frowned and looked around.
"…"
Leo frowned and carefully looked around him. He had a hunch that something invisible was at work, and it stole the fruits around here. He then glanced at the eyeball, who latched onto the white tree as usual.
The eyeball once again pointed its tentacle at the spirit of a toddler.
Finally, Leo caught the hint and followed where the tentacles pointed at.
WHOOSH
One of the fruits withered and turned into dust right in front of Leo's eyes. He raised his eyebrows and walked toward the pile of dust. Curious and confused, he picked up the white dust and looked at the eyeball again.
The creature tracked the flying spirit and kept pointing, hoping that Leo could do something about it.
Leo's eyes also followed after the pointer. Upon noticing that the invisible thing went for a pile of ripened fruits, Leo rushed there and gathered the white dragon fruits in his spatial rings, leaving only one fruit on the ground.
The toddler spirit was greedy. As it knew that Leo couldn't see it, the spirit went for the fruit next to Leo's feet. It reached out to touch it.
Suddenly, Leo's hand thrust down. The hand went through the spirit's body, but the former failed to touch or grab it.
The spirit was surprised. It flew away in a hurry and hid behind the white tree.
SCREECH!
The eyeball never missed its chance. It jumped down from the white tree and cladded itself in white light.
PLOP
The octopus-like eyeball caught the toddler!
Leo saw that. He praised the eyeball, "Good job! Pin it down!"
Rushing to the eyeball's side, Leo ordered his cancer cells to coat his hands and fingers with Qi strings. Then, he tried to touch the invisible spirit again.
Unfortunately, Leo's hands and Qi threads were unable to touch the infant dao spirit. Instead, the Qi threads entered the spirit's body and were digested.
Sensing his Qi leaving him, Leo was annoyed. Still, as he had fought with mutated monsters that could steal his life force before, Leo had a trick up in his sleeves.
Instead of pulling his hands out, Leo ordered his cancer cells to increase the power output. Instead of creating harmless Qi threads, Leo wanted them to exhibit their inner "essence" and feed the invisible thief some more.
"You want to rob my energy? Sure. Go ahead. Fill your stomach! Make sure you don't die from overeating!"
As if a dam had opened a floodgate, thick energy gushed out from Leo's palm.
"!!!"
The toddler spirit was taken aback when its master tried to overflow it with his element essence. It wiggled and tried to flee from the eyeball monster's grasp.
This needed to stop. If Leo kept pouring more element essence into the spirit, it would explode because of the overflowing energy. It was not sturdy enough to contain such domineering essence energy.
Unfortunately, a newborn dao spirit couldn't be an opponent of an older 9th-rank monster. The creature's eye curved up, mocking the spirit that it had no chance. It continued to press the spirit to the ground.
The spirit was offended. Still, for the sake of survival, it dispersed its body particles and entered Leo's body.
Leo immediately sensed a cold energy flow entering his palms, going up his arms, and entering his heart. He widened his eyes in shock.
"What?"
Leo sank his mind into his body, commanding his cancer cells to identify the weird energy flow inside him.
The cells swiftly complied with the order and contained the mysterious energy, driving it away from his heart. They pushed it to his solar plexus.
The flow of energy fought back. It manifested itself, transforming into a tiny ball. The ball then shone and repelled the cells from entering its body. Unfortunately, it underestimated Leo.
Leo was ruthless. He shoved his index finger into his chest and dug the grain-sized ball out. He looked at it and narrowed his eyes as it was so little.
"What are you?"
The wound in Leo's chest was healed while he looked at the orb. He wondered if it was the gnosis or dao that the quest mentioned.
WHOOSH
The ball moved by itself and escaped from his fingers. Instantly, it transformed into a streak of light and entered the alien ring.
Leo witnessed everything. He looked at the finger with the ring.
"You again. You never stop amusing me, ring. Very well, let me amuse you!"
Using his full strength, Leo rubbed the alien ring while he ordered his cells to pour essence into it, trying to flush out the light ball earlier.
However, this action awakened something else. Instead of destroying the ring or flushing out the content inside, it reinforced the ring and fed the spirit more energy. As the ring was enhanced, it faded into Leo's flesh, becoming one with him.
The alien ring was gone. He could no longer find it.
"Huh?!"
Leo was at a loss. He had no idea what he had done. He sat on his butt and scratched his head.
"Argh! Dammit! This is frustrating. What was that thing?!"I think you should take a look at
Because of frustration, Leo got lazy. He lay on the rocky ground under the white tree and looked at the abundant dragon fruits.
The chilly wind above the ground and the thin air made Leo drowsy. A few seconds later, Leo fell asleep.
.
After Leo was asleep, the spirit came out from Leo's finger. However, its appearance looked a lot different. Instead of coming out as a toddler, it was now a boy.
The boy had the same face as Leo when he was six. His cheeky smile and big head made him look naughty rather than cute.
The dao spirit looked at Leo's sleeping face and sneered at him. He dug a small hole in the ground near Leo's waist. Then, it created a small water pond. After that, it grabbed Leo's hand and put his fingers into the water.
When the deed was done, the boy's spirit sat on Leo's chest, waiting for his deed to show a result.
Suddenly, Leo snapped open his eyes. He stared at the being on his chest.
The dao spirit was taken aback. It turned around and tried to flee. However, Leo's hand was faster.
This time, Leo caught the boy by the neck. His hands were coated with the thick essence of the cancer cells.
He could see the spirit!
"Too bad for you, I'm immune to this prank. I know exactly which dream will make me wet my bed, and I can easily break every dream I have with a thought! Do you know how many years I have been sleeping and playing in my dream world when I was bored?!"
The boy struggled to flee, but he couldn't escape. It looked at Leo to the face, moving its mouth. However, no word came out.
RUMBLE
While Leo and the spirit conversed, black thunderclouds manifested above the mountaintop.
BOOM
Thunder cracked, and a lightning bolt flashed in the clouds. Coincidentally, it was black lightning.
"Oh, shit."
Leo had faced this before. He remembered how the black lightning bolts almost killed him several times back when he was on Earth. That time, he managed to escape the lightning barrage by running away from the chasing clouds.
Facing the unknown tribulation clouds again, Leo realized that he had no time to run. He tossed away the spirit and prepared to bail.
"!!!"
However, the spirit latched onto Leo's chest, hugging him like a baby monkey. He looked up and faced its master.
"What do you want, ghost? Do you want to get fried or what?"
The spirit had enough. Its ghostly body sank into Leo's chest and merged with him.
This time, the ghost didn't try to do anything funny to his body. Instead, it assimilated with him, transferring all its memory to Leo.
A new memory gushed into Leo's mind, and one of his blood veins ruptured. Transparent blood came out from his nose, but he snorted all of them back.
"Ah? Eh?"
It was hard to comprehend what he saw in the vision. In his mind, he saw countless scenery of trees, forests, and mountains. He witnessed the passage of time, seeing the growth of plants, animals, and insects.
Life and death came and went. When old creatures died, new beings replaced them. Each generation was different from the previous one as they had different personalities and traits.
However, there was one thing in common. In every generation, one or two of the plants, trees, insects, or creatures mutated and created a new subspecies. These variants changed the major traits of their ancestors, and they either thrived or died trying.
Among all plants, a descendant of a green dragon fruit plant absorbed too much wood Qi, and it bored a mutated fruit. That fruit fell from the tree and was eaten by a wild cockatrice. Then, the monster defecated the germinated seeds, which gave birth to a new species of dragon fruit plant – The white dragon fruit plant. Not long after that, a rabbit trent uprooted the plant and gave it to their king.
"Ah…"
Leo drooled and looked up to the sky as he was still drunk by the memory injection. He tiptoed toward the white tree and the eyeball. As his muscle memory kicked in, he collected the tree and the eyeball into one of the spatial rings.
CRACK
A few seconds later, black lightning descended, aiming at Leo!
While half awake, Leo side-stepped and dodged the lightning bolt.
BOOM!
The whole mountain erupted and exploded!
That was not all, the black lightning created a five-kilometer-deep hole in the ground. The tip of the lightning bolt then gathered more force, condensing another explosion.
BOOM!
Something in the large hole exploded.
Meanwhile, Leo fell from the mountain as the heaven tribulation lightning destroyed it. He snapped back to his sense and used the falling debris as a stepping stone. He leaped from the falling rock and hopped on the next.
After five jumps, Leo traveled 500 meters and caught another erected mountain's cliff.
Leo looked at the sky, wondering why the black lighting pursued him. He didn't remember doing anything wrong for heaven to curse him.
"WHAT DID I DO?!" Leo retorted and cursed heaven.
RUMBLE
A second later, the black clouds dispersed, leaving Leo confused.
"HUH?! THAT'S IT?!"
Leo scratched his head and looked down at the narrow hole that the lightning bolt had created. There was a glowing red dot at the end of the tunnel, but Leo was not interested.
CLINK
Leo suddenly heard a chiming bell sound. Behind him, a dao spirit of him emerged. It had the face of Leo, but its body was made of wood.
The first dao avatar of Leo was a wood mannequin with his face.
When the dao avatar came out, Leo received a system notification.
<Congratulations. You have digested the gnosis of rabbit trent king.>
"…HUH?!"

chapters.title: Chapter 106 Florida Man Raises Fund To Arm His Children With 12-Gauge Shotguns For Self-Protection In School
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 106 – Florida Man Raises Fund to Arm His Children with 12-Gauge Shotguns for Self-Protection in School
Planet Rabbit Trent A-3
Local beasts are the lords of this unexplored world. As it is thick in wood and earth Qi, the local monsters excel in defense and self-regeneration. However, due to the recent infestation of Sweet Dream Mushroom, a portion of this world is not suitable for weak cultivators to explore. Please tread with caution.
Primary Objectives:
1 – Kill Rabbit Trent King. (Completed)
2 – Absorb Gnosis of Rabbit Trent King. (Completed)
Secondary Objective:
1 – Locate Entity Fate Crystal in Sweet Dream Mushroom Forest (Completed)
2 – Absorb Entity Fate Crystal. (Completed)
Exploration Rewards: 3 Free Tickets, Ownership of Planet Rabbit Trent A-3
Secondary Rewards: 1 Lucky Draw
.
This was the quest that Leo was supposed to do. However, unintentionally, Leo completed all objectives.
DING
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm <You have obtained 3 Land Expansion Tickets, the ownership of Planet Rabbit Trent A-3, and one lucky draw.>
<Planet Rabbit Trent A-3 has been added to your domain. You can build a permanent portal to Planet Rabbit Trent A-3. Please check the Mystic Realm Portal Building for more details.>
Leo was overjoyed when the system mentioned a permanent portal. If he could erect a permanent portal to this world, he could make his mystic realm platform a tourist attraction. He could also use this place as his secret farmland so that he could breed and harvest dangerous plants or sweet dream mushrooms.
However, not all good things come without flaws. The next system's messages shut down Leo's dream.
<Please be advised. You can build structures in this world when your Humble General Store reaches level 10 or higher, which automatically unlocks necessary facilities.>
<Please be advised. The local monsters and beasts are not considered your subordinates. You must subjugate the local monsters first before you can expand your store to this world.>
<Please be advised. The system cannot collect, steal, or deduct the life force of the local monsters and beasts. You must defeat them yourself.>
Reading the three messages, Leo had a headache.
The first headache was the humble general store's level. He still remembered that upgrading the store to level 10 would disable the auto-protection perk of his system. When that happened, the stores, buildings, granaries, warehouses, and the apartment would be defenseless – Any cultivator might be able to destroy them.
Fortunately, a hundred unicorns just migrated to his domain. Leo wondered if he could entrust the security duty to them.
Also, Leo had a sick idea of how he could arm his subordinates, such as Gao Yan, Wu Buyi, and future trustworthy employees. He ejected the modified handgun that he used to shoot Situ Nantian.
The gun was still brand new. Judging from its performance, it was effective against a tough cultivator. Leo wondered if he could arm Gao Yan or Wu Buyi with similar guns.
Thinking about the gun, Leo's blood boiled. His Floridian instinct was tingling, and he had the urge to shoot something.
"Hah. I wish the domain system has a gun store. Should I start crafting a homemade 12 gauge and spend some lifespan upgrading it? No, that won't work. The upgrade cost is too steep. It's a lot of investment."
Leo put the thoughts aside and contemplated the second and third issues. As this world was still plagued with unknown creatures, monsters, and animals, it would take a long time to subjugate or capture them all. As such, this project should be left to the employees in the future.
Exploiting employees was what a good capitalist should do. Leo crossed his arms and nodded, believing that it was a good idea.
All issues were temporarily solved. Leo shifted his attention to the rewards.
The free tickets came in the form of digital assets. It only showed in the domain system menu.
However, the main attraction was the lucky draw ticket. Leo saw an icon of gold paper in the online shopping menu. He pressed on it, checking what it was.
DING
<Please select the category you wish to pull the lucky draw from.>
"Category?"
The system prompted him with a list of texts – Food, Beverage, Medicines, Furniture, Weapons, Armor, Quality of Life Tools, Vehicles, Electric Appliances, ETC.
The list went on. Leo frowned and skimmed through the list as most of the items could be purchased through the online shopping system. Thus, he didn't need to look at the common things.
After scrolling down the long list, Leo's eyes picked up a few interesting categories – Unique Domain Building, Gnosis, Fate Crystals, Cultivation Resource, and Authority.
Aside from the unique buildings and cultivation resources, the rest of the choice was locked. He pressed on the locked choice, hoping to learn why they were inaccessible.
DING
<Gnosis Lucky Draw requires Shopping Mall Level 10.>
<Fate Crystal Lucky Draw requires Shopping Complex Level 20.>
<Authority Lucky Draw requires Franchise Headquarters Level 20.>
"…"
These options seemed to be exclusive to the endgame content. His headquarters building was still called "Humble General Store", but the structures in the list hinted at the existence of higher-tier buildings.
Since the unique domain building choice was the only thing Leo couldn't access from the online store system, Leo picked it.
DING
<You have unlocked the shop domain system. This option is available!>
<Will you use the lucky draw ticket on the category "Unique Domain Building"?>
Leo shrugged. As he had no luck with lottery tickets or gacha games when he was a human, he didn't care if he would get something useless. After all, nothing good came for free.
"Yes."
DING
All system windows were closed, and a new one appeared in front of Leo. The window sounded the drumrolls, and a lottery ball machine showed up on the screen. It stirred the balls in the machine around.I think you should take a look at
Inside the machine, Leo noticed a few gold balls, purple balls, blue balls, and grey balls.
"Four tiers of rewards?"
Leo gulped, hoping to get a golden ball.
KLUK-KLUK
The gacha machine twisted its handle, and a ball was chosen. Leo gulped, praying to all alligators and Floridian neighbors in the past to bless him with great luck.
Unfortunately, Leo's luck was bad. It was a grey ball.
Leo bit his lower lips and counted the number of grey balls in the machine. It occupied 60% of the content while the blue ones took one-third. The rest were gold and purple.
"Yeah, my luck sucks. Anyway, what's the reward?"
Leo waited for the system to inform him what he got. He pressed on the window screen, hastening the process.
PLOP
The grey ball was open. Then, a building icon came out.
<Congratulations. You have unlocked Gunsmith Workshop!>
"…"
It was a gunsmith workshop. The building should not be considered a gunsmith workshop at all as it was just a shack with random junk in front of the structure. Leo thought it came straight from a slum or a junkyard.
Fortunately, the icon came with a brief description, showing its potential and its max level.
.
Gunsmith Workshop (Max Level 20)
This workshop is a must if you pursue the art of hot weaponry. At a low level, you may craft weapon parts to make ancient firearms, such as flintlock pistols. After upgrading it to level 10, this building can be evolved into a Gunsmith Factory, which unlocks advanced firearms of the 21st century.
Upgradable Perks
Gunsmith Mannequin (0/1)
Handloading Mannequin (0/1)
Firearm Technology (0/6)
Product Quality (0/6)
Structure Quality (0/6)
[Upgrade] – 10,000 Years of Lifespan.
.
Leo drooled. He couldn't stop looking at the detail of the gunsmith workshop. Still, the upgrade cost ruined his mood.
"10 freaking thousand?! Are you nuts? Why is it so expensive?!"
Looking at the upgrade cost, Leo calculated how much he needed to invest in this building. As every structure came in as level one, Leo might have to upgrade it 19 times, which translated to 190,000 years of lifespan!
Thinking of the investment made Leo sweat. He grabbed a leaf from a random tree and wiped his face with it. He checked his current lifespan.
<Current Lifespan: 141,346 Years…>
"Huh?"
Leo remembered that he used 80,000 years for the handgun and ammo during the chase, yet he still had this many.
"Oh, right. I ate a lot."
Once again, Leo shrugged it off as lifespan fluctuated daily. He sometimes used them to buy modern items to improve his quality of life, such as clothes, new rubber gloves, and toilet paper. He also gained a lot from food that he picked up from the wild.
Leo stopped messing around. He came down from the cliff and landed next to the deep hole. Ignoring the pit, Leo kicked the ground and leaped east, heading toward Wu Buyi's campsite.
His mission was over. It was the right time to start collecting goodies in his spatial rings. Also, he could use this opportunity to practice riding a flying sword.
While jumping and leaping across the forest, Leo had a feeling that he forgot something. He rolled his eyes, wondering what he had forgotten.
.
.
At the pagoda tower, Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei still cultivated, gathering as much Qi from the tower as they could. Even though they were slightly injured from the last incident, they never stopped working to grow stronger.
As for the disciples on the first floor, they also worked hard. However, Xu Nuan, Yao Qiqi, Han Hao, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman were more adventurous. They began climbing the pagoda tower, following the footsteps of Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei.
Yao Qiqi, despite being the only junior among the group, wasn't afraid of the Qi suppression and the gravity of this tower. She skipped and hopped as if she was walking on the moon.
Xu Nuan watched the little child play as she traveled together with the elder's group. She was jealous of the disciple.
"Don't run too fast. You will fall."
Yao Qiqi giggled, "I'll be fine! I'm about to reach the bottleneck of the nascent soul stage!"
Han Hao, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman almost vomited blood when they overheard her. All of them cultivated for decades, but they had the same cultivation base as the little girl.
Ashamed of their talent, the men closed their mouths and refrained from talking. They rushed forward, trying their best not to mingle around with the two.
Xu Nuan looked at the fleeing men and chuckled. She also had a similar thought when Yao Qiqi suddenly advanced from the golden core stage to the nascent soul stage last night.
Looking at the little girl, Xu Nuan thought of Leo. She wondered if he was the cause of Yao Qiqi's fast growth. She thought.
'If I have time, I should bring her to Senior Florida Man again. Maybe, she should study under him rather than me. She might have a brighter future with a stronger mentor. Haiz. I have nothing to teach her other than the common sense.'
Xu Nuan lamented her inability and lack of knowledge. While thinking, Xu Nuan also wondered if Leo needed a servant or an elder to oversee his store and subordinates.
'Should I ask him to be his store's assistant? Should I bring some girls from the sanctuary to study under him?'

chapters.title: Chapter 107 Philanthropist “Mr. Florida Man” Teaches Teen Carjacking Techniques And How To Survive Cop Chases
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 107 – Philanthropist "Mr. Florida Man" Teaches Teen Carjacking Techniques and How to Survive Cop Chases
WHOOSH
Leo finally returned to the campsite after a few days of exploration. Upon arrival, he noticed some changes.
The first change was Gao Yan. Although he hadn't moved from the portal area, his aura and presence changed - His pupils and sclera were pure green, and his skin was covered in tree barks. Two antler horns grew from his temples, but they gathered terrifying energy.
Lightning branches kept coming out from Gao Yan's horns. High-voltage lightning bolts randomly struck the river, mangrove trees, and the shelter that Leo and Wu Buyi had made.
PA
One of the lightning bolts hit Leo's chest. It burnt his T-shirt, and it left a black mark on his chest. The stain quickly vanished as Leo's skin absorbed the rampaging Qi of Gao Yan.
Gao Yan gave Leo an apologetic look. He bowed his head several times to apologize to Leo, but his action made his thunder horns send out more lightning strikes toward the latter.
Leo observed the color of the lightning bolts. Fortunately, they were colorless, and their destructive power was similar to regular lightning bolts from Earth during the pre-apocalypse era.
"Stop pointing those horns at me. Point them at the sky or something. If better, dip your head into the water and zap those caimans for me. I'm craving some freshwater fish and caiman meat."
Gao Yan wryly smiled and tried his best to lean his head backward. Although he tilted his head, the horns still unleashed more lightning bolts and hit everything that moved around him.
BANG
One of the lightning bolts hit Wu Buyi, who had been sulking in a collapsed shelter.
Leo turned his attention to Wu Buyi. Upon seeing him hugging his knees inside a leaf shelter, Leo approached him.
"What's happening, Wu Buyi? Why are you sulking here? Did someone bully you?"
Wu Buyi looked at Leo's face. His eyes were teary as if he had been crying.
"M-My lord… I…"
Leo felt bad for Wu Buyi. He thought that something went wrong with the latter's cultivation or items.
"Tell me. What's wrong?"
Wu Buyi glanced at Gao Yan. He sniffed and confessed, "While you were away, Gao Yan… had a breakthrough."
"Oh, isn't that nice? Your disciple is getting stronger. But why are you sad?"
"He… he…" Wu Buyi sobbed. Teardrops rolled down from his eyes while he looked at Leo's face.
"He, what?"
"After the breakthrough, he faced the heaven's tribulation lightning."
"And?"
"He transcended it."
Leo was puzzled as there was no reason for Wu Buyi to cry or sadden. He frowned and stared into Wu Buyi's eyes, "And?"
"He… awakens a dao avatar."
"AND???"
"That dao avatar… is a lightning spirit from the heaven tribulation clouds."
"…"
Wu Buyi cried harder. He raised his voice, "Isn't this unfair, my lord?! He's only like… 16?! Look at him. His cultivation base has already caught up to me! That's not all, he got himself a sexy sentient dao avatar! Look at him, my lord. LOOK!!"
Leo facepalmed. He got the gist of it, but he glanced at Gao Yan.
After a careful look, Leo noticed a transparent body of a young maiden, cladded in electricity. The outline of her refined curvy hips and bosoms was ideal for a young lady as she was not too fat or slim. Moreover, although her face couldn't be seen, Leo vaguely saw the gleams of her eyes, which stared directly at him.
Leo deeply sighed. He gently grabbed a 2-inch thick tree branch nearby. Using less than 1% of his true force, Leo swung it down, bonking Wu Buyi.
BONK
The impact was strong enough to send a regular adult man to ICU. Fortunately, Wu Buyi was a nascent soul cultivator, so this impact was the same as a mild smack to the back of the head.
"You senile old coot! Is that why you're jealous of your disciple?!"
Wu Buyi yelped and covered his head. He looked at Leo and wept, "But that's a sentient dao avatar, my lord! In the future, that dao avatar can manifest her physical body. And, and… In legends, the manifested dao avatars of the opposite gender usually served their masters as their concubines-"
BONK
Leo heard enough. He hit Wu Buyi again. This time, he used 1% of his strength.
The impact stunned Wu Buyi. He fell to the ground, and a large bump grew on his bald head.
After Wu Buyi stopped talking, Leo reminded him.
"How old are you this year?"
"108, my lord."
Leo tossed the tree branch away. He purchased a sheet of A3 paper and folded it into a fan.
WHOOSH
Although it was a paper fan, it could be deadly in the hands of Leo. He used two percent of his strength and smacked Wu Buyi's head for the third time.
PA!
The sound was crisp as the folded fan always caused a loud noise upon impact. Still, because of Leo's abnormal strength and speed, the fan caught fire after the hit.
Wu Buyi got knocked to the ground once again. He failed to get up this time as he started seeing stars.
Leo shouted at Wu Buyi.
"You're freaking over 100 years old, and you're still envious of a junior because he has a potential pretty wife?! What are you, a sex-depraved 14-year-old virgin?!"
While his head was an inch deep in the ground, Wu Buyi cried, "Yes, my lord. I have been cultivating all my life, and I have never touched a woman before. I wish I have a pretty woman by my side, too!"
"…"
Wu Buyi raised his head and wailed, "I'M A PATHETIC LONELY 100-YEAR-OLD MAN, MASTER! WAAAA!!"I think you should take a look at
"…"
Leo double-facepalmed. He understood something that he never wished he would learn.
'Come to think of it, I never saw a female disciple from Life Sword Sect. All their elders and disciples are men. Only Xu Nuan and her people are women… Wait. Are their sects gender-based?'
Cultivators were lonely creatures. They either spent most of their time cultivating, training, procuring resources, and working to increase their strength. Talented young men usually spent their youthful period in seclusion or got trapped in a male-only sect, such as Life Sword Sect.
Leo figured that Wu Buyi might have spent decades in cultivation and pill-making arts, which was why he never touched a woman.
'Poor sod. Well, that's understandable. This world has no internet or Dutch wives. It's already a miracle that he doesn't swing that way.'
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm Thinking of the internet, Leo remembered that he had bought a smartphone for the white dragon fruit tree. He injected his Qi into all five spatial rings, searching if he had picked it when he brought the tree and the eyeball along.
Fortunately, it was still there. Leo's 8,000 years of lifespan wasn't lost along with the destroyed mountain.
WHOOSH
Leo ejected the smartphone out. He fiddled with it, checking if he could still access a wild site.
DUN-DUN-DUN PA-DUM-TSS
As Leo had expected, as soon as Leo accessed THAT website and pressed on a random video, the iconic theme song sounded.
Seeing the old porn website, Leo snickered. Although he doubted how the phone could still enter a modern internet website, he turned off his brain and showed Wu Buyi the phone.
"Look here, baldy. I'll teach you a way to relieve some boredom. This is one of many toys I have in my previous world…"
Leo sat in front of Wu Buyi, teaching him how to use a modern smartphone.
.
Two hours of crash course worked wonders. Although Wu Buyi had never heard of the internet and smartphones before, a senior alchemist like him quickly adapted to the technologies. He understood how the apps, browsers, and the internet worked.
As if Wu Buyi's mental age regressed to a child, he sat alone, staring at the phone with bloodshot eyes. Although Wu Buyi didn't understand the language of many websites and apps, he got addicted to the images and the videos, especially the sites with many sexy women.
Seeing that Wu Buyi had something to distract the depressing thoughts, Leo was relieved. He decided to give Wu Buyi that phone.
"Don't be obsessed with it, okay? The Internet can be addictive, but it's a useful tool to broaden one's horizon…"
"AHN! YES! AH! AHN!"
"…"
The sound from the phone was enough to tell Leo what video Wu Buyi was watching. Once again, Leo slapped his forehead and facepalmed. He left the old man alone as he needed it.
After ditching Wu Buyi, Leo walked toward Gao Yan. The latter's condition hadn't improved as he still couldn't suppress the rampaging lightning Qi in his antler horns.
Gao Yan's horns reminded Leo of someone he had forgotten. Finally, Leo remembered the missing guy.
"Where is Taxi?"
Leo looked around and realized that Taxi wasn't there with him. He jumped 5 kilometers to the sky and scanned the landscape.
The pervert horse was nowhere to be seen.
After the landing, Leo planned to shout to call the horse. But then, he remembered that this realm had become a part of his domain. Since it was within Leo's domain, he should be able to use the map to pinpoint the unicorn.
Putting his thought to work, Leo opened the shop domain menu and checked the map.
DING
It worked. The system map revealed the entire world.
This world only consisted of one big Pangea, aka a single supercontinent. Its overall shape was round in the west and north, but the southeast was long and narrow.
It looked like a jellyfish with two tentacles, facing west.
The pyramid was located to the northwest of the continent. As for the mountains, they were at the edge of the continent, next to the endless sea. The pagoda town was at the entrance to the east peninsula. As for their campsite location, it was directly south of the pyramid, located at the southwest of the continent.
BEEP
Red dots and green dots indicated allies and potential foes on the map. Leo noticed the face icons of Hua Jiashan, Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, Xu Nuan, and Yao Qiqi in the pagoda town. About 30 red dots traveled in groups, wandering around the map. As for Taxi, he was in the middle of the North Sea.
"What the hell is he doing over there?"
As Taxi might know something about lightning Qi and the cultivation method, Leo decided to go and fetch him to the camp.
"Stay there, Gao Yan. I'm going to get you a new mentor. I'll be back."
Because Leo couldn't fly, he decided to bring out the red flying sword of Situ Nantian.
WHOOM
After being ejected from a spatial ring, the flying sword hummed and floated in front of Leo. The latter hopped on it and stood tall.
Gao Yan widened his eyes and gazed at the flying sword in admiration. He recognized the model.
"Isn't this the Pherrari F50 model? I heard it's a limited edition! Senior, how did you get it?"
Leo raised his eyebrows when Gao Yan mentioned the brand name. He was amused.
"What did you say? Ferrari?"
"Umm, Pherrari, senior."
"…"
Leo looked at the flying sword and thought of the race cars in his old world. Thinking how they sounded the same, Leo laughed.
"Ever heard of GTA, boy?"
"Gee-Tee-Ay?"
"It's a culture in my world, you see?"
Leo proceeded to explain what GTA meant and how to GTA someone.

chapters.title: Chapter 108 Florida Man Sued By IATA As He Flies To Space By Riding Drone
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 108 – Florida Man Sued by IATA as He Flies to Space by Riding Drone
After a brief explanation, Leo gazed at Gao Yan with a proud look.
Meanwhile, Gao Yan muttered and reviewed the new knowledge.
"GTA is such a profound art! So, if I master that, I can snatch somebody's flying sword during combat? Then, if I master a flying sword technique enough, what technique do I need to learn next?"
Leo puffed his chest and ejected the system's pistol to show the boy.
"GTA isn't possible without absolute strength and the right tool. Here, you should carry this."
Without hesitation, Leo gave the pistol to Gao Yan. After all, he seemed more trustworthy than the baldy fox Wu Buyi.
Gao Yan received the pistol and flipped it around. He had never seen a similar artifact before.
"Senior, what's this?"
"A gun."
"A gun?"
"Well, you can take it as an emergency artifact for self-defense. You point the muzzle at the person you want to put a hole inside, then you pull the trigger."
"???"
Gao Yan wryly smiled as he couldn't understand Leo.
Seeing Gao Yan's expression, Leo got down from the flying sword. He pursed his lips and purchased another handgun, investing 5,000 years of lifespan. He then browsed the online store to see if non-lethal rounds existed.
Fortunately, there was plenty of rubber ammunition for sale. They were also a lot cheaper than live rounds as one box of 50 rubber bullets only cost five years of lifespan.
Leo purchased 10 boxes of ammo. Then, he used the spare pistol to teach Gao Yan how to shoot a gun.
"Okay, I'm gonna teach you some basics. Firstly, you need to know the trigger discipline, the safety, and how to not point that muzzle around and kill yourself or your friend by an accident."
He proceeded to teach Gao Yan the general knowledge of handguns and gun anatomy first. He forced the boy to replace the live rounds with the rubber rounds so that he wouldn't waste the expensive bullets.
.
BANG
BANG
Two hours later, Gao Yan practiced shooting a tree from a distance. He was nervous at first as the ammo was limited. But when he learned that the live rounds cost 40,000 years of lifespan to get, he stopped worrying about expendable cheap bullets.
Leo watched Gao Yan's form and nodded in approval. He was a quick learner. His strong grip and wrist made it so that the recoil never existed. Moreover, his accuracy was no joke as he could even shoot a target 50m away instantly without even aiming.
The insane accuracy came from the weird transparent dao avatar of Gao Yan. Leo glanced at her and noticed that the spirit's hands overlapped with Gao Yan's.
In short, Gao Yan could use an aimbot in real life. Leo was envious of him.
Secondly, Leo noticed something odd about him. When Gao Yan focused on his gun, his antler horns stopped releasing random lightning bolts. Instead, the lightning Qi gathered in his hands and fingers, transferring the Qi into the gun.
BANG!
Leo narrowed his eyes when Gao Yan fired the next shot. He could clearly see a branch of lightning bolt coming out of the muzzle. However, the rubber didn't conduct electricity, so the lightning Qi failed to influence the bullet.
"Senior, this artifact is really difficult. I can't apply my Qi to the bullet," Gao Yan complained.
Leo heartily laughed, "Don't worry. Rubber is an insulator. Electricity and heat can't get through it easily, so you can't apply your Qi to it. However…"
Thinking about applying Qi to the bullet heads, Leo was curious if he could do it. He used the level-1 gun to test his theory.
After loading the rubber round magazine, Leo tried injecting his Qi into the rubber bullet head while he aimed.
RUMBLE
The pistol glowed in rainbow light. Leo ignored it and pulled the trigger.
BOOOOOM!
Instead of firing a rubber bullet, the ordinary-looking pistol fired a 1-foot-diameter railgun beam. The rainbow energy evaporated everything in its path and vanished after it traveled 50 kilometers.
"…"
"…"
Leo and Gao Yan's eyes turned into small dots as they had no words to describe the phenomenon. They stood there in silence.
"AHN! OH, YES! HARDER!"
Unfortunately, the sultry noise from a certain smartphone in a broken shelter interrupted the tranquility. In the shack, someone was addicted to a lewd video.
PIKI
The 5,000-YOL gun in Leo's hands cracked and emitted white smoke. It seemed that even the system's gun couldn't handle the recoil and Qi.
Leo clicked his tongue and spent 5,000 years of lifespan upgrading it to level 2.
DING
The pistol was upgraded and automatically repaired. The smoke and the residual essence and Qi were gone.
"Ahem," Leo was embarrassed. "Sorry, I couldn't suppress my… strength. Anyway, you might want to use metal Qi, earth Qi, or wood Qi instead of lightning. Avoid fire Qi by the way. It might overhead the gun like what I just did."
Gao Yan's eyes brightened. He repeatedly nodded and gazed at Leo in admiration.
"I'll keep that in mind, senior! I'll train hard and be as strong as you!"
"Don't rush, boy. You have a long future ahead of you. Also, keep that live rounds with you. There are only…like… 18 bullets in there? Well, I think those ammos are enough to kill an immortal or two. I tested it on a random thief a couple days ago, and it's enough to deter him. Too bad my accuracy sucks or I would have shot him in the head."I think you should take a look at
"!!!"
When Gao Yan heard the keywords "Kill an immortal or two", he stopped listening to Leo as he was in shock.
An artifact that could kill an immortal?!
Even the dao avatar behind Gao Yan covered her mouth in astonishment before she lowered her head to show gratitude to Leo.
"S-Senior. T-This artifact is t-too much!"
"Meh, just keep it. My store is getting bigger, and those stupid robbers are eyeing our goods. It's okay when I'm around. But when I'm not, you will need something for self-protection. Use it to protect your friends and your loved ones."
Gao Yan shed a manly tear of gratitude. He prostrated to Leo.
"THANK YOU, SENIOR. I WON'T LET YOU DOWN!"
Looking at Gao Yan's overreaction, Leo scratched his face, embarrassed. He then purchased 10 more boxes of rubber ammo for Gao Yan.
"Keep practicing. Also, try not to clean it with water. I'll come back to teach you how to disassemble and assemble that gun and how to clean it later."
"YES, SIR!"
"…"
Leo smiled at the boy. His honesty, manner, and sincere attitude were likable. He wished that his store would have more employees like him.
Thinking of employees and promising young people, Leo recalled the little girl from the women's group. He opened the map and checked Yao Qiqi's status.
Looking at the portrait of the little girl, Leo pursed his lips and hesitated.
'She's too young to work, but that doesn't mean she can't work at my store. Well, she can work here as a playmate for that stupid plant as long as Cat won't eat her. Oh, right. I should also hire experienced managers, too. I can't entrust everything to Wu Buyi alone.'
Leo changed his plan. He brought back Pherrari flying sword and pointed at the east. Before he left, he told Gao Yan.
"I'm going to pay your sect's team a visit. While I'm away, keep practicing. Oh, if a strong monster shows up, don't hesitate to kill it with the live rounds."
"Eh?"
Leo didn't wait for Gao Yan to respond. He looked around and scanned the area with his infrared sight.
Because of the loud gun noise and Gao Yan's lightning bolts, no creature lingered in the area except a couple black caimans in the river.
Leo paused for a moment and picked up a boulder. He threw it into the river.
BOOM
The rock flew like a cannonball, parting the water as if Moses was there. However, as it traveled through the water at a light speed, the boulder reddened and shrank by half.
PU
The hot boulder smashed a unicorn caiman in half. The other one noticed how its friend died and swam away in a panic.
Gao Yan looked at the parted river in astonishment. But when he saw the red area in the transparent river, he understood why Leo did it.
"A-Amazing."
"Anyway, take care of yourself while I'm away. Don't become like your mentor."
Leo snorted and hopped on the flying sword "Pherrari". Learning from his mistake, he ordered it to fly up instead of going straight.
WHOOSH
Just like that, Leo shuttled to the sky and disappeared along with the sword.
Gao Yan looked up and dropped his jaw. He was astonished at how profound Leo's strength was. He then chatted with his dao avatar.
"Say, Senior Thora. Do you think I can be like him one day?"
The lightning spirit giggled and embraced Gao Yan from behind. She whispered in a soft voice. However, nobody but Gao Yan could hear her.
"In a decade years, probably not. A hundred years, very low chance. A thousand years, maybe."
"Wha?! He's that strong?!"
"I can't see through his cultivation base and strength even though I'm a born elemental spirit. He's not an ordinary immortal for sure."
"…Wow."
.
.
WHOOSH
After flying vertically for a few seconds, Leo mustered his strength and put his force on the tip of the flying sword, commanding it to adjust its flying course.
By the time Leo managed to push the flying sword's tip down, he was already at the stratosphere of the planet. The sky was no longer bright, and stars filled the sky.
No moon existed around this planet. Only the white sun at a distance seemed intimidating.
Leo gazed at the space and admired it for a moment. It was different from the Milky Way as the stars were arranged in a square formation. Moreover, the gas wasn't as thick as it condensed around its source.
Looking at the stars, Leo wondered if they were the other mystic realms that were linked to the cultivation world or if they were manmade stars in some pocket dimension.
"Ah, my stupid ring. Who made you? Who was the owner of that alien ship? Why did it appear in my world?"
Leo asked the alien ring that had already become one with his finger. He rubbed it, but he got no response from the ring.

chapters.title: Chapter 109 Locals Concerned As Florida Man Sponsors Female-Only Orphanage To Adopt A Daughter And Recruit Underaged Employees
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 109 – Locals Concerned as Florida Man Sponsors Female-Only Orphanage to Adopt a Daughter and Recruit Underaged Employees
Although Leo hadn't mastered the flying sword maneuver techniques yet, he managed to direct it east. He jetted toward the pagoda town as he planned to scout Xu Nuan and Yao Qiqi to work for him.
While flying, Leo looked behind him.
A transparent wooden mannequin with Leo's face followed after its master. It was Leo's first official dao avatar.
Leo wasn't well-informed about the dao avatar and cultivation techniques. However, he learned a thing or two after he interacted with Gao Yan and Wu Buyi.
"So that is my dao avatar?"
He smirked at the mannequin and waved his hand, calling him to come closer.
"Hey, bro. Can you talk? What are you?"
"…"
The mannequin dao avatar dully stared at Leo before it vanished into his alien ring.
Seeing its behavior, Leo was disappointed.
"I guess you're sentient, too. Too bad you're quite a rebellious one."
Leo shrugged and ignored his dao avatar. He focused on his feet and pressed more weight on the flying sword, descending and preparing to land.
A few minutes later, Leo could see the pagoda town again. Unfortunately, it wasn't as beautiful as a few days ago because of the carnage, which Situ Nantian and Leo had caused.
Seeing the town, Leo jumped off the flying sword as it had no brake pedal to stomp on. It headed toward one of the buildings in the town.
BOOM
Because the flying sword carried Leo's Qi, it punctured a hole in a 20-story pagoda and the building behind it. Fortunately, it crash-landed on the street and stopped there.
Leo safely landed in front of the city. He broke a sweat when the 20-story pagoda collapsed because of the flying sword.
"Whoops. That wasn't me!"
After denying the responsibility, Leo proceeded to the half-broken 400-story tall pagoda. As the 10 top floors got blasted during the fight between Taxi and the cultivators, it still emitted white smoke.
Entering the building, Leo found the disciples of the Life Sword Sect and Amazonian Sanctuary again. However, most of their elders were not there.
When the young disciples from both organizations saw Leo, they immediately stood up to greet him. A couple of them had met Leo once, and they told their friends to be respectful.
"Greetings, elder!" A male disciple lowered his head and cupped his fist.
"S-Senior… G-Greetings, sir." Qi Niu, who once tempted Leo, tried not to be too obvious. She pretended to not recognize him.
Leo nodded at the crowd, "At ease, boys and girls. Continue what you've been doing. I'll be on my way to visit your elders."
"Y-Yes, sir."
After parting with the disciples, Leo climbed the tower. As there was nothing to stop him, he started running up the stairs.
.
On the 50th floor, Leo found the group of elders there. Xu Nuan, Yao Qiqi, Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, and the elders from the sanctuary gathered and inspected a pile of white dust on the ground.
When Leo approached them, Han Hao noticed him first. He poked his colleagues with his elbow to get their attention. Then, he bowed 90 degrees.
"Senior Florida Man, it's good to see you here with us, sir!"
Han Meng gave his father a weird look. He lowered his head and saluted, "Senior, we meet again."
Xu Nuan, Tiger Swordsman, and the other female elders cupped their fists and gave Leo face. As for Yao Qiqi, she boldly grabbed Leo's hand and jumped around.
