"Senior Angel! Do you remember me? It's me, Qiqi!"
Leo lowered his sight and found the little toddler. He glanced at his hand for a moment as he was worried that Yao Qiqi might be infected by his radiation aura.
Fortunately, Yao Qiqi seemed to develop immunity. She didn't mutate like the others.
After making sure, Leo patted her head, "Of course, I remember you. Sorry that I made you drink that tea. Your physical age has regressed by a lot."
"Thank you for saving my life, Mister Angel! I'm working hard to become an angel like you!" Yao Qiqi laughed.
Looking at the adorable little girl, Leo couldn't help but smile. Although he had the urge to hug her and carried her around, he suppressed his desire. He then complained.
"I wish I had a granddaughter as cute as you."
"Hmm?!"
As soon as Leo mentioned it, Xu Nuan's eyes gleamed. She walked toward Leo and seized the opportunity to propose an idea.
"Senior. Yao Qiqi is a talented girl. She's only six, but she has already reached the nascent soul stage. However, our sanctuary is incapable of guiding her to a higher path."
Leo flinched for a moment as Xu Nuan's tone implied that the sanctuary wanted to disown her. He frowned.
"So, you're saying that you can't raise the girl?"
"N-No! That's not what I'm saying!" Xu Nuan waved her hands and shook her head, "I'm trying to say that she deserves a better mentor. I… no, the elders of our sect believe that her talent would be a waste if she keeps staying with us. We were hoping… if you can take her under your wings, senior?"
Leo's eyes reddened in anger, "You want to shove your responsible on me?"
"NO! Of course not!" Again, Xu Nuan sweated profusely. She looked at Yao Qiqi, "I mean, we think she deserves a better parent than us, old women, sir!"
"…"
Leo's frown deepened. He was still angry.I think you should take a look at
A female-only sanctuary or organization was the best place for Yao Qiqi to find female friends and sisters. She could grow up normally and be happy in the right environment. However, Xu Nuan's action was intolerable as she simply wanted to kick her out and hand her to Leo.
"You know what?" Leo patted Yao Qiqi's head. "I'm not taking in any disciple unless the person is agreed to it. Let the girl decide where she wants to stay. If she likes staying with you and your sanctuary, she will stay there. But if she wants to be with me, I'll take her in since you old hags are irresponsible!"
"S-Senior. That wasn't our intention!"
Xu Nuan wanted to cry as Leo misunderstood her. She wished for Yao Qiqi to have a better mentor and growing environment as their sanctuary couldn't provide enough resources to raise her.
Preventing the misunderstanding, Xu Nuan confessed, "It's not like that, senior. We… Our sanctuary doesn't have enough cultivation resources to nurture her. In fact, we lack daily grain pills and cultivation resources for our disciples."
"But haven't many cultivators been donating spirit stones to your sanctuary?" Han Hao added while he raised his eyebrows.
"Most of those donations came from the imperial court and the Ouyang Clan, Elder Han. They added a condition that we had to provide them virgin maidens for their clans in return. Since we don't support prostitution, we returned their money."
Leo heard some disturbing inside news. His anger was shifted toward the imperial court and the Ouyang Clan as they reminded him of the pedophile ring in his homeworld, which was always on the news.
He gave Xu Nuan and the female elders a meaningful look. He asked them again.
"Are you sure that you have never sold your girls to old men like me before?"
Xu Nuan and everybody shook their heads, "No, senior. Never!"
Leo slowly nodded. Then, he looked at Yao Qiqi for a moment before he came up with an idea.
"You know what? I have a better idea. Tell me, how many members your organization has?"
"Umm, about… 250 disciples and a dozen elders?"
"And you lack cultivation resources, right?"
"…Yes."
"I'm hiring all of you. My store lacks clerks, cashiers, and employees. I'll pay you essence stones if you move your goddamn sect whatsoever to my territory and settle down there."
"WHAT?!"
Xu Nuan and the old women couldn't believe their ears as Leo suddenly offered them a job. Moreover, the pay was essence stones, which they couldn't get their hands on as they weren't a member of the imperial court.
Han Hao and others were also stunned as they didn't expect Leo to solicit the entire sanctuary to work for his store.  They looked at each other and secretly contacted Hua Jiashan via telepathy.
While everybody was shocked, Leo began listing the employee welfare and working conditions.
"I'll provide a dorm for you to stay, but you will still need to build your own houses later. Of course, you will have to move in and live in my territory. Even so, everybody only needs to clock eight hours a day or 40 hours a week! Working overtime will be rewarded accordingly. You get free healthcare, aka free medical pills from me if you are sick or injured. Also, the pay is one essence stone per month."
"ONE ESSENCE STONE PER MONTH?!" Xu Nuan's eyes were round. The other elders also drooled.
Leo smirked as he didn't tell them that he paid Gao Yan and Wu Buyi more than that. As he didn't know how good Xu Nuan and the others were, he offered them minimum wage.
Meanwhile, Han Hao and the male elders had a wry smile on their faces. They recently purchased Leo's essence stones for one YOL per stone. Hearing that the women had a chance to earn one stone per month, they didn't know if they should be jealous of them or not.
As the old said, "Money is King", the sanctuary elders readily agreed. Even Xu Nuan shed a tear of happiness as they couldn't get a better offer elsewhere.
"As long as you don't force us to do something immoral, we will gladly work for you. However… there's a problem," Xu Nuan gulped as she looked around.
"What?" Leo was annoyed as Xu Nuan still dared to give him a condition.
"Umm, our sanctuary possesses a portal to a mystic realm. If we abandon the portal to work for you, I'm afraid that our elders and disciples won't be able to challenge any mystic realm anymore. T-This offer might be impossible for us after all."
Xu Nuan was worried that the girls wouldn't be able to enter any mystic realm if they joined Leo. The others also had the same thought, and they were reluctant to abandon their precious territory to join him.
Leo rolled his eyes. He deeply sighed and told them a secret.
"What if I tell you that I'm the owner of this world, and I might be able to open a PERMANENT portal?"
"EH?!"
"I mean exactly when I said PERMANENT PORTAL. It's fixed to this world, though. Anything you find here, you can keep them. Any monster you kill, you can keep them. Well, this world is kinda dangerous, though, since there're gators and those pink mushrooms-"
Suddenly, Han Hao pushed Xu Nuan aside, interrupting Leo mid-conversation, "We'll join you! WE WILL JOIN YOU! LET LIFE SWORD SECT MERGE WITH YOUR DOMAIN, SIR!"
Xu Nuan: "…"
Leo: "…"
Everybody stared at Han Hao. They all had the same question in their minds.
'Who asked you?'
.
While the adults talking, Yao Qiqi looked back and forth between Xu Nuan and Leo. She didn't understand a thing.
As Yao Qiqi was bored, she looked at Leo's big hand. Then, she noticed a ring pattern around his middle finger.
"A ring?"
Curious, Yao Qiqi touched the ring tattoo. But as soon as she touched it, she heard a young man's voice.
'Who goes there? Who are you? How do you have the same aura as my master?'
The owner of the voice peeked out the ring. A transparent wooden mannequin head came out from the ring and looked at Yao Qiqi.
'You, who are you?'
Yao Qiqi was surprised. She laughed at the mannequin as he had the same face as Leo, except it looked younger.

chapters.title: Chapter 110 Locals Refuse To Call Cops After Witnessing Florida Man Urinating On Wooden Mannequin In Front Of His 6-Year-Old Daughter, "We Saw Nothing!"
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 110 – Locals Refuse to Call Cops after Witnessing Florida Man Urinating on Wooden Mannequin in front of His 6-Year-Old Daughter, "We saw nothing!"
Han Hao was shameless. Instead of listening and waiting for his turn to chat, he self-inserted into the conversation and sold his sect to Leo. Moreover, he hadn't gotten approval from Hua Jiashan yet.
Leo frowned and brought out a paper fan from his spatial ring. He smacked the shameless old man's head in front of the crowd.
PA!
The elders were taken aback. But when they noticed that Leo did it to punish Han Hao, the corners of their mouths curved up as they found the situation funny.
"Pipe it down. You have to talk to Hua Jiashan first if you want to merge your sect with my company."
"C-Can we really serve you, senior?!" Han Hao gulped as he thought that he had jumped the gun. However, Leo didn't decline the offer.
"I'm planning to poach disciples from your sect anyway. If you can migrate to my domain and help me fortify my territory, I have no reason to refuse."
"WOOOOO!!"
Han Hao forgot about manners and raised his arms to the sky, celebrating. Everybody stared at the weird old man with a blank expression.
When Han Hao came back to his senses, he coughed and rubbed their hands, "About the wage… can we get the essence stones too?"
Leo rolled his eyes, "Go fetch Hua Jiashan and we'll discuss the wage!"
"YES, SENIOR!"
Han Hao laughed and turned around to look at Han Meng and Tiger Swordsman. The two elders frowned at their grand elder.
"What are you looking at?"
Han Meng grumbled, "You're crazy, Father. Sect Master is not going to like this. Life Sword Sect was found by the sword saint, and he was Sect Master Hua's ancestor. He won't disband his sect to serve Senior Florida Man."
"Well, we'll find out."
While Leo and the group chatted previously, Han Hao had been chatting with Hua Jiashan via voice transmission, which was a common skill of cultivators with at least one dao avatar.
Hua Jiashan promised Han Hao that he would return to chat with Leo. Han Hao was waiting for the sect master to be here.
Meanwhile, Leo shifted his attention to Xu Nuan. He believed that she might need her master's permission to move her people as well. Thus, he waited for the two big shots to arrive.
While waiting, Xu Nuan was curious about Leo's background. She boldly asked him, "Senior Florida Man. Since we will work for you, we wish to know more about you. Could you tell us about yourself?"
"Ah, an interview?" Leo snickered, "I'm supposed to interview you, not the other way around, though."
"Please satisfy our curiosity, senior. At least, we need to know who and what we are working for. What is your goal? Why are you expanding your domain? Where were you from? And how strong are you?"
Xu Nuan dropped the most important question that Han Hao and others were dying to know. They stopped talking to listen.
Leo looked at the group of old men and women. He deeply sighed and looked at Yao Qiqi, afraid that she might get bored as the adults forgot about her.
Betraying Leo's expectation, Yao Qiqi mumbled as if she was chatting with someone or something. Leo followed her gaze and found the reason.
The wooden mannequin spirit came out from his alien ring and sat in front of Yao Qiqi. They seemed to converse in a silent language that the others couldn't eavesdrop or hear.
Since Yao Qiqi was busy, Leo returned his attention to the group of elders. He briefly explained.
"As you've guessed, I'm not from this planet."
"I knew it!" Han Hao smacked his knees as he had predicted it. "Which immortal realm are you from, senior?"
'Immortal realm?'
Leo pursed his lips as he didn't remember that Earth had that fantasy background except for the mutated monsters and thick radiation gas.
Still, the strength of Earth's monsters, mutated insects, Godzillas, and Kaijus was a lot superior to the unicorns and the horn caimans of this realm. Even Situ Nantian couldn't hold a candle against one of them.
As Leo didn't know how to explain, he described the environment of Earth.
"It was a place with thick gas and huge monsters. Half of them are capable of injuring me while the other half can potentially kill me if I'm not careful."
Han Hao and Xu Nuan nodded as they could vividly picture the harsh environment of an immortal realm. Still, Xu Nuan wished to know the detail. She probed for more information.
"Which rank are they, senior? I heard the 10th-rank monster beast are immortal beasts, but we have never seen an 11th-rank or higher. Can you tell me the average strength of those monsters?"
Leo pursed his lips and counted his fingers. As he had no idea how the locals categorized a monster's strength, he told them the truth.
"I've never counted. Well, I know that they are immune to red lightning, but they can still die if black lightning hit them."
"R-R-RED LIGHTNING?! D-DO YOU MEAN RED LIGHTNING TRIBULATIONS?!"
Han Hao and Xu Nuan uttered in unison. As they were the most educated people in the group, they had studied a lot about heavenly tribulation lightning's variations.
Xu Nuan narrated her thoughts to make sure her knowledge matched Leo's.
"Senior. If I remember correctly, the red lightning tribulation is called the baptism of god. My sanctuary's ancestors and seniors who had already ascended to the immortal realms used to leave us with a note. They said that the gold lightning tribulation separated mortals and immortals apart. Orange lightning tribulation separates weak immortals from the strong, and the red lightning tribulation weeds out untalented immortals from reaching godhood."
"G-Godhood!?"
This time, Tiger Swordsman, Han Meng, and the other sanctuary's elders were shocked. They looked at Leo again as they had a sick hypothesis in their mind.
"S-Senior Florida Man. Are you god?!" Han Meng was the first to ask.
Leo smirked and sarcastically replied, "If red lightning bolts can make those Kaijus gods, then I'm probably a creator. Hell, I got killed and resurrected by black lightning bolts once. Y'all have no idea how nasty that black lightning bolts were. One direct hit is always game over."
"…"
The elders failed to comprehend what Leo talked about. As for Xu Nuan, she trembled in fear and respect.
"T-There's another color?"
Leo shrugged, "Black is the strongest from what I've been through. Red and orange are merely food for me."I think you should take a look at
"…"
Han Hao's face lost all color. He took several deep breaths and readdressed Leo's title.
"T-Then, Great Venerable Florida Man, are you from a deity realm?"
Hearing the question, Leo burst into laughter. He thought of his old world and pranked them, "Well, probably. Considering that the Dao of Florida is eternal and their will lives within me, you can say that Florida is the land of gods."
"!!!"
As soon as they heard the affirmative from Leo's mouth, all of them kneeled and prostrated to Leo. Everybody sweated profusely as they no longer dared to disrespect him or casually chat with him.
"Lord, sir! P-Please forgive us for the past offenses! We really didn't know that you are a deity!"
Xu Nuan even smacked her face, "Please forgive this insolent lady, Lord God! I-I overstepped my boundary! I shouldn't have asked you to take Yao Qiqi!"
"Huh?"
Leo's expression turned ugly. He thought about what he said and smacked his forehead. Correcting his mistakes, he tried to downplay his earlier sentences.
"Guys. That was a joke. I'm no god. I'm still a being with flesh and blood. See this?"
Proving that he was a mortal, Leo cut the tip of his finger with his nail and showed them his transparent blood. Little did he know that transparent blood was exclusive to immortals and higher beings, who cultivated the purest element essences.
"C-Clear blood!?"
"No, that's heaven's blood!"
The elders smacked their foreheads to the floor. They firmly believed that Leo was either a high-ranking deity or someone stronger than average immortals.
Seeing their reactions, Leo facepalmed. He thought to himself.
'Man, why are these people so stupid? Even the homeless zombies in San Fran are smarter than you!'
.
Because of the misunderstanding, Leo was treated like a king. No one dared to stand in front of Leo. Everybody still prostrated on the floor as Leo never told them to raise their heads or look up. The awkward silence continued for five minutes.
On the other hand, Yao Qiqi ignored the manner and clung to Leo's hand. As the adults stopped talking, she started chirping, monopolizing the conversation with Leo.
"Senior angel! Your dao avatar tells me that you bullied him. Did you do it?"
"Dao avatar?" Leo raised his eyebrows for a moment and remembered that he had a stalking mannequin ghost with his face. He snickered, "Do you mean the wood mannequin spirit that has my face?"
"Yes! He said that you almost killed him when he was born. He didn't understand why you bullied him when he tried to help you."
The adults eavesdropped the conversation. They looked up and sneaked a glance at Yao Qiqi, secretly praising her for initiating an interesting topic.
Leo looked at his ring and deeply sighed. He patted Yao Qiqi's head and sat next to her.
"Ah, that was a misunderstanding. I didn't know that he was my dao avatar at that time. I was in a bad mood because I didn't know what gnosis was, so I kinda mistook him as a local spirit."
Yao Qiqi pouted, "But you shouldn't treat him badly. You must apologize to him."
Leo paused to think for a few seconds. Then, he nodded, "Alright. I'll apologize to him. By the way, where is he?"
WHOOSH
The mannequin spirit manifested its body and stood in front of Leo. However, nobody but Leo and Yao Qiqi could see him.
The sentient dao avatar had a mind of its own like Thora, who was the dao avatar of Gao Yan. However, it didn't have a name as it was a newborn spirit.
The mannequin stared at Leo. Although his face was the same as his master's, he couldn't express himself well as he could only dully look at the other party.
Leo gazed at his own dao avatar. He took a deep breath and deeply sighed. Then, he lowered his head, bowing while sitting.
"I'm sorry. I didn't know that you were my dao avatar, and I harmed you."
Had it been in the past when Leo was a human, he would have never apologized to anybody. Instead, he would have made an excuse. But as he aged and lived in seclusion for years, the past mistakes always haunted him at night and when he found something nostalgic.
It hurt him. He wished that he could have thrown away his ego and acted like a decent human back then.
When Yao Qiqi reminded Leo that he should apologize, Leo had a flashback of his Karen self when he hurt others with his words. As he didn't want to become that stupid Florida Man again, he swallowed his pride and accepted his mistakes.
The dao avatar flinched when Leo apologized to him. Although he was angry and dissatisfied with Leo, the dao avatar's mood got better. He sat in front of Leo and raised his fist.
Leo noticed it. He fist-bumped the mannequin.
When their fists touched, Leo finally heard the mannequin's voice clearly.
'Learn some common sense of this world, you idiot.'
Leo bitterly smiled, "My bad. Yeah, I'm an idiot. By the way, are we cool?"
'Fine. No next time, though. If you do that to me again, I'll really ditch you.'
"Sorry about that. Anyway, what do you drink or eat? Tell me so I can feed you."
The mannequin finally revealed a bright smile. Then, he shocked Leo with his demand.
'Plant me somewhere and piss on me.'
"…"
Leo awkwardly glanced at Yao Qiqi. The girl pouted and yelled at the spirit.
"NO BAD WORDS! What are you saying in front of a six-year-old girl?!"
Leo & Dao Avatar: "…"

chapters.title: Chapter 111 Florida Man Evicts 100-Year-Old Elders From Nursing Home And Forces Them To Work In Sweatshop
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 111 – Florida Man Evicts 100-Year-Old Elders from Nursing Home and Forces Them to Work in Sweatshop
After making up with the dao avatar, Leo shifted his attention to the crowd. When he turned toward them, they gazed at Leo with sparkling eyes.
"V-Venerable Florida Man. Could you teach us what kind of dao you were talking about? Also, Yao Qiqi, can you see Venerable Florida Man's dao avatar?!"
Xu Nuan had heard a myth. Soul formation cultivators and genies could see another cultivator's hidden dao avatars, thus giving them an edge in combat over regular cultivators.
She had long noticed that Yao Qiqi always looked at empty spaces and talked to herself a lot. Xu Nuan was finally convinced that she was one of the gifted children who could naturally see dao avatars that normal people couldn't.
Before Leo or Yao Qiqi could reply, the sound of footsteps came from the upper floor. Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei finally arrived.
Hua Jiashan was surprised when he saw Han Hao and others on their knees. He was even more astonished when he saw a wooden dao avatar of Leo, which he couldn't detect before.
Dongfang Mei, on the other hand, frowned at Xu Nuan and her subordinates. She stared at Leo, suspecting that he bullied her people.
"What's going on here?" Dongfang Mei circulated her Qi to push her wheelchair forward.
Leo shifted his gaze to Dongfang Mei and stroked his beard. Leo had run into the woman and Hua Jiashan a few days ago, but he forgot about her.
"Who are you?"
"I'm… Eh?"
Dongfang Mei frowned as she noticed the dao avatar of Leo, who had the same face as him.
The dao avatar also looked at her. As soon as the avatar and Dongfang Mei faced each other, the former sensed the terrifying pressure of ten thousand immortal monster beasts beyond the 10th grade.
The mannequin spirit's aura represented the entire mystic realm. At a glance, he carried a bottomless amount of wood and earth element essence. But as Dongfang Mei looked at him carefully, she noticed his Yang Essence, which ceaselessly evolved and gave birth to new droplets of earth and wood essence droplets.
Dongfang Mei finally realized that Leo was not a mortal. No mortal's dao avatar could be this strong!
As Dongfang Mei already sat in a wheelchair, she couldn't kneel like the others. She lowered her head.
"This old woman is getting senile. Please forgive me for not recognizing you, Lord Immortal."
"Meh," Leo rolled his eyes as he got used to being called immortal. "Immortal this, venerable that, make up your mind. I'm tired of having too many titles!"
"T-Then, what should we call you?"
"Just Florida Man is fine!"
"O-Okay, senior Florida Man…"
Leo refused to tell them his real name. After all, he enjoyed it when people called him by that nickname. Moreover, it hid the fact that Leo had no surname.
He totally forgot about it. Even the system failed to search for the memory in his brain.
"Anyway", Leo looked at the two leaders. Since they were together, it was the right time for business. "I've talked to your subordinates, and I'm planning to migrate your people to my domain. I'll pay you accordingly. What do you think?"
Hua Jiashan already heard the detail from Han Hao. He was still reluctant as his mentors and ancestors entrusted the sect to him. He couldn't simply abandon it.
To make sure, Hua Jiashan asked Leo, "By migration, do you mean you will take all my sect's people? Are you trying to merge your domain with my sect, senior?"
"Yes, everybody. And yes, this is a takeover."
"Including the city?"
"Well, claiming the ownership of your city is too much. I only need workers, not citizens. But hey, if those people want to work for me, they have to get their resume ready. I don't have too many spots."
"…"
Hua Jiashan bitterly smiled. He looked at his people for a moment before he shook his head.
"I'm sorry, Sir Florida Man. The Life Sword Sect has a long tradition and inheritance. It belongs to the sword saint, and I can't disband it. I have to refuse. Even if I have to be the only member of my sect, I cannot join you."
Leo smirked. As a fellow old man, he knew exactly how other old men react when a stranger evicted them from their home. Obviously, they would always reject and resist.
It was not about the inheritance. Everything had to do with emotional attachment.
Leo nodded and crossed his arms. "But who said that I want to disband your sect. All I want is freaking manpower! Your goddamn sect can be a branch of my domain, and you can be the general manager if you want to cherish that inheritance."
Hua Jiashan was surprised. As long as he could protect the sect's name and continue its legacy, he had no problem with it. However, Hua Jiashan needed more insurance and detail.
"What about the sect's facilities and the portal, sir?"
"Meh, you can still keep doing what you have been doing, but the organization structure and the personal allocation will change. Some of your workers will be assigned to my domain."
"…Oh."
Hua Jiashan lowered his head. He deeply sighed and lamented his powerlessness.
He misunderstood Leo. He thought that Leo was the same as others.
'He's the same as Death Sword Sect and other sects. Well, this is what happens when the sect master is too weak. All my disciples and elders will be taken away, and the sect will be left abandoned in a few years. Hah…'I think you should take a look at
But Leo hadn't finished yet. He told Hua Jiashan the perks of merging the Life Sword Sect with his company.
"As compensation, I'll pay the wage of your elders, disciples, and workers. Your sect can keep whatever resources you have initially. All the wages will be essence stones."
"Eh?"
"As for you, the chairman of the Life Sword Sect, I'll pay you for the takeover. In my world, company board directors and owners sold their SHARES of their business for money. I won't rob you of your business."
While talking, Leo scanned through his spatial ring and searched for something to give to Hua Jiashan. He found several books, strange mirrors, and weapons in there. A few dimmed essence stones were in there as well.
After coming up with an idea, Leo pulled out a ring that he stole from Situ Nantian. There were plenty of talismans, essence stones, cultivation books, and random artifacts that Leo didn't know how to use.
"Take this first. When we get home, I'll pay you… 100,000 essence stones for the trouble. That should be enough for you to retire, right?"
"!!!"
Han Hao, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman looked at Hua Jiashan in envy. With that many essence stones, Hua Jiashan could live in luxury for the rest of his life.
Hua Jiashan was also taken aback and surprised. He didn't expect compensation for the takeover. Still, he accepted the ring and scanned through it.
When Hua Jiashan noticed the talismans and several artifacts of Situ Nantian, he sweated profusely.
"I-Isn't this killing array talismans of the Situ Clan? S-Sir Florida Man. How did you get these?"
"Oh, that?" Leo snickered as he thought of Situ Nantian, "A thief tried to steal my 10th-grade monster core from me, so I blasted that mofo's hand to pieces. I got these rings from him, you see?"
Leo showed them the four rings on his fingers.
"…"
The crowd went silent. Everybody's face lost all color as they connected the dots and learned something terrible.
Situ Clan was even bigger than the Ouyang Clan. Many of their ancestors were immortals, and they sometimes visited the clan to help them. Therefore, provoking the Situ Clan was worse than provoking the Ouyang Clan.
Hua Jiashan was scared that Leo might have harmed one of the Situ Clan's elders or members to get those rings. He rescanned the spatial ring in his hand to investigate its owner.
It wasn't hard to find the real owner of the ring. Among the artifacts, there was a personal item of Situ Nantian in the mix.
The sentient fishing pole that he loved the most got stuck in the bottom of the treasures.
"Umm…" Hua Jiashan pointed at the ring, "By chance, does the ring belong to Situ Nantian, sir?"
"Sitto, who? Sit on someone's face? What kind of mother names their child like that?"
"…"
Leo had no idea who Situ Nantian was, but the crowd had heard the name. It belonged to the previous Chancellor of the Imperial Court, who retired years ago. Moreover, Situ Nantian had a deep connection to the higher realm as his parents and children had already ascended.
The bystander of the conversation, Dongfang Mei, also had a lot of concerns. She couldn't stop sweating as this old man already poked a hornet's nest.
There might even be war!
Hua Jiashan facepalmed as he regretted joining Leo's pirate ship. Unfortunately, it was too late to change his mind since Leo already gave the ring to him.
The sect master made his decision. He took several deep breaths and voiced his thoughts, "Are you trying to make us join you so that we can fight in your war, sir?"
"What war?" Leo scratched his face, "What are you on about? Did you snort some coke on the way here?"
"Huh?"
Both Leo and Hua Jiashan were confused. The former didn't understand why Hua Jiashan mentioned war while the latter thought that Leo had everything planned.
Noticing that Leo was clueless, Hua Jiashan tried to affirm him.
"Umm, you've just provoked the Situ Clan, and they have many immortal backers. If they learn about it, they will come down to hunt you down, sir."
"REALLY?!"
Leo's pupils dilated. He bashfully rubbed his hands and grinned from ear to ear, "Why didn't you tell me earlier? Actually, let them come! I'll gladly welcome those idiots with a snap… I mean, with hospitality and hostility."
"…"
"You know what? Y'all should be happy since I'll be HARVESTING a lot from this little… visit. I won't pay you commission for inviting idiots to my domain, though."
"…"
"Anyway, back to the topic," Leo changed the subject. "In case you're worried about your mystic realm portal, you can still keep it if you can. Once you migrate to my domain, you can always access my domain's portal. Oh, have I told you that there will be a permanent portal linking to this realm? There will be no requirement or limit since this planet is already mine."
"WHAT?!"
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei's brains couldn't digest all the information at once. Their eyes span, and their minds went blank.
While the crowd was silent, Leo kept talking. He briefly explained the payment, working days, and employee welfare.

chapters.title: Chapter 112 The Congress Denied The Threat Of Functioning Alien Spaceship After Florida Man Fired Death Star Beam From Excavated Spaceship In His Backyard
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 112 – The Congress Denied the Threat of Functioning Alien Spaceship after Florida Man Fired Death Star Beam from Excavated Spaceship in His Backyard
After the long sale pitch, Hua Jiashan finally surrendered. However, he asked Leo if he could keep operating the Life Sword Sect as a sword school, which Leo had no issue with that.
Leo turned to Dongfang Mei, wondering if she would be interested to join him.
"What about you? Will you move your sanctuary to my territory? We have a permanent mystic realm portal, and we have essence stones."
Dongfang Mei bitterly smiled. She had seen many men soliciting her and her people for their selfish agenda. From her perspective, Leo was similar to those men.
Still, Dongfang Mei could tell the differences between lecherous old men and sincere ones. Leo had a weird playful and naïve demeanor, which young boys usually had. She didn't detect any lewd air from him.
As Dongfang Mei hadn't known Leo for long enough, she planned to wait and see. The elder raised her finger and was about to decline the offer.
"SMASH!!"
A certain weird unicorn interrupted their conversation. The loud voice of Taxi came from a distance, followed by a thunderous noise of an explosion.
A shockwave of the explosion hit the pagoda. The entire structure trembled while dust fell from the ceiling. Everybody stopped talking. Then, they looked through the windows, gazing at the north.
Far of a distance, Taxi had been fighting with a flying black caiman. As both creatures could use thunder and lightning, their fight was loud.
Leo deeply sighed as he recognized the unicorn. Worrying that the horse might lose, he rubbed his ring and searched for the red flying sword.
"Hmm? Ah, silly me. I forgot."
He forgot that he jumped off the sword. It was not in his spatial ring. In addition, Leo had no clue how to retrieve it remotely.
While rumbling through the pocket space in his spatial rings, Leo found the spare handgun that he had purchased earlier. He also had a magazine full of rubber bullets.
As Leo couldn't go there to help Taxi, he could at least provide a covering fire. He pulled out his handgun and unlocked the safety. Then, he took aim.
Dongfang Mei, Hua Jiashan, and the elders were curious about Leo's newest artifact as they had never seen it before. The pistol's structure, shape, and utility were foreign to them.
WHOOSH
Leo charged the pistol with his Qi thread. Like before, it emitted rainbow light.
He measured the distance and calculated the caiman's movement speed. Unfortunately, they were at least 200 kilometers away from the pagoda, and it seemed impossible to accurately hit anything.
Leo pondered if he should just YOLO and fire it. He pursed his lips and lowered his gun.
"Senior, what are you doing?" Asked Hua Jiashan.
Leo took a deep breath and ignored the crowd. He silently ordered his system.
'Upgrade the gun to level 8.'
<Affirmative.>
The gun's appearance remained the same. However, the materials of the pistol were no longer polymer or metal. The alloy transformed into something else entirely, which didn't exist on Earth.
Leo rubbed the CZ 75 in his hand and sensed the similarity between his blood and the mysterious gun frame.
'This should do it.'
Betting on the newly upgraded pistol, Leo aimed again. This time, he filled the rubber round with his Qi threads until it was full.
He pulled the trigger.
PSHHHHHHHHHHHHUUUUUUUU
The weird sound of the pistol was the only thing everybody heard before Leo took one step backward because of the absurd recoil.
Because of the whizzed noise and Leo's action, nobody paid attention to the result of the shot, except Leo.
"Senior, umm, can you explain what you have been doing?" Again, Hua Jiashan wished to learn more about the artifact in Leo's hands.
Leo deeply sighed and gazed at the smoking pistol. It was overheated, and the entire gun frame was bright red. He then looked up and checked the result.
The rubber round was indeed fired.  However, no explosion or flashy atomic bomb erupted.
'Weird. I thought I would have fired a laser beam or Death Star's cannon. This thing seems lackluster…'
BOOOOOOOOM
When Leo gave up on the gun, a rainbow light flashed from the north. The explosion was round and small, but the light was too bright.
A small white hole was created, which repelled every object nearby outward and emanated blinding light.
All elders either covered or closed their eyes as they couldn't see through the light. Only Leo brazenly gazed into the blinding flashbang of his little bomb. His pupils were so small that they almost disappeared.
"Odd."
Leo put the gun away and walked to a window to get a better look. He stood there for several minutes.
It took ten minutes before the light subsided. When the rainbow light faded from the sky, everybody could open their eyes to see the result.
"What happened?"
The elders rushed to the windows to gaze toward the north, where Leo had launched a mysterious object toward that location.
The horned caiman was gone. Rather, it was evaporated to nothingness. The white hole also vanished and left behind the remnant of carnage and the destruction power of an immortal.
"SMASH T-T"
The unicorn wobbly flew toward the pagoda. Its speed was a lot slower than usual as it only sprinted in the sky with the speed of sound.
When Taxi got closer, Leo noticed something hilarious. He burst into laughter.
The white gorgeous unicorn was charred black. Instead of calling him a graceful unicorn, he became a "Nightmare".
"Ay, yo, Taxi! I didn't know you were black. I always thought you were white!"
Taxi approached the pagoda and entered it through a window. He glanced at Leo and snorted.
"SMASH!! D:"
"No, I didn't mean to sound racist, but boy, you look gorgeous in black!"
"SMASH!!! D:<"
"Sorry, sorry. I won't use that term anymore. Anyway…"
Leo giggled and pointed his finger and Taxi. He ordered his cancer cells to use water element essence and Qi to produce fresh water.
PHOOSH
His fingers became high-pressured water hose. They sprayed beams of water and wiped away the black dust that dirtied Taxi's skin.
Taxi smiled and let Leo bathe him. A few minutes later, he was cleaned.
"Done!"
Leo pointed one of his fingers at his mouth and drank a few gulps of water. Then, he disabled the water jet stream ability.
"Smash <3"
"You're welcome, boy."
"Smash!"
Taxi nudged his head at Leo's face. The latter also patted the horse.I think you should take a look at
While petting the pony, Leo recalled that he hadn't finished the deal yet. He turned around to resume the topic.
"Umm, sorry for the distraction. Anyway, Ma'am. Will your sanctuary move to my domain?"
"…"
Dongfang Mei looked back and forth between Leo and Taxi. The corners of her mouth curved up. Even Xu Nuan and others began to giggle as they figured out the nature of Leo's character.
Not only the unicorns loved virgin men and women, but they also followed people with pure hearts. If this unicorn showed affection toward Leo, the latter couldn't be a vile old man.
Dongfang Mei stopped being on guard. If this unicorn was this obedient, then she could trust Leo.
"Senior Florida Man, our Amazonian Sanctuary will move to your domain. We will migrate the outer disciples, initiates, and children to your domain first to build a shelter for us. Then, we'll plan about future projects later."
Hearing that Dongfang Mei approved of the merge, Leo was overjoyed. With more workers, he could expand his farms beyond the boundary of his domain.
"Alright! Well, for now, you should bring your people back to your sect and sanctuary. We can come back to this mystic realm whenever we want anyway."
Hua Jiashan, Han Hao, Dongfang Mei, Xu Nuan, and the other elders brightly smiled as they no longer had to be cautious about the time limit and the quota anymore. They bowed to Leo and bid farewell. Yao Qiqi also said goodbye to Leo and followed her mentor back.
.
After the group was gone, Leo wiped his sweat and deeply sighed.
The day was long. At first, he almost fought Xu Nuan for trying to give him Yao Qiqi. Fortunately, they cleared up the misunderstandings, and Leo managed to persuade them to merge their sects with his future company.
'I'm done with this quest. I should go back and check the store.'
Leo thought of Cat and the hundred unicorn friends of Taxi. He was concerned that the little plant girl might get bullied by those nasty ponies.
"Taxi, can you help me find my lost flying sword? I dropped it somewhere in the town."
"Smash?"
"Yeah, I don't know how to pilot flying swords. Wait, what do you mean by "Marking the artifact"?"
"Smash? Smash!"
Taxi smirked and mocked Leo for being stupid. He then explained how human cultivators and monster beasts could claim ownership of magic items, artifacts, and treasures by using their Qi and essence.
Similar to spatial rings, artifacts of this world could be locked and branded. Only a stronger cultivator or the owners could erase the brands and make the artifacts their own. Once branded with their Qi, new owners could remotely summon them with a thought.
After learning the new information, Leo was inspired. He slapped Taxi's leg to thank him.
"Man, what could I do without your advice? You're really helpful, dude."
"Smash :E"
Taxi showed Leo his ugly smile once again.
.
After retrieving the missing flying sword with Taxi's help, Leo rode on the horse's back, heading back to the starting point.
When Leo arrived at the campsite, Gao Yan was no longer around. Only Wu Buyi was present. However, he looked exhausted for a certain reason. His cheeks sank, and there were black rings under his eyes. In addition, his right arm was strangely swelled as if he only used it to work out for a long period.
Leo gave Wu Buyi a disgusted look.
"Did you have fun, Wu Buyi?"
Wu Buyi snapped back to his senses. Although exhausted, he smiled at Leo and kowtowed.
"My lord! Your artifact is amazing! I've learned a lot from this artifact! I no longer need women anymore!"
Leo facepalmed, regretting that he accidentally corrupted this alchemist.
"Don't overdo it."
"Haha! Don't worry, my lord. We, cultivators, are not like commoners! Normal men can only do it once or twice a day on average, but cultivators like us can squeeze a hundred rounds with ease!"
"…"
Leo silently gazed at Wu Buyi's shelter. Although he couldn't see inside, his nose already caught the unpleasant scent from the deeds.
Not wanting to continue discussing the private activity, Leo changed the subject.
"Where is Gao Yan?"
"Oh," Wu Buyi finally remembered that he left Gao Yan alone for too long. He looked around, but he couldn't find him.
Upon realizing that Gao Yan was not in the camp, Wu Buyi sweated profusely.
"Umm, senior. Do you know where Gao Yan is?"
"…"
Leo quietly pulled out a paper fan and smacked Wu Buyi's head.
"THAT'S WHY I'M ASKING YOU! YOU'RE SUPPOSED TO ANSWER MY QUESTION, NOT ASK ME THE SAME QUESTION I ASKED YOU!"
"EEP! I'M SORRY!"
Leo smacked Wu Buyi a few more times as this idiot needed some whipping.
.
.
Meanwhile, Gao Yan strolled in the forest, following the instructions of his sentient dao avatar.
The spirit girl brought Gao Yan across the south river and entered a secret cave, where another ruin was located. Thora pointed at the cave and narrated the backstory of her ancestor.
'This was the place where the previous lightning element spirit queen resided. She was also the creator of those lewd unicorns and horned caimans.'
"Wow."
'And under this cave, we also hid a great artifact. Follow me. I'll show you something good!'
"Okay, okay. Don't rush!"
The two entered the cave together. A few minutes later, Gao Yan walked through the natural cave and descended to the underground level.
Walking further into the underground cave, Gao Yan discovered an underground area. The underground dome was 20 meters tall and covered 20,000 square meters.
There was also something in the middle.
ραΠdαsΝοvel.cοm "T-This!!"
Gao Yan stopped his feet as he gazed at the gigantic metal saucer structure in the middle of the dome room.
Had Leo been there, he would have screamed in shock. It was an alien spaceship!
Thora flew into the mysterious alien ship.
PSHOOOSH
A few seconds later, a portion of the ship moved, opening a door for Gao Yan to get in.
'Come in, master. I know an artifact that you can use.'

chapters.title: Chapter 113 Florida Teen Discovers Real Lightsaber In Alien Spaceship And Claims Ownership. Star Wars Fans Riots.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 113 – Florida Teen Discovers Real Lightsaber in Alien Spaceship and Claims Ownership. Star Wars Fans Riots.
Entering the alien spaceship, Gao Yan found an airtight room. After entering it, the gate behind him closed, trapping him inside.
Air was sucked out, and the walls sprayed Gao Yan with white fume. He coughed as he accidentally inhaled some of the fumes.
WHOOSH
A new door was open, revealing Thora on the other side. While floating, she waved her hand and invited Gao Yan in.
'Come in! Follow me!'
"O-Okay?"
Gao Yan looked around and admired the interior of the spaceship. The passage was narrow, but the ceiling was high. Only one person could walk through the corridor at a time.
Along the way, Gao Yan noticed a few sealed metal doors. At the top right corner of each door, strange labels told Gao Yan what the room was for. However, he could not read the language.
He looked up and stared at the thin line of glasses. They were the only source of light in here. Despite being in a sealed area, the air wasn't stale, and Gao Yan could feel the airflow.
"This place is strange. There is no window, but I smell fresh air."
Following Thora, Gao Yan took a left turn and walked along the passageway. At the end of the walkway, Gao Yan found another closed metal door.
'Here! The artifact is stored here!'
Gao Yan nodded and touched the door. However, it didn't open.
Thora giggled and pointed at the glowing green glass on a pedestal next to the wall.
'Touch that first. Inject your lightning element Qi into the glass, and it should recognize you.'
"Really?"
Gao Yan turned toward the console panel near the wall. He tried as Thora had instructed him.
BEEP
The console panel turned red. The monitor on the panel also showed a message that Gao Yan couldn't read.
<Access Denied.>
Thora frowned. She floated toward the panel.
'Odd. A few days ago, it still recognized anyone with lightning Qi.'
She put her hand on the panel and tested it.
BEEP
<Access Denied.>
'Huh?' Thora was confused. Her expression turned ugly, 'Why?! It still worked when a few days ago!'
She tried it for the second time. However, it prompted an additional message, which only Thora could read.
<Access Denied. The engine room will be temporarily locked for security measures.>
'WHAT?!' Thora was frustrated and discharged static electricity around her. Branches of light flashed and hit the ceiling and the walls.
As Thora was afraid of losing face, she rushed into the room, phasing through the metal door.
Gao Yan had no idea what went wrong as he had never seen a spaceship before. He scratched his head and patiently waited for the sentient element spirit to return.
Two minutes passed.
Ten minutes passed.
30 minutes went by, and Thora finally walked through the door and returned to Gao Yan's side. She was crestfallen.
'I'm so sorry, master.'
Gao Yan tilted his head and wryly smiled, "I don't know what's going on. Did something happen?"
'Well, yes. The place no longer recognizes me or visitors as guests anymore. I tried to unlock the door from the other side, but it said that we need permission from the new owner of this realm.'
"New owner of this realm? Who?"
'That… I don't know. As a matter of fact, I'm as confused as you, master.'
Thora was sad. In the engine room, there was a large soul stone, which provided endless energy for the spaceship. She planned to let Gao Yan consume it so that he would obtain some life force and energy.
Soul stones were the upgraded version of essence stones. Immortals and immortal beasts usually nested around them as they never stopped producing element essence for them to cultivate and consume. A finger-sized soul stone could provide 1000-essence-stone's worth of energy while a bigger one contained more.
As Thora couldn't bring the massive soul stone to Gao Yan with her power, she could only blame her bad luck.
Meanwhile, Gao Yan had no clue about soul stones or any potential treasure. He snickered.
"It's fine. I'm glad you worry about me. Well, since we can't take it, we should check somewhere else. Maybe, we can find the owner of this place and get his permission."
Thora pouted, 'I doubt the owner would give it to us.'
"Haha. True. Anyway, what about the spirit queen? Where did she live? You mentioned her before."
'Oh, right! This way. Follow me.'
"Is she still alive?"
'She already ascended to heaven realm. She's beyond the immortal realm now.'
"Wow. So, she's a deity? She's an elemental goddess now?"
'Hehe. You can say that.'
Thora puffed her chest as she was proud of her spirit queen. She forgot to watch her steps and phased through a wall by an accident. She quickly came back and resumed guiding Gao Yan to another room.
After walking 100 meters, Thora stood in front of another sealed door. Above the door, a label was written in English.
Hydroponics Lab
Thora glanced at the label and sighed. She missed her kin and her sisters back home.
Unlike the engine room, the hydro lab's door was automatic. It opened when Gao Yan got close.
Gao Yan and Thora were relieved. Entering the lab, Gao Yan found an oxygen power plant. Arrays of greeneries, such as algae, vegetables, and fruit plants, were sealed in glass tubes. They were lined up in rows and columns, which occupied 70% of the room.
At the center of the room, the largest tube was empty. However, the bottom of the glass tube was charred as if something wrong had happened in there.
Thora phased through the glass tube and floated inside. She introduced her home.
'This is where I and the previous spirit queen lived. Isn't this place lovely?'
Gao Yan looked around in astonishment. He had never seen someone storing random plants, moss, and green patches in a container before.
"But aren't these grasses worthless? I'm an alchemist. Those things in the glasses are just common plants and moss. We can find these everywhere in a moist area."
Thora pouted, 'But they were essential for our former masters. They used these so they could breathe, you know?'
"But cultivators and immortals don't need to breathe, right? We can survive without air for months if we want to hold our breath."
'You're stupid, master. This place is a guesthouse for air-breathing creatures like regular humans and beasts. Without these plants, there would have been no air!'
"Huh?"
Thora changed the topic. She phased through the center glass and pointed at a small metal stick, which was buried under the plants.
'Since we can't get you the soul stone, you should be able to use that. Pick that up, master.'
Gao Yan looked at the plant and found a metallic hilt or a handle of something. He pulled it off the grass and removed the dirt. Then, he inspected the item.
The white cylinder-shaped hilt was two-inch thick and one foot long. Gao Yan gripped it, and he found it perfect for his hand. Strangely, there was a flip button on it, but the button was broken.
Thora looked at the cylinder hilt's button and frowned. She grumbled, 'I guess this is busted, too. What a shame.'
"What is this, Thora?"
'A sword.'
"A sword?"
'An artifact that immortals can kill for, master. Oh, I know that the button is broken, but can you try injecting your lightning Qi into it? Maybe, we can reactivate it with your Qi instead of using its internal energy.'
"…"
Gao Yan nodded and injected his Qi into it. Then, he started feeling the suction force, drawing in his energy and Qi.
A second later, the suction power intensified. Gao Yan felt like his blood gathered in his hand, which was holding the object.
BZZZZ
He regretted injecting his Qi into it. The mysterious cylinder hilt drained 90% of his Qi within seconds, and it demanded more. Even Thora sensed the crisis.
'Master, I'm sorry! Stop!'
Gao Yan gritted his teeth and let go of the hilt. Taking two steps back, Gao Yan stared at the artifact while holding his right hand.
The palm, which held the hilt earlier, was burnt. A layer of his skin came off, and faint smoke emanated from his heated hand.
The artifact glowed in green light. A small panel on the bottom of the hilt glowed and showed strange symbols, which represented numbers.
Thora read the number and giggled, 'Master, you barely charged the artifact. You need to do it 99 more times.'
"Huh?! I need to do that again?!"
'Well, yes. It runs out of battery. We need to fuel it with lightning Qi until it's full so that we can repair the artifact.'
Thora also tried to touch the hilt, but her hands went through it. She pouted as she couldn't contribute to the object's battery.
'But I think it should be enough for demonstration. Master, pick it up again and try to press into the hole over here.'
"…"
Gao Yan was reluctant this time. Yet, he picked it up and looked at the broken switch.
Its switch was missing. However, Gao Yan used his nails and finger to press inside the object.
'Oh, by the way, master. If I were you, I would point the tip and the bottom of that thing away from your body… Whoops.'
The warning came too late. Gao Yan successfully activated the artifact.
A distinctive hum echoed in the room. Green beams came from the top and the bottom of the hilt.
FFFFFSSSKKRRRSH
"OW!"
The beam of the lightsaber staff slightly grazed Gao Yan's arm by accident. He dropped it on the ground for the second time.
FFSSHEEEW
The lightsaber was deactivated.
Gao Yan widened his eyes and looked at Thora. He was shocked by the tool.
"WHAT WAS THAT?!"
Thora smirked and laughed at Gao Yan, 'A staff sword, master. You are also a swordsman, right? This artifact should suit you. Use this and the gun that the senior gave you, you should be invincible under the immortal realm. Oh, have I told you that this sword staff can also kill 10th-grade monster beasts and low-rank immortals?'

chapters.title: Chapter 114 NSA Agents Files Lawsuit Against Florida Man For Riding Unicorn Into Area 51
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 114 – NSA Agents Files Lawsuit against Florida Man for Riding Unicorn into Area 51
Floating over Leo's camp was Wu Buyi. He scanned the forest with his Qi, searching for Gao Yan's whereabouts. He also brought out a life candle of the disciple, holding it and gazing at the flame.
The life candle's fire fluttered and flickered as the strong wind in the sky threatened to blow it. The west wind hit Wu Buyi's face. However, the tip of the flame didn't point toward the east according to the wind.
It pointed south.
Wu Buyi smiled as he finally found where Gao Yan went. He put the candle away and descended. After landing on the ground, Wu Buyi reported his findings to Leo.
"My lord. I've found my disciple. He's just south of here."
Leo rolled his eyes, "Just go and find him, then. He's your disciple, so it's your responsibility."
"O-Of course. I'll go fetch him right away. B-But, my lord. I'm afraid of the local beasts. They're a lot stronger than me. Could you go with me?"
Leo had already scared most of the dangerous animals away, and it was impossible for Wu Buyi to get ambushed. Seeing how useless Wu Buyi was, Leo deeply sighed.
"Lead the way. I'll follow you."
"Okay!"
Wu Buyi brought out Gao Yan's life candle again and followed the flame. Leo hopped on Taxi's back and patted the horse.
"Follow him."
"Smash!"
The group flew south to the area that they had never explored before.
.
While riding Taxi, Leo opened the system's domain menu and checked the map.
BEEP
As Leo had expected, a green dot, which represented Gao Yan, was only 10 kilometers south of the camp. With Taxi's speed, they should reach the destination in a minute.
Unfortunately, Wu Buyi was slow. Because of the slowpoke, Taxi decreased his speed to match him.
As Leo was bored sitting and doing nothing, he fiddled with the upgraded handgun. He also rechecked the remaining rubber bullets in the magazine.
CLICK
He reloaded the pistol and looked around, searching for something to shoot for fun. However, no creature was in sight.
Noticing that no one was there to entertain him, Leo put the gun away. He admired the scenery instead.
In the south, it was close to the edge of the continent. The land was mostly covered in rainforests and small hills. A large river cut through the south mountain range, creating a mysterious passage toward the sea.
Aside from the canyon, no other landmark was noteworthy.
As there was nothing to do, Leo gazed at the forest. He changed his mindset and thought of a way to use this world.
'A farmland? Eh, no. I shouldn't clear the entire forest. I should leave some for the local beasts and the future tourists. I can collect entrance fees from the visitors and let them play there. Since this will be a tourist spot, I shouldn't build a warehouse around here to attract looters. Another branch of a convenience store or a tavern is better. Oh, can I build a livestock shed here?'
Thinking of the building, Leo tested his domain system if he could build anything in this world.
DING
Surprisingly, he could.
"!!!"
Leo almost stood up. He pressed the domain map menu to see the grid map. A new window popped up in front of him.
The entire continent was within Leo's territory!
"…Too bad."
Unfortunately, every grid had a lock icon on them. When Leo pressed the lock icons, the system prompted him with a message.
<Please activate a permanent portal from your Mystic Realm Portal first.>
In short, Leo had to return to the other world before he could use this function.
Leo found it fair. Having a minor condition might be inconvenient, but it was insignificant to him. He planned to go back and update the portal platform anyway.
While Leo was absentminded, Wu Buyi reached the destination. He pointed at a cave near a hill.
"Over there, my lord!"
Leo came back to his senses. He looked at the hill and frowned.
It was strangely round. Rather, it looked like a dome instead of a natural mountain or hill. Moreover, no tree or plant grew on this bald hill.
Taxi and Wu Buyi landed on the ground. Leo jumped off the horse and walked toward the dome-like hill. Then, he leaped on top of it.
"Umm, my lord. The cave entrance is over here," Wu Buyi pointed at the natural cave, which led a path into the hill.
Leo ignored Wu Buyi and stared at the green grass under his feet. He took his shoes off and touched them with his skin.
No grass mutated upon touch.
Seeing the result, Leo frowned. He pulled a stalk of grasses to see up close. Then, he put one in his mouth and chewed it.
It tasted like plastic!
This was not natural grass. It was artificial!
Leo spat the plastic grass and threw the fake stalk away. He squatted and began uprooting the other grasses.
As Leo pulled harder, a square patch of fake ground and grasses came off, revealing the structure of a dome underneath.
"Hohoh?"
Leo smiled at the hidden metallic dome under the fake grasses. Finding it interesting, Leo peeled the other square patches and threw them away.
Seeing that Leo did something interesting, Taxi jumped on the dome and helped Leo peel the cover. As for Wu Buyi, he watched the duo in silence.
With two workers working together, Leo and Taxi managed to remove artificial grasses and fake dirt from the dome. When they finished, Leo sat on Taxi's back and ordered it to hover over it.
Looking at it from above, Leo's smile widened. He smirked at the structure as he had a rough idea of what it was.
The dome reminded him of a stadium's roof or a cover of an underground missile silo in sci-fi movies. Leo leaned toward the latter as a distinctive line, which split the dome in half, could be seen from above. It was obvious that the dome should be able to open in half and release whatever was under it.
"Well, well, well. What do we have here? I thought I'm in a fantasy world, but I've found a trace of high-tech civilization. What a combination!"
Leo rubbed his hands and jumped down. He landed on top of the dome, after which he sat and rubbed the metal surface. Then, he lightly knocked it.
DONG-DONG
The dome was slightly dented, but it produced a crisp sound like a giant bell.
Again, Leo rubbed his hands. He looked forward to seeing an ICBM missile or a modern silo underground.
"Lead the way, Wu Buyi! I'll follow you."
"…"
Wu Buyi was confused, but he nodded. He sneaked glances at the metal dome as he found it weird. In his mind, he thought about the ruins of other civilizations that he always saw in other mystic realms.
"Eh, it's just one of those ruins. Since it's made of metal, I bet it's another fire or metal type. I wonder what kind of artifact we can scavenge from this place," Wu Buyi muttered and proceeded into the natural cave.
Taxi was also curious. It followed Wu Buyi into the cave first.
Leo walked after them and licked his lips. But before he entered the cave, he paused and opened the domain system's map.
On the map, a group of ten red dots gathered at his campsite. Another 10 red dots were also 500 meters north of Leo's current location.
Noticing the guests, Leo turned around. He was about to go back and welcome the uninvited visitors. But the next second, Leo smacked his forehead as he remembered that he couldn't collect the compensation or lifespan until he properly build the permanent portal at the platform.
"Man. Consider yourself lucky. If you leave me alone, I'll leave you alone."
Leo turned around and entered the cave. He prayed that those people wouldn't mess with his exit portal and them.
.
.
500 meters away from the artificial hill's cave was a group of the second prince's expedition team. As for the other group at Leo's camp, they were the first prince's team. The first prince and the second prince were with their teammates, and they formed an alliance to work together in this realm.
The second prince was led by Yan Long, the second prince himself. He brought his aide and servants over to search for treasures and usable herbs.
So far, the second prince managed to defeat two cockatrices. They also kept their corpses in the prince's spatial ring. Aside from the monster subjugation, they managed to harvest a ton of useful herbs in the forest.
While searching for more herbs and goodies, Yan Long's group discovered Leo's trace by chance and had been following him. They found Leo's den, but they didn't get anything useful from the camp. Thus, they abandoned the camp and left it to the first prince's party to search next.
After following Leo, they soon caught up to him and his team.
"Your Highness, that old man with the thunder unicorn has just entered a ruin. Should we follow them?" Yan Long's aide informed his master.
Yan Long looked like a man in his mid-30s. He had a trimmed full beard, and his long black hair was tied and hidden under a gold pheasant headwear on top of his head. Despite having a dandy beard, his narrow eyes and thin eyebrows made him look like a cunning character in anime. Because of his narrow eyes, his handsomeness was degraded by a tier.
His gold armor was the symbol of the royal family. The left shoulder guard was in the shape of a dragon's head while the right had the face of a tiger. However, they emanated the aura of an immortal as an immortal blacksmith refined the armor for him.
With the armor, Yan Long was confident in his survivability against a quasi-immortal. In addition, he also had the deadliest talismans from the Situ Clan, which was capable of killing any non-immortal of this world.
Because of his confidence, Yan Long made a bold decision.
"Follow them into the ruin. If they somehow find a good treasure, we'll use our status to extract their spatial rings and their loot. But if they aren't that interesting, we'll just give an excuse that we accidentally run into them and leave them alone."
"Do we have to fight, your highness?"
"Probably not. They only have two people – One nascent soul and one quasi-immortal. We have 10 soul transformation cultivators on our side and the immortal killing array talismans. If we have to fight, we can't lose."
"…"
The subordinates still hesitated. However, the prince already flew toward the hill.
Without a choice, the aide and the soldiers followed their master to the dome.
.
.
Using the life candle, Wu Buyi beelined toward Gao Yan's location. After walking for five minutes, he was in front of a weird metal saucer structure.
Taxi and Leo reached the place later. But when Leo noticed the UFO-like spaceship, he exclaimed.
"YEEHAW! We hit the jackpot!"
Wu Buyi wryly smiled as he was confused, "How so, my lord?"
"It depends on that ship's technology levels. If it surpasses my old world, we're in for gold. But if it's inferior to the spaceship I came from, it might be useless."
"Sa-Pace-Ship?" Wu Buyi couldn't pronounce the word.
Leo stepped forward and walked closer to the spaceship. However, there was no gate or entrance for them to enter. The gang began rubbing and knocking the metal, looking for a way to enter it.

chapters.title: Chapter 115 Florida Man Riding Unicorn On Highway While Fleeing From Area 51’S Military Tanks Gets Caught On Video
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 115 – Florida Man Riding Unicorn on Highway While Fleeing from Area 51's Military Tanks Gets Caught on Video
Wu Buyi was clueless about technology. Thus, it was natural that he failed to figure out a way to enter. As for Leo, he had a better understanding of science, but he couldn't find a device or clue.
After fiddling with the ship's surface for an hour, both men gave up looking for a way in. They gathered in front of the spaceship, looking at the ceiling and the underground interior.
"Should I just smash it?" Leo rubbed his chin. He wondered if he should crack the ship open and brute-force his way in.
Wu Buyi brought out the life candle of Gao Yan and rechecked the latter's location.
The flame's tip pointed at the spaceship. Obviously, Gao Yan was inside.
"Is he abducted or captured?" Wu Buyi was concerned.
Leo opened the domain's mini-map and found a green dot in front of him. He pressed the system screen and zoomed in. Then, the system mini-map showed the portrait of Gao Yan, who was moving from the center of the ship toward them.
"Nah, I don't think so." Leo closed his system map, "He should be coming out soon."
"Really?"
"Any minute now."
The men gazed at the spaceship and silently waited.
TOK-TOK
While they waited, they heard the footsteps of people coming from the passageway behind them. Taxi and Wu Buyi looked back, but Leo remained unfazed.
Yan Long and his entourage entered the cave and caught up to them.
Wu Buyi gulped as he couldn't measure their cultivation base and strength. He roughly figured that they were at least the soul formation stage at the minimum. Because of the strength gap, Wu Buyi took three steps back and hid behind Leo and Taxi.
Taxi, on the other hand, glanced at the people and scoffed. A 9th-stage thunder unicorn like him was capable of killing newborn immortals, so 10 soul transformation cultivators were nothing to him. Moreover, Leo, who was stronger than Taxi, was here. The pony believed there was nothing to fear.
As for Leo, he didn't think much of the group. As long as they weren't as stupid as Situ Nantian, Ouyang Long, and Ouyang Ting, he was willing to spare them.
Meanwhile, the second prince finally got to see Leo. His eyes swept around the room and scanned through the transparent dao avatar of Wu Buyi and Leo.
Wu Buyi's hidden dao avatar was a fire spirit and a cauldron. As their strength was limited to the nascent soul stage, Yan Long scoffed and ignored them. He checked Taxi's dao avatar next.
Upon sensing Taxi's aura and his dao avatar, Yan Long smacked his lips. He ordered his men.
"Tsk. 9th-rank thunder unicorn. Men, abort the plant. Don't do anything stupid."
Leo and others overheard that. The former snorted in disgust while Wu Buyi was relieved. As for Taxi, he sneered at the group of cowards and looked away.
Yan Long flinched as he noticed the disdain in Taxi and Leo's eyes. His expression turned cold as he held a grudge against Leo for looking down on them.
The second prince exerted his authority.
"My name is Yan Long, the second prince of the Yan Empire. Senior, this ruin is now under the jurisdiction of the imperial court. Our forces will escort you out, and we'll take the risks exploring this ruin in your stead."
Wu Buyi's face was as white as a sheet as he was afraid of the imperial court and the royalty. He tugged Taxi's mane, begging the horse to protect him.
Taxi and Leo didn't bother looking at the group. Because Yan Long was rude, Leo had no reason to feed the troll or interact with them. The man and horse continued waiting for Gao Yan to come out.
Noticing that he was ignored, Yan Long's eyes reddened in anger. He crossed his hands behind his back, but he secretly summoned immortal killing talismans from his spatial rings.
"Senior, I'll say this again. We will take over the responsibility of exploring this ruin. You don't need to waste your precious time on something unknown. This isn't our first time dealing with the remnant of a lost civilization."
Finally, Yan Long uttered something interesting. Leo stroked his beard and turned around.
"Did you say this isn't your first time?"
"Correct," Yan Long sneered. "I bet you don't know how to access that building."
Leo suddenly burst into laughter, "Building, you say? PFFT, yeah, right. BUILDING! FUHAHAHAHA!!"
"…"
Blood gathered in Yan Long's face, and he clenched his fists. He almost activated the talismans because of anger, but he held it in.
"Would you like me to continue being courteous, or would you like me to be more direct?" Yan Long glanced at his men and gestured for them to prepare to attack if necessary.
Leo turned toward them and crossed his arms. He walked 10 steps, approaching the arrogant prince.
"Stop being a hypocrite and say it to my face, kid."
"Very well."
Yan Long smirked and walked 10 steps forward, challenging Leo. As they got close their height difference was more noticeable.
Leo was 6'3 while Yan Long was only 5'11. Even though the prince seemed bulky because of his armor, Leo seemed more aesthetic as his refined muscle looked better underneath the robes.
In short, Leo's size alone won the unspoken charisma contest.
Noticing how Leo was taller and bigger, Yan Long narrowed his eyes for a moment. He then replied in a crisp voice.
"What I'm trying to say is… Scram or die, idiot."
"That's a lot better."
Leo snickered and took off his rubber gloves. He patted Yan Long's head and leaned closer. Then, he whispered.
"Unfortunately, you're already dead, boy."
"Is that so? BUT THE DEAD PERSON IS YOU!!" Yan Long sneered. The next moment, his hands brought two immortal killing talismans and slapped them on Leo's cheeks.
PA!
The two yellowish talismans turned red. Then, they vanished into Leo's skin.
Yan Long laughed and kicked the ground, retreating three steps, "You're dead, quasi-immortal! Those talismans are made to kill immortals. They will destroy your dantian and deplete your life force! No matter how strong you are, you're still a mortal! Now, if you kowtow to me and beg to be my slave, I might change my mind and save you!"
"…"
Leo raised his eyebrows, amused. He slowly pulled the CZ pistol out from his spatial ring and unlocked the safety. While he rechecked the ammo, he counted the time.
"Five… Six… Seven…"
While counting, Leo also sensed the movements of the infiltrating talismans. They acted like parasites, moving through his blood veins and traveling toward his stomach.
Had Leo been a regular cultivator, he would have panicked. Unfortunately, parasites and poison couldn't harm evolved cancer cells and their favorite host.
Transparent blood cells swarmed the talismans like hungry zombies. They devoured the moving parasites until the foreign objects vanished.
DING
<You have digested Immortal Dantian Destruction Talismans. Your lifespan has increased by 6,000 years.>
The system message stunned Leo. He almost forgot to continue counting. While counting down Yan Long's death, Leo asked the prince if he had more juicy food for his cancer cells to digest.
"Eight… Nine… Hey, do you have more of those? Twelve… Thirteen."
Yan Long frowned. Ignoring Leo, he raised his hand and gestured to his men.
"Use your talismans. Ignore this fool and get rid of the unicorn. We'll dissect it and harvest its monster core."
Hearing the order, the nine soul transformation cultivators smirked and pulled out their talismans.
Leo stopped counting after it reached 15 seconds. He looked at Yan Long's long black hair, which already turned white and slowly fell off. In addition, the prince's youthful skin rapidly wrinkled and dried.
Strangely, Yan Long hadn't realized it yet.
Leo was amused once again as someone finally endured the mutation for more than 15 seconds. To celebrate this occasion, Leo let them witness a firework.
The pistol's muzzle pointed at the aide next to the prince. He carefully injected threads of Qi into rubber bullets in the magazine. However, he didn't notice that his mannequin dao avatar merged with his body and poured some wood element essence into it.
"DIEEEE!!"
The nine men jumped and lunged at Taxi, ignoring Leo.
Leo sighed, but his right hand followed the men's movements. Without looking, Leo pulled the trigger.
BANG
BANG
BANG
BANG
Nine consecutive fires came out, followed by echoing gunshot sounds. Within one second, Leo shot nine times.
He didn't notice that the rubber bullet heads transformed into tree seeds. They pierced into the nine men's skulls and got stuck inside their brains.
PLOP
PLOP
PU
Nine more muffled noises came from their heads as the nine skulls shattered. Soft pink tissues scattered everywhere. Some of them fell on Wu Buyi's face and Taxi's back.
Leo rotated his right shoulder, relieving the stiffness after using a point shooting technique. Still, he hadn't noticed that his mannequin dao avatar did something to the bullets. Without looking at what he did, Leo ordered Taxi.
"Get rid of them, Taxi. I've already weakened them for you."
Wu Buyi and Taxi's expressions were blank. They gazed at the corpses without intact heads.
WIGGLE
Moreover, black sprouts emerged from the exploded heads. Some brain tissues already turned black and wiggled as if they were alive.
Taxi retorted.
"Smash?"
Leo shrugged, "Yes. Smash them."
"Smash? Smash?!"
Leo rolled his eyes, "Do I need to explain how to smash them to pieces or what? Just kill them and be done with it. I'm busy waiting for this mofo to become another package of yin fluid."
"…Smashed smash. D:"
"What do you mean they're already dead?"
Leo had enough. He turned around to look at the messes he made.
Upon looking back, Leo found the bodies of nine men, whose heads had exploded because of the wood essence bullets.
"…"
Leo's expression became the same as a pokerface cartoon meme. He quietly turned around and looked at Yan Long.
Meanwhile, Yan Long stood still and stopped moving. His hair and headwear fell to the ground. The gold armor also slipped off from his body along with his clothes, revealing his skinny limbs and torso.
He became a dried mummy. While standing, Yan Long lost consciousness and died without realizing what hit him.
Leo frowned and walked toward the guy. He poked the prince's head.
PLOP
The entire body of Yan Long turned into dust.
"Hah?!"
Leo was disappointed. He thought the prince would have convulsed or swelled because of the expanding cancer cells. Instead, the guy lost all his fluid and died.
"Ah, dang it. I thought I would have gotten another source of yin fluid. I should have touched the other guys instead of shooting them… Wait, can I still mutate the corpses?"
He rushed to the corpses and touched them with his hands. For a safety measure, Leo spat on them to boost the mutation speed.
WIGGLE
Unfortunately, Leo was too late. The bullet seeds earlier already germinated and absorbed the hosts' blood and fluid to the last drop. Without blood, the muscle fibers and bones quickly withered and dried.
A few seconds later, the corpses turned into black soil. Only black sprouts rapidly grew into small dragon fruit plants.
Looking at the plants, Leo smacked his forehead. He regretted using guns instead of the usual. He lamented and blamed himself.
"Dammit, Florida Wick. Stop playing with guns! Next time, only use guns in aerial fights, not ground combat!"

chapters.title: Chapter 116 Florida Man Robs Astronauts’ Graves To Eat Their Bones
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 116 – Florida Man Robs Astronauts' Graves to Eat Their Bones
Without the nuisance, Leo leisurely collected the plants and the headless corpses into his spatial rings, taking them as a souvenir for Cat. He also didn't forget to pick up their spatial rings and weapons.
Among the loot, Leo loved the talismans the most. He stuffed them in his pant pockets, planning to experiment on them later.
Wu Buyi also helped Leo gather their clothes and armor. While he was at it, he picked up one of the yellow talismans on the ground. He inspected it.
"I-Isn't this the infamous Immortal Killing Talismans of the Situ Clan?!"
"What's that?"
Leo raised his head and looked at Wu Buyi. He then patted an identical talisman on the ground, patted the dirt off, and put it in his mouth. He chewed the paper as if he was a goat.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 3,000 years.>
It was worth degrading oneself into a goat. Leo loved seeing big numbers.
Wu Buyi blankly stared at Leo. He thought he got used to the weirdo, but he underestimated Leo's Floridaness. He thought that his master only ate precious herbs and monster's meat as food, but he didn't expect the guy to eat the talismans.
Each talisman was worth a city! How could he eat it so casually!?
"Umm, my lord. T-That talisman's worth is at least a billion spirit stones. A-Are you sure you want to keep eating those? Why don't you keep some for emergencies? They're very useful in group fights. If we could deploy one or two of those talismans, we can deter even a hundred quasi-immortal cultivators with ease."
Leo didn't listen to Wu Buyi. He picked another talisman from a pile of dirt. Then, he created a stream of water, soaking the paper. When it was wet and clean enough, Leo crumbled it into a small ball and swallowed it.
The paper ball went down his throat easily. Instantly, the cancer cells in his stomach devoured the foreign object and converted its residual energy into life force.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 3,000 years.>
After mastering the trick, Leo pulled out more talismans from his pocket and poured more water on them.
Looking at his master, Wu Buyi sweated profusely. His heart ached as he watched billions of spirit stones enter Leo's belly for no reason. His pupils gradually dimmed, and he began smiling even though he was in pain.
"Ah, I don't get it anymore. What is cultivation? What is life?" Wu Buyi looked at the ceiling and deeply sighed.
PHOOSH
While the two men were busy handling the aftermath, the troublemaker finally exited the spaceship. Gao Yan activated the sealed gate, and a section of the spaceship was open.
Gao Yan, carrying the lightsaber staff, walked down the stairs and gazed at the elders. When he saw Leo and Wu Buyi, he wryly smiled.
"M-Master. E-Elder Florida Man?"
Wu Buyi turned around and glared at his disciple. He stomped toward the boy and smacked the back of his head.
"You idiot! You worried us! Do you know how hard it is to track you? You could have been killed by other cultivators in the same realm!"
"I'm sorry!" Gao Yan covered his head and squatted, preventing himself from getting another hit.
Wu Buyi proceeded to bonk Gao Yan's head several more times to vent his anger. Gao Yan confusedly cried and ran around the spaceship while Wu Buyi sprinted after the boy to hit him some more. The comedic duo ran around the spaceship thrice before Gao Yan got penta-bonked, having five bumps on top of his head.
While the master and disciple messed around, Leo took this opportunity to enter the spaceship, using the gate that Gao Yan had come out of. Taxi also followed after his boss.
When Leo and Taxi entered the ship, Flora stopped following Gao Yan and followed after them. She was worried that they might get trapped in there if they didn't understand the ship's mechanism.
Betraying Thora's expectation, Leo ordered Taxi to wait in the air pressure chamber. When the gate behind them was closed, the man remained calm as if he had done this before.
"This takes me back," Leo muttered. He gazed at the interior in nostalgia.
"Smash?" Taxi looked back and forth, getting nervous.
"Relax. This is a method to get inside the ship. It's a standard procedure even if we aren't in space."
"Smash?"
Taxi tilted his head, unable to comprehend the situation. He'd rather destroy obstacles instead of waiting for a complicated door to open.
Thora was also surprised but for another reason. Other than fellow lightning element spirits like her, nobody should have learned about this spaceship and its functions. When she noticed that Leo knew about the chamber, her interest was piqued.
The lightning element dao avatar hovered in front of Leo, trying to communicate with him.
Unfortunately, Leo could only see her moving mouth and her transparent body. Her words didn't reach him.
