Unfortunately, the second prince and his men perished because of a certain someone. The imperial court was in the middle of investigating the incident. It wouldn't be long before they would discover the culprit.
As for the third prince and his imperial bodyguards, they missed out on this event because Yan Xiang had punished him for ruining Tang Xuan's job when they visited Leo. Thus, he unknowingly saved his own hides for another day.
Still, Yan Zhu couldn't enjoy his luck because his secret military base, aka the Fatui Cult, was in terrible shape.
When the cultist from the Frozen Fire City went to check on their underground city, they discovered that all resident there was either missing or dead. Furthermore, the chosen cultists that participated in this season's mystic realm never returned. As a result, they lost 90% of their military strength.
Situ Clan also got a disastrous casualty. Situ Nantian was critically injured while the rest of his followers perished in the mystic realm. The other elders also went missing as they became victims of the sweet dream mushrooms near the pyramid.
The Ouyang Clan's teams were the lucky dog among the prominent clans. They went to a different mystic realm, and they secured some treasures and rare herbs. A few clansmen managed to increase their strength to the next stage and gained a new elemental power.
However, not all Ouyang Clan's members were as fortunate. Some of their agents in the Death Sword Sect suddenly stopped contacting their clan's headquarters to report their findings. Among the agents, Hua Guanhai no longer informed the clan about the Death Sword Sect's movements.
Nobody had realized yet that the Death Sword Sect brought in something from Leo's mystic realm, which would bring the second calamity that once traumatized Hua Jiashan and Situ Nantian 500 years ago.
disciples managed to return alive. Everybody but Hua Jiashan had .
WHOOSH
Hua Jiashan, Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, and their disciples managed to return alive. Everybody but Hua Jiashan had been grinning from ear to ear as they were looking forward to the future merging.
The sect master gazed at his people and bitterly laughed. He already accepted his fate as a vessel of a new lord. He gazed at these people and instructed them one last time.
"Make sure to tidy up your living quarters and every facility before you visit senior Florida Man. At least, return the favor of the sword saint by treasuring his old home."
Hao Han and others came back to their senses. They faced Hua Jiashan and deeply bowed.
"We will not forget our true home, sect master. Even though we will be working for Senior Florida Man soon, our hearts and our blood belong to the Life Sword Sect!" Han Hao pledged.
Han Meng saluted, "We may have to serve a new lord, but we won't forget our roots! We grew up from here, and this place will always be our home! You are also like a father to us. Our bond will never be broken!"
Tiger Swordsman dryly laughed and chimed in, "It's not like we will abandon the sect, Senior Hua. We can always return here to take care of the sect or help you teach young disciples. We just have another side job at Senior Florida Man's place!"
Listening to his trusty people, Hua Jiashan was relieved. He waved his hand and allowed them to leave.
"Alright. You're dismissed. It will be lonely here, but you can always come back to visit me and tell me what it's like working for Florida Man."
"Yes, sir!"
Everybody saluted Hua Jiashan. Then, they gradually spread the word to their colleagues that they would merge their sect with Florida Man's domain as they would receive abundant cultivation resources from him.
After everybody had left, Hua Jiashan silently returned to his courtyard. He stood in the middle of the field and brought out a long sword. Then, he repeated the signature move of his sect, performing a rite for his ancestors.
Dancing with a sword for 10 minutes, Hua Jiashan's metal and fire element Qi resonated with his sword. However, his mind was blank as his consciousness already traveled to another place far away.
While being absentminded, Hua Jiashan suddenly heard a stranger's voice in his mind.
'You're getting sloppy, disciple.'
Hua Jiashan stopped practicing. He widened his eyes in shock.
"T-This voice… Master!? Is that you?!"
The voice belonged to the ancient sword saint, who had long ascended to the immortal realm. The sword saint was also Hua Jiashan's secret mentor whom he had never told anybody about.
'I've been listening. I heard our sect is going to merge with somebody else's domain? Is that true?'
"Y-Yes, master."
'Who is he? Is he an immortal or a fellow swordsman?'
Hua Jiashan lowered his head in shame. He confessed, "That person… is a mysterious cultivator, master. I believe that he might be an immortal in disguise, and he's a physique cultivator. He uses no sword or obvious martial arts, but his physical strength is definitely superior to everybody I've seen. His Qi is also… unique."
'Tell me more.'
Hua Jiashan finally revealed a bright smile. He sat on the field alone and narrated how he encountered Leo in the mystic realm.
Like a child telling his day at school to his parent, the sad look on his face vanished as if the merging no longer troubled his heart.
.
.
Cultivators from various sects either celebrated their successful expeditions or were saddened by their losses. The Amazonian Sanctuary was neither.
Far north, beyond the Death Sword Sect's headquarters, thousands of young maiden and female elders gathered at a forest city, welcoming their master's return.
Everybody cheered when Dongfang Mei, Xu Nuan, Yao Qiqi, and everybody returned without an injury at first. But then, Dongfang Mei returned and shocked her subordinates by announcing the new arrangement.
"We have a piece of bad news for you, ladies."
Dongfang Mei took a deep breath before she announced the merge.
"We shall relocate south and join a powerful immortal's domain! We will abandon this city!"
"WHAT?!"
The women stopped celebrating and stared at their master in disbelief. The forest and the city were their only sanctuary as the cultivation world was unforgiving for female cultivators.
Sexual harassment, human trafficking, and slavery were common in this world, where male cultivators ignored common sense and moral ethics. They acted like caveman barbarians, treating weaker cultivators as animals. Thus, living in this world as a woman was a nightmare. Many women developed a trauma, which prevented them from interacting with men.
Because of such oppression and treatment, the women banded together in this city to protect themselves. They even managed to gain respect from medium and small sects.
However, Dongfang Mei, who had given them hope, suddenly dropped the bomb.
Upon learning that they might have to leave this place to live with other male cultivators, some of the women protested.
"Why do we have to move?! We are safe here!"
"Have you asked us if we want to move?!"
"I'm not going anywhere! We built this city! We're not serving some perverts!"
"Senior Dongfang! Are you trying to sell us to some vile men?!"
Noises got louder, and more women yelled at her.
Dongfang Mei had expected this outcome. She clapped her hands and gave them a choice.
"I see that most of you here favor staying. Then, I will give you a choice."
"A choice?" Everybody stopped making noise. They listened to their leader.
"First, I will step down as the caretaker of this sanctuary and allow you to select a new leader."
"…"
The women nodded in acknowledgment as they needed someone to replace Dongfang Mei. Still, they hesitated as none of them was as strong as her. The second strongest female cultivator there was Xu Nuan, but she didn't seem to be on their side.
Aside from Xu Nuan, there were plenty of nascent soul cultivators. They looked at each other, unable to decide which one to be nominated.
While everybody was lost in thought, Dongfang Mei continued her speech.
"The new leader will inherit this city and the sanctuary, while I and Xu Nuan will migrate south. If anyone wishes to follow me, you are welcome to do so. However, you must continue to follow my instructions and orders until the authority is handed over to the domain lord."
Yao Qiqi next to Xu Nuan innocently vouched for Leo, "The domain lord is very kind and strong, sister! He healed me, and he can fly with a SWOOSH!"
Xu Nuan and Dongfang Mei's followers giggled at the girl. They patted her head.
"How did he fly?"
Yao Qiqi mimicked how Leo jumped.
"He stomped the ground and SWOOSH!" Yao Qiqi started leap-frogging while extending her arms like Superman.
"Hahahahaha!"
Nothing healed a woman's heart pain more than seeing their child innocently playing. Xu Nuan and Dongfang Mei regained their hope, hoping to convince their followers to join them.
Xu Nuan stepped forward and told everybody the tale of Leo. She even included the incident when Leo rejected one of her disciples after the latter had attempted to seduce him.
Among the listeners, Qi Niu, who was the person in question, glared at Xu Nuan with red eyes. She bit her lower lip in embarrassment and shame.
Thanks to her reaction, many disciples noticed her expressions and connected the dots. One of them even asked the girl.
"Is that true, Qi Niu?"
"…"
"Did you get turned down by an elder? Did you try to seduce him?"
"…"
The two questions and Qi Niu's silence were enough to convince many girls. Slowly and gradually, more women leaned toward joining the domain of a mysterious elder.
Still, after the speech, not all of them were willing to follow Dongfang Mei. Only 100 women chose to join their migration. As for the rest, they refused to change their ways.
The two groups silently parted ways. Dongfang Mei, Xu Nuan, Yao Qiqi, and 100 female disciples of the sanctuary boarded a small flying boat and flew south, heading to the Magpie City.

chapters.title: Chapter 131  Florida Man Invents Laser-Shooting  Matchlock Rifles to Make Anime Character  "Tanya Von Degurechaff" Real
chapters.content:
Chapter 131  Florida Man Invents Laser-Shooting Matchlock Rifles to Make Anime Character "Tanya Von Degurechaff" Real
Chapter 131 – Florida Man Invents Laser-Shooting Matchlock Rifles to Make Anime Character "Tanya Von Degurechaff" Real
Three days after the mystic realm season ended, Hua Jiashan personally escorted his subordinates to submit to Leo. Coincidentally, Dongfang Mei also arrived at the same time and parked their ship nearby.
Both Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei dryly laughed even though they would serve a stranger from now on.
Leo and Wu Buyi welcomed them at the east road, 100 meters away from the apartment. They also prepared welcoming gifts for the new workers.
"You're finally here," Mocked Wu Buyi.
"…Yeah."
Han Hao and Han Meng bitterly smiled while they stood in front of Wu Buyi. They were embarrassed that they weren't as decisive as him.
Hua Jiashan no longer looked sad anymore. He smiled and saluted Leo, "Please take care of us, Lord Florida Man!"
Dongfang Mei was the same. She glanced at her young disciples and hoped that Leo wouldn't bully them, "Our fate is in your hands. Please guide us, Lord Florida Man."
Leo swept his eyes across the field of 100 attractive maidens, who seemed to be in their teens. He then glanced at the crowd of male disciples. The latter group already lost their cool, and they drooled like a monkey who had never seen bananas. He was worried about their future.
For the sake of the female workers' safety, Leo gave them a little privilege.
"Dongfang Mei, is it? You will be in charge of all female workers here. The entire building is yours. There are about 40 rooms there, so some of you will have to share rooms. Decide how you share the rooms yourself."
Dongfang Mei and Xu Nuan were pleasantly surprised. They gazed at the building that Leo pointed at.
.
Employee Apartment Level 9
Apartment Size – (3/10)
Apartment Quality – (6/10)
[Upgrade] – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
.
The apartment had been upgraded to level 9, and its quality was slightly improved. The plant walls were covered with wallpapers while the linoleum mats were smooth and seamless. Every room also came with a pre-installed air-conditioner and a heater.
The girls were glad that they didn't need to camp outside or build a new shelter. They brought their belongings to the building and explored their new living quarters.
Xu Nuan took charge of exploring each room. She received the room keys from Leo, and she went inside to see where her disciples would live.
The interior of each room and the space exceeded Xu Nuan's expectations. Each room was over 50 square meters, and Leo had already installed basic furniture for them. Two wooden bunk beds, four desks, four cabinets, and one refrigerator were present in every room.
Leo proceeded to teach Xu Nuan and her people about the apartment's electricity system and the toilet. He flipped the light switches and showed her how the air conditioners and heaters worked. He even explained what the refrigerators could do.
"Four people can share one room by standard, but you can decide if you want to stuff four or more people in the same room. Also, I have already upgraded the refrigerators for you, so you don't have to worry about the electricity bills. Just don't throw rotten food or wet trash in there and forget about it. I'll be pissed if you ruin those!"
"…"
"The light switches are easy to operate. You just have to flip it on when you need a light source during nighttime. I have also sealed most of the electrical outlets. As long as you don't remove the covers and stick your fingers in there, you won't get zapped to death."
"…"
"About the bathrooms and tap water, do remind your people not to overly rely on them as your drinking water source. I tried that, and the water still smells a bit fishy. If you need drinking water, take it from the main general store's building. The water there is a lot cleaner and it doesn't smell. Oh, you know how to use the toilets, don't you?"
"…"
Xu Nuan was so flabbergasted that she couldn't come up with the right questions to ask Leo. She had never seen a sect or a clan using unique artifacts to improve their quality of life as they usually used them to boost their combat prowess instead.
Even if they were useful in random situations, most cultivators always drain every artifact's residual Qi and throw them away when they no longer provided Qi for them.
Secondly, Xu Nuan sensed thick lightning Qi from the electrical outlets. Every room was a perfect living quarters for the big sect's executive members as they provided endless Qi to the residents. She was stunned that Leo nonchalantly shared the precious living quarters with her people.
"That will be all," Leo cut the coaching short as he had a lot of work to do. "For today, get yourself familiar with your new home. If you need food, go pick a random fruit or veggie from the farms around here. If there is no food, go check the granaries near Wu Buyi's house. There should be a lot of potatoes in there if Cat hasn't eaten all of them. As for drinking water, as I said, take them from the general store."
"…"
"Is there any question?"
The girls no longer listened to Leo. Everybody cheered as they started picking their rooms without waiting for Dongfang Mei or Xu Nuan's instructions. The two elders also forgot about Leo as they were still stunned by the endless supply of lightning Qi.
At first, the teenage maidens didn't notice the Qi source. But when they lingered in the rooms for five minutes, their sharp senses picked up the Qi insignia of the lightning element Qi strands. Unknowingly, they stopped making noises to cultivate the Qi.
The group settled down, and the girls got quiet.
Seeing that the girls adapted well, Leo left them alone for the day. He returned to the Life Sword Sect's group to give them a new place to live.
Directly north of the girl's apartment was another identical building, which Leo had unlocked after the general store had reached level 9.
It was the second apartment building, where Leo had prepared for Hua Jiashan's group.
When Leo returned to the sword sect's people, he made a new rule.
"Alright, boys. As you can see, the apartment on the front is the girl's dorm. As for you horny sausages, you live in the back. I expect you to respect the girl's privacy and distance. I don't mind if some of you pursue them. But if you cross the line, your ass is fired, okay?"
In short, Leo set up a line that the boys couldn't cross. He treated them like hormone-driven 13-year-old teens, who had never seen a woman in their entire lives.
Even though Leo yelled at the men, they barely listened to him. Some of the disciples still eyed the gorgeous disciples of the sanctuary.
Leo deeply sighed. He passed a paper fan to Wu Buyi. The latter received it and nodded as he knew what Leo wanted to do.
PA!
Then…
PA!
PA!
PA!
Several crisp slaps could be heard throughout the domain as Wu Buyi smacked the heads of horny disciples. Even Han Hao, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman were slapped.
"AHEM!"
Again, Leo tried to get their attention. He repeated what he said earlier. Then, he added a bait to entice the boys to work harder and become gentlemen.
Leo ejected broken lightsabers, which he had obtained from the broken spaceship. He then activated one that he owned.
A rainbow lightsaber was activated, releasing a loud buzz-hum noise.
"!!!"
Hua Jiashan widened his eyes in shock. Tiger Swordsman dropped his jaw and drooled in envy. Even Han Meng rubbed his eyes several times as he couldn't comprehend what he just saw.
"L-Lord Florida Man. What is that?!" Asked Hua Jiashan.
After getting their attention, Leo baited them.
"This is an example of a monthly reward for the best employee of my store! It's called EMPLOYEE OF THE MONTH!"
"E-Employee of the month?"
"That's right. All you have to do is to contribute the most, just like how you contribute to your sect."
"Oh!"
"The judgment criteria will be how efficient you work, how much impact your contribution is, and how many people or customers you manage to bring to my store!"
"Oh!"
"And most importantly, the employee of the month must not commit any taboo of my store, such as taking advantage of the weak, harassing women, bullying a child, or committing vile acts that trouble your colleagues, commoners, or other customers. If I catch you violating a girl or someone, your rewards will be confiscated, and I'll kick you out of my domain!"
"OH!!"
Finally, the boys understood what Leo wanted. They were eager to start working right away.
"For now, your shelter will be that apartment over there. Four men to each room! I don't care how you allocate your men, but I don't want to see a random young master occupying a room to himself. Regardless of their statuses, they MUST share the rooms!"
Wu Buyi and everybody saluted and bowed to Leo. Even Hua Jiashan lowered his head and guided his former subordinates to the building.
However, as there were more people from Life Sword Sect, there weren't enough rooms for the men. After assigning 160 former deacons and elders to the rooms, they ran out of a place to sleep.
In the end, a thousand inner disciples and outer disciples were without shelter.
Leo was ready for such a scenario. He guided the disciples to his general store.
The current building was three story-tall. It became an empty shopping mall with nothing to sell. However, Leo could use it for another purpose.
Leo brought the young men to the third floor, where there was nothing but blank partitioned rooms and stores. Then, he started purchasing cheap beds from his online store and threw them into the blank rooms.
After spending almost 5,000 years of lifespan, Leo provided the young men basic needs, such as warm spring beds, bed sheets, blankets, pillows, towels, soaps, shampoos, and a set of uniforms. He also allocated the third floor's public toilets as their exclusive bathrooms.
It took a whole day for Leo to reeducate the newcomers. Gao Yan also came to teach them about the toilets and the new common sense in this domain.
.
.
The day was long, but hard work was well-rewarded. Leo stood on top of the general store building, gazing at his shopping mall empire.
DING
<Current Lifespan – 176,127 Years…>
Talismans provided a lot of lifespans. Even though Leo had used a lot to upgrade all of his buildings to level 9, he still had some leftovers.
"It's time."
Leo went back into the general store's building, where he had built a new facility inside.
On the second floor, there was a new workshop, which Leo had secretly constructed. It occupied the northeast corner of the department store.
.
Gunsmith Workshop Level 9
Gunsmith Mannequin (1/1)
Handloading Mannequin (1/1)
Firearm Technology (2/6)
Product Quality (2/6)
Structure Quality (3/6)
[Upgrade] – 10,000 Years of Lifespan.
.
Two wooden mannequins tirelessly worked inside their store, building ancient firearms for Leo.
Leo visited the workshop inside his mall and checked the finished product. He picked up a matchlock rifle and flipped it around. Then, he tested it by pulling the trigger without using any gunpowder.
CLICK
Nothing was shot out. However, the trigger worked as intended.
Leo smiled at the product. He brought it out to the store's rooftop to test it. After bringing it outside, he patiently loaded the rifle with the gunpowder that the mannequins had provided him in the workshop. Then, Leo loaded the weapon with an essence stone, using it instead of regular bullets.
He took aim toward the north. Then, he fired.
BANG
It had a strong recoil. Leo's hands slightly jerked after the rifle fired a laser beam toward the sky. As for the essence stone, it disappeared along with the laser beam.
Leo shrugged as he found the shot average. He loaded a new bullet and gunpowder sack. Then, he added his Qi to the bullet and rifle.
BOOM
The matchlock rifle exploded as it was overloaded. The gunpowder and the essence stone created a flame blast, burning Leo's shirt. Fortunately, his new pants and underwear didn't catch flame.
After causing the misfire, Leo sighed.
"I need new testers. Maybe, I should use assign new employees to the workshop and have them test the rifles."
Leo narrowed his eyes. Although he had a new source of lifespan income, he didn't forget about the core of his shop domain's perks.
"I also need new merchandise to scam others. Well, I might as well only sell essence stones for lifespan while I sell my items for essence stones. That way, I can get more profits!"

chapters.title: Chapter 132  Florida Man Armed His Employees with  Job Applications to Repel Potential Looters
chapters.content:
Chapter 132  Florida Man Armed His Employees with Job Applications to Repel Potential Looters
Chapter 132 – Florida Man Armed His Employees with Job Applications to Repel Potential Looters
"Isn't this place nice?"
"Yup. Comfortable beds, great cultivation environment, and useful artifacts, I can't ask for more."
Han Hao and Han Meng shared the same room as they were father and son. Although the room was big enough for four people to live, nobody dared to share a room with them as an ex-grand elder and the head disciplinary elder's statuses were still superior to others.
In addition, Han Hao's wife hadn't learned about this place yet. He still had to travel to his wife's hometown and bring them here in the future.
Both elders checked every nook and cranny of their new home as everything was so interesting, especially the electrical appliances.
"Isn't this something alchemists love?" Han Hao opened a modern refrigerator and inhaled cold air.
Han Meng opened a curtain to see the view behind the apartment. Unfortunately, Leo didn't build this apartment like a resort, Han Meng only saw the recycling center, a junkyard, and a lumber yard.
Beyond the recycling center, Han Meng noticed long fences and a large barn. A few thunder unicorns gathered there as the barn was their new home.
Looking at the group of 9th-stage monster beasts, Han Meng wryly smiled, "Nah, I'm not surprised anymore. We're working for a big shot now. Father, I think we will advance to the quasi-immortal stage within 100 years if we keep working under Lord Florida Man. Look at those monster horses! They are obeying Lord Florida Mna's orders!"
Han Hao and Han Meng laughed. They looked forward to working with Leo. For the day, they adjusted their conditions, cultivating whatever Qi they detected in the room.
.
Meanwhile, Tiger Swordsman and Hua Jiashan shared the same room. The former awkwardly knelt on his knees, looking at the sect master.
"I-I thought you wouldn't join us, sect master."
Hua Jiashan stroked his beard. He widely grinned, "Who said I couldn't change my mind?"
"B-But I thought you treasured the sect. Who's going to take care of the sect's facilities?"
Tiger Swordsman thought of the abandoned buildings of the Life Sword Sect. As everybody migrated to Leo's domain, nobody would take care of it anymore. The local townsmen from Magpie City might also be in trouble as they could no longer commission their disciples or elders to help them.
Hua Jiashan saw through Tiger Swordsman's thoughts. He snickered.
"The sect is close-by. We can rotate our people or send some free disciples back there to clean our sect."
"A-And what about our library and treasury?"
"Who's gonna steal that useless library with nothing but common martial art techniques? Everything is in my head. If I want to, I can just write new manuals."
"But the heritage of the sword saint…"
Hua Jiashan burst into laughter. He waved his hand.
WHOOSH
An energy sword manifested and hovered in front of Hua Jiashan. Moreover, it didn't use the sect master's Qi as its primary energy source.
It was an electric energy sword, emitting yellow light. It also had the same aura as yellow tribulation lightning bolts.
"T-This," Tiger Swordsman was astonished.
"The sword saint contacted me a few days ago. He taught me a better version of our sword arts, and he allows me to work for another immortal for the time being. He told me that we could easily restore the Life Sword Sect after we got a lot stronger. For now, we can stop worrying about managing the sect so that we can focus solely on our training."
Tiger Swordsman repeatedly nodded as he agreed. When he was still an elder of the Life Sword Sect, he spent 70% of his time teaching and completing the sect's missions. The rest of his free time was shared between recuperation time and training. This was the reason why his growth rate was slower than the others.
"B-But, sect master, what about the work in this domain? Will Lord Florida Man allow us to train?"
Hua Jiashan laughed again, "Are you stupid? Did you listen to his explanation about the work rules?"
"Erm, rules?"
"We only need to work when the sun is up, and we can rest when the sun goes down. We work five days and get two days off every week. Compared to what I imposed on you lots, this work rule is very lenient and comfortable!"
"…Wow."
Tiger Swordsman finally remembered what Leo had told him when they were inside the pagoda town. He was excited that he luckily secured an easy job with high pay. At this rate, he would swim in essence stones and cultivation resources.
"For now, let's get used to the room's natural pressure and the lightning Qi. Get on your bed and start adjusting your dantian and conditions."
"Yes, sect master!"
Hua Jiashan's smile stiffened. Even though they submitted to Leo, Tiger Swordsman still called him sect master. As Hua Jiashan wished to avoid complications, he corrected Tiger Swordsman.
"Just call me by my name. We're no longer masters and subordinates. We're colleagues now."
"…Ugh, yes, s-senior Hua."
"Still be bit stiff, but, well, fine."
It would take a while before Tiger Swordsman could relax around Hua Jiashan.
.
.
The next day at 4 AM, the sanctuary girls, the sect's disciples, and elders stopped cultivating and gathered in the field, east of the apartment. They waited for Leo to come out and give them instructions.
Unfortunately, Leo did not follow the local's traditions of not sleeping and eating. He still required 6-8 hours of sleep every day even though he could stay awake for months without sleeping if he wanted to.
As a result, some young disciples got bored of waiting. As they had nothing to do, they roamed the farms and the domain's territory, exploring the buildings.
Many disciples gathered around Gao Yan, who was the only disciple that got to live in a small house, next to Wu Buyi's home. They bombarded him with questions.
"Gao Yan, what's it like to work here? What do we have to do?"
"Is Lord Florida Man kind? What did you get from him?"
"Has Lord Florida Man taught you any techniques?"
Gao Yan patiently answered them one at a time. He also glanced at the group of girls, who secretly eavesdropped their conversations.
"So far, the work here is quite simple. We only need to help Senior Florida Man with the farm work. You see the farms in front of the apartment? That's where most of us will be working at."
Gao Yan walked toward the chilies farm and brought out a large crate from his spatial ring. He then showed the people how to collect the crops.
"For example, these chilies are Exploding Reaper Chilies. It's a spice that can be used in alchemy, and it's edible if you cultivate the fire element Qi. We collect the chilies like this…"
Each chili was one foot long and three inches thick. Each plant bore hundreds of red spices, which glowed in the dark.
Gao Yan avoided touching the chilies directly. He cut the stalks with a knife and let the large chilies fall into the wooden crate.
"One crate can store about 40-50 chilies at most, so I usually store about 30ish chilies. Well, you don't have to count it. Just measure the size with your eyes and stop using the same crate when it's half-full. Because we can't touch it, we will play it safe and only store half."
One of the girls got curious. She pushed through the crowd and asked Gao Yan.
"What will happen if we touch the chilies?"
Gao Yan wryly smiled. He showed them by picking one of the chilies with a tong and placing it on the ground, 10 meters away from the farm and the crowd. He turned around and warned them.
"Don't try this, ever."
After giving them a warning, Gao Yan poked the chili with his fingertip. As soon as he touched it, he kicked the ground and leaped away.
The chili instantly swelled. Then, as its name implied, it exploded. A small flame bomb erupted, burning everything within 10 meters black.
Gao Yan licked the tip of his finger to heal the burn wound. Unfortunately, the spiciness of the chili hit his tongue, and the strong smell of wasabi hit his nose. He staggered backward two steps before he regained his bearings.
Coming back to his senses, Gao Yan warned them again.
"There you have it. The explosion is capable enough to kill any nascent soul cultivator, according to Elder Wu's estimation. Unless you have already mastered the fire element, you should avoid working at the chilies farm. I suggest you try the potato farm or the dragon fruit farm over there."
Gao Yan pointed at the array of strange trees, south of the chilies farm. A hundred black trees surrounded a tall white tree at the center. Under the trees, piles of black fruits emanated thick fag of yin Qi.
"W-What is that place?" Asked the girl.
"Dragon Fruit Farm. They're the fruits that the thunder unicorns eat. Oh, Cat also loves that. If you work there, you will run into them a lot."
"Cat? Thunder Unicorns?"
Several disciples, elders, and deacons had already seen Cat and the unicorns, but many hadn't noticed them yet. Those who knew brightly smiled while those who didn't had a dark expression.
Speaking of the devil, Cat heard the call and responded to Gao Yan. Despite being a massive chomper plant, she jumped by using her long roots.
BOOM
Cat landed in the middle of the crowd. She grinned and greeted them.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
This was her way of greeting and judging the newcomers. Any disrespectful cultivator would usually attack her and got themselves killed. As for those who knew, they simply needed to pay the "Nom-Nom Tax", and Cat would leave them alone.
Xu Nuan, Han Hao, Han Meng, and many people from the Life Sword Sect were aware of this custom. They each ejected a large dead animal from their spatial rings and tossed them to Cat.
The chomper bobbed her head up and down like a cheerful cockatoo, giving them approval. She swallowed the nom-nom taxes and leaped away.
Again, the old customers laughed and smiled while the newcomers looked at the parting monster in shock and fear.
"W-What was that?!"
"I-Isn't that a 7th-stage monster plant?!"
"Are they keeping a monster here?!"
Gao Yan wryly smiled and pointed at the sky. Everybody looked up. Then, they found two thunder unicorns, walking in mid-air and patrolling the area.
"Please get used to the guardians around here. Not only do we have Senior Florida Man's pet, but we also have a hundred of his mounts… 9th-stage monster beast mounts. We will be helping him feed these mounts and his pet every day from now on. This will be our primary job."
"…"
While every youngster and newcomer was shocked, Xu Nuan couldn't stop smiling. As taming was her forte, this place was her paradise.
Unable to stop her excitement, Xu Nuan asked Gao Yan.
"Do you know if I can volunteer to be those beasts' caretaker?"
"Err, are you sure?" Gao Yan was surprised.
"I'm confident in my abilities. Actually, if I work with those unicorns, everybody here won't have to risk their lives interacting with those monsters. Let me take charge of this job!"
Gao Yan and everybody from Life Sword Sect gazed at the elderly lady in awe and respect. As nobody disagreed, they selected Xu Nuan and her disciples to take care of the animals.
.
The talk continued for two hours as Gao Yan continued introducing every place to the women and the new employees.
At 8 AM, Leo finally woke up. He carried a dozen prototype matchlock rifles and came out of his store. He found the large crowd on the farms, harvesting and helping the farming mannequins.
Impressed by their proactive and enthusiasm, Leo couldn't help but smile.
"Wow. They're workaholics, I see."
Leo thought of the lazy youngsters in his home country. Weirdly, a job application was a bane of their existence to the point that it could be used in a certain exorcism.
It was pointless to think about the modern era. Leo walked toward them and clapped his hands.
"Gather up! Let's assign roles and tasks before you start messing around!"
The new farmers stopped what they were doing and gathered in front of the general store. Disciples, who were loitering around the workshop area, ran to the front to join the gathering.
Hua Jiashan, Dongfang Mei, Xu Nuan, Han Hao, Wu Buyi, Gao Yan, Yao Qiqi, and other elders were present. They were ready to learn about their new lifestyle.
Within five minutes, all members were accounted for. Leo began interviewing them and assigning work.

chapters.title: Chapter 133 Florida Man Distributes Guns To School Teachers And Students For Self-Protection. Multiple School Shooters Reported 10 Minutes Later.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 133 – Florida Man Distributes Guns to School Teachers and Students for Self-Protection. Multiple School Shooters Reported 10 Minutes Later.
After the interview, Leo took notes on everybody's specialties. He then assigned tasks to them.
Xu Nuan and half of the sanctuary girls were assigned as unicorn grooms, and they were now in charge of feeding 100 thunder unicorns and grooming them if needed.
Yao Qiqi and Esen were grouped together. Leo ordered them to follow Cat around and make sure she wouldn't randomly go anywhere or cause problems.
The rest of the girls were sent to the clothing store, where the automaton tailor tirelessly mass-produced men's clothes. Their job was to help the mannequin set up a proper store and manage the clothing store's stocks.
Dongfang Mei and Hua Jiashan got a strange job. Leo called them "Bouncers", and he sent them to protect the mystic realm platform. They only needed to be there and make sure nobody could enter Orlando Planet without permission.
Wu Buyi, Gao Yan, and alchemists from Life Sword Sect received permission to build a new alchemy warehouse and herb farm anywhere in Leo's domain so that Leo could expand his farms without using the system.
Tiger Swordsman, Han Hao, Han Meng, and seven elders of the Life Sword Sect were put into the same team. Leo gave them the prototype matchlock rifles and told them to practice using them.
As for the rest of the disciples and deacons, Leo divided them into three groups and let them work in an 8-hour shift. Their job was to plant seeds and harvest crops as Leo's system farms produced crops nonstop, and the automaton farmers couldn't harvest the ripened fruits, vegetables, and plants fast enough.
Once everybody got a job, Leo reminded them of their pay.
"As promised, I'll pay your monthly wage in essence stones. But if you don't like them, you may exchange them for the products that I sell in my store. Of course, the new prototype weapons and clothes are included."
Leo pointed at the group of elders, who held strange rods in their hands. They flipped the rifles around as if they had never seen them before.
"What is this artifact, senior?" Asked Tiger Swordsman.
"A gun."
"A… gun?"
The elders still didn't understand what they were for. On the other hand, Gao Yan gulped as he was envious of the elders.
Because of his curiosity, Gao Yan asked Leo and brought out the level-8 pistol, "Sir, are they the same as the gun you gave me?"
Leo glanced at Gao Yan's gun and nodded. He explained, "Your weapon is a bit different since I made that. As for those prototype rifles, they are the mass-produced version that I will be selling in my store in the future. For now, I need you to learn how to use them first. When you master those, you can teach our future customers without relying on me."
"Oh!"
"Also," Leo remembered that he forgot to mention the danger of those firearms. He reminded them, "Those rifles use spirit stones or essence stones as ammunition. You can add your Qi into the ammo to increase its destructive power, but I haven't tested how far you can add."
Leo grinned while the expressions of the elders turned white. They realized that Leo used them as guinea pigs to test his new artifacts.
"Umm," Han Meng raised his hand. "You said something about using spirit stones as ammunition. Do we have to use our spirit stones to practice using it?"
"Well, it won't be fair if I let you use your money to test my weapons. Of course, I'll be providing you my spirit stones."
"I-I see."
Han Hao's team was relieved as they wouldn't need to squander their precious cultivation resources and money to complete their assignments.
Still, nobody in the world would be willing to work for someone for free. Dongfang Mei, Hua Jiashan, and Han Hao wondered if Leo could fulfill his promises.
"Lord Florida Man," Hua Jiashan stepped forward. "About the promise, can we enter your domain's mystic realm freely?"
Leo nodded, "You may enter the domain if it's your day off or when you're off your shift. During working days, nobody should be entering that place!"
"I see!"
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei were delighted. As they only needed to work 40 hours a week, they had plenty of time to enter the mystic realm and cultivate.
With just that information, both leaders no longer felt bad that they had abandoned everything to serve Leo. They were happy with the treatments, the jobs, and the pay.
.
After assigning jobs to his employees, everybody was dismissed to get familiarized with their tasks.
As Xu Nuan was experienced in communicating with beasts and monsters, she didn't need Leo's help. She guided her people to the barn and introduced herself to the 9th-stage monster beasts.
The thunder unicorns received her well. Even P.Hub and Taxi liked her.
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei also had no issues with their job since they only needed to be on the platform and protect the portal. Both sat in front of the permanent portal on the platform, gazing at the three giant statues and meditating in peace.
Yao Qiqi and Esen laughed and rode on Cat's chomper head. The plant monster ran around the domain, showing them everything they needed to know. The loli trio seemed to be playing instead of working.
The clothing store team seemed to be having fun as well. Leo and others could hear their squeal from outside the store as the girls got overexcited from seeing the even dresses in there. They would be busy in the store for a long time.
The alchemists had no issue with their assignments at first. But when they tried to chop iron pine lumber to build a new house, they failed to cut through the thick wood. Only when Gao Yan pulled out his lightsaber and cut the lumber with it, they could continue working.
Wu Buyi only watched the team working on a new workshop. He didn't tell Gao Yan or others that some of the lumber was sacred wood, which got mixed into the lumber. As a lot of sacred wood lay around in the lumber field, Wu Buyi stopped caring and let everything run its course.
The farmer team had no issue as most of the disciples were originally born from farmer families. Only the chilies farm workers seemed to be hesitating as they were afraid of touching the crops.
As the new farmers were afraid of exploding chilies, Leo purchased rubber gloves from the online store system and distributed them to all workers on the field, including the off-shift employees.
With rubber gloves, the employees tried to touch the chilies.
Upon touch, the chilies didn't explode. Everybody was relieved that their lives wouldn't be at risk anymore, and they had no issue working.
Every group adjusted to the new environment and quickly settled in, except the group of new riflemen.
.
Leo ordered Han Hao's team to follow him. The group arrived at the west of the domain, where they could see a long stream. Leo put a long table there and covered it with a white sheet. Then, he lined a hundred small sacks of gunpowder on the table.
He also brought out a bin full of spirit stones. As these stones came from dead thieves, their quality was average. They were perfect materials for practice shooting.
Once the arrangement was ready, Leo ordered them.
"Stand in one column. Bring out the guns I gave you."
"…"
Han Hao and others brought out the rifles from their spatial rings and awkwardly carried them in their arms.
Leo also brought out his rifle. He showed them how to safely carry a rifle without pointing the muzzle at their teammates.
"This is how you carry a long rifle. Use your arm and shoulder to support it. Don't forget to point it up or down at the ground for safety even though there's no bullet in it. Discipline is a must if you want to master advanced firearms in the future…"
The crowd mimicked Leo's action. As they were cultivators, they were fast learners. In a few minutes, they could rotate the long rifles like a modern tomb guard, except the weapon was different.
Seeing how they could adjust to the rifles well, Leo moved on to the next lesson.
"See the little sacks here? Break one of them in half and pour the black powder in here. Then, you put a spirit stone into this hole and use this shaft to push it to the end of the tunnel…"
Again, after one demonstration, they perfectly copied Leo's technique. However, the group was disappointed as the techniques seemed too easy.
Han Hao complained while he loaded a spirit stone into the gun barrel.
"Umm, Lord Florida Man. Isn't the technique a bit… mundane? Even a commoner can do this. Is this really a useful artifact?"
Leo rolled his eyes. He directly touched a spirit stone and dropped it into his rifle's barrel. After loading the bullet, he aimed up and lighted a cord.
BANG
Without using his Qi, the newly made essence stone transformed into a laser beam and separated the clouds in the sky. The bullet vanished into space and disappeared.
"…"
The students gazed at the laser beam and dropped their jaws. Doubts and questions in their mind vanished.
Leo tilted his head and gave them a meaningful look.
"Do you still think it's not useful?"
"N-No, senior! T-That element Qi… was too strong! I-I think it can vaporize any soul formation cultivator, no, any soul transformation cultivator! I don't think sect master Hua can take that shot!"
Leo nodded and explained, "This is an outdated weapon that I want you to try. In the future, my merchandise will be a lot more powerful and easy to use. Even a kid can use it to kill strong cultivators."
"…"
"Before that can happen, you need to know how to operate each gun so that you will have more experience in the field. When a gunfight occurs, you can outperform them and kill your opponents with the same weapons. Do you get it?"
"Y-Yes, senior."
"Good. Now, that you have loaded your ammo, I'll teach you how to aim. Copy my posture and look carefully at how I aim at the target…"
"…"
No one questioned Leo anymore. They listened and watched the demonstration.
.
10 minutes later…
BANG
BANG
BANG
Ten elders of the Life Sword Sect pulled the triggers in unison. The spirit stones transformed into long yellowish needles and pierced through iron pine trees.
Unlike Leo, the elders added their Qi into the spirit stones to increase firepower. Everybody smiled as they could feel the feedback from each shot.
They got addicted to the toys. Every time the targets were hit, they were elated.
Like a company of musketeers, their reload motions seemed like a choreography. Even when they aimed and pulled the triggers, everything happened at the same time.
Leo watched them from the back and secretly swallowed his saliva. He wondered if these cultivators were hidden geniuses.
'I'll be damned. Why are these old men so good at guns? I thought they would have fumbled a few times or shot their own feet. Welp, there goes the fun.'
Despite these thoughts, Leo was happy that they mastered the art. With this improvement, they could teach the other employees in his stead and reduce his workload.
Also, with these guys, Leo was confident that he could upgrade his general store to level 10 and remove the system's newbie protection.
He wondered if the system would unlock a PVP system or something similar. He could only pray that it wouldn't be that bad.
.
.
Imperial Palace
Yan Xiang and Yan Luo gazed at the mysterious spaceship that the latter had salvaged from a ruin. They smiled from ear to ear as they waited for their subordinates to finish exploring it.
A group of elderly men came out. Surprisingly, the team's leader was none other than Tang Xuan.
"We have finished inspecting this artifact, your majesty," reported Tang Xuan. "This is a flying ship of an unknown country. We've found traces of commoners here, but we don't find any Qi sources or artifacts. However..."
"Yeah?" Both father and son were curious, "However?"
Tang Xuan hesitated if he should reveal the thing he had found. He closed his eyes for a moment and chose not to disclose the information. After all, he felt threatened.
"However, we've discovered that there were artifacts in this ship, but someone had already taken all of them."
Yan Luo smirked, "Yeah, Florida Man took them all and killed my brother. Or rather, Florida Man found everything, but my brother tried to rob him. He got his karma served."
Yan Xiang snorted, "Florida Man or not, he killed my son. Even if that brat is a disgrace to my family, his surname was YAN. Florida Man has to pay for his crime!"
"…"
Tang Xuan quietly sighed as he gave up on them. He could only pray for their quick demise.
Still, as a loyal servant of Yan Xiang, he tried to divert their attention by informing them of the urgent tasks. He reminded them.
"Before we think about revenge, how about we plan for the upcoming Jianghu Alliance Meeting in two weeks? All sects will bring their disciples to the capital for the tournament to show off their gains from the mystic realms. You have selected your representatives yet."
Yan Xiang and Yan Luo paused to think. As this event focused on their reputation, they couldn't ignore it.
"What was the age category again? 20?" Asked Yan Luo.
"It's 18 this year, your highness. The age limit is reduced because of the number of competitors last year."
"Oh, shame. Well, we have to pick someone from the army again. Say, can I borrow one of your disciples?" Yan Xiang thought of Tang Tian's disciple. He wondered if he could poach him.
"You must be joking, your majesty. He will participate as a representative of my Sixth Element Sect."
"I'm joking. I'm joking. Don't take it too seriously."
"Of course, I know."
Although their conversation seemed peaceful, Yan Luo secretly glared at Tang Xuan. He was envious of his sect.
"I guess we have to postpone the revenge business to another date," Yan Xiang grinned as he had an idea. "Say, Tang Xuan. Can you send an invitation to Florida Man if he will participate in this event? Maybe… we can humiliate him before our ancestors come down to kill the guy."

chapters.title: Chapter 134 Florida Man Purchases Luxurious Sports Cars To Decorate Parking Lot
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 134 – Florida Man Purchases Luxurious Sports Cars to Decorate His Parking Lot
A week passed after the merge, Leo's employees settled down to the new lifestyle.
Off-shift employees all entered the "Orlando Planet" to cultivate wood and water Qi. Even muscle-tempering realm disciples tried their luck in there. However, they had to come back to rest and recuperate as the overflowing elemental Qi in that world was too strong for their bodies to handle.
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei finally understood why Leo assigned them there. As the only seniors in the area, they healed and corrected the weak disciples' Qi and dantians. After the recuperation, the disciples either advanced to the Qi condensation stage or improved their constitution.
Former outer disciples of the Life Sword Sect and the Amazon Sanctuary quickly developed their physiques and inner Qi. After a week, 300 muscle-tempering stage youths became Qi condensation stage cultivators.
The improvement of the teenagers made Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei proud even though they barely helped them. Because of the positive emotion, they had fun rescuing reckless youths and observing their growth.
Aside from the daily routine, a new building was erected. East of the Recycling Center, Wu Buyi, Gao Yan, and their alchemy team built the first non-system alchemy workshop of their own. Using the materials from the junkyard, they made 50 alchemy cauldrons to practice making pills.
That day, Wu Buyi and the alchemist team received a new assignment from Leo.
.
Leo stood in front of the newly built workshop. He opened the domain system map and noticed that it occupied 100x100 grids. Moreover, the workshop was 10 meters tall, and it came with three floors – The basement, the first floor, and the second floor.
The architecture and design were still rough as the roof was made from clay tiles. Because of its amateurish workmanship, there might be leaks. These alchemists would surely get into trouble during the rainy season.
Although he was impressed by their carpentry skills, Leo didn't forget that it was not a system structure. Soon, it had to be deconstructed and replaced with an upgradable system building.
"I see that you finish making your workstation. Then, Wu Buyi, are you ready for a new task?"
Wu Buyi, Gao Yan, Life Sword Sect's alchemists, and aspiring alchemists gathered around Leo and saluted.
"We're ready, my lord!"
"Good. Here is your first task. I want you to make grain pills according to the recipe I give you. The ingredients are mostly stored in either the granary or the warehouse. Use them as you see fit."
Wu Buyi received a modern A4 paper, which he had never seen before. He was impressed by the smooth surface and the sharp edge.
"Erm, senior?" Gao Yan noticed that Wu Buyi was distracted.
"Oh, ahem!"
Wu Buyi stopped checking the paper and read the recipes.
"The recipe is… iron pine nut, one starch, one metal element catalyst, and fire element Qi. Huh?"
Wu Buyi frowned as the recipe used too many top-grade materials. In addition, Leo wrote a paragraph underneath the recipe to teach them about his insight.
The alchemist elder continued reading.
"Umm, according to the annotation, the grain pills will mutate according to the additional elemental Qi we use. If we use essence instead of Qi, the pill quality will improve. For example, if we can use all five basic element essence, the grain pills will come out with all five elements."
"…Wow!" Gao Yan and the alchemists were astonished.
Wu Buyi paused for a moment and sneaked a glance at Leo's face. He then asked, "Umm, if it's not too much, can we observe how you make these pills?"
"Can't y'all figure it by yourself? What are you? A donut?"
Wu Buyi was embarrassed. As shameless as he was, Wu Buyi pressed on.
"I'm so sorry, my lord. We need a reference of how you do it."
Leo rolled his eyes as he didn't want to waste his precious system workshop's time on something cheap and outdated. Still, he entertained these alchemists nonetheless.
Walking back to the workshops, the group followed Leo. Upon arrival, Leo noticed that the second workshop had just finished making another batch of yang flame pills. Leo stopped the mannequin and inserted the ingredients for grain pills instead.
After tossing iron pine leaves, a piece of potato, and a pine nut in there, Leo closed the lid and spat on the fireplace as usual. Then, he activated the system workshop in front of the crowd.
DING
The fire was automatically lit. The workshop mannequin also put his hands on the cauldron and adjusted the flame balance for Leo.
Leo turned around to look at the crowd.
"Done."
"Eh?" Gao Yan and others were taken aback. They thought that Leo would teach them.
"If you want to learn, watch the doll over here. He will show you how it's done. Oh, also, you." Leo ordered the mannequin, "Keep making the grain pills and let them observe you, okay? Keep making until you're out of materials."
The mannequin nodded. He then focused on the cauldron.
After entrusting his task to the mannequin, Leo left the alchemist group. He also gave Wu Buyi homework.
"I hope to see you master this recipe. If you can't make pinnacle-grade grain pills like that doll, I'll confiscate the phone."
"!!!"
Wu Buyi's face was ashen. As the phone had been fulfilling his dream and broadening his horizon, Wu Buyi couldn't afford to lose it.
Because of desperation, Wu Buyi's concentration was heightened. He saluted Leo and turned around to observe the mannequin with burning eyes.
Seeing that the trick worked, Leo pointed at Gao Yan, too.
"You, too. If you can't make a pinnacle-grade grain pill within this year, I'll confiscate that lightsaber! You're an alchemist, not a Jedi. Why the hell are you wielding that showy sword around?! Didn't Thora tell you not to use it?!"
"!!!"
It was Gao Yan's turn to be surprised. He closed his mouth and glanced at his sentient dao spirit.
Thora had been crossing her arms and pouting at Gao Yan. She also scolded him.
'He's right. You shouldn't use that sword or reveal its existence to others! Why did you keep using it in public? Do you want to tempt your friends to kill you in your sleep?'
Gao Yan sweated profusely, "B-But the lumber is too strong! Even Master Wu can't cut it with his sword. Without the artifact, we can't even build the workshop!"
'No excuses! This happened because you people are too weak! If you have time to build that useless thing, you should have trained some more!'
"…"
Gao Yan wanted to cry as building the workshop was Leo's idea, yet he got scolded. Meanwhile, Leo secretly glanced at Gao Yan and looked away, pretending that it was none of his business. He moved on to check the gunsmith in the general store.
.
CRACK
CRACK
On the second floor of Leo's store, two automaton mannequins sat at their workbenches, working on their new rifle and ammunition.
The gunsmith had robotic arms like the tailor of the clothing store. However, he didn't need Leo's skin to create gun parts as he got the materials from elsewhere.
Lining inside other partitioned rooms were sacred wood blocks and a large chunk of gemstone, which Leo had extracted from the ground.
.
Superconductor Obsidian of Holy Lich
This 10,000-year-old mineral is the crystallization of a dead Archlich's dantian core. As the former master of this dantian crystal was as strong as a celestial king, this mineral inherited his physical strength. If it's used to make weapons, it will surely be extremely durable.
Cannot be used in alchemy.
Can be used to make weapons or converted into metals
.
This superconductor mineral was the primary material for the gun barrels and other parts. The matchlock rifles that Leo had given to Han Hao and others were also made from this material.
Unfortunately, the superconductor obsidian was not strong enough to withstand Leo's Qi and his empowered essence stones. Leo still needed better material for his personal firearms. In addition, the gunsmith workshop was still low-level. The workshop mannequins couldn't make a better version of rifles or guns yet.
Leo visited the temporary storage rooms of the gunsmith and replenished the stock. Then, he went to check the other mannequin and his work.
The second mannequin didn't tinker or temper with the gun parts. Instead, he worked on the unique gunpowder of Leo's store.
Leo glanced at the crates of exploding chilies. Looking at the out-of-place ingredient, he wryly smiled.
.
Exploding Reaper Chilies
Can be found in a temperate climate area or a mystic realm with the fire element Qi. These chilies can explode if they are directly touched by a cultivator. However, it won't react if you touch it with non-organic objects.
Not suitable for food or alchemy due to its chemical reactions.
.
A knife extended from the second mannequin's arm as he brought a thick chili to the workshop table and sliced it in half. Upon cutting it open, white seeds of the chili came out.
The mannequin didn't stop there. He separated the seeds and put them in another container. After moving the seeds away, he began to chop the chili into smaller pieces.
DOK-DOK-DOK
As if someone was chopping a vegetable, the chopping sound echoed in the mall. However, in reality, the mannequin's speed surpassed that of what a human's eye could see. Within seconds, a large piece of chili turned into red powder.
After getting the red powder, the mannequin poured them into a large mortar. He then reached out for a ladle and scooped rainbow water from a bucket in the gunsmith.
Leo wryly smiled as he remembered the water. It was tap water from the general store, but it was mixed with his saliva. This contaminated water was one of the ingredients to make the gunpowder!
After mixing the water into the chili powder, the mannequin started grinding them. The red pieces of chili slowly turned black and hardened as they absorbed the mutated water.
A few seconds later, the chili powder turned into black powder.
.
Reaper Gunpowder
Made from Florida Man's bodily fluid and Exploding Reaper Chili. A pinch of this gunpowder is as deadly as 100 grams of TNT. Keep it away from fire.
.
This was the source of Leo's gunsmith's gunpowder. As long as Leo kept growing chilies, he would have endless sources of gunpowder for his toys.
For now, the bottleneck of gun production was the rifle's crafting speed. The mannequin could only make five matchlock rifles per day, which was not enough to arm everybody in Leo's domain.
'This will take ages to make a musketeer squadron.'
Leo sighed and brought empty buckets to a public bathroom. He refilled the water and spat into them. Then, he carried the buckets to the gunsmith for the mannequins to work with.
After replenishing the water, Leo dumped a few more crates of chilies in the store room and left the workers alone. He walked down the stairs.
Arriving on the first floor, Leo admired the new look of his general store. It looked like a large indoor wet market as showcase tables and a dozen door refrigerators were full of his merchandise.
Vegetables, fruits, potatoes, pills, and mutated plants filled the first floor. Instead of storing them in the warehouses or granaries, Leo put them here so the store wouldn't look too empty.
The shopping mall was 20% ready for the grand opening. Leo just needed to fill the building with other minor shops and content on the second floor.
Thinking of other merchandise, Leo turned his attention to the clothing store for a moment. He narrowed his eyes.
'Clothes are good, but cultivators are mostly men. They aren't fond of fashion.'
Leo closed his eyes and tried to recall what men in the modern world bought whenever they had enough money. He thought of big toys, such as sports cars, yachts, and big bikes.
Flashy vehicles came to Leo's mind. He opened his eyes and gazed at his online store system. He compared the prices of various modern vehicles.
"They might be useless to others, but they are flex factors. Yeah, I should start with you."
.
Pagani Huayra– 1,400 years of lifespan
McLaren Elva – 1,700 years of lifespan
Bentley Bacalar – 1,900 years of lifespan
Aston Martin Vulcan – 2,300 years of lifespan
Bugatti Mistral Roadster – 5,000 years of lifespan
Mercedes-Maybach Exelero – 8,000 years of lifespan
.
When Leo was a human, these vehicles were out of his reach. But after the apocalypse, these toys were so insignificant that they were too cheap.
Leo bitterly laughed. There was no road for these cars to run on, so they were useless to him. However, they could be used as decoration to attract eccentric customers.
"Let's park one or two on the second floor. There's nothing to see here, so I might as well use it as a lounge area for the riches."

chapters.title: Chapter 135 Florida Man Attempted Time Traveling, Crashed His Brand New Ferrari Roma Into Trees.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 135 – Florida Man Attempted Time Traveling, Crashed His Brand New Ferrari Roma into Trees.
DING
DING
DING
Sometimes, a man should reward himself for his hard work. Leo also blessed himself with fancy sports cars even though he had no intention to drive them anywhere.
Ferrari, Lamborghini, Bugatti, Pagani, Rolls-Royce, Porches, Mercedes, Leo purchased one each and parked them on the second floor. When they were lined up in a column, these colorful exotic cars strangely sparkled under the LED light.
However, Leo wasn't satisfied. As each car came out as a default setting, it required gasoline to function. Thus, Leo tampered with it by using the system to upgrade it.
DING
The cars averagely cost 2,000 years of lifespan, except the Rolls-Royce and Bugatti. The upgrade price was also the same. Thus, Leo only upgraded every car once.
After spending 40,000 years of lifespan in these cars, the vehicles no longer needed batteries or gasoline. Instead, it required its driver to charge its fuel by filling the fuel tank with either spirit stones or essence stones.
Their fuel tank was also changed. It could automatically crush and dispose of the stones through a new exhaust.
Leo peeked under every car and admired the new exhausts.
"It's weird. So, if I drive it, it will crush my essence stones and pour out the dust through this exhaust? Why don't you just use a Qi battery or something?"
As the upgraded car looked interesting, Leo checked his current lifespan.
<Current Lifespan – 510,196 Years…>
He was rich!
Leo puffed his chest as he thought of the talismans that he got from the Fatui Cult's underground city. So far, he had already eaten all of them, including random pills from their spatial rings.
Although those talisman papers caused him to defecate bricks every morning for a week, the result was worth the trouble.
"Eh, how about upgrading one of the cars to level 9?"
Curious about the system's effects, Leo purchased another car. He picked the cheapest one from the sports car catalog, the Ferrari Roma, which only cost him 250 years of lifespan. For the sake of traditions, Leo picked the red one.
Leo put his hand on it and upgraded the car 8 times, spending another 2,000 YOL.
CLINK-CLINK
As if the vehicle turned into Optimus Prime, it shapeshifted for a few minutes. When it stopped, it reverted to the default look.
Leo opened the door and inspected the interior. Everything looked the same, except the gears and gearbox.
"Where is the gear? Isn't this supposed to be the dual-clutch transmission?"
Instead of finding a gear handle or something similar, there was a glass pad with a handprint on it.
Seeing the hand pad, Leo frowned. He couldn't imagine driving this car while pressing his hand on the glowing pad as it would be uncomfortable. Still, for the sake of the experiment, he needed to try it.
Leo stored the car in his spatial ring and brought it out in front of his store, where he had made a concrete road. After putting the vehicle on the road, Leo opened his store domain system and expanded the street.
Concrete road completely cut across the entire domain from east to west. However, Leo wasn't satisfied. He created another path to the north and south, forming a T intersection at the east border area.
A road course wouldn't be completed without another parallel way. Leo added another road on the north edge, moving from the east to the west. Then, he dragged the road down to the south. Leo repeated the process and made the southwest road meet with the southeast.
A temporary race track was created with the center road as a pit lane. Leo widely grinned as he looked forward to testing his vehicle.
"I hope no idiot crosses the road while I'm playing. Anyway, time to vroom-vroom!"
Leo hopped into the cockpit and started the car. He revved the engine to hear the sweet sound.
VRRRRRRR
As Leo had hoped for, it was beautiful.
However, by doing so, he caused a commotion. Life Sword Sect's disciples and elders who had been busy in the farms heard it and came to look. Even Gao Yan, Wu Buyi, and the alchemy team stopped working and came to see the commotion.
"What's that?"
"A carriage?"
"No, it doesn't look like a carriage. There are no horses."
"Stupid. That might be a flying ship of Lord Florida Man. Who knows what kind of artifact he has."
"Wrong. I have seen many warships from other sects. That is not a ship."
"Then, what is that?"
"I don't know!"
The onlookers speculated and guessed what the red vehicle was. As they were afraid of offending Leo, they kept their distance and whispered among themselves.
Fortunately, there was a shameless man among them. Wu Buyi was familiar with Leo the most, and he wasn't afraid of his scolding.
The alchemist walked to the side of the car and leaned over. He looked inside the car and tilted his head.
"My lord. What are you doing in there? What is this?"
Leo proudly smirked, "My ride."
"Ride?"
"Back off and watch."
"???"
"Tell the guys on the road to move too if they don't want me to run them over."
"…"
Wu Buyi still didn't understand what this red metal thing with wheels could do. Still, he waved his hand and chased everybody in front of the Ferrari away. The crowd got out of the road as instructed, but they gathered behind the car.
After the path was cleared, Leo was ready to test-drive this machine. As he had no clue how the car worked, he put his palm on the handprint console.
DING
<Scanning…>
"Oh?"
A robotic female voice notified Leo of the car's strange system. He was surprised, but he continued pressing his palm on the console.
<Registering the driver…>
<Please tell me your name.>
Leo paused for a moment. He almost said his true name, but he hated the idea. Thus, he discarded the American name and chose to use his alias as it sounded more pleasant.
"Florida Man!"
<Affirmative. Master Florida Man has been registered as the car owner.>
<Please be advised. Unless you grant permission to the new driver, nobody can drive this vehicle.>
"…Wow."
Leo was impressed with the new security system. It sounded like it came from a sci-fi movie.
<You can remove your hand from the console. Please enjoy the ride.>
"Cool!"
Leo laughed and put his hand on the wheel. He fiddled with the side sticks and checked the wheel's features if digital gears existed.
It wasn't hard to locate the gear paddles behind the wheel. Seeing the paddles, Leo was relieved as they still looked similar to modern sports cars.
Slowly, Leo tried to recall the old memory when he was still a human. He shifted to the first gear and lightly on the gas to get back his feeling.
Unfortunately, Leo forgot that he had upgraded this vehicle to a monstrous artifact.
VRRRRRRRR
Leo's back was pressed on his seat as the car suddenly accelerated. The digital speedometer instantly jumped from 0 to 300mph!
As Leo was caught off guard, he jetted forward and got off the road in seconds.
"JESUS, TAKE THE WHEEL!"
Leo screamed as he saw the approaching large tree ahead. He accidentally pulled the wheel toward him.
It moved like a commercial plane's wheel.
BOOM!
The vehicle crashed the tree head-on. However, the iron pine tree shattered in half upon impact!
BOOM!
BOOM!
However, the impact didn't stop the momentum of the car. It kept on going even though its four wheels were off the ground for a second.
Leo frowned as he expected the airbag to come out, but nothing happened. Moreover, he saw a faint layer of barrier around the car as it blasted through the obstacles.
After hitting the seventh tree, the car ceased moving. It parked in the middle of the rocky terrain while a tree trunk supported the chassis from underneath. The prestige Ferrari car became a see-saw.
Leo opened the door and came out of the vehicle to see the mess he made.
Strangely, the front hood was unharmed and unscratched. The headlights still looked as new, and the bumper was intact.
He looked at the chassis next as he was worried that the wheels and the tires might be misaligned. Fortunately, nothing was dented or damaged. Surprisingly, the trunk that supported the car's bottom chassis didn't even touch anything.
The entire car floated on top of the trunk by an inch.
"Dafuq?"
Leo scratched his head and looked at the system item in astonishment. He had no idea what the system did to the normal-looking sports car.
As Leo couldn't drive the car at this stage, he stored the vehicle in his spatial ring. Then, he leaped back to the general store.
Upon arrival, Han Hao, Han Meng, Wu Buyi, and Xu Nuan surrounded him.
"Sir, what happened?! Are we under attack?"
Leo scratched his head and pursed his lips. He was too embarrassed to confess that he crashed his car.
"Nothing happened. I just tested my stupid artifact."
"Artifact? That red thing, sir?" Han Hao gazed at the carnage at the edge of the store domain. Seven iron pine trees on the path fell, leaving a trail of dust behind.
Leo coughed, "It's in the experiment stage, so I need a lot of practice. Anyway, nothing to see here. Disperse! Disperse!"
"…"
The elder group looked skeptical as the vehicle just now emitted a strong aura of a quasi-immortal. Still, as it was Leo's toy, they chose not to question him.
After the crowd went back to their posts, Leo switched his location. He leaped to the west road, where nobody wandered around.
Leo gently put the sports car back on the road and tried again. This time, he didn't step on the gas pedal and let the car move by its default gear.
VRRRRR
Even though Leo didn't step on the gas, the car sped up and stabilized at 100mph. He stepped on the brake several times to decelerate. However, it went back to the same speed again.
Confused, Leo put his palm on the console and asked the car.
"Alexa! Siri! Google! Whatever your name is, how do I decrease the default speed?!"
DING
<You can inject your Qi into the console and adjust the default speed of each gear.>
"…That's it?"
<Yes.>
For some reason, Leo's kidneys were hurt. He also had the urge to smack his forehead for the stupid resolution.
Following the suggestion, Leo minimized his Qi usage and injected his Qi into the console.
DING
A new system window appeared in front of the wheel. Unlike Leo's system, it was a screen, projected by the vehicle.
[Transmission Settings]
"…"
Leo bitterly smiled. The more he saw the changes, the more he realized that the system was weird.
.
.
Although Leo might not be an engineer, he read a lot when he was on Earth during his free time. He also used to temper with cars during the post-apocalypse era as nobody was there to help him. Gearbox tuning was one of Leo's hobbies back then before all metal and spare parts in the world rotted in rust.
The car system made the tuning easier. With the graphs and detailed statistics, Leo decreased the acceleration spike by 90%, allowing the car to run at an Earthling speed.
Still, several features of the settings made Leo laugh.
[Flight Settings]
[Autopilot Settings]
[Shield and Safety Settings]
With just these options, Leo found himself a new hobby that he could enjoy other than building his shopping mall empire.
"Oh, boy. This is going to be fun!"
.
.
While Leo had fun with his new toy, a cultivator had been floating over the Magpie City.
Tang Xuan gazed at the Life Sword Sect, which seemed desolate. He couldn't see any deacon or disciple around. Instead, he found several homeless commoners and beggars taking shelter in an outer disciple's barrack.
"What happened to Hua Jiashan? Where is he?"
Tang Xuan gazed at the east, where Leo's general store was. He narrowed his eyes as he noticed a lot of changes in the area. As he thought of Leo, he recalled the recent mysterious incidents.
'Someone killed the second prince. Situ Nantian mysteriously retreated and went into seclusion after the expedition. The third prince made a fuss in the court and accused Yan Luo that he raided the Fatui Cult. So many things are happening at the same time.'
Tang Xuan narrowed his eyes as the face of an eccentric old man appeared in his mind. He still remembered Leo's face vividly.
'That man appeared, and everything went to hell. But if Florida Man was behind Situ Nantian's seclusion and the death of the second prince, Yan Xiang would never reconcile with him anymore. Actually, my guts are telling me that Florida Man did it, including the destruction of the Fatui Cult. If that's the case, I have to pick sides. I can't be neutral in this mess or Yan Xiang will rope me in as usual.'
Tang Xuan calculated the pros and cons for an hour. He deeply inhaled and made up his mind. Then, he contacted his son and his clansmen, using his voice transmission.
"Tian'er, are you there?"
Tang Tian, who was on the other side of the continent, heard his father's voice. He replied with his thoughts, but Tang Xuan could hear him clearly.
'What's wrong, father?'
"We will resign from the imperial court."
'What?! But why?! We and Yan Xiang have been allies for centuries!'
"Not anymore. Something has to change."
'What happened, father?! Is there something urgent?'
"There is…"
Tang Xuan thought of Leo. He still remembered the strange aura and his unique charisma.
Although his loyalty had been to the Yan Empire for countless years, Tang Xuan's instinct was never wrong. When he heard that Leo killed the second prince, he was sure that a major war between quasi-immortals would break out soon, and the loser's side would be erased from history.
And that loser would be Yan Xiang and his men, the Situ Clan and Ouyang Clan included!
There was no point staying on a sinking ship, Tang Xuan made up his mind to ally himself with Leo. After all, he might be the key to improving his clan's status.
Tang Xuan deeply inhaled and strengthened his focus. He answered Tang Tian.
"A major war will break out soon, and Yan Xiang will definitely lose. We have to switch sides before that happens! I want you to migrate everybody out of the manor and bring them to Magpie City, RIGHT NOW!"
'EH?! NOW?! B-But father, aren't you jumping to conclusions too early? There's no sign of war!'
"It will happen. Did you know that someone killed the second prince and destroyed the Fatui Cult?"
'WHAT?!'
"Someone is targeting the Yan Empire, and a new quasi-immortal suddenly shows up on our land. Don't you think it's strange?"
'…'
"I don't care what you think, but I trust my guts. We need to move before the others. In the upcoming gathering, we will take sides with the new force!"
Tang Xuan and Tang Tian spent hours chatting. When it was dark, Tang Xuan flew toward Leo's general store to deliver an invitation to the imperial court's gathering.

chapters.title: Chapter 136 Florida Man Arrested For Hiding A Thousand Underage Immigrants And One Dead Body In His Sweatshop
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 136 – Florida Man Arrested For Hiding A Thousand Underage Immigrants and One Dead Body in His Sweatshop.
At night, Leo's farm and his buildings were still bright as many cultivators graduated from sleeping. They cultivated in their rooms instead of resting. Night-shift farmers illuminated the farmland with their Qi by creating light balls. They never stopped harvesting crops as they had a quota to meet every day.
Tang Xuan hovered at the edge of the general store's domain. He gazed at the flying platform and the glass elevator. Then, he watched the young cultivators working as farmers.
He recognized some of the people there. A few of them used to work as a deacon of Life Sword Sect. However, they abandoned their sect to work here.
That was not all. Tang Xuan spotted Wu Buyi, Gao Yan, and many alchemists in front of the three alchemy workshops behind the general store building. They were busy observing the mannequins and taking notes.
In addition, Tang Xuan sensed the Qi signature of Hua Jiashan on top of the flying platform. Furthermore, the presence of the famous Amazonian Sanctuary, Dongfang Mei, was nearby.
The Tang Clan's ancestor was confused. The last time he visited here, this place was a small secluded place. But at the moment, it became a small town full of cultivators.
Tang Xuan frowned and glanced at several individuals. As he was an expert in measuring someone's character and talent, he noticed a few irregular people.
In front of a small house, next to Gao Yan's residence, a small child without an eyeball, a toddler, and a monster plant sat in a circle as they seemed to be listening to the eyeless girl.
In normal circumstances, Tang Xuan would have rushed there to rescue the two little girls from the monster. However, the trio's Qi and strength were abnormal.
The weakest one was the little toddler girl. Even though she looked like a 2 or 3-year-old child, her cultivation base was already at the nascent soul realm! Her dao avatar floated behind the child and smiled at her as if she were her elder sister or nanny.
As for the monster plant, Tang Xuan had seen it before. The chomper, aka Cat, was a 7th-stage monster whose body was made from sacred wood. Her humanoid dao avatar was always beside her, but the girl spirit seemed to have a mind of her own.
Although the two girls were strange enough, it was incomparable to the mysterious eyeless girl.
First, Tang Xuan couldn't see the usual aura that humans naturally produced. Every commoner and cultivator was born with a thin layer of grey aura, and it could change or evolve to other colors, depending on one's behavior and moral integrity.
However, the eyeless had no such thing! Rather, her presence was the same as a cold corpse!
Secondly, behind the girl, a thousand transparent spirits and transparent flame balls followed after her. They orbited around the group as if they formed an array, protecting everybody. Furthermore, the spirits of two beautiful maidens with long ears had been looking back at Tang Xuan.
