Unfortunately, humans were naturally greedy. The imperial family and the representatives from the Jianghu Alliance desired the secret cultivation method of the evil sects, but they were not shameless enough to openly practice the vile cultivation methods.
Instead of cultivating them directly, they hired the captives and rebuilt the unorthodox sects. Then, they deployed agents and spies into the organizations to learn and develop their secret arts as a pretense of working as their disciples.
Ouyang Clan, Situ Clan, and even royalty sent their people to occupy important positions within the evil sects and cults. After the imperial family and various major clans conquered the evil cults from within, these organizations became vessels of the royal family and big clans. Afterward, those unorthodox cults and sects used their connection to gain membership in the imperial court.
Years later, Emperor Yan and his sons seized the political advantage and took control of the Death Sword Sect and Fatui Cult. The major clans had no choice but to bow their heads and enjoy the leftovers from the royal family.
This status quo had been fixed for 300 years. No one managed to break their political alliance as all major clans enjoyed the new cultivation methods and rose in power…
…Until the recent mystic realm expedition.
.
The once wealthy Mantis Dragon City, the home base of the Death Sword Sect was no longer the same.
Buildings and structures of the city were covered by mysterious pink mushrooms and a thick fog of mushroom spore. It was devoid of cultivators and commoners. However, the population was replaced by something terrifying.
"Uuuuugh."
"Oooooooh."
"Eeeegh."
Humanoid monsters walked aimlessly in the city. They had four limbs and humanoid torso, but their head and blistered skin became the nutritious soil for hardened pink mushrooms.
Everybody's heads were deformed and mutated differently. The mushrooms that grew from their brains and skulls all had a unique shape and size. Some behaved like the mutated cultivator's mouth while several mushrooms transformed into an extra limb.
Regular mushrooms, spore spitters, fangs, hammers, spikes, eyes, limbs, beating hearts, hardened flesh, extra heads, extra faces, mouths, and even genitals emerged on everybody's head. Each carried a different trait and strength.
Floating over the mushroom city were two flying ferry ships. One of them belonged to the Ouyang Clan while the other one was from the imperial court.
Standing on the deck were the rescuers and the survivors of the outbreak. The rescued were without any garments as the court physicians and alchemists examined them thoroughly with their Qi.
Among the alchemists, one of them was a soul transformation cultivator. Coincidentally, he was from the Ouyang Clan and an elder of a prominent group.
He was Ouyang Ke, the grandfather of Ouyang Feng and an elder of the World Tree Sect. As his sect commanded, he and many alchemists were dispatched here to investigate the Mantis Dragon City as the imperial court had lost contact with their agents in the Death Sword Sect.
Ouyang Ke and others didn't need to spend too much time as the cause of this incident was apparent – Sweet Dream Mushrooms!
Although this discovery was huge, nobody onboard had the luxurious time to inform their superiors or headquarters. All able cultivators were busy expending their Qi, creating a wind storm and blowing the spores south. As for the physicians and the alchemists, their hands got tied down as they had to heal and filter the survivors.
While checking one of the naked sword sect's disciples, Ouyang Ke detected a movement inside the disciple's left thigh. The latter's blood vessels were black, and pink rashes were visible on his skin.
"Another infected!"
Ouyang Ke warned his colleagues and grabbed the disciple's head.
"ELDER, PLEASE SPARE ME!" The disciple cried.
"Sorry, brat. There is no cure!"
CRACK
Ouyang Ke twisted the disciple's neck. Then, he severed the young man's head and threw the corpse out of the ship.
"Next!"
After killing the 56th survivor, Ouyang Ke's bloodshot eyes stared at the remaining naked survivors.
The remaining disciples trembled in fear. They looked around, searching for a way to flee. Unfortunately, many nascent soul and soul formation cultivators surrounded them, blocking every possible escape route.
"Move!"
One of the cultivators pointed his long spear at the frontmost young man. The latter shed a tear of despair and walked toward Ouyang Ke.
Looking at the young man, Ouyang Ke grumbled, "Don't cry, brat. If you're not infected, we'll bring you to Cauliflower City. As long as you're not infected…"
"…"
Other alchemists and physicians also finished scanning their patients.
CRACK
CRACK
Out of a dozen inspected survivors, three of them got their necks snapped on the spot. Once again, the elders threw the infected corpses away.
As for the lucky ones, they cried tears of joy as they wouldn't get killed. They screamed and hugged each other.
Ouyang Ke was in a bad mood. He glared at the non-infected survivors and yelled at them.
"Bring them to the isolation cabins and seal them with cage talismans for seven days. We have to make sure that no spore is on them or that they are infected, but they don't show the symptoms! Be thorough! This is Sweet Dream Mushroom we're dealing with!"
The ferry guards gulped and saluted Ouyang Ke. Then, they dragged the inspected survivors to the cabins inside the ship.
The disciples cried as everything around them was unfair. They had just survived the sudden mushroom zombie outbreak, but they got caught and imprisoned by their allies.
Ouyang Ke and the other elders ignored their desperate cries and resumed their tasks. They were aware that one small mishap there could bring a calamity to the entire continent. Thus, they tried their best to contain the mushroom spores and the infected.
As nobody could predict where the spores would spread, they purposely sacrificed the southern region of their continent to the mushrooms. The only worrisome settlements south of Mantis Dragon City were Magpie City, Leo's shop, and Frozen Fire City, so the imperial court chose to limit the infection to their areas instead of letting it spread elsewhere. Once the reinforcements from the immortal realm arrived, they could remove these troublesome mushrooms and hunt down Leo altogether.
That was their initial plan.
"UUUUUUURRRAAAAAAAAHHHH!!"
While everybody was busy scanning the survivors, one of the mushroom zombies below looked up to the sky and bellowed.
The ferry guards looked at the zombie. Then, they frowned as they recognized the person's aura and Qi's signature. Although his face and appearance had changed, his signature long swords and his black armor were recognizable.
That zombie was Hua Guanhai, aka Hua Jiashan's brother and the sect master of the Death Sword Sect. Because of the mushroom spore that he accidentally carried over from the mystic realm, he was infected first and became a slave of the mushrooms.
At first, the guards scoffed at Hua Guanhai.
"Are you angry, Hua Guanhai? Hahahaha! It must have felt terrible to be a slave of their own mind."
"Yeah, I can't imagine how sad it is to get trapped in their own delusion."
"Less talking. Let's ignore him. We can't let any survivor flee from here, or it will really be a disaster."
"But the south…"
"That rumored Florida Man is near Magpie City. I heard he killed the second prince, and the emperor wanted him dead. Well, since these mushrooms gradually multiply, we'll send these spores to Florida Man's abode and kill him altogether. We'll kill two birds in one stone."
The guards smirked as they were on the imperial family's side. They didn't care about the consequences of their actions.
WHOOSH
They would soon be rudely awakened. While they were chatting, Hua Guanhai kicked the ground and charged toward them.
SWUA
SWUA
Using his black long sword, he cut down ten soul-formation cultivators in the sky in one second!
"!!!"
Ouyang Ke and others sensed the terrifying presence of Hua Guanhai. They took arms and prepared for a fight.
"Dammit! Can Jiangshi fly, too?!"
"Hua Guanhai, you bastard!"
Hua Guanhai turned around and groaned. His mushroom head split open in half, revealing a large eyeball inside, which replaced his brain.
The eyeball glared at everybody. Then, Hua Guanhai sneered.
"Not good!" Ouyang Ke broke a sweat. He pulled out an emergency portal talisman and tore it.
WHOOSH
A red portal appeared. Ouyang Ke frantically jumped into the portal and escaped alone.
As for the other cultivators, they failed to react as fast as Ouyang Ke. They unleashed their Qi attacks on Hua Guanhai.
"UUUURRRAAAAAHH!"
Hua Guanhai screamed and summoned his new dao avatar. The pink fog below gathered into a mass of spore, then shapeshifted into a giant chomper plant.
"NOM-NOM!"
The Dao avatar uttered before it transformed into pink clouds. Like a sweeping sandstorm, it devoured everybody in the sky.
.
.
"ACHOOO! MEOW!"
While eating potatoes in her granary, Cat's humanoid head sneezed. Her green slimy booger splashed everywhere on the mountain of mutated potatoes.
"…"
Cat sweated profusely. Even though she wantonly ate everything that she could, she was afraid of Leo's paper fans and his scolding. As the potatoes were Leo's important ingredients for pills, he always told Cat not to leave some clean potatoes for his automatons.
Seeing how all the potatoes in the granary got dirty, Cat cut out the dirty parts and put them in her mouth, hiding the evidence.
The smell of her slime booger was worse than Leo's stool and rotten corpses, yet she hummed as it tasted different.
While Cat was enjoying her endless meal, Leo walked into the granary.
"Hey, Cat. Have you eaten all the cabbage and chilies? The donkeys are complaining that there are not enough cabbages!"
"No Nom-Nom Meow!" Cat feigned ignorance.
"No? Are you sure?"
Cat shook her head. She sweated profusely.
"…Okay, then. I'll go check the other granary."
Leo left Cat alone. She then let out a sigh of relief.
As she was worried that Leo would scold her for eating too much, she decided not to eat more of Leo's food. She got out of the granary and deeply inhaled.
"Meow?"
As her foodie instinct was sharp, Cat caught a sweet scent of mushrooms from the north.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
Cat drooled. She sprinted and leaped over the junkyard and log fields. Then, she disappeared into the iron pine trees beyond Leo's domain territory.
After running 100 kilometers, she came across a pink fog, which slowly crept toward Leo's domain and Magpie City.
Cat tilted her head as she remembered the scent. It belonged to the sweet dream mushrooms that she once ate. Addicted to the unique taste, she rushed into the fog to find a similar mushroom.
"NOM-NOM MEOW <3"
.
.
"Umm…"
While Cat went out for food, Esen slowly regained her senses. Her entire body felt numb, and she could barely move.
Esen gazed at the ceiling and discovered that she was in her new house. She let out a sigh of relief.
'Geezer, you idiot. Your stupid water hurt my throat! You could have given me water nicely!'
She was still mad that Leo used a barbaric method to treat her. However, she also remembered how delicious Leo's blood was.
The taste was out of the world. She had drunk many types of blood, but Leo's tasted like a fine wine. Moreover, his blood was full of life force and pure elemental essence.
Thinking of Leo, Esen smirked. She then glanced down, looking at her paralyzed body. S
Esen tried to move her arms, fingers, and legs. Unfortunately, they wouldn't budge.
'Oh, dear. This takes me back. I guess I have to keep trying until I regain my strength. Oh, right. I can move my Qi and move like a marionette.'
Using her Qi as a string, Esen pulled her arms and legs up to restore her senses.
But as soon as she got to see her arms and legs again, Esen deeply frowned. Something wasn't right.
Her skinny arm was usually short, and her hands were small. However, they seemed longer and bigger. Moreover, her pale skin was so whiter than a sheet.
'Hmm?'
Not only were her arms longer, her legs got lengthened as well. Her slender legs and meaty thighs seemed unusual.
'Huh?'
Unable to contain her curiosity, Esen closed her eyes to scan her appearance with her Qi. Then, she saw herself in a bird-eye view in her mind.
'WHAT IN THE WORLD?!'

chapters.title: Chapter 143 Wanted Florida Man Dressing In Among Us Suit Is Terrorizes Towns. FBI Warns Children Not To Trust Any Man In Among Us Cosplay.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 143 – Wanted Florida Man Dressing in Among Us Suit Terrorizes Towns. FBI Warns Children Not to Trust Any Man in Among Us Cosplay.
"Nom-Nom Meow Meow <3"
Cat giggled as she deeply inhaled the mushroom spores. To her, the sweet scent smelled like a freshly cooked wagyu steak.
The living mushrooms entered her bloodstream. However, they were instantly devoured by transparent blood cells, which Cat inherited from Leo.
The more the cells absorbed the mushroom spores, the livelier Cat became. As if Cat got injected with a chicken's blood, she sprinted around the infected area and sucked in as much spore as she could.
Her existence became an air filter. Pink gas entered her mouth whenever she inhaled. But when she exhaled, only her bad breath came out.
The expanding pink spore also reacted to her actions. As they moved by their instinct, they traveled closer to the closest lifeform to infect her. As a result, the fog chased after her while she ran around.
The torrent of gas filter gradually cleaned the area, stopping the spread from the north to the south.
Unfortunately, Cat's action wasn't enough to remove all pink spores from the area. As the fully grown mushrooms and zombies from Dragon Mantis City never stopped producing new spores, the disappeared fog was replaced.
"Nom Nom-Nom, Nom-Nom, Meow <3"
After running around for an hour, Cat noticed the traits of the mushroom fog. Instead of chasing the spores, she planted her roots in the soil and spread her thorn vines. Then, she mumbled.
PLOP
PLOP
Black stems slowly grew from her thorn vines. Soon, they became new branches and leaves. The small leaves produced sticky liquid, which trapped the mushroom spores on her. The parasitic mushrooms melted upon touch and got absorbed into her leaves and vines.
As Cat digested more mushrooms, her life force and her strength increased.
RUMBLE
Dark clouds slowly gathered above Cat as she was about to naturally break through to the 8th stage. She looked up and noticed the flashing purple and yellow lightning in the sky.
Cat's lips curved down. She hated thunder and lightning.
Thunderbolt and lightning, very very frightened her.
BANG!
Thunder roared as the tribulation clouds warned Cat about her pending trial by fire.
Cat bore her teeth in anger. She plunged her vines and new branches into the ground, getting ready to endure the punishment from heaven.
BOOM
BOOM
Purple and Yellow lightning bolts slammed at her without mercy. At the same time, the extreme heat burnt the pink spores and all surrounding trees.
Getting hit by yellow lightning bolts, Cat's vines and roots slowly turned into stone. However, her transparent blood cells rushed to the petrified parts to cure the curse.
Cat's innate ability was also active. She summoned the DNA of the cockatrices that she had been storing inside her and digested it. As the new DNA contained instinctive programs that the cockatrices had inherited from their ancestors, Cat took in some of their natural traits.
One of them was the power of petrification and the ability to resist the stone curse.
After assimilating with the DNA, her petrified parts rapidly healed and reverted back to normal.
BOOM
Although the yellow lightning bolts could no longer turn her into stone, their extreme temperature still burnt her vines and roots. Her body was lightened on fire along with the surrounding iron pine trees and mushroom spore.
Cat's eyes gleamed as she imagined what Leo would do in this situation. She came up with a few solutions, but most of them were impossible for her.
Still, she remembered one thing that he and she could do in common.
"NOM-NOM MEOW!"
Opening her mouth wide, she taunted the tribulation clouds to strike her again.
Replying to Cat's taunt, a yellow and purple lightning bolt descended and descended into her mouth.
BOOM
Cat shut her mouth and trapped the intense energy inside. The scorching light burnt her tongue and melted her teeth. But a few seconds later, she gulped the air in her mouth into her tree trunk.
BURP
After letting out some gas, Cat's burnt wounds and her innards were instantly healed. She could feel her life force rising. At the same time, her humanoid body on top of the plant physique also grew bigger.
From a child-like upper torso and face, Cat gained the body of a middle-school teenager. Her dao avatar behind her also transformed into a refined black elf in her adult form.
Yellow electric sparks leaked from her vines and head as Cat stole a portion of lightning Qi to herself.
RUMBLE
The lightning tribulation was far from over. 30 consecutive yellow lightning bolts kept coming, punishing Cat for stealing heaven's energy.
Cat welcomed the lightning bolts with an open mouth. Her humanoid body laughed while the corner of her chomper mouth curved upward.
"NOM-NOM MEOW!"
...
That day, Cat broke through her bottleneck and became an official 8th-stage monster on her own.
The tribulation ended before the sunset. However, Cat didn't return to Leo's domain. She gazed toward the north as she smelled something nicer than the pink gas.
She smelled corpses and bigger mushrooms.
.
.
Imperial Palace
Sitting in front of the throne room was Ouyang Ke. He reported the incident to Emperor Yan Xiang and the officials.
"Sweet Dream Mushrooms?!"
The court officials murmured and looked around in panic. As for Yan Xiang, he stood as this incident reminded him of the calamity 500 years ago.
Last time, Situ Nantian sacrificed a portion of the continent and forcefully broke through to summon yellow tribulation lightning.
Only yellow lightning bolts could burn the mushrooms and stop them from growing. However, to summon such a tribulation, they required a talented soul transformation cultivator who could withstand the punishing attacks from heaven.
Many good cultivators died during the mystic realm expedition. The second prince's party was wiped out while the Situ Clan suffered a major blow. In short, their manpower was crippled.
The officials in the thorn room looked around to find the right candidates. Some sneaked glances at Tang Xuan while weaker cultivators thought of the first prince and the third prince.
While everybody was lost for words, a representative from the Situ Clan took a step forward.
The man was Situ Bai. He was an elder of the Cauldron Gnosis Sect, which was a part of the Pill Union. Although he was from the union, he had been working here to coordinate between the imperial court and his clan.
Situ Bai was like other court officials here. He kept his blue robes clean and spotless. His long hair was hidden inside his headwear, and he carried no weapon with him.
Bowing to the emperor, Situ Bai offered his insight.
"Your Majesty, there is no need to panic. From the information, the new sweet dream mushroom lair is the Dragon Mantis City south of here. Thanks to Elder Ouyang's quick wits, the wind is temporarily blowing south."
"And…?" Yan Xiang deeply frowned as he wanted the mushrooms contained, not spreading elsewhere.
"This is the best solution we have at the moment. Since Daoist Florida Man is rumored to reside near the Magpie City, he would be the first to face the spreading of the mushrooms."
Everybody in the room murmured again. As Leo had just been marked as a criminal due to his recent deed, Yan Xiang and the backers of the imperial family hated him. Hearing that he would run into the deadly mushrooms first, some of the men secretly smirked.
But there was an issue.
Yan Luo, the first prince, also attended the meeting. He pointed out the loopholes of their vague goal.
"What if Florida Man escapes? He can just avoid the mushrooms and flee to the other continents, right?"
Situ Bai grinned, "That won't be possible. Our spies have discovered that the people of Life Sword Sect and Amazonian Sanctuary are now working for him."
The listeners nodded as they got the same information as well. Although they didn't get this information from Tang Xuan, they once sent spies to check Leo's movements from time to time. Although they failed to infiltrate his domain, observing everybody from afar was enough to get that piece of information.
Situ Bai continued, "We believe that the criminal has taken both groups as his vessels. Since the commoners of the Magpie City can't move as fast as cultivators, I don't think Florida Man's subordinates will abandon their hometown. They will surely force Florida Man to either protect them or abandon them."
"And you're certain that Florida Man will protect those people?" Yan Luo raised his brows in amusement.
"Yes. He has no choice if he wishes to stay on this continent for a long time. If he ditches his subordinates, his reputation will take a huge hit. After that, he will be isolated among all sects, which is not ideal for someone who randomly opens a shop in the wild. He needs customers, and he needs us."
"…"
Yan Xiang glared at Situ Bai. He disliked the idea of relying on Leo. He deeply inhaled and voiced his thoughts.
"What if Florida Man fails to remove the mushrooms?"
Situ Bai shook his head, "Then, he is incompetent, and he deserves to die from the mushroom poisoning."
"Right. What about the mushroom suppression?"
Situ Bai widely grinned. He revealed the existence of his clan's ancestor.
"One of our ancestors is coming home to spectate the upcoming youth tournament. Once he arrives, we will ask him to help us remove the deadly mushrooms."
"…"
Yan Xiang nodded. He also contacted his father, but he never told anybody. He kept this piece of information a secret to himself for now as he planned to use his father to kill Leo in case everybody failed.
"Alright. Then, what about the jiangshis? Hua Guanhai and his Death Sword Sect's people got infected, right? How do we deal with those men?"
Situ Bai affirmed, "Of course, we'll pit them against Florida Man."
"How do we do it?"
Situ Bai confidently brought out a cyan pill from his pocket. As soon as it came out, the pill hovered over his palm. It also emitted a strong presence of a rare elemental Qi.
"This is my new creation, the Garuda Tornado Pill! If I crush this pill, a strong tornado will be summoned, and I can manipulate it at will because I have mastered the wind element. I can trap Hua Guanhai and jiangshi of the Death Sword Sect with this and send them to Florida Man's doorsteps!"
The crowd was astonished. Some of them praised Situ Bai out loud.
"Brilliant!"
"Such insight! As expected of the Situ Clan!"
Yan Xiang and Yan Luo also approved the idea. The former quickly permitted him to put his idea into action.
"Situ Bai, since you've proposed the idea, you will be in charge of sending Hua Guanhai to that criminal's store. Also, if anything goes wrong, you will take full responsibility!"
Situ Bai smirked. He bowed 90 degrees, "This servant will not fail you."
.
.
= Meanwhile =
Leo was bored. After the incident with Esen and the waterfall, he had been helping the mannequins chop iron pine lumbers as nobody could do it.
One of the alchemy workshops also changed its priority. Leo stopped making more tea as he assigned it to make sacred wood instead.
After the alchemy workshop turned the useless lumber into blocks of sacred wood, Leo transferred them to the gunsmith and ordered the automatons to make new bullets and guns, using the materials.
The gun production proceeded nicely. Even though the mannequins could only make outdated matchlock rifles, they were enough to arm more men or be used as spare guns.
While Leo was busy working as a carpenter, his sensitive nose caught a scent of something sweet. He stopped working and looked north.
"…"
Leo had long forgotten about this scent. But as soon as he smelled it, he finally remembered where he last saw the source of this odor.
Sweet Dream Mushrooms!
"Ah, those things. I haven't used them in alchemy yet because of Hua Jiashan. I wonder if I can make a secret workshop in the mall or a basement somewhere to experiment with the new recipes."
.
[Pill Recipe – Hope and Dream Pill]
One Sweet Dream Mushroom
Ten Yang Catalysts
Fire, Water, Earth, Metal, and Wood Essence
[Pill Recipe – Determination Pill]
One Sweet Dream Mushroom
Ten Yin Catalysts
Fire, Water, Earth, Metal, and Wood Essence
[Traits]
Increase Lifespan by one year per gram (Consumption)
.
Leo never forgot about it. These recipes had been his regrets since Hua Jiashan and Wu Buyi forced him to remove the mushrooms from his workshop.
Since a new source of mushrooms appeared, it would have been a waste for Leo not to check it out. He put aside his job and put on a new hazmat suit. He also purchased 10 4-foot-tall plastic barrels to store the ingredients.
POOF
Ten plastic barrels came out. However, they weren't safe enough for a chemical weapon, such as the zombie mushrooms.
Leo used the same old trick by touching the new plastic barrels and thought about upgrading these containers.
DING
<Will you upgrade Plastic Barrel to Level 2?>
<Upgrading it will consume 1,000 years of your lifespan.>
The barrel itself only cost Leo one year of lifespan, but upgrading it required a lot more.
As Leo had no issue with lifespan at the moment, he ordered the system.
"Upgrade it to level 9!"
<Affirmative!>
The barrel shapeshifted as its material drastically changed. As if the system understood Leo's purposes, it changed the barrel to suit the future ingredients.
The barrels turned into a cubic metal tank while it retained the same height. Its surface glowed in rainbow light, similar to Leo's aura. However, it had no lid or a way to open it.
"Huh?"
Looking at the cubic tank, Leo scratched his head. He flipped it around, but he couldn't find a way to open it. But then, his imagination taught him how to use the new artifact.
"Like this?"
Leo thought outside the box and injected his Qi into it.
CREAK
The cubic tank opened a hole on top, revealing the empty space inside.
"…"
As childish as he was, Leo jumped into the container and hugged his knees. Then, he touched the surface of the cube.
"Close it!"
WHOOSH
The square hole was closed.
Leo looked up and widely grinned. He found himself trapped inside a completely sealed cubic tank.
"NOICE! Now, open!"
WHOOSH
As Leo commanded, the box moved like a slime, opening a hole for Leo to come out.
Unfortunately, Leo's ADHD and his internal thoughts acted up. He touched the bottom of the cube and designed it.
"Open here, here, and here. Oh, open this, too. Make room for me! Oh, you're too tall. Can you shrink?"
Again, the cubic tank shrank and reshaped according to Leo's will. Soon, it became a smaller square box. As for Leo, he inserted his legs through the two bottom holes while the cube remained covering his legs as a layer of suit.
Leo's head remained inside the new peanut-like container. In front of him, a small area turned transparent, allowing Leo to see the outside. From the outside, Leo's suit looked like a bulky spacesuit with a square backpack. However, it had no arms.
PLOP-PLOP
Leo moved his legs, and the container moved as well. He laughed as he got the cosplay suit that he dreamt of.
"Hehehehe. I am the new imposter! Where are my crewmates?"

chapters.title: Chapter 144 Florida Man Accidentally Evaporated Entire Town By Shooting Fireworks While Parachuting. One Of The Fireworks Was Genuine 100-Ton TNT.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 144 – Florida Man Accidentally Evaporated Entire Town by Shooting Fireworks While Parachuting. One of the Fireworks Was Genuine 100-ton TNT.
FLOP-FLOP-FLOP
In the custom-made cosplay suit, Leo waddled north. As he didn't tell anybody about the suit, disciples and elders that had been working on the junkyard and Wu Buyi's alchemy workshop stared at Leo in confusion. Even thunder unicorns and the nightmare horses were confused.
Because of the system's suit, nobody could sense his aura. Thus, he thought of this creature as one of the weird things that Leo had created.
Everybody sneaked glances at the local mannequins. As Leo made them, they believed these automatons could recognize the other creations of the same creator.
Their guesses were half correct. The mannequins could tell that Leo was inside that suit. As soon as he got close, they stopped working to salute him.
Seeing the mannequin's reaction, everybody stopped being on guard of the weird suit.
"That must be Lord Florida Man. The golems are showing respect to him."
"Yeah. What is Lord Florida Man doing?"
Tiger Swordsman found Leo's eccentric behavior amusing. He stopped practicing shooting and followed Leo.
Leo ignored his robots and kept going north. Soon, he left the domain boundary, heading further toward the unexplored land. He didn't notice that Tiger Swordsman tagged along with him.
As walking took too long, Leo began skipping and leaping. His bulky suit hopped like a 2D character in Nintendo games, ignoring the laws of physics.
Tiger Swordsman brought out his flying sword and rode on it. He kept up with Leo's speed without bothering him.
After traveling for a few minutes, both men discovered an area with dense pink fog.
Being cautious, Tiger Swordsman stopped proceeding forward. As for Leo, he ignored everything and kept hopping into the pink mist.
"…"
Tiger Swordsman frowned. His instinct cried that he shouldn't go any further. Thus, he let out a long sigh.
'I should tell the others about this mist. Lord Florida Man might have already detected it, which might be why he is wearing that strange suit. It's too dangerous here.'
The muscular elder turned around and returned to the domain. He would tell Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei about the pink mist later.
.
.
As Leo hopped deeper into the misty forest, the visor, which he had made, started to get foggy. Leo narrowed his eyes as he noticed the movement on the clothes.
Branches of mushroom spore rapidly grew and latched on Leo's visor. Leo even heard creaking sounds of small objects, which were made by the growing mushrooms trying to eat the suit.
Aside from the growing mushrooms, the wind around Leo was quite strong. He felt like he was near the eye of a tornado as the mist circulated too fast.
"Hmm."
Not allowing the mushrooms to break his new suit, Leo kicked the ground and leaped 10 kilometers in one jump. While he was in the sky, he got out of the mist and got a clear vision of the surroundings.
The mist was like a mass of clouds that got glued to the ground. They slowly moved from north to south, but they were caught by a whirlpool under Leo.
In the eye of the whirlpool was a giant chomper plant, aka Cat. She emitted a yellow electric current, which had the same characteristic as the yellow tribulation lightning bolts.
Leo smirked and glanced above him. Above his head was a small yellow cloud, which was about to disperse as it used up its power.
"Damn Cat. So, you're here nom-noming mushrooms? Well, good for you. At least, you aren't stealing my food."
Leo looked forward, searching for the source of the mist.
Further north, a city wall was on the horizon. Leo estimated that he was about to reach another city north of Magpie City and his domain.
Soon, his leap momentum ended, and he fell to the ground. Leo leaned forward and bent his knees.
BOOM
As he had done this a million times, Leo landed and planted his two feet firmly on the ground. His kneecaps got slightly itchy as the suit was added to the weight.
Leo put more force into his legs and was about to jump again. But as he looked up, a shadow silhouette of a man charged toward him.
As the silhouette got closer, Leo got a clear vision of the man.
It was not a man. It was a humanoid creature with a large mushroom replacing his eyes, nose, and everything above his mouth.
"REEEEEEEEEEEE!!"
The mushroom zombie screamed at Leo and jumped at him. He bit the rainbow suit.
CRACK
Unfortunately for the zombie, its teeth cracked as it failed to break the spacesuit.
Leo pursed his lips in frustration. He planned to test this suit against real sweet dream mushrooms, but an idiot scratched it. He touched the side of his bulky spacesuit and ordered it to shapeshift.
The side of his suit softened, allowing Leo to extend his arms into them and create rubber-like armguards and gloves. However, Leo made it more creative.
Instead of fixing the arm and hand sizes to fit his, he ordered his suit to distort the arms and hands. He made the gloves bigger, which was as large as the entire spacesuit.
Using his large hands, Leo slapped the zombie like how he slapped some mosquitos in summer.
PA!
The zombie splashed blood, guts, and flesh all over. Some of them got on Leo's visor.
Leo wiped the bloodstain off his visor. However, he took too much time. More mushroom zombies emerged from the mist and jumped him.
"Oh, boy. Am I in a zombie apocalypse world or a cultivation world? Make up your mind!"
PA!
PA!
As Leo was wary of the mushrooms, he chose not to fight while wearing the Among Us cosplay spacesuit. Using his suit's large hands, he smacked, punched, and slapped zombies that came in his way.
.
One hour later, the zombies kept on coming. Piles of innards and human flesh scattered throughout the pine tree forest along with the rapidly growing mushrooms.
Sweet dream mushrooms devoured the blood and corpses of victims. They multiplied and covered every inch of the mutated pine trees.
Leo frowned while he scanned through his surrounding area. Noticing the mushrooms on the trees spitting spore, he thought of his domain. He imagined how it would have affected the workers had these zombie mushrooms infected them.
"Tsk! Should I burn this entire place down? I didn't create these mushrooms! I'm not responsible for this!"
Leo stopped killing random zombies. He jumped up and took off his spacesuit's gloves. After throwing the gloves into his spatial rings, Leo clenched his fists.
His cancer cells reacted to Leo's will. They poured fire and lightning essence into his hands. Black electric current leaked out from his skin.
Leo glanced at his fist. Worrying that he might destroy the planet, he decreased his power by a few gears.
"Yellow is enough. Black is overkill. I don't want to destroy this world, my cells."
The black electric current changed to yellow. Sensing that his Qi and essence returned to his bloodstream, he was relieved.
Leo's fists were set in yellow flame. The fire didn't harm him. On the contrary, it added a new power to his punches.
Letting himself fall, Leo descended. He threw his left fist and hit the ground!
BOOM!
The ground cracked and collapsed as if a massive meteor collided with the planet. The land parted way, creating a massive crater and explosion shockwave.
Yellow lightning from Leo's left fist zapped every zombie within 10 kilometers. Yellow fire followed and disintegrated everything, including plants, mushrooms, and zombies.
The wave of zombies got petrified first. Then, they crumbled into piles of molten rocks.
"MYAAAA!!"
While the flame expanded, Leo heard the scream of Cat behind him. He turned around and looked up from the crater. Then, he saw the massive body of Cat over his head.
Cat's roots and vines were on fire, but the yellow flame didn't harm her. However, she couldn't extinguish them as the flame reacted to Cat's lightning Qi and her yellow electric current.
As if Cat was aware of the culprit behind the shockwave and the flame, she jumped from the previous spot and landed on top of Leo's head.
BONK
Getting hit by the massive tree trunk and the massive roots of Cat, Leo groaned. He still didn't notice that Cat's humanoid torso on top of the plant had grown a lot.
"Who asked you to play here? Go home!"
"Nom-Nom Meow, Munya!" Cat complained as Leo interrupted her meal.
"Don't MUNYA me! I'm here to purge the mist and the zombies!"
"Meow, Meow!!" Again, Cat bickered that everything was his fault in the first place.
"Not my fault. These mushrooms aren't mine."
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
"Collect them? I'm actually planning to keep some of the mushrooms to grow on some planets later, but these stupid zombies are in the way. Hey, instead of eating mushroom spore, how about you eat those zombies and big mushrooms instead? I need to remove the fog and the wild mushrooms before they infect my slaves."
"Nom-Nom?"
"…"
"NOM-NOM MEOW?!"
"FINE! NOM-NOM AS MUCH AS YOU WANT IF YOU CAN! Seriously, I'm gonna clear the zombies up north. You can stay here and eat the corpses!"
"Nom-Nom Meow <3"
Cat jumped away from Leo's head and swung her vines, swiping burnt pine trees and ashes into her mouth. Using her roots as legs, she crept like a massive spider, menacingly stomping and kicking dirt to the sky at the speed of thunder.
Leo scratched his head and climbed out from the crater. After getting back on the surface, he looked at the bottom again.
It was roughly a kilometer deep and ten kilometers wide. The other edge of the crater also reached his domain's northern boundary.
"Oh, boy. Those peeps are going to complain about this. Welp, not my fault."
Leo maintained his element essence in his right fist as he hadn't used it yet. He gazed toward the north and kicked the ground, leaping toward the Dragon Mantis City.
Looking below, Leo bitterly laughed. The massive provincial-sized city was conquered by the mushrooms. Even some of the zombies below were devoured by the growing monsters.
Traveling deeper, Leo found the massive pink fog gathering in the center of the city. The mist spiraled into a tower, slowly ascending to the sky.
In the middle of the spiral, Leo's infrared eyes pierced through the foggy clouds and found a golden mushroom tree. Around the spiral tower of the tree, its roots and foundation were connected to other grown sweet dream mushrooms on top of every roof and house.
The golden branch seemed to be an evolved mushroom or its overmind, judging from its roots and the movements of the mist.
As Leo approached closer, a new silhouette of a cultivator with a disfigured head shot out from the pink mist. It flew toward Leo, holding a long sword.
"REEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!"
Hua Guanhai cackled. As if he retained some of his memory, the zombie slashed at Leo while it activated its dao avatar ability.
A spirit of another mushroom zombie appeared behind Leo, carrying an energy sword in its hands. It thrust the sword to pierce Leo from the back.
SWUA
SWUA
The swords connected!
CLANK
However, the physical sword of the real body broke in half. As for the energy sword, it failed to penetrate through Leo's spacesuit. Instead of piercing through it, the suit absorbed its energy.
Getting ambushed out of nowhere, Leo knitted his brows.
"Hey, what's your problem?"
Annoyed, Leo used his right hand, which was still coated with yellow electric current and yellow flame, to seize Hua Guanhai's neck.
CRACK
Mimicking an imposter cracking a crewmate's neck, Leo twisted Hua Guanhai's head 360 degrees. Then, the yellow lightning and yellow flame turned the zombie into ash.
FWHOOSH
As its master died, the dao avatar spirit behind Leo also vanished.
"REEEEEEEEEEEEE!!"
As if the death of Hua Guanhai awakened something below, Leo heard multiple loud screams of the living mushroom zombies. A few seconds later, a thousand of them jumped out from the mist and charged at Leo in the sky.
"Whoops."
Leo widely grinned as he found the scene funny. He reignited his fire and lightning fist in his right hand while he slowly descended to the middle of the horde.
The thousand zombies swarmed Leo in every direction as he fell to the ground inside the city. But as he landed, the fist hit the ground and caused another explosion.
The second nuke erupted, and the shockwave disintegrated everything in its path into dust. Zombies were blasted away and burnt to ash while buildings crumbled into dust. As for the mushroom, the mist, and the spore, they vanished into nothingness.
.
.
A few minutes later, the dust subsided. Leo took off his spacesuit and patted his clothes.
Climbing out of the second crater, Leo inspected the infected city. He then checked the condition of the evolved mushroom.
Everything around Leo turned into a brown barren land, filled with dirt and dust. However, the golden tree still stood tall, and it continued producing pink mist.
"Huh?"
Leo was surprised that the strange spiral thing was intact after getting hit by his light punch. He stared at the branch for a moment before he came up with an idea.
"Can I contain this thing and grow it somewhere else?"

chapters.title: Chapter 145 Florida Man Burnt Alive While Doing TikTok Challenge - Taking A Bath In Active Volcano
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 145 – Florida Man Burnt Alive While Doing TikTok Challenge - Taking a Bath in Active Volcano
Leo walked closer to the mysterious golden tree. He gave it a closer look.
The surface of the golden tree was the same as other sweet dream mushrooms except for its color. It also produced pink mist as it tried to multiply.
Leo rumbled through his pockets and picked up a blank spatial ring. He put his hand on the golden tree and stored it in the dimensional space.
The tree vanished into the ring. However, the pink mist still lingered in the area. Giving it time, they would resurrect sweet dream mushrooms and terrorize this world.
"Hans."
Leo uttered and pointed his index finger at the pink mist.
FWOOSH
A stream of yellow flame came out from Leo's finger, devouring the pink mist in the area. Leo moved his finger around to torch everything to ash.
As Leo kept burning the mist, they faded and vanished. However, he didn't let his guard down as he knew how dangerous they were.
"Hans."
For good measure, Leo sent his Qi into his right foot and stomped it.
BOOM
The ground caved in while the sides got pushed away. Leo created another crater with his stomp, but it had another effect. Everything under him turned into moldy lava as the extreme temperature from the impact and Leo's Qi melted rocks and soil under him.
The blasted town sank into the crimson slime-like liquid. As for Leo, his feet sank into the lava until it reached his knees.
Leo snorted and walked through the lava as if they were regular swamps. He pushed through the heat and got caught on fire once again.
The flame did nothing to Leo's hair, skin, or physique, but it removed his fat and impurity from his pores. Leo enjoyed it as if he took a casual sunbath without relying on sunscreen in his hometown.
The extreme temperature and the lava melted the remnant mushroom spore away. However, the molten liquid slowly moved and gathered in the crater, threatening to bury Leo alive.
Leo noticed the wave of lava coming for him. He sighed and jumped, exiting the lava crater. After leaving the crater, Leo checked on his clothes if they were still there.
Fortunately, the new clothes, made from Leo's skin and Qi were unaffected by the flame and the temperature. Even his sneakers were still intact.
Looking at his jeans and t-shirt, Leo pursed his lips. He was bored of these casual clothes.
'I should pick up those swags from the cloth shop. But having a long beard and long hair looks weird in a black suit. Should I shave a bit?'
Leo stroked his beard. He pondered about the shave, and he let his intrusive thoughts take over for a moment. He made a scissor gesture with his index and middle finger. Then, he snipped half of his long silky beard.
SNIP
Half of the long beard fell into the lava pool below. Then, Leo rubbed his trimmed beard.
Unfortunately, his long white beard instantly regenerated and restored its former glory. Moreover, each string got slightly thicker.
"Hah, I knew it."
Leo shook his head. It was as he had predicted.
After the orange lightning tribulation, his body automatically regenerated lost body parts or healed his wounds. Even when he lost a limb or two, he grew them back. However, there was one flaw – His body remained the same as when he transcended the orange lightning tribulation.
He could not shave or cut his hair anymore. He had to leave them as they were.
Having no choice, Leo thought of tying his hair or braiding his long beard. He thought of ancient Viking portraits on the internet.
'I should change my looks for once. This might be fun since I have to meet that stupid emperor. I need to bait those idiots to attack my store so that I can steal… no, no, no. Many workers are too weak. If they launch their attacks, those guys will die.'
Unwilling to let his free laborers die, Leo came up with a new approach. He snickered while he hopped out of the lava swamp, heading back home.
.
A few minutes after Leo had left the former city of Dragon Mantis, the swamp of lava changed color from red to black. At first, it looked natural – When magma cooled, they turned into obsidians, cinders, pumice, ash, and dust.
However, as it touched Leo's skin directly and received the blessing of his radiation aura, a hidden bacteria in the lava pool mutated. It devoured hot rocks and random material to grow.
As it kept eating, the bacteria multiplied. Soon, they spread everywhere underground and continued consuming lava and random hot minerals.
Unfortunately, the bacteria had a short lifespan. After staying alive for 10 minutes in the molten liquid, they died and returned to the soil. As they kept dying, they kept multiplying to fight against the impending extinction.
One of the surviving mutated bacteria dug deeper into the ground and discovered the buried remains of a badger. It ate some of the rotten meat and multiplied before it died.
The bacteria's descendants instantly inherited its ancestor's good and bad traits. As they were born near the buried corpse of an animal, they preyed on the other bacteria and creatures nearby. The newly evolved bacteria absorbed the DNA of the badger. Then, they returned to the lava.
CRACK
After getting back to the lava pool, the bacteria with badger DNA got in touch with a remnant of Leo's DNA. They evolved again and began forming a physical body, using the badger's DNA as a base.
12 hours after Leo had left, a small badger emerged from the lava pool. Using Leo's quick generation ability, it mimicked the dead badger's physique and created a new body for itself to survive. However, it quickly died from the excessive evolution.
More bacteria ate the dead lava badger and learned from its DNA structure. They tried to copy him and evolved as well.
More creatures emerged. Some died instantly after the evolution, but a few managed to survive a few minutes. A trial and error process continued as the newly evolved bacteria experimented with their true potential.
Soon, a new terrifying monster would be born in the Dragon Mantis City.
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo returned home. When he arrived, he discovered the terrible condition of his domain. The northern area of his domain was safe, but it was impossible to expand northward anymore due to the large slope of a crater.
Leo stood at the edge of the crater and scratched his head.
'It didn't want to do this. Oh, boy. There goes the northern highway.'
After shaking his head, Leo walked back to his store as he planned to take it easy for the rest of the day.
While walking back, Hua Jiashan, Dongfang Mei, and other elders rushed to see him in panic, especially the sword sect master.
"My lord! I heard you went into the mysterious pink mist! Was it a sweet dream mushroom?!"
Leo shrugged, "Yeah, it's the mushrooms."
"!!!"
Everybody's face was as white as a sheet. They froze for a few seconds before they knelt.
"P-Please protect us, Lord Florida Man! None of us can remove or repel the sweet dream mushrooms and the Jiangshis. Only you can save us all! We don't want our entire continent to perish!"
Leo rolled his eyes as these guys overreacted, "Meh. Don't worry about that. I've already burnt everything to ash earlier. Don't you see the carnage I left behind?"
He pointed at the crater at the north and the white smoke at a distance. The sky over there was dark as the ash from the magma blocked the sunlight.
Hua Jiashan's eyes glittered. He looked up and brightly smiled, "Really?!"
"Yup. I nuked them all."
"YES! THANK YOU, MY LORD!"
Hua Jiashan squealed and shouted like a madman. He even kissed Leo's sneakers.
Leo grumbled, "The show is over. Go back to work. My clothes are still on fire, and you idiot still kiss my dirty shoes? Are you nuts?"
"…"
Upon being reminded that Leo's clothes were on fire, the elders finally noticed it. At first, they thought the flame was his aura, so they didn't pay attention to it.
Leo scoffed and patted the fire off his t-shirt and jeans. He shooed the crowd away.
"Scram! Get back to work! This ain't a show!"
"Y-Yes, my lord!"
Everybody dispersed in a panic. Still, they secretly laughed as they were happy with how Leo treated his subordinates. After all, Leo was never arrogant or overbearing like other clan lords or sect masters. He might use his paper fans to smack some sense into them, but he never harmed or bullied his men.
After the crowd went away, Leo finally got the time to rest. But instead of heading to his bedroom, he took an elevator to the mystic realm platform.
Getting on the platform, Leo walked toward the black-winged angel statue. He rubbed the spatial ring that stored the golden mushroom tree earlier and snapped a twig from it. Then, he brought it out.
"Meowmeow, do you know what it is?"
Leo named the angel statue "Meowmeow" out of spite. As the statue had too many beautiful concubines around him, Leo always hated the guy. Still, he was the most knowledgeable servant among the four statues.
The angel's eyes glowed in green as it was awakened from Leo's words. He gazed at the golden twig and smirked.
'That is a twig of the world tree, master.'
"A world tree? Are you serious? This came from sweet dream mushrooms!"
'Sweet Dream Mushrooms are the origin of world trees, master. Every demon realm has one. I'm surprised that you managed to find one here.'
Leo frowned. He had doubts.
"How did you know that? Aren't you supposed to be my shadow? I don't even know jackshit about this crap, but you seem to know everything."
'I was born from your entity fate crystal and your dao. Obviously, I got my knowledge from the fate crystal that existed long before you were born, master.'
"Entity Fate Crystal again…"
Leo deeply sighed. The statues already explained to him what it was for, and he still couldn't believe it.
"I feel like I'm in the Matrix."
'Not for long, master. You should upgrade your store to level 10. Then, the fun part will begin.'
Leo deeply sighed as he was depressed. He already figured out what would happen in the next upgrade, and he was not ready for the massive changes. He put this matter to the back of his head.
"Anyway," Leo changed the subject. "What can I do with this?"
'World Tree's twig is a valuable material for a weapon or alchemy. Instead of asking me, you should research it with the system you have.'
"But those guys down there will make a ruckus if they know that I'm keeping an evolved sweet dream mushroom."
'It's fine, master. In fact, you have a subordinate who can suppress the world tree completely and tame it.'
"Who?"
'Your girlfriend.'
Leo rolled his eyes, "I don't have a girlfriend, fool."
'You do now.'
Meowmeow smirked while his concubines giggled.
Again, Leo deeply frowned as he didn't understand Meowmeow. He snorted and stored the twig back in his spatial ring.
When Leo turned around, he found a person behind him.
She was a pretty girl in her teens. Her iconic blond hair curled into two small drills, hanging by the side of her pointy ears. Her small lips and glossy skin looked alive as if she was a human. In addition, her green parasite eyes were brighter than a torch as they assimilated with her virgin yin Qi.
Esen looked like a high-elf aristocrat from a Japanese anime!
Leo stared at the new look of Esen, the lich empress. He sized her up and whistled.
"Heya, brat. Aren't you a looker yourself?"
Esen rested one hand on her hips while the other hand covered her mouth. She smirked, "Ohohoho! How do you like my new appearance? Are you falling for the new me?"
Leo glanced down and stared at her chest. Then, he grinned and snorted, "Grow some milker first, and we'll talk."
"…"
Esen flinched. She glanced at her chest. Although Esen managed to grow taller and bigger, her chest was still as flat as a board.
"MUKIIIIIII!!"
Being humiliated, Esen's face reddened. Out of anger, she threw a punch at Leo's face.
POW
Instead of hurting him, Esen hurt her fist.
"OW! DAMMIT, GEEZER! What the hell is wrong with you?!"
"That's my question, brat. Who asked you to punch me?"
"…"
Esen's eyes got teary as she failed to get back on Leo once again. She stomped away and jumped off from the platform.
A few seconds later, Leo heard a loud commotion below and a scream from Gao Yan. It seemed that Esen took her anger on the poor guy.
Leo snickered and shook his head. He looked back at Meowmeow.
"Her? My girlfriend?"
The angel shrugged, 'You suit each other.'
"Not in a million years, dumbass. She's not my type. I want MILF, not a snotty brat!"
Meowmeow widely grinned as if he was looking forward to seeing Leo's reaction in the future. However, he kept the secret to himself.
'You'll see, master. My prediction is never wrong.'
"Sure. Sure."
Leo jumped off the platform and descended toward the alchemy workshop. He had some work to do regarding the sweet dream mushrooms and the world tree.

chapters.title: Chapter 146 Florida Man Defends Bullied Man From Angry Karen By Using Mushrooms, Then Mocks Her For Having “Saggy” Genitalia.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 146 – Florida Man Defends Bullied Man from Angry Karen by Using Mushrooms, then Mocks Her for Having "Saggy" Genitalia.
Leo came down to the alchemy workshop area. He waited for one of the workshops to be available as he needed to research something.
When a workshop finished making a new batch of pills, Leo stopped the mannequin from continuing the work. He dropped a twig of golden world tree into the pot and researched it.
DING
.
Twig of Sweet Dream World Tree
This twig was collected from the Sweet Dream World Tree, which could only be found in a mushroom-infested mystic realm. As it inherits a strong hallucination poison from the world tree, it can be used to upgrade cold weapons or ammunition.
If you have a smith workshop, you might find a better usage from this.
[Alchemy Recipe – Ammunition Coating]
One Hundred of Any Ammunition
One Twig of Sweet Dream World Tree
One Earth Element Catalyst
Earth Essence
[Alchemy Recipe – Weapon Coating]
One Cold Weaponry
One Twig of Sweet Dream World Tree
One Earth Element Catalyst
Earth Essence
.
The recipe was nothing special as Leo got the information from the alchemy workshop. He was slightly disappointed.
'What's the point of adding a hallucination effect to weapons and ammo? Confuse them? Eh, I'm not into that kink.'
Despite the thought, Leo rubbed his spatial ring and secretly snapped another piece of twig from the mushroom tree. He added it to the cauldron along with a dented flying sword that he had used to demonstrate a tactical suit the other day.
The mannequin seemed to understand Leo's intention. He rushed into a granary and fetched a golden sand banana for Leo to use as an Earth element catalyst.
After getting all the ingredients, Leo closed the lid and spat into the fireplace as usual. Then, a timer appeared.
59 Minutes, 58 Seconds
Leo was relieved as the timer was extremely short. With this speed, he could experiment with random weapons that he had stolen from dead cultivators.
However, there was one problem. Had Leo brought out more twigs in the open, those twigs would automatically produce mushroom spores.
He needed someone to either suppress the mushroom spores or contain them.
'Right. Meowmeow mentioned I should ask Esen for help. I should go find her.'
Leo left the workshop to see Esen next.
.
.
Meanwhile, Esen was in a bad mood. After coming down from the mystic realm platform, she visited Gao Yan and Wu Buyi to vent her anger on them.
Gao Yan and Wu Buyi didn't pay attention to her. They were busy studying the pill-making methods from the mannequins.
Using the opportunity that both men were careless, Esen stomped toward them. She kicked Wu Buyi's butt and smacked the back of Gao Yan.
"You trashy cultivators! No matter how hard you stare at those pots, you won't get better at alchemy! Come and spar with me, and I'll show you how to get better properly!"
Wu Buyi yelped in pain while Gao Yan's spinal cord was almost dislocated. Both of them were out of commission in one slight attack.
Looking at the pathetic men, Esen snorted, "You people are useless. Why is that geezer keeping you around? If I were him, I would have expelled you long ago."
"???"
Wu Buyi rubbed his butt and gazed at Esen in confusion. He didn't recognize her as she had changed a lot.
"Who are you, little missy? Why did you kick me?"
"Who are you calling missy?! I'm old enough to be your great-grandmother!"
Esen kicked Wu Buyi again. The latter screamed as her foot hit the sore spot.
While Wu Buyi got bullied, Gao Yan got back to his feet. He rubbed his back as he was still in pain. Then, he looked at the assailant.
"Hmm? Oh. Senior, you've…changed a lot."
Gao Yan's face reddened as he found Esen attractive. Her face and blond long hair were so unique that he was at a loss for words.
His reaction made Thora angry. She pinched and twisted his right ear.
Getting pinched out of nowhere, Gao Yan was confused. He screamed in pain and protested, "What did I do wrong?!"
"Hmph! Getting excited, aren't you?"
"But why are you twisting my ear?!"
"Cause I feel like it!"
Gao Yan cried as he failed to understand Thora.
While Gao Yan got bullied by his dao avatar girlfriend, Esen turned her attention toward him.
"You there!"
Esen had long examined Gao Yan's talent and potential. She believed that his potential was on par with Yao Qiqi and Cat. However, he didn't have a proper mentor to guide him. As a result, Gao Yan's combat foundation was extremely weak at his cultivation base.
He lacked real experience in combat.
Essen walked closer to Gao Yan and stared at him up close. Although she was a head shorter than him, her face and voice made him nervous.
"When was the last time you trained in combat?" Asked Esen.
"Umm…" Gao Yan pondered. He wryly smiled, "Probably before I became an alchemist? I haven't swung a sword for a long time."
"So, you've become a nascent soul cultivator, but you have never fought anybody at all? Wait, what was your cultivation base before you became an alchemist."
"… First stage, senior. The muscle tempering realm."
"You WHAT?!"
Esen screamed in front of his face. She pinched his left ear to pull him closer to her.
"Are you an idiot?! You have never sparred against anybody at all since then?!"
"OW! OW! OW! PLEASE STOP PINCHING ME!"
"This won't do! You know what? Throw away all your alchemy schedule! I'll be your sparring partner from now on, and I'll personally teach you how to fight! Aren't you the representative of the upcoming tournament I heard?"
"EH!?"
"Don't EH me! Now, come with me! Bring out your stupid artifact sword so you can train with it! I'll be using a tree twig somewhere as a sword, and I'll spar with you! COME HERE!"
"What? Wait… DAAAAAAAHHHH!!"
Esen didn't wait for Gao Yan to speak or react. She dragged him by the ear, pulling him to an empty plot, east of the domain. Then, she started smacking him with an iron pine twig, which was harder than a regular pine log.
.
.
Leo came out from the alchemy workshop street and stood in front of his store. He looked around, searching for Esen.
"OW! OW! OW!"
Gao Yan's loud cry came from the east. Leo furrowed his brow as the dude was loud.
"Is he delivering a baby or something? Man, dude is squealing harder than Japanese AV actresses."
Leo laughed at Gao Yan. He walked over to see the commotion as he had no urgent job to do.
Upon getting closer, Leo found Esen and Gao Yan. The latter cackled as she smacked the poor young man with a twig.
"PLEASE STOP, SENIOR! I GIVE UP!" Gao Yan raised his lightsaber to parry the twig. However, he was too slow as Esen masterfully rotated her wrist and hit his chest.
"Stop closing your eyes when you get hit, idiot! Open your eyes and look at me!"
"B-But it's scary!"
"Aren't you a swordsman?! What happened to your basic sword skill? Are you a clown or a performer with a sword?!"
Gao Yan was depressed. He had a main character's mindset, which prevented him from hitting or fighting women, especially attractive girls like Esen.
Leo observed the two and smirked. He picked a place to sit and brought out another gold branch of the world tree. Then, he chewed on it as if it was a piece of cookie.
CRUNCH-CRUNCH
From Leo's perspective, the mushroom tree was as hard as an ice cube. Upon being crushed, it melted in his mouth and turned into fresh earth element essence and life force.
DING
<You have eaten a Twig of Sweet Dream World Tree.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 250 years.>
Leo raised his eyebrows and grinned. He looked at the twig in his hand and continued eating it.
'Instead of using them to coat bullets, I should eat them instead. But if I keep eating them, I won't have enough twigs for alchemy. I need to find a place to grow this tree.'
As Leo remembered what he was here for, he stood up and interrupted the two.
"Esen, you free?"
Esen stopped hitting Gao Yan. She turned to Leo and glared at him, "What do you want?"
"I need your help."
Hearing that Leo needed her help, Esen widely grinned. She tossed away the twig in her hand and strode toward him.
"Ohoho. Finally, the invincible geezer shows some weaknesses. What is it, then? What kind of help do you need from the powerless me?"
Leo didn't notice the sarcasm. He brought out a twig of sweet dream world tree to show Esen.
"Can you control the spore or contain it with your power? These spores can somehow turn people into zombies. You're a lich, right? Can you tame mushroom zombies or the mushroom parasites?"
"Huh?"
Esen's smile faded from her face. She looked at the twig as she sensed a scent that belonged to her race and the other undead creatures. She sniffed it and pulled it off Leo's hand.
"Where did you get this? Why do you have a twig of undead tree?"
"Oh?" Leo was delighted as Esen seemed to know something about the tree, "Can you control it?"
"Who do you think this empress is?" Esen puffed her flat chest. She waved the twig around, creating a trail of golden sparks. "I can't call myself empress if I can't use this simple herb!"
"Herb, you say?"
"Yes, herbs! This is nothing but our staple food! My death knights and arch liches loved this. We ate these for breakfast!"
"…"
"Say, where did you find this? Can you grow some on your farm? I don't want to eat yin vegetables. They smell like rotten fish."
Leo didn't know what to say. He probed her with another important question.
"What about the spores? Can you do something about them so everybody here won't become undead zombies because of those?"
"Oh, that's simple!" Esen giggled as she was confident, "The spores usually come out from the undead trees and mushrooms whenever they feel threatened. But when you have at least one big undead tree and four smaller ones around it, all mushrooms usually stop producing spores."
"Oh?"
Leo learned something interesting. He snapped a few more twigs and gave it to Esen.
"I have a fledging BIG TREE that you spoke of. Can you somehow turn those twigs into SMALL TREES?"
"HAHAHAHA! This is too simple! Let me show you weakling how it's done!"
Esen carried four twigs to the empty plowed land south of the farms. Leo also followed after her to see how she would do to the deadly twigs.
As if Esen copied Leo's alchemy technique, she spat on the twigs and planted them in the ground. She placed them in a square formation, leaving the center area empty. Then, she pointed at the twigs.
"Pee on them."
"…Wut?"
"Undead trees require a living creature's urine to grow. Without the urine, they can't grow leaves and graduate from being mushrooms. If you don't want them to spread spores, you have to pee on them."
"…"
Leo was speechless. He walked toward the nearest twig and was about to unzip. However, Esen stood in front of him, gazing at his face.
"Erm, excuse me?"
"What?"
"Privacy, please."
"Ha! Why are you being shy? Do you think I'm interested in your limb dick?! I'm already 10,000 years old. I've seen so many dicks in my life!"
Leo rolled his eyes. Instead of urinating on the twigs, he pointed his finger at them and ordered his cell to spray impurity and dead cells onto the plant.
ZAAAA
A stream of black water was poured on the golden twig.
"…"
Esen frowned as she was taken aback. She sniffed at the black water, but she quickly covered her nose in disgust.
"WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?! HOW COME IT SMELLS LIKE HOLY WATER?!"
Leo cackled, "Holy water? Woman, you have never seen REAL holy water!"
He proceeded to water the other three twigs. Then, he spat on every plant to boost their mutation and growth rate.
After he put in his effort, he brought out the sweet dream world tree and planted it at the center of the formation. Leo then grinned.
"Your turn. Make sure you contain the spores or disable the spread."
"…"
Esen frowned as she still had countless questions Leo managed to create holy water. She spat at the world tree's trunk and slapped it a few times. Then, she fiddled with her skirt.
Before Esen pulled down her panties, she glared at Leo.
"Privacy, geezer."
Leo widely grinned. He mimicked Esen's voice earlier.
"Ha! Why are you being shy? Do you think I'm interested in your saggy crack?! I'm already 50,000 years old. I've seen them a lot in my life!"
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 147 Florida Man Earns Millions by Forcing Teen to Eat Black Matsutake Mushroom with Cheese
chapters.content:
Chapter 147 Florida Man Earns Millions by Forcing Teen to Eat Black Matsutake Mushroom with Cheese
Chapter 147 – Florida Man Earns Millions by Forcing Teen to Eat Black Matsutake Mushroom with Cheese
After setting up the array, four transparent walls emerged from the ground, trapping the pink spores and the growing world tree inside. The small twigs emitted strong elemental essence and fueled the array as if they were batteries.
Esen wrote unreadable words on the transparent walls, causing the array to shine. She then explained what she did.
"This will prevent the sweet dream mushrooms from spreading outside the array and limit the tree's growth. It's a temporary measure, though."
"Temporary? Not permanent?" Leo didn't like what he heard.
"You can't simply tell ants to stop reproducing. Even though we can limit their area of influence, we can't stop their growth completely. Look, geezer. Every tree, plant, flower, and fruit all have the same origin. Their ancestors were fungi. Look at how tree branches and roots grow and spread. Don't they look like mushrooms?"
"…"
Leo had no comment on that as he was not Neil deGrasse Tyson or a modern scientist. He slightly opened his mouth as he was enlightened.
"Because we can't stop the fungi from multiplying, we can only prune them. Well, in my era, we can just simply eat away those excess mushrooms. But in your case, heh, I doubt you can eat it."
Leo pursed his lips, "You sure?"
"No man can survive after eating it! I dare you, geezer. Go ahead and eat it. Then, you will become a mindless Jiangshi!"
"…"
Leo shrugged and walked into the array. His body phased through the invisible wall as they couldn't prevent him from entering the restricted zone.
Entering the mushroom farm, Leo walked closer to the planted world tree. It rapidly grew taller and bigger. On its trunk, pink mushrooms rapidly grew.
Leo ignored the pink mushrooms. He gazed at several dark spots on the golden tree as new mutated mushrooms emerged one after another.
He picked up a black mushroom with white dots on its head. It had the same shape as matsutake mushrooms, but it looked poisonous.
'New specimen? Welp, research, it is.'
Leo put the mushroom in his spatial ring to contain it. Then, he pulled a pink mushroom from the world tree and ate it.
It smelled like truffles! He chewed it in glee and savored the rich taste.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 1 year.>
The lifespan reward was disappointing. The only thing good about these mushrooms was the taste. They were a lot better than bland mutated vegetables and bananas as Leo grew sick of them.
Leo drooled. He then smacked his forehead.
'I shouldn't have listened to Hua Jiashan. I should have cultivated these mushrooms from the start! I could even make several luxurious dishes with these!'
He regretted removing the previous batches of sweet dream mushrooms. He wished that he should have let them grow inside the workshop.
Addicted to the rich taste and the rewards, Leo began plucking mushrooms from the golden tree and stuffed them in his mouth. His hands never stopped moving as he swiped every mushroom in his reach.
Esen stood there, staring at the weird scene in a daze. She was puzzled.
"Huh? Is he infected?"
Curious, Esen walked closer to Leo to check his condition.
But Leo suddenly turned around while one of the pink male-genital-like mushrooms was still in his mouth.
"Wut? Want some Non-Nom?"
"…"
Esen paused for a long time as Leo's expression was weird and vulgar. But when she regained her senses, Leo already finished 50 pieces of matured mushrooms. She even saw him put a long black fungi into his mouth.
Leo didn't think much of it. He bit the tip off and chewed the mutated mushroom.
The pink tasted like truffles, but the mutated one tasted like hot cheese and cooked truffles.
It was delicious!
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 10 years.>
The boost was not rewarding, but it filled his stomach. Moreover, the smell of hot cheese was never wrong.
After finishing the first black mushroom, Leo plucked the third one and was about to eat it.
However, an intrusive thought and Leo's ADHD acted up. He looked at the thick black mushroom for a moment. He secretly cut the tip, and a drop of white juice leaked. He grinned and pointed it to Esen's face.
"Here, wanna eat it? This one is very good."
"Huh? What is that? I've never seen sweet dream mushrooms in that color."
"Here, put it in your mouth. It tastes like cheese."
"What is cheese?"
"Try it first. Open wide."
"…"
Esen realized that Leo was never affected by the mushrooms. She frowned and stared at the fungi. Although she wished to question Leo how he was immune to the mushroom's parasites, her desire to taste a new food overwhelmed her. She opened her mouth and showed her tongue.
Leo chortled like a villain before he shoved the black long mushroom into her mouth. Then, he squeezed it.
SPLASH
The white juicy liquid in the black mushroom got pushed to the tip. Then, it released the sticky cheese liquid into her throat.
"MMM!"
The scene looked straight from a hentai or a porn movie. Leo cackled to the point that he rolled on the ground and laughed in tears.
Meanwhile, Esen choked. She coughed and spat some of the mushroom cheese from her mouth. Then, she threw the half-eaten mushroom at Leo.
"BASTARD! WHAT DID YOU DO?!"
"DAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!!"
Leo pointed at her flushed face. He mocked her.
"You look very sexy, brat! You should star in AV movies! I bet Epstein and his customers would love it!"
"What the hell are you talking about?! Wait… Dammit, geezer! You bully me again!"
Esen screamed at Leo and kicked his butt several times. Although her kick did nothing to him, Leo feinted getting hurt and then ran away from her.
After Leo had run away, Esen snorted. She turned her attention to the other black mushrooms on the tree.
'What's so funny about the mushrooms? It's delicious, though.'
Not understanding the references, Esen plucked a black mushroom to eat it, but she put the tip into her mouth first. Then, Esen started sucking the cheese out before eating the entire thing.
She didn't realize that Gao Yan had been watching their interaction, and his face was as red as tomatoes.
.
.
With Esen's help, the domain got a new manmade farmland, aka the mushroom farm. Although it consisted of a tall golden tree and four short twigs, it continuously produced sweet dream mushrooms and mutated mushrooms every few minutes.
Esen got a new job. She was in charge of managing the mushroom farm and the world tree. Leo ended up giving her an upgraded barrel, and he taught her how to use it.
After learning the applications of the new cube, Esen played with it. She followed Leo's instructions and created a new crewmate spacesuit to wear. Then, Leo gave her a newly upgraded container for her to collect or store the mushrooms.
Just like that, Leo gained the first official crewmate to join his cosplay party. Esen painted her suit yellow to match her hair color while Leo continued using his rainbow suit.
.
.
Leo hummed as he brought a few sweet dream mushrooms and the black ones to the workshops.
One workshop continued working on dantian pills. Another one was still busy with the Floridian Dantian Pill. As for the third, it was idle.
Leo had ordered the mannequin to make something from the world tree twig, but he didn't give it a new order. As a result, after the workshop finished making the product, the local mannequin waited for Leo to replenish the ingredients.
He went to the workshop and picked up the finished product. He checked the result.
.
Cugatti, the Flying Sword of Living Death
This flying sword has been merged with the Twig of Sweet Dream World Tree. Any opponent being inflicted by this word will be branded with the Undead Curse – The victim will undergo a mutation and die while their consciousness will be controlled by the curse.
.
In short, Leo could use it to turn others into zombies!
Leo smacked his lips. He found it silly as he never intended to use it as a weapon.
He still had a pistol. A Floridian like him didn't need anything else but bigger guns!
Since Leo had no intention of continuing to use this sword, he looked around, wondering if he could see it to somebody. Then, he came up with an idea.
"Right. I can put this in my store as merchandise. The guns, too!"
Leo kept the sword to himself for now. He didn't forget what he came here for.
Bringing out the black mushroom, Leo tossed it into the cauldron and researched it.
DING
.
True Death Mushroom
Can only be found in demon realms. This mushroom's spores can strip a cultivator's immortality and life force if the cultivator doesn't have virgin yin or virgin yang essence in their dantian. Can be used in alchemy.
[Alchemy Recipe – True Death Poison Pill]
One True Death Mushroom
One Sweet Dream Mushroom
One Drop of Virgin Yin Blood
One Drop of Virgin Yang Blood
Wood and Earth Crystalized Essence
.
The recipe looked normal, except for the essence part and the catalysts. It didn't require an element catalyst like the others, but it demanded crystalized essences.
Leo wasn't confident that he could make this pill any time soon as the crystalized essence was new. For the moment, he took notes of the recipe. Then, he checked for a recipe that required sweet dream mushrooms as a material.
.
[Pill Recipe – Hope and Dream Pill]
One Sweet Dream Mushroom
Ten Yang Catalysts
Fire, Water, Earth, Metal, and Wood Essence
[Pill Recipe – Determination Pill]
One Sweet Dream Mushroom
Ten Yin Catalysts
Fire, Water, Earth, Metal, and Wood Essence
.
Looking at the recipes, Leo remembered something. He recalled that he once ordered his mannequin to make the hope and dream pill, but he forgot about it.
As the mannequins either stored their finished pills in the warehouse or the workshops, Leo searched for the pills. It wasn't hard to find the finished products as they were kept separately in a Tupperware box.
.
Medium Grade Hope and Dream Pill
- Heal Medium Wounds
- Restore 300cc of Blood
- Restore Stamina by 30%
- Enhance Qi and Physical Strength for 3 Hours
- Induce Sleep for 3 Hours
.
For the first time, Leo received a proper healing medicine. With this, he no longer needed the elixir grain pills, which had too many side effects.
However, this pill's effects were questionable.
"What's the point of the buff if you will put someone to sleep?! Is this Sleeping Zenitsu pill?!"

chapters.title: Chapter 148 Florida Man Encourages Martial Art Students to Bring Guns to Karate Class
chapters.content:
Chapter 148 Florida Man Encourages Martial Art Students to Bring Guns to Karate Class
Chapter 148 – Florida Man Encourages Martial Art Students to Bring Guns to Karate Class
Since Leo lacked proper healing medicines, he queued the available workshop to produce Hope and Dream Pills.
DING
<Remaining Time: 6 Days 23 Hours, 59 Minutes, 58 Seconds…>
The timer was quite long for a healing pill, but Leo couldn't help it. After all, all workshops had the same setting.
.
Basic Alchemy Workshop Level 9
Active Cauldrons: (1/5)
Alchemist Automatons (1/5)
Production Quality Level – (5/5)
Production Quantity Level – [2/5]
.
Leo regretted putting two points to the quantity level. Had he put those points to active cauldrons, he would have increased the production speed by 200%!
'Should I upgrade my store to level 10? But if I do that, the system protection is going to be…'
He deeply sighed. He wished that the threat was just a joke. Thus, he walked to the general store and touched the wall, prompting it to show an upgrade menu.
DING
<Would you like to upgrade Humble General Store to level 10?>
<Warning! Upgrading your Humble General Store to level 10 will unlock the PVP feature and disable your newbie protection domain. Once upgraded, you cannot decrease its level!>
<Warning! Upgrading your Humble General Store to level 10 will activate Fate Crystal's Main Quests. Please strengthen your base before you start the main quests.>
Leo closed the menu and grumbled. He thought of the conversation he had with Meowmeow and the other three guardian statues as the new feature was closely related to the entity fate crystal inside him.
'Damn it all. There's no free meal in this universe. Damn that Entity Fate Crystal! Damn this universe!'
During the past 50,000 years, Leo went through thick and thin. He died and revived several times, and he faced countless tribulations. He should not have been invincible among all his peers.
However, Leo was afraid of the terms "PVP" and "PLAYERS". He hated the idea that there might be somebody else with a similar system or strength as his.
'Should I enable it, or should I delay it for now?'
Leo slowly opened his eyes. His expression turned cold as he thought about a potential war between his people and the unknown forces of PLAYERS.
As he had a new goal in his mind, he moved according to his urgent need. Leo rushed to the warehouse and scoured for swords, blades, knives, and other weapons. After fetching a dozen long swords and scimitars, he gathered them in front of the alchemy workshop.
Leo stared at his workshop for an hour. He repeatedly sighed as he was in the middle of making a harsh decision.
After an hour of long thought, Leo rechecked his lifespan pool.
<Current Lifespan: 458,443 Years…>
Leo splurged a bit as he purchased so many modern cars to decorate his store. Still, he replenished some of them back from random caimans that fell from the flying platform.
He wanted to save up until he had a million years. However, his patience ran low as the workshops took too long to make pills.
'Screw it! I'll save up for a few more days. After that stupid tournament, I'll think about it again.'
Leo managed to suppress his intrusive thoughts. He killed time by bringing out the crashed Ferrari car to practice controlling it.
.
SCREEEEECH
