"Before that, you should also suppress your cultivation base… or strength a bit. Make it so that you're a nascent soul like the kid and Gao Yan."
"…I don't have a cultivation base. I'm a lich, not a cultivator."
"And how do you use your power?"
"I use my enemy's blood and yin Qi."
"…"
Leo had some concerns about Esen. For the moment, he gave her an order.
"Don't use your power. If possible, only use your external martial arts."
"You mean, fists and kicks?"
"Something like that."
"… Can I bite?" Esen widely grinned and revealed her four long fangs.
Leo gave Esen a weird look, "…Fine."
.
Walking further for another hour, everybody arrived at the last checkpoint of this city - the palace entrance.
The palace gate was made from pure gold. It was even wider than the city entrance. Moreover, a battalion of 1,000 nascent soul cultivators in full plate armor stood on the walls, staring at the people below.
As Leo approached the checkpoint, a nascent soul cultivator in an eunuch robe jumped down from the wall. He bowed 90 degrees to Leo as if he had been expecting him.
"Welcome, Lord Florida Man. The emperor has been waiting for your arrival. Please follow me."
"…"
Leo turned around to look at Xu Nuan as he was surprised. Then, he gazed at the Eunuch.
"Lead the way, then. By the way, do we get a place to rest for the night?"
"Of course, sir. We always prepare the best courtyard for the tournament participants."
"What about the banquet?"
The eunuch flinched for a moment. His eyes gleamed, "Of course, we will hold a banquet at night, as usual, sir. But for now, please follow me."
"Fine."
Leo gestured for the others to follow him. The crowd nodded and was about to enter the palace.
However, the gate guards raised their weapons, blocking their way to get in.
"HEY!" Esen yelled at the guards, "We are together with him! Why can't we get inside?!"
The eunuch glanced at Esen for a moment before he turned to Leo. As usual, he bowed again.
"Until we verify that you are indeed Florida Man of the rumor, we cannot allow your people to enter the restricted area. Could you please inform them to wait, sir?"
"…This is unnecessary."
"This is for our palace's security, sir. In the past, many imposters tried to get in by impersonating famous cultivators. Most of the time, they chose to act as leaders of new sects or clans. In your case, we need to confirm your identity first. Once we recognize you, your group can enter the palace without the verification procedure the next time."
"Fair enough."
Leo shrugged and turned around. He gestured to Esen.
"Protect everybody. I'm testing the water."
Esen frowned for a moment before she caught the hint. Her expression turned solemn.
"Leave some for me. Don't eat them all."
"I ain't Hannibal Lector. I don't eat people!"
Not waiting for an answer or reaction, Leo turned around and followed the eunuch into the palace. He didn't care if this might be a trap from the emperor's side.
.
The eunuch brought Leo into the massive golden palace. They passed through the front palace, which had the same structures and layout as the Forbidden City in China.
After entering the Forbidden City and reaching the inner palace, Leo came across another Forbidden City. However, the building materials were made of white spirit stones.
Leo had the urge to touch the spirit stone pillar nearby, but he was afraid that it might mutate. He pulled his hand back and kept up the pace with the eunuch.
Entering the white Forbidden Palace, Leo walked into a large hall. Deep in the hall was a throne, where the emperor had been sitting and watching him.
In the throne room, Yan Xiang's top soldiers and experts from various clans stood on the sides, opening the center area for the newcomer to enter. Some of them didn't bother hiding their killing intent.
Among the crowd, Situ Bai and Ouyang Ke were there. However, Leo couldn't see Tang Xuan.
Yan Xiang waved his hand, ordering the eunuch to retreat. The eunuch nodded and withdrew from the area.
"Come closer, Daoist Florida Man."
"…"
Leo raised his head and walked on the red carpet until he reached the center of the room. He then greeted the emperor for the first time.
"I'm Florida Man from Florida Domain. Hello, there, your majesty."
Many eyes turned red as Leo didn't kneel and he sounded rude. Still, Yan Xiang didn't pursue the matter as he had other issues with him.
"Well met, Florida Man. Let me get straight to the point since we don't have much time."
Yan Xiang leaned forward and released the aura of a quasi-immortal.
"Swear allegiance to the Yan Empire, and we will forgive you for killing my son."
Leo tilted his head, wondering what the emperor was cooking. He smirked, "No, thanks."
"… I see."
Yan Xiang deeply sighed while Situ Bai and Ouyang Ke also brought out their talismans, preparing for an all-out attack. However, Yan Xiang had his own agendas and plans. He offered another proposal.
"Let's make a bet, Florida Man."
"Yes? What bet?"
"I'm hosting a tournament for young disciples tomorrow. I heard you've accepted my invitation and brought your people here. How about we bet on our junior's performance?"
"Oh?"
"If your junior wins the tournament, we will forgive you for killing the second prince, and we will acknowledge you as the new citizen of our empire. But if you lose…"
Yan Xiang glared into Leo's eyes. His voice changed.
"You will be expelled from our country, and you cannot establish a new cult, clan, sect, or store ever again. Even if you stay, we will excommunicate you and order all cultivators of our country not to patronize you."
"Hah?!"
"We know that you're strong, Immortal Florida Man. It's impossible for us to kill or harm you. But that doesn't mean you can bully us forever."
"…"
"How about it? Will you accept our challenge? Sir Immortal?"
Leo finally understood Yan Xiang's intention. It seemed that the emperor was smarter than the thieves and cultivators who raided his store.
Since the emperor wanted to play it safe, Leo was happy to oblige. After all, he wanted to harvest their lifespan, not murdering everybody here in vain.
"Alright. Let's do it."

chapters.title: Chapter 155 Florida Man Scams Copium-Addicted Senators during Sports Conference. No Press Has Been Charged.
chapters.content:
Chapter 155 Florida Man Scams Copium-Addicted Senators during Sports Conference. No Press Has Been Charged.
Chapter 155 – Florida Man Scams Copium-Addicted Senators during Sports Conference. No Press Has Been Charged.
Yan Xiang's assertiveness and passive-aggressive attitude caught Leo off guard. He reluctantly agreed to the unfair bet as he had no intention of eradicating his dynasty just yet.
'I guess he knows what I did in that world. Welp, I need them to visit my domain, so I can extract their lifespan. Killing them here is a waste.'
While thinking, Leo recalled something that he had planned to ask the emperor. It was related to the reason why Leo readily accepted Tang Xuan's invitation and came here brazenly.
Leo gazed at Yan Xiang with a solemn expression.
"If you agree to my two conditions, I'll accept that unfair bet."
The corners of Yan Xiang's mouth curved down. Then, he narrowed his eyes, wondering what Leo wanted.
"Speak."
Leo paused and took a deep breath. As this matter was related to his power and origins, he was cautious.
"First off, I'm a collector. I've come to this world in searching for unique artifacts. Have you ever heard of…Fate Crystal?"
"Fate Crystal?"
Yan Xiang narrowed his eyes while everybody in the throne room looked at each other and murmured in confusion. They had never heard of this item's name before.
On the other hand, Yan Xiang was aware of the existence of this item. His face reddened in anger as it was related to his country.
"I know of it. Why do you ask?"
"Aside from what you've offered, I want a Fate Crystal as a part of the bet."
"Impossible!" Yan Xiang stood up and shouted, "Earth Fate Crystal of the Yan Dynasty is the pillar of our continent's protective arrays! Without it, the barbarians from the other continents would have invaded and destroyed us all!"
Leo had a wry smile on his face. He silently mocked Yan Xiang as he didn't understand what Fate Crystals were for.
From what Leo had learned from the four guardians of the mystic realm platform, Fate Crystals came in five grades – Earth Fate Crystals, Sky Fate Crystals, Heavenly Fate Crystals, Entity Fate Crystals, and Karmic Fate Crystals. Each grade offered a different power and perks if they were used correctly.
For example, Earth Fate Crystals could bless the item owner with the power of "Luck". Had a modern human possessed it, that person would have won a lottery every time they bought one. However, aside from material luck, they couldn't influence somebody's lifestyle or change one's life. Moreover, the profound "Luck" energy in the crystal could be depleted after a few usages.
Sky Fate Crystal was a bit better. Aside from providing luck to the owner, it could also bring a major opportunity or a fortuitous encounter to the item holder. After giving the owners enough opportunities, it would lose its power.
Heavenly Fate Crystal was a huge leap from the previous tier. Not only did it bless the owner with infinite luck and opportunities, but it sometimes came with a mysterious "System". If it was put inside one's body, the person would gain the "System" power. The black-winged angel commented that whoever had it could be considered a "Protagonist" of the era.
As for Entity Fate Crystal, Leo had two of them inside him. The first one enabled him to use three systems – The Online Shopping System, the Shop Domain System, and the Lifespan System. The second Entity Fate Crystal from the mystic realm enabled him to upgrade non-electrical appliances by using his lifespan. It had other powers, but Leo hadn't fully explored it yet.
Unfortunately, the Karmic Fate Crystal was something out of Leo's reach at the moment. The angel statue said that it didn't exist in his world.
In summary, these fate crystals were the clues that Leo had been searching for as they might relate to "Players" and the PVP mode. In addition, the angel statue hinted that he needed to collect as many fate crystals as possible to boost his abilities.
Fortunately, Yan Xiang misused his Earth Fate Crystal. Although the earth-graded one was useless to Leo, he wanted it nonetheless.
"If you need a source of energy, I can provide you a better one. Have you ever heard of soul stones?"
"Soul stones?" Yan Xiang widened his eyes as he had heard of it. They were the rare cultivation resources that his ancestors always desired. "You have soul stones?!"
Leo shrugged. He didn't have one on him at the moment, but he knew the recipe to make some.
.
[Alchemy Recipe – Soul Stones]
One Molg Lich's Bone (Any Piece)
Yin Essence
.
[Alchemy Recipe – Soul Stone]
1,000 Essence Stones
Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Catalyst
Fire, Water, Wood, Metal, and Earth Essence
.
There were two ways to make them. The first one required the bones of Esen's dead comrades. The second recipe required 1,000 essence stones and some catalysts.
"One of my store's merchandise is soul stone, but we'll talk about the trade some other time. For now, the fate crystal is one of my conditions. Will you agree?" Leo steered the conversation back to the topic.
Yan Xiang gave Leo a meaningful look. He hesitated if he should continue pressing on the hidden agendas that he and the officials had agreed upon.
Still, Yan Xiang thought of the death of his son. He pressed on.
"Earth Fate Crystal will not be included in this bet."
"Then, the bet is off."
"But we can offer something of a similar value."
Yan Xiang snapped his fingers. Then, the first prince Yan Luo, who had been hiding behind his father, gestured his subordinates to drag a group of people out from the next room.
A group of eunuchs carrying multiple golden chests walked out and put the containers in front of Leo. Then, they opened them.
Inside the chests were countless essence stones and spatial rings, which the imperial court had salvaged from the Death Sword Sect and the Fatui Cult. Yan Xiang presented them to Leo.
"If you win, we give you the essence stones and the spatial rings inside the chests instead. How about it?"
The crowd's eyes reddened as they were envious of the bet. They wished that they could take some of the chests back home.
Leo pursed his lips as if he didn't hate this counteroffer. He slightly nodded, "You are quite a haggler, your majesty. Very well. I accept that. But I still have my second condition."
"Speak!"
Leo widely grinned. He then laid a bait.
"If I win, I want you and your court official to pay my store a visit. You can bring your army if you want to. I will not defend or resist if you suddenly attack me or my people."
"Huh?"
The ugly smile on Leo's face was so wide and heinous that he revealed his pink gums and 48 teeth. He rubbed his hands and leaned over like a crooked villain.
"I'm a merchant, so I want nothing more but customers. Will you agree to my humble condition?"
"…"
Yan Xiang grinned while the court's cultivators sneered at Leo. They silently whispered, mocking him for being stupid.
'Is that a declaration of war? It sounds stupid to me.'
'Yeah. With that condition, we can just mobilize our armies there as a pretense to visit his stupid store, right? Then, we can just raze that place to the ground.'
'I have a better idea. Since we have a reason to access his territory, we can secretly set up a killing array to slaughter everybody inside. He can't complain if we suddenly invite some immortals from the higher realms to kill this idiot.'
'That's what I'm thinking. This immortal is a fool! He's so overconfident in his strength to the point that he forgets about other immortals from the higher realm! Once our ancestors come back, he will surely piss his pants and beg for his life!'
Leo's ears twitched as he could hear their whispers, but he pretended not to hear them. He kept staring at Yan Xiang, waiting for his answer.
Yan Xiang inwardly agreed with the gossipers. He had no issue with it.
"Fine. I'll accept the second condition. Now, bring me a scroll, so we can make this bet official!"
"Alright."
As if the scroll and brush had been prepared before the conversation, a eunuch among the crowd came out and presented a blank golden scroll to Yan Xiang. The latter picked the brush and wrote on it.
After Yan Xiang was done, the scroll floated by itself. Then, it ejected Chinese words. They instantly multiplied into two and flew into Leo's forehead and Yan Xiang's forehead.
The golden Chinese word "Contract" appeared like a tattoo.
Yan Xiang snorted and warned Leo, "With this, the bet is official. Nobody, even me, can go back on our words. Remember, if you lose, you will be expelled from this continent and never come back. If you win, you get to stay and keep those chests."
Leo widely grinned, "Don't forget the visiting part."
"…Yeah, that too. Now that you're done here. You can follow the servant outside to the prepared resident. He will tell you where the tournament will be held tomorrow."
Suddenly getting kicked out of the throne room, Leo smacked his lips. He found this emperor uncultured and rude.
Leo turned around to leave the throne room. But when he reached the exit, he stopped his feet as he remembered something.
"Say, Your Majesty."
"What?"
"What about the night banquet? Can I bring my people to join?"
"…"
Yan Xiang frowned while the other cultivators laughed at him. Yan Luo also sneered and mocked Leo.
"The banquet indeed will be held here. But for you and your people, I'm afraid that you cannot join us. After all, the invitation only extends to the members of Jianghu Alliance and our allies."
"…"
"But since you ask for it, we will not be rude and leave you out. You can join us, but we might not have a seat for you and your men, senior. You will have to sit on the ground outside the palace."
The crowd laughed. None of them hid their disdain expressions.
"…"
Leo deeply sighed. He admitted that the local people were quite bold. He thought that cultivators respected seniority and stronger cultivators. But here, they didn't hide their hostility.
'If I were a villain, these fools would have been long dead. I guess I didn't kill enough. Rather, these guys are born stupid.'
Leo secretly touched the pistol in his suit as he had the urge to shoot Yan Luo's mouth, but it was not the right time.
"I'll see y'all in the tournament. See you tomorrow, your majesty. Also, you, the smart mouth…" Leo turned around and gave Yan Luo a meaningful look, "I wish you a long life… REALLY long life."
"…"
Leo snorted and let go of his gun. He left the throne room and followed a servant, who had been waiting for Leo outside the room.
"This way, please. We'll go and pick up your comrades. Then, we'll head to your designated courtyard."
"Okay."
Both men returned to the entrance of the palace checkpoint to regroup with the others.

chapters.title: Chapter 156 Florida Man Breaks Into House And Set New Guinness World Record Of Longest Poop On House Owner’s Bed
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 156 – Florida Man Breaks into House and Set New Guinness World Record of Longest Poop on House Owner's Bed
After Leo had left, Yan Xiang leaned back in his chair. The back of his clothes was drenched in sweat.
The others also let out a long sigh. They thought that Leo would have killed them as Yan Xiang was too aggressive. Fortunately, they didn't need to use the hidden talismans on their bodies.
Yan Xiang had prepared a killing array in the throne room. Had Leo attacked anybody, the array would have activated and unleashed yellow lightning bolts on him. However, by doing so, some of the people here would have died.
They were glad that they didn't fight.
"That was nerve-wracking. I thought he would have attacked us first."
Yan Xiang was relieved. Then, he glared at Yan Luo and reprimanded him.
"You and your smart mouth almost got us killed! What were you thinking provoking an immortal!?"
Yan Luo snorted as he found nothing wrong in his action. Moreover, he was confident in his new weapon, which he had salvaged from the spaceship that he had obtained.
The prince pulled out a homemade pistol, which he had replicated it from an old blueprint in the ship. The pistol could only shoot one bullet at a time, and it looked fragile. However, Yan Luo reinforced it with his metal element Qi, and he was confident in his creation.
"I wish he attacked us, Father. I would have killed him with this new artifact."
Yan Xiang glanced at Yan Luo's gun and snorted. He had seen its firepower, and he was disappointed in it.
"At best, it can kill a quasi-immortal if we use a dozen fully-charged essence stones as bullets. I doubt it can kill him."
"We can try. Actually, we can even test it in the tournament. Yan Zhu will be disguised as one of our representatives and join the tournament, right? We'll let him use it."
Yan Xiang thought of the useless third prince, aka Yan Zhu. The latter had been consuming tea of rejuvenation for a long time, and his appearance should be as young as a teenager by now.
The other clan representatives also grinned. As this tournament was special, they had been investing in the tea of youth, turning some of their elders into teenagers to join this event.
Yan Xiang massaged his forehead. He prayed that this plan would work.
"As we have agreed upon, all sects and clans will disguise their strongest elders as young participants. The agents will kill Florida Man's disciples and representatives to teach him a lesson. I don't care if you send your quasi-immortal ancestor or patriarch there. I want the result!"
The tournament was rigged from the start. Yan Xiang's group plotted to send their strongest fighters to murder Gao Yan and others to get their revenge.
"After we use the contract to remove Florida Man from the continent, we will eradicate the Life Sword Sect and send their heads to Florida Man as a parting gift! And once our ancestors arrive, they will deal with him!"
The crowd smiled and saluted their emperor.
"You are wise, Your Majesty. This stratagem is perfect. We will surely get him!"
Yan Xiang nodded in satisfaction. His confidence soared as he wished to see Leo's reaction tomorrow. Also, he reminded his men.
.
.
Meanwhile, the servant guided Leo, Esen, and their group to the prepared courtyard.
However, there was an issue. The courtyard's quality was questionable.
The rotting wooden buildings smelled like moldy flour. Dust and leaves formed a thick layer on the road and floor. All buildings featured no door or coverable window. Moreover, no furniture remained in any building or courtyard.
This place was long abandoned!
The servant sweated profusely as he looked at the dark faces of Leo and others. He then repeated what Yan Xiang had told him.
"T-The emperor said that your "banquet" food is stored in the kitchen, senior."
"…"
Cat was the first to react. She rushed toward the general direction of the kitchen. But a minute later, she came back with a bowl, full of moldy grain pills.
"No Nom-Nom Meow!!"
"…"
Leo deeply inhaled and glared at the servant. He pulled the latter's collar.
"So, can you explain what your emperor was doing? Is this bullying?"
"I-I'm sorry, senior! I-I'm following his order! This is not my idea!"
"Hmph!"
Leo dropped the servant. He fell on his butt and ran away in fright. Fortunately, Leo didn't directly touch him, or he would have died on the spot.
Esen, Xu Nuan, Tiger Swordsman, and the disciples looked disappointed. The elf girl crossed her arms and looked at the desolate courtyard.
"So, where is our banquet and food?"
Leo walked toward Cat and picked up a rotten grain pill. After Leo touched it, the rotten pill shone and transformed into a black pill. Then, he flickered it into Cat's mouth.
"Meow <3"
Cat ate it in glee. She chewed it several times and opened her mouth, waiting for Leo to continue feeding her.
Leo laughed and picked up more expired pills. He let his radiation convert everything into black pills and tossed them into her mouth.
While feeding Cat, Leo warned Esen and others.
"There won't be any banquet. It seems that the emperor doesn't welcome us here."
Leo told everybody about the meeting earlier and his agreement with Yan Xiang.
After hearing the bet, Esen smirked, "You scammed them, you sick geezer! But why do you want them to visit your domain?"
Tiger Swordsman and Gao Yan wryly smiled as they had seen how Leo dealt with intruders. Still, he didn't understand how Leo did it.
"You wouldn't get it."
"???"
"You don't have to worry about that. For now, we have to deal with the issues at hand first."
Leo turned around and told the crowd to settle in.
"I'll sneak into the palace's kitchen and fetch us food and wine. You all wait here."
"Oh?" Esen smirked, "Can I go with you?"
"Suit yourself."
"HEHEHEHEHE!!"
.
.
A few minutes later…
Racing on an empty road behind the palace were two 1-meter-tall cardboard boxes with small holes in the front. Leo and Esen, who hid themselves in the uncanny boxes with anime logos, moved as fast as cockroaches in a dark kitchen.
After slipping through the unsuspected patrolling soldiers, both of them reached a storehouse behind the palace kitchen. They stopped to scan the area.
"Hey, geezer," Esen whispered. "Had we done this normally, we would have gotten the food already. Why the boxes?"
"Shush!" Leo looked left and right. Then, he lifted the box to show his face. He looked at Esen, who peeked through the cardboard boxes using the two front holes.
"This is the ultimate art of Solid Snake, brat. With cardboard boxes, we are John Cena!"
"What the hell are you talking about!?"
"Trust me. It will work."
"…"
Esen was at a loss for words because of Leo's silliness. She grumbled, playing along with his antics.
"Fine. Lead the way."
"Leave it to the Big Boss!"
Leo covered his body and head with the large cardboard box. He then crept closer to the storehouse, but he avoided the front entrance.
Instead of entering the building through the front entrance, Leo stayed behind the building. After getting out of the cardboard box, he touched the storehouse building's brick wall. He linked his Qi with the spatial ring, ordering it to store a portion of the wall in his ring.
WHOOSH
The wall instantly vanished into the ring!
Leo didn't stop there. To avoid suspicion, he entered the building and put his hand on the previously vanished wall area.
WHOOSH
Leo resummoned the wall from the spatial ring. The stone wall appeared and filled the empty hole. However, a few pieces of rock crumbled and fell to the ground.
'Whoops. Well, nothing is perfect in this world. I should hurry.'
Inside the 100-square-meter storehouse building, Leo only found dry-aged beef, pork, and freshly butchered cows. All meat was stored in a room, surrounded by a formation of blue talismans. Cold air protruded from the array as if it acted as a freezer.
Next to the freezer array, there were human-sized barrels, containing countless living fish. shrimp, and crabs. Baskets of vegetables and fruits were also nearby.
On the opposite side of the building, stacks of wine jars filled out the wall shelves. Leo briefly counted them, but he stopped after he counted to 4.
The center of the room was also peculiar. There was a golden chest, which was tied by thick iron chains. Purple talismans on it also emitted a similar aura to the seal talismans, which had been used to seal Esen.
As for the front door, it was still closed, and it was locked from the outside. As there was no window, no light illuminated the dark storehouse.
Leo loved talismans more than anything as he could get a lot of YOL by eating them. He beelined toward the chest and touched it with his finger.
WHOOSH
The entire chest, chains, and talisman vanished into his spatial ring.
'I don't know what it is, but it's mine now!'
After getting the mysterious box, Leo went around and stuffed everything in the storehouse into his spatial rings. When everything was swiped clean, Leo sneaked out from the way he came from. He used the same cardboard box as a cover and got out of the area.
Leo came back to Esen, who had been idling on a sidewalk, next to the pile of junk. When Leo came back, she complained.
"Are you done? I'm tired of sitting here."
Leo chuckled, "We have everything. Let's go back to hold our private banquet."
"So, what do you get?"
"Wines, fish, meat, and stuff."
"What about blood?"
Leo forgot that Esen's primary food was blood. Although she didn't need much, she still required them to sustain her existence.
"…Err. I have a few buckets of unknown animal blood with me. Do you want me to turn them to yin fluid?"
"Of course. I don't drink fresh animal blood. At least, you should turn them into blood wine or some sort if you want to satisfy this empress!"
"…"
"Let's look for another place. I don't think we have enough for me and Cat."
Esen took the lead this time. As she had been observing the buildings, she had an eye on a tall pagoda 500 meters away from the royal palace. As Esen got used to crawling, her cardboard box sprinted so fast that she disappeared into the corner of the road.
Leo sighed and followed after her, using his sensitive nose. After crawling for a few minutes, he reached the back of the pagoda. However, there was a two-meter tall brick wall, preventing Leo from getting closer.
On the surface of the wall, Leo noticed the black footprints of Esen's leather shoes.
'Oh, she must have gone inside already. Welp. Frog-jump, it is.'
Leo frog-jumped and leaped over the wall with ease. He landed on the other side of the wall.
ZAG-ZAG
As the other side was full of bushes, Leo's box slipped out. He quickly grabbed it and stored it in his inventory. While he was at it, he looked around to find the traces of Esen.
Her cardboard box was also nearby. Leo didn't forget to take it back. Then, he followed her scent.
The scent of Esen came from the top floor of the pagoda. Leo looked up and compared its size to the pagodas in Orlando Planet.
'It's a lot smaller than those pagodas. I guess this should be easy.'
After wiggling his butt like a cat, Leo jumped 200 meters and reached the top floor. He grabbed the ledge of the roof tiles and swung his body onto the top floor's balcony.
Upon landing, Leo looked inside the pagoda. Then, he found a bedroom and Esen. The lich girl was busy throwing books and random objects out of the bookshelves as if she was searching for something.
"Esen, what are you doing?" Leo got into the room and looked around.
"I can smell some good pills in here. It smells like blood."
"Oh?"
Leo's nose twitched as he concentrated on his smelling sense. As Esen had mentioned, Leo caught a wisp of the strong iron-like smell of blood and the medical scent of pills. He sniffed a few times before he looked at the ancient stone bed.
"Hmm."
Leo walked toward the bed and lightly knocked on its surface. However, as he exerted too much force, the bed cracked and was broken in half.
After the bed was broken, the scent got stronger. Esen stopped what she had been doing to turn her attention to Leo.
"You've found it?"
"Accidentally, yes."
Leo and Esen removed the outer layer of the stone bed to see the hidden treasure underneath. After removing the obstacles, they found five metallic jars with cloth seals.
The strong scent of blood, alcohol, and medical herbs filled the room. Similar to the storehouse, the jars were inside an array of blue talismans.
"Jackpot," Leo laughed.
Esen nodded in approval, "I call dibs on these. You can take one. I'll take four!"
"Hey, 50/50. You take two. I take two. We drink the remaining jar."
"Geezer, you're not even an undead. You don't need blood. Give me four!"
"But if I have two jars, I can research on it. If I'm lucky, I might be able to find a recipe to mass-produce these!"
"!!!"
Esen dropped her jaw. For once, she gazed at Leo in admiration.
"Deal. You take two. I take two. We drink the rest. But promise me that you will make me more of these!"
"We haven't even tasted it yet, damn brat!"
Both the undying old man and ancient elf laughed. They stored the blood wine in their spatial rings.
But as they were about to leave, Leo's stomach growled. He stopped moving for a moment.
"What now?" Esen could hear the growl. She had a bad feeling about this.
"You go first. I need to take a dump."
"Pfft. This is what you get for eating too much meat and random junk. If you eat too much solid food, you need to take a shit often! Even cultivators avoid that!"
"Meh, you don't know crap."
Shamelessly, Leo took off his pants and underwear. He hopped on the stone bed as he had no place to drop the bombs.
Esen's face turned dark in disgust. She jumped off the building first as she didn't want to smell the rotten dung of a 50,000-year-old man.
.
A few minutes later, Leo created a glistening ten-meter-long black cake. He admired it for a moment as he couldn't believe that he had accumulated this much in his bowel. After wiping his butt, Leo put on his clothes and left quietly.
Both Leo and Esen didn't realize that they were in Yan Luo's bedroom.

chapters.title: Chapter 157 Local Prince Filed Lawsuit Against Florida Man As The Guinness Book World Record’s Longest Turd Exploded On His Face
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 157 – Local Prince Filed Lawsuit against Florida Man as the Guinness Book World Record's Longest Turd Exploded on His Face
Leo and Esen returned to the abandoned courtyard. When they arrived, they noticed that the yard was a lot cleaner.
Xu Nuan and Yao Qiqi were in the middle of spraying water everywhere. They summoned water with their Qi and washed away the dirt.
Gao Yan also used his wood Qi, commanding small plants and trees to use their leaves as brooms. The trees bent down and scrubbed the floor while it was soaked by Xu Nuan and Yao Qiqi's water Qi.
Tiger Swordsman worked as an incinerator. He created several small fireballs to burn the collected junk and piles of wet leaves. Once they turned into ash, he threw them to the trees, using them as fertilizer.
As for the two girls, they climbed into the resident building to repair the roof tiles. Ricardo and Taxi also helped patch the walls so that the wind wouldn't leak inside.
Meanwhile, Cat did nothing. She sat in the middle of the courtyard, playing with the water. Her cloak and temporary clothes were already wet. In addition, she already emptied the mutated grain pills in the pot.
Looking at what everybody had been doing, Esen nodded in approval.
"Your people are hard working. You need to reward them, geezer."
"I know. That's why I'll cook the best food for them. Also, I should mutate the blood wine earlier."
"Save that until the food is ready! Good wines require good side dishes!"
"…You're right. But wait a minute. I didn't know you can drink."
"Now, you know."
"…"
Esen hovered over the flooded ground as she didn't want to get wet. As for Leo, he took off his socks and leather shoes. After pulling his pant cuffs up to his knee, he walked toward the crowd.
"I'll be preparing our private banquet party. If you need anything, come find me in the kitchen, okay?"
Xu Nuan, Gao Yan, and the girls were delighted as they looked forward to the party. Tiger Swordsman, on the other hand, felt that it was somewhat unnecessary as they rarely ate solid food. However, he couldn't refuse wine and liquor.
.
Leo entered the dirty kitchen. Although everybody had briefly cleaned this place, dark spots and moldy walls still smelled rotten.
Looking at the dark and moldy place, Leo was annoyed. He ejected modern cooking utensils, such as pots, electric stoves, BBQ grilling sets, pans, and a cauldron to cook. He also pulled out several cubes of sacred wood to use as temporary tables for cooking as the kitchen was too dirty.
As the electric stoves had already been upgraded, Leo put them on the sacred wood cubes and turned them on. He arranged pots and a pan for each stove. Then, he opened his online system shop to purchase some cooking oil and garnish.
Unfortunately, the garnish was too expensive. Leo saw the price and changed his mind. He only purchased some cooking oil, spices, salt, BBQ sauce, butter, cheese, and sugar.
'Alright. I have a bunch of beef. I should start with steak. I'll make the normal ones first. Then, I'll cook a mutated version for myself.'
.
.
The group kept cleaning the courtyard until the sun went down. When the sky turned dark, Tiger Swordsman summoned a fireball to illuminate the place for others.
Everybody stopped working as they did the best they could. Although the courtyard was sparkling clean, the interior of the residents needed improvement as they couldn't get rid of rotten wood and half-broken pillars.
ZIIIIIII
The sizzling sound and the pleasant smell of freshly cooked meat came from the kitchen. All cultivators and beasts turned their heads, looking at the source.
Cat salivated. She screamed.
"NOM-NOM MEOW?!"
Xu Nuan gulped. She had never smelled something this pleasant before. Even though she had already taken a grain pill, her stomach yearned for the mysterious food.
Gao Yan and Tiger Swordsman were the same. They thought that they had already seen all the good commoner food in the city, but they had never smelled something this seductive. They drooled.
"S-Smash…"
Taxi, on the other hand, shook his head. As a vegetarian, he disliked the odor. As for Ricardo, he sneered at Taxi as he had become an omnivore species due to Esen's power.
"Smash?"
Taxi was enraged. He neighed at Ricardo and chased after him. As for the brown guy, he laughed and dodged Taxi's headbutt attacks with ease.
30 minutes later, Leo brought out the finished dishes. He also called Gao Yan and others to help him arrange the new tables and chairs for everybody.
Gao Yan and Tiger Swordsman rushed to Leo's aid. When they entered the kitchen and saw the food, they drooled a waterfall.
"NOM-NOM MEOW?!"
Cat also screamed. Fortunately, Esen had been holding the rein, pulling Cat from going berserk.
The men brought the food to serve everybody. As furniture in Leo's online shopping system was cheap, Leo bought a set of long kitchen tables and chairs for everybody. Each got their chopsticks and utensils for food.
The appetizer was baked sweet potatoes and tenderloin steaks with butter and supermarket BBQ sauce. Although Leo's cooking skill was far from chefs or Gordon Ramsey, the food's appearance and smell were enough to stir any stoic vegans or pill eaters here.
After putting all the dishes down, Leo distributed wine to all adults. As for Gao Yan and the girls, they only received orange juice. Esen and Leo, on the other hand, allocated their blood wine.
The small BBQ party started.
"Let's eat!" Leo encouraged everybody.
Xu Nuan stared at the food for a long time. She shook her head and averted her eyes as she tried to resist the temptation. But in the end, her human instinct won.
Tiger Swordsman also broke his fasting. He devoured the steaks like a starving man seeing food for the first time. As for Cat, she already finished everything on her plate and waved her dishes around, asking for the second serving.
Leo laughed and enjoyed his food while he continued cooking.
The small banquet lasted until midnight as all cultivators couldn't stop eating. As their digestive system was enhanced by their Qi and high cultivation base, their stomach dissolved the food and demanded more of it.
In the end, Leo only managed to eat half of what everybody had eaten as he was the only cook. Still, he loved the party as it reminded him of the good time he had on Earth.
.
.
While Leo and his people had fun, the night banquet at the throne room was awkward.
Yan Luo, Yan Xiang, and the court officials looked at the staled chickens on their plates and the dull wine, which their servants got them from the outer city district.
A dozen eunuchs couldn't stop sweating. As the storehouse was empty, they scavenged every shop in the outer city district to procure the best wine and fresh food ingredients. Unfortunately, most food ingredients at night were stale and old because the shops had put them on display for the entire day.
As a result, the food was of low quality. Some of them had a funny smell, which ruined their appetite.
Yan Xiang stopped eating and drinking after the roasted duck on the plate emitted a foul smell. He stood up and cupped his fist.
"We are deeply sorry, my subjects. It seems that there's an issue with the palace's granary. We shall head back and rest for the day. You may continue the banquet until morning."
"…"
The crowd didn't utter a word. Even though the food was not up to their standard, not all cultivators here touched them. After all, they always used grain pills to fill their stomach. They only remained there to enjoy the wine.
Unfortunately, the wine came from the town. They lacked the rich and deep taste of spirit yeast and Qi from a master brewer. In the end, they lost their appetite.
One by one, they excused themselves and returned home. Yan Luo also went back to his pagoda to take a short rest so that he would be in peak condition tomorrow.
.
Yan Luo arrived at his personal pagoda. Upon arrival, he took off his robes and tossed the clothes at the maids. Then, he walked up the stairs to the top floor.
Every floor of Yan Luo's pagoda emitted strong waves of earth and wood Qi. While walking, Yan Luo absorbed the Qi by inhaling it into his stomach. However, by doing so, his body got heavier.
The higher Yan Luo climbed, the stronger the suppressive Qi. Yan Luo began sweating as he felt like his weight was already 10 times heavier than usual. His knees started to give in.
Resisting the increasing weight, Yan Luo circulated his Qi. After doing so, he felt a bit better.
Climbing stairs was a form of training for Yan Luo. He ignored the physical exhaustion and kept on walking.
Upon arriving at the top floor, the suppression force was gone. Yan Luo deeply inhaled as he expected some fresh air from the high ground.
Unfortunately, he swallowed a mouthful of foul air into his lungs.
He smelled a strong scent of human feces.
Yan Luo frowned and looked around. Then, he noticed that his belongings and shelves were ransacked. Moreover, the stone bed, which he had been using as a cultivation spot, was misplaced.
"What the hell happened here?! Why am I smelling shit?!"
The first prince rushed to his bed as he was worried about his secret wine. They were made from 9th-stage monster's blood, rare herbs, and 1,000-year-old spirit yeast. He had been saving them until the wine matured. Then, he would use them as a cultivation resource.
But they were gone.
"…"
Moreover, on top of the bed, an extremely long turd, which coiled like a sleeping snake. It was beautifully and disgustingly glossy and smooth to the point that Yan Luo was speechless.
In anger, Yan Luo bellowed.
"WHO DID THIS?! WHO THE HELL RUINED MY BEDROOM?! COME OUT!!!"
For an hour, Yan Luo lost it. He kept screaming and cursing the culprit.
After yelling enough, Yan Luo regained his composure. He stared at the black dung and thought of an unpleasant old man, whom he met earlier today.
"Was it you, Florida Man?!"
Infuriated, Yan Luo imagined a thousand ways to kill Leo and his people. While he was at it, the prince summoned his dao avatar and unleashed a powerful energy strike at his bed.
BOOM
The bed exploded.
The turd also exploded.
But because the turd exploded, it scattered everywhere. Some of it got stuck on Yan Luo's face and body while the rest splashed on the walls and ceiling.
"…"
Yan Luo's face got even redder. He realized his stupidity, and he blamed everything on Leo.
"FLORIDA MAN!! TOMORROW, I'LL KILL YOU!!"

chapters.title: Chapter 158 Florida Man Tied Children With BDSM Ropes And Sent Them To School. Teachers Approved While Parents Protested.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 158 – Florida Man Tied Children with BDSM Ropes and Sent Them to School. Teachers Approved While Parents Protested.
7 AM of the next day, a servant came to fetch Leo and his company to the tournament area.
As cultivators rarely slept, everybody but Leo was already prepared. The girls retrieved all furniture and utensils last night, and they stored everything in Xu Nuan's spatial ring.
As for Leo, he still had bed hair, and he was in his pajamas. He came out of the building, holding a pillow and a blanket as he was still half-asleep.
During the night, Esen and Cat pranked Leo. Cat sat on top of him while Esen, who was drunk at the time, squeezed Cat's dirty saliva into his mouth. He ended up tying the two naughty children with upgraded ropes and managed to sleep at 4AM.
Because of the lack of sleep, Leo's expression was grumpy and dark. When he stared at the servant, the latter peed his pants.
As for Esen and Cat, they were still tied by Leo's upgraded ropes in a BDSM style. Their mouths were gagged, and they still struggled to break free. As nobody could untie them, they got stuck in that condition.
"Let's go."
Leo yawned and ordered the servant to lead the way. He stored his favorite pillow and blanket in his ring and accompanied the crowd in his pajamas. While sleep-walking, Leo dragged the two naughty girls with leashes as if they were disobedient puppies.
The servant shrieked and guided the group to the tournament area. He didn't notice that the abandoned courtyard was strangely clean.
.
.
The guide brought Leo back to the army camp area outside of the outer city. When Leo and his company got there, many sects and clans were already there.
Instead of finding a military campsite, Leo found a massive arena platform and spectator stands. Watchtowers that usually appeared in siege warfare surrounded the 1,000 square-meter circular stage. Many strong cultivators stood on the watchtowers, looking down on the people below.
Strangely, everybody glared at Leo's group. Their cold eyes never hid their killing intent and hatred.
Leo glanced back at the crowd. Upon sensing their hostility, Leo snorted in disdain.
"Well, well, well. This is an away game, isn't it? I should expect this much."
The guide pointed at a public spectator stand area, which was empty. As usual, Yan Xiang prepared him a bad-looking one.
While the watchtowers and other seats were clean and well-decorated with flags and banners, seats for Leo's group were smelly brown cushions. He gave it a closer look and noticed that they were also soaked with human urine and feces.
Gao Yan and Tiger Swordsman's faces turned dark as they realized the pettiness of the host. The girls shrank back in fear while Yao Qiqi was on the verge of crying. As for Xu Nuan, she was as angry as Leo.
This bullying and humiliation were despicable. She was disappointed in the emperor.
Looking at the trash cushions, Leo's mood was foul. As he was in a sleep-deprived state, he turned around and told his people.
"We will change seats with the others. Wait here."
Leo kicked the rotten spectator stand toward the arena. It landed right in the middle of the stage.
As soon as it crumbled, the smell of feces and urine spread. The onlooking cultivators covered their noses in disgust. Meanwhile, the agents from the Situ Clan, Ouyang Clan, and the Yan Family shouted.
"How dare you disrespect the imperial court?!"
"Who is stirring a commotion before the tournament?! Do you know who's hosting this event?!"
"Is this why we don't welcome a country bumpkin like you!"
As most people here came from the two clans, more people yelled and cussed at Leo. As for the people from smaller clans and sects, they chose to remain silent as they didn't want to take part in this unfair lynching and bullying.
Leo slowly ran out of patience. He sneered at them, wondering if they were one-dimensional extras from a 3rd-rated web novel or something similar as their comments and behavior were one-dimensional.
Why would weak cultivators openly be disrespectful to a stronger cultivator?
The reason was simple. They were either blind or stupid.
Leo shook his head. His mood got a little better after he thought of them as NPCs. Still, for the sake of teaching them a lesson, Leo pulled out his pistol.
He marked everybody who had spoken earlier. As if he entered a bullet time, Leo pulled the trigger 20 times in a row without changing his posture. Only his arm and right hand moved.
20 upgraded bullets found the heads of the noisy cultivators on the watchtowers. 20 yellowish needles flashed and disappeared into the sky. A second later, 20 agents from the three clans collapsed with their eyes wide open.
As upgraded bullets were expensive, Leo reloaded the pistol with an essence stone. He then shouted back.
"If you think you're better than me, get down here and talk to me to the face. If you keep shouting while hiding like a coward, I'll be coming for you!"
"!!!"
The three hostile clans stopped making noises as their brain couldn't comprehend what had just happened. Their colleagues suddenly collapsed and died on the spot, but they couldn't sense or see Leo's attack.
Fear and uncertainty loomed in their mind. They were reminded that their opponent was an immortal while they were merely low-rank servants from the three clans.
Logically, they would have been killed instantly had they done the same to other immortals. They totally forgot about it as their master had ordered them to do so.
As their plan backfired, they shivered in fear, realizing their mistakes. They hid behind the watchtower's short walls, praying that Leo wouldn't notice them.
Leo looked around for a moment. When everybody stopped making useless noise, he felt a lot better.
After the useless squabble and senseless killing, Xu Nuan brought out the kitchen chairs and table for them to sit on. Everybody rested there and waited for the event to start.
.
An hour later, Tang Xuan and his clansmen arrived. However, they didn't come here as contestants as Tang Xuan refused to dispatch his clan's elders or disciples here. Only Tang Tian and two of their elders followed him to this arena.
The remnant of the Fatui Cult also arrived. Only four nascent soul cultivators showed up, and they still dressed in the same black clothes. Similar to the Tang Clan, they came here as spectators.
RUMBLE
A golden flying ship of Yan Xiang also arrived. As if they were celestial beings, they rode a massive carriage, which had a small castle on top. Yan Xiang, Yan Luo, and Yan Zhu stood on the deck.
Surprisingly, the three men weren't the only passengers there. Xu Nuan looked up and noticed many familiar faces on the ship, looking back at her.
They were the girls from Amazonian Sanctuary, who had refused to join Leo's domain. Among them, Qi Niu, the girl who once tried to seduce Leo, was by Yan Zhu's side.
Qi Niu sneered at Yao Qiqi and Xu Nuan as she was proud of her decision. While looking down on her former mentor, she mocked them and Leo.
"This is what you get for abandoning our sanctuary. You're just a bunch of greedy bitches that wag your tails around an old man! Look at me. I'm now a royal consort of the third prince! But you, what are you right now? I know, a bunch of beggars! Ha! Serve you right!"
Yan Zhu heard his new wife's remarks. He laughed and pulled Qi Niu into a hug. Then, he groped her chest.
"That's right, my wife. Those bastards are nothing to us. Even if he's an immortal from a higher realm, he is just a stray that can't compete with other immortals for resources."
Qi Niu was interested in the topic. She giggled and rubbed her chest against Yan Zhu's hand.
"Your Highness. What does the immortal realm look like? Why are you calling that old man a stray?"
Yan Zhu smirked and explained. He intentionally used a voice vibration technique so that everybody in the Cauliflower City could hear his words.
"Immortals aren't really fond of entering a mortal realm. Whenever they enter a mortal realm, the heavenly forces that protect all mortal realms always suppress their Qi and aura to a mortal stage. Also, they cannot cultivate or gather Qi from the lower realm! This is why no immortal wants to linger on a mortal realm for too long since it's a waste of time… except…"
"Except?"
Yan Zhu sneered at Leo. Unafraid of the consequences, Yan Zhu elaborated while he attempted to ruin Leo's reputation.
"Stray immortals. My wife. Do you know what a stray immortal is?"
"What are they, husband?"
"Stray immortals are losers of the immortal realm! They fail to set their roots over there and are usually bullied by their peers. Because they can't acquire cultivation resources from the higher realms, they sometimes enter mortal realms to steal cultivation resources from mortals! They're the worst kind of despicable immortals out there! In short, they're cowardly beggar losers that can only bully the weak and run away from the strong!"
"…I see!"
Yan Zhu and Qi Niu burst into laughter while the spectators gave Leo a weird look. On the other hand, Gao Yan, Tiger Swordsman, and Xu Nuan frowned as they doubted it.
Yao Qiqi pouted and yelled back at Qi Niu.
"Liar! Senior Florida Man is not a beggar! He gave us essence stones and artifacts from the higher realm! He never steals anything from us!"
Leo scratched his nose as Yao Qiqi was half correct. She was wrong on the "Steal" part, though.
But thanks to Yan Zhu's explanation, Leo learned a new thing. He wondered if immortals from the higher realm would come down to visit his store one day.
Yan Xiang gestured for Yan Zhu to stop making a commotion although he approved of the message. As they succeeded in ruining Leo's reputation to make their clans look like the good guys, Yan Xiang proceeded to the next step.
"My subjects, we've gathered here once again for the seasonal tournament of our young generation. Although not many clans and sects agree to participate this season, we hope to see new rising stars in our empire."
The crowd cheered and praised Yan Xiang in admiration. Meanwhile, Leo and his people only watched the show.
Yan Xiang continued, "As usual, we shall proceed with the preliminary round to examine our new rising stars. Bring in the boulder of verification!"
Situ Bai and Ouyang Ke came out of the crowd. They burned the messes that Leo had tossed on the stage. Then, Situ Bai ejected a massive boulder from his spatial ring.
The boulder was flat on one side. It was 10 meters wide and two meters tall.
Ouyang Ke explained how it worked.
"For the sake of our newcomers, this is how we verify our contestants. All tournament contestants will hit the boulder once without using their Qi. Then, the boulder of verification will identify their BONE AGE! As in the past, many clans disguised adults as juniors to participate. We have to use this method to filter out dishonest people from the crops!"
While speaking, Situ Bai and Ouyang Ke widely grinned. Even Yan Zhu burst into laughter as he knew what they were about to do.
"Let's stop chitchatting. How about we let Sir Florida Man introduce us to his juniors! Sir Florida Man, please guide your juniors to the stage. As we've agreed, you may send five juniors to join the tournament."
Getting called, Gao Yan was excited. He and Yao Qiqi got on the stage first while the two tamers reluctantly followed them.
Meanwhile, Esen's face turned white. She looked at Leo, wondering if their plan would work.
Leo let out a long sigh. He wasn't confident if his tea would work.
"Oh, well. Just go and try, Esen. But you know what? If the boulder is accidentally destroyed, they can't verify your age, right?"
"…"
Esen's eyes gleamed as she was enlightened. She widely grinned.
Leo untied the ropes and permitted Taxi, Cat, and Ricardo to revert to their original form. The monster beasts immediately transformed and revealed their aura.

chapters.title: Chapter 159 Florida Man Identified As Disabled Joins Paralympic Games, Breaks Every World Record
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 159 – Florida Man Identified as Disabled Joins Paralympic Games, Breaks Every World Record.
RUMBLE
As Cat, Taxi, and Ricardo reverted to their original form, their aura exploded. The eerie and ominous yin Qi made the air chilly. Combined with their killing intent, their glares stirred every string of Qi around the arena, causing all cultivators' dantians to churn.
Meanwhile, Cat exuded the air of an 8th-stage monster. She was a tier weaker than the unicorn and the nightmare, but she was capable of holding her own weight.
Tang Xuan and his people silently observed Leo's group and wryly smiled. He ordered Tang Tian and other elders to be silent.
On the other hand, Yan Zhu flinched as he instantly recognized the strength of Taxi and Ricardo. Both horses were 9th-stage monster beasts, and their strength was on par with real immortals!
"MONSTER BEASTS?!"
The spectators panicked. As the average strength of spectators was a measly nascent soul stage, aka the 5th stage, their presence and strength were akin to an insect in front of the three predators.
Yan Xiang leaped from his throne and landed on top of the boulder of verification. He glared at the monsters and Leo.
"Do you realize what you are doing, Immortal Florida Man?! This is a competition between juniors. Why are you bringing those monsters along?!"
Leo lightly scoffed. He pointed his thumb at Yao Qiqi and the two tamer girls from the Amazonian Sanctuary.
"You told us to introduce our juniors, so here they are. They will participate in this tournament… or game… or whatever this mental Paralympics is."
Yan Xiang glanced at the monsters and yelled at Leo, "According to the rules, only HUMAN CULTIVATORS with the BONE AGE under 18 can participate in this tournament! No monsters allowed!"
Leo smirked. Then, he winked at Xu Nuan, "You explain."
Xu Nuan realized that it was her time to shine. She stepped forward and saluted Yan Xiang, pretending to be polite.
"Let me explain, Your Majesty. Indeed, according to the agreements and rules, only cultivators can join this event. However, beast and monster tamers are an exception. Do you remember the special rules?"
"…"
Yan Xiang narrowed his eyes as he had seen Xu Nuan's face somewhere before, but he couldn't remember. Qi Niu, who had been clinging to Yan Zhu's side, mocked Xu Nuan to remind him of Xu Nuan's origin.
"Old hag Xu, you know nothing! The rules only allow the Amazonian Sanctuary's representatives to bring one monster or beast per person! It doesn't include you, traitors!"
Xu Nuan looked up. Her eyes met with the former disciple's. She remained expressionless as she lamented.
"Alas, Qi Niu. We did everything we could so that none of you would end up as someone's toys or slaves. It seems that we were wrong."
"That's right! You were wrong, old hag! Look at me!" Qi Niu laughed and flexed her status. As a royal consort, she obtained new dresses, artifacts, and cultivation resources from Yan Zhu. Her cultivation base improved by leaps and bounds.
"Indeed. Even though your cultivation aptitude is downright garbage, you successfully become a prince's toilet. I didn't know that you wished to become a prostitute that badly. Had I known you better, I would have sold you to a brothel and realized your dream earlier."
"WHAT?!"
"My sincere apologies, Qi Niu. Indeed, we are inferior to you, sex-craved gold-digging slut young lady. We can't compare our sexual experience to you, who have experienced so many golden schlongs. In fact, we aren't qualified to have a conversation with you, whose belly has been penetrated by god-know-how-many men."
"XU NUAN!!"
Qi Niu was enraged. Her face reddened, and her nose bleed from anger and blood pressure.
While the women launched a firework, Leo inwardly gave Xu Nuan a thumbs up as she colorfully silenced the annoying wench on the flying ship. Still, they hadn't solved their primary issue.
As Yan Xiang was the host, he could change the rules anytime. Their scheme might fail.
Yan Xiang raised his hand and looked at Yan Zhu. The latter nodded and pulled his wife away.
After Qi Niu stopped making noise, Yan Xiang did exactly what Leo had predicted.
"As she said, woman. Amazonian Sanctuary cultivated beast tamers, not a fighter. That was why we allowed their representatives to bring their pets here to fight in their stead. However, you do not have the same luxury since you aren't from a tamer-oriented sect or clan."
Leo snorted, "Even though three of them are from the sanctuary?"
"No exception. Only human cultivators can participate in this event. Oh, right. I forgot to tell you. If you don't have five participants, your group will be disqualified from entering this event, thus losing the bed by default."
"Hohoh? Is that how you are going to play?"
One after another, Yan Xiang kept using underhanded tricks to suppress Leo.
Leo's eye color changed from green to red. Since Yan Xiang shamelessly tried to cheat his way to victory, he stopped playing nice.
"Five representatives, is it?"
Leo's eyes shifted toward Esen. He then ejected a dozen barrels of tea from his spatial ring.
"Esen."
"Yeah?"
"Could you go and fetch us the REMAINING representatives that are still DEAD sleeping?"
"Remaining representatives? Aren't we… Ohoh?"
"Yeah. Your FRIENDS from your HOMETOWN are still sleeping like CORPSES, right? Why don't you go and RESURRECT them? Oh, don't forget to drown them with TEA so that they can feel ALIVE again!"
Esen might be loud and obnoxious most of the time, but she was still a former empress, who used to govern the world. She instantly caught on the hint.
"Yeah, I remember them. I'm still carrying their gears in my storage rings. I'll be right back. Oh, I'll take those too."
Esen collected the barrels of tea and flew back to the abandoned courtyard.
After Esen had left, Leo crossed his arms and faced Yan Xiang.
"As you wish, she will bring the contestants here shortly. You don't mind waiting an hour or two for my guys to arrive, right?"
Yan Xiang frowned and glanced at the departing girl. For some reason, he couldn't measure Esen's cultivation base. But since Esen could fly, Yan Xiang guessed that her strength might be at the 3rd or 4th stage at best. After all, she didn't look old.
Yan Zhu also secretly ogled Esen. As Esen was a pretty blond high-elf, her beauty was unique and otherworldly. Her face, her flawless smooth skin, and and her silky hair made Esen a lot more attractive than Qi Niu.
He wanted her.
While Yan Xiang contemplated what he should do in this situation, Yan Zhu came up with an idea.
"Father!"
"What?" Yan Xiang looked at his third son on the flying ship.
"Let's add a new wager. Since Immortal Florida Man delays the event, we need some compensation."
"Compensation?" Yan Xiang raised his eyebrow. He had no idea what his son was cooking, "What compensation?"
Yan Zhu's voice was so crisp that everybody could hear it.
"We can allow Immortal Florida Man to take the verification test later. But since he made us wait, we will impose a penalty for his group. Of course, we will not do anything to him. But we will add a new wager on top of the previous agreement."
Yan Xiang's face turned dark. As he knew the behavior of his lecherous son, he knew what Yan Zhu might ask for, "What is the wager?"
Yan Zhu pointed at the girls behind Leo.
"They were from the Amazonian Sanctuary, right? According to my concubine, they are the traitors of their sect. Therefore, it is our duty to uphold justice when the members of the Jianghu Alliance request our aid. We will imprison those women, including the girl that has just left."
"Hmm."
Overheard the conversation, Leo raised his eyebrow, bewildered by Yan Zhu's dumb logic. Xu Nuan glared at Yan Zhu in anger while Yao Qiqi and the girls panicked. As for Taxi, Ricardo, Gao Yan, and Tiger Swordsman, they were enraged.
"Isn't that a bit overbearing, boy?" Leo sarcastically laughed.
Yan Zhu sneered, "I didn't say that we would imprison everybody right away. I said that we would add this condition to the wager. Therefore, we will only arrest those girls if your side loses. Of course, if you win, your crime will be pardoned."
"I see. Is that how you're going to play it?"
Leo deeply inhaled, suppressing the urge to nuke this city to oblivion. He had a thousand ideas on how to murder Yan Zhu as painfully as possible. But for now, he needed to teach these arrogant people a lesson.
"Well, since you set the rules, make sure you play by the book, sir. By the way, since my juniors will take a while, why don't you show us how your representatives verify your age with that boulder?"
"Hahahahaha! Sure!"
Yan Zhu and Qi Niu jumped down from the flying ship. Three men in silver armor also leaped onto the stage while holding the banners of the Yan Clan.
The third prince introduced himself. He cupped his fist and saluted every spectator, except Leo's group.
"Greetings, fellow Daoists! My name is Yan Zhu, and I'm 17 this year! I'll be joining this season's event as the Yan Clan's representative!"
.
"Huh?"
Xu Nuan, Tang Xuan, Tang Tian, and bystanders from neutral clans and sects were confused. As they had interacted with Yan Zhu in the past, they were aware of Yan Zhu's real age.
It was definitely not 17!
He was over 150 years old!
While the spectators from the neutral faction looked perplexed, the accomplices from the Jianghu Alliance either clapped or praised the third prince.
"The prince is very talented. He is only 17, but his aura is very domineering!"
"What is his cultivation base now? Is it the soul transformation stage?"
"17 years old at the soul transformation stage?! The imperial family is really blessed! Hahahaha!"
Some of them sounded sarcastic, but nobody pointed out the irregularity of the age and Yan Zhu's cultivation base.
Meanwhile, Yao Qiqi and Gao Yan were terrified. They thought that they were the chosen ones as they managed to reach the nascent soul stage at a young age. Unfortunately, someone appeared and declared that they were more talented than them.
Xu Nuan noticed their dark expressions. She patted them and whispered.
"Don't believe in them. Those liars are making things up. That third prince's real age is 150 or so. It seems that the tournament is rigged."
"W-What? It's rigged?!"
"Precisely so. Lord Florida Man already told us what happened. Yan Xiang is trying to suppress Lord Florida Man and expel him from the continent. They're using the tournament and the wager contract as a tool to trap him."
"W-Will we be okay?"
"I… don't know."
Xu Nuan couldn't come up with the right words to soothe Yao Qiqi and Gao Yan. She gazed at Leo, trying to guess what he had been scheming or thinking.
.
While Xu Nuan and others speculated what Leo would do in this situation, Yan Zhu patted Qi Niu's back, ordering her to hit the verification boulder.
"You first."
"…Alright, husband."
Because of Yan Zhu's help, Qi Niu managed to advance to the golden core stage. Among her peers, she was considered a genius. But when everybody compared her to the old men here, she looked cute.
Yan Zhu brought her along so that she could earn some reputation from the seniors of the Jianghu Alliance. Also, this would be her debut appearance as his official concubine.
Qi Niu mustered her earth element Qi into her fist. Then, she punched the boulder.
BOOM
The boulder shone. Then, words appeared on the flat surface as the artifact confirmed Qi Niu's age and her cultivation base.
.
Name: Qi Niu
Age: 16
Cultivation Base: 3rd-Rank Golden Core Stage[1]
Power Output: 1st-Rank Golden Core Stage
.
The court officials and members from the Jianghu Alliance nodded in approval. Although Qi Niu was a lot weaker than their disguised elders, her achievement was acceptable.
"Good! Next!"
Yan Zhu let his three subordinates hit the boulder. All of them were war veterans who had drunk enough tea of rejuvenation.
BOOM
.
Name: Ou Jang
Age: 14
Cultivation Base: 7th-Rank Soul Transformation Stage
Power Output: 5th-Rank Soul Transformation Stage
.
As soon as the result appeared, the accomplices grinned while the people from the Tang Clan smacked their lips in disgust.
The person was obviously cheating. It was impossible for a 14-year-old boy to be 1.8 meters tall and reach this cultivation rank!
The next two soldiers hit the boulder as well. Like the first soldier, the result showed up as a 15-year-old boy having the cultivation base of a soul transformation.
Then, it was Yan Zhu's turn.
BOOM
.
Name: Yan Zhu
Age: 16
Cultivation Base: 9th-Rank Soul Transformation Stage
Power Output: 9th-Rank Soul Transformation Stage
.
Yan Zhu burst into laughter while his accomplices chuckled. It seemed that Yan Zhu drank too much tea that his bone age regressed too much.
After Yan Zhu's team finished their turns, Yan Xiang called other groups over.
"Next, the Ouyang Clan! Show everybody how far you cultivated your juniors!"
"Yes, Your Majesty!"
.
.
An hour later, all seven teams of participants finished their turn, except for Leo's team.
Tiger Swordsman, Xu Nuan, and Leo's expressions were dark. Except for Qi Niu, all participants were soul transformation stage cultivators.
"What a shameless bunch," Xu Nuan grumbled.
"These people are despicable, Lord Florida Man! We should void the wagers and go back. There's no point competing with these cheaters," Tiger Swordsman was disappointed in Yan Zhu and the Jianghu Alliance's immaturity. He was disillusioned.
Leo remained silent. He stroked his braided beard, waiting for Esen to finish her preparation.
Unfortunately, Yan Xiang didn't want to wait. He shouted, commanding Leo to bring his team forward.
"It's your turn, Immortal Florida Man! If you fail to present five contestants for this event, your team will be disqualified!"
"…"
Leo deeply sighed. He glanced at Gao Yan.
"You go first."
Gao Yan trembled in fear, "R-Really? Me? Against all those 7th-stage cultivators?"
"Yeah, you. Go and get this over with."
"B-But I-I-I might die!"
"You won't. Trust me."
"…"
Gao Yan reluctantly got on the stage. He dragged his feet and looked back at Leo several times before he gave up resisting.
Facing the boulder, Gao Yan mustered his courage. He closed his eyes as the memory of his past flashed before his eyes. After the short flashback moment, Gao Yan's aura soared.
RUMBLE
Instead of exuding the air of a nascent soul cultivator, his Qi volume surpassed that of a soul formation cultivator!
Then, he threw a punch.
BOOM
The result came out.
.
Name: Gao Yan
Age: 16
Cultivation Base: 1st-Rank Nascent Soul Stage
Power Output: 5th-Rank Soul Formation Stage
.
As soon as the result appeared, Yan Zhu, Yan Xiang, and the people of Jianghu Alliance changed their expressions. They looked at Gao Yan in disbelief.
"I-Is he really 16?!"
"H-He is legit, right?"
"That… that's a real talent. He's the true gem!"
Hesitant appeared in the accomplices' eyes as they coveted Gao Yan. They secretly schemed in their mind, hoping to poach Gao Yan from Leo after this event.
"NEXT!"
Yan Xiang swallowed his astonishment. He pressed on, trying to push Leo to send weaker juniors to fight.
Leo pursed his lips. He looked at Yao Qiqi for a moment. However, he immediately changed his mind.
Yao Qiqi was too young. As she couldn't use Cat in combat, the fight might be too risky for her. Leo couldn't use Cat either as Yan Xiang forbade him from using any monster beast.
"Immortal Florida Man, your next representative?"
"…"
Leo slightly opened his mouth and was about to order one of the tamers to jump on the stage. However, his sharp nose caught a mixed scent of Esen and a group of strangers with a similar odor. A wide smile appeared on his face.
"They're here."
"Hmm?"
As soon as Leo finished his sentence, Esen descended and landed on the stage. Following her, two girls and one boy also arrived.
The boy came with a set of worn-out purple knight armor, carrying a massive bastard sword on his back as if he were inspired by a certain famous manga series. Meanwhile, one of the girls only had a tattered black robe and wielded a long cane. As for the last girl, she wore a black gothic dress. Strangely, they had silver hair, and they wrapped a piece of cloth around their eyes.
Esen turned around and winked at Leo. She reported her achievement.
"As you ordered, I "resurrected" them and "feed" them those."
Leo let out a long sigh of relief, "Well, done. Now, show them how it's done."
"Alright!" Esen cackled and patted the cane girl, "You first. Go, Ivy."
Ivy, the new girl, smiled at Esen and courteously bowed, "Yes, Your Holiness."
She looked up and walked toward the boulder. Then, she lightly jabbed it with the back of her fist.
BOOOOOM!
The boulder got pushed back five meters! A small crack appeared on its surface.
Then, the result appeared.
.
Name: Ivy Archlich
Age: 17
Cultivation Base: 9th-Rank Quasi-Immortal Stage
Power Output: 1st-Rank Earth Celestial Stage
[1] Cultivation Base is graded in 8 major realms. Each realm has 9 minor ranks. The grades are as follows;
1st Stage - Muscle Tempering Stage
2nd Stage - Qi Condensation Stage
3rd Stage - Foundation Establishment Stage
4th Stage - Golden Core Stage
5th Stage - Nascent Soul Stage
6th Stage - Soul Formation Stage
7th Stage - Soul Transformation Stage
8th Stage - Quasi-Immortal Stage
As for the minor ranks, it is graded from low to high. For example, the 1st-grade golden core cultivator is weaker than the 9th-grade golden core cultivator.

chapters.title: Chapter 160 Paralympic Host Refuses To Void Florida Man’s World Records As 99% Of Athletes Self-Identified As Disabled
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 160 – Paralympic Host Refuses to Void Florida Man's World Records as 99% of Athletes Self-Identified as Disabled
In this cultivation world, a person's strength was generally categorized into eight major tiers. Each tier was nicknamed as "Stage" so everybody could compare their strength with their peers.
The eight stages were as follows;
1st stage – Muscle Tempering Stage
2nd stage – Qi Condensation Stage
3rd stage - Foundation Establishment Stage
4th stage – Golden Core Stage
5th stage – Nascent Soul Stage
6th stage – Soul Formation Stage
7th stage – Soul Transformation Stage
8th stage – Quasi Immortal Stage
Each major stage was separated into nine minor ranks. Everybody started at the first rank. After a cultivator accumulated enough Qi, their rank naturally rose.
This general knowledge was widely accepted as the world's standard. There could be no other cultivation stage beyond the 8th stage. If there were, the person might be an immortal or someone who practiced an unorthodox cultivation method.
But in this case, the name of the new cultivation stage wasn't new to Yan Xiang and the people from the big clans. As their ancestors transcended the mortal realm, they were aware of the immortal realm's standards and cultivation bases.
Unlike the mortal ranks, the immortals were graded into nine major stages. Coincidentally, the first rank of immortal stages was the Earth Celestial Stage.
"An immortal?!" Yan Xiang was petrified.
Ivy, the blindfolded archlich, silently stared at the boulder. Her tattered black robe fluttered by the wind, revealing her jade white skin and her long legs. She pursed her lips, unsatisfied with the result.
"Your Holiness, can I use my full strength? This is humiliating."
Esen smacked Ivy's back. She cackled while her cold eyes glanced at Yan Zhu and Yan Xiang.
"That's enough. If you hit it too hard, the others won't have a chance to show their strength. Also, that sly fox will definitely find fault with us and disqualify our people again."
"… Understood, Your Holiness."
Ivy receded and stepped down from the stage. After Ivy got down, Leo gave her a new set of casual clothes as the tattered robe was too revealing. As she went commando under the short black robe, Leo, Gao Yan, and Tiger Swordsman could see almost everything whenever the wind blew.
"Little girl, put this on. You're practically naked."
Ivy looked up and gazed at Leo. She flinched and paused for a few seconds as if she saw something unexpected. After coming back to her senses, Ivy bowed like a medieval aristocrat.
"I'm grateful, Holy One. Your contribution will forever be remembered. The spirit will praise your generosity for millennia."
"…"
Something was wrong about her. Ivy's speech made Leo cringe. Still, Leo was curious about her. He leaned closer to her ear and whispered.
"Are you an arch lich?"
"Yes, Holy One."
"Can you also summon undead?"
"Yes, Holy One."
"I see. By the way, why are you calling me Holy One?"
"Because the purity of your Virgin Yang is as clean as newborn babies, yet your shadow hides the traces of death. Heaven's luck gathers around you, but you fail to grasp or use them. You and Her Holiness the Empress have a similar air. Since you are her equal, we cannot treat you the same way we treat cultivators. You deserve our utmost respect and worship."
"…"
She sounded too cryptic. Leo couldn't understand her.
While Leo sized up Ivy, the next servant of Esen proceeded to the boulder. However, Yan Xiang stopped them.
"Halt! You must be cheating! You all are disqualified!"
As Leo had predicted, Yan Xiang attempted to ruin their scheme once again. But this time, Esen confronted Yan Xiang.
"That's a baseless accusation. What's the evidence, smart ass?"
"Evidence? It's right here! Do you think I'm stupid?! Who do you think I am? I've been the emperor of this country for over 500 years, and I have met every quasi-immortal on the continent! Someone under 18 can't possibly reach the quasi-immortal stage!"
"Are you sure?" Esen held back her laughter.
"Of course! At the soul formation stage, it usually takes 10 years to complete one soul array to get stronger. Everybody needs at least 10 arrays to stabilize their foundation! Even the smartest and most talented cultivator still needed to spend 2-3 years per array!"
The other cultivators nodded as some of them already experienced such hardship. An average soul formation cultivator mostly spent at least 100 years getting stuck in this stage to refine their foundation before they advanced to the next rank. Thus, reaching the soul transformation stage under the age of 18 was impossible.
Still, Yan Xiang's words also contradicted his allies, who were his representatives. Everybody was younger than 18!
Esen caught on to the flaw of Yan Xiang's logic. She crossed her arms and tilted her head. Then, she glanced at Leo.
Leo had been listening to them. Since Esen didn't bother pointing out the faults, he had no choice but to take the initiative in the conversation. He stopped talking to Ivy and faced the emperor. Then, Leo pointed at Yan Xiang, mimicking a certain famous lawyer in a video game series.
"OBJECTION! RELEVENCE!"
"…What?" Yan Xiang frowned. "What do you object, Immortal Florida Man? Relevance? Do you think my reasoning is irrelevant?"
Leo smirked and stepped on the arena stage.
"It is indeed irrelevant, emperor. Do you think everybody in this world has to follow your standard, or else, their achievement is unacceptable?"
"Yes! Look. You are an immortal. Tell me. How long did it take for you to become what you are today? How many years did you spend as a mortal?!"
Leo smirked, "165!"
Yan Xiang burst into laughter, "See? You even spent a long time as a mortal!"
"165 years is the time I took I spent training from the 1st stage mortal to THIS!"
Leo clenched his fist, and a thunderous sound and black electrical statics erupted from his palm. Then, his entire right arm turned black as his cancer cells charged their energy, getting ready to unleash a black lightning bolt upon his foe.
The sky instantly turned black. Dark clouds gathered as if they came here to answer Leo's summon. Thunderbolts of various colors flashed in the sky.
"…"
Yan Xiang and others widened their eyes in astonishment and disbelief. Some of them had barely survived green or purple lightning bolts. However, they saw yellow, orange, red, and black lightning flash in the clouds.
Leo steeled the topic back to the point. He released his hand, and the tribulation clouds dispersed. His right arm also returned to normal.
"You see, Mr. Spineless Kim Jung Un. Although I stagnated for several ten thousand years doing nothing but eating and farming, I only needed 100ish years to become what I am today. Therefore, you cannot enforce your standard to the foreigners, whose standard is superior to your cheap 3rd world country's ass."
"W-What?"
Leo patted on Esen's head. Then, he winked at her.
"Esen, when you first learned a cultivation technique, how old were you?"
Esen smirked, "Seven!"
"Then, how long did it take for you to reach your current stage?"
Again, Esen laughed and came up with a random number, "Seven!"
The crowd widened their eyes in astonishment. They murmured, doubting Leo's reasoning. Everybody still believed that both Yan Xiang and Leo cheated, but they waited to see how Leo would come up with an excuse.
Leo turned to Ivy next, "What about you? How old were you when you stopped being a commoner?"
Ivy remained expressionless. She spoke the truth, "Ten."
"And how long did it take from the commoner stage to your current stage?"
"If we count the training period and the baptism period, three years."
"WHAT?!" Yan Xiang and his people couldn't believe it, "Liar! You must be older than 17! You must have drunk a lot of rejuvenation tea!"
Leo widely grinned. He turned back and started attacking Yan Xiang's logic.
"By your logic, nobody under 18 should reach the soul transformation stage?"
"Of course!"
"Then, what in the frozen hell are those guys over there, there, there, there, and there? If I remember correctly, there are a bunch of young brats with that strength. How are you going to explain that?"
"…"
Yan Xiang's expression turned stiff. He widened his eyes and touched his mouth, realizing that he slipped up. Yan Zhu, Ouyang Ke, and Situ Bai bitterly laughed as they already realized it long ago, but nobody dared to stop Yan Xiang from screwing himself.
