"Let me question you again, you idiot sandwich. By your standard, do you think those 14-year-old brats are so talented that they got stronger faster than so many white-haired geezers around here?!"
"…"
"Tell me, donkey emperor! You said yourself that it's impossible to become a soul transformation cultivator by the age of 18. Then, what in the sunny Ohio are those kids?! Did you cheat, donkey docker?!"
Yan Xiang was at a loss for words. He was aware of his mistake, and he couldn't come up with an excuse.
Situ Bai couldn't sit still anymore. He stepped up and refuted Leo.
"There is no fixed standard, Immortal Florida Man! Our people are just too talented!"
"Then, nobody cheated?" Asked Leo.
"Of course not! How could we cheat in this prestige event?!"
"I see! So, none of you cheated, am I right?"
"Exactly!"
"Good. Now, donkey docking emperor. Are you going to accuse my people that we are cheating?"
Yan Xiang frowned. He smacked his lips and was about to press on the accusation.
However, Situ Bai jumped up on the boulder and whispered in the emperor's ear.
"P-Please stop what you're doing, Your Majesty. If you keep accusing them, they might really kill us all. They're probably the immortal friends of Florida Man."
Yan Xiang glared at Situ Bai, "And what are we going to do? Send our men to their deaths? If we let them enter the tournament, we can't win!"
Situ Bai coughed and reminded Yan Xiang of their objective.
"You Majesty, we simply need to buy time for our ancestors to arrive. Even though we can't win this tournament, he has already shown his weaknesses. One of them is merely a nascent soul cultivator. As long as we can kill that guy to avenge the second prince, the rest of us can forfeit the tournament. Then, we will have the last laugh since he can't do anything about the dead disciple!"
"…"
Yan Xiang disliked the plan as it was pre-determined that their side would lose. Still, facing multiple immortals was too risky. He had no choice but to find a way to save his representatives from Leo's wrath.
"Alright," Yan Xiang made up his mind. "We can't judge cultivators by anybody's standard. So be it. Go ahead and show us what your representatives can do!"
Getting the permission, Leo was satisfied. He gestured to Esen and the other two to end this farce.
"Esen, you go last. Let your subordinates show a bit of their strength. Use the minimum force."
Esen acknowledged the order. She commanded the boy to go first.
"Go, Marc. Use one-tenth of your strength like how your sister did."
The boy knight with a large bastard sword beamed her with a bright smile, "Okay, Your Holiness. I'll do my best!"
He rushed to the boulder. Without using his sword, he lightly poked it with his finger.
PU!
His finger left behind a hole in the flat surface. Then, the boulder of verification revealed the brief information of the boy.
.
Name: Marc Dullahan
Age: 12
Cultivation Base: 9th Rank Quasi Immortal Stage
Power Output: 5th Rank Earth Celestial Stage
.
Marc looked up. Even though he was blindfolded, he could see everything clearly. Upon seeing the result, he gasped.
"Whoops. I overdid it."
Marc nervously looked back. Then, he noticed Esen's death glare. He immediately bowed 90 degrees, "I'm so sorry, Your Holiness! I didn't mean to!"
PLOP
Because Marc bowed too fast, his head slightly slipped off from his neck. Fortunately, Marc noticed it and immediately grabbed his head before it fell off his neck. Then, he returned to the Ivy's side while sweating profusely.
Esen slightly shook her head and complained, "Still an idiot as usual."
Leo laughed, "He's cute, though. He looks like an innocent boy."
"You won't laugh at him anymore if you see him fight seriously."
"Yeah, yeah. I'm looking forward to it. What about the other girl?"
Leo and Esen gazed at the last silver-haired girl in a gothic dress. As she came here without a storage ring or a weapon, Leo was curious about her.
"Death Knight, I assume," Leo randomly guessed.
"You got it! I'm surprised you know about her."
"Just guessing. I was thinking banshee or vampire, but she's too silent to be one of those. A stoic knight suits her more."
"Hahahaha! You're a fan of my Molg Empire, I see. Wanna join my kingdom?"
"Nope. You join mine, not the other way around."
"Tsk."
The girl in question silently walked toward the boulder. She gently stroked on its surface. Then, she turned around to leave without looking back at the result.
RUMBLE
The entire boulder cracked, forcing Yan Xiang and Situ Bai to jump down. The result appeared.
.
Name: Beatrice D. Knight
Age: 17
Cultivation Base: 9th Rank Quasi Immortal Stage
Power Output: 1st Rank Sky Celestial Stage
.
Looking at the result, the spectators' expressions stiffened.
Sky Celestial?!
Leo was also curious as nobody had taught him about the immortal stages yet. He asked Esen for some clues.
"You've fought with the immortals, right? How many ranks are there in total?"
Esen chuckled and walked toward the boulder. Then, she raised four fingers.
"Four?"
"No," Esen stopped in front of the boulder. Then, she threw a punch. "Nine!"
BOOOM
The boulder exploded upon impact. Rocks and debris flew everywhere. Yet, the destroyed boulder still faintly released some words in the air, displaying the result before it quickly faded to smoke.
.
Name: Esen Sydin IV
Age: 7
Cultivation Base: Error
Power Output: Error

chapters.title: Chapter 161 Florida Man Wins Lottery, Receives Gold Digging Catfisher As Prize
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 161 – Florida Man Wins Lottery, Receives Gold Digging Catfisher as Prize.
Yan Xiang, Yan Luo, Yan Zhu, Situ Bai, and Ouyang Ke's faces were as white as a sheet. They were horrified by the presence of Esen's subordinates.
Moreover, the boulder of verification was known for its durability. Their ancestors once praised that it could withstand a heaven celestial stage immortal's strike. However, Esen and Beatrice easily destroyed it.
It was a clear indication that both women were at least at the heaven celestial stage immortal, aka the 3rd level immortal!
Realizing his mistake, Yan Xiang regretted that he chose to provoke Leo. He turned around to look at Tang Xuan.
The former patriarch of the Tang Clan deeply sighed and silently saluted Yan Xiang. He prayed for the emperor's fate and future. Tang Xuan believed he did everything he could, but Yan Xiang ended up seeking demise.
Tang Xuan looked away from Yan Xiang and gazed at Leo, hoping that the latter would not lump him together with the Yan Family and their entourage.
'I hope Daoist Florida Man will spare my clan after this. I already did everything I could.'
.
.
Esen puffed her chest and strode back in elation. When she was about to walk past Leo, the latter raised his hand. Esen noticed it and instinctively high-fived him even though she had never done it before – Everything came from a muscle memory, which she inherited from Leo's blood.
"Well done."
"Of course. I'm an empress for a reason."
The five representatives on Leo's side all gathered. Esen, Beatrice, Marc, Ivy, and Gao Yan were ready for the next event.
Yan Xiang's face was still pale. His previously arrogant demeanor vanished. Still, he waved his hand and swept away rocks and debris on the arena stage with his Qi.
After the stage was clean, Yan Xiang stood still for a minute. Once his breathing pace returned to normal, he announced.
"All eight teams have been qualified. The preliminary round is over. Now, we will introduce the tournament bracket and the rules."
Yan Xiang snapped his fingers. Situ Bai and Ouyang Ke pulled out white talismans and tossed them into the air.
The talismans floated and formed a square array, acting as a projecting monitor. Like a real TV screen, it showed five empty tournament brackets. Each bracket consisted of eight participants.
Yan Xiang explained, "This will be the main theme of this season's tournament. All teams will send one of their members to participate in each bracket. The winners of each bracket will be the finalists, and they will fight in a free-for-all combat in the final."
Leo and Esen nodded as it sounded fair. However, Gao Yan sweated profusely.
By these rules, Gao Yan might have to duel against a 7th-stage cultivator at least once. As he was still at the 5th stage, Gao Yan was not confident that he could win.
Gao Yan turned to Leo, asking for permission, "S-Senior. Can I forfeit before I go up on the stage?"
Leo rolled his eyes, "Did you forget the gun and the lightsaber?"
"B-But I don't know any nascent soul techniques or special moves!"
"Just go out there and shoot your opponent. If you miss, just swing your lightsaber. The force will guide you."
"Force?"
"Use the force, young Padawan. Size matters not."
"But my techniques…"
"Shut it and be confident in yourself. I heard you have been practicing the Sword Saint's techniques for years. Do you think your hard work means nothing?"
"But the strength gap…"
"Even ants can take down an elephant. You aren't alone. Isn't Thora a part of your strength? She's with you the whole time!"
"…"
Gao Yan finally remembered that he had a sentient dao avatar as his dao companion. As a dao avatar, she was considered as Gao Yan's power. Therefore, she could help him during combat.
Behind Gao Yan, Thora had been following her boyfriend since the beginning of the journey. Except for Leo, Esen, and Esen's new subordinates, only a cultivator stronger than soul transformation could see her.
Yan Xiang and others long noticed Thora's presence. However, they disregarded her as they mistook her as a common dao avatar, which sometimes came out from their master's body. It was a normal occurrence, and every nascent soul cultivator had one.
Thora gave Leo a thumbs up. Then, she embraced Gao Yan from behind.
'Be confident, husband. You are stronger than you think. We can defeat those trashy cultivators.'
"…"
Hearing his girlfriend's encouragement, Gao Yan's hope was ignited. He no longer sulked.
"…I'll try my best."
Leo snickered, "You will surely do your best. You're a main character after all."
"Main character?"
"Never mind that."
"???"
Although Leo wasn't 100% certain, from his point of view, Gao Yan appeared to have the qualifications of a main character.
He had an abnormal amount of Qi and strength surpassing his actual cultivation base. He had a unique girlfriend, who acted as Gao Yan's mentor and bodyguard. He was a hardworking kid with a humble background. Moreover, he was on a lucky streak lately after Leo had met him.
It was a wild guess, but Leo believed he was right.
While Leo and Gao Yan chatted, Yan Xiang began calling the representatives to get on the stage to draw the lottery tickets, deciding which bracket they would be in.
"Immortal Florida Man. Could your team come up and draw a lottery ticket for your representatives?"
Leo shrugged and gestured for Esen and others to finish this farce.
Esen and her three subordinates leisurely leaped to the stage and stood along with the other contestants. Gao Yan was the last to arrive.
Yan Xiang explained, "Each team will send their representative to draw a lottery. All five of you will be on a different bracket by default."
The emperor gestured his one of his team members to be the example. The person was a 14-year-old soul transformation cultivator. The latter walked up to his emperor.
A cubic box appeared out of thin air. It came with a circle hole on top, which allowed any adult man to put his hand inside. It floated toward the boy's chest.
Not thinking much, the cultivator inserted his hand into the box and found eight iron balls. He picked one up and showed it to the crowd.
It showed the Chinese number "8".
The boy passed the iron ball to Yan Xiang. The latter summoned another box and put the ball inside. Afterward, the cultivator's name automatically appeared on the first bracket.
After the soul transformation cultivator showed them how it was done, Yan Xiang elaborated.
"Now that the imperial court's team has sent the first representative, their four remaining participants will wait until the first bracket is full. Then, we will move on to the second bracket. But before that, every team has to send one person to enter the first bracket."
The rules were simple and easy to understand. Every team could choose which contestant to send in a certain bracket. However, it came with a nasty scheme as Yan Xiang immediately called out Leo's team.
"Immortal Florida Man. Please select your representative to enter the first bracket. Who will you choose?"
Leo and Esen knitted their brows as they sensed something amiss. Although the call seemed random, it hid a certain tactic that they could see.
Testing the water, Leo ordered Ivy to go first.
"Ivy. You're up."
"Yes, Holy One."
Ivy, who wore the spare robes of a tamer girl, walked toward the box and picked an iron ball from the inside.
The number was 7.
The imperial agent's face instantly turned dark. He lamented to his fate.
Ivy's name appeared on the first bracket. Her opponent was none other than the fake 14-year-old boy.
The other teams secretly laughed at Yan Zhu. One by one, they sent their men to pick their lotto.
After the first bracket was filled, it was time for the second bracket. Then, Yan Xiang subtly revealed his nasty scheme.
"Immortal Florida Man. Could you please?"
"…"
Leo slightly nodded. With just this call, Leo was 50% sure that the tournament was half-rigged. It seemed that they were targeting something.
"Marc, you're up next."
The white-haired boy innocently smiled, "Yes, Holy One!"
He went up and picked the number "1".
While Marc drew the lotto ball, Leo scanned everybody's reactions and expressions. By observing other people, he noticed one thing in common.
Their throats vibrated, and they secretly glanced at each other.
"Vibrating throats?" Leo narrowed his eyes.
Esen also noticed it. She whispered, "Voice transmission techniques. They secretly talk to each other with a Qi frequency trick. If you adjust your ears a little, you can eavesdrop on their conversation."
"Oh?"
Leo slightly grinned and concentrated. His cancer cells adjusted his gills and ears. Then, Leo began to hear strange noises of mixed radio frequencies.
The sounds of people became more audible.
'The boy is not our target. Send another dummy.'
'Should we send mid-horse this time? He seems weak.'
'Don't underestimate that white-haired boy. I saw him pierce through the verification boulder with his finger. He's a lot stronger than Gao Yan. We'll send another low-tier horse as planned.'
'Dodge that boy. Send another weak pawn.'
As Leo was new to this technique, he could only hear the voices from the crowd, which had a lower cultivation base. As for the soul transformation cultivators, Leo couldn't hear them yet.
However, the information was enough for Leo to figure out their plan.
"I guess Gao Yan is in danger."
Esen nodded, "Indeed, he is. I'm sure they will send their strongest fighter to join the same bracket as Gao Yan's. Should we order him to forfeit the matches?"
"No. We'll let him struggle a bit. We have necromancers on our side. If things go south, we can resurrect him, right?"
"We can, but he will lose his status as a cultivator. By the way, do you have some healing pills for emergencies?"
"I do. Don't worry."
"Okay, then. Let's sit back and watch the show."
.
.
The lottery pull continued. After Marc, Yan Xiang ordered Leo to pick a fighter first.
Leo sent Beatrice to join the third bracket. Then, he and Esen eavesdropped their conversation.
Again, everybody chose to send their remaining weakest cultivator to face Beatrice. But strangely, Yan Xiang's team still kept Qi Niu and Yan Zhu in their team.
Next, it was the fourth bracket. As Leo already figured out Yan Xiang's plan, he boldly sent Gao Yan up.
As Leo and Esen had predicted, everybody got noisy. They urged their teams to dispatch the strongest fighter to join the 4th tournament bracket.
Gao Yan got the lucky number "7".
The draw became a scramble. Yan Xiang's agents and allies competed with each other to draw the lotto next. They even loudly prayed for a certain number. Surprisingly, Yan Xiang sent Yan Zhu to join this bracket.
"Let me get that eight!"
"No, mine!"
"Me! He's mine!"
But in the end, a 9th-rank soul transformation cultivator from the Situ Clan got the 8th ball. He would face Gao Yan.
Everybody on Yan Xiang's side silently rejoiced. Their eyes gleamed, eager to see the demise of Gao Yan even though he had done nothing wrong. Everybody disregarded the last bracket.
Esen snorted and proceeded to finish this farce. She drew the number 1 and got down from the stage.
The remaining representatives lifelessly finished their tasks. Qi Niu, the weakest link among the bunch, got the short straw as she picked up number 2.
Qi Niu trembled as she sneaked glances at Esen. She then rushed to Yan Zhu.
"Husband! Can I forfeit the match? I can't possibly defeat that woman!"
Yan Zhu was still over the moon as he was in the same bracket as Gao Yan. He looked forward to the fight to the point that he disregarded Qi Niu's wellbeing.
"Don't worry about it, Niu'er. We told them that the fight was a non-lethal one. That immortal won't kill you. If she does, it will ruin her reputation and her future. There's an unspoken rule among cultivators that no senior should harm or kill a junior no matter the reason. If someone violates this, the other seniors from the higher realm will hunt him down!"
"B-But we did kill a bunch of commoners and weak cultivators."
"That unspoken rules don't apply to people with backgrounds. Those peasants can rot and die for all we care!"
"…"
Qi Niu felt a bit better. However, her heart still beat like death metal drums as she couldn't get rid of a bad feeling in her chest.
She didn't realize that Esen secretly glanced at her. Moreover, under Qi Niu's foot, a purple shadow slipped into her shadow and coiled around her left ankle.

chapters.title: Chapter 162 Florida Man Sued Doctor For Prescribing Antibiotics Instead Of Heroin
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 162 – Florida Man Sued Doctor for Prescribing Antibiotics Instead of Heroin
Every participant's tournament bracket and opponents were decided. Yan Xiang then waved his hand. Then, four additional arena stages were elevated from the ground.
Yan Xiang then reminded everybody of the purpose of this tournament.
"Remember, this tournament exists for the disciples and juniors to spar and gain experience. Purposely crippling or severely injuring your opponents is strictly forbidden. Accidents may happen, but you should not fight to kill your opponent no matter what!"
The spectators had a complicated expressions on their faces. It was obvious that Yan Xiang said this to restrain Leo's overpowered immortals from abusing their power.
Leo scoffed, "Likewise. I hope there won't be any more dirty tricks. Otherwise…"
"…"
Intimidated, Yan Xiang's hands trembled. Still, he didn't give up on his plan.
Unbeknownst to Leo, when Yan Xiang created the platforms, he inserted some talismans underneath. Those talismans would activate whenever Yan Xiang wanted to, and their effects varied, depending on the chosen talisman.
The emperor continued explaining to hide his anxiousness.
"The match is decided when a fighter gives up, falls off the stage, or is unable to continue fighting. As we said before, killing your opponent is strictly forbidden. If someone kills their opponent, the murderer will be instantly disqualified and arrested for murder! No exception!"
Leo snorted as he didn't plan on killing anybody yet. He looked at his juniors and warned them, "Don't kill. Leave them alive."
Esen pouted, "Why should we? They're playing dirty."
"We can get them later. We can play by their rules for the time being. If they break the rules first, we unalive them."
"Fair enough."
Yan Xiang didn't waste time. He called the contestants to the stages before Leo could find fault with him.
"Participant number one and two of all brackets, you may step on the stage!"
Everybody stepped down from the main stage while the fighters looked confused at first. But when they found their tournament stage, they leaped to their arena.
Marc got on the first arena's stage while Esen jumped on the arena number five. As for the others, they observed their opponents and cheered for their allies.
Marc's opponent was a soul transformation cultivator. He was 6'2 tall, and his muscle was a lot bulkier. Moreover, he grew a full beard. No matter how everybody looked at him, he didn't look like someone under 20 years old.
"First match! Marc Dullahan of Florida Domain versus He Man from Mount He Sect!" The referee announced the name of the contestants and gave the signal, "FIGHT!"
The muscular cultivator bellowed and summoned two dao avatars. One was an elderly man with bodybuilder-like muscles while the other was a bald barbarian with two great axes. The bodybuilder avatar merged with He Man while the ax wielder avatar manifested its physical body.
Marc ignored the dao avatars. He slowly pulled the bastard sword from his back and dropped it to the floor. He adjusted his blindfold while he strolled toward his opponent.
He Man seized the opportunity. He transformed all his muscles into steel and threw a punch at the boy. At the same time, the giant ax wielder avatar swung its battleaxe, aiming at Marc's head.
As if Marc used Situ Nantian's footwork technique, he vanished and reappeared on the right side of He Man. Moreover, the bastard sword that Marc had left on the floor teleported to his hand.
WHOOSH!
Marc gently swung the bastard sword, but it stopped one centimeter away from He Man's neck.
The muscle man sweated profusely. He couldn't see the swing. By the time the sword stopped, it was already at his neck.
"This is my defeat. I lose."
The referee was also astonished. He stuttered, "W-W-Winner, Marc Dullahan of Florida Domain!"
Marc widely smiled and pulled his bastard sword back. He took a step back and saluted to He Man, "Good fight, sir."
"…Y-You too. G-Good fight."
The innocent smile and Marc's humility stunned He Man. For a moment, he forgot that Marc was an immortal who cheated his age. Had someone told him that Marc was really a boy, he would have believed them.
Because of the innocent look, He Man was ashamed of his action. He inwardly cursed his sect master for colluding with Yan Xiang. He lowered his head and stepped down from the platform.
When He Man returned to the other colleagues of the same sect, nobody blamed him for his defeat. On the other hand, they congratulated him.
"Good job coming back alive. That was close."
"Surviving an immortal's strike is already an achievement. Don't be disappointed."
He Man slightly nodded. Still, he couldn't get rid of the guilt in his heart. He gazed at Marc, wondering if he was really a 12-year-old boy.
"Hey, do you think the boy is really 12?" He Man asked his colleagues.
"Of course not! He must have drunk tea of rejuvenation like us."
"…I see."
He Man shook his head to forget the thought.
.
.
Meanwhile, on the fifth platform, Esen and Qi Niu got on the stage, and the referee signaled the start of the match.
Qi Niu gritted her teeth and pulled out her poison-coated daggers. On the other hand, Esen crossed her arms and stood still, waiting for Qi Niu to make the first move.
Unlike the boys, Qi Niu and Esen didn't bother about courtesy or manners. They remained silent, refusing to talk first.
As Esen didn't make the first move, Qi Niu got nervous. The latter's legs and arms trembled.
From Qi Niu's point of view, Esen's smug smile had a strange vibe. She felt like her soul was being invaded. But in reality, Esen didn't even try. She simply stared into Qi Niu's soul, sizing up her potential and threat.
But in the end, Qi Niu's soul was corrupted. Her future growth was mediocre at best.
"This is boring, yo."
Esen was disappointed. She had hoped that Qi Niu would have been as talented as Gao Yan.
"Come on, come at me, little wench. Here, I won't defend!"
"…"
Even though Esen gave up her pride and spoke first, Qi Niu didn't move. Instead, Qi Niu took two steps back.
As the opponent didn't dare to move, Esen stopped playing nice. She took a step, but she instantly appeared in front of Qi Niu.
"!!!"
"Since you don't move, it's nom-nom time!"
It was too late for Qi Niu to react. The lich empress opened her mouth and sunk her sharp fangs into her neck.
CHOMP
Esen bit Qi Niu's neck. Like a vampire, she started sucking her blood.
Qi Niu didn't resist. She stood there, petrified from fear. But after Esen's fangs entered her flesh, pleasure replaced her fear.
Esen didn't prolong the bite. She let go of Qi Niu's neck, and the girl collapsed to the ground. The lich empress turned to the referee and pointed at the unconscious girl.
"Result?"
The referee came back to his senses. He announced, "W-Winner, from Florida Domain!"
.
.
Yan Xiang watched how Esen and Marc made a quick work of his people. He deeply sighed, unable to let go of the vexing thoughts. He still couldn't give up his pride.
He totally forgot about why he wanted Leo dead. Revenge was no longer in the picture.
It was about his pride. He simply wished to uphold his reputation and teach Leo a lesson.
'Just you wait, Florida Man!'
Yan Xiang crossed his arms behind his back, but his fingers moved. He secretly activated five talismans under each platform, but he suppressed its effect for the moment.
.
.
Ivy and Beatrice got on their stages next. As soon as the girls came up, some neutral faction's spectators whistled as they cheered for them.
"Go, pretty girl! Show us what you can do!"
"Hey, the weird girl with that black dress! You are fine, baby!"
Ivy and Beatrice ignored the jeers. They waited for their opponents on the stage.
The fighters from Yan Xiang's side got up the platform. Coincidentally, they were both from the imperial court.
But before the referee allowed the fighters to start, Yan Xiang moved his fingers and activated two talismans under Ivy and Beatrice's arena.
Although the talismans were activated, nothing seemed to change. However, Ivy and Beatrice flinched as their skin was strangely itchy and hot.
Both women had a bad feeling about the platforms. As soon as the referees started the matches, they rushed their opponents and kicked them out of the stages.
The matches were decided in five seconds. Again, the crowd was astonished.
Ivy and Beatrice didn't wait for the referees to announce the result. They quickly got down from the stages and reported to Esen.
"Your Holiness, something is wrong with the arena," reported Ivy.
Beatrice silently pointed at her tournament stage and pointed at her arm.
Esen and Leo were curious about what got into them. The former inspected Beatrice's skin. Then, she understood what went wrong.
Beatrice's skin was slightly wrinkled. Black dots appeared on her skin as if they were moles.
"Is it itchy?" Esen asked Ivy.
"Yes, Your Holiness. It feels like I'm getting older."
"You're getting older?"
Esen frowned and looked at the stages. However, she couldn't detect anything strange.
Meanwhile, Leo walked toward Ivy's stage. He leaned over and grabbed on the ledge. As soon as he touched it, he got goosebumps. His cancer cells screamed and activated their power to resist the strange effects.
Leo tilted his head in confusion for a moment. After keeping his hand on the stage for a few seconds, he noticed something.
Some of his cancer cells got slightly older. The freshly new blood cells rapidly matured.
Testing his hypothesis, Leo ejected a piece of half-eaten yin cabbage and threw it on the stage. However, nothing changed.
"Odd."
The hypothesis was wrong. Leo was even more confused.
"It's not the aging effect. Then, what is it?"
Leo narrowed his eyes. Then, he looked at Yan Xiang.
Yan Xiang also looked back at him. The former never hid the disdain in his eyes.
"Oh, boy. Tricks after tricks. Schemes after schemes. How come no one has taught them that absolute strength can crush any scheme and tactic?"
Leo walked back to his team and warned them about his findings. He looked at Gao Yan, who hadn't taken the stage yet.
"That damn emperor is using another underhanded trick again. I think he has done something to the arenas."
Esen also nodded as she managed to figure something from Ivy and Beatrice's reactions. She voiced her opinion.
"I think it's something related to time. Is it time ability?"
Leo glanced at the piece of cabbage. It still remained there to prove his point.
"No. It's not time. If it's time, it would have affected his men, too."
"Then, what did that emperor do?"
"…I have no idea."
.
.
Looking at Leo's reaction, Yan Xiang inwardly laughed. He disabled the two previously activated talismans. Then, he looked at Gao Yan's arena next.
'It's too late, Florida Man. Since your people abuse the tea of rejuvenation, I will expose your lies and crush you! It doesn't matter how strong they are. As long as the tea's effect is canceled, you will revert to the original self! Then, your true age will be noticeable by all!'
Yan Xiang's talismans didn't have the time acceleration effect. Instead, they were pill toxin purification talismans, which were commonly used to remove impurities and pill toxins in a cultivator's dantian. But in this case, Yan Xiang used them to remove the rejuvenating tea's effects.
As the talismans only affected the people on the stages, nobody but the contestants could detect them. Moreover, Yan Xiang only needed Leo's people to stay on the stage for ten minutes to completely neutralize the tea's effect.
"Next match! Gao Yan from Florida Domain… Versus… Situ Dong!"
While Yan Xiang mocked Leo in his mind, it was Gao Yan's turn to fight.
Yan Xiang threw everything to the back of his head. As Gao Yan was a legit junior, he paid extra attention to the boy.
Gao Yan was their primary target. They needed to kill him first.
The boy nervously got on the stage while his dao avatar followed after him. Yan Xiang instantly noticed Thora, but he ignored her.
Gao Yan's opponent, Situ Dong, got on the stage. He was a soul transformation cultivator from the Situ Clan. His physical age was 16, but his physique was the same as an adult with a big belly.
Situ Dong laughed at Gao Yan's quirky demeanor. He also glanced at Thora.
"What a sissy. You're a man, but your dao avatar is a woman. Do you want to become a woman that badly?" Mocked Situ Dong.
Gao Yan's expression changed. He stopped being nervous and pulled out his lightsaber. Then, he stared at Situ Dong.
"Keep my dao companion out of your mouth, sir."
Situ Dong burst into laughter, "Dao companion?! Did you sleep with your dao avatar or something?! Hahahahaha! Hey! If you want to do a woman, you should have gone to a brothel, not bedding yourself! FUAHAHAHAHA!!"
"…"
Thora's expression turned dark, but Gao Yan's eyes reddened.
"FIGHT!"
Ignoring the contestants, the referee signaled the fight.
Situ Dong took the initiative. As the opponent was a lowly nascent soul cultivator, Situ Dong looked down on Gao Yan. He merged one of his dao avatars with his physical body, transforming himself into a 10-meter-tall oak tree with a thousand long humanoid arms and sharp fingers.
Not concerned about Gao Yan's safety or life, Situ Dong threw a thousand long fists at him.

chapters.title: Chapter 163 Florida Man’s Student Accidentally Gunned Martial Artist To Death During MMA Match
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 163 – Florida Man's Student Accidentally Gunned Martial Artist to Death during MMA Match
"DIE!!"
Situ Dong was certain of his victory. In terms of strength, nascent soul cultivators were the same as infants learning how to walk while soul transformation cultivators already mastered the dao avatar techniques. Crushing Gao Yan would be a walk in the park.
Gao Yan gritted his teeth and activated his lightsaber. Meanwhile, Thora extended her arm forward, and a yellowish dome of lightning barrier appeared.
BOOM
The fists collided with the barrier. After ten punches, it shattered.
The eleventh fist came for Gao Yan!
Gao Yan no longer hesitated or thought of anything. His muscle memory took over as he swung the lightsaber like how Esen had taught him.
The sci-fi sword, empowered by Leo's essence stone, sliced through the dao avatar's fist like butter.
Situ Dong widened his eyes in shock as the damage to his dao avatar transferred to his real body. The cut from the gap between his left hand's middle finger and ring finger extended to the bottom of his palm.
His hand was almost cut in half!
Because of the cut, 500 fists of the dao avatar vanished. Moreover, Situ Dong lost the feeling in his left hand, and the meridians in his left arm were blocked by an unknown force. His entire left arm withered and thinned, reverting back to its original appearance.
After losing half of his power, Situ pulled back his 500 fists. He took a step back and looked at this dao avatar in shock.
"T-This cannot be! WHAT DID YOU DO?!"
Gao Yan was still in the zone. As he successfully counterattacked with that cut, he took the initiative by pulling the pistol that Leo had given him.
In the chamber was a sacred wood bullet. However, Gao Yan injected all his wood Qi into it, betting on everything in this attack.
BANG
Pulling the trigger, the pistol spat a brown laser beam. At the tip of the beam, the sacred wood bullet pierced through Situ Dong's chest.
The bullet entered Situ Dong's chest and crushed the center ribcage. It dug further, grazing his heart and lungs. It crushed the spinal cord because the bullet lost its momentum, getting stuck in Situ Dong's flesh and bones.
The attack didn't stop there. As the sacred wood was empowered by Gao Yan's wood Qi, the bullet transformed into a plant seed. It absorbed blood and Qi of Situ Dong to rapidly grow. Instantly, it emptied the host's Qi and depleted his lifespan.
Situ Dong vomited blood and bent slightly forward. Then, he collapsed to the ground face-first.
Gao Yan lowered his gun and deactivated the lightsaber. He slowly came back to his senses. When he realized that Situ Dong stopped breathing, he panicked.
"I-I-I didn't mean to!! I'm so sorry, senior!"
Gao Yan rushed to Situ Dong and fed him an elixir grain pill that he got from Leo. Unfortunately, it wasn't enough to resurrect the guy.
The referee and Situ Bai leaped on the stage and checked Situ Dong's pulse. They then looked at his soul for a moment. Then, they glared at Gao Yan.
The referee announced, "Situ Dong has been critically injured. He can no longer fight. The winner of this match is Gao Yan-"
"HALT!"
Situ Bai glared at Gao Yan while he thrust his fingers into Situ Dong's back. He pulled out the sprouted seed and bellowed.
"Your Majesty! Please arrest this man in an instant. He's using a hidden weapon in the tournament!"
Yan Xiang frowned as he also wanted to use this opportunity to disqualify Leo's team. However, there were too many eyes from the neutral factions and rogue cultivators among the spectators. He couldn't blatantly cheat or show favoritism at the moment.
The emperor declared, "Weapons and artifacts are considered skills. Gao Yan didn't break the rules."
"But Your Majesty! Gao Yan killed his opponent!"
"…"
Yan Xiang narrowed his eyes as if he could use this against Leo and Gao Yan. However, before the emperor could speak, Tang Xuan, who had been lurking in the crowd, suddenly used his Qi to amplify his voice.
Tang Xuan's voice vibrated through the arena and Cauliflower City.
"If Gao Yan and his opponent have a similar strength, we can judge that Gao Yan has violated the rules, and his team will automatically be disqualified. However, Gao Yan's opponent is two realms stronger than him. In this case, I think it's an accident."
"Accident?! You call this an accident?!" Situ Bai yelled back.
"Fists and kicks have no eyes. Accidents are bound to happen in sparring. In this case, Gao Yan can't afford to hold back his strength because of his inferior cultivation base. Situ Dong should be at fault here for failing to react to that last attack. Obviously, he looked down on his opponent, and he died because of his lack of judgment. I repeat, Gao Yan is not at fault for accidentally killing his opponent!"
Tang Xuan glanced at Leo, hoping that the latter could support his claim, "Don't you think so too? Immortal Florida Man?"
Leo stroked his beard and looked at Situ Bai, "As he said, bozo. Your guy is indeed stronger than my boy, but he got squashed because of his stupidity. You can't blame my boy for giving it his all while your people purposely throw the match, do you?"
"…"
The neutral faction's people murmured as they agreed to this argument. From their point of view, Gao Yan barely reacted to the first attacks while Situ Dong miscalculated. Had Situ Dong not retreated, Gao Yan would never have had enough time to use his secret weapon.
In short, it was Situ Dong's fault for dying to the secret weapon.
Yan Xiang looked around for a moment before he gave Gao Yan a meaningful look. He thought of the weapon that Yan Zhu had. Although Yan Xiang had enough reasons to disqualify Gao Yan, he had no choice but to pardon him in this case. After all, he needed to know how and where Gao Yan managed to get those artifacts.
The emperor sent a voice transmission to Situ Bai.
'Leave him be. Instead, I want you to investigate that boy's background. I want to know where he came from and how he got those artifacts and secret weapons.'
Situ Bai nodded. He coughed and retreated from the stage.
"Fine. That was an accident. Continue the tournament!"
"…"
.
.
After the commotion, rogue cultivators among the spectators got excited. They whispered among themselves.
"That Florida Domain is quite something. They're backed by immortals for sure. Look at that lineup."
"Obviously, those immortals are elders in disguise. Emperor Yan conspires against Immortal Florida Man first. And now, Immortal Florida Man uses the same trick as them. It's karma, I say."
"Well-deserved karma, actually. This event is supposed to be exclusive for the youngsters and rising stars. But look at those people from the Jianghu Alliance. They are trying to bully a newly found sect backed by immortals. Now, they're paying the price."
"I wonder if I can join the Florida Domain. Do they accept new disciples?"
"Those weapons, though. Did you see the last attack? That energy sword seems deadly, too!"
After Gao Yan showed everybody his secret weapons, many rogue cultivators were interested in Leo's domain. His reputation slowly rose.
On the other hand, the imperial court faction was not happy. They gossiped, wondering what Yan Xiang was doing.
"Why hasn't the emperor arrested Gao Yan and disqualified Florida Man bastard? He could have done so, right?"
"He could have, but that might give a reason for other cultivators to rebel. Some of the orthodox sects are not happy with His Majesty's decision to embrace the unorthodox cultivators to the Jianghu Alliance."
"Naturally, fiendish cultivators and orthodox cultivators will always be enemies. It's because of those princes. Without those nasty princes and their cults, His Majesty would have been worshiped by all."
"Stop gossiping your lord! If you have the energy, go and suppress those rumors about Florida Man!"
Distrust and doubts filled the air as they started questioning Yan Xiang's actions. Still, they waited to see the tournament unfold as the winner of this tournament would write a new history.
Meanwhile, Tang Xuan and Tang Tian conversed.
"Father, why are you openly supporting Florida Man? Are we rebelling now?"
Tang Xuan stroked his beard. He gazed at Florida Man and confessed.
"We will do everything in our power to support Florida Domain and Immortal Florida Man. Time for our clan to recognize a new lord."
"But why? Haven't we served the Yan Empire for centuries? Why now?"
"If Yan Xiang were a decisive emperor, we would have continued serving him. But since he's been manipulated by his reputation and seeking revenge for the vain revenge, his sand castle empire will soon collapse. We have to jump ships now if we want to survive the turbulence."
"…"
Tang Tian still hesitated. He thought of his old friends, disciples, and mentors. However, only the faces of Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei showed up as they were the last people to remain with him when he needed their help.
Thinking of the Life Sword Sect and the Amazonian Sanctuary, Tang Tian gazed at Tiger Swordsman and Xu Nuan behind Leo. He then understood why his father chose Leo.
"It's their moral integrity, right?"
"…"
Tang Xuan bitterly smiled as the answer was off the mark. It was the strength and influence of Leo that Tang Xuan respected.
.
.
After Gao Yan's match ended, the second round of the tournament started.
Ivy got called to the stage first. Again, her opponent was a soul transformation cultivator from a major clan.
As soon as Ivy got on the stage, Yan Xiang activated his secret array underneath the platform.
Ivy flinched as she could sense her skin and bones getting older. She glanced at the referee to signal the match.
However, the referee suddenly paused and turned around to look at the emperor. He purposely delayed the match!
"Not good," Leo deeply frowned at Yan Xiang as he noticed Ivy's dark expression. He rushed toward the stage and got closer.
As soon as Leo got too close to the arena stage, his cancer cells screamed. His entire body got itchy as the rejuvenated cells and bones slowly lost their vigor.
"START THE MATCH, REF!!"
Leo slapped the floor, yelling at the referee.
However, the referee turned around and scolded Leo, "Noncontestant, please get away from the arena and stay in the permitted area! If you interfere with the match again, we will disqualify your team!"
"…"
Leo glared at Yan Xiang and the referee. He then checked Ivy's condition with his eyes.
Although Ivy's skin and face still looked young, signs of aging were apparent. Soon, she might look like an old woman.
'Damn cheaters.'
Leo grumbled and looked at the bottom of the platform. He then sniffed like a dog, hoping to find an irregular scent.
A few seconds later, Leo noticed a weird scent. It smelled like the tea of rejuvenation.
Leo had an idea what it was. However, as he couldn't openly interfere with the arenas, he turned around and returned to his spectator area.
He walked toward Cat, who was bored to death.
"Cat. There are weird things underneath the arenas. Can you dig the ground in secret and fetch them for me? When we return, I'll give you extra nom-nom."
"NOM-NOM MEOW?!"
Cat stopped being drowsy. She transformed into a humanoid dryad and stood in front of Leo with sparkling eyes.
"Yes. Nom-Nom Buffet."
"Meow <3"
Cat widely grinned. While standing still, her roots penetrated into the ground. Silently, she curled her roots and made her way to the foundation of all five arenas.

chapters.title: Chapter 164 Florida Man Killed Local Emperor And Two Princes As They Refused To Purchase His Fake Meds
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 164 – Florida Man Killed Local Emperor and Two Princes as They Refused to Purchase His Fake Meds
As Leo had suspected, Yan Xiang purposely delayed the match while he activated the talismans underneath the arena. He waited for the array to cancel the effects of rejuvenation tea.
"This should be checkmate. Once we expose his trickery, he will lose."
Nothing could go wrong with this plan. He believed he could force Leo to leave the country like this.
RUMBLE
Suddenly, the ground shook, and all five arena stages cracked. Then, the earthquake stopped.
"Huh?"
Yan Xiang frowned as he could no longer sense the talismans under the arena. He raised his index finger and pointed at one of them.
Nothing happened. Yan Xiang couldn't sense anything.
"What?!"
.
.
Cat retracted her roots and pulled out a stack of talismans. She passed them to Leo as she couldn't eat them.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
Leo rubbed her head with his hand. He stored the talismans in his storage ring, planning to eat them later. He then looked at Ivy, checking her condition.
Her complexion looked better. Although she looked slightly older, no one should be able to notice it since she was still covering her eyes with a black blindfold cloth.
As everything was under control, Leo shouted at Yan Xiang, "Why are you delaying the matches? We don't have all day!"
Yan Xiang bit his lower lip. As he realized that he couldn't use the talisman arrays to the fullest, he resumed the matches.
"…Proceed, referees."
.
.
The semi-final rounds were as Leo had predicted. Without Yan Xiang's trickery, Ivy, Marc, Esen, and Beatrice easily defeated their opponents. As for Gao Yan, he seemed to have an epiphany or enlightenment from the previous fight.
Before Gao Yan's match began, he readied his pistol while he switched on the energy sword with another hand. As soon as the referee signaled the match, Gao Yan shot his opponent without hesitation.
His next opponent was still a soul formation cultivator. As he came prepared, he managed to dodge the first bullet. Unfortunately, he didn't know that Gao Yan's gun was an automatic one.
BANG
The second bullet hit the cultivator's stomach. It wasn't fatal enough to kill. However, the opponent immediately gave up as he was afraid of the unknown effects of the bullet.
The semi-final round was over by noon. The next was the final match of each bracket.
Nothing changed in the final. The opponents of Esen and her subordinates forfeited before the fight.
However, Gao Yan faced another wall. His next opponent was none other than Yan Zhu.
.
.
Yan Zhu got on the same stage as Gao Yan. He also eyed the black pistol in his opponent's hand.
"Brat. Where did you get your weapons?"
Gao Yan slowly climbed on the stage. After reaching his position, he got into his personal combat stance – Gun and lightsaber in a different hand.
"None of your business, prince."
"If you sell them to me, I'll give you anything – spirit stones, cultivation resources, cultivation manuals, status, women, ANYTHING!"
"Not interested, thank you."
"I see. That's a shame. I'll pry it from your dead body, THEN!"
Without waiting for the referee to officially initiate the match, Yan Zhu pulled out a homemade pistol, which was preloaded with an essence stone. He aimed at Gao Yan's head and pulled the trigger!
"!!!"
Gao Yan was shocked when Yan Zhu pulled out a similar weapon. He swung the lightsaber at the incoming bullet.
The lightsaber contacted with the essence stone bullet. As soon as they touched, the essence stone exploded.
Mushroom flame and black smoke erupted. Half of the arena stage instantly vanished while the shockwave blast destroyed all watchtowers in the area. Some weak spectators were blown away like a ragdoll while court officials bellowed, summoning their dao avatars to protect them.
"HAHAHAHAHAHA!!"
Yan Zhu burst into laughter while he reloaded another essence stone. He aimed his gun at the middle of the flame.
"This is what you get for refusing my offer! Now, I'll be prying your weapons from your dead body! HAHAHAHA!"
Yan Zhu turned to the referee.
"Announce the result! The match has ended!"
The referee sweated profusely as Yan Zhu broke the rules. The former hadn't announced the start of the match yet, so the preemptive strike was a foul.
"Y-Your Highness, the match hasn't started yet."
"Are you blind?!" Yan Zhu yelled at the referee, who was an eunuch of the imperial court, "Finish the match. I've won!"
"Y-Y-Yes, Your Highness. Alright. The winner is-"
BANG
Before the eunuch referee could announce the result, a sacred wood bullet cut through the air and pierced through Yan Zhu's mouth. It broke his front teeth and exited through the back of his head.
The silhouette of Gao Yan got clearer. He walked out of the flame. His black suit was untouched. However, his skin was slightly red as it got a bit of burn.
Gao Yan readjusted his aim. He pulled the trigger and fired more rounds.
BANG
BANG
The second shot hit the center of Yan Zhu's forehead. The other pierced through the prince's left chest.
"…"
Yan Zhu was still smiling, but his body stiffened. He fell to the ground and stopped moving.
The spectators were in silence. Everything happened so fast that they didn't know how to react.
"Wait, what?!"
"T-The match hasn't even begun, but why?!"
No one understood what the prince and Gao Yan just did. Only Leo, his people, and Yan Xiang knew about the weapons.
Yan Xiang silently looked at the lifeless body of the third prince. He was neither sad nor angry. Instead, he was happy that Yan Zhu died. Because of Yan Zhu's death, he had a reason to take advantage of Leo.
The emperor announced, "Fighting before the signal is a violation. Both Yan Zhu and Gao Yan are disqualified from the tournament. Also, the last attack has been committed outside of the tournament event. It will be charged as murder. Arrest that man at once!"
Cultivators from Yan Xiang's faction moved. They descended and surrounded Gao Yan from all sides.
Leo deeply sighed. He tried his best to play nice, but he had enough of this nonsense. He warned Yan Xiang, "I assume this is a declaration of war, donkey emperor."
"Immortal Florida Man!" Yan Xiang pointed his finger at Leo, "Your team has violated the rules over and over again! Your team will be disqualified. No excuses this time! You will be expelled from this conti-"
BANG
Leo pulled out his pistol and pulled the trigger. The upgraded bullet hit Yan Xiang's forehead and exploded, shattering his brain everywhere. His headless body stood still for a moment before it fell to the ground.
"YOUR MAJESTY!!"
"EMPEROR YAN!!"
Yan Xiang's goons rushed to see their leader. But when they saw Yan Xiang's remaining head, they gulped.
WHOOM
Although Leo managed to destroy Yan Xiang's head, his soul was ejected from his body. Remaining as a spirit, Yan Xiang bellowed and ordered his people.
"Immortal Florida Man has attempted to assassinate me! People of the Yan Empire! THIS IS TREASON! THIS MEANS WAR!!"
Leo silently gazed at Yan Xiang's soul.
"Dafuq? How is he still alive?"
Esen crossed her arms and explained, "Quasi-immortals can detach their souls from their bodies before they die. If they manage to possess a new body in the remaining time, they can self-resurrect. I saw many immortals and quasi-immortals abusing this trick to escape death. Most of the time, they possessed and killed their descendants in the process."
"Talk about good parenting. Wow."
Yan Xiang acted as Esen had predicted. His soul vanished into Yan Luo's body. The latter screamed in shock as he was aware of this technique.
"FATHER, NOOOO!!"
It was too late for Yan Luo to realize. From the very beginning, Yan Xiang had been keeping his sons as spare bodies for him to self-resurrect.
Yan Luo's soul was absorbed into Yan Xiang's soul. Then, the emperor took over Yan Luo's body and instantly restored his cultivation base. Moreover, he gained a new power from Yan Luo's dantian.
RUMBLE
Because of the reincarnation technique, Yan Xiang's cultivation soared. His aura expanded, and his elemental Qi summoned clouds of heavenly tribulation.
Orange clouds covered the sky. Orange thunderbolts descended in front of Yan Xiang.
BOOM
The sudden appearance of orange tribulation thunderbolts scared the spectators and bystanders. Everybody fled the scene, ignoring Yan Xiang and the tournament.
Leo didn't know what to feel about the villain getting new powerups. He silently pointed his gun at Yan Xiang's new body. Then, he pulled the trigger.
BANG
PU!
Yan Xiang, who was still laughing like a lunatic, got hit in the head for the second time. His head exploded once again, and one of the orange thunderbolts hit his body.
BOOM
Yan Xiang's new body and soul were purged as the emperor attempted to advance to an Earth Celestial Immortal. The body and soul dissipated into dust, never to be reincarnated again.
As soon as Yan Xiang died, Esen frowned at Leo.
"That's quite rude of you. That man is about to face a heavenly tribulation. You're supposed to wait for him to finish. Anyway, you should have done this ages ago. What's stopping you?"
"…I just wanted customers. I guess I'm not suited to be a salesman."
"A salesman doesn't kill his customer."
"Too late."
Leo looked up. The orange clouds slowly dispersed as Yan Xiang died during the chaos.
"Let's go home. I think we're done here."
The yellow tattoos on Leo's forehead vanished as Yan Xiang was killed. There was no one to adhere to the agreement. Therefore, the contract was voided.
"What about the prizes?" Asked Esen.
"We'll take them on our way home. Let's send the kids to the bus first. Then, we can ransack this place."
Esen grinned and elbowed Leo's side to punish him for being unnecessarily protective.
Leo called Gao Yan over. Everybody ignored the city rules and flew back to the bus, which they had parked outside the city.
.
.
Situ Bai and Ouyang Ke were still affected by the emperor's death. They looked at each other for a moment. After seeing each other's white faces, they realized something important.
Without an emperor, their clans could rise. It was the time for their clans to mobilize their men to seize the capital city and plunder the palace's treasures.
All former servants of Yan Xiang dispersed. Although some of them were sad and shocked by the emperor's death, their greed guided them back to their headquarters to relay the news.
"The emperor is dead. It's time for changes."
Meanwhile, Tang Xuan was astonished by the abrupt chaos. In a flash, Yan Xiang, Yan Luo, and Yan Zhu died one after another. Tang Tian was also shocked. He was prepared for the Yan Clan's demise, but he didn't expect it to be this fast.
The two Tangs consulted each other.
"Father, this is chaos! The Situs and Ouyangs will bring their armies here soon. Their immortals will also be here. What should we do?!"
Tang Xuan closed his eyes and groaned, "We join forces with Immortal Florida Man. Go tell everybody in our clan and Sixth Element Sect to migrate to Magpie City."
"Y-Yes, father!"
Tang Tian and his men flew back to their clan's manor. As for Tang Xuan, he opened his eyes and followed Leo to his bus. He was determined to join Leo's side.

chapters.title: Chapter 165 Florida Man Broke Into Stranger’s House And Stole Garden Light Bulb
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 165 – Florida Man Broke into Stranger's House and Stole Garden Light Bulb
Gao Yan scratched his face. The fire slightly cooked his skin, but the damage wasn't severe. Though, his hairstyle turned into an afro because of the burn.
He felt nothing after he murdered Yan Zhu. After all, the third prince tried to kill him first.
After Leo dealt with the emperor, the crowd dispersed in every direction. Gao Yan took this opportunity to steal Yan Zhu's storage rings and his handmade pistol. He picked it up to get a closer look.
As Gao Yan had seen Leo's matchlock rifles, he was slightly familiar with the gun structures. Inspecting the gun, he realized its perks and its shortcomings.
The weapon depended on essence stones as the muzzle and the structure was off. The hammer looked like a makeshift arbalest without a string, which was used to artificially ignite the essence stone bullet forward. Overall, the gun looked like a metal pipe attached to a handle.
"What a lousy weapon."
As Gao Yan was aware of the firearm's firepower, he hated to see other cultivators using these godlike weapons. He clenched his fist and crushed the fake pistol.
After turning Yan Zhu's pistol into a metal scrap, Gao Yan turned around and walked toward Leo. However, the latter was busy chatting with Esen.
Unable to interrupt the seniors, Gao Yan turned to Tiger Swordsman. He presented Yan Zhu's storage rings to the elder.
"Elder Tiger, I got these rings from the prince. Could you pass it to Lord Florida Man?"
Tiger Swordsman was surprised that Gao Yan turned the items to him instead of keeping them to himself.
"Did you rob those from the prince?"
"Erm, yes."
"Then, why don't you keep them? You killed the prince, right? You can keep what you killed."
"But, err," Gao Yan looked behind him. He scanned the empty arenas and the carnage.
In the sky, a few cultivators still remained in the area, observing Leo and his team. Some rogue cultivators fixated on the corpses of Yan Xiang and Yan Luo as if they were vultures staring at their prey.
Gao Yan might be cowardly and naïve, but he wasn't stupid. He just openly robbed the prince in front of the crowd. Therefore, some of the cultivators in the sky might have a bad idea about him. Moreover, he didn't know if the rings stored something too precious that the other cultivators sought.
Instead of keeping the treasures and wealth, he might as well contribute something to Leo so that he could get another form of reward. In the future, Should those cultivators capture and ask Gao Yan about the rings, he could just tell them that Leo had them.
"I'm still too weak. Keeping something precious with me is like a child wearing a gold necklace and waltzing into a slum area."
Tiger Swordsman chuckled and smacked Gao Yan's back, "You fool. Your weapons are definitely more precious than those rings. You have a weapon that can easily kill a soul formation cultivator and negate their dao avatar's attacks. That alone warrants a bounty on your head. It's too late, now."
"Eh?!"
"Seriously, if I were one of them, I would have memorized your face, too. You got a target on your back, boy."
"…"
Gao Yan's eyes were teary. He then turned around to look at Xu Nuan, Yao Qiqi, and others.
The girls gathered around Gao Yan to soothe him. One of the tamer girls coyly hugged his arm.
"Senior Brother Gao, you might not know, but the girls in the dorm have been talking about you. They said that you're the hottest disciple of Florida Domain, you know?"
"W-What?"
"Lord Florida Man and Elder Wu Buyi favor you. You receive not one but TWO precious artifacts from Lord Florida Man! Everybody is calling you a golden bachelor!"
"…"
"Say, do you have a girlfriend?"
Thora immediately coughed and glared at the tamer girl. Unfortunately, the tamer girl couldn't see Thora. Only Yao Qiqi could see her.
Yao Qiqi looked back and forth between Thora and Gao Yan. Then, she warned her sisters.
"Senior Brother Gao Yan already has a girlfriend."
"EH?!"
The tamer girls were stunned for a moment. A few seconds later, they squealed as they got a new scoop.
"Who is his girlfriend?!"
"Not telling." Yao Qiqi laughed.
"Boo!"
The disciples laughed and cheered as the tension died down. Tiger Swordsman and Xu Nuan were also relieved as everything went well for their faction.
The only thing that troubled them was the aftermath. Without Yan Xiang and his sons, the entire continent would become lawless. Orthodox sects and unorthodox cults would break their peace treaty and start a new war. They wondered what Leo would do in this situation.
.
Leo stopped chatting with Esen. He turned around and ordered the crew.
"Tiger, Xu Nuan, you two escort the boy and girls back to the bus. Cat, Ivy, Beatrice, Marc, you are the only capable fighters here. Protect them while they are on their way back and wait for me there."
Tiger Swordsman nodded, "What about you, my lord?"
"I and this brat are going shopping. The daddy will come home late. Wait for me at the bus."
"…Alright, my lord."
Yao Qiqi blinked several times before she looked at Esen. She had a funny feeling about both Leo and Esen.
"Lord Florida Man, if you're the daddy, who's the mommy?"
"…"
Everybody but Leo instantly turned toward Esen. For some reason, both of them had a similar air, and they seemed close.
Leo caught on to their weird look. He shut down their fantasies.
"I ain't dating her in this lifetime. She's flat like paper. What's the point of licking a board? I want real milkers, not sunny-side eggs!"
"YOU WHAT?!"
Esen was offended. She glared at Leo and kicked his leg. Again, she ended up hurting herself.
"DAMMIT, YOU MONSTER!"
Leo cackled and pressed his hand on her head, bullying her again even though she looked like a proper teenager. He leaped forward and vanished into the city.
Esen screeched in anger. She flew and chased after Leo, wanting to get back at him.
.
.
Leo and Esen arrived at Yan Xiang's palace. As soon as they landed, they found a chaotic scene.
A hundred eunuchs and servants were already corpses. Cultivators from unknown clans summoned their dao avatars and randomly attacked various buildings. Sounds of women's screams came from everywhere.
"Wow," Leo was astonished.
"Don't look away. You did this," Esen snickered and mocked Leo.
"I guess even a crooked emperor can be a pillar of a country."
"This is more like a thief's den. Without a leader, thieves fight among themselves for their loot. All cultivators are a bunch of thieves, scavengers, tomb robbers, and bandits. If you look at them carefully, you will realize that they are all jobless. Some of them are even homeless! Commoners work for food while cultivators only steal from others. Tell me which one is better."
"…That's rude."
"It's a fact!"
Leo stopped arguing with Esen. As nobody picked a fight with them, Leo rushed into the throne room where he had met Yan Xiang for the first time.
From Leo's memory, behind the throne room were usually the chambers of the emperor and their bodyguards. Sometimes, their concubines and children resided there for safety. If one wished to find something valuable from the emperor, one had to search the emperor's bedroom first.
Sprinting to the throne room, he came across more dead bodies. Most of them were the palace guards, who were all 6th-stage cultivators. A few soul formation cultivators and eunuchs also died here.
The wounds of the corpses came from sword wounds. The cut was so clean that it looked like someone killed them with one attack.
Leo had a bad feeling about this, but he proceeded forward. Esen also followed after him.
The palace layout and structure were as Leo had predicted. Behind the throne room was a series of residential areas for Yan Xiang and his concubines. Small rooms within the palace were given to eunuchs, whose corpses were inside every room.
As Leo kept proceeding further, he noticed a person in the Fatui Cult's uniform carrying a woman on his shoulder. As the cultist turned around, his eyes met with Leo's.
"Ah, pillager."
For the sake of not wasting a bullet, Leo kicked the ground and instantly appeared in front of the cultist.
"WHAT?!"
The cultist was a soul transformation cultivator, who wasn't present when Leo raided its HQ. He thought that he could sneak into the palace during the chaos and snatch some riches that Yan Xiang had left behind. But in the end, he only managed to secure a pretty concubine of Yan Xiang to be his wife.
It was too late for the cultist to have a wife. As soon as Leo got in front of the hooded cultist, he kicked the guy to the nuts.
CRACK
Not only the balls were broken, the cultist's pelvis was shattered to pieces. The impact was so severe that it dislocated the cultist's spinal cord and crushed his innards.
Unsatisfied with the light injuries, Leo gave him a love tap with a jab to the face.
PLOP
Like a shattering watermelon hit by a hammer, the cultist's skull and head got blasted to pieces. Pink and white flesh came out, splattering the hallway.
The concubine girl fell from the cultist's shoulder. She trembled and looked up in fright.
Leo silently glanced at her, "Go."
"!!!"
The woman tried to stand and run, but her legs gave in. She wet her skirt while she trembled in panic.
Leo shook his head and squatted. He looked at the woman's face and asked her.
"Want me to help you?"
The woman heavily nodded while she cried.
Upon looking at the woman's face closer, Leo realized that she was a beauty. Although her long wet messy hair covered half of her face, her eyes, nose, mouth, and facial outline were similar to Lisa from Black Pink.
Unfortunately, this girl's asset was undesirable for Leo's standard. He glanced down for a moment before he marked her as unwanted.
"Tell me where the emperor keeps his treasure, and I'll bring you out of this place."
The woman gulped. She then raised her trembling arm and pointed at a big room that Leo had ignored.
"T-T-The library. T-There's a secret room underground. I don't know where and how to get there, but I know there's one for an emergency."
"Good job."
Leo widely grinned and turned around. He ordered Esen, "Bring this woman out of this city for me."
"What? Why should I?" Esen was annoyed.
"If I touch her, she's dead. You know that my body is special, right?"
Esen narrowed her eyes and scoffed, "Fine, you monster. Half of the treasures you find belong to me, alright?!"
"Deal."
Esen grumblingly walked toward the woman. She carried her on her shoulders in a fireman carry style. Then, she flew away from the palace. However, instead of bringing the concubine outside the city, she brought the woman to Leo's bus.
After Esen had left, Leo proceeded to the library.
.
.
In the library, everything was a mess. Scrolls, books, and papers were scattered everywhere as cultivators had already searched this place for cultivation manuals. Unfortunately for them, this place only stored government documents.
Leo toured the library for a few minutes. As all books and scrolls were already on the ground, all shelves were empty. There was no sign of a book-lever mechanism in here.
As Leo couldn't find the secret passage, he started using his other senses. He began sniffing like a police dog.
The room was filled with bamboo and papyrus-like odor. Leo's nostril ached after he inhaled too much small paper powder and dust.
A few minutes later, Leo sensed cold air from the floor and the wall. There were two spots that he detected.
Leo walked toward the north wall. In front of the wall was a series of empty bookshelves. As Leo didn't need the shelves anymore, he pulled the shelf away and hit the wall with his fist.
BOOM
The wall exploded and collapsed, revealing a secret corridor.
"There you go."
The pathway was a narrow stairway to an underground passage. However, Leo sniffed the air and frowned.
The air smelled like iron and sour sweat. It was fresh. From Leo's experience, this scent indicated fresh corpses and people who had never taken a bath for centuries.
Since the destination reeked of blood, Leo turned away from the secret passage. He walked toward the second area.
In front of Leo was a golden pillar. It was located at the center of the library. Strangely, no bookshelf was in the way.
Leo smirked and touched the pillar. He stored the entire thing in his spatial ring.
RUMBLE
The ceiling caved in a little. However, without a pillar, the ladder to another underground area was visible.
Leo looked down and sniffed again. This time, he detected the scent of plants and medical herbs. Moreover, strange Qi came out from the underground area.
"This is the one!"
Leo jumped down the hole.
Upon reaching the bottom, Leo saw a bright light. There was another passage to a bright room.
Leo entered the room. Upon reaching his destination, he was greeted by a large underground garden of medical herbs.
On the left side, Leo found hundreds of ginseng and mandrakes. On the right, a dozen shelves were full of glass bottles of medical pills.
However, at the center of the room, there was an altar.
Leo's eyes were attracted to the pedestal at the center of the room. He walked closer to check the glowing orb on the pedestal.
As soon as Leo got closer, his system reacted.
<Detecting Earth Fate Crystal!>
<A new mission has been generated.>

chapters.title: Chapter 166 Florida Man Infiltrating Stranger’s Storeroom Assaulted By Another Burglar. One Burglar Killed.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 166 – Florida Man Infiltrating Stranger's Storeroom Assaulted by Another Burglar. One Burglar Killed.
"Oh, a quest, finally?"
Leo rubbed his hands and waited for his system to show him the details.
.
Fate Crystal Tutorial
Fate Crystals are profound artifacts that created the universe. By collecting at least seven fate crystals of the same quality, the collector can gain new strength, depending on the crystal's quality.
Earth Fate Crystals are useless to you. However, it will be nice to collect them for future usage. Maybe someone around you can find them useful?
Be warned. You are not the only one who searches for these crystals. There will be competitors, and they are not your run-in-a-mill pushovers.
Primary Objectives:
1 - Collect 7 Earth Fate Crystals (0/7)
2 – Assemble 7 Earth Fate Crystals (0/1)
Secondary Objectives:
1 – Kill 7 Immortals (0/7)
2 – Upgrade Humble General Store to Shopping Mall (0/1)
Primary Mission Rewards: Gnosis of Earth Fate, True Earth Fate Crystal, Ring of Entity Upgrade Feature
Secondary Mission Rewards: 7 Lucky Draws, 777 Free Tickets
.
Leo paused for a moment. He silently screamed in his mind.
'A freaking tutorial?! NOW AFTER ALL THESE YEARS?!'
His bloodshot eyes stared at the floating window and his alien ring. He had a thousand words to curse at the system for giving him a random tutorial quest.
Leo had once wished for the system to give him quests when he was on Earth, yet it never responded to his call. Only after Leo started spending his lifespan for new features, quests appeared.
'Dammit! I should have stayed on Earth and played with the system instead of transmigrating! I could have established a solitude paradise while I watch some live Godzilla porn on a dusty beach.'
After coming to this world, Leo missed the days when he killed time by watching some random mutated monsters humping each other even though they were male. He still remembered how a male Godzilla excreted a massive egg of its offspring, which Leo proceeded to kill the parent and cooked the egg for dinner.
Aside from the hometown's nostalgia, Leo had another issue in life. He didn't have a proper hobby or a source of entertainment.
This quest came at a good time. Leo was interested in these new side missions and the lore of fate crystals. Although he had learned it from the statues at home, it felt nice to learn them from another place.
"I didn't know they could be merged. Welp, a new hobby, I guess."
Leo reached to grab the crystal on the pedestal. As soon as he touched it, it slipped from Leo's hand and vanished into his alien ring.
DING
<You have collected one Earth Fate Crystal!>
The quest window updated its quest progress.
.
Primary Objectives:
1 - Collect 7 Earth Fate Crystals (1/7)
2 – Assemble 7 Earth Fate Crystals (0/1)
.
It felt like a game. Leo was satisfied. Still, he realized a new issue.
He had no idea where the other fate crystals were. The system never provided him any hint.
"Erm, my system. Where is the second or third crystal?"
The system didn't respond.
Unable to get feedback, Leo stopped worrying about it. He turned around and prepared to leave.
As soon as Leo turned around, he noticed a shadow of an adult man, approaching the secret ladder passage. As the crystal was gone, the room was dark, and the mysterious man's shadow blocked all light from above.
The mysterious man jumped down into the secret room. After landing, he vanished and reappeared in front of Leo as if he could teleport.
Leo narrowed his eyes as he had seen this technique before. These movements were the same as Situ Nantian. However, this man looked different.
Before Leo could get a good look at the stranger's face, the latter swung his sword at Leo's neck.
CLINK
The sword hit, but it couldn't cut through his skin.
The assailant widened his eyes in shock. He pulled his sword and took two steps back. Then, he vanished again. This time, he reappeared behind Leo.
The assailant's body turned into an orange humanoid flame. His sword also merged with his body. Using his element physique, he reattempted to cut Leo's neck.
Without looking back, Leo raised his hand and blocked the flame sword.
CLANK
The flame sword hit Leo's palm. Again, Leo was unharmed.
"…"
Leo slowly turned around. He caught the sword and yanked the weapon forward.
The mysterious swordsman let go of his flame sword. It instantly vanished and reappeared in the swordsman's hand.
Leo blankly looked at his hand. He raised his eyebrows in confusion for a moment. Then, he turned around to face the guy.
"Dude, what's your problem?"
The swordsman didn't answer. He stared at Leo in solemn.
As Leo finally got to see the assailant's face clearly, he was slightly surprised. The swordsman looked like a fire elemental spirit in games.
"You…" The swordsman uttered, "Hand over the fate crystal, or else!"
Stunned, Leo raised his brow. Upon realizing that the guy was the "Rival" that system once mentioned, Leo smirked.
"Over my dead body. Come and get it."
"As you wish!"
The mysterious swordsman vanished again. A second later, he emerged from the ground below Leo. He flew up and thrust his flame sword at Leo's bottom.
Nothing offended Leo more than a low blow. He stomped on the stranger's shoulder.
Leo's right leg turned red, and black red cracked. As soon as Leo stomped the emerging guy on this shoulder, the flame physique of the swordsman shattered.
The swordsman's real body appeared from the shattering flame. His left shoulder and his left arm were missing after the strike. Despite the lost arm, he glared at Leo.
A second later, his left arm and shoulder regenerated. Again, an orange flame came out from the man.
"I see. You're an immortal, too."
Hearing the stranger's words, Leo widely grinned. As the quest demanded him to kill seven immortals, this guy came at the right time.
"Hey, dude. Don't ever think of fleeing. Come here."
"Tsk!"
The mysterious immortal kicked the ground and retreated toward the ladder.
Leo laughed and pursued. But instead of heading toward the ladder, he jumped and punched the ceiling, breaking the ground, and came out from the underground level.
The ground collapsed along with the palace. Leo's body pushed through the collapsing debris and emerged from the falling palace.
The mysterious immortal also managed to escape, but he floated 50 meters in the sky. He looked down on Leo.
"No matter what your real cultivation base is, you can't defeat me!"
The swordsman bellowed and transformed into a flame spirit again. He then shouted.
"DAO DOMAIN!"
An orange dome appeared and covered both Leo and the swordsman. It rose 100 meters high and sealed everything within a 300-meter radius.
Leo's system also warned him.
<Warning! Detecting Foreign Domain!>
<Identifying the domain…>
.
Domain of Orange Flame
Effects: Burn everybody with orange tribulation flame except the caster. As long as the caster is within the domain, he can recover his health and injuries instantly.
Note: Due to the limitation of the mortal world, the flame's effectiveness is decreased by 90%.
.
"Huh?"
Leo pursed his lips. This was his first time seeing the system's messages about an opponent's abilities. Reading the effects, Leo was fascinated and interested.
"Wow. This is like a game. It has a condition, too?"
The swordsman scoffed at Leo. He pointed his sword and taunted him.
"Summon your domain, old man! I know you're in disguise like me. Don't be a coward and use your dao domain!"
"…What?"
Leo was puzzled about the dao domain. He tilted his head and rubbed his alien ring to summon a certain someone.
Leo's dao avatar came out. The green spirit yawned and frowned at Leo.
'What do you want?'
Leo pointed at the immortal in the sky, "Teach me about the dao domain. What is a dao domain?"
The avatar deeply sighed. He taught Leo.
'Dao domains are the manifestation of one's dao. It's one of many abilities of immortals. For example, if your dao is related to lightning, you can manifest a "Domain Dome" that acts as your territory. In that territory, your dao will come to life and help you defeat your opponents.'
"I still don't get it."
The avatar shrugged, 'Fine. Lend me some Qi, a lot of Qi, actually. My power is related to evolution and mutation, so don't expect much.'
"Sure."
Not understanding what a dao domain really was, Leo transferred his Qi to the green spirit behind him.
Absorbing Leo's Qi and essence, the green dao avatar turned black. He merged with Leo, and a black dome overlapped with the orange one.
The black dome continued expanding until it was bigger than the orange swordsman. The latter widened his eyes and gazed at the black dome in shock.
"W-Wait a minute. You're not an Earth Celestial! You're a dei-"
The flame swordsman stopped speaking mid-sentence. His orange domain shattered, and he fell to the ground. At the same time, Leo received a system message.
<You have deployed Domain of Genes.>
<All hostile foes within the domain will mutate randomly. Regular plants, vegetables, and living organisms within the domain will either evolve or mutate depending on their traits and genes.>
"???"
The effects sounded strange and useless. Leo lowered his head in disappointment.
"I thought my domain would be something amazing, like getting nine million status points or something. What a letdown."
Leo didn't notice that the immortal swordsman squirmed in pain on the ground. His body swelled and disfigured as his muscle mass and fat expanded. His head bloated for five seconds and then exploded like a shattered balloon, scattering his brain and flesh everywhere.
A piece of white brain landed on Leo's left cheek. He clicked his tongue in disgust before he swatted the flesh away.
"Yuck! Dammit. I ain't Hannibal Lecter or zombies. I don't eat brains!"
Leo's dao avatar deactivated the domain. He came out from Leo's body for a moment and taught Leo.
'That was an effect of my dao domain. If you feed me more Qi, I can expand the domain range wider. Also, if you realize more dao, you can have more abilities.'
"Oh, neat. I thought I was OP AF, but I can still get stronger, eh?"
'…Don't be overconfident. Your martial art skills are dog crap. Learn some moves!'
The avatar vanished into Leo's ring afterward.
Leo blinked several times before he understood why his supporting spirit dissed him. He smacked his forehead.
"Welp. I guess I have to adapt to this world's culture. Anyway…"
Leo walked toward the squirming flesh. Even though it lost its head, the flesh was still alive.
"I guess I get another source of yin fluid. I hope Cat won't steal this from me."
Leo carried the bloated corpse on his shoulder even though it hadn't finished mutating. Black blood got on his suit and shirt, but Leo ignored it.
With a corpse in tow, Leo returned to the battle bus, heading home.
.
.
DING
<You have killed an immortal!>
.
Secondary Objectives:
1 – Kill 7 Immortals (1/7)
2 – Upgrade Humble General Store to Shopping Mall (0/1)

chapters.title: Chapter 167 Florida Man Builds Ramps On Public Parking Lot Rooftop To Complete IRL GTA Stunt Jump Achievements
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 167 – Florida Man Builds Ramps on Public Parking Lot Rooftop to Complete IRL GTA Stunt Jump Achievements
Leo came back to the bus unhindered. As for the corpse, he had already stored it in his spatial ring as the immortal was already dead.
Upon coming back, Leo found his people waiting for him near the bus. As Leo was the only one who could open the bus, they couldn't get inside.
In addition, a few fresh corpses were nearby. Some of their blood splashed on the bus's windows. Cat was also busy eating some of them. Noticeably, Marc's bastard sword had some bloodstain on it, and Beatrice was busy dissecting one of the corpses.
Esen was tired of waiting. She pointed at the bus's door and complained.
"Open na noor!"
"…"
Leo held back his laughter. She sounded drunk because of her boredom.
"What the hell happened here?" Asked Leo.
Esen crossed her arms and snorted, "Some idiots tried to rob the bus. Cat and my servants cleaned up the mess."
"Oh, nice, but…" Leo looked at Beatrice. The silent blindfolded girl extracted something from a corpse and flickered it toward Ivy. The latter caught it and cleaned it with her water Qi. Then, she offered it to Esen.
"My lady. Another one."
