"Thanks!" Esen giggled and took the little marble. She was about to pop it into her mouth, but she glanced at Leo. Seeing his curious look, she paused for a moment.
"Want one?" Asked Esen.
"What's that?"
"A cultivator's crystalized dantian. It's very rich in Qi."
Leo flinched, "No, thanks. Again, I'm not Hannibal Lecter. I don't partake in cannibalism."
"Suit yourself."
Esen shrugged and tossed it into her mouth. She chewed it.
CRUNCH
The crunching sound was the same as when someone chewed a hard candy. Leo's teeth itched by just listening to the noise.
As everybody was there, Leo unlocked the shuttle bus's door and opened it. After unlocking the door, he invited the others to get in.
"Let's go home. Oh, as for the corpses, store them in your rings if you have any. Don't waste your time here."
The group happily entered the bus. Cat, Taxi, and Ricardo transformed into a human and got on as well.
Gao Yan was the last one to enter the bus before Leo. As he was about to enter, he looked at Leo and asked.
"Senior, sir."
"Yeah?"
"Instead of sleeping in that abandoned courtyard, wouldn't it be better if we parked the ship in the yard and rest in the ship instead yesterday?"
"…"
Leo silently facepalmed. He thought about it as well, and he regretted not parking the bus in the courtyard.
Since lamenting for the mistake wouldn't improve his life, Leo chased Gao Yan onto the bus.
"Just get in!"
"Y-Yes, sir!"
.
.
Half a day later, Leo's group arrived home. He properly landed the bus on the west runway and taxied his vehicle back to the general store.
When everybody arrived, the group was reluctant to get off. After all, the bus was too comfortable to live in. They wished they could use the bus as a resident.
"Hey, geezer!" Esen yelled from the back of the bus, "Can I and my people live here instead of that shabby house?"
Xu Nuan and Tiger Swordsman gulped as they also had the same idea. They gazed at Leo, hoping for a positive answer.
Leo rolled his eyes as he had predicted it. But then, he was inspired.
He remembered that he hadn't built a parking lot yet. In addition, Leo could fill the parking lot with upgraded motorhome coaches to house his workers. The prices of the upgrades and the vehicles were also about the same as the apartment building. Therefore, he had some free residential buildings he could use.
"Alright. Since you want it that much, I'll give it to you for one condition."
Esen's eyes gleamed in excitement. Xu Nuan and Tiger Swordsman's ears also widened.
"What is the condition?"
Leo smirked, "You have virgin yin while I have virgin yang. I need some of your blood for alchemy. Every month, I want you to pay rent with your blood."
Esen's expression turned solemn. She let out a short sigh of relief, "For a moment there, I thought you would ask for my virginity or something."
"I ain't a sex-depraved virgin. I'm a cultured stoic super alpha male of my species. I need no women!"
"…But you're a pervert that dreams for big boobas."
"That's too. I have an on-and-off switch!"
"…"
"Back to the deal, can you pay rent with your blood?"
"…Fine with me. How much do you need?"
"Not much. Just this much."
Leo laughed and purchased a plastic water gallon from his system shop.
As soon as the gallon came out, Xu Nuan and others sweated profusely while Esen's face turned dark.
That was a gallon!
Esen yelled at Leo in frustration, "Are you a vampire or something?! Why do you take so much?! Are you trying to bleed me to death?!"
Leo scoffed, "I can't collect your lifespan. What else can you give me if it's not your virgin yin blood?"
Esen puffed her chest, "Of course, you can get my loyalty. But if you're kinky, you can have me as well."
"I'd rather hump a sexy tree than hump a corpse. No, thanks."
"BASTARD!"
Esen teleported in front of Leo and kicked him to the nuts. Unfortunately, his precious jewels were too hard, and she hurt her feet once again.
Leo cackled and exited the bus, leaving the annoying elf behind. Meanwhile, Esen realized that she had been bullied again. She swore that she would get back at him one day.
Ivy came out from her room to console her master. She patted her back.
"Master, other couples sometimes quarrel and end up in physical abuse. In your case, Lord Florida Man didn't even try to hurt you, but you hurt yourself. I'm sure he cares for you."
"WHO SAID WE'RE COUPLES?!" Esen screeched at Ivy.
"Aren't you dao companions? You and him smell the same for some reason."
"…Same smell? Me?" Esen sniffed her armpit.
"Aren't you staying in his cabin? A man and woman staying in the same bedroom, if you are not his dao companion, why are you staying in his bedroom?"
"…"
Finally, Esen realized the cause of the misunderstandings. Esen turned around, hiding her red face. She teleported back into Leo's cabin at the back of the bus.
The crowd on the bus saw everything. The tamer girls quietly squealed as they got a new scoop. Xu Nuan and Tiger Swordsman shook their heads and got off the bus. As for Esen's servants, they remained there.
Cat, Taxi, and Ricardo were indifferent on the matter. They rushed out of the bus and reverted to their monster appearances. The trio stretched and relaxed.
"SMASH!" Taxi dashed back to his barn.
"…Smash." Ricardo nodded at Cat and returned to his group as well.
"Nom-Nom Meow <3"
Cat turned toward the granaries. Like a menacing giant spider, she crept on top of the general store and leaped toward the food storage to plunder Leo's crops once again.
.
.
After getting out of the bus, Leo put his idea to work. He opened the domain system menu and purchased the parking lot.
.
Parking Lot
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 8
Price – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 30 x 30
.
This structure had been sitting in his system for a while, but Leo had been ignoring it. As he could use this to his advantage, he built it right away.
Leo placed the parking lot west of the clothing store as the west area was empty. The 30 x 30 grits transformed into a flatland.
Not satisfied with the appearance, Leo upgraded it to level 9. Then, the structure changed.
Instead of an empty parking lot, a new building appeared on top of the flatland. It was a parking lot building.
Leo frowned as he didn't expect this. He got closer to check the ceiling height as his battle bus might not fit in there.
Fortunately, Leo's worry was pointless. The ceiling was 10 meters tall, a lot taller than standard parking lot buildings in the modern world. Moreover, it was more spacious than its outward appearance.
Leo entered the building and noticed a massive space inside. At a glance, the space should be more than 3,000 sq/m. Moreover, there were only four pillars, which was unusual.
Seeing such a wide space, Leo was delighted. He rushed back to the bus and drove it to the parking lot. But then, he came across an issue.
There was no guideline or drawn lines to indicate the rooms.
Since it was a blank building, Leo had no choice but to use his own judgment. As a civilized man from the modern world, he looked for a parking space for handicapped people.
Of course, he couldn't find any.
As Leo couldn't find any yellow line, he designed to be pragmatic and calculative. He drove the bus to the top floor.
The parking lot building came with 9 levels. It took Leo a while to navigate the huge bus up the road. Fortunately, the slops were big enough for buses and giant trucks.
After getting to the top floor, Leo chose the corner-most area and lined the bus along with the edge, facing the door toward the center of the building.
His job was finished. Next, Leo began scouting the area.
As Leo looked around, he was surprised once again. The top of the parking lot was the same size as its outward appearance. Thus, there was less space than the interior of the building.
Looking at the scenery from the rooftop, Leo remembered something. He rushed back into the bus and drove it to the 8th floor instead. Then, he parked it at the edge of the floor to save space.
After getting out, Leo rushed to the top floor. He then searched for a metal ramp that he could set on this building.
He wasn't disappointed. There were plenty, and Leo managed to pick the right one. He fit one to the south barrier of the rooftop and nodded in satisfaction.
With the ramp, he could drive a bike and land on the south farm to complete a rare stunt trick.
The South ramp wasn't enough. Leo added another one to the west so that he could drive something to the empty area. Then, he looked at the east, where the clothing store and his general store were.
Adding one to that area was a stupid idea. Leo didn't want any employee to have a funny idea and crash a car into his shopping mall.
"A parking space's rooftop isn't completed without a ramp! Now, what should I do with the limited space here? I need a longer road for a bike or a supercar to get some speed…"
Leo wondered if he could build an adjacent building to become an elevated road or a runway. Because of the distraction and his incurable ADHD, he forgot about the fate crystal quest for the entire day.
.
.
Far west, ten kilometers away from Yan Empire's west coast, a white-haired burly elderly man hovered over the ocean, gazing at the fading defensive array of the continent. He wore tiger skin as clothes, and he had four arms instead of two.
The old man crossed his lower arms while his upper arms stretched forward. He widely grinned, anticipating chaos and opportunities.
"Finally, Yan Xiang's petty array is down. I guess Flame Blade Immortal has already found the fate crystal. It's about time for me to make my moves."
The old man whistled. A few seconds later, a massive portal appeared behind him, and ten thousand cultivators came out from the other side. All cultivators had four arms like the old man, and their average strength was in the soul transformation stage. Over a hundred of them were quasi-immortals.
As for the old man, his rainbow aura and air were similar to the flame swordsman that Leo had encountered. He was an earth celestial immortal disguised as a quasi-immortal cultivator.
Without looking at his comrades, the old man announced.
"We, the Gorr Tribe, have been hiding for 500 years because of Situ Nantian and Yan Xiang! They intentionally developed sweet dream mushrooms and planted them in our territory! Because of those mushrooms and those cowards, we were driven out of this planet. Wait no more, my brethren! Yan Xiang's precious jewel, the Earth Fate Crystal, has fallen into our hands! We will avenge our fallen comrades and show our appreciation for forcing us to grow in the demon realm!"
The cultivators behind the old man roared like savage beasts. Their iris and pupils were ignited, emitting orange flame. Yellow tribulation flame came out from their pores as they were ready for combat.
The old man pointed in front of him.
"CHARGE! TAKE BACK OUR DOMAIN! KILL EVERYBODY!"

chapters.title: Chapter 168 100 SQ/M Clothing Store Building Abducted By Florida Man’s UFO
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 168 – 100 SQ/M Clothing Store Building Abducted by Florida Man's UFO
The new parking lot building caught the attention of the workers. Teenagers gathered around it while Wu Buyi and the elders entered the building to explore.
As usual, they found another building with a massive space. They were no longer surprised.
"Again, the spatial distortion array," Wu Buyi shrugged and left the building.
Han Hao and Han Meng continued to explore the building. They reached the 8th floor, where Leo had parked his battle bus there.
"Oh, it's here. I guess this will be where Lord Florida Man keeps his flying ships. Well, what's on the next floor?" Han Hao saw the bus and proceeded to the rooftop. Han Meng also followed after his father.
Upon getting to the rooftop, they found a real-sized parking lot space and two ramps. As for Leo, he was no longer there.
"Slopes?" Han Meng inspected the south ramp and touched its surface. It was smooth and hard.
Han Hao also checked the west ramp. He crossed his arms in confusion.
"What are these for?"
"Who knows?"
"…"
These people never had a slider when they were young. Thus, they lacked imagination. As they lost interest, they leaped down from the building and returned to their duties.
A few minutes later, Leo came back from the junkyard, carrying two long logs. He placed it vertically, measuring if it could reach the top floor.
Unfortunately, it was too short.
"Bah. I guess I have to use another method. What to do…?"
Leo planned to extend the rooftop so that a stunt car could race on it. But since this project was complicated, Leo paused to think. He imagined steel rods, which were commonly used to weave a foundation of a mega project construction.
He looked at the iron pine log. Although it had strong durability and toughness, Leo wasn't confident that they could replace the modern steel rods. After all, they were vulnerable to fire.
"I have to upgrade the logs and wood somehow. But if I want to do that, I have to upgrade my alchemy workshops to enable more cauldrons. To upgrade those, I have to upgrade my store to level 10…"
Leo narrowed his eyes. He gazed at his general store building.
"No choice, eh? Oh, right. Didn't I have a new ability?"
Leo thought of his dao avatar's ability – The Domain of Genes. As it only affected hostile people, he could use it to replace the default mechanism of the store.
After making the decision, Leo entered the general store and warned the workers inside, who were resting on the third floor. He forced them to pack their belongings and wait in front of the store.
The confused teens and young men gathered their stuff and exited the building through the front door as requested. Then, they gathered in groups, waiting to see what Leo would do to the building.
After everybody had left, Leo didn't upgrade the building right away. Instead, he came out of the building and called the people to follow him to the parking lot.
The group proceeded to the sixth floor of the parking lot. Then, Leo opened his online shopping menu. He input keywords.
Recreational Vehicle, aka RV
DING
Vans, trucks, trailers, buses, coaches, and motorhome accessories showed up in Leo's menu. He sorted and filtered the list before he chose a brand new Mercedes Sprinter Camper Edition, which cost only 100 years of lifespan.
WHOOSH
A black luxurious van appeared in front of Leo. He smirked and touched it. As usual, he ordered his system in his mind.
'Upgrade it.'
DING
The upgrading fee was the same as its price tag. After upgrading it to level 9, Leo only spent 900 YOL, including the van.
The vehicle slightly transformed. Its paint reflected the light like a mirror, and Leo could see himself from the reflection. The tires and the van's width were slightly bigger. The black windows glittered as they absorbed the sunlight to generate Qi for the vehicle.
Leo slid open the van's door to check the interior.
Instead of seeing a compact camping van with luxurious seats, Leo found a specious 100 square meter room inside. It featured a kitchen, a refrigerator, a washing machine, two bathrooms, a living room, and two bedrooms. Every room was fully furnished.  The flooring came with basic laminated wood, which looked easy to clean and maintain. Similar to Leo's bus, the driver's cockpit was separated from the living area.
Leo hopped inside. Although he was inside a van, he no longer needed to crouch as the ceiling was 2.5 meters high. He checked the bedrooms next.
Instead of finding a foldable bed, Leo found a bunk bed for two, two desks, and two closets. The room was as big as a studio room apartment. Leo checked the other room and saw the same interior. He was satisfied.
"Four people? Okay, that will work."
Leo got out of the van. Upon getting out, the crowd gazed at him in anticipation.
"I'm reallocating everybody's residents. You will no longer stay in my shopping mall anymore. Instead, I'll let you live in these vehicles that I'm about to build! Well, first… I need to park this thing properly."
Leo got back to the van and parked it at the north edge of the building.
"Group up into a team of four!"
The young disciples looked at each other and began forming teams. It didn't take long for hundreds of youngsters to form groups.
Leo picked the nearest group of four and pointed at the van.
"This is your new home. Take your belongings in there and choose your room. Also, you are responsible for your own rooms and van. If it gets dirty, it's on you!"
The four chosen youngsters were excited. They brought their belongings into the camping RV to see the inside. Upon seeing the interior, they weren't disappointed.
"Wow."
"Holy…"
Leo frowned at their reaction. He remembered something. Walking back into the van, Leo pulled the car's key. He stared hard at it while he ordered his cancer cells.
'Duplicate this thing for me. Use the metal Qi or whatsoever.'
Leo's transparent blood seeped out from his fingertip. When it touched the air and Qi, it turned black and grew bigger. In the blink of an eye, it transformed into a black water slime.
The slime enveloped the car key for a moment. It slowly split into three and separated from the original. Then, they transformed, duplicating the key's size and shape.
Just like that, Leo got three additional keys for these guys. He tossed one to each resident.
"Don't lose it. That's the key to your home. Also, if any moron tries to drive the car without permission and crashes something, I'll deduct your lifespan for the repair cost. Comprende?!"
The four teenagers repeatedly nodded and sweated profusely. They stored their keys in their spatial rings.
After entrusting the keys to the new residents, Leo repeated the process. He purchased another RV, picking the same brand.
.
.
In the end, Leo purchased a hundred RVs and parked them on the seventh floor. As Leo left a lot of room for other cars to navigate through this floor to the lower and higher levels, it was 80% full. Although there were rooms to squeeze more vans in, Leo left some empty areas for the boys for creativity.
All homeless employees got their new home. Leo could upgrade the store without implicating the bystanders.
Going back to the general store, Leo visited the third floor, where the employees used to stay there. As Leo had expected, the floor and the partitioned rooms were full of dirt and footprints. It needed a heavy cleaning.
Leo shrugged and visited the second floor next. He collected all sports cars into his spatial rings. Then, he touched the floor.
"Upgrade Menu."
DING
<Would you like to upgrade the Humble General Store to Level 10?>
<Warning! Upgrading your Humble General Store to level 10 will unlock the PVP feature and disable your newbie protection domain. Once upgraded, you cannot decrease its level!>
<Warning! Upgrading your Humble General Store to level 10 will activate Fate Crystal's Main Quests. Please strengthen your base before you start the main quests.>
"Stop whining. Do it!"
DING
<Upgrading!>
RUMBLE
The entire shopping mall trembled. Sounds of glass breaking echoed while the entire building transformed once again.
The store gained two new floors while it maintained its interior and spaces. New sets of escalators and a new elevator appeared, allowing shoppers to walk freely in the mall. From the second level to the fifth level, the majority of the floor vanished, transforming the interior floors into balcony floors.
Compensating for the lost usage space, each partitioned room in the mall got bigger. They looked small from the outside. But when Leo looked closer, each room was about 1,000 square meters, which was quite sizable for a store.
After the trembling stopped, the system prompted him with a new message.
DING
<Your Humble General Store has reached the maximum level. To upgrade it further, please evolve the building into a "Shopping Mall" by using the store domain menu.>
<Main Quest has been unlocked. A new quest menu can be accessed via the store domain menu.>
<Your Newbie Protection has expired. The store building will no longer be protected by the absolute defense domain. If the Humble General Store building is destroyed, your store domain will be deleted.>
<PVP Mode has been unlocked. You may access this menu via the store domain menu.>
<Shop Merging Feature has been unlocked. You can now move your store buildings into the Humble General Store.>
<New Construction Options!>
"…"
A lot of information flooded Leo's mind. He slowly digested it one by one.
First, Leo wanted to refute the system as this place was no longer a "Humble" general store. It should be called empty-mall-level backrooms.
As the system gave him a new thing to do, Leo tested it right away. He opened the store domain menu to see the new features.
New tabs appeared in the shop domain menu – Merge, PVP, and Quests.
Leo pressed on it.
DING
<Please select the building you wish to merge with your Humble General Store.>
In the menu, the screen highlighted the clothing store and alchemy workshops in green.
Experimenting with it, Leo pressed on the clothing store building.
DING
<Please designate the room you wish for the Clothing Store Level 9 to occupy.>
Leo didn't think much. He picked an empty room on the first floor.
WHOOSH
The clothing store building instantly vanished. The workers in the store, including the cat-eared mannequin, remained behind. They looked around in confusion as the entire building was gone.
WHOOSH
All items and clothes that the mannequin made appeared in the designated room. The interior changed into what the clothing store once had. Moreover, all the clothes and display mannequins sorted themselves, gathering on the new shelves and cloth hangers in the room.
Leo walked toward the new clothing store in his mall to check. As the store was in the mall, no front door or wall existed anymore. Only a long display window separated this place from the adjacent rooms.
Curious about what the mannequin had made, Leo checked the products. He noticed several sets of black suits, neckties, long pants, leather shoes, evening dresses, t-shirts, and random clothes that Leo had shown to the mannequin girl. Roughly counting, Leo believed she had at least 2,000 clothes for sale.
TAKTAKTAK
The clothing store mannequin sprinted into the shopping mall. She found Leo and stopped on her track. Then, she saluted.
"Oh, you're here."
"…"
The mannequin seemed to be in a good mood. She rushed into the new clothing store and inspected the interior.
A few seconds later, the girls, who worked at the clothing store, followed their boss to the mall. When they found the mannequin, they were relieved.
"There you are… Eh? L-Lord Florida Man?"
The girls bowed to Leo, "G-Greetings, senior! Er… Right! W-We have something to report! T-The clothing store has disappeared, sir! The whole building vanishes!"
Leo grinned. As the girls seemed confused, Leo explained everything to them.
"It's fine. Actually, there will be a big change. A lot of changes…"

chapters.title: Chapter 169 Florida Man Quits His Job To Start New Career As Gamer, Spends All His Savings In Gacha Game.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 169 – Florida Man Quits His Job to Start New Career as Gamer, Spends All His Savings in Gacha Game.
After settling down the clothing store employees, Leo inspected the shop domain system menu again as there were many new features.
After moving the clothing store into the building, the map highlighted the clothing store, and there was an exclamation icon on it. Curious, Leo pressed on the icon.
DING
A new system screen appeared, and it showed the status of the clothing store.
.
Clothing Store Level 9
Automaton Worker (0/5)
Automaton Weaver – (1/5)
Weaver Skills – (5/5) MAX
Store Quality – (3/5)
.
"Oh, I thought I would get something new. What a bummer."
It was a shortcut to display the store's status. Leo could use it to upgrade the store without touching it.
As the main building was already level 10, Leo upgraded the clothing store without hesitation. Instead of adding more points to the store's quality, he put one extra point to a new weaver to increase the production rate.
.
Clothing Store Level 10
Automaton Worker (0/5)
Automaton Weaver – (2/5)
Weaver Skills – (5/5) MAX
Store Quality – (3/5)
.
A new cat-eared mannequin manifested. She stood straight and gazed at the other weaver for a moment. Then, she approached Leo and poked his arm with her index finger.
Leo was familiar with these mannequins. As usual, he peeled his skin for the automaton. The weaver received it in glee. However, it kept staring at Leo and tugged his suit.
"Oh, I forgot. I haven't assigned you a job, right?"
The new mannequin nodded.
"Okay. See the clothes in the store? Make more of those. I don't care which type you make. Just make sure that everything will always be in stock."
The cat-girl automaton nodded again and walked into the store. She stopped in front of her senior and began communicating by nodding and twitching their heads, sending MOS codes.
The tamer girls in the store got scared of the two mannequins. They looked as if they came straight from a horror movie or they were possessed by demon spirits. Fortunately, they didn't start chasing anyone. The weavers continued producing black suits and night dresses as usual.
But the system wasn't done with Leo. It gave him a new hint.
DING
<Tips: The max level of all buildings is 10. However, you can upgrade them further if you complete Fate Crystal quests.>
"…"
Being reminded of the main quest, Leo checked the Fate Crystal Quest menu.
Two new screens appeared. The left one showed the number of fate crystals in Leo's possession and their abilities. Leo got to see what his Entity Fate Crystals could do. The adjacent window showed the tasks that Leo needed to complete.
.
Fate Crystal Quest Introduction
When you assimilated with the Entity Fate Crystal for the first time, a new fate and power have been granted to you. Your first Entity Fate Crystal is specialized in "Store System" and "Lifespan". Therefore, your fate and quests in the future will revolve around your store and lifespan.
As you have experimented with the store system, you already learned about its nature and perks. However, those perks are nothing compared to the true potential of the Store System and your great fate.
The following quests shall serve as guidelines on how you can utilize the Store System to the fullest potential. Bear in mind that nothing comes for free. You will need to invest in the system to become the strongest system user in this universe.
*Note. For further details about fate crystal's abilities, check the Fate Crystal Abilities Menu.
.
The introduction sounded corny and suspicious. Also, Leo already had an ongoing Earth Fate Crystal Tutorial. He wondered what this quest series would be.
He scrolled the quest window further down to read.
.
Quest Types
Fate Crystal Quests are categorized into four – Main Quests, Repeatable Quests, Side Quests, and Time-Limited Quests.
Mean Quests are your main objectives that you should prioritize over everything else. It consists of 13 phrases and each phrase consists about 10-20 tasks. The tasks can be challenging or tedious. However, the rewards for every completion are abundant and generous. You may find yourself chasing after the main tasks in the future.
Repeatable Quests have three sub-categories. Daily Quests, Weekly Quests, and Monthly Quests will discipline you and reward you for the chores. The rewards are not as generous as the main quests, but they can accumulate if you don't neglect them. In short, they are the quests to promote hard workers.
Side Quests are secondary tasks you can unlock as you meet more people or travel abroad. They usually appear when you come across a fate crystal or a fate crystal owner. The content of the quests varies, depending on your compatibility with the fate crystals.
Time-limited quests are self-explanatory. Nobody can tell when and how to trigger these quests. However, only those who are blessed by luck can receive these quests. It is rumored that the quests' difficulty is higher than the main quests, but the rewards are always worth the effort and investment. Please be mindful of these quests when they appear.
.
Everything sounded like the general game systems of modern gacha games or MMORPGs. Reading about it reminded him of the nostalgic past when he was a human.
The introduction pages were over. Leo checked the content of the quests.
.
Entity Fate Crystal Quest – Phrase 1/13
Mission Objectives: Complete 10 tasks to complete this phrase.
Phrase Completion Rewards: 100,000 Years of Lifespan, One Guaranteed SR Lucky Draw (Building), and Increase Sub-Building's Max Level to 12
Phrase One Tasks (7/10 Completed)
- Evolve Humble General Store into a Shopping Mall.
- Move any building into the main store's building. (Done)
- Set up a new store in the main store's building. (Done)
- Complete a mystic realm expedition once. (Done)
- Upgrade any building to level 10. (Done)
- Harvest at least 10,000 of any crops from Basic Farmlands. (Done)
- Concoct at least 10,000 pills by using Alchemy Workshop. (3,330 / 10,000)
- Recycle at least 10,000 items by using the Recycling Center. (4,009 / 10,000)
- Summon at least 10 automatons to work in your domain. (Done)
- Sold at least 1,000 products of your store. (Done)
*For each completed task, you will receive one Lucky Draw (Building), and one Lucky Draw (Automaton).
.
Leo scratched his head. He did nothing, but seven of ten tasks were listed as completed. As for the task rewards, they hadn't been claimed yet.
Behind each task, there was a claim button. Leo manually pressed on them.
DING
Digital tickets appeared in his shop domain menu. He got 7 building lucky draws and seven automaton lucky draws.
Looking at the tickets reminded Leo of the blasphemous gacha games in the past. They were the source of all evil, and Leo used to invest heavily in one of those games.
"Mah gawd. Should I keep it until I have 10 tickets or what? Will I have a discount or a guarantee system if I pull 10 at once?"
Leo laughed and pressed on the flashing ticket icons. Then, the window navigated to a new tab, which he had never seen before.
It was a gacha page!
There was a gacha system hiding in his shop domain system?!
Leo widened his eyes in astonishment and disbelief. Still, as he once used a lucky draw and got the gunsmith workshop, Leo quickly came back to his senses.
He read the new page, and he was not disappointed.
Images of fancy miniature buildings floated on the page. At the bottom right, there was a one-draw button and a 10+1 draw button! In addition, it cost 10 gacha tickets to draw 11!
The sentence above the buttons ignited Leo's gambling addiction.
[Guaranteed Rare or higher rarity for every 10+1 draw.]
In short, it would be more beneficial for Leo to accumulate 10 tickets to use it at once.
"What about the automatons? Will I get 2B or KOSMOS from the gacha or what?"
The automaton page was just a swipe away. Leo pressed the right arrow button on the right edge of the screen, and a new gacha page appeared.
This page showed the images of faceless mannequins in the background. However, a beautiful female android and a strong-looking humanoid robot stood in front of the generic ones, acting as their poster guy and girl.
The promotion was the same. Leo needed 10 for the guaranteed rare and the bonus draw.
Unfortunately, Leo couldn't purchase the missing tickets. He pressed the draw 10+1 button to test it, but the system warned Leo that he had insufficient items.
"System, can I buy these tickets?"
Again, the system didn't give him another hint or allow him to buy lucky draw tickets.
"I guess I have no choice but to complete the main quests. But what about the daily quest thingy?"
Leo turned his attention to the repeatable quest tab. He glanced at them. Then, he knitted his brow.
.
Daily Quests
- Sell 1,000 items in your store. (0/1,000)
- Attract 1,000 customers to your store (0/1,000)
- Gain at least 1,000 years of lifespan by selling items from your store. (0/1,000)
Rewards (Per Task Completion): 1,000 essence stones
Rewards (Per Full Completion): 10,000 Years of Lifespan
.
The quests were impossible for Leo at the moment as everybody in his domain was Leo's employee. After he had absorbed the Life Sword Sect and the Amazonian Sanctuary into his domain, he didn't get any new customers.
He wondered where all the customers went.
The weekly quests and monthly quests were even more brutal. The quests required Leo to proactively bring in customers to his store. The number also exceeded the daily quests by ten times.
In short, without a customer, Leo couldn't complete any repeatable quest.
Realizing the issue, Leo had a headache. He scratched his head so much that his hair got slightly messy.
"Forget it. I'll complete the main quests first."
Leo turned his attention to the shop domain system. He moved all three alchemy workshops into the shopping mall's building, putting them on the fifth floor as they were related to the production. He also moved the gunsmith workshop to the fifth floor as Leo designated the top floor for the production workshops.
Next, Leo upgraded all of them to level 10 and put one point to new cauldrons. With this setup, the workshop's production rate would double.
.
Basic Alchemy Workshop Level 10
Active Cauldrons: (2/5)
Alchemist Automaton (1/5)
Production Quality Level – (5/5)
Production Quantity Level – [2/5]
.
With a new cauldron, Leo could focus on completing the pill-making task. However, he didn't need to do it right away as there were other important things to do.
Leo hadn't explored the new batch of buildable structures yet.
He opened the shop domain system to see the list of the new buildings. Then, he found many interesting structures.
.
Food Court
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 10
Price – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – Three Humble General Store's Rooms or Shopping Mall's Rooms.
.
Essence Stone Quarry
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 10
Price – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 200 x 200
.
Yin-Yang Pylon Tower
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 10
Price – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 100 x 100

chapters.title: Chapter 170 Florida Man Invented New Strongest Flashlight, Accident Blinded Himself And His Employees By During Experiment.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 170 – Florida Man Invented New Strongest Flashlight, Accident Blinded Himself and His Employees by during Experiment.
"Pylon Tower? Is this an electric pylon pole or a Starcraft one?"
Leo couldn't help but smile. He rushed outside as he wanted to see what the pylon tower was. As the west district was empty, Leo built the massive pylon tower right away.
DING
A steel pyramid manifested from nothingness. It occupied half of the designated land that Leo had sacrificed. A 30-meter-tall diamond-shaped rainbow-color crystal hovered over the steel platform. It rotated clockwise and released cold air.
Leo gawked at the large pylon crystal in astonishment. While Leo admired his creation, the others also came to see the new structure as it produced something special.
Hua Jiashan was the first to find Leo. He rushed to the latter's side and pointed at the pylon tower in shock.
"L-Lord Florida Man! W-Where did you get that Spirit Stone Heart?!"
"Spirit Stone Heart?" Leo stopped looking at the pylon crystal and turned to Hua Jiashan. He tilted his head in confusion, "What's that?"
"I-It's the heart of all spirit stones, senior! When I was young, these crystals were what made us cultivators. They fill this realm with elemental Qi while we, the cultivators, absorb its Qi to become immortal. I-I thought the former Yan Emperor took everything with him."
"So, you're saying, that Eren Yeager's butt plug is a Qi generator?"
"Erm, what?"
"Let me rephrase that. Is that crystal a Qi factory?"
"Y-Yes, senior! That crystal is very important! As long as we have one of them in this realm, our world will be filled with natural Qi, and our people can get strong fast! B-But, there might be an issue."
"What now?" Leo crossed his arms and stared at Hua Jiashan.
This guy once forced him to give up the Sweet Dream Mushroom farm. Fortunately, Leo managed to import a world tree from the mystic realm and grow some mushrooms, so the project continued.
Leo was cautious of Hua Jiashan. He didn't want this paranoid old man to ruin his fun again.
"S-Senior," Hua Jiashan looked around. He spotted a hundred young disciples gathering on top of the parking lot building to admire the new structure. Then, he discovered what he had feared.
The disciples on the building had a pale complexion. They were fine in the beginning, but weak ones began vomiting. Some of the young Qi-condensation realm cultivators couldn't handle the dense Qi in the air.
Hua Jiashan faced Leo again.
"S-Senior. The Qi of the Spirit Stone Heart is too strong for young cultivators to handle. Please create an array to filter or contain its Qi. Otherwise, our disciples might die from Qi deviation."
"…"
Leo pursed his lips and looked at the crowd around them. Upon gazing at the parking lot, he noticed a hundred young men on the rooftop and the seventh floor, staring at the pylon crystal.
"Tsk."
Leo was annoyed. He walked toward the steel pyramid and touched it.
DING
The Yin-Yang Pylon Tower's menu screen appeared, informing Leo what it could do.
.
Yin-Yang Pylon Tower Level 1
Yin and Yang Essence Production Level (1/10)
Fire Essence Production Level (0/10)
Water Essence Production Level (0/10)
Wood Essence Production Level (0/10)
Earth Essence Production Level (0/10)
Metal Essence Production Level (0/10)
[Unlock New Element Slot] (0/4) – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
[Upgrade] – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
.
There was no sign or hint about an array or a filter that Hua Jiashan needed.
As the upgrade fee was quite high, Leo rechecked his lifespan to see his balance.
<Current Lifespan: 361,154 Years…>
Leo indeed spent a lot in the past few days. Even though he managed to snatch some talismans from the dead cultivators and ate them, the rewarded lifespan was not enough to regain his losses.
Looking at his current lifespan, Leo was reminded of the Floridian Pills that one of his workshops had been making. He believed it should already be finished and collected.
'I'll go check those pills later. I hope they can give me some lifespan for the trouble. Otherwise, it would have been a waste of time. Those things took 30 days to make!'
While thinking, Leo upgraded the pylon tower to level 10. He got nine status points to allocate, but he hadn't chosen a status yet.
RUMBLE
The tower froze for a moment. Then, seven yellowish saucer hoops appeared putting the crystal in the center. The hoops rotated in a different direction as if they were an Aerotrim that astronauts usually used to train their balance. However, the crystal didn't move along with the rapidly rotating rings.
As the hoops moved in every axis, Qi stopped coming out. Instead, the energy flowed toward the pyramid, and the structure shone.
White lines illuminated and flowed toward the foot of the pyramid. At the same time, the ground around the pyramid elevated, revealing a grey floor, made of unknown steel.
The light traveled everywhere on the grey floor like a fluid flowing down from a mountain, following mysterious geometrical circular drainages. As the light expanded, Leo and Hua Jiashan looked at the ground and noticed a pattern.
"Circles?" Leo discovered that the lines of light drawn multiple circles on the ground. Moreover, he could feel warm Qi from the areas in the circles.
"I-Isn't this?"
Hua Jiashan picked a spot and sat inside a circle. He closed his eyes to meditate for a moment. A second later, he widened his eyes and laughed.
"Lord Florida Man! Thank you!"
"???" Leo tilted his head and wryly smiled, "Er, thank me for what?"
Hua Jiashan looked around. He pointed at the circles on the ground.
"My lord. I can't tell you how much I'm moved. Not only did you contain the Qi for us, but you created cultivation hotspots for young cultivators! I can sense a smooth flow of Qi from these circles! If they sit on it and cultivate here, their progress will improve leap and bound!"
"…"
Leo still didn't understand what it actually did. However, he did sense mild radiation from the surface of the ground. He wondered if Hua Jiashan's disciples might develop skin cancer on their butt cheeks if they overused this place.
"Welp, suit yourself. Is the leakage issue solved now?" Leo changed the subject. He wondered if those young men in the RVs could live in there.
"No problem, senior! I don't feel the oppressive Qi from before anymore!"
"…Okay. That's good."
Leo was relieved. For once, Hua Jiashan wouldn't ruin his domain development project.
Still, as the pylon tower was related to the Qi production, he wondered if he should focus on one element or multiple elements. He asked Hua Jiashan.
"Say, Elder Hua."
"Yes, my lord?"
"Which do you think is better? A specialized Qi tower or an all-rounder tower?"
"What do you mean, senior?"
Leo let out a long sigh. He confessed, "I can make this tower produce all five elements essence and yin-yang essence. But if I do that, the quality and the quantity of each Qi type might be low. But if I choose to specialize in one type, I can make the best… Spirit Stone Heart in the universe, maybe."
"W-WHAT?!"
"Anyway, just tell me which element your people generally prefer. We have Yin and Yang. We also have fire, water, earth, metal, and wood elements."
"…"
Hua Jiashan's entire body stiffened. He was frozen in time as if Dio Brando activated his power nearby.
The old man's brain.exe stopped working.
He wasn't the only one who was so shocked that he was petrified. Wu Buyi, Han Hao, Dongfang Mei, and a few elders nearby had been eavesdropping their conversation, and they were frozen in time as well.
Since every cultivator around him was useless, Leo thought of another old witch that had lived 10,000 years. She might know something.
Leo jumped to the 8th floor of the parking lot. He got on the motorhome bus and searched for Esen in the master cabin.
He found Esen on the second floor of the cabin. Ivy, Marc, and Beatrice were also there with her. The group of undead all wore modern bikini swimsuits and rested on an artificial beach.
"Esen, I need your opinion," Leo approached Esen, who was in the middle of sunbathing. She lay on her stomach, revealing her bare back.
Looking at the smooth back of the elf lich, Leo's eyes naturally looked down and found her perky bottom. Although she didn't move, Leo could tell that they would jiggle if someone slapped them.
He had to admit. Although Esen's chest was an "L", her bottom was a huge "W".
The intrusive thought and the temptation were dangerous this time. Leo looked away from her white butt cheeks and clenched his right wrist with his left hand.
'MUST.NOT.SPANK.'
Esen noticed Leo's arrival. She turned her head and glanced at him.
"What's up, geezer?"
"I made a… Spirit Stone Heart. I'm wondering which element I should prioritize. Should I make it a multi-element one or should I specialize it."
As soon as Leo mentioned Spirit Stone Heart, Ivy, Marc, and Beatrice turned around. Although they still wore the blindfolds, they looked interested in the topic.
Marc was excited, "Can you make it Yin Element? Undead like us need it the most. If we have that, we can resurrect our colleagues!"
Ivy agreed. She chimed in. "Holy One. This may sound selfish, but we need Yin Element. Not only do we benefit from the element, but the nightmares, thunder unicorns, and your pet "Cat" will enjoy it. Yin element is the best nutrition we need."
Esen slowly sat up. She covered her chest with one arm while Beatrice brought a towel to cover her front. After covering herself, Esen gave her opinion.
"Focus on Yin and Yang, period! Ignore the basic elements. As long as you have abundant yin Qi or yang Qi inside you, you can cultivate every other element!"
Hearing Esen's advice, Leo was enlightened, "I see. Thanks for the tips."
"Hmm! Have you realized my greatness now?" Esen puffed her chest and pointed her nose to the sky. However, by doing so, the towel fell off, revealing her naked front.
"…"
Leo looked down and stared at the great plain. He smirked.
"You would have been greater had you been blessed with twin mountains. Unfortunately, your RNGesus did your genes dirty. Maybe you were born with low Estrogen. I want to suggest Estrogen injection, but that will surely give you breast cancer. But if you can handle small risks, you can take birth control pills to boost your hormones. I'm sure they will grow bigger, maybe. Oh, by the way, your nipples are erected."
"…"
Esen silently looked at her chest and discovered that she was half naked. Her face reddened in embarrassment.
"MUKIIIIII!! I'LL KILL YOU!"
"WHY?! I was just giving you proper advice!"
Esen screamed and baby-punched Leo. The latter laughed and ran away while the girl chased after him.
.
.
After being chased around the bus for several minutes, Leo purchased a pack of modern contraceptive pills for Esen to boost her hormones. Although they cost 1,000 years of lifespan, it was enough to silence her for the time being.
Leo returned to the tower. As Esen had suggested, Leo added all points to the Yin-Yang element.
.
Yin-Yang Pylon Tower Level 10
Yin and Yang Essence Production Level (10/10)
Fire Essence Production Level (0/10)
Water Essence Production Level (0/10)
Wood Essence Production Level (0/10)
Earth Essence Production Level (0/10)
Metal Essence Production Level (0/10)
[Unlock New Element Slot] (0/4) – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
[Upgrade] – 10,000 Years of Lifespan
.
With the specialized path, the light on the ground illuminated everything around the pyramid. They were so bright that it flashbanged everybody nearby.
Leo basked in the blinding light from the ground. His trembling hands operated the online shopping system as he purchased sunglasses. After putting them on, he recovered from the temporary blindness.
He looked around, wondering how the others fared under the intense light.
Hua Jiashan and the elders all closed their eyes and turned away from the tower. As for the innocent juniors on the parking lot's rooftop, they screamed in unison.
"MY EYES!"
Leo's expression turned into a pokerface meme. He thought of the prosthetic eyeballs that he created ages ago.
'I guess I'll have some new customers soon. Those eyeballs are going to sell like hotcakes. Oh, I should add some sunglasses to my store.'

chapters.title: Chapter 171 Florida Man Establishes Meth Factory in Shopping Mall and Offers Meth-Making Master Class as Services.
chapters.content:
Chapter 171 Florida Man Establishes Meth Factory in Shopping Mall and Offers Meth-Making Master Class as Services.
Chapter 171 – Florida Man Establishes Meth Factory in Shopping Mall and Offers Meth-Making Master Class as Services.
After building the pylon tower, Leo returned to the store. He visited the alchemy workshop on the fifth floor.
By the time Leo arrived, the mannequin alchemists already found their working place. A couple nerdy alchemist disciples also followed the mannequins and discovered the new area.
"S-Senior Florida Man, what happened here, sir?" One of the disciples asked Leo.
"Nothing much. I just moved the workshops to this place, so you don't have to cramp in a small area."
Leo gazed at the front of the workshops. Instead of calling it workshops, they looked like a tutor center office, where Asian parents imprisoned their kids during holidays because the children failed to become a doctor before the age of 10.
In front of the offices, the walkway balcony was wider than the road behind the general store's building. Measuring with his eyes, it was about 50-60 meters wide, a lot wider than the previous road. Many alchemist enthusiasts could have a BBQ party there instead of cramping or competing to stare at boiling cauldrons all day.
Thinking of the cauldrons, Leo reminded himself of the Floridian Dantian Pills. He entered one of the workshop offices to explore the interior.
As Leo looked around, he noticed that the interior was larger than it appeared from the outside. He wasn't surprised by the special distortion anomaly anymore.
The front office was nothing special. The first noticeable attraction was the front desk counter.
On the right, Leo found a coffee lounge area. About 20 round coffee tables and chairs made this zone look like a coffee shop. As for the left area, blank modern glass showcase cabinets formed a square array.
"A reception area and a showcase area?"
Leo nodded in approval of the system's upgrade. He liked the interior design.
Going further in, Leo followed a corridor. A path led Leo toward the production area of the workshop. As he walked along the way, he found five large rooms. Two of them featured a cauldron at the center while the other three were empty. Every room came with a horseshoe-shaped spectator stand and cushions.
Leo peeked into one of the rooms and found a mannequin alchemist doing his job. He entered the room for a sightseeing.
Upon getting inside, Leo gazed at the spectator stand and measured the room's size. It was roughly 150-200 square meters, and the ceiling featured several air ventilation duct system as it removed the smoke and hot air from the cauldron. The air circulation and the chilling air were better than the former building.
After checking the place, Leo had a rough idea of how this place worked. Next, he inspected the deepest area of this workshop. He expected a storage area or something similar.
At the deepest area of the workshop, Leo found a storage room as he had predicted. Inside the room was the interior of the former workshop's building, where Leo stored some pills and pill ingredients inside.
In the room, Leo found some old pills and random leftover materials from the farmlands. He also located what he had been looking for.
The finished Floridian Dantian Pills had already been collected and stored in a Tupperware box. The 50 black pills inside were two inches thick.
As Leo was about to pick up the box, the alchemy mannequin walked toward Leo and poked him.
"Hmm?"
Leo turned around and found the mannequin menacingly staring at him with red eyes. He poked Leo's skin, wanting something.
Looking at the mannequin, Leo was confused for a moment. A few seconds later, he remembered the trait of the workshop. As Leo had ordered the mannequin to make Floridian Dantian Pills, the mannequin automatically queued the next batch. However, he didn't leave spare materials for the mannequin to continue making them.
.
[Alchemy Recipe – Floridian Dantian Pill]
One 9th-grade Monster Core of Horned Caiman
One Drop of Florida Man's Blood
One Piece of Florida Man's Flesh
.
The recipe required his blood and flesh. Obviously, the mannequin couldn't find the ingredients.
"I have three more cores with me. Oh, well. I guess I have to hunt a few more to keep the store in stock."
Leo leisurely bit his finger and tore a bit of his flesh and blood for the mannequin. The doll received them and rushed back to work, making a new batch of Floridian Dantian Pills.
After the mannequin was gone, Leo picked up the box and checked the content. As soon as he opened the lid, he received the pending notification message from the workshop.
DING
<You have refined 30 Superior-Grade and 20 Pinnacle-Grade Floridian Dantian Pills.>
.
Superior-Grade Floridian Dantian Pill
- Increase firearm weaponry compatibility by 5,000 years' worth of training.
- Increase poison, lightning, and wind element essence by 5,000 years' worth of cultivation.
- Increase lifespan by 1,000 years.
- Grant immunity to Crimson Heaven Tribulation.
.
Pinnacle-Grade Floridian Dantian Pill
- Increase firearm weaponry compatibility by 10,000 years' worth of training.
- Increase poison, lightning, and wind element essence by 10,000 years' worth of cultivation.
- Increase lifespan by 2,000 years.
- Grant immunity to Black Heaven Tribulation.
.
Leo was disappointed. He thought that it would give him a lot of lifespan for the trouble. Unfortunately, the best pill only offered 2,000 years of lifespan. If Leo consumed everything, he would only get 70,000 YOL back.
He couldn't sell them either. After all, nobody in this world could live more than 1,000 years. Selling them for cheaper than the base value would be a stupid idea.
Since Leo couldn't sell them, he might as well eat them. If he felt generous, he could distribute a few to his promising juniors, such as Gao Yan, Yao Qiqi, and Esen's subordinates.
"I guess it's too late to stop the mannequin. Oh, right. I have three extra cauldrons. I can allocate them for other pills."
Leo stored the pill box in his spatial ring. He walked toward a free cauldron.
As Leo reached the free cauldron, the workshop mannequin was already there. However, it didn't do anything to the cauldron as Leo hadn't assigned this cauldron to make any pill yet.
As true immortal pills granted the same YOL compared to the Floridian dantian pills while they required only a week to make, it would be wiser to invest in true immortal pills instead.
Putting the plan into action, Leo ordered the mannequin to make the true immortal pills.
As soon as the mannequin received the order, it rushed into the storeroom at the back to gather materials. But when it realized that it didn't have enough, it rushed out of the building to visit the warehouse outside.
Seeing the mannequin's frantic action, Leo noticed the inefficiency in the building's settings and location. He opened the domain system menu, hoping to move the warehouses and granaries into the general store.
Unfortunately, both buildings were highlighted in red. When Leo pressed on them, he received a notification message.
<Required Shopping Mall.>
"…"
This message reminded Leo that he could evolve the max-leveled general store into a proper shopping mall. Moreover, the main quest and side quest demanded him to upgrade the store.
Since Leo needed to transform the building, he changed his plan. He pressed on the general store building to see its status.
A [Evolve] button appeared at the bottom. Also, the texts on top informed Leo of a piece of bad news.
Cost – 100,000 Years of Lifespan
"RIP-OFF! THIS IS A SCAM!"
He just spent 100,000 YOL upgrading Pylon Tower to level 10, and the system wanted another 100,000! Leo's kidneys, liver, spleen, intestines, and heart churned upon the fact that everything was expensive.
As optimistic as Leo was, he adjusted his mindset. He counted his fingers and contemplated.
"If a cauldron can make 50 immortal pills every week, I can get about 50,000 to 100,000 YOL of weekly income. But if I assign three cauldrons to make them, my income will be 150,000 to 300,000 YOL! I just need to work hard on eating pills and providing materials for the mannequins! Spending a week's worth of income to invest in something inevitable is not a waste!"
Hyping himself, Leo felt better. He pressed the evolve button.
RUMBLE
The entire building shook. Although the interior didn't change, Leo received a series of notification messages.
<Your Humble General Store has evolved into "Humble Shopping Mall".>
<New Construction Options!>
<The Underground Parking Lot has been unlocked.>
<Underground Storage Warehouse has been unlocked.>
<You can purchase building gacha tickets with your lifespan.>
<You can purchase worker gacha tickets with your lifespan.>
<You can infinitely expand your domain territory with your lifespan.>
<Storage Buildings can be linked to underground storage.>
<You can assign free workers jobs in Humble Shopping Mall, such as Security, Clerk, Manager, Cashier, and etc.>
Looking at the messages, Leo was surprised. He didn't expect to see new toys to entertain him.
Still, Leo didn't get sidetracked this time. As he focused on getting his lifespan back, his mind was full of the pill-making plan and his factory.
He needed to upgrade the workshops.
.
Basic Alchemy Workshop Level 10
Active Cauldrons: (2/5)
Alchemist Automatons (1/5)
Production Quality Level – (5/5)
Production Quantity Level – [2/5]
.
Leo simply needed to upgrade all workshops three more times. However, he couldn't upgrade it further.
As Leo needed the sub-structures to be at a higher level, he checked the "Shopping Mall" menu if he could raise its level right away.
DING
Humble Shopping Mall Level 10 (MAX)
"DAMMIT!"
.
.
.
"HAHAHAHA!! KILL!"
Four-armed cultivators emerged from the west. They laid siege to the first coastal city. Although they ran into soul formation and soul transformation cultivators there, these demonic savages outnumbered them.
Within half a day, the defensive arrays crumbled. Hordes of demons entered the city and slaughtered townsmen, commoners, and cultivators.
After getting the city fell, everybody celebrated their success. Men rushed into houses and dragged women outside. A few also abused their perks of war and committed war crimes.
The leader of the Gorr Tribe, Qiang Baidu, was once a cultivator from the Yan Empire. After the sweet dream mushroom incident, Situ Nantian branded them as the "Infected", and their tribe had to be eradicated.
Because of what Situ Nantian did, Qiang Baidu swore to get his revenge. So far, he managed to rebuild his clan and amassed troops of 10,000 demonic cultivators.
His target was the Cauliflower City. However, before he could get there, he needed to travel northeast.
On the way to Cauliflower City, there were multiple cities that he had to go through. The first major city was the lair of the Fatui Cult, the Frozen Fire City. Then, further north, there were small cities on the way.
Magpie City was one of them.
Qiang Baidu gazed toward the northeast. He bellowed, assembling his men.
"We rest for the night! Tomorrow, we head northeast! Our next destination is the Fatui Cult!"

chapters.title: Chapter 172 Florida Man Chased High-Schooler from Shooting Range for Bringing Multiple Girlfriends on a Date and Skipping Zaza Smoking Schedule
chapters.content:
Chapter 172 Florida Man Chased High-Schooler from Shooting Range for Bringing Multiple Girlfriends on a Date and Skipping Zaza Smoking Schedule
Chapter 172 – Florida Man Chased High-Schooler from Shooting Range for Bringing Multiple Girlfriends on a Date and Skipping Zaza Smoking Schedule
As Leo couldn't upgrade the shopping mall to a higher level, he had no choice but to complete the main tasks at hand. He visited all three workshops.
Three cauldrons would be making True Immortal Pills to steadily supply Leo with lifespan income. One cauldron was dedicated to the Floridian Dantian Pills. One was for elemental grain pills as Leo could quickly mass-produce a batch of pills every hour.
As for the last cauldron, Leo left it idle so that he could research new stuff. He inspected all the random items that he had been collecting in the past months.
A massive gemstone-like rock still sat in one of Leo's spatial rings. As he couldn't take it out inside the building, he exited the store and ejected the entire thing on the road.
BOOM
.
Superconductor Obsidian of Holy Lich
This 10,000-year-old mineral is the crystallization of a dead Archlich's dantian core. As the former master of this dantian crystal was as strong as a celestial king, this mineral inherited his physical strength. If it's used to make weapons, it will surely be extremely durable.
Cannot be used in alchemy.
Can be used to make weapons or converted into metals
.
This was something that Leo had extracted from the ground long ago. He already researched it, but he hadn't shown it to the gunsmith workshop mannequins yet.
Because it was too large, Leo karate-chopped the huge obsidian into smaller pieces and stored them in his spatial ring. He then transported them to the gunsmith workshop.
Upon arrival at the gunsmith workshop, Leo discovered that it also had a front desk office like the alchemy offices. When he got inside, the layout and the structure appeared the same as the alchemy workshop's interior.
Leo walked straight to the storeroom and dropped all the obsidian there for the mannequins to do something about them. He also checked the room and discovered a dozen cubic blocks of sacred wood. However, he also spotted a hundred matchlock rifles and sacred wood bullets.
'I should upgrade this workshop's technologies. Matchlock and flintlock rifles are outdated. At least, they should make the breech-loader ones. I wish the mannequins could make the modern guns.'
Leo opened the gunsmith menu and assigned one extra point to the technologies.
.
Gunsmith Workshop Level 10
Gunsmith Mannequin (1/1)
Handloading Mannequin (1/1)
Firearm Technology (3/6)
Product Quality (2/6)
Structure Quality (3/6)
.
After putting an additional point to the technology, changes occurred in the storeroom. Leo also received notification messages.
<Firearm Technology has been upgraded. The workshop will stop producing outdated weapons.>
<Would you like to upgrade your outdated firearms and ammunition to a new version? You have 146 outdated weapons and 6,500 ammo in your storeroom. The upgrade fee is 7,960 years.>
<Please be advised. The outdated weapons outside of the workshop's storeroom cannot be upgraded. Please bring them back to the workshop's storeroom.>
Leo was overjoyed. Even though the upgrade fee was expensive, he agreed, "Do it!"
DING
All rifles on the weapon rack transformed. Instead of changing into flintlock rifles according to the world's timeline, it skipped the musket era to the Civil War period.
146 breech-loading rifles glittered as if they had been freshly assembled with brand-new parts. The models looked similar to M1819 Hall, but they emanated mild metal, wood, and earth Qi.
The ammo section was also changed. They got slightly longer, and the wooden bullet head was coated with unknown black material.
"Hoh, boy. What the hell did my system do?"
Leo rubbed his chin. He thought of feeding a Floridian Dantian Pill to everybody and distributing these guns to them. If they had 10,000 years' worth of training from the pill, wouldn't they all become John Wicks?
Inspired by the idea, Leo grabbed one of the rifles, and some bullets, and rushed out to find his guinea pig, aka Gao Yan.
.
.
BANG
BANG
Han Hao, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman were at the makeshift shooting range, playing with their flintlock rifles. A dozen tamer girls were also there with them as they were also interested in the firearms.
Gao Yan became a new member of the shooting range. After the tournament, he realized how important the firearms were. Without Leo's artifacts, he would have never beaten Yan Zhu, who was two major realms stronger than him.
BANG
BANG
Gao Yan practiced shooting with his pistol, using the rubber ammo that Leo had given him. His posture was firm when he held his gun with both hands.
After emptying a magazine, Gao Yan lowered his gun. He reloaded the magazine and changed his posture. Instead of holding the pistol with both hands, he only used one hand.
Gao Yan visualized Yan Zhu in front of him. Then, he shot the invisible enemy.
BANG
His hand, wrist, and arm never moved. As the vanilla CZ 75 model had a low recoil, the upgraded version improved the feature by miles. While using regular ammo, Gao Yan didn't feel anything.
The trigger felt as light as a feather.
But as soon as Gao Yan added his Qi to the bullet, things changed.
BOOM!
The pistol became a cannon. Gao Yan's arm bounced, and he lost his posture.
Gao Yan gasped for air and held his wrist. His entire arm trembled as he couldn't withstand the recoil.
Han Hao took the gun off Gao Yan's hand and helped him sit. He also passed Gao Yan a canteen of cold water.
"Take it easy, Gao Yan. What gets into you?"
Gao Yan wryly smiled and received the canteen from the elder. He then told Han Hao what he experienced during the tournament.
Listening to the boy, Han Hao and Han Meng were impressed. They also glanced at the pistol in envy.
"I see. That's why you're putting more importance to the weapon skill and accuracy."
Gao Yan nodded, "Yes. The accuracy and aiming parts are easy. But when it gets real, it's very hard to aim accurately and adapt to the recoil. I just injected 10% of my Qi into the gun, and it became like that. Also, it has a lot of weaknesses. If it were me, I could have dodged every attack from the guns."
"Yeah. Your opponents can just dodge the bullet if they pay attention to where the muzzle is aiming at. That's why you shouldn't be overly relying on it, but you can't neglect gun skills either."
"That's why I'm training hard. I'm planning to keep this as a trump card in the future."
"Good choice!"
The elders liked Gao Yan even more while the girls secretly admired the young man.
While everybody exchanged their insight, Leo walked toward them and interrupted their conversation.
"I've finally found you."
The tamer girls, Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, and Gao Yan stood up. They saluted Leo.
"Greetings, senior."
Leo pursed his lips and gazed at Gao Yan and Tiger Swordsman.
"You two have just returned, but you're here training. Aren't you tired?"
"Of course not, sir!" Tiger Swordsman laughed, "I didn't get to do anything."
"What about you?" Leo looked at Gao Yan. "You got burnt back then. Are you alright?"
Gao Yan's face and skin were already healed. He didn't look like someone who got hit by an explosion.
"I'm perfectly fine, senior. My dao avatar healed me."
Leo wryly smiled and glanced at Thora, who had always been behind Gao Yan. Somehow, Leo envied the boy for having a caring waifu.
As everybody was energetic, Leo revealed his new item. He flickered a superior-grade Floridian dantian pill to Gao Yan.
"Eat that and get some rest."
"Err, eh?"
Gao Yan caught the black pill and gazed at it in astonishment. It was twice larger than standard cultivation pills. Moreover, it emanated a strange aura.
Thora instantly recognized Qi. She exclaimed and told Gao Yan.
'That's lightning Qi! There are wind and poison Qi, too!'
"W-WHAT?!"
'That's a precious cultivation pill! You should hurry and thank him!'
Gao Yan was shocked. He stood stiff and bowed 90 degrees, "T-Thank you very much, Lord Florida Man! I-I'll work even harder to meet your expectations!"
Leo waved his hand and dismissed the boy. He turned toward the elders next and tossed them a breech-loading rifle.
"Give me your guns and use this instead. Actually, I forgot to bring extra. Try to get familiarized with this and the new bullets."
"???"
Leo didn't bother explaining or teaching them how to use a new weapon. He collected the old rifles and ammo. Then, he returned to the main store's building.
Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, Gao Yan, and the girls looked at Leo and the new gun in confusion for a moment.
Han Meng was the first to seize the opportunity. He picked up the rifle and inspected it. At first, he didn't understand the loading mechanics. But after playing around with it, he realized that he could pull the hammer and reveal a new hold to reload an ammo.
Han Meng ejected a spirit stone from his spatial ring. He inserted it into the hole and closed the breech. Instead of using gunpowder, Han Meng injected his fire Qi into the gun and pulled the trigger at the same time.
BOOM
CLANK
The spirit stone bullet hit dead center at the iron pine log target. It also blasted the wood to pieces.
The firepower was similar to the old model. The recoil was the same as the matchlock. However, Han Meng felt a lot more comfortable than the old gun.
"Hey, this gun is more accurate than the old one. I think it's easier to reload, too!"
"Hmm? Let me see."
Han Hao and Tiger Swordsman inspected the new toy. They flipped the breech part and played with the new reloading function.
Everybody loved it. They didn't have to carefully push a spirit stone or a sacred wood ball into the muzzle anymore.
The group took turns shooting with the new weapon for a few minutes. The tamer girls also got the boons from being there as the elders taught them how to shoot as well. Although the tamers were reluctant to use their spirit stones as a bullet, they managed to borrow a few sacred wood bullets from Gao Yan to try.
Several minutes later, Leo returned with a new arsenal. Upon seeing that everybody had fun with his new weapon, he was delighted.
"Nothing feels better than the sounds of gunshot, huh? Here, take your new weapons and ammo."
Everybody was surprised when Leo suddenly tossed them rifles. Leo passed guns and ammo to the tamer girls as well. After distributing new toys to his workers, he turned his attention to Gao Yan again.
"Gao Yan, stop training for a day and get some rest. Don't forget to eat the pill I gave you."
"Erm…" Gao Yan was reluctant to rest. He still wanted to train more, "But I still wish to train."
"You will thank me later. Don't waste your time in the shooting range. Instead of wasting your ammo, eat that pill and go train with Esen."
"…"
"Trust me."
Gao Yan deeply sighed. Since this was Leo's order, he had no choice but to comply, "Yes, sir."
The guy sulked and dragged his feet to his home. He wasn't aware that the pill's effect would change his mind later.

chapters.title: Chapter 173 Game-Addicted Florida Man Sued Game Company as Game’s “Quest” Forced Him to Touch Grass
chapters.content:
Chapter 173 Game-Addicted Florida Man Sued Game Company as Game’s “Quest” Forced Him to Touch Grass
Chapter 173 – Game-Addicted Florida Man Sued Game Company as Game's "Quest" Forced Him to Touch Grass
At night, Leo was still inside the shopping mall, rearranging the first floor's goodies. All shelves and showcase refrigerators were concentrated on the northeast corner, leaving the other area empty.
He did this for a reason.
After the shopping mall upgrade, a new area opened up at the back of the shopping mall – A large cargo elevator emerged, connecting to the underground warehouse zone. It became easier to transfer items from granaries and warehouses to the shopping mall.
With this setup, Leo could directly resupply his "supermarket" goods without leaving the shopping mall.
"Whew. Next!"
Leo chose not to sleep for the day as he had a hundred tasks to complete. He entered the cargo elevator and descended to the shopping mall's underground warehouse.
Getting into the warehouse, Leo discovered four closed shutter doors and a massive empty room with a tall ceiling. On the shutter doors, labels told Leo where the doors would lead him to.
[Granary 1]
[Granary 2]
[Warehouse 1]
[Warehouse 2]
It wasn't hard to guess. Leo opened the "Warehouse 1" door.
Opening the shutter door, the interior of Leo's first warehouse building was in front of him. He inspected the warehouse's items and collected weapons, clothes, and pills that he and his subordinates had plundered from the dead cultivators.
After gathering a bunch of junk items in his spatial rings, Leo walked toward the exit. When Leo came out, he appeared outside of the first warehouse building.
"Alright. Neat! What about the security?"
Leo looked around and searched for a volunteer to test the security feature. It wasn't hard to find a trustworthy guy around here.
The first warehouse's mannequins and a disciple helped each other pushing a large trash bin full of iron pine barks toward Leo's warehouse. When they saw Leo, they stopped to greet him.
"Hello, senior!" The Life Sword Sect's disciple politely cupped his fist. As for the mannequin, it creepily stared at Leo's face.
Leo waved his hand and called the disciple, "I have a favor to ask you. Can you go into that warehouse and try to get inside the new area over there?"
"New area, sir?"
"Mhm. I'll give you an essence stone for the trouble. Can you do it?"
Hearing that he would get an essence stone for a simple job, the disciple repeatedly nodded in excitement, "Of course, sir!"
"Good. Now, go in there and return if you can enter that area."
"Is that all, sir?"
"Yup!"
The disciple cheerfully rushed into the warehouse. When he reached the deepest part of the building, he discovered a new shutter door, which led to a new area.
He was astonished and excited. After all, he always worked around here, helping the warehouse mannequin storing goods from the harvesting team. He knew this warehouse like the back of his hand.
"Wow."
The disciple cautiously walked toward the open area. But as soon as he reached the boundary of the underground shopping mall's warehouse, he hit an invisible wall.
"Huh?"
The disciple was confused. He reached out toward the new zone and tried to get there. However, he touched a transparent wall instead.
He panicked. He thought that Leo wouldn't give him an essence stone if he couldn't enter the area. Thus, he tried to punch it.
BONK
The punch bounced back. He felt like he hit a bouncing rubber instead of a hard wall.
Confused, the disciple tried again. Second attempt, third attempt, tenth attempt, he failed to break the invisible barrier.
In the end, he gave up. The disciple was crestfallen as he returned to Leo. He reported his failure.
"…Sir, I couldn't get inside the new area. I'm sorry."
Leo raised his eyebrows. Instead of being disappointed, he was overjoyed.
"Really? Okay. You did a good job. Here is your bonus."
He tossed an essence stone to the disciple. The latter caught it and blankly stared at the stone for a moment. When he came back to his senses, he deeply bowed to Leo.
"THANK YOU, SIR! I'LL WORK EVEN HARDER!"
Leo waved his hand and dismissed the young man.
As long as no one but Leo could access the warehouse from the other entrances, the shopping mall warehouse was secure. However, Leo might have to manage the entire warehouse himself.
'This might be a headache. For now, I don't need to restock my supermarket. I'll leave it empty for now unless Cat threatens to empty the granary again. How much does she eat every day?!'
Leo wanted to go check the granaries to see the carnage. However, he stopped the thoughts as he had another thing to complete. He returned to the alchemy workshop. Then, he ordered the mannequin to use the sixth cauldron to make more grain pills.
Although Leo planned to keep this cauldron to research other materials, he postponed the idea. After all, his main quest's first phrase was almost completed.
.
Entity Fate Crystal Quest – Phrase 1/13
Mission Objectives: Complete 10 tasks to complete this phrase.
Phrase Completion Rewards: 100,000 Years of Lifespan, One Guaranteed SR Lucky Draw (Building), and Increase Sub-Building's Max Level to 12
Phrase One Tasks (8/10 Completed)
- Evolve Humble General Store into a Shopping Mall. (Done)
- Move any building into the main store's building. (Done)
- Set up a new store in the main store's building. (Done)
- Complete a mystic realm expedition once. (Done)
- Upgrade any building to level 10. (Done)
- Harvest at least 10,000 of any crops from Basic Farmlands. (Done)
- Concoct at least 10,000 pills by using Alchemy Workshop. (3,380 / 10,000)
- Recycle at least 10,000 items by using the Recycling Center. (4,057 / 10,000)
- Summon at least 10 automatons to work in your domain. (Done)
- Sold at least 1,000 products in your store. (Done)
*For each completed task, you will receive one Lucky Draw (Building), and one Lucky Draw (Automaton).
.
Leo needed two more to complete the first set of quests. Then, he could enjoy the two batches of lucky draws. Moreover, there was something new in the gacha section.
Aside from the building and the automaton, there was a new banner that Leo could try his luck.
[Gnosis Lucky Draw]
This feature had been unlocked after Leo evolved the general store into a shopping mall. This was foreshadowed in chapter 106. However, like the other gacha banners, it required lucky draw tickets, and Leo couldn't purchase it with his lifespan.
Although the system gave Leo multiple restrictions and forced him to work, it was not heartless enough to not give him hints. Under the 10+1 draw button, there were tiny texts underneath.
<Gnosis Lucky Draw Tickets can be obtained from the PVP mode.>
"…"
Leo narrowed his eyes after reading the hint. He deeply inhaled, preparing his heart to explore the unknown. While walking toward the recycling center, Leo opened the menu that he had never explored yet – The PVP tab.
DING
When Leo pressed on the PVP tab, a tutorial screen appeared.
.
PVP Mode
Welcome to the PVP Section, where you can enjoy competing against other fate crystal bearers and comparing your strengths. You can climb ladders in the ranking matches or spar against your friends in a private lobby. At the end of every season, you will obtain many rewards based on your rankings.
This feature has three subcategories – Offline Ranking, Real-Time Ranking, and Casual. Only the Offline Ranking Mode and Real-Time Ranking Mode offer rewards.
Offline Ranking Mode lets you fight against shadows of crystal bearers from the past and present. Every week, you can participate in a ranking match once. Every time you defeat your opponent, you can obtain one gnosis lucky draw.
Real-Time Ranking Mode allows you to match up against fellow crystal-bearers of your peers in real time. Both you and your opponent may wager your wealth in the match if both sides agree to the terms. In addition, combat in this mode yields five times more rewards than the offline mode due to its high mortality rate. Please be advised. Killing is not forbidden in this mode. Similar to the Offline Ranking Mode, you can participate in the ranking match once a month.
As for the Casual Mode, it is for private matches. If you have friends, we suggest you try this out to have fun. Of course, this mode is 100% safe as no one can die during the fight.
.
Leo was skeptical about this feature. Even though the participating right was limited to one fight per week or month, he wasn't that interested in the activities. Instead, he only checked this feature because he was curious about the lucky draw tickets.
'This is the same as those evil gacha games. If you don't PvP, your progress will fall behind the others because you can't get the exclusive rewards. This is where the P2W part comes in. But does system allows P2W?'
While reading the tutorial screen, Leo arrived at the recycling center. He gazed at the acid pool, where the workers disposed of junk.
Standing near the pool, Leo rubbed his spatial rings, which he had used to store junk items from the warehouse earlier. Old clothes, regular grain pills, old weapons, and random tools were poured into the pool.
Everything was instantly dissolved. Then, the machine hummed, producing hundreds of spirit stones.
Leo ignored the machine and kept pouring more items. After Leo had removed all clothes and junk items from the spatial rings, he checked the quest progression.
.
Recycle at least 10,000 items by using the Recycling Center. (7,133 / 10,000)
.
They were not enough. Leo needed more junk to dispose of.
He turned around and placed all spatial rings on the ground, piling into a small mountain. Roughly estimated, about 1,000 rings were in front of Leo.
After putting everything in place, Leo rechecked everything one by one.
All empty storage rings were tossed into the pool behind Leo. He kept scanning and tossing it away when he was done.
10 rings, 50 rings, 100 rings, Leo kept discarding them. He didn't show remorse for throwing such precious items away as he had too many.
When Leo checked the 138th ring, he found a storage, full of books and furniture. It seemed that the previous owner was a librarian or a book enthusiast.
Leo mercilessly ejected the books to the ground and dumped all the bookshelves into the pool. Then, he skimmed through the books.
"Come to think of it, my place doesn't have a library. Should I keep these?"
Leo flipped a random book. The pages showed images of humans doing various poses. At the side of each image, Chinese texts described the techniques.
Reading the martial arts manual, Leo tilted his head to the side as he found the poses weird and illogical. He closed the book and checked another one.
