"Old fool, when I heard that you were alive and succeeded the Sword Saint, I rushed here to see you. At the ascension ceremony when you succeeded the sect master title, I tried to talk to you, but you kept pushing me away. Do you know that I cried for days because I thought you had a new dao companion?"
"Err… I never marry though."
"Exactly! I was stupid, too. I thought you married Sword Saint's daughter, so I stopped thinking about you. And now… you confess to me."
"…"
The elders bitterly smiled and gazed into each other's eyes. Hua Jiashan stood up and embraced Dongfang Mei.
"I'm sorry, Mei. I kept you waiting."
"Umm."
"Marry me, Mei?"
A tear dropped from Dongfang Mei's eyes. She admired Hua Jiashan's wrinkled face and stroked his right ear. Then, she slightly nodded.
"I want seven kids."
"What the hell?!" Hua Jiashan was taken aback, "You sound like women at brothels!"
"FIVE FREAKING HUNDRED YEARS I'VE BEEN PROTECTING MY VIRGINITY FOR YOU! I DREAM OF BEARING YOUR CHILDREN AND HAVING A FAMILY WITH YOU! I WANT YOUR SEED! BED, SEX, NOW!"
"AAAAAH!!"
Dongfang Mei suddenly summoned her dao avatar. A giant spirit of a graceful woman emerged and dragged Hua Jiashan into a building. After throwing the old man into an empty room, the avatar merged with Dongfang Mei.
The old lady reverted into a charming young lady in her 20s. She strode while she moved her hips, seducing the old swordsman.
Hua Jiashan remembered Dongfang Mei in her prime. He dropped his jaw as his youthful instinct was resurrected.
"…You're as beautiful as ever."
"SHUT IT! OFF WITH YOUR PANTS! WE ARE WEDDING, RIGHT NOW!"
"AAAAAHHHH!!"
Although Hua Jiashan moaned, he didn't resist Dongfang Mei's approach. Instead, he smiled as he loved this sexually aggressive childhood friend with all his heart.
BOOM
Unfortunately, before they could seal the deal, an explosion erupted nearby.
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei's faces turned dark. They frowned for a moment and looked at each other.
"Continue or go out?" Asked Hua Jiashan.
"Tsk. It's close. Let's go check it out."
"Alright."
"But remember, SEVEN KIDS!"
"…"
.
Both elders put back their clothes and rushed outside to see the commotion. As soon as they came out, they found the army of invaders. As the invaders emitted killing intent and Qi, Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei discovered their cultivation base.
"Soul transformation and soul formation cultivators?!" Dongfang Mei gasped.
"Those are not ordinary cultivators! They're demonic cultivators!" Hua Jiashan pointed out the four arms that they had.
Hua Jiashan summoned his dao avatar and merged with it. His age instantly regressed, and his appearance reverted to a long-haired handsome youth. His white robes and long sword glittered, emitting the white aura of a sword saint's disciple. As for Dongfang Mei, she already transformed.
Although both elders were cultivators who trained in a different martial art style, they pulled out rifles and sacred wood bullets from their spatial rings. Their nimble hands loaded a bullet into the rifle's chamber and closed the breech. They took aim in unison.
Their targets were two soul transformation cultivators. Their fingers injected Qi into the shell and pulled the trigger.
BANG
BANG
A loud gunshot mixed with the sound of an explosion nearby. Two flashing yellow needles shuttled through the sky and pierced the two soul-transformation mutants from below. One bullet blasted out the innards of a mutant while the other entered through another mutant's crotch and exited through his head.
The couple elders didn't bother admiring the result. They reloaded another ammo and aimed at other mutants.
BANG
BANG
One shot, one down. Two shots claimed two additional lives.
.
Dugu Ying swept his eyes across the Magpie City. He ordered his men to bombard it to the ground.
Mutants unleashed their skills. Fireballs appeared in the sky and descended upon the town. The first target was the structures of the Life Sword Sect, where Dugu Ying suspected that the assailant might be in hiding.
BOOM
A disciple dorm exploded. However, nobody reacted.
Dugu Ying narrowed his eyes. He made a new order.
"I want ten platoons to attack the sect. As for the rest, kill every commoner and townsman!"
A thousand men rushed toward the Life Sword Sect while the other 500 flew toward the city, where the commoner lived.
But as soon as Dugu Ying commanded his men, changes occurred in the city. Two cultivators flew out and carried their trademark weapons.
Tang Xuan and Tang Tian appeared. Below them, the people of Tang Clan erected a dome shield to protect the townsmen.
Tang Xuan, as a quasi-immortal, was never afraid of soul transformation mutants. He shouted while he summoned his dao avatar.
Purple fog emerged, enveloping the entire Magpie City. Some of it also transformed into a purple mist dragon, baring fangs at the intruders.
Tang Tian brandished two of his purple swords. Behind him, five hundred clones of himself manifested from the purple fog that his father created, holding similar weapons.
The two Tangs glared at the intruders and shouted at them.
"WHO DARES HARM THE COMMONER OF MAGPIE CITY?!"
Dugu Ying flinched as he noticed the aura of Tang Xuan. But as he realized that Tang Xuan was the only quasi-immortal there, he believed he still had a chance to kill him.
The mutant bellowed back.
"BOOTLICKERS OF YAN EMPIRE, RETURN MY WIFE OR DIE HERE!"
"IMPUDENCE!" Tang Xuan snorted and charged toward Dugu Ying.
Dugu Ying sneered. He flew backward and pushed his four arms forward.
BANG
BANG
Suddenly, two gunshots echoed, followed by two yellowish flashes of something small shuttling through the sky. Then, two of Dugu Ying fell.
"What?!"
Because of the distraction, Dugu Ying looked away from Tang Xuan.
Tang Xuan smirked, "Pay attention, brat!"
BOOM
Tang Xuan instantly teleported and appeared behind Dugu Ying. A purple fist found the latter's spine.
CRACK

chapters.title: Chapter 187 Florida Elder Gunned Down Flash Mob Looters Attempting To Ransack His Store. “Welcome To Florida, Suckers!” Said Elder During The Interview
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 187 – Florida Elder Gunned Down Flash Mob Looters Attempting to Ransack His Store. "Welcome to Florida, Suckers!" Said Elder during the Interview
BANG
BANG
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei kept shooting the mutants in the sky. Unfortunately, they only had two guns. After firing the third shot, the mutants found them.
"OVER THERE!" One of the four-armed tribesmen pointed at the couple.
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei kicked the ground in unison. As their cultivation base was weaker than their foes, they chose to rely on the godly weapons of Leo and kept their distance.
The elders flew backward, kiting the pursuers. While flying, they aimed and pulled the trigger.
Every bullet coming out of the muzzles claimed at least one life. The fourth shot of Dongfang Mei penetrated through the vanguard mutant and accidentally blasted another mutant's head. Only then, does the bullet lose its momentum.
Although the firepower was amazing, the couple had no time to admire their artifact. They allocated 90% of their Qi to accelerate their flight speed.
The pursuers knew they were stronger than the duo. They also accelerated to get into their attack range. Little by little, they got closer to Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei.
"Jiashan! To the domain! We can ask for the guardian's help!" Suggested Dongfang Mei.
Hua Jiashan nodded without looking at her. The couple changed their flight course, heading east.
"YOU'RE NOT GETTING AWAY!"
One of the mutants reacted to their movements. Although he hadn't caught up with the duo yet, he threw his axe to intercept their flight course. The axe then transformed into a burning flame wheel.
Sensing the pending crisis, Hua Jiashan reverted to his roots. While aiming his rifle at the assailant, he ejected a flying sword from his spatial ring along with his sword dao avatar.
The spirit merged with his sword, transforming it into one energy blade. It swung at the flame wheel.
Upon contact, the wheel and the energy sword exploded. However, the wheel blasted through the sword.
The mutant scoffed at the duo.
"FOOL! Do you think weaklings like you can block a strike from a soul transformation cultivator like me?! DIE!"
The mutant bellowed and controlled the flame wheel toward Hua Jiashan.
Hua Jiashan widened his eyes and raised his arms to block the attack.
BOOM
It was a direct hit. The wheel continued rotating, slashing Hua Jiashan's arms a thousand times.
"JIASHAN!"
Dongfang Mei rushed in and kicked the wheel away. She then turned to look at her husband-to-be.
"Huh?"
Hua Jiashan blankly gazed at his arms as not a scratch was left behind on his body. He looked at the black suit that he had been wearing.
Black suits, white collar shirts, long pants, leather shoes, and white socks were the new uniform of Leo's domain. The latter forced everybody to get their clothes from the clothing store, and nobody could leave the domain without wearing one.
"How am I alive?" Hua Jiashan laughed.
Seeing how Hua Jiashan survived a soul transformation cultivator's attack unharmed, she gained inspiration. Instead of continuing to run, she reloaded her rifle with Leo's essence stone. Then, she aimed at the axe-wielding mutant.
She pulled the trigger. But instead of firing a regular bullet, she unleashed a beam cannon at the crowd of mutants.
BOOM
A yellow lightning beam devoured seven mutants in its path, including the Axeman earlier, vaporizing them to smoke.
"WHAT?!"
Hua Jiashan surviving the strike already baffled the Gorr Tribesmen, but the sudden beam attack shocked them.
Seeing the result of her weapon, Dongfang Mei advised her darling.
"Jiashan, mix in essence stone bullets with the regular ones! Invest your essence stones and spirit stones!"
"But that's my cultivation resource and money!"
"What's the point of having those after you die? If you can use them to kill soul transformation cultivators, use them!"
"Dammit!"
Hua Jiashan loaded a spirit stone into his rifle. He injected his Qi into the chamber and pulled the trigger.
BOOM
The firepower was 90% weaker than the yellow lightning beam. However, it punctured through a soul transformation mutant, whose body had merged with his dao avatar. His body and soul perished together.
Moreover, Hua Jiashan received feedback from the bullet, and he could control it. As he had mastered the art of flying sword, he realized the bullet acted the same way as a flying sword.
Testing the water, Hua Jiashan waved his finger like how he controlled his dao avatar sword.
WHOOSH
The bullet moved as Hua Jiashan wished. Although it was already far away, he could still order it to turn around and fly toward another mutant. Unfortunately, the spirit stone bullet quickly lost its momentum and fell to the ground.
The experiment was enough for Hua Jiashan to come up with a new technique. He loaded another spirit stone into his rifle chamber and took aim while he flew backward.
WHOOSH-SWISH
After applying the flying sword technique to the bullet, it became a homing and penetrating round. The bullet head pierced through a mutant's heart. Then, it curved into another mutant's head. Once the skull and brain shattered, the bullet went pursued the nearest target.
Hua Jiashan burst into laughter while he loaded another spirit stone. He loved this rifle and his new skill.
"WHAT THE HELL IS THAT THING?! SCATTER!"
The mutants panicked as none of them could defend or dodge the bullet. By the time the bullet lost its momentum, another flew toward them.
BOOM
That was not all. Dongfang Mei never stopped unleashing hell upon them. While retreating, she blasted another yellow lightning beam toward the crowd.
The former Amazonian Sanctuary master was not without skills either. Seeing how Hua Jiashan used spirit stones as bullets and applied his technique to them, Dongfang Mei also applied a forbidden technique that she could never use on her tamed beasts and monsters.
Instead of shooting a beam, she fired the essence stone round as a regular bullet. However, there was a deadly effect.
"DETONATION!"
It was a suicide bomb technique. But in this case, Dongfang Mei ordered the essence stone to explode when it reached the crowded area in the sky.
A yellowish flash of explosion engulfed 30 soul transformation mutants at once. The radius of the blast covered only 200 meters, but all lifeform inside instantly turned into stones. The 30 stoned mutants fell to the ground and shattered to pieces upon impact.
"W-WHAT ARE THESE CULTIVATORS?! WHAT ARE THOSE WEAPONS?!"
Witnessing unknown weapons of destruction at work destroyed their willpower. Half of the mutants fled while the others were frozen in fear.
As they stopped pursuing Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei, both elders disengaged and fled to Leo's domain to call for help.
While retreating, Hua Jiashan mocked the mutants.
"WELCOME TO FLORIDA, SUCKERS! HAHAHAHA!"
.
.
BOOM
BOOM
Above Magpie City, Tang Xuan leisurely fought the invaders. After destroying Dugu Ying's spinal cord, he threw the guy to Tang Tian. Then, he crushed a purple pill, which summoned a purple mist.
Purple mist summoning pill was Tang Xuan's signature product as his dao and combat techniques synergized with the pills. When pills manifested, his dao avatar merged with the clouds and transformed into a hundred humanoid fog spirits. The poisonous clouds rushed toward the invaders.
Four-armed mutants flung their weapons and fists against the mists, but they failed to destroy or disperse them. Instead, the mist entered their bodies and corroded them from the inside.
One after another, Gorr Tribesmen's mouths foamed, and their skins turned purple. A few seconds later, their bodies dried up. As the wind blew, their bodies dispersed into purple dust.
Unfortunately, this technique couldn't kill their souls. The tribesmen's souls ejected from their bodies and fled back to base.
Tang Xuan didn't bother pursuing the fleeing souls. He focused on killing active tribesmen before they could harm the innocent civilians in the city.
Five minutes into the chaotic fight, half of Dugu Ying's troops died. The rest realized that they weren't Tang Xuan's match, and they promptly retreated.
Tang Xuan floated alone in the sky above Magpie City. He crossed his arms and snorted.
"Damn demons. They haven't learned, have they?"
Tang Xuan was relieved that he brought his clan members and his family to Magpie City before the raid. Although it took him a while to convince everybody to join him, he managed to bring them here, hoping to surrender to Leo and establish their new headquarters in his domain. Then, his clansmen ran into the Gorr Tribesmen by chance and got entangled in this fight.
After driving the intruders away, Tang Xuan descended and removed the array barrier around the city. He came down and suppressed his aura and Qi so that the people wouldn't be too uncomfortable.
"It's done." Tang Xuan relayed news to Tang Tian and the commoners of this city.
Hearing the good news, the commoners in the city cheered and celebrated. Many old farmers and children came out from hiding and kowtowed to the Tang clan members.
"Thank you, immortals! Thank you!"
"We were worried because the Life Sword Sect migrated east. Thank you, Lord Immortals!"
Many clansmen dryly laughed as they didn't contribute anything to the fight. On the other hand, Tang Xuan refused to take the credit.
"It was nothing. As a cultivator, my job is to protect the weak from selfish cultivators… like them."
The crowd cheered louder as they loved Tang Xuan's demeanor and promise.
Tang Xuan raised his hands and gestured for the crowd to stop getting too excited.
"The situation is under control. All non-combatants should go home and reunite with their families. We'll mop up the battle and clean the bodies."
Again, the commoners never stopped cheering and praising Tang Xuan. They pestered the Tang clansmen for hours.
Meanwhile, Tang Tian and his men silently dragged the demon cultivator Dugu Ying to their courtyard. They destroyed his meridians and crippled his dantian. Then, the men started interrogating the guy.
While Tang Xuan worked as the clan's spokesman and poster boy, Tang Tian took on a dirty job. He tortured Dugu Ying for an hour and extracted some information from him.
After getting enough information, Tang Tian killed Dugu Ying and crushed his soul.
.
.
At night, Tang Xuan, Tang Tian, and their people finished collecting spatial rings and weapons from the dead mutants. They crushed the stone corpses until none of them resembled a human so that the townsmen wouldn't be frightened by them.
In the middle of the city, Tang Xuan and Tang Tian gathered inside a courtyard house. They put all spatial rings on the table to filter the loot.
Tang Xuan didn't say anything. He focused on eliminating the remnant Qi of the ring owners, unlocking the rings. He collected useful spirit stones and essence stones in one of his storage rings. As for clothes, weapons, food, pills, and random items, he poured them out so that Tang Tian could sort them.
Tang Tian grumbled while he sat on the floor, sorting weapons and pills from the pile of trash. He kept doing it under their room was full of spiritual weapons.
"Father, what are we gonna do with these? It's not like we can use them, right?"
Tang Xuan smirked, "Tributes."
"Tribute?"
"Yes. We're planning to migrate to Florida Man's territory, so we need to prepare the right gifts for him. To be honest with you, I had trouble finding the right tribute for Florida Man. Those people came at a good time."
"…"
Tang Tian pursed his lips. He thought of the prisoner that they had captured earlier.
"Say, father."
"Yeah?"
"About intel that we got from that prisoner, should we inform Florida Man, too?"
Tang Tian already squeezed information from Dugu Ying and learned about the Gorr Tribe's objectives. Though, they were surprised that their leader was an immortal, and many quasi-immortals were among their ranks.
Tang Xuan had already heard everything from Tang Tian. He let out a long sigh.
"This is not a battle that we can fight alone. Although it's disgraceful, we need to rely on him."
"What if he doesn't want to be involved in this mess?"
Tang Xuan snickered, "I doubt he will ignore us and the commoners of the Yan Continent."
"How so?"
Tang Xuan flickered an essence stone toward his son.
"Florida Man is a businessman. He seeks life force, not material wealth."
"Life force?"
"Yes. Life force."
"Then, why…oh."
Tang Xuan laughed. He poked Tang Tian's forehead.
"That's right, stupid Tian'er. I met him, and I learned enough about his personality. He doesn't senselessly rob people's lifespans unprovoked. He will definitely offer us some of his artifacts in exchange for our LIFE FORCE! He wants CUSTOMERS!"
"???"
Tang Tian was still confused. He tilted his head, wondering how his father was so sure about it.

chapters.title: Chapter 188 Drunk Florida Man Wrestled With Stray Cat Using WWE Moves, Discovered Cat Was Actually Adult Man Cosplaying As Tiger, Got RKOed And Sent Home.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 188 – Drunk Florida Man Wrestled with Stray Cat Using WWE Moves, Discovered Cat Was Actually Adult Man Cosplaying as Tiger, Got RKOed and Sent Home.
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei rushed to the store. As soon as they arrived, they sent mental messages to everybody in the area.
"We're under attack! Elders, bring your weapons! Disciples, gather and hide in the main building!"
All workers froze when they heard the unexpected news. Male young disciples left the farms and their vans, sprinting toward the main store building. The girls also relayed the messages to the thunder unicorns and nightmares, telling them about the incoming crisis.
Taxi and Ricardo moved. The former gathered 50 9th-stage thunder unicorns around the store to protect the youngsters. On the other hand, Ricardo and his nightmare platoon took flight, floating in mid-air and getting ready for combat.
Dongfang Mei reverted to her usual appearance so that her people could recognize her. As she had left behind her favorite wheelchair at the Life Sword Sect's courtyard, Dongfang Mei straightened her back and endured the back pain, flying toward the main store building to meet Xu Nuan and others.
Hua Jiashan also searched for Wu Buyi, Han Hao, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman to get them ready.
The swordsmen trio reacted as Hua Jiashan had expected. They brought their new weapons along and met up with Hua Jiashan in the sky.
"Sect master? What happened?" Asked Han Hao.
"Demon cultivators! They attacked Magpie City just now."
"WHAT?!"
The trio was shocked. Their small city had never been attacked seriously as there was nothing for invaders to gain except their small sect's treasures. Even Death Sword Sect, which always bullied and humiliated them, never really tried to take over the city.
Han Hao, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman hesitated for a moment. But when they gazed at Hua Jiashan's black suit, they started laughing.
"What? Why are you laughing?"
"Sect master, you see." Han Hao smacked the back of Han Meng's head to stop him from laughing. He explained. "You forgot that Lord Florida Man's cloth armor can't be destroyed by anybody under the immortal rank, right?"
"Huh?" Hua Jiashan frowned. Then, he remembered that he got hit by a flame wheel earlier, and he came out unharmed.
Han Hao pointed at their clothes, which looked the same as Hua Jiashan's black suit. Then, he pointed at everybody around him.
"Look, sect master. We all are wearing the same uniform, including our disciples. I don't think we are in danger."
"But what if we get hit in the head?"
"Well, if they're that accurate, we're dead."
"See? We shouldn't get cocky because we have invincible cloth armor!"
Although Hua Jiashan's words made sense, Han Hao and others seemed relaxed. They brought out their guns.
"But we have these, right?" Han Meng brightly grinned.
"We can just keep our distance and shoot them from far away, sect master." Tiger Swordsman suggested.
"…"
Hua Jiashan thought back to his previous fight against the mutants. Then, he realized that he was never in danger. Realizing how panicked he was, Hua Jiashan smacked his forehead.
"I guess I'm old."
Han Hao laughed and patted Hua Jiashan's shoulder, "Relax, sect master. Have you forgotten how many strong backers Lord Florida has? Look around carefully. We have fifty 9th-stage thunder unicorns, fifty 9th-stage nightmares, an 8th-stage plant monster pet, and four immortal friends of Lord Florida Man. This doesn't include the lord's stone guardians on the flying island. If push comes to shove, we won't lose."
"…"
Hua Jiashan closed his mouth and nodded. Nothing sounded more assuring than having good protection gears and weapons.
"Say," Hua Jiashan counted the heads of his former subordinates. He didn't see Wu Buyi around. "Where's that greedy alchemist?"
Han Hao shrugged, "In his house looking at Lord Florida's artifact, I think?"
"…"
Everybody gave up on Wu Buyi as he changed a lot after getting his hands on a smartphone. Then, Hua Jiashan searched for Esen and her crew.
"Where's Lady Esen?"
Han Meng shrugged. He pointed at the white tree. "Over there, maybe. They're experimenting with something."
"Alright. I'll go find her."
Hua Jiashan ordered the trio to patrol the domain along with the nightmare platoon. He visited Esen next.
.
White Tree Array
Surrounding the white tree array was a group of lava badgers. They were already 4 feet tall, and they had evolved one more time.
In their mouths, they chewed sweet dream mushrooms that Esen plucked for them. Strangely, they weren't affected by the zombification poisoning. Instead, they grew larger.
After eating mushrooms for hours, these tamed pets became 5th-stage monsters. They were already stronger than Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, and Wu Buyi.
Xu Nuan gazed at the badgers in astonishment. She wondered where these guys came from. On the other hand, Esen shook her head in disappointment.
"In the end, they avoid the true death mushrooms."
The badgers refused to eat true death mushrooms as if they knew what their effects were. They also kept their distance from the white tree when Esen allowed them to go inside the array.
The feast time was over. At the moment, these creatures simply ran and played like innocent children.
While everybody observed the little monsters, Hua Jiashan flew toward Esen. He landed behind her and cupped his fist.
"Lady Esen, there have been changes at Magpie City. We need your help."
Without looking back, Esen snorted, "I heard you. That city is being attacked, right?"
"Yes. Could you help us if our domain is under attack next?"
"If that happens, I'll be the first one to lead the troops… If that really happens."
"???"
Hua Jiashan raised his eyebrows, confused, "What do you mean?"
Esen rolled her eyes. She turned around and stared into his eyes.
"Look here, mister dense-dumb-dork. When you retreated from that city, is there any pursuer?"
"Erm… no."
"Right. You drove them away, right?"
"Err…yes."
"From the very beginning, you have the power to drive away intruders. Are those weapons that you got from Florida Man for show?"
"O-Of course not. They were very useful!"
Esen snorted. She turned around and patted the head of the clinging badger. Then, she advised him.
"Instead of worrying about this place, you should bring troops to Magpie City to help the commoners. Also, arrange another unit to scout the perimeter around this place. Use those ponies. They have been eating and sleeping all day."
"Y-You're right. I'll be going."
Hua Jiashan was ashamed. He was too panicked, and he didn't think this through. After bidding farewell, Hua Jiashan went to pick up 20 thunder unicorns and Taxi so that they could visit Magpie City.
After Hua Jiashan left, Esen glanced at Ivy.
"It's probably time for us to resurrect our former comrades. That geezers have most of our people's bones, so we can't do anything about them. But we have collected some armor and weapons of the royal guards. We should be able to awaken their souls."
Ivy bowed without saying anything. She vanished, heading back to the battle bus to pick up the collected bones and artifacts that they had stored inside.
Esen turned to Beatrice next.
"Beatrice, you go back to our former home. There should be Immortalium steel remaining inside that cave. Go collect them and bring them over. We can refine them into new weapons for our units."
Beatrice quietly bowed. She, too, vanished, rushing toward the Frozen Fire City, where the Gorr Tribe had taken over.
Esen turned to Marc next. The Dullahan boy clenched his fists, waiting for an instruction.
"As for you, Marc…"
Esen paused and frowned.
"Y-Yes, master?"
"Go fetch me tea of rejuvenation and some golden sand bananas from the granary. I'm hungry."
"…"
Marc was dejected. He hunched his shoulders while he walked to the local granary to fetch food for her master.
After sending Marc off, Esen pursed her lips and deeply sighed. She scanned the domain, searching for Leo's whereabouts.
Unfortunately, she couldn't find him anywhere.
"Where the hell does that geezer go?!"
.
.
Morning, Fate Stadium
Leo finished drying his pants and underwear. He put his clothes on and opened the curtains of his room.
The scenery was the same. The power was down, and his system's teleportation feature was disabled. None of the street lights was on. Only the artificial light balls, created by the local residents, illuminated the city.
Leo grumbled in a bad mood. He was still ashamed that he had wet his pants because of a stupid vivid dream. He exited his hotel room and walked to the stadium to kill time.
While walking back to the stadium, he encountered the werewolf group again. As usual, they still gathered in front of their tribe's locker room.
Leo sneered at them. Then, he walked away as he had no business with these mutts.
After coming back to the stadium, Leo discovered that a match was in progress. Another Fenrir immortal contested against a giant orange cat-octopus.
It was a match between a Cathulhu and a Fenrir. It was literally a dog versus cat match.
Leo frowned as he found this unfair. His match was canceled, but the stadium allowed them to fight. He stomped toward the nearby staff to complain.
"Hey! My match was canceled yesterday, but how come these guys can fight when the power is down?"
The staff was a furry rabbit woman. She politely bowed to Leo and explained, "Our deepest apology, sir. Your match yesterday was a life-and-death one, so we need all technical teams to monitor and record your match. However, the current match over there is a friendly sparring match between two private parties. Since no technical staff has to work, we allow them to play."
"…"
Leo was still mad, but he forgave them. He excused himself and observed the match.
The fight was weird as the catopus toyed with the dog. He slapped, tossed, and threw the werewolf around like a cat playing with an empty bottle cap.
The spectators burst into laughter. Most of them cheered for the cat.
Leo also smirked as he hated those racist werewolves. Still, he was curious how they managed to initiate the friendly match.
BOOM
While Leo was in deep thought, the giant catopus slapped the dog senselessly. The latter collapsed on the floor and stopped moving.
"WINNER! Nyan Meo!"
It ended in an anti-climactic fashion. Leo pursed his lips and inspected the cat-octopus monster.
The winner was from the Cathulhu race as expected. He seemed smaller than Miao Damao and his family when they were inside the VIP box. However, he emitted the aura of an immortal.
The cathulhu, Nyan Meo, bowed to everybody in the arena. When he was about to leave the stage, his eyes met with Leo's. He smiled and pointed one of his tentacles at the latter.
"You there, munya!"
Leo blinked twice. He pointed at himself.
"Who? Me?"
"Yes, you, munya! Wanna fight for fun, munya?"
Leo shrugged, "Sure. But I'm stronger than you, though. It won't be fair."
"Don't worry, munya! Even if you're a sage or an entity, your strength is meaningless when you face an elite cathulhu, munya!"
Leo wanted to laugh, but he couldn't. The guy's tone seemed disrespectful, but he reminded him of the cathulhu's overall strength and potential. After all, from the rumors, they seemed to be the only ones who could proactively provoke "Overlord Lucky" and his minions.
"Alright, stupid cat. Friendly match, right? Nobody can die, am I right?"
"Yes, munya! Come here! Let's go, munya! Let me humble you!"
"You cocky cat. You asked for it!"
Leo leaped from the spectator stand to the arena stage. As for the cat, he remained in his place, taunting Leo by wiggling his tentacles around.
The staff on the stage improvised on the spot. He used his voice amplification technique instead of microphones, announcing the next friendly spar match.
"Next! We have the rising star player FLORIDA MAN versus the veteran of the DOGE-CAT War, the War God himself, NYAN MEO!"
"Huh?"
Leo raised his eyebrows as he doubted his ears. He looked at the cathulhu and asked the guy.
"You? A war god?"
"Surprise, mother-dogger, munya! Do you think I'm a weak immortal? You've been tricked, munya!"
Nyan Meo's grin widened. He released his rainbow aura, which was similar to Leo's. Also, black sparks came out from his orifices.
Those were black tribulation thunderbolts that Leo also had!
"Ready your butt cheeks, munya! I'm gonna clap you so hard that you will moan from pleasure, munya!"
"…"
The cathulhu didn't wait for the match signal. As the stadium had no power to restrain them, he made the first move.
A 50-meter-long and 5-meter-thick tentacle came from above, attempting to squash Leo to meatpaste.
BOOM
The cathulhu hit the stadium floor. But he didn't sense the feedback of squishing Leo to death.
BOOM
A sharp and painful impact hit Nyan Meo's round face. Leo's leather shoe found its way to the cathulhu's head and sent it to the other end of the stadium.
Then, he stopped moving.
"Huh?"
Leo frowned as he found the match disappointing. He thought that the cathulhu was a lot stronger than that.
"Match over! Winner, Florida Man!"
"…"
Leo scratched his head in confusion. He opened his palms and protested the referee.
"Is that it?"
The referee waved his hand, gesturing for Leo to leave.
"Hurry and go before that cat wakes up. Otherwise, you'll be in trouble."
"How?" Leo still couldn't understand why the referee warned him that way.
He didn't need to think long. Nyan Meo slowly rose back to his feet. He stood up with his tentacles and patted his face.
"That hurts, munya. I thought I was sturdy, but your kick was even harder than Overlord Shuri's slap, munya!"
"Huh?"
"TIME FOR ROUND TWO, MUNYA! Let's get at it again, munya!"
The cathulhu charged at Leo. Before the latter could react, the cathulhu grabbed him with his tentacle and pressed him against the ground outside the stage arena.
The referee shrugged, "I've tried to warn you. In a friendly sparring match, nobody can die. Even if the system is down, none of you can be killed. Therefore, both parties can keep fighting until one of you is exhausted mentally and physically. Well, I guess it's too late. Good luck, Florida Man!"
Indeed, the warning came too late. Leo lifted the cathulhu's tentacle up and yelled at Nyan Meo.
"BEHAVE, DAMN CAT!"
"NYAHAHAHA, MUNYA!"
Leo then swung the cat around while he held the latter's tentacle. He slammed Nyan Meo left and right like a cartoon character. Unfortunately, he couldn't deal any damage to him.
The cathulhu's eyes spun as he was dizzy. But after a few seconds, he regained his senses and attacked Leo with his slaps. Again, Leo counter-punched and kicked the cat, pushing him away.
The battle lasted for six hours and nobody gave up. In the end, Nyan Meo got exhausted first and stopped fighting.
BLINK-BLINK
By the time Leo and Nyan Meo ended their match, the light returned to the arena. Then, they heard the long-awaiting announcement from the stadium host.
"We are sorry for the inconvenience. We have recovered the power, and the system is back online. We will make sure that nothing similar will happen again!"
Finally, Leo could return home. Without waiting for Nyan Cat to challenge him again, Leo opened his system menu and pressed the return button.
WHOOSH
Leo's body vanished from the Fate Stadium arena.
Nyan Meo pouted. He grumbled as he hadn't played enough yet.
"Lame, munya! I was having fun, munya!"
Leo didn't notice Nyan Meo's ranking in the life-and-death arena. He was in the top 10, and his stage name wasn't just Nyan Meo.
He was called "Overlord Nyan Meo". In addition, his real strength didn't belong in the mortal, immortal, or deity realm.

chapters.title: Chapter 189 Trained “Cat” Maimed Neighbors When Local Trainer Took Her For A Walk. All Dead Bodies Found In Florida Man’s Refrigerator Marked As “Cat Food”.
chapters.content:
﻿
Chapter 189 – Trained "Cat" Maimed Neighbors When Local Trainer Took Her for a Walk. All Dead Bodies Found in Florida Man's Refrigerator Marked as "Cat Food".
At night, routed troops of Qiang Qiang returned to base. They rushed to Qiang Baidu and reported their failure. As only a few hundred men managed to come back alive, it raised a commotion in the camp.
Qiang Baidu glared at the kneeling men in front of his palace. He walked down the stairs and sat next to one of the captains in a low voice.
"What happened there?"
"I-I'm so sorry, my lord!"
"Calm down and take a deep breath. I won't punish you. We're family, okay?"
"Y-Yes, my lord."
The captain narrated what he had seen at Magpie City. He retold the event from when Qiang Qiang got ambushed to the appearance of Tang Xuan and two strange cultivators with long-ranged weapons. He also reported how Dugu Ying got captured by a quasi-immortal.
"A quasi-immortal?"
"Y-Yes, my lord."
"Hmm."
Qiang Baidu patted the captain. He kept his promise of not harming his soldiers.
But when he turned around, a hundred quasi-immortals came out from the palace. They cupped their fists, saluting Qiang Baidu.
They were the bodyguards that had been companying him.
Qiang Baidu ordered them.
"Treat the wounded and let them rest. Then, gather everybody. Finish it before midnight."
The quasi-immortals nodded. They rushed to pick up the wounded and the troops.
Qiang Baidu rubbed his throat and sent his voice transmission to every subordinate.
"Assemble troops. Tang Xuan and his Tang Clan have mobilized his little army to face us. We'll trample them and set an example for those heinous cultivators! Then, we'll use this momentum and probe Florida Man next!"
.
.
At midnight, the one hundred quasi-immortal mutants rallied the rest of their troops. They left behind a few people to guard the base, but 8,000 soul transformation mutants and 100 quasi-immortal bodyguards were ready for another big war.
Qiang Baidu gazed at his tribesmen. He nodded at them.
"Let's go! We'll strike them at night and turn Magpie City into a bonfire! We'll roast and eat humans and cultivators like cows and horses! Tonight, WE FEAST ON THE TANG CLAN!"
The four-armed people raised their arms and roared. None of them rebuked or complained about cannibalism or human flesh as they no longer considered themselves as one of the local people.
They were demons. They had already sold their souls to the demonic realm's ruler, who was also an apostle of Fenrir race's overlord.
Qiang Baidu took flight. The rest of the troops kicked the ground and flew to the sky, flying north.
.
.
Canyon River
As Leo hadn't returned home yet, Cat continued to chill in the river as the contaminated water was delicious and fresh. She floated freely on the surface, pretending to be an aquatic plant.
WHOOSH
A shadow from the north flew over Cat's head.
Cat flinched as she failed to follow the shadow's movement. She widened her eyes and was about to chase after the mysterious being.
Fortunately, the shadow turned around and flew back. She stopped in front of Cat to show her appearance.
The shadow was none other than Ivy. The blindfolded girl in a black hooded robe faced Cat and smiled at her.
"Hi, Cat."
Cat recognized an ally. She waved her branch to greet her.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
"No. I don't have anything to feed you at the moment."
"Meow…"
Cat sulked. She thought that she could get some exotic night snacks.
Ivy laughed, "Well, I have a task to do at the south. Will you come with me? Maybe, we might catch something you can eat."
"Nom-Nom Meow!" Cat regained her energy. She repeatedly nodded.
"Alright. Come with me!"
Ivy resumed her task. She flew at a low altitude and lowered her speed. As Ivy matched her speed with Cat's, the latter managed to follow after her.
Coincidentally, their flight path collided with Qiang Baidu's troops.
.
.
Qiang Baidu and his men had trained in a harsh environment for 500 years. Their constitutions changed, and they gained many new abilities. Nightsight was one of the necessary skills that everybody was forced to learn.
All 8,100 soldiers formed a square formation in the sky, hiding under the shadows of night clouds. Still, they never stopped scanning below for rogue cultivators or enemy units. Everybody stared at the Canyon River.
Qiang Baidu also gazed at the river. He recalled that one of his scout units went somewhere north and never returned. He wondered if they ran into Tang Xuan or something in the river.
WHOOSH
While Qiang Baidu was in deep thought, two shadows moved along the river, flying at a low altitude. Their destination seemed to be their base.
Qiang Baidu narrowed his eyes as he inspected their cultivation base.
"An 8th-stage plant monster and a hidden master?"
Qiang Baidu couldn't see through Ivy's strength as he couldn't detect her Qi. However, judging from the movements of the monster, it seemed to follow after the hooded person peacefully.
One of Qiang Baidu's bodyguards asked him, "Your order, my lord?"
Qiang Baidu pondered hard as he didn't remember any prominent monster tamer. He vaguely remembered a gorgeous young lady who tagged along with a quasi-immortal of the Dongfang Clan. However, according to his memory, the Dongfang Clan migrated to the immortal realm before the sweet dream mushroom calamity. Their descendants or disciples shouldn't be in this world anymore.
"Meh, I'm overthinking things. Send five elites and a 100-man unit after them. The rest will continue north!"
"Yes, my lord."
The bodyguard's throat vibrated, sending secret messages to five colleagues of his. Five quasi-immortal mutants dove down and a hundred soldiers followed them, chasing after Cat and Ivy.
Qiang Baidu gazed north. He glared at the flying island on the horizon.
Looking at the mystic realm island, Qiang Baidu narrowed his eyes. He changed his plan.
"That place seems to be too close to Magpie City. Change of plans, troops! We'll eliminate the variables first! It doesn't matter if Florida Man is an immortal like me. We'll remove them and get rid of Tang Xuan next! We shouldn't forget that we're here for Yan Xiang's Earth Fate Crystal!"
.
.
WHOOSH
WHOOSH
Ivy and Cat calmly flew along the river as usual. But as they passed under the 8,100-man army above, they glanced up.
Sure enough, a hundred men above dove down and turned around. They flew after Cat and Ivy.
Cat turned around and laughed, preparing to extort some nom-nom tax. However, Ivy pulled Cat and threw her further south. Then, she hovered in front of the plant monster.
"Five quasi-immortals are among them. You aren't their opponent, Cat."
"Nom-Nom Meow?" Cat tilted her head and gazed at the 100 soul transformation cultivators behind their leaders.
"You can take on their minions. I'll take on the big guys."
"Meow <3"
Cat nodded. She then dove into the river and vanished from plain sight.
Ivy pulled out a wane and a cane from her spatial ring. She rotated them and held the sharp bottom tip upward like daggers. Then, she lowered her stance.
One of the quasi-immortal mutants silently merged with his dao avatar and transformed his arms into wolf heads. The heads extended and lengthened as if they were tentacles, shooting toward Ivy.
Four silver lines after images flashed, but Ivy's cane and wane didn't look like they moved. However, red bloodstain got on the sharp edges.
A second later, four wolf heads fell to the river, leaving the assailant's four amputated arms.
The quasi-immortal mutant didn't flinch. His severed arms regenerated, and he continued his pursuit. His four colleagues caught up with him and unleashed their abilities.
One of them transformed into a four-armed werewolf. The second quasi-immortal became invisible. The third summoned a hundred 9th-stage flame wolves while the fourth transformed into a flame spirit.
Ivy was unperturbed. She tilted her head to the side, finding them cute.
"No domain ability? Then, rest in pieces."
Ivy ejected a long staff from her spatial ring. Glowing in purple light, the staff generated a small purple dome, covering all five quasi-immortal mutants and her inside. Then, the dome shrank.
POOF!
Everybody inside the purple dome vanished!
"!!!"
The 100 soul transformation mutants froze as they were taken aback by the abrupt chaos. They could no longer sense Ivy and their leaders.
Cat was also confused. However, she never missed an opportunity to strike. While being underwater, she flipped upside down, pointing her roots upward. Then, she created spike bullets with her roots and branches.
Green bullets shot out from the river like a machine gun. All sacred wood bullets from her were radioactive, and they carried a weaker version of Leo's cells.
The bullets pierced through half of the men's bodies!
The wounded mutants screamed in pain and pulled the bullet heads out of their bodies. As they already sold their souls to a demonic Fenrir, their flesh and blood were tainted. Thus, the sacred wood burnt their flesh and blood the same way they burnt undead creatures.
Sensing a threat, the remaining mutants dispersed and dove into the water to chase after Cat. As for the injured, they remained above the river to recuperate and recover. Little did they know that they fell into Cat's trap.
"Nom-Nom Meow!"
As if Cat was a marine creature, her roots and branches slithered into the water like eels. They snatched a dozen mutants in the water and pulled them toward her monster mouth.
The mutants sneered and summoned their dao avatars. But as they were about to unleash their Qi and essence, contaminated water got into their stomach and mutated them from the inside.
The others also felt the changes. Their skins corroded, and their eyes ceased functioning. Everybody in the water became blinded. Even their dantians, meridians, and Qi were blocked as their DNA was destroyed and altered.
Red rashes rapidly spread, and their muscle bloated and distorted. Let alone fighting, they could no longer swim or maintain their balance underwater.
Cat took her time, collecting her food. She brought out a storage ring, which she had stolen from Leo's warehouse.
She had been getting smarter. She already learned how spatial rings worked!
"Nom-Nom Meow!"
Cat gently pulled one of the mutants to her mouth. She bit his head off. Then, she stored the corpse in her storage ring.
CLINK
As storage rings couldn't be stored inside another spatial ring, a few rings remained in the water.
Cat pouted as she found multiple rings annoying. Still, she used one of her small branches to insert the rings. Afterward, she turned her attention to another mutating mutant.
The nom-nom festival began.
.
.
The 50 injured mutants still hovered over the river, looking at the blood-tainted water. They tried to communicate with their friends, but no one answered.
"What the hell are we fighting?!" One of them asked their colleague.
"I don't know! Isn't it supposed to be just a plant monster? It's only at the 8th stage!"
"Can an 8th-stage plant monster really fight underwater?!"
"Like I said, I don't know!"
The troops panicked. They looked at each other, unable to make decisions.
The quasi-immortals mysteriously vanished, and half of their unit lost contact with them. They started panicking.
One of them turned toward the main army. He fled the scene and shouted to others.
"I'm going to call for help! Don't just float there and watch! Keep attacking even if it's random!"
"…"
The men frowned as they didn't have to listen to the guy's order. However, his words made sense.
Everybody summoned their dao avatars. They utilized their unique techniques and threw various projectile skills at the river.
A barrage of fireballs, flame hurricanes, earth meteors, and lava beasts fell into the river, causing random explosions.
The river boiled. Bubbles burst on the surface while explosions and fountains erupted one after another.
"MYAAAA!!"
The trick worked. Cat leaped out of the river and fled toward a forest nearby.
The mutants sneered. They stopped attacking and pursued after Cat.
WHOOSH
A purple dome reemerged behind the group. As if it became a portal, Ivy slipped out of it.
Behind her were five purple four-armed men. They lifelessly followed after her as if they were mannequins.
"Oh, you're still here."
Ivy deeply sighed as she was slightly disappointed in Cat's performance. She thought that Cat could handle all of them on her own. Unfortunately, the creature still lacked experience in combat.
The lich girl waved her cane, pointing at the injured men.
"Go and unalive your former colleagues."
The five purple four-armed mutants widened their eyes. Instead of having eyeballs, purple flame lit inside the eye sockets while a part of their skin was reduced to the bone.
The quasi-immortal mutants had been converted into undead!
The mutants roared and started using their skills at their former friends. The latter screamed in fright before the stampede devoured their lives.
A minute after Ivy's return, the remaining mutants were wiped out, except one guy who had fled earlier.
When the ordeal was over, Cat ran back to Ivy's side. She moaned and cried as her plant body was burnt and scarred because of the barrage earlier. Even though the wounds slowly healed, she kept yowling.
"Meow! Meow!"
Ivy shook her head. She sat on top of the monster's body and patted Cat's human head.
"It's okay. The fight is over. We're safe."
"…Meow?"
"Yes. I got rid of them. Nobody can hurt you anymore."
"…"
Cat stopped crying. Then, she beamed at Ivy with a sly grin.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
Ivy's expression changed. She crossed her index finger.
"No, Cat. My new soldiers are not your food. You can eat what you killed, but you can't take my spoil of war."
Cat lowered her head. She then crawled back to the water to fetch the corpses.
Ivy bitterly laughed. She wondered what kind of teaching Leo had given to Cat as she was spoiled rotten.

chapters.title: Chapter 190 Pedophile Tourist Attempting to Sexual-Harass Girl during Halloween Event Shot By Florida Man Cosplayed as Pedophile Bear.
chapters.content:
Chapter 190 – Pedophile Tourist Attempting to Sexual-Harass Girl during Halloween Event Shot By Florida Man Cosplayed as Pedophile Bear.
BZZZ
While monitoring the lava badgers, Esen heard the voice transmission from Ivy. Her voice seemed excited.
'Master, I spotted an earth celestial immortal, 95 quasi-immortals, and a bunch of insects flying your way.'
Esen raised her eyebrows. She turned around and planned to deliver a telepathic voice to Leo. Unfortunately, he hadn't returned yet.
As Leo was not around, Esen had no one to shove the responsibility away.
"Meh. How troublesome. Oh, wait. We can do this."
Esen was confident that she could easily crush every Earth Celestial immortal with ease as long as they fought individually. But suddenly, she remembered that she hadn't tested Leo's new toys yet.
She replied to Ivy.
"Proceed as planned. Go pick up our comrades from home. I'll babysit that geezer's pets."
'Yes, master.'
Ivy and Cat continued heading south as planned. As for Esen, she stretched and yawned. Then, she informed everybody, including the badgers and tamer girls.
"Listen up, humans! Some death-seeking crap-stuck-on-their-butt idiotic immortals will launch a full-scale assault here tonight. Instead of patrolling everywhere, tell everybody to form ranks and gather south! You girls and these critters go hide inside that geezer's pointless store. Tell the adults to get their guns ready!"
.
.
Qiang Baidu arrived at Leo's domain border. He ordered his troops to stop marching forward.
In front of him, the mystic portal island stood tall, leaking waterfall to the canyon river. Small and big creatures poured out from an erected gate and fell along the natural water slide. Thunder caimans, cockatrices, rare fish, and dead land animals came out once every minute.
Below the flying island, a faint layer of fog covered the entire domain. The remnant force of heavenly tribulation clouds lingered in the area, empowering the fog with mild static electricity. However, green, purple, yellow, orange, and even red thunderbolts occasionally flashed inside the clouds underneath the flying island.
Hovering fearlessly under the tribulation clouds were the 50 nightmare horses, led by Ricardo. They remained in their beast form, concealing their true abilities. They all gathered at the south of the domain border, facing Qiang Baidu's troops.
On the ground, 50 unicorns formed ranks, standing together in a square formation. The leader of this unit, Taxi, had already transformed into a human. He stood on the rooftop of Leo's general store.
Behind Taxi, Hua Jiashan, Han Hao, Han Meng, Xu Nuan, Dongfang Mei, Tiger Swordsman, and the lazy dork Wu Buyi brought out their new arsenal.
Inside the general store hid the young disciples from Life Sword Sect and Amazonian Sanctuary. They peeked outside while standing behind the glass windows. Among them, Yao Qiqi and the newly recruited lava badgers hid there, serving as the last line of defense.
As for Esen and Marc, the former rested on a beach bed, next to the white tree array while Marc served as a human fan, generating breezy wind toward Esen with his Qi while mixing a cocktail drink for his master. He awkwardly blended a golden sand banana, arctic yin tomato, immortal grasses, and yin fluid to create a rare chilly drink. The duo didn't seem to be disturbed by the invaders.
On the guardian statues pretended to be lifeless. However, their eyes curved up, mocking the approaching mutants.
Meanwhile, Qiang Baidu gave the thunder unicorns and nightmares a meaningful look. All these 9th-stage monsters were a threat to his quasi-immortal unit. Only he could defeat them.
However, what concerned Qiang Baidu the most was the two youngsters near the south farmland. They seemed too relaxed, and Qiang Baidu couldn't measure their combat strength.
'Are they immortals? That can't be possible, right? I don't think this mortal plant has enough cultivation resources to nurture an immortal, let alone a quasi-immortal. If they had, Situ Nantian and Yan Xiang would have ascended long ago.'
Qiang Baidu shook off their theory that Esen and Marc were immortals. He believed they had an artifact, which concealed their cultivation base.
He scanned the domain and found interesting buildings, such as the Crystal Tower, parking lot building, apartments, and the shopping mall. He was interested in the spirit stone heart the most.
'That spirit stone heart… I see. That should be Immortal Florida Man's work. Does Florida Man here?'
Probing the domain, Qiang Baidu empowered his voice with his Qi, roaring.
"I AM QIANG BAIDU OF THE GORR TRIBE! BRING ME YOUR LEADER!"
His voice vibrated in the air, causing an earthquake. The horses flinched because of the intense voice. As for the weak elders, their ears bled, and everybody on the rooftop of the shopping mall collapsed to the ground.
The recycling center's mannequins rushed to work. They fetched new healing pills, the pinnacle-graded "Hope and Dream" pills, to feed the injured elders. Everybody took one and fell asleep on the spot. Even Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei couldn't withstand Qiang Baidu's voice.
The mannequins brought them into the shopping mall via the back door, and let them rest. Then, they visited the gunsmith and fetched finished rifles inside. After arming themselves, they went back to the rooftop, replacing the defensive forces.
Not only did the recycling center's mannequins react to the intruders, but the warehouse and granary mannequins reacted as well. However, instead of joining the fighting forces, they served as logistic officers, carrying necessary food and items to the shopping mall.
A minute later, no one from Leo's side came out. Only the ponies remained vigilance.
Seeing that nobody replied, Qiang Baidu believed that Leo might be in hiding or had already run away.
'Is he not here? Or rather, is Florida Man one of the two?'
Qiang Baidu glared at Marc. He had heard about Leo before, and the intel said he was an elderly man with a long white beard and white hair. However, this boy seemed to be in his teens, which didn't fit the description.
Still, anything could happen in this world. Qiang Baidu guessed that he might have consumed age-reduction medicines from the Tang Clan.
'I need to make sure they aren't immortals. I'll grab them myself.'
Qiang Baidu descended and landed 50 meters away from Esen and Marc. The former stomped toward the duo.
"Brat! Where is Florida Man?!"
Esen, who had changed her clothes to the domain's uniform, casually rose up. She put on a black suit and adjusted her breast pads before she faced Qiang Baidu.
"Who's asking?" Asked Esen.
Qiang Baidu gave Esen a meaningful look. As he managed to see her face under the moonlight, he noticed the otherworldly beautiful face of a high elf. His eyes automatically moved to her chest, which bulged under her shirt and suit.
The mutant drooled. He wanted her.
"Little girl. Which sect are you from?"
Esen rolled her eyes, "You didn't answer my question."
"Ha! I'm Qiang Baidu, the chieftain of the Gorr Tribe. You, little girl, should surrender to me when you have a chance. I'll even make you one of my concubines and guarantee your status and wealth!"
Marc's expression turned dark. He almost pulled out his blindfold clothes because of anger.
Esen raised her hand and stopped the Dullahan boy from taking action. She continued toying with Qiang Baidu.
"You? Taking me in? You should at least look at yourself in the mirror and clean your eyes with piss water. Do you think an ugly geezer like you deserve me?"
Qiang Baidu liked Esen's tone. He looked forward to breaking Esen's mind on their first wedding night.
"You might not know, but I'm an immortal. I have transcended this world's limitations and laws! Now, you have two choices. Be my concubine willingly, or I'll chop off your four limbs and use you as my personal toilet!"
Esen deeply sighed. She shook her head.
"Seriously, men are the same everywhere. Well, except that geezer."
Thinking of Leo, Esen faintly smiled. She found it comfortable freeloading in his domain. Moreover, he never tried to force himself on her.
Esen didn't realize that her happy smile aroused Qiang Baidu even more. He laughed and walked closer to her.
SHINK
Marc suddenly pulled out a giant bastard sword from his storage ring and slammed it on the ground between Esen and Qiang Baidu. The blindfolded clothes failed to conceal bright light from Marc's red glowing eyes.
"Stay away from my master, demon!" Marc glared at Qiang Baidu.
The mutant chieftain found the boy amusing. He laughed at Marc, "Are you Florida Man?"
Marc snorted. Because of various emotions, he yelled, "What if I say I am?!"
"Good!"
BOOM
A fist found its way to Marc's face. Qiang Baidu punched him and knocked his head off his shoulders.
"…"
Qiang Baidu frowned and looked at his fist. The feedback from his punch was weird as he didn't sense any Qi or defensive force from Marc.
Upon noticing that Marc's head was missing, Qiang Baidu laughed.
"What a showoff! If you're a mortal, you should have stayed outside of our business! Well, it's too late for you, though."
Qiang Baidu turned his attention to Esen next.
"Your boyfriend is dead, girly. Come to me obediently."
Esen crossed her arms. She snorted.
"First off, that boy is my servant, not my boyfriend. Secondly, when you fight a Dullahan, you have to destroy his soul first, not attack his head. After all, their heads are replaceable."
"What?"
Esen sat back on her beach bed. She took a sip of her cocktail, "What I'm trying to say is, you fucked up."
BOOM
Suddenly, the headless body of Marc picked up the bastard sword and swung it toward Qiang Baidu at lightning speed. The blade directly hit his stomach, but it failed to cut through his skin.
Qiang Baidu was sent flying 500 meters into the sky before he regained his balance. But when he looked back at Esen, he could no longer find Marc's headless body.
Marc's head reappeared 100 meters away in front of Qiang Baidu. As for his body, it was already above the guy.
The blindfold cloth was gone. Qiang Baidu could finally see Marc's face.
Marc had no physical eyes! In his eyesockets were two glowing red lightning balls, staring straight at Qiang Baidu's soul!
A new physique manifested, using Marc's head as its core. A red body made of red electricity gained mass while Marc's physical body emitted black flame.
"!!!"
The black aura of Marc's headless body revealed his true strength. Upon sensing his opponent's power, Qiang Baidu was terrified.
"RED TRIBULATION LIGHTNING?! YOU'RE NOT A MORTAL!"
Marc grumbled. His lightning physique teleported and grabbed Qiang Baidu's neck.
"Duh, obviously. Do you think a mortal can survive after hearing your shout up close? You didn't use your brain a lot, do you?"
ZAAAAAP
Using his pure Qi, Marc unleashed a red electric current through Qiang Baidu's body and fried him. At the same time, Marc's headless body swung the bastard sword down, cleaving Qiang Baidu's body from head to groin.
The body of the mutant chieftain was cut in half while it was burnt to crisp.
Marc released Qiang Baidu's cleaved neck. The body dissipated into black ash.
Despite the destruction of Qiang Baidu's body, Marc's eyes moved around, searching for his opponent's soul and new physique.
WHOOSH
A crimson dome emerged, enveloping Leo's domain and Qiang Baidu's troops. Flame from the dome's ceiling barriers poured down and condensed a new mass.
As Marc had expected, Qiang Baidu wasn't dead yet. The flame mass condensed Qiang Baidu's new body. He reappeared in front of his troops with his full clothes intact. His skin was slightly charred, while smoke came out from his body. However, all wounds instantly healed in seconds.
Marc clicked his tongue. He had fought immortals before, and killing them wasn't easy. To kill an immortal, he needed to destroy or disable his opponent's domain first.
On the ground, Esen had been observing the fight, and she was slightly disappointed in Marc's indecisiveness. She complained.
"Don't just use your brute strength against an immortal. Use everything necessary to crack or destroy your opponent's domain! If you can't, you lose!"
Marc nodded as he remembered the trick. He cursed in his mind.
"I'm getting rusty."
His red lightning physique and headless body activated their domain abilities in unison. A blood dome and an upside-down island emerged from nothingness.
The surface of the upside-down island was a cemetery. Tombs and graves were disorderly arranged while the black soil wailed as if it was haunted. At the center of the cemetery, a statue of a headless horseman was situated there, holding a long scythe and a bundle of heads.
The flying island hovered over the troops of Qiang Baidu. It also slowly spread black fog to conceal its existence. At the same time, the blood domain covered it.
The blood domain barrier and crimson flame domain overlapped. As both domains collided, their real bodies were affected.
Qiang Baidu flinched and looked above him. A scythe symbol hovered over his head as if he had been cursed by Marc's blood domain and the upside-down Cemetery Island.
Vice versa, Marc's headless body was caught in crimson flame. Fortunately, the black flame negated the burning effects, and the red lightning of Marc's soul devoured the weaker flame as fuel.
Whenever immortals overlapped their domains, they could tell which side had an advantage. Qiang Baidu's face darkened as he figured out that his opponent was immune to crimson flame.
Changing his strategy, Qiang Baidu chose another ability.
"It doesn't matter what your cultivation base is! As long as I have a soul domain that can counter your trump cards, I can kill you-UUGH!"
BANG!
Before Qiang Baidu could finish his sentences, Marc pulled out one of Leo's distributed rifles and shot Qiang Baidu with an enchanted sacred wood bullet. It pierced his throat directly, cutting off his voice.
Marc clicked his tongue as his aim was off. He readjusted his aim.
Qiang Baidu had enough. He healed his throat and bellowed.
"ALL UNITS, CHARGE! KILL THEM ALL! QUASI-IMMORTAL, GET RID OF THOSE 9TH-STAGE MONSTERS! AS FOR THE REST OF YOU, DESTROY EVERYTHING!"
The troops stopped observing. As they had witnessed Marc's strength, no one held back their skills.

chapters.title: Chapter 191 Florida Man Sued Dead Pro-War Rioters for Raiding His Shopping Mall and Got Shot to Death by His Employees.
chapters.content:
Chapter 191 Florida Man Sued Dead Pro-War Rioters for Raiding His Shopping Mall and Got Shot to Death by His Employees.
Chapter 191 – Florida Man Sued Dead Pro-War Rioters for Raiding His Shopping Mall and Got Shot to Death by His Employees.
"Oh, dear. They have done it, munya. Who's going to help them, munya?"
On the mystic realm portal platform, the three statues laughed at the invaders. They looked at each other.
The black-winged angel shrugged, "Rock, paper, scissors?"
The Cathulhu disagreed, "That's not fair, munya. I can only do tentacles. Pick another method, munya."
The Fenrir also panted and stuck out his tongue, pretending ignorance, "You want my paws, woof?"
"…"
As they didn't feel the necessity of participating in this fight, the trio pushed the responsibility to each other. However, as they had the same mind, they couldn't come to an agreement.
The angel facepalmed. He then glanced at his three concubines, including the new member. Qiang Qiang, who lost her soul and was converted into a stone golem, still sat on the angel's lap. Her apathetic gaze stared into the distance.
Meowmeow patted the girl's head. Then, he injected a fragment of her soul back.
Qiang Qiang's body jolted as if she was electrocuted. A second later, she looked around and found her new master. Instead of panicking or making a fuss, she nodded at Meowmeow.
She lost all her previous memory. The only instinct of Qiang Qiang was to follow this angel's instructions.
After converting Qiang Qiang into a complete slave, Meowmeow gave her the first order.
"New order for you. You will serve Lord Florida Man as your new master as he is also my master. For now, I want you to take the elevator to the first floor. When you arrive, you will pretend to be a fountain statue at the entrance of the shopping mall. If intruders manage to break in from the front, it will be your duty to stop them. Got it?"
Qiang Qiang nodded. She got down from the angel's lap and shrank her physique. With determination, she entered the elevator and got down to the first floor.
.
.
Upon Qiang Baidu's signal, the mutant army charged toward the nightmares and thunder unicorns. None of them was afraid of the monsters.
Taxi transformed into a human with a unicorn horn. The silver horn glowed and fired a yellow thunderbolt at the incoming quasi-immortal mutant.
The lightning bolt hit the demonic cultivator, but he came out unharmed. The mutant roared and manifested his flame axe. He swung down, aiming at Taxi's head.
CLINK
Taxi parried the strike with his horn. While he was at it, he pulled out his rifle and pointed at the mutant's face.
"SMASH!"
Unlike the naïve Dullahan, Taxi had been through countless battles in the mystic realm. He knew when he should unleash an all-out attack to finish off a strong enemy.
He injected the sacred wood bullet into the chamber with yellow lightning energy. Then, he pulled the trigger.
BOOM
The rifle and sacred wood bullet amplified the energy and unleashed an orange laser beam.
Getting shot in the face, the quasi-immortal's head and upper shoulders melted. His soul was pulverized without a chance to recover.
Just like that, Taxi claimed the first kill. He then exhaled a long fume of white smoke from his mouth.
"Smash!" (Get them, boys!)
Learning from their pack leader, the other thunder unicorns transformed into naked humans. As they had prepared freshly-made rifles from the gunsmith workshop, everybody armed themselves and aimed at the sky.
BOOM
BOOM
BOOM
49 orange beams ascended to the sky and devoured unlucky mutants in their paths. The proud quasi-immortal mutants fell one after another. However, the majority of them dodged the attack with ease.
After one volley, they instantly downed 6 quasi-immortal mutants and 600 soldiers.
The unicorns reloaded their guns and prepared to shoot again. But then, they discovered the problem with their rifles – The gun muzzles were bright red!
"SMASH!" (Someone go fetch new boomsticks! We can't use these again!)
The unicorns were smart. They realized that the rifles got overheated after they forcefully injected their yellow lightning energy into the gun chambers. 20 of them kicked the ground and chose to fight in close combat while the rest stayed on the ground, shooting lightning bolts at their enemies instead.
One of Taxi's comrades rushed into the store. He ignored the panicking disciples and went to the gunsmith.
"Smash!" (I'll borrow these!)
The guy grabbed as many guns as he could and rushed out to supply his friends.
"…"
The two mannequins in the workshop only glanced at the naked unicorn man. After which, they shook their heads and continued crafting more rifles and bullets.
.
In the sky, Ricardo and 49 Nightmares didn't bother using Leo's guns. They all transformed into muscular bronze men with black unicorn horns on their foreheads. Strangely, after they had transformed, they all wore a red bandanna and tight bikini underwear.
Seeing the charging army, Ricardo turned around and made a pose. The others also did the same as if they choreographed the moves. Then, they sexily turned back and smiled at the invaders. Again, the entire team was in sync, busting a move in unison.
"…"
The group of quasi-immortal mutants and soldiers had goosebumps. Because of the weird vibe and air of these bronze unicorn men, their movements slowed down by a beat.
At that moment, the mannequins on the shopping mall's rooftop struck. They loaded their guns with spirit stones and fired small laser beams at the soldiers behind the quasi-immortals.
All recycling center's mannequins stared at their enemies with glowing bloody lenses. Their joints crackled while they reloaded new spirit stone bullets, which were freshly minted from the recycling machine. Because their residual Qi was 100 times thicker than standard spirit stones, these new bullets were slightly better than the regular sacred wood bullets from the gunsmith.
"AAAAAHHHH!"
Because the attack was not as flashy as the massive laser, it caught the backline soldiers off guard. Every shot always hit a person.
A soul transformation mutant's physique was as sturdy as a quasi-immortal cultivator. Although they were shot, none of them died on the spot. Instead, they circulated their elemental essence into their wounds to regenerate their flesh.
Their usual techniques would have worked had Hua Jiashan or others used the same guns and bullets. However, the sharpshooters were mannequins of Leo, who were created from his system. Combined with the special spirit stones, the bullets were perfect catalysts for the system mannequins to borrow Leo's power.
The wounds on the soul transformation mutants turned black. Instead of mending or recovering, they got infected.
They thought they had the superior physique of a demon. They thought they had graduated from being a mortal. However, the contagious flesh-mutating virus from the bullets broke the bubbles and taught them the harsh reality of this universe.
The bullets of mannequins could mutate people the same way when they touched objects or living beings!
"NOOOOO!!"
Their bodies uncontrollably swelled and bloated. Some of their guts imploded and gushed out from their orifices. Moreover, their nascent souls couldn't be ejected from their fresh bodies!
The mannequins leisurely fired more rounds. As they had a hivemind, none of them shot the same person twice.
After launching two volleys, the enemy troops reached them. Two hundred soul transformation cultivators landed on the rooftop while a thousand got behind the shopping mall building. As for the quasi-immortals, they got entangled in close combat against the unicorn men.
The mannequins dispersed. They leaped in all directions while they shot more mutants in mid-air. One of them tackled a nearby mutant and put a bullet in the latter's head. Afterward, he showed the most disrespectful behavior by twerking close to the enemy's face during the mutation process.
No one had the luxury time to scold the ill-mannered mannequin. Everybody chased after the gun robots in anger.
Unfortunately, the mannequins didn't know how to fly. As they could only jump and leap, most of them got caught. The mutants pummeled them and attempted to break their bodies into pieces.
The mannequins expressionlessly endured the assaults even though various Qi skills and palms crushed their limbs and torso in half. Their bodies reddened. Then, they exploded.
Black flame emerged from the self-detonating mannequins and devoured the soul transformation cultivators on top of them. Several hundred demonic cultivators died on the spot.
"SMASH!!"
The destruction and the explosions distracted Taxi and Ricardo. Both horsemen bellowed in anger, thinking that they had just lost their comrades.
But the next moment, the hidden feature of the system domain was activated. A portion of iron pine logs in the junkyard automatically moved and fell into the acidic liquid of the recycling center's pool. Instead of the pool melting the log into spirit stones, the wood turned into worker mannequins that had died earlier.
Their red lens gleamed as all of them retained their memory. Their hivemind also learned from their mistakes and discovered new tactics that they could use.
CRACK-CRACK
The newly respawned mannequins rushed back to where they had died and grabbed their guns. They resumed shooting at the invaders around the shopping mall, protecting Leo's headquarters.
The surrounding mutants noticed their emergence. At first, everybody thought they were hidden soldiers from Leo's building. As they also learned from their comrade's mistakes, the mutants threw dao avatar attacks from a long-range, preventing their suicide bomb attack tactic.
Several mannequins exploded into black flame upon destruction. But again, they quickly consumed logs from the junkyard and came back to life.
One of the quasi-immoral mutants noticed the commotion. He also spotted how the acid pool produced new mannequins. Despite being in combat against a unicorn man, he ordered his subordinates.
"DESTROY THAT POOL AND THAT MACHINE! THEY ARE PRODUCING THE GOLEMS!"
Two hundred soul transformation cultivators descended from the sky and hurled 5,000 fireballs at the structure.
RUMBLE
Flame erupted, and the building was caught on fire. However, the pool and the recycling machine were still intact.
BANG
Suddenly, a cat-eared mannequin walked out from the shopping mall, wearing the domain's black suit uniform. She also carried a dozen sets of black suits, and she rushed toward the recycling center. Unafraid of random attacks from above, she passed the suit to the newly respawned mannequins.
BOOM
One of the fireballs hit her back. Fortunately, the suit neutralized the damage to her body. Still, the impact staggered her forward.
As soon as the clothing store mannequin stumbled, the male mannequins flinched. Their expression turned dark as if a hoodlum assaulted their girlfriend.
CRACKLE
Despite being angry, they put on the new uniform. As if the clothing store mannequin knew about their weaknesses, she also made them gloves and cloth masks.
After putting everything on, they became ninjas in a business suit. Everybody returned to the battlefield.
The clothing store mannequin nodded in approval and fled to the shopping mall, avoiding the battle. However, several hundred eyes noticed her actions, and they followed after her.
Instantly, the mutants found the back entrance of the shopping mall.
"FOLLOW THAT DAMN GOLEM! KILL EVERYBODY INSIDE!"
The soul transformation mutants threw their attacks at the main building next. More explosions enveloped the shopping mall building. However, the glass windows and the walls were unaffected by their strikes.
BOOM
A black statue suddenly blasted out from the backdoor of the shopping mall. She then transformed back to her original size.
Qiang Qiang, the new gargoyle statue, made her debut as Leo's shopping mall guardian. She looked around and opened her four arms. Then, she clenched her fists.
CRACK
A domain ability of Qiang Qiang was unleashed. Five hundred soul transformation soldiers above the recycling centers and a dozen men behind the shopping mall were squeezed by something invisible. Their bodies were crushed like pancakes.
However, Qiang Qiang's ability wasn't omnipotent. Despite killing so much, she couldn't use it repeatedly. After releasing her hands, Qiang Qiang's arms cracked. She glanced at her cracking stone arms for a moment and concentrated on healing her new physique.
While healing, one of the invaders recognized her. He screamed.
"LADY QIANG QIANG?!"
.
.
"Why are they so noisy outside?"
Gao Yan opened his eyes. He had eaten Leo's Floridian Dantian Pill, and he hadn't fully digested the pill effects yet. However, his cultivation advanced to the soul formation realm, aka the 6th-stage. He was one stage below the soul transformation realm.
Although Gao Yan was not ready to come out of the seclusion, he paused his cultivation schedule and stepped out of his house.
As soon as he came out, a quasi-immortal's headless corpse fell from the sky and landed in front of him, splashing blood on his face. Taxi also descended and stomped the dead body for good measure.
Taxi then noticed Gao Yan. He smiled at the guy.
"Smash?" (What's up, amigo? Did you just wake up?)
Gao Yan wryly smiled, "What's happening here?"
Taxi pointed to the sky. Gao Yan looked up.
"Oh."
The nightmares were in combat against quasi-immortals in the sky while Taxi's unicorns battled another group on the ground. However, thousands of soul transformation mutants rained upon the main store's building.
A hundred of them rushed toward Gao Yan. One of them summoned his titan dao avatar and was about to punch Gao Yan.
The teenager didn't bother looking at the titan avatar. He pulled out a pistol from his belt and pulled the trigger, aiming at the real body of the giant without looking.
BANG
Leo's pistol was more powerful than the mass-produced rifles. Even though Gao Yan only loaded sacred wood bullets in his magazine, it had more destructive power than the mannequin's version.
The soul transformation mutant died instantly, body and soul!
BANG-BANG-BANG-BANG-BANG-BANG
As if Gao Yan's hands were possessed, he rapidly pulled the trigger and adjusted his aim after every shot. Within one second, he emptied the magazine. 14 more mutants fell from the sky.
Gao Yan yawned, but his hands reloaded a new magazine in less than a second. He looked at Taxi while he fired 15 more shots at the sky.
"Do I need to fight? I have to go back and cultivate some more?"
Taxi shrugged.
"Smash?" (Can you help? We're under manpower here.)
"I need more bullets. I have like… 5 more mags, maybe?"
CLICK
After finishing that sentence, Gao Yan reloaded the second mag and emptied the chamber in the next second.
In a flash, Gao Yan already killed 45 invaders without even looking.
Taxi smirked at Gao Yan.
"Smash!" (I'll tell my boy to fetch you some ammo.)
"Thanks."
Taxi kicked the ground and tackled another quasi-immortal nearby. He and his colleague proceeded to stomp the poor guy to death.
Gao Yan snickered and pulled out a lightsaber. He tossed it in front of him and controlled it with his Qi.
WHOOM
The activated lightsaber floated in mid-air, acting as Gao Yan's flying sword. He reloaded another mag and continued firing.
"Hwuaah. I'm kinda sleepy. I want to go back to my dream world and train again."
The Floridian Dantian Pill was at work. Gao Yan already spent a hundred years in his dream training in various firearms. It was a matter of time before he became immortal John Wick.

chapters.title: Chapter 192 NetFlex Announced New Hangover Movie Would Be Based on True Story of Florida Man Waking Up to the Aftermath of Alien War.
chapters.content:
Chapter 192 NetFlex Announced New Hangover Movie Would Be Based on True Story of Florida Man Waking Up to the Aftermath of Alien War.
Chapter 192 – NetFlex Announced New Hangover Movie Would Be Based on True Story of Florida Man Waking Up to the Aftermath of Alien War.
The black-winged angel Meowmeow closed his eyes and observed the fight with his senses. Seeing how underperformed the mannequins were, he frowned.
"Why are the mannequins so weak, munya? I thought they were stronger than trashy immortals, munya." Complained Mu-Nyang.
Meowmeow also had the same thoughts. But after taking a better look, he realized something.
"Our lord is too far away from us. The mannequins exert their fullest potential. They are strongest when our master is around."
"But haven't mastered built us a pylon tower for us, munya?"
