Mu-Nyang referred to the crystal tower with the spirit stone heart. It had been supplying this domain with abundant yin-yang Qi. However, compared to Leo's presence, its energy supply was negligible.
The angel deeply sighed, "It's still not enough. The energy consumption of "Purgatory Flame" is too great. Think of a battery. When many electrical appliances are active at once, the battery will be rapidly drained. Also…"
Meowmeow opened his eyes and stood up. Then, he walked toward the edge of the platform.
"Have you felt it?"
"Feel what, munya?"
The angel gazed toward the stars. His expression turned dark.
"The eyes that are watching us from above."
"!!!"
The Fenrir and Cathulhu statues widened their eyes. Then, they looked up. Then, they noticed the anomaly. Although the night sky was full of stars, the three detected faint killing intent from far away directed at them.
The Fenrir statue instantly recognized the stare. The pair of eyes came from someone from his race.
The Fenrir statue bore fangs. He lowered his stance and prepared to shuttle to space. However, the Cathulhu statue jumped and body-pressed the wolf as if a professional wrestler delivering a finishing move.
The wolf was stunned and dizzy. His eyes spun.
The Cathulhu comically flipped the wolf statue over and pinned him. Then, one of his tentacles counted the fall.
"ONE, TWO, THREE! DING-DING-DING! MUNYA!"
The Fenrir statue came back to his senses. He glared at the cat and barked, "What are you doing, woof?!"
"Our master aren't here, munya. Until he's back, no big fight, munya."
"…"
The angel nodded in approval, "He's right, doggy. We're running on a reserve battery right now. Look at my girl. Even though she got an upgrade from me, she can't use her full strength.
While they chatted, a barrage of fireballs, fire lances, flame wheels, and fire hurricanes descended upon Qinag Qiang. She endured the random attacks and came out with a slight crack in her chest.
Noticing the damage to his subordinate, Meowmeow let out a long sigh.
"We're running low on energy. We have to assume that our master won't return any time soon. Let's help them and finish this quickly."
The angel vanished. He reappeared in the middle of Qiang Baidu's army.
"!!!"
The appearance of the giant statue surprised the soul transformation mutants. They shouted and summoned their dao avatars.
Meowmeow unsheathed a long katana, and a dark dome emerged, covering everybody within Leo's domain. He then swung it once and sheathed the katana.
WHOOSH
The dome of darkness vanished, revealing the result of the attack.
"Huh?"
"Eh?"
2,000 soul transformation mutants and 30 quasi-immortal elites were cleaved in half. They widened their eyes as their bodies split vertically. Moreover, their souls got stuck inside their dying physiques.
In one attack, the angel statue cut down 25% of Qiang Baidu's troops!
The angel returned to the platform. He let out a long sigh and threw his butt on his throne. He then complained.
"I'm out of energy. You two are next."
"Okay, munya…"
"…Woof."
The two beast statues seemed hesitant as they didn't want to run out of energy. Still, for the sake of protecting Leo's place, they took action. Both wolf and cat jumped out of the mystic portal platform.
.
.
Qiang Baidu glanced at the battlefield while he parried Marc's strikes. The battle did not go well for his side.
The horned men teamed up and isolated his quasi-immortal elites to a 3v1 or 2v1 combat. They also used long-ranged weapons, which always erased one or two elite bodyguards per shot.
It had been 10 minutes into the fight, but their number was reduced by half. As for the other party's casualty, only the wooden golems were destroyed. Still, every time they were destroyed, they self-exploded, killing a dozen soul-transformation mutants at once.
As for the property damage, it was hopeless. The shopping mall building remained intact while the recycling center only suffered from slight burn damage.
At this rate, his forces would be wiped out. The humiliation of losing to a tiny force with less than 200 combatants angered him.
"FLORIDA MAN!!"
Mistaking Marc for Leo, Qiang Baidu roared and used his trump card. He pulled out a black pill from his spatial ring and ate it.
As soon as the pill entered his stomach, his skin turned black. His physique grew larger while all of his bodily hair fell.
Marc backed away from Qiang Baidu as he sensed something amiss. From his point of view, Qiang Baidu gave an air of a demonic creature from another world.
Two black horns grew from Qiang Baidu's temples. His jaws extended forward like a savage beast. All his muscles bulged while his blood vessels expanded and lengthened. Two demonic wings emerged from his back. As for his legs, the bones and joints transformed, turning into massive goat legs.
It took Qiang Baidu only two seconds to transform from a four-armed mutant into a 10-meter-tall four-armed demon with a dog face.
The consciousness of Qiang Baidu faded, replaced with pure primal instinct. He howled and charged at Marc.
Marc's main head left behind an afterimage and teleported two meters behind the demonic werewolf. His red lightning arm pierced through Qiang Baidu's back and unleashed the red tribulation lightning upon him.
BOOM
An explosion occurred. However, it was Marc's arm that exploded. As for Qiang Baidu, he was unharmed.
The headless body carried Marc's bastard sword. He hacked down, aiming at Qiang Baidu's neck.
CLANK
Instead of lopping off the demon's neck, Marc's precious artifact was broken in half. Moreover, the body flinched
Marc frowned as he suspected something. While clenching his lost arm, he fired a transparent thunderbolt at Qiang Baidu.
BZZZ
The electricity hit the demon, but it was Marc who took the damage.
"I see. An attack reflection domain ability, this is troublesome."
Marc regenerated his lost arm and put his head back to his physical body. Then, he flew toward the inverted flying island, heading to the Dullahan statue in the cemetery.
The statue reacted. It moved and jumped out of the cemetery, flying toward its master. Then, the two extended their index finger and gently touched each other's fingertips.
"FUSION!"
The horseman statue merged with Marc. The flying island hummed and generated a gravity force, pulling everybody in the sky toward the cemetery. At the same time, Marc emerged as a black knight riding on an armored war horse.
When the transformation finished, Marc didn't pursue Qiang Baidu. He threw away his precious bastard sword and pulled out a long scythe from the saddle's weapon holder. He rotated it over his head to warm up.
RUMBLE
The gravity force of the inverted island had a mind of its own. It directly pulled Qiang Baidu toward the cemetery.
Marc chased after the demonic werewolf. Even though he couldn't harm the demon, he could isolate the Earth Celestial demon and protect his weaker allies on the battlefield.
.
Esen still rested on a beach bed, observing the chaotic battlefield next to the white tree array.
Although Esen seemed lazy, she worked harder than anybody. She had been maintaining a transparent dome, covering the farms and the white tree array.
This domain made everything inside invisible. Moreover, it generated an illusion of a burning farmland, tricking the invaders.
In addition to the farmland protection, she kept an eye on the unicorns and nightmares on the battlefield. Whenever they got critically injured by the mutants, she secretly dragged them inside the domain and transferred some yin essence to the beasts, healing them in the process. Then, she kicked them out.
While monitoring the battlefield, she glanced at Marc to see how the boy fared against an earth immortal.
She was slightly disappointed. She thought that Marc would defeat Qiang Baidu easily, but the latter was abnormal.
'Which overlord is backing that guy? A demon? A Fenrir? Or both?'
Several names came to Esen's mind, such as Overlord Lucky, Overlord Hein, and Overlord Anuboque. Although she had never met them in the past, she was aware of their existence as her former mentor was one of the overlords as well.
Because of the complications and the involvement of galactic entities, Esen figured that Marc might not be Qiang Baidu's opponent this time. She stood up and stretched. Then, she rubbed her throat, sending voice transmission to another subordinate.
"Beatrice, how's it going?"
The death knightress Beatrice instantly replied, 'I'm observing the Magpie City at the moment, Your Majesty.'
"What about the humans?"
'No danger.'
"Good. Come back and help your brother. He is fighting an incarnation of an overlord or an entity at the moment. He knows how to kill souls, but he doesn't know how to kill an apostle."
'Understood, Your Majesty. Heading back now.'
Esen let out a sigh of relief. She looked up, watching over Marc.
But as Esen looked up, someone accidentally stepped into her domain again. The next thing she heard was a buzzing hum of a lightsaber cutting through a person's limb.
"AAAAAHHHH!"
A soul transformation mutant collapsed on his butt after losing two of his arms to Gao Yan. The latter leisurely walked toward his opponent while commanding his flying lightsaber to deflect a fireball from above. He pointed his gun's muzzle at the mutant's head and pulled the trigger.
BANG
Another mutant went down.
Gao Yan turned around and walked out of the invisible domain as if he didn't sense the changes. When he left, Taxi rushed to Gao Yan's side and supplied him with a barrel of unorganized 9mm bullets.
"Smash!" (There you go, boy. Have fun smashing!)
Gao Yan nodded at Taxi, "Many thanks, senior."
Although Gao Yan got more ammo, he still needed to put them in empty magazines first. Without looking at the barrel of ammunition, Gao Yan flickered seven empty magazines over the barrel.
Using only his Qi, he commanded the ammo to fill the magazines. In 10 seconds, 105 bullets were ready to use. He took the mags and started blasting holes while he completely left the domain.
Esen looked at Gao Yan and noticed Thora, who followed Gao Yan around as usual. She turned toward her and deeply bowed. Then, she awkwardly chased after her boyfriend.
Looking at Gao Yan, Esen felt like she had seen him somewhere before, but she couldn't remember.
"Where have I seen that guy? I kinda remember someone with a similar fighting style, but I can't remember…"
Esen tilted her head and fell into deep thought for a long time.
.
.
Beatrice returned to the domain an hour later. However, by the time she arrived, the fight was almost over.
The Cathulhu statue and Fenrir statue briefly joined the battlefield and killed 3,000 soul transformation cultivators instantly. Then, they left. As for the quasi-immortals, Taxi, Ricardo, Qiang Qiang, and 98 Pony Legion crushed them with Esen's support.
The remaining soul transformation mutants were either devoured by random bullets from Taxi's subordinates or mannequin musketeers. As for Gao Yan, he loitered in front of his house and shopping mall, picking off stray mutants in the area.
The remaining fight was located on the inverted island above Leo's domain. On the cemetery island, a demonic werewolf continued chasing after Marc in his knight appearance.
Beatrice flew to the cemetery and landed behind the demonic wolf. She pulled out a 1.5-meter-long blade from her chest. The purple blade emitted a black aura of death and extreme yin essence, which no living being could use.
It was the aura of death itself.
Beatrice slowly took off her blindfold. She calmly opened her eyelids, revealing her pitch-black eyeballs.
As soon as Beatrice revealed her eyes, the demon werewolf flinched as if he regained sanity. Qiang Baidu turned around to see the Grim Reaper.
SHING
A purple horizontal light flashed and vanished. Beatrice swung her blade the same way Meowmeow did, minus the domain of darkness. Then, the purple blade receded into her chest.
"???"
Qiang Baidu didn't feel anything. But a second later, his body collapsed on the ground lifelessly. Transparent purple particles flew out from his physique as if his soul had disintegrated.
His attack reflection ability was ineffective against Beatrice's mysterious blade. Only Esen, Ivy, and Marc were aware of the true terror of this death knight.
Marc, who was still in his knight armor, lowered his scythe. He didn't do anything fancy other than running around on his war horse, dodging Qinag Baidu's random attacks. He canceled his transformation and smiled at his sister.
"Sister Bea, you're back!"
Beatrice silently nodded. She revealed a faint smile for a moment before she resumed her usual pokerface. She put back her blindfold clothes and closed her eyes.
"You lack training."
Marc slouched his shoulders, "But I fought hard."
"You lack training."
"…"
Marc wanted to cry, but he had no tears. He deactivated his domain ability, and the inverted cemetery island vanished.
Sounds of combat ceased, and the night regained its tranquility. No cheer or celebration was heard from the winner's side even though they just defeated an overwhelming army of an immortal.
.
.
Morning
WHOOSH
Leo finally returned to the bedroom of his battle bus. He deeply inhaled and treasured the stale air of the master bedroom. As he missed his domain and people, he stepped out of the bus to tell everybody that the daddy was home.
As soon as Leo got out of the parking lot building, he found a trace of carnage last night. He also found Esen and her two minions, dragging corpses of weird humanoid creatures toward the junkyard.
"Wut da hail happened here?"

chapters.title: Chapter 193 Woman Called Cops on Florida Man For Allegedly Sexual-Harassed Her, Made Her Fall in Love with Him, Then Friendzoned Her. No Baby Has Been Conceived.
chapters.content:
Chapter 193 Woman Called Cops on Florida Man For Allegedly Sexual-Harassed Her, Made Her Fall in Love with Him, Then Friendzoned Her. No Baby Has Been Conceived.
Chapter 193 – Woman Called Cops on Florida Man For Allegedly Sexual-Harassed Her, Made Her Fall in Love with Him, Then Friendzoned Her. No Baby Has Been Conceived.
Leo inspected the exterior of his buildings. Scars of burn and sword scratches remained visible on the shopping mall's walls, apartments, and the parking lot. Although they posed no threat to the structure's stability, they ruined the aesthetic and the beauty of these modern buildings.
Gazing at these buildings reminded Leo of when he just purchased a brand new car, but some douchbag door-dinged him, leaving behind small scratches on the mint car.
"Who did this?!"
Leo bellowed and stomped into the shopping mall to check the interior and his workers.
Upon entering the main store's building, Leo found a stone fountain. His legs froze as he didn't remember building it here.
"Lord Florida Man!"
"He's back!"
"We're safe!"
Leo pursed his lips. He looked around and found some familiar faces among the crowd.
"Wu Buyi!" Shouted Leo.
Wu Buyi sprinted with all his might. He slid with his knees, bent forward, and kowtowed at the same time. As if he had calculated his strength, the sliding stopped when he arrived in front of Leo. As a result, the alchemist elder invented the sliding kowtow for the first time.
"Your loyal servant is here, my lord!"
"Explain the situation?"
"Of course, my lord!" Wu Buyi stood up and rubbed his hands. He then recounted the last night's incident.
.
.
At the junkyard, the war veterans, namely the mannequin troopers, sat and rested near the recycling pool. The cracks and damage of their bodies rapidly healed. As for the domain uniforms they wore, they still emitted white smoke as everybody went through a series of bombardments.
The gentle clothing store mannequin carried warm towels toward the group. She distributed the towels to the fighters.
The boys gazed at her and blushed. All mannequins kept staring at their goddess while she walked around and checked the conditions of her colleagues.
Meanwhile, non-combatants came out and cleaned the battlefield. Warehouse and granary mannequins got busy transferring, sorting, and filtering useful goods from useless ones. Useless junk, such as regular grain pills, food, used clothes, and common weaponry were thrown into the pool. As for the rest, namely spirit stones, essence stones, rare plants, fruits, meat, books, and artifacts, the mannequins arranged them in the center of the junkyard, waiting for Leo's inspection.
That was not all. As there were so many enemies, corpses and blood were harvested and collected in one of the granaries. Esen took charge of this arrangement and relocated farmland crops and other food from the first granary to the second building. As for the first storeroom, she stored buckets of fresh blood and whole corpses. As for the militated and mutated ones, she collected them in spatial rings and put them in the first granary.
Marc and Beatrice were busy running around and fetching dead bodies outside of Leo's domain. They also watched over the young workers, who came out to help with the clean-up.
Leo came out of the shopping mall's backdoor and walked toward the junkyard. Wu Buyi trailed behind his master.
When Leo found the piles of new goodies, his foul mood vanished. A bright smile returned to his face.
"So much trash to recycle! Excellent!"
Wu Buyi and young workers from Life Sword Sect sweated profusely while they gazed at the mountains of precious artifacts, spirit stones, and essence stones. They silently cursed Leo in their mind that he treated these treasures as junk.
"M-My lord. Those are spirit stones, essence stones, and martial art books. We should at least arrange them properly."
Leo smirked. He walked toward the mountain of spirit stones and spat on it several times, making sure that every marble was baptism by his almighty blessings.
In the blink of an eye, all trivial spirit stones evolved into essence stones with the highest quality.
Leo laughed, "Now, these balls are no longer trash. Mannequins, my boy! Stash these in one of the warehouses! Store them in some spatial rings or something! We'll use these to pay our slaves next month!"
Wu Buyi and the human bystanders coughed blood. Although some of them had seen Leo's feat and abilities once, their hearts and minds couldn't comprehend or adapt to the new reality and logic in this place.
Their wages were a bunch of saliva-soaked spirit stones? That was the common question in their minds.
Leo moved to the pile of essence stones next. Instead of spitting on them, he stored everything in his spatial rings. These resources would be useful for the soul stone crafting project in the future.
Afterward, Leo shifted his attention to the artifacts.
Giant axes, blade wheels, swords, and spears were common weapons that the Gorr Tribe used in the previous battle. Every piece of weapon was made from a special red ore, which Leo had never seen before.
Looking at the crimson weapons, Leo scoffed.
"Trash!"
"PFFFT!"
Again, Wu Buyi and the young men coughed blood. Their kidneys clenched so hard that their bloody kidney stones gushed out from their pee hole.
The pain was unbearable. Every man closed their legs and covered their groins while they shed tears of agony.
While Leo inspected the loot, Hua Jiashan, Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, Xu Nuan, and Dongfang Mei rushed out of the shopping mall to greet him. Everybody just recovered from the previous injuries, and they were happy to see their strongest backer again in one piece.
But then, Leo approached the mountain of skill books, martial art manuals, and scrolls containing various cultivation methods. He flipped through the content and uttered in a crispy voice.
"Trash!"
"…"
A line of blood leaked out from the corners of everybody's mouths even though they had bright expressions on their faces. Their livers churned as if Hajime Ippo delivered them a full-blown liver punch to the guts.
Hua Jiashan silently approached Leo. Without saying anything, he stored all books and scrolls in his spatial ring. Then, he calmly brought them to the library building, which he recently built next to Wu Buyi's workshop.
Han Hao learned from an example. With dull eyes, he gathered all the artifacts in his spatial ring. He then gazed at Leo.
"Lord Florida Man. I would like to request permission to build a weapon pavilion for our domain."
Leo didn't bother looking at Han Hao, "Suit yourself."
"I'll integrate the contribution system of the Life Sword Sect to the new pavilion."
Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, Xu Nuan, and Dongfang Mei's eyes gleamed. They bowed in unison, "We will also help."
Leo waved his hand and shooed them away. The group widely grinned and flew toward the northeast zone of Leo's domain to construct their new weapon pavilion.
The weapons and books were all taken away, leaving behind random pills and miscellaneous objects.
Leo turned around and glanced at Wu Buyi. The latter looked back and forth between Leo and the mountain of pill containers, full of unidentified pills.
It was not hard to guess Wu Buyi's intention. Leo snorted.
"A man's trash is another man's treasure. I don't plan to experiment or study random junk I picked up from corpses. Do whatever you want with those, but I want you to report to me the recipes and the effects of those pills."
Wu Buyi was moved to tears. He kowtowed so hard his butt pointed to the sky.
"THANK YOU, MY LORD! PRAISE LORD FLORIDA MAN! PRAISE THE FLORIDA GOD!"
"…"
Wu Buyi gathered everything and waltzed to his workshop in glee.
Looking at the obnoxious butt-kisser, Leo shook his head. He turned his attention to the other important "trash" that he could use.
They were the corpses of mutants.
While Leo admired the mountain of four-armed men, Esen sneaked behind Leo's back. She injected every ounce of her Qi into her fangs and leaped at Leo's nape.
As if Leo had an eye on his back, he turned around and grabbed Esen's face. His big palm pressed her nose.
"Unhand me, you ingrate!" Esen flailed her arms, throwing a tantrum.
Leo gave her a meaningful look and glanced at the dead body. Guessing that Esen might have worked hard to defend his domain, he released her and patted her head instead.
"Thanks."
"Hmph!" Esen snorted, "My subordinates and I worked hard. I want compensation!"
"What do you need?"
"I want your blood!"
"Sure."
"Huh?"
Esen was taken aback as she expected a different reaction. She only messed around with Leo for a little revenge for all the bullying. Because of the sudden gentleness and consideration, she blushed, thinking that Leo cared for her.
Betraying her expectation, Leo bit the tip of his tongue and shoved it in her mouth. Then, he smirked.
"Lick it good, brat!"
"!!!"
Esen's face reddened to the ears from embarrassment and anger. She then bit his finger, but her teeth couldn't even put a dent in his skin or nail.
"YOU'RE BULLYING ME AGAIN!?"
"No, I'm rewarding you. Also, your tongue is very soft."
"!!!"
Realizing that Leo teased her, Esen spat Leo's finger out. However, her face and ears were still as red as tomatoes.
"Y-Y-Y-You will pay for this humiliation!"
Leo smirked and teased her again, "I'll pay you with my body anytime."
"!!!"
Esen flinched. Her mind wandered elsewhere as she took Leo's words seriously. Her mind wandered and imagined impossible scenarios.
Seeing Esen's reaction, Leo laughed and disillusioned her.
"I mean, I'll pay you with my blood. What were you thinking?"
"!!!??"
White smoke came out from Esen's crimson ears and face. She covered her eyes with her hands and sprinted away in embarrassment and shame.
Looking at the flustered elf, Leo snickered. Teasing this spoiled girl reminded him of the good times he had with his close friends on Earth. Unfortunately, after coming to this world, he couldn't find anybody who he could consider as a friend. So far, only customers and subordinates were around him.
A bold and rebellious girl came at the right time. She was strong enough to overcome his immortal cancer cells, and she treated him as her equal. Thus, he couldn't help but prank or tease her every time they were together.
After Esen had left, Leo turned his attention to the main course. He rubbed his hands.
"So many yin fluid and pill ingredients. I'm rich!"
He giggled like a hyena. Then, he proceeded to collect corpses to his spatial rings.
.
Stuffing a thousand whole corpses into a storage ring was easy. However, the process of adding them all into spatial rings was tedious.
As spatial rings were programmed to recognize a dead body as a unique object, the ring owner had to manually add the corpse into a ring by using their Qi as storage rings automatically rejected living beings. Shoving dead bodies into a storage ring at once always resulted in rejection.
Leo sat there, dragging one corpse after another into a ring. The first hundred bodies were easy as Leo was enthusiastic. However, after repeating the process 2,000 times, he was bored.
'I should have delegated someone to do this. Why am I doing this?'
He stopped working and rechecked the remaining dead bodies in the junkyard.
The mutants with gunshot wounds were gone. The rest were corpses with missing body parts. A few were burnt to a crisp.
As Leo inspected the remaining corpses, something caught his eye. One of the dead bodies was a 10-meter-tall werewolf.
Leo had a history with the Fenrir race. He checked the body up close.
Suddenly, Leo received a system notification message.
DING!
<Detecting Earth Fate Crystal!>

chapters.title: Chapter 194 Florida Man Claimed Innocence After His Worshipers Declared a Racial War Against Elves Under His Name. He Said During Interview, “This Casual Racist Will Attempt the Ranked Mode If Necessary!”
chapters.content:
Chapter 194 Florida Man Claimed Innocence After His Worshipers Declared a Racial War Against Elves Under His Name. He Said During Interview, “This Casual Racist Will Attempt the Ranked Mode If Necessary!”
Chapter 194 – Florida Man Claimed Innocence After His Worshipers Declared a Racial War Against Elves Under His Name. He Said During Interview, "This Casual Racist Will Attempt the Ranked Mode If Necessary!"
Fate Crystal Tutorial
Fate Crystals are profound artifacts that created the universe. By collecting at least seven fate crystals of the same quality, the collector can gain new strength, depending on the crystal's quality.
Earth Fate Crystals are useless to you. However, it will be nice to collect them for future usage. Maybe someone around you can find them useful?
Be warned. You are not the only one who searches for these crystals. There will be competitors, and they are not your run-in-a-mill pushovers.
Primary Objectives:
1 - Collect 7 Earth Fate Crystals (2/7)
2 – Assemble 7 Earth Fate Crystals (0/1)
Secondary Objectives:
1 – Kill 7 Immortals (2/7)
2 – Upgrade Humble General Store to Shopping Mall (1/1)
Primary Mission Rewards: Gnosis of Earth Fate, True Earth Fate Crystal, Ring of Entity Upgrade Feature
Secondary Mission Rewards: 7 Lucky Draws, 777 Free Tickets
.
So far, Leo obtained two fate crystals – One from Yan Xiang's secret treasury and one from Acku, the orc. He also killed a nameless immortal at Cauliflower City and Groruk in the Fate Arena.
Suddenly, the system detected a fate crystal from this giant mutant corpse. Leo was delighted.
"Lucky me! I'll take it!"
Leo reached out to grab the giant mutant, planning to dissect it.
Suddenly, Qiang Baidu's corpse snapped open his eyes. He stared at Leo.
Leo looked back at the giant wolf-head four-armed giant. He frowned for a moment before he gently grabbed the latter's nape with his right hand. His left hand firmly grasped Qiang Baidu's shoulder.
"…Oh. You surprise me. This ain't Mortuary Assistant. We don't welcome ghosts here."
Without confirming Qiang Baidu's life and death, Leo yanked the head.
SWUA
With a forceful pull, Leo ripped Qiang Baidu's head and shoulders apart.
"Dead bodies are best dead. No hidden survivor here."
Leo flipped Qiang Baidu's head and grabbed his demon horn. He pulled it up to see the giant's dog head.
To Leo's surprise, the head seemed alive. The dog head muttered.
"I remember you. You were at Fate Stadium."
Leo raised his eyebrows. He was sure that Qiang Baidu was dead. However, something was not right about this dead body.
Moreover, only people who had been at the Fate Stadium should know him. This guy's testimony revealed that he was not Qiang Baidu.
"You mess with the wrong overlord, Florida Man. Your death is warranted!" The head threatened Leo.
"Who are you?"
"You don't need to know. You and your people will live in misery forever, waiting for your doom."
Leo hated people who pretended to be mysterious. He recounted the deeds he had done at the stadium and came up with a guess.
"You're the boss of those stupid mutts, I assume. I see that this guy has a puppy face."
Being insulted, the head of Qiang Baidu became savage. His brows wrinkled while he bored his fangs.
"YOU'RE COURTING DEATH, NU'EARTHE! I'VE CONFIRMED YOUR PLANET! A MILLION DIETIES WILL DESCEND UPON YOUR REALM AND DESTROY EVERYTHING! WE'LL FEAST UPON YOUR CHILDREN! YOUR WOMEN WILL BECOME SOW SLAVES, AND WE WILL ENSLAVE YOU FOR THE REST OF ETERNITY! YOU WILL LIVE TO SEE YOUR LOVED ONES BEING TREATED AS PUBLIC TOILET! YOU, NU'EARTHE, WILL-"
SMASH
Leo heard enough. He squeezed his hand and crushed the giant head's skull. Qiang Baidu's brain imploded.
After exploding the severed head, a shining grain emerged from Qiang Dongbai's brain. It floated freely for a few seconds before it vanished into Leo's alien ring.
DING
<You have obtained Earth Fate Crystal.>
.
Primary Objectives:
1 - Collect 7 Earth Fate Crystals (3/7)
2 – Assemble 7 Earth Fate Crystals (0/1)
.
Four more to go, Leo almost needed to work a little harder.
However, the system notification messages hadn't ended yet. New messages followed, warning Leo of new major conflicts.
<Player "Overlord Pochi" of Fenrir Tribe has marked you as his sworn enemy.>
<Player "Overlord Milo" of Fenrir Tribe has marked you as his sworn enemy.>
<Player "Overlord Max" of Fenrir Tribe has marked you as his sworn enemy.>
<The Fenrir Tribe has declared the Extinction War against you!>
<Every 3 months, 100 representatives of your forces and 100 representatives from the Fenrir Tribe's forces will be sent to a battlefield in Fate Stadium. You must prepare 100 representatives for the Seasonal War Game.>
<Every year, 10,000 fighters from your forces and 10,000 fighters from the Fenrir Tribe's forces will be randomly chosen and sent to a battlefield in Fate Stadium for the Annual War Game.>
<Every 10 years, one million fighters from your forces and the Fenrir Tribe's forces will be randomly chosen and sent to a battlefield in Fate Stadium for the 10-Year War Game.>
<Every 100 years, you and your sworn enemies will be forced to fight in a death duel. Until one side remains alive, no one is allowed to leave the battlefield.>
<Warning! Extinction War cannot be stopped. You and your sworn enemies cannot be reconciled. Until either you or all your sworn enemies die, the system will enforce the war games!>
<Warning! Your sworn enemies can invade your planet and bypass the mortal world's restrictions. Vice versa, you can invade your sworn enemies' domains if you meet the prerequisite conditions.>
<Warning! Your system buildings will receive overall attribute debuffs when your sworn enemies or their forces enter your world. Vice versa, their system's buildings will be inflicted with debuffs if you or your subordinates invade their worlds.>
<A new event quest has been generated.>
.
War of Extinction – Overlord Pochi, Overlord Max, Overlord Milo VS Florida Man
Backgrounds: Three Fenrir Overlords have declared war against you because of the recent conflicts. Even though they have lived longer than you and acquired "System" before you did, they still abuse their authority and attempt to remove you from the Player List.
Difficulty Evaluation: You lack manpower, and your system hasn't been upgraded to show its full potential yet. Your domain is vulnerable to surprise attacks and rapid invasions. Your battle prowess is your only advantage. As for the rest, the Fenrir Tribe is superior to you in every way. The key to winning this war is you and how you can catch up to the Fenrir Tribe's technologies, manpower, territory, and army quality.
Victory Condition: Kill Overlord Pochi, Overlord Max, and Overlord Milo.
Defeat Condition: You died.
Side Objectives: Complete any of these objectives to earn big rewards.
1. Destroy or capture at least 3 planets of your sworn enemies. (0/10)
2. Destroy or capture at least 10 mystic realms of your sworn enemies. (0/10)
3. Destroy or capture one of your sworn enemy's home planet. (0/1)
4. Win 10 Seasonal War Games (0/10)
5. Win 3 Annual War Games (0/3)
6. Win 1 10-Year War Game. (0/1)
7. Kill a relative of your sworn enemies (0/1)
Rewards: One UR-Guaranteed Universal Draw
.
The changes shocked Leo. His expression turned dark when he read the details about the war.
This complicated things. He already had a hard time dealing with the PVP feature. Adding this to the picture, Leo's life difficulty changed from super-easy mode to slightly easy mode.
"Eh, invading me? Ha! Sure! This casual racist will try the ranked mode if necessary! Oh, wait. Is the lifespan stealing feature still there?"
DING
<Please note. The newbie protection period is over. Please gather lifespan by using the store features or do it your "old" way.>
"…"
That was enough to confirm that Leo could no longer abuse his store domain system anymore. He let out a long sigh.
"Nothing I can do. Back to drugs, I guess. Well, I have plenty of materials. Also, how are my sub-quests?"
Leo rechecked the other quests that he needed to complete. He opened the quest menu.
.
Entity Fate Crystal Quest – Phrase 1/13
Mission Objectives: Complete 10 tasks to complete this phrase.
Phrase Completion Rewards: 100,000 Years of Lifespan, One Guaranteed SR Lucky Draw (Building), and Increase Sub-Building's Max Level to 12
Phrase One Tasks (8/10 Completed)
- Evolve Humble General Store into a Shopping Mall. (Done)
- Move any building into the main store's building. (Done)
- Set up a new store in the main store's building. (Done)
- Complete a mystic realm expedition once. (Done)
- Upgrade any building to level 10. (Done)
- Harvest at least 10,000 of any crops from Basic Farmlands. (Done)
- Concoct at least 10,000 pills by using Alchemy Workshop. (7,730 / 10,000)
- Recycle at least 10,000 items by using the Recycling Center. (Done)
- Summon at least 10 automatons to work in your domain. (Done)
- Sold at least 1,000 products in your store. (Done)
*For each completed task, you will receive one Lucky Draw (Building), and one Lucky Draw (Automaton).
.
Leo only needed to wait one day to get the last quest done. He also gathered 9 lucky draws for buildings and 9 lucky draws for automatons. If he could get one more, he could do the 10+1 draw and get something new for his domain.
As there was nothing he could do, Leo looked around to inspect the property damage. He wondered if any building needed to be repaired.
Leo toured his domain. After walking around the farms and apartments, he found nothing unusual, except a missing monster.
He could not find Cat anywhere. Usually, the glutton cat-wannabe would have clung toward him and tasted his skin whenever she had a chance.
"Where's that damn nom-nom plant?"
.
.
Frozen Fire City
"Nom-Nom Meow <3"
Cat chewed a dead mutant, who belonged to the base guard squad that Qiang Baidu had left behind. While eating, she followed Ivy, using her as a shield.
Ivy didn't mind it. She already slaughtered all remaining four-armed mutants in this city, and she was on her way to Esen's former mansion.
Upon reaching the underground mansion, Ivy entered the building and searched for the remaining armor and weapons. She then found a hundred pieces of random armor parts, sitting and collecting dust in the treasury room.
Ivy smiled as she understood the true value of these dusty scraps. She collected them in her spatial rings and emptied the room.
"I guess Her Majesty didn't have enough time to get THAT."
After the room was emptied, Ivy found a hidden door cover. She opened it and found stairs toward their secret room.
Ivy took this opportunity to take off her blindfold. She opened her eyelids and revealed her eye sockets, devoid of physical eyes. In the blank eye sockets, two purple fireballs were ignited.
Her young and pretty face reverted into a human skull. The smooth flawless skin underneath her robes disappeared as if they were an illusion.
Upon reaching the bottom of the stairs, Ivy in her skeleton form gazed at a black grassland cemetery. At the ceiling of this underground level, a small green stone illuminated the entire floor and provided yin and yang Qi to nourish the black immortal grasses.
Tombstones and wooden crosses riddled the beautiful grasses. None of them had a name on it, yet blossomed immortal grass flowers remained behind on every tombstone and cross.
"It has been a long time, my comrades." Uttered Ivy. She remembered the days when she and her fallen comrades were together as if it were yesterday.
Although they had fallen, it didn't mean that Ivy couldn't bring them back. Esen and liches always respected the dead as they got a more peaceful rest than living as an undead. Thus, they chose not to resurrect them unless they needed to.
Because of the recent development and the invasion of immortals, Esen and Ivy realized that they lacked manpower. Thus, bringing the old comrades back was necessary.
"I'm sorry. I have to wake you up from your slumber. May your souls forgive me… KARMA BESEECH THEE, ARISE!"
RUMBLE
The cemetery's ground shook. The immortal grasses instantly withered while the immoral grass flowers turned into dust as they were sacrificed for this spell.
A hundred skeleton arms emerged from the soil. The arms pushed the ground and lifted their main bodies out of the ground.
Similar to Ivy, purple fireballs floated in their eye sockets. Their jaws and their perfect white teeth clattered as if they were angry that their peaceful rest was interrupted.
All skeletons glared at Ivy, yet they didn't emit killing intent or express their anger. Instead, they waited for her explanation.
Ivy let out a long sigh. She waved her cane and uttered, "This will be faster. I'll transfer my memory to you."
A hundred purple strings came out from Ivy's forehead and connected with the skeletons' foreheads. Her memory flowed into them, showing the recent events that she had been through.
The skeletons witnessed the fight scenes between Ivy and quasi-immortal mutants. They also saw Esen's current appearance, who resembled the person who killed Esen and made her an undead.
Everybody still remembered that Esen's mother killed her as Esen had disgraced the high elf council by protecting the other races. They still hated the elves that turned her into one of them.
Ivy then roused them.
"As you have witnessed, the new enemies must have a connection with a demonic realm. And as you all know, demonic realms belong to Fenrir Overlords. And do you remember who their real masters are?"
RUMBLE
The skeletons exploded their killing intent. They still remembered the humiliation they suffered when the elves threw them into this world and trapped them with the undead curse. Hearing about the underlings of the elves and their existence enraged them.
One of the skeletons opened its jaw. He produced a human language.
"Who shall we serve? Her Majesty Esen… or the new lord?"
Ivy gave them a meaningful look. She made her stance clear.
"The Holy One - Lord Florida Man is Her Majesty Esen's savior. He will also free us from the elf's blasphemous curses as he has already proved himself! Do you know that the Holy One has lifted the undead curse from Her Majesty Esen?"
"W-WHAT?!"
"He can do the same to us! He is the savior of our people! Follow me, my comrades. We will swear allegiance to the Holy One and support Her Majesty Esen! They will free us from this curse! With his lead, our revenge draws near!"
RUMBLE
The skeletons emitted even more killing intent, shaking the entire underground level. Everybody roared as if angry beasts had been unleashed.
Their roar caused the ceiling stone to fall and land in front of Ivy. She picked it up.
"I almost forgot about this. What was it called again?"
One of the skeletons laughed and reminded Ivy.
"That's earth fate crystal, Archlich Ivy. We commonly use that to suppress the elf's curses from spreading."
"Ah, I remember."
Ivy nodded and put the fate crystal in her spatial ring. She also informed the others, "We probably don't need this anymore. Let's report our resurrection to Her Majesty and the Holy One. Then, we'll discuss what to do next."
The 100 skeletons roared. 30 of them released their black Qi, transforming into skull knights in black armor. 40 of them created lich robes and summoned their canes. As for the rest, they pulled out long black scythes from their chests and summoned black skull armor on their bodies. After donning themselves in armor, they generated a black hooded robe to cover their gear.
The newly emerged death knights, archliches, and grim reapers were ready for the new age and new master.

chapters.title: Chapter 195 Florida Man Scammed Illegal Migrants by Accepting Them into His House, Offer Them Legal Jobs, And Robbed Them Afterward. The Immigrants Were Originally Broke When They Crossed Borders.
chapters.content:
Chapter 195 Florida Man Scammed Illegal Migrants by Accepting Them into His House, Offer Them Legal Jobs, And Robbed Them Afterward. The Immigrants Were Originally Broke When They Crossed Borders.
Chapter 195 – Florida Man Scammed Illegal Migrants by Accepting Them into His House, Offer Them Legal Jobs, And Robbed Them Afterward. The Immigrants Were Originally Broke When They Crossed Borders.
Magpie City
The battle at Leo Domain was visible from this city. Tang Xuan and Tang Tian observed the battle all night. Even after the battle was concluded, they remained vigilant.
In the morning, one of the Tang Clan's members went out to scout the battlefield. He kept a respectable distance and spied on the unicorns and nightmares' movements.
The beasts reverted back to their beast appearances. They returned to their barn, recuperating after a rough battle. As for the aftermath, the cleanup team came out from Leo's store and handled the job.
Realizing that the battle was over, the spy returned to Magpie City and reported his findings.
When Tang Xuan heard that Leo's subordinates vanquished the massive army of quasi-immortals and soul-transformation mutants, he was overjoyed. He ordered his people to pack their things to visit Leo.
.
In the afternoon, Tang Xuan and Tang Tian, along with his first caravan, arrived at the border of Leo's domain. As they showed Leo their utmost respect, they traveled on food and approached the domain openly.
When the group crossed the border, patrolling disciples of the Life Sword Sect spotted them. They came to greet the visitors. Among the disciples, Yao Qiqi was one of them.
Yao Qiqi didn't get to do anything in the previous battle due to her size and her age. Nobody allowed this loli goddess to step onto the battlefield as she was too precious.
In the aftermath, Xu Nuan allowed her to tag along with the patrolling unit to give her something to do. She had been working as a moral support for the patrol unit since this morning.
When Yao Qiqi spotted the guests, she ran toward them to greet them.
"Hello, senior! Welcome to Florida Domain! We have the best alligator steaks, rare potatoes, and pinnacle-graded elemental pills for sale!"
"…"
Tang Xuan brightly smiled as he found the girl cute. As for Tang Tian and their subordinates, they were taken aback by her assertiveness and sales pitch. Their clan was famous for their alchemists and poison alchemy techniques. Thus, trying to sell a pill to them was the same as selling cans of cola to a Pepsi factory.
Behind the two Tangs, Jin Yong, who had become Tang Tian's disciple, was interested in Yao Qiqi. He was the second person who discovered her true cultivation base after Tang Xuan.
"This place has grown a lot since my last visit! When I was working at the Life Sword Sect as a part-timer, there weren't many buildings around here. This girl, too, is quite strong. Senior Florida Man cultivated her well."
"W-What?!"
As Jin Yong mentioned Yao Qiqi's strength, the others were surprised. They then stopped treating her as a child and scanned her dantian.
Golden core cultivators and weaker servants failed to measure her strength. As for the others, they were flabbergasted. Tang Tian even dropped his jaw. This girl reminded him of his dead disciples.
When Tang Tian was young, he had met so many promising individuals. However, most of them died young. This harsh world was unforgiving for talented youngsters as adults were prone to jealousy. Most of them died mysteriously, but Tang Tian was aware that the Ouyang, Situ, and Yan Clan murdered them before they could grow stronger.
In the end, cautious disciples of his, namely Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei, managed to survive while hiding behind the others. They weren't on the big clan's radars.
Seeing Yao Qiqi, Tang Tian felt bad for her. He believed that Situ Nantian or Ouyang Zi would send their best assassins after her without fail. He had to do something to protect this girl from those nasty men.
"Little girl," Tang Tian crouched in front of her, "Who is your master? Is he or she around?"
"My master?" Yao Qiqi brightly smiled and pointed at the shopping mall building. "I have multiple masters! Mommy Xu Nuan is my mother and my first master. Grandma Dongfang Mei is my second master. Also, Grandpa Florida Man is my savior and my third master! My grandma said that I should respect him as my grandfather. Do you know that I like my grandpa the most? When I grow up, I'll marry my grandpa!"
"…"
Tang Tian had a wry smile on his face. He then glanced at his father as he had a bad feeling about this.
Tang Xuan and Jin Yong remained expressionless as they had met Leo before. He didn't believe that Leo was such a degenerate person who would be sexually attracted to a little girl. Instead, they believed that the girl was educated and nurtured well in a peaceful and loving environment.
However, his followers had another idea.
"Patriarch! This Florida Man is too vulgar! How dare he seduce such an innocent little girl! We must protect her and take her away from that pedophile!"
"Yes, patriarch! He is worse than the Murong Clan and their Joyous Yin-Yang Sect! At least, those dual cultivators don't touch children!"
Yao Qiqi overheard it and pouted, "You are rude, mister! Angel Florida Man is my life-saver! He saved my mother's life! He saved my grandmother! He saved my friends! He's my savior!"
"…"
Nobody dared to retort as the girl seemed angry. They looked at each other, gesturing with their eyes so that their comrades would do something.
Tang Xuan coughed and changed the subject.
"Little girl, could you guide us to see your grandfather? We're from the Tang Clan, and we would like to discuss our migration. We would like to seek shelter in his domain."
Yao Qiqi was excited, "Are you moving here, too? This is great! We can have more slav-I mean friends!"
Nobody noticed the brief change of expression on Yao Qiqi's face when her dao avatar almost possessed her. Everybody smiled, thinking that she bit her tongue.
.
The group of 100 people arrived in front of Leo's shopping mall. They were not all of Tang Clan's members as they were the representatives of the group to evaluate the situation.
Because all the elders were busy, nobody was there to welcome them.
Yao Qiqi advised them, "Grandfather Florida Man is busy at the moment. I'll go tell them that you're here. Also, if sister Esen shows up, you should talk to her instead. She's grandfather's best friend!"
Nobody hated a cheerful little girl. Their hearts were cleansed, and they temporarily forgot about this cruel world.
Yao Qiqi then excused herself and returned to patrol duty and play with the other young disciples of Life Sword Sect. Tang Xuan and the men all stood in front of the shopping mall with no one accompanying them.
The group took this opportunity to look around. Their eyes were attracted to the parking lot and the flying island above them at first. It only took them a minute to notice another landmark.
Beyond the parking lot structure, a crystal tower trekked through the sky. It was the second tallest structure in Leo's domain after the shopping mall elevator, which connected to the floating island.
Tang Xuan and Tang Tian widened their eyes in shock. They kicked the ground and flew toward the pylon tower as they sensed something nostalgic.
When they arrived, they almost fell on their knees.
"Spirit Stone Heart?!"
"I-I-It's massive!"
Both had never seen anything like this. They had seen spirit stone hearts, but they were not even half the size of this pylon tower.
As cultivators, their legs automatically moved closer. They walked toward the foot of the tower. However, as they got closer, their legs got wobbly.
The pylon tower pushed them away with its residual forces. None of them could reach even the outer layer.
The outer layer featured a thousand white cushions for cultivators to sit on. A few of them were occupied as a few off-duty workers sat there, cultivating the yin-yang energy from the tower.
Looking at the young workers, Tang Xuan and Tang Tian were envious. They reattempted to reach the outermost layer of the seats. But again, they were pushed back.
While the two Tangs were helpless, one of the workers noticed them. He stood up and saluted them.
"Senior. This place is restricted to the Florida Domain's employees. If you're not an employee, you cannot cultivate here."
"…"
Tang Xuan nodded in understanding while Tang Tian drooled. The latter couldn't wait to join Leo's side.
"Thank you for the information, young friend. Then, please excuse us." Tang Xuan saluted back.
"No problem. I hope you will join us, too."
Tang Xuan was impressed by the humbleness of the workers there. He believed that Leo nurtured them well.
As Tang Xuan and Tang Tian couldn't do anything there, they turned around to head back. However, before they could go back, they ran into Leo.
.
Leo had been walking around his domain as he was in the middle of repairing the roads. He also helped the workers pick up random corpses that they overlooked.
While making his way back to his shopping mall, Leo found a large group of visitors waiting for him in front of the store. He also detected Tang Xuan and Tang Tian near his pylon tower.
Curious about what they were here for, Leo went to see the two Tangs first.
He waved his hands to say hi.
"I thought you died during the chaos at Cauliflower City. Hell broke loose, eh?"
Tang Xuan wryly smiled. He somewhat wanted to blame Leo for causing mayhem after the tournament. Still, everything was Yan Xiang's fault, so he kept quiet about the incident.
"Yes, it has been a while." Tang Xuan bowed. "But I'm here with a different purpose this time. I hope that you can lend me ears."
"I'm listening."
"I would like to join your domain and worship you as our lord. I hope you can take us under your wings."
"…"
Leo raised his eyebrows. He didn't expect someone to surrender this soon.
"I think it's too early… wait."
Leo almost declined the offer. Suddenly, he recalled that his domain required more men, especially soldiers. After all, invasions from other planets might become a common occurrence.
For the sake of the future war, Leo changed his mind.
"Are you here to serve me?" Asked Leo.
"Yes, senior."
"I have to warn you though. You'll be working here from 9 to 5. You get two days off every week, and your pay will be essence stones, made by me. You may use your hard-earned essence stones to purchase grain pills from me if you need them. As for cultivation resources, I'll randomly distribute them to you if you show promising results in your cultivation. Is that okay?"
"…Huh?"
This employee welfare was new to them. In their world, servants were expected to work 25 hours a day until they died. No one was allowed to sleep or ask for a day off. Moreover, cultivation resources were mostly exclusive to the executives, not the employees or servants.
Tang Tian found these terms too good to be true. He knelt on both knees.
"Junior Tang Tian greets Lord Florida Man! I promise that I'll work my hardest!"
Tang Xuan glanced at his son and wryly laughed. He didn't care for the cultivation resources, day offs, or wages. He was more interested in the pylon tower.
"Then, could you allow us to cultivate near that Spirit Stone Heart?"
Leo shrugged, "Everybody under me is free to do whatever you want during your day off. Of course, you can cultivate near that tower if you want."
"Then, our lives will be in your care, including our clansmen and the people from the Sixth Element Sect."
"Huh? I thought it was just you two."
Tang Xuan laughed, "When I said "WE", I meant my entire clan and sect. Also, we have about 2,000 people. We only bring 100 people here for today. Tomorrow, we'll inform the others and have them migrate here."
"…"
"Oh, do you have a place for us to take shelter? You don't have to prepare a house or anything. We will build our dwellings anywhere as long as you give us permission."
Leo facepalmed. He had a headache as he didn't want these people to suddenly erect a slum in his domain. As this matter involved 2,000 people, Leo came up with a new idea.
"You know what? You can take shelter in that building first, but you're not allowed to build anything yet. Tomorrow, I'll do something about it."
Leo pointed at the parking lot building. As there were many empty floors, these people could use them as temporary shelters for the time being.
He could have purchased more RV vans for these new guys. However, it was not the time since they had never proved their usefulness to Leo yet.
"No problem, senior!" Tang Xuan widely smiled. He had no issue living in the strange building with no door or windows. After all, he didn't need to sleep or eat to live. He just wanted a roof to cover his head whenever he wanted to rest.
"…"
Since the guy seemed to be too happy about it, Leo came up with an idea to extort them.
"By the way, I forgot to tell you. If you want an RV house like the others, you will have to work here for at least ten years. You can hasten that process by being stronger than one of those horses outside and pay me 10,000 years of lifespan for the RV."
"…Eh?"

chapters.title: Chapter 196 Florida Man Became Millionaire after Selling Expired Drugs to Homeless People, Claiming His Medicines Could Cure Cancer by Granting New Cancer.
chapters.content:
Chapter 196 Florida Man Became Millionaire after Selling Expired Drugs to Homeless People, Claiming His Medicines Could Cure Cancer by Granting New Cancer.
Chapter 196 – Florida Man Became Millionaire after Selling Expired Drugs to Homeless People, Claiming His Medicines Could Cure Cancer by Granting New Cancer.
The deal was concluded. Tang Xuan, Tang Tian, and the people from the Tang Clan were added to Leo's employee list, enabling them to use Leo's facilities.
As Leo had plans for the domain, he forbade Tang Xuan from building anything inside his domain. However, their clan could do anything they wanted outside of his official territory.
Tang Xuan was pleased. He relayed his order and let his people construct their new shelters right away. As for the weak, elders, women, and children, he sent them to the parking lot building for the time being as they needed a place to rest.
As all members of the Tang Clan were cultivators, they had no issue living near the pylon tower. In fact, they loved the parking lot due to the open space and airflow. Even though they had no bed or room, they didn't care.
The food issue was also not an issue. Most cultivators sustained on grain pills. Only children relied on hard food as they still needed natural nutrition to grow.
People from the Tang Clan's group rushed back to inform the others in the Magpie City. Then, in the late afternoon, more people moved into the domain as planned.
Leo got busy welcoming and adding them to the employee list for the rest of the day.
.
The next day
"What the hell is this, Tang Xuan?" Leo stood next to Tang Xuan, gazing at the crowd of immigrants. Something was not right about them.
Mass of people kept coming to Leo's domain non-stop. Leo had been counting his new employees, but the number exceeded the promising quota.
Tang Xuan sweated profusely. He also didn't expect this development.
"I'm so sorry, sir. I didn't think this through. It seems that the commoners from the Magpie City and other cities have heard about you."
Not only did the Tang Clan and Sixth Element Sect move in, the commoners from the Magpie City and refugees from various places flocked to Leo's place. Regardless of their cultivation background, they deemed Leo as the safest place on the continent.
"The commoners?" Leo frowned. "I need capable workers, not freeloaders."
Tang Xuan wryly smiled and explained. "Commoners are roots of cultivators like us. Without them, we wouldn't have existed. At least, we should support them and let them grow as cultivators, don't you think?"
"…From our agreements, I can only take you in, not them."
"Look. They bring their family and children along. Will you send them away, sir?"
"…"
Leo had more headaches to deal with. As commoners got mixed in the people, Leo couldn't take them all. Still, they brought in their children and families, making the situation complicated.
"Fine. But they can't stay within my center domain. Let them live elsewhere but here or they will accidentally mutate. My domain is too toxic for regular people." Leo gave up.
Noticing Leo's generosity, Tang Xuan was moved. He hurried and assisted Leo.
"I'll tell my people to arrange a place for them, sir."
.
In the end, the commoners gathered at the west of Leo's domain, taking spaces between the Magpie City and Leo's territory. The Tang Clan and the Sixth Element Sect took the east so that they would not be involved with the mixed-in newcomers.
As for the south, thunder caimans, a contaminated river, and the presence of a white tree array deterred the immigrants. No one dared to step foot in this territory.
The same applied to the extinguished magma field to the north. There were still lava badgers lingering in the area. Moreover, Leo's junkyard and recycling center operated close to the north field. It was too dangerous for the commoners to move there.
The segregation settled in peace after Leo explained the complications of his domain to the commoners.
Leo stood in front of the crowd of commoners while the new guys from the Tang Clan stood on the sides, listening to Leo's new announcement.
"Please remember that my domain is very toxic to regular humans. The north, the south, the center, and the east are off-limit to you unless you're a cultivator. The north belongs to little monster beasts, and the land cannot be reclaimed at the moment. The center is where my domain is, and it's full of monsters and Qi. The east side is exclusive to the Tang Clan and the Sixth Element Sect for the time being since they have come here first. As for the south, don't go there. There's nothing to see but alligator monsters and a contaminated river… That's the general geographic and usable terrain here. Next… about my store…"
As soon as Leo mentioned an exception, glints appeared in the commoners' eyes. They silently listened to the regulations until the end.
After Leo finished explaining the rules and their duties, he allowed them to ask questions.
"Anybody doesn't understand about what I said?" Asked Leo.
"Yes, sir!" One of the commoners shouted.
"Ask away!"
"You mentioned that only cultivators can access the central district. How do we become a cultivator?"
Leo answered without thinking much. "You just need to be able to cultivate. That's it."
"How can we cultivate, sir?"
Leo shrugged. "Get a cultivation resource."
"From where, sir?"
Hearing that question, Leo paused. His instinct cried that a major opportunity arose, and he needed to grasp it. Thus, he gave them hope.
"You may exchange your lifespan for some cultivation resources. Though, I can't sell you essence stones to you yet since it can kill you."
"!!!"
The commoners murmured and looked at each other in excitement. The front-most adult man raised his hand.
"How much does it cost, sir?!"
"20 Years of lifespan per pill for one elemental grain pill."
"C-Can we check our lifespan, sir?!"
"Sure."
Leo opened their lifespan menu for the crowd of commoners without thinking. Again, he raised a commotion.
The commoners had never seen a system screen before. When blue screens showed up and told them their remaining time, they were speechless. Still, everybody caught on to what they needed to do.
"Sir! I would like to buy one of your pills!"
"Me, too! I'll take two for my child and myself, sir!"
"I want one for my grandfather!"
"I-I-I want the cheapest one, sir! I only have 15 years to live! At least, I want my descendants to live a better life than mine!"
The gathering crowd almost rioted. They pushed others and tried to get close to Leo. Fortunately, the Tang Clan's members managed the crowd and got them to form queues.
As so many people wanted his pills, Leo had no choice but to sell them. He allowed them to visit his shopping mall for the time being.
It was a mistake. 2,000 regular people flooded into his shopping mall and fought for his grain pills.
.
.
<You have sold Pinnacle-Grade Fire Grain Pill for 20 Years of Lifespan.>
<You have sold Pinnacle-Grade Poison Grain Pill for 20 Years of Lifespan.>
<You have sold Immortal Grass for 10 Years of Lifespan.>
<You have sold…>
Later that day, Leo stood in front of his supermarket section, collecting YOL from his customers. They came here to acquire basic cultivation resources for their children, exchanging their lifespan for opportunities.
Leo didn't stop them. He only warned people with low lifespans not to spend too much.
A hundred people buying one pill each wasn't an issue. However, two thousand commoners flooding his shopping mall at once to get multiple pills was troubling. Leo called over some disciples from the Life Sword Sect to help him restock the supermarket as products flew off the shelves at a rapid rate.
The people from the Sixth Element Sect also mixed among the customer crowd. Jin Yong recommended the poison grain pills to his colleagues, and they rushed to the store to grab some as well.
Everything happened so fast. Within one hour, Leo's grain pills were out of stock. He was forced to close the mall for the day until his grain pills were properly restocked.
Most commoners got their desired pills for their family members. Alchemists of the Sixth Element Sect managed to snag poison grain pills to increase their poison element proficiency. However, a few didn't get anything, so they had to wait for the next opportunity.
After closing the store, Leo counted his profits. He checked his lifespan.
<Current Lifespan: 1,641,544 Years…>
His lifespan almost tripled!
"…Wow."
Leo couldn't believe what he had just done. He just wanted to kill his time for the day to wait for the quest to finish, but he ended up working for so long that he forgot about time.
The phase one quest was completed yesterday. However, Leo didn't get a chance to collect the rewards.
After the store was closed, Leo took this opportunity to grab the tickets and rewards.
DING
<You have completed the Entity Fate Crystal Quest (Phrase 1/13)!>
<You have received 100,000 Years of Lifespan, One Guaranteed SR Lucky Draw (Building)!>
<Your Sub-Building Maximum Level has been increased to 12!>
In summary, Leo obtained 10 Lucky Draw (Building), 10 Lucky Draw (Automaton), one SR Lucky Draw (Building), some lifespan, and a new perk in total. He was ready to dib his hand into a gacha rabbit hole.
Leo opened the gacha system menu. Without hesitation, he navigated to the lucky draw section. He then prayed to RNGesus for good luck.
"Give me something nice!!"
Leo pressed the [10+1] summon button!
DING
DING
DING
An animation of 11 capsule balls came out from the gacha machine in the background. The ball popped, ejecting 11 building icons out.
Eight icons were white, indicating the common rarity.
One was green. An uncommon one.
One was blue, which was the guaranteed rare building.
And the last one was gold! Leo got a super rare building!
"NOICE!"
Seeing the result, Leo checked the details of each building right away, starting with the common rarity ones.
"Alchemy workshop?"
Two common draws were two alchemy workshops, which weren't that shabby. Leo could build them to make more pills, so he wouldn't lose anything.
The third was another gunsmith. It was alright as well.
The fourth and the fifth were a granary and a warehouse respectively. Leo didn't really need them, but it was nice to have.
As for the sixth common draw, it showed up as a blacksmith workshop. Leo could finally experiment with cold weaponry and materials.
"Eh, it's not like I need cold weapons. Well, I can leave it to Hua Jiashan, I guess."
The seventh was another clothing store. Leo shrugged it off as he could use another tailor to make more clothes.
The last common building was a strange one. However, it looked TOO normal – A fast-food chain restaurant. It could only be built inside the shopping mall's first floor due to its restrictions, and it automatically consumed food from the granary to make food.
Leo didn't hate it, but he didn't like it either. As cultivators never needed food, this building might just be a decoration for his shopping mall.
After the common ones, Leo started with the uncommon rarity. He hoped for a better building.
He wasn't disappointed. New building icons appeared, and their descriptions attracted Leo.
.
Green House Farm (Uncommon)
Farming Automaton (0/5)
Green House Size (0/5)
Crop Quality (0/5)
Crop Growth Speed (0/5)
Can be placed on the rooftop of the shopping mall. The max level is 20.
.
Alchemy Factory (Rare)
Alchemy Automaton (0/10)
Active Machine (0/10)
Factory Capacity (0/10)
Factory Output Speed (0/10)
Must be built on top of a level 10 alchemy workshop or higher. Inherit the previous workshop level. The max level is 30.
.
Land Vehicle Factory (Super Rare)
Engineer Automaton (0/20)
Technology (0/20)
Vehicle Quality (0/20)
Production Speed (0/20)
Must be built on top of any level 10 workshop. Inherits the previous workshop level. The max level is 50.

chapters.title: Chapter 197 Florida Man Mistook Lithium as Iron. Mined a Ton. Threw Raw Ores to Furnace. And Caused an Explosion. Scientists and Chemists Baffled Why He is Still Alive.
chapters.content:
Chapter 197 Florida Man Mistook Lithium as Iron. Mined a Ton. Threw Raw Ores to Furnace. And Caused an Explosion. Scientists and Chemists Baffled Why He is Still Alive.
Chapter 197 – Florida Man Mistook Lithium as Iron. Mined a Ton. Threw Raw Ores to Furnace. And Caused an Explosion. Scientists and Chemists Baffled Why He is Still Alive.
"…"
Leo was not disappointed, but he wasn't impressed either. The new buildings seemed complicated.
Moving on, Leo glanced at the icon of a guaranteed SR lucky draw. Since he couldn't exploit the 10+1 draw like the regular lucky draw, he used it on the spot.
DING
A new building icon appeared. This time, it looked different.
.
Genetic Modification Lab (Super Rare)
Surgeon Automaton (0/20)
Surgeon Skills (0/20)
Genetic Storage (0/20)
Capsule Module (0/20)
Space: 100 x 100.
Cannot be built inside Shopping Mall. Require Fate Crystal Bearer's blood to operate. Max Level: 50.
.
Leo pursed his lips, finding this building interesting. He closed all menus and built this structure next to the pylon tower. He also didn't forget to build other buildings that he had been neglecting.
.
Food Court
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 10
Price – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – Three Humble General Store's Rooms or Shopping Mall's Rooms.
.
Essence Stone Quarry
Requirement – Humble General Store Level 10
Price – 1,000 Years of Lifespan
Space – 200 x 200
.
Leo added the quarry southwest of his domain, west of the farm district.
As for the food court, Leo added it to his shopping mall, occupying three slots near the entrance. A fast-food chain restaurant was also put in the adjacent room. All buildings were upgraded to level 12.
.
Food Court Level 12
Automatons Cooks (2/5)
Accommodation Size (2/5)
Food Quality (5/5)
Food Variety (3/5)
.
Fast-Food Chain Restaurant Level 12
Automatons Cooks (2/5)
Cooking Speed (2/5)
Food Quality (5/5)
Food Variety (3/5)
.
Basic Alchemy Workshop Level 12
Active Cauldrons: (4/5)
Automatons Alchemist (1/5)
Production Quality (5/5)
Production Quantity (2/5)
.
Clothing Store Level 12
Automaton Worker (1/5)
Automaton Weavers (3/5)
Weaver Skills (5/5)
Store Quality (3/5)
.
Gunsmith Workshop Level 12
Automaton Gunsmith (1/1)
Automaton Hand Loader (1/1)
Firearm Technology (5/6)
Product Quality (2/6)
Structure Quality (3/6)
.
Blacksmith Workshop Level 12
Automaton Blacksmiths (2/5)
Furnace (5/5)
Product Quality (5/5)
Production Speed (0/5)
.
For alchemy, Leo prioritized the number of cauldrons as the past production rating was too slow. The gunsmith got new technology upgrades while the clothing stores obtained two new workers.
The blacksmith was a nice addition. Leo hadn't figured out its features yet, but he learned from the alchemy workshops. Thus, he put all points to furnaces so that he could produce more goodies.
After Leo had constructed all the common buildings in his shopping mall, he built rare structures next.
An alchemy factory replaced one of the newest alchemy workshops. Leo checked its features.
.
Alchemy Factory Level 12
Automaton Alchemists (2/10)
Active Machine (5/10)
Factory Capacity (5/10)
Factory Output Speed (0/10)
Currently Making: Elemental Grain Pills
.
Leo went to the 5th floor of his shopping mall and visited the factory.
The front office of the factory resembled the other workshops. However, it utilized machines instead of cauldrons to produce pills. A cargo elevator emerged at the back of the factory and connected to the warehouse.
The factory's automatons automatically fetched pill ingredients from the shopping mall's underground warehouse, using its exclusive elevator at the back.
When Leo arrived at the factory, the structure and the automatons already started working even though Leo hadn't given it an order. Five sets of machines moved in sync, converting iron pine nuts into elemental grain pills.
Within ten minutes, a factory belt rolled a dozen elemental grain pills into a bucket. 20 round balls caused a loud noise in the enclosed space.
CLANK
CLANK
The first batch gave Leo 20 metal grain pills. As for the other machines, they produced other types of meds. Fire grain pills, water grain pills, and other elemental grain pills came out.
Leo picked one of them to inspect its quality. Then, he deeply frowned.
The quality was mediocre.
.
Medium-Grade Metal Element Grain Pill
- Satisfy your hunger for 120 hours.
- Improve your blood circulation and internal organ efficiency by 15% for 120 hours.
- Increase your lifespan by five years.
- Increase Metal Qi by two years' worth of cultivation.
.
Instead of making top-tier pills, the factory rapidly chugged medium-graded ones and consumed a lot of ingredients in the warehouse.
Leo hated it as he wanted the best pills. However, as things went on, a mass production line was necessary as he couldn't restock the supermarket fast enough. Cheaper products would do the trick since he didn't need to give every commoner the best items.
After checking the factory, Leo upgraded another alchemy workshop into a new SR structure. Again, he upgraded it to level 12.
.
Land Vehicle Factory Level 12
Engineer Automatons (2/20)
Technology (5/20)
Vehicle Quality (5/20)
Production Speed (0/20)
Currently Making: None
.
Unlike the pill factory, this one allowed Leo to choose which product to build. He opened its menu, and a screen appeared, showing a catalog of retro vehicles.
Judging from their models, they were cars from the 70s era. Leo didn't need them at the moment, and he didn't want to waste his precious resources to make any. Still, he queued one for science.
The model he chose was a brown military jeep. As soon as Leo confirmed the production, the factory warned him about the necessary materials.
DING
<You lack materials and recipes.>
"…"
The factory didn't bother to tell him which material Leo lacked. Instead, it just refused his order.
Leo sighed as he couldn't do anything. He moved on to check the next structure that he couldn't build inside the shopping mall.
The next one was the quarry.
West of the farmlands, a rocky mountain elevated the ground.
Leo then assigned points to the quarry.
.
Essence Stone Quarry Level 12
Automaton Miners (4/5)
Mining Speed (0/5)
Quarry Tools (3/5)
Essence Stone Quality (5/5)
.
Four mannequins holding pickaxes emerged. They ignored Leo and walked toward the stone mountain.
Leo followed after them to see how they worked.
The miners stopped at the foot of the mountain. They touched the surface of a boulder and patted its dirt. After the mud and dirt had come off, the boulder revealed its true value.
Instead of calling it a boulder, it was a massive black crystal hiding underneath mud and dirt.
The miners rushed toward the giant crystal and swung their pickaxes on it.
CLINK
CLINK
The miners instantly extracted several pieces of crystals. One of the miners collected and put them in a wheel cart. When the cart was full, the mannequin pushed the cart back to the patched area close to the quarry. He lifted the cart and poured everything to the ground. Then, he went back to get some more.
Leo picked up the extracted crystals and inspected them.
[High-Graded Essence Stone]
[High-Graded Spirit Stone]
[Medium-Graded Spirit Iron Ore]
[High-Graded Rough Tin Ore]
Although the crystals came from the same origin, each had a different property.
The spirit stones and essence stones were a no-brainer. Leo grabbed a spirit stone with his bare hand and instantly upgraded it into pinnacle-graded essence stones. As for the essence stones, their quality rose to the pinnacle grade upon touch.
Iron ores and tin ores were new to Leo. Like usual, he touched them and hoped to get an upgraded version of these minerals.
Leo's instinct was correct. The brown ores blackened. However, Leo had no idea what they were.
He brought the newly mutated ores to the blacksmith workshop. He gave them to the automatons, and they threw them to the furnaces on the spot.
BOOOOOM
The furnace exploded, breathing flame and almost cooked both blacksmith automatons.
DING
<You have discovered Immortal Iron Ore!>
<You have discovered Immortal Tin Ore!>
"…Aren't they just the same? Tin and iron? Hello?"
Leo shrugged, unable to figure out their value. He left the ores in the blacksmith alone and went to check the other new structures.
He didn't notice the changes in the blacksmith's eyes. The two mannequins stood in front of the working furnaces, waiting for the ores to completely smelt and work on them.
.
Leo built a greenhouse on the shopping mall's rooftop. It didn't occupy a wide space, but it worked the same way as farms. He left the new farmers to work on the yin cabbages as the horses needed them.
With that, Leo finished building almost all the new structures. He still hadn't checked the new gene lab yet. However, Leo had a short-concentration issue. He moved on to the automaton gacha next.
Leo gazed at the banner and the poster girls. They looked attractive and unique for mannequins. Curious of what they could do, Leo reached out and pressed on the [10+1 Summon] button.

chapters.title: Chapter 198 Florida Man Called Cops Claiming His New Dairy Cow Sexual-Harassed Him by Forcing Him to Touch Its Breasts
chapters.content:
Chapter 198 Florida Man Called Cops Claiming His New Dairy Cow Sexual-Harassed Him by Forcing Him to Touch Its Breasts
Chapter 198 – Florida Man Called Cops Claiming His New Dairy Cow Sexual-Harassed Him by Forcing Him to Touch Its Breasts.
The screen showed 11 balls rolling out from the gacha machine. Unfortunately, ten came out as grey – They were obviously common automatons.
However, the other one was in rainbow color!
It was neither a pity rare gacha nor a super rare gacha. Leo hit the jackpot!
PLOP
The balls split in half and shot out 11 automatons. 10 wooden mannequins and a humanoid beast woman manifested in front of Leo.
Five of the wooden mannequins had leather armor on. They carried short swords and bucklers as if they were fighters. Three farming robots held farming tools, and the remaining two hoisted short bows and quivers behind their backs.
Five fighters, two archers, and three farmers were basic units, but Leo welcomed them nonetheless.
As for the last automaton, she looked terrific. Her flawless light olive skin resembled Western Europeans. The automaton's curly blond hair refined her noble look. Her frilly red dress revealed her shoulders and upper bosom.
On a side note, she had a huge bosom despite having a slender physique. Leo estimated that they were at least K-cup. Moreover, her height was towering 7'5!
She was a giant!
The mannequin looked like a noble lady in the Renaissance era. She would have looked perfect without the dull iris, cold expression, and two bull horns on her head.
DING
The gacha system revealed the stats of the mannequins.
.
Fighter Golem (Level 1)
Rarity: Common
Strength: Muscle Tempering Realm
Specialty: Basic Swordsmanship
.
Archer Golem (Level 1)
Rarity: Common
Strength: Muscle Tempering Realm
Specialty: Basic Archery
.
Farmer Golem (Level 1)
Rarity: Common
Strength: Muscle Tempering Realm
Specialty: Agricultural Knowledge
.
Sierra Tauron, the Tauro Constellation Baroness (Level 1)
Rarity: Ultra Rare
Strength: Earth Immortal
Specialties: Domain of Minotaurs, Minotaur Bloodline, Animal Husbandry Knowledge, Dairy Production
Biography: Tauron Sierra was once a princess of the Minotaur Clan. When Sierra Tauron was alive, she visited Overlord Xiaomao and studied under him for a decade. She returned home and used her newly acquired animal husbandry knowledge to improve her home planet, earning her the Baroness title.
On 764,319 O.E. (Overlord Era Calendar), the Divine Elven Zenith of Neo United Terraforming Solars (DEZNUTS) declared war against the Minotaurs. Overlord Lucky led the DEZNUTS Army of 200,000 deities, 5,000 sages, and 200 entities to eradicate all living beings of the Tauron Solar System. Tauron Sierra died during the invasion, and her soul returned to the River of Karma.
.
After reading her biography, Leo had goosebumps. He felt like he had touched something complicated.
Leo walked closer to Sierra. He waved her hand in front of her face, but she didn't even blink.
"Hello, ma'am?"
While talking, Leo's gaze fixated on the cleavage in front of him. Although they only came in a pair, Leo loved them.
Suddenly, Sierra's eyes moved. She gazed at Leo's face and noticed that his eye level was at the same height as her chest.
"You can't milk those."
"…"
"…Yet."
"…"
Leo almost had a heart attack as he didn't expect this summoned automaton to speak. His eyes looked up and noticed her dull stare. Embarrassed, he stroked his beard and feigned ignorance.
"Ahem. Erm, ma'am. Do you still remember what happened to you in your previous life?"
Sierra maintained her gaze. She didn't look like she had any emotion or memory left.
"I remember that I am a Minotaur, but I don't remember anything else. My purpose in this life is to fulfill your need, master."
"AHEM! AHEM!"
Her wordings sounded dangerous. Leo looked away from her bosom to suppress his neurons and hormones.
"Tell me what you can do." Leo changed the subject.
