Sierra counted her fingers.
"I can manage ranches and livestock. I can tame wild animals. Also, I can produce a gallon of milk every month."
"…"
Leo choked on saliva. His moral integrity raised a red flag while his primal instinct cheered.
After taking a deep breath, Leo asked her about her strength.
"About your level and strength, how do I upgrade your level?"
"Please touch me and use your life force."
"…"
Leo made up his mind. He would assign her a conversation instructor later as her wording might give someone a wrong idea.
For the sake of his conscience, Leo grabbed her hand.
Sierra dully gazed at her hand. Feeling the touch, her body responded. She clenched her hand into a firm handshake.
"Hmm?"
Leo sensed the force in her grip. He smiled.
"Girl. You shouldn't provoke others. By the way, your hand is very rough. You must have been a hard worker in your previous life."
"I somewhat remember. My breasts hurt every time I extract my breast milk. I hate them."
"…"
"If possible, master. May I ask you for a favor? When I'm lactating, could you please milk me with your hands? At least, they are softer than my hands."
"…"
Sierra was the first to make Leo bend forward and awaken his dragon. He shook his head and got rid of naughty intrusive thoughts.
"I'll send you a better milker. Anyway, about combat, can you fight?" Again, Leo changed the subject before the conversation steered to a wrong turn.
"If you mean fighting in a real battle, I cannot. But if you refer to bed battles, I'm confident in my skills."
"…Never mind."
Leo closed his eyes. He gave up on her.
For some reason, Leo felt like she didn't belong in this peaceful and family-friendly domain. She might fit well in adult-rated stories.
Because the conversation kept steering toward THAT subject, Leo stopped asking Sierra. While holding her hand, Leo glanced at his system menu.
The upgrade fee was quite expensive. Upgrading Sierra to level 2 cost 10,000 YOL.
Since Sierra was Leo's only ultra-rare worker, he invested in her and spent his lifespan.
DING
As soon as Sierra's level became two, her status changed.
.
Sierra Tauron, the Tauro Constellation Baroness (Level 2)
Rarity: Ultra Rare
Strength: Sky Immortal
Specialties: Domain of Minotaurs, Minotaur Bloodline, Animal Husbandry Knowledge, Dairy Production
.
Her cultivation base improved by a major realm. Although Leo wasn't clear about the cultivation rank beyond the mortal stages, he was happy with the improvement. He upgraded Sierra again.
DING
DING
DING
Fortunately, every upgrade only cost 10,000 YOL. After Leo had upgraded her to level 9, her level reached a soft cap.
.
Sierra Tauron, the Tauro Constellation Baroness (Level 9) (Evolution Material Required)
Rarity: Ultra Rare
Strength: True Immortal
Specialties: Domain of Minotaurs, Minotaur Bloodline, Animal Husbandry Knowledge, Dairy Production
.
Because of this system, Leo learned more about immortal ranks. The immortal realm cultivation ranks were as follows;
1st stage – Earth Celestial
2nd stage – Sky Celestial
3rd stage - Star Celestial
4th stage - Heaven Celestial
5th stage - Celestial Warrior
6th stage - Celestial General
7th stage - Celestial King
8th stage - Celestial Emperor
9th stage - True Immortal
While thinking about the cultivation ranks, Leo wondered how strong Esen and Acku were. For certain, she should be a high ranker.
Leo shook his head and collected his thoughts. He rechecked the upgrade requirement.
An inventory menu appeared, but there was only one item slot. Over the inventory box, an icon of a required material was shown.
The icon was a blue water droplet. Leo pressed it, and the system informed him of its description.
<True Earth Fate Crystal's Holy Water>
"…I guess I have to complete fate crystal quests to get those."
Leo deeply sighed. He let go of Sierra's hand. However, she didn't let her hand go.
Sierra stared into Leo's eyes. She uttered with a firm voice.
"My lactation period is a week away. Master, don't forget to pay me a visit and milk me."
Leo widened his eyes and yanked his hand away from her. He got goosebumps.
"Get somebody else to milk those cow tettens! Leave my hands alone!"
"If you prefer, you can drink it from the source."
"…"
Leo silently and inwardly facepalmed. He had a headache.

chapters.title: Chapter 199 Florida Man Built Trillion-Dollar Labs to Modify Cabbage DNAs. On the Other News, Ohio Man Discovered on Death Star.
chapters.content:
Chapter 199 Florida Man Built Trillion-Dollar Labs to Modify Cabbage DNAs. On the Other News, Ohio Man Discovered on Death Star.
Chapter 199 – Florida Man Built Trillion-Dollar Labs to Modify Cabbage DNAs. On the Other News, Ohio Man Discovered on Death Star.
Leo assigned Sierra as the new unicorn barn's manager. She would be in charge of handling those pervert thunder unicorns from now on. As for her milking business, Leo got someone else to do the task.
As it had been a while, Leo visited Gao Yan to check on his experiment. He wondered if the guy was still alive after he had eaten Floridian Dantian Pill.
Leo came to Gao Yan's house and knocked on the front door.
A few seconds later, Gao Yan dragged his feet and opened the door. When Gao Yan saw Leo's face, he squinted his brow in a bad mood.
Leo was also surprised. Under Gao Yan's eyes, black bags were visible. The latter looked like someone with insomnia issues.
"How are you doing, boy?"
Gao Yan deeply sighed, "Not good, senior. Could you leave me alone for…like…a month or two? I need some more sleep so that I can digest your pill."
"…Alright. Take your time. Just checking."
Gao Yan nodded and closed the door in front of Leo's face.
Leo didn't mind it. He understood that insomnia patients were usually moody, and Gao Yan might develop that trait. He didn't notice that Gao Yan's cultivation base was on the verge of reaching the soul transformation realm.
Since Gao Yan was okay, Leo moved on to the next work. He opened the shop domain menu and glanced at a certain structure.
.
Genetic Modification Lab (Super Rare)
Surgeon Automaton (0/20)
Surgeon Skills (0/20)
Genetic Storage (0/20)
Capsule Module (0/20)
Space: 100 x 100.
Cannot be built inside Shopping Mall. Require Fate Crystal Bearer's blood to operate. Max Level: 50.
.
This lab required a lot of space. Curious about its perks and effects, Leo built it in the northern district between the pylon tower and the junkyard.
RUMBLE
The elevated land remained the same, but a trench emerged. The trench passages led to an underground bunker's steel doors.
As usual, whenever a new structure appeared, the local workers rushed in the check it. They gathered around the trench maze and observed it from above.
Leo ignored the curious crowd and walked to the sealed doors. He thought of nuclear bunkers on Earth, which failed to outlast the nuclear fallout era. As he was familiar with how bunkers worked, he strolled toward the gate and leaned toward an eye scanner located on the console at the right side. While he was at it, he upgraded the structure to the current max level, aka level 12.
.
Genetic Modification Lab (Level 12)
Surgeon Automaton (3/20)
Surgeon Skills (5/20)
Genetic Storage (2/20)
Capsule Module (2/20)
Current Usage: None
Genetic Donor: None
.
The bunker gates opened. Leo waltzed into the bunker's airtight room. Using the console on the side, he shut the doors behind him.
Beyond the airtight room was a lone elevator. Leo entered it and found only two buttons – [G] and [B1].
Leo pressed the B1 button and let the elevator take him to the mysterious land.
.
DING
The doors were opened. Leo looked ahead and walked out of the elevator.
"…Wow."
Although the structure's name was a lab, Leo found a hospital lobby and ICU wards instead. In each room, an empty patient bed and a sci-fi-like bed capsule glittered in gold.
Behind the lobby counter, three mannequins in a lab coat stood up and saluted Leo. Strangely, these guys wore eyeglasses even though their camera lens didn't need such things.
One of the mannequins wrote something on an A4 paper and handed it to Leo. The latter looked at it.
[We need gene samples to work.]
It was a direct request. Leo also had no issue giving them some genes.
"Where do I put the genes and how do I donate mine?"
One of the mannequins brought out a glass vial and pointed at it. Then, he wrote something.
[Put your blood in the vial. We will handle the rest.]
"Oh, nice!"
Leo bit his fingertip and squeezed his transparent blood out. The three overexcited mannequins held their vial and stared at the dripping blood of Leo as if the liquid was a precious treasure.
After filling half the vial, Leo licked his finger to heal it. He also asked them.
"What does this place do? Do you know how this works?"
One of the mannequins wrote on the same paper.
[You can bring any lifeform here to modify their genetics by using the donated samples as a catalyst. The test subjects might obtain a trait or two from the genes if they are lucky.]
Leo almost celebrated as he wished to train some useless employees in his domain to be as strong as him. However, the luck factor sounded suspicious.
"If they are lucky?"
[If they are unlucky or the genes are incompatible with the test subject's DNA, there might be side effects.]
"Such as?"
[Memory loss, permanent paralysis, blindness, random disability, and death.]
"…"
It was worse than Leo had imagined. He also flipped the mannequins as this structure might become useless for a long time.
[The higher the surgeon skills, the lower the mortality rate. Please upgrade us when you can, master.]
"Yeah, good to know. Anyway, if I bring someone here, what is the chance that a side effect might occur?"
[At the current rate, 75%]
"…That's quite high, isn't it?"
[That's because your structure level is too low. Please unlock more max level caps so that we can be more useful to you.]
Leo shook his head. He excused himself and was about to walk away.
But then, Leo turned around. His intrusive thoughts had another sick idea.
"You said that you can modify any lifeform, correct?"
[Yes, master.]
"Can you modify plants, vegetables, or fruits?"
[Yes, master.]
"!!!"
This sounded terrific. Leo rubbed his hands, wondering if these surgeons could transform some of his crops or vegetables into something better.
Testing things out, Leo ejected a yin cabbage from his storage ring and gave it to the three mannequins.
"Let's test it. Can you modify these veggie genes?"
[We can try. Please wait.]
One of the mannequins took the cabbage into a ward. He dropped it into a sleeping capsule and closed the hatch. Then, he fiddled with the console panel.
DING
<Modifying Yin Cabbage Genes…>
<Time Remaining: 59 Seconds…>
The task was strangely quick. Leo crossed his arms and waited for the mannequin to complete the job.
A minute later, the genetic transformation was completed. One of the mannequins opened the bed capsule's hatch and picked up a seed, which was the only remaining thing from the yin cabbage.
The seed glowed in rainbow color just like Leo's aura. He received the seed and inspected it.
.
Low-Grade Seed of Floridian Yin Cabbage
Can only be planted in Basic Farmland or Greenhouse. It takes 12 hours to mature and requires a clean flow of Yin Qi as nutrition.
.
Another item got its name after Leo's origin. He wryly smiled.
"I'll use this building as a research institution from now on, I think. By the way, can you automatically convert more veggies without me?"
The three mannequins nodded and gave Leo a thumbs up.
Leo was relieved. At least, he wouldn't need to visit this place often.
.
.
CRACK
CRACK
South of the Floridian Domain, Ivy and Cat led the troops of undead elites home. While they traveled north, the newly recruited undead harvested the souls of dead cultivators in the area and awakened them as mindless skeleton soldiers.
Ivy looked back and frowned.
"Don't make too many. We only need extra laborers at the moment. The battle has long ended."
One of the death knights laughed. "We all need servants. A few wouldn't hurt."
Ivy gave up on them. She turned around and concentrated on getting back before the daybreak.
Meanwhile, Cat was bored. She parted from the group and went back to swimming without telling anybody.
While diving underwater, Cat spotted new marine creatures in the river. One of them was a black lustrous anaconda.
"Nom-Nom Meow <3"
Not caring about danger, Cat chased after the snake.
.
.
Several galaxies away from Leo's planet, a lone artificial planet floated freely in the void. Under the radioactive shield of the planet was a civilization.
The population of this planet only consisted of Fenrir Werewolves. They walked around naked on the street, but they all had handheld gadgets, such as smartphones, portable soundcards, or storage boxes.
Among the skyscraper towns, one of them was decorated in neon lights as they embraced the cyber-punk style. Many werewolves wore sunglasses as the bright light on the street hurt their eyes.
In the neon-light city, one of the werewolves sat at a bar counter. He passed a photo of Leo to the bartender.
The werewolf was none other than Anuraku, who once challenged Leo and ran away from the fight. He returned to his home planet for a mission.
The bartender glanced at the photo and muttered. "Who's that Nu'Earthe?"
Anuraku grinned.
"A mutual enemy of our race's overlords."
The bartender scoffed as he didn't care. "What service do you need?"
"Hahaha! Simple. This guy has at least one entity fate crystal, and his home planet hasn't been found yet. I want his home planet's coordination."
"That's a tall call. It will be costly."
"I don't care. Use your system power. I want his coordinate!"
"Alright. If that's what you need."
The bartender collected the photo and counted his fingers. Then, he wrote something on a paper.
Anuraku picked it up. As soon as he saw the price quote, he yelled at the bartender.
"A million years of lifespan?! Are you kidding me?! Do you think I'm a sage or something?!"
The bartender shrugged. "As I said, this job is a tall call. Tracking an entity fate crystal bearer is a challenging job. My price reflects the danger I have to face!"
"TSK!"
Anuraku was annoyed. He stood up and stomped out of the bar. Before he left, he yelled at the bartender.
"You should be grateful that the overlords think highly of you! Had it been others, I would have killed you!"
The bartender shrugged. "Go home, kid. If you want to challenge me, at least get a heavenly fate crystal."
"…"
The werewolf grumbled and slammed the door of the bar.
After Anuraku had left, the bartender transformed from a werewolf into a bald muscular half-African Caucasian human. He tore the photo and rolled his eyes.
"Why should I spend my lifespan to track my fellow countryman?"
The bartender snapped his fingers, and a t-shirt, leather jacket, and a pair of jeans manifested. He put them on and walked to the front door. Then, he put a sign "Close" on it.
DING
However, the door was barged open. A female werewolf kicked it open.
"NU'EARTHE OHIO MAN! THE OVERLORD IS LOOKING FOR YOU!"
The "Ohio Man" turned around and gave the intruder a deep frown.
"We're closed."
"SHUT UP, NU'EARTHE! I SAID OVERLORD MILO IS LOOKING FOR YO-"
CLICK
A 12-gauge shotgun appeared in Ohio Man's hand. He shoved the muzzle into the wolf's mouth.
"One more N-Word, I'll blast your head off."
"…"
Seeing that the wolf stopped barking, Ohio Man pulled his gun back. He then quoted the price.
"A hundred million years of lifespan for one day of service."
"YOU BAST-"
CLICK
Again, the shotgun's muzzle entered the wolf's mouth.
"Pay it or leave it. Choose."
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 200 Income Disparity! Ohio Man Earned 100 Million by Selling Information to Cartel Lord While Florida Man Genetic-Engineered Cabbage DNA to Create Ultimate Pet Food and Earned Nothing!
chapters.content:
Chapter 200 Income Disparity! Ohio Man Earned 100 Million by Selling Information to Cartel Lord While Florida Man Genetic-Engineered Cabbage DNA to Create Ultimate Pet Food and Earned Nothing!
Chapter 200 – Income Disparity! Ohio Man Earned 100 Million by Selling Information to Cartel Lord While Florida Man Genetic-Engineered Cabbage DNA to Create Ultimate Pet Food and Earned Nothing.
On the artificial star, a bright meadow was situated in the middle of a cyberpunk city. In the middle of the grass field was the castle of a realm master, aka an overlord.
Sitting on the throne was a 50-meter-tall black werewolf. While waiting for a certain visitor, he leaned on his armrest and closed his eyes.
In the throne room, 5,000 werewolves of various sizes stood in formation. Everybody was fully equipped with cyan plate armor from head to toe. Their red aura revealed their cultivation base of celestial kings and emperors. A few of them were true immortals.
As for their leader, the black werewolf, his strength transcended the immortals, deities, and sages. Just like Leo, he was also an entity fate crystal's owner.
Overlord Milo ignored the anxious looks of his minions. He discovered the approaching human and a werewolf's aura. Noticing their arrival, Overlord Milo opened his eyes.
The brown muscular man was still in his human form. He waltzed to the throne room with Milo's messenger in tow. However, the poor messenger still had a gun pointing in his mouth.
Milo smirked at the guest.
"Human Ohio Man. I see that you've accepted my invitation."
Ohio Man snorted. "Pay up, or else. I want 100 million years of lifespan."
The messenger widened his eyes and refuted, "You said 10 million earlier!"
"You didn't pay upfront, but you asked me to pick up the pay here. Obviously, the price is different."
"YOU BASTARD NU'EARTHE-"
BANG
Ohio Man pulled the trigger. The head of the messenger exploded, including his soul.
The immortals in the throne room bore fangs and barked at Ohio Man. They pulled their weapons and were about to jump him.
Overlord Milo snapped his fingers.
RUMBLE
The werewolf immortals suddenly sensed a great pressure falling on them. They fell to their knees and sweated profusely.
Overlord Milo warned them.
"As I always warned you – Ohio Man is an entity like me. He only needs to wiggle his fingers and you lots will die without knowing what hit you. Stand down!"
Everybody lowered their heads. Even if they disagreed with their overlord, nobody had enough strength to resist the pressure.
Overlord Milo snapped his fingers again, and the pressure was lifted. He looked at the brown man next.
"Ohio Man. Is 100 million years of lifespan the final price of your allegiance?"
"No. This price is for a piece of information."
"That's quite expensive for a piece of information."
"You asked me to betray my kin. That is a reasonable price."
"Fair enough."
Overlord Milo deeply inhaled. Then, a large system screen appeared in front of him. He pressed a few buttons, ticking the names of all immortals in the throne room.
The overlord uttered and warned his men.
"Your troops retreated first when our army clashed with Overlord Nyan Meo's Army. As a punishment for deserting, I'll be taking half of your lifespan. Consider yourself lucky that you won't be trialed!"
5,000 werewolves gritted their teeth and looked at the flow of life force escaping from their bodies. A flow of white lukewarm air moved toward Overlord Milo.
The average lifespan of these soldiers was 30,000 years as their cultivation base was high. Thus, everybody lost about 15,000 YOL.
The life force of 5,000 werewolves accumulated into millions. Instantly, Overlord Milo secured over 75 million YOL to pay Ohio Man.
The brown man frowned as he found Milo's method disgusting. However, he didn't voice his dissatisfaction as it was none of his business.
Meanwhile, Milo rechecked his YOL balance and found that he still lacked 20 million YOL to pay Ohio Man. He glanced at the men and smirked.
"Second punishment, how dare you lose to the Cathulhu?! The DEZNUTS senators clearly ordered us to produce results, but you couldn't even raze one of their planets! The price of this humiliation will be your death!"
The werewolves in blue armor widened their eyes. They pleaded with their lord.
"CHIEF! PLEASE DON'T! WE FOUGHT WITH ALL OUR MIGHT! PLEASE FORGIVE US!"
"WE DID EVERYTHING IN OUR POWER, CHIEF! WE HAD TO RETREAT TO SAVE OUR INJURED COMRADES!"
"DON'T KILL US, CHIEF!"
Milo snorted, "Silence! DIE!"
"NOOOOOO!!"
Again, Milo snapped his fingers. This time, all troops in the throne room collapsed and dissipated into dust. Their soul returned to the karma river while their life force gathered inside the overlord.
Ohio Man closed his eyes. This wasn't Overlord Milo's first time, and Ohio Man had seen it before. Still, it left a bad taste in his mouth.
Overlord Milo sneered at the lone human.
"What? Do you pity them?"
Ohio Man smacked his lips, "No loyal soldiers deserve this. They fought for you. You just mistreated them. How are you going to explain to their families?"
"Nothing. I'll just kill them all and take their lifespan."
"…"
Ohio Man glared at the overlord. His killing intent exploded while his cold expression remained the same. However, he chose not to antagonize the werewolf entity.
He changed the subject.
"What do you want to know? Also, pay up, and I'll answer."
"Good."
Overlord Milo smirked and waved his finger. A system screen appeared in front of the brown man, showing a drafted contract between an employer and a freelancer.
The freelancer silently bit his fingertip and signed the contract with his blood. The system screen then produced golden chains, which entered both Milo's and Ohio Man's bodies.
Milo didn't scam him. He operated his system and transferred 100 million YOL to Ohio Man. Afterward, he asked the main question.
"Give me the coordinates of Florida Man's home planet."
"…"
The brown man narrowed his eyes. Then, he closed them. After a minute of long pause, he opened his eyes and summoned his system screen. He typed a few words into his system and pressed the [Send] button.
DING
"The coordinate of Florida Man's "HOME PLANET" is there. I complete the contract."
Milo glanced at the coordinate. Seeing the number and texts, he grinned.
"I need to confirm the information first. The contract hasn't been completed yet."
"I don't think so."
Ohio Man smirked and flickered his finger at the golden chain in front of him. The transparent chain dispersed into nothingness, and their systems prompted them with a notification message.
<The transaction has been completed.>
Milo squinted his brow, but he didn't protest. After all, the golden chain contract was made by the system. It automatically verified the actions of both parties that no one cheated on the others. In addition, according to the contract, Ohio Man had to comply with Milo's request without fail, and he could not lie to him.
Since the contract chains dispersed automatically, Milo believed that Ohio Man spoke the truth.
"I guess you didn't play tricks."
"As I said. I gave you the coordinates of Florida Man's "HOME PLANET" as you requested. I'll be taking my leave now."
"Alright. You may go. I'll ask for your service again… Mister Seer."
"…"
Ohio Man turned around and left the castle. As he left, he snorted and mocked Milo.
"Dumbass. You think I'll harm my countryman? If he's from Florida, he's a family! Nobody messes with my family!"
He returned to his bar, but he didn't resume his business.
Ohio Man rubbed his ears. A second later, they lengthened to the side, transforming into elven ears. His face changed, and his black long hair grew. While the transformation went on, he packed his belongings and opened his system menu. Then, he navigated to a quick travel tab. The brown man then chose a planet, which he nicknamed "WIFE" as his destination.
DING
<Quick Travel requires a million years of lifespan to use, and you can only go to a place where you already visited. Will you really spend ONE MILLION years of lifespan to use this feature?>
"Yes."
DING
<Affirmative. Teleporting to WIFE.>
WHOOSH
Just like that, Ohio Man teleported away from this realm after scamming the local overlord.
When Ohio Man reopened his eyes, he found himself standing in a forest with gigantic tall trees.
In front of him was a humble cabin. A female elf carrying a tone-skinned infant in her arms sat in the garden, singing for her baby.
"Daddy's home, Ester?"
The elf mom turned around. Upon seeing the brown handsome elf with long straight hair touching his back, she smiled at him.
"Welcome home, Simba."
She was Ohio Man's wife. The infant in her arms was also his son.
.
After Ohio Man had left, Overlord Milo made his way to a portal altar behind the throne room. He stood at the center of the altar and operated his system.
DING
<Please input the coordination value of your destination.>
Milo copied and pasted the value that Ohio Man had told him.
DING
<A new planet has been discovered.>
A new system screen showed the image of a frozen world. The atmosphere was full of white ash while the terrain was mostly ash snow.
Milo laughed. He glanced at the cooldown time of his portal.
.
Interdimensional Portal (Level 50)
Number of Travelers (20/20)
Size of Travelers (20/20)
Gate Duration (10/20)
Cooldown Time (0/20)
.
As Milo never upgraded the cooldown time level, this facility could only be used once every year. Thus, he always kept this as an emergency.
But in this case, Leo had a bounty on his head. Moreover, the entity fate crystal in Leo's hands was too precious to ignore. Milo needed to get his hands on it before his colleagues or the elves started making their moves.
"Open it! Bring me to that planet!"
RUMBLE
A dimensional gate appeared. Milo laughed and crossed the realms.
After crossing to the other side, he looked around. Although the local temperature was almost at absolute zero, he had no issue enduring the freezing wind.
GWAAAAAA
While looking around, a lizard-like monster emerged from the ground and stood on two hind legs. The Godzilla breathed an ice laser beam toward him.
Milo smirked at the monster.
"PATHETIC! A deity without a vessel?! You are nothing but food here!"
The beam hit Milo's chest, but it didn't do anything. He punched the Godzilla in the face.
BOOM
The monster's head exploded upon impact. Milo cackled and mocked the monster.
"This is what you get for messing with an entity! Even sages have to bow their heads to me!"
After killing the monster, Milo began searching for Leo and his domain.
"Now, where is Florida Man and his vessels?"
He wasn't aware yet that he was on the wrong planet.
.
.
"ACHOOOO!! ACHOOO!!"
Meanwhile, Leo couldn't stop sneezing. He stood on a farm, watching the newly planted seed growing into a sprout.
It was the newly evolved seed that Leo got from the lab. He waited to see what kind of vegetable he would get from it.
PLOP
It didn't take long for the Floridian Yin Cabbage to mature. Instead of growing up into either a black or green cabbage, it shone in rainbow color.
Leo extracted it. But instead of bringing it to an alchemy workshop, he waved his hand and called over a newly summoned golem.
The farmer rushed to aid Leo. It looked at the rainbow cabbage and waited for Leo's instruction.
.
Farmer Golem (Level 8) (Evolution Material Required)
Rarity: Common
Strength: Quasi-Immortal
Specialty: Agricultural Knowledge
.
Leo gave it to the golem and ordered him.
"Can you multiply this or improve the quality? I don't want to keep remaking the seeds."
The farmer nodded. It then turned toward the greenhouse on top of the shopping mall and jumped. Instantly, it arrived in front of the greenhouse.
Leo followed the golem to see how it would do with the product. Then, he was stunned.
The golem cut the cabbage into pieces. Then, he planted them in the greenhouse. In 10 minutes, they matured. The golem harvested the cabbages and collected them in a basket.
Leo counted the new batch of yin cabbages. It multiplied from one head into 30 heads in 10 minutes.
"I'll be damned."
The farmer didn't stop there. It cut five cabbages and replanted them. Then, the golem turned around and gave Leo a thumbs-up.
It seemed that Leo didn't have to worry about running out of food for a while. However, there was a pressing issue.
"ACHOOOO!!"
For some reason, Leo couldn't stop sneezing.

chapters.title: Chapter 201 Florida Man Took Flight Courses to Become First Human Pigeon.
chapters.content:
Chapter 201 Florida Man Took Flight Courses to Become First Human Pigeon.
Chapter 201 – Florida Man Took Flight Courses to Become First Human Pigeon.
Things settled down after Leo erected the pill factory. He no longer had a supply shortage issue.
What pleased Leo the most was the gunsmith upgrade.
.
Gunsmith Workshop Level 12
Gunsmith Automaton (1/1)
Hand Loader Automaton (1/1)
Firearm Technology (5/6)
Product Quality (2/6)
Structure Quality (3/6)
.
As the tech level went up, the current distributed rifles became outdated. The mannequins stopped producing breech-loading rifles and began producing something more interesting.
At the workshop, Leo stood in front of the two mannequins. They also waited for Leo's instructions.
In front of Leo was the system screen, which showed the list of firearms that Leo could build.
"I guess we skip the WWII techs to the Cold War period. How nice!"
AK-47, M16, Barrett M82, and Steyr AUG were available to craft. However, unlike the previous rifles, Leo could no longer rely on sacred wood and holy lich superconductors. The system demanded Leo's lifespan and other materials to make.
From here on, Leo also needed to supply the mannequins with his blood and a weird material called Immortalium. He also had to pay the mannequins one year of lifespan for every new rifle made.
"And where the hell do I get that ore or mineral?"
Leo scratched his head and stared at the two idle mannequins. They tilted their heads as they didn't know either.
Realizing how useless they were, Leo gave up on them. He took the elevator to the mystic realm portal and visited his trusty advisors.
.
On the flying island, the fisherman guardian "Kitten" never stopped throwing something out of the portal. Every minute, either trees or living monsters came out from the permanent portal. All materials vanished upon coming out while all living beings went down the slider and fell to the canyon river.
When Leo got there, he realized that he never collected the tributes from Kitten. He walked toward the portal to check the other side.
However, the three presenting guardians could read Leo's mind. They reminded Leo how he could collect the tributes.
The angel uttered first.
"Master, all gathered materials are automatically sent to your warehouses and granaries. You just need to head there and bring them out from the system's temporary storage."
"…Oh." Leo was surprised. "I have an inventory system?"
"Not that kind of inventory you're looking for, but it is indeed an inventory system. You can't store items in there though."
"Fair enough. Anyway, I need help. Do you know where I can get Immortalium ores or whatever that is?"
The angel remained silent and glanced at the wolf. The Fenrir wagged his tail and smiled.
"You can find them on this planet, woof. But you have to go further north, woof!"
"North?"
"Somewhere beyond the Cauliflower City, woof! Fly 100 kilometers north. You won't miss it, woof."
"…"
Leo nodded. He also had another reason to go there.
.
Entity Fate Crystal Quest – Phrase 2/13
Mission Objectives: Complete 10 tasks to complete this phrase.
Phrase Completion Rewards: 200,000 Years of Lifespan, One Guaranteed SR Lucky Draw (Automaton), Increase the Shopping Mall's max level to 15, Increase the Sub-Building's Max Level to 15
Phrase Two Tasks (7/10 Completed)
- Use the PVP feature once. (Done)
- Defeat a player's shadow in weekly PVP Mode (Done)
- Defeat a player in monthly PVP Mode (Done)
- Spend 10 Building Lucky Draws. (Done)
- Spend 10 Automaton Lucky Draws. (Done)
- Upgrade 10 buildings to level 12. (Done)
- Gather one million years of lifespan. (Done)
- Secure a strategic mineral depot. (0/1)
- Build a resource extractor on top of a mineral depot. (0/1)
- Locate three hidden Earth Fate Crystals on your planet (1/3)
*For every completed task, you will receive one Lucky Draw (Building), and one Lucky Draw (Automaton).
.
Leo had finished the first main quest, and the second set appeared. Fortunately, Leo had already completed most tasks. Only the complicated ones remained.
The bottleneck was the earth fate crystal and the mineral depot. As the mysterious Immortalium ore might be a strategic resource that the system mentioned, securing the depot was the same as killing two birds with one stone.
Leo had no reason not to explore the main continent. He agreed to the suggestion.
"I guess it's time for another adventure. By the way, do you know where the hidden earth fate crystals are?"
The angel pointed south while Mu-Nyang pointed east.
"One of your subordinates has it. She might give it to you if you ask her." Said Meowmeow.
Mu-Nyang looked east and hinted at Leo. "The last one should be in the middle of the ocean, munya. You might have to get to the bottom of the ocean to get it, munya."
Leo smacked his forehead with his palm. He couldn't imagine himself diving into the ocean abyss and searching for a random crystal.
"That's worse than searching for a needle in a haystack."
"Want me to go search for it in your stead, munya?"
Upon hearing Mu-Nyang's suggestion, Leo was overjoyed. He readily agreed.
"Then, please do. I'm already busy as I am."
"NYAHAHAHA! PLAY TIME, MUNYA!"
"Oi!"
It was too late for Leo to retract his words. The giant Cathulhu statue vanished and left behind a sonic boom shockwave.
The angel and wolf statue's expression dulled as they had expected the cat to run away sooner or later. As for Leo, he pursed his lips.
He didn't mind that Mu-Nyang ran away from his guardian duty. He envied the cat.
"Say, Meowmeow." Leo's expression was solemn.
"Yes, master?" The angel sensed the seriousness of the situation. He prepared to take action.
"Can you teach me how to fly?"
"…Huh?"
"Don't HUH me! I know you can read my mind! I don't know how to fly, and I want to fly, too! I WANNA BECOME A PIGEON SO THAT I CAN DROP A SHIT BOMB ON MY ENEMY'S HEAD!"
"…"
Meowmeow facepalmed as he didn't expect his master's childish behavior to act up often. Still, as Leo lacked the fundamentals and basic skills of a cultivator, the angel decided to help him.
"Flight skills can be difficult, but you should be able to do it naturally like how you breathe. First, you should treat the gravity force as a hindrance while the air is a mass of water. Then, you use your Qi to…"
The lesson went on. Leo sat in front of the angel statue, listening to the lecture.
.
.
A week went by.
Leo's daily routine changed. In the early morning, he opened the shopping mall and welcomed new customers from the commoner town. As nobody could take the role of a cashier, Leo got stuck in the mall from 6 AM to 6PM, collecting lifespan and selling pills.
At 6PM, the shopping mall was closed. No worker, commoner, or people from the Tang Clan could linger in the mall as Leo kicked them out. Afterward, for two hours, Leo always toured his domain and examined his farms, warehouses, granaries, and workshops.
At 9 to 11 p.m., Leo went back to the flying island to attend Meowmeow's lecture. When the class was over, Leo went back to his battle bus to sleep. He always woke up at 5AM and entered the shopping mall through the backdoor to manage the underground warehouse.
At 6AM, Leo repeated the loop.
When nobody caused trouble, days were slow and peaceful. Leo loved the feeling of spending boring days doing the same thing over and over. This tedious mundane lifestyle reminded him of the time when he was still a regular salaryman.
Unfortunately, the peaceful period was short.
WHOOSH
Leo teleported back from an offline battle stage to his bedroom. He just fought another shadow of an immortal and killed the guy.
He glanced at the reward, which he got from the fight. He opened the gacha menu and navigated to the gnosis gacha banner.
At the moment, Leo had two gacha tickets as he had defeated two shadows so far. He wondered if he should draw them or stack them to draw 10+1.
The discount tempted Leo. In the end, he decided to save up the tickets for the additional draw and guaranteed rate.
"Alright. Time to work!"
Leo went out of the bus to go to work as usual. However, this day was different.
In front of Leo's motorhome bus, Ivy, Esen, Marc, and Beatrice gathered. Behind them was a company of undead creatures.
Leo didn't fear ghosts. He stared at the crowd and frowned.
He didn't mind that Esen brought friends. However, he was dissatisfied as she never informed him.
"This ain't Halloween y'all. I have no candies for you. Also, Esen. Next time, introduce them to me first so that I can add their names to the employee list. I can't let them roam free without permission or the Fenrir statue will eat them. He likes bones."
"…"
Esen rolled her eyes as she couldn't understand what Leo was referring to. She rested her hands on her hips and leaned forward.
"Geezer, I need your help."
Leo smirked. "Is that the attitude of someone who needs help?"
"Meh, I don't give a damn. We're out of tea. I want more tea for age reduction! I want my people to become alive again."
Leo pursed his lips and glanced at Ivy, Marc, and Beatrice. Although the trio had drunk a lot of tea, their skin already turned purple. It didn't look like the tea worked on them.
On the other hand, Esen still remained a graceful flat-chested high elf. She also didn't smell like a corpse.
After inspecting the crowd, Leo wondered why Esen was resurrected while the others stayed undead. He closed his eyes and recalled the difference between her and her minions.
"Esen."
"Yeah?"
While recalling the old memory, Leo asked her. "Do you remember how I resurrected you?"
"…No clue."
"Hmm."
Leo remembered that he almost mutated her, but he managed to save her life by shoving his blood down her throat.
'Was that incident the reason?'
The corners of Leo's mouth curved up into a faint smile. He believed that he got the answer.
"Sure. But once I resurrect them, will they swear allegiance to me and be my employees for the rest of their lives?"
One of the death knights at the back shouted. "If you can remove the curse, we will do anything! Even if you want us to fight overlords, we'll do it for you!"
After the knight shouted, the others followed suit.
"That's for certain!"
"We take pride in our loyalty! We, the Molg Tribe, keep our promises!"
Leo was satisfied with the answer. He turned his attention to Ivy, Marc, and Beatrice.
"Good. But that's not what I really want. I need something different. By the way, have you heard of an earth fate crystal? I need that for alchemy."

chapters.title: Chapter 202 Forklift Certified Florida Man Refused to Have Sex with Celebrity to Warm Up for the Upcoming No-Nut-November.
chapters.content:
Chapter 202 Forklift Certified Florida Man Refused to Have Sex with Celebrity to Warm Up for the Upcoming No-Nut-November.
Chapter 202 – Forklift Certified Florida Man Refused to Have Sex with Celebrity to Warm Up for the Upcoming No-Nut-November.
Not even a hesitation, Ivy fetched the earth fate crystal and offered it to Leo.
"Here it is, Holy One. Please accept our tribute."
"You're exaggerating. Anyway, thanks for the crystal. In exchange, I'll try to… resurrect y'all."
Leo dryly laughed as he almost bit his tongue. It felt weird to say that he would resurrect these walking skeletons when he wasn't even a priest in RPG games.
"Now, go grab the tea in the granary. Drink 'em until you look like this damn tsundere elf." Leo ordered the crowd.
Esen frowned. "What's sun-de-le?"
"A cute waifu material that deserves a lot of love."
"!!!"
Esen's face reddened, and her body stiffened. Smoke came out from her ears. She misheard "Waifu" as "Wife", and she thought that Leo saw her as his future wife.
On the other hand, Leo referred to Japanese anime characters. However, as it had been 50,000 years since he last watched an anime, he forgot the right terms to call the trope.
While Esen was flustered, Ivy took this opportunity to ask Leo.
"When will you get married, Holy One?"
"Dafuq?!"
It was Leo's turn to be speechless. His body stiffened while his mind wondered why she had come to such a conclusion.
Still, it reminded him of his future. He had been single for 50,000 years because he was the only "Human" on Earth. But at this moment, he lived in a civilization and mingled with the locals. It was about time for him to think about growing a family.
Leo glanced at Sierra as her big assets came to his mind. He also thought of the sexy lamias with 6 boobas as they were his type.
"Probably when I can score a mother of my babies. Well, that's an odd question. Why do you ask?"
Ivy faintly smiled and saluted. She secretly glanced at Esen, who was still flabbergasted and embarrassed.
"Nothing, sir. Just curious."
"Anyway," Leo changed the subject. "When you get your fleshly body back, come find me. The resurrection process will be very risky because I need to touch y'all and feed you my blood. It will be very painful and dangerous. If you fail to endure the pain, you will probably die… again."
"We're not afraid of death, Holy One. We're already dead."
"…I know."
Leo dryly laughed and facepalmed. He didn't know what to feel.
Ivy and Leo continued to chat for 10 minutes before the undead clan excused themselves. As for Esen, she didn't speak a word.
.
After Esen's group had left, Leo flickered the hand-sized crystal in the air and let it fall into his alien ring.
"This is the fourth!"
DING
.
Fate Crystal Tutorial
Fate Crystals are profound artifacts that created the universe. By collecting at least seven fate crystals of the same quality, the collector can gain new strength, depending on the crystal's quality.
Earth Fate Crystals are useless to you. However, it will be nice to collect them for future usage. Maybe someone around you can find them useful?
Be warned. You are not the only one who searches for these crystals. There will be competitors, and they are not your run-in-a-mill pushovers.
Primary Objectives:
1 - Collect 7 Earth Fate Crystals (4/7)
2 – Assemble 7 Earth Fate Crystals (0/1)
Secondary Objectives:
1 – Kill 7 Immortals (2/7)
2 – Upgrade Humble General Store to Shopping Mall (1/1)
Primary Mission Rewards: Gnosis of Earth Fate, True Earth Fate Crystal, Ring of Entity Upgrade Feature
Secondary Mission Rewards: 7 Lucky Draws, 777 Free Tickets
.
Leo only needed three more crystals to complete the primary objectives. As for the secondary one, he might have to rely on the monthly PVP mode and the Fate Arena.
'Time to get going. I've prepared enough.'
After spending a week practicing flight skills, Leo was confident that he could fly alone. However, as the trip might take days, Leo wasn't sure if he should head there without a toilet and a bed.
Since it might be a long trip, Leo decided to take the battle bus with him. But first, he needed to inform his people that he would be absent for a while. He headed to the store to inform his employees.
.
.
Leo stood in front of his bus, staring at Esen, Ivy, Marc, and Beatrice. They pestered Leo to tag along. Moreover, they wanted to bring the crowd of 100 elite death knights, archliches, and grim reapers along.
"You lots…" Leo had a headache. "I'm heading out for work. Why do you want to come with me?"
Ivy grinned and made an excuse. "We still need you to resurrect us. Since this trip might be long, it would have been a waste of time if we waited for you here. We should accompany you and complete the ritual along the way so that we won't waste the tea."
Leo understood that Ivy didn't want to waste her time. However, he didn't understand why Esen wanted to tag along. Moreover, her clothes were weirdly cute.
Instead of wearing the Florida Domain's uniform, she wore a silver evening dress from the clothing store, and she carried a small jewel handbag. Her hairstyle also changed into curly long hair, touching her shoulders. Her light makeup also covered the made her skin less shiny, which pleased the eyes.
Esen looked like she was about to attend a ball.
"Esen." Leo dully stared at the elf. "Are you going to a prom or something?"
The elf in question dodged Leo's eye contact. Her face was still red to the ears. Still, she was capable of making a conversation.
"W-What's prom?"
"A party where hormone-driven young men and women attend before they get drunk, secretly have sex in a toilet, and go home without alerting their parents that they are no longer virgins."
"W-WHAT?!"
Because of Leo's warped mindset, Esen misunderstood the prom as a vulgar party. She almost tore the clothes from the embarrassment. Fortunately, the clothes were so durable that Esen couldn't even put a dent in it.
After teasing Esen enough, Leo invited the group to the bus.
"There aren't many rooms. Make sure you don't break anything."
Everybody except Esen bowed to Leo. They got on the bus one after another.
Ivy and Esen were the last to enter the bus. The former dragged her master into the vehicle and whispered to her.
'Your Majesty! Make sure to cling to him as much as possible. If you stay close to him, you will get stronger. If better, dual-cultivate with him to absorb his virgin yang. That way, you will attain godhood.'
"STOP TEMPTING ME! I'M NOT DUAL-CULTIVATING WITH THAT GEEZER!"
"Have you seen his youthful appearance yet? If he drinks enough tea, he will become young. He might be handsome."
"I'M NOT DUAL-CULTIVATING!"
Esen screamed at her subordinate and kicked her inside the bus.
Meanwhile, Leo overheard the conversation. He raised his eyebrows in confusion.
"What the hell are they trying to do? Matchmaking? Pfft. I ain't into flat boards. She's a good body pillow, though."
.
After getting on the bus, Leo drove it and took off. He flew the bus north.
While driving, Leo upgraded the bus to level 12. The lobby area expanded, and more bedrooms appeared. All 100 knights, liches, and reapers could have a room of their own.
Leo had no time to admire the bus's interior as he was the only one who could fly this battle bus. He focused on the task at hand.
Unfortunately, the busy-body archlich girl didn't leave him alone. She whispered something to Esen's ears. A minute later, Esen walked toward Leo and sat on his lap.
"…"
"…"
Esen's face and ears were so red that her head emitted strong heat and white smoke. On the other hand, Leo stared at Esen for a while before he glanced at Ivy.
Ivy maintained her pokerface. She advised Leo.
"Holy One. Please use her body as you see fit. She cultivates virgin yin, and her physique is compatible with you. If you dual-cultivate with her, your strength will improve leap and bound."
Leo gave Ivy a meaningful look. "I ain't banging the girl. What are you, a Hollywood pimp?"
"I only hope for the best for you and Her Majesty."
"…"
Leo rolled his eyes. He turned to Esen next.
However, the high elf looked up and gazed at Leo's face. Her eyes were moist because of embarrassment.
Leo lightly bonked her with the edge of his palm. Then, he adjusted her posture and made her face the front. Without letting her react, he grabbed her hands and placed them on the wheel.
After correcting her posture, Leo slipped out of his seat and let Esen sit in the driver's seat.
"You keep driving north. I'm gonna go take a nap."
Esen: "…"
Ivy: "…"
Leo left and entered his bedroom. As for Ivy and Esen, they looked at each other.
"Is he gay?" The corner of Esen's mouth twitched. She was offended.
"More like, he isn't easily tempted, Your Majesty."
"Is my charm not enough?" Esen pouted.
"You're very beautiful. But I think the Holy One's taste is a bit special. I think we have to improve your femininity… starting from your chest."
"…"
.
.
The bus flew over the Cauliflower City and headed further north. Wandering cultivators noticed the vehicle, but none bothered attacking it.
After traveling 1,000 km further, Leo came out of his room to check the view.
The north of Yan Empire Continent was full of snowy mountains. A few of them were pencil-like mountains while the others were series of mountain ranges.
Among the white mountains, a pitch black stood out. It was ten times taller than Mount Everest, and its peak reached the space. Yet, all light couldn't reflect from the dark mountain's surface.
Leo gazed at the mountain and recalled the statue's words. Indeed, he couldn't miss it.
"That's our destination."
Leo pulled Esen out of his seat. He resumed driving the bus, bringing it closer to the mountain of darkness.
Esen and Ivy stopped seducing Leo. They remembered this mountain well.
"What are you doing here, geezer? Isn't that Immortalium Mountain?"
"You know the mountain?" Leo was surprised.
"That damn mountain's territory was a forbidden area during my reign. The mineral there is so toxic that it degrades our souls. If we get too close, the link between our fleshly bodies and souls will be cut off, and we'll die."
"Hmm."
Leo widely smiled as he found the mountain and Immortalium interesting. He wanted to learn more about it. Thus, he navigated his bus and landed the bus on a frozen lake 10 kilometers away from the Immortalium Mountain.
He put on the suit and got off the bus. As he prepared to fly alone toward the mountain, Esen tugged his clothes.
"What?" Leo looked back. He started to get annoyed.
"S-Soul… Our souls."
"What soul?"
"There's a way to prevent the soul links from being cut. When my men explored the mountain, we sent couples there together to mine the Immortalium ores."
"So?"
"O-O-Only husband and wife can enter there! Unless you have a wife, you can't go there! Your soul will instantly return to the karma river if you go there!"
Leo clicked his tongue. He thought Esen tried to trick him into dual-cultivating with her.
"I don't have time for that. Let go."
"…"
Esen paused. She turned toward Ivy, asking for her help with her look.
Ivy nodded. But before she could speak, Leo already kicked the ground and flew toward the black mountain.
Esen and Ivy dropped their jaws. It was too late to pull Leo back as he already crossed the boundary of no return.

chapters.title: Chapter 203 Naked Florida Man Climbed Mount Everest to Set a Guinness World Record for Longest Urine.
chapters.content:
Chapter 203 Naked Florida Man Climbed Mount Everest to Set a Guinness World Record for Longest Urine.
Chapter 203 – Naked Florida Man Climbed Mount Everest to Set a Guinness World Record for Longest Urine.
For the first time, Leo flew by himself outside of his domain. A week of training was enough for Leo to adapt to the flying technique.
The massive mountain emitted a dark aura. As Leo got closer, he started losing his vision. Lights vanished from his eyes, but his consciousness remained.
Leo turned around and blinked twice. He instantly regained his sight. But when he turned back to look at the mountain, he was blinded again.
"How annoying."
Leo's iris changed from green to red. His vision adjusted the natural light and tone. A few seconds later, he saw everything in yellowish and red infrared vision.
The mountain's surface was strangely hot despite being surrounded by snowy mountains. Strangely, the freezing environment here wasn't affected as if the heat was limited to the mountain's surface.
Leo braced the danger and got closer enough to land on a cliff. But as soon as his feet touched the black metal floor, his vision blurred.
The surrounding environment changed. Leo found himself on Miami Beach when he was still a human.
A crowd of pedestrians, tourists, and locals minded their businesses on the beach. They either wore swimsuits or light clothes while Leo was still in his suit.
"Huh? Oh, I'm hallucinating."
Leo frowned. This wasn't his first time dealing with random hallucinations. After closing his eyes for a few seconds, he lightly scratched the tip of his tongue with his teeth to sharpen his senses. Then, he opened his eyes.
The view reverted back to the black mountain.
"Heh. Is that it?"
Leo shrugged and looked around, searching for a better place to explore. He looked up for a moment and jumped, climbing the altitude.
Instantly, Leo was 1,000 kilometers above the seawater, but he hadn't found the peak of this mountain yet. As he looked up, he discovered that the mountaintop was beyond the atmosphere levels.
Seeing the absolute unit of a mysterious mountain, Leo was taken aback. While flying higher, he scratched his head.
"How come nobody notice this thing? It's so big and tall… Oh, wait. It blends in space. But…"
As no light reflected the surface of this mountain, nobody could see it in the dark. Still, Leo was puzzled why the locals never tried to exploit or extract this resource.
He soon learned the reason after he reached the stratosphere of this planet. The sky dimmed, and the stars became clearer. Also, Leo spotted a strange object orbiting the mountaintop.
Upon getting closer, Leo could see what it was.
It was a statue of an elderly man in a cultivator robe, holding a thunderbolt in his left hand. Its right hand wielded a long black katana.
As Leo got closer, the statue moved. It looked back at Leo, and its eyes glowed. Their eyes met.
The statue adjusted its posture and faced Leo. It pointed the katana at his face and bellowed.
"This place belongs to the Kishin Clan! If you value your life, go back!"
After warning Leo, the latter's sight blurred again. The scenery around him changed once more.
Instead of flying upward, Leo found himself sitting on a bed in a hotel room. He looked down and found his unit.
"Why am I naked?"
Leo frowned and stood up. He scratched his tongue with his teeth again, hoping to break the illusion. However, a shadowy figure appeared in front of Leo and thrust a long katana at his chest.
TINK
The katana failed to penetrate his skin. Moreover, Leo caught the tip of the sword with his left hand.
The shadow silhouette revealed its identity. It was the statue from earlier.
"Figured as much."
Teaching the statue a lesson, Leo lightly japed the statue's face with his right fist. The head exploded upon impact.
After the statue's head was destroyed, the illusion was broken. However, Leo still found himself in a different place.
He still held the black katana of the statue earlier. Upon looking around, Leo found himself in a meadow. In front of him were a hundred naked women, a mountain of essence stones, a thousand chests of golden bars, and a floating crystal.
Leo recognized the crystal. It looked like an earth fate crystal that he needed. But upon giving it a closer look, Leo scoffed in disgust.
"An illusion on top of another. Is this some kind of a trap? If I fall for it and take anything, will I get trapped here forever?"
Leo flipped the black katana and grabbed the handle. Then, he slashed the floating crystal in half.
The naked women vanished along with the crystals, except one. The remaining woman had the same appearance as Esen, but she had a full rack of assets.
All gold coins, essence stones, and other valuables disappeared, leaving them alone. The remaining woman coyly walked toward Leo and smiled at him.
"Florida Man. How do I look now?"
Leo sneered, "Fake as EF. Get lost, damn illusion!"
Not a shred of hesitant, Leo swung the katana and beheaded the woman. She widened her eyes in shock for a moment while her head rolled on the ground. But a second later, she laughed.
"Hahahaha! You're the toughest one yet. All cultivators and Molgs in the past failed because of their greed and lust. But you, Florida Man. I like you."
"Who the duck are you?"
Despite asking, Leo walked toward the head and stomped it. The head exploded and turned to dust.
The headless body of fake Esen regrew her head. She changed her appearance into a naked lamia with six breasts that Leo had met at the Fate Stadium. She lay on the ground and wiggled her finger, tempting him.
"I'm your greatest desire, Florida Man. Why don't you give up cultivating and partake of me? You can stay with me forever, and I can shapeshift into any woman you like. If you desire a lamia, I can transform into one. If you desire a female Minotaur, I can do it too. Or… do you want to try the 2D girls that you dreamed of 50,000 years ago?"
Judging from the woman's words, she had some sort of mind-reading or memory-reading power. Leo narrowed his eyes as this woman was trickier than he had thought.
"Not interested. Go die."
Leo stomped toward her and seized her neck. He let go of the katana and raised his fist, preparing to cleanse her soul with his holy punch.
The woman turned into smoke and slipped out of Leo's hand. She appeared behind him and embraced him from behind.
"How barbaric. Well, I like wild men. Stop playing hard to get and hug me."
"Nope!"
Leo swung a left back fist at the woman's face. It connected and shattered her into smoke.
After the woman was gone, Leo broke the illusion. However, he was already free-floating in space, and he slowly drifted away from the planet.
"Ah, crap!"
Treating the void as water, Leo waved his arms and legs like a frog, swimming back to the mountaintop. Fortunately, his flight skills helped him back to the mountain. Had he never learned a flying technique, he would have drifted to the void.
He landed on the mountaintop and let out a deep sigh of relief. He wiped his sweat and checked on the surface of the mysterious Immortalium Mountain.
Leo pinched a piece of black rock and pulled it out of the mountain. It was so sticky that Leo was forced to exert 10% of his strength to get a piece out. Even after it had come out, the piece of black mineral behaved like a magnet, pulling itself back to the ground.
Sensing the resisting force, Leo stored a piece of Immortalium rock in his storage ring. He walked around and explored the area.
The statue earlier was nowhere in sight. As for the black katana, it floated freely in the void and drifted away.
Leo shrugged as he didn't care about a lousy black sword. But as he was about to abandon it, the sword flew toward Leo and pointed its tip toward him.
TINK
The katana's tip hit the back of Leo's head.
"Oi. You. I already ignored you, but you dare to attack me first?"
Leo turned around and grabbed the katana's hilt. His left hand held the handle while his right hand grabbed the blade's body. Then, he kneed it.
CLANK
The black katana was broken in half!
As soon as it was broken, a white aura came out from the broken blade. Smoke silhouettes of spirits rushed out and flew to the void.
Although Leo had no idea what he had just done, he observed the ghosts. He noticed that there were a bunch of elves and monsters in the mix, but the majority of souls were humans.
Also, one of them glared at Leo. He also looked back and noticed that her soul was darker than the rest.
DING
<You have slain the Ghost Blade, Killer Queen.>
"Huh?"
The system message surprised him. Still, it explained a lot. Leo figured out the situation.
"So, you must be Killer Queen, the Ghost Blade? I guess you must have been busy collecting souls of wandering cultivators while you're hiding here."
"BASTARD!" Killer Queen's soul bellowed. "MY KISHIN CLAN WILL NOT LET YOU LIVE! THEY WILL LEARN OF THIS PLANET'S COORDINATES THROUGH ME, AND THEY WILL HUNT YOU DOWN!"
"Hey, you attacked me first!"
"YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHO YOU ARE MESSING WITH, NU'EARTHE! YOU SHOULD BE HONORED TO DIE BY MY HANDS AND BECOME ONE WITH ME!"
Leo rolled his eyes. He was tired of her stupidity and one-dimensional behavior.
"Lady. What has happened is the definition of EF around and find out. This is the consequences of your actions. Had you run into a weaker prey, you might have won. But since you chose to pick a fight with me, I retaliated. Well, let's stop talking and continue with our businesses. I'm an introvert. I'm allergic to conversations."
Leo snapped his finger and summoned his dao avatar from his ring. The avatar appeared behind the sword ghost and grabbed her nape. Then, it tilted his head to the side.
The avatar discovered something inside the ghost. He smirked.
'Master, may I consume her?'
"Consume, as consummate, or eat?"
'Both.'
Leo rolled his eyes again. "I guess spirits are still bangable, huh? Well, if she's your type, go ahead."
'Just kidding. I don't have sexual organs. I can't procreate.'
"…"
'I'll be devouring her soul. Thanks for the food, master.'
"…You're welcome."
The dao avatar dragged the sword ghost's soul into Leo's alien ring and vanished. A second later, the ring spat something out.
A white crystal ball with the size of a basketball rolled on the ground. As soon as Leo found it, he recognized it right away. After all, he had seen one at the pagoda of a mystic realm.
That was a gnosis crystal.
"…"
Leo widely smiled. At least, he got something worthwhile. However, at that moment, Leo sensed a crisis.
He needed to take a leak.
With unwavering focus, he assumed his position at the edge of a cliff. He zipped down and whipped his personal gun out. The graceful holy water gushed out from the chamber, but it didn't go down the mountain as the gravity was too light here. Sparkling yellowish liquid droplets floated freely in the atmosphere before they vanished into rainbow smoke.
A minute of long relief sent a chill running down Leo's spine. He waved his gun and stroked it to remove the residual holy water in the chamber. Then, he collected his gun into his pants and zipped up.
Leo didn't think much about the consequences of his actions as he just peed. However, this evaporated holy water would change the atmosphere of this world forever.
.
.
Far away from Leo's star system, a lone elderly fisherman sat next to a seashore, fishing and waiting for a fish to take a bite. Behind him was a group of happy Cathulhu's children playing catch.
Overlord Xiaomao, the fisherman, gazed at the horizon in a daze. But suddenly, his eyes shifted, and he turned around to look at the general direction of a certain star.
He uttered to himself.
"Did someone just break the karmic laws? Even if he's a fellow overlord, he can't just convert a mortal world into an immortal realm! He's just asking for trouble."
Overlord Xiaomao shook his head. But as he sighed, a Cathulhu child hopped on his lap and meowed at him.
"Master, where fish, munya?"
The other cats also begged for food, "Where fish, munya?"
Overlord Xiaomao laughed, "Hang on, kids. Give me a second."
The fisherman grabbed his fishing rod and lightly pulled it.
ZAAAAAA
Suddenly, a massive tuna the size of an African continent jumped out of the sea, holding the bait in its mouth.
It was neither an ordinary fish nor an immortal fish. It was also not a deity or a sage.
The tuna was an entity of this sea that Overlord Xiaomao had been raising as livestock!
"FISH, MUNYA!"
The kids celebrated, looking forward to a feast.
The overlord yanked the fishing rod. The next moment, the sea overlord's head and body were separated and deboned. All innards and blood returned to the sea while its juicy white meat, skin, and scales remained.
The old man collected 90% of the meat to his storage ring. Then, he waved his finger, extracting meat from the fish's head and distributing food to the kids.
While feeding the kids, Overlord Xiaomao glanced at the faint star that he could barely see. The light hadn't traveled to his planet yet, but he already noticed the aura of holy water in the atmosphere. It reminded him of his blood and sweat.
"Who did that?"

chapters.title: Chapter 204 Florida Man Created Realistic Wax Doll of His Dream Girl to Grope Her Breasts. The Doll Was Haunted, but Florida Man Happily Exorcised It on His Bed.
chapters.content:
Chapter 204 Florida Man Created Realistic Wax Doll of His Dream Girl to Grope Her Breasts. The Doll Was Haunted, but Florida Man Happily Exorcised It on His Bed.
Chapter 204 – Florida Man Created Realistic Wax Doll of His Dream Girl to Grope Her Breasts. The Doll Was Haunted, but Florida Man Happily Exorcised It on His Bed.
"Now, then."
Leo grabbed the gnosis crystal. It instantly vanished into his body. No dao avatar appeared. Instead, the system confused him.
<Congratulations. You have digested the Gnosis of Pocket Dimension!>
<A new feature has been unlocked. You may explore the pocket dimension inside you.>
"Huh? Oh, okay?"
Although Leo was confused, he checked his system menu to see a new feature. However, he was left disappointed. No new feature showed up in his system menu.
"Where the hell is that new mode? System, is this an April's fool joke?!"
The system didn't respond.
"Tsk."
Since Leo got no answer from the system, he turned his attention to his alien ring. He rubbed it as if he wished to summon the Genie of the Lamp.
"Come out, my dude. I need help."
WHOOSH
Black smoke came out from the alien ring and condensed into a dao avatar. The spirit furrowed his brow and stared at Leo as he was annoyed.
"My name is Leonardo. Please don't forget that, master."
"Obviously, I never forget that name. That WAS my name, you thief!"
"Of course. After all, I'm your shadow in the past."
The spirit's appearance changed. He transformed into a brown-haired Caucasian man who seemed to be in his 20s. He had wide shoulders and a refined physique, including 6 abs. His defined jawlines and facial hair resembled Chad memes on the internet.
Looking at his old appearance, Leo let out a long sigh. In the past, he thought he was perfect. But living in isolation for 50,000 years, Leo learned that appearance was a piece of useless illusion for people to admire. What mattered the most was his absolute strength, flexibility, and survival skills.
"I hate your look." Leo laughed at Leonardo.
Leonardo rolled his eyes. "Just get to the point. Oh, wait. Never mind. I know what you'll be asking me. The answer is your dantian."
"My dantian?"
"A dantian is a core of every mortal in this universe. Every humanoid creature has three. Every mammal monster has three to four. The locations vary, depending on each species. As for us, our dantians are located in our brain, our heart, and our navel."
"Navel? Is it in my belly button? Somewhere around my bladder? Is it IN THE BLADDERS?" Leo looked at his stomach and unbuttoned his shirt. He scratched his belly and peeled a layer of dead skin. While he was at it, he squeezed his navel to check if he had any stone inside. Fortunately, his skin was healthy as his cancer cells took care of foreign substances for him.
"Stop imagining stupid things, master. Of course not, the lower dantian IS NOT in the bladders. We don't keep our energy source in the pee stomach!"
"Oh, what a relief." Leo laughed.
"Anyway," Leonardo coughed. "It's usually hiding between our intestines. In our case, it's attached to the lower stomach like a tumor... It's a very healthy tumor to have, by the way. Don't try to cut open your stomach to see it."
"…I didn't say anything." Leo was disappointed that his spirit said it first. He was planning to slice his stomach open to check what it looked like.
Leonardo's expression turned dark as he knew what Leo was thinking. He changed the subject.
"The dantian usually absorbs Qi that you digest in your stomach. Then, it channels the energy through your meridians to your heart and brain. Well, you have been doing it naturally since day one, so I don't need to explain further."
"…I still don't know how I do it, though."
"You can't explain when and how you learn to breathe, right?"
"Right. Is it the same thing as how we automatically learn how to admire round and firm boobas?"
"…That's not it, master."
Leonardo had a headache as Leo was too childish. He couldn't blame him since his master got tazzed by countless red and black tribulation lightning bolts in the past. He might have become silly and childish because of that.
.
.
It took Leonardo 30 minutes to explain how the three dantians functioned as a whole because Leo kept interrupting him with stupid jokes. After the lecture finished, Leonardo returned to Leo's alien ring to rest.
Leo was proud of his shadow of the past. He didn't have a shred of doubt as to why Leonardo was smarter than him.
Putting the new knowledge to a test, Leo closed his eyes and sank his consciousness into his pocket dimension, aka the dantian dimension!
.
.
When Leo opened his eyes, he discovered an endless grassland to the west while a raging rainbow sea was located to the east. On the north, a lone laboratory capsule tube full of black liquid stood there.
To the south, there was a wooden desk with a photo frame. It was a picture of a family of four, but their faces were blurry. A trace of black ink remained on their faces as if someone painted them to cover their eyes.
The two adults in the photo were his parents. A young boy in front of the father was Leo. As for the other guy, Leo forgot about him.
He couldn't even remember his face or his name, let alone his existence.
Leo frowned at the photo. He still recognized the family, but he couldn't recall their faces.
Looking at the photo ruined his mood. He was reminded of an unpleasant memory when he was a human. Thus, he walked toward the desk and grabbed the photo. Then, he put the face of the photo down to cover it.
"My day is ruined. Who the hell put it here?! Who's mocking me?!"
Leo looked around, but he found nobody. Only he and his naked butt were alone in this place.
Realizing that he was naked, Leo realized that he was not in the real world. He pondered for a moment before he figured out why the picture was here.
"This place… is my world?"
According to Leonardo's lecture, this place contained a fragment of Leo's soul and memory. It also reflected the owner's life, character, past, and aspirations.
Unfortunately, Leo only found the test tube that he got his second life and the working desk of his father.
The old memory distracted Leo enough. He stopped looking at the things and focused on what he could do here. He walked toward the sea.
The rainbow sea contained all of his elemental essences in the dantian. Leo stepped onto the white beach and slowly walked on the surface of the sea.
The raging sea's waves suddenly ceased. The water became as still as a silent lake.
With every step Leo walked past, a rainbow lotus flower emerged and bloomed. By the time Leo realized it, Leo walked a hundred steps and created a hundred rainbow lotus flowers in his elemental essence sea.
"Oh, dear. Sea pollution gets the best of me. Anyway, flowers won't hurt."
Leo jumped off the sea and flew east, inspecting the endless sea's boundary.
After 10 minutes of flying at the speed of sound, Leo still couldn't find the end of the sea or another continent. He stopped and landed on top of the seawater.
"What do I do here? What's the point of this place?"
While Leo pondered what to do next, he recalled that he got the mysterious new system feature from the gnosis. Thus, he tried to summon a system menu.
DING
Strangely, it worked. However, the system menu wasn't the same as the lifespan system he had.
An annoying rainbow system screen was so dazzling that Leo couldn't see the screen clearly. He was forced to narrow his eyes to read the texts.
.
Pocket Dantian Menu
- Combat Simulation
- Dantian Universe Management
- Lifeform Management
- Time Ratio Settings
- Energy Expenditure Settings
.
"Hoh?"
The new features interested Leo. As the system never provided Leo with a tutorial or explanation, he blindly pressed the combat simulation mode to test the water.
DING
<Please choose a fighter.>
Another menu appeared. This time, it showed a list of other people's statuses and portraits.
The status menu revealed all their details – Age, race, cultivation strength, skills, special abilities, favorite weaponry, and potential percentage.
The screen was also strange. Under the potential percentage panel, there was a slider. Leo could adjust the potential value of the status menu.
"What does this do?"
Leo scrolled through the list of people and found Esen among them. Curious, Leo checked her details.
.
Name: Esen Sydin IV
Race: High Elf
Age: 10,007
Cultivation Base: Celestial Emperor
Skills: Dao of Necromancy, Dark Magic, Soul Domain of Undead Army
Specials: Virgin Yin Blood, Divine Elf Bloodline
Favorite Weaponry: Nameless Breech-Loader Rifle
Potential Percentage: 75%
.
Seeing the potential percentage of Esen, Leo laughed at her. He moved the slider bar to the rightmost, increasing her potential to 1,000% for a laugh.
But as soon as he did, her status changed.
.
Name: Esen Sydin IV, the Overlord of Death Elf
Race: Death Elf
Age: 10,007
Cultivation Base: 12-Galaxy Entity
Skills: Providence of Necromancy, Death Magic, Mandate of Destruction, Mandate of Death Legion
Specials: Virgin Yin Blood, Divine Elf Bloodline
Favorite Weaponry: Staff of Corrupted Divine Elf
Potential Percentage: 1,000%
.
Leo was speechless. He realized what the slider bar was for.
"Is this the difficulty adjustment setting? Wow, this stupid wench is… quite sexy."
The final form of Esen drastically changed. Instead of being a graceful elf, she became a dark elf. Moreover, her chest was round and bouncy, unlike the flat version.
Strangely, Esen's hair became white, and her eyes were pitch black. The display portrait screen showed her rainbow aura, similar to Leo's.
Although Leo was wary of her skills, his finger pressed the [Summon] button to call her to this world.
DING
A shadow of Esen manifested in front of Leo. She appeared with a set of black skull armor and a long gem staff. Despite wearing heavy armor, her gear showed a lot of legs and cleavage.
The shadow of Esen glared at Leo and raised her staff. Before Leo could utter a word, something entered Leo's chest.
"…"
His heart clenched slightly. Leo felt like his heart stopped beating.
He shrugged and faced Esen's shadow. He understood what this mode was for.
"I see. So, this mode exists to train me. I can fight anybody I want in my consciousness? Is that why it is called a simulation? Neat… but pointless."
Leo snorted and dashed toward Esen. The latter backed away and raised her staff again. This time, a million death knights with the aura of entities emerged from the sea.
Leo ignored the emerging legion of death knights. He threw a punch at Esen's face.
Esen vanished as she blinked to avoid the punch. However, Leo predicted her movements and reached out his hand to grab her neck.
Unfortunately, Leo miscalculated the distance. He grabbed her chest instead.
"…"
"…"
Leo widely grinned. He loved the feeling.
"Well, you're not real, so this doesn't count as molesting, right?"
"…"
The shadow's eyes emitted dark flame as if she were angry. She opened her mouth and screamed.
Leo shuddered as his cancer cells trembled. A few cells exploded and died, but they self-resurrected instantly.
"Err…"
Leo was confused about how this fight worked. As he was just a consciousness, he still felt that his cancer cells were slightly damaged from this attack.
Since Esen started threatening his life, Leo got serious. He stopped molesting the girl and threw a punch to her chest.
BOOM
Before the death knights could join the battle, Esen's body exploded and shattered to pieces. Then, all death knights disappeared.
The system informed him of his victory, but a strange development followed.
DING
<You have defeated a shadow fighter of the highest difficulty!>
<Defeat the same fighter 999 more times, and you can learn one of her skills.>
"…Huh?"
.
.
Meanwhile, Esen and her subordinates still kept their distance from the mountain. They looked up and continued to track Leo's life signature.
He was still alive. Everybody was relieved.
But suddenly, Esen sensed a tingling feeling on her right chest. She felt like someone just touched it.
Her face reddened, but she pretended that nothing had happened.
'W-What happened to me? W-Who touched me?!'
There was a pricking feeling in her chest afterward, but it only jolted her. However, that previous touch was too memorable as it felt like Leo's rough hands.

chapters.title: Chapter 205 Florida Man Injected Micro-CPU and Micro-GPU Inside His Brain So That He Could Play Fortnite in His Sleep.
chapters.content:
Chapter 205 Florida Man Injected Micro-CPU and Micro-GPU Inside His Brain So That He Could Play Fortnite in His Sleep.
Chapter 205 – Florida Man Injected Micro-CPU and Micro-GPU Inside His Brain So That He Could Play Fortnite in His Sleep.
"999 more times? Ain't nobody got time for that!"
Leo scratched his head. Although gaining a free skill was tempting, he wasn't interested in the grind. After all, the previous fight was annoying as Esen's shadow was a lot faster than Situ Nantian. Had Leo fought her 2 months earlier, he would have been struggling to catch her.
He had enough with the simulation mode. He checked the other features next.
.
Pocket Dantian Menu
- Combat Simulation
- Dantian Universe Management
- Lifeform Management
- Time Ratio Settings
- Energy Expenditure Settings
.
The next one in the queue was the Dantian Universe Management. Leo pressed on it and activated this mode. Then, changes occurred in his consciousness.
His body automatically floated out of the planet. His sight got stuck in the void, and he could only look forward. The grassland star, which he had been on earlier, became as tiny as a grain of sand.
Aside from the grassland star, there were other stars and colorful masses of gas and dust in the void. However, they seemed so far away from the starting world.
DING
Another red system screen manifested and floated in front of Leo. It showed the status of this universe.
.
Dantian Universe Status
Max Star Capacity: 340,282,366,920,938,463,374,607,431,768,211,455
Inactive Stars: 18,446,744,073,709,551,615
Current Active Star(s) In Use: 1
Average Star Mastery: Level 1/10
.
"…"
Leo almost swore out loud. There were so many stars in this universe. However, the total number of stars that Leo could use was only one! Moreover, the stars had a level, and it was pathetically low.
At the bottom of the menu, several buttons hinted that Leo could do something about these unused stars.
[Assign Element]
[Assign Roles]
[Create Galaxy]
Leo spent a few minutes experimenting with these buttons. Fortunately, there was a hint of what they were for as a description appeared whenever Leo hovered his finger over a button.
He read the descriptions while he experimented on it. Surprisingly, everything was direct and simple.
[Assign Element] was straightforward. Using this feature, Leo could assign a type of element essence for an inactive star, and it would become active.
After a star got its elemental essence, the [Assign Role] button became available to use. It allowed Leo to choose the role of an active star, and there were four major choices – Habitat, Core Energy Source, Spiritual Source, and Material Source.
The habitat option gave permission to local lifeforms to evolve or grow. Leo could play god and create any living being on one of these stars with this option.
The core energy source option transformed an elemental star into a core of a black hole, a sun, or a core of a galaxy, which enabled the [Create Galaxy] mode.
Spiritual Source's button linked an elemental star to a core energy source and developed a star system. When at least two stars joined and became a star system, they provided Leo with an unending flow of Qi and energy.
As for the Material Source, it was more magical than the rest. It allowed Leo to use whatever energy he had to materialize anything in the real world! However, it had a prerequisite that the local energy source or materials from the star systems and galaxies were enough to supply such a grand endeavor.
For example, to create a rock in the real world, Leo needed to sacrifice a thousand rocks in his universe. Then, a real rock would appear in the real world and carry the same characteristics as the 1,000 sacrificed rocks in Leo's dantian universe.
The exchange rate seemed cheap at a glance. However, the sacrificed materials couldn't be regenerated. Once a star was completely consumed, it disappeared forever.
