The liches grinned as they mistook Ivy's words. They thought that the husband and wife got busy the entire night, and they got exhausted in the morning.
"Understood. I'll go tell those people."
The liches exited the bus to relay Ivy's words to the death knight. However, they were blunt with their words.
"The Holy One and Her Majesty were intimated all night! They are sleeping, and they aren't welcoming guests at the moment. Tell them to come back in the afternoon!"
The death knight was taken aback at first, but he quickly understood the lich's intention.
"Understood. I'll go tell the humans now."
.
.
The previous death knight returned to the front of the parking lot. When he arrived, Murong Qi's group was still there.
The death knight coughed and informed them by using his words.
"His Majesty Florida Man had intense sex last night, and he is exhausted. He is resting at the moment. Come back in the afternoon."
"…"
Because the death knight's voice was loud and clear, everybody in the parking lot could hear it. The elves and white-haired men raised their eyebrows while the disciples froze on the spot.
The death knight's colleagues in front of the parking lot turned around and gave their friend a weird look. Everybody doubted that Leo did that with Esen.
On the other hand, Murong Qi saw hope. He was excited.
'Finally! I don't believe that anybody's mind is clear and pristine like a virtuous saint! Every person at least has one or two dark sides or weaknesses! You're no exception, I see!'
Murong Qi believed that Leo was weak against women or he was a lustful beast. Therefore, his ploy might work.
"Senior, could you tell Lord Florida Man that I also wish to give him gifts to express my goodwill? You see. I have a thousand young maidens right here. They have trained and cultivated in dual-cultivation techniques. Since your lord's hobby coincides with ours, he might…"
All elves and white-haired people clicked their tongues in unison. The guard waved his hand.
"As I said, come back in the afternoon!"
"T-Then, can I leave my gifts here, first?"
"Take them back with you!"
"O-Okay."
Murong Qi smacked his lips as nothing went his way. He blamed his bad luck.
.
.
Meanwhile, a weird rumor circulated because of the guard. Several disciples overheard it and misinterpreted the words.
"Lord Florida Man had sex?"
"Lord Florida Man did someone?"
The rumor quickly spread throughout the domain. Then, the news reached Taxi's ears.
"Smash?" (Oh, he and that broad smashed?)
Ricardo nodded in approval.
"SMASH!" (Doesn't matter. They SMASHED!)
Because of their conversation, Sierra, who was assigned to be their caretaker, also misinterpreted the rumor.
"So Lord Florida Man milked Lady Esen?"
"SMASH?!" (WHAT?!)
"SMASH??" (How come I haven't heard of this?!)
Sierra continued exaggerating the rumor unintentionally. "I asked the lord to milk me, but he doesn't want to touch me. Since he touches Lady Esen, he might be planning to milk her?"
"SMASH!!" (HOLY HORSE!)
"SMASH?!" (WHAT LOGIC! THIS IS A SCOOP!)
The horses circulated weird rumors to the badgers and the tamer girls. Soon, the words were twisted along the way.
"Lord Florida Man milk Lady Esen?"
"Senior Florida Man drinks Lady Esen's milk?!"
"Lady Esen has milk?!"
"Lady Esen has BOOBS?!"
.
.
On the flying island, Meowmeow, Mu-Nyang, and the wolf dully stared at the crowd below. They had a headache.
"Master is gonna get angry, munya."
"He is gonna be pissed for sure, woof!"
Meowmeow deeply sighed in resignation. He felt bad for Leo.
"I pray for you, master. Please don't get any weirder."
It was too late for Meowmeow to correct the rumor. More weird rumors circulated and mixed with the others.

chapters.title: Chapter 224 Florida Man Introduced New Career Choice to Female Teenagers – Lithium Miner.
chapters.content:
Chapter 224 Florida Man Introduced New Career Choice to Female Teenagers – Lithium Miner.
Chapter 224 – Florida Man Introduced New Career Choice to Female Teenagers – Lithium Miner.
Leo and Esen left their bus after a good sleep. Esen made her way to the white tree array to check on the formation. As for Leo, he hyped himself and planned to do some new quests.
.
Entity Fate Crystal Quest – Phase 3/13
Mission Objectives: Complete 10 tasks to complete this phase.
Phase Completion Rewards: 300,000 Years of Lifespan, One Selectable SR Building, Increase the Shopping Mall's max level to 17, Increase the Sub-Building's Max Level to 17, and Enable TOP-UP Feature.
Phase Three Tasks (5/10 Completed)
- Recruit at least 2,000 workers. (Done)
- Complete at least one true fate crystal (0/1)
- Successfully defend against an invasion from another player (0/1)
- Successfully invade a player's home planet (0/1)
- Embed a true fate crystal to a pylon tower (0/1)
- Upgrade 20 buildings to level 15 (Done)
- Upgrade shopping mall to level 15 (Done)
- Get a girlfriend and fail NNN! (Done)
- Manufacture at least 1,000 weapons using strategic resources. (491/1,000)
- Recruit at least 100 immortals as your soldiers (Done)
*For every completed task, you will receive one Lucky Draw (Building), and one Lucky Draw (Automaton).
.
The missions were tougher in this phase. Many quests seemed impossible for Leo at the moment. For example, Leo had no means of accessing or invading another player's home planet. In addition, the Earth Fate Crystal tutorial was still ongoing, and the progress was barely halfway to completion.
However, nothing was impossible for Leo. As he had recently upgraded the shopping mall from level 10 to 15, his system unlocked many new buildings.
Leo opened his domain system menu and browsed the list of the new buildings. Then, he widely grinned.
.
Altar of War
Gate Size (0/25)
Transferable Personal (0/25)
Distance (0/25)
Cooldown Timer (0/25)
Price – 10,000 YOL
Cannot be built in Shopping Mall.
.
Tavern of Heroes
Hospitality Worker Automaton (0/25)
Tavern Size (0/25)
Max Visiting Friends (0/25)
Accommodations (0/25)
Price – 10,000 YOL
Can be built in Shopping Mall.
.
Military Boot Camp
Drill Sergeant Automaton (0/25)
Camp Capacity (0/25)
Facilities (0/25)
Training Speed (0/25)
Price – 10,000 YOL
Can be built in Shopping Mall.
.
Life Force Casino
Hospitality Worker Automaton (0/25)
Facility Quality (0/25)
Security (0/25)
Accommodations (0/25)
Price – 10,000 YOL
Can be built in Shopping Mall.
.
Fate Crystal Radar
Operator Automaton (0/50)
Detection Range (0/50)
Price – 1,000 YOL
Cannot be built in Shopping Mall.
.
These five buildings were the highlight of the newest upgrades. Aside from these new buildings, the rest were alchemy workshops, warehouses, granaries, farms, a new apartment, and small houses that Leo already had.
Leo rearranged the granaries in his domain. He pressed the [Move] button and grouped them behind the shopping mall so that the land behind Gao Yan and Wu Buyi's houses was empty. Then, he erected new houses and an apartment in the area and upgraded them to level 15.
RUMBLE
Instantly, buildings appeared out of thin air and firmly occupied the elevated hardened ground.
Leo didn't stop there. He erected new warehouses and granaries to increase his storage rooms. Two new farms extended to the west and east of the southern agriculture district. Moreover, two alchemy workshops were added to the shopping mall's fifth floor.
After Leo had completed the minor buildings, he moved on to the main course. He started with the facilities that could be added to the shopping mall first.
Life Force Casino, Military Boot Camp, and Tavern of Heroes appeared on the fourth floor, occupying the rooms next to the time chamber.
As usual, these facilities looked small from the outside. But after Leo had upgraded them to level 15 and allocated some points, the interior expanded, which was capable of hosting a thousand visitors at once with ease.
.
Tavern of Heroes Level 15
Hospitality Worker Automaton (3/25)
Tavern Size (5/25)
Max Visiting Friends (2/25)
Accommodations (5/25)
.
Military Boot Camp Level 15
Drill Sergeant Automaton (3/25)
Camp Capacity (10/25)
Facilities (2/25)
Training Speed (0/25)
.
Life Force Casino Level 15
Hospitality Worker Automaton (3/25)
Facility Quality (5/25)
Security (5/25)
Accommodations (2/25)
.
The upgrade cost of these three facilities was painful. One level cost 10,000 years of lifespan. Thus, raising everything to the max level required 450,000 years of lifespan.
Leo didn't fret as he had plenty to squander. He was no longer scrapped for a year of lifespan like in his early days as his side hustler business got more popular during these few days.
More migrating commoners continued to show up and moved to the west slum district. The town's size continued to expand, and the outskirts of the town already reached the outer gate of the Magpie City. As new people showed up, they got interested in Leo's shopping mall and became his customers by default.
In addition, the people from the Tang Clan were richer than the commoners. They always queued in front of the supermarket section and waited for the new batch of poison grain pills or poison liquid to enter the shelves. Then, they always purchased them all.
With these guys around, Leo didn't need to work as hard as in the past. He just needed to expand and maintain the order around here.
Unfortunately, Leo didn't get to enjoy his SIM session for long. While he was playing with the system, one of the death knights approached Leo and informed him of the visitors.
"Your Majesty. A quasi-immortal has brought many young mortals here to see you. He said something about giving you a gift as a tribute."
"A new customer? Well, where are they? Guide me to them!"
Leo was enthusiastic as he never hated new rich customers. He wondered how many cultivators he could scam on this occasion.
.
.
Murong Qi and his people still lingered in front of the store. Some of them eyed the floating crystal tower behind the parking lot, which was the source of the yin-yang Qi in this domain.
Everybody secretly cultivated and absorbed Qi from the environment. Even though the death knights forced them to wait here for hours, none of them complained. After all, the dense Qi in this area was thicker and better than the mystic realms that they had been.
While everybody cultivated in earnest, one of the death knights called them over.
"His Majesty Florida Man is here! Kneel and pay respect to the Holy One!"
"…Huh?"
Murong Qi and his followers were taken aback that the elf identified his lord as a king or an emperor.
Had it been normal circumstances, Murong Qi would have never bowed to others. However, the elf was an immortal. Murong Qi had no power to argue or protest.
Obediently, Murong Qi knelt on one knee and cupped his fist. He lowered his head the same way he paid respect to Yan Xiang.
Seeing their sect leader kneel, his followers copied him. Everybody behind Murong Qi paid respect to Leo.
"Murong Qi and his followers greet Your Majesty! May you be healthy and live in prosperity for 10,000 years!"
"…"
Leo wasn't used to being treated as an emperor. He coughed to hide his nervousness and embarrassment.
"Ahem! Are you moving here like Tang Xuan and others as well? Or are you here to visit my store? What's your name?"
Murong Qi looked up and gazed at Leo's face. He tried to measure Leo's cultivation base.
Unfortunately, no matter how Murong Qi looked into it, Leo's aura was no different from a soul formation cultivator or other mortals. He doubted that was Leo's true strength.
'I see. He must have hidden his true cultivation base. An able rich man never flaunts his wealth! A true expert never shows his strength. This must be the case.'
Murong Qi introduced himself and got to the point.
"I'm the sect master of the Joyous Yin-Yang Sect, Your Majesty. The reason I'm here is that I wish to come and pay homage to the new lord. I've also brought you some gifts as a tribute."
Murong Qi looked back and showed him his followers. A thousand pretty maidens behind him looked up and beamed Leo with a bright smile.
"These girls are the finest disciples of my sect! I would like to offer them to you, Your Majesty. They are good at housework, chores, and… bed work. I'm sure you will like them-"
Before Murong Qi could finish his sentences, Leo rolled his eyes and interrupted him.
"Send those bitches back to the lithium mine they belong. We don't welcome underage prostitutes here. Only underage miners and farmers are allowed!"
"…Eh?"

chapters.title: Chapter 225 CEO Florida Man Rejected 2,000 Job Applicants Because He Was Too Busy Analyzing GTA6’s Trailers and Leaked Gameplay.
chapters.content:
Chapter 225 CEO Florida Man Rejected 2,000 Job Applicants Because He Was Too Busy Analyzing GTA6’s Trailers and Leaked Gameplay.
Chapter 225 – CEO Florida Man Rejected 2,000 Job Applicants Because He Was Too Busy Analyzing GTA6's Trailers and Leaked Gameplay.
"E-E-Excuse me?" Murong Qi was stunned. He thought that Leo was into women and pleasure. However, his words contradicted the rumor.
Leo snorted and stared at the young girls.
Everybody wore skimpy and revealing clothes, showing a lot of skin. They also put on thick perfume and makeup, which was not something that tamer girls in his domain would do.
Even if Leo's mind and IQ were below average, he was wise enough to differentiate between innocent maidens and prostitutes. Thus, he didn't trust these newcomers.
"If you're here as customers, I welcome you. But if you're here to ask for a job, get some proper clothes first. Also, those underage girls smell like puke. Tell them to take a bath at least once a day."
"…"
"Your servants also have a foul odor. I can smell their dried sperm from a mile away. When was the last time you people took a bath? A month ago?"
Murong Qi broke a sweat. He looked behind him and noticed the unique odor of his disciples.
As their sect was located in the northern region, the weather was usually cold and dry. Thus, the natives rarely took a bath to conserve water. Only stronger cultivators who cultivated water elements took a bath daily. As for the disciples and cultivators under the 3rd stage, it would be a miracle if they took a bath once a month.
In short, they smelled like a horse stable mixed with strong deodorant and perfume.
Murong Qi bitterly laughed. He waved his hand and activated his dao avatar. A water domain appeared and enveloped his followers. A few seconds later, he removed the water dome and all the water droplets in their clothes.
Just like that, Murong Qi partially cleaned his people. Still, the sensitive parts of their bodies were as dirty as before.
Leo observed their interaction. He had a new inspiration.
'I wish I had a public bathhouse like the one in Japanese anime. I guess I have to pray to the RNGesus god for gacha luck next time.'
Leo waved his hand and parted them with a warning.
"Take them home for now. Come back when your followers become adults. But if you wish to purchase something from my store, you should at least take a proper bath first."
"…"
Leo moved on to the next job, leaving Murong Qi and his followers confused.
.
.
After Leo had left, Murong Qi gritted his teeth. He was angry and humiliated that Leo didn't welcome him.
'If you weren't an immortal, I would have killed you on the spot! How dare you humiliate me?!'
In a bad mood, Murong Qi ordered his followers to return to their ship. Everybody was disappointed that they had to go home.
Along the way to their ship, they passed the Tang Manor. Tang Xuan stood there in front of his home, watching Murong Qi leave.
Tang Xuan snickered and mocked him. "I see that you've been kicked out. Sucks to be you, pervert."
"Tang Xuan! Has nobody taught you not to step on a fallen man?!"
"For someone like you, I don't need to treat you with courtesy."
"…I'll remember this humiliation, Tang Xuan."
"Yeah. Keep thinking of me when you return."
"…"
Murong Qi's face reddened in anger. He swore that he would get back to Tang Xuan one day in the future.
In the end, the people of the Joyous Yin-Yang Sect returned empty-handed. Because of Murong Qi's temper, none of their followers got to visit Leo's store or purchase his elixir.
.
.
RUMBLE
Meanwhile, ten light years away from Leo's planet, two artificial stars emerged from a white wormhole. Both stars gradually floated forward while the wormhole was closed.
Several kilometers above the artificial stars was the cubic warship of the elves. They descended and extended docking corridors toward the stars to connect a pathway.
CLICK
The square cube connected to the artificial stars. A few minutes later, passengers from the stars flew in the corridors toward the cubic ship.
.
At the meeting room of the cubic ship, the ship's captain, Ingof Jack, gazed at the two commanders of the reinforcement. Although Jack had a lower cultivation base, the two werewolves bowed their heads and showed respect to the captain.
"Overlord Milo, reporting for duty."
"Overlord Max, reporting for duty."
Both werewolf commanders were the overlords of their artificial stars. Moreover, they served the divine elves as soldiers.
Overlord Milo was a werewolf with messy black fur. As for Max, he had the face and skin of a grey pitbull, and he was more muscular than the former. Without hairy fur, he resembled a beastman instead of a Fenrir Werewolf.
Both overlords had the cultivation of the sage realm, which was a major realm higher than the deity realm. They also brought over a thousand deities and a million immortals.
Ingof Jack invited them to their seats.
The room featured a round table with a hologram screen at the center. Ingof Jack sat at the head of the table while the two overlords sat next to each other.
Jack operated the console in front of him, and the hologram image changed. It displayed the planet on which Leo resided.
"Gentlemen, I'll get to the point. As you've been briefed, our primary mission is to secure Princess Esen and kill her followers. Secondly, we need to investigate how Princess Esen removed the undead curse."
The hologram screen zoomed toward the planet. It highlighted the main continent.
As the hologram kept zooming in, it showed the Florida Domain. The flying island stood out as a mystic realm portal was active 24/7.
Jack continued.
"Unfortunately, the mission won't be easy. Our intel has discovered three guardians there. Our detector estimates that the guardian statues have the strength of a deity at the very least."
Max scoffed. "A deity isn't our opponent! We can just go there and stomp everybody!"
Jack shook his head. He showed other images, which his satellites managed to capture. The hologram showed the figure of the black-winged angel statue.
"Although the guardian statues have the same strength as a deity, this statue resembles someone from the Kishin Clan."
"Kishin Clan? The Oni Clan?"
Max and Milo shuddered at the name of the Kishin Clan. They weren't fond of those samurais.
Jack raised a remote and pointed at the wall on the opposite side of the two werewolves. Then, the wall showed a photo of a black-winged angel with the same face as the statue.
"T-That man?!" Max recognized him.
Jack gave them a piece of bad news.
"Gentleman. I don't know how that statue's face looks like Overlord Mao of the Devil Tribe, but you should be prepared for it. If possible, we will not directly assault that place. We are going to avoid the guardian statue so we won't accidentally provoke Overlord Mao of the Devil Tribe. Please don't forget that Overlord Mao and Overlord Kishin are sworn brothers. If one of them is provoked, the other will also move. Things will get complicated if they suddenly wage war against us."
"…"
"I'll explain our strategy for the mission."
Jack continued to explain his plan. As for the two werewolves, they grumbled as they hated to see the black-winged angel's statue there.
They wished that the statue never existed.
.
.
Meanwhile, Meowmeow, the black-winged angel statue gazed at the new stars. He raised his eyebrows and pursed his lips.
"Oh, boy. Two more stars appear. They're still out of range, though."
Mu-Nyang cackled. "Why don't we invite our master to go there, munya? As long as he's around, we can use our full strength, munya!"
"Not so fast. We probably won't need to move."
"Huh? Why, munya?"
Meowmeow's expression was solemn. He shifted his gaze toward another star, which strangely moved erratically. It traveled at the speed of a thousand light years per second, and it was heading toward their star system.
Looking at the approaching anomaly, Meowmeow warned his colleagues.
"Call Kitten over. We might need his help. I think that guy found us."
"That guy, munya? Wait… THAT GUY?!"
Mu-Nyang stopped smiling. He frowned and followed Meowmeow's gaze.
"I see, munya. It's that blasphemous crook that stole the prototype body, munya! That body was supposed to be our master's body, munya! We have to get it back!"
"Yeah…"
Meowmeow narrowed his eyes. He rubbed his katana, waiting to get his revenge.
"That body should have been passed down to our master. Because of that bastard, our master struggled for 50,000 years in an incomplete vessel and was forced to endlessly evolve! He also lost his opportunity to ascend! I swear with my name. I'll drag your soul out and crush you!"

chapters.title: Chapter 226 Musical Theatre’s Judges Sent to Hospital after Listening to Florida Man Singing “A Whole New World” During Audition.
chapters.content:
Chapter 226 Musical Theatre’s Judges Sent to Hospital after Listening to Florida Man Singing “A Whole New World” During Audition.
Chapter 226 – Musical Theatre's Judges Sent to Hospital after Listening to Florida Man Singing "A Whole New World" During Audition.
DING
<Your alchemy factory has refined 20 medium-grade Floridian Dantian Pills.>
<Your alchemy factory has refined…>
Every day, one of the alchemy factories produced a batch of Floridian dantian pills. As for the other factory, it mass-produced 20 medium-grade elemental pills every ten minutes.
The quality of these pills was far inferior to the ones made by alchemy workshops. However, the production rate was second to none. Because of these factories, Leo had endless supplies of pills for his employees and customers.
Leo wished he had more of them. He hoped the next gacha would bless him with more of these factories.
As Leo had promised Esen's subordinates, he reserved the Floridian dantian pills for the death knights, liches, and grim reapers. Until everybody got their pills, he would not put these items on the supermarket's shelves.
He stopped inspecting the facilities and checked on the land vehicle factory next.
This facility had been put on idle as Leo didn't have enough material or resources to supply this factory. After Immortalium ingots and goddess milkium ingots entered the shopping mall's inventory, the factory's workers transported all necessary materials into the facility and waited for Leo's instruction.
Leo entered the factory. He opened the facility system and checked what he could build in there.
DING
.
Land Vehicle Factory Level 15
Engineer Automaton (2/20)
Technology (7/20)
Vehicle Quality (6/20)
Production Speed (0/20)
Currently Making: None
.
Current Buildable Vehicles
- Motorcycles – Standard
- Motorcycles – Scooter
- Motorcycles – Sport Bike
- Motorcycles – Motocross
- ATV
- 2-Door Pickup Truck
.
The choices were limited as the building's technology was still level 7. However, the portraits of the vehicles seemed to be from the 90s, which didn't seem so bad.
Curious about what the factory could do, Leo chose the vehicle that required the least materials – The scooter. As scooters were friendly to drive for beginners, Leo believed it might sell if he could upgrade it later on.
The factory only took one Immortalium ingot and the goddess milkium ingot. The factory's mannequins rushed down the elevator and fetched several large chunks of stones extracted from the quarry. Then, they hurled them on the factory's belt and operated the machines.
RUMBLE
Sophisticated machines hummed. One of them injected strange Qi into the raw stones. Then, blocks of chrome-color ingots exited the machine and sat on the running belt. Each ingot was in a different size, and the belt machines sorted them.
One of the machines pushed the largest ingot to another belt, which brought the mineral to a pool of mercury-like liquid. The ingot fell into the pool and emitted a burning iron odor.
A claw machine slowly lowered and grabbed the material in the pool. The claw was 9,999 times more precise than any toy claw machine in modern arcades. Thus, it had no issue pulling out the grey ingot.
But when it came out of the water, it was no longer an ingot anymore. Magically, the mysterious stone ingot turned into a frame of a scooter.
The claw machine brought it toward another pool of black water, where another machine had smelted and poured Immortalium and milkium liquid inside.
The black and white liquid moved as if it were sentient. The substances coated the bike's frame and seeped into the core of the mineral.
Watching how the machine manufactured the bike's frame was mesmerizing for Leo. He spent 10 minutes staring at the machines in a daze before he came back to his senses.
He scratched his head and complained.
'Damn. I see. This is why those factory videos on YouTube are so satisfying to watch.'
Leo left the factory before he changed his mind. He only checked the timer to see when the bike would be finished.
<Time Remaining: 49 Minutes, 33 Seconds.>
It was fast! This factory could potentially make 24 scooters every day! Although it was not comparable to modern factories, it was good enough for a factory with only two working mannequins.
Leo strolled around the shopping mall to kill time. He waited for the bike to finish.
.
An hour later, Leo returned to check on the first production of this factory. He found a humble grey scooter, which resembled the Honda Elite 250 in the 90s except for its chrome paint job.
Leo was excited. He brought it out of the factory and tried starting its engine.
Unfortunately, it had no fuel. The scooter's engine was silent.
"Aw. Do you still need gas? Too bad for you, I'mma upgrade you and make you use the MAGICAL QI instead of gas!"
Leo stroked the handles and tried to summon the system menu. As usual, the system menu showed up, displaying its name, level, and upgrade options.
Similar to the M16's case, the system allowed Leo to upgrade it to level 15, which was the maximum level of the shopping mall. In addition, the price of each upgrade was a measly 10 YOL!
"Hehehe. I see. If I make the items, the upgrade cost will be cheap! Then, this bike can be sold for some profits!"
Leo contemplated his business plan. As the bike cost him 140 YOL in total as he upgraded it to the max level, he needed to sell the price higher than regular pills. Moreover, the bike required special materials to make, so Leo had to add the material and production cost to the calculation.
'To be honest, I can just sell them at a cost price. But I don't have to upgrade every bike to the max level, do I? I can just make it passable by changing them into a QI-EV bike. Then, I can set the price for cheaper… How about 300 YOL per basic unit? I can still charge my customers 50 YOL for each upgrade!'
He made his decision. He would test the bike and show everybody the new merchandise first. Then, he would experiment with lower-level bikes to see which was marketable.
.
.
VROOOM
A few minutes after Leo had brought out the bike, he drove it out of the shopping mall and laughed.
The vehicle entered the highway and sprinted toward the east, which led to the Tang Clan District. Workers and clan members on the road leaped out of the way in panic.
Leo grumbled as the road became a walking street. He switched the vehicle's gear a notch. Then, it stunned everybody.
The scooter was flying!
"KAHAHAHAHA! A WHOLE NEW WOOOOOORRLD!"
Leo began singing Aladdin's song even though no woman was there to sing the female part. As no one was there to sing with him, he sang the female part himself. As a result, the song sounded weird. Combined with his tone-deaf voice, everything was horrible.
While Leo flew with his bike, the people below looked up and watched him. But because of Leo's bad voice, everybody plugged their ears. Some of the commoners shed tears of pain and cringe because of the loud tone-deaf voice.
"DAMMIT! STOP SINGING!"
"ARRRRGH! MY EARS!"
"MAKE IT STOP!!"
Aside from the people who hated Leo's singing voice, many cultivators speculated what Leo had done this time.
"What's that? A flying sword?"
"That's definitely not a flying sword. It's more like a two-wheeled cart of a performer trope."
Meanwhile, Tang Xuan noticed Leo's new toy and his obnoxious tone-deaf voice. He rubbed his temples while he tried to figure out what Leo was riding.
"Two wheels, strange frames, and that sophisticated engine… Is that a new personal flying ship? That looks very creative."
While Tang Xuan admired the bike, young people from the Tang Clan drooled. Many teenagers who had never flown with their own power wondered if the new vehicle was a special flying ship or a flying artifact that they could use.
Some of them gossiped.
"I heard the Cugatti Flying Sword was the top brand of flying swords. But that is different."
"It seems friendly to the users, too. Look at how Lord Florida Man sits on the small chair. If you can sit on a flying sword, wouldn't it make it easier to use?"
"Indeed. Even people with balance issues might be able to use that!"
"I wonder if it's for sale. I want one."
"Me, too."
"Me, three."
Many cultivators prayed that Leo would put one of the artifacts on sale. They wished that the supermarket would put something different on sale on day.

chapters.title: Chapter 227 Florida Man Equipped Scooter with Military-Graded Weaponry and Sold it to the Army. Government Officials Baffled How Armed Scooter Was More Destructive Than Million-Dollar Tanks.
chapters.content:
Chapter 227 Florida Man Equipped Scooter with Military-Graded Weaponry and Sold it to the Army. Government Officials Baffled How Armed Scooter Was More Destructive Than Million-Dollar Tanks.
Chapter 227 – Florida Man Equipped Scooter with Military-Graded Weaponry and Sold it to the Army. Government Officials Baffled How Armed Scooter Was More Destructive Than Million-Dollar Tanks.
After testing the scooter, Leo returned to the shopping mall. He also put the vehicle for sale with a staggering price tag of 1,500 YOL.
The scooter was situated in the center of the shopping mall, next to the statue of Qiang Qiang, aka the four-armed mutant turned statue.
A thousand commoners and cultivators gathered around the scooter and observed it from a distance. Nobody dared to touch it as they were afraid of Leo and the fountain statue, who glared at them.
"1,500 Years of lifespan? Wow! That's expensive! I don't even have a hundred!" One of the commoners bitterly laughed.
A cultivator, who was a former commoner a few days ago, also commented.
"A muscle-tempering realm cultivator has roughly 100 to 200 years to live. A 2nd stage cultivator like me can live past 200 years. I doubt weak cultivators can afford that."
"Yeah. Only a prominent figure like Chancellor Tang Xuan or the handsome genius Gao Yan can afford it. We can only look and dream."
"Fool! Ya'll just need to invest your lifespan into cultivation resources first! You pay 20 years of lifespan to buy a grain pill. Once you become a proper cultivator, you seek a mentor. After you secure a cultivation method, you can purchase essence stones for one year each. Then, you accumulate life force and grow stronger from there!"
"…Sounds good. Doesn't work. No cultivator or sect around here exists anymore. The workers here don't accept disciples."
The spectators ran their mouths as usual. They speculated who would buy this artifact from Leo.
Several minutes later, Leo brought another scooter out for a test drive again. The people in the mall only watched him from afar as they didn't want to hear his tone-deaf song again.
After 10 minutes of test driving, Leo brought the bike back. He widely grinned and parked it near the first scooter. He then purchased a blank signboard from his system store and put it in front of the second bike.
Leo wrote the price tag of the second vehicle, including its specs.
.
Scooter Standard Edition (Level 2)
Price - 300 YOL
Max Range – 300 Miles.
Top Speed – 75 MPH
Indestructible in Crashes
Require Spirit Stones to Refuel
No Weaponry
Land Vehicle Only
.
"Hmm?"
"Huh?"
"Only 300?"
The spectators were surprised by the price reduction at first. Several cultivators got interested and approached the signboard to get a closer look.
However, when they realized that the vehicle only operated on land, they were disappointed.
"A two-wheeled carriage?"
"Isn't this a bit expensive?"
Many had a similar idea. But when their eyes noticed a certain line of description, they paused to think.
"Indestructible?!"
"Wait, what?!"
Leo had been waiting for them to notice the advertised spec. He explained.
"I've tested this earlier. The vehicle can withstand a full-power attack of an immortal with ease. Actually, I doubt even gods can put a scratch on the engine or the body frame."
"!!!"
Many cultivators widened their eyes and turned their attention to the bike's body frame and its material. One of them braced for danger and touched the seat.
It was firm and sturdy. He then applied some force to the seat, testing its durability.
BOOM
Suddenly, the bike's body frame generated a shockwave and knocked the cultivator away. As for the bystanders, they only sensed some breezy wind.
Leo grinned and wrote another line. While he was at it, he elaborated.
"This bike comes with a security system. If a stranger tries to harm it or steal it, it will generate a shockwave as a warning. If the thief tries to harm or steal the bike again, it will KILL the thief."
"WOW!!"
Many commoners, merchants, and weak cultivators were interested in this feature. As they were at the bottom of the food chain, they pursued security the most. Thus, a vehicle that was immune to thievery and damage seemed like an ideal investment.
A group of commoner merchants whispered among each other. Then, one of them stepped forward and saluted Leo to ask him.
"Immortal Florida Man, sir. I have a question to ask. May we inquire you something?"
Leo nodded. "Speak."
"About the payment, can multiple people contribute for the same item? For example, there are 30 of us, but no one has enough lifespan for it."
"Oh, you mean, your group wants to pool your lifespan to buy this scooter, right?"
"Ah. You are very wise, sir. Yes, it is as you said. Each of us will contribute 10 years of lifespan. With that, we have 300 years of lifespan to purchase the vehicle."
"I see no problem with that. We have a deal!"
"THANK YOU, SIR!"
All 30 commoner merchants were overjoyed. They planned to use the vehicle to replace the horses for their carriage since it seemed stronger than regular horses.
Leo collected their lifespan and gave them the keys. He also taught the group how to operate the bike. He went as far as teaching him how to drive it.
Some of the observing commoners salivated. The trade earlier gave them inspiration.
Many traveling vendors and merchants from other affiliates rushed back to the west slum to inform their colleagues. However, the local cultivators were unfazed.
"It's just a land carriage. What's the big deal?" One of the local workers chatted with his friends.
"For us, it's no big deal. But for the merchants who often travel across the mainland, this vehicle can be extremely useful. Besides using it to replace horses, I think they plan to use this as an emergency shield against robbers."
"No. You have no clue. This artifact is totally different from horses. If they use this to travel, they won't even need to rest. They can just keep on going until the passengers are tired."
"Right. There's that… Such innovation!"
Everybody glanced at the first bike, wondering if they should pool their YOL to purchase it.
Meanwhile, Leo had been listening to their little gossip and conversations. He walked toward the first bike and rewrote its specs and descriptions.
.
Scooter Performance Edition (Level 15)
Price – 1,500 YOL
Max Range – 69,420 Miles
Top Speed – 1,200 MPH
Indestructible in Crashes
Require Driver's Qi to Refuel
Armed with Anti-Immortal Saw Blades and Protection Barrier.
Flyable
.
"HMM?!"
The specs were drastically different than the standard version. This time, the local workers were interested in the investment.
"Lord Florida Man, what's the anti-immortal saw blades?" One of them noticed the weaponry of the vehicle.
Leo snickered and activated the bike. He rode on it and flipped a red switch on the left handle.
Four robotic arms extended from the sides of the vehicle. At the tip of the arms, giant white saw blades intimidated the crowd with their sharp and nasty teeth.
VRRRR
The saw blades rotated while the robot arms moved around, searching for a target to slice.
"AAAAHHH!!"
The spectators panicked and pushed everybody in the back away, escaping from danger.
Leo stopped the saw blade function and widely grinned. He explained.
"As you can see, it is armed with four saw blades. This world is wild, and danger is everywhere. These blades will help you during your travel."
"…Wow. W-What about the protection barrier-"
WHOOM
Leo activated the barrier. He then invited the local workers to try their luck.
"This is another feature of this bike. When you feel you are in danger, you can activate the barrier by consuming the battery's energy. Also, I doubt any immortal can destroy this barrier. Anybody wants to test it out?"
"…"
No mortal or commoner dared to challenge the barrier. They looked at each other in reluctance.
While everybody hesitated, a voice came from behind the crowd.
"Let me try!"
The crowd parted ways for the challenger. Everybody looked at the person in front of the store.
The person was none other than Tang Xuan. He came here to see the commotion.
"Ah, welcome. Come. Have a try."
Tang Xuan nodded. As he had just ascended and became an earth celestial immortal, he wanted to test his full power on something. Leo's vehicle came at a great time.
The bystanders moved away from the barrier and Tang Xuan. As for the challenger, he rubbed his fist for a moment and threw a straight punch.
"HA!"
BANG
The punch hit the surface of the blue barrier. It caused a slight ripple, but the fist failed to pierce through the outer layer.
The spectators were speechless. They were aware that Tang Xuan had just recently advanced to the first stage of the immortal realm, but the guy couldn't even do anything to the barrier.
"…Wow."
"If I have that…"
"This artifact…"
The local workers stared at the bike with red eyes. Their hearts yearned for this vehicle as it represented safety and social status.
Leo observed his potential customers. He then announced.
"The line of production is underway. Every hour, I'll bring in a new bike. There will be multiple editions of them as well. But if anybody wishes to place an advanced order or reserve your vehicle, you can come and talk to me or the other cashiers in front of the supermarket. Then, I'll quickly touch up the bikes and deliver them to you!"
Everybody gulped. Even Tang Xuan stared at the bike and salivated.
Without hesitation, Tang Xuan made his decision.
"I want that bike you're riding!"

chapters.title: Chapter 228 Tourists Randomly Gunned Florida Man’s House and Broke His Windows. Florida Man Brought Out Restored WWII M4 Sherman Tank From His Garage and Destroyed Their RVs.
chapters.content:
Chapter 228 Tourists Randomly Gunned Florida Man’s House and Broke His Windows. Florida Man Brought Out Restored WWII M4 Sherman Tank From His Garage and Destroyed Their RVs.
Chapter 228 – Tourists Randomly Gunned Florida Man's House and Broke His Windows. Florida Man Brought Out Restored WWII M4 Sherman Tank From His Garage and Destroyed Their RVs.
RUMBLE
The fleet of artificial stars and a cubic warship traveled in a single-file formation, moving toward Leo's planet. One of the fake stars deployed a hundred shuttle pods, which made their way to the planet's atmosphere.
Their mission was to infiltrate this world and secure a safe landing site for their carriers and their battleships.
.
.
Overlord Milo concealed his cultivation base and used an artifact to shapeshift into a male human with pale skin. The other Fenrir werewolves were also in disguise.
BOOM
BOOM
A hundred shuttle pods landed at the ruin of Cauliflower City. Another hundred claimed the Frozen Fire City while the rest landed on the surface of the sea.
Overlord Milo came out of his shuttle. He looked around and found nothing but burnt houses and destroyed buildings.
"The Qi here is quite thin and dirty. As expected of a lair of Nu'Earthe trash!"
Milo collected the spacecraft into his spatial ring. His soldiers also hid their transportation and regrouped with their leader.
The overlord gave his men a new order.
"As I have briefed you on the mothership, Overlord Mao is on his way to this planet. We don't know what he's here for, but we will avoid a direct confrontation with him. If he comes here to fight, we'll let him do whatever he wants with the Nu'Earthes. But if he demands Princess Esen, we will kill her first and let him have her corpse."
The soldiers took a mental note. They understood why the overlord wanted Esen dead in the scenario.
"No hostage, right?"
"Yeah. Princess Esen is a criminal. We will not allow Overlord Mao to use her as a bargaining chip. Kill her, and we will announce to the universe that he did it."
"Roger that."
The werewolves grinned. They believed that they had everything under control.
Unfortunately, they were mistaken. A few seconds later, every werewolf on the mainland and in the sea heard the sound transmission of a certain someone.
[Hohoh? Plotting against me? Sure. Go ahead. Kill whoever you want, but I'm gonna take down your motherships first and strand you on this planet. How about that?]
Overlord Milo and his soldiers were stunned. Their legs froze in fright as they knew who the speaker was.
"OVERLORD MAO!!!"
Overlord Mao was infamous for his cruelty and ruthlessness. In the past 10,000 years, he personally destroyed seven galaxies and enslaved a trillion female humanoid creatures. Moreover, his status as a supreme entity intimidated his peers. Even Overlord Xiaomao and Overlord Lucky avoided confronting him.
This devilish overlord went into hiding after he married the sister of the Oni Clan's patriarch. Every overlord was relieved that the devil disappeared.
[At first, I was planning to take a quick look. You know what? I've changed my mind. You will do exactly as I'm telling you to do. Refusing to do so, the Devil Tribe and the Kishin Clan will declare war with you and your snotty long-eared masters. I'm sure Overlord Xiaomao and his pet Cathulhus will gladly ally with me!]
Overlord Milo panicked. "Sir! Senior Mao! Please forgive our transgression! It was a misunderstanding! That was all a joke!"
[A joke? Ha! Had I never noticed, you would have proceeded with our stupid plans and framed me for the crime I didn't do? You puppies never change.]
"I-I-I'm so sorry, senior! It wasn't our intention! W-W-We're here for a mission. Once we finish what we planned to do here, we'll leave quietly!"
[Hah! Too late for that. Now, stop talking, and let me think.]
"…"
[Yeah, I know what I'm gonna do. Call all your troops, including the guys in the motherships. Tell everybody to raid this planet and destroy it. Leave no one alive!]
The werewolves sensed a chill running down their spines. They knew that Overlord Mao had quite a temper, but they never expected him to order them to initiate a genocide.
Still, the order aligned with their missions and ideology. The werewolves had no issue complying.
"Understood. We'll inform the motherships about your order, senior."
[Good! Show me what you can do.]
.
.
"I see."
Ingof Jack and Overlord Max received the sound transmission from Milo. They let out a long sigh as they understood the situation.
"Change of plans. We'll begin our full-scale assault. Deploy the Planetary Core Evaporator!"
The crew got busy. Everybody sat at their station while the weapon operators authorized the usage of the planet-destroying cannon.
The warship charged up an energy in front of its ship. An array formation formed, stabilizing the condensed energy.
.
On the flying island, Meowmeow, Mu-Nyang, and the wolf statue widened their eyes as they sensed a crisis.
"Activate the FUCK OFF laser!"
"Aye, aye, munya!"
"On it, woof!"
The guardians raised their arms, tentacles, and paws. An energy formation was erected to match the cannon's condensing energy. However, the energy-gathering speed was faster than the warship.
Within a minute, the guardians finished drawing the local Qi and Leo's Qi to the defensive array. Then, they activated it.
A massive rainbow lightning beam was unleashed. The target was none other than the cubic ship.
As if the cubic ship detected the counterattack from the planet. The warship unleashed the cannon before the energy was fully charged. A black lightning beam was fired to intercept the incoming beam.
Both beams collided!
As soon as both energies made contact, it caused a massive shockwave. However, the shockwave was directed toward the cubic warship. Moreover, the rainbow lightning beam devoured the black lightning beam and made its way toward the spaceship.
A barrier of the cubic ship was instantly erected before the shockwave hit it. The shockwave bounced off and caused the black barrier to tremble.
BOOOM
However, the rainbow beam instantly shattered the barrier upon impact. It pierced through the cubic warship and left behind a 3km-diameter gaping hole.
Debris, components, crewmates, and random objects were sucked out of the ship and floated freely in the void. Many werewolves tried to scream, but no word could come out of their mouth.
Weak immortals struggled to swim the void back to the ship. However, deities and stronger immortals leisurely used their Qi and made their way toward the artificial stars nearby.
Although the cubic ship was severely damaged, the hull and its components quickly mended as if it were a living being. Within a minute, the damage vanished.
At the same time, a hundred smaller battleships and ten thousand unmanned jets flushed out of the cubic mothership. The artificial stars also revealed their spaceports and launched their warships.
Over 30,000 jets and 1,000 battleships of various sizes turned into a net, which covered the stars. They rushed toward the planet.
Meowmeow frowned. He gestured to his three concubines.
"You three, help us intercept the small battleships. As for you, cat and dog, go and take out the death stars. I'll take care of their flagship… and Mao Miaomiao!"
"Roger, munya!"
"On it, woof!"
All guardian statues vanished.
While the mortals in the Florida Domain enjoyed their slow life, a war between entities broke out.

chapters.title: Chapter 229 Tank Fight Ensued as Tourists Whose RVs Were Destroyed by Florida Man’s Tank Brought Panzer Tank for Revenge. Floridians Gathered to See the WWII’s Tanks in Combat.
chapters.content:
Chapter 229 Tank Fight Ensued as Tourists Whose RVs Were Destroyed by Florida Man’s Tank Brought Panzer Tank for Revenge. Floridians Gathered to See the WWII’s Tanks in Combat.
Chapter 229 – Tank Fight Ensued as Tourists Whose RVs Were Destroyed by Florida Man's Tank Brought Panzer Tank for Revenge. Floridians Gathered to See the WWII's Tanks in Combat.
RUMBLE
The sky rippled while the Qi in the air trembled. Leo, Esen, and the former undead flinched as they sensed the changes in the environment.
Leo looked up and narrowed his eyes. As his sight was enhanced, he could see beyond the star system. He quickly found the three motherships and ten thousand jets and spaceships.
"God damn. Darth Vader would have been shocked if he saw this."
Leo rubbed his fists and was about to fly toward the incoming jets and battleships.
'Master, let us handle this. You should protect the people around you.'
The voice of Meowmeow echoed in Leo's mind. The latter paused and uttered in response.
"Can you take all of them alone?"
'No. But your domain's safety should be the priority. If your shopping mall is destroyed, your system will consider you as a loser, and the domain system will be erased.'
"What?!"
'The PVP and war features are active. Some of the players are also present, so your buildings are very vulnerable right now.'
Leo remembered this. He lowered his arms and stopped the thought of going to space.
"How far can my shopping mall take on the attack of the outsiders? Is there HP that I have to be wary about?"
'The shopping mall is sturdy. At level 15, it can withstand three 5-star deity's attacks. Further than that, some parts may be damaged or destroyed. Also, if the building collapses, it's over.'
Leo nodded. He looked back at the shopping mall, which was the heart of his domain.
"No choice, huh?"
.
VRRRRRRRR
A loud siren sounded everywhere in the Florida Domain. Leo's voice also mixed in with the ringing noise, warning the workers and the local population.
"We're under attack! I repeat, we are under attack! For the sake of safety, please take shelter in the shopping mall. For combatants and employees of Florida Domain, gather on the rooftop and bring out your arms! Prepare for battle!"
While talking to a microphone, Leo directed his employees to the staff elevator and fire exit, sending them to the deepest underground floor of his shopping mall. It would serve as a protective bunker for the non-combatants.
Gao Yan, Jin Yong, Tang Xuan, Hua Jiashan, and the elders gathered as Leo had requested. Even Han Hao, Han Meng, and the people who entered the time chamber yesterday also joined them.
Taxi, Ricardo, and Sierra assembled on the flying island as they would act independently. As for Esen and her team, they gathered on the top floor of the parking lot, forming the second immortal unit.
The commoners from the west slum seemed confused as they couldn't see the battle in space. Still, they obediently followed Leo's instructions and entered the shopping mall.
This was their first time entering the mall's restricted area. They walked down the stairs and gathered at the B5 floor.
The underground parking lot area was dimly illuminated by the ceiling LED lights. The air was slightly warm as the air ventilation was the worst here. Fortunately, Leo activated a portal, which connected to an empty warehouse. After that, the air circulation improved, and people could breathe.
Sheltering over 10,000 people in a short period wasn't an easy task. Women, children, and elderly people mixed in the crowd, which slowed the progress.
While Leo was busy managing the crowd, the sky brightened. Countless shooting stars descended from space, beelining toward Leo's domain.
Leo pulled out his pistol and was about to shoot at the falling stars.
BANG
BANG
BANG
Taxi's team made their moves first. They transformed into humans and armed themselves with Leo's newest weapon – The M16. They unleashed bullet hell upon the descending fighter jets from space.
Black lasers and beams flashed. Most of them missed the targets. But when they hit, the target exploded.
However, they failed to shoot down all spaceships and jets. Within 10 seconds, the jets broke the formations and circled around Leo's domain. They also retaliated with their charged Qi bullets.
One of the bullets came from Taxi. The pony in Johnny Sin's appearance smirked and activated a defensive domain.
CLANK!
The bullet hit the domain barrier and shattered it instantly!
"SMASH?!" (WHAT?! HOW?!)
The bullet grazed Taxi's shoulder. He also reverted to his thunder unicorn appearance as he suddenly couldn't use his Qi.
Leo saw everything happening with his eyes. Upon noticing that Taxi got pushed back by just one of the alien jets, he took things seriously. He pulled out the Floridian Staff. Then, he ejected the purple bones of deceased Molg Tribesmen.
"Ancestors, protectors, and warriors of the past, your children and descendants are being bullied by immortals, deities, and unknown creatures from outer space. If you still love them, answer my call! COME!"
For the first time in the real world, Leo activated the necromancy power that he had learned from Esen's shadow.
A purple aura formed around the bones. Every piece of bone floated in the air and regenerated the lost parts. Out of the 10,000 bones that Leo had collected, 3,000 managed to form a skeleton body. As for the rest, they didn't change.
3,000 skeleton soldiers answered Leo's call!
Leo pursed his lips and glanced at the 7,000 purple bones. He believed that their souls might have already been reincarnated as he didn't sense any connection with them.
'I guess I can only use them in alchemy. As for these guys…'
Leo waved his hands and used another art of necromancy on them.
'Blessing of darkness.'
All skeleton soldiers changed color from purple to black. They also grew one meter bigger and larger. Moreover, their aura exuded the air of true immortals!
"Go! Take down those annoying flies!"
The skeletons clattered their jaws and leaped to the sky. Without a weapon, they threw punches and kicks at the fighter jets that they managed to catch.
All captured jets exploded in one hit. Instantly, 500 jets were crushed.
However, the enemy wasn't planning to sit around and let Leo's minions kill them all. The unmanned jets also fired physical bullets and beams at the flying skeleton soldiers.
Black explosions erupted and shattered a thousand skeleton soldiers in the sky!
Leo squinted his eyebrows and raised his staff. He recalled one of Esen's skills that could be applied in this situation.
"Mandate of Death Legion. You are not allowed to die the second time!"
RUMBLE
An invisible domain expanded with Leo at the center. The dome covered everything in Florida Domain.
The destroyed skeleton soldiers froze in mid-air. They reattached and regenerated their lost parts and self-resurrected. Upon coming back to life, they howled and manifested dark armor, swords, and shields. Rainbow flame eyes were ignited within their eye sockets.
The skeleton soldiers evolved into death knights!
The newly emerged death knights returned to battle. Each fighter activated the unique domain abilities that they once had.
Thousands of domain energy domes overlapped. The next moment, jets exploded one after another.
The surviving skeleton soldiers also evolved into death knights. They paused to check the situation for a moment. Then, they started chasing after a larger battleship in the sky.
Above the flying island, a flat spaceship with a thousand eyeballs underneath descended from the atmosphere. All eyes glared at Taxi, Ricardo, and Sierra.
Suddenly, their eyes moved around and fixated on the approaching death knights. Each eye acted as a magic cannon, generating an elemental essence bullet.
A thousand balls of energy bullets were ejected from the eyeballs and rushed toward the death knights.
BOOM
BOOM
The energy balls shattered the death knights and broke their bones to pieces.
Leo hopped on the flying island to oversee the combat. Upon seeing how his creation was destroyed, he tried to resurrect them again.
BANG
A bullet from a jet directly hit Leo's forehead! His head tilted backward.
BANG
BANG
BANG
A hundred bullets rained upon Leo as the previous jet focused its gun on him. Many bullets hit his chest, legs, arms, and head.
Leo clicked his tongue. He pointed his staff at the annoying fly and pressed on the trigger.
TATATATATATATATATA
The staff of Floridian Singularity unleashed its power. A thousand rainbow bullets shot out from the tip and followed the spaceships in the sky like homing missiles and caught them.
A thousand explosions of fireworks ensued. Two of which also hit the newly arrived battleship with a thousand eyes.
After the explosion, the battleship looked like something had eaten its hull. The ship was engulfed in flame from the inside and slowly descended to the ground.
Leo pursed his lips and glanced at the shot-down battleship. He sensed a thousand life signatures in there, and he doubted that they would die in a crash.
He came up with an idea.
"Taxi."
"Smash?" Taxi popped a healing pill into his mouth. He then yawned as the side effect kicked in.
"… You take a break. Ricardo, lead your people to clean up the fallen battleship. Be wary of their weapons since they also use guns like us."
"Smash!" Ricardo saluted. He then gestured for his people to follow him.
"Sierra!" Leo wasn't done yet. "You will be in charge of a field infirmary. Take this idiot to the shopping mall's B3 or B4 floor and let him rest there. When you're done, come up and secure injured fighters of our domain. Bring them to the same floor and repeat. Got it?"
Sierra nodded, but her next question gave Leo a headache.
"Understood. By the way, do you need a break and drink my breast milk, master?"
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 230 Florida Man Called Cops Claiming Mad Scientist Stole His Identity and Body.
chapters.content:
Chapter 230 Florida Man Called Cops Claiming Mad Scientist Stole His Identity and Body.
Chapter 230 – Florida Man Called Cops Claiming Mad Scientist Stole His Identity and Body.
"His Majesty is…"
"Isn't that…"
On top of the parking lot building, elves and white-haired people from the Molg Tribe all wore the Florida Domain's uniform, aka the black suits, pants, shirts, and leather shoes from the clothing stores.
Esen's group had been observing the combat in the sky, and they witnessed Leo using their necromancy skills. Everybody was so astonished that they had goosebumps.
Ivy smirked and rallied her colleagues.
"Are you going to cower here and let His Majesty do all the work?! What are we, freeloaders? Are your necromancy skills for show?"
"WHAT?!" The former undead warriors were offended. "WHAT DID YOU SAY, IVY?!"
"I'm saying we shouldn't be sitting here idly! Let's follow the lord and get rid of those invaders!"
Except for Esen and Beatrice, everybody's expressions turned dark. As their passion was ignited, their killing intent soared.
Seizing this momentum, Ivy asked permission from Esen.
"Your Majesty, let's go and help His Majesty!"
Esen lightly snorted. She waved her hand. "Go. But leave Beatrice and Marc here."
"Thank you, Your Majesty!" Ivy turned around and shouted, "YOU HEARD HER, BOYS! MOVE OUT!"
The 100-man unit took flight. Each carried an M16 with them, and they flew in an arrow formation, heading toward one of the descending battleships.
The battleship reacted to their approach. All cannons and guns pointed at them and unleashed bullet hell.
As energy bullets rained from the sky, the former undead warriors pointed their rifles at the incoming energy cannon balls and pulled the triggers.
Black lightning lasers flashed and pierced through the approaching energy balls, detonating them upon contact.
The elves didn't stop there. Even though they were astonished by the firepower, they kept firing at the battleship's deck and cannons. Some of the laser beams pierced through the hull, but a few hit the citadel. A chain reaction ensued as explosions erupted.
The team didn't celebrate after shooting down the entire gigantic spaceship. They frowned as they noticed several thousand crewmates flying out of the battleships while carrying guns, swords, spears, canes, and rocket launchers.
A thousand colorful domain domes expanded and overlapped with the other domains. Then, the elven immortals revealed their power.
"SOUL DOMAIN, RESTRAINTS!"
"SOUL DOMAIN, QI SEAL!"
"SOUL DOMAIN, FEEBLE!"
A soul domain was an exclusive power of immortals. When activated, everybody in the domain besides the caster and their allies would be affected without fail. The only way to escape Soul Domain's range and abilities was to have a superior cultivation base or unique artifacts.
Debuff magic caught Ivy and her team. Everybody suddenly felt sluggish as they couldn't use Qi. Moreover, they had a hard time breathing.
Still, none of the debuff domain abilities disabled their ability to pull the gun's triggers. While falling, they aimed at the casters and fired.
BANG
BANG
BANG
Even without Qi, the default bullets still transformed into black laser beams. A hundred lasers flashed and hit a hundred targets in unison.
The shot crewmates didn't even realize what had hit them. Their bodies and their souls were disintegrated into dust because of the black tribulation thunderbolts.
After the 100 elven crewmates vanished, a hundred domains lost their effects. Ivy's platoon recovered some of their strength.
Ivy commanded the team. "Death knights! Switch weapons to death swords! You will target their domains and destroy them! As for others, avoid using a domain during chaos!"
Targeting the domes was one of many strategies to kill an immortal. If a soul domain was forcefully destroyed, the caster would naturally be hit with a backlash. They would lose half of their Qi in their dantian and have their inner organs crushed by the backlash pressure.
Ivy had a lot of experience in battlefields. In a chaotic fight where many people were involved, using any domain ability was the same as offering their heads to their enemies to shoot. Naturally, their domains would be the first to be targeted as it was easier to destroy.
However, the crewmates lacked battle experience. They used their domains too soon.
CLANK
SHING
The death knights dispersed and brought out their black swords. They slashed at the empty air in front of them. However, each slash shattered the air in front of them. Like shattered glasses, several layers of the domain collapsed. Only the outer layers of wider energy domes remained.
Over 500 elves that had abandoned the battleship vomited blood in unison. They fell from the sky like mosquitoes being sprayed with pesticides.
Unfortunately, Ivy's opponents weren't just the crewmates from a battleship. Two more battleships followed the destroyed one and sprayed bullets at them.
16 of the energy balls directly hit Ivy and several death knights. The cannonballs exploded!
The direct hit sent all victims flying and falling like a ragdoll.
"ARCHLICH IVY!!"
The platoon panicked. They turned around and found the assailants from above.
PEW PEW PEW
Following the battleships were the drones and unmanned jets. They also unleashed their anti-domain machine guns at them.
PU
PU
Instantly, half of the platoon got hit in the chest! They fell from the sky!
"NOOO!!"
One of the grim reapers roared and activated his domain. He summoned a black scythe and swung it toward one of the battleships.
SWUA
The reaper could sense feedback from his domain as several hundred souls inside the battleship were cut in half and destroyed.
CLANK
Unfortunately, using a domain during the confusion had a consequence. One of the drones shot his domain and destroyed it in one hit.
The grim reaper coughed blood and lost his ability to maintain flight. He slowly fell to the ground.
But as the grim reaper and the survivors were in despair, Ivy bellowed.
"IDIOTS! DON'T USE YOUR DOMAIN! BELIEVE IN HIS MAJESTY!"
Ivy and the people who got shot down earlier flew back up. One of them rushed to support the injured grim reaper.
White smoke still came out from their black suits and clothes. However, none of them was seriously injured. They only got a few burns on their skins or faces.
The uniform protected them from the bullets and the energy cannonballs earlier!
The grim reaper came back to his senses. He lowered his head in shame and embarrassment.
"I-I'm sorry, commander."
"It doesn't matter!" Ivy snorted. "Believe in His Majesty's blessings and protection! He blesses us with these godly artifacts. We mustn't let him down!"
"OOOOOH!!"
Everybody regained morale. They restored their formation and started kiting small drones and jets, acting as decoys and targets.
.
.
Leo glanced at Ivy's platoon in the sky. He let out a sigh of relief that the invader's weaponry was ineffective against his domain's uniforms.
But this didn't change the flow of the battle. He looked up and counted the number of battleships.
They were endless!
"This is going to take forever."
Leo grumbled. He wished that he still had the newbie protection power during his early days.
"System, can I collect compensation from the invaders now?"
DING
<No. However, you may collect the compensation after you successfully capture or kill the PLAYER behind this siege.>
<Please note. When an invader is killed within your store domain, their lifespan will be collected and accumulated in a system pool. You can only claim it if the responsible PLAYER is captured or killed during the invasion. However, the system will automatically erase the accumulated lifespan pool if nobody manages to capture or kill the opposition PLAYER.>
In short, Leo had to find the one leading this mess and grab him to his domain.
Leo swept his gaze over the large battleships and the motherships, searching for the one in charge.
As Leo kept looking, the corner of his eyes noticed a long angel, floating in the void behind the motherships and looking down at him and his people.
Strangely, that person had the same face as Meowmeow, the statue. Moreover, Leo's heart was tinged with discomfort.
"That guy… Why do I hate him so much?"
.
.
The black-winged angel in space was Overlord Mao Miaomiao. He indeed had the same face as the guardian statue Meowmeow.
His eyes met with Leo's. He sneered at the latter.
"I've come here to find an imposter, but I found the original! HAHAHAHA! That pitiful brat manages to survive, I see. Well, I owe you my gratitude. Your parents created a very nice vessel! Too bad it's too good for you. Hahahaha!"
Mao Miaomiao burst into laughter while he circulated his Qi. His aura expanded as he revealed his true cultivation base.
Immortal…
Deity…
Sage…
Entity…
It reached the realm of Karmic Sovereign!
"Admire this power, brat! This is your parents' hard work! You must savor it and memorize it well since you won't get to see it again!"
Mao Miaomiao raised his hand and created a 666,666 km-long sword. He grabbed the hilt and was about to cut the entire planet in half.
"NOT SO FAST, MAO MIAOMIAO!!"
Meowmeow suddenly appeared in front of the angel and punched him in the face. The sword shattered while the angel was knocked back 20,000 kilometers.
Mao Miaomiao smirked and wiped his mouth. He spat out transparent blood and sneered at the statue.
"Oh, you. I remember you. That stupid crow pet of that brat becomes his shadow. What a loyal pet!"
"Bastard! Return Leo's body!"
Mao Miaomiao snickered. "Come and take it if you can!"
Meowmeow bellowed and transformed into a black phoenix. He breathed rainbow flame toward the angel.
The angel sneered and swatted it away. He then clenched his fist and gathered Qi in his hand.
A rainbow aura gathered in Overlord Mao's fist. He then threw a punch toward Meowmeow.
BOOM
A rainbow beam blasted out of Mao Miaomiao's fist and hit Meowmeow's chest. The black phoenix shattered!
"AHAHAHAHAHA! IS THAT ALL YOU CAN DO, LITTLE CROW?!"
Black flame rekindled and emerged on top of Overlord Mao. The flame formed the phoenix's mouth. Then, Meowmeow swallowed the overlord whole.
Mao Miaomiao's expression changed. His body turned blue as he transferred his entire body and soul into another dimension. Then, he teleported 1,000 kilometers away.
Meowmeow turned around and gave chase. The overlord clicked his tongue and complained.
"Playing catch? Fine! How long can you keep chasing me while you're getting further and further away from your master, I wonder?"
"…"
The game of tag in space started while Leo and his comrades fended off the invaders.

chapters.title: Chapter 231 Ohio Man Sent Death Threat to Doctor Who Stole Florida Man’s Kidneys.
chapters.content:
Chapter 231 Ohio Man Sent Death Threat to Doctor Who Stole Florida Man’s Kidneys. ?
Chapter 231 – Ohio Man Sent Death Threat to Doctor Who Stole Florida Man's Kidneys.
Being invincible and indestructible in combat was useful in chaotic battlefields. However, not everything was well-protected when the invaders outnumbered the defenders.
Battleships and unmanned drones quickly bypassed the defenders and bombarded the shopping mall and other buildings. Their bullets and lasers hit Gao Yan's house and the granaries.
Faint barriers appeared, protecting all buildings within the domain. However, the layers of barriers slowly cracked as the anti-domain guns wore down the basic defensive barriers of Leo's buildings.
Leo observed the situation and deeply pondered. He closed his eyes and sank his consciousness to his dantian universe, checking a few system skills that he obtained from the shadows.
'Oh, I have this.'
One second in reality was 1,000 seconds (16 minutes) in Leo's pocket universe. He found what he needed.
Leo pulled out the pen that he had bought from Nine-Fingered-Red of the Fate Stadium. He injected his Qi into it.
FFFFKRRRSHZZZ
The pen transformed into a spear covered in rainbow plasma energy. From an onlooker's perspective, Leo was holding a light spear with a bare hand.
VRAU VRAU
Leo waved the spear around. The broom of the dwarf fit Leo's left hand while his right hand held the boom stick of Florida Singularity.
He looked up and swept his eyes over the countless burning drones, jets, and battleships. The rain of fire painted the sky in orange.
"...Domain."
SHING
Leo swung his plasma spear like a sword once. However, none of the airships, jets, or drones in the sky were harmed. Instead, hostile elves and werewolves in the premise of 100 kilometers collapsed.
White smoke came out from the victim of Leo's mysterious domain. They slipped through the gaps of the ships and gathered toward Leo.
Leo's chest was the eye of a whirlpool, sucking everything into his body.
DING
<You have absorbed 30,511 souls!>
<You have converted 30,511 souls into life force.>
<You have gained 6,431,916 years of lifespan.>
DING
<You have completed the Fate Crystal Tutorial's secondary objectives!>
<You have obtained 7 lucky draw tickets (Building) and 777 free territory expansion tickets.>
Leo snorted and retracted the light spear's energy. He put the pen back in his pocket and shifted his attention to the unmanned drones and jets.
"What kind of power should I use against those robots? EMP? Is there anybody that can use EMP or something similar?"
Leo closed his eyes and searched for the right skills. While he was at it, he scanned through the new names in his system menu. Several names of the overlords showed up.
'Milo, Max, Jack…Jack Ingof? Jacking off? Pfft. Who named this mofo? Oh, well… Huh?'
Leo sorted the list by the strength of the shadows, so the system menu would show the strongest person first. But after the list was sorted, Leo found a familiar name.
Dr. Mao, the Devil
'Mao? Doctor Mao? Where have I heard this name before?'
While looking at the name and the portrait of Overlord Mao Miaomiao, his heart raced, and he coughed. His face reddened, and his blood pressure rose.
He didn't know why, but he was angry.
'…Do I know this guy?'
.
.
Ohio Man's planet
Simba received a new transfer order from Ester's mother again. She ordered him to assist Overlord Lucky to lay siege against a colony of Cathulhu. Moreover, the main forces of the elves were also there as they were about to confront Overlord Xiaomao and his cats.
"Here we go again."
Simba shook his head and deeply sighed. He hated the elves and their warmongering nature.
"Again, dear?"
"Yes. Again. They never stop even though Overlord Xiaomao alone can take on a million entities by himself. He's as strong as a karmic sovereign. Why haven't they learned?!"
Ester bit her lower lip. She circulated her Qi into the entity fate crystal in her chest. Then, a vision appeared in her mind.
Flashes of events revealed the possible future. Branches of potential outcomes were right before her eyes.
After calculating the future, Ester revealed what she had seen.
"One of my sisters broke through. Ellen has become a karmic sovereign like Overlord Mao and Overlord Kishin. Mother might have thought that Ellen could take on Overlord Xiaomao with Sister Ellen's help."
"Ellen? The 7th sister of yours?"
The matriarch of the divine elves gave birth to many promising daughters. Esen was the eldest while Ester was the 2nd. However, because of the infighting and competitiveness of the royal court, none of them was on friendly terms.
"Yes. She's a cultivation maniac. She often stole other sisters' cultivation resources, but nobody could do anything to her because of her tyrannical strength and unique dao. She can erase anybody with negative karma. Also, she already killed three of our sisters… I think the queen is keeping her as a backup."
"…"
Simba had been with the Elf royalties for a long time. He knew that the "mother" hated her daughters the most.
He had proof, but he couldn't say it. He also knew why the "mother" kept her daughters around, and it was extremely repulsive.
"I gotta go. Take care while I'm not around, Ester."
"Yeah. Come back safely, Simba."
The husband and wife kissed. Then, Simba touched his face with his palm and transformed into one of the Fenrir werewolves. He teleported away.
After Simba had gone, Ester bitterly smiled. She turned around and gazed at her house.
"Time to clean, I guess. He'll be fine."
…
Ester quickly cleaned the house and let her kid play in the yard. She hummed and admired the sparkling clean house. Then, she shifted her gaze toward the garage, where Simba usually tinkered with some artifacts there.
"Ah, that place is getting stinky. I should surprise him."
In the past, Simba always told Ester not to enter his workshop as it was dangerous. Ester heeded his warning and respected Simba's privacy.
However, Simba was not a clean person. He often forgot to clean his workshop. Thus, Ester always nagged him to do it himself.
As Simba neglected his workshop's hygiene for too long, Ester planned to remove some dust.
Entering the workshop, Ester found a workshop desk, a furnace, a pill cauldron, an anvil, and strange machines. Aside from the craftsman's tools, she didn't see anything special but dirt and black dust.
Ester's face darkened.
"Simba, you lazy skunk! I told him to clean this place, but he never did. Oh, boy."
Ester waved her finger, creating a strong wind. The air circulation blew all the dust into the sky.
After removing the dust, Ester brought a wet towel. While tidying the furniture there, Ester stumbled upon a framed photo of Simba and his family.
Ester giggled and admired her husband when he was young. She picked the photo to clean it.
But as Ester picked up the photo, a key slipped out from the back of the frame.
"Huh?" Ester picked up the bronze key. "What's this for?"
Curious, she looked for a place to use the key. She didn't need to look for long as the workshop desk's drawer had a keyhole of a similar size.
Ester used the key and opened the drawer. When she pulled it open, she found a stack of document papers in a folder.
The language of the papers was strange to her. She couldn't read it. However, among the documents, an old photo of an Asian man was clipped to a paper.
"???"
Ester frowned as she had seen the face of this man somewhere before. Her curiosity was piqued.
"I shouldn't use this, but… please forgive me, Simba."
Ester opened her status window and browsed a lifespan shop system. She scrolled through the list to find the auto-translate function for Simba's native language.
Earthling Linguistic Knowledge – One Million Years of Lifespan
Ester grinned and purchased it. Then, a flood of knowledge entered her mind. When she looked at the papers again, she could finally read them.
"That's better!"
Ester reread the document with the photo of an Asian man.
"…Professor Mao Miaomiao, CEO and the owner of Immortal Cloning Incorporate…"
Ester flipped the documents and read everything. The more she read, the more she was horrified.
These were the records of human experiments, which were done by the professor and his assistants. They adopted countless orphans and homeless children to their labs and experimented on them.
She finally recognized the professor
He had the same name as the infamous karmic sovereign overlord Mao Miaomiao!
She couldn't stop anymore. Ester kept reading.
Among the documents, she found photos of many scientists with a tribal tattoo on the back of their hands. Their unique green eyes were also identical to the eyes of divine elves.
"Wait, these people in the documents aren't even humans! I remember those tattoos! They're divine elves!"
In shock, Ester flipped the pages and checked the documents with the photos again. She also glanced at the family photo of Simba.
The white boy in the picture might look like a human. However, his green iris and his sharp eyes couldn't fool her anymore.
This boy had a divine elf's blood in his veins! Moreover, the parents all had elven tattoos on the back of their hands.
They were elves!
But something didn't make sense. Ester rescanned the documents again to recheck what she might have missed. And indeed, she missed one notable fact of these strange documents.
One of the papers had the details of a certain test subject whose face was the same as the boy in Simba's photo. There was also a terrifying note at the corner of the paper.
.
Test Subject's Name: Leonardo Ariel
Call Sign: LEO
DNA Compatibility: OL-XM, OL-LK, OL-AP, OL-AS, and OL-ME
Dominant DNA: OL-ME, OL-AP
Cultivation Ceiling Potential: Entity or Karmic Sovereign
Professor's Note: MOTHER, transfer my soul into this body. Kill the rest of the scientists and test subjects.
.
That wasn't the end of the document. Behind the personal information of this boy, there was Simba's handwriting.
'Rest in peace, brother. Thank you for saving my life. I'll avenge you one day.'

chapters.title: Chapter 232 Florida Man Allegedly Released Pet Wolf to Hunt and Kill Stray Dogs in Neighborhood for Food – His Food.
chapters.content:
Chapter 232 Florida Man Allegedly Released Pet Wolf to Hunt and Kill Stray Dogs in Neighborhood for Food – His Food.
Chapter 232 – Florida Man Allegedly Released Pet Wolf to Hunt and Kill Stray Dogs in Neighborhood for Food – His Food.
Inside the cubic ship, the bridge continued to operate. Even though their ship was hit by the guardian's laser and lost 20% of its personnel, the sacred machine cells of the ship restored all components and repaired the ship to its former glory.
"Howl-14 is down!"
"We lost contact on Hyena 13!"
"Foxtrot unit is wiped out!"
"Howl 3 has sent an SOS! Their engine is down!"
At the bridge of the cubic warship, Ingof Jack sat on his seat, listening to the reports from the operators. A thousand monitors in this room showed the camera feeds of their spaceships. However, one-third of the screens only showed statics as the ships had been shot down.
One after another, battleships stopped replying to their status call.
Jack's expression turned dark. He had predicted this outcome, but he had no choice. After all, Overlord Mao Miaomiao's status was superior to the divine elf matriarch Eleanor.
"Tell all units to stop charging at that place head-on. Descend and surround that place. Then, use your superior range to bombard them! As for the ships in the orbit, tell them to navigate to the axis pole. Destroy the planet's magnetic field!"
"Aye-aye, sir!"
The order was relayed to the other warships. A few minutes later, the remaining spaceships stopped charging blindly at Leo's domain. Instead, they entered the atmosphere while avoiding the domain's airspace.
The death toll still rose, but it wasn't as fast as before. Jack counted the remaining warships and was relieved to see the number stopped rising.
But suddenly, a loud explosion erupted and shook the entire cube warship. They also received another report from the other artificial star.
