"SIR! COLONY MILO HAS BEEN DESTROYED!!"
"What?!"
Jack stood up from his seat and turned his attention to the side monitor, which showed the status of their ally mothership.
One of the artificial planets exploded!
"WHAT HIT THEM?!" Jack was stunned. He thought that Leo didn't have enough personnel to counterattack or raid their motherships.
The monitor slowly zoomed toward the destroyed ship. The crews at the bridge turned their attention to the screen and were horrified by the scene.
Ten thousand grey 100-kilometer-long octopus tentacles pierced through the star from the inside and crushed the hull as if they were soft jelly.
A cat-face octopus emerged from the destroyed mothership. Its head was half the size of the artificial planet while its long tentacles were about a kilometer thick.
The cat-octopus opened its wide mouth and chewed the components and werewolves in glee. Its tentacles also dragged everything it caught into its mouth.
NOM-NOM MUNYA!
Jack recognized the creature well. This monster was from a race that the Fenrir Werewolves deemed as their nemesis.
"CATHULHU! WHY IS A CATHULHU HERE?!"
The nightmare didn't stop there. One of the operators trembled in fear as he just received a piece of terrifying news.
The news came from Overlord Max's artificial star.
"SIR! O-OVERLORD MAX's LIFE SIGNATURE… HAS CEASED!"
.
.
A few minutes earlier
While Overlord Milo infiltrated Leo's planet, Overlord Max remained in his mothership to command his troops. His forces detached from the others as they orbited around the planet to target the other side of the world.
Besides the Yan Dynasty's main continent, there were other minor continents in this world. Small islands surrounded a 15 million square-kilometer continent. In addition, the land was full of small towns and villages of cultivators.
Milo eyed on this continent. He sent his order to his minions.
"Send drone battalions down. Kill every nu'earthe there and set up a foothold!"
The artificial star quickly deployed a million drones, which dove into the atmosphere.
Overlord Milo relaxed on his captain's seat at the bridge and enjoyed the monitor screens of his ship. The cameras of the drones showed the footage of their hi-tech jets destroying the defenseless mortals.
His aide brought him a plate of raw steak, which Milo tossed the meat into his mouth. He then licked the plate to savor the taste.
"MORE!"
The aide, who had the face of a Chihuahua, received the empty plate and proceeded to the gate of the bridge.
Upon reaching the gate, the aide found a transparent energy wall, which separated the bridge from the corridor. However, on the other side of the corridor, the guards were on the floor and were soaked in their blood.
On the other side of the transparent energy curtain, a grey Fenrir werewolf stood there with his arms crossed. He stared down at the Chihuahua aide.
The aide widened his eyes in shock. The face of this man was well-known among all Fenrirs.
"O-Overlord Lucky!"
The wolf grinned. He ordered the little werewolf.
"Open the curtain for me, woof!"
"Y-Yes, Your Excellency!"
The Chihuahua opened the bridge's protective curtain for the werewolf lord.
WHOOSH
The energy curtain disappeared. The warlord strolled toward the bridge and patted the Chihuahua's head.
"Good job, woof."
The aide trembled in fear. He gazed at the corpses in front of the bridge and mustered the courage to ask him.
"W-What happened to the guards, Your Excellency?"
The conversation caught the attention of busy operators in the room. Some of them turned around to look at the Chihuahua.
As the curtain was open, the scent of blood entered the bridge. Every werewolf detected the scent and was alarmed.
The giant warlord swept his gaze over everybody. Vice versa, Overlord Max turned toward the infamous person. Their eyes met.
"Overlord Lucky? Wait, BLOOD SCENT?! DAMMIT! WHO LET AN IMPOSTER HERE?! KARMIC RIVER LAW! COME OUT, BLOODHOUNDS! EAT HIS SOUL!"
Overlord Max bellowed and activated his domain ability. A dozen blood wolves manifested from nothingness and bit Overlord Lucky's neck, arms, and legs. Their fangs sunk into Overlord Lucky's flesh, but they didn't cause any external wounds. Instead, they caught his soul.
Strong mortals relied on dao domains. Immortals could use soul domains while deities upgraded their power into providence domains.
On the other hand, sages borrowed power from the river of karma and called their power "Karmic Law".
But the imposter, who was Leo's wolf statue, exceeded those realms.
The imposter ignored the threat and sneered at Overlord Max. He sentenced Max's demise with a revelation.
"A measly karmic law? My master doesn't need to lower his status to deal with a sage like you, woof! I can handle this… SOVEREIGN JUDGMENT!"
The imposter revealed himself as one of Leo's guardian statues. He reverted to his statue appearance and unveiled countless transparent strings in the bridge.
These transparent strings were the karmic bonds between souls and the river of karma. Everybody had one string connected to the invisible river of karma of this universe.
Overlord Max's string was the largest among the crewmates. The thread treaded beyond the mothership into the void where nobody could see.
Max widened his eyes in disbelief. He bellowed in desperation and commanded his hounds.
"TEAR HIS SOUL NOW! KILL THAT IMPOSTER! HE'S NOT OVERLORD LUCKY!!"
The hounds exerted more force. However, their spiritual teeth and fangs failed to tear the imposter's soul apart. They got stuck with something.
The wolf statue who had Overlord Lucky's face snickered. He calmly extended his hand and grabbed the string of Overlord Max. He cut it with his finger and attached it to his chest.
"Our cultivation base gap is too large, woof! You can't expect to harm my master's soul with this much strength, do you, woof?"
Overlord Max screamed in desperation. Although he didn't understand or measure how strong this imposter was, he cursed at the statue.
"I SWEAR BY THE NAME OF HIS EXCELLENCY LUCKY! YOU IMPOSTER WILL FACE HIS WRATH!!"
"That doesn't change your fate, woof. Goodbye."
The transparent string flashed and sucked Overlord Max's soul into the statue's chest. The soul let out a desperate cry before he vanished into the statue's body forever.
CRUNCH!
The sound of a shattering glass echoed in the werewolf statue's mind. He licked his lips and burped.
"Delicious, woof! Anyway, y'all need to die, too."
The wolf howled and sang the silent requiem.
PLOP
PLOP
The confused and shocked crewmates stared at the statue in a daze. Their eyes, dantians, and internal organs melted into goo while their flesh and bones remained intact. Everybody collapsed in their pools of blood.
The bridge was not the only place where the crewmates were killed. The other subordinate warships of Overlord Max also suffered from the statue's domain power, aka the sovereign law.
Countless werewolves in all ships fell without realizing what had hit them. The drones stopped functioning while warships descended and crashed on the ground.
"Hehe. Done, woof! I should go help the others."

chapters.title: Chapter 233 Florida Man Received Noble Prize For Mastering Doomsday Prepping Techniques in Simulation Games.
chapters.content:
Chapter 233 Florida Man Received Noble Prize For Mastering Doomsday Prepping Techniques in Simulation Games.
Chapter 233 – Florida Man Received Noble Prize For Mastering Doomsday Prepping Techniques in Simulation Games.
DING
<Your subordinate "Lucky" has slain Overlord Max.>
<NEW ACHIEVEMENT! Your subordinate "Lucky" has eliminated a PLAYER for the first time!>
<You have received one SR-guaranteed lucky draw (Building) as a reward.>
<Your subordinate "Lucky" has stolen Overlord Max's life force!>
<Your subordinate "Lucky" has stolen Overlord Max's planets and mystic realms.>
<NEW ACHIEVEMENT! Your subordinate "Lucky" has slain 100,000 enemies in one battle!>
<You have received one SR-guaranteed lucky draw (Mannequin) as a reward.>
<NEW ACHIEVEMENT! Your subordinate "Mu-Nyang" has destroyed a star-destroyer class mothership for the first time!>
<You have received one SR-guaranteed lucky draw (Mannequin) as a reward.>
Leo couldn't stop smiling as his guardian statues worked hard. Because of them, Leo received new rewards for free.
However, the battle was far from over. Drones and unmanned jets still rushed down toward his domain like angry Karens swarming an innocent store manager.
A hail of beams and lasers hit Leo's store, pylon tower, and apartments. Two of three external defensive barriers shattered, leaving them only a thin layer of energy shields.
Leo was annoyed. He had every ability to kill every lifeform, but he couldn't find the right skill to eliminate the machines.
Not giving up, Leo searched his pocket universe system to find the right person with related skills. He sorted the shadow's roster by strength.
Then, a certain angel appeared on the list.
.
Name: Dr. Mao Miaomiao, the Devil
Race: Chimera Homunculus
Age: 50,072
Cultivation Base: Seven Karmic Sea Sovereign
Skills: Karmic Dao of Lust, Karmic Dao of Space and Time, Karmic Dao of Swordsman, Karmic Dao of Chaos, Fate Plundering Dao, Blessing of Divine Elf's Matriarch.
Specials: Abyssal Phoenix Bloodline, Divine Elf Bloodline, Karma Oceania Bloodline,
Favorite Weaponry: Katana of Karmic Severance
Potential Percentage: 1,000%
.
Leo deeply frowned as this man's name and photo annoyed him. He didn't know why, but his guts hated the black-winged angel.
'This guy looks exactly like Meowmeow. Their names also coincide… is that really a coincidence? I need to ask that pervert angel later. Tsk. I have no time for that. I need any skill that can be used in this situation!'
Leo glanced at one of the skills that Mao Miaomiao had – Karmic Dao of Space and Time.
He was interested in it. However, it might not be the answer in this situation. Also, the cultivation base of this man was alarming.
It took Leo several minutes to defeat Esen's shadow, who was a 12-galaxy deity. Moreover, this guy's cultivation base sounded stronger than hers. It might take a long time to defeat this shadow.
Despite the hesitation, Leo tried it anyway. After all, the pocket dantian belonged to him, and he couldn't be killed in real life if he lost.
'Show me what you can do, doctor. Who the hell are you?!'
Leo summoned Mao Miaomiao's shadow to fight.
DING
The shadow manifested in Leo's universe. The silhouette silently spread his black wings and transformed into a 500-kilometer-tall black phoenix. It flapped its wings and floated freely in the void. The beast glared at Leo, who was still standing on a planet.
Before Leo could initiate the fight, an explosion erupted inside Leo's stomach. Black flame gushed out from his eyes, ears, nostrils, mouth, and other orifices.
"…"
It was warm enough for Leo to sense a mild danger. He groaned in frustration and shoved his hand into his chest. Then, he pulled out a ball of black flame from his flesh.
This was the source of the explosion earlier. Leo didn't know how the phoenix stuffed this fireball inside him.
"Nice trick. But can you do this?"
Leo used one of the skills he copied from Beatrice. He shoved his hand into his chest again and grabbed one of his ribcages. He broke it and pulled it out.
The ribcage transformed into a transparent broadsword. It illuminated the dark universe in the pocket dantian.
The shadow phoenix flinched when he saw the transparent sword. It also summoned a flame katana.
The weapon floated around the phoenix for a moment to scan the battlefield. Then, it turned toward Leo and rose up.
RUMBLE
The black katana extended and expanded. Then, it swung down, aiming at Leo's grassland planet.
Leo imposed an IAI stance, which he had learned from Beatrice. He sheathed the sword and sliced the incoming giant blade.
CLANK
The small broadsword and the black flame blade contacted. The smaller one cleaved through the massive metal and sliced it into two!
The cut didn't stop there. Cutting through the void at 300 times the speed of light was a crescent wind blade, which expanded according to the distance it traveled.
SWUA
The energy blade cut one of the phoenix's wings. It reverted to a humanoid form. However, one of his arms was missing.
The shadow glanced at his missing arm and rubbed it. The lost arm regenerated, and he moved it around.
"Yeah, I figured."
"!!!"
Although no sound could travel in space, Leo's voice echoed in the pocket universe. The shadow turned around and found Leo floating in space.
Leo had teleported behind the shadow earlier, using Grim Reaper's phasing techniques. By the time Mao Miaomiao's shadow realized it, Leo was already in his attack range.
The transparent sword swung down.
The shadow opened his mouth and bellowed in a hoarse voice.
"TIME!"
CLICK-CLICK-CLICK
Leo suddenly felt sluggish. His movement drastically slowed and came to a pause. However, he could still move his eyeballs to look around.
On the other hand, the shadow sneered and adjusted his posture. He resummoned his katana and hacked Leo's neck.
CLANK
The katana hit Leo's nape, but it only managed to cut 5 millimeters into his flesh.
"!!!"
The shadow exerted more force. Unfortunately for him, he failed to dig it further.
"This is a new record. Congratulations! Nobody managed to give me such a deep wound. I'm stoked!"
Leo mustered his willpower and strength. He clenched his fist and broke free from the mysterious restraints. Then, he did what Jotaro usually did in anime.
"ORAORAORAORAORAORA!!"
A thousand fists barraged the shadow's face, chest, stomach, legs, arms, and groin simultaneously as if Leo could shoot his fists like a shotgun.
The clone widened his eyes in disbelief. His body slowly crumbled and disintegrated as he was pummeled so hard that his flesh and bones broke down into atoms.
Leo didn't have enough as the mysterious anger swelled in his heart. He reached out and pointed his palm toward the dust. Then, he activated one of Esen's magic.
Death Magic!
The spell was designed to attack a soul directly. The magic revolved around converting yin Qi into a black gas, which was hazardous to living beings and souls. As long as the black gas touched the target, the victim's soul would always perish if it was unprotected.
Black miasma erupted and surrounded Leo and the dust. It seeped into every atom of the shadow's dust, but the miasma ignored Leo.
A loud screech followed, but no one could hear it. In one of the participles of dust, the artificial soul of the shadow emerged and tried to escape.
Leo brightly smiled and swung his transparent sword. Again, he relied on Beatrice's death knight sword domain, which was capable of attacking anybody within the invisible dome.
The soul was beheaded while the miasma consumed it.
DING
<You have defeated Dr. Mao Miaomiao's shadow!>
<If you defeat Dr. Mao Miaomiao 999 more times at this difficulty, you can learn one of his skills!>
Leo brightly grinned and nodded in approval. It was easier than he had thought.
"I'm glad he's stupid. He's not the type to dodge any attack, I see."
There were many types of shadows in Leo's pocket dantian universes. Leo fought many death knights, Marc, and grim reapers in his free time to learn their skills, and they were the most annoying opponents.
Every time Leo fought Beatrice or her comrades, they dodged his attacks as if their lives depended on it. As a result, it took a long time to defeat one of them at a time.
On the other hand, Ivy and liches were stationary most of the time. They relied on teleportation magic and blinking techniques, but they couldn't dodge even basic attacks when they were caught.
Other cultivators also fell into the two prior categories. Situ Nantian, Hua Jiashan, and Han Hao had high agility and dexterity while Tang Xuan, Dongfang Mei, Xu Nuan, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman always tried to defend or block his attacks, which was futile.
Gao Yan, Yao Qiqi, and Jin Yong, on the other hand, were the balance type. They usually made a correct judgment when to dodge or defend. But in the end, none of them managed to cleanly dodge Leo's attacks when he put his mind to it.
Leo had enough for now. He opened his eyes in reality.
Only a second passed in the real world. Leo didn't miss anything dangerous.
Although Leo didn't manage to get a skill from Mao Miaomiao, he gained insight from the previous fight. He shoved his hand into his flesh and dug a ribcage out.
SWUA
The ribcage transformed into a transparent sword like what happened in the simulation mode.
Then, Leo activated Beatrice and Marc's domain powers at the same time. Two layers of dome expanded and covered the sky.
Beatrice's personal domain allowed Leo to cut anything inside the dome. As for Marc's domain, it multiplied the attacks he delivered. The Jojo fist barrage earlier in the simulation was also one of Marc's abilities.
"What if I combine the one-hit slash technique and the multiplier skill together?"
Leo smirked and tested it out. He swung the transparent sword down.
SWUA
SWUA
SWUA
As it was Leo's first time using the skills, only 46 drones and 16 unmanned jets were cut in half. However, ten thousand slashes only cut empty air.
Leo pouted as he felt bad. He retried one more time.
SWUA
SWUA
SWUA
It was worse than before. A total of 30 machines were broken while the rest missed the mark.
"Eh… Annoying. STAY STILL AND LET ME CUT YOU!!"
Leo swung his sword like a baseball bat. Every time he swung, battleships, jets, and drones fell from the sky.
.
.
Meanwhile, Esen pursed her lips as she watched her husband work. She was proud of him.
"Isn't that Beatrice's soul domain? The multi-hit domain is the same as Marc's too! Hehe, damn, geezer. You're secretly practicing my subordinates' daos, I see."
Esen didn't want to lose to him. She pointed her fingers at the countless militated corpses on the ground and shouted.
"DON'T EVER THINK DEATH IS THE END! ARISE, MY SLAVES!"
The fleshes of corpses mended and combined into new beings. 10,000 zombies and skeletons slowly stood on their feet and howled.

chapters.title: Chapter 234 Florida Man Punched Mad Veterinarian Who Attempted to Combine His Dog With His Daughter. “I hate kids like you.” Said the Vet.
chapters.content:
Chapter 234 Florida Man Punched Mad Veterinarian Who Attempted to Combine His Dog With His Daughter. “I hate kids like you.” Said the Vet.
Chapter 234 – Florida Man Punched Mad Veterinarian Who Attempted to Combine His Dog With His Daughter. "I hate kids like you." Said the Vet.
In space, a statue and an angel with identical faces got entangled in a dog fight. Both sides kept flying further and further away from Leo's planet.
Mao Miaomiao's historical laughter was silenced by the void while the angel statue bellowed in anger. No matter what Meowmeow did, he couldn't touch the devil.
"What's wrong? What happened to your confidence earlier?" The angel mocked the imposter.
Although Meowmeow couldn't hear the angel's voice, he could read his lips and his expressions. His anger soared.
"TIME LAW!"
The statue bellowed and stopped time around him. However, the black-winged angel cackled and used the same ability.
"That's my power, you copycat. TIME AND SPACE LAW!"
All gas and particles in the void within the radius of 100 light years of distance remained in the same place. However, the two angels continued playing the game of tag.
Meowmeow's swords, beams, punches, and kicks kept missing. Meanwhile, Mao Miaomiao calmly counterattacked by hitting the statue with his palms.
The statue cracked and was on the verge of crumbling. Meowmeow looked at his body and bit his lower lip.
As Meowmeow realized he was not the opponent of the karmic sovereign, he vanished, withdrawing from the battle.
"Hey! Hey! You can't just leave. Come back here!"
Mao Miaomiao pursued. In five seconds, he caught the statue and punched the latter's chest.
The chest of Meowmeow cracked and dented. He was knocked back 100 kilometers away.
Not allowing Meowmeow to leave, the angel teleported and reappeared behind the statue. He threw a punch at the back of Meowmeow's head.
The statue detected danger. He bellowed and dispersed into smoke. Instantly, he teleported closer to Leo's planet.
Mao Miaomiao stopped pursuing the fleeing guardian. His smiley face turned solemn.
"I've played enough. Time to get serious."
Mao Miaomiao created a large sword, which was three times longer than the sun. He then swung down, aiming at the planet of Leo.
The sword descended and broke through the atmosphere.
.
.
On the flying island, Gao Yan and Jin Yong stood side by side. They had come out to assist the seniors, but their presence seemed unnecessary.
Ivy's platoon did well by kiting jets and battleships away from the domain. They tanked countless energy shots from battleships and unmanned jets, but they managed to take down as many drones and jets.
While both promising quasi-immortals observed the fight of immortals and deities, an immortal on their side got on the island via elevator.
Both men turned around and found a swordsman, who had traumatized many people with his caveman's speech and brutality.
"WHERE WOLVES?! ME KILL WOLVES!"
Jin Yong's eyes were dull as he gave up talking to his mentor. As for Gao Yan, it was his first time meeting the sword saint's clone.
"Is this the new guy you were talking about?" Asked Gao Yan.
"Yes. Be careful, though. If he detects your talent, he'll drag you to that godforsaken place."
"Godforsaken place?"
"A torture chamber. If you get stuck in there, you'll be forced to train nonstop until you drop."
"Isn't that interesting?"
"…No. Don't do it, junior. Trust your senior!"
Gao Yan was curious why Jin Yong hated the time chamber so much. He planned to visit it after this mess.
RUMBLE
While the two soon-to-be immortals chatted, the sky turned dark. A large energy blade rapidly got closer to their planet, and its humming noise alarmed them.
Gao Yan, Jin Yong, and Hua Taixu looked up. They clearly saw a large blade approaching, and it got bigger every second.
"Uh-oh." Gao Yan realized what it was. "Isn't that an energy blade? It's massive!"
Jin Yong broke a sweat. "There is no time to admire that! That stupid thing is about to crush our world!"
Hua Taixu's expression also turned dark.
"Enemy strong! Me helpless!"
Gao Yan didn't want to give up. He raised his pistol and injected every ounce of Qi into his bullets. He switched the firing mode to automatic and unleashed hell upon the oncoming blade.
Repeated lasers hit the approaching blade, but the beams were deflected upon contact!
Gao Yan was taken aback. This gun was the strongest artifact that he had, but it was not effective against the blade.
Jin Yong took this opportunity to try. He used one of the mass-produced M16 and sprayed enhanced bullets at the alien's sword.
TING
TING
It was ineffective as expected.
While both men tried to protect their world from the sword, the others also worked hard to repel that absolute unit to hit the planet.
Ivy, Marc, Beatrice, Taxi, Ricardo, and Esen turned their attention toward the sword and threw their strongest attack at the sword. As futile as it was, no one managed to put a dent in the energy sword.
The sword quickly broke through the atmosphere to hit the planet.
3,000 feet above the flying island.
2,000 feet
1,000 feet
It only took a second for the blade to descend from the exosphere to reach this far.
"NOOOO!!"
Gao Yan and Jin Yong rushed toward the energy sword and swung their weapons at it.
BOOM
The energy sword generated a shockwave and knocked both men away. It descended further.
100 feet!
It was too late for Gao Yan and others to stop the blade. It was 10 feet above the platform.
BOOM!!
It hit!
A portion of the flying island was cut through, but half of it remained intact as the tip of the blade got stuck by something.
Gao Yan, Hua Taixu, and Jin Yong turned around to see what the colossus blade had hit and why it was stopped. Then, they found the cause of such a phenomenon.
Something came out of the permanent portal of Orlando Mystic Realm. A thousand straight fishing lines came out from the portal and wrapped around a section of the blade, preventing it from cutting through the flying island in half.
The one responsible for the fishing lines slowly walked out of the portal.
He was a statue of an elderly fisherman, and his name was Kitten.
The fisherman looked up and found the karmic sovereign's blade. He snorted.
"A runaway homunculus dares to provoke my master? You don't know who you're dealing with!"
The fishing lines tightened and crushed the energy blade. The weapon of Mao Miaomiao shattered instantly.
.
.
Mao Miaomiao raised his eyebrows and gazed at his destroyed energy blade. He was surprised that someone managed to block his attack.
"Hey, hey. Isn't that planet supposed to be a mortal world? How come there are so many entities? Oh, wait. I know! That brat is around. Right, I'm supposed to get rid of that brat and take whatever bloodline he uses with his new body."
The devil shrugged and ignored Meowmeow. He swept his gaze over the planet to find Leo.
It wasn't hard to find him as Leo stood at the top of his shopping mall with his eyes closed. He seemed to be meditating.
"Ah, found you. I should get this over with quickly. Also, that chick is FINE!"
Mao Miaomiao found Esen, who minded her business on top of the parking lot. Around her, an army of skeletons and zombies listened to her instructions. Suddenly, they flew toward the remnant drones and jets.
Zombies jumped and caught many jets. Then, they self-detonated, bringing down some machines with them.
When the zombies exploded and left with militated corpses, Esen waved her fingers and repaired them. The flesh and blood of destroyed zombies combined as one, and a new zombie was resurrected.
Mao Miaomiao admired Esen's ability. He also drooled as he had never tasted a fine divine elf with a flat chest before. He thought to himself.
'I bet Mother Eleanor won't mind if I smash one of her people. Well, she isn't planning to use her body as a new vessel anyway. It's that warmonger that she will be using.'
He laughed to himself as he was the one who discovered a technique to transfer one's soul and consciousness to a new body without causing a side effect. At the moment, the matriarch of the divine elf was about to employ the technique on one of her successors to prolong her lifespan and youthful appearance.
The doctor couldn't help but laugh at his MOTHER. He was proud of his technological breakthrough achievements. Because of his elation, his wood was rock solid.
"Ah, I can't wait to taste some elves! I've changed my mind. I'll take her-"
POEK!
Something hard suddenly hit Mao Miaomiao's nape. He turned around to see the assailant.
There was a thick tentacle behind Mao Miaomiao. He looked up and found the culprit.
"What are you looking at, munya!"
On top of Mu-Nyang, Lucky was also there, sitting and sneering at the chimera doctor.
"You've done goof, woof!"
Mao Miaomiao raised his eyebrows and tilted his head to the side. "I fucked up? How so?"
Mu-Nyang and Lucky stopped smiling. Their killing intent burst.
"Master has given us a new order. You're gonna die here, munya!"
The Cathulhu and Werewolf Overlord's clone charged at the angel while the latter cackled.
"Y'all are stupid or what?! Do you think entities like you can be my opponent? You need at least 10 karmic sovereigns to beat me!"
Mao Miaomiao summoned two black katanas out of nowhere and swung them toward Mu-Nyang. The cat-face octopus statue was cut into four pieces, and the cat collapsed.
Meanwhile, the wolf imposter barked at Mao Miaomiao and activated his killing move. Strange energy infiltrated the karmic sovereign's body, causing his eyes and internal organs to melt!
Although Mao Miaomiao lost both eyeballs and some internal organs, he ignored the threat. Instead, he clapped his hands and revealed his trump card.
"Play time's over. I'll show you something special… RETURN TO ZERO!"
Suddenly, a karmic law's domain emerged and covered everything in the galaxy. All movements were frozen in time. Unlike before, nobody could sense or feel the power of time and space law, except Leo.
RUMBLE
People began to move backward, and so did the spaceships and soldiers of Leo's domain. 5 seconds, 10 seconds, 30 seconds, the time kept flowing backward!
A minute later, the anomaly stopped. Then, the time resumed normally.
The destroyed energy blade reappeared while Mao Miaomiao's Qi remained in good shape. Also, the sword was about to descend and hit the world.
Mao Miaomiao sneered and changed his approach. Instead of letting the sword move by itself, he grabbed the hilt and changed its trajectory, aiming at Leo, who had been keeping his eyes closed.
"NO MORE NICE GUY! DIE, BRAT!! I ALWAYS HATE KIDS LIKE YOU!"
The blade accelerated. It dodged the flying sword and Kitten's finishing lines, making its way toward Leo.
Sensing the incoming blade, Leo's eyes snapped open He then threw a punch at the sword.
CLANK
The energy sword instantly shattered!
Mao Miaomiao gazed at his shattered sword in a daze. He was confused.
"Wait. What?!"
The punch unleashed a shockwave, which traveled through space and hit Mao Miaomiao's face.

chapters.title: Chapter 235 Florida Man Attacked and Killed Home Intruder Using Giant Octopus.
chapters.content:
Chapter 235 Florida Man Attacked and Killed Home Intruder Using Giant Octopus.
Chapter 235 – Florida Man Attacked and Killed Home Intruder Using Giant Octopus.
"!!!"
The impact that hit Mao Miaomiao's face was light, but it pushed him a thousand kilometers away. A crack also appeared on his face as the shockwave slightly disintegrated his cells.
The doctor looked back at the assailant, who was still chilling on the planet.
'That damn brat!'
Enraged and humiliated, Mao Miaomiao charged toward the planet while he created a hundred star-destroying swords. He waved his hands and ordered the colossus swords to cut the planet!
.
The sight of multiple gigantic swords bigger than the moons and the sun astonished the crowd. They emerged from a distance, but they rapidly got closer and swung toward their planet.
"NOT GOOD!"
Gao Yan and Jin Yong panicked. They flew to space and unleashed everything.
They slashed, hacked, and shot the swords with their firearms.
TINK
TINK
Their bullets and swords weren't enough to deflect or stop the momentum of the swords. They got bounced back because of the repelling forces.
"NOOOO!!"
The swords went past them and came down toward the world.
Meanwhile, Leo pursed his lips and deeply sighed. He muttered to himself.
"I guess I made it on time. What was the keyword? Oh, right… ZA WARUDO!"
Leo suddenly bellowed and unleashed a domain. A grey dome expanded, enveloping the entire world and the entire star system!
The grey dome reached Mao Miaomiao and also pulled him inside.
Meowmeow, Lucky, Mu-Nyang, Gao Yan, Hua Taixu, Jin Yong, Esen, Beatrice, Taxi, Ricardo, and others didn't sense anything as the time flow in the domain was frozen.
On the other hand, Mao Miaomiao could still sense his surroundings, but he couldn't move. His entire body got stuck by an unknown force, and he could only move his eyeballs.
While everybody was frozen in the time and space domain, Leo calmly jumped toward the energy swords. He lightly punched one of them, and they shattered into smoke.
Leo took his time. He awkwardly swam the void toward the other colossus sword and punched it. Then, he moved to the next.
.
Mao Miaomiao witnessed everything. He stared at Leo and counted in his mind.
'12, 13, 14, 15 seconds… how long can you maintain it? I doubt you can even last a minute!'
Leo couldn't hear Mao Miaomiao's internal thoughts. He swam the void and destroyed the third sword. Using the momentum, he floated toward the next energy blade.
One minute passed. Leo managed to destroy the fourth one.
"…"
Mao Miaomiao inwardly sneered in his mind. When he was in his prime condition, ten minutes was the longest time that he could sustain this domain. As for the time rewind ability, Mao Miaomiao could only regress one minute to the past as it consumed too much of his life force.
Three minutes passed.
Five minutes passed.
Ten minutes passed, but Leo still took his time to break another sword. So far, he managed to crack 15.
Mao Miaomiao was patient. He gathered his strength, waiting for the domain to disperse. However, what he had been waiting for never happened.
11 minutes passed. Everything was still frozen in time!
'11 minutes?! What is this?! How come that brat managed to break my record?! If I remember correctly, I discarded his soul and sent it to the Karma River. Did Jocelyn and Aslan recover his soul and put it in a new vessel?! No. That's impossible. Jocelyn and Aslan were merely deities. They don't have enough authority and power to interfere with the rivers of karma.'
Mao Miaomiao was confused. He thought of Leo and Simba's parents, who were his colleagues 50,000 years ago. Those couples were in charge of nurturing the test subjects and brainwashing them, making them think that they were their real parents.
In reality, Simba and Leo were never their children. They were the creations, which mankind from Earth and the divine elves had created.
Abyssal Phoenixes, divine elves, Cathulhus, Fenrir Werewolves, and other creatures from different races in the universe had been abducted and had their blood extracted. They also managed to get their hands on the rare DNA of top overlords of this universe.
Mao Miaomiao observed Leo and calculated in his mind.
'The power of time and space comes from the Kishin's Oni… I'm sure either Jocelyn or Aslan must have implanted the OL-ME DNA into another chimera and had that brat reincarnate into it. But that alone can't enable him to endure the backlash this long. He must have the OL-AP and OL-AS DNA with him. The infinite revival ability and supreme vitality come from the abyssal phoenix. The power of regeneration and quick healing come from the Cathulhu. But I also have those DNAs. Why can't I last more than 10 minutes!? Something isn't right!'
While Mao Miaomiao calculated, Leo destroyed the 50th sword and wiped his sweat. The guy leisurely dove back into the planet's atmosphere to take a breather. Then, he flew back toward the other swords and continued his work.
"…"
Mao Miaomiao was speechless by Leo's calmness. He wondered if this guy was stupid. Had he been in Leo's shoes, he would have come after the caster and ended it.
lightsΝοvel 'Luckily, that brat is stupid. He could have killed me and removed all swords altogether. Why is he taking a roundabout way to negate my attacks?'
He smirked and gradually accumulated his Qi in his veins. He managed to move his fingers a bit.
It wouldn't take long before Mao Miaomiao could break free from the time domain's restraints.
POOF
POOF
While Mao Miaomiao fantasized about breaking free of Leo's domain, the rest of his swords suddenly shattered at once.
'Huh?'
Mao Miaomiao shifted his attention to Leo. However, the guy was still at the same place holding his unique staff.
Leo turned around. He looked at Mao Miaomiao and their eyes met.
.
Leo mumbled to himself as he was tired of destroying swords one by one. He got creative and used the death magic on the energy blades.
Black smoke from Leo's hands moved through the void and touched several swords at once. They instantly evaporated the colossus blades.
Leo let out a sigh of relief.
"I should have done this earlier."
Leo proceeded to remove all threats. When the swords were gone, he turned around and stared at the culprit of all the messes. He hadn't forgotten the guy.
"Now, you. Doctor Mao Miaomiao, I don't know you, but I hate you. I don't know why, though."
Leo circulated his Qi into his feet and propelled himself forward. Instantly, he arrived in front of the black-winged angel.
"!!!"
Mao Miaomiao sensed danger. He burst out his strength and broke from Leo's domain.
"YOU CAN NEVER DEFEAT ME, LEONARDO!! I HAVE THE SUPERIOR PHYSIQUE AND CULTIVATION BASE!!"
Leo couldn't hear Mao Miaomiao's scream in space, but his muscle memory remembered what he needed to do to defeat the doctor. After all, Leo had already defeated him a thousand times during the long process of meditation earlier.
He reached out and grasped Mao Miaomiao's neck with his left hand. His right hand returned the staff of singularity to his storage ring and clenched into a fist.
BOOM
Leo's right fist directly hit Mao Miaomiao's face. The latter's head directly exploded and splattered tissues everywhere.
Leo didn't stop there. He spread miasma of death to capture every piece of Mao Miaomiao's flesh to find his true soul.
Leo had done this a thousand times already. It wasn't hard to find the guy's soul.
"IMPOSSIBLE!!"
"There you are."
The soul of Doctor Mao Miaomiao emerged from one of his brain tissues. The black miasma tied his soul's arms and legs while it seeped into his transparent body.
Mao Miaomiao's soul screamed in pain and slowly dissipated. However, the guy utilized his life-saving skills again.
"RETURN TO ZERO!"
As soon as Mao Miaomiao uttered the word, Leo deeply frowned. The shadows in the simulation mode only used this technique for the sake of combat, not fleeing. However, Mao Miaomiao attempted to use it to save his skin and flee with all his might.
Time was rewinded, and Mao Miaomiao's soul and body slowly restored themselves. As for Leo, he was rooted in the same place because of the time law.
Leo forcefully shattered the restraint effects. He then threw a punch at Mao Miaomiao's face to kill him again.
"NO WAY IN HELL I'LL LOSE TO YOU!"
Mao Miaomiao pulled out his secret weapon from his storage ring. But instead of swinging it toward Leo, he turned around and targeted an invisible string that only he could see.
The sword was known as the Katana of Karmic Severance. It was his precious artifact that he got from Divine Elf Matriarch Eleanor.
"KARMA SEVERENCE! DIE!!"
Mao Miaomiao cut a transparent karmic string, which connected him and Essen!
SWUA
As soon as it was cut, Leo flinched and his punch was halted. He only felt a slight discomfort, but his body trembled as if he had lost something important.
Using this opportunity, Mao Miaomiao bellowed and used his teleportation technique. He vanished and reappeared 200 lightyears away from Leo.
Mao Miaomiao turned around and burst into laughter.
"Ha…Hahaha. HAHAHAHAHAA!! BRAT! THAT WAS GOOD! YOU WERE GOOD! You must have worked hard for such power! Too bad for you, you're still naïve and inexperienced! You can't possibly beat me, the consort of Divine Elf Matriarch! I HAVE HER PROTECTION!"
He believed that he had escaped from Leo's grasp. He also learned that Leo might have already surpassed him in time and space law's mastery. Still, Mao Miaomiao believed that he had a superior cultivation base and physique as Leo flinched from the previous attack.
Severing karma was one of many killing moves of a karmic sovereign. As he could see and govern karma, he could decide the fates of mortals, immortals, deities, and even sages. Mao Miaomiao could even dictate anybody's luck and create low-grade fate crystals!
As Leo failed to react to Mao Miaomiao's karmic severing cut earlier, Mao Miaomiao was confident that Leo's true strength might be in the entity realm at best.
"Next time, I'll come prepared, brat! I won't be playing around anymore. I'll search for your karma strings and severe it! I'll find your karma of existence and destroy it! Then, you will disappear from this universe forever! HAHAHAHAHA-PU!"
While Mao Miaomiao was in a good mood, a fishing hook appeared out of nowhere and entered his mouth. The fishing hook pierced through Mao Miaomiao's upper gum while the fishing line was pulled.
"AAAAAAHHHHH!! WHO DARE?!"
Mao Miaomiao turned around. Then, he found a statue of an elderly fisherman, holding a fishing rod. Floating behind him were Mu-Nyang, Lucky, and Meowmeow.
The guardian statue "Kitten" returned from the Orlando Mystic Realm to help.
Mao Miaomiao widened his eyes and gawked at the fisherman. He recognized the old man's face.
"OVERLORD XIAOMAO?!"
The guardian statue lightly snorted.
"What? You stole the original's blood and made it yours. Don't you think that Leonardo can't do the same?"
"Y-YOU ARE HIS CLONE?! IMPOSSIBLE! YOU DON'T EVEN HAVE A SOUL!!"
"I might not have his soul, but I know how to infuse my soul into somebody else's body. You were the one who taught me, Doctor Mao."
"…You… ASLAN?!"
The statue of the elderly fisherman transformed into a middle-aged human scientist in a lab coat. His face shapeshifted into the male parent in Simba's photo.
"Surprised motherfucker. YOU AIN'T GETTING AWAY!"
"YOU CAN'T KILL ME! I HAVE A SUPERIOR PHYSIQUE AND CULTIVATION BASE-"
PU
PU
PU
Mu-Nyang pierced through Mao Miaomiao's chest using his tentacle. Meowmeow beheaded the doctor with his katana. As for Lucky, he glared at Mao Miaomiao and burnt his internal organs with his flame domain.
Aslan, aka Kitten, pulled his fishing rod and dragged out Mao Miaomiao's soul from his body. His fishing hook and line bound the doctor's soul and dragged him along.
After the soul was captured, Mu-Nyang opened his mouth and ate the remaining flesh and blood of Mao Miaomiao, stopping him from coming back to life.
Mao Miaomiao struggled to break free. He tried to use his favorite skill again.
"RETURN TO ZERO!"
But this time, it couldn't be activated.
Aslan scoffed at Mao Miaomiao.
"Who do you think I am? I'm using the clone of Overlord Xiaomao as a vessel. What cultivation base do you think he has, idiot?"
"NO! THIS IS IMPOSSIBLE! OVERLORD XIAOMAO IS JUST AN ENTITY! HE CAN'T BE THIS STRONG!"
"Silence, bitch!"
Aslan slapped Mao Miaomiao's soul face. A portion of the spirit disappeared.
Meowmeow glared at the doctor's soul. He turned to Aslan and made a request.
"Let's kill him. He deserves a thousand deaths for what he did to us."
Aslan smirked. "Relax, boy. I know you hold a grudge, but we still need the guy."
"Why?" Meowmeow wasn't happy with Aslan's decision.
Aslan snickered and shifted his gaze toward Mu-Nyang. The latter pouted and spat several crystal balls out.
"I have a total of 17 earth fate crystals and 4 sky fate crystals, munya."
Aslan tilted his head, gesturing that Mu-Nyang still had more.
Mu-Nyang pouted and spat another one. However, this one forced Mu-Nyang to puke a moon-sized crystal out of his large head.
"And one entity fate crystal, munya."
Aslan snickered and collected everything.
"Good job. Now, take this bastard's crystal as well."
"Okay, munya!"
Mu-Nyang widely grinned. He opened his massive mouth, revealing a million sharp fangs under him. His tentacles wrapped around Mao Miaomiao and pulled him into his mouth. At the same time, Aslan removed the hook and the fishing lines for Mu-Nyang to eat the soul.
"NOOOOOOO!!"
Mu-Nyang's fangs and teeth turned into a grinder. He crushed the doctor's soul to pieces and digested him.
Aslan nodded in approval.
"Mu-Nyang. Don't destroy everything. Let that bastard's soul reincarnate as one of your dantian universe's population and torture him until he's traumatized. Trap him in there and let him suffer an ill fate for at least a decillion years! Make him suffer! Oh, don't forget to extract his fate crystals in his soul. Leonardo will need those."
"Okie, munya!" Mu-Nyang laughed. He loved playing with his victim's souls.
Inside Mu-Nyang's universe housed 100,000 souls of Fenrir werewolves. He planned to degrade these guys into something nastier and stupider than their previous race – The gnolls.
"Let's go home and help our master."
The business was over. The four guardian statues reverted to their casual appearance and flew back home.
.
.
Meanwhile, a disaster struck at home.
Esen, who had been commanding her undead troops and standing on the parking lot's top floor, collapsed. She then stopped breathing, and her heart ceased functioning.
A transparent karma string, which had linked her with Leo, fell next to her body.

chapters.title: Chapter 236 Florida Man Found His Wife Unconscious at Home, Calls Fisherman for Advice Instead of Calling an Ambulance.
chapters.content:
Chapter 236 Florida Man Found His Wife Unconscious at Home, Calls Fisherman for Advice Instead of Calling an Ambulance.
Chapter 236 – Florida Man Found His Wife Unconscious at Home, Calls Fisherman for Advice Instead of Calling an Ambulance.
"Hmm."
Overlord Milo and his troops remained at the Cauliflower City. Their leader silently observed the battle from afar. On the other hand, the troops panicked as they lost contact with their operators.
"Your Excellency! We can't communicate with our mothership anymore!"
"My lord. Our colony might have been destroyed. What should we do?"
Overlord Milo was silent. He narrowed his eyes and kept his eyes on Leo, but he didn't know that he was the Florida Man he had been looking for.
"Avoid that place. We'll go kidnap and kill other Nu'Earthe of this planet!"
"But the colony…"
"Screw the colony. I can drag you useless idiots home whenever I want to! Follow me and shut up!"
"Y-Yes, my lord."
The vanguard team departed from the city and flew northeast.
While flying, Overlord Milo thought of a certain Ohio man, who gave him the wrong coordinate of Florida Man. He grumbled and inwardly cursed him.
'What a waste of time! I could have spent my precious time searching for Florida Man! Because of that stupid elf, I lost my colony star, and my team is stranded here. Well, I'm gonna pretend that we're busy fighting on this planet and retreat after I get my war trophies. The elves can't blame me if I bring home a bunch of Nu'Earthes.'
The group ignored the scenery and made their way toward a mountain range, where a certain dual-cultivation sect was located.
30 minutes later, Overlord Milo found the hidden sect and a large city. He laughed and ordered his men.
"Capture everybody! We need war trophies to show those idiot elves that we WORKED. When we return, we will get our remuneration and reimbursement for our destroyed colony!"
The werewolves stopped thinking about their destroyed base. They eyed the panicking mortals and sneered.
The group of immortals and deities launched their attacks, while the mortals did their best to resist and retaliate. Situ Nantian, Murong Qi, and the people of Ouyang Clan united to fight back.
Although the city of Tappaya City and the Joyous Yin-Yang Sect housed many experts, they all failed to resist. Within 10 minutes, they were either captured or killed.
Situ Clan, Ouyang Clan, Murong Qi, and half of the cultivators from the city were taken away. As for the city and the sect, they were left in ruins.
Overlord Milo didn't waste time. He gathered his subordinates and summoned a magic shopping system. He purchased a mass-teleportation scroll by spending 100,000 years of lifespan. Then, he brought his people away from this planet.
.
.
After losing contact with Overlord Milo and Overlord Max, Captain Ingof Jack made a decisive decision. He relayed his order with a heavy heart.
"… Retreat. Recall the battleships and detonate all unmanned drones."
The crewmates were silent. They lowered their heads in regret that they shouldn't have followed the order of Overlord Mao, who abandoned them during a critical time. Everybody gnashed their teeth in frustration.
The cube mothership gently traveled forward, retrieving the surviving battleships. Several drones also flew back from the planet. As for the jets and the drones in the atmosphere, they rearranged their formation and charged toward Leo's domain.
The jets performed a kamikaze attack on Leo's buildings!
Ingof Jack didn't bother waiting for the result of the suicide attack. He counted the number of surviving battleships and operated the navigation console in front of him. He pressed a few buttons and put his palm on the flat glass to confirm his identity.
DING
The cube mothership slowly faded to nothingness as it teleported back to the Swastika Galaxy.
.
.
BOOM
BOOM
Jets and drones crashed into Leo's farms, pylon tower, apartments, houses, warehouses, granaries, and the recycling center. The west slum was annihilated while the Tang Clan's manor was leveled because of the suicide jets.
The pony team ignored every building, but they surrounded Leo's shopping mall. They used everything necessary to shoot down oncoming jets, which targeted their main base.
Lightning bolts, lasers, and various Qi techniques shot down jets and drones nearby. Taxi and Ricardo got sweaty as they worked the hardest.
While the two horse monsters fought, they gained an insight. Both Ricardo and Taxi transformed and ascended. Their lower bodies retained the horse part, but their neck and head were replaced by a humanoid upper torso, arms, and human heads.
A nightmare centaur and a unicorn centaur emerged for the first time!
Both Taxi and Ricardo took the first step into the immortal realm. They were no longer regular monsters but mythical monsters.
The black and white centaurs panted as their Qi was almost depleted after they had shot down ten thousand drones and jets. They were on the verge of collapsing from exhaustion.
As they were about to give up, the onslaught was over. The last suicide bombers were shot down by Gao Yan and Jin Yong.
All horses fell to the ground as they were dying to take a long rest. Some of them neighed and begged for water.
"…Smash." (Anybody, I need water.)
"Smash." (I wish I had an apple.)
"…S-Smash?" (Am I dreaming? Why am I seeing a sexy zebra twerking her butt at me? Hey, come here. Let me smash that!)
Everybody was out of commission. Had their enemies pressed the attack, they would have lied there and waited for their demise as their minds already gave up fighting.
While the ponies got their precious rest, a commotion took place on top of the parking lot. Ivy, who had let her troops combat the intruders, returned to her master's side and discovered something shocking.
Esen collapsed. Her heart also stopped beating!
"YOUR MAJESTY!! WHY?! WHAT HAPPENED?! MEDIC!!"
Ivy injected her Qi into Esen's chest, but the latter's dantian didn't react to her energy. Instead, Ivy's Qi leaked out of Esen's pores and orifices.
lightsΝοvel Beatrice rushed in. She fed Esen the "Hope and Dream" pill, which she had kept for emergencies. This was Leo's strongest healing medicine.
After feeding Esen the pill, the latter's complexion looked better. Her heart woke up and resumed its duty. Her lungs reacted and began pumping air.
However, Esen didn't wake up.
Beatrice and Ivy frowned. They looked at each other.
"Let's ask His Majesty for help," Ivy suggested.
Beatrice nodded. She looked up to find Leo in the void.
Coincidentally, Leo also rushed back to his domain as he had a hunch. He flew toward the parking lot building and found the group.
Leo flinched when he found Esen sleeping on the hard floor. He instinctively touched his chest as he couldn't feel their connection.
Something was cut. Leo was sure that Mao Miaomiao did something to him and Esen before he escaped.
'That bastard! What did he do?!'
Leo sat next to Esen's body. He pried open her mouth to tease her.
"Wake up, princess. If you don't wake up, I'll finger your throat and play with your uvula."
"…"
Esen didn't react. Only her subordinates stared at Leo's face, questioning his joke and timing with their expressions.
As Leo didn't get any answer, he stopped playing. He carried Esen in his arms and brought her to his bus. After reaching his room, Leo rested her on his bed.
Ivy and others followed Leo into his room. They looked at him.
"What happened to her, Your Majesty? Do you know anything?" Asked Ivy.
Leo couldn't answer. He had a feeling that he knew the answer. But at the same time, he was clueless. Thus, he pondered out loud.
"Sleeping beauty curse? Do I need to kiss you to wake you up?"
Leo put his theory into action. He leaned over and kissed Esen in front of her subordinates, hoping to end this farce as soon as possible.
When their lips touched, Leo recalled the hot night they had. He remembered that Esen tried to bite his lips, but her fangs couldn't do anything to his flesh.
Thinking of the pleasant past hurt Leo's feelings in this situation. He wished Esen would wake up soon.
Leo parted his lips with hers. He gazed at her peaceful sleeping face.
"Hey, brat. Stop playing. Wake up."
"…"
Esen remained asleep.
"Dammit. WAKE UP!"
"…"
"I SAID. WAKE! UP!"
Leo screamed at Esen's face, but she was still out.
The crowd silently waited for Leo to show them another miracle. Unfortunately, it didn't happen.
One of the liches whispered to his friends.
"Hey, should we try to resurrect her as an undead? Then, we let His Majesty cure her again."
Leo overheard that. He widened his eyes as he was enlightened. Thus, he brought out the staff of singularity to enhance his necromancy power.
But as Leo was about to use the power of necromancy on Esen, Ivy, and Beatrice grabbed his arms. Although they didn't have enough strength to stop him, they reminded Leo.
"Your Majesty! Her Majesty is still alive! You can't turn her into an undead while she's alive! If you do, she will be in a lot of pain!" Ivy warned Leo.
"She is alive. Necromancy is unnecessary!" Beatrice also didn't like what Leo was about to do.
Leo listened to the women and snorted. He glanced at them.
"Then, any better idea? Why is she in comatose?"
"…That's."
Ivy and Beatrice couldn't explain either. They lowered their heads.
Everybody also avoided eye contact with Leo. None of the undead legions understood why Esen was in this condition.
"Calm down, master. I can explain."
"!!!"
While everybody was in confusion, one of Leo's guardian statues entered the bus. He was none other than Kitten, aka Aslan.
The fisherman statue shrank his body to match Leo's size. He walked into the room.
The crowd of elves and Molg tribesmen parted ways for the fisherman statue to enter. Aslan stood at the foot of the bed and lowered his head to greet Leo.
"Kitten?" Leo was surprised. "Oh, right. I forgot about you. Did you come back from the mystic realm to help us fight? You're quite considerate."
Aslan snickered. "Let's save the pleasantry for another occasion. Let's look at the patient first."
"…"
Leo raised his eyebrows. For some reason, this fisherman didn't act or talk like a fisherman. Instead, he sounded like a mature doctor from a hospital.
Aslan approached Esen and used his fingers to open her eyelids. Light came out of Aslan's fingertips as if they were flashlights.
The fisherman checked the response of Esen's iris, but she didn't react. He closed her eyes and deeply sighed.
"Master, have you ever heard about the term Karma Severance?"
"Karma Severance?"
"It's going to be a long story. Also, please excuse us."
Aslan glanced at Ivy, Beatrice, and their companions. He gestured that he wanted to be with Leo alone.
Ivy pouted, "Can some of us stay?"
Aslan shook his head. "Your cultivation base is too low. Learning about advanced terms and techniques of the higher realms will disrupt your growth and dao heart. I don't want to traumatize you."
"…"
Beatrice firmly nodded in understanding and turned around. She waved her hands, asking her colleagues to leave.
Ivy was unwilling to leave. But as there was nothing she could do, she grudgingly left the room and left Aslan and Leo alone.
The door was closed. Aslan waved his finger to create a sound-protected domain to isolate their voices.
"So," Leo crossed his arms. "What do you know that I don't know?"
"Alright. I'll explain."

chapters.title: Chapter 237 Florida Man Whose Wife Was in Coma Prevented Relatives from Visiting Her So That He Could Watch TV Alone in Hospital.
chapters.content:
Chapter 237 Florida Man Whose Wife Was in Coma Prevented Relatives from Visiting Her So That He Could Watch TV Alone in Hospital.
Chapter 237 – Florida Man Whose Wife Was in Coma Prevented Relatives from Visiting Her So That He Could Watch TV Alone in Hospital.
Minutes later…
Leo gave Aslan a meaningful look after listening to his lecture. He repeated what he had learned so far.
"So, there's a glitch in the karma river because that asshole cut her karma string. Do I understand it correctly?"
Aslan shook his head. "You can't compare the karma river to a computer. It's Mother Nature's finest creation and a threshold to separate entities from non-entities, and karma sovereigns from entities. Entities like me and other guardians are comparable to client users while karmic sovereigns are super users."
"What about the developers?"
Aslan gave Leo a meaningful look. He concealed his mischievous thought with a smile. "I have no clue about that, but I'm positive that he's harmless to you, master."
"Are you sure? How do you know that the person's a "HE"?"
"It's a figurative of speech. Would you like me to address his pronoun as they/them or she/her?"
"Never mind." Leo rolled his eyes, "Talk about the trustworthiness of that guy. Are you sure about it?"
"Of course, master. I'm very sure."
"…"
Leo had a feeling that Aslan hid something from him. He planned to fight the latter's shadow in the simulation mode at least 10,000 times to get his knowledge and skills later.
"Any, back to the previous topic. The Karma River is the gathering place of souls. Every time a soul is destroyed, a new soul will be born to become its replacement. When people die, their souls are dragged into the river so that they can be recycled… Ahem… reincarnated again. As for Esen, her soul is still inside her body because she hasn't died yet. It's just a little tricky. Her karma has been cut by a karmic sovereign, whose authorization surpasses the River of Karma. We can't use the Karma River's system to cure her."
So far, Aslan taught Leo about the karma river and its usage.
In this universe, there were seven karma rivers. Each of them was located at the center of a galaxy cluster. Every karma river housed 9.2 quintillion soul embryos of mortals, immortals, gods, and sages, which waited for their queue to be reincarnated into the universe.
However, at the bottom of the rivers, there were other nasty things that only sages, entities, and karmic sovereigns were aware that they existed.
Karma eggs of every mortal, immortal, god, and sage were hidden there. Many people called it Akashic Records. Some named them books of gods even though they were crystal-like eggs.
Those eggs were the shells that the soul embryos left behind as the owners had already been reincarnated. However, the connection between the souls and the eggs persisted in the form of karma strings.
These karma strings were the things that sages, entities, and karmic sovereigns could toy or tamper with, depending on their cultivation base. For example, Sages could only temporarily cut the strings to kill the targeted souls. Entities could erase them permanently while they were immune to a similar trick. As for karmic sovereigns, they could tamper the souls to their liking, including putting a curse on any soul or blessing them with misery and misfortune.
Aslan reminded Leo.
"You see, master. When you revived her and purified her undead curse, you accidentally switched the link between her soul embryo's shell and her soul. You tied her existence with yours. Therefore, when that moron cut her karma string, she lost her connection to you. As a result, she lost her source of life force."
Leo looked at Esen's face and let out a sigh of relief. "Forget about the mumbo jumbo things. Teach me like I'm 10 years old. What do I have to do to fix her?"
"To fix a patient with a severed karma curse, we need a karmic sovereign's help. Actually, you can also…"
"Ahem." Aslan hid his grin and came up with an idea. "How about we seek help from a karmic sovereign?"
Leo gave Aslan a meaningful look. He shook his head. "I know that you know I can help her. Teach me how to do it. Again, teach me and use the vocabulary of a 10-year-old. No big words or stupid jargon."
"Alright, master." Aslan couldn't help but laugh. "Have you created a karmic river in your dantian universe, master?"
"What is that? How do I create one?"
"Okay. This is gonna take a while. It's okay. This daddy will do his best."
"…Daddy? What the hell are you talking about?"
"Never mind, master. Forget what I said. Hehehe."
The lecture continued for the entire day.
.
.
The next day morning, Aslan left the bus. As soon as he came out, Ivy, Beatrice, and their colleagues surrounded the living statue.
"How is our empress, guardian?" Ivy clenched her hands together.
Aslan smirked. "You don't have to worry about her. Your emperor has it under his control from the very beginning."
"R-Really? Can His Majesty really cure her?!"
"You underestimate your emperor, my dear. You don't even realize how capable he actually is. Oh, well. I spoke too much. Just give him time, and everything will be revealed."
"…"
Aslan excused himself and returned to the flying island.
As soon as Aslan left, Ivy rushed into the bus.
DONG
However, something prevented her from getting in. There was a transparent barrier, blocking everybody from reentering the motorhome.
"Oh, I forgot to tell you." The sound transmission of Aslan entered their ears. "For the sake of your emperor's mental health, I've blocked the access to the vehicle. Until he completes what he is trying to do, none of you can enter the bus."
"HEY!!"
Ivy screamed in frustration. The others were also annoyed as the bus was their living quarter.
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo sat on a chair next to the bed. He closed his eyes to meditate and sink his consciousness into the dantian universe inside his body.
The universe was roughly shaped as Leo hadn't properly arranged his galaxies and star systems yet. Most of them still orbited around the rainbow sun, aka the core of Leo's universe.
Leo floated in the void, gazing at the rainbow sun. He frowned for a moment as he noticed how the sun collected strange liquid and turned it into a sea of orbital rings.
As Leo had no idea what they were, he ignored it. Instead of inspecting his universe, he opened the simulation mode and browsed for an opponent. Leo filtered the search menu to find two individuals – Kitten and Mao Miaomiao.
Leo hadn't done with the shadow of Mao Miaomiao yet. He needed to learn more about the karma severing skill that the mysterious doctor had. As for Kitten, aka Aslan, Leo suspected that the statue didn't tell him everything. He planned to extract memory and information from his shadow.
DING
The details of Aslan appeared in the simulation system menu.
.
Name: Dr. Aslan "Kitten" Ariel
Race: Elemental Spirit
Age: 50,120
Cultivation Base: 5-Law Entity
Skills: Law of Genes, Law of Souls, Law of Creation, Law of Karma Fishing, Law of Soul Destruction, Dao of Guardian, Dao of Ocean King, Dao of Soul Scientist
Specials: Shadow of Transcended Singularity, Curse of Karmic Sins, Overlord Xiaomao's Bloodline, Blessings of Overlord Xiaomao
Favorite Weaponry: Fishing Rod of Karma Oceania's King
Potential Percentage: 1,000%
.
The guy had quite a potential in his final form. Unfortunately, his cultivation ceiling was stuck at the entity realm, which was a stage lower than the karmic sovereign realm.
Leo didn't mind it. At least, Kitten seemed more reliable than the other guardian statues.
"How many skills do he have? One, two, three… eight? So 8,000 wins for all skills and an additional 2,000 for his weapon. Oh, well. Time to grind."
Leo cracked his fist and began the simulation mode. He summoned Aslan's shadow to fight first as he seemed easier than Mao Miaomiao's shadow.
As soon as the shadow appeared, Leo wasted no time. He stopped time and punched the shadow in the guts, destroying the doctor's body in one punch.
However, an artificial soul of Aslan's shadow escaped. It resisted the domain of time and pointed its finger at Leo's face. Then, a fishing line came out from its fingertip and pierced through Leo's head!
"!!!"
Leo was shocked. This was the first time that someone managed to stab him. However, he didn't feel that his physique was harmed or injured.
The fishing line didn't harm Leo's physical body in the simulation. Instead, he caught Leo's simulated soul. Aslan's artificial soul shouted and pulled Leo's soul out of his body.
"CRAP!"
For the first time, Leo's soul was ejected from his body in the simulation mode.
Aslan's shadow didn't stop there. He reanimated his fleshly body to protect his soul. Then, he created a frog out of nothingness and pulled Leo's soul into a frog!
As Leo was unfamiliar with his new soul form, he failed to react on time. Aslan's shadow stuffed Leo's soul into the frog!
When Leo came back to his senses again, he found the gigantic body of Aslan's shadow. He tried to lift his hand to fight back, but strength left him.
'What the hell?!'
The next thing he knew was an incoming fist. Aslan's shadow's fist came down and crushed the animated frog while Leo's soul was still trapped inside.
BOOM
Leo's vision turned black for a moment. A few seconds later, he woke up from a trance and found himself hovering in the void.
DING
<You have lost in the simulation mode. Please try harder.>
"…"
He lost!
Leo lost to a clone of his guardian!
Leo lost to an entity that was supposed to be weaker than Mao Miaomiao!
"…Crap. Isn't he quite strong?! What the hell? Isn't he supposed to be weaker than the other guy!?"
He hadn't realized yet that Aslan was also a clone of Overlord Xiaomao. There were many abilities that Aslan's shadow could borrow from the karmic sovereign, which an entity like him shouldn't have. Moreover, the blessings of Overlord Xiaomao and "Shadow of Transcended Singularity" enhanced his abilities, raising his strength enough for him to be capable of killing Leo.
Instead of feeling down, Leo was excited. He loved this harmless fight so that he could experience death as many times as he wanted. He could also spy on his future opponents and learn which type of abilities worked on him.
"I want that weapon. That thing is dangerous enough to negate my raw power. Also, what is that dao or law? I want to try using those!"
Leo summoned Aslan to fight him again.
10 hours in the real world was 10,000 hours, aka 417 days in the simulation mode. Leo fought only Aslan as he tried to get familiarized with the soul-related abilities.
His fight record was horrible as Leo kept losing to the law of soul destruction of Aslan. But after battling him 50,000 bouts, Leo managed to get his first 1,000 wins.

chapters.title: Chapter 238 Florida Man Beaten by His Father Because He Refused to “GIT GUD” in the Art of Sigma Male.
chapters.content:
Chapter 238 Florida Man Beaten by His Father Because He Refused to “GIT GUD” in the Art of Sigma Male.
Chapter 238 – Florida Man Beaten by His Father Because He Refused to "GIT GUD" in the Art of Sigma Male.
After getting the first 1,000 wins, Leo got to choose one of Aslan's skills to learn. He picked the Laws of Souls as it might give him clues about soul attacks and fundamental knowledge.
DING
<You have chosen to learn the Laws of Souls.>
<Unlocking the memory…>
A flood of memories flashed into Leo's mind. Countless texts appeared in front of Leo's eyes at entered his brain like a stream of water vanishing into a sinkhole.
Several hours in Leo's dantian universe passed. He slowly came back to his senses after digesting so much knowledge. He felt like he had read and memorized over a billion pages of scriptures.
"Was it that SIMPLE?!"
Leo was taken aback by the sudden enlightenment. He understood why he was so weak against Aslan's attacks that he wanted to smack his head into a wall in shame and frustration.
"I guess I never used the power of soul… or the basic power of sages at all! Man, this is why I shouldn't skip tutorials in games. I feel like I've jumped into a challenger-ranked game while my skill is only comparable to silver. What a mess."
From what Leo had learned, the power of Laws was an ability or an authority to enforce one or more of the universe's absolute laws upon their enemies. For example, an entity who comprehended the Laws of Sword could command any sword in the universe to cut down their enemies.
However, there was an interesting exception. When two or more entities comprehended the same laws and they fought, the entities would be restricted and banned from borrowing power from the universe. If they really needed to fight, they could only rely on their Qi and life force to fuel the power of laws. This exception existed to prevent multiple entities with the same laws from getting stuck in an endless battle while borrowing and depleting the primal Qi of the universe.
Again, this rule only applied to entities with the same power of laws. It didn't apply to karmic sovereigns, who could bend the laws of the universe at will.
"The laws of souls dictate that all souls must be connected to a vessel, aka a fleshly body, to exist in the universe outside of the karma river. Anybody who violates these laws is subjected to divine punishment. That's the general idea, but those motherducking minor sections are a headache. Dammit. I'm trying to cultivate here, but this whole thing is a fucking haven for lawyers!"
Leo recited the knowledge he just obtained to make sure that he correctly memorized them.
"Section 1, souls exist for the universe and the rivers of karma. Their existence solely belongs to the universe."
"Section 2, souls can only exist if one of the Karma Rivers contains one of their soul embryos or the soul's shells."
"Section 3, souls may reincarnate into a mortal. They cannot be reincarnated into immortals, deities, sages, entities, or superior entities."
"Section 4, souls who reincarnated must return to the karma river of their birth when they died…"
Leo's expression turned dark when he said the laws using his own words and understanding. He kept reciting until he reached a certain section.
"Section 5, every mortal, immortal, deity, and sage in this universe must stay connected to their karma the river of karma by maintaining their karma threads."
This section was related to the karma strings that Mao Miaomiao had tampered with. Leo believed that he hit the jackpot, but the following sections made him confused.
"Section 5.1, if any mortal, immortal, deity, or sage's karma thread is disconnected to the river of karma by accident, intentional, or by the third party's act, their soul will be considered as THE STRAY."
"Section 5.2, THE STRAY is subjected to reconnect to one of the karma rivers within one year after they lost connection with their origin karma river.
"Section 5.3, THE STRAY who fails to reconnect their soul to any karma river within one year will be permanently deleted by the universe… what?"
"Section 5.4, THE STRAY who returns to the karma river will automatically abandon their previous vessel and wait for their new reincarnation process… HEY!"
Leo stopped reciting the laws as he was concerned about Esen. Aslan taught him that Esen's karma thread was connected to him, but Leo was not the river of karma. He was confused about how this worked.
But as Leo fell into a deep thought and recited the rest of the laws in his mind, he found a loophole in the laws. It never stated WHOSE karma river that a soul had to be connected with.
'She connected to me. But when she lost her connection, she fell unconscious. So… I need to reconnect her to me, is that right?'
Leo gained a new hope. He was glad that he spent over a year in this universe fighting Aslan's shadow clones.
However, the knowledge of basic laws was not enough for Leo. He needed more, and he needed to learn how to utilize karma threads and karma laws better.
The answer to Leo's question was not Aslan's other skills. Instead, it had to do with the lower cultivation realms that Leo had skipped.
"To learn how to use karma threads, I need to learn the basics first. I know about dao domains, soul domains, and providence domains. But I haven't learned a sage's ability or domain yet."
Leo let out a long sigh while he searched for other people to fight in the simulation mode so that he could rob their skills. He filtered the search menu and showed only sages, whose cultivation base was one stage above the deity realm.
A new list appeared on the simulation system screen. The name of Overlord Max was on top of the list.
.
Name: Max, the Overlord of Bulldogs
Race: Fenrir Werewolf
Age: 100,238
Cultivation Base: 4-Karmic Thread Sage
Skills: Authority of True Bite, Authority of Territory Marking, Authority of Scent, Authority of Intimidating Bark
Specials: Fenrir Bloodline
Favorite Weaponry: Soul Piercing Fangs
Potential Percentage: 1,000%
.
The next tier of domains was the dao authority. However, in this case, Max had a bunch of useless authority as he practiced useless daos when he was a mortal.
Leo laughed at the skill list. Although he didn't need those authorities, he needed something to learn as a reference. Thus, he tried fighting Overlord Max's shadow a thousand times.
.
.
Two days after Leo had gone into seclusion, he opened his eyes and returned to the real world. In total, he spent over 2,000 days or over 5 years in his dantian universe to train.
His gaze, his expressions, and his aura seemed softer than before. The domineering rainbow aura around Leo receded to his flesh as if he had learned how to conceal or suppress them.
Leo sat next to Esen, who was still unconscious. His eyes swept over the room and searched for a certain thread.
He didn't need to look far. The karma string that Leo had been looking for was still connected to Esen, but the other end was floating in the air.
Leo deeply sighed as this issue was too simple. He wished that he had known about this earlier.
"Man, I worked hard for this? Welp, talking about wasting my time."
Leo reached toward the invisible thread and grabbed it. Then, he pulled the loose line toward himself and searched for the severed part. When he found the end of the line, Leo injected his Qi into it.
RUMBLE
The karma thread reacted. It got longer and moved toward Leo.
The end of the thread entered Leo's chest even though he didn't order it to do so. Still, Leo didn't resist as he knew what and where the thread went to.
Inside Leo's dantian universe, the thread emerged and wiggled toward the stream of liquid, which orbited around the center of Leo's universe. It found one of the red karma crystals in the depth of the river and attached its end to the balls.
No system message warned him or informed him about the development. However, Leo could feel that his life force slowly flowed toward Esen.
After reconnecting the source of the lifestream with Esen's soul, Leo lay on his bed and complained.
"Yeah, it explains everything. I now know why some died and some survived after they touched me. I accidentally stole their karmic threads and karma embryos."
After the complaints, Leo turned his head and looked at the sleeping face of Esen. He snickered.
"You troublemaker. Now I know why your lifespan status always shows as NULL. Your lifespan is my lifespan, damn leecher. You resurrected your friends, and their karma threads link to me, too. Now, I'm their sugar daddy. You're lucky that the clock doesn't accelerate and deplete my lifespan."
Because of the past frustration, Leo came up with a silly idea. He flipped over and got on top of Esen's sleeping body.
"In ancient times, there was a unique way that a master could transfer their mana to their servants, who were the souls of heroes. I think we're in a similar situation. I'm your master, and your status is similar to a servant. Therefore, I'm gonna replenish your mana, okay?"
Leo giggled and cuddled with Esen in glee.
.
.
On the third day's morning, Esen slowly opened her eyes and woke up from her long slumber.
"Umm…"
Esen stretched her arms and legs. They were so numb that she couldn't feel them for a while.
"WHAT?!"
Esen remembered the feeling. She looked left and right. Then, she found Leo, who was sleeping soundly next to her in the same bed.
"!!!"
Esen screeched as she realized what Leo had done. She slapped and punched him several times, but he didn't budge.
The lich empress panted and stopped hitting Leo. She dragged her feet to the bathroom to clean herself.
The elf walked past the face-washing basin's mirror. A second later, she took several steps back to look at her reflection.
"EH?!"
Something was no longer the same size as before. She looked down and widened her eyes.
"WHAT HAPPENED TO MY CHEST?! AND WHY THE HELL IS THERE A BITE MARK ON MY… DAMMIT, GEEZER!!"
.
.
While Esen threw a tantrum in the bathroom, Leo's consciousness was still in his dantian universe, battling Aslan's shadow clone for the 779,999th time.
"HAHAHAHA! GIDGUD, BITCH!"
Leo burst into laughter after he caught Aslan's karma thread. He yanked it and pulled Aslan's soul toward him.
But the soul was tricky. He used the trick that always killed Leo.
Soul Detonation!
The soul swelled and burst out the true power of an entity, whose dantian's energy volume was comparable to a karmic sovereign.
The blast created a supernova, instantly engulfing and devouring Leo's body and soul.
DING
<YOU DIED!>
<You have been defeated. GG!>
<Please note. GG's true abbreviation is GIT GUD, not GOOD GAME!>
Leo's body and artificial soul were reconstructed in the simulation mode. He reopened his eyes and stared at the mocking system message.
"DAMMIT!" Leo was annoyed. "I'M SUPPOSED TO BE STRONGER ALONE! HOW THE HELL ARE THE SHADOW'S STRENGTH INCREASE!?"
DING
<The simulation mode's highest difficulty reflects the ultimate form of the present fighter.>
<Fighter Aslan Kitten Ariel's original soul is an elemental spirit, whose strength and abilities are related to your strength in real life. As you get stronger, he also gets stronger. When he gets stronger in the real world, his shadow in the simulation mode also gets stronger.>
<Again, please GIT GUD.>
"…"
Leo wished that the system was a man or a person that he could punch in the face.

chapters.title: Chapter 239 Florida Man Allegedly Groomed a Maiden. FBI Declared That He Rizzed His Last Gyatt.
chapters.content:
Chapter 239 Florida Man Allegedly Groomed a Maiden. FBI Declared That He Rizzed His Last Gyatt.
Chapter 239 – Florida Man Allegedly Groomed a Maiden. FBI Declared That He Rizzed His Last Gyatt.
Leo drowsily woke up after he had lost to Aslan's shadow. He dragged his feet to the bathroom to get the morning shower. Upon stepping his foot into the bathroom, Leo found Esen, gawking at her improved physique.
"Mamma Mia…"
Leo nodded in approval as the busty physique of Esen aligned with his taste. He naughtily slapped her butt and entered the shower room.
"Ow!"
Esen bent her back and pouted. She glared at Leo in embarrassment.
"Hey, geezer! What did you do to me?!"
Leo shrugged and started showering. He gasped when the cold shower hit his face and shook his head, splashing water everywhere in the bathroom. Then, he answered Esen.
"Nothing much. I just injected some "LIFE FORCE" into you. Try to open the system and check your lifespan. You'll be surprised. Oh, by the way, I have given you the authority to freely browse your lifespan or view other people's lifespan status. Try thinking about your remaining lifespan, and the menu will show up."
"…"
Esen had a thousand curses to scream at Leo because of the last night's activity. She wasn't angry about what Leo had done. However, she was dissatisfied that he didn't wake her up to enjoy their romantic time together.
Although Esen was annoyed, she tried opening the lifespan system menu to see her lifespan status. A blue screen appeared and floated in front of her.
.
Name: Esen Sydin IV
Age: 10,007
Remaining Lifespan: 69,420 Years, 11 Months, 29 Days, and 22 Hours
.
"Huh?"
Esen vaguely remembered that she saw this status screen. It used to show her remaining lifespan as null before, but the current status screen finally revealed her remaining time and life force.
