Mu-Nyang exhibited a change in demeanor, closing his eyes in deep meditation, focused on internal digestion. Meanwhile, Lucky, true to his nature as a dog, wagged his tail and panted. His glittering eyes anticipated Leo's affection.
Following his encounter with Hua Taixu's original soul, Leo discerned a unique quality about these statues. They seemed to be clones of an exceptionally skilled expert.
"Whose clone are you, damn statues?" inquired Leo.
Lucky panted, responding earnestly, "Overlord Lucky, woof!"
Mu-Nyang cracked open his eyes slightly, offering cryptic insight. "My essence derives from Overlord Mustafa of the Cathulhu, munya."
Turning to Meowmeow, Leo sought an answer.
The black-winged angel replied promptly, "Overlord Mao Miaomiao, my lord."
"...As expected. And Kitten?"
Speaking on Aslan's behalf, Meowmeow replied, "Overlord Xiaomao."
"So, everyone here is a clone of a super expert. But why claim to be my shadows? How are you connected to me?"
Lucky panted as usual, yet he was the most forthright that day.
"You possess everyone's bloodline, woof!"
"Everybody's bloodline?!"
"You are also a... creation of those super experts, woof."
"…"
Leo paused to ponder. He remained silent for 30 minutes to digest the unexpected information.
What was he?
He knew about the cultivation ranks and Karma River. He was aware of how to use them and how they functioned as a whole. However, nobody had told him about his origins.
Then, Leo recalled a conversation when he secretly chatted with them regarding his origins and his power.
"Wait. That actually makes a lot of sense. You all mentioned the fate crystals before."
"Yes, woof! Initially, you were incomplete. But when your soul assimilated with the entity fate crystal left by your parents, you broke free from bloodline curses, woof! Doctor Mao Miaomiao might have taken your original body, but you're far stronger now, woof!"
Leo had heard similar details from the four guardian statues previously. Initially skeptical, he thought they emerged from the mysterious alien ring. Yet, as he learned more, he realized they might be sentient cancer cells that evolved independently from him.
Lucky intercepted Leo's thoughts.
"We're not precisely your cells, woof. We require your proximity. Otherwise, our power diminishes, and we fade, woof. Our existence is tied to your karmic river, woof!"
Upon Lucky's reminder, Leo noticed invisible strings linking the guardian statues to his dantian universe's karma river. He reached out, touching one.
The string connected Leo with Meowmeow. Upon contact, Leo could perceive Meowmeow's senses and glimpse a fragment of his memories.
The memory wasn't pleasant. It recounted Leo's struggles on Earth as an incomplete mutant facing tribulation lightning bolts. At that time, his cultivation was equivalent to a golden core cultivator about to reach the nascent soul rank in the Yan Dynasty's standards.
Upon reaching the nascent soul level, instead of awakening a nascent soul or dao avatar, Aslan, Meowmeow, Lucky, and Mu-Nyang emerged.
Each absorbed a different facet of Leo's bloodline, residing within him. However, none of them could emerged as the entity fate crystal suppressed their growth and tied them with Leo's soul.
The four resisted against the unknown force at first. But when they realized that their rapid growth rate might harm and destroy Leo's body prematurely, they stopped resisting.
Constant interaction with the crystal granted them knowledge of Leo's bloodline origins. They gradually assimilated the abilities and knowledge of their blood donors.
As Leo grew stronger, so did they. The four guardians copied a portion of the donors' power, reaching their strength but unable to exist independently. They remained a part of Leo, reliant on him.
Meowmeow was the most rebellious. After copying Doctor Mao's skills, he cultivated his dantian universe secretly while Leo was on Earth. He eventually selected three women to become his wives.
Afterward, the four awaited Leo's daily growth. As they had too much free time, they delved into Leo's fate and potential futures. Everyone got a glimpse of his future.
Meowmeow witnessed Leo marrying Esen and the tragedy. He also saw the event when Doctor Mao Miaomiao forcefully expelled Leo's soul before seizing his body.
Sensing he'd gathered enough, Leo paused Meowmeow's memory probe.
"Did any of you foresee my future?" Leo asked.
Mu-Nyang laughed, "Aside from the obvious, you'll adopt two daughters, munya. You know who they are, right, munya?"
"Within my domain?"
"Indeed."
"Who?"
"Young and talented individuals."
"…"
Leo ceased questioning Mu-Nyang. He got enough information, thus he refocused on his main goal.
DING
DING
Leo constructed the Portals to the Cow Level and Agriculture Realm beside the mystic realm's main portal device. The agriculture portal appeared as a barn door frame without an energy layer, akin to a crystal-clear HD monitor. The cow level's portal, a blue oval mana gate, emitted a buzzing hum.
Purposefully adjusting these portals, Leo tailored them to his immediate needs.
.
Portal to Cow Level (Level 17)
Number of Cows (x100) [10/25]
Quality of Cows [5/25]
Respawn Rate [1/25]
Portal Cooldown [1/25]
.
Portal to Agriculture Realm Level 17
Number of Farms (x100) [4/25]
Number of Fish Ponds (x100) [4/25]
Number of Pig Pens (x100) [5/25]
Number of Chicken Barns (x100) [4/25]
.
Leo visited the agricultural world first. Upon entering, his feet were stuck on the firm ground. The intense gravity force of this world made him weigh 50 times heavier.
The gravity of a planet unveiled many things about its qualities. For example, the Yan Dynasty Planet's gravity force was merely five times stronger than Earth's. Even so, the Yan Continent was already expansive and larger than every continent on Earth combined.
"A big world, I see."
Leo shifted his attention to the environment next.
The fresh scent of green grasses and clean air soothed him. The wide grassland, trees, and nature seduced Leo to sit down. He walked 10 steps and sat on a patch of short grasses, which seemed to have been cut recently.
A second later, his expression changed.
"Oh, crap!"
Leo almost jumped back out of the gate as he realized his mistake. He didn't wear a hazmat suit to protect the environment from his radiation contamination.
Despite touching the grasses with his bare hands, the green grasses never changed. Instead, Leo sensed the warm air produced by the grasses and trees. He narrowed his eyes and inspected them.
"Isn't this…"
The warm air was colorless and scentless. The fresh scent of the grasses was the disguise of the anomaly of this world.
The warm air was the purest yang Qi, similar to Leo's Qi and blood. It gave birth to life and it protected nature.
Leo was relieved to see his radiation neutralized by nature. At least, this world couldn't be contaminated if he accidentally touched any plant or tree.
Leo explored deeper into the world. He ascended 10,000 kilometers to the sky to scan the world from above.
He couldn't see any structure or animal. He could only see tall oak trees, flower patches, and endless grassland.
As Leo could see everything from this altitude, he decided to take a world tour. He observed which direction this planet rotated first. After making sure that it spanned anti-clockwise, Leo flew in the opposite direction.
After flying 10,000 kilometers east, Leo finally found what the system had built for him. There was a massive castle in the middle of farms, barns, and pig pens. The strange thing was, that everything was 50 times larger than a human's standard.
For example, the castle's brick walls were 500 meters tall and 150 meters thick. Each brick was three times larger than the pyramid's stone block, but they were much more durable and harder.
This aroused Leo's interest. Since this place had a strong gravity, everything in this world was forced to evolve to survive. He wondered how strong the tree of this world was.
'Can it be stronger than sacred wood?'
Leo wished to cut one of them down and brought it back for research. However, he was determined not to get sidetracked at the moment.
He gazed at the farms and counted them.
.
Several minutes later, Leo understood how this place worked. Every point allocated to an attribute increased the number of structures by 100 instead of one. Thus, 400 50-acre farms, 400 50-acre fish ponds, 500 gigantic pig pens, and 400 chicken barns extended around the castle.
Leo ascended and landed on top of the castle roof. Upon landing, the system informed him of the status of this place.
DING
.
Agriculture Realm (No Name)
Governor: None
Governor Effect: None
Primary Warehouse: Not Assigned
Crop Respawning Time: One Hour
Crop Mature Time: 24 Hours
Fish Respawning Time: One Hour
Fish Mature Time: 24 Hours
Pig Respawning Time: One Hour
Pig Mature Time: 24 Hours
Chicken Respawning Time: One Hour
Chicken Mature Time: 24 Hours
.
Looking at the menu, Leo was intrigued. He thought of the idle guardians and wondered which one he should assign here as a governor.
'I sent Kitten to Orlando because it has a lot of crocs and fish. Should I send him here instead? I don't think Meowmeow is into agriculture stuff. Lucky doesn't fit it. I doubt that the dog is only good at guarding, not managing. He is more of a fighter. As for Mu-Nyang, that guy is as obnoxious as Cat. Since he's an octopus cat, should he be more suitable for a swamp world like Orlando Realm? Alright, I've made up my mind. Kitten will be transferred here. As for that stupid cathulhu, he's gonna go hunt thunder caimans instead.'
Leo backtracked and exited the realm.
When Leo came out, he asked Mu-Nyang to replace Aslan's duty.
"Go and bring Kitten back. You will govern that caiman realm from now on."
Getting assigned a new task, Mu-Nyang was delighted, "Sweet, munya! Caiman buffet, munya!"
"HEY! Your job is to collect food, material, and lifespan from the monsters for me, not eating everything!"
It was too late for Leo to reprimand Mu-Nyang. The octopus cat disappeared into the permanent Orlando portal. An hour later, Aslan returned and sighed when he saw Leo's face.
"A new job?" Asked Aslan.
"Yeah, come with me to the new place. I need you to be this realm's governor and improve the quality of this agriculture world."
Aslan had no issue with that. Still, as Leo's father, he was concerned about the shortage of personnel. He knew that Leo would claim more worlds and realms in this universe, and he would soon lack trustworthy people to fill the governor positions.
"Master, if I may, may I suggest something?"
"Yes?"
"Some of your subordinates, such as Sierra, can be used as a workforce. By chance, if you manage to draw a clone of a talented person from the gacha, you can even send them to work as a governor. Since their existence is tied to you, they will never betray you."
"…I know that."
"Then, could I recommend Sierra to fill this position instead of me? If you upgrade her to a deity, her talents and other abilities will drastically increase. I'm a clone of a fisherman overlord, and I'm only good at fishing karma embryos in Karma River. Sierra's abilities in the agriculture field surpass mine."
"…"
It made sense. Leo totally forgot about the perverted cow woman.
As Leo agreed with Aslan's suggestion, he let the fisherman's clone guard the platform. He summoned Sierra instead.
.
.
An hour later, Sierra arrived on the platform. The first thing she requested Leo was predictable.
"Master, have you finally decided to milk me?"
Leo rolled his eyes, "I'm gonna upgrade you into a deity. Prepare yourself."
"Okay. But will you milk me? Or would you prefer to drink it from the source?"
"…"
Leo thought to himself. He wished to put Sierra alone on a couch surrounded by five nightmare horses in season one day. He bet that the VDO would be a hit and become the next hot meme on the internet.

chapters.title: Chapter 254 Mad Cow Disease Discovered in Florida Man’s Butcher Shop. Store Owner Denied the Allegations and Ate Raw Beef in front of WHO Officials. He Was Later Found Humping a Cow That Day.
chapters.content:
Chapter 254 Mad Cow Disease Discovered in Florida Man’s Butcher Shop. Store Owner Denied the Allegations and Ate Raw Beef in front of WHO Officials. He Was Later Found Humping a Cow That Day.
Chapter 254 – Mad Cow Disease Discovered in Florida Man's Butcher Shop. Store Owner Denied the Allegations and Ate Raw Beef in front of WHO Officials. He Was Later Found Humping a Cow That Day.
Leo appointed Sierra as the new agriculture realm's governor as planned. He also spent a million YOL to upgrade her to the same strength as Hua Taixu. Then, they entered the realm together to finalize the appointment and the new working place.
It had been two hours since the building had been activated. Leo wondered what the respawn feature was.
Upon arriving at the castle, Leo found his answer. All farms were covered in unknown green crops. The fish ponds bubbled and rippled as countless schools of fish danced like a Disney princess underwater. Every fish was as large as an adult tuna!
The farms and the ponds were nothing compared to the pig pens and the chicken barns. Leo and Sierra dropped their jaws, staring at the Jurassic Park.
There were Dinosaurs in the pig pens and chicken barns.
The chicks looked the same as modern chicken babies on a farm. Their yellowish fur and their round heads made them look cute, except for their humongous size of a T-Rex. Because their windpipe was wider than smaller chicks, their chirping voice sounded intimidating.
KEEEEEEEECH
Every time they made a sound, the air trembled and rippled. Sierra frowned and picked her ears in frustration as their noise pricked her eardrums.
"Master, those chickens are not cute." Complained Sierra.
"I know."
Leo glanced at the pig pens. There were even more heinous monsters there.
Instead of regular chubby pigs, the pens were occupied by chonky four-legged pink orcs. They had the same face as piglets, but their staggering height of 100 meters and 300 meters long made Leo question where they came from.
Before Leo decided to make Sierra the governor, he stood on the castle wall and waited for another hour to observe the changes.
DING
It didn't take long for the realm to create more creatures. Leo noticed how this planet condensed yang Qi in the air and manifested embryos of pig babies. As for the chickens and fish, the condensed Qi transformed into eggs.
While the pig embryos floated in the air, they rapidly grew and matured into baby piglets. The newborn creatures softly landed in the pig pens and were automatically grouped in one building. As for the eggs, they gradually hatched. The fish eggs poured tuna-like fish into an empty pond while the chicks marched toward their new barn after birth.
Leo witnessed how the pigs, chickens, and fish were born and grouped. He finally understood how the respawn feature worked.
"So, I'm getting all these livestock for free? Nice!"
The last remaining question was, how big they would grow when they were matured. He decided to remain here for the entire day to witness the changes.
While he was at it, Leo appointed Sierra as the new governor of this realm. He also allowed her to explore this planet to get familiarized with it.
DING
A system screen appeared in front of Sierra. She was taken aback at first, but she quickly understood her assignment. She fiddled with it to learn new things.
A few minutes later, Sierra renamed the realm 'Tauron Farm'. Then, the status of the realm changed according to the governor's strengths and traits.
.
Agriculture Realm (Tauron Farm)
Governor: Sierra Tauron
Governor Effect: Increase the quality of livestock by 50%. Reduce the respawning speed of all livestock by 50%.
Primary Warehouse: B2, Shopping Mall Warehouse
Crop Respawning Time: One Hour
Crop Mature Time: 24 Hours
Fish Respawning Time: 30 Minutes
Fish Mature Time: 24 Hours
Pig Respawning Time: 30 Minutes
Pig Mature Time: 24 Hours
Chicken Respawning Time: 30 Minutes
Chicken Mature Time: 24 Hours
.
Leo could also see the changes, and he nodded in approval. Indeed, her abilities suited this place better than that fisherman statue.
"Now, we wait."
.
.
22 hours later, creatures of the first batch grew up and reached maturity by consuming the yang Qi in the air as if they were plants.
The chicks grew even taller than Godzillas, but their feathers and appearance looked the same as mature chickens. A total of 100 edible kaijus hovered over the clouds and flapped their giant wings.
POKOK!
The system was merciless. As soon as they reached maturity age, all adult male chickens lost all feathers and stopped breathing. They died without realizing what killed them. Afterward, their stomachs were sliced by an invisible knife, while their blood and innards were extracted and separated.
The hens were different. They died as well, however, their stomachs were cut open. Inside every hen's stomach, a golden egg radiated a brilliant light and a transparent aura of pure yang Qi. These eggs were also collected and placed on a grass patch next to the exit portal. As for the chicken meat, they were cleanly cut and arranged in parts.
The pigs and fish suffered the same fate. A hundred megalodon-sized tuna were pulled from the ponds and descaled before the system collected their meat and edible organs. The pigs were cut in half and turned into hung meat in butcher shops.
Meanwhile, the farms produced only wheat for Leo. However, the grains were as tough as steel and as big as an adult human's arm. When the system put a million grains together, they looked like giant pieces of white metal blocks.
Leo stood there, staring at the wheat grains. He rubbed his forehead and pondered, "How should I grind them? Can you even make flour out of these?!"
Sierra noticed Leo's trouble. She advised him. "You can just cook them or boil them directly."
"Oh, eat them the same way as rice?"
"Yes."
Leo nodded. He wondered what they tasted like.
.
.
The business with the agriculture realm was over. When Leo exited the portal, a dozen warehouse and granary workers already stood there, waiting to enter the realm to collect meat and other goodies.
Leo turned around and gazed at the barn portal. He doubted, "Can you even bring those giant meat through here?"
The mannequins ignored Leo's doubt and entered the portal. A few seconds later, one of them came out, pulling a piece of raw chicken drumstick out. The gate enlarged and expanded according to the size of the meat instead of squeezing it.
As the worker had no issue transporting his items, Leo entrusted the tasks to these guys. Still, he had some concerns as the transportation of giant meat was unhealthy. The mannequins carried them on their backs while some parts of the meat touched the ground.
Leo glanced at Aslan. The latter noticed Leo's gaze and understood his intention.
Aslan assured Leo, "I'll make containers for these. Actually, we can even use storage rings. I'll teach the automatons later."
"Please do. My kidneys are cringing. Imagine seeing a chuck of meat being dragged on the ground and finding the same meat on your table."
"I know. Give me some time." Aslan deeply sighed and vanished.
Leo sighed and finally turned his attention to the cow level. He wondered if they had respawned enough cows for him to play with yet.
"BRING IT!"
.
.
Leo entered the portal to the cow level. Upon crossing to the other side, Leo found a world of frozen blood swamps. Opposite of the agriculture world, this place was full of yin Qi. Its absolute freezing temperature threatened to solidify Leo's bodily fluid and his blood while the extreme cold temperature pierced his bone marrow.
"…"
Leo silently exhaled a white fume. He thought of Earth when an ice Godzilla got into heat after seeing Mount Everest. That guy humped the mountain for a whole year until they merge into one mountain and froze everything in 10,000 km diameters. At that time, Leo was in seclusion under a thick layer of snow, causing him to be trapped there for 400 years.
The forgotten PTSD resurfaced. Leo sensed a shiver down his spine as he didn't want to be trapped in a cold place again.
MOOOOOO!!
While Leo was absentminded, the warcry of a cow vibrated the air, followed by loud footsteps and an earthquake. Leo turned around and found an army of 2,000 godzilla-sized humanoid cows wielding halberds approaching him.
"…Wow." Leo was astonished. He couldn't believe that the cow level was real.
The cow monsters raised their halberds and swung at Leo.
…
Ten minutes later, Leo sat on top of 2,000 monster cows' corpses. While resting, he gently sliced a piece of a monster's neck and pulled a meat slice. He then cooked it using the flame generated from his yang Qi.
The makeshift steak was rough, but it was savory and delicious. Their fat seeped into every piece of their meat, making their flesh ideal for steak and grill dishes. Moreover, their meat was as soft and tender as A5 wagyu.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 10 years.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 10 years.>
<Your lifespan has…>
Not only the meat was delicious, but Leo's lifespan kept increasing because of their rich life force. He couldn't stop eating them.
By the time Leo was full, one hour had passed.
MOOOOO!!
A new wave of cow monsters screamed. An army of 10,000 cows charged from the north. At the same time, another army of 10,000 cow monsters launched a coordinated attack on Leo.
Leo silently stored the corpses in his system inventory. He licked his fingers and widely grinned.
"This takes me back. COME ON, FOOD! LET'S EAT EACH OTHER!"
MOOOOOO!!
A cow monster suddenly emerged from the underground and seized Leo. It stood tall and held Leo in his palm.
Leo didn't flinch. He waved his fingers and calmly sliced the human hands of the cow monster. He also unleashed the abilities of Mao Miaomiao and Meowmeow.
Blood Domain!
PLOP
PLOP
Instantly, the blood of these cow monsters left their bodies through their orifices. They gathered and hovered over Leo's head.
Leo collected them in his system inventory and watched the armies of cows collapse. He hummed and walked toward the endless supply of Wagyu steaks.
"Hoh, boy. Those cafeterias and restaurants are gonna get busy. Also…"
Leo picked up one of the giant halberds that the cow monsters had been carrying. Everything seemed to be made of a mysterious red metal, which emanated strong yin Qi.
After holding the halberd for a while, it shrank to fit Leo's hands.
"OH!!"
Leo was pleasantly surprised. He wondered if the other halberds had this function as well.
He wasn't disappointed. Every halberd could shrink or expand to match the users. Leo wondered if he could sell them in his store.
"More merchandise! My store can now run a butcher shop! Right, I should add a meat section in the supermarket now. This is gonna be fun."
Leo laughed and continued exploring the cow level.
.
.
Every hour, the cow level respawned 1,000 monster cows and 1,000 halberds. These guys had the cultivation base of a 17-star deity, and they could use providence domain of power and warcry.
Normally, one of these cows could have stunned any intruder with their loud shout. Their absolute physical power also rivaled that of a sage, which made them a tough foe to fight in close combat. Thus, this realm was too dangerous for others to enter.
Leo made a huge signboard in front of the portal.
[DANGER! 17-Star Deities Inside! DO NOT ENTER!]
Although not many people visited this place or Orlando Planet, some workers used this place as a hangout spot because of the beautiful view and scenery. Some of them used this place to cultivate their mind.
With the signboard, Leo was confident that no stupid person would enter the portal. He turned around and was about to bring the new Wagyu meat to the supermarket.
DING
As soon as Leo was about to leave, the platform's elevator brought a new group of passengers. Among them, Gao Yan and Jin Yong tagged along.
The duo became friends, and they had been using this place as a gathering spot. Sometimes, they even tried to initiate conversations with the guardian statues.
Gao Yan and Jin Yong had already reached the immortal realm after the invasion incident. They also planned to visit the time chamber together tomorrow.
"Oh, master?" Gao Yan was the first to notice Leo. He cupped his fist and saluted. "Greetings, Lord Florida Man!"
Jin Yong copied Gao Yan, "Greetings, sir! It's a nice day, isn't it?"
Leo nodded at them and pointed at the signboard.
"There's new portals to other realms. Don't go into that blue portal, okay? That place is too dangerous for you two. There are deities…"
Leo couldn't even finish his sentences. Jin Yong burst into laughter and pulled a new weapon he salvaged from Overlord Max's battleship.
"Nice! I'm gonna go in there and test my new weapons!"
"HEY!" Leo bellowed and tried to stop the idiot alchemist. However, Jin Yong leaped over the signboard like a parkour master and vanished into the blue portal.
Gao Yan dryly laughed. He also sprinted toward the portal and brought out the full-charged lightsaber and Leo's upgraded pistol.
"Sir, I'll go in there and bring him back shortly. It won't be long!"
"…"
The two youngsters entered the cow level despite Leo's warning. The latter facepalmed.
"Damn idiots."

chapters.title: Chapter 255 Weather Forecast Predicted Heavy Snow in Tampa Florida as the Infamous Drug Cartel ‘Florida Man’ Wrote Academic Books for Children.
chapters.content:
Chapter 255 Weather Forecast Predicted Heavy Snow in Tampa Florida as the Infamous Drug Cartel ‘Florida Man’ Wrote Academic Books for Children.
Chapter 255 – Weather Forecast Predicted Heavy Snow in Tampa Florida as the Infamous Drug Cartel 'Florida Man' Wrote Academic Books for Children.
In the past, Gao Yan and Jin Yong sneaked into Orlando Realm several times for an adventure. However, the local monsters could no longer pose a challenge to them.
They needed something stronger.
This world fit their need. The extremely cold temperature and the overwhelming yin Qi almost killed them as soon as they entered their place. However, instead of taking the hint and leaving, these young men laughed in excitement.
"Is this a proper immortal realm?" Gao Yan inquired.
"Probably something higher. Lord Florida Man's signboard said clearly; Deities are here."
"So, it's a world of deities?"
"I don't know. I just want to kill something stronger than thunder caimans and cockatrices."
"Same."
The two guys took steps further and explored the surroundings.
The sky was crimson red, covered by the red clouds. Below their feet, several layers of ice hid the blood swamps underneath. Corpses of bull-like creatures could be seen inside.
Only 10 seconds had passed since they had arrived in this world. The humanoid cow monsters let out a warcry as they detected an intruder.
MOOOOOOO!!
"!!!"
"!!!"
The deafening voice of the cows stunned both cocky immortals. Their ears bled. Their vision blurred, while the muscles in their legs lost all strength.
"Yeah, figured as much."
Behind the two men, Leo was there. He was in a hazmat suit.
The cow army was quick. While Leo was about to drag these young immortals away, one of them leaped over Leo and landed in front of the exit portal. It turned around and blocked the path. As for the rest of the horde, they stomped toward the three men.
Seeing the lone guard, Leo lightly threw a light punch empty air in front of him.
BOOM
The punch generated an air bullet, which blasted the head of a lone cow monster into pieces. The monster collapsed and stopped moving.
Leo snorted and grabbed the collars of the idiot youngsters. He yeeted them toward the exit portal like a professional basketball player, scoring three points twice.
MOOOOO!!
The cows were angry as their prey managed to escape. They launched their attacks at Leo.
Leo grumbled in a bad mood.
"You livestock should know your place."
Just by glaring at them, Leo unleashed an aura surpassing a karmic sovereign. The cow monsters froze on their track and collapsed one after another.
After confirming that all cows were dead, Leo withdrew his glare. He silently turned around and exited the cow level.
.
Coming outside, Leo inspected Gao Yan and Jin Yong's conditions.
Their souls had a short crack extending from their ears. Although the cracks were small, this injury might take several years to heal as no medicine could heal one's soul. In addition, Jin Yong's dantian was damaged, while Gao Yan's meridians almost shattered.
They found out.
"Yup. This is the definition of FAFO. Y'all gonna get stuck for a few years healing your wounds. I told you that realm was too dangerous."
Although Leo scolded them, Gao Yan and Jin Yong couldn't hear him. Their eardrums were busted. He carried both men down the flying island and put them in his bus, locking them in there until they were healed.
"Hah."
After dropping the two men on his bus, Leo visited the shopping mall warehouse to unload the cow's meat and corpses.
A thousand cow monsters were big enough to fill the entire underground warehouse. Thus, Leo only unloaded 500 dead cows.
Leo returned to the first floor. Along the way, mannequins from the restaurants rushed toward the underground warehouse, where Leo had dropped the dead cows. It seemed the food department would be busy for a while.
Getting out of the shopping mall, Leo opened his system to check the last item he got from phase 3's quest.
[Selectable SR Building]
It was different than the others. Leo could pick one from the list.
Leo activated the item.
DING
A long catalog displaying a hundred icons flashed on the system screen. Leo skimmed through the list.
.
Train Station
Cellphone Factory
Theme Park
Zoo
.
The list went on. However, Leo already made up his mind when he saw a certain building.
.
.
A day later, Filip and Andria wandered Leo's shopping mall to explore the stores and services. They found the time chamber that Andria had mentioned.
"Is this the one?" Filip pointed at the time chamber.
Andria nodded, "Yes. You can enter it if you find the sword saint. I don't know where he is now, though."
"It's fine. I don't think we have to wait long."
As Filip spoke, a new batch of trainees exited the time chamber along with Hua Taixu. The disciples were female teenagers of the Amazonian Sanctuary. However, their cultivation base boasted the quasi-immortal stage, while their sword mastery improved by leaps and bounds. They no longer needed to rely solely on their pets anymore.
Hua Taixu was elated as four new students inherited his way of swords. He shifted his attention to the other group next.
Then, his eyes met with Filip's.
"YOU, STRONG! ME, STRONGER! Me, Train, You. YOU, STRONKER!"
Filip was taken aback. He looked at Andria in confusion, "Is he always like this?"
Andria smirked, "You will appreciate him when you are in there, commander. Now, follow him and seize this opportunity."
"…I don't know about this."
While Filip hesitated, Hua Taixu threw ropes at the former and three other troopers. The sword saint's clone dragged everybody into the time chamber and burst into laughter.
Andria sent them off and waved her hand at them. After everybody disappeared into the time chamber, she shifted her attention to the other facilities.
The casino didn't interest her. The boot camp reminded her of the PTSD training regime she had been through before she could become a crewmate.
But there was a new facility, which appeared recently. It was located far to the south of the shopping mall's fourth floor.
The facility took two slots in the shopping mall. Half of it was a bookstore. As for the other half, it was a library, but it was only accessible to staff members.
Andria pouted as she wished she could enter the library to read free books. As she had no choice, she browsed through the bookstore. As an expert in this field, she skimmed through the sections of the bookshelves first.
- Cultivation Methods
- Sword Techniques
- Spear Techniques
- Pole Arm Techniques
- Archery
- Firearms
- Finger Techniques
- Fist Techniques
- Palm Techniques
- Elemental and Daos
"Huh?"
Andria frowned and rubbed her eyes for a moment. Making sure that she wasn't hallucinating, she approached the cultivation method section and checked the books. As most books weren't covered in plastic seals or wraps, she picked up a sample book and flipped it.
The book was 500 pages thick. The quality of the papers was also durable, and she felt nice when she flipped the papers. The pictures were in color and highly detailed.
"What?!"
The book contained a detailed cultivation method from the muscle tempering stage to the quasi-immortal stage. It also provided tips and tricks that every commoner could learn and understand.
Andria flipped around the book and read the cover.
[Easy Cultivation Methods for Dummies]
"…"
Andria almost vomited blood. In her world, every commoner could kill to get their hands on such a cultivation method. As for her, she managed to learn a cultivation method from the military in exchange for 1,000 years of service.
Had she gotten this before she joined the army, she wouldn't have had to get stuck in a spaceship for years.
Andria put away the book and picked up another one nearby.
[Foundation Building – I Wish I Knew Before I Cultivate]
It was a theory book, but the information seemed useful. It gave examples of the Dos and Don'ts, which cultivation beginners often overlooked in their early days.
Andria stood there and read half of the book. She kept shaking her head and sometimes smacked her face in anger.
"I WISH I KNEW ALL OF THESE!! WHY CAN'T I FIND ONE OF THESE IN MY WORLD?!"
Andria carried the foundation building book in her arm and checked more books.
[Life Force Gathering Method]
[Pill Alchemy for Beginners]
[How to Sleep as a Cultivator]
[Overcoming Heavenly Tribulations like a Pro]
By the time Andria realized, she already had a dozen books in her arms. She carried them to the counter, where a lone wooden mannequin stood behind.
Andria panted and asked, "How much are these? I want to buy them all."
The mannequin picked the books and nimbly scanned the barcodes on the back of each book. When she was done, she showed the number and pointed at a signboard.
[This store only accepts lifespan (years) as a currency.]
The mannequin pointed at the cashier machine on the counter and showed Andria the number.
495 YOL
They were expensive!
Andria's hands trembled as she didn't want to lose more lifespan. Her inner thoughts told her to return the books and read for free here. However, the other thoughts reminded her that she could share the books with others, which would be more worthwhile.
After measuring the pros and cons, Andria made her decision to buy the books.
"I'll pay. I'll take these books."
The cashier nodded and pressed a button on the machine. As soon as she pressed it, Andria sensed a portion of her life force leaving her and entering the mannequin's body.
Andria accepted the loss and took the books with her. It was worth the investment. Also, she suddenly gained an inspiration.
'Right. I should go back to the ship and tell the others to buy other books. Then, we can share the knowledge among ourselves.'
While Filip was busy in the time chamber, Andria rushed to the spaceship to tell her female friends about the bookstore.
.
Andria wasn't the only one who noticed the new bookstore on the fourth floor. The frequent visitors, such as Hua Jiashan, Tang Xuan, and other old men found them and had the same reaction as Andria's.
"WOW! YOU CAN DO THAT?!"
"DAMMIT! I WISH I KNEW ALL OF THESE!! I'M STUPID!"
The old men screamed in pain while they read the books on the shelves. 10 minutes later, they swallowed their pride and brought the books to the counter.
Hua Jiashan was decisive. He was the first to ask how Leo got his hands on them.
"Shopkeeper, could you tell me where your master is? I wish to know about the origins of these books."
The mannequin calmly pointed inside the library. She then pointed at a signboard, which was hand-written by Leo.
[All books are written by ME! Don't question how I got these from. I won't answer you.]
"…"
The crowd was speechless. Even Wu Buyi who came here with them dropped his jaw.
"M-My lord is so smart!"
Hua Jiashan rolled his eyes, "Obviously, he's a supreme expert. Who knows what his real cultivation base is. He must have learned everything firsthand to be able to write so many books."
Dongfang Mei ignored the crowd. She flipped through the intermediate section, where all books were related to immortals and techniques suitable for immortal stages. She wasn't disappointed.
'This will be useful. I'll take this, this, that, and those.'
Dongfang Mei ended up purchasing 10 books, which cost her 900 YOL. However, for her, it was worth every penny.
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo sat in the library, yawning and picking his nose. He currently took a short break after he had defeated random cultivators in the simulation mode 10,000 times.
DING
<Detecting new knowledge. Would you like to transfer your knowledge into books?>
"Yes."
DING
Two books manifested and floated in front of Leo. He retrieved them and tossed the books toward a librarian behind the counter.
"Copy those as usual."
The librarian mannequin caught the books. She gently put them on the table and placed her hands on them.
DING
DING
The books gradually multiplied. While she did that, Leo received system notification messages.
<You have spent 100 years of your lifespan creating 100 copies of 'Lamia's Anatomy, Weakness, and Strength'>
<You have spent 100 years of lifespan creating 100 copies of 'Am'Sia Family Blacksmith Techniques'>
The newly copied books filled the bookshelves of the library first. After the librarian had finished registering the books, she transferred 10 of each to the bookstore and put them on sale.
The source of these books came from the system skills that Leo had copied from the simulation mode. Some of the tips and tricks also originated from Leo's understanding.
.
Book Complex of Singularity Level 17
Librarian Automaton (2/20)
Library Size (5/20)
Bookstore Automaton (2/20)
Bookstore Size (5/20)
Book Printing Speed (3/20)

chapters.title: Chapter 256 Florida Man Invented Mosquito Worm Wines as New Local Merchandise. TikTokers Rushed to Drink It as Mosquito Worm Consumption Became New Trending.
chapters.content:
Chapter 256 Florida Man Invented Mosquito Worm Wines as New Local Merchandise. TikTokers Rushed to Drink It as Mosquito Worm Consumption Became New Trending.
Chapter 256 – Florida Man Invented Mosquito Worm Wines as New Local Merchandise. TikTokers Rushed to Drink It as Mosquito Worm Consumption Became New Trending.
While Leo rested in the library, several mannequins brought a few bottles of wine over.
"Hmm?"
Leo glanced at the group of mannequins with wine bottles. He frowned as he didn't remember asking them to make wines.
"Which department are you from? Now, I have too many mannequins that I don't know where you are working anymore."
The mannequins pulled out a brush and ink from their pockets. They wrote a few words and showed them to Leo.
The handwriting was similar to Leo's as the mannequins were a part of his shadows. The message was simple.
[Please accelerate the time of the wine.]
"Oh."
Leo figured out what they wanted. However, he disliked their approach. Instead of accelerating the wine age of these few bottles of wine, he would rather do it with 10,000 at once.
The mannequins picked up Leo's thoughts and rushed back to their stores. Leo got curious and followed them to the first floor.
It turned out that the group of mannequins were the chefs from the restaurant department. They mixed the cow monster's blood, the giant chicken's blood, and the giant pig's blood together and made a new blood wine.
Leo was confused about how they made those as mixing too many types of blood was a quick method to get AIDS. He wondered if the mannequins tried to honor a certain soldier who consummated with a monkey and brought this disease to the world.
For the sake of hygiene, Leo grabbed two of the wine bottles and brought them to an alchemy workshop. He researched it.
DING
<You have discovered Fresh Yin-Yang Blood Wine.>
.
Raw Yin-Yang Blood Wine
This wine is brewed by an anonymous master chef by mixing a cow deity, a yang pig, and a yang chicken blood together. The cow deity's extreme yin and yang energy from the pig and chicken created harmony, killing pathogens, bacteria, and parasites in the liquid. The mixed blood has been diluted with contaminated water from the Florida Canyon River and undergoes a fermentation and mutation process.
Unfortunately, every good wine takes time to brew. This wine is only less than a day old. Thus, it cannot have any effect on the consumer.
Cannot be used in alchemy.
.
Leo let out a sigh of relief as the wine seemed harmless to cultivators and commoners. As long as the pathogens, viruses, and bacteria in the blood are killed, everybody shouldn't be infected with AIDS, EBOLA, or COVID-19 this way.
Still, Leo wasn't satisfied with just one result. He activated a time and space domain on the remaining wine bottle, accelerating the time of the wine by 100 years.
This was one of many applications of the space and time domain. The user could rewind, slow, accelerate, or stop the time flow within the domain. He could also teleport anywhere within the range as the power distorted space and dimension.
The red wine in the bottle turned black. Leo shook the bottle a little to check the quality.
"Huh?"
There was a little worm in the liquid. It looked like a hatchling mosquito in a water bowl.
"DISGUSTING!"
Leo smacked his lips in disgust. He believed that the wine had gone bad. Still, he tossed the entire bottle of content into an alchemy cauldron to research it.
The result was shocking.
.
100-Year-Old Yin-Yang Blood Wine of Time and Space
This wine has been brewed by Florida Man. It contains a tinge of his time and space dao and a mutated mosquito from the Florida Canyon River. Anyone who consumes this wine and eats the mosquito, their bone marrow and meridians will transform and evolve.
In addition, it has a strong flavor. It is the best liquor to go with a cow monster steak.
Effects:
- Evolve the consumer's bone marrows and meridians.
- Increase the consumer's lifespan by 10 years.
- Increase the consumer's yin and yang Qi by 1,000 years' worth of cultivation.
- May intoxicate the consumer with low alcohol tolerance.
Cannot be used in alchemy.
.
Leo salivated. Unlike earlier, he wanted to drink the wine. However, he had already sacrificed the entire content for this research.
For the sake of a good drink, Leo rushed back to the restaurant's warehouse in the kitchen. He found the chef mannequin and ordered him.
"Gather all wines in your store. Go tell the other store's cooks to bring all their wines to the B3 floor. Remember this, whenever you brew fresh wine like this again, store them on the B3 floor. I'll check that place daily and accelerate the wine age for you lots, okay?"
The mannequin repeatedly nodded. The hive-mind automaton twitched as he shared the information with his thoughts. A minute later, every mannequin from the restaurants marched out of their stores with hundreds of wine boxes in tow.
Their march attracted the attention of the visitors on the first floor. They wondered if Leo was doing something weird again. However, most of them ignored him and moved on to the fourth floor.
30 minutes later, the same mannequins marched back to their shops and added the aged wine to their warehouses. They also listed the new liquor as their local specialty, which was shared in all stores. Some of them were also transferred to the supermarket to seduce drinkers.
The brief preparation of the restaurants was completed. A new trend in the Florida Domain slowly changed.
.
While Leo was busy with the restaurant's matters, the new bookstore became a new trend in the shopping mall. Young men and women gathered to purchase cultivation books and theory books.
Commoners also flocked to the store. As they had a limited lifespan, they came up with a brilliant idea – They formed a group of hundred people who desired the same book to share. When they got the book, they made copies for everybody while their leader kept the original.
Several cultivators also used the same method to get expensive cultivation manuals. Some youngsters with brilliant minds shocked others by investing in a cheap book and copying them to sell the copy version for essence stones.
Leo didn't mind the cultivator world's pirate bay. After all, the copy versions might skip some details. Some of the photos and images also couldn't be mimicked by any artists here. Thus, martial arts practitioners still required a clear photo to understand the manuals. Even better, the pirates ended up promoting his bookstore and the overall strength of everybody in this world.
In addition, the restaurants obtained a new source of food from Leo and the agriculture realm. With more beef, chicken, and pork in stock, the cook mannequins came up with several modern dishes and featured in their stores.
The pleasant scent of the food drew commoners and cultivators over, though some were reluctant due to the expensive price tags. The poor only observed and salivated in front of the restaurants while rich cultivators, such as Tang Tian, swagged into one of the stores and ordered the best meal.
Tang Tian entered a steak house. He made an order to the waiter mannequin.
"Give me the most expensive one! Oh, I want the best wine, too!"
The local workers didn't disappoint Tang Tian. 15 minutes later, he came back with plates of a medium-rare steak and side dishes. He also poured Tang Tian the new wine.
Tang Tian got used to the modern wine glass of these stores. He loved drinking alcohol from wine glasses as it tasted better than drinking from a porcelain cup.
But when the waiter poured black wine which contained a wiggling mosquito hatchling into the cup, Tang Tian was enraged.
"Hey! What happened to your wine?! Are you trying to raise some insects here? I don't drink this crap. Get a new bottle!"
The mannequin didn't flinch. He wrote a note and showed it to Tang Tian.
[The hatchling in the wine is the main attraction of the wine. You won't be disappointed if you eat it. Please be warned. The mosquito is a mutated insect from the Florida Canyon River. It carries a fragment of Lord Florida Man's aura.]
"WHAT?!"
Tang Tian almost dropped his wine glass. He rubbed his eyes and stared at the swimming insect again.
Eating a mosquito was a repulsive thing to do even for a local cultivator. Tang Tian had goosebumps by thinking about chewing the live worm.
"DAMMIT!" Tang Tian smacked his lips and glared at the waiter. "If you lie, I'll turn you into firewood!"
The mannequin nodded with confidence. He waited for Tang Tian to drink it by radiating his red eyes.
Tang Tian held his breath and gulped the wine content in the glass in one gulp. The worm entered his stomach and touched the digestive fluid. Then, the creature emitted intense yin and yang Qi and struggled to survive.
Instantly, Tang Tian's eyes snapped open and reddened. Although he missed the savory of the blood wine, he didn't miss the extreme pressure that came from the living worm.
The dying worm released every bit of yin-yang Qi it had before it died. Tang Tian's digestive fluid dissolved the mutated worm and transferred the hidden essence of energy to his dantian.
As if a dam transferred half of the water to a farmer's reservoir, Tang Tian's dantian almost burst. He gasped for air while he released the excess energy out of his body to stay alive.
"AAAAAAAAHHHHHH!!"
The scream of Tang Tian erupted and interrupted the tranquil silence in the shopping mall. Everybody nearby sprinted toward the restaurant to see the commotion.
Tang Tian collapsed and squirmed on the ground. He hyperventilated and sweated profusely as if he had just survived an ordeal.
PLOP
PLOP
Several blocked meridians that Tang Tian had given up working on suddenly opened by themselves. Gushes of Qi flowed through the channels while his bone marrows produced thicker and healthier blood cells.
Tang Tian crawled on the ground and salivated like a rabid dog. He gradually rose up on two feet, dragging his exhausted body back to his seat. He was in a daze for 10 minutes.
When Tang Tian regained his senses, he stared at the remaining wine in the bottle.
There were three more mosquito worms in there.
Tang Tian widened his eyes and stared at the waiter in disbelief. "Waiter, will I die if I keep drinking this?!"
The waiter wrote him a response.
[The wine goes along well with the steak. Try drinking it together while you eat the steak.]
"…"
Tang Tian shifted his attention to the steak. Although 10 minutes had passed, it was still warm.
"Alright. Fine. I'll try it."
Tang Tian grabbed chopsticks and a fork. As he had never eaten a proper steak, he didn't know how to eat it.
After struggling for a while, Tang Tian learned how to use a fork and a knife. He cut the steak into a small piece and ate it, using chopsticks.
Tang Tian paused. His mind wandered through space, and he saw countless big bangs and supernova explosions.
It was delicious! The taste was otherworldly to the point that Tang Tian questioned why he had been eating only grain pills all these years when such good food existed.
Minutes later, Tang Tian stopped having a foodgasm. He slowly cut a piece of steak and ate it again.
The same reaction occurred. Tang Tian's mind entered a space program.
The spectators who had come to see a commotion found Tang Tian funny. They laughed and pointed at his face as the elder acted like an autistic commoner.
One of the crowd was curious why the current patriarch of the Tang Clan behaved that way. He ordered the waiter to get the same steak and wine.
15 minutes later, the curious cultivator got the same set of food and wine. He also questioned the waiter about the mosquito worm in the wine bottle and got the same answer. And when he ate the steak, he had the same reaction as Tang Tian's.
The Florida Domain's mad cow disease made its first appearance.
Meanwhile, Dongfang Mei and Hua Jiashan came to see the commotion while they were still carrying books from the bookstore. They had planned to come here to read books while waiting for the food.
Seeing their mentor and senior in such as state, the husband and wife were puzzled.
"Is he infected by Wu Buyi?" Hua Jiashan laughed.
Dongfang Mei shook her head. "Master Tang has always been stupid when nobody is around. He must be acting to get our attention or some sort. He's such as spoiled master."
"Let's go tease him."
"Yeah. That stupid master. He deserves some bullying."
The couple sneaked behind Tang Tian and planned to steal the latter's food. But as the two got closer, Tang Tian suddenly turned around and hugged his wine bottle and the plate of steak.
"THIS IS MINE! GET LOST, YOU DUMB DISCIPLES!!"
With a shout, Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei were sent flying outside the restaurant. The aura of Tang Tian belonged to a heaven celestial cultivator, aka the fourth stage immortal.
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei safely landed on the plaza in front of the four-armed guardian statue. They got on their feet and gazed at Tang Tian in astonishment.
"HUH?!"
"WHAT?!"
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei had already entered the time chamber once, but they only reached the first stage immortal. They thought they managed to catch up to their mentor, but they were wrong.
"What have he been eating?" Hua Jiashan inquired.
Dongfang Mei glanced at the restaurant. She pointed at it. "Probably something he's protecting. Let's try that."
"…Okay. We need a place to rest and read our books anyway."
The duo entered the restaurant as customers. Tang Tian glared and barked at them, uncaring about his reputation and image.
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei laughed at Tang Tian again. But 15 minutes later, the husband and wife could no longer bully their mentor – They fell into the same state. They also weren't aware that their cultivation base sharply rose.

chapters.title: Chapter 257 Florida Man Cosplaying as Game of Thrones’s Character Blocked the Road and Kept Shouting “Winter is Coming”. Investigation Found He Busted 90 Times Last Month Causing His Kidneys to Fail.
chapters.content:
Chapter 257 Florida Man Cosplaying as Game of Thrones’s Character Blocked the Road and Kept Shouting “Winter is Coming”. Investigation Found He Busted 90 Times Last Month Causing His Kidneys to Fail.
Chapter 257 – Florida Man Cosplaying as Game of Thrones's Character Blocked the Road and Kept Shouting "Winter is Coming". Investigation Found He Busted 90 Times Last Month Causing His Kidneys to Fail.
The next day, Filip and his friends finally came out from the hell hole where Hua Taixu was the demon king.
Their cultivation base broke through the bottleneck and reached the deity realm. Everybody learned how they could build stars in their dantian, and they already made several. Their sword mastery also improved. Although they were unhappy with the training regime, they were proud of themselves.
"Thank you very much, senior Hua!" Filip bowed to Hua Taixu before he left.
"Come again. You. Stronger!"
"…Yes."
Filip dragged his sorry shape to the tavern of heroes to rest. Along the way, they met another member of the ship.
"Huh?"
Something was wrong there. As only five of them could enter this place, another crewmate other than Andria shouldn't be able to enter.
Filip asked the crewmate, "Lieutenant! What are you doing here? Where is Major Andromeda?"
The lieutenant saluted and replied, "Major Andromeda Andria has returned to the ship and commanded me to purchase some books, sir!"
"…Books? Why do you want those ancient outdated information sources?"
"Sir, none of the books in the bookstore is nonsense. Every book is either a precious cultivation manual or a way of dao. It's highly detailed to the point that Major Andria has already awakened two new dao avatars."
Filip squinted his brows. Because of his curiosity, he forgot about the mental and physical exhaustion, "Where is that bookstore?"
"This way, sir."
The soldier guided Filip to the bookstore. When they arrived, they found a long queue of cultivators and commoners who had been waiting to enter the store.
Seeing the line and how busy the store was, Filip and the crew got interested.
"Is the bookstore that good?" Filip inquired.
"Yes, sir. Any book of the store is a precious manual."
"But am I seeing things correctly? The price tag is… 100 years of lifespan!?"
"It's worth the investment, sir. Oh, did you know that you can get your lifespan back if you eat food on the first floor?"
"WHAT?!"
"The cafeterias and the restaurants there are running a promotion, sir. Their blood wine and beef steak are superb! If you manage to finish the meal, you will get about 50-100 years of lifespan back at the price of 200 essence stones!"
"…"
Filip disagreed with the soldier because 200 essence stones were a lot for their living standard. As they had been relying on essence stones and soul stones to generate energy and Qi for them to cultivate or navigate their ship, the resources were invaluable. Spending them on food for personal interest was wasteful.
Still, Filip couldn't stop his men from spending their hard-earned money. He too also possessed a stash of essence stones for his retirement. As his subordinate bought books from the store, he might as well get one so that the soldier would not feel left out. He went to the back of the queue and waited for his turn to enter the store.
The store was full of customers. The interior alone was large enough to accommodate at least 1,000 customers at once. However, only two bookstore clerks were present. Thus, they only allowed 100 customers to access the store at a time.
30 minutes later, it was Filip's turn to enter. He strode with a long stride and beelined toward a cultivation manual section.
The cultivation manual section had four minor categories; Beginner, Intermediate, Advance, and Expert.
The beginner section featured simplified cultivation manuals, which made it easy for commoners and young cultivators to grasp the basics. The intermediate section shelves contained full cultivation methods with Leo's annotations. Similar to the beginner ones, Leo's extra comments in the books allowed readers to comprehend the techniques more easily.
The advance and expert categories, however, were dedicated to hardcore cultivators. Leo didn't comment on anything while the cultivation methods were complicated and complex for regular cultivators to understand. Practitioners were expected to spend at least years to fully master the methods.
The only difference between the advance section and the expert section was the quality of the cultivation method. A commoner could pick up an advanced book and cultivate all the way to the deity realm. On the other hand, no beginner could touch the expert section due to the pre-requirement of a deity realm; a practitioner needed a basic understanding of dantian stars, which only deities, sages, or stronger cultivators had.
As a deity, Filip checked the expert's zone first. He randomly picked the thickest book and scanned the table of contents.
At first, Filip snorted at the long list of topics. But as he kept on reading the table of contents, he realized the true value of the book in his hands.
The book was a precious cultivation method of an entity, whose cultivation base was two major realms higher than the deity realm. By practicing this method, Filip could potentially reach the entity realm and join the overlord ranks!
In astonishment and shock, Filip flipped the book to check the price tag.
100 YOL
As the lieutenant had said, it only cost 100 years of lifespan!
Such an investment was worth it!
Filip drooled and closed the book. He was about to bring it to the checkout cashier. As he took a step forward, the corner of his eyes saw a portrait of a black-winged angel on a book cover of the expert section's shelves.
"!?!"
Filip's feet stopped. He turned around and grabbed the book with a thick book cover.
"Overlord Mao Miaomiao!?"
Filip recognized the face of the man on the cover. The devil was an infamous villain that every textbook described as the traitor who sold mankind to the divine elves and destroyed Earth's ecosystem.
He hated this traitor with a passion even though he wasn't there when the calamity struck. Driven by his hatred, Filip picked the book and skimmed through it to mock the content.
One minute later…
Five minutes later…
Ten minutes later…
An hour later…
Three hours later, Filip stood there reading the book in earnest. He couldn't put it down as the book contained both the cultivation method and the dao of soul transfer, which enabled souls to change bodies.
The dao was the loophole in the karma river's system. As long as the body target was not naturally born, anybody could transfer their soul and steal the body. However, they would lose all cultivation base and progress from the discarded body.
Filip thought of a forbidden project in the past. In the textbooks that he had read, there were incidents about scientists experimenting with human creation. Most of them ended up in failure. Only Overlord Mao Miaomiao and Doctor Void Singe succeeded.
In Mao Miaomiao's case, he transferred his soul to one of the test subjects and became the first man who gain immortality through soul transfer. As for Doctor Void Singe, he completed the research 20,000 years after the first incident and published the information to the government.
Unfortunately, Overlord Xiaomao detected their movements and warned them not to improve their techniques due to the looming threat of the divine elves. The government officials cowered in fear and shut down the projects. All related documents were burnt and destroyed. Only the history books recorded the implications and events that led to the project's termination.
Filip acquiring the lost research was a double-edged sword. He was at a loss for what he should do.
'Publish it? Destroy it? Keep it to myself? What should I do?!'
Filip scanned the bookshelves and found multiple books on the same cover. He gulped and made an excuse in his mind.
'Yeah, there are too many books. None of them should notice that I have one right now. If anything happens, it's the bookstore's fault for releasing the techniques to the public!'
Filip made up his mind. He grabbed the book and walked to the checkout counter. He put two books down.
The cashier mindlessly scanned the barcodes with the scanner. She then pointed at the number on the cashier machine.
200 YOL
Filip paid the price in full. He put the books in his spatial ring and was about to head out. While he was leaving, a group of beautiful elves and molgs passed by. None of them even paid him a glance as they were busy.
The group of women cut the lines and entered the bookstore. However, nobody bothered to warn them as if they knew who they were.
Filip turned around and gazed at the women. He wondered who they were.
But as he looked at the blond elf's face, his face lost all color. The face of the elf looked similar to a common photo that every human was taught to be wary of – The Queen of Divine Elf, Eleanor.
Running for his life, Filip vanished and reappeared on the first floor. He kicked the ground and tried to leave the store. He didn't notice the four-armed statue behind him.
Qiang Qiang, aka the captive mutant, had lost all her memory. She served Leo and Meowmeow as a guardian statue of the shopping mall, and her job was to maintain order.
When Qiang Qiang noticed a strong guest running away from the shopping mall, she pursued him. Using her four arms, she embraced him and pulled him back to the center fountain.
Filip struggled to break free. Unfortunately, Qiang Qiang's current cultivation base was the same as Meowmeow – The Entity Realm.
A newborn deity was not an opponent of an entity. Filip got stuck in her arms and wailed in fear.
"Please spare me!"
Qiang Qiang didn't answer. She left him there until someone found him.
.
Leo entered the shopping mall 6 hours later. He found Filip getting a bear hug from the giant four-armed statue. He laughed.
"I didn't know that my dearest guest has a stone fetish. Would you like me to make you some sexy stone golems to take back home?"
Filip retorted, "INSTEAD OF TOYING WITH ME, CAN YOU FREE ME HERE?!"
.
.
Meanwhile, Esen, Ivy, and Beatrice were the ones who had visited the bookstore and met Filip. As none of them knew the guy, they ignored him like the others.
Esen rushed to a romance novel section and picked several books. Ivy took theory books and science manuals while Beatrice picked a sword technique scroll. Everybody had their own preference. However, Esen felt like their lives were too smooth lately.
She thought about her old playmates. She wondered where Cat and Yao Qiqi had gone as the duo rarely appeared in the domain.
Esen thought to herself.
'I understand that Cat sometimes hunts for food herself. But I don't understand Yao Qiqi. What has she been doing lately? I don't see her around anywhere.'
.
.
The girl in question was indeed in hiding. Yao Qiqi had recently received three cut golden retriever puppies, and she had brought them to the Magpie City.
The three werewolf puppies followed Yao Qiqi around like she was their mother. On the other hand, Yao Qiqi's aura and demeanor resembled adults.
Yao Qiqi visited a black market. She exchanged some essence stones for spirit stones. Then, she fed the puppies with the lowest-grade stones.
The puppies ate everything as if they were dog food. They licked their lips and begged Yao Qiqi to give them more.
Yao Qiqi ignored their pleas as she understood what they actually thought. She yelled at them.
"If you think you can fool me with those eyes, you're wrong! Behave yourself, doggies!"
"Woof!"
After feeding the dogs, Yao Qiqi marched home with the dogs following her as usual. Along the way, a merchant group offered her and her dogs a ride, which she accepted.
While sitting in a carriage, Yao Qiqi heard a rumor.
"Did you know? The winter this year comes very early. I heard the Cauliflower is already covered in snow!"
"Meh, you're crazy. I never snowed in Cauliflower City. Check your rumor's source!"
"But I'm telling you! The winter is coming! Can't you sense the cold wind from the north?!"
Yao Qiqi was interested in the topic since the weather affected the upcoming wedding ceremony between Esen and Leo. She wondered if they would continue to proceed with the ceremony.
'I should finish preparing a gift for Lord Florida Man soon. Should I bring my pets to explore the world first?'

chapters.title: Chapter 258 Local Florida Men Saved Tourist Man from Ferocious Cannibal Disguising as Middle-Schooler. Cops Arrested the Tourist Later for Attempting to Groom Minor.
chapters.content:
Chapter 258 Local Florida Men Saved Tourist Man from Ferocious Cannibal Disguising as Middle-Schooler. Cops Arrested the Tourist Later for Attempting to Groom Minor.
Chapter 258 – Local Florida Men Saved Tourist Man from Ferocious Cannibal Disguising as Middle-Schooler. Cops Arrested the Tourist Later for Attempting to Groom Minor.
Agriculture Realm
Worker mannequins from various warehouses and free workers created by Leo's gacha entered and left the realm, transporting goods to their respective headquarters. Everybody walked in a single line like working ants while enduring the intense gravity of this planet.
It had been days since this realm's creation. Sierra, the current governor of this land, spent all day plowing and expanding more farmland. She had been working nonstop.
Sierra might be a clone of a real Tauron Princess. However, she also shared a hive-mind with other mannequins of Leo's store. She quickly learned the general situation of the restaurants and understood what the facilities were in urgent need.
Even though the system farms generated countless giant wheat, it would only sit in a granary or a spatial ring due to the low consumption rate. In addition, wheat wasn't enough. They needed a more variety of crops, vegetables, fruits, salt, sugar, and other spices.
While plowing an empty grassland, Sierra took off her dress and squeezed some of her milk on the ground. She injected her Qi into the liquid in the soil and activated her dao.
Sugar cane sprouts budded and emerged from the ground. Although its growth rate was far inferior to the system's crops, it gradually extended.
"…"
Sierra frowned and gazed at her rough and blistered palms. She hated the touch of her hands.
"I wish Lord could milk me…"
The complaints didn't enter Leo's ears but the working mannequins' non-existing ears. The female mannequins flinched while the male mannequins almost collapsed to the ground. Some of them gave Sierra a weird look.
Fortunately, the mannequins possess no sexual desire. They simply thought of Sierra as a weirdo among the consciousnesses in the hive mind.
Noticing the gazes from the crowd, Sierra snorted. "What? You've got a problem?"
Everybody looked away and resumed working. A few male mannequins secretly looked at their wooden hands and simulated a squeezing motion. Because of the lewd movements, they got bonked by other female mannequins.
The peaceful days in the realm continued until changes occurred outside.
.
.
"Have you heard about the new steaks?"
"Yeah. You have to be stupid to not pay attention to those restaurants!"
"Yup. The steaks are not only delicious, but it's also good for cultivation!"
"Don't forget. It's impurity-free! You know my fatty niece, right? She has no talent in cultivation at all, but her father spent a fortune to buy her the steak. Do you know what happened? She has become a beauty, and she's now a soul formation cultivator!"
"Only soul formation cultivator? Man, your niece is a wastrel! I also ate one. Look at my cultivation base! It was Golden Core before. But now, I'm a quasi-immortal! Situ Nantian? Yan Xiang? I'm a super expert now!"
"You arrogant little shit! Super expert? Have you seen the people of Tang Clan and the Life Sword Sect? More immortals are being born every day in those restaurants!"
After Leo had added monster cow beef to the food ingredient, the restaurants became another main attraction of Leo's shopping mall. Commoners, newbie cultivators, and seasoned veterans gathered in front of the diners, admiring the menus. However, not everybody could afford the precious meat.
Every restaurant required their customers to pay with either essence stones or lifespan. Only rich merchants and established cultivators could enjoy the privilege.
Still, there were multiple ways to acquire essence stones. Working for Leo was one of the options. As a result, commoners who had just emerged as newbie cultivators flocked to Leo's shopping mall to apply for a job.
Unfortunately, Leo wasn't always around. His daily routine kept changing according to the shopping mall's needs. At the moment, he usually stayed in the library, visited the cow level, or helped the mannequins transporting goods from the agriculture realm.
Still, the prospective employees were patient. They gathered on the shopping mall's third floor, hoping to get his attention. The number of job seekers started increasing every hour. From 100 to 1,000, from 1,000 to 5,000, the mall got crowded with cultivators and commoners.
The crowd indeed got the attention of the Life Sword Sect's elders and the Tang Clan's members.
.
.
.
Sixth Element Sect's Alchemy Workshop, East of Florida Domain
The workshop was a copy of Leo's workshops when they were outside his shopping mall. Tang Xuan and Tang Tian were the ones who built it so that the sect's disciples could have a place to study and research.
Unfortunately, most disciples chose to visit the workshops in the shopping mall to learn from the mannequins. Only a few elders stayed behind to concoct their pills.
Bao Xun was one of the old-school elders. He was 7 feet tall, 250 pounds in weight, and slightly muscular. His iconic smooth bald head and hairless face earned him the nickname of Second Sun, which was his current Daoist name. In addition, his green iris and black sclera always intimidated his disciples and peers.
"I heard Sect Master Tang and his ancestor are entering seclusion. Is that true?" Bao Xun inquired his colleagues.
"Yes. I heard they have purchased pills and books from the store. They have left a message that they won't come out anytime soon."
As Tang Xuan and Tang Tian had purchased a lot of goodies from Leo's store, both elders stopped idling around. They entered seclusion to cultivate and stabilize what they had gained from Leo's food, pills, and books.
Without the two pillars of the Tang Clan and the Sixth Element Sect, elders of the sect temporarily took control of their alchemists while the Tang Clan operated normally.
Both the Sixth Element Sect and the Tang Clan functioned as one whenever Tang Tian was around. However, when Tang Tian was busy, the task of management fell into the hands of Bao Xun.
Bao Xun specialized in poison pills and all sorts of poisonous substances. He also worked as a sleeping agent for Yan Xiang, and he was in charge of assassinating every promising youngster who refused to work for the emperor.
After Yan Xiang and his family had fallen, Bao Xun became independent. But as a soul transformation cultivator, he realized that he couldn't survive in this world without a backer.
Leo's emergence gave Bao Xun a new hope. He wished to follow Leo and eat some scraps that he might leave behind. However, Tang Xuan and Tang Tian monopolized most of the goodies, which annoyed Bao Xun.
With both elders out of the picture for some time, Bao Xun decided to come out of their shadows to get closer to Leo. However, there was a problem.
Leo never stayed in one place for long. Whenever he did, countless people flocked after him to get his attention. This troubled Bao Xun.
"I think it's about time for us to visit Lord Florida Man. What do you say?" Asked Bao Xun.
The other elders shook their heads. Everybody disagreed.
"Lord Florida Man is someone out of our league. We should respect our differences in status and keep a respectable distance. Only when he summons us, we shall seek his audience."
Bao Xun was annoyed, "But if we stay here, we will never get to enjoy what Lord Florida Man has made for us. He only delegated us a task to protect the commoners, but he never shows up to guide us!"
"He has already helped us greatly. Everybody receives 30 essence stones every month for what we're doing. Don't you think it's a bit greedy to ask for more for what we've been doing? We pretty much have been freeloading him this entire time."
"Not at all! We are cultivators. We follow stronger ones in the hopes of getting recognition. We're not here to just sit here and beg for 30 essence stones a month. We need to strive to get Lord Florida Man's attention like what Elder Tang Tian and Ancestor Tang Xuan did!"
"And what are you going to do? Be shameless and go see him while he is busy?"
Bao Xun snorted. He was tired of the lazy elders. "Shyness hinders one's growth. We need to be shameless to get something in return!"
"…As you wish. I wish you luck."
The elders ended the conversation and continued concocting pills as usual.
Bao Xun had enough. He stomped out of the workshop. Making his way to the shopping mall, he flew toward the center of Florida Domain.
Coincidentally, someone had just returned from a seclusion. A mysterious dark elf teenager donning in vine dress walked on the road barefeet. Her outward appearance and height resembled a middle-schooler, but she exuded the aura of an earth-celestial immortal.
"Nom-Nom Meow…" (I'm hungry. I hate walking like a human. I wish I still had roots and vines.)
Cat had completed her humanoid transformation. As a newbie, she didn't know how to fly or use a light-feet technique.
Bao Xun noticed the aura of an immortal. He stopped flying. After landing in front of Cat, he cupped his fist to pay respect. The greedy elder didn't waste time trying to gain a connection with one of Leo's people.
"Greetings, fairy. I'm Bao Xun of the Sixth Element Sect. I think this is the first time we've met. Would you mind telling me which affiliate are you from?"
"Hmm?"
Cat turned her attention to the stranger. As she didn't know how to react, she depended on her muscle memory.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Uncle, do you have food? I'm hungry.)
"What?"
Bao Xun had seen Cat in her monster form several times in the past, but he never interacted with her. Thus, he was taken aback by her nom-nom language.
"No Nom-Nom?" (No food?)
"Umm, what's nom-nom?"
"Nom-Nom Meow!" (Nom-Nom is delicious food! Do you have one?)
"…I don't understand what you're saying."
Bao Xun and Cat awkwardly looked at each other. A few seconds later, Cat's stomach growled.
The growl soon developed into a roar. It was so loud that everybody nearby turned around to look at them. Then, the disciples of the sixth element sect noticed their elders.
"Elder Bao? What is he doing over there with that… girl?"
Another disciple frowned as he noticed the long ears of Cat. "Is that girl one of Lord Florida Man's bodyguards? They have long ears like her."
"But their skin color is lighter."
"You racist bastard! What's wrong with skin color?! Haven't you seen the people from the south? They're beautifully tanned!"
"SORRY!"
Their conversation caused a commotion. Everybody started paying attention to the strange girl.
Meanwhile, Cat couldn't take it anymore. Her eyes span.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Uncle, you smell like one of those poisonous mushrooms. Can I eat you?)
"Err…what?"
Cat opened her mouth wide and salivated. But before she could expand her head size and gobble Bao Xun whole, a working mannequin carrying a large chunk of mad cow's belly meat turned into Tom Brady; He threw the meat which accurately entered her mouth.
"MUFFU!!"
Cat was surprised at first. But when she tasted the sweetness of the belly fat, she started chewing in glee.
The working mannequin patted his hands and gave Bao Xun a thumbs up. Then, he left without elaborating like a chad.
"???"
Bao Xun was confused. He hadn't realized yet that he had just escaped the death penalty for not paying the nom-nom tax.
Still, some of the Life Sword Sect disciples who had been observing them realized who Cat was. He muttered.
"That language… Isn't she 'CAT'?!"
As soon as the name was mentioned, other local cultivators started recognizing her.
"Cat? T-T-THAT CAT?! THE MONSTER PLANT?!"
"Wait a minute! High-ranking monsters can transform into a human! Don't tell me…"
"IT'S CAT, YOU FOOL! DON'T FORGET TO PAY THE NOM-NOM TAX, OR SHE'LL EAT YOU!!"
"SHIT!"
Several spectating cultivators rumbled through their spatial rings and fetched several packages of food. They rushed toward Cat and put the food down in front of her as a tribute while they knelt.
Cat smiled at the kind cultivators. She cheerfully patted their heads.
"Nom-Nom! NICE!"
"T-Thank you, young fairy."
The cultivators hurried away after receiving her blessing. They touched the hair that she had touched, which emitted a chilling air.
Her hand was full of extreme virgin yin energy. It threatened to freeze the cultivators. Fortunately, it didn't directly turn them into monsters like Leo's touch.
Again, Bao Xun looked around in confusion.
"What the hell is going on around here?"

chapters.title: Chapter 259 Florida Man Sued Mother-in-Law for Snorting Coke Without Inviting Him.
chapters.content:
Chapter 259 Florida Man Sued Mother-in-Law for Snorting Coke Without Inviting Him.
Chapter 259 – Florida Man Sued Mother-in-Law for Snorting Coke Without Inviting Him.
Shopping Mall, Burger Kung Restaurant.
"Last Rizzmas, I gave you my Gyatt. But the very next day, Biboo taxes it away…"
Wu Buyi hummed while he sang a weird song composed by a vtuber. He sat at the Burgur Kung Restaurant's table after ordering a double cheeseburger and a mad cow steak burger for 200 essence stones.
The food price seemed expensive to many. But in Wu Buyi's eyes, they were dirt cheap.
He was also different from before. Instead of indulging in the smartphone and the internet, Wu Buyi put an alchemy manual, which he had purchased from the infamous bookstore. Flipping a few first pages, he read the table of contents to find the topic he was interested in.
"There it is! Quick Alchemy!"
Wu Buyi hummed and flipped more pages. He started reading in earnest while the waiter mannequin brought the ordered burgers to his table.
30 minutes passed by. Wu Buyi was so absorbed in reading the books that he forgot about his surroundings.
POOF
Suddenly, a person in a suit sat at the same table as him.
Wu Buyi glanced up, annoyed by the rude guy. "Hey, man. The table is taken."
Tiger Swordsman rested his elbows on the table and leaned forward. "I see that you bought the lord's book. What book are you reading?"
Seeing Tiger Swordsman's face, Wu Buyi snorted in disgust.
"Just alchemy book."
"Every book is a secret manual. It's not JUST a book."
"I know. That's why I'm reading it."
"Cool. Hey, have you entered the time chamber yet? Are you planning to enter it anytime soon?"
"What time chamber… Oh, that."
Wu Buyi thought of Hua Taixu and his dojo, aka the time chamber. He had already entered it once, and he didn't want to take that Spartan training course ever again.
"I'm an alchemist. I'm not into sword fights."
"Aren't you vexed at all, buddy?"
"Vexxed from what?"
"The helplessness and the despair when the immortals and gods invaded us the last time."
"…"
Upon being reminded of the recent invasion, Wu Buyi's expression changed. As Tiger Swordsman had said; being useless during a critical time was frustrating. During the invasion, everybody from the Life Sword Sect and the others could do nothing but hide in the underground warehouse.
