The shameful experience awoke Wu Buyi's pessimistic thoughts. He snorted in disgust.
"I'm planning to dedicate my life to alchemy. You and the swordsman freaks can keep on training and go fight in my stead."
"Are you sure?" Tiger Swordsman didn't give up convincing Wu Buyi, "The old once said, shedding sweat during training is a thousand times better than shedding your blood because you're unprepared. One day, you will be forced to get into combat, and you might regret it."
Wu Buyi closed the book and gave Tiger Swordsman a meaningful look.
"Look, Tiger. I know what I'm doing. From the very start, my cultivation base exists to support my career as an alchemist. I never seriously trained in any combat arts until I met Lord Florida Man. But that invasion taught me a lesson. You know what I learned from that?"
"What?"
"Everybody has a role." Wu Buyi stood up and folded his arms behind his back. Then, he started walking around the table. "Not everybody is geared toward combats. Indeed, cultivators usually can reinforce one's foundation or grow stronger by fighting someone strong. However, that doesn't mean every cultivator should fight all the time."
"What do you mean?"
Wu Buyi grinned. He recalled the knowledge that he had learned from the internet and taught Tiger Swordsman using his own words.
"Look, if we compare our raw martial arts skills without accounting for our difference in cultivation base, who do you think would win if we were to fight? You or me?"
"Obviously me!"
"That's right."
"What's your point?"
"That's my point exactly! I can't fight for shit! Do you think an alchemist like me should be put on the frontline while the other non-combatants can benefit the organization as a whole?"
"…"
Wu Buyi deeply sighed and explained. "I've learned something important from a lost civilization called the US Military. Although most of their soldiers are trained and anticipated to fight in combat, some of them are actually supporters who specialize in other skills, such as medics, mechanics, engineers, programmers, and many others. Hell, even psychiatrists are a thing!"
"…What?"
"I guess I have to explain using baby vocabularies. Anyway, where do you think your weapons come from?"
"A blacksmith."
"Good. Where do you think you need to go to when you're injured in combat?"
"…A cave to recuperate?"
"Idiot! A hospital or an infirmary! You need to see either a doctor or an alchemist like me!"
Wu Buyi spent hours lecturing about the supporting roles in armies. Because his voice was so loud, several bystanders stopped to listen to Wu Buyi's lecture.
By the time Wu Buyi realized it, a hundred cultivators already sat around his table, listening to his teachings. Everybody got enlightened.
"I see! Everybody has a different role!"
"We don't need to treat cultivation as an exclusive martial art. Instead, we use it as a supplement for our future career or goals, I see!"
"I…I have awakened a dao…"
Several people murmured in astonishment and respect. A dozen of them showed respect to Wu Buyi by kneeling and cupping their fists.
"Great Teacher Wu! Thank you for your teachings!"
"Great Teacher Wu! We're enlightened! Thank you!"
Meanwhile, Wu Buyi blankly stared at the people around him in confusion.
"What the hell are you lots doing here? Get out of my sight! This ain't a zoo! SHOO! SHOO!"
.
.
Leo watched the crowd from the 5th floor's balcony. He faintly smiled as he enjoyed watching the local cultivators getting adapted to the new technologies and lifestyle. He was proud of them.
While observing the people below, Esen, Ivy, Beatrice, and Marc approached him from behind. The elfen wife stood next to him and gazed at the crowd below.
"Are you free today?" Asked Esen
"Somewhat. Do you need anything?"
"Give me some books. I don't want to spend my lifespan."
Leo snickered and patted her head. He then guided her and her entourage to the bookstore and granted them free access to the library.
The library contained more books than the bookstore. However, only three copies of each book were kept there to save space. Despite containing fewer duplicated books, the tall bookshelves, and endless room was full of manuals and books of various sizes.
Leo reminded them, "You can read free books here. But bear in mind that you can't bring it out when I'm not around. If you really need one, I'll print one for you."
Beatrice, Marc, and Ivy bowed in gratitude. As for Esen, she puffed her chest in elation.
"Good job! This is what you should do as my husband!"
Everybody giggled as they found Esen adorable even though her appearance and body reached adulthood.
Leo wrapped his arm around Esen's shoulder while she leaned her head on his chest. They wished that they could enjoy this tranquil and peaceful time forever.
.
.
DING
DING
DING
A hundred blue system screens flashed and orbited around a naked beautiful elf within a water capsule. Her face, skin, and body features looked the same as Esen's.
She was Eleanor, the Matriarch or the Queen of the Divine Elf. She was also one of the few karmic sovereigns of this universe.
While being inside the water capsule, Eleanor slowly opened her eyelids. She woke up from her long dream.
"…Found you, Esen. It was the right decision to imprison you there. I knew someone would rescue you and unlock your potential. Now, I have two spare bodies I can transfer my soul into…"
Eleanor rose up and pushed the hatch open. Her eyes glowed in green color while her rainbow aura exuded from her body. The water in the capsule glittered in rainbow similar to the water of Florida Canyon River.
Next to the capsule, a silver werewolf stood with his arms crossed. He was none other than Overlord Lucky, the strongest werewolf overlord of the Fenrir Werewolf.
He only glanced at his master and gave a short report.
"Princess Ellen has betrayed us and joined forces with Overlord Xiaomao. From the report, Mercenary Ohio Man, Overlord Milo, and others followed her. What should we do about them?"
Eleanor lightly sighed. She nonchalantly put on her clothes while being watched by the werewolf.
"Leave them be. Don't bother attacking them right now."
"Why? Isn't Ellen your spare body?"
"It doesn't matter anymore. ANOTHER spare body has more potential."
"Who?"
"The crown princess Esen. Also, I'm interested in the person who unlocked her potential."
Eleanor swiped away the system screens in front of her except one. The monitor showed the portrait of a handsome young man in his mid-20s.
It was the old portrait of Mao Miaomiao. However, Eleanor knew who the real owner of that body was.
"Who would have thought that the boy back then would have risen up from the ash? I guess the Phoenix bloodline is not for show."
Overlord Lucky didn't utter a word. He closed his eyes and turned away.
"So, what's next?"
Eleanor walked out of her chamber and ordered him.
"Bring every overlord in our army. Capture a system user by the name 'Florida Man' and the crown princess at all costs."
"And if they resist?"
"Cut off their limbs and bring me their limbless torso. I can still use them."

chapters.title: Chapter 260 Florida Man Registered His Teenage Daughter in Professional Martial Arts Tournament to Earn Money.
chapters.content:
Chapter 260 Florida Man Registered His Teenage Daughter in Professional Martial Arts Tournament to Earn Money.
Chapter 260 – Florida Man Registered His Teenage Daughter in Professional Martial Arts Tournament to Earn Money.
Airport, Orlando Realm
It had been a week since Filip and his crew had been staying in Leo's domain. Although they were scheduled to leave in 4 days, they extended their stay for a reason.
Filip, Andria, and three previous members already returned to his ship. A new team of five representatives replaced them and visited Leo's bookstore. Everybody also avoided the time chamber like a plague.
After taking turns and purchasing enough books, Filip and his crewmate decided to leave. They retrieved the rest of the soul stones from Leo and prepared to leave.
Leo stood on the airport runaway to send them off. Filip also extended his hand for a handshake.
"Thank you for everything, Sir Florida Man. We're indebted to you."
Leo glanced at Filip's hand. He calmly wore rubber gloves and shook Filip's hand.
"Please come again. Also, if possible, please tell the other earthlings that one of them is doing well on his own."
"I will. I'm sure everybody will be proud. Oh, by the way…"
Filip hesitated as he still had one doubt about Leo; He still hadn't learned the origins and the meaning of 'Florida'.
"Sir Florida Man. Could you tell me the meaning of 'Florida'?"
Leo shrugged, "It's a hometown of cultured people."
"A cultural place, I see."
Leo wryly smiled while he thought of stupid deeds that the local people had done in the past, such as breaking into a property and stealing valuables but forgetting his cell phone in the victim's house. This didn't include the daily news headlines in the local newspapers.
"Yes. A VERY cultural place for sure."
"I'm jealous. My home country has already forgotten about culture. They only pursue wealth and military might."
"…Just pass the sunshine law bill and your country will be very cultural."
"What's that?"
"Never mind."
Leo and Filip continued their small talk for a few minutes before the latter bid farewell and departed with his colleagues.
After Filip's group had left, Leo checked his current bank balance.
<Current Lifespan: 21,392,639 Years…>
Lifespan was no longer an issue anymore. Leo brightly grinned as he could splurge some to purchase top-graded motorhomes or RVs for the promising workers.
Moreover, it was about time for him to go back to the Fate Stadium. The mystic realm season was also on the schedule. Afterward, there was a marriage ceremony to worry about.
The schedule was packed. Leo deeply sighed as he would be busy again.
"Even after I've become a supreme expert, I still have to work… Anyway."
Leo returned to his domain. He planned to hold a meeting to select representatives for the next mystic realm expedition.
But as he left the shopping mall, a man from the Sixth Element Sect had been waiting for him outside.
Bao Xun politely bowed and greeted Leo.
"Greetings Lord Florida Man. I'm Bao Xun from the Sixth Element Sect. I have been waiting to meet you in person."
"…"
Leo sized up Bao Xun. He closed his eyes and stood still for five seconds. When Leo reopened his eyes, his demeanor toward Bao Xun changed. Instead of returning Bao Xun's greetings with respect, Leo snorted.
"What do you want?"
Bao Xun was taken aback. He thought that Leo was a reasonable man, not a rude or arrogant expert.
"T-This lowly mortal just wishes to learn from you."
"I don't accept disciples. If you wish to learn, go buy my books at the bookstore. I'm a busy man, so I'll take my leave now."
"W-Wait."
Leo didn't bother waiting for Bao Xun. He kicked the ground and vanished.
Bao Xun stood there, gazing at the empty air in front of him. He was confused as to why Leo avoided him.
"What did I do wrong?! Is he that arrogant? This is absurd!!"
.
.
WHOOSH
Leo reappeared on the parking lot building's rooftop. He let out a long sigh.
"Greedy bastard."
A minute earlier, Leo sank his consciousness to his dantian universe and ran a simulation combat mode against Bao Xun's shadow clones. He quickly defeated Bao Xun's clones 10,000 times and learned his characters.
Bao Xun was a master of assassination dao. His Qi was corrupted by yin Qi while his meridians and dantian were full of impurity due to the negative karma. This aroused Leo's suspicion.
Leo peeked deeper into Bao Xun's karma and learned of the ambition he had toward the Sixth Element Sect. It seemed that Bao Xun aspired to become the sect master and replace Tang Tian.
Although Leo never intended to intervene in the external affairs of other sects, he hated schemers and bootlickers the most. Bao Xun had some of their traits, which earned Leo's disgust.
"Instead of working hard and earning my recognition, he tries to take a shortcut to get ahead. He should have learned something from Tang Tian and others. Hah…"
Leo shook his head and proceeded to his bus. He needed to consult Esen regarding their marriage ceremony and the upcoming seasonal expedition.
.
.
Days passed by. It had been three months since the last seasonal mystic realm gates were opened. During this period, many events occurred, causing the majority of sects and clans to disband or dissolve.
The destruction of the Death Sword Sect, the Fatui Cult, and the Yan Clan caused a chain reaction on the mainland. Major cities and towns became lawless as cultivators no longer feared the law imposed by the royal family. Then, the repeated alien invasions terrorized the land, decreasing the local population by two-thirds.
Only one major organization survived the ordeal and stood strong – The Florida Domain. Although the Tang Clan, Amazonian Sanctuary, Sixth Element Sect, Life Sword Sect, and townsmen from nearby counties integrated into the domain.
As they gathered in one place, a new issue soon arose.
Leo stood on the mystic realm platform and adjusted its level and status.
.
Mystic Realm Portal – Level 17
Entry Limit (Person) – (10/10)
Portal Cooldown Reduction – (2/5)
Portal Duration – (5/5)
Next Destination: Unknown High Plane
Status: Ready
Number of Linked Planet(s): 1
.
The number of people who could join Leo's expedition rose to 10. Leo simply needed to select nine people to come with him.
Unfortunately, many representatives from various clans expressed their desire to take part in the expedition, especially the elders from the Life Sword Sect.
Han Hao, Han Meng, Hua Jiashan, and Tiger Swordsman were the teams that aimed to join Leo even though they had another portal at their old sect. The Tang Clan, Amazonian Sanctuary, and Sixth Sword Sect were also the same. However, they chose not to go home and begged to join Leo instead.
This troubled him. Since so many people wished to participate, Leo asked Ivy for assistance.
Ivy immediately suggested an internal tournament to select the domain's representatives, to which Leo agreed. An odd tournament was abruptly initiated.
The tournament lasted three days. During this time, Tang Xuan and Tang Tian never came out of their seclusion. Gao Yan and Jin Yong were also injured, so they didn't participate. Esen, Ivy, Marc, and Beatrice weren't interested in the expedition, so they forfeited their rights to join.
In the end, it became a fight between the elders of the Life Sword Sect, the Tang Clan, and the Sixth Element Sect. After the dust settled, an unlikely winner emerged.
The winner was the underdog, who was also the mascot of Leo's domain.
On the training field's arena, the final round of the tournament had been concluded. Two fighters were on the platform, but one was on his knees. The victor stood triumphant, but she seemed unfazed by the workout.
The referee was none other than Leo. He deeply sighed while he announced the result.
"WINNER BY SUBMISSION, CAT!!"
The young dark elf pouted and looked around. She was dying to get some food.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Can I go eat now?)
Leo rolled his eyes and tossed a piece of mad cow's meat into her mouth. Cat transformed her head into a chomper plant and swallowed the large chunk of one-ton shoulder meat whole.
After feeding the winner, Leo gazed at the second place. He bitterly laughed at the dark horse.
"I thought you would have won there, Ricardo."
Ricardo in his human form mumbled in embarrassment.
"Smash…" (I thought my cultivation base was superior to hers and this would have been an easy win. I guess I was conceit.)
"It's fine. It's just that Cat is kinda… unique."
Although Cat had recently ascended and become an immortal, she inherited some of Leo's original power, which gave her an edge over the other contestants.
Leo glanced at Cat who already left the arena and was in the middle of sprinting toward the nearest granary for more food. He noticed how her three dao avatars hurried and followed after their master.
One was the spirit of a dryad woman. Another one was a man-eating chomper plant. As for the last one, it was a man with Leo's face.
One of Cat's daos was an overpowered guy!
Leo massaged his forehead. He had a feeling that Cat should be added to the main combat force soon.

chapters.title: Chapter 261 Florida Man Denied the Allegation of Smuggling AV Superstars from Brazil to Ohio to Film Bestiary Movie.
chapters.content:
Chapter 261 Florida Man Denied the Allegation of Smuggling AV Superstars from Brazil to Ohio to Film Bestiary Movie.
Chapter 261 – Florida Man Denied the Allegation of Smuggling AV Superstars from Brazil to Ohio to Film Bestiary Movie.
After a quick tournament, Leo finalized the expedition team's members. Aside from him, there would be nine people joining.
Cat, Ricardo, Taxi, Tiger Swordsman, Hua Jiashan, Dongfang Mei, Han Meng, and Han Hao qualified for the final 8 of the tournament, so they were eligible to join. As for the last member, it was up to Leo to decide. However, everybody knew which one he was going to pick.
The morning of the next day, the qualified participants gathered on the mystic realm platform. Their friends and spectators also showed up there to send them off.
Wu Buyi, Xu Nuan, Yao Qiqi, and their disciples joined the spectators, watching their colleagues and seniors from afar. They wished them the best.
While watching the people, Xu Nuan asked Wu Buyi.
"Doesn't the Life Sword Sect have one of the mystic realm portals? Why is everybody eager to use Lord Florida Man's portal?"
Wu Buyi shrugged, "They're probably thinking if they are with the lord, they would be safe. Something like that."
"That makes sense. Indeed, if the lord is with them, there shouldn't be any casualty. But why does everybody avoid using the free portals? I think the Death Sword Sect and the Fatui Cult also have theirs."
"Using a random portal? Pfft. Nobody is that stupid anymore. It's true that the portals are ownerless. But if you use that, only gods know where they will send you to. It's a gamble."
"It's not a gamble if you tag along with the lord, that's why you're trying to say?"
"Yes. That's correct."
Xu Nuan understood Wu Buyi's reasoning. She also agreed with him.
Indeed, as previous dominant clans and sects no longer existed, nobody protected the portal platforms of the destroyed organizations anymore. Any rogue cultivator could easily seize this opportunity to use the ownerless portals and gamble for a fortuitous encounter or treasures.
Still, this method came with a great risk. As no powerhouse or strong cultivators were there to protect them, the chance of dying in an unknown world was high. Therefore, sane cultivators chose not to use the old portals.
"By the way, isn't it a pity that Lord Florida Man only permits 10 people to enter? The Jianghu Alliance no longer exists. What's stopping him from sending more people?" Xu Nuan inquired.
"Who knows? He might have foreseen danger, or he might have chosen this method to limit the potential casualty. The less people, the easier it is to protect them."
"Right. There's this reason. But really, do we need to take part in that realm anymore? The facilities here are more than enough for us to cultivate and progress to the deity stage with ease. What's the point of going there?"
"Sightseeing, perhaps."
Xu Nuan and Wu Buyi let out a long sigh. One of the shopping mall's facilities alone was enough to make any major sect a top-tier sect that could dominate Jianghu or the Yan Empire. However, Leo had built so many.
This didn't include the unique business scheme that Leo had been using. Many young employees usually sat near the pylon tower and cultivated whenever they had free time. When they accumulated enough cash or lifespan, they always spent everything to purchase cultivation resources and technique manuals from the shopping mall.
Alternate ways of cultivation enabled the local employees and visitors to grow stronger without participating in the mystic realm expeditions. Thus, this journey was unnecessary. It was only there for risk-takers to play.
"Yeah, sightseeing."
Both prayed for the participants to return unharmed.
.
Leo arrived at the mystic realm at 9 in the morning. Esen and her subordinates also followed after them. Everybody expected Esen to be chosen. After all, she was his spouse.
But then, Leo betrayed everybody's expectations. He announced the last member who would join them in this expedition.
"As you know, aside from me and the final 8 of the tournament, I'll pick one of the employees to go along. So… Lucky. You'll come along!"
"!!!"
Leo pointed at the giant wolf statue. He wiggled his finger and called him over.
The statue transformed into a humanoid werewolf golem. His 2.5 meters tall and refined muscles made him intimidating. However, the waggling tail and smiling face gave off another impression.
"Woof!"
He was a good boy.
Surprised by the unlikely decision, everybody observed Esen's reaction. The latter snorted and waved her hand.
"I'm planning to enter the time chamber. I don't have time for some treasure-hunting trips."
Everybody was relieved as the lord and his wife were in harmony. Still, some of the people had never seen the guardian statues in action yet. Their curious gaze fixated on the guardian.
After the roster was full, Leo activated the portal and instructed them.
"For those who aren't chosen, you can enter Agriculture Realm to train your physique. The gravity there is helpful to your foundation. Also, if you want something to fight, you can try the Orlando Realm. Be warned, though. Orlando is full of 9th-stage monster beasts. Anyone under the quasi-immortal realm shouldn't enter there."
Hearing about the Agriculture Realm, the young spectators were excited. They checked their storage rings and began planning their luggage and food supplies.
The local elders were also interested in the two new gates. But when they saw the warning signboard in front of the Cow Level's gate, they got curious.
"What about that portal, senior?" Asked Wu Buyi.
Leo glared at the troublemaker, "Only deities and sages can enter there! If any moron sneaks in and gets themselves killed, I won't bother bringing their corpses out!"
"I-Is that so?"
"Be warned. There are a hundred thousand deity-stage monsters in there. If you recklessly jump into the gate like Gao Yan and Jin Yong, you will end up in a worse state than them. Those guys are in a coma, and they won't be up for a few months!"
"…"
The people who had planned to enter one of the three gates earlier gulped. They took a mental note not to enter the cow level without Leo's permission.
Everything was settled. Leo stopped talking and gestured for the participants to follow him.
"Let's go. I'll go clear the path. You guys follow me. Immediately retreat if a deity or someone of a higher cultivation base shows up, okay?"
The expedition team nodded, except Cat who tilted her head in confusion. She smiled at Leo and mumbled.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Are deities edible?)
Leo rolled his eyes and ignored the obnoxious monster daughter. He vanished into the portal while the people behind him delayed their entry, letting Leo clean the mess first.
.
Among the crowd, Bao Xun smacked his lips. He wished he could peek into that world and snatch something. Because of the danger, he canceled his plans.
'Fine. I'll stick with that O-Lan-Do Realm. I just need to ascend and become an immortal before they return. Then, I might get Lord Florida Man's attention.'
Bao Xun secretly left the platform and made his way to the time chamber.
'Nobody should be there at the moment. This is a golden opportunity to train. I'll take whatever I need to get stronger!'
He rushed into the shopping mall and flew toward the fourth floor. He arrived in front of the time chamber.
Hua Taixu stood calmly in front of the time chamber, waiting for a new batch of volunteers to join his training sessions. When Hua Taixu noticed Bao Xun, he sized up the alchemist elder and snorted.
"Weak! Corrupted! Dumb! You. Me. Train! Me. You. REFINE!"
Hua Taixu stomped toward Bao Xun and slapped his left cheek.
PA!
The sound was crisp. The force behind the strike was also immense that Bao Xun's lower jaw was dislocated.
"!!?"
Bao Xun was confused. He couldn't comprehend why he was slapped for no reason.
It was too late for Bao Xun to react. Hua Taixu exhibited a finger technique, pressing Bao Xun's acupuncture points and demobilizing him. Then, he slapped Bao Xun's right cheek.
PA!
"?!?"
Bao Xun was frustrated, but he couldn't move his body or utter a word. His eyes glared at Hua Taixu in anger.
Hua Taixu sneered. He bonked Bao Xun with the sheath of his sword.
"You. Discipline! Me. Refine. Character!"
"???"
The clone of the sword saint laughed and dragged the paralyzed man into the time chamber. He also didn't forget to let the cashier mannequin on the fourth floor deduct Bao Xun's lifespan for an entrance fee.
As Bao Xun had wished, he managed to infiltrate the time chamber. Whether it was according to his plan or not, nobody could tell.
.
.
WHOOSH
Leo crossed the gate and emerged on the other side. When he looked up, he frowned.
The gate directly brought him to the middle of a forest city. A dozen oak trees around him were at least 50 meters in diameter, and their height exceeded 200 meters. However, wooden walkways and tree houses on the branches were so complex that they weaved like multiple layers of spider webs.
In addition, Leo sensed a hundred life signatures of immortals. He briefly saw a group of five children with green hair running across a wooden bridge above him.
'Is this really a mystic realm? Or rather, did my stupid building directly send me to an alien planet?'
Leo doubted this planet was a simple deserted planet full of monsters.
While Leo looked around, an arrow flew toward his face. By reflex, Leo caught it with his fingers.
Glancing at the arrow, Leo noticed a dripping purple arrowhead. It also smelled like acid.
"Poison arrow as a greeting? How civilized."
Leo pulled out the arrowhead and tossed it in his mouth. He chewed it and crushed the purple metal like candies.
CRUNCH
CRUNCH
His teeth easily broke the arrowhead while his saliva melted its fragments into liquid. He then swallowed everything.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by one year…>
Although Leo was rich, he never forgot his old power – Everything in the universe was edible, and anything he ate always was converted into his lifespan.
While biting and chewing the wooden arrow shaft like a panda chewing a bamboo tree, Leo looked up and found the assailant. He waved his finger and called the guy over.
"HEY! YOU GREEN MAN OVER THERE! GET DOWN HERE!"
There was a man with long green hair and green robes. He also wore a green hoodie cloak and a face mask. His long and thick green eyebrows and sharp eyes exuded green smoke as if they were on fire.
The man shouted back.
"STATE YOUR NAME, YOUR RACE, AND YOUR BUSINESS!! WHO ARE YOU!? HOW DID YOU ENTER THE NEUTRAL FOREST OF DEZNUTS!?"
"… Deez nuts?"
Leo was taken aback by the weird name. He pondered hard and tried to recall some weird acronyms that he had learned from clones' memory.
"Ah!"
Leo vaguely remembered something. As Leo had fought Marc, Beatrice, and Ivy in his dantian universe during his sleep, he copied their daos, skills, and memory. Among the pieces of memory, there was information related to the DEZNUTS organization.
DEZNUTS stood for 'Divine Elven Zenith of Neo United Terraforming Solars'. They consisted of Divine Elves, Molgs, Werewolves, and a few races who surrendered to the Divine Elf Matriarch Eleanor.
In short, DEZNUTS was a puppet organization, that existed to serve Eleanor and her Divine Elf Empire.
Leo snickered as he found the name cute. He pointed at the guy.
"Go tell your friends that a FRIENDLY FLORIDA MAN has come to visit! If you attack us one more time, that FRIENDLY FLORIDA MAN will turn into ANGRY FLORIDA MAN! Do not take chances, boy!"
"…"
The green man frowned, but he cooperated. He disappeared into the distance while other town militias appeared and surrounded Leo.
"Sky celestials, heaven celestials, a mediocre realm, I guess," Leo commented.
Hearing Leo's remark, every militia's eyes were bloodshot. They nocked their great bows and aimed at Leo's head. Their killing intent emanated in the air.
Leo let out a long sigh. He contemplated if he should erase everybody here.
Fortunately, a family of a mother holding her infant in her arms passed by. A blond elf and her child were walking on a bridge above Leo. They peeked down to see the commotion.
Leo instinctively looked up. His eyes met with the elf woman's eyes.
"Huh?"
Strangely, the woman's face resembled Esen. Moreover, their life signature and aura were uncannily similar.
.
Meanwhile, Ester sized up Leo. She frowned as she couldn't see through Leo's cultivation base.
"Who is he?"

chapters.title: Chapter 262 Florida Man Arrested for Trespassing into Area 51 to Learn Magic and Sorcery from Aliens.
chapters.content:
Chapter 262 Florida Man Arrested for Trespassing into Area 51 to Learn Magic and Sorcery from Aliens.
Chapter 262 – Florida Man Arrested for Trespassing into Area 51 to Learn Magic and Sorcery from Aliens.
Minutes later, Cat, Lucky, Hua Jiashan, and others entered the portal and arrived at the other side. As soon as their eyes adjusted to the light, they deeply frowned.
A hundred immortals with green hair and green eyes had been surrounding the portal and Leo. Over a hundred onlookers also stood on the wooden hanging bridges connecting between tree houses.
The killing intent in the air was overwhelming. Fortunately, most of the people here had spent time and lifespan training in Leo's time chamber before. All of them had a firm foundation, and their celestial aura negated the pressure.
After everybody got in, Lucky sneered at the green elves. He purposely revealed the aura of an entity.
In the universe, the power ranking was graded as follows;
Mortal
Immortal
Deity
Sage
Entity
Karmic Sovereign
The six realms were the major realms that everybody desired to overcome and ascend to the elusive realm, which no one had reached before. Moreover, all karmic sovereigns never recorded or revealed the secret of the next cultivation stage.
Thus, an entity was akin to the semi-pinnacle of the universe. When the aura of Lucky erupted, all green-haired elves coughed blood and fell on their knees. As for Hua Jiashan and Leo's allies, they weren't affected by Lucky's killing intent.
"T-This… sage's aura?!"
"No! That's an entity!"
"Dammit!"
The elves gazed at Lucky in despair. When they noticed that the entity was a stone statue, they were flabbergasted.
"A-A-A golem?!" One of them uttered in shock.
Lucky snorted, "Don't lump me with those outdated automatons. I'm an entity created by Lord Florida Man. My status is the same as a karmic sovereign!"
"!!!"
Hearing Lucky's braggart, Leo shook his head while the elves swallowed their saliva.
"Enough, Lucky. Suppress your aura. Let's chat with them first and we'll decide our next moves." Leo reprimanded Lucky.
The statue was unwilling, but he eventually retracted his aura and concealed his Qi.
The elves could move again. However, most of them already suffered an internal injury due to the presence of Lucky. They remained kneeling or sitting, looking at Leo and his comrades.
"WAAAAAHHH!!"
The wail of a baby alarmed Leo and everybody. They looked up and found the onlookers on the bridges coughing blood. Moreover, a baby in the arms of a blond elf cried in pain.
"Shit! You overdid it, Lucky!" Leo cursed at his subordinate.
"I-I'm sorry, woof! I didn't target them. I only targeted those around us, woof!"
"You idiot! There are innocent people here! Don't harm women, elders, and children!"
Leo quickly put on a hazmat suit and leaped to assist the people on the bridges. He fed them pinnacle-graded Hope and Dream pills, forcing them to fall asleep. As for the baby, he crushed a medium-graded one and fed him a smaller dose. While he was at it, he also fed the mother a pinnacle-grade pill.
Ester and her son slightly recovered. Fortunately, Ester was a lot stronger than the militias and her son carried the bloodline of Simba and the royal divine elf. Both made it through after they swallowed Leo's pills.
The mother resisted the sleep-inducing effect of the hope and dream pill. She checked the pulse of her baby.
Fortunately, no internal injuries harmed the infant. The boy only coughed and cried because of the suffocation earlier. Lucky indeed didn't intend to harm the women and the children onlookers, but the Qi pressure still affected their psyche.
Hours later, Leo wasted a thousand pills and rescued all the civilians. When everybody recovered, he leaped down from the bridge and landed in front of his people.
His actions didn't escape the eyes of their superior officers, who had been observing Leo and his people from afar since they had first arrived. One of their delegations stopped watching and made their appearance.
The representative of the green elf teleported from 100 kilometers away and landed 20 meters in front of Leo's group. He was a 7-foot-tall middle-aged man with long ears, short green hair, and thin physique. His seamless long-sleeved green shirts and pants were unique among the crowd of green elves who wore leather armor and brown clothes.
Aside from the clothes, the man's face was ragged and wide. He wasn't as handsome as other young elves in the forest.
The man introduced himself, "I'm General Vendettito Sugondese the Third of DEZNUTS. We apologize for our poor reception. We didn't know that esteemed guests from another planet were visiting us today."
Leo sized up the so-called general. His aura was similar to Lucky's as he was also an entity.
Since eight of Leo's subordinates were merely immortals, he chose not to provoke this entity and untimely implicated them. Leo minded his manner and cupped his fist.
"I am Florida Man from Florida Domain. We have entered a local mystic realm portal to explore and search for a fortuitous encounter. We didn't expect the portal to directly send us to another civilization."
"Florida Man?"
Vendettito raised his brow as he recognized the name. He secretly sent a sound transmission to his colleagues 100 kilometers away for confirmation.
'General Antinuts, could you check the name 'Florida Man' in the database? I think I've heard this name somewhere before.'
The colleague 100 kilometers away was another teenager-like green elf with a scar on his face. He had short crew-cut hair and smooth skin. However, he was as old as Vendettito.
Antinuts snorted and replied instantly.
'Florida Man is a wanted man that Her Majesty personally issued a warrant a few days ago. She also warned us not to provoke him if we find him. Let's buy some time and inform Her Majesty about his location.'
'Alright.'
Vendettito stopped sending secret messages to his friend. He gazed at Leo and returned the gesture.
"Understandable. We also experienced that in the past. Well, since you're here, how about we continue our conversation in the palace so we can get to know each other better."
As soon as Vendettito raised his hand, the green elf militias and the people on the bridges instantly recovered from their injuries. Ester also recovered from the side effects of Leo's pill while the sleeping elves woke up.
Leo raised his eyebrows. He didn't sense a domain ability or Qi, yet everybody was fully healed. He smacked his lips and inwardly laughed.
'Heh, a mass healing spell? That's a very good ability. Don't mind me if I copy that ability.'
Leo turned around and glanced at Lucky.
"Transform into your wolf form. Let me ride your back."
"But why, woof?"
"Just do it. I need to take a short nap. Let me meditate on your back for a couple minutes."
"…Okay, woof."
Lucky transformed into a 2-meter-tall wolf. Leo hopped on the wolf's back and firmly sat down. Before he closed his eyes, he ordered everybody to follow the big-faced elf.
"Let's go."
Hua Jiashan and the others nodded and followed the march. As for Leo, he closed his eyes and sank his consciousness to his dantian universe.
Vendettito sized up Leo and slightly frowned. He scoffed in his mind.
'Meditating in the middle of a foreign land? Talk about naivety, he must have been living under a rock. Oh, well. Since he's na?ve, I might as well buy time and contact Her Majesty.'
The group proceeded toward the palace of the local Zenith Elf, aka the green elves.
.
Meanwhile, Cat looked around and drooled. She kept staring at the green elves around them.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (They look delicious. Can I eat them?)
Taxi jolted and pulled Cat's collar dress, which she had gotten from Leo. It was a green dress that matched her nail color.
"Smash!" (Not yet. Wait for the lord's permission first.)
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Does that mean we can eat them soon?)
"…Smash." (Probably?)
Ricardo smacked the back of Taxi's head and reprimanded his colleague.
"SMASH!" (Don't give her hope, you idiot! As soon as we attack them, all hell will break loose! Think about the others!)
"…Smash." (Sorry.)
"…Meow?" (Sorry?)
Ricardo shook his head and slapped his forehead. Babysitting these two immature monster beasts was a headache.
.
.
After an hour of journey, everybody arrived at a white fortress, made of sparkling white jade metal.
"NOM-NOM MEOW?!" (THOSE WHITE BRICKS LOOK DELICIOUS! CAN I EAT THOSE?!)
Ricardo bonked Cat's head.
"Smash!" (Not edible! Don't eat!)
"…Meow." (Shame.)
While the monster beasts made a lot of strange noise, Leo slowly opened his eyes and widely grinned. He gradually opened his palms and closed them, exercising and warming up his finger muscles.
Leo removed his hazmat suit. He turned around and looked at Cat.
"Cat, come here."
"Meow?"
Cat eagerly rushed to Leo's side. She looked up and smiled at him, displaying the beauty of a gorgeous dark elf girl who could awaken any man's father instinct.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Any food, dad?)
"Open your mouth."
Cat gleefully opened her mouth as ordered. Leo snickered and condensed the green light on his index fingertip. Then, he fired a streak of light into her mouth.
"!!!"
Cat instinctively swallowed the strange light. It spread throughout her body, causing her body to glow in green radiant.
A few seconds later, Cat burped. She was full. However, she wanted more.
"Meow?!" (That was delicious! What was that?!)
Leo placed his fingertip on his lips, "Shush! Keep it a secret, alright?"
Cat repeatedly nodded in excitement. She eagerly awaited for Leo to feed her more of those green lights.
Leo snickered and closed his eyes. He rechecked the status of Vendettito.
.
.
Name: Vendettito Sugondese the Third
Race: High Elf
Age: 16,580 Years
Cultivation Base: 43-Galaxy Entity
Skills: Providence of Nature, Creation Magic, Healing Magic, Mandate of Nature
Specials: High Elf Bloodline
Favorite Weaponry: Tesla AK50 Railgun
Potential Percentage: 1,000%
.
The skillset wasn't as good as Esen's. However, the application of nature magic was useful.
The nature of magic was different than Qi; a magician could exchange their life force to create a miracle.?For example, Vendettito's clone could repeatedly create life forms by sacrificing some of his lifespans, such as trees, animals, and mortal creatures. It was a power befit of benevolent gods.
Leo salivated while he memorized the faces of the local people. He wondered how many books he could sell by publishing the art of sorcery and magic to a cultivation world.

chapters.title: Chapter 263 Florida Man Arrested Again as His “Cat” Swallowed His Neighbor Whole.
chapters.content:
Chapter 263 Florida Man Arrested Again as His “Cat” Swallowed His Neighbor Whole. ?
Chapter 263 – Florida Man Arrested Again as His "Cat" Swallowed His Neighbor Whole.
Leo secretly sank his consciousness into his dantian universe again. He had already defeated Vendettito 5,000 times, but he hadn't enough. He attempted to learn the combo of the guy's healing magic, creation magic, the mandate of nature, and the providence domain of nature.
The clone manifested in Leo's universe again. He stood on the grassland world that Leo always used as a battleground against all fighters in the past, brandishing a railgun rifle and aiming at Leo who positioned himself 100 meters away.
PWHOOSH
The railgun uttered a muffled sound. A black lightning bolt traveled at the speed of light and accurately hit Leo's face.
ZZZZZZ
Leo was knocked 100 meters backward. A burnt mark was left behind on his forehead.
"Dammit. I want to study your combo, not your stupid anti-domain railgun."
Vendettito's clone didn't bother listening to Leo. He kept firing while a green magic circle emerged under his feet. It expanded like a ripple, covering a span of 100 kilometers instantly.
Leo had seen this move several thousand times. He wryly smiled while he swiped his dirty forehead.
"Here comes the mandate. So, the next move is…"
A black stone spike protruded from the ground, threatening to pierce Leo like a kebab. The latter shifted his body to the side and avoided the attack by a hairbreadth.
The black spike transformed into a black tree. Sharp branches extended from the spike and pursued Leo like a homing missile.
Leo lightly kicked the ground and vanished. He reappeared behind Vendettito and threw a light jab.
Vendettito also instantly teleported like a character from DBZ. He reappeared behind Leo while he pointed the railgun at the back of Leo's head at point-blank range.
PWHOOSH
The beam directly hit Leo, causing him to tumble forward. At the same time, a new spike emerged from the ground and came for Leo's head.
"Oh, boy. This combo again? I want to learn a new one."
Leo purposely remained still.
BONK
The spike failed to penetrate Leo's forehead. The surface of the stone shattered, but it managed to push Leo's head backward.
Vendettito's clone realized that no attack worked on Leo. He sacrificed some of his lifespans to cast creation magic and healing magic at once.
A flat 10cm-diameter silver magic circle of a healing spell appeared first. But as soon as the creation magic combined with the old spell, the magic circle changed shapes, transforming into a black runic symbol.
It spelled 'Death'.
Leo glanced at the spell and smirked. He took notes, "Finally a new trick. I guess I have to let you attack me a few times for you to use your ultimate combo, I see."
In the previous fights, Leo didn't wait for the clones to attack him first. He fought like a game-speedrunner, defeating the clones within a minute of every fight.
He thought that he could master every skill that the clones had. Unfortunately, Leo had already absorbed so many fragments of memory and experience. All the experience he had learned so far wasn't warranted.
He needed to put them into practice by either learning it from the user or using it himself.
Getting hit by their skill combination was a quick way to master their abilities. Within a minute, Leo was enlightened.
"Ah, yes. Mixing magic creates a new magic entirely. Also, that creation magic works with other magic…"
Leo vanished while being in mid-air. He reappeared a hundred meters away from Vedettito.
The death symbol missed the target. However, Vendettito put his right palm on his left bicep while his left hand formed a two-finger sword. He waved his fingers, commanding the death symbol to chase after Leo. While he was at it, a thousand black and white magic circles manifested and surrounded Leo from all sides.
Leo glanced at the thousand silver geometric symbols. He thought of a certain healer in an 18+ anime and smirked.
"Right. Reverse healing. Thanks again. I learn a lot."
Leo lightly stomped the ground. A flat silver magic circle manifested and overlapped with Vendettito's providence domain. Leo then snapped his fingers and imitated the abilities of Vendettito in a different version.
He imagined the word 'Steal'.
PLOP
PLOP
All magic circles in the air turned black one after another. They stopped moving toward him.
Vendettito flinched. A second later, he coughed blood as he lost control of his domain power.
"If creation magic can tamper with other spells, then will it work against Qi-based domain abilities and laws? I guess it works."
After he had successfully stolen all completed spells in Vendettito's domain, including his mandate and providence domains, Leo had enough. He swiped his hand, gesturing a slice while aiming at Vendettito's neck.
SWUA
Vendettito's head fell from his shoulder. His artificial soul was also cut in half and vanished.
DING
<You have defeated Vendettito Sugondese the Third.>
Leo shrugged. He returned his consciousness to reality with the newfound power.
.
.
When Leo reopened his eyes, the team already entered the fortress. The steel gate behind them lowered and closed the entrance road.
"Hmm?"
Leo looked back and noticed that Vendettito's men quickly closed the gate right after everybody had gotten in. He raised his eyebrows in suspicion.
"Among Us?"
The others looked at Leo, "Among us?"
"It's nothing. Just muttering to myself."
"..Okay."
Leo inwardly laughed while the SFX of a certain game echoed in his mind. He wondered what Vendettito was cooking, and he couldn't wait to shove it up the chef's rectum.
Meanwhile, Vendettito was satisfied with the preparation. He had bought an hour. With this much time spent, Eleanor should have learned about the wanted man's location.
"By the way," Vendettito glanced at the wolf golem that Leo had been riding. As it resembled the Fenrir Werewolf race, he couldn't help but ask. "What's your relationship with the werewolf race? I see that you're using a golem of a Fenrir Werewolf. Are you close with them?"
Leo patted Lucky's head and feigned ignorance, "What Fenrir Werewolf? Are they some kind of endangered species?"
"…The Fenrir Werewolves are the second-class population of DEZNUTS. Although they aren't important, I hope you won't treat them as pets or anything similar. They have rights."
"If you mean the right to invade someone's planet unprovoked, I would like you to remove that soon. It's annoying."
Vendettito frowned and stopped walking. He turned around while the group was on the main road between two training grounds of local soldiers.
"What do you mean? Did they invade your planet?"
"No. They actually invaded my friend's planet, and I don't like it."
"…I see. Who is your friend?"
"Overlord Lucky."
"…"
Again, Vendettito deeply furrowed his eyebrows. He was certain that Overlord Lucky was Eleanor's right-hand man. By logic, the overlord should not be Leo's friend.
Since their relationship seemed complicated, Vendettito chose not to proactively attack Leo first. He continued buying time, waiting for Eleanor's troops to arrive.
"I see that you're friends with one of our great generals. For now, let's get inside the castle. We have prepared rooms to accommodate you. Also, at night, we shall hold a welcome banquet."
"That's very nice of you. By the way, I have another question."
Leo scanned the fortress and checked the number of garrisons. A total of 2,000 immortals, 20 deities, five sages, and two entities were present. No mortal was nearby.
After confirming the number of potential enemies, Leo requested something absurd.
"Does your planet have something like this?"
Leo brought out a piece of sky fate crystal from his alien ring. He flipped it around to show it to Vendettito and nearby elves.
As Leo had expected, Vendettito's expression turned solemn. He took a few seconds to pace his breath and inquired, "What is that, sir?"
"A fate crystal. I'm a collector, you see. I hope that your planet has these. I would like to make a trade with you for such crystals."
"Unfortunately, this is the first time I've seen the crystal. I doubt we even have one on this planet."
"Are you sure?"
"We are sure."
"Cool. Then, let's not waste time. Could you open the gate and let my men return? Since there is no need for a trade, their trip will be in vain. Instead of letting them get stuck here for days, I'd like them to go back and spend their time cultivating back home."
"…"
Vendettito glanced at the crowd of immortals. He sized up Hua Jiashan, Han Hao, Han Meng, and others. Since they were weak quasi-immortals and immortals, he thought they were Leo's luggage carriers.
"Since we're here, won't you let them have some rest and enjoy the feast first?"
"It's just an hour walk. They're all immortals. I doubt they need rest."
Leo glanced at Ricardo and Taxi. He secretly sent a sound transmission to them.
'These green people are not friendly. I think they are planning to kill us here. Bring the others back first.'
Taxi and Ricardo's expressions turned dark. They didn't move an inch, but they replied.
'SMASH!' (Understood. By the way, would you like us to call for reinforcement?)
'Lucky and I are enough. But if you're worried, go tell the devil and the fisherman statue that I might be in trouble.'
'SMASH!' (Got it!)
Leo shifted his gaze to Vendettito, "Well? Can they go home first?"
"What about you?"
"I will stay, of course."
"Then, I don't see any problem. GUARDS! OPEN THE GATE AND ESCORT THE FRIENDS BACK TO THEIR PORTAL!"
Getting permission, Leo patted Lucky's head. He whispered.
"Go with them. Kill anyone if they play any trick."
Lucky's pupils dilated. He sneered at the elves, "Woof!"
Hua Jiashan and the others were still confused as to why Leo suddenly drove them back. But since Leo made the decision, they reluctantly followed the escorting soldiers to leave the fortress. Lucky followed after them while he observed the guards.
Nine guests left. Leo remained behind. The gate was closed again.
While monitoring the group with his senses, Leo gestured to Vendettito, "Let's get in. I can't wait to see the food."
.
.
Meanwhile, Cat was perplexed. She couldn't understand why Leo forced them to go home when the fortress seemed delicious.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Can I eat the fortress? The white metal smells really delicious!)
Taxi patted Cat's head.
"Smash." (Not yet. The lord said that there were ambushes inside. He drove us out to protect us.)
"NYA?!" (Enemies?! Are those green people enemies?!)
"Smash." (It seems that way.)
"Nom-Nom Meow <3" (Then, can I eat them now?)
"Smash!" (Of course not-)
It was too late for Taxi to stop Cat. The group had only exited the fortress by a minute, but Cat already approached the nearest green elf soldier.
The soldier wore a set of thick black leather armor, made from a bear of this planet. Its odor was similar to a piece of dried meat.
Cat drooled when her nose caught the scent. She rushed toward the elf who followed them at the back, then she tugged his shirt.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Let me eat you, please.)
"What?" The elf couldn't understand Cat's weird language.
By the time he turned to Cat, the latter's head expanded by 2 meters in diameter. Like a snake, her mouth opened wide and chomped down on the unsuspected elf.
GULP
Cat didn't bother chewing the elf. She swallowed him whole and let her digestive fluid melt him.

chapters.title: Chapter 264 Florida Man Implanted CPU Chip in His Son’s Brain to Improve His IQ. The Son Later Diagnosed with Autism.
chapters.content:
Chapter 264 Florida Man Implanted CPU Chip in His Son’s Brain to Improve His IQ. The Son Later Diagnosed with Autism.
Chapter 264 – Florida Man Implanted CPU Chip in His Son's Brain to Improve His IQ. The Son Later Diagnosed with Autism.
Taxi and Ricardo were the only ones who witnessed the vore scene. They covered their mouths and looked around.
"Smash!?" (Are you crazy?! You are going to kill us all!)
Cat instantly shrank her head back to a pretty girl's head. She licked her lips while the corners of her mouth curved up. Her smug smile annoyed Taxi and Ricardo.
"Meow?" (Nobody was looking though. Look around. Has anybody noticed the missing guy yet?)
"…"
Taxi and Ricardo swept their gaze around them.
The escort soldiers didn't even notice the missing guy. Moreover, the pedestrians on the bridge and the road didn't even pay attention to them as they were at the back of the caravan – All eyes focused on Lucky and the squad leader of the escort troops.
"Meow <3" (See? Nobody suspects a thing <3)
Taxi had the urge to bonk Cat and reprimand her. Afraid of attracting attention, the pony man only gave Cat a solemn look.
"…Smash." (One is enough. No more, or we'll be killed.)
"Meow." (Fine. I'm full anyway. That guy was just a desert.)
"…"
Cat hummed and followed the caravan as if nothing had happened. Ricardo and Taxi let out a long sigh before they followed the troublemaking kid. They positioned themselves on her left and right, sandwiching her and preventing her from breaking the formation again.
.
Meanwhile, a 5,000-year-old green elf slowed his feet and glanced behind him.
Rockhart Pepopile was his name. His handsome face perfectly fit the image of fantasy elves in Leo's imagination, except for his robust muscles. His cultivation base was a 7-star deity, and he was over 5,000 years old.
Rockhart had been monitoring Leo's subordinates since they had departed. Cat's action never escaped his detection range.
Despite witnessing the assassination, Rockhart grinned. He secretly sized up Cat and checked her figure.
He loved little girls, especially dark-skinned girls. Cat's dark elf girl appearance fit his taste perfectly.
Rockhart was rock-hard. His pants swelled around his crotch area.
He wanted her.
'Stupid girl. It's your fault for killing my soldier. Well, even if you didn't do it, I will still make you mine anyway. A brat like you needs CORRECTION!'
His lecherous thoughts synchronized with his aura. Purple air leaked from his skin's pores, causing everybody nearby to look at him.
Hua Jiashan, Han Hao, Han Meng, and Tiger Swordsman frowned. Their instinct cried that the man had a perverted thought. Dongfang Mei also raised her eyebrows as she recognized this strange aura color.
As for the subordinates of Rockhart, they got used to it. They were aware of this guy's fetish and hobbies.
'Here we go again. This damn pedophile.'
'Is he fantasizing about his slaves again? Or rather, is he eyeing on someone around here?'
'Will he die if he stops kidnapping young women for a day? Because of him, all young elves have relocated to other provinces.'
Not everybody had a high opinion of this captain. Most of them wanted him gone because of his sickening behavior and dark hobbies.
30 minutes later, the group was halfway toward the portal. Rockhart started his scheme, ordering everybody to stop.
"Halt. Let's rest a bit."
"…"
The elf soldiers weren't tired, but they rested as ordered. As for Leo's subordinates, they let out a long sigh as they were mentally exhausted. Hua Jiashan and the elders took this opportunity to rest under a shade and took a sip of tea.
Cat, Taxi, and Ricardo remained close to Lucky as their monster instinct made them attracted to stronger monsters. As for Lucky, he chose a large boulder to sit on and observed Leo's people.
While everybody was resting on the side road, Rockhart took this opportunity to approach Cat.
"Hello, young lady. Is this your first time visiting our planet?"
Cat innocently tilted her head and looked at the handsome elf's face. She meowed.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Do you have food?)
"Err, what?"
"Nom-Nom?" (I said, do you have food?)
Rockhart was confused. He looked at Ricardo and Taxi, asking them with his eyes to translate for him.
Both horses in disguise shook their heads and smirked. They glanced at Lucky.
Lucky noticed their gestures. He snorted and translated Cat's language.
"She simply asked you if you had food to spare, woof."
"Oh! That's what she means! But… what happens to her speech? Why is she talking like a cat?"
Lucky snorted, "She isn't even an elf, woof. She's a mutated dryad, born from our lord's essence. Because of the mutation and her age, she hasn't been able to communicate normally. It takes time for her to adapt and adjust her vocal cords, woof."
"…I see. But since you mention her age, how old is she?"
"Less than a year old, woof."
"…"
Rockhart dropped his jaw. Although he was into children and young maidens, he had never touched an infant before, especially monster infants.
He salivated. In his eyes, Cat's petite body and sexy figure were irresistible. He wanted her to join his collections.
"Can I ask you something specific?" Rockhart smiled at Lucky.
"Speak, woof!"
"Is she the lord's servant or slave? Can I purchase her?"
Ricardo and Taxi jumped up from their seats and stood in between Cat and Rockhart. Their bloodshot eyes glared at the pedophile.
"SMASH!" (This sicko deserves a thousand death! HOW DARE YOU?!)
"SMASH!" (YOU WANT HER? OVER MY DEAD BODY, PUNK!)
Despite being weak immortals, they showed no fear in front of a deity. As they still wore Leo's suit, they were confident that they couldn't be killed by a lowly deity.
Rockhart sneered at the ponies. However, he was conscious of Lucky's superior cultivation. Thus, he conceded.
"I see that she's a very important person among you. Please forgive me for my rudeness. Forget what I ask."
Lucky smacked his lips. He bellowed.
"Then, scram! There is nothing to sell here!"
"…"
Rockhart lowered his head and retreated without saying anything. He turned around and hid his cold eyes.
'I guess I have no choice.'
Rockhart coughed and sent a sound transmission to his superior officer, who was another entity beside Vendettito.
"Sir, one of Florida Man's subordinates has killed one of us. They have an entity as an escort. I'm afraid that we might take a heavy casualty if we try to arrest them."
As soon as Rockhart sent the words, the reply from Vendettito's colleague echoed.
"I hear you. I'll take care of that entity. You should start calling for backup and have them arrest the intruders."
"Yes, sir!"
Rockhart licked his lips and ended the call. He rubbed his hands, looking forward to violating Cat and torturing Ricardo and Taxi.
.
.
DING
DING
Meanwhile, 50,000km away from Ester's planet, Eleanor's flagship and the cubic motherships reformed their formation, preparing to enter the world's orbit.
Eleanor leisurely reclined her sofa, gazing at the bridge's monitor. The ship's captain stood behind her, acting as her aide.
The ship captain was a divine elf, whose blond hair, jade white skin, and beautiful face were not inferior to Eleanor. He looked like a young man in his 20s, but his real age surpassed 20,000.
Dowbad Dragondese was one of the few karmic sovereigns under Eleanor's command. His combat prowess was only second to Eleanor, and he was the grand commander of the DEZNUTS council.
Dowbad glanced at his system menu and pressed a few buttons. He adjusted his status attributes and ability points, preparing for another combat against an entity.
His system was a leveling system. He could get stronger infinitely as long as he could kill an opponent in the same cultivation base. However, as he couldn't find an opponent in the same cultivation base to kill, his level got stuck there for years.
Dowbad finished with his skill settings. He adjusted his white robes and checked his inventory system before he pulled out a long sword and a silver shotgun.
Overlord Lucky was also behind Eleanor. When he noticed that Dowbad was eager to enter a battle, he snorted.
"Her Majesty hasn't asked you to make a move yet. Stand down!"
Dowbad calmly refuted, "I'm just preparing my gear. It has nothing to do with you."
"Yes, it has everything to do with me. I'm Her Majesty's bodyguard, and you're taking out arms while we're in the proximity of her grace. Unarm yourself before I cut you to pieces!"
"Oooh. Scary."
Dowbad snickered and put his weapons away.
Eleanor ignored the banter. She closed her eyes and used one of her unique dao.
In her mind, she could see visions of the present events or secretly enter anybody's mind and spy on them, snooping the events from their perspective. She could also read their minds while her consciousness was inside her victim.
However, there was one condition to use her ability. She could only spy on fellow Fate Crystal users. She could not possess others who didn't have a crystal in their souls.
Coincidentally, Leo fulfilled this unique condition. Eleanor found his life signature and sent her consciousness to slip into his sea of consciousness.
It only took two seconds for her consciousness to enter Leo's mind. She hid in there and watched the scenery from Leo's perspective. While she was at it, she slowly collected and read his memory and mind.
10 seconds later, Eleanor frowned. She couldn't hear his thoughts or see the images of his imagination. Leo only dully gazed at Vendettito, but his mind was blank.
"What's the matter with this man?" Eleanor thought. She found Leo weird.
He had no thoughts! His head was completely blank!
Baffled and perplexed by Leo's mentality and thoughts, Eleanor stopped reading his thoughts but focused on reading his memory.
As soon as Eleanor snooped into Leo's core memory, she found a mental wall, made of a divine elf's magic and unknown karmic sovereign's dao.
"Hmm?"
Eleanor recognized this magic and dao. After all, she was the one who designed it. She once used it to brainwash countless races into submission.
"Aha! So, you were once my minion! I thought you were someone great, but it seems you are just one of my forgotten pawns. Very well, since you've returned, I shall welcome you to my army. Let me reactivate that magic seal and rewrite your memory again!"
Eleanor burst into laughter. Her consciousness attempted to touch the magic wall.
VHOOM
Suddenly, the square, circle, and mathematic symbols on the magic circle moved and transformed into a large eyeball. It stared at Eleanor and emitted rainbow lights.
"!!!"
Eleanor sensed something amiss. She retreated from the consciousness and snapped open her eyes.
When she came back to her senses, she discovered that her back was full of sweat.
"That eye…"
Eleanor deeply furrowed her brows. She screamed in anger.
"ASLAN! YOU DAMN TRAITOR!"
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo scratched his head so hard that his hair got messy. He felt like a bug had been crawling inside his brain for a moment.
"Odd. I almost dug out my brain… Was there something in there?"
On the other hand, Aslan who was still guarding the mystic realm platform, revealed a sarcastic smile. He inwardly laughed.
"Peek-a-boo, Eleanor. Do you think I didn't put a safeguard in my son's mind? You're na?ve! Now, your location is exposed, and I can send the coordinates to your enemies."
Aslan burst into laughter while he sent a sound transmission to various aliens in the Fate stadium. He revealed Eleanor's current whereabouts to everybody inside.
Among the people in the Fate stadium, Ellen, Milo, and Simba were a part of them. They picked up the sound transmission and looked up to the sky.
Ellen revealed a sinister smile. She clenched her fist.
"Aha! There you are!"
On the other hand, Simba's face was as pale as a sheet. The location was too close to his home, where Ester and his son resided.
"Shit!"

chapters.title: Chapter 265 Karen Called Cops on Florida Man for Marrying Her Daughter Whom She Attempted to Murder.
chapters.content:
Chapter 265 Karen Called Cops on Florida Man for Marrying Her Daughter Whom She Attempted to Murder.
Chapter 265 – Karen Called Cops on Florida Man for Marrying Her Daughter Whom She Attempted to Murder.
The fortress "Parodies" was located in the middle of the province. Not only it was the home of Vendettito, but it was also the primary assembly point for soldiers. Thus, many strong sages and deities garrisoned in this fortress.
The primary materials of this fortress were strange white bricks and stones. They exuded strong yang Qi, soothing everybody within the fortress. Because of its nature, the weather inside the fortress was warmer than the outside.
In the fortress, Leo inspected the interior of the fortress. The ceiling was quite short as it was only two meters tall. Only two people could fit in a hallway at once, and many random jars and tables sometimes got in the way of walking. Moreover, no light source existed except for the glowing white stones on the floor.
The interior of the fortress was designed to hinder potential intruders or troops. As the hallways and the ceiling were small, not many troops could enter the fortress at once, making it easier to defend.
In addition, the hallways and the passageways in this fortress were a maze. He had been following Vendettito for 10 minutes in this building, but they hadn't found the stairs to the higher floor yet.
Leo grumbled while he followed Vendettito into the fortress. The room temperature was already 60 degrees Celsius, which was absurdly uncomfortable for someone who always lived in a cold climate. Despite being in this environment, Leo never broke a sweat.
Vendettito, on the other hand, seemed comfortable in this temperature. He sneaked glances at Leo and inwardly smirked.
"How is the fortress, Sir Florida Man? Does the yang Qi of our palace suit your liking?"
Leo snorted, "Are we there yet? We have been walking in this maze for a while."
"We can't help it. This fortress is already old. It was designed this way to defend against a siege."
"Yeah, right. Siege. A warship could have bombarded this place to the Stone Age. What's the point of this floor plan?"
"Hahahaha! You must haven't heard about the Styx Clay before. This fortress and the walls are built using the Styx Clay. No anti-domain gun or mandate domain can put a dent on it unless you're a karmic sovereign."
"That's what I'm saying. It's pointless. If a karmic sovereign can destroy it, why bother making it complicated? Those guys can just simply teleport randomly and enter your house, no? I bet housemaids never last a month working here. Cleaning these hallways and the entire maze is a hassle."
Vendettito narrowed his eyes. He knew that Leo was strong, but he didn't believe that Leo was capable of destroying this fortress. He continued bringing Leo deeper into the fortress to buy more time.
However, Leo was tired of this farce. He stopped walking and placed his hand on a wall.
DING
A large chunk of the wall vanished into Leo's system inventory. He planned to research this material late.
Vendettito didn't notice the disappearance of the wall. He continued walking, leading Leo.
Seeing how Vendettito no longer paid attention to his actions, Leo grinned and hurried his feet. He followed Vendettito while he randomly touched things, storing and stealing everything he touched.
Leo got greedier. Instead of touching the walls, doors, or random furniture on the way, he reached out and touched the short ceiling.
DING
DING
Like a monkey, Leo walked while he raised his hands to the sky. He snickered and kept up the pace.
As Leo stole more walls and white blocks, the wind blew into the hallway. Vendettito noticed it and turned around.
"Huh?"
Leo instantly stopped playing around. He deeply inhaled and unleashed his time and space domain.
CLICK-CLICK-CLICK
The clocks stopped ticking while the time in the solar system froze.
'Time to finish this. I should start by getting rid of this fool.'
Leo didn't bother waiting to confirm Vendettito's motive. He threw a punch to the elf's face, exploding his head upon impact. The pieces of flesh scattered in every direction for a few seconds before they were suspended in mid-air.
Unfortunately, killing an entity was not a simple task. As soon as Leo destroyed Vendettito's head, his soul was ejected from the body and flew away even though Leo's time domain was in effect.
"Nope! You're not getting away!"
Leo extended his hand into a grasp motion. As soon as he clenched his fist, the transparent blue orb of Vendettito's soul shattered into dust.
"Alright!"
Leo laughed after confirming the kill. He turned his attention to the fortress next. He maintained the power of time domain and took advantage of it.
"It would have been a shame if we returned empty-handed. Time to loot."
.
.
In the flagship, Eleanor, Dowbad, and Overlord Lucky were about to teleport to the Parodies Fortress to assess the situation Dowbad vanished first as he was eager to play with the wanted man.
CLICK-CLICK-CLICK
As soon as Dowbad was gone, the time domain of Leo reached them. Everybody in the ship and the other motherships were suspended in the grey domain.
"Heh, a time and space law? How cute."
Overlord Lucky snorted and broke out of the time domain. He rubbed his arms and prepared to destroy it.
Eleanor also easily broke free from the domain's restriction. However, her expression was still dark as she was still wary of a certain dead researcher.
"I told Mao Miaomiao to kill everybody, including Aslan and the local elves! How did he survive?!"
Eleanor ignored the time domain. Because of her anxiousness, she teleported away and reappeared 50 galaxies away from the flagship.
Below here was the karma river of this universe. Although it was called a river, the mass of white water was larger than Earth's water mass. They covered the span of 49 solar systems combined.
It was a radiant ocean in the void!
Countless souls hibernated in there, waiting for their reincarnation opportunities. At the bottom of the sea hid the embryos of new souls who were about to replace the destroyed souls.
Eleanor scanned through the White Sea and searched for the souls of Mao Miaomiao, Aslan, and the people who were involved in the project.
10 minutes later, she managed to locate some of the scientists and relatives of the local elves. However, she couldn't find Aslan and Mao Miaomiao.
This confirmed her worries.
"As I thought. Aslan, you're still lurking in this universe. That was not just a typical will. It WAS your consciousness and your soul!"
Eleanor smacked her lips as she remembered Aslan well.
.
.
Aslan was a famous divine elf who graduated from the royal academy at the age of 13. The man reached the entity realm at the age of 16, breaking all the records of divine elves.
His talent piqued Eleanor's interest in his bloodline and intelligence. She invited him to join her harem, hoping to merge his bloodline with hers to give birth to talented children.
Unfortunately, Aslan was uncooperative. Instead of joining Eleanor's harem, he accepted a lowly spy job and was deployed to Earth. Coincidentally, the task was related to Eleanor's secret project – The Soul Transfer Research Project.
Eleanor was enraged when she discovered the news. She traveled to Earth to visit Aslan. Then, she offered him to become his mentor, hoping to win him back.
Aslan accepted. He became Eleanor's disciple for a while, and their relationship got closer. However, Aslan always rejected Eleanor's approach when things got too intimate.
Because of Aslan's dullness, Eleanor got bored of him. She returned to her constellation as she had a domain to manage. She thought that Aslan would still respect her as his mentor.
Again, Aslan quickly betrayed Eleanor. He fell in love with a female human scientist and married her. She soon conceived a baby boy named Leonardo.
The news of Aslan's marriage quickly reached Eleanor. Her pride as the queen shattered, and she wanted him and his family dead in the most painful way possible. Thus, she started colluding with Dr. Mao, who was a harmless earthling.
Because of Dr. Mao and the local governments, the kid 'Leonardo' was forced to join the project as one of the test subjects. Aslan and his wife protested at first. But when Eleanor made her appearance and personally monitored the project, Aslan and his wife were forced to cooperate.
Still, Aslan was not stupid enough to sit idly and wait for his son to die. He scammed Eleanor to exchange her stars with the top overlord's blood to boost the project's success rate. He even seduced her, promising her that he would divorce his wife and join her harem.
Eleanor succumbed to Aslan's scheme and agreed to his request. She contacted several overlords, such as Overlord Xiaomao, Overlord Mustafa of Cathulhu, and the phoenix overlord for their bloodline. The valuable blood essence was cloned and distributed to the test subjects later.
With Aslan's help, the first few phases were successful. The test subject 'Leonardo' and 'Simba' evolved, and their physiques became compatible with a divine elf's soul.
But when it was time for Aslan to fulfill his promise and surrender himself to Eleanor, he escaped with his son and 'Simba'. They disguised themselves as commoners and hid in Florida for decades until Dr. Mao Miaomiao reported the news to Eleanor.
Afterward, a tragedy struck.
.
.
Eleanor stopped thinking. She seethed her anger whenever she thought of her former crush.
"I taught you everything. I gave you wealth, status, and fame, yet you chose a powerless human. Very well, since that FLORIDA MAN is your son, I'll send you and him to hell together! But first, I have this!"
Eleanor burst into laughter while she pointed her finger at the karma river.
"I command you! From now on, I'm your master! You all shall join my dantian universe and become my power!"
RUMBLE
As soon as Eleanor's mandate was in effect, the entire White Sea shrank and entered Eleanor's dantian. All quadrillion souls in the river vanished into her body.
Eleanor's cultivation base increased. As a karmic sovereign, every karma river inside her increased her strength by a stage. Moreover, each karma river could negate death, allowing her to self-resurrect whenever and wherever she wanted.
After digesting the karma river, she thought of Mao Miaomiao. Eleanor still doubted how that devil perished even though he could consume souls in his dantian universe's karma rivers to self-resurrect.
'Tsk. That moron. Well, it doesn't matter. With this, Aslan and that Florida Man won't be my opponent! I'll crush them myself!'
Eleanor teleported again and reappeared on top of the Parodies Fortress. Next to her was Dowbad, who had already broken free from Leo's restrictions.
The captain looked at his master.
"Are we attacking him together?"
Eleanor snorted, "Kill him in one attack. I don't care what happens to his soul. I want him dead."
"Good. I'll make the first move!"
A trail of water flowed out from Dowbad's fingers and the pores of his skin. They were the water from his karma river, which could instantly destroy any foreign entity or karmic sovereign's body upon touch.
But instead of aiming at Leo on the first floor, Dowbad gathered the water mass and targeted Leo's time and space domain. He made a slash motion.
.
.
Leo looked up as he sensed two karmic sovereigns on top of the fortress within his domain.
"…Ah. Right. The domain vulnerability. How annoying."
Leo retracted the domain. But instead of dispelling it completely, Leo cast a new spell to trick the two enemies.
A magic circle appeared underground, covering the entire fortress. It was Leo's combination between the nature spell and the creation spell.
The spell transformed the geometric symbols in the circle into words – SLOW.
RUMBLE
The spell worked as intended. Aside from the caster, everybody in the domain moved in slow motion.
SWUA
As soon as the spell replaced the time domain, Dowbad's attack hit the spell's magic circle. It shattered the word in one hit.
The slow-motion effect was dispelled!
"Wow. That was close!"
Leo laughed and kicked the ground, teleporting himself to the sky.
When Leo reappeared, he looked down and found himself above the fortress. On a fortress tower's rooftop, two karmic sovereigns looked up and stared at him.
Leo and Eleanor stared at each other. The latter raised her eyebrows in astonishment as Leo's face looked exactly like Aslan's.
"…"
Seeing the child of the man she once loved, Eleanor's heart softened. She ceased her killing intent.
"Florida Man, I assume."
Leo snorted, "You look like Esen. Are you her mother?"
"Oh?" Eleanor was surprised. She narrowed her eyes. "Do you know my daughter?"
"She's my wife, of course!"
Eleanor was taken aback. Because Leo's voice and face were similar to Aslan's, the PTSD of the past resurfaced. "You father and son are the same. Your stupidity knows no bounds."
Leo ignored her comment since he was used to being called stupid. "Well, if you're her mother, I must express my gratitude. Thanks for giving birth to my cute wife and throwing her away. I'm not sorry that I banged your daughter, and I ain't refunding or returning her. Finder's keeper!"
"…You, what?"
"Anyway, what's your problem? Why the hell did you kill and curse your daughter? Are you one of those 'I'm a proud single mother, but I can't raise children for shit' mothers? Also, who's her father anyway, I'm curious. Don't tell me that you don't remember whose dick you rode, bitch. Should I change the questions to… wait a second. Out of context, what's your body count? 5? 10? 50? Spartan 300?"
"…"
After witnessing Leo's weird tone and manner, Eleanor changed her mind. She wasn't into freaks or men with mental issues. Eleanor raised her arm and unleashed her power.
"Go to hell."

chapters.title: Chapter 266 Florida Man Accidentally Snapped His Mother-in-Law’s Neck While Roleplaying as Dark Lord of the Sith.
chapters.content:
Chapter 266 Florida Man Accidentally Snapped His Mother-in-Law’s Neck While Roleplaying as Dark Lord of the Sith.
Chapter 266 – Florida Man Accidentally Snapped His Mother-in-Law's Neck While Roleplaying as Dark Lord of the Sith.
Leo gazed at the two karmic sovereigns. He was slightly nervous if he should fight them before he could learn about their skills. After all, clones of "Kitten" managed to kill him several times in the simulation.
If an entity like Kitten could kill him, Leo was afraid that these two karmic sovereigns might be able to kill him as well. He decided to play it safe by not recklessly using a big skill, such as domains and power moves.
Leo pulled out the staff of singularity in preparation in preparation.
As Leo had predicted, Eleanor made her move first. She created a thousand mysterious white liquid in front of her and fired everything toward him.
Although the water droplets seemed harmless, Leo took a precautionary move. He blinked and appeared 100 meters away from the previous location. He stretched his arm and pointed his staff at Eleanor.
Retaliating, Leo injected a star's worth of Qi into his staff, transforming it into a boomstick. He pulled the trigger. A thousand rainbow-colored laser beams repeatedly flashed, targeting Eleanor and Dowbad.
As soon as Dowbad and Eleanor noticed the rainbow beams, their expressions changed. Both vanished and reappeared 10 meters behind Leo.
Dowbad also drew his karma river to condense white water in his hand. The fluid condensed into a long sword while Dowbad swung it. At the same time, Eleanor transformed her karma river into strings and spread them around Leo, blocking his escape route.
Leo raised his eyebrows while he glanced at the karma water strings. He raised his staff and blocked the water sword strike.
CLANK
The karma water sword shattered upon impact. The liquid dispersed into fog and gathered inside Leo's stomach.
Dowbad dropped his jaw in shock, "HOW IS THAT POSSIBLE?!"
Leo shrugged and pointed the staff's muzzle at Dowbad's face. He pulled the trigger.
"TSK!"
Dowbad bent backward and narrowly dodged the beam by a hairbreadth.
Leo sneered at Dowbad. He activated the second feature of the staff by flipping the hidden switch on the shaft.
VHOOM
The beam faded. However, a thick rainbow plasma sword replaced it.
Using the staff as a plasma halberd, Leo swung the staff down, aiming to cut Dowbad in half.
Dowbad groaned and twisted his body in midair, dodging the unknown rainbow lightsaber. While dodging, he pointed his fingers at Leo and fired karma river bullets at him.
Leo rotated his staff with one hand, deflecting the bullets. As for his other hand, he pulled out a pistol and started blasting.
BOOM
The upgraded pistol unleashed a massive rainbow laser beam, devouring half of Dowbad's torso in one shot!
"!!!"
