Dowbad widened his eyes in shock as his body gradually disintegrated into dust. Protecting his life, ejected his soul from his brain, sacrificing his fleshly body.
The karma river in his soul condensed a new physique and resurrected him. The elf returned naked and weaponless. Saving his skin, he retreated, teleporting back to his battleship.
Leo didn't pursue him. He shifted his attention to Eleanor.
The battle only lasted three seconds. However, those three seconds were enough for Eleanor to finish multiple incantations and spells.
The karma river strings around them shrank while the tips of the strings pursued Leo like homing missiles.
Leo waved the lightsaber halberd. The rainbow plasma blade cut through the strings like paper. While defending himself, his other hand shifted his pistol and pulled the trigger.
BOOM
The rainbow Kamehameha was too fast for Eleanor to react. She instantly ejected her soul from her fleshly body as Dowbad did. As for the soulless body of Eleanor, it disintegrated to ash!
The karma river in Eleanor's soul consumed the souls in the river and regenerated her fleshly body. As all her equipment, storage rings, and artifacts had been devoured by Leo's mysterious beam, she remained in her birthday suit.
"I see. You're definitely not an entity but a karmic sovereign like us. No one under the karmic sovereign realm can deflect or defend against karma river techniques." Eleanor praised Leo.
Meanwhile, Leo deeply frowned. She looked too much like Esen, but her breasts and hips were superior to her. He wished that Esen had half of those assets.
"Is an assassination attempt on your son-in-law a tradition of your family? I don't understand your logic sometimes."
"If you want to blame someone, blame your father."
Eleanor snapped her fingers and opened five status screens in front of Leo. All of them featured different system perks.
The first one was a leveling system, displaying her attribute values, skills, magic, and various techniques. On the screen, Eleanor still had unassigned attribute points, which she could use to boost her strength.
The second window showed the description, power level, and strength of Leo. However, most of his information was censored because of his entity fate crystal.
The third revealed Eleanor's system inventory and her items. Similar to Leo's inventory, she had ten thousand different types of items in her inventory slots.
The fourth system screen revealed a shopping website. It allowed Eleanor to exchange her lifespan for system items.
It was the same shopping system that Leo had!
As for the last screen, it was the RTS system. It revealed the universe map and her galaxies in the universe, including the territory of her rivals and enemies. On the screen, her location was deep in her own domain.
"It's your mistake for intruding on my domain, Florida Man. Now that you attacked me, my system can kill you! DIE!"
Eleanor pressed on something on her RTS system screen and cackled.
Leo deeply frowned. He thought of the newbie's protection system that he had in the past, causing him to have goosebumps.
"Shit!"
Leo couldn't believe that someone else had that system too. He raised his staff, preparing to protect himself from random attacks.
One second later, nothing happened.
Five seconds later, everything was quiet.
"Hmm?"
"Huh?"
Both Eleanor and Leo blankly looked at each other in confusion.
"Hey, bitch. Are you sure your system works perfectly? Was that a bluff?"
"T-This is impossible! My systems always attacked every intruder! Why doesn't it work?!"
Nonchalantly, Leo blinked and teleported behind Eleanor. He peeked at her RTS status screen and saw a sentence below.
"Oh."
Although Leo was silly and stupid most of the time, he didn't forget to give Eleanor a firm chokehold. He tightened his arms, making sure that she couldn't escape his grasp.
"Have you read the bottom sentence under the map, you dumb bitch? It literally said [The self-protection feature only works against system users with a lower cultivation base.]"
"WHAT?!"
Eleanor already knew about it. However, the sentence implied another thing that shocked her.
If the system didn't work against Leo, wouldn't that mean his real cultivation base was higher than the karmic sovereign realm?
"IMPOSSIBLE! THE KARMIC SOVEREIGN REALM IS THE PINNACLE OF THE UNIVERSE! NO ONE HAS EVER REACHED THE HIGHER STAGE!!"
"I don't know about you, but I'm probably… that."
Leo gently exerted more strength and snapped Eleanor's neck.
CRACK
Unfortunately, snapping her neck wasn't enough to kill her. At best, it could only shut her mouth for a few seconds.
Leo didn't waste time. While Eleanor was disabled, he closed his eyes to run a simulator. He quickly chose Eleanor's clone as an opponent to learn her skills, hoping to find a way to kill a karmic sovereign.
Five seconds later, Eleanor's bones regenerated and self-repaired. She regained her senses and started summoning her karma river.
CRACK
Leo slightly opened his eyes and snapped her neck for the second time. He also chopped off her arms and legs, making sure that she couldn't use another body part to bring out deadly water from her dantian's karma river again.
Five seconds later, Eleanor recovered. This time, she opened her mouth and vomited the head of a karma dragon.
"Annoying. Can you let me rest for a few minutes?"
CRACK
Leo twisted Eleanor's head for the third time. This time, he grabbed her lower jaw and pushed it against the upper jaw, forcing her to bite the body of the dragon.
The dragon reverted into karma water and dispersed into a fog. They were attracted to a stronger karma river, which was located in Leo's dantian. The fog vanished into Leo's stomach.
Preventing Eleanor from summoning something from her mouth again, Leo mimicked Eleanor's previous actions, drawing karma river water from his dantian to reality.
A stream of rainbow water came out from his index fingertip. He twirled it around Eleanor's head and imagined a thick duct tape.
The stream of river transformed into black duct tape, which sealed Eleanor's mouth and her entire face.
"Ah, this is a lot better."
After sealing her mouth, Leo searched for her karma strings.
Unfortunately, karmic sovereigns were no longer tied to a karma river or a cycle of reincarnation. They were independent of the rivers, and they could even control them.
As Eleanor had no karma strings, Leo was unsure what he should do with her. He closed his eyes and returned to the simulator mode.
Unfortunately, Eleanor was a force to reckon with. She kept restoring her limbs and reattempting to break free.
Leo mercilessly snapped her neck, sealed her meridians, broke her dantian, and even drained her Qi. However, Eleanor always fully recovered within 5 seconds, making the task tedious and grindy.
"AHHHH!! ANNOYING!"
.
.
Meanwhile, Aslan pondered about Leo's foundation. He was aware that his son never had a mentor to teach him about cultivation and the difference in cultivation base, he wondered if Leo could handle a veteran karmic sovereign like Eleanor or Overlord Kishin.
Worrying about Leo, Aslan stood in front of the portal, scanning the leaking energy of the other side. He attempted to play a geo-guessing game, searching for the planet that the portal was connected to.
Several minutes later, Aslan deeply frowned. He recognized the unique air and scent, which only the elf planets had.
"Really? An elf planet?"
Aslan thought of the distance between Eleanor's territory and their location. As they were too far away, his power would be weakened if he traveled there.
As the planet was too far away, Aslan was helpless. He wished that he was the one tagging along with Leo.
While worrying about Leo, Aslan sensed a slight change in the air on the other side. It reeked the smell of a werewolf.
"Oh, dear. Isn't that Overlord Lucky?"
.
.
Overlord Lucky had been watching enough. After Eleanor and Dowbad left the ship, he followed them and landed in front of Ester's house.
Overlord Lucky blasted the front door open and entered the wooden cabin. He searched for a living person inside.
Unfortunately, Ester was not home.
Overlord Lucky didn't leave. He searched Ester's belongings, hoping to find sensitive documents or cultivation resources that Simba had left behind. After ransacking everything in the house, he visited the garage next.
But as soon as Overlord Lucky entered the garage, the caravan of Hua Jiashan, Cat, Taxi, and the others paraded on the street. The commotion got the overlord's attention.
"Hmm."
Overlord Lucky was curious. He went out of the garage and levitated in the sky to see the parade.
He looked at the crowd of immortals in disdain.
"Weaklings here are everywhere. Tsk!"
Overlord Lucky swept his gaze over the caravan. Then, he saw the group of humans, whom he hated.
"And a bunch of Nu'Earthe! Who let those maggots here…HUH?!"
While glaring at the crowd of cultivators, the corner of his eyes spotted a strange individual. He had the appearance of a giant wolf, but his body was made of grey stone.
Overlord Lucky found the guardian statue 'Lucky'.

chapters.title: Chapter 267 Florida Man Faced No Murder Charge after He Gunned Vegan Man Who Attempted to Steal His Potted Marihuana Plant.
chapters.content:
Chapter 267 Florida Man Faced No Murder Charge after He Gunned Vegan Man Who Attempted to Steal His Potted Marihuana Plant.
Chapter 267 – Florida Man Faced No Murder Charge after He Gunned Vegan Man Who Attempted to Steal His Potted Marihuana Plant.
"…A golem? But why…"
Overlord Lucky was perplexed. He had memorized every face of the Fenrir entities, but he didn't remember seeing the golem before. It piqued his interest.
Leaving Ester's house, Overlord Lucky leaped forward and landed on the road, blocking the path of the caravan. He turned around and menacingly glared at the green elves.
Rockhart recognized the overlord. He rushed over and yelled at him.
"Hey! You mutt! You should have come earlier! Now that you're here, kill these people for me! I want that little girl, you hear?!"
"Ah?" Overlord Lucky snarled. He didn't like the elf's tone.
"Don't AH me, you slave! You and all werewolves are our slaves! You will do exactly what I said!!"
Rockhart disregarded the cultivation gap between him and the overlord. He brought out a whip and lashed at the latter's stomach.
"…"
Overlord Lucky felt nothing. His cold eyes stared into Rockhart's soul, not hiding his malicious intent.
Rockhart continued whipping while Overlord Lucky stood there and took it.
"Stop ignoring me, you slave dog! GO! I SAY, GO! KILL THEM!!"
"…"
Despite possessing the power to crush Rockhart in one hit, Overlord Lucky snorted and caught the whip. The weapon dissipated into dust and burnt Rockhart's hands.
"AAAAHHH!!"
Rockhart squealed like a pig. However, his hands weren't injured. Only a fragment of his Qi sent a false alarm to his brain.
"Y-YOU, DAMN MUTT!! HOW DARE YOU BURN ME?! I WILL SUE YOU AND HAVE YOU ARRESTED FOR ASSAULTING A DELEGATE OF DEZNUTS-"
Overlord Lucky had enough. His large hand grabbed Rockhart's head and pulled him toward his face.
"Listen here, you little shit. The only reason you're alive right now is because of the Oath of Fenrir. Even though we've pledged allegiance to the Divine Elves, we are not your slaves or servants!! If you run your mouth one more time, I'll gorge out your eyes, vocal cords, eardrums, and your limbs. I'll make sure you'll spend eternity living in the freezing abyss, unable to speak, hear, or see anything. Bear in mind that the Oath of Fenrir forbids us from killing elves, but it doesn't prevent us from torturing you!! NOW, SCRAM!"
"H-HIEEEKK!!"
Rockhart squealed and fell on his butt. He turned around and ran away without looking back.
Overlord Lucky snorted and turned his attention to the golem who had the same face as him.
BOOM
Suddenly, Rockhart's head shattered and turned into blood mist. The guardian golem "Lucky" stood up and patted her paws after he had swiftly used a blood domain to devour Rockhart's lifespan and blood essence.
The clone faced the original. Both "Lucky" took one step closer to size up their opponent.
Lucky transformed into a humanoid werewolf, preparing for a potential combat.
Overlord Lucky allowed the clone to finish his transformation as he was curious about it. When the golem finished his transformation, Overlord Lucky narrowed his eyes. The golem looked exactly like him. Overlord Lucky disliked this copycat.
"Is this a joke?"
Lucky, the guardian statue, took one step forward and stared into the overlord's eyes. "My life is never a joke, woof. But yours is."
"Aha! Is that a challenge, bitch?!"
"We're trying to return home, woof. It's you who suddenly gets in the way. If you're smarting than dogs, MOVE… bitch. Get out of the way!"
Overlord Lucky sneered. Testing the water, Overlord Lucky deployed the blood domain and attempted to kill everybody behind the golem.
The shadow of Leo wasn't na?ve enough to overlook the domain. He countered it with the same domain while he created a black blood shield and a black blood sword. He slashed forward, attacking the overlord's domain.
Overlord Lucky stepped forward and grabbed the blood sword before it could cut his domain. His other hand generated his blood sword and hacked the copycat's neck.
Lucky, the clone, simply glanced at the blood sword and snorted.
BOOM
The blood sword of the overlord shattered and dispersed into blood mist.
Noticing that his sword was destroyed, Overlord Lucky also clenched his fist and destroyed the copycat's sword as well.
Without a weapon, the guardian bashed his blood shield against the original.
Overlord Lucky couldn't foresee a simple attack. The blood shield smacked his face and cladded his body with glowing black blood. Black lightning within the blood struck the overlord and paralyzed him.
"RUN, WOOF!" Lucky ordered Leo's employees.
Hua Jiashan and the others realized the crisis. They ran past the overlord and rushed toward the portal in front of them. One after another, the cultivators escaped from the home base of green elves.
Taxi, Ricardo, and Cat were the strongest trio in the group. They waited until everybody except Lucky to enter the portal before they made their move.
Unfortunately, the overlord recovered from the paralysis first. He glanced at the trio and bellowed.
Lucky reacted fast. He threw a punch at the overlord's face and stopped the voice attack before it was completed. Overlord Lucky was smacked to the nose and long mouth, causing some of his teeth and fangs to fly.
Overlord Lucky instantly regained his bearing and regenerated the lost teeth. He grabbed the copycat's arm and tried to throw him. However, he forgot that the black blood that got on him earlier was still under his opponent's control.
ZAAAAP
Black electricity ran through the overlord's physique and dantian. Some of his meridians and stars in his dantian universe were destroyed.
Overlord Lucky shifted his attention to the copycat. He glared at him with hatred.
"YOU DAMN GOLEM!!"
Overlord Lucky had enough. As Qi, martial arts, and domain didn't work, he switched his fighting method. A black magic circle manifested underneath the overlord's feet.
Lucky sensed the life force in the magic circle below the overlord. He stomped on the edge of the circle and shattered it before the incantation was finished.
"TSK!"
Overlord Lucky was annoyed. He pulled an underhanded weapon which he didn't like to use – A system weapon. He pulled a gauntlet from his system inventory and equipped it to his right fist.
Lucky flinched as he sensed the threat of that weapon. Buying time, he threw the blood shield at the overlord.
The overlord swatted the shield away with his gauntlet, shattering it into blood mist. He also expanded his muscle mass and dispelled the black blood on him.
That short moment gave Lucky enough time to put on the Florida Domain's uniform, which was a custom-made suit, shirt, and pants, tailored for him.
The overlord directly charged at Lucky like a savage beast. He threw a straight right punch at him.
Lucky raised his guard like a boxer. Using his arm, he blocked the strike.
BOOM!
The power of the system gauntlet pushed Lucky 10 meters backward after the impact. However, his arm and clothes were unharmed.
"What?!" The overlord was in disbelief. His system boasted that the gauntlet boosted his attack power enough to kill any karmic sovereign, yet the copycat was unharmed.
Lucky glanced at the custom-made uniform and grinned. His opponent might have a weapon, but he had the strongest armor in his universe, aka Leo's flesh and blood.
"Enough messing around. You'll regret provoking me, woof!"
"YOU DAMN HERETIC!!"
Both wolves rushed at each other and exchanged punches. None of them bothered utilizing Qi or magic anymore as the fight became personal.
Cat, Taxi, and Ricardo sensed the opportunity. They sprinted and detoured around the two entities, fleeing toward the portal.
BOOM
Suddenly, an ugly green elf descended from the sky and blocked the exit. Rockhart returned and glared at the trio.
"You're not going anywhere!"
Cat smacked her lips in disdain. She pulled out a new weapon, which Leo had given her before they entered the portal.
It was a resizable halberd that mad cows of the Cow Level used. Leo had also tampered with it a little.
.
Rough Halberd of Anti-God
This halberd was mass-produced in a mysterious realm called 'Cow Level'. Its materials, aka deity's blood, and Big Dipper Gold, transform this rough halberd into a weapon, specifically designed to kill gods. No magic or spell can be cast when the user activates its power.
.
Although Cat didn't know what it could do, she had a feeling that it could be useful in this situation. She charged and swung her halberd at the pedophile deity.
Rockhart cackled and waved his hands, drawing magic circles. 16 magic circles appeared and covered his arms, enhancing his physical abilities.
Cat swung the halberd while Rockhart welcomed it by raising his arm to block it.
CLANK!
The magic circles around his arms shattered upon impact. His right arm was sliced in half, and the halberd's dull blade sunk into Rockhart's chest.
"WHAT?! HOW?!"
Rockhart was confused. He was a deity while Cat was just a fledgling immortal. By logic, Cat shouldn't be able to harm him at all.
Taxi and Ricardo learned from the example. They ejected the same halberds from their spatial rings and rushed at the deity.
"DAMN YOU ALL!!"
Rockhart grabbed Cat's halberd and tried to push it away. However, Cat reverted to her monster form while the halberd in her arms grew bigger. She used the enhanced physical power to press the halberd further.
SWUA!
The giant halberd sliced Rockhart's torso in half!
"SMASH!!" (NOW!)
"SMASH!!" (I KNOW!)
The two horses dissected Rockhart's head and torso into a thousand pieces with their halberds!
"Nom-Nom Meow <3!"
Cat's long vine pierced into the stomach of Rockhart. She pulled out his physical dantian crystal and threw it into her mouth.
CRUNCH
She chewed it in glee before she swallowed it. Then, she started stripping the corpse and began eating the flesh.
Meanwhile, the soul of Rockhart was ejected from his dead body. A portion of his Qi in his dantian was transferred to his soul.
However, as a deity's soul physique was inferior to a sage, an entity, or a karmic sovereign, he couldn't regenerate his physique like Eleanor or Dowbad. He became a vengeful ghost.
"YOU WENCH! I WAS TRYING TO MAKE YOU MY WIFE, SO I TOOK IT EASY ON YOU! I'LL SHOW YOU HOW A DEITY FIGHTS-"
BOOM
The ghost suddenly shattered and dispersed into sparkling dust as a rainbow laser beam flashed and punctured through Rockhart's soul.
In the sky, Leo carried the limbless elf queen on his shoulder. He scanned the battlefield below and found Lucky and Overlord Lucky entangled in a fistfight.
"Has the others escaped?" Asked Leo.
Cat, Ricardo, and Taxi were relieved when they saw Leo.
"Meow <3"
"Smash <3!"

chapters.title: Chapter 268 Florida Man Allegedly Killed Stripper by Throwing Landmine on Her Dance Stage.
chapters.content:
Chapter 268 Florida Man Allegedly Killed Stripper by Throwing Landmine on Her Dance Stage.
Chapter 268 – Florida Man Allegedly Killed Stripper by Throwing Landmine on Her Dance Stage.
Leo stared at the fight between overlord Lucky and his subordinate. The two werewolves looked like heavyweight boxers duking it out.
No Qi, no magic, just pure manliness.
Leo respected their choices. He glanced at the nearby green elves and lightly exuded his killing intent.
The immortal elves shrank back in fear. They also noticed the female divine elf on Leo's shoulder, but none of them dared to stop or call out Leo.
"You three, go home. You too, Cat! Stop eating random things around here and leave!"
Cat was still busy eating Rockhart's corpse. She pouted at Leo.
"Nom-Nom Meow!" (I haven't eaten enough yet!)
Leo knew what she wanted. He ejected a chunk of raw mad cow's meat and threw it at her.
Cat's monster mouth was faster than a hungry dog's mouth. She caught it and chewed it in glee.
"You'll get more if you obediently return. Go home."
Cat repeatedly nodded. She transformed into a human while her mouth was still chewing the meat earlier.
Seeing that the troublemaker chose to leave, Taxi and Ricardo nodded at Leo and followed after the dark dryad.
After the liabilities were gone, Leo tossed Eleanor's limbless body on the ground and muttered an incantation of creation magic. He created a new magic spell – Soul Bind.
Seven rainbow metal chains, made of karma water, bound Eleanor's body and latched her with the seven floating magic circles around her. They tightened the bind as if the chains wished to tear her body into pieces.
Leo sat next to Eleanor to monitor her regeneration rate. While he observed Eleanor, he closed his eyes and returned his consciousness to the simulation mode.
.
.
On a grassland that Leo used as a battleground, a clone of Eleanor stood 300 meters away from Leo. Donned in a jewel crown and see-through dress, she seductively moved her hips and played with a wane in her hand in a sexual way.
Leo gazed at the clone of Esen's mother. He let out a long sigh while he glanced at the clone's status.
.
Name: Eleanor Sydin, the Transcendent
Race: Divine Elf
Age: 155,268
Cultivation Base: Transcendent Level 1
Skills: Transcended Dao of True Immortality, Transcended Dao of Necromancy, Transcended Dao of Grand Curse, True Death Grand Magic
Specials: Divine Elf Bloodline, Grand Succubi Bloodline, Vampire Progenitor Bloodline
Favorite Weaponry: Divine Cane of Seven Virtues, Cursed Wane of Seven Sins
Potential Percentage: 1,000%
.
Leo miscalculated. Although Eleanor's current cultivation base reached the karmic sovereign stage, the system gave birth to a stronger version which became a huge issue. Because of her abnormal dao and cultivation strength, Leo kept losing to her.
As the clone had defeated Leo in the simulation mode so many times, she started to get cocky. She no longer proactively tried to defeat him after she was summoned. Instead, she teased him, tempting him with her bodily charm.
The clone slowly stripped her clothes, trinkets, and footwear. She shook her hips and touched various parts of her body.
Leo was annoyed. Had the clone been Esen, he would have stripped naked and jumped her without hesitation. However, he was sane enough not to fall for a hag.
'Should I lower the difficulty? But if I do, I can't copy her skills or materialize her personal weapon.'
He tried one more time. This time, Leo chose not to rely on any weapon, dao domain, or magic. He charged at Eleanor's clone head-on.
Eleanor giggled and tossed her weapons away. She opened her arms and allowed Leo to punch her.
Leo closed the distance and reached a punching range. He threw a right hook toward Eleanor's face.
THUMP!
Suddenly, Leo's heart clenched. His entire body was paralyzed for no reason.
Eleanor's eyes and her heart-shaped crotch tattoo glowed in pink light while she ogled Leo's manly physique. This wasn't her first time using the cursed wane of seven sins to bind Leo's soul. She gently stroked Leo's face and slowly stripped him.
Leo knew what she was aiming for. This divine elf was not just a regular elf but a mixed succubus and vampire. Moreover, he once got bitten in various parts and lost all his blood before.
"Do you like my blood that much? Fine, I'll grant you something better!"
As Leo understood that he would lose to the clone again, he chose to preserve his pride by self-detonating his body!
BOOOOOM!
Leo's flesh and blood radiated in rainbow light. A rainbow flame erupted, devouring the entire star system and Eleanor's clone with it.
Leo's artificial soul ejected from his flesh. He mimicked Aslan's personal soul technique, regenerating his lost flesh and blood and restoring his fleshly body.
RUMBLE
The destroyed planets also restored themselves. The grassland planet and the other neighboring stars looked brand new as if the fight had never happened.
DING
<Congratulations! You have defeated Eleanor Sydin's shadow at the maximum difficulty!>
<If you defeat her 999 more times, you can learn one of her skills!>
<If you defeat her 9,999 more times, you can manifest one of her personal weapons in reality!>
"…"
Leo landed on the grassland and pursed his lips. He managed to destroy Eleanor's soul by self-detonating. However, that wasn't the answer he was searching for.
He needed a better method to kill Eleanor. Destroying the entire planet to kill this woman was overkill.
Suddenly, Leo had an epiphany. He thought of a partial destruction technique, which limited the blasting range. Testing his theory, Leo stretched his right arm and made it explode.
BOOOOOM
A massive mushroom cloud and a wide flame blast engulfed the entire planet. The star slowly cracked and was broken into pieces.
RUMBLE
Again, the star repaired itself and became anew. Leo's arm, flesh, bone, and blood also regenerated.
"Still too strong. How about a finger…"
BOOOOM!
This time, a small nuke exploded. The blast consumed everything within 1,000 kilometers in diameter at first. However, the flame spread and consumed the entire planet in an hour, turning the entire planet into a new Sun.
Leo stood in the sea of flame and gazed at his missing pinky finger. He deeply sighed.
"That's not it either. I can't detonate my flesh at all or the entire star will be destroyed. How about something smaller… such as a drop of my blood?"
The experiment continued…
.
.
10 minutes in the real world was equal to 10,000 minutes in the dantian universe. After seven days of experiment, Leo finished his preparation. He summoned Eleanor's clone to fight again.
The clone stopped playing around. She reinforced her clothes, wane, and cane with unknown pink miasma fog. Then, she glared into Leo's eyes.
Leo flinched as he sensed something entering his brain. The next second, his physical brain melted into goo!
Leo's soul was ejected from the body, but he didn't give up. He commanded his flesh and blood within the dying body with his Qi.
The melted brain reverted to a functioning brain once more. Leo's soul reentered the body and grumbled.
"Damn that mind attack again. That's kinda annoying."
Leo stomped his feet and created a magic circle underneath his feet. He also poured karma water out of his skin pores.
Rainbow blood manifested from the circle. At the same time, transparent blood from Leo's body mixed with the magical blood, creating a new substance.
Eleanor's face changed. She kicked the ground and teleported 100 light years away from the planet.
Leo finally confirmed his hypothesis. He burst into laughter and pursued the fleeing clone while bringing the mixed blood along.
"WHERE ARE YOU GOING, HONEY?! COME BACK HERE!"
.
.
An hour passed since Lucky and Overlord Lucky exchanged fists. They took a step back and panted in exhaustion.
The overlord did everything he could, but he failed to crack the golem. Vice versa, Lucky did his best, but the overlord's regenerative power negated the accumulated damage on his body. In the end, both couldn't harm each other.
Overlord Lucky finally smiled. He stood straight and extended his hand.
"Good fight. I'm Lucky of Fenrir Werewolf. What's your name, golem?"
"Hmm, woof?" Lucky was confused at first. But since the overlord showed his respect, he did the same. "My name is also Lucky, woof! I'm one of the Florida Domain's Heavenly Kings, woof!"
They shook hands and gazed at each other in the eyes. The overlord nodded in approval even though the copycat's name slightly offended him.
"I guess your creator used my blood essence to make you. Well, since you are my copy, won't you follow me and work for me? Our race welcomes you with open arms!"
Lucky snickered and shook his head, "No, thanks, woof! My place is very comfy, woof! I won't betray my master also, woof!"
"…I see that you are faithful to your master. Is his name Florida Man?"
"Yes. He's over there, woof."
Both werewolves turned and looked at Leo, who was still meditating next to Eleanor's limbless body.
Overlord Lucky gave Leo a meaningful look. Although Leo looked defenseless, he chose not to provoke him. They might have a grudge against each other, but the overlord was not in the mood to exact his revenge.
He looked at the copycat and sized him up. Upon noticing the strange clothes on the golem, he bitterly smiled.
"Did Florida Man give you those treasures?"
Lucky puffed his chest, "Yes, woof! My master is very kind, woof!"
"I envy you. I wish my master had half of your master's generosity."
"What do you mean, woof?"
"…We're her slaves…Never mind." Overlord Lucky closed his eyes and deeply sighed. He patted the golem's shoulder, "Cherish your master and your colleagues. I hope that you can replace me and become the new pillar of our race in the future."
"What do you mean, woof?"
The overlord didn't answer. He faded away, leaving the entire planet.
"…"
Lucky looked at the sky as he sensed the overlord's presence leaving this planet. He sensed a tinge of sadness in the overlord's voice.
.
.
Meanwhile, Dowbad already put on his clothes and sat on the captain's seat. He gazed at the monitors, which broadcasted the movements of Overlord Lucky and Leo.
Seeing that the overlord had retreated, Dowbad glanced at Eleanor who had become a captive.
"Heh. If you die, the DEZNUTS council's president seat will be empty. Since I'm also a karmic sovereign, I have the qualification to claim that! Thanks for driving your daughters away, idiot queen! Your throne will be mine!! OPERATORS, FOCUS ALL WEAPONS ON THAT PLANET! CONCENTRATE EVERYTHING ON THE QUEEN ELEANOR!! KILL HER AND ERASE THAT PLANET!!"
Cubic motherships gradually transformed into cylinders. They rotated and condensed a massive black lightning ball, black fireball, and black karma water at the center.
The combination of three energies created a faint rainbow light. The motherships' modules and hulls cracked as they couldn't contain the rampaging energy anymore.
On the monitors of Dowbad's ship, the feed showed the capacity rate of 120%. The captain burst into laughter and ordered his men.
"FIRE AT WILL!! LONG LIVE THE QUEEN!! HAHAHAHAHAA!!"
All cylinders unleashed faint rainbow beams toward the planet of green elves!

chapters.title: Chapter 269 Florida Man Constructs Space Shuttle, Sends Mother-in-Law to Space Without Return Instructions
chapters.content:
Chapter 269 Florida Man Constructs Space Shuttle, Sends Mother-in-Law to Space Without Return Instructions
Chapter 269 – Florida Man Constructs Space Shuttle, Sends Mother-in-Law to Space Without Return Instructions
RUMBLE
The rays of faint rainbow light descended upon the green planet. They dispersed the ozone layers, atmosphere, and clouds instantly.
Leo and Lucky sensed the beam's energy. They looked up and saw the oncoming rays of death.
Lucky's legs were frozen in shock. On the other hand, Leo bellowed and unleashed his time domain.
CLICK-CLICK-CLICK
Everything turned dark. Amidst the darkness, the condensed heat of a death ray glowed in white light.
The tips of the death rays were 500 meters away from the ground. The emitting heat burned every atom of oxygen in the air and evaporated clouds. Fortunately, the chemical reaction paused because of Leo's time domain.
Leo looked around and found several green elves caught on fire. None of them realized that they were about to be burnt alive.
He looked up and gazed at the source of these beams. Upon looking through the void, he found multiple warships and suspicious cylinders in space.
Upon discovering the culprits, Leo smacked his lips.
"So, it was you. I shouldn't have let you escape."
.
.
Meanwhile, Dowbad realized that Leo relied on the space and time domain to stop the death rays. He broke free from the restraints and mocked Leo in his mind.
'You fool! You could have let me kill Eleanor! Someone of your caliber could have escaped easily. Since you're foolish enough to activate your domain, you can die along with her and her planet!! After you die, I'll be the King of DEZNUTS and the Divine Elf!'
Dowbad summoned karma water swords from his palms. He laughed and swung his swords down, aiming at the empty air in front of him.
CLANK
The swords hit an invisible object in front of him, creating a dimensional crack.
The crack was none other than Leo's domain energy. As long as Dowbad could destroy this, Leo would suffer internal injuries because of the domain destruction backlash. This was a common tactic of killing or defeating any deity, sage, or entity. Even karmic sovereigns weren't immune to this weakness.
Unfortunately for Dowbad, the crack instantly mended and vanished.
'Hmm?'
Dowbad was taken aback. He had used this method a thousand times in the past, and his attack always destroyed his opponents in one strike. This was the first time he failed to crush a domain.
'If I can't destroy it in one hit, I can just repeatedly hit it!'
Dowbad tried again. Like a madman, he hacked the invisible wall in front of him.
CLANK
CLANK
The first few strikes damaged the dimensional wall at first. But after he hit it a few times, the domain grew stronger, resisting the attacks. It reached the point at which the domain repelled Dowbad's assault.
BOOM
"WHAT?!"
Dowbad's karma water swords shattered. Moreover, the time domain strengthened its power, paralyzing his arms and legs. In the blink of an eye, Dowbad was petrified by the power of time.
.
.
On the planet, Leo stared at the flagship and snorted. He patted the back of his left hand, which was wounded because of the damage inflicted by Dowbad.
Seven shallow cuts were healed. In addition, Leo strengthened his physique with his Qi, which also enhanced his domain's durability and effectiveness.
After making sure that Dowbad was stuck in the time domain, Leo walked toward Lucky and patted his head.
The wolf golem was freed from the time restraints. He looked around in confusion and turned to his master. He talked to Leo using a sound transmission technique as no sound medium could transmit his voice.
"What happened, woof? Oh, right. The time and space domain, woof."
"Help me something, doggy. Do you think you can bring people through the portal?"
"Easy task, woof! Which elf fancy you, woof?"
"Take as many as you can. Prioritize women, elders, and children. This planet might be destroyed soon."
"WOOF?!"
Lucky looked up and found the frozen death rays from outer space. His expression turned dark.
"T-They're ruthless, woof! They resort to killing everybody here to kill you, woof!!"
"Yeah. What a typical villain, right?"
"B-But there are millions of people, woof."
"Take as many as you can. You have 35… no, less than 34 days to finish. Also, while you're at it, go fetch Kitten and Meowmeow. We need every hand we can get to evacuate the civilians. Oh, don't forget that once you go out, you can't return. Write something on a refugee's face as a message so that those guys can learn about the issue."
"OKAY, WOOF!"
The evacuation mission started. Lucky grabbed the nearest green elf woman and threw her into the portal.
Leo shifted his attention to another issue at hand. Because he spent too much time chatting with Lucky, Eleanor broke free from his time domain and regenerated her limbs. Fortunately, Leo's enhanced domain restricted her movement and Qi circulation.
Eleanor slowly tore the tapes off her face. She gasped for air while she glared at Leo.
"I'LL KILL YOU!" She uttered a silent voice, but her expression and her mouth were enough for Leo to decipher the sentences.
Leo silently walked toward Eleanor. He grabbed the back of her head and slammed her face to the ground. Transmitting his cold voice to her mind, Leo threatened her.
"Why don't you look carefully at what your friend has done? Here, let me help."
Pulling Eleanor's face out of the ground, Leo flipped her around and pushed her face against the frozen beam.
"Oh, right. The Bird Box meme…"
Leo recalled a great meme in the past. He pulled her closer and pried her eyes wide open.
"Feast your eyes with the deed of your subordinate! Do you think it's okay for you to launch a star-destroyer beam to a planet full of innocent lives?"
"…"
Eleanor stared at the light beam in the sky. Upon noticing the source of the beams, she stopped resisting.
Leo slowly released Eleanor, but he kept on finger pressing at the back of her neck. A drop of his blood seeped out of his nail and glued on her skin.
That was Leo's last resort. With that bead of blood, Leo could detonate her soul and destroy this entire planet at will.
After ensuring his safety, Leo threatened her.
"Let's get things straight. If you make any stupid move, I'll detonate your soul right here, right now. This entire planet can go kaboom along with you. I hope you won't do anything stupid. If you understand me, slowly nod. If you stay still or do something else I didn't ask, I'll kill you."
"…"
Eleanor froze for a moment. Then, she slowly nodded.
"Good. Now, I'll start asking you questions. Let's get to know each other. Who are you?"
"…I'm Eleanor Sydin, the Matriach of the Divine Elf and the Queen of DEZNUTS."
"Good."
Leo asked a basic question first to decrease the tension and make Eleanor let down her guard. He continued asking.
"Did you try to kill my subordinates back there?"
"…I only want your life."
"I see. What did I ever do to you? Why are you trying to kill me?"
"You killed one of my concubines first. Also, you're invading one of my domains."
"Fair. Then, why did you kill your daughter, Esen?"
"…"
Eleanor slowly regained her Qi. She managed to fully recover from her injuries, but the bead of blood on her nape scared her. Her instinct screamed, warning her to remove it as soon as possible.
Having no choice, Eleanor played along with Leo and waited for her opportunity.
"Answer my question, queen," Leo warned Eleanor.
"…I forgot."
"Forgot? Is that an answer for someone who murdered your kin? If I were you, I would have plastered that memory into my brain forever. I would have even remembered how terrible it felt when someone I gave birth to gazed into my eyes and begged for help."
"…"
Leo's sarcasm sent a sharp pain to her heart. However, as Eleanor remembered why she gave birth to so many daughters, her guilty conscience vanished instantly. She snorted and belittled Leo.
"For us divine elves, sacrificing oneself for the sake of empire is an obligation! She died for the sake of the greater good!"
"My ass! I heard from Esen. Her sister framed her something, and you expelled her to a godforsaken planet. Then, you killed her there and turned her into an undead!"
"Oh. So, you knew."
"Of course, I know everything! Now, tell me! Why did you kill her?"
Eleanor smirked. She slowly turned around and glanced at Leo, "That's because she's a threat to me. She's too talented for her own good."
"…Are you really her mother?" Leo narrowed his eyes. He couldn't believe that a mother could be this mad.
"All my children have the obligation to sacrifice everything for the sake of their mother. She is no exception. Unfortunately, a 7-year-old brat desired to take my throne. I had to nib the bud before other aristocrats and karmic sovereigns could use her to threaten my kingdom. It's a pity though. Had she been a good girl and listened to me, I could have let her soul die in peace."
Leo was disgusted. He had no reason to talk to this evil mother anymore.
"Any last word?"
"Hahaha! You can't kill me. If you kill me, all the remaining seven karmic sovereigns of this universe will hunt you down! Even the lurkers in the Fate Stadium will form an alliance against you!"
"How so?"
Eleanor boldly turned around and sneered at Leo. She swatted Leo's finger away from her face.
"Because I'm the only pillar of DEZNUTS council. Without me, this entire universe will be on fire. All entities, overlords, and karmic sovereigns will start plundering, ravaging, and monopolizing resources from every star in this universe. No star or planet will be safe anymore. No mortal can be born. No immortal can ascend. Gods will lose their followers. Sages will have no heaven to rule. All entities will fight each other to the last man for no reason! In the end, this universe will be full of corpses and ashes! NO STAR CAN EXIST WITHOUT ME!"
"Good speech, but I don't buy it. I call your bluff."
"YOU!!"
Eleanor screeched. Her eyes flashed as he reattempted to kill Leo by burning his brain from the inside.
PA!
Learning from the mistakes and failures in the simulation mode, Leo closed his eyes, preventing Eleanor's consciousness from entering his mind. He stretched his arm and seized her face. Kicking the ground, Leo dragged Eleanor to space while maintaining the time and space domain.
Both reappeared one light-year away from the planet. Leo turned around and gazed at a faraway planet where he came from. From the current location, the star was tinier than a grain of sand.
Eleanor resisted. She summoned lance spikes from her body, which hit Leo's face, arms, legs, chest, and crotch!
PLOP
Betraying Eleanor's expectation, all karma water weapons had no effect on him anymore!
Leo reopened his eyes, revealing his cold murderous intent. Showing no mercy, he ordered the bead of blood on her nape to explode.
"FLORIDA MAAAAAAAAAANNNNNN!!" Eleanor sensed a crisis. She screamed with all her might.
Leo scoffed and vanished, teleporting back to the planet before the time domain lost its power.
BOOOOOOOOM
A massive explosion devoured Eleanor's body and soul.
.
.
Upon return, Leo reinforced the domain.
The beam descended by 200 meters while Leo had been away for a split second. Noticing how the beam almost hit the planet, Leo wiped the sweat on his face.
"That was close, dammit."
Leo looked up and gazed into the outer space. Far, far away, where the light needed a year to travel and reach the planet, a massive explosion occurred.
Although Leo could only see a brief flash, he confirmed that his blood bead detonated.
'I hope that was enough to kill her. Well, next. I have to deal with this guy and the refugees. I have to hurry or do something… How should I deflect the beams? Should I partially accelerate the planet's rotation and orbit so that it moves out of the way? But that's gonna cost so much energy. Hmm…'
Leo stared at the beams in the sky. He wondered what to do next.

chapters.title: Chapter 270 Astronauts Discovered Intoxicated Florida Man on Space Station. Nasa Baffled How He Got There.
chapters.content:
Chapter 270 Astronauts Discovered Intoxicated Florida Man on Space Station. Nasa Baffled How He Got There.
Chapter 270 – Astronauts Discovered Intoxicated Florida Man on Space Station. Nasa Baffled How He Got There.
Lucky had been busy. He stripped female elves naked and wrote someone on their backs and chests. Then, he mercilessly threw them into the exit portal.
Meowmeow and Kitten rushed into the portal after they had received Lucky's message. They rushed to Lucky's side and inquired about the situation. Upon learning the predicament, they helped Lucky transfer the elf civilians to their planet.
Leo did nothing to contribute to the evacuation. He monitored the portal's timer.
Strangely, even though Leo had been keeping the time and space domain active, the portal's timer continued ticking.
<Remaining Time: 33 Days, 12 Hours, 47 Minutes…>
The time and space domain only sealed the time flow within the domain, but it was ineffective against the system's buildings and facilities. This warned Leo about the limit of his power.
'System… Fate Stadium…'
Leo thought of the time when the power of the Fate Stadium was down. At that time, his system stopped functioning, and he couldn't teleport home.
Cultivators, elves, overlords, or karmic sovereigns weren't a threat to Leo. However, the mysterious system and fate crystals gave him a sense of uncertainty. As the system's power seemed stronger than the power of a karmic sovereign, Leo was not sure if he could overcome someone with an overpowered system.
'…System. Oh, right. Fate crystals. I haven't taken that woman's fate crystals or checked the quest yet. Is there even a quest in the first place?'
Reminded of the system and fate crystals, Leo checked his system log messages and the quest menu.
.
.
<You have activated the mystic realm portal!>
<A quest has been generated.>
.
Planet DEZNUTS BMLB-49
Goresaurus Race, a dominating beast species, once reigned this planet for 50,000 years until the High Elf Race from outer space invaded and occupied this land. It becomes one of 11 million colonies serving the high elves, divine elves, and the DEZNUTS council.
Currently, Vendettito Sugondese the Third acts as the governor of this colony. If you manage to kill him, you can steal this colony from the hands of high elves. Be warned. Vendettito is affiliated with another player. Attacking this domain will automatically declare war against that player. Think wisely if you wish to initiate this quest.
Primary Objectives:
- Kill Vendettito Sugondese the Third. (Completed)
- Eliminate the Player (Optional) (Completed)
Secondary Objectives:
– Locate and Collect Sky Fate Crystal Hidden in This Planet
Rewards:
Exploration Rewards: 100 Territory Expansion Tickets, Ownership of Planet DEZNUTS BMLB-49
Secondary Rewards: 10 Lucky Draws (Automaton)
.
Without paying attention to the quest, Leo already completed the primary objectives. The remaining task was to find an insignificant sky fate crystal somewhere in this world.
Leo had no time for that. He closed the quest menu and continued reading the log.
<You have killed Vendettito Sugondese the Third.>
<You have collected two earth fate crystals.>
<You have killed Eleanor Sydin, the Divine Elf Matriarch!>
Leo let out a long sigh of relief as the system confirmed Eleanor's death. However, it didn't inform him about the rewards and the loot.
He smacked his lips and looked up. He planned to go back and get the fate crystals that Eleanor might have. He prayed that nobody would snatch fate crystals of Eleanor first.
Also, there was another issue. He had to destroy the warships in the orbit.
Putting his plan into action, Leo teleported again. He appeared on top of a cylinder warship, which was firing a beam toward the planet. He glanced at the tip of the ray, which didn't move from the spot.
Leo was relieved as his time-domain still kept everything frozen. Then, he began working, punching, and breaking the device and modules of the ship.
The cylinder ship broke in half with one punch. Its aiming trajectory shifted, but the released beam didn't follow after the barrel.
"I can't move the beams this way. Well, I'll start by killing these guys in the spaceships first. Wait, wouldn't it be more profitable if I kill everybody here and steal their ships? Man, I'm a genius!"
Leo cackled and whipped out a pen he bought. With a drop of Qi injection, it transformed into a lightsaber hilt and generated a plasma sword.
He coated his rainbow Qi around the sword, enhancing its property. Then, he swung it toward the space, unleashing a sword technique of death knights.
This ability allowed a death knight or a grim reaper to cut or kill any soul within their domain directly without touching them. It was one of Leo's favorite powers because of its decisiveness and usefulness.
As Leo swung his sword, he sensed a feedback of his lightsaber sword cutting through souls. However, he also sensed that someone among the targets blocked the strike with ease.
Leo narrowed his eyes and pinpointed the person. Then, he found Dowbad, who got stuck in his time domain.
"Aha! Next prey!"
Leo cackled. He wondered what fate crystals Dowbad had.
.
While Dowbad was stuck in the time domain, he was conscious of his surroundings. He sensed Leo's presence coming closer to his ship.
WHOOSH
Suddenly, another barrier overlapped with the time domain. It enveloped him and everybody on the ship. The next moment, he detected an invisible ripple of energy passing through his body.
'Shit! Block it!'
Dowbad condensed his energy to protect his soul.
Then…
CLINK
Something powerful hit his soul, but it was unable to cut through the soul physique of a karmic sovereign. Although the technique belonged to someone in the deity or sage realm, the powerful strike was as strong as a full frontal attack of an entity or a karmic sovereign's raw power.
'That was close! If I hadn't blocked that, my soul would have been cut in half!'
Dowbad mustered all his essence and life force. He even burnt half of his life force to break free from Leo's enhanced time domain.
He had to retreat. Otherwise, he might die!
'I'll remember this!'
Afraid of Leo's retaliation, Dowbad opened his system menu and navigated to the PVP page. He pressed the monthly PVP button, which teleported him to the Fate Stadium.
A second later, Leo's second attack arrived. Unfortunately, it missed him.
.
Leo deeply frowned after he swung his lightsaber for the second time. He could no longer sense Dowbad's presence and life signature.
"…Is he gone? Man. That was lame."
He looked around, tracking the presence of Dowbad. However, the guy's karma strings and his Qi trace vanished along with him.
Unable to locate Dowbad, Leo stopped searching for him. He shifted his attention to the unmanned warships in space.
"Time to clean up this place."
.
.
WHOOSH
Dowbad emerged in the middle of the stadium arena. He looked around and discovered that the system matched him against another system user.
The elf stood up and gazed at his opponent. Coincidentally, his opponent was also an elf, and she was also a karmic sovereign.
She was none other than Ellen. The princess sneered at Dowbad as she recognized the guy.
"You look exhausted. Did you use the PVP system to escape?"
"Y-You… YOUR HIGHNESS ELLEN?!"
Ellen sneered and sized up Dowbad. As the guy appeared here naked, it was easy to guess the predicament that Dowbad had faced earlier.
Dowbad was one of Eleanor's subordinates, and he never left her side. His arrival only implied one thing – Eleanor fought someone and they lost!
Ellen cackled and summoned her scythe. She mocked Dowbad, "Has my mother died, 'DOWN BAD'? Did my mother fight someone and lose?"
"Y-You don't need to know!"
"But I insist. You will tell me everything once I capture your soul!"
"Y-YOU INGRATE WENCH!"
The PVP match between Dowbad and Ellen began. The divine elf princess's laughter echoed in the stadium, followed by a man's desperate squeal.
.
.
Meanwhile…
WHOOSH
Ester and her son were thrown into the portal along with women and elders in her neighborhood. Her consciousness was blank when she was under the influence of Leo's time domain. But when she arrived on the other side, she regained her consciousness and could move again.
Leo's time domain could stop the time flow within his domain, but he couldn't stop the time of the universe. Thus, time flowed normally outside of Leo's domain.
Ester and a thousand elves beside her were confused. They gazed at the portal behind them and inspected the surroundings.
While they were puzzled about how they appeared here, three naked female statues moved and stood before them.
Ester scanned their cultivation base and was shocked. She recognized their aura signatures - They were entities whose faces resembled famous fallen entities in the past!
"…Overlord Zhu Qiao… Overlord Wei Yuan… and Overlord Xu Chu?! But they're dead!! Mother already killed them all, but how?!"
The three statues immediately shifted their gazes at Ester. One of them waved her finger and pulled Ester out of the crowd. Then, she stared into her eyes while her voice resounded in Ester's mind.
"Child of Eleanor, I assume."
"Y-Yes," Ester gulped.
"You are under arrest for fraudulence, false accusation, and treason!"
"W-What?! What do you mean?"
Ester flustered and panicked. Because of her high-pitched voice, her sleeping infant woke up and cried.
"WAAAAAAHH!!"
Ester snapped back to her senses and checked her son's condition. Upon noticing that he was just scared, she was relieved.
Unfortunately, the statues were merciless. They used their Qi to pull the infant away from the mother. Without remorse, they declared the punishment sentence.
"Until the lord has returned, you will be imprisoned in our dantian universe!"
"W-WAIT! I HAVE A CHILD! DON'T TAKE AWAY MY CHILD!!"
As Ester screamed, a group of elves and molgs arrived at the platform. The leading figure was a blond elf whose appearance was a copy of Eleanor.
Esen immediately found the aura of her sister. Although she couldn't remember her face, Esen never forgot the life signature of someone who falsely accused her of heresy. She waved her hands and pulled Ester's child into her arms.
"It has been a while, bitch."
"W-Who are you?! GIVE ME BACK MY CHILD!! SOLDIERS! HELP ME!"
The green elves had been watching their interaction for a while. As soon as they realized that one of them was being bullied, they took arms and prepared to fight.
Unfortunately for them, one of the statues shifted her attention toward them. Then, as soon as her gaze fell upon them, the elves were petrified into stones.
The remaining crowd behind the rioters shrank back in fear. As none of them was a combatant, the statue didn't attack them.
Esen sneered at Ester and pulled out a knife from her spatial ring. Then, she pointed at the baby.
"Well, well, well. How the turntable. Is he yours?"
"Y-You. WHO ARE YOU?! RELEASE MY CHILD!"
Esen's eyes turned cold. She reminded her sister. "Look at my face carefully. Who do you think I look like?"
Ester widened her eyes and paid attention to Esen's face. She finally remembered.
"M-Mother, no. YOUR MAJESTY?!"
"Wrong. It's your damn sister, bitch!"
"ESEN?!"
"Glad you finally remember. Now, take her out of my sight!"

chapters.title: Chapter 271 Florida Man Claims Immortality Achieved After 33 Days of Sunbathing
chapters.content:
Chapter 271 Florida Man Claims Immortality Achieved After 33 Days of Sunbathing
Chapter 271 – Florida Man Claims Immortality Achieved After 33 Days of Sunbathing
While the clock was ticking, Leo floated in space, staring at the frozen beams from the cylinder warships. 50 beams formed 50 pillars, threatening to punch through the planet below.
"Pushing the entire planet out of the way? But if I do that, the planet might go out of the orbit path. It will surely ruin the ecological system and the weather cycles. Also, I have never pushed a planet in my life. Even if I do it, I might end up digging the ground and find myself in the depths of the planet instead. No rock or natural soil can withstand that force. Hmm… What to do?"
Even though Leo was not the smartest, he racked his brain to find the best solution. He always thought of the worst-case scenarios and the aftermath whenever he came up with a solution.
Pushing a planet out of the beam's trajectory was impossible as the planet couldn't withstand such a kinetic force. Leo might end up destroying it instead.
Moving the cylinder ships was also not an option. As the beams had already concentrated a mass of Qi and unleashed a beam, 50% of the energy was gathered at the tips of the death rays. In addition, the remaining force still followed the energy balls within the light, and they would hit the planet eventually.
Then, there was a third option. Leo could deflect, block, or absorb the concentrated energy balls at the tips of death rays first. Then, he could lessen the damage to the planet and protect the innocent people of the planet.
"Probably third choice. It's gonna be a grind."
Leo tested his theory. He flew toward one of the mass of energy balls at the tip of a beam. Then, he punched it.
The hit connected and caused a ripple. The energy ball slightly shrank and bounced backward, dispersing energy everywhere. Some of the light particles fell on Leo's arms and hands.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,243 years.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,271 years.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,214 years.>
"HMM?!"
Leo widened his eyes in astonishment. He couldn't believe what the system had informed him.
"I CAN GAIN LIFESPAN FROM THIS?!"
Enlightened, Leo moved around and bathed himself in the particles of light.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,227 years.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,206 years.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,279 years.>
The system did not disappoint him. This confirmed Leo's hypothesis.
He burst into laughter. "Oh, my goodness. What a hack!!"
Instead of punching the condensed ball of light, Leo stretched his hand and sank his fingers into the mass.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,298 years.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,294 years.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,211 years.>
This changed everything. Leo changed his plan.
He threw himself into one of the masses and bathed himself in the light.
"NOM-NOM MOTHERHUMPER!!"
DING
DING
DING
.
.
While carrying a hundred innocent elves with his Qi, Meowmeow looked up and gazed at his master.
"What is he doing?" Asked Meowmeow.
Aslan was nearby. He had been pushing a cartwheel, carrying a dozen of children toward the portal. He followed Meowmeow's gaze and looked up.
"Nom-Noming, perhaps."
"Nom-Nom…what?"
"Energy draining. The usual stuff."
"Has he learned the vampiric touch or energy drain dao before?"
Aslan snickered, "Read his memory again. He has already copied a bunch of daos and skills from many experts. Your lord is a hard worker."
"Copy… Right. The simulation system. That system is a cheat. I still couldn't believe that you got your hands on that entity fate crystal with this system."
"That's where you're wrong. Entity fate crystals never have that ability. At best, it can only give some assisting perks and quality-of-life perks in exchange for a portion of the karma contract or life force. What he has is the latter type."
Meowmeow nodded as he was less informed than Aslan. He gazed at his master, wondering what Aslan had planned for his son.
"Say, Aslan. I know he's your son, but what are you planning for him? I can't read his fate at all after he has unlocked the simulation mode."
Aslan shrugged, "Returning the favor, I guess."
"Returning the favor? Oh…" Meowmeow's expression changed. He recalled the secret of Aslan and Leo's existence. "In the end, we're a bunch of NPCs, huh?"
"Yup. From the very beginning, this universe is tailored for him all along."
"You sick son of a…" Meowmeow wanted to curse Aslan for this master plan. Still, he couldn't hate the guy.
"Let's keep serving him." Aslan raised his fist, "For the universe and our future."
Meowmeow sighed and fist-bumped the guy, "For your son and my future harem."
"Screw you, sicko. One of these days, I'll reincarnate you into a body of a clone and wipe your memory!"
"Hehehehe! I've already foreseen my distant future. I'll have over a hundred sexy concubines and a warm family! I'll live a good fulfilling life!"
"Yeah, and you will suffer. Your son will suffer. Some of your wives will also die and suffer because of you."
"…"
Meowmeow shut his mouth and pouted. He snorted, "I'll make sure to learn one of our lord's abilities for that day."
"Yeah, you will. I suggest you master this time domain ability. It will be useful for the future."
"I know. I also want that simulation mode too…"
"… You greedy dumbass."
The men laughed and continued working.
.
33 days later…
Meowmeow, Aslan, and Lucky managed to transfer five million elves to the other side. They also sent messages to Meowmeow's concubines and Esen, asking them to assist them in accommodating and controlling the refugees.
Esen and Meowmeow's concubines exchanged messages by throwing letters into the portal as they couldn't leave yet. They learned about the development and the predicament of the refugees.
Unfortunately, there were over 100 million elves on the planet. Leo's subordinates couldn't save everybody by themselves, though none of them cared.
After all, they were confident in their lord's abilities.
In the orbit, Leo bathed in the middle of the 48th beam. He snored and floated there, absorbing the light and the Qi.
DING
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,235 years. Your lifespan has reached the maximum capacity. The excess life force will be converted to lifespan credit.>
<Your lifespan has increased by 1,255 years. Your lifespan has reached the maximum capacity. The excess life force will be converted to lifespan credit.>
Every second, a message informed Leo of his gain. The number of unread messages accumulated, but Leo no longer looked at it. He was tired of reading every message.
"KOK"
Finally, Leo's pig-like snoring ended. He rubbed his eyes and deeply yawned. Glancing at the message screen, Leo pressed the [Mark All as Read]. Then, he checked his bank balance.
<Current lifespan: 2,147,483,647 Years.>
<Your lifespan has reached the maximum capacity!>
<Tips. You can upgrade your soul by using lifespan as a currency.>
"Eh? Already? This is kinda déjà vu."
Leo had seen this number before. He felt like it was yesterday.

chapters.title: Chapter 272 Florida Man, Who Previously Claimed Immortality from 33 Days of Sunbathing, Now Diagnosed with Skin Cancer
chapters.content:
Chapter 272 Florida Man, Who Previously Claimed Immortality from 33 Days of Sunbathing, Now Diagnosed with Skin Cancer
Chapter 272 – Florida Man, Who Previously Claimed Immortality from 33 Days of Sunbathing, Now Diagnosed with Skin Cancer.
The massive amount of lifespan reminded Leo of the grindy days on Earth. He shed a tear of joy and elation.
"Finally, my lifespan reaches the cap. Well, since it has come to this, I might as well splurge some."
Leo tried to open his gacha screen.
DING
<You cannot access the page due to the restrictions of the Shop Domain System.>
"…"
Unfortunately, the gacha system was tied to the shop domain system. Because of the restriction, he couldn't access it outside of his domain.
Without a choice, Leo checked something else. He recalled that the excess lifespan was stored as online shopping credits. Thus, he opened the online shopping system to see what he could buy from it.
"The system mentions the soul upgrade thingy. I think I saw it when I was on Earth, but I didn't buy any for a reason. What was its name again?"
Leo input a search keyword 'Soul Upgrade' into the search box and proceeded. The online shopping system projected a loading screen for a moment before it displayed a new page.
The number of items was filtered from zillions of icons to seven. Leo read the list one by one.
.
Soul Upgrade (LITE)
Max Cultivation Base: Immortal
Max Lifespan Capacity: 255 Years
Increase Cultivation Aptitude: E
Price: 10 Years of Lifespan.
.
Soul Upgrade (LITE+)
Max Cultivation Base: Deity
Max Lifespan Capacity: 65,536 Years
Increase Cultivation Aptitude: D
Price: Earth Fate Crystal + 200 Years of Lifespan.
.
Soul Awakening
Max Cultivation Base: Sage
Max Lifespan Capacity: 65,536 Years
Increase Cultivation Aptitude: C
Enable Dantian Universe
Dantian Universe Capacity: 65,536 Stars
Price: Sky Fate Crystal + 10,000 Years of Lifespan.
.
Soul Awakening Pro
Max Cultivation Base: Entity
Max Lifespan Capacity: 65,536 Years
Increase Cultivation Aptitude: B
Enable Dantian Universe
Enable System Hints & Quests
Dantian Universe Capacity: 65,536 Stars
Price: Heaven Fate Crystal + 30,000 Years of Lifespan.
.
Soul Enlightenment
Max Cultivation Base: Karmic Sovereign
Max Lifespan Capacity: 2,147,483,647 Years
Increase Cultivation Aptitude: A
Enable Dantian Universe & Karma River Hosting
Enable System Hints & Quests & System Shops
Dantian Universe Capacity: 4,294,967,296 Stars
Price: Heaven Fate Crystal + 50,000 Years of Lifespan.
.
Soul Enlightenment Pro
Max Cultivation Base: Transcendent Level 10
Max Lifespan Capacity: 2,147,483,647 Years
Increase Cultivation Aptitude: S
Enable Dantian Universe & Karma River & Soul Creations
Enable System Hints & Quests & System Shops & Simulation Mode
Dantian Universe Capacity: 18,446,744,073,709,551,615 Stars
Price: Entity Fate Crystal + 1,000,000,000 Years of Lifespan.
.
Soul Matrix
Max Cultivation Base: Singularity Level 100
Max Lifespan Capacity: 18,446,744,073,709,551,615 Years
Increase Cultivation Aptitude: EXTRA
Enable Dantian Universe & Karma River & Soul Creations
Enable System Hints & Quests & System Shops & Simulation Mode
Dantian Universe Capacity: 18,446,744,073,709,551,615 Stars
Price: Karmic Fate Crystal + 1,000,000,000 Years of Lifespan.
.
Aside from the Soul Matrix's package, the rest of the items were greyed out and were marked as [PURCHASED].
Leo tilted his head in confusion as he didn't remember buying any of these. A minute later after reading the description again, Leo remembered why he didn't pay attention to these upgrades.
"Right. At that time, I was grinding for the transmigration fee. Man, if I knew I could cultivate, I wouldn't have spent two billion years on something nonsense. It was a scam!"
Leo regretted spending two billion years to transmigrate to a cultivation world. He wished he learned some cultivation techniques by buying something from the system shop instead of wasting his precious YOL for something he could have easily achieved.
As refunding was impossible, Leo accepted the reality and looked at the price of the last item.
Karmic Fate Crystal…
That was Leo's bottleneck. He only had entity fate crystals, but he never came across the elusive karmic fate crystals. He wondered where he could get it from.
Since Leo could not buy it now, he could only admire the system screen and the PNG icon. He deeply sighed and lamented his fate for being poor.
"Fine. I can't expand my lifespan cap right now, but I still have credits. Oh, wait. Is there anything I can gift my people or Esen in here?"
Leo thought about gifting this perk to Esen as a wedding gift. He checked the other upgrades that the store listed as PURCHASED.
Testing the system, Leo added one of the items to a cart and proceeded to the checkout screen.
Unfortunately, there was no [PURCHASE AS GIFT] button. Leo deeply sighed in resignation.
"You stinky system. Can't I buy something for someone else? You could have made more money. What a lousy business model. You should learn it from STEAM or AMAZON!"
DING
<Tips: You can purchase the GIFT SYSTEM from the Online Shopping System.>
"…"
Leo was taken aback by the sudden response. In silence, Leo searched the keywords and found the perk.
.
Gift System
Price – 1 Year of Lifespan
This system allows you to gift or bestow a friend your lifespan, system abilities, system skills, system attributes, or anything related to the system. You can also purchase a system perk and gift it to your friend.
Perk Description
Enable [Purchase as Gift] in the Online Shopping System
Enable [Bestow System]
.
This system was almost free. In Leo's eyes, it cost nothing!
"Dammit! You should have told me earlier that you have this! I wouldn't have wasted so much time and energy if I had this perk!"
DING
<Tips: The system will not provide aid or show favoritism toward any player. System Tips only appear when you truly need a piece of advice or assistance.>
"Yeah, screw you, system."
<Tips: The system detects that you are most compatible with one of the most popular systems, the PP stretching system. Rumors said an entity invented this system to have anal intercourse with himself.>
"HEY!!"
Leo screamed in anger and punched the system screens. However, his punches only hit empty voids.
DING
<Tips: Only autistic players punch system screens. Please be advised that system screens are holograms. Be a human, not an autistic monkey.>
"DAMMIT! YOU SON OF A %##@!!"
Leo lost it for 10 minutes.
.
After regaining his composure, Leo purchased the gift system. Checking the new toy, a new system screen appeared.
The screen displayed three tabs – Lifespan Bestowal, System Skill Bestowal, and System Perk Bestowal.
The perks were simple. Leo could give away a skill or dao that he didn't need to one of his subordinates or friends. However, Leo would lose that ability afterward.
From his point of view, gifting a skill to a subordinate was excessive. He could always exploit the library facility to create skill books and gift them instead. Only the system bestowal and lifespan bestowal were useful.
In the past, Leo could trade lifespan by using the shop domain system as a medium. But with the lifespan bestowal ability, he could use it outside of the domain.
Also, the system perk bestowal might be in handy. Testing the system's perk, Leo tried to purchase the 'Soul Enlightenment Pro' package so that he could gift it to Esen as a wedding gift.
A [Purchase as Gift] button appeared in the shopping cart menu as Leo had predicted. He grinned and pressed on it.
A list of his friends and subordinates appeared next. Leo scrolled down and found Esen's name. He ticked her name and pressed [Proceed].
DING
<Please be warned. One of your entity fate crystals will be consumed!>
<Please be warned. Losing one of your entity fate crystals might deactivate some of your system abilities!>
<Will you purchase [Soul Enlightenment Pro] as a gift to Esen Sydin IV?>
It sounded painful to lose one of the few entity fate crystals. Still, Leo wasn't worried.
He gazed toward the distance where he had killed Eleanor earlier. Although it was faint, he sensed several glowing crystals floating freely in the void.
'I should get those first and use them to exchange. I can't afford to lose my power.'
After thinking it through, Leo reinforced the time domain ability, focusing on the suspended beams of death rays. Leo also circulated his Qi and rubbed the alien ring to warm it up.
His blood boiled while his muscles expanded. When the preparation was ready, Leo instantaneously blinked, teleporting a light years' worth of distance. He pressed the alien ring on the massive crystal one after another and hurried back.
WHOOSH
It took Leo 0.25 seconds to complete the sequences. He returned before the time domain was dispersed.
"HMM!"
Leo reinforced the time domain again. This time, the ray of death beams didn't move an inch.
The mission was a success.
DING
<You have acquired 2 entity fate crystals!>
<You have acquired 3 heavenly fate crystals!>
<You have acquired 15 sky fate crystals!>
<You have acquired 54 earth fate crystals!>
Eleanor was rich. She had been collecting so many crystals that Leo was envious of her.
"Your mother is rich, girl. Well… WAS rich. They're mine now! HEHEHEHEHE!"

chapters.title: Chapter 273 Florida Man, Who Diagnosed with Skin Cancer Because of Sunbathing, Discovered to be the Prime Suspect of Missing Ohio Woman’s Case
chapters.content:
Chapter 273 Florida Man, Who Diagnosed with Skin Cancer Because of Sunbathing, Discovered to be the Prime Suspect of Missing Ohio Woman’s Case
Chapter 273 – Florida Man, Who Diagnosed with Skin Cancer Because of Sunbathing, Discovered to be the Prime Suspect of Missing Ohio Woman's Case
In Leo's bus, Esen tucked Ester's child in a bed after a warm bath. She looked at the boy's satisfied face as he was fast asleep.
"…I wish I had a kid like this," Esen was jealous of Ester.
"You definitely will. Lord Florida Man is a vigorous man. As long as you show him your charm at night, you will surely receive his blessings." Ivy giggled.
"N-No way! H-How can I have my own baby?!"
"Don't worry, your majesty. You will bear a child one day."
"…"
Esen blushed. As soon as she thought of their sexy time at night, smoke came out of her ears.
Ivy couldn't resist laughing. She giggled and gently patted her master, "It's okay, your majesty. It's a very normal reaction. Don't worry. It's something you will enjoy and cherish for a long time."
Esen squealed in her throat and ended up making kettle noise in embarrassment. As her embarrassment reached the limit, she moaned.
"Stop bullying me."
"Hahaha. I'm so sorry, Your Majesty," Ivy changed the subject. "So, what are you going to do with your sister and her child?"
Esen gazed at the child and sighed, "Children are innocent. They are not a part of this. Only Ester will be punished."
"But this boy will miss his mother."
Ester had already been imprisoned in Wei Yuan, aka one of
"…If push comes to shove, I'll find him a new mother."
"That's a good choice. This child is still young. He hasn't even developed his brain yet. If we introduce him to a new mother soon, he won't suffer from any implication."
"…"
Esen pitied the boy. She only hoped that he would live a happy normal life.
.
.
It had been 33 days since Dowbad was sent to the Fate Stadium. He ran into Ellen in a PVP match.
The result was obvious – Ellen crippled him and imprisoned him in her dantian universe. She had been interrogating and extracting information about Eleanor's remaining forces and her hidden armies.
After 33 days of interrogation, Ellen received enough info. She killed him and stole his entity fate crystal and heavenly fate crystals.
After securing Dowbad's fate crystals, Ellen called over Overlord Milo and Simba.
In her office in the Fate Stadium, Ellen sat at a coffee desk. Simba and Milo stood still like modern soldiers, folding their arms behind their backs.
Ellen revealed her next scheme.
"The queen should have been dead by now. It's about time we return to DEZNUTS star cluster and reclaim the authority."
Overlord Milo was concerned as Eleanor had many consorts. Among them, there were a few karmic sovereigns.
"Are you sure? Shouldn't we wait and let the local karmic sovereigns kill each other first? I'm sure they will tear each other apart to steal Eleanor's treasures and mineral stars. Some of them originated from her dantian universe. They contain her dao. None of them can resist those."
"That's the point, Milo. When they're busy fighting, we march straight to Deswal Solar System and kill every senator of DEZNUTS. Once they're down, the local soldiers will join our cause and the media will be in our hands. With the media, we can frame the karmic sovereign consorts and the senators for the death of Eleanor and gain the public's support. We can't reign and govern so many stars and zillion of the inhabitants without a good public image."
"…That's true. That's a good plan."
Eleanor shifted her gaze to Simba, whose dark expression didn't hide his stress and concerns.
"Are you worried about your family, Ohio Man?" Inquired Ellen.
Simba let out a short sigh. "The battle took place on my home planet. I need to go back and bring my wife and my child here. Can I get your permission?"
"No." Ellen was firm, "Going there immediately is too dangerous. Eleanor was already defeated by someone called 'Florida Man.' We really need to gather more information about this person. Speaking of which, remember how you used to provide misleading information about this person to Milo? According to what we know, you and Florida Man come from similar backgrounds. It would make sense, logically, to imprison you for investigation, but we're choosing to keep you here with us as a way of showing leniency."
"…"
Ellen leaned forward, giving Simba a meaningful look.
"Listen, Ohio Man. We value your tracking abilities. Prove your loyalty to me, and I'll do everything in my power to rescue and protect your family. In case something happens to them, we will mobilize every able man to avenge them. Stay put and don't do anything. If you disobey my order during this sensitive time, we will deem you as one of Florida Man's allies, and we will kill you, your wife, and your child without fail."
Simba narrowed his eyes. His killing intent erupted, revealing his cultivation base of an entity.
"Even if you're a karmic sovereign, that doesn't mean I will bow my head to you all the time. If you dare harm my family, you can say goodbye to your precious race 'cause I will massacre every green, white, blond, and black elf in this universe! You can rule over the kingdom of ashes and corpses as you wish!"
"Hehehehe." Ellen giggled and stood up. She coyly walked around Simba and revealed her cleavage, "You're quite feral for an entity. Say, if Florida Man actually kills your wife and child, will you stop working as a mercenary and join my army? I kinda like a feral family man… and your black skin."
"…"
Simba clicked his tongue in frustration, yet he maintained his composure and discipline, not resisting Ellen's hand stroking on his chest.
Ellen licked her lips in a lewd way. Teasing Simba enough, Ellen pulled her hand away.
"You're authorized to use your ability to track the location of your wife and child. After you use it, tell me their current location."
Simba was relieved. He opened his system, and a transparent blue screen appeared in front of him.
Ellen glanced at Simba. As she had more entity fate crystals in her soul, she could see the system screen in front of him. Using this opportunity, she stood next to him and peeked at the status screen.
The screen showed Simba's signature perk. He could search and find anybody's name and find their location.
Simba's hands trembled in hesitation. He clenched his fist and input the name of his wife. Then, he pressed the [Search] button.
DING
Instantly, a map appeared, revealing the location of Ester.
However, Ester's status was strange. The map only revealed the last known location, but it didn't show where she was in real-time. Also, the status detail made Simba's heart sink.
.
Name: Ester Sydin
Status: Missing or Dead
Last Known Location: Florida Domain, Yan Empire Planet
Last Detected: 33 Days Ago

chapters.title: Chapter 274 Florida Man, Initially the Prime Suspect in Missing Woman Case, Found Innocent Due to Alibi of Feeding Wife Marijuana.
chapters.content:
Chapter 274 Florida Man, Initially the Prime Suspect in Missing Woman Case, Found Innocent Due to Alibi of Feeding Wife Marijuana.
Chapter 274 – Florida Man, Initially the Prime Suspect in Missing Woman Case, Found Innocent Due to Alibi of Feeding Wife Marijuana.
DING
<You have gifted Soul Enlightenment Pro to Essen Sydin IV.>
<The target doesn't possess a fate crystal. The system shall upgrade her soul to be compatible with fate crystals and systems.>
<After the upgrade is completed, the consumed entity fate crystal will merge with her soul and enable a random system.>
The deed was done. Leo spent 500 million years' worth of lifespan credit, which accumulated from the excess YOL and Qi.
<Current Lifespan: 1,647,483,647 Years.>
Leo laughed and sighed. No matter how many times he saw his bank balance, his heart palpitated with pride and joy. The sense of a rich man's happiness was overwhelming.
Continuing his work, Leo focused on draining the remnant energy in the frozen beams. He had less than 24 hours to finish what he had started. Also, he hadn't looted the spaceships yet.
Thinking of the limited time, Leo sent a sound transmission to Meowmeow, Lucky, and Aslan.
"Stop migrating the local people. I think it's time to plan our retreat. Come help me loot the spaceships. If you have any big, and I mean BIG storage rings, help me bring the spaceships to our domain. I need those."
