Upon hearing Leo's instructions, Aslan on the ground looked up. He bitterly laughed and shook his head.
"What a greedy boy. Alright, this daddy will help."
Meowmeow and Lucky gave Aslan a weird look. They also gave up on the dotting father. Instantly, they kicked the ground and stood on a different spaceship.
The guardian golems gazed at the cylinder ships and cubic motherships. They also wanted the sophisticated warship of the elves, but it was impossible to transport something bigger than the Sun to their world through the mystic realm portal.
The only way to bring them there was to pilot the entire fleet back home!
Aslan faintly smiled while he envisioned how he should pilot the fleet back. As for Meowmeow and Lucky, they were clueless on this part. Instead of taking the entire ships, both Meowmeow and Lucky infiltrated the warships and collected their armory.
Leo observed how Aslan slipped into Eleanor's flagship and activated a weird dao domain. As he thought that Aslan was scavenging for loot, he left the guy alone.
.
.
Meanwhile, Esen was still on the bus with Ivy. Suddenly, a system screen appeared in front of her.
Esen didn't have enough time to look at the screen. An endless stream of energy came out from the screen and dove into her forehead, knocking her unconscious.
"Your Majesty?!"
Ivy couldn't see the system screen or detect the energy. She rushed to support Esen and checked her pulse. However, nothing seemed unnatural.
She was confused.
As Ivy was helpless, she sought help from her peers. She went out to find Beatrice.
Beatrice and Marc had been guiding the refugees to the south of the slum and arranging temporary shelters for the foreign elves. One of Meowmeow's concubines was also there to maintain order and suppress Vendettito's men.
When Ivy informed them that Esen collapsed, Beatrice rushed to the bus, letting Marc handle the task by himself.
When Ivy and Beatrice returned to the bus, they found Esen sitting on the bed, gazing at a wall in a daze.
"Your Majesty?" Ivy sat next to Esen and rechecked her pulse.
Everything was normal, except her Qi flow. Some strange meridians were open, and her Qi flow's speed and quantity were much superior to the past. As if clogged pipes were either replaced by brand new ones or cleaned, streams of Qi from her dantian filled her entire body.
Because of the improved Qi flow, her skin radiated a faint rainbow aura. It was not as intense as Leo's, but she had a similar air as him. Moreover, her yin Qi reverted to pure virgin yin, unblemished by Leo's virgin yang aura.
"H-How?" Ivy was astonished.
Esen turned to Ivy and Beatrice. She wryly smiled and pointed at the two system screens in front of her, which her subordinates couldn't see.
"I think geezer… I mean, my husband has just given me a big present."
One of the screens was a message log. As for the other, it revealed Esen's unique system.
.
<Your husband, Leonardo "Florida Man' Ariel, has gifted you a Soul Enlightenment Pro package!>
<Your cultivation aptitude has been upgraded from B to S tier.>
<Your cultivation ceiling potential has been upgraded from Entity Realm to Transcendent Realm.>
<Your max lifespan capacity has been increased to 2,147,483,647 years.>
<Your max dantian universe capacity has been increased to 18,446,744,073,709,551,615 Stars.
<A new system has been implemented. More features will be unlocked once you have completed tutorial quests and progressed through Phase Quests.>
<A system will be generated according to your personality, karma, daos, and aptitudes. Calculating…>
<Detecting a compatible system. WORLD TREE SYSTEM will be integrated into your soul.>
<Integration completed. Adjusting quests and future system perks…>
<Adjustment completed. Synchronizing…>
<Synchronizing completed!>
<Congratulations. You are the only one in the universe with WORLD TREE SYSTEM!>
.
World Tree System
Introduction
World Tree, a creation of nature admired and worshiped by all lifeform is a symbol of peace and prosperity in many cultures. A world tree is usually unique as it grows and adapts to the local climate and environment.
In legends, a great man once mated with a tree, which later gave birth to thousands of saplings. One of them became a world tree, which later gained the enlightenment of a dao and gave birth to this system.
The World Tree System offers you the ability to cultivate as many world trees as you can. Each tree grants the entire planet one or more boons, depending on its maturity and your desire. They can be used as weapons or the ultimate protector of life. If you are desperate for a partner, you can even transform them into a dream spouse of your choice!
The System
The World Tree System consists of a World Tree Shop, a World Tree Nurturing System, and World Tree Management.
World Tree Shop provides saplings, which you can plant and cultivate on any planet. It can rapidly grow as long as you cultivate the tree with love and care. Further details can be viewed in the help menu.
World Tree Nurturing System allows you to check your planted trees. You may view each tree's status and choose how you will grow them in the future.
World Tree Management can be useful when you have multiple world trees cultivated on many planets. As traveling between planets can be troublesome, you can manage them with this menu and save your time. Unlike the nurturing system, you may delegate your matured world trees to work automatically by setting POLICIES, such as domesticate enhancement, wartime agricultural focus, or many other policies that you can explore.
.
There were other details. It would take time for Esen to study her new system.
Esen closed the screens and sighed. She thought of Leo and his aura.
"So, is this your secret, geezer? No… Leonardo?"
She giggled as she finally discovered Leo's real name and surname. She wondered if she should change her surname to Ariel like Leo's.

chapters.title: Chapter 275 Father of Florida Man, Who Fed His Wife Marihuana, Introduces AI to Battleship and Sparks US Navy Concern as Ship Gains Sentient and Joins Vtubing Company
chapters.content:
Chapter 275 Father of Florida Man, Who Fed His Wife Marihuana, Introduces AI to Battleship and Sparks US Navy Concern as Ship Gains Sentient and Joins Vtubing Company
Chapter 275 – Father of Florida Man, Who Fed His Wife Marihuana, Introduces AI to Battleship and Sparks US Navy Concern as Ship Gains Sentient and Joins Vtubing Company
<Warning! The gate will close in 10 minutes. Please return to your world or you will be trapped in this realm.>
After working so hard, Leo managed to digest all beams and reduced their effectiveness to a minimum. Still, they might change the landscape once the time resumed.
Leo stopped working on them. He ordered his men.
"TIME TO BAIL, PEOPLE! LET'S GO HOME!"
Meowmeow and Lucky promptly left the motherships and returned with two massive jiggling backpacks of spatial rings. They presented the bags to Leo with a bright smile.
"There're so many railguns and weapons, woof! They also have good pills and herbs in the rings." Lucky reported.
Meowmeow was also elated, "I manage to extract and smelt some of their ship components and hull using my Qi. You should turn those into ingots and make our original spaceships soon."
Leo was proud of his minions. He ordered them to bring the bags home.
However, one person was missing. Leo looked around, but he couldn't find Aslan.
"Where's Kitten?" Leo asked Meowmeow.
"That guy? Didn't he enter the flagship? He never comes out."
"Huh."
Leo gazed at the flagship of Eleanor. It was located in the middle of the cube ships and cylinders.
Sensing Aslan's life signature from inside the ship, Leo sent a sound transmission to Aslan again in case he didn't hear it.
"Time to go home, Kitten! Stop fishing and come out!"
"…"
Despite the second attempt, Aslan didn't respond.
Leo was annoyed. He rushed toward the flagship and planned to drag the fisherman golem out. However, as soon as Leo got closer, the entire flagship broke free from Leo's time domain restrictions. Its engines hummed in the void and turned the ship around.
Leo, Meowmeow, and Lucky were shocked. They brought out their weapons and got ready for combat. Then, they finally heard Aslan's voice.
"Stand down, master! Guys! I was busy hacking the ship! It's very difficult to program something in the time domain, you know?"
The group was relieved. For a moment, they thought that Aslan encountered something terrible inside and died like unfortunate employees in a certain scraps-scavenging-on-alien-infested-moons-to-feed-eldritch-tentacles-and-meet-quota-to-survive company.
The sense of relief soon turned into shock when Aslan navigated the flagship around and vanished entirely.
"DAFUQ?!"
"WOOF?!"
Meowmeow and Lucky widened their eyes in disbelief. Even though they shared a hive mind, both of them couldn't perceive what Aslan was doing.
Both golems tracked Aslan's location with their psychic link. Then, they discovered the general location of the runaway guy and were flabbergasted.
The guy was already directly on the Yan Empire Planet's orbit!
"M-Master," Meowmeow shivered in disbelief and shock "Kitten has just…"
Lucky finished Meowmeow's sentence, "Kitten just piloted that ship home, woof!"
Leo calmly nodded as he hadn't paid attention to their report at first. A second later, Leo thought of it and turned to them.
"What did you say?"
Lucky and Meowmeow dryly laughed, "Kitten… has driven that ship home, master."
"And how the holy hell did he do that?!"
"…We have no idea either."
"…"
Had Eleanor been there with them, she would have mocked them for treating Aslan as a regular minion as he was a top genius that she had acknowledged. Hacking a spaceship's mainframe and learning a ship's navigation method on the spot was a cakewalk to that guy.
.
.
Dreadnaught Flagship "Matriarch"
The dreadnaught was the state-of-the-art hybrid battleship and mothership, specially designed to accommodate Eleanor and her royal guards. It feathered an instant omnipresent drive engine, which allowed the entire ship to teleport anywhere in the universe as long as they had the right coordinate!
From afar, the dreadnaught looked like a rain dragon in Chinese mythology armed with modern weaponry. A humongous saddle on its body carried two pearls on the sides while its back was equipped with a massive cannon. Its six arms wielded a sword, a spear, a shield, a pistol, and a rifle.
The round pearls in the saddle's bags were the residential crew cabins, cafeterias, and entertainment facilities. They were connected to the middle section, where the sensitive modules were located.
The saddle, however, concealed hidden airship hangers and spaceports for smaller ships. A million unmanned drones were parked inside, ready to be deployed at any moment. In addition, moon-sized battleships docked on the saddle, and they were glued to the dreadnaught.
The front and the back, however, were shaped into a face and a rain dragon's long neck. Its 2 billion kilometers length and 50 million kilometers diameter in size could freely move like a real dragon. The scales on the outer hull were the hidden anti-domain weapon ports, where countless guns and missile launchers were equipped to deal with smaller vessels around the dreadnaught.
The left bridge, which was situated inside the rain dragon's left eye, was the primary navigation bridge. On the captain's seat, Aslan let out a long sigh.
"Man, injecting my Qi into the entire ship was too taxing. Eh, it was my fault. I should have told him about my plan. Anyway, it's good to be back home with a real battleship. This one is too good to be left behind."
Aslan was proud of his work. Still, as the massive dreadnaught was larger than the Solar System's Sun, he parked it a light year away from the Yan Empire Planet's solar system. He also reprogrammed the mainframe AI to follow the star system and protect itself from aliens or random asteroids.
Programming a new AI was easy, but editing and auditing the codes was hell. It took Aslan a day to complete the task.
RUMBLE
The dreadnaught no longer needed a pilot. The AI of the ship took over the reign and moved according to Aslan's wish.
<Greetings, Sir Kitten! The weather is nice today! What should we do?>
The newly born AI happily treated Aslan as its master. He was also glad that the AI was easy to talk to.
"Station here and slowly follow this star system's trajectory course."
<Affirmative. The current star system travels at the speed of 250km/s. I'll adjust my speed to match it.>
"Good. I'll be leaving you for a while. Behave and wait until I return, okay?"
<Affirmative. Have a good day, Father.>
"…"
Aslan scratched his cheek in embarrassment. He thought to himself.
'Sorry, Leo. I guess you have a little brother now. Well, I should add a little detail to the AI later.'

chapters.title: Chapter 276 Karen Sued Florida Man for Curing Her Lung Cancer by Trapping Her in Gas Chamber.
chapters.content:
Chapter 276 Karen Sued Florida Man for Curing Her Lung Cancer by Trapping Her in Gas Chamber.
Chapter 276 – Karen Sued Florida Man for Curing Her Lung Cancer by Trapping Her in Gas Chamber.
<Warning! The gate will close in five minutes.>
Meowmeow and Lucky brought their war trophies to the other side. Leo also undid his time domain.
CLICK-CLICK-CLICK
Time resumed. Remnant light beams flashed and vanished. However, some death rays that Leo hadn't fully digested continued traveling and hit the surface of the planet.
Small bombs erupted. Several mushroom clouds shot up to the sky and evaporated everything on the 1,000km diameter. Lands turned into either lakes or seas while many lives, whom Meowmeow, Lucky, and Aslan failed to migrate, perished in the bombardment.
Leo watched the small beams destroy the geography and nature. He deeply sighed as his guilty conscience reminded him that he was somewhat responsible for this massacre.
He clapped his hands like a Japanese praying. Then, he closed his eyes.
The souls of the dead left the planet and flew toward Leo. They were small sparkling light balls, containing no emotion. Even though some of them were immortals, the devastation power of the beams was enough to erase their entire memory and cultivation base.
'Don't worry. I'll take you in and let you live in a better place. Please don't mind your new appearance of alligators. I only have those right now, but I promise to create a better lifeform.'
Leo drew the souls into his dantian universe's karma river. Several million souls entered Leo's karma river and joined the queue. Soon, they would be reincarnated as alligators in Leo's universe.
After collecting all the souls of the victims, Leo parted this planet. Even if he couldn't finish the secondary quest, the haul was enough to make up for the loss.
DING
<You have completed the second mystic realm exploration.>
<You have completed the quest! You have obtained 100 Territory Expansion Tickets!>
<You have become the owner of DEZNUTS BMLB-49 Planet. You may assign a governor and impose taxes from this planet.>
After leaving the portal, the main gate behind Leo was closed. However, a new permanent portal was erected, and Leo could return to the previous planet at any time.
Leo stared at the portal and pondered. He glanced at Lucky and Meowmeow, who were about to resume their roles as guardian statues.
"You there. Go back in there and continue looting. There are more treasures, right?"
Meowmeow and Lucky's faces twitched. They wanted to take a break.
"Can we rest for a day or two, woof?"
"No. Go back and get as many treasures as you can. Oh, right. Where is that bastard Kitten?"
Meowmeow pointed into the void. A light year away in the darkness, a dreadnaught of Eleanor parked behind the belt of asteroids. However, Aslan was still busy with something.
After pinpointing the fisherman golem, Leo smacked his lips. He shook his head.
"Forget it. Meowmeow, you help me send those refugees back home. I don't want them here."
"…"
Meowmeow would have vomited blood had he possessed flesh and human organs. He lowered his head and followed Leo's instructions.
.
After sending the lazy statues off to work, Leo flew around his domain to inspect the land. He prayed that no elf caused trouble here.
While flying, Leo spotted Taxi and Ricardo's subordinates everywhere in the domain. They patrolled in pairs, walking in their humanoid form. They also carried the new rifles of Leo's domain and wore the suit uniform.
In addition, Esen's people gathered in two groups. One guarded the front of Leo's shopping mall while the other unit gathered south of the slum area.
Leo found Marc in the slum. He wondered what he was doing over there by himself.
"Marc?"
Marc turned around and found Leo in the sky. He waved his hand in delight.
"My lord! You're back!"
Leo looked around and found the refugee camp of green elves. All of them glared at Leo, Marc, and patrolling molgs with hatred. Fortunately, as most of them were women and children, none of them chose violence in this situation.
After landing, Leo questioned Marc, "How are the refugees? Did they cause trouble?"
"Some do, actually. We've already killed 500 rioters today. Ten of the molgs are sent to the temporary infirmary in the shopping mall. Also, we asked Lady Qiang Qiang to pacify the third refugee camp, but they keep calling us traitors even though we are helping them."
"Did you explain the situation?"
Leo referred to the general situation of their planet. As Meowmeow and others had sent many messages through the portal, Leo believed that Marc and others should have learned about the predicament.
"We did, but they didn't listen. Only after their ringleaders were killed, did they follow our instructions. But as you see, my lord. They're wary of us, and they are prone to riot."
Leo gazed at the green elves in the camp. Some of them held their children dearly while they glared at Leo and Marc in resentment.
"Yeah, this is war," Leo lamented. "I also didn't want this, but I did my best."
"I know, my lord. They would have died if you hadn't helped them. What a bunch of ingrates!"
As if the elves could hear their conversation, one of the elf women yelled at Leo and Marc.
"HELP MY ASS! YOU ABDUCT US HERE! BRING US HOME, YOU TRAITOR MOLG!!"
As soon as the first woman showed courage, the others berated Leo.
"I know what you ugly men are trying to do! You think we will cooperate if you threaten us?! You Molg and that NU'EARTHE can go suck dicks!"
"Even if you force yourself on us, we will tear your balls and feed it to a Fenrir!"
"Just you wait! The queen Eleanor will find you and destroy this world! You and your family will be hunted down like a dog!"
"Don't get cocky because you capture us! Lord Vendettito will come and rescue us! You traitors are nothing!"
Listening to the girls, Leo's mouth got itchy. He wanted to tell them that Vendettito and Eleanor were long dead, but he doubted they would believe him.
Since they were so prideful, Leo chose a slightly violent method to control the crowd.
"Let's introduce them to a gas chamber."
"Gas chamber?" Marc tilted his head in confusion.
Leo wickedly grinned, "They're gonna learn why they shouldn't insult artists, especially Austrian artists and Floridian Artists."
"???"

chapters.title: Chapter 277 Florida Man Rescued Boy from Sexual Predator Using Mushrooms.
chapters.content:
Chapter 277 Florida Man Rescued Boy from Sexual Predator Using Mushrooms.
Chapter 277 – Florida Man Rescued Boy from Sexual Predator Using Mushrooms.
Leo waddled away while the elf women jeered and laughed at them. Marc glared at the women in annoyance and pulled out a bastard sword to threaten them.
"SILENCE, YOU INGRATES! YOU ARE INSULTING THE LORD!"
"Ha! The lord? More like the toad lord! He's uglier than a tapeworm! I pity his wife and his family. I bet they are crying in regret that they marry-"
WHOOSH!
Marc was ruthless. With a swing of his sword, he crushed the ground in front of the woman. The sword cut her dress and left a shallow cut on her body.
The woman was petrified. She slowly looked down and found a straight line of a shallow wound on her chest and stomach.
"EEEEEEKKK!!"
She squealed in fright. The courage from before vanished like smoke as she ran away from Marc.
Marc snorted and pulled his sword back. He then turned to the others.
"Too bad, I missed! Does anybody else want to bad-mouth my lord? Next time, I won't miss."
"…"
The crowd backed away. Although they were scared out of their wits, some of them still glared at Marc in resentment.
"LISTEN UP!" Marc seized this opportunity to pacify the crowd, "The lord has promised that he will send you home as long as you behave yourself! We are finalizing the preparation at the moment! As long as you don't resist, we won't do anything harmful to you!"
"BUTTSHIT!" A woman in the back of the crowd suddenly yelled.
Marc turned around. He activated a dullahan's ability and summoned a skeleton horse.
A deity-realm skeleton horse manifested behind the woman. Its red eyes gleamed as it exhaled foul air on the woman's neck.
The elf woman slowly turned around and found the ghost horse. She shrieked in fright and collapsed on her butt. The ground and her skirt were soon stained by warm yellowish liquid.
Marc snorted and recalled his summon. He continued pacifying the refugees.
"Again, we have no intention to harm you as long as everybody is cooperative. By tomorrow if no mishap occurs, we should be able to bring you home!"
As soon as Marc revealed a rough schedule, the elf women were overjoyed. Their dark expressions brightened.
Still, managing selfish elves wasn't a simple task. A few seconds later, an elf woman carrying a young girl rushed out of the crowd to see Marc.
"Sir, my child is sick. We need the local medicine from my home. Can we leave first?"
The boy seemed to be only one or two years old. Marc looked at the boy and inspected him with his Qi.
However, there was no illness or anomaly in the boy's body. The child also looked healthy and cheerful as he smiled at Marc.
Marc frowned. He knew that the mother was lying. Even though it was a reasonable demand, allowing an exception might disrupt the order.
To deal with this woman, Marc came up with a trick.
"I'll treat the boy. Give him here."
The woman faltered, "N-No. He really needs the herbs at my house!"
"What's the name of the herb?"
"I-I-I-Immortal grass! Yes, an immortal grass!"
"…Wait here."
Marc snapped his fingers and resummoned his skeleton horse. It galloped to the shopping mall. A few seconds later, it returned with a bundle of immortal grasses in its mouth.
He retrieved the grasses and showed them to the woman.
"Here, the immortal grasses. How many stalks do you need?"
"E-Eh?"
Marc gave the woman a meaningful look, "Take one of the immortal grass's blades and shut your mouth, you liar. Don't make me stuff this entire stalk to your son's mouth. Leave while I'm in a good mood."
"I-I-I'm sorry!!"
Marc shoved one of the grasses into the woman's hands. She gulped and deeply bowed at Marc, then she brought her son along and ran away into the crowd.
Marc snorted and put the grasses in his storage ring. He then turned to the refugees.
"Anybody else wants to cause trouble?!"
"…"
Finally, no one caused another commotion. Still, the appearance of immortal grasses stunned the elf women.
Their planet belonged to a deity realm, which limited the accessibility to deities, immortals, and mortals. Anybody with a higher cultivation base was forced to suppress their strength to the deity realm before they could enter, though Vendettito and Rockhart were an exception due to their statuses as governors of the world.
Because their world supported deities, their natural resources improved. Spirit herbs, grasses, and trees sometimes blessed them with rare flowers and fruits, which became important cultivation resources for the local population.
However, immortal grasses, such as the ones that Marc had brought, were common. They existed, but Vendettito and high-ranked deities monopolized them.
Seeing how Marc handed the grass to a cunning woman that easily, their greed and desire were ignited. One of them ripped her skirt and blouse, revealing a lot of her skin. Then, she coyly walked toward Marc.
"Erm, sir. I'm wondering… what can I do to exchange for the immortal grasses?"
Marc snorted and told her the truth. He pointed at the shopping mall.
"You see that?"
"Umm, yes." The woman looked at the shopping mall building from afar.
"That place sells one blade of immortal grass for 10 years of lifespan each. However, we only trade with literate people, not hoodlums or whores! Unless you join us, we will not trade with you!"
The woman was taken aback. The astonished crowd was shocked as well.
Still, she didn't give up, "S-Sir. What about the grasses that you have? C-Can I buy that with my lifespan… or my body?"
Marc glanced at the cleavage and gulped. However, he soon compared the green elf's face with his elder sister's face, he was instantly disillusioned and regained his composure.
"I'm not interested in green elves. I'm a molg. I can only marry a molg! Now, go back to your camp and behave!"
The woman was offended, but she pushed her luck. She knelt and hugged Marc and whispered, "Please, mercy, my lord. I'll do anything. I-I don't mind if you do…"
Marc flinched as he had never hugged a woman before. Facing such an aggressive approach, he faltered.
While Marc was at a loss, Leo returned and found them hugging. He put on gloves and coldly peeled the woman from Mark, grabbing her clothes. As Leo didn't control his strength, he ended up tearing her clothes.
After yanking the greedy woman away from an innocent Dullahan, Leo showed the green elves a Tupperware box, containing a piece of Sweet Dream Mushroom.
"Sorry to cuck you, bitch. Now, listen!" Leo levitated and showed them the mushroom. "Back to the main topic, let me introduce you to a gas chamber… made of these mushrooms! You know what they can do, right?"
"T-That…"
Marc and the refugees were stunned. Some of them screamed in desperation and fear.
"Sweet dream mushrooms! NOOOOO!!"
"NOT THAT MUSHROOMS!"
"PLEASE NO!!"
The threat worked like magic. The refugees scattered in every direction.
Leo and Marc stood there and looked at each other. They widely grinned as they managed to disperse the mob.
"Say, my lord."
"Yes?"
"How are we going to round them back to the camp? You've just scared them away."
"Meh, they will gather. Just publish a gathering point for those who want to go home. They will show up. But if they want to stay, they have to follow our rules."
"…That might not be simple. They might cause trouble."
"So do the local cultivators. What's the difference?"
"…You're right."
Leo and Marc continued staying there as they discussed a method to bring them home tomorrow.

chapters.title: Chapter 278 Florida Man Diagnosed with Kidneys Stones after He Breaks Guinness Book World Record by Sleeping with 100 Women in One Day.
chapters.content:
Chapter 278 Florida Man Diagnosed with Kidneys Stones after He Breaks Guinness Book World Record by Sleeping with 100 Women in One Day.
Chapter 278 – Florida Man Diagnosed with Kidney Stones after He Breaks Guinness Book World Record by Sleeping with 100 Women in One Day
The next day, as Leo promised, he announced to the refugee camps that they could go home.
Millions of elves immediately gathered in front of Leo's shopping mall as asked. Because of the massive crowd, some of them stood in the middle of the southern farm.
Because they stood in the middle of the farms, they could see the crops clearly. When the cabbages, potatoes, and oranges matured, the girls gleefully stole them.
Though most of them were ignorant of the vegetable's effects, a few of them were literate. The girl who tempted Marc yesterday pulled a massive potato from the ground. When it came out, the crowd was stunned once again.
"It's huge!"
Many green elves were vegetarians. When they saw a huge crop, they drooled as they also wanted to grow one in their home world.
"MINE!" Shamelessly, a young elf girl touched the potato and stored it in her storage ring.
"Hey! That's mine!"
"First come, first serve!"
"You…"
Similar commotions occurred as more elves ransacked the farms to steal crops. They ignored the local workers and farming mannequins in the area.
As most elves were immortals, the young workers didn't dare to stop them. As for the farm mannequins, they stood still, waiting for their master's permission.
Leo stood on the rooftop of his shopping mall, observing the chaotic crowd. He let out a long sigh as these elf women were too rowdy and unorganized.
'I shouldn't have saved them. Oh, well. Whatever.'
The faster they are gone, the better. Leo coughed and amplified his voice.
"We will now guide you home. I want you to form two lines and walk along the road toward the west! Follow after the boy with white hair and he will send you home!"
The unorganized crowd cheered and ran along the road toward the west. As they ignored lines and order, elves with a stronger cultivation base soon pushed a weaker elf to the ground. The following women never spent a second to help or look at the victim. Instead, they started stepping on each other to go home first.
Fortunately, everybody was an immortal. Even though they were stepped on, their physiques could take some punishment. Some of them crawled out of the road with difficulty, but they were internally injured.
Marc, who was the designated guide, gave up on these selfish elves. He glanced at Leo on the rooftop and spoke to him via telepathy.
"My lord, can we kill them all?"
Leo smirked, "Be patient, young Padawan. Just fly and tell them to follow you. Bring them to the flying island and point at the right portal. Make sure not to block the entrance to the agriculture realm and Orlando."
"What if they enter the cow level, my lord?"
"If they're that stupid, then they can enjoy their bonus stage."
"…You're cruel, my lord."
"I'm a benevolent lord, but I can't save stupid people."
.
Marc guided the elves to the platform as instructed. But as Leo had predicted, they fought to enter the portal to their world first.
Meowmeow and Lucky stood directly in front of Orlando's portal and Agriculture Realm's portal. Because of their presence, the elves avoided them. However, the portal to the cow level was unprotected.
A small portal to the elf world was narrow. Only one or two people could enter at a time. But when a crowd of millions of elves rushed to the portal, nobody could move.
Everybody soon got stuck on the platform. They fought, scratched, and bit each other to get ahead. Still, the lucky ones managed to enter the portal in one piece.
Several elves levitated and observed the situation from above. When they noticed how unorganized the crowd was, they returned to the refugee camp and waited patiently.
Unfortunately, not everybody was that smart. They soon noticed the portals behind Lucky and Meowmeow. One of them was pushed outside, forcing her to stumble and fall next to Meowmeow.
The black-winged angel sized up the female elf. She secretly ogled her bosom and helped her up.
"Are you okay, ma'am?"
The elf kept sneaking glances at the portal to the agriculture world, "C-Can I use the portal behind you?"
Meowmeow shook his head, "That is not the right portal. It leads to a dangerous world. If you go in there, you might die."
"O-Oh. T-Thank you for your advice, sir."
"You're very polite. Say, are you single?"
"Umm, yes. Why do you ask?"
Meowmeow stroked his chin. He leaned closer to the maiden and whispered.
"I like you. Wanna stay here and be my concubine? I'm an entity. I can help you cultivate… or dual cultivate with you. I'm also one of the four heavenly kings under this domain's lord."
"…"
The woman widened her eyes in astonishment. She wanted to decline right away.
However, Meowmeow suddenly transformed into a humanoid angel. The handsome angel's face and his perfectly toned body were more attractive than male elves, causing the elf girl to be star-struck and speechless.
Meowmeow seized this opportunity and pulled her into a hug. He glanced at one of his concubines and ordered her.
"Stand in my place. Don't let anybody in."
One of the concubines "Wei Yuan" nodded and positioned herself in front of the portal.
After Wei Yuan got in position, Meowmeow dragged the elf woman into the agriculture world in glee. Without her consent, he made that girl his fifth concubine.
30 minutes into the chaos, Meowmeow and the elf woman came out of the portal. The girl was still in a daze, intoxicated by Meowmeow's hidden abilities.
Meowmeow whispered, "I will ask my lord for permission. You may reside here with us. Oh, you can stay in the agriculture world for the time being."
The elf blushed and nodded. She turned around and vanished into the portal behind Wei Yuan.
Wei Yuan dully stared at her unfaithful husband. She deeply sighed and secretly complained to him.
"How many more do you need?"
Meowmeow giggled, "Lots."
"Define 'Lots'."
"Until I have enough wife to consummate for 1,000 years without rest. You girls get tired too easily. I can't even warm up."
"…Pervert."
"Thanks!"
Their interaction didn't escape the eyes of the nearby women. Some of them saw the face of Meowmeow and had the same reaction as the lucky girl.
One of the courageous women approached Meowmeow. She boldly took off her blouse, revealing her skin.
"C-Can I…?"
Meowmeow laughed and patted the elf's head. "Of course. Elf women are beautiful by nature. If I refine you, you will be even prettier! Come with me. Let me show you what real HEAVEN is."
"Hehehe. Okay."
Again, Meowmeow guided another prey to the agriculture world. Half an hour later, only Meowmeow exited the portal. However, as the black-winged angel was a pervert by nature, he only wore a towel when he came out.
Many angry women in the crowd stopped thinking when they saw Meowmeow's handsome face and firm abs. When they met his eyes, their legs guided them to him.
Wei Yuan sighed and opened the way for the girls. Meowmeow politely gestured, guiding them to his love nest. Because of his action, a strange queue was formed in the middle of the chaotic crowd.
.
Meanwhile, Leo had been watching Meowmeow's interaction with the crowd. He facepalmed.
"I can't believe women fell for a freaking statue. What the hell is wrong with their taste in men?! Is it because the THING is ROCK HARD?!"

chapters.title: Chapter 279 Florida Man Calls Cops to Sue Government for Prohibiting the Use of Living Humans as Fertilizer for Personal Gardens
chapters.content:
Chapter 279 Florida Man Calls Cops to Sue Government for Prohibiting the Use of Living Humans as Fertilizer for Personal Gardens
Chapter 279 – Florida Man Calls Cops to Sue Government for Prohibiting the Use of Living Humans as Fertilizer for Personal Gardens
While Meowmeow harvested wives from the crowd, many elf women seemed disinterested in joining the harem. They stared at the portals behind other statue golems.
One of them checked the portal to Orlando, but Lucky barked at her. The girl stumbled and backed away from the doge. The others also respected the guard dogs and kept their distance.
However, the other gate was unprotected. The cow level's portal was so alluring that one of the elves decided to take a peak.
As the portal to the cow level was near the agriculture realm portal, Wei Yuan glanced at the daredevil girl and warned her.
"That place is not your home. Go back to the line."
The elf didn't believe in Wei Yuan. She spat at her feet and vanished into the cow level.
She never returned.
An hour later after the first elf entered the portal, another silly elf tried her luck. Again, Wei Yuan warned the ignorant elf.
"That is not the way to the elf world. It's full of monsters. Do not enter."
"Ha! I'm not an immortal. I'm a deity! I'm not afraid of monsters!"
The cocky deity elf burst into laughter and entered the cow level.
.
.
In the cow-level world, the sky was dark red as usual. No monster or traces of combat was in sight.
The deity elf pursed her lips and sneered. As she was experienced in space traveling, she flew to the void without hesitation.
"Foolish Nu'Earthe! I'm not na?ve! Even if it's not the right portal, I can fly my way through the void! I'm outta here!"
The elf kept flying upward at 90 degrees. She broke through the red clouds in the sky and reached the atmosphere. Everything looked normal like she had experienced in the past.
However, when she reached 50,000km altitude, her face hit a transparent wall.
The girl covered her face in pain. She looked up in frustration.
"Tsk! A barrier? For what?"
She reattempted to break the barrier with her fist and kick.
DONG
DONG
Every time she hit the barrier, it generated a weird bell noise. The sound vibrated and echoed everywhere at the cow level.
MOOOOOOOOO!!
In response, countless mad cows on this planet bellowed in rage. Some of them flew to the sky.
The elf woman turned around and found countless humanoid cow monsters, wielding giant halberds. Some of them even had crow wings on their backs.
"SHIT!"
The elf gathered more strength and punched the barrier. However, it didn't budge.
"DAMMIT!! MOVE!"
Five seconds, ten seconds, 30 seconds, the elf repeatedly punched the invisible wall that prevented her from going to the void. She started crying in despair.
MOOOOOO!!
It was too late for her. One of the cows launched an attack.
.
.
10 minutes after the deity elf had entered the portal, a soul physique of a deity exited the portal. It was the soul of the second elf woman who had entered the cow level earlier.
The soul glared at Wei Yuan's face, but she couldn't complain. On the other hand, Wei Yuan scoffed, "I've warned you. That is not the right way."
"…"
The soul couldn't argue. She turned around and used her soul physique to pass through the crowd, entering the portal to the elf world in peace.
After the unfortunate elf's soul returned, many elves realized the danger of the cow level. They stopped their silly thoughts to focus on reaching the right portal.
.
A day quickly passed by. Only less than 50,000 elves managed to get through the gate as too many people were uncooperative.
On the other hand, Meowmeow managed to score 200 elves. These girls would become new members of Leo's domain in the future. But for the moment, they had to pay the entrance fee with their bodies.
The second and the third day were the same. People flocked to the platform, competing to return home. A few of them, as usual, lost to the temptation of a certain angel statue, joining his ranks.
But on the fourth day, the crowd lessened by half. The elves learned the trend and finally decided to wait in the refugee camps. As less crowd was present, the lines flowed faster and more people managed to get home.
.
.
On the fifth day, Esen finally came out of Leo's bus. She grinned and carried a round pearl in her hands.
[Seed of World Tree]
It was a seed that Esen had bought from her World Tree System. Although she was a newbie, she managed to complete a few tutorial quests on the bus and got her hands on a real seed.
When Esen came out, she found a crowd of bored elves, queuing and waiting on the main road. They also looked back at her.
Esen shrugged and turned around.
"Meh, high elves. I hate those arrogant hypocrites."
Esen didn't have a good history with high elves. These green elves were known for their obnoxious nature. When she was a princess, the green elf representatives always pestered her and tried to make her a representative of the high elves instead of a divine elf. But when she was framed, the high elves were the first to condemn her and made the loudest noise to gain the favor of Ester.
Unfortunately for Esen, the high elves kept haunting her. One of the elves recognized her appearance and mistook her identity with her mother.
"YOUR MAJESTY ELEANOR! PLEASE HELP US!"
The scream of a desperate elf awakened the crowd's anger and desire for a bloodbath. They flew toward the parking lot and rushed toward Esen.
"YOUR MAJESTY! YOU'RE HERE!"
"WE'RE SAFE! PLEASE HELP US KILL THESE KIDNAPPERS!"
"YOUR MAJESTY! LET'S KILL THEM ALL! BURN THIS PLACE TO THE GROUND!"
Esen flinched. She turned around and glared at them, "I'm not your queen. Get lost!"
"W-What?"
The desperate high elves were heartbroken. They stumbled and fell to their knees at first. However, as Esen had guessed, they shifted the blame to Esen right away.
"Your Majesty! Did you betray us?!"
"How dare you betray us, your majesty! You were supposed to protect us!"
"Get us out of here! This is your job!"
Esen stopped her feet. She slowly turned around and gave them her brightest smile.
"You know, I've been having a headache about how I can increase my World Tree's level. I guess I was overthinking."
Esen opened her system menu and read her tutorial quest detail.
.
Tutorial Quest (7/10)
You have successfully purchased a world tree's seed. However, planting a world tree is a challenging task for a newbie. For an inexperienced world tree farmer like you, you should start by securing some fertilizer first.
Quest Objective:
- Secure 1,000kg of organic fertilizer (0/1,000)
Rewards:
- Unlock Fertilizer Inventory

chapters.title: Chapter 280 Florida Man Collapses After Pushing Limits by Writing 8,000 Words in 8 Hours for Serialized Novel's Christmas Event
chapters.content:
Chapter 280 Florida Man Collapses After Pushing Limits by Writing 8,000 Words in 8 Hours for Serialized Novel's Christmas Event
Chapter 280 – Florida Man Collapses After Pushing Limits by Writing 8,000 Words in 8 Hours for Serialized Novel's Christmas Event
"W-What?" The elves warily stared at Esen.
Esen brightly grinned and unleashed her domain ability. She displayed a new power, which she had obtained after receiving Leo's system.
Live Necromancy!
The crowd of green elves in front of Esen exploded, scattering flesh and blood everywhere. Their bodies left behind only bloody skeletons! Regardless of immortals or deities, everybody in her line of sight perished instantly, body and soul!
This new domain allowed Esen to transform living people with the same or lower cultivation base into an undead skeleton. Their soul's memory would be wiped clean, and they would be cursed into an undead forever.
That was not all. Her system reacted to the blood and militated corpses of the elves. The pearl in Esen's hands started sucking liquid, flesh, and innards of the dead. Within a minute, the stained parking lot was clean.
DING
<Secure 1,000kg of organic fertilizer (10,937/1,000)>
<Congratulations! You have completed the 7th tutorial quest.>
<A new feature has been unlocked. You can now access your Fertilizer Inventory.>
<Fertilizer Inventory can only store organic objects. You cannot retrieve any item from this inventory like normal inventory systems. All stored items will be automatically converted into numeric values of fertilizer for your world trees.>
<A new quest has been generated.>
.
Tutorial Quest (8/10)
After gaining enough fertilizer, you should think of a suitable place to plant the world tree seed. Since a world tree's characteristics, power, and blessings are at stake, you should plan out and cultivate the environment before completing the plantation process.
As this is a tutorial quest, the system will help you pinpoint a suitable location for planting. You can temporarily access the system map and see the recommended plantation spots, highlighted on the screen.
Quest Objectives:
- Mix the targeted area's soil with 1,000kg of fertilizer (0/1,000)
- Plant the World Tree Seed (0/1)
- Water the seed with any Holy Water every day for a week (0/7)
Rewards:
- Unlock World Tree Status and Management Feature.
.
Esen grinned and opened her new system inventory menu. When she found icons of militated flesh, she snickered.
"I should have extorted this ability from him ages ago. Damn geezer. You're hiding so many secrets from me! Hehehehehe."
Ivy had been standing behind Esen. She sweated profusely and gazed at her master in admiration and astonishment.
"Wow."
Esen turned around and gazed at Ivy, "Look, Ivy. We have new workers! It doesn't even consume a lot of Qi. I think I can maintain 100,000 of them with one percent of my Qi."
Ivy dryly laughed, "You're getting a lot stronger, your majesty. L-Let's go see his majesty and tell him about your new abilities."
"Of course! By the way, where is my husband?"
"…Probably, up there?" Ivy pointed up, gesturing that Leo might be on the flying island above them.
"Alright. Let's go see them… But on a second thought, let's do that later. Those annoying high elves might mistake me for my mother again."
"…True."
Afraid of the complications, Esen stored the world tree's seed and left the parking lot, flying north. They traveled together to the black mountain, where Leo had left behind a black stone mine active.
.
.
Meanwhile, the planet of High Elf faced a new change.
The portal of Leo's mystic realm platform sent them to the destroyed fortress, where the bombs landed.
WHOOSH
A new batch of married elves came out of the portal. But when they exited the portal, they fell to the ground and hit other elves who had arrived before them.
"OUCH! Watch where you're going!"
More elves kept pouring out of the portal and piled on top of the others below them. Some of them tumbled and rolled down from the mountain of bodies. The unfortunate girls underneath gritted their teeth and circulated their Qi to survive.
Soon, a deity elf came out. When she found out about the situation, she pulled out every elf on the mountain and rescued the unlucky woman. She also created an ice slider, forcing newcomers to slide down the path she had created.
The slider allowed the newcomers to gain time to react. A minute later, more people arrived and fell into the slider tracks. As the deity had envisioned, the new people leaped or flew off the slider track, avoiding the congested front gate.
When everybody gained their bearings, they finally noticed the disaster. The land that they once called home was left in ruin. A portion of the continent sank into the ocean while small craters riddled the afloat parts. As for the forest homes, nothing remained.
"WHAT HAPPENED HERE?!" Everybody panicked and screamed.
A few of the elves were enraged. They tried to go back to the Florida Domain.
Unfortunately, more people kept coming out. They bumped heads and knocked each other out.
For a while, they got stuck there. More elves stared at the portal, waiting for the exodus to end. They vowed to go back and question the kidnappers.
.
.
15 days later, the situation calmed down. More than 70% of the elves returned to their world. However, the rest of the elves chose not to return home.
Strangely, 100,000 elves decided to stay here permanently. They built their homes in the slum district and started doing business with the local humans. Some of them even married to the rich men and cultivators.
5,000 young elves fell prey to Meowmeow. They soon exited the agriculture world as elf golems, and they joined ranks with the worker mannequins, helping the local farms and other facilities in the shopping mall.
Because of the new influx of population, the stores had been busy again. Migrated elves were allowed to enter the shopping mall, and they quickly explored the facilities.
This day, the sky platform was finally devoid of elves. The last woman entered the portal, and the queue was no more.
However, chaos never stopped. A few minutes after the last woman left, several elves returned to the Florida Domain.
The first group was a team of deities. They rushed to confront Wei Yuan and questioned him.
"WHAT HAPPENED TO OUR WORLD?! WHAT DID YOU DO TO MY PLANET?!"
Wei Yuan's cold eyes fixated on them as she answered, "From what the lord has informed me, one of yours is the one who did this. Our lord was the one who rescued you from the calamity. Also, you ungrateful brain-rot parrots-in-heat should watch your tone. Yelling and screaming like Karen-on-period will only get you killed. Not all of us are benevolent or kind."
"E-Eh?!"
Coincidentally, Meowmeow left the agriculture world after converting another teenage elf into a statue golem. He noticed a group of angry deity elves.
"What's up, ladies? Are you here to join my harem squad, too?"
The elves were still angry. They looked at Meowmeow and were about to curse him.
However, Meowmeow's pheromone and handsomeness stunned them. Their anger disappeared as fast as zoomers browsing through TikTok clips.
Seizing the opportunity, Meowmeow soothed the crowd with his calm and deep voice.
"Say, girlies. Wanna chill and watch Netflix together in that realm? We have cookies, pizzas, and BIG rod."
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 281 Florida Man Starts New Hotel Business, Forgets to Hire Employees
chapters.content:
Chapter 281 Florida Man Starts New Hotel Business, Forgets to Hire Employees
Chapter 281 – Florida Man Starts New Hotel Business, Forgets to Hire Employees
For the past 15 days, Leo either spent time monitoring the refugees or trained in his dantian universe. But as the situation calmed down, Leo shifted his attention to the mountain of spirit stones, which Lucky and Meowmeow had looted from the spaceships. Everything was stored in the junkyard, waiting for Leo to sort them.
Lucky and Meowmeow collected over 500,000 spatial rings from the divine elf's spaceships. Inside the rings contained useful items, soul stones, essence stones, and random herbs. However, 70% of the items were nonsense junk, such as leaf gums, anti-viagra pills, skin lotion, and cosmetic creams.
Leo wanted to stop time and sort everything. However, the time domain could only pause the time flow within a star system or a galaxy depending on Leo's seriousness. Using it too frequently might affect Leo's system domain. After all, the system wasn't affected by the power of time.
As the population grew, managing the domain got complicated. Thankfully, his 'free' laborers were competent.
While Leo was at wit's end, Meowmeow sent a platoon of his elf wives to the junkyard. These girls had been turned into golems, and their cultivation bases increased by a major realm. The immortal elf evolved into 'stone' elf deities.
The elves received direct orders from Meowmeow. They approached the backpacks of spatial rings and started ejecting items out. Unhesitatingly, they threw away all common consumable items that high elves used – Creams and cosmetic items.
With a thousand helpers, Leo was overjoyed. However, the surprises didn't end.
A thousand undead skeletons formed a patrolling army. They watched over the farms and chased away the remnant high elves, who attempted to steal the crops. A few molgs and death knights under Esen followed the army around and supervised them if necessary.
"So many GREAT ASSETS of the company, me like!" He bet a certain space company would also approve this.
As things were automatically organized, it was time for Leo to clear another urgent matter at hand – His official wedding. As this matter was related to the morals of his people and his reputation, he needed to do this carefully.
Leo thought of his facilities in the shopping mall. He wondered where he should hold the wedding ceremony. A few seconds after he fell into a deep thought, he smacked his forehead.
He had money – YOL. He could solve everything with cash!
'Can I buy a freaking pre-made resource from the freaking online shopping system?'
Inspired, Leo checked the system shop. He wasn't disappointed. As soon as Leo put the keyword 'Wedding' into the search box, several item icons appeared in the menu.
The items ranged from a readymade garden to luxurious spaceship colonies.
Leo looked at the price. Then, his expression turned dark.
The cheapest garden was only 1,000 YOL as it provided nothing but decorations. However, the acceptable ones, such as a transformable 5-star hotel resort truck, cost a whopping 10 million YOL. This didn't include their upgrade fees.
Leo counted his fingers and sighed. "Oh, boy. Should I just stick to RVs? But we don't have a proper hotel around here. Should I make one? Meh, 170 million YOL is nothing. I can get them back in a jiffy."
He settled with a premade transformable construction vehicle, which could transform into a 5-star hotel resort. Although it was upgradable, it couldn't provide perks and employees like the usual system buildings. Fortunately, Leo could build it anywhere or repack it like C&C headquarters bases any time.
DING
A moderate-sized spaceship, 500m long, 100m wide, and 10m tall manifested from thin air. It slowly descended and landed at the Tang Clan's resident district.
Leo followed the spaceship to its landing site. When it landed, it automatically transformed into a luxurious 30-story tall grand resort hotel.
Looking at it from the front, it resembled the US Parliament House because of its unique architecture. However, its bright yellowish LED light, maze garden, and fountain pool inherited the Las Vegas style.
Sandwiching the parliament-looking building at the center was a fortress-like L-shaped building. Its height was twice as tall, but every room featured a balcony with a personal swimming pool!
Leo gulped and checked the description of the purchased item on the shopping menu. He was curious about what he had just bought.
.
Mobile Construction Vehicle (Rizzler Resort)
Level: 1/17
Upgrade Fee: 10,000,000 years of lifespan.
This vehicle can transform into a Rizzler Class resort, which is equivalent to a 4-star hotel according to Fate Stadium's standard. The hotel features a total of 1,000 luxurious suites, 10 grand suites, and 10 president suites for VVVIP guests. It comes with most basic facilities, such as restaurants, bars, nightclubs, theatres, casinos, fitness centers, meeting halls, cultivation rooms, spas, brothels, and many more.
Please note. This item does not come with workers, food, or cultivation resources.
.
Leo wryly smiled. He spent 160 million YOL and upgraded it to the soft cap level. Then, he waited for the building to change.
"…"
Nothing happened.
Leo shrugged and entered the building to inspect the interior. He understood that nothing might have changed from the outside, but a lot should have evolved inside.
He wasn't disappointed. As Leo had experienced, everything inside exceeded Leo's expectations.
.
Mobile Construction Vehicle (Rizzler Resort)
Level: 17/17
This vehicle can transform into a Rizzler Class resort, which is equivalent to a 5-star hotel according to Fate Stadium's standard. The hotel features a total of 17,000 luxurious suites, 170 grand suites, and 70 presidential suites for VVVIP guests. The hotel comes with state-of-the-art facilities suitable for aspired cultivators under the entity realm.
Please note. This hotel automatically generates basic food, water, liquor, and electricity. However, it doesn't provide cultivation resources.
.
The lobby was as large as an airport terminal in capital cities. Signboards showed a different section and different facilities, including various reception counters.
Leo rubbed his hands and walked into the building to explore his new toy.
.
.
RUMBLE
The new building caused a commotion in the Tang Clan's manor. Many clansmen rushed out to scout the perimeter, and they instantly found a massive hotel a kilometer away to the east of their location.
The hotel covered a span of 50 square kilometers. Gardens, sports facilities, running tracks, a golf course, a water park, and a theme park took 30% of the land. 10% belonged to the massive swimming pool with stone bridges and bar islands. As for the rest, the hotel buildings covered the terrain.
The large building shocked the clansmen. Fortunately, they had heard and seen Leo's system buildings before. Everybody concluded that it was the work of Leo once more.
The clansmen returned to their clan lords. However, both Tang Xuan and Tang Tian were still in seclusion. The news reached Bao Xun instead.
Bao Xun rushed out of his home to see the hotel with his eyes. He arrived in front of the hotel's entrance and gawked at the massive structure.
"As expected of Lord Florida Man! Tsk. I need to gain his favor this time."
Guessing that Leo might be inside, Bao Xun mustered his courage and was about to enter the building.
TAP-TAP
However, he wasn't the only one who gathered around this place to play. Behind him, a bored dryad and two elderly women arrived. The naught monster girl poked Bao Xun's shoulder.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Mister. Do you have any fertilizer?)
"Huh? What?"
Bao Xun turned around. Then, he found Cat, Xu Nuan, and Dongfang Mei.
Dongfang Mei had been cultivating. After several days of hard work, she reached the Star Celestial Stage, aka the 3rd stage of the immortal realm. Xu Nuan also reached the 2nd immortal stage. As for Cat, ate her way to the 5th immortal stage naturally! Moreover, her physical prowess was already comparable to a 5-star deity.
The physical appearances of the two female elders also changed drastically. Dongfang Mei was natural as she mastered an age reversal technique – She looked like a mature lady in her mid-20s. As for Xu Nuan, her physical age decreased because of her cultivation base. At the moment, she looked like a 40-year-old aunt. As for Cat, she was still a usual pretty dark elf brat.
Suddenly confronting three experts of Leo's faction, Bao Xun shrieked in fright. He deeply bowed.
"G-Greetings, senior. I didn't know that you were interested in this building as well."
"At ease," Dongfang Mei laughed. She gazed at the interior of the hotel. "I guess Lord Florida Man surprises us again. What is he building this time?"
"I-I don't know. Would you like to check inside with me?"
Dongfang Mei shook her head. She gestured for Xu Nuan and Cat to stay outside.
"Let's wait until he gives us further instructions. He might be busy decorating or tampering with the building from the inside. If we suddenly interrupt his work, he might be very angry."
Bao Xun came to his senses, "You're right, senior. I-I almost offended the lord."
"Good. Let's wait here together. You're curious too, right?"
"Y-Yes."
The group stood at the entrance of the hotel, waiting for Leo to come out.
Meanwhile, many disciples, commoners, and rogue cultivators in the area also gathered for sightseeing. But when they saw Dongfang Mei, nobody dared to enter the building.
.
.
Three hours later, Leo finished inspecting the hotel. He was satisfied with the rooms and facilities. However, there was an issue.
This building lacked employees. Leo would need to assign some workers to this establishment soon. Moreover, many facilities required supplies from the shopping mall, such as spirit herbs, quality food, and cultivation resources – such as True Earth Fate Crystals.
Leo grumbled while he walked into the lobby.
'I need to make more true earth fate crystals, but they can be stolen. I need someone trustworthy to be this hotel's manager.'
Leo reached the exit and found a crowd of people gathered outside. He looked up and found Dongfang Mei, Xu Nuan, and Cat.
Seeing the trio, Leo had an idea.
"You've come at a good time, ma'am. Are you interested in an executive job?"

chapters.title: Chapter 282 Florida Man Faces Warrant for Allegedly Raising Male Bulls for Inappropriate Use.
chapters.content:
Chapter 282 Florida Man Faces Warrant for Allegedly Raising Male Bulls for Inappropriate Use.
Chapter 282 – Florida Man Faces Warrant for Allegedly Raising Male Bulls for Inappropriate Use.
"Executive job?" Dongfang Mei didn't fully understand Leo, "What kind of job, sir?"
"Managing this business, well, a massive tavern business. Do you have any related experience?"
"OH?!" Dongfang Mei repeatedly nodded after Leo mentioned 'tavern'. "Is this place a tavern, sir?"
"Yes. It's a high-tech one. You'll need to learn a lot before you can employ helpers."
"I DO! I WANT TO TAKE THIS JOB!!"
Dongfang Mei was firm. Her life experience told her not to miss this opportunity.
Leo approved Dongfang Mei's decisiveness. This was one of the required qualities of a good leader.
"Good. You're hired! I'll increase your wage and cultivation resources accordingly. So, here is your job. I want you to explore this place and remember how every facility works. You have 15 days to comprehend everything. As for the employees, you are free to hire anybody to work here. Make sure every business in this hotel is covered."
"Yes, sir! You can count on me!" Dongfang Mei giggled and immediately turned to Xu Nuan. She smiled at her subordinate. "You'll be my assistant, Xu Nuan. Oh, go call the girls that have nothing to do. Bring them here so we can learn about this place together! Let's go!"
"O-Okay." Xu Nuan was still confused, but she rushed toward the clothing stores, where most of her disciples gathered to play or work.
The onlookers could only gaze at Xu Nuan and Dongfang Mei in envy. Even Bao Xun cursed his fate as to why he wasn't born a woman.
Meanwhile, Cat was oblivious to the talk. She tilted her head and tugged Leo's clothes.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Daddy. Where food?)
Leo shifted his attention to Cat. He wryly laughed and patted her head.
"Alright. Let's get you some crazy cows. Come inside with us."
"Meow <3" (Yay!)
The weird family entered the hotel while Dongfang Mei followed him into the building. The door shut behind them, blocking the outsiders from intruding on the premises.
.
After the door was locked, the spectators whispered among each other before they rushed back, especially the people of the Tang Clan. They were the only group who didn't have a proper job other than maintaining the order of the western slum district.
The news about the new recruitment quickly spread. As the tavern job's concept was easy to understand, idle housewives and young maidens of the families were interested in the new opportunity.
Within 30 minutes, a hundred idle women from the Tang Clan made their way to the hotel. Xu Nuan also brought 50 of her disciples who were bored of working in clothing stores.
The doors were automatically opened, and the new employees entered. Dongfang Mei accepted them without an issue. Although 150 workers might not be enough, they were enough for the first batch of trainees. Also, it would take a while to learn the jobs and new culture.
Leo also helped them integrate into modern technologies and culture, such as room services, spas, housekeeping, and the usage of various facilities and electric appliances.
Also, Leo combined another set of earth fate crystals. Another true earth fate crystal was born, and it was used to power the hotel complex. Another source of "HOLY WATER" emerged.
.
.
14 days later, Dongfang Mei, Xu Nuan, and 150 employees graduated from the hotel management crash course. As for Cat, she ditched them the first day when Leo started teaching the women housekeeping techniques.
On this day, the group gathered in one of the meeting halls in the hotel complex. Leo stood on a podium and gazed at the crowd of hotel employees, who had changed their dresses into a maid uniform. Only Dongfang Mei wore a modern white suit.
"It has been over a month since the last seasonal expedition. It's about time we prepare for my wedding ceremony. You know what to do, right?"
Dongfang Mei brightly smiled, "Can I also hold a ceremony for me and my husband afterward?"
"Do whatever you want. Make sure you don't F up my wedding. I just want to get this over with."
"Of course! We'll do our best, senior! By the way, about the rental price and other fees, I think it's quite… cheap?"
Leo's facial expression distorted, "Why? Is 100 years of lifespan per night too cheap?"
"I mean… Sir, we should consider the perks of our facilities. Firstly, our hotel offers cultivation services. For example, the private yoga rooms are connected to a stream of holy water."
Dongfang Mei referred to the newly created holy water fountain, where the source of Qi and electricity of this hotel came from. She continued.
"Our customers can drink them for free! Drinking a mouthful of holy water gives the same Qi as cultivating at the pylon tower for a year! The fitness center also features unique training dummies and correction machines that adjust one's martial techniques! Training in such a facility for one day is more beneficial than training on their own for 10 years! Such privileges require a high price to pay. This doesn't include the luxurious suites where our customers can fully relax and enjoy their time. If I may suggest, a day of rent should be at least 10,000 YOL to make it worth it! Otherwise, every commoner and their chickens will be swarming this place and ruin our hotel!"
"…I see."
Leo nodded in acknowledgment. At first, he wanted the hotel to be accessible to all commoners so that they would be motivated to start cultivating. However, judging from the local standard, 10 years of lifespan seemed too cheap for such opportunities.
"How about 5,000 for regular suites, 20,000 for grand suites, and 50,000 for presidential suites?"
"That's more reasonable for a promotion. However, the full price should be 10,000/30,000/100,000. In the future, more immortals will emerge. I'm sure a few thousand years of lifespan will become cheap changes to them. Well, I'm also an immortal, so I know how easy it is to increase our life expectancy."
"…If you say so. Okay."
"Oh, I almost forgot. About the currency, sir. Since you normally trade one essence stone for one year of lifespan, I suggest we standardize essence stones as the local currency. One YOL is one essence stone. Is that okay with you?"
"Suit yourself. But wait, won't the price of our hotel be too cheap then? 10,000 essence stones per night?"
Dongfang Mei widely grinned, "Don't you need soul stones? I heard you have been mass-minting soul stones in the workshops."
"…"
Indeed, Leo had been printing soul stones to trade with people from the Fate Stadium. He hadn't visited that place for a long time.
In the end, Leo let Dongfang Mei run the hotel as its general manager or the CEO. Xu Nuan ended up being appointed as an accountant, and she would be in charge of managing the hotel's budget and finances.
As for the wedding, Dongfang Mei requested a week of preparation. They would also need to start sending invitation letters to their friends and families.
.
.
"Hey, have you heard?"
"Again? The new building, right?"
"Yeah, that. It's the building that we can't enter."
"I heard they aren't open for business yet."
"I know, but the lord's wedding ceremony date has been decided. I think they will hold the ceremony there."
As usual, poor workers and cultivators in the shopping mall gathered on the 2nd and 3rd floor, enjoying the fresh air from the air conditioners and absorbing mild lightning element Qi from electric outlets. Although they couldn't get as much Qi as the pylon tower's seats, they preferred this place because of the relaxing environment.
As for elders and rich cultivators, they usually stayed in either the fourth-floor casino or the first-floor restaurants. Only weirdoes and studious cultivators remained in one of the fifth floor's workshops, uninterested in worldly affairs.
In a small domain, news spread fast. Within a few hours, everybody heard about the wedding schedule. Fortunately, they heard about it a few months ago, and they had been preparing gifts for this occasion.
However, the new residents of this domain, aka the elves, had never heard about it. Most of the remaining elves were women and children. Their elders and men either died rioting or returned home three weeks ago.
A dozen elf women disguised as humans and blended into the crowd inside the shopping mall. When they heard about the wedding, their women's instinct kicked in.
They were jealous of the bride. They wished their husbands or future boyfriends would host a big wedding ceremony for them. Driven by emotion, they spent a whole day eavesdropping everybody.
The next day, the hotel's housekeepers brought leaflets to the shopping mall. They plastered them on every wall on every floor, advertising the wedding schedule.
The wedding would be held at the newly built hotel. All official employees could freely attend and enjoy free food and drinks. However, they were expected to bring gifts for the groom and bride according to their tradition.
Some of the elves stole a few leaflets from the walls. They carried them back to their new village in the slum district to inform their colleagues.
.
.
Meanwhile, the bride had no idea what Leo was doing. She and Ivy toured the continent and arrived at the former home of the Joyous Yin Yang Sect and Tappaya City.
As Milo's people had abducted the local cultivators and civilians there, the sect was deserted. Only weird creatures remained behind.
In an abandoned ranch, Esen inspected the local bulls and realized what they were.
"Ah, it has been a long time. So, they're still around."
Ivy gazed at the bulls in front of Esen. Her expression was complicated.
"Spirit Bulls? If I remember correctly, the only good thing about them is their urine. Their meat is a bit meh compared to the supreme beef in the restaurants. Are we taking them with us?"
"Of course. These bulls are necessary for my world tree. Their urine will be the best fertilizer. Actually, let's take the whole ranch with us. Can you help me?"
"…"
Ivy was reluctant as she knew how smelly the spirit bull's urine was. Moreover, these spirit bulls were infamous for their nasty behavior – They enjoyed consummating with other races, especially humanoid creatures!
She knew the reason why the Joyous Yin-Yang Sect kept these animals. Their purposes were solely for wild entertainment!
The bulls finally noticed the gender of Ivy and Esen. They lewdly snorted and stood on two feet. At the bottom, their pink organ extended like an elephant tusk.
Ivy and Esen clicked their tongue in disgust. The latter snapped her fingers and activated one of her dao domains.
SNAP
The bulls flinched for a moment before they all collapsed on the ground, falling asleep.
Esen sighed and waved her hands. A hundred fat bulls floated and followed Esen.
"Let's go home. We're done here."
Ivy nodded. She copied Esen and carried the rest of the herd, "By the way, Your Majesty. Where are we keeping them? The unicorn's barn?"
"Nah," Esen thought of the pervert cow woman. Sierra's face came to her mind. "We have a lewd cow at home. She might like them. They're from a similar species, right?"
"OHHHH!!" Ivy remembered Sierra. She also wondered how the cow woman would react. "Good idea! Let's bring these guys to her."
The duo flew home, carrying souvenirs for Leo. They, too, would be in for a surprise.
.
.
DEZNUTS Council, Home Planet of Eleanor
Ellen's troops reclaimed Eleanor's territory without an issue. As soon as she returned, Ellen declared that Leo murdered Eleanor.
This news enraged all elves. The divine elf, high elf, forest elf, and dark elf population vowed to avenge their matriarch. As such, more people volunteered to join Ellen's army.
Milo also brought a piece of similar news to his kin. As most Fenrir was loyal to Eleanor, they also joined Milo's troops, preparing to for a new fight.
Meanwhile, Simba seized this opportunity to visit Ester's planet to find clues about his wife. He arrived home and found traces of disaster.
"…"
Simba remained silent while he levitated in the sky, gazing at the new lakes and sunken lands. The place where his house once existed was no longer there.
In addition, there was a strange gate not far from the ruined fortress.
Simba narrowed his eyes as he saw several golems crossing the portal. When he looked carefully, he found that the golems looked like high elves of this world.
Curious, Simba approached the portal.

chapters.title: Chapter 283 Galactic Showdown Goes Viral: Ohio Man and Florida Man Unleash Epic Toy Lightsaber Battle!
chapters.content:
Chapter 283 Galactic Showdown Goes Viral: Ohio Man and Florida Man Unleash Epic Toy Lightsaber Battle!
Chapter 283 – Galactic Showdown Goes Viral: Ohio Man and Florida Man Unleash Epic Toy Lightsaber Battle!
DING
<Warning! A player has entered one of your mystic realms!>
While Leo helped Dongfang Mei and Xu Nuan adapt to the hotel, a system message warned him about the uninvited guest. He left the hotel in a hurry and rushed to the mystic realm platform.
Upon arrival, Leo found Meowmeow and Lucky. Both of them still guarded the agriculture portal and Orlando portal as instructed. However, the number of stone golems drastically increased since Leo last visited them.
A hundred concubines of Meowmeow stood in a formation while his initial three wives stood in front of them like platoon leaders.
The two heavenly guardians also detected the intruder's presence. They saluted Leo.
Leo glanced at the army of elf golems. He complained, "What are those? I remember that I told you to return them. Why the hell are you taking them in?"
Meowmeow widely grinned.
"Hey, master. Do you know that in terms of male human and female humanoid species breeding, elves are the most compatible partners for men? Not only are they beautiful, which is their main attraction, but their youthful appearance sticks with them forever. This means they stay sexy and fit, suitable to become a-"
"Stop!"
Leo almost vomited blood from cringe because this silly statue recited a cursed copy-pasta verse in the elf version. Fortunately, he hadn't mentioned anything about orcs or something inappropriate yet.
He changed the subject, "Where are the intruders? Which planet are they invading?"
As Leo's tone was serious, Meowmeow stopped messing around. He revealed the location of the intruder.
"The elf planet, master. Should we repel the invader? Actually, I have been thinking of eliminating all male elves over there and brainwashing every female elf. We can get free laborers that way."
Leo's turned solemn, "I'm not afraid of bloodshed, but damn! You're a psychopath! Are you planning to create a harem of elves or what?"
"Well, I was born from your inner desire, so…"
"Screw you and your perversion, damn birb! Fine! You and I, we go back to that planet together. You can do whatever you want with the male elves. All I want is peace and order! Spread love, not hatred!"
"That's my point, master! I DO spread LOVE – SEXY LOVE!"
Leo facepalmed and shook his head. He swore that he would either deploy or reincarnate this guy into somebody else's dantian universe one day.
"No more chit-chat. Let's get to work. We're going to see this visitor-"
Leo was about to enter the permanent portal to the elf planet. However, a male dark elf suddenly crossed over to Leo's domain.
Although he was a dark elf, his face was as handsome as the other male high elves that Leo had seen. In addition, his physique was a lot bigger than thin elves.
He looked like a dark elf on steroids. That perfect toned muscle and his hidden abs would have charmed millions of modern women on Earth instantly.
The dark elf exuded the air of an entity at a glance. However, his eyes and his black aura strangely resembled Aslan.
The dark elf stared straight into Leo's eyes. He muttered.
"Florida Man, I assume."
Leo snorted, "Yes, and you are?"
"Someone from Earth. My Daoist name is Ohio Man."
"Oh?"
Leo raised his eyebrows, surprised. The corners of his mouth curved up, "Well, well, well. A dark elf claiming to be one of my kin, how amusing. What did you do to get those elf ears?"
Simba swept his gaze across the platform and found several stone elves who stood still like statues. Upon noticing how the local high elves had been cursed by an unknown ability, his killing intent soared.
Leo also noticed that. He calmly pulled out his pen from his pocket.
Simba stared at Leo again. He slowly brought out a photo of a gorgeous female blond-haired elf holding a baby in her arms. Then, he showed it to Leo.
"Have you seen this woman before? Her name is Ester Sydin. She's the second princess of the Divine Elf Kingdom. I know that she has been imprisoned somewhere in this world because you link your domain with her home planet."
"Hmm?"
Leo's expression changed when he heard of the surname. Although Ester didn't have the 'IV' after her surname, she was still from the Sydin Family. Instantly, Leo figured that Esen and Ester were related.
Unfortunately, Leo didn't remember seeing her. After all, he was busy watching over the crowd of unruly elves and the return migration.
"Never seen her in my life." Answered Leo.
"…"
Simba deeply sighed after a long pause. He shifted his attention to Meowmeow and Lucky next. Despite meeting them the first time, Simba inquired about them as if he knew they were alive.
"What about you two? Have you seen my wife?"
Lucky barked, "Nope, woof! Anyway, why should we even answer you?!"
Meowmeow scoffed, "If I met her, I would have turned her into one of my collections. If she's not among the statues over there, then she might have been erased along with several people of that planet."
Simba glared at Meowmeow and squinted his brow. He inquired Meowmeow again in a cold deep voice.
"I'll be giving you a second chance. Answer me honestly, and I won't do anything to you or anybody here. WHERE.IS.MY.WIFE?!"
Meowmeow didn't like the tone. He also replied in the same tone. "I.DON'T.KNOW.FUCK.OFF!!"
"…I see."
Simba deeply sighed. Then, he slipped his left hand into his pocket.
Leo immediately activated the lightsaber pen and pulled out the upgraded pistol. He aimed at Simba's head and was about to pull the trigger.
VHOOM!
Simba pulled out a finger-sized keychain knife from his pocket, but it instantly expanded into a 1.5m long plasma chainsaw blade. With a swing, he sliced Leo's upgraded pistol in half!
Leo flinched when he pulled the trigger and discovered that the system gun was easily destroyed. As he got distracted, Simba closed in on him. The chainsaw blade came from Leo's right side like a baseball bat coming after a flying ball.
"HMMPH!!"
Leo smacked the flat surface of the chainsaw blade with his hammer fist. The core of the chainsaw bent 60 degrees, causing the plasma chainsaw to stall and cease functioning.
But as Leo blocked the chainsaw, Simba discarded the weapon and followed through with his right hook, aiming at the face of Leo. Moreover, he activated one of his dao domains, concealing him and Leo within a 5-meter cubic square meter domain.
Leo ignored the weird domain and leaned forward, dodging the strike by a hairbreadth. At the same time, he head-butted the face of Simba.
BONK
Leo's forehead directly broke Simba's nose. However, the latter's face regenerated instantly as he pulled his head back. A right knee shot up, aiming at Leo's face.
As Leo's left hand still held the lightsaber pen, he swung it, aiming for Simba's neck.
POW!
The knee found Leo's chin and tilted his head upward. However, Leo's lightsaber hacked down and found Simba's neck.
SSSSSSSHHHHKKKKKKK
The lightsaber emitted a strange sound as if it hit a metal plate. Moreover, the energy from the pen dimmed.
Unafraid of the lightsaber, Simba grabbed it with his right hand. His domain also drained the energy of the sword.
Within a split second, Leo sensed that his energy was leaving him. He groaned and kicked Simba's chest, using his opponent as a foothold.
Getting kicked in the chest, Simba's chest caved in while ten of his ribcages shattered instantly. He vomited several mouthfuls of blood while his body was knocked backward. His back hit the wall of his domain. Then, he fell on his knees.
Leo's back also hit the small wall behind him. When he looked up, Leo discovered the domain's ability, which trapped him and his opponent.
The domain trapped both of them inside! Moreover, it leeched his energy!
"Annoying!"
Leo stopped time and overlapped his domain with Simba's.
As soon as the time domain reached Simba, he instantly healed the injuries and undid his domain. Instantly, he vanished and reappeared behind Leo.
