Leo sensed the dark elf behind him. Even though his time domain was active, this dark elf ignored the restrictions and stretched his hand, seizing Leo's neck from behind.
"DETONATE!"
BOOOOOM
A large explosion erupted and Simba's black flame devoured Leo whole!
Unfortunately, the touch was a mistake. Leo, being an absolute menace, turned his head 180 degrees. His spinal cord grew a dozen sharp spikes, which pierced Simba's arms, face, and chest. The transparent blood of Leo ignited a rainbow flame, which extinguished the black flame of Simba.
Despite being pierced by Leo's bones, Simba lightly snorted and transformed into smoke. He leisurely reappeared five meters away while his body showed no signs of injuries.
Leo calmly turned his body around. He grabbed his head and twisted it back to the right angle.
CRACK
Adjusting his spine placement, Leo tilted his head from left to right and right to left. Then, he rotated his shoulders while the spikes behind him slowly formed a pair of bone wings.
Simba gazed at Leo in solemn. He recognized the traits of the wings and rainbow aura.
He was enraged. The wings reminded him of a certain murderer and the traitor of humanity.
"Rainbow aura of the phoenix bloodline and the wings of that devil? What's your relationship with Mao Miaomiao?!"
Leo slowly tore his suit, which was burnt and corroded by Simba's black flame. He tossed away the broken pen and resumed a kickboxing stance.
"Mao Miaomiao? Oh, that asshole? He's long dead."
"I know he's dead. Did you absorb his bloodline?! Or was you one of the people from that lab?!"
Leo didn't fully understand what Simba's problem was. He only remembered that he was a lab rat before, so he innocently answered.
"If you refer to the asshole's lab, yeah, I was a part of it."
"Good. Very good." Simba's expression changed. His killing intent exploded, and a menacing black aura of a draconic karmic sovereign was revealed. Black scales covered his skin while his face distorted, transforming into the face of a black dragon. A pair of black metal wings protruded from his back while his arm and leg joints twisted.
A long white bone slowly exited through Simba's left hand. The humanoid dragon ruthlessly pulled out the piece of bone from his flesh.
The bone, bathed in his black blood, shapeshifted into a 3-meter-long blade. However, the movable joints on it implied that it was not a simple weapon.
Instead of displaying the aura of an entity, Simba revealed his true strength as a karmic sovereign.
Leo solemnly gazed at Simba. Realizing the gravity of the situation, he pointed at the void in space.
"How about we change location? You are here to rescue your wife, right? You probably don't want to kill her accidentally."
Seeing how calm Leo was, Simba pointed his long blade at Leo's face.
"Ha! Now, you wanna talk?"
"Will you stop fighting if we talk?"
Simba sneered, "Nah. Once I get my wife back, you can say goodbye to your people and your world! A traitor of humanity like you doesn't deserve happiness and a good life!!"
"Now, you're being excessive. I'm the victim here!"
"Hah! Victim? YOU HAVE NO IDEA WHAT I HAVE BEEN THROUGH BECAUSE OF YOU PEOPLE! NOW, DIE!!"
"…Oh, dear." Leo cracked his knuckles. "I guess we have no choice. I'll send you to your wife, then."
Leo and Simba paused for a second. Then, they rushed at each other at the speed of light.

chapters.title: Chapter 284 Florida Man's 'Ruff' Day: Takes Home 'Abandoned Puppy,' Turns Out to Be Ohio Kid
chapters.content:
Chapter 284 Florida Man's 'Ruff' Day: Takes Home 'Abandoned Puppy,' Turns Out to Be Ohio Kid
Chapter 284 – Florida Man's 'Ruff' Day: Takes Home 'Abandoned Puppy,' Turns Out to Be Ohio Kid
One punch, two punches, five punches, ten punches, a hundred punches, every attack was faster than the speed of light. However, nothing connected.
The same applied to Simba's attacks. Despite wielding an abnormally long sword, none of his attacks, punches, or kicks landed. He even mixed in a domain ability, which had the same effect as Leo's sword domain, yet Leo instantly threw a counter punch, which forced him to recall the domain to protect himself.
Both men weaved, vanished, and teleported on the platform, testing each other's limits and fighting patience.
Simba grumbled in frustration as he was at a disadvantage. Leo already undid his time domain, but Simba was forced to maintain a cubic barrier. Even though it gradually drained Leo's life force to maintain the blockade, it was vulnerable to any domain-canceling attacks. If the barrier was destroyed, Simba's dantian would crack, which would lead to his demise.
After five minutes of close combat, Simba lost the chicken race. He removed the barrier domain before Leo could destroy it. Then, he teleported 1,000 meters to the sky.
But as soon as Simba removed the life force leeching domain, Leo's both phoenix wings transformed into a rainbow scythe. Taking a firm step forward, Leo swung the scythe and unleashed one of his many domain abilities.
The domain was invisible and undetectable. However, the big movement hinted that a big sophisticated attack was about to hit him.
Simba finally had a chance to use his bone sword. The long sword broke into 27 pieces like detachable razor blades, and all of them transformed into Simba.
SWUA!
Nine fake bodies of Simba instantly shattered to pieces. In addition, the detached razor blades dissipated into dust.
Simba squinted his eyebrows as he figured out what the previous attack was.
'A karma attack? Are you kidding me? A karmic sovereign attacking another karmic sovereign with a karma domain? Is he stupid? No karmic sovereign can die even if their karma strings are cut. We're the absolute existence exceeding the laws of the universe! I guess his foundation is lacking. After all, he just appears out of nowhere.'
Simba scoffed at Leo for being inexperienced in combat against a fellow karmic sovereign. He took his time and pulled out another piece of bone from his other hand to create another razor sword.
But Leo ignored Simba's action. He adjusted his stance and swung his scythe at empty air.
SWUA!
Leo cut through dimension and created a crack in front of him. At the same time, another crack appeared directly above Simba's head and sliced down.
The crack in dimension cleaved Simba's real body in half from head to groin!
"!!!"
The crack in dimension sucked Simba's body and soul into the void. Simba immediately ejected his soul from his body, teleporting a kilometer away from the mysterious crack in dimension.
The cleaved body of Simba vanished into the dimensional crack before the mysterious portal disappeared.
Simba's soul regenerated his fleshly body anew. Then, he mumbled to himself.
'Time and Space Laws, Dimension Splitting Laws, Karma Cutting Laws, how many laws has he mastered?! No karmic sovereign has mastered more than two laws at once! If you cultivate multiple karma rivers, your lifespan capacity will decrease! Is he that dumb?! Or rather… is he using a system ability? Is that the case?'
He couldn't understand how Leo had mastered so many abilities. Still, as a system user, Simba believed that Leo cheated the natural laws and overly relied on the system.
'Since he's using a system ability, I can win. I can do… THIS!'
Simba ejected a fate crystal from his spatial ring – True Entity Fate Crystal!
Like how Leo merged seven earth fate crystals into one true earth fate crystal, Simba also merged seven entity fate crystals into a true entity fate crystal.
.
True Entity Fate Crystal
This crystal can only be created by merging seven Entity Fate Crystals. Any True Entity Fate Crystal can be used as a consumable item, a socket item for system facilities, or an imprint on a soul.
By crushing this crystal, the owner can erase all system abilities from a nearby system user who has obtained their system abilities from entity fate crystals or inferior crystals.
If it is equipped in a system facility or system equipment's socket, it will grant a random blessing to the facility or the equipment. In case it is used to imprint a soul, a unique system will be generated and imprinted to the karmic soul.
.
Despite owning a precious treasure, Simba never hesitated to spend one or two to eliminate his enemies. He grabbed the true entity fate crystal and was about to crush it.
Suddenly, Simba's hands lost all strength. He widened his eyes in shock as he sensed a hundred threads latching onto his fingers, arms, legs, and head like a puppet.
Behind Simba, Aslan rubbed his temples while he held a fishing rod, which bound his adopted son before he could damage Leo's foundations.
Simba also turned around and found the clone of Overlord Xiaomao. He instantly recognized the face of the golem. Then, he remembered that another golem on the platform also had the face of Mao Miaomiao.
"As I figured. You lots are into this together! There's no way Mao Miaomiao can get his hands on Overlord Xiaomao's blood essence without his help!"
Aslan deeply sighed, "Dammit, Simba. I gave you an entity fate crystal and sent you to Eleanor's side to hide you. I didn't send you there to JOIN her, you dumb kid!"
"!!!"
Simba was taken aback when Aslan's sound transmission entered his mind. Moreover, he was shocked that the sentient golem knew his real name.
"WHO ARE YOU?!"
Aslan rolled his eyes, "I'm your father."
"BULLSHIT! MY FATHER DIED AGES AGO!!"
Aslan shrugged and was about to explain everything. But when he noticed that Leo was about to charge at them, he cut the conversation short.
"How about you shut up and hide inside me for the time being? You're not supposed to fight your brother, you little shit."
"WHAT?!"
Aslan reeled his fishing rod. The lines and Simba's body shrank into a tiny grain of dust and entered Aslan's dantian universe.
.
.
WHOOSH
Leo arrived at Aslan's side. He looked around for a moment. Then, he stared at his subordinate.
"There you are, you lazy golem. Where is that dark elf?"
Aslan laughed, "I thought you were going to say the N-word for a second."
"I forgot about that word. Thanks for the unnecessary reminder. Anyway, where's that elf?"
Aslan giggled and lied, "I ate him. His soul is in my dantian universe now."
"…" Leo gave Aslan a meaningful look. He mumbled, "I wish I could press X to doubt you. You're very sus, do you know that?"
"You don't have to worry about my credibility and loyalty, master. I'm always on your side, like a father looking after his son."
"Yeah, right. What an irresponsible father. Ha!"
Leo rolled his eyes and shook his head. Despite the confession, Leo thought of it as sarcasm. He flew back to Florida Domain as the crisis was over.
Aslan deeply sighed and scratched his cheek. He wondered if his son purposely ignored the hints or if he was simply stupid.
Since Leo stopped paying attention to him, Aslan sank his consciousness to his dantian universe to check on his adopted son.
In Aslan's universe, every star system and galaxy was symmetrical like an art. 256 galaxies contained a total of 4,294,967,296 stars orbited around an abnormally large white sun at the center.
On the surface of the white sun, a civilization hid behind a curtain of flame. Crystalized minerals which immune to extreme heat were carved into square houses. Countless white flame spirits wandered about, minding their businesses.
Simba was tossed to the surface of the planet. The white flame immediately burnt away his disguise and Qi, revealing his true form of a jacked African-American man who seemed to be in his mid-20s.
Simba panicked when the white flame devoured all of his Qi. He struggled to take a step, but the extreme gravity of this planet pinned him to the ground. Moreover, the fate crystal in his hand slipped away and vanished into the planet.
Aslan descended from the void and landed next to Simba. His appearance didn't resemble Overlord Xiaomao like his 'Shell'. Instead, he appeared as a handsome blond-haired divine elf in white robes. He sat next to his son and laughed.
"Sorry for the untimely reunion, son. It has been 50,000 years, hasn't it?"
"You… who are you?" Despite being exhausted, Simba managed to utter a few words.
"Again, I'm your father."
"…Don't pretend. Mao Miaomiao and Eleanor killed my parents. You can be him."
"What if I purposely faked my death and hid my soul inside Leonardo?"
"…What?! Wait a minute."
Aslan gently pulled Simba off the ground and seated him. Then, he sat in front of his son.
"It's about time we have a heart-to-heart talk. There's a lot to explain, too. I don't blame you for the confusion, but for the sake of my grand plan, please cooperate with us."
Simba narrowed his eyes and gave Aslan a meaningful look. Upon noticing that the stranger was a divine elf, his killing intent locked onto Aslan.
"All elves are the same. You scheming bastards always toy with us. You're no different from Eleanor and her cronies!"
"Ah, yes. The blame," Aslan had a headache. He stood up and waved his hands, summoning a flame spirit.
One of the white flame spirits walked over. He bowed at Aslan and glanced at Simba.
Aslan ordered the spirit, "Transfer a fragment of my memory 50,000 years ago to this brat. Show him the full event of how I died as Aslan Ariel and reincarnated as 'Kitten', the clone of Overlord Xiaomao."
The spirit nodded. He transformed into a stream of white flame and disappeared into Simba's forehead.
"!!!"
Pictures of 50,000-year-old memories flashed in Simba's mind. A stream of knowledge followed along with vivid 3D scenes of events.
.
It was when Leo and Simba were still stuck in the lab as test subjects. At that time, Simba was barely two years old. However, countless substances had been injected into his veins.
Every day, Simba felt like dying. He always had a high fever. His stomach cramped while every fiber of his muscles was in pain. Even his bones cracked and broke daily.
Simba gave up living several times and waited for his death. However, someone gave him hope for living.
Next to his glass cage, a cute blond boy also went through the same ordeal, yet his face never showed a hint of being in pain. He dully stared at the adults like a doll.
At first, Simba was jealous of the boy. He thought that the boy didn't get tortured like him.
The boy was none other than Leo.
One day, Leo noticed Simba's existence. He suddenly smiled and waved his hands. Then, he picked up a crayon and started drawing doodles on the glass wall to communicate.
Simba couldn't even move at first, but the drawing interested him. He lay there in a blank room, staring at the weird drawing of Leo. The drawings soon became his beacon of light, which distracted him from the never-ending pain.
Days passed by. Simba forgot how long they were in that hell hole.
One day, a couple secretly entered Leo's cage and brought him out. At that time, Simba was still wide awake because of the stomach pain.
The commotion set off the alarm. Guards rushed in to apprehend the couple, but the elf in a lab coat slaughtered his way out.
Simba envied them. He thought that they were only there to rescue his neighbor.
But a miracle occurred. Leo screamed and pointed at Simba. He flailed his arms and legs while crying, refusing to leave.
The couple read the boy's thoughts and rushed into Simba's cage. When they brought Simba along, Leo stopped crying.
That was Simba's core memory. He remembered the face of his savior, who gave him hope.
The fleet of memories in Simba's mind suddenly paused and became static. A new memory overlapped with his.
The face of the male elf slowly became clearer. He started to resemble the divine elf in the dantian universe. Simba also learned of this man's identity.
He remembered the guy well.
Aslan Ariel, the Vice Chief Researcher of the Homunculus Project!
That man was Leo and Simba's father!

chapters.title: Chapter 285 Florida Man Forces His Son to Marry Vaporeon to Breed the Ultimate Pokemon
chapters.content:
Chapter 285 Florida Man Forces His Son to Marry Vaporeon to Breed the Ultimate Pokemon
Chapter 285 – Florida Man Forces His Son to Marry Vaporeon to Breed the Ultimate Pokemon
Simba witnessed the memory of Aslan. He saw himself from his father's point of view.
Aslan and his wife carried both Leo and Simba from the lab. He traveled everywhere, hiding them from the grasp of Mao Miaomiao and Eleanor. Countless pursuers died in the hands of Aslan. Even innocent police officers and soldiers who followed their superior's commands got entangled in the conflict and met their demise. The situation quickly escalated as the US military decisively deployed their superweapons.
The military followed Aslan to Alaska. A space warship, which the US government bought from Eleanor, unleashed its first nuclear missiles on the North Pole, hoping to kill Aslan and his family. Unfortunately for them, Aslan returned one of them to the sender, destroying the only space warship of mankind.
A parent can sometimes do unexpected things for his children. After the incident, Aslan directly assassinated the president, wiped out half of the US military, and stole an entire nuclear submarine to threaten the states. He also massacred a million elves, who resided in the country to set an example.
The power of a crazy entity terrified the Earthlings. Eventually, the local government yielded.
Aslan was not that merciless. He assumed the presidential title and commanded the US government to protect his family as well as hunt down Mao Miaomiao. He also exposed the inhumane experiment to the world.
The crazy father was soon idolized as the IRL superhero. However, many families of deceased soldiers held grudge against him. Half of the country's population rejected his sovereignty and established a new government. Ironically, their leader was Mao Miaomiao, who claimed to have a close tie to Eleanor and divine elves.
The remnant elves quickly sided with Mao Miaomiao. They shared their knowledge with the new force and bribed many officials in other countries.
The rise of the US shadow government drew the attention of other nations. Many countries openly supported the new regime and denounced Aslan for being a terrorist.
The tension sparked a civil war. The glorious United States shattered in half as Aslan's supporters and Mao Miaomiao's supporters collided.
At first, Aslan overwhelmed Mao Miaomiao's force with his prowess alone. Elven sages and deities were no match against the genius divine elf in human disguise. Within three days, 90% of the elven forces under Mao Miaomiao perished.
Mao Miaomiao fled the states to the Middle East, where he had secretly formed an alliance with the local princes, promising technologies and immortality.
The princes sheltered Mao Miaomiao in exchange for a cultivation method. The mad scientist used these Arabians as a human shield and went into hiding.
The defeat of Mao Miaomiao's government solidified Aslan's status as the new dictator. European countries stopped sending support to Mao Miaomiao's forces and switched sides.
Peace was temporarily restored.
During the peaceful time, Aslan brought his family to Florida, which had become a sanctuary for his troops and his supporters. A naval base and a military base were all there, providing them options if another war might occur.
Leo and Simba grew up there. Aslan hired private tutors for his two children.
Unfortunately, there is always a bigger fish. 20 years later, another war broke out.
Things changed when Eleanor's vanguard forces arrived. A hundred entities descended and wiped out Aslan's country. Only the eastern states, such as Indiana, Kentucky, Alabama, and every state beyond these territories survived the purge.
Aslan realized his looming demise as he wasn't strong enough to defeat multiple entities at that time. He secretly drugged his wife, Simba, and Leo before he transported them to Ohio. As for him, he fought to the bitter end.
The result was as Aslan had predicted - He was captured while all his soldiers were wiped out. Eleanor also returned and forced Aslan to find his family.
Another tragedy struck. Eleanor found Aslan's wife. She killed her and read her memory, which led her to Ohio where Simba was in hiding. As for Leo's location, the wife didn't know as the man already run away from home.
Eleanor cut off Aslan's legs and arms. She dragged him to the children to let them see their miserable father.
Simba, who had become an adult, revealed his exceptional aptitude for cultivation during the crisis. He defeated an immortal with brute force and caught Eleanor's eyes.
Unfortunately, a newbie fighter was no match against a veteran entity. Eleanor defeated Simba in one hit and was about to kill him. Before she could deliver the finishing blow, Leo suddenly showed up, holding the mad scientist Mao Miaomiao hostage.
Leo, at that time, offered a hostage exchange deal. He offered himself to go with Eleanor. In exchange, he wanted Eleanor to spare their lives.
Eleanor was amused. She agreed and let Simba live in exchange for Leo's cooperation. As for Aslan, she refused to release him due to her personal grudge.
Simba scraped for his life, but Leo and Aslan became Eleanor's prisoners from that day onward.
With Aslan and Leo as their captives, Eleanor and Mao Miaomiao celebrated their victory. They resumed the soul transmigration research, using Leo as their prime guinea pig. As for Aslan, he was forced to cooperate or Simba and Leo would be killed.
Without a choice, Aslan worked for Mao Miaomiao and Eleanor once more. However, he asked the two dictators for permission to visit Simba once in a while.
Mao Miaomiao and Eleanor allowed Aslan to leave as Leo was in his custody. The father quickly initiated his plan B by injecting Simba's soul with an entity fate crystal. Then, he implanted Simba with a new memory, teaching him a disguise technique so that he could appear as a person of another race. After another meeting, Aslan teleported Simba away to the most unexpected hiding place – an elven planet deep within Eleanor's territory.
After sending Simba away, Aslan cooked a new scheme. Using the entity fate crystal in his soul, he created a backup body for Leo and disguised it as a failed homunculus product. But by doing so, his soul would be trapped inside the entity fate crystal forever as a price. As for his real body, his will and a fragment of his soul would linger, allowing him to command his real body to work temporarily.
Aslan's soul merged with the entity fate crystal and transformed into a worthless rusty ring afterward. As for his fleshly body returned to work as if nothing had happened.
Years later, Leo's fleshly body reached its prime. His physique was on par with a karmic sovereign, which Mao Miaomiao desired the most. The mad scientist stopped experimenting on Leo.
The next phase began. Mao Miaomiao wanted to transfer his soul into Leo's body. However, there was a problem with karma strings and the laws of the universe. Possessing someone else's body was against the karma laws.
Mao Miaomiao came up with a plan. He asked Eleanor to only kill Leo's soul. Fortunately, Aslan was there and overheard their conversation. He volunteered to murder his son.
Amused by Aslan's offer, Eleanor and Mao Miaomiao gleefully permitted him.
Seizing this opportunity, the fleshly body of Aslan and his soul fragment performed a ritual. He sacrificed his life and body to become a karma string, which attached to Leo's soul to the entity fate crystal that he had disguised as a rusty ring. Then, he secretly moved the soul into a newly created body in one of the dead homunculus capsules.
After the ritual, Aslan's fleshly body dissipated into dust. Leo's soul migrated from his true body into a new physique. As for the empty shell, it ended up in the hands of Mao Miaomiao.
Afterward, everything was history.
.
.
Simba slowly opened his wet eyes while shedding tears. The memory of Aslan saddened him.
"F-Father. You have done a lot." Simba's voice trembled.
"Any father would have done the same." Aslan chuckled.
"…Yeah, I understand that feeling."
Simba was also a father. He also rushed here without planning to rescue his family. Being reminded of his actions, he deeply sighed.
"Say, father. By chance, do you know where my wife or my kid is? My system tells me that she was last seen here."
Aslan raised his eyebrows in confusion at first, "You have a wife and a kid?"
"…Yes. That's why I'm here in the first place."
"I guess Leo accidentally visited your planet and kidnapped your family, huh? Man, sometimes, karma is a bitch..."
"Do you know something, father?"
"Can you show me what they look like?"
"…The photo got burnt."
"Meh, forget it. I'll read your memory myself. Close your damn eyes!"
Aslan pointed his fingertip at Simba's forehead and sent a string of karma into his mind. He closed his eyes and slowly digested the information.
Several minutes later, Aslan retracted his karma string. On the other hand, Simba smacked his lips and gazed at Aslan in awe.
Simba was familiar with this technique. When he did this, the ones getting their memory read always screamed in pain. But in his case, he felt nothing.
"How did you do that? I didn't feel any pain at all?"
Aslan shook his head and sighed, "You must have been inconsiderate when you used this technique. Instead of trying to plug your karma string inside someone's brain, you should have slid it into a blood vessel. Blood vessels aren't responsive to the nervous system, and the victim cannot feel anything. You can infiltrate someone's brain like this without spooking them."
"OH!"
Simba was enlightened. Again, he shed a tear of joy that he had a smart and caring father.
"Anyway, I think I know where they are." Aslan changed the subject, "They're alive and well. But I think your wife has done something to your brother's wife. Man, who asked you two to marry the daughters of that bitch who killed me? You two have no taste at all!"
"…Um, what?"
"I said, you two suck! I wouldn't have complained if you married a Vaporean, a Gardevoir, a fleshlight… or a freaking alligator! Why do you two have to marry Eleanor's daughters!? DAMMIT!!"
"…"
Aslan bitterly laughed like a cramped-legged hyena having diarrhea.
Watching his father malding, Simba was speechless. The fatherly image of Aslan shattered, replaced with a toxic loud-mouth nerd of a father.
"…Father. You need help."
"Shut it, you little shit! We're going to see Leo! You can stay here for the time being. I'll bring your wife and kid over in a jiffy!"
"…Thanks, father."
Aslan turned around and gave Simba a meaningful look. "Call me 'Dad', not 'Father'. I cringe every time you call me that."
"Err. Okay… dad?"
"Yeah, that's better. No more cringe."
"…"
Simba gazed at his father while having a complex feeling. He wondered if he should be overjoyed or depressed because of this weird reunion. Somehow, his father was weird.

chapters.title: Chapter 286 Florida Man Wakes Up to Surprise Addition: Baby or Burrito?!
chapters.content:
Chapter 286 Florida Man Wakes Up to Surprise Addition: Baby or Burrito?!
Chapter 286 – Florida Man Wakes Up to Surprise Addition: Baby or Burrito?!
By the time Aslan returned, Leo already cleaned up the mess. Fortunately, the fight finished in a flash, and both men didn't use any wide-ranged skills. No one was harmed.
As soon as Aslan landed on the mystic realm platform, he looked around, observing the stone elf army. He then gave Meowmeow a weird look.
"Get some help, Meowmeow."
Meowmeow was offended. He smirked, "I've been working hard, and you're telling me to get some help? No. YOU get some help. You've contributed nothing."
"Hah. You have no idea what your wives have done. You almost ruined my plan."
"Ruin what plan? You lazy ass know nothing."
"…"
Aslan shook his head, mentally exhausted from bantering with this immature angel. He shifted his attention to one of Meowmeow's mistresses 'Wei Yuan'.
Wei Yuan also looked back. She flinched as the gaze of Aslan seemed scarier than before. His bloodcurdling glare and Overlord Xiaomao's elderly face were so terrifying that she knelt and lowered her head.
Aslan approached her. He whispered, "Transfer the prisoner to my dantian universe."
Wei Yuan nodded. She ejected a light ball from her stomach and sent it to Aslan. The latter directed it to his dantian and closed his eyes.
In Aslan's dantian universe, Ester floated in the void. Her body, covered in a bubble ball, gradually descended upon the white sun. She landed in front of Simba.
The husband and wife reunited. The bubble broke, but no one managed to move due to the extreme gravity.
Aslan's consciousness also manifested in the universe. He appeared behind the two and created a one-square-kilometer barrier array. The dome manifested, which lessened the gravity force within the domain.
Simba and Ester could finally move. They hugged and consoled each other.
Aslan watched his son and daughter-in-law in solemn. A few minutes later, both husband and wife turned to him.
"Dad, about our son…"
Aslan sighed, "I know. He's somewhere in your brother's territory."
"Then, can you bring him here?"
"Nope!"
Simba's expression turned dark. "Can I ask why?"
"I'll be taking him as a disciple and raise him myself. You two are in no condition to raise your child."
"Hah?! Wait a second, you're being unreasonable here. That's our child. Why are you taking him away?"
Aslan reminded Simba of one fact, "Have you forgotten what you are made of? It's already a miracle that you can actually reproduce. In fact, you're different from Leo who inherited my flesh and blood. You're a human, but the only human part inside you is your brain. The rest of your body is composed of countless monster parts and mixed blood of various powerful overlords."
"…"
Simba froze. He was aware of that fact. But for Ester, this was her first time hearing this piece of information.
"You are what, Simba?!" Ester was shocked.
Speechless and flustered, Simba stuttered, "I-uh-I'm sorry."
Aslan clarified the misunderstanding for the family. "This is going to be a long explanation. How about we sit down and listen to me."
The father proceeded to explain everything he had done in the past and revealed his family's secret.
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo was mentally exhausted after the brief combat against Simba. He returned to his bus, planning to get a good nap.
Returning to his bedroom, he tossed his clothes to the floor and dashed into a bathroom. After an hour-long quality bath, he wiped his body and made his way straight to the bed. Without checking the bed, he slipped inside and prepared to enter his dream world.
Suddenly, his arm touched something.
"WAAAAAAAAA!!"
The thing that Leo accidentally touched suddenly cried. Leo widened his eyes and looked at the little thing next to him.
There was a little baby boy next to him. He was a light-brown elf infant.
Leo sat up and gazed at the baby in confusion. He didn't remember having a baby. Moreover, Esen was never pregnant as he had been keeping her status after their sexy time.
"Who the hell are you, you little shit? Wait a minute. OH SHIT!!"
He remembered that he accidentally touched the boy. He jumped out of bed and scoured for his clothes, searching for spatial rings that contained Hope and Dream pills.
It took Leo a minute to find the ring in the back pocket pants. He brought the pill out and bit his fingertip, extracting his blood. Then, he leaped back to the bed to check the boy's condition.
The boy never mutated. On the contrary, he looked healthy. His deep black eyes fixated on Leo's face.
"Huh? You're fine?"
The boy stopped crying. He stretched his little arms and opened his palms.
"Dah."
The boy was attracted to Leo's blood. He waved his arms and legs, wanting to get the drop of transparent blood on his fingertip.
Leo noticed the boy's gaze. He deeply frowned.
"Hey, you little brat. My blood is more toxic and poisonous than Chornobyl sewers. If you drink this, you'll turn into a zombie."
"DAH!"
"…"
Leo grumbled. He might be an idiot, but he refused to play with lives. For the sake of the boy, Leo licked his fingertip to get rid of the blood.
As soon as Leo drank the blood, the boy wailed.
"WAAAAAAAHH!"
Facing a crying baby, Leo facepalmed. He picked the boy up and wrapped him with a dry towel. He purchased a pet bed from the system store and put the baby on it.
The boy stopped crying again. He looked around him in curiosity.
Leo was relieved. Ignoring the responsibility, he returned to bed and was fast asleep.
However, the nightmarish experience of keeping a baby had just begun. An hour later, the boy screamed.
He was hungry. He also defecated.
The foul smell of the baby's feces woke up Leo. He got out of bed and rushed to the source of annoyance.
"You…"
"WAAAAAAAHH!!"
Leo had enough. He stripped the dirty towel and burnt it. Then, he carried the poop-stained boy out of the bus.
Along the way out of his bus, he ran into Beatrice, who had just clocked off work for the day. She noticed the boy and the dirty butt.
"Your Majesty… The boy…"
Leo grinned as he found a victim. He shoved the boy to Beatrice.
"I don't know how this little critter got to my bed. Find his parents and get him outta here. He dirtied my room."
"…This elf…"
Before Beatrice could explain, Leo already stomped back to his room. He shut the door behind him.
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 287 – Florida Man Shuns Celeb's Marriage Proposal, Claims Affection for 2D Vtuber over 3D Pigs
chapters.content:
Chapter 287 – Florida Man Shuns Celeb's Marriage Proposal, Claims Affection for 2D Vtuber over 3D Pigs
"Hah…"
Leo grumbled on the bed. He then gazed at the quest menu to check the progress.
.
Entity Fate Crystal Quest – Phase 4/13
Mission Objectives: Complete 10 tasks to complete this phase.
Phase Completion Rewards: 500,000 Years of Lifespan, One Selectable SR Building, Increase the Shopping Mall's max level to 20, Increase the Sub-Building's Max Level to 20
Phase Three Tasks (7/10 Completed) - Get married (0/1)
- Complete monthly PVP three times (1/3)
- Complete mystic realm expedition three times (2/3)
- Top-Up one time (Done)
- Obtain two true earth fate crystal (Done)
- Defeat 100 deities (Done)
- Upgrade shopping mall to level 17 (Done)
- Spend at least 1,000,000 years of lifespan system items (Done)
- Manufacture at least 2,000 weapons using strategic resources. (Done)
- Attain the strength of entity realm or higher. (Done)
*For every completed task, you will receive one Lucky Draw (Building), and one Lucky Draw (Automaton).
.
The fourth phase reached the bottleneck because of the monthly PVP and the expedition requirement. It would take 2 or 3 more months to complete it all.
In addition, the quest reminded Leo that he hadn't used the PVP mode for a long time. It had been months since he last visited the Fate Stadium.
Leo wanted to get up, but he soon fell asleep because of the mental exhaustion.
.
'After the wedding, I guess. Come to think of it, I need to talk to Esen about the wedding arrangement.'
Leo wanted to get up, but he soon fell asleep because of the mental exhaustion.
.
.
Meanwhile, Esen and Ivy returned home with a herd of perverted bulls. They brought them to the agricultural world and shoved the responsibility to Sierra.
Esen approached the Minotaur woman and chatted with her.
"I've brought something you will surely love, cow tits. Look at these stupid pervert bulls. I got them from the Joyous Yin-Yang Sect whatsoever!"
Esen expected a reaction from the pervert Minotaur woman. After all, this woman had been harassing her husband and seducing him for a while. Distracting this woman away from Leo was her idea.
Sierra was confused at first. When the bulls arrived, her expression changed. She knew what they were.
Instead of being delighted, she complained.
"How unsightly. I can't believe we originate from the same species… Anyway, thank you for your contribution, my lady. I won't be raising them here. This inferior subspecies is best on the grill. Breeding them is a waste of space and time."
Esen was taken aback, "I thought you would treasure your comrades."
"What comrade? I'm civilized a Tauron, not some horny bulls or cows. They are not qualified to grant me seeds. The only one capable of doing so is obviously master."
"…Do you have any idea what you're talking about?" Esen's face twitched. She couldn't believe that the woman had the balls to express her true desire in front of her face.
"Of course. I wish Master could milk me. When I'm in season, I wish he could breed me."
Esen's expression turned dark. She let out a long sigh and looked at Ivy.
"Can we convince my husband to kill this cow?"
Ivy shook her head, "I'm afraid we should not. The Lord has been busy these days, and he needs every help he can get. Personal vendetta is out of the question, Your Majesty."
"Are you even on my side?!" Esen pouted.
"I'm on your side. However, it's up to you to convince the lord yourself," Ivy leaned over and whispered, sending a sound transmission to her master's mind. "Just make sure you keep him occupied at night every day. As long as he's happy in bed, he won't have enough time to look at other women."
Hearing the piece of advice, Esen smirked. She laughed at Sierra, "Too bad for you. That's an impossible wish! I'll make sure he won't even have a drop of seed left when you're in season!"
Sierra gazed at Esen with her usual dull expression, "Then, I wish you take care of your body, my lady. I really hope you know what you're getting yourself into."
"Ha! You don't even need to warn me! I'll show you how it's done!"
Esen laughed and led Ivy out of the agriculture realm.
After Esen and Ivy had left, Sierra snickered and secretly mocked Esen.
"Satisfying a transcended being? You will need to please him at least 4 billion times per second, my lady. His vigor is limitless, but your stamina will run out first."
Unfortunately for Esen, she couldn't hear Sierra's advice. The divine elf princess paraded to the motorhome, where she and Leo usually spent their nights.
But upon entering the bus, Esen and Ivy found Beatrice and Marc. In the death knight's arms, there was a brown baby.
Esen and Ivy gave Beatrice a weird look. They swept their gazes over Marc for a moment before they uttered in unison.
"Is that yours?"
Marc repeatedly shook his head, "O-Of course not!!"
Esen and Ivy looked at Beatrice next. They widened their eyes, "Then, who is the father, Beatrice?!"
Beatrice slightly shook her head. She was also puzzled, "The lord, maybe?"
"HAH?!"
Esen almost fainted from shock. On the other hand, Ivy raised her eyebrows as she had a funny feeling about this baby boy. Preventing the misunderstanding from escalating, Ivy tried to clarify things.
"First off, Beatrice. This is not your child, correct?"
Beatrice nodded. She also let out a long sigh of relief because of Ivy's quick thinking. Still, Esen hadn't recovered from the shock.
Ivy asked for more input, "Is he the lord's biological child?"
Beatrice shook her head, "Maybe, or maybe not. He smells like the lord, but he doesn't have his blood. It feels like he's a distant cousin or something."
"I see. Did you hear that, Your Majesty?" Ivy smiled and looked at Esen.
Meanwhile, Esen ignored the group. She stomped toward Leo's bedroom and got inside. When she discovered him sleeping soundly, Esen delivered a body-press like a professional wrestler. However, she ended up hurting herself doing the deed.
The impact was enough to wake up Leo. He sat up and stared at his weirdo wife, "What are you doing?"
Esen, in frustration, jumped back on the bed and sat on top of him. She took off her clothes and yelled.
"GIVE ME A BABY!!"
"WHAT?!" Leo was confused.
"SHUT UP AND MAKE ME A BABY!!"
"HAH?!"
Esen pushed Leo down on the bed. Even though she didn't have enough strength to make him budge, Leo allowed himself to fall back into the bed.
.
Ivy, Beatrice, and Marc sneaked into the room later and discovered their lords. They silently left them alone.
Marc's face was so red that white smoke came out from his ears. Ivy held back her laughter while Beatrice was as expressionless as ever.
When Ivy noticed Marc's expression, she teased him.
"Was it too stimulating for you, little boy?"
Marc pouted, "Who are you calling a boy?! I'm old enough to be an adult!"
"Hehehe. But you've been sneaking glances at your sister, didn't you?"
"W-WHAT?! WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?!"
Marc got so flustered that he waved his hands and arms. Despite the rejection, he glanced at Beatrice's face again.
Beatrice also noticed her brother's eyes. She let out a long sigh, "I also think it's about time for you to find a good wife. How about it, Marc? Ivy has been with us for over 10,000 years. Will you consider her as a prospect?"
"W-What are you talking about?!" Marc was even more confused.
Ivy was surprised at first. But she teased him again, "My, my. I didn't know that you fancied me. Well, if you don't mind an arch lich hag like me, I'll do my very best to please our little Dullahan."
Marc screamed in embarrassment and sprinted out of the bus. Ivy heartily giggled while Beatrice revealed a faint smile.
After Marc was gone, Beatrice stopped smiling. She asked Ivy in a serious tone.
"I was serious, though. Will you consider my brother, Ivy?"
Ivy snorted, "He likes you, though."
Beatrice rolled her eyes, "He's my brother."
"I know. But shouldn't you be clear about his feelings?"
"If I do, he will break. It's better to let another woman win his heart. That way, he can forget about this sinful thought."
"…True. But why me, though?"
"How long are you going to remain single? Another 10,000 years?"
"…"
Ivy rubbed her chin. She started thinking about her love life. When she thought about it, no one but Marc's face came to her mind.
"Tsk. I'm out of options. Fine, I'll take whoever wants me."
"Good choice!" Beatrice grinned.
"What about you?! You're as old as I am. How are you going to find your mate?"
Beatrice finally showed her proud smile. She then revealed a shocking piece of information.
"I have a prospect in my mind."
"WOW! YOU HAVE A CRUSH ON SOMEONE?! WHO IS IT?!"
"Hmm. It's someone stoic and funny. I won't tell you who."
"TELL ME MORE! I NEED TO KNOW NOW!!"
"That's a secret."
Ivy's laughter echoed throughout the bus while other molgs and former undead warriors in the bus lobby silently eavesdropped on their conversation.
.
Meanwhile, in a small house, a certain alchemist was busy watching a VTuber video and cried. Wu Buyi lamented.
"Why do you have to graduate Coco?! You were so bright! How dare those people bully you into quitting?! The world you're in is not fair-ACHOO!!"
While crying, Wu Buyi sneezed. His boogers and snot drenched the phone.
"FUUUUUUUUUUCK!! MY PRECIOUS PHONE! NOOOOO!!"
He took off his shirt and wiped the phone in panic. But while doing it, he sneezed again.
"AAAACHOOOOOO!! GOD DAMMIT! WHO'S BADMOUTHING ME?!"

chapters.title: Chapter 288 – Wedding Tumble: Florida Man's Feast Turns Dance Floor into Slip 'n Slide Diarrhea Fest
chapters.content:
Chapter 288 – Wedding Tumble: Florida Man's Feast Turns Dance Floor into Slip 'n Slide Diarrhea Fest
Later that day, Aslan visited Leo's bus. The guards in front of the bus bowed toward him and allowed him inside.
Upon entering the bus, Aslan found himself in the lobby area. He looked around and found a dozen death knights, guarding this resident from potential intruders who could teleport directly into the bus.
Aslan nodded at them in approval. He turned his attention to the deepest part of the bus where Leo's room was located. As he walked further, the corner of his eyes detected a group of female molgs. They had been looking at something in a basket.
Curious, Aslan walked toward them. When he could see the basket, he found what he had been looking for.
"There you are."
Instead of taking the kid, Aslan snickered. He turned around and left the bus.
Upon looking behind him, he found Ivy and Beatrice who were about to leave the bus as well. Their eyes met, and they greeted.
"Sir Guardian, what are you doing here?" Inquired Ivy.
"Just checking the kid. Carry on."
Ivy raised her eyebrows, suspicious of the guardian. She probed for information, "Do you know anything about the child? The Lord has entrusted him to us for some reason."
"Ah, him? I'll be taking him as my disciple. But for now, I'll have to ask you to be his nanny. Can you do it?"
"…But none of us has any experience in this."
"I see. Oh, wait. I know. I'll bring him to Sierra, then."
Ivy wryly smiled as she could imagine Sierra breastfeeding the baby. Thinking about it for a second, she almost burst into laughter.
"Please do, sir. She's fit for the task."
"Good. I'll be taking the kid."
Aslan picked up the basket and left the bus. He visited the agricultural world next.
Sierra gazed at the brown baby. She brightly smiled at the boy. Without shame, she took off her shirt and revealed a massive pair of watermalones.
.
Agricultural World
Sierra gazed at the brown baby. She brightly smiled at the boy. Without shame, she took off her shirt and revealed a massive pair of watermalones.
"Can I really ask him to milk me? Can I ask him to sucky-suck mine?"
Aslan was speechless. He silently wished for Simba and Ester's forgiveness as he was about to entrust their child to this pervert Minotaur.
"Do whatever you want. Make sure he grows up healthy… physically and morally."
"Don't worry, guardian. I shall raise him to be my finest stud. His life purpose shall be dedicated to me, my breasts, and the milking procedure! If necessary, I'll teach him how to mate with females-"
"Never mind. I'll find another nanny." Aslan changed his mind.
"NO, PLEASE! LET ME RAISE THE BOY!"
Sierra wailed and held Aslan by his legs. The latter sweated profusely even though he was a golem statue.
"…"
Aslan hesitated. He knew that he couldn't trust this pervert cow woman, but nobody was trustworthy enough to take this role.
'I can't bring Ester out either. If Ester and Esen met, Esen would probably kill her. It's already a miracle that Ester is still alive so far.'
Not trusting Esen's temperament, Aslan chose to hide Ester in his dantian universe. Moreover, sending the boy back to his mother in his dantian universe was out of the question since the place was too dangerous for a mortal infant. Only deities or strong immortals could withstand the pressure and the extreme gravity of his giant stars.
"Fine. You take care of him. But if he grows up to be a pervert like you, I'll tell the lord to dismiss you."
Sierra beamed at Aslan with her brightest smile. She pressed the baby boy's face against her chest, "You can count on my pregnancy… I mean, you can count on me!"
"…"
.
.
Two days later, Leo finally exited his room. Strangely, his skin was smoother and glossier than usual. He looked so healthy that the molgs and Ivy's subordinates were surprised.
Leo whistled in a good mood and left the bus. After he had left, Ivy sneaked into Leo's room to check on her master.
On the bed, Esen was out of commission. She lay on her stomach. The traces of two days' worth of bed combat stained the bed sheets, blanket, carpet, and Esen's body. Despite the carnage, Esen's expression was strangely lewd as if she had been through a wild night.
Ivy giggled. She was happy for her master.
"Congratulations, Your Majesty. If he was this energetic, that stupid cow can't possibly take him away from you."
.
.
Leo adjusted his pants. His body was strangely lighter than usual.
When Leo exited his bus, he found Dongfang Mei and a few of her workers waiting to receive him. They reported the completion of their job.
"My lord. We have finalized your wedding ceremony schedule. The invitation letters have been distributed. You and Lady Esen will attend the official ceremony tomorrow at noon."
"Oh, I guess I've come out at a good time." Leo was relieved.
"Yes. I was planning to request Lady Ivy to inform you about your wedding."
"Good. What do I need to know or prepare, by the way?"
Dongfang Mei deeply sighed, "Please follow us to the hotel. We need to measure you and tailor your clothes. Also, we have to finish tailoring the bridge's dress as well. Can we visit Lady Esen?"
"Err…"
Leo thought of Esen's condition. He scratched his head, "You can ask Ivy for that. She will measure my wife's three sizes for you. I don't think she's in a good condition to meet anybody at the moment."
Dongfang Mei was perplexed for a moment before she figured it out. The elder covered her mouth and giggled, "Please save your stamina for the wedding night, my lord. I know that you love her, but please don't overly LOVE her before the ceremony."
"…I'll try."
"Please follow me."
Dongfang Mei and her subordinates silently laughed while they guided Leo to their tailors.
The preparation for the wedding ceremony took all day. Leo got stuck in the hotel as Dongfang Mei and Xu Nuan rehearsed the event before the important day.
.
.
Wedding Day, 5 AM.
Although the event seemed abrupt, everybody had been preparing for this day for months. Merchants, cultivators, and Leo's employees brought their gifts and treasures to the hotel, hoping to gain Leo's favor.
However, no one could enter the hotel yet. In front of the hotel, Dongfang Mei and Meowmeow's elf concubines blocked the entrance. Instead of letting everybody in, they inspected the visitors' name tags one by one.
Everybody was forced to register their name and hand over their presents. Then, the staff gave them a wooden plaque, which indicated their seat number.
A merchant wrote his name on the paper as instructed. Although reluctant, he presented a wooden box to the female employees behind the reception counter.
"In this box, I've stored a precious 300-year-old spirit ginseng. Please inform Lord Florida Man that the Ginseng Pharmacy's director Wang Ao sends his regards."
One of the staff politely accepted the box, yet she mercilessly opened it to inspect the content. Then, she showed it to a stone elf next to her.
The golem gazed at it. Then, she gave it a score.
"Two points."
The receptionist nodded. She handed a wooden plague with a string of numbers.
"Table 10288, seat 5."
The merchant was confused but he received the plague nonetheless. Then, he followed another staff to his designated seat.
When he entered a meeting hall, he discovered an endless field full of round tables, covered in white sheets. On the tables, empty plates and wine grasses were already prepared.
They were modern round tables, commonly found in modern Chinese restaurants. However, there was one issue – The table was not in the same room as the wedding event!
"Hah?! Why here? What about the wedding?!"
An employee sighed and pointed at a large TV monitor on the wall. She whispered, "You can view the event here, sir. The TVs will show the ceremony in the main hall."
Wang Ao was confused. As he had never seen a TV before, he stood up and pointed at the black screens.
"What do you mean by TEE-VEES?! Why can't I take part in the main hall?!"
The employee's smile never faded from her face. She calmly responded in a friendly voice tone, "Sir, this is a wedding ceremony between top experts. Do you expect to join the same table as immortals and gods from other worlds?"
Wang Ao was taken aback, "B-But my gift is very precious! A-At least, he should give me face and..."
The employee gave the merchant an ultimatum by pulling out a treasure. The item was one of many treasures that Leo and his men got from the dead invaders. Although Leo never ordered anybody to sell them, the manager mannequin put them in the supermarket once in a while to boost the sales. In addition, there was a mysterious event 'BLACK FRIDAY' when Leo went on an expedition. At that time, many items were on discount, and several good artifacts were on sale.
The staff managed to snag this spiritual steel fan, which was capable of blocking any attack from a quasi-immortal! Moreover, she could pay with installments of 12 months, which cost only 50 essence stones or 50 years of lifespan per month.
Seeing the treasure, Wang Ao was speechless. He stuttered, "Umm, f-fairy miss. W-What is that?"
"Of course, it's a mortal-grade treasure."
"Then, w-why do you bring it out? Are you threatening me? I-I'm only a mortal without a cultivation base! P-Please don't bully me!"
"Who said I'm bullying you? I'm only showing you what a proper gift looks like. Unless you can procure something of this standard at the minimum, you can't possibly hope to get preferential treatment! Please understand your position, dear guest."
"O-Okay."
Wang Ao sulked and sat at his table. He regretted spending months and a lot of gold coins to get that ginseng.
Fortunately, the hotel employees were not that heartless. Even though the ceremony hadn't started yet, a waitress brought over a plate of food and a bottle of wine. She served it to Wang Ao.
"The wedding starts at noon. It might be boring to sit here without anything to do. Please enjoy this while you're waiting, sir."
"…Okay."
Wang Ao sighed and looked at the parting employee. He smacked his lips as everybody was all cultivators, and a commoner like him couldn't possibly talk back to them.
As he had nothing to do, he gazed at the plate of food and a bottle of wine on the table. On the plate was a sunny-side egg, five stripes of bacon, a spoonful of boiled potatoes, garlic bread, and some salad.
Wang Ao snorted as he recognized some of the food, except for the garlic bread, salad, and bacon. As he didn't think much, he picked up a pair of chopsticks and started eating.
Upon putting a piece of bacon in his mouth, he widened his eyes in astonishment. The warmth of the food and Qi enveloped his mouth and stimulated his taste buds.
Wang Ao froze on the table as the Qi from the food entered his veins and muscle fibers. He started breaking a sweat.
While Wang Ao was sweating profusely, the previous waitress returned with a clean towel and a bathrobe. She then whispered, "After you eat your food, you can take a shower in the bathroom at the end of the hall over there, sir. Actually, you can take a shower every time you eat a mouthful of your food. The impurity in your body might come out of your pores. As you know, impurity of mortals smells… unpleasant."
Wang Ao widened his eyes and looked at the bath towel. He then glanced at the food on the plate.
Without saying anything, Wang Ao grabbed the plate and the towel. He then ran toward the bathroom while gas inside his belly threatened to release everything through the number 2 hole.
The waitress giggled. She brought the wine bottle to the bathroom and placed it in front of the stall, where Wang Ao disappeared into.
One customer down, many more to go.

chapters.title: Chapter 289 Surprise Gift at Florida Man's Wedding: Guests Unwrap Bag of... Fertilizer?!
chapters.content:
289  Surprise Gift at Florida Man's Wedding: Guests Unwrap Bag of... Fertilizer?!
Chapter 289 – Surprise Gift at Florida Man's Wedding: Guests Unwrap Bag of... Fertilizer?!
The registration progressed smoothly after the guests learned the trick. They handed over their gifts and received numbered plaques according to the value of their items.
Most commoners and weak cultivators were sent to a meeting hall on either the first floor or the second floor, according to the value of their gifts. The waitresses served food, and all none cultivators got into the same predicament as Wang Ao. Only intermediate-level cultivators enjoyed their food without an issue.
The size of the hotel was also impressive. Two thousand guests entered the second floor's meeting rooms, but seats were still available. Moreover, the washrooms and bathrooms were never fully occupied even though half of the visitors had bowel movement issues.
At 8 AM, groups of stronger cultivators arrived. Led by Han Hao, a team of elite disciples under his guidance made their appearance. As a representative of his group, he showed the receptionist his wedding gift.
It was a glowing red sword, emitting intense yang Qi. Originally, it was an immortal-grade sword that belonged to one of the invaders. However, Han Hao tampered with it himself. "Here is my gift 'Enchanted Immortal Slaying Sword'. I may not be an expert blacksmith, but I know a thing or two in the art of treasure refinement."
The commoners behind Han Hao's group were surprised to see a real artifact among the gifts. Some of them broke their queues to admire the weapon.
Still, a few people questioned Han Hao's item.
Wu Buyi emerged out of the crowd. Unlike his usual antics, he wore proper robes. His body emitted no foul odor despite being a nerd who only took a bath once a week.
"An immortal-grade sword? Are you crazy, Han Hao? This is an important wedding. You should have brought something better!"
Han Hao snorted, "Jokes on you. My sword might look inferior in your eyes, but it contains the dao of the sword! Anybody who holds it and uses it for a month can naturally learn the dao of swords! Even if the sword owner doesn't train every day, he will still gain enlightenment!"
The crowd murmured in astonishment. Regular merchants and commoners drooled in envy as they had no mentor to guide them. They wished that they had the sword.
"As expected of the disciplinary elder. His sword might not be useful for the lord, but he can use it to pass down the sword daos to his descendants! Such gift will surely impress Lord Florida Man!" One of the guests praised.
"Indeed. The quality of the item isn't everything. It's about the usefulness of the gift that counts!" Another bystander chimed in.
Han Hao puffed his chest and glanced at his colleague, "How's that? What's your gift? Do you think you can come up with something better than me?"
"Pfft. You braggart knows nothing. Here, hold my beer!"
Wu Buyi cut the queue and stood in front of the counter. He presented a spatial ring to a receptionist.
The staff members received it and ejected a sample of the goods. A bottle of rainbow liquid came out.
Wu Buyi explained, "My wedding gifts are 1,000 bottles of purified rainbow river! As you know, the southern river of our domain is heavily contaminated because of Lord Florida Man's pet. However, that doesn't mean that the contaminated water is unusable. As a veteran alchemist, I've dedicated months to research and come up with a purifying technique, which enables me to make the river water consumable! I call these 'Florida Drinking Water' to honor our lord's name! Also, I've tested it before. Anybody who drinks this can gain at least 1,000 years' worth of cultivation!"
"HUH?!"
Although the domain was rich in cultivation resources and cultivation methods, most of them were inconvenient. For example, every employee could cultivate near the pylon tower for free, but they had to compete for the limited available seats.
In addition, consumable goods were expensive. Every grain pill had a price tag in Leo's store. Even the food cost essence stones. Despite the high cost of living, every cultivator yearned for Leo's cultivation resources because of their exceptional quality.
The emergence of a new cultivation resource aroused their desire and greed. Every cultivator gazed at the water bottle and salivated.
"S-Sir Wu, c-could you share the refinement method?" A cultivator in the crowd asked.
Wu Buyi snorted, "Ha, no! I've already presented the method along with the samples! The notes are already inside!"
A receptionist heard it. She ejected a book to check its authenticity. After flipping a few pages, she nodded.
"Here is your plaque, sir. You can attend the wedding on the fourth floor. Also, here is your room's key card. The Lord has instructed us to book a room for every VIP. You can stay in the designated room for a week, sir."
"Oh, nice!" Wu Buyi laughed and took the table plaque and the keycard. He turned around to sneer at his friend. "I wonder what floor you will get. First floor? Second floor? Hehehehe."
"…"
Han Hao grumbled and shifted his gaze to the receptionist in front of him, waiting for her verdict.
The receptionist wryly smiled. Although she was a member of the Tang Clan, she was instructed not to give anybody preferential treatment. Thus, she picked a plaque on her desk and revealed the result.
"Sir Han Hao. You can attend the wedding on the third floor."
"T-Third floor?" Han Hao was taken aback.
"I-I'm sorry, sir. I'm just following the guidebook. Weapons are less valuable than consumable goods according to the lord, sir."
"…"
Han Hao was crestfallen while Wu Buyi cackled like a villain. The former turned around and pointed his finger at Wu Buyi.
"Don't get cocky, you little shit! Just because you're close to the lord, that doesn't mean you're superior to your peers!"
"Heh, LOSER!"
"YOU!"
Han Hao wanted to punch his friend in the face, but he was wary of the stone elves in the area. He smacked his lips and followed the lines out of the queuing area.
But as Han Hao was about to leave, his son followed the queue from the other line and presented his gift. Although he was Han Hao's son, they didn't share the same idea.
"Here is an ingot, smelted from the hull of broken otherworldly artifacts. I don't know what it is, but I think Lord Florida Man can appraise it. I hope it can be put to good use."
The receptionist in front of him was a former disciple of the Amazonian Sanctuary. She was as confused as the others when she received the item. But when she glanced at the guideline instructions on her desk, she wryly smiled and reluctantly gave Han Hao a few items.
"Here is your plaque, sir. You can attend the wedding on the fifth floor. Also, here is your keycard to your room. The King Suite section is on the 10th floor, and you can rest in the room for a month. All three meals will be provided for free, and you can order it by using the room service."
Han Hao and Wu Buyi froze in their tracks. They turned around in unison. "WHAT?!"
Both of them stomped toward the young maiden. They inherited the spirits of Karens and yelled at her face.
"WHY ARE YOU SENDING HIM TO THE FIFTH FLOOR?! WHAT'S WRONG WITH OUR GIFTS?!"
The receptionist sweated profusely while the others next to her also flinched in fear. Fortunately, their superior officers had predicted this outcome and prepared for such a scenario.
An attractive lady slowly walked out of the office. She patted the nervous receptionists behind the counter and took over the role.
Dongfang Mei smiled at Wu Buyi and Han Hao. She explained, "Don't be angry, you senile geezers. We're family here."
"But your subordinate…!" Han Hao pointed at the girls.
"Listen here, you little shit!" Dongfang Mei released her aura of an immortal. She stared down at Han Hao and Wu Buyi, "If you want to blame someone, you can blame our lord for setting up with this criteria. I'll read it for you. 'Give preferential treatment to anyone who brings RARE MATERIALS. Give respectable treatment to anyone who CONTRIBUTED TO TECHNICAL RESEARCH! ANYBODY who brings non-consumable items or non-mineral items to the wedding should be sent to the third floor. Common items, to the first or second floor. Unless someone wants to give me a freaking spaceship, don't ask for my presence!' There you have it. Any question?"
Wu Buyi and Han Hao were baffled. They looked at each other before they internally screamed in frustration.
"DAMMIT! I SHOULD HAVE KNOWN!!"
"I KNEW IT! WHY DIDN'T I THINK ABOUT THIS?!"
Dongfang Mei sneered and waved her hands, shooing them away.
"Now, get lost, you idiots. Don't waste other people's time. We have more guests to welcome and entertain! SHOO! SHOO! Oh, junior Han Meng, you can head to the fifth floor. There's only one meeting room there. If you follow the sign, you won't miss it."
Han Meng dryly laughed and glanced at his father and his uncle. As he had expected, Wu Buyi and Han Hao glared at him as if he had violated their grandmothers.
The three troublemakers left the scene quietly. Still, the commotion caused a stir among the crowd. Many commoners and merchants who initially brought rare herbs, medicines, or artifacts left the queuing lines to fix their presents.
After the uproar, the following guests started showing weird items.
A bundle of dirt near the contaminated water, a piece of obsidian, a bag of lava badger's poops – Weird stuff kept showing up as presents.
Despite their attempts, Dongfang Mei and the employees were merciless. They had predicted this outcome, and they sent every weirdo to the first floor as punishment.
Then, some idiots thought they were clever. They bundled a package of essence stones and presented them as gifts for the employees instead of handing over a wedding gift.
"Lady Dongfang Mei. Here is our sincerity. Could you please give us a plaque to the fifth floor?" One of the merchant groups gave Dongfang Mei a bag of 50 essence stones as a bribe.
Dongfang Mei widely grinned. She accepted the bribe in glee. However, her next words shocked the merchants.
"Security, please escort these men out of the premises. They are banned from taking part in the wedding."
"W-WHAT?!" The merchant group was shocked.
"Thank you for your present, my dear. But since you don't have a present for the lord, you cannot enter this place. NOW, GET LOST!"
"NO! WAIT!!"
It was too late for the crowd of greedy merchants. Stone elves dragged the people out of the building.
.
The hectic day continued as more people wished to attend the wedding. Because the front gate's reception counter was inadequate to sort over 10,000 guests, more employees came out of the building to help. Meowmeow also brought his concubines over to maintain the order.
By 10 AM, most of the guests were seated. Unfortunately, latecomers could not join this wedding ceremony as the first and second-floor seats were full.
As only the third floor or higher floors were available, most of the people left in disappointment. Still, this gave an opportunity to cultivators who were rich in resources.
Tang Xuan and Tang Tian came out of their seclusion and entered the hotel. They presented their gifts at the same time.
Tang Tian presented a diary, which contained his insight and his dao of poison. As for Tang Xuan, he presented an alchemy recipe book.
Dongfang Mei smiled at the two. Not even a blink of hesitation, she presented them keycards to King Suites and the plaque to the fifth floor.
"Congratulations, gentlemen. You are very thoughtful!"
Both Tangs laughed, "Smart men thoroughly prepare. Only silly men rush in."
"True," Dongfang Mei giggled.

chapters.title: Chapter 290 – Florida Man Convoy and Giant Feline Crash Wedding, Bestow Groom with Recipe for Chaos and Vampire-Grade Red Bull as Wedding Gifts
chapters.content:
290  Florida Man Convoy and Giant Feline Crash Wedding, Bestow Groom with Recipe for Chaos and Vampire-Grade Red Bull as Wedding Gifts
Chapter 290 – Florida Man Convoy and Giant Feline Crash Wedding, Bestow Groom with Recipe for Chaos and Vampire-Grade Red Bull as Wedding Gifts
After the two Tangs got their seats, no rogue cultivator or commoner managed to pass the test. Most of them left in regret, lamenting that they should have come earlier than the people before them.
Still, several cultivators fought for the seats on the third floor. Tiger Swordsman was one of them.
Unlike the rogue cultivators, Tiger Swordsman understood the nature of Leo. He presented a round crystal to Dongfang Mei.
"Here is a 9th-grade monster core that I have been keeping for ages. I was planning to ask an alchemist to refine it, but I don't think I need this anymore. I hope our lord still needs this."
Dongfang Mei brightly smiled and nodded at Tiger Swordsman, "You're correct! Lord Florida Man is always in need of such material. Here is your keycard and the plaque. Your seat is on the fourth floor."
"Huh?"
Tiger Swordsman took the keycard and the plaque. The token showed the number of a seat on the fourth floor.
"F-Fourth floor's seat?!"
"That's right."
"B-But that core isn't that valuable…"
"A man's trash is another man's treasure. Have you heard about that?"
"…Yeah, I read that from one of the purchased books."
"Now, don't waste my time. Pack your things and enjoy. We need to welcome other guests."
"…"
Tiger Swordsman reluctantly nodded and followed a path to the elevator.
Meanwhile, the crowd finally grasped a clue to pass Dongfang Mei's test. They started offering monster cores, hoping to get a good seat in this ceremony.
"Fairy, I have a sixth-stage monster core. Can I join?"
Dongfang Mei grinned, but she shook her head. "Only the 9th grade monster cores or better are eligible. We don't need weaker cores."
The crowd was disappointed. This time, most of the rogue cultivators gave up and left.
After most of the crowd was gone, the hotel entrance was clear. This allowed many groups of observers and strong employees of the domain to come in.
The gang of ponies arrived. As this was an important event, Taxi, Ricardo, and their friends polymorphed into humans. They also wore black suits and formal clothes.
Taxi and everybody presented their gifts. They placed strange horns on the table.
"Smash!"
Dongfang Mei deeply sighed as she was familiar with the SMASH language. She counted their heads and asked.
"How many horns?"
"SMASH!" (100! Everybody donates each!)
"I see. That must be painful."
"Smash." (Compared to what Florida Man gave us, this is nothing. Our horns can regrow.)
"Good. Then, I'll be taking these. You can go straight to the fourth floor."
"Smash?" (Not fifth floor?! But we're comrades!)
"The lord limits the entries on the fifth floor. He values privacy. Also, he informed us that he doesn't want to meet too many people today. If you want to congratulate him, you can do so later."
"…Smash. Smash?" (Fine. I'll chat with him later. Oh, by the way, do we get to play in the new rooms? I mean, there are a few female unicorns in season. We hope we can…)
"Dammit, you freaking pervert horses! Do it in your goddamn barn, not in this hotel! I forbid you to revert back into your horse form! You also cannot copulate with your mates!"
"SMASH!!" (NUUUUUU!!)
"NOW, GET LOST!"
The group of ponies in disguise sulked and took their items. They proceeded to the fourth floor as instructed.
Dongfang Mei shook her head as she gave up on these perverted creatures. She wished that these guys could adapt to the human culture and ethics soon.
After Taxi's people got their seats, the next batch of youngsters entered. Jin Yong, Gao Yan, Cat, and Yao Qiqi arrived with strange red bags.
Cat was in her humanoid form. Unlike the usual, she wore a white evening dress like a proper lady. Moreover, her demeanor and the way she walked were so refined that Dongfang Mei almost mistook her for a noble lady.
Yao Qiqi was the same as ever. She tagged along with Cat, holding her hand like siblings. The girl had been quiet for a long time as she had been in seclusion in the shopping mall every day. In addition, her cultivation was already in the quasi-immortal realm.
When Dongfang Mei saw Yao Qiqi with this group, she flinched. She didn't expect the innocent girl to be this close to these troublemakers.
The elder looked at Gao Yan and Jin Yong. She inquired, "You two are out already? How are your injuries?"
Dongfang Mei referred to the old injuries that Gao Yan and Jin Yong got from the Cow Level Realm.
The duo brightly grinned and curled their arms, flexing their muscles.
"We're healed, senior," Gao Yan laughed.
"Our medicines and pills are the best in this world. Obviously, we easily made it through!" Jin Yong snickered while he fetched a notebook from his storage ring. He put it on top of the counter.
Dongfang Mei gazed at the notebook. She revealed a faint smile, "An annotation? A cultivation method? What are you offering?"
Jin Yong puffed his chest, "I've come up with a healing pill recipe! Although the ingredients require poisonous mushrooms, they can turn into a panacea, which can cure most mortal-grade poisons!"
"But the store already has the Hope and Dream pills for sale though. Do you think Lord Florida Man needs this?"
"We can try. It's my honest research. Well, he might find one or two inspirations from my note."
Dongfang Mei liked Jin Yong's attitude. She also rechecked the young man's cultivation base.
She couldn't help but impress. The external aura of Jin Yong was the same as any earth celestial, aka the first rank immortal. But deep in his dantian, Dongfang Mei sensed the turbulence of star energy, which reflected the nature of a celestial warrior – the fifth stage immortal.
Dongfang Mei was envious of Tang Xuan and Tang Tian that they had this young man as their core disciple. Since his future cultivation potential was limitless, Dongfang Mei gave him an exception.
"You go to the fifth floor. The room keycard is here. Don't waste this opportunity."
Jin Yong was surprised, "I thought I would have gotten a pass to the third floor at best. Why the highest, senior?"
"Just shut it and go. Also, take the notes with you. Give it to Lord Florida Man yourself."
Jin Yong dryly laughed and received his notebook back. He politely cupped his fist and bowed 90 degrees, "I'll remember this favor, senior. When I reach the pinnacle realm, I'll come back and repay you."
"That sounds cliché as hell. Move along, you brat! Give the room to your friends behind you!"
"Hahaha!"
Jin Yong laughed and followed the employees to the elevator to the fifth floor. He didn't forget to turn around and taunted Gao Yan, "Good luck, Gao Yan. I'll be waiting for you at the top!"
Gao Yan smacked his lips and flipped his finger, "Scram, you shameless senior! Just you wait!"
Dongfang Mei watched their interaction with a bright smile on her face. Looking at their interaction reminded her of the time when she was young.
"You have a good friend, Gao Yan." Dongfang Mei praised the young man.
Gao Yan, the man who always walked around in a tactical suit, slightly shook his head and complained, "He scammed me when we were recuperating. Last month, I was planning to visit the supermarket and buy a hope and dream pill, that idiot suddenly showed up and forcefully fed me his experimental pill. I was bedridden for a week after that. Well, my soul and dantian injuries are healed because of that though."
"Doesn't that mean his pills were legitimately good?"
"A hope and dream pill could have healed me instantly. I wasted a week because of that."
"Ah, I see." Dongfang Mei changed the subject, "What about your tribute, junior? What are you bringing?"
Gao Yan sighed and brought plastic bags of his blood to the counter. He then explained, "This is my contaminated blood."
Dongfang Mei was amused, "Contaminated blood?"
Gao Yan pointed at his antler horns, "See these, senior?"
The horns had been with Gao Yan since the Orlando expedition. Leo was the one who implanted them on him.
The horns contained several stars' worth of lightning Qi. Dongfang Mei measured it with her senses and discovered that the horns had the same energy as a star celestial immortal.
She checked his cultivation base next. Impressively, he was a stage higher than Jin Yong who was several years older than him.
Gao Yan was a celestial general, aka the 6th-stage immortal.
Compared to Dongfang Mei, who was just an earth celestial, this junior could be considered the top genius of their domain. From Dongfang Mei's perspective, Gao Yan deserved Leo's guidance the most.
"What did you do during the past few months, junior? You have grown stronger so fast!"
Gao Yan dryly laughed. He reluctantly revealed his secrets, "I've been sneaking around when I was supposed to be recuperating, senior. Actually, when I was sleeping, I accidentally ejected my soul and wandered to a strange river full of spirits. By chance, I met a kind senior, and he taught me various things. When I returned, I was struck by a spiritual tribulation. When I recovered, I was already at this level."
Dongfang Mei had so many questions to ask the junior. Still, she was curious more about the contaminated blood.
"What about the blood? How was it connected to your horns?"
"Oh, right. I got distracted. You see, senior. When I went through the spiritual tribulation, I split my body into two. My evil spirit possessed one of my bodies and tried to kill me. Well, long story short, I killed him. These bags of blood are the remains of that evil spirit and my discarded body. Oh, don't worry about the evil spirit, though. The lightning Qi in my horns already exorcized it."
"…"
Dongfang Mei was speechless. She wondered if she had the qualifications to evaluate this young man. After all, Gao Yan's presence and air slightly resembled top experts in the past.
"…Anyway, you can have your blood bags with you. You can go straight to the fifth floor. Take your keycards and the plaque."
"Many thanks, senior!" Gao Yan was overjoyed. He bowed 90 degrees and received his items. Then, he rushed toward the elevators, hoping to see his senior brother's reaction.
Dongfang Mei shook her head. She turned to the two troublemakers next.
"What about you, Cat? What are you doing here?"
Cat widely grinned. She showed Dongfang Mei her palms.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Are there any food, senior?)
Dongfang Mei blankly stared at the dark elf dryad. Everybody else brought presents, but this girl audaciously demanded their presents instead.
As Dongfang Mei didn't want Cat to cause trouble, she passed her the fifth-floor plaque.
"Follow your friend to the fifth floor. The food is there."
"Nom-Nom Meow <3!" (Thank you!)
"Learn human speech, dammit."
Cat giggled and cat-walked her way to the elevator.
After the cancerous monster had gone, a baby girl remained.
"What about me, grandma? Or should I say, Nom Nom Meow?" Yan Qiqi copied Cat and showed Dongfang Mei her palms.
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 291 – Florida Man's Wild Wedding: Guests Get Free Smartphone Souvenir for Witnessing His Cat Giving Head to Cow 11 AM.
chapters.content:
291  Florida Man's Wild Wedding: Guests Get Free Smartphone Souvenir for Witnessing His Cat Giving Head to Cow
Chapter 291 – Florida Man's Wild Wedding: Guests Get Free Smartphone Souvenir for Witnessing His Cat Giving Head to Cow
11 AM.
Bao Xun failed to enter the wedding because the first and the second floors were full. Beatrice, Marc, Lucky, Meowmeow, and Mu-Nyang, on the other hand, used their strength as a free pass and claimed the fifth floor's seats.
Ivy and Aslan got another role. The former was the bride's maid while Aslan self-proclaimed as the groom's best man. They naturally participated in this event on the fifth floor.
The seats on the third and fourth floors gradually filled after Esen's subordinates and Meowmeow's concubines entered the hotel. Smart merchants, who traveled to Joyous Yin Sect, brought back some of the loose spirit bulls from the wilderness and earned their third-floor seats.
At noon, Dongfang Mei immediately closed the entrance doors and fire exits. She joined the event on the fifth floor as the hotel employees still had jobs to do.
Leo made his appearance in a white suit and a bow tie. Although he hated greeting or meeting people, he walked to every table on the fifth floor, chatting with every guest.
One of the tables belonged to Gao Yan, Jin Yong, Yao Qiqi, and Cat. These troublemakers already emptied all the food on the plates, and they were waiting for the next servings.
Upon noticing Leo's arrival and his clothes, Gao Yan and Jin Yong gleefully saluted him.
"Senior Florida Man! You look handsome today! Congratulations!" Jin Yong cupped his fist and laughed.
"Tsk. Mind your manner, fool. AHEM! Senior Florida Man, congratulations!"
Leo gazed at the blood bags and gave Gao Yan a weird look. He checked the duo's conditions with his eyes.
"Are you healed already?"
"Yes, I'm already healthy!" Replied Gao Yan.
"Hehehe. Those injuries were nothing, senior. Here, check this out. I've invented this recipe!"
Unlike Gao Yan, Jin Yong seized the opportunity to present his wedding gift first.
Leo noticed the shabby-looking book. He received it and flipped a few pages. Noticing the content, Leo wryly smiled.
