"Did you come up with these recipes and notes?" Asked Leo.
"Yes, senior. I experimented with it with my body. I can reassure you that all my pills are perfect. If you can mass-produce this and sell it in your store, you'll reap a lot of profits! Err…Ahem. If you really put the pills on sale, can I get some share, pretty please?"
"…"
Leo slightly shook his head and smiled. He had already fought Jin Yong's clones and learned all of his abilities, including his alchemy dao. He already knew what they were for, and how he could improve this incomplete recipe.
"This is the incomplete recipe of Soul Cleansing Panacea. Instead of using regular fiery hallucination mushrooms and metal-dissolving mushrooms as ingredients, you should use the True Death Mushroom. But since you can't use it directly due to its extremely toxic nature, you must remove its toxin first by mixing it with true earth fate crystal's holy water for 30 days. Then, the true death mushroom will mutate into an ascension mushroom, which can be used as a key ingredient in any healing pill or panacea. Now, you refine the ascension mushroom with the other ingredients in the list, and you can get a better healing pill that can heal soul damage and restore a star in your dantian universe."
"…Whoa."
Jin Yong was speechless and embarrassed. He had never expected to receive such a valuable lecture and tips in alchemy.
"S-Senior. C-Could you repeat it again? I forgot to take notes."
Leo sighed. "Fine. Here, take this book back. Cross those stupid mushrooms out from the ingredient list and…"
Calmly and patiently, Leo imparted the knowledge that was supposed to be Jin Yong's future dao and wisdom. The others who shared the same table also admired Leo's generosity.
After correcting the recipe, Jin Yong shed a tear of gratitude. Still, he had other problems that he wished to consult Leo.
"Erm, about the true death mushrooms, how do I collect them? If I remember correctly, those mushrooms are contained in the southern array that traps a white tree in there along with other sweet dream mushrooms. I can't simply walk into the array and turn myself into a jiangshi, can I?"
Leo rolled his eyes, "We'll talk about that after we are done with the wedding. No work talk is allowed!"
"Hehehe. Whoops."
Jin Yong was satisfied. He hugged the book and widely grinned.
Leo shifted his attention to the others next. Gao Yan saw the opportunity and stood up, presenting plastic bags that contained his contaminated blood to Leo.
"S-Senior. T-This is my wedding gift. Senior Dongfang said that I can bring them here to give it to you myself, so…"
"Blood?"
Leo brightly grinned and rubbed his hands in excitement. He received the plastic bag and gazed at the black blood. Without hesitation, he spat into the bag and tied it.
"???"
Gao Yan was taken aback and widened his eyes. But when he remembered that Leo could mutate anything he touched, Gao Yan laughed and inquired.
"Senior, I'm curious. If I reach the deity rank, can I transform normal grass into immortal grass like you?"
Leo paused for a few seconds to think before he answered, "Probably not. At best, you can turn them into one of those useless blue spirit grasses. Actually, you're an immortal now. You should be able to do it naturally. But don't expect high-quality spirit grass, though. It depends on your Qi volume and your primary element. Also… the heavenly lightning energy in your damn horns is the bane of all mutation. Suppress it if you want to mutate or evolve something."
"I-I'll keep that in mind."
Gao Yan bowed 90 degrees, but he widely grinned. He was enlightened, and he was eager to try evolving some regular plants into spirit herbs like Leo.
Leo stored the blood in his inventory as he was afraid of the spill. He then turned his attention to the two girls.
Yao Qiqi was still a cute girl as always. Her bright smile and dirty mouth healed all of Leo's mental fatigue.
On the other hand, Cat who was in a dark elf appearance didn't maintain her disguise very well. Small worm-like vines slipped out of her nostrils and ear holes. The corners of her mouth spread wider than usual, which revealed the entire interior of her mouth whenever she opened her mouth to talk.
"Nom-Nom Meow?" (Daddy, where is the food? I need more food.)
Leo had a headache. He ejected a raw leg of a mad cow and shoved it down Cat's throat. Because of its enormous size, Cat's body bloated like a python which just swallowed a grown dog.
"Meow <3" (SWEET! Thanks, daddy!)
"…"
Leo silently brought out five more pieces of raw mad cow's legs and placed them on the table.
"Feed her whenever her transformation is about to be undone. I don't want her to revert into a monster form and eat every guest here."
Gao Yan and Jin Yong laughed and assured Leo, "Don't worry, senior. We'll take care of her."
Leo put on a pair of white leather gloves and patted Yao Qiqi's head, "As for you, I'll ask the cook to serve this table more food. I'll be checking the other table now."
"Thanks, senior!" Yao Qiqi bowed, but she wasn't done with Leo yet. She boldly asked for something. "Senior, I have a request."
Leo stopped his feet. He turned around, "What's up?"
"Why aren't the thing senior Wu Buyi had on sale in the store, senior? I wish to buy one of those."
"Huh? Played with what?"
"A small square thing that shows pictures."
Yao Qiqi referred to the smartphone of Wu Buyi. As she had no playmate in her age range, she was bored. In addition, she had been eyeing the phone for a long time. She wished she could watch more video clips.
Leo nodded as he had an inspiration. He rechecked the store to see the price of a smartphone.
The AI-PHONE 69 of Wu Buyi was only 1,000 YOL, not including the upgrade fees.
Since it was cheap, Leo didn't mind spending some of his precious lifespans to buy something for a little kid. He purchased three phones and upgraded them to level 17, enabling its infinite range internet connection and unlimited battery life. Then, he passed them to Gao Yan, Jin Yong, and Yao Qiqi.
"There you go. I'll only give them to you three since you guys are special. Learn the functions from Wu Buyi or study the manuals in the boxes, okay?"
The trio gleefully accepted the smartphones and cheered. As for Cat, she only cared about food on the table.
Leo excused himself and checked on the other tables next. His eyes then met with Han Meng's.
The elder dryly laughed while he pretended to sip some tea. Then, he stood up to greet Leo.
"Haha. I didn't expect to earn my place here. Well, congratulations, Lord Florida Man! I wish you and your spouse eternal happiness."
Leo tilted his head in curiosity, "What did you give Dongfang Mei that she gave you the seat?"
"Oh, just a random ingot that I made. I smelted a hull of some debris and handed it to Lady Dongfang."
"I guess she must have been impressed. Well, good job earning your place here."
Leo liked Han Meng's hardworking attitude. Since the guy was an old customer, Leo decided to help him a little. He pulled out a weapon, which he had gotten from Han Meng's clone.
It was a yellowish broadsword, containing a star's worth of earth element Qi. He passed it to Han Meng.
"This sword is called Guardian of People. It cannot kill innocent people. But when you use it against an evildoer or a crook under the sage realm, none of their dao or domain abilities can affect you. You can keep using this until you reach the sage realm, actually."
"W-WHAT?!"
Han Meng didn't expect to get a gift in return. He fell to his knees and kowtowed to Leo.
"THANK YOU, MY LORD! I-I'M MOVED! I DON'T THINK I DESERVE THIS!"
"Meh," Leo rolled his eyes. "This is my wedding day. Whoever earns this floor's spot deserves preferential treatment. You take it and flex it to your father. Oh, by the way, where is your father?"
Han Meng dryly laughed, "He… is on the other floor, my lord."
"Ah, shame. Well, next time, I guess."
Leo snickered and went to greet the others. He visited the table of the two Tangs next.
The two alchemists stood up and cheerfully saluted Leo. They had seen everything, and they expected to receive something nice in return as well.
"Haha, Lord Florida Man. Congratulations! It's very rare for someone our age to find a dao companion!" Tang Tian started first.
Tang Xuan reserved his words, but he sincerely bowed, "We wish you a fulfilling marriage life, longevity, and prosperity, senior!"
Leo returned the gesture. As Leo had already blessed several people, he might as well give these alchemists some boons.
"Pick one. A poison plant encyclopedia, a weapon compatible with your dao, a smartphone, or a random artifact?"
Tang Tian was bolder than his father. He had seen Wu Buyi playing with a smartphone before. Thus, he requested an item exclusive to Leo's trustworthy subordinates.
"If possible, I would like to have the thing my disciple has, please."
Leo nodded in approval. He kindly blessed Tang Tian with the same phone and upgraded it. Then, he asked Tang Xuan next, "What about you?"
Tang Xuan's eyes gleamed. Although he was reserved and well-mannered, he was smarter than Tang Tian. He requested a piece of information, which would help his clan in the long run.
"This might sound rude, but I wish for a cultivation method that even a cripple with crooked meridians can cultivate."
"Education, I see."
"Yes. The ones at the bottom are actually the pillars and the foundation of the upper echelons. Without mortals, there won't be immortals or deities. Without plants and animals, there won't be humans."
Leo was impressed with Tang Xuan's vision. He pulled out a ring from his inventory and tossed it to Tang Xuan.
"It contained 100,000 books in there. Some may be duplicates because I never sorted them. Use whatever you find useful. As for the rest, you can keep it as your clan's heirloom or techniques. By the way, all of them are available in the bookstore."
Tang Xuan deeply bowed. He was happy with this gift.
"I shall not let you down. The Tang Clan will become the pillar of Florida Domain!"
"Well, do your best."
Leo excused himself and walked to another table. He didn't think much about Tang Xuan and his Tang Clan. However, Tang Xuan made an internal vow to himself.
He looked up and gazed at Leo in admiration.
'Right now, our clan members might be useless to you. But one day, our clan will become a great force worthy of your trust! We won't be hiding behind you ever again!'
The humiliation from the invasions still got to Tang Xuan. He vowed that his clans could fight alongside Leo one day.

chapters.title: Chapter 292 – Florida Couple Taken to Hospital after Recreating 'Till Death Do Us Part' Wedding Moment With Super Glue on Their Lips.
chapters.content:
Chapter 292 – Florida Couple Taken to Hospital after Recreating 'Till Death Do Us Part' Wedding Moment With Super Glue on Their Lips.
At 12.30, Ivy led the bride to the wedding hall. The caravan's parade song attracted everybody's attention. Even the people on the lower floors could hear it.
Leo immediately stopped talking. He stepped on the front stage and patiently waited. Aslan also stood next to his proud son, unable to stop smiling.
The staff switched the TVs on, showing the live feed of the caravan. The crowd stopped eating and queuing for bathrooms to watch the event.
The wedding ceremony followed the divine elf's tradition. The bride's friends or bodyguards carried a wooden palanquin, on where the bride sat. A parade led the caravan and played beautiful march songs, using harps and flutes. Everybody was dressed in green clothes and wooden masks.
The songs entranced the guests. All sound from the halls ceased – Only the parade instrumentals resounded. The music kept on going until the palanquin arrived at the designated wedding hall.
Ivy opened the palanquin's curtain and helped the bride exit the vehicle. Esen put her hand on Ivy's palm and slowly stepped out.
As soon as Esen revealed her wedding clothes, all the men swallowed saliva in astonishment.
Esen's clothes were pure white. Long white gloves and silver stockings concealed her precious jade skin. Ironically, her wedding dress revealed her shoulders and improved cleavage. The thin skirt only covered the front and back, leaving the sides unprotected. As for her back, it was naked.
In short, her entire dress looked like it could slip or fall at any moment. All the men gazed at her in a daze, imagining impossible scenarios as they didn't understand how the dress worked.
Meanwhile, Ivy and Esen secretly rechecked the invisible strings, which supported the dress. These transparent threads tied the clothes to her body, enabling her to move freely without worrying about potential cloth malfunctions.
Esen looked up, highlighting her diamond tiara and her new hairstyle. Instead of letting her hair loose as usual, her hair had been braided into a bun, revealing Esen's smooth neck and upper back.
Two bodyguards walked in front of Esen. They carried a basket of flower petals and she spread them while they walked. Ivy held Esen's hand and followed the girls toward the front stage.
When Esen reached the stage, Ivy helped her walk up the stairs. The bride's glistening high-heeled shoes made a clopping noise as she stepped up on the stage.
Leo gazed at Esen's face. Because of her makeup, she looked more gorgeous than usual. Although he wanted to embrace her and kiss her right away, he maintained composure and followed the wedding procedure, which he had practiced according to Ivy and Beatrice's guidance.
The bride stopped at the center of the stage, staring at her husband. Meanwhile, Leo followed the divine elf tradition by turning around and picking a branch of a white tree, which had been soaked with earth fate crystal holy water. He then knelt on one knee in front of Esen and raised the branch.
Leo recited the vow, which Ivy had asked him to come up with. He recited a traditional line to be safe as he had no idea what he should say on this occasion.
"I am Leo… Leonardo, the Florida Man!"
For the first name, Leo revealed his first name in public. The crowd was surprised and widened their eyes. However, Leo didn't disclose his surname because he already forgot about it.
Leo continued, "I vow with my karma, fate, and soul: I will cherish, protect, and treasure your heart, your soul, and your smile. In good times and in bad, in sickness and in health, in Styx River and in Heaven, in bed and outdoors, I will love and honor you all the days… and maybe all the nights."
"AHEM!" Ivy and Aslan coughed as Leo's vow was getting weird.
Esen restrained her smile. She received the white tree's branch and bit the tip of her tongue. She blew a droplet of blood on the branch. Then, she gave the branch back and made an oath.
"I am Esen Sydin VI, the Empress of Molg and the crown princess of the Divine Elf Kingdom. I vow with my soul, bloodline, and karma: I shall dedicate my heart, body, and soul to you. In life and death, in dreams and reality, I will also love and honor you. But please show mercy at night. It's exhausting."
Everybody burst into laughter, including Leo. Only Ivy and Aslan facepalmed.
Leo wiped the tear at the corner of his eyes. He received the branch and followed the tradition of the divine elf by stabbing his neck with the branch. Although the branch was not strong enough to penetrate his skin, he secretly enveloped the branch with a thin layer of Qi, creating a razor blade. Then, he slightly cut his flesh with it to draw his blood.
The spectators were surprised yet again as they weren't familiar with this tradition. Everybody murmured, thinking that Leo was about to commit suicide.
Ivy had predicted this scene. She had informed Dongfang Mei and the hotel workers to inform the guests.
Meanwhile, Xu Nuan and Dongfang Mei's subordinates started working. They explained to the guests.
"There is a legend in the Divine Elf Kingdom. In ancient times, the god of sincerity and honesty blessed a mortal world with white trees, which served as his avatars. The white trees inherited his power, and they were so sacred that their branches could detect dishonesty and evil thoughts of mortals. Any mortal wounded by a white tree's branch will be cursed and die within seven minutes. The divine elves in ancient times always used white tree branches in wedding ceremonies to test the grooms and brides of their hearts. The grooms and brides are required to prove their honesty and sincerity during the wedding by piercing their necks with a branch of a white tree. But because of the changes of time, only the grooms need to stab their necks."
"OH!!"
Hearing a backstory, everybody was relieved.
Unfortunately, none of them but the molgs and Esen's people knew that the tale was real. As soon as Leo stabbed his neck, a change occurred inside him. A sound transmission of a stranger echoed in his mind.
'I heard the vow, but I didn't hear all of them. Can you repeat those? Of course, I'll use my dao power on you to prove your sincerity.'
Leo deeply frowned. He asked the owner of the voice in his mind.
'Who are you?'
'I am Overlord Gawr Ghoul, the servant of Karmic Sovereign of Honesty. You who are about to marry one of my descendants, repeat your vow or I'll curse you.'
'Umm. Okay.'
Since the guy claimed to be Esen's ancestor, Leo played it safe. He repeated his vow in his mind.
After repeating the verse, Leo's entire body glistened in white light. Moreover, his physical age decreased!
His white hair turned black. The long beard was shortened and trimmed while the skin on his face smoothened. Blemishes and hidden marks on his skin vanished. Even his aura and scent became pleasant.
From the physical appearance of a 50 or 60-year-old man, Leo looked like a man in his 40s. As he became younger, his mature face looked dandy and handsome.
Ivy and Beatrice slightly blushed as the matured handsome face of Leo and his trimmed full beard charmed them. They averted their eyes and took several deep breaths to control their minds.
Esen slightly dropped her jaw as well. She got used to seeing Leo in his old appearance. When she noticed how attractive Leo was, her heart skipped a beat.
Meanwhile, Leo felt nothing. He only heard the praising of the unknown overlord.
'I've confirmed your sincerity. As the avatar of honesty, I hereby bless you with longevity and a joyous marriage life. Oh, I enhance your vitality a little. Have fun at night, my boy.'
The corners of Leo's mouth curved up into a smile. He started to like the overlord.
'Visit my domain sometimes. I'll introduce you to the bride.'
'Yeah, I've pinpointed your location. I'll pay you a visit when I'm free. Now, I'll leave you alone. See you later, boy!'
'You, too.'
The connection was finally cut. Leo looked up and pulled the branch away from his neck.
When Leo stood up, Esen smiled at him and whispered.
"Did you have a good chat with the god?"
Leo rolled his eyes, "Can't you tell?"
"Yup. You look very handsome, Leonardo."
"Just call me Leo. The long name sounds cringe."
"Alright, Leo."
Both bride and groom smiled at each other. They forgot about the ceremony.
"AHEM!"
Again, Ivy coughed as the ceremony hadn't been completed yet. She whispered Esen.
"The kiss, Your Majesty. You need to kiss him to complete the wedding ceremony."
"O-Oh."
Esen flinched and glanced at the crowd below the stage. All their eyes fixated their gaze at Esen's white shoulders and long legs, which made her nervous.
She gulped, not wanting to stay here any longer. She looked at Leo's face.
Because of their height difference, Esen couldn't reach him. Even though she wore high-heeled shoes, the tip of her head only reached Leo's nose.
Without a choice, Esen levitated a few centimeters. She grabbed Leo's face and complained.
"Stick out your mouth, Leo."
Leo snickered, "Oh, it's kissy time?"
"Shut up!"
Esen sealed their lips together.
"YEAAAAAAHH!!"
As soon as they kissed, the crowd erupted. Some of the guests on the lower floors raised their glasses and toasted for Leo. Many people whistled and laughed.
Meanwhile, Leo and Esen awkwardly stared at each other's eyes. Because of their good eyesight, they could even see the other person's cells within the eyeballs.
Esen was embarrassed that she had enough. She tried to pull her head away.
"Hmm?"
Unfortunately, their lips were glued together for an unknown reason.
"Mmm?!"
Leo also sensed something weird. He pulled his head back, but he ended up dragging Esen along. The sticking-mouth-tug-of-war had been initiated. The laughter got louder as the scene was too comical.
Aslan glanced at Ivy who wryly smiled as she forgot to tell Esen and Leo a piece of important information.
"Oh, dear."
According to the legend of Honesty God, the kiss had to be SINCERE as well. In elf's tradition, a puppy kiss couldn't be acknowledged as a lover's sincerity. Only when they started making out in public was considered SINCERE as the husband and wife openly claimed ownership of each other in front of many witnesses.
Leo was the first to start opening his mouth. It was not because of the awareness of the legend or tradition but his naughtiness.
Because their lips were glued to each other, Esen's mouth was forced open. Leo then attacked her with his tongue.
"RERO-RERO- RERO-RERO- RERO-RERO- RERO-RERO- RERO-RERO- RERO-RERO!!"
"!!!"
Esen flailed her arms and legs in panic, but Leo already embraced her and carried her with his two hands, grabbing her butt.
A minute after the exchange, their lips parted while a thread of liquid still connected their mouths. Esen's face was bright red. On the contrary, Leo widely grinned.
Ivy coughed several times and quickly announced the end of this farce.
"As the witness of the vows, I announce you husband and wife."
Aslan raised his eyebrows as the order of the kisses and the announcement switched. He whispered to Ivy.
"No flower bouquet throwing, right?"
Ivy whispered back, "No."
"What about the next procedure?"
"The groom must take the bride to the backroom and consummate with her for at least an hour. Also, because of the vow and the blessing, impregnation is guaranteed. Please tell the lord to wear some protection if he doesn't want a child at the moment."
"Who the hell made those karmic laws?! Was it Karmic Sovereign Wendy?!"
"If I remember correctly, her name is Wen Dee, not Wendy."
"Yeah, right. When DEEZ NUTS hit your mouth. I remember that name now."
"…"
.
Aslan and Ivy told Esen and Leo the next queue, which ended up in another memorial moment. Leo happily princess-carried Esen to the room behind the stage while everybody laughed at them.
For hours, the groom and the bride were MIA, but the guests understood what happened behind the scenes. Everybody enjoyed the party until midnight before they dispersed.
However, the missing couple never came out of the room. Only a week later, Leo and Esen had their fill.

chapters.title: Chapter 293 – New Cocktail Gone Viral: Bartender Offered to 'BUKKAKE' Florida Man
chapters.content:
Chapter 293 – New Cocktail Gone Viral: Bartender Offered to 'BUKKAKE' Florida Man
In the presidential suite of the hotel, Leo and Esen exploited their privilege and stayed there for the day. The exhausted bride collapsed on the 400x500cm bed and quickly fell asleep. As for Leo, he rechecked the quest progress.
.
Entity Fate Crystal Quest – Phase 4/13
Mission Objectives: Complete 10 tasks to complete this phase.
Phase Completion Rewards: 500,000 Years of Lifespan, One Selectable SR Building, Increase the Shopping Mall's max level to 20, Increase the Sub-Building's Max Level to 20
Phase Three Tasks (8/10 Completed)
- Get married (Done)
- Complete monthly PVP three times (1/3)
- Complete mystic realm expedition three times (2/3)
- Top-Up one time (Done)
- Obtain two true earth fate crystal (Done)
- Defeat 100 deities (Done)
- Upgrade shopping mall to level 17 (Done)
- Spend at least 1,000,000 years of lifespan system items (Done)
- Manufacture at least 2,000 weapons using strategic resources. (Done)
- Attain the strength of entity realm or higher. (Done)
*For every completed task, you will receive one Lucky Draw (Building), and one Lucky Draw (Automaton).
.
The next hurdles were two real-time PVP matches and one seasonal expedition. The latter was easy, but the PVP match sounded intimidating.
As Leo had to complete these quests eventually, he decided to do it right away.
Leo wrote a note on the table, telling Esen that he might be away for a few days. Then, he opened the PVP system screen. Without hesitation, he picked the monthly PVP battle.
WHOOSH
Leo in the groom's white suit vanished and reappeared in the middle of the Fate Stadium Arena as usual. He opened his eyes, expecting to be alone in the arena and waiting for his opponent.
Betraying Leo's expectations, his opponent had been queuing for a match and waiting on the stage for longer than him. Leo found a werewolf opponent.
Coincidentally, he was none other than Overlord Milo, who came here to complete his monthly PVP and earn some rewards.
"You… You look familiar." Milo in his giant Fenrir appearance flinched.
"Oh, hi." Leo brightly smiled at a familiar face.
"…"
As Leo's face changed, Milo took a few seconds to recall his memory. Eventually, he remembered Leo.
"YOU'RE THAT INVADER! WE'VE FINALLY MET! THIS TIME I WILL CRUSH YOU!"
Milo remembered Leo's face. They had met before when Leo officially raided one of a dead player's planets. Last time, Milo left Leo alone because he was not in the mood. But this time, he was eager for a fight.
But then, their names appeared on the scoreboard.
.
Name: Leo [Redacted]
Title/Alias: Florida Man
Race: [Redacted]
Age: [Redacted]
Gender: Male
Level / Cultivation Base: [Redacted]
Remaining Lifespan: 2,142,543,938 Years
.
Discovering the nickname of Leo, Milo closed his mouth. He widened his eyes as he finally recognized his sworn enemy.
"FLORIDA MAN! SO, YOU'RE THE NU'EARTHE SCUM! I'VE FINALLY FOUND YOU!!" Milo bellowed again.
"Umm." Leo pursed his lips in bemusement. He repeated a famous vtuber's catchphrase in an innocent voice once again, "Oh, hi."
Milo gnashed his teeth in anger. He invoked his Qi and scanned Leo's aura.
He was into a rude awakening. As Milo had been by Ellen's side, he recognized the aura of a karmic sovereign. But compared to Ellen, Leo's aura seemed more refined and controlled. Moreover, there was a tinge of strange air within his aura.
'Right. Queen Eleanor invaded Florida Man and was defeated. If that monster lost to this man, I might not be his opponent.'
Milo was not stupid enough to challenge someone whose strength surpassed Eleanor. He deeply inhaled and bellowed, "I FORFEIT! GET ME OUTTA HERE!"
Unfortunately for Milo, per the rules, he could not forfeit a PVP match. Every system match could only be resolved after one party was incapacitated or dead.
BEEP
The system arena ignored Milo's plea. It initiated the betting phase, allowing spectators to wager their lifespan. Because of Milo's outburst, all bet was poured on Leo's side.
Leo gazed at the betting rates and snorted in disappointment. As a rich man, wagering a billion YOL for 100,000 YOL was pointless. He ignored it.
"Hey, wanna bet?" Leo tried to scam Milo to make a personal wager.
"NO! GO TO HELL!"
"…Shame." Leo was disappointed.
The betting phase ended. Then, the arena started counting down.
Milo groaned in helplessness. He turned to Leo and prepared to fight for his life.
Meanwhile, Leo was relieved. At least, he wouldn't have an issue this month. He started planning his schedule and thinking of the dwarf.
BEEP
The fight signal sounded the beginning of the match.
Milo held his breath and charged forward. He enveloped his arms with the power of karma and swung his right claw at Leo's face.
Leo's eyes followed the trajectory of the claws.
'Hmm?'
A strange phenomenon occurred to Leo for the first time. He found Milo's movement slower than usual. Moreover, his inner Qi stimulated his entire body, which brimmed with power that could burst out at any moment.
Following his instinct, Leo raised his hand and parried the wolf's paw with the back of his fist.
PA
Upon contact, the paw and the claws shattered. Half of Milo's front right leg exploded into blood mist.
The bullet-time moment never ceased. Leo frowned and observed how droplets and militated flesh of Milo's left arm scattered everywhere in the air.
'Is this Matrix? How beautiful.'
Since the fight was easy, he took a step forward. Then, he threw a straight punch toward Milo's chest.
'Oh, wait. Fenrir's blood, heart, liver, and other things are valuable in alchemy. I shouldn't blast this mofo.'
Leo pulled his fist back. Instead of aiming at Milo's chest, he threw an uppercut toward Milo's jaw. After all, the head of a Fenrir was less precious than the other parts.
BOOM
The punch connected. Milo's head shattered and his brain exploded.
The bullet-time ended. The giant Fenrir collapsed on the stage.
WHOOSH
Milo's soul escaped the fleshly body and hovered in mid-air. He glared at Leo in resentment.
"I FORFEIT! I CAN'T FIGHT ANYMORE!"
Leo turned to the overlord. He pondered which domain ability he should use in this position.
Unfortunately, the match was concluded.
<WINNER OF THE MATCH, 'FLORIDA MAN'!>
"…"
The spectators all cheered as most of them won the wagers. As for Milo, his soul escaped the stage.
Leo sighed. He clenched his fist.
"I don't know how, but I got another one in the bag. Now, I have to wait a month and do it one more time."
The stadium glowed as it prepared to set up the next match. According to the rules, the winners and losers of the pvp arenas would be automatically teleported to either the front counter of the Fate Stadium or their reserved hotel room.
WHOOSH
Leo wasn't a permanent resident or reserved a hotel room. He was sent to the front counter for the second time.
Without asking anybody, Leo queued to buy an entrance ticket. When he reached the counter, he showed the identity token that he had purchased during his last visit.
The receptionist was the lamia that had advised Leo the last time. She checked Leo's identity.
"Your fighter pass has expired, sir. Would you like to extend it?"
"Same price, right? 10,000 years of lifespan?"
"Yes, sir."
"I'll take one."
The receptionist nodded. She updated Leo's information and checked his records on her computer.
When the receptionist saw the updated lifespan in Leo's possession, she widened her eyes in astonishment.
"Um, sir. Would you like me to upgrade your fighter pass to the veteran pass?"
Veteran Fighter Pass was usually granted to elite fighters who fought in this arena more than 10 times. It granted small perks to the owner, such as unlimited access to the facilities, no expiry date, and access to exclusive services.
Leo still remembered the condition. He doubted the lamia's motive, "AM I eligible? I don't remember fighting here more than 10 times."
"Any fighter with more than 100 million years of lifespan can directly upgrade their fighter passes, sir. Would you like to upgrade yours?"
"Are there any fees?"
"It's free, sir."
Leo shrugged. He never hated free stuff, but he hated hidden conditions and scammers. For the sake of his safety, he probed further. "What's the catch?"
"There is no condition, sir. The Fate Stadium welcomes all VIPs and potential investors."
"In short, you want rich people to spend their money in your stadium, correct?"
"…Yes, sir."
"Hmm. Fine. Upgrade mine." Leo nodded and allowed the lamia to upgrade his pass.
"Thank you, sir."
The lamia replaced Leo's token with a platinum card. On the card, it showed the face of Leo and his alias. She then gestured for Leo to enter the VIP lounge behind her.
"You can enter the stadium this way, sir."
"…Okay."
Leo played along and followed the lamia into the lounge behind the counter area.
.
Walking into the room, Leo found a massive lobby. Some tables and couches were twice as large and taller than average human furniture. But in some sections, the furniture was small enough for children to use. Fortunately, there were enough chairs and tea tables for humans.
The lamia bowed and introduced the lounge.
"This place is reserved for crystal bearer pass and veteran fighter pass holders. The food and drinks of this lounge are on the house. But if you require assistance, such as hotel booking, you can make requests at the service center counter down the hallway."
"Oh, nice."
Leo looked around and found food bars and a buffet area. He licked his lips.
"Oh, before I forgot," the lamia followed Leo's gaze and warned him. "In the buffet area, using any inventory system or storage rings is prohibited."
"Eh? Why?" Leo was dejected.
"In the past, some selfish players robbed the stadium's food and took advantage of other players. We almost ran out of food because of those gluttons. Anyway, please don't use any ring or inventory in the area, or you'll be arrested by the staff. If you're arrested, you might be thrown into a death chess game."
"…"
The lamia bowed and excused herself. She returned to the counter to resume her duty.
Leo gazed at the shaking hips of the lamia. He smacked his lips, but he shook his head afterward.
'I'm a married man. No more lewd gaze, damn you.'
Leo lightly patted his forehead, but the impact behind his strength dizzied him. It took a few minutes to regain his balance.
After regaining his composure, Leo scanned the area. Fortunately, nobody lingered in the lobby lounge to mock him.
Although Leo planned to return home early, he got sidetracked. His legs guided him to the buffet area to check the alien's food. The food didn't disappoint him.
From raw blood to cooked food, the stadium featured everything. Meat for every type of creature, including humans, goblins, orcs, snakes, wolves, elves, and regular animals was on the menu.
Leo bit his lower lips. He understood why the robbers stole food from here as everything seemed useful in alchemy. But as Leo had graduated from eating raw food, he picked some edible meat cut that could be cooked as steaks on his plate. He then passed them to the chef behind an island cook station.
"Medium rare, please."
The chef of the cooking station was a muscular green orc with two long fangs extending from his lower jaw. He gently took Leo's plate and humbly smiled.
"Would you like me to season your steak, sir?"
Leo glanced at the steak cut and counted it. "One without seasoning, one controlled steak, and one of your recommendations, please."
"A gourmet, I see. Very well, sir. It shall be done in a few minutes. I'll serve them to your table."
"Thank you."
Leo was impressed with the service. He went to the bar counter next to order some drinks.
The bartender was also a green orc, but it was a SHE. The orc lady was as gorgeous as divine elves, but she had firm muscles and an impressive chest.
Leo sat at the bar and picked a brochure. He read the menu for a moment. Then, his eyes found weird cocktails on the list.
He asked the bartender.
"Miss, what the heck is BUKKAKE?!"
"Hahaha. That?" The orc giggled, "It's a white sticky cocktail that I will splash it from a hose to your face. Would you like one, sir? It's fun."
"…No, thank you. Just curious."
The lounge was wilder than Leo had imagined.

chapters.title: Chapter 294 Buffet Restaurant Calls Cops on Florida Man for Not Eating Vegetables
chapters.content:
Chapter 294 Buffet Restaurant Calls Cops on Florida Man for Not Eating Vegetables
?294 Buffet Restaurant Calls Cops on Florida Man for Not Eating Vegetables
Chapter 294 – Buffet Restaurant Calls Cops on Florida Man for Not Eating Vegetables
After ordering a regular wine, Leo sat at his table and relaxed. The orc chef served the steaks along with side dishes 10 minutes later.
Leo took his time to enjoy his food. While he ate, he observed every employee in the lounge with his Qi sense.
All of the employees here were all deities. Some were even stronger than Esen's minions.
This got Leo curious. He wondered how powerful the stadium owner was. Also, he hated the fact that his system was dependent on the stadium's system.
'One of these days, I should seek the stadium owner. Or rather, should I search for a karmic fate crystal and increase my power ceiling?'
He inclined against his chair and looked at the ceiling, thinking hard. Because of the distraction, Leo stopped eating the steaks on his plate.
While Leo was in deep thought, the crisp sound of footsteps came from the other exit of the lounge. A tall and sexy divine elf in a red dress walked toward Leo. Without asking for Leo's permission, she slid a chair and sat in front of Leo. She leaned forward and rested her chin on her hands.
Leo stopped looking at the ceiling and slowly gazed at the mysterious stranger. Their eyes met.
"Hello, Florida Man." The woman grinned.
Leo slightly frowned. The woman had a similar face and the same voice as Esen. However, she looked more mature. Her voluptuous chest, red lips, and smooth skin could fall any nation, but her palms seemed crude, hardened, and blistered.
"Hello, femme fatal," replied Leo. "What do you want?"
"How cold. Do you even know who I am?"
Leo scoffed and resumed eating. He cut a piece of meat and put it in his mouth.
Noticing Leo's attitude, the stranger grinned. She introduced herself.
"I am Ellen Sydin, the new queen of the Divine Elf Kingdom and the president of the DEZNUTS council."
Leo shrugged, "Good for you. So?"
"You're not surprised at all?"
"I do, but I have no F to give. So?"
Ellen widely smirked. She suddenly took off the upper part of her dress to show her bunnies.
"Are you either dumb or infertile? Can't you catch the hint?"
Leo glanced at Ellen's perfect breasts. But as Leo had unloaded so many bullets in Esen, his sage mode remained active. He clicked his tongue.
"As a proud married man, I'm not interested in affairs, especially my wife's sister. Go tempt someone else."
Ellen flinched for a moment. She slowly adjusted her dress and put it on. Then, she leaned back and crossed her legs. "You know, 100 billion handsome elves would kill to catch a glimpse at my face. I'm offering you my body here."
"…Then, go ask them for their dicks."
"But I want you to join my harem. I need a quality stud to produce good seeds for my future children."
"…"
Leo put his knife and fork on the side of the plate. He wiped his mouth with a warm towel on the table and gave Ellen a meaningful look.
"Your mother said the same thing. Do you know what she got? Gender equality punch to the face."
Ellen giggled, "Did you kill her?"
"Deader than dead. She got MEGUMINed."
Although Ellen didn't understand what 'MEGUMINed' was, she could guess the vocabulary. She was satisfied.
"Hmm. Very nice. Now, I like you more. Are you sure you don't want to be my consort? You just need to copulate with me when I ovulate. I can do many plays – submissive, femdom, BDSM, or any kink you dream of. Not only you can claim my body, but you can also enjoy my wealth and status as the prime consort of Divine Elf Kingdom!"
"Too cliché. You elves are too horny! Get some help!" Leo started to get annoyed.
"We are honest, unlike you hypocritical humans. That's why those lowly dogs keep calling you people Nu'Earthe. You need to accept your primal instinct and be honest with it. That way, the civilization can flourish."
"What a load of craps. Rapists would have dominated the society."
"I beg to differ. It's them who will have to work to get those rights. Women will be forced to rely on their strength to protect their bodies. As for men, they also had to compete with fellow men and overcome their prospect's strength. Because of such encouragement, our race never stops improving their cultivation strength."
"In short, if they are weak, they can either die a virgin or be enslaved."
"Exactly."
Leo shook his head in disgust. He didn't want to discuss another word.
"You people are disgusting. Your society must be one hell of a shit hole."
Ellen burst into laughter, "That's the difference between us and you humans. We dominate the universe while you humans become wandering fugitives."
"…"
Leo stood up. As he lost his appetite, he planned to go home and return to his wife.
Unfortunately, Ellen predicted Leo's thoughts. She also stood up and ejected a broadsword from her system inventory. The sword pointed at Leo's neck.
"Florida Man. Join me."
Leo was relieved that Ellen finally used a forceful method. He was tired of this farce.
"How about no? Wanna settle this in the arena?"
Ellen smirked, "Heh. No need."
"Mhm. Get lost, bitch. Shoo, shoo!"
"…Cool. Don't regret this."
Ellen pulled her sword away. She turned around and left without uttering a word.
Leo scoffed and patted his clothes. Although he planned to visit the dwarf and the spaceship vendor, Leo opened his system menu and chose to press the 'Return' button.
But after pressing the button, the corner of Leo's eyes noticed that the whiskey bottle that he had ordered from the bartender was still full. He grabbed it along with the plate of steaks. Then, he vanished.
.
.
After Leo had teleported away, the bartender and the chef changed their expressions. They lifted their collar cloth closer to their mouth and whispered.
"This is the VIP lounge. We are reporting another food robbery. The thief's alias is Florida Man. The stolen goods are a plate of steaks and a bottle of 20-Year Medusa Oak Whiskey."
A few seconds later, the response came from the higher-ups. A voice entered their mind.
"The CCTV footage has been retrieved. Good job. We will apprehend him when he shows up here again."
The orcs nodded. The chef returned to his duty as if nothing had happened. Only the bartender widely grinned and commented.
"What a fool. Didn't he read that all food and drinks must only be consumed here? Bringing even a piece of food here to their homeworld is illegal. He's just asking to be enslaved."
The orc chef shook his head and deeply sighed. "The rules are too strict. Sometimes, I wonder if I should report this matter to the superior officers. I mean, it's just a few pieces of cheap steaks and cheap whiskey."
"You know nothing, Yraunaj. It's a scheme of the higher-ups. We just want an excuse to enslave strong players and steal their fate crystals. Their dantian crystals are also valuable, especially the humans. If we can acquire one of them, we can learn the secrets behind Overlord Xiaomao's abnormal strength!"
Again, the orc chef 'Yraunaj' disagreed with his partner and the stadium's ways of doing things. He felt like the stadium was scamming their valuable guests.
'I hope he is strong enough to handle the Player Hunter Squadron. I wish your true strength is independent of the system… human."
.
.
Meanwhile, Ellen's expression was dark. He was disappointed in Leo.
"Foolish. Had he agreed, I could have made him the King of Divine Elf. He would have ruled half of the universe! I would have supported him and purged the Kishin Clan from the universe. Then, we would have formed a permanent alliance with Overlord Xiaomao…"
Ellen deeply grumbled while she opened her system menu, planning to return home. But as the system screen appeared, a notification message screen manifested.
DING
<Breaking News: Fresh Warrant Issued for 'Florida Man' Who Allegedly Caught Stealing Food from Buffet Lounge. Player Hunter Squadron Has Been Deployed.>
"…"
Ellen raised her eyebrows in bemusement. A second later, she burst into laughter.
"What a fool! I thought you were stupid, but you are downright autistic! How could you have fallen for the stadium's petty trick?! Had you simply left the table, no one would have batted an eye! Now, you're done for!"
The new queen looked forward to seeing Leo and Esen struggle. After all, the army behind the Fate Stadium was the only one who could rival the divine elf kingdom's forces.
.
.
Leo returned to his bus. He looked at the clock.
Only 30 minutes had passed. Leo was proud that he got home early. With free time at hand, Leo planned to manually improve his kingdom by purchasing some prebuilt houses from the shopping system.
He opened his online shopping menu. Then, he was prompted with a red notification message.
<Warning! You have committed a crime in Fate Stadium. Please navigate to the PVP system screen and press the 'Surrender' button to turn yourself in. Failure to comply will result in additional charges, and the Player Hunter Squadron will be deployed to apprehend you. We don't guarantee the damage that they may inflict on your kingdoms or domains.>
"…"
Leo was confused. He didn't remember committing any crime in the Fate Stadium. All he did was take a whiskey and a plate of steaks back.
Steak?
Whiskey?
Leo paused for a minute. He slapped his forehead.
"Those idiots. They should have told me that I couldn't take any food outside the buffet area in the first place! Is this a scam?!"
Leo navigated to the PVP system screen. His hand hovered over the 'Surrender' button. But then, he pulled his finger away.
Something seemed fishy when Leo pondered about it. Why would the rich and resourceful Fate Stadium deploy task forces to hunt down a little thief? Wouldn't that be excessive?
He closed the system windows and crossed his arms to think.
Hours later, Leo tilted his head in frustration. He had a headache as his thoughts were in chaos.
'At a time like this, I shouldn't be overthinking things. Instead of wasting my time, I should waste other people's time! How about asking Kitten and Meowmeow about it? They are more knowledgeable than me, right?'
Being inspired, Leo left the bus and visited the mystic realm portal.

chapters.title: Chapter 295 Florida Man Funds Space Traveling Project, Aiming to be the First Space Gas Smoker
chapters.content:
Chapter 295 Florida Man Funds Space Traveling Project, Aiming to be the First Space Gas Smoker
?295 Florida Man Funds Space Traveling Project, Aiming to be the First Space Gas Smoker
Chapter 295 – Florida Man Funds Space Traveling Project, Aiming to be the First Space Gas Smoker
Arrived at the mystic realm platform, Leo searched for the two advisers' whereabouts. Unfortunately, Meowmeow and Aslan were nowhere to be seen.
Leo approached Lucky, who wagged his tail and expected a head pat. Satisfying the doggy, Leo stroked his chin and head.
"Hey, good boy. Where is that lewd devil and fisherman?"
"Them, woof? That birb usually hangs out in Agriculture World with his new concubines. If it's Kitten, he said something about a parked spaceship on the asteroid belt or something, woof."
"Asteroid Belt?" Leo was curious. He also recalled that Aslan once ditched them and disappeared along with Eleanor's dreadnaught battleship. "What is Kitten planning to do with that ship?"
"I don't know either, woof." Lucky pouted as he really didn't know.
Seeing the innocent look of Lucky, Leo left him be. He changed the subject, "Is Meowmeow in the AW (Agriculture World) right now?"
"Yes, woof! But be prepared for some disgusting scene, woof."
"Meh, what can go wrong."
Leo ignored Lucky's warning and proceeded to the Agriculture World Portal. He crossed to the other side and found a green world, filled with fresh oxygen… and a foul sultry liquid odor.
Turning his head toward the source of the strong scent, Leo found a hundred stone elves lying on the ground, soaked in white liquid. He deeply frowned and looked at the queue of elf golems who had been lining and waiting for their turns.
At the front of the queue was a handsome man whose face resembled Dr. Mao Miaomiao and Leo in his youthful appearance.
Seeing the angel with his face doing naughty things to other female golems made Leo nauseous. He stomped toward the golem and yelled.
"Meowmeow, stop banging other rocks! I have something to ask you!"
Meowmeow whose body part was connected to another elf golem turned his head and looked at his master, "Oh, master. You've come at a good time. Wait a second. You look younger again! I bet your vitality is restored too! Wanna join me? We have so many girls to play with!"
Leo covered his face with his right palm and groaned, "I said, stop banging your wives for a second and pay attention, okay? It will be quick. Once we're done, you can do whatever you want with them as long as they are happy with it. I won't interfere with your life!"
"Oh, sure. What do you need, master?"
Leo got to the point, "Do you know anything about Fate Stadium and their system manipulation abilities?"
Meowmeow flinched. His playful expression changed, "Fate Stadium, you say?"
"Yes. You know something, didn't you?"
Meowmeow paused for a long time. He slowly stood up and gazed at his wives, "Leave us alone. We'll continue this in the other days."
The girls seemed disappointed. They bowed at Leo and retreated to the mystic realm platform.
After both men were alone on the empty grassland, Meowmeow revealed a secret.
"Master, are you aware that we four guardian golems share our thoughts and memory, right?"
"Something like that, but you have your own personality and conscience, correct?"
"Yes. Everybody's conscience is unique because everyone inherits a different bloodline and abilities. Well, originally, all abilities are yours to begin with. We just inherit some that you haven't awakened yet."
Leo found the info interesting, but that was not his purpose for visiting Meowmeow.
"Back to the topic, what about the Fate Stadium? Does anybody know anything?"
Meowmeow closed his eyes and confessed, "I managed to peek into Kitten's unique memory. He seems to be an expert in this topic because he is more special than the rest of us."
"Ah, figured as much."
As Leo had predicted, the fisherman golem was the smartest guy among the four guardian golems. Moreover, something unique about Aslan gave an eerie feeling that Leo couldn't describe. It was neither dangerous nor pleasant, and that guy's tone and voice were always apologetic and happy at the same time.
"By the way, master. Do you know that Kitten has a soul?"
"…A soul, you say?"
Something clicked in Leo's mind. A puzzle piece filled the incomplete picture that Leo imagined Aslan.
"That makes a lot of sense. That guy is too weird to be someone who has been born from my shadow or thoughts. What kind of secrets he is hiding? Do you know anything else?"
Meowmeow nodded, "We know that Kitten has visited the stadium more than once, but we can't dig deeper into his memory. That's all we know."
"Hohoh… Good. Good. Anything else?"
"If it's related to the Fate Stadium, that's all we know."
"Alright. That's good enough."
Leo rubbed his chin. He planned to confront Aslan after this.
"Also, master," Meowmeow was concerned about Aslan.
"What is it?"
"I know that guy is sussy, but he means well. I can tell that he's trying his best to support you from the shadow. He gives off… an air of a dotting father."
"Pfft. Father my ass. If he has a soul, he must have harbored a hidden desire or a personal agenda. I'll go check him out."
"Please, master. Don't be too harsh on him. He's not your enemy."
"…I know."
Leo returned to the mystic realm platform. He widely grinned, eager to meet his suspicious helper.
Meanwhile, Meowmeow was no longer in the mood to play. He restored his outfit and followed Leo to the other side as well.
Before Meowmeow left, he turned around and gazed toward the direction of the farms. Over a thousand kilometers away, Sierra and Mu-Nyang were busy managing the livestock and the child of Ester.
Meowmeow prayed for Mu-Nyang's sanity. After all, Sierra was even more perverted than him.
'Mu-Nyang, can you read my thoughts? I hope your tentacles are safe and pure. Don't let that cow abuse you.'
A minute later, Meowmeow heard the reply from the Cathulhu.
'My purity has been soiled, munya.'
Meowmeow burst into laughter and shook his head. He changed his mind, turning around and flying toward the cat.
'Did Sierra bully you?' Asked Meowmeow.
'She used my tentacles to squeeze her breasts, munya. This is sexual harassment! I want to report this to master, munya!'
Meowmeow almost died laughing. He accidentally fell from the sky as he lost focus.
'Maybe she's asking you to extract her breast milk for the baby?'
'No way, munya! You can't see her expression. She's a SICK COW, munya!'
'Okay. Okay. I'll be there to help you. I know how to handle ladies.'
'Don't cross the line, munya. Her karma is connected to the REAL Sierra. As soon as the original Sierra is reincarnated, she can extract OUR Sierra's memory and discover us, munya!'
'Oh, dear.'
Meowmeow started to have a headache. He wondered what he should do to this unruly system clone.
.
.
After returning to his domain, Leo flew to the void and scanned for the hidden dreadnaught.
It wasn't easy to locate a specific object several light-years away. Fortunately, the asteroid belt formed a dome curtain around the solar system, making it easy to spot.
Leo stopped searching for a spaceship within the void. Instead, he flew toward the asteroid belt to measure the denseness and distance.
As the name implies, the asteroid belt was full of floating rocks, random minerals, space junk, and colorful gas. Leo entered the fog in space and accidentally inhaled a wisp of yellowish gas.
He coughed and spat a mouthful of saliva. The gas earlier was so rotten that Surstromming smelled like flowers. Even the contaminated food back on Earth could not rival this scent.
Still, the foul gas contained a thick poisonous essence. Leo estimated that a deity could spend a day or two here to cultivate its Qi and condense a few poison stars.
Leo slapped his cheeks to focus. He covered his mouth and plucked his nostrils with his fingers. Then, he flew into the space fog to scan through the asteroid belt.
Traveling through the smelly fog full of floating asteroids was irritating and frustrating. Because of his traveling speed and poor vision, Leo bumped into giant rocks several times.
Annoyed by the asteroids, Leo waved his arms around. He stored anything he touched in his system inventory, exploiting his system features.
The trick worked perfectly in this situation. As the system inventory's collection range depended on the user's cultivation base, Leo accidentally turned himself into a black hole, sucking every hard object into his body.
Within a minute, a section of asteroids, minerals, junk, and a portion of smelly gas vanished. Everything within a 100,000km diameter disappeared.
The yellowish mist continued to follow the solar system's gravity as usual. Although they moved at the speed of 2,000km/s, they couldn't recover all the lost gas that Leo had consumed.
Leo blankly gazed at his system inventory. 5,000 different items occupied 5,000 item slots, including the gas. Every item of the same type was stacked in the same slot.
The storage limit of the inventory system seemed infinite. Leo tilted his head in confusion as he vaguely recalled that it was supposed to be limited before. He wondered how it got overpowered.
"This system is quite a cheat, isn't it? Was it the white tree's blessing? Or was it Eleanor's entity fate crystal? But didn't I use it?"
Leo was confused. The more Leo learned about the system's perks, the more he was wary of the player hunter squadron and the Fate Stadium.
Because of the looming threat, Leo stopped being sidetracked. He continued to search for Aslan's hidden ship.
.
.
Two days later, Leo's inventory slots kept expanding. 60,000 slots were filled. Some of the item slots contained over a million objects of the same type.
Although collecting resources was fun, Leo was not in the mood to enjoy being a loot goblin. He focused on clearing the path, searching for Aslan's ship.
Hard work paid off. Finally, Leo spotted a weird steel Shenlong dragon armed with giant cannons at a distance. It also moved like it was alive, swimming through the thick asteroid belt's gas.
Leo pursued, hoping to find Aslan in the battleship. But then, the dreadnaught suddenly picked up the speed and teleported away, vanishing like it never existed.
"WHAT THE HELL?!"
Leo looked around and tried to track the dreadnaught battleships. He closed his eyes and read the karma of this universe.
Karma in this universe came in various forms. For example, every living being was tied with at least one karma string and was bound with the local karma river. Cutting it would end the person's life and might erase the soul.
On the other hand, objects also contained karma in the form of object memory. Every solid material left behind traces of time, which any sage or stronger entity could read and follow.
Leo reopened his eyes and found a trail of rainbow road. It led toward the deep space.
"Tsk."
Leo grumbled in frustration. He turned around and rushed home as he didn't want to leave his domain for too long.
Another major battle might ensue. He needed some preparations.

chapters.title: Chapter 296 Florida Man Arrested for Joyriding Coffin Through Car Factory
chapters.content:
Chapter 296 Florida Man Arrested for Joyriding Coffin Through Car Factory
?296 Florida Man Arrested for Joyriding Coffin Through Car Factory
Chapter 296 – Florida Man Arrested for Joyriding Coffin Through Car Factory
After Leo had returned home, the dragon dreadnaught mothership revealed its appearance near the location where Leo had been.
Aslan who was inside the mothership's main bridge faintly grinned, feeling proud of himself.
'You still have a lot to learn, my boy. If you can be tricked with simple back-and-forth teleportation, you can't possibly catch top karmic sovereigns in this universe like Overlord Kishin or those player hunters.'
He had so many things he wanted to teach Leo. However, it was not the right time. Aslan deeply sighed and inclined on his armchair, recalling the faces of the Fate Stadium's mastermind.
Thinking of the person, Aslan's expression turned solemn.
'Leo isn't ready for a karmic fate crystal yet. His foundation is lacking even though he can use the simulation mode. He needs more time to refine his soul and dantian universe. Even if he spends a year or two training in the simulation mode, I doubt he can catch up to those guys.'
Aslan was aware of the player hunter squadron's existence. He had met them before as Meowmeow and Leo had suspected.
The encounter wasn't pleasant. Thinking of the men, Aslan's blood boiled. He suppressed his anger and attempted to calculate the situation logically.
'Those player hunters can easily disable every system and negate system skills. Leo has integrated some of the system skills, daos, and abilities into his own, but he hasn't mastered everything yet. If they suddenly take Leo's system power away, he won't be weakened. But that domain and his system buildings will disappear, including the lifespan that he stole…'
Aslan smacked his lips. Although he wasn't sure if the player hunters could erase Leo's hard-earned lifespan that he had accumulated, he didn't want to take risks.
He deeply sighed and closed his eyes. He decided to intervene.
'I need to visit that distasteful man again. But first, I should tell Simba and Ester about this.'
Aslan sank his consciousness to his dantian universe.
.
.
A month quickly passed by.
In the middle of the night inside the presidential suite room, Leo relaxed in the middle of the bed. Cuddling next to him was Esen who slept soundly.
Leo stroked Esen's hair and smiled. The past month's marriage life had been fulfilling.
The relationship between Leo and Esen improved. She was no longer shy at night. Moreover, she often initiated or proposed a dual cultivation session with Leo.
Every time Leo dual-cultivated with Esen, her cultivation base increased. In addition, her clone's strength in Leo's simulation mode improved. Because of such boons, Esen was always by his side during daytime and nighttime.
Looking at Esen's sexy body, ample chest, sexy hips, firm perky cake, and flawless smooth skin, Leo chuckled. He thought of the day when they first met.
"You were so skinny back then. If anyone could time-travel and told me that I would marry you, that me in the past would have laughed his ass out. Who would have thought that the loli corpse would turn into a gorgeous bombshell of an elf?"
Suddenly, a cough could be heard in the room. The voice of Ivy interrupted Leo's thought.
"Your Majesty. Her Majesty has become what she is today because of your hard work and care. Without your grooming… I mean, your love, she would have stuck being a living corpse. Look at her now. She's now a happy woman."
Leo smacked his lips. This was not the first time that Ivy snuck into their room, so he was used to it. Furthermore, this woman sometimes entered the room while both Leo and Esen were in the middle of a night activity. Although Ivy never intervened or interrupted them, she always gave him the creep.
"Yo, peeping tom. Can you mind our privacy? You know, I want to be with my wife alone sometimes."
Ivy smiled and refused, "I'm sorry, Your Majesty. Her Majesty is pregnant. I understand that you are mindful of your privacy, but you can be sometimes crude and rough in bed. It is my duty to be vigilant of her health and her actions until the delivery."
"…"
Leo didn't know what to say to this archlich.
That wedding night, Leo did it without protection. Because of the white tree god's blessings, Esen was pregnant. At first, Leo thought of it as a joke. But when Esen told Leo that her egg was fertilized, Leo realized the gravity of the situation.
"Fine, you perv. Even if you want to join us, I won't take you as a concubine."
"Don't worry, Your Majesty. I have a boyfriend."
"Oh!" Leo laughed. "I didn't know a lich like you have a sugar daddy. Who is the unfortunate guy?"
Ivy widely grinned, "He's a handsome little boy."
Leo was taken aback, "WTF?! Are you grooming a minor?!"
"He's more of an innocent grandpa in a child-like physique, similar to your partner, Your Majesty. If you call me a groomer, you're no different than me. You groomed a loli. I groomed a shota."
"No, listen here, you predator bitch," Leo was dumbfounded, but he wanted to win the argument. "I never did anything to her when she was in the child-like body or when she was still a walking corpse. We started getting more intimated when Esen has an adult-like body."
"Hahaha! Your Majesty, everybody knows that it's an excuse. Don't worry about it. We don't blame you for your fetish or your kinks. As long as you love our queen, we don't mind."
"But I DO MIND, damn you! I ain't a pedophile, and I don't groom minors! Don't randomly accuse me!"
"Haha, my apologies, Your Majesty. Well, please resume whatever you're doing. Don't mind my presence here. Go ahead, continue."
"…"
Leo rolled his eyes and shook his head. He gave up on Ivy.
As a month passed, Leo prepared for another journey to the Fate Stadium. He opened the PVP system screen while he put on his clothes.
After putting on his casual t-shirt and jeans, Leo reminded Ivy.
"I'll be visiting another planet for business. Tell Esen that I'll be away for several days."
Ivy raised her eyebrows, "How many days exactly, Your Majesty?"
"Probably more than a week. If I'm lucky, I might return within a day."
"Is it a dangerous trip? Do you want me to inform the other guardians to tag along with you?"
"Nah. I'll be fine. Be careful about invaders, though. Tell Meowmeow, Kitten, and Lucky that I want them to patrol the star system. If they detect any uninvited visitor from other galaxies or dimensions, kill them on sight."
Ivy's expression turned solemn. She bowed 90 degrees, "I understand. Please have a safe trip."
"Ah."
Leo deeply inhaled and gazed at the real-time PVP screen.
.
You Are Wanted by Fate Stadium Authority!
A warrant has been issued. You have been charged with robbery, and you are expected to surrender to the authority within a month. Failure to do so will result in system cancelation – Your system perks, such as the Inventory System, Online Shopping System, and Domain System will be terminated. All items and perks acquired by the systems shall be erased. Furthermore, a task force from the Fate Stadium will be deployed to arrest you.
In case you surrender to the authority, you may keep the systems and the perks. However, you will be prosecuted according to the Fate Stadium's Laws.
Current Warrant and Charge: Robbery
Surrender Grace Period: 25 Minutes
.
The red warning screen overlapped with the PVP screen. In addition, the [Surrender] button was highlighted.
As Leo hated misunderstanding and corrupted political systems, he decided to confront the Fate Stadium's officials to clear things up. He pressed the surrender button.
As soon as Leo pressed it, he vanished from the presidential suite room.
.
.
DING
<You have submitted to Fate Stadium Authority!>
<Thank you for cooperating. We shall take your action into account.>
Leo opened his eyes and found himself inside a transparent coffin. The 50x50cm square glass plate under his feet was enough for Leo to stand on, but the 2-meter-high ceiling and the glass wall were claustrophobic inducing.
He looked around and saw other glass coffins. Fortunately, the coffin allowed him to stand on his feet, so he could observe everything. Around his glass container, many coffins of a different size contained a hundred humanoid creatures inside.
A factory belt gradually moved Leo's coffin forward until it reached a pushing machine. Leo's coffin was stopped in front of the pusher, but the machine allowed it to go further.
After the first stop came another pushing machine. Again, the belt carried Leo's coffin deeper, but many other coffins of a bigger size were removed from the factory belt.
30 minutes later, Leo's coffin was the only one on the factory belt. It reached a platform at the end of the line.
CLANK
The coffin fell on the platform, forcing Leo to lie down. He grumbled and remained prone, gazing at the destination.
The platform was illuminated by white light, causing the coffin to float. It slowly moved upward into the void.
Finally, Leo looked up and found himself and the glass coffin in the void, floating toward a weird palace situated on a thick white cloud. The coffin landed on the clouds and was stopped by a golden gate.
In front of the golden gate was a giant human with a halo and white angelic wings. He carried a golden harpoon in his left hand and a giant thick grimoire in his left hand. His flat silver hair, flat face, square facial outline, cube-like body, and square limbs made him look like a character from 8-bit games.
The Minecraft angel gazed at Leo. He uttered in a deep and loud noise.
"Criminal Florida Man! You have been charged with robbery! Will you pledge yourself guilty?!"
Leo smacked his lips and muttered, "Please elaborate before you declare your verdict, sir judge. I don't even know what I stole."
The angel snorted, "You stole FOOD from the Fate Stadium! Do you want me to show you the evidence? Once I show you the evidence, your sentence will be doubled!"
"I'd rather see the proof, sir. I don't like being falsely accused. Besides, if I really stole something, I can reimburse the Fate Stadium with something of an equal value."
"SILENCE!"
"…"
Leo narrowed his eyes as he didn't like the barbaric jurisdiction system of this Minecraft-like angel, but he remained quiet.
The angel flickered his fingers, and a floating monitor appeared. It showed the event when Leo picked up a bottle of whiskey from the Fate Stadium and vanished.

chapters.title: Chapter 297 Florida Man Brings Farm Alligator to Court Room and Threatens Judge to Lessen His Sentence
chapters.content:
Chapter 297 Florida Man Brings Farm Alligator to Court Room and Threatens Judge to Lessen His Sentence
?297 Florida Man Brings Farm Alligator to Court Room and Threatens Judge to Lessen His Sentence
Chapter 297 – Florida Man Brings Farm Alligator to Court Room and Threatens Judge to Lessen His Sentence.
Leo snickered and pointed at the table.
"See? What robbery? I only take what's mine."
The judge paused for a long time. He narrowed his eyes and gave Leo a meaningful look. "According to Section 334, taking anything from Fate Stadium's VIP lounge outside is considered thievery depending on the value of the items taken!"
"Tsk. That's butthurt crappy laws you have there," Leo quietly complained in a hushed voice. He wished to say to the angel directly, but he was wary of the 'Court Contempt Law'. Provoking the judge was not a good idea here.
The angel continued, "The items you stole were a bottle of whiskey and three pieces of python deity steaks. The value of the items is…"
The judge flinched and pulled a paper close to his face. His expression turned ugly.
"Well?" Leo grinned. He believed that the value was not that high.
"The value of the stolen items… is ten essence stones."
Leo almost burst into laughter. He fetched a handful of essence stones from his pocket and showed them to the judge, "What's the fine? Can I pay for the stolen 'FOOD'?"
The judge spat and pointed at Leo's face, "Don't be arrogant! A crime is a crime! All your fate crystals and properties will be confiscated by the Fate Stadium! You will be thrown to the Chessboard of Judgment!"
"…Are you serious?" Leo's eyes turned cold.
"Ha! You idiot! That's Court Contempt! I charge you an additional 100 years and ten games of Death Chess! Guards! Strip this fool's fate crystals and give them to me!"
Four giant angels emerged from the white clouds and threw golden chains at Leo's glass coffin. Everybody had a square face and polygon-like physique, but everybody had four angelic wings and halos.
One of them mocked Leo. "It's over, brat. Our 'Fate Crusher Chains' crushed countless entities to death in the past 1,000 years. Even karmic sovereigns are helpless against this artifact!"
Another angel sneered and tightened his chain around the glass coffin. He sneered, "You're lucky that the coffin is still protecting your soul, Junior. But it's too late for you. This coffin alone has the ability to seal your system abilities. The chains will continuously absorb your Qi to the last drop. And when your Qi is depleted, your cultivation base will regress until you become a helpless mortal. Once we're done with you, we'll decide what kind of chess piece we will assign you. For someone like you, a center pawn should fit you well. After all, almost central pawns die in early games, especially when the chess players are noobs."
The judge then added, blackmailing and threatening Leo, "If you don't want to be reduced to a mortal, obediently take out fate crystals from your soul and give them to me. Then, we will lessen your sentence and free you from the glass coffin cage. You get to retain your cultivation base, too! What do you say? Are you willing to cooperate now?"
The other two angels didn't speak, but their obnoxious smiles and ugly faces looked the same as the talkative bunch.
Leo deeply sighed after he patiently listened to their schemes and unnecessary explanations. He opened the system menu and checked it.
A red X overlay appeared on top of the system menu screen. A red message also informed Leo what the coffin was doing.
[Your system has been temporarily sealed.]
[You cannot access the Online Shopping System.]
[You cannot access Domain System.]
[You cannot access the PVP System.]
Strangely, one of the systems could not be sealed.
[ERROR! Failed to seal Dantian System!]
[ERROR! Dantian System is the Host's Dao. Unable to steal the system!]
"…"
Ignoring the messages, Leo snorted. He gave up playing along with the crowd of clowns. As the negotiation failed, it was time to use force.
"It was not like he needed the systems in fights."
He raised his fist and lightly knocked on it.
CLANK
The glass coffin shattered!
"WHAT?!" The judge widened their eyes in shock. "That's impossible! The coffins are made from a karmic sovereign's refined bones! How did a trashy thief like him destroy it?!"
The four angels also wished to say the same words. They bellowed and commanded the golden chains to tighten, planning to crush Leo to death.
The gold chains tightened around Leo. The four guards injected their Qi into the artifacts, attempting to either kill Leo or drain his energy.
Leo looked at the chains while he was wrapped into a semi-
mummy. His eyes peeked through the chains and stared at the judge's face.
The judge wiped a drop of his sweat and laughed.
"Finally, you mess up, Florida Man! Nobody has survived against those chains! Fate Crusher Chains are made from 108 dead karmic river entities! Even if you're a karmic sovereign, your physical body and soul will mutate into a monster! You will lose all your sanity and revert into a mortal after the chains drain your Qi! Now, last chance! Give me your fate crystals, and we'll let you live!"
"…"
Again, Leo's expression turned dark. He deeply sighed.
"That was cringe, judge. Can't you come up with a better threat? You sound like one of those 3rd-rated villains in stories."
The judge was enraged. He pointed his finger and yelled, "Just kill the fool and extract his fate crystals for me! END HIM, NOW!"
The four angels exerted more force. Once again, they injected more Qi into the chains to drain Leo's energy.
The chains had two functions. They injected golden Qi into the victim to force the energy circulation, driving out all Qi from the victim's dantian. Then, the gold Qi would return to the artifact users.
Another function was the mutation ability. When gold Qi entered someone's body, the victim's DNA mutated. Afterward, the Qi would enter the host's soul and devour a portion of it, weakening the victim.
The judge and the four angels were confident in these artifacts. They had killed many arrogant karmic sovereigns who rebelled against the Fate Stadium before. None of them believed that a backwater cultivator like Leo could survive against their best weaponry.
Meanwhile, Leo stood still and stared at the judge. He didn't move or utter a word.
None of his energy escaped his body. Instead, he gradually absorbed gold Qi from the chains into his dantian universe.
In Leo's dantian universe, alligators evolved into lizardmen. Some of them already learned how to cultivate, and a few already reached the immortal stage. Gold Qi from the chains entered Leo's universe and flowed toward the local population.
When the wandering immortals noticed the new type of energy in the universe, they rushed to absorb it like a starving man seeing a bowl of soup. As soon as the lizardmen touched the gold Qi, they refined the new form of energy into their own while they excreted used Qi to the universe, working as a natural filter.
The used Qi was digested and purified by the dantian universe. Thick gold gas emerged and flowed toward the void in Leo's space. Soon, they condensed into a new star.
Because of the time dilation between reality and Leo's universe, his digestive speed surpassed the speed at which the golden chain could draw his energy. The dantian's suction force was stronger than the golden chains, causing the flow of energy to reverse.
Gold Qi from the chains slowly depleted. As soon as the artifacts were about to run out of Qi, they absorbed the energy of their owners.
The faces of the four angels were ashen. Sweat drops covered their faces while their knees slowly lost strength.
10 minutes later, the four angels fell on their knees. Everybody lost 90% of their Qi.
"S-Senior Judge… Help."
The judge bellowed, "WHAT ARE YOU DOING?! KILL THAT MAN ALREADY! WE NEED HIS FATE CRYSTALS, NOW!"
"S-Senior…W-We…"
Soon, the angels ran out of Qi. Then, stars in their dantian universe exploded one after another to produce emergency energy and Qi to sustain their souls.
"N-No!"
One of them realized the mishap. He let go of the chains.
However, the tip of his artifacts moved as if they were alive. Two chains wrapped around his body instead.
"W-WHAT?! NOOOOO!!"
The others also had the same fate. Their weapons stopped listening to their will and followed the command of the other user, whom they tried to kill.
Leo licked the tip of his wounded tongue after he purposely spat his blood on each chain. He also connected his karma strings with the items, changing their ownership.
Receiving such an immense Qi, the chains radiated rainbow light. They loosened the bind and moved according to Leo's will, tying the four angels instead.
After the chains released Leo, he stretched and straightened his back. A loud spinal crack sound refreshed him.
"Ow, that's the spot!" Leo let out a long sigh of relief. "Chains, I want their life force."
The chains shone a blinding light. Radiating heat enveloped the four angels.
"NOOOOOO!!"
"HEEEEELP MEEEEEE!!"
The chains stole their life force and Qi to the last drop. The former masters of the weapons were reduced to dry mummies while their souls disappeared from the universe forever.
After devouring the angels, the chains moved, floating freely like flying snakes. All artifacts coiled around Leo, protecting their new master.
The judge fell from his chair and failed to stand up. While backing away, he yelled.
"GUARDS! ARREST THE REBEL! ARREST HIM! NO, KILL HIM!!"
A hundred angels rushed toward Leo from all sides. Everybody carried a similar gold chain around them.
Leo slowly walked out of the shattered glass coffin, approaching the judge. While walking straight toward the square angel, a hundred chains flew toward him.
BOOM
The four chains of the four dead angels released rainbow light and repelled the gold chains for Leo.
Leo glanced at the chains. He suddenly had a strange inspiration.
'If I turn one of the local population in my dantian universe into super experts, can I bring them out to help me?'
Leo sent his consciousness to his dantian universe to meet one of the lizardmen and alligators that he had been secretly raising.

chapters.title: Chapter 298 Florida Man Arrested in Court Following Incident Where His Alligators Ate the Judge
chapters.content:
Chapter 298 Florida Man Arrested in Court Following Incident Where His Alligators Ate the Judge
?298 Florida Man Arrested in Court Following Incident Where His Alligators Ate the Judge
Chapter 298 – Florida Man Arrested in Court Following Incident Where His Alligators Ate the Judge
"Gator Gyatt?"
"Gator Gyatt."
"GATOR GYATT!"
The lizardmen developed their local language and civilization. Although their vocabulary was limited, everybody understood each other by observing the speaker's gestures and annotations.
Immortal lizardmen gathered and socialized. Unlike selfish cultivators in the universe, none of them competed for resources or took advantage of the others.
Lizardmen worked as one. Strong immortals selflessly imparted their knowledge to youngsters while regular immortals brainstormed and researched the way of daos together.
Because of their unity, most lizardmen and immortals had the same set of skills. There were also cons: Their culture made them lack imagination and diversity. Thus, their cultivation progress got stuck in the deity realm.
Leo's consciousness arrived at a lizardmen-infested planet where lizard deities established cultivation schools. He revealed his appearance as a human with four rainbow phoenix wings.
That was Leo's serious form. He also nicknamed it as the 'Second Phase'.
When Leo showed up in front of the lizardmen, the locals gazed at Leo in shock and astonishment, yet nobody attempted to challenge or provoke Leo due to their peaceful nature.
"Guys! I'm looking for volunteers! No, I'm taking in disciples! Those who are willing to come under my wings will receive my guidance!"
The gators were taken aback at first. Fortunately, they understood Leo's words perfectly. Some of the deities jumped for joy.
"GYATT!" (I volunteer!)
"GYATT!" (TAKE ME, SIR!)
Instantly, 50 deities volunteered. Leo was glad that they were cooperative.
"Good. But first, I need to test something…"
Leo proceeded with his plan. He drew four souls of the volunteers and attempted to bring them to the real world.
.
.
Leo opened his eyes. It took him less than a second to visit the lizardmen and bring them out. However, as the souls lacked a host, they could not manifest in reality.
Without hesitation, Leo injected their souls into the gold chains.
