The new souls were surprised at first. However, the gold chains contained several strong daos, which none of them had learned before.
The new knowledge excited the lizardmen. They absorbed the new daos like a sponge and figured out how the chains worked. Five seconds later, they mastered how they could manipulate and control the chains.
Leo was relieved. He whispered to the four souls.
"This is your first test. Show your power against those birbs."
"GATOR GYATT!" The four souls in the chains shouted in unison and dispersed, charging toward the surrounding angels.
The angels also retaliated, sending their golden chains to block the sentient artifacts.
A hundred gold chains outnumbered the four gators. 20 of them latched onto the four newbies while 20 angels injected their Qi into their weapons.
Leo saw that. He brought out 100 random rocks that he got from the asteroid belt. Flickering them with his fingers, the rocks were shot like bullets.
PU
PU
Exploiting the bullet time sense, Leo turned simple rocks into entity-killing bullets, shattering the heads of the angels one after another until the last man. Their souls escaped from the destroyed flesh and screamed in pain.
"W-What!?"
The judge couldn't believe his eyes. His people were known to be the strongest karmic sovereign killers, yet everybody lost instantly.
Leo ignored the judge's reaction. As the angels lost their bodies, the gold chains became ownerless. Leo hummed and collected everything. Then, he repeated what he had done to the four gold chains earlier.
More gators from Leo's dantian universe were summoned and injected into the weapons. The new artifacts became alive and wiggled in joy.
However, the gators weren't satisfied with just the new bodies. They turned their attention to the escaped souls of angels.
"GYATT!!"
In just one word, all 104 chains chased after the escaped souls. They captured everyone.
"NOOOO!!"
Returning the favor, the chains absorbed the life force and Qi of the angels and transferred them into the gators. The lizardman deities devoured everything and improved their cultivation base.
The deities quickly adapted to the real world's cultivation method. They started condensing stars in their dantians, creating a lower dimension one their own.
As the gators grew stronger, the chains emitted stronger lights.
Leo was happy with this experiment. He let the guys celebrate while he approached the judge. With a wiggle of his hand, he pulled the square angel to his palm and choked his neck.
After the angel was in his hand, Leo started questioning him.
"Let's restart our conversation. How about something basic to break the ice? Who are you?"
The angel growled in anger, "LET ME GO, YOU TRASH! DO YOU KNOW WHO I AM?! I AM THE JUDGE OF HEAVENLY FATE STADIUM!"
"Good start. How about your name?" Leo shrugged and strengthened his grip. The choke squeezed the angel's neck so hard that his square eyes were almost ejected from the eye sockets.
"L-Let go…"
The light warning worked like magic. The judge lowered his voice in fear.
Leo asked him again, "Don't test my patient. What's your name?"
"I-I'm Brack of Jade, the Sentinel of Heavenly Fate Stadium…"
"That's better. What is the nature of your job?"
"A-As I tell you. I'm the sentinel of the stadium. M-My job is irrelevant to you-"
Leo inserted his other hand into the angel's fleshly body. He grabbed a string of karma, "Strike two. One more time, I'll erase your entity forever."
The angel broke a cold sweat. He looked around and found 104 living golden chains circling around him.
Seeing no way out, he trembled.
"P-Please don't kill me."
"As long as you cooperate."
"Y-Yes. Yes. I'll cooperate." The previous arrogant attitude disappeared like the wind. Brack confessed, "I'm working for a transcendent cultivator by the alias Sieg."
"Okay? Who is this 'Sieg'?"
"H-He's the owner of the Fate Stadium. He…"
Brack suddenly flinched and paused for a long time. His entire body bloated and expanded as if he were hit by Kenshiro's punches. Two seconds later, his body and soul exploded, scattering blood and flesh everywhere.
Leo raised his eyebrows and looked at the exploded angel in confusion. Although his bodily cells could mutate and kill living beings, most of the entities were immune to his power. Brack, too, should have been able to resist his ability. Despite the potential immunity, he still died from mutation.
'Was it because of me? Nah, my radiation can't destroy souls. I need to check…'
Doubting Brack's cause of death, Leo picked up a piece of flesh from the pile. He licked it.
There was no taste of radiation or his cancer cells. Instead, it smelled like rotten chicken.
'Yeah. That was not me.'
Confirming that he was not responsible for Brack's death, Leo recollected the information. First, there was someone behind Brack. Secondly, he was a transcended being, whose cultivation base surpassed the karmic sovereign stage. Also, he had the power to destroy the soul of an entity like Brack.
And lastly and theoretically, the mysterious guy by the name 'Sieg' might be the owner of the Fate Stadium.
Leo opened his system menu and checked it. The screens showed up and worked as usual.
As the systems functioned once again, Leo stopped worrying about it. He closed the screens and examined his surroundings.
The clouds in the void were as bright as usual. However, no beings remained here but Leo.
Leo took this opportunity to inspect the seat of Brack and his furniture behind the court stand. Upon reaching his chair, he found a cardboard box of jade slips.
Jade slips usually contained messages and thoughts of cultivators who left behind their thoughts. However, this was the first time that Leo encountered one.
Curious, Leo picked one up to inspect it. He flipped it around confusedly like a monkey at first. Fortunately, he was smart enough to inject his Qi to inspect it.
The jade slip glowed and ejected the hidden voice of the previous owner. Ironically, the ex-owner was Brack.
[Lord Sieg, I've collected two heavenly fate crystals from Player Xia Wu. His soul has been erased as instructed, sir.]
Leo smirked. This was enough proof that Sieg was the mastermind behind the collection of fate crystals. He remembered the name, marking Sieg as his next hit list.
'A transcended being… This might be troublesome. In the past, I've been fighting karmic sovereigns and entities. My true strength should be around the transcendent stage as well. If I meet that guy, I might be at a disadvantage. I never fought a transcendent before…'
For the first time, Leo was intimidated. He wished he had a higher cultivation base than Seig.
But then, Leo remembered that his system allowed him to upgrade his cultivation limit or cultivation aptitude. He only needed one karmic fate crystal to do so.
Figuring a method to gain an advantage, Leo was determined. His next major project would be treasure hunting.
Not wasting time, Leo opened the PVP menu. The screen showed up. Unlike before, the functions were restored, and Leo could join the arena again.
Leo smirked and mocked Sieg.
"Your systems aren't that omnipotent, it seems. If you were a proper programmer, this system would have restricted my access. Now that the system allows me to rejoin the stadium, you've lost your initiative!"
Leo collected all the golden chains into his storage ring. He boldly pressed a button, challenging the monthly PVP match.
.
.
WHOOSH
Leo immediately reappeared in the arena as usual. He stood alone in the stadium this time.
"Huh?"
"What?"
When Leo appeared, the crowd looked confused. They muttered and whispered.
"I saw the news. Isn't Florida Man a wanted man?"
"You saw that, too? The news is spreading fast. I thought the player hunter squadron had been deployed already. How is he still here?"
"Maybe, he wants to submit himself to the authority?"
"Probably. I think we might see a Death Chess Match here today."
Leo silently eavesdropped their conversation. He also recalled the distasteful chess game that he once saw in one of the Fate Stadium's facilities.
WHOOSH
While Leo was waiting, a hundred entities teleported to the arena. They were also angels with square physiques.

chapters.title: Chapter 299 Florida Man Pranks Call Center Scammer by Redirecting Him to Police Station
chapters.content:
Chapter 299 Florida Man Pranks Call Center Scammer by Redirecting Him to Police Station
?299 Florida Man Pranks Call Center Scammer by Redirecting Him to Police Station
Chapter 299 – Florida Man Pranks Call Center Scammer by Redirecting Him to Police Station
"Florida Man! There's a warrant for you. Follow us obediently or lose the qualifications as a player forever!" The speaking angel's killing intent and cold eyes fixated on Leo.
Leo crossed his arms and scoffed at the angels, "I already did, and that judge by the name 'Brack the Jade' released me! What's the point of arresting me again, may I ask?"
"Huh?"
The angels in the arena knew the name of the judge. They looked at each other in confusion while one of them transmitted his voice to his superior officers.
After a few seconds of hesitation and confusion, the angels received a new order from the stadium's managers. Their expressions turned dark, and their killing intent exploded.
"Florida Man, you scoundrel heretic! Lay down your weapon and surrender, then we'll give you a peaceful death!"
Another angel also shouted, "HERETIC! CUT OFF YOUR ARMS AND SURRENDER!"
More angels bellowed in unison, "SEAL HIS SYSTEMS! REMOVE HIS SYSTEM POWERS!"
Leo narrowed his eyes as he was concerned about their system manipulation abilities. Since it was impossible to reason with them, Leo took the initiative by releasing the 104 golden chains.
The deity lizardmen's souls in the chains were ejected from Leo's storage rings and charged toward every angel in the arena. Half of them bound the agents and started draining their life force.
Leo also attempted to move, but his feet were glued to the stage arena. He looked at the ground and smacked his lips.
"Annoying restrictions."
Unable to move, Leo changed his approach. Again, he opened his system inventory and ejected a thousand small rocks. He flickered small asteroids at the remaining survivors.
The remaining angels managed to parry the attacks from Leo's chains. But the next second, finger-sized rocks beamed toward them at light speed, blasting their heads into shattering watermelons. Even the bound agents took the same hit.
The souls of the angels escaped the destroyed fleshly bodies. The souls of these entities continued screaming and ordering others.
"Why hasn't his system sealed yet?! Has anybody informed the Lord?!"
"MANAGERS! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?!"
"CUT HIS SYSTEM ABILITIES ALREADY!"
Their loud noise caused a commotion in the other arenas. The spectators also stood up and rushed toward the exits as if they were students getting stuck at school during a school shooting massacre.
The chains ignored everything and grabbed their souls. The lizardmen gleefully devoured the angels and stole their life force.
Leo smiled at the golden chains as he was proud of his creations. Still, killing these annoying pests couldn't solve the trouble at the moment.
His feet were still stuck in the arena.
Annoyed by the fate stadium's power, Leo got serious. He used the previous power that he had shown in the fight against Simba.
Four rainbow phoenix wings emerged from his back. His skin radiated in white light while blinding silver light came out from his eyes. In addition, his aura revealed his true cultivation base.
Surpassing the karmic sovereign realm was the transcendent realm. At this stage, the minor rank was classified into levels.
DING
DING
DING
The scoreboard of the fate stadium changed as it detected Leo's true strength. Instead of hiding his information as usual, the scoreboards revealed all of Leo's personal information.
.
Name: Leonardo Ariel
Title/Alias: Florida Man
Race: Chimera Homunculus
Age: 50,035
Gender: Male
Level / Cultivation Base: Transcendent Level 10
.
Leo gazed at his status board and scoffed. He vaguely knew about it as he had learned about the cultivation potential ceiling from the system before.
This reminded him of how powerful the systems were. He got frustrated.
'If the systems can discern my cultivation base and upgrade my cultivation potential, won't Sieg be stronger than I am? This is troublesome.'
Because of frustration, Leo exerted more strength on his legs. He managed to lift his right leg up and stomp the ground.
BOOM
The entire arena cracked and was broken in half. The supporting structures underneath crumbled.
The spreading cracks reached the spectator stands and observer decks. The barrier arrays that had been preventing stray bullets shattered, and the ground sunk.
After stomping hard, Leo's feet were free. He levitated and observed his deeds.
RUMBLE
The whole arena area turned into ruins. The ceilings shook. Dust scattered everywhere, and the space vacuum underneath the stages sucked some of the debris into the void.
The whole Fate Stadium was on the verge of being destroyed!
"Erm, whoops?"
Leo awkwardly smiled. Destroying the entire Fate Stadium wasn't his intention. He only wanted to free himself from the predicament.
"I guess I have to stop throwing myself into trouble. I'm not that invincible. I have to remind myself that… Right. Be humble, Leo. Be humble." He reminded himself and slapped his cheeks. Then, he inspected the system menus.
All system screens turned red. A huge "ERROR" warning overlapped with the usual menus.
Leo had expected this. The last time when the electricity went down, his system was affected. He believed that his system functions relied on the Fate Stadium's mysterious power.
He didn't like that.
'What should I do to be the true owner of a system!?' Leo thought and accidentally sent his voice transmission to all his four heavenly generals.
His question was quickly answered. The voice of Aslan echoed in Leo's mind.
'Find seven entity fate crystals and turn them into a true entity fate crystal. That way, your systems won't be affected by the Fate Stadium. If better, you just need to find a karmic fate crystal. Once you do, no one can influence your system powers.'
Leo was overjoyed by the enlightenment. However, at the same time, he doubted how Aslan knew of this.
In solemn, Leo asked Aslan in his mind.
'I'm going to be serious this time. I want a serious answer only. Kitten, I heard from Meowmeow that you had a soul. Who are you exactly?'
.
.
Meanwhile, Aslan had been sitting at a coffee table on a white cloud in space. His expression was pale even though he was a stone golem.
In front of him was a colossus being, whose body was as large as the Milky Way Galaxy. The being was an eyeball with eight angelic wings. However, its aura exuded the air of a level 10 transcendent being.
The eyeball glared at Aslan. He uttered in a deep voice, which sounded like a big man and a hoarse woman spoke in unison.
"You know what your son has done, right?"
Aslan slowly nodded, "Yes."
"He has troubled me greatly. Normally, I would have descended and killed him."
Aslan deeply inhaled. He mustered his courage and rebuked, "Your subordinates are the ones provoking my son. Had they never framed him for a petty crime, the entire thing wouldn't have happened. Also, it was your subordinate who coveted my son's fate crystals. His actions are justified."
The eyeball flickered while his wings flinched. He didn't utter a word as if he was pondering what to reply.
Aslan pushed on, "Senior Sieg. I know that you have been collecting entity fate crystals and you're on a quest to find the true karmic fate crystal as well. This time, we accidentally collide because of your greedy underlings. We are willing to let this bygone be bygone as long as you can pull back your player hunter squads out of our territory. What do you say?"
The eyeball 'Sieg' grimaced. He hated the idea, "Are you taking me for a fool? Why should I reconcile with you when I can even destroy your soul right now?!"
Aslan sneered, "My soul is connected to my son's karma river. If I die, he will know. Do you want to enrage a transcendent being who carries the bloodline of rainbow phoenixes? I'm sure Overlord Priscilla won't be sitting still if she heard about your deed that you're provoking one of her kin."
RUMBLE
Sieg was enraged. His eight wings transformed into small tentacles and bound Aslan. Some of the tentacles cut his arms and legs, leaving Aslan limbless.
"LISTEN HERE, YOU ELF BRAT! DO YOU THINK A PUNY ENTITY LIKE YOU CAN THREATEN ME? A TRANSCENDENT BEING?! YOU OVERESTIMATE YOUR CAPABILITIES, AND YOU WILL PAY FOR YOUR SINS!"
Aslan gritted his teeth and bellowed.
"Yes, if you consider this talk as a negotiation, I'm not even qualified to have this talk to begin with. But as you can see, I'm the only one in the universe WHO CAN CREATE TRANSCENDENT HOSTS! MY SON IS THE PROOF OF MY CAPABILITIES!"
"…"
Sieg froze. The eyeball floated closer to Aslan to look at his face. He then glared into his soul, yet he waited for Aslan to make the offer.
Aslan kept pushing on.
"Here is the deal. Pull back your troops and promise not to attack or harm us for 10 years. In return, I'll create a new fleshly body to replace the old one that you lost to Overlord Priscilla."
Sieg closed his eyes and receded. He fell into a deep thought for several minutes.
After thinking things through, Sieg opened his eyes.
"Let me confirm this. A 10-year truce in exchange for my new body?"
"Yes."
"Heheh, what if you rig something that shouldn't have existed as you did to Mao Miaomiao?"
"I'm not that stupid. Mao Miaomiao was a greedy fool, unlike you who always thinks ahead."
The eyeball curved up his under eyelid. He laughed, "Indeed, you're not stupid. You were the one who tricked Eleanor's downfall. Well, I don't trust you. I'm going to add a new clause to our agreement."
"A new condition?" Aslan had a bad feeling about this.
"Well, yes. I need to make sure that you will work diligently to complete my new fleshly body. Therefore, I'll trap your soul in my dantian universe and link your existence to my karma river. Until you complete it, you can't go anywhere!"
Aslan's expression turned dark again. He clicked his tongue, "No can do. I need the best environment to work. If I leave my son, my existence will fade to nothingness."
Sieg laughed, "As I said, I'm no fool. I read you like a book. Your soul isn't really tied to your son whatsoever. Instead, you left your true soul with the entity fate crystal in your son's soul. I just need to take that soul out of your son first."
"YOU!!"
Aslan bellowed, but Sieg's tentacles pressed him down to the cloud floor.
Sieg laughed, "Well, let me go find your son. Once we have your soul, we can make a deal. HAHAHAHA!"
"BASTARD! ARE YOU TRYING TO KILL MY SON?!"
"HAHAHA! For the third time, Aslan. I'm no fool! Why should I let your son get stronger when I can kill him now?! There's no point in allowing another rival to emerge! Also, Priscilla and I have been sworn enemies since we were children. What's the difference between adding another grudge on top of what we already have? And once I'm done with your son, I get you who can work your ass off for me for the rest of eternity! HAHAHAHAHA!"
"…"
Aslan groaned and lowered his head, allowing the eyeball to feel good about himself.
The giant eyeball transformed into a small soul and faded. He teleported and rushed toward Leo.
After Sieg had left, Aslan was freed from the tentacles. He regenerated his limbs and smirked. Afterward, he whispered.
"Did you catch everything?"
A second later, a female voice from a distance echoed in his mind.
'Loud and clear. So, he's heading to that stupid Fate Stadium, right?'
"Yes, my son should be there at the moment."
'Roger. I'll go intercept him.'
"Please remember our promises, Lady Priscilla."
'Don't worry. I'm not like that greedy eyeball. I'll protect you and that boy. He has my bloodline, right?'
"Haha. Yes."
'Although I've never had a child, he's born from my blood. In a way, he's my child as well. Should I say that I'm his mother?'
"That will complicate things… I'm his father, you know. He will think that you and I are married or something."
'Pfft, hahahaha! Yeah, right. Anyway, we talk too much. I'll go now.'
The secret weapon that Aslan had prepared 'Overlord Priscilla' started to move. As for Aslan, he let out a long sigh of relief.
"All according to Keikaku."
A few seconds later, Leo's voice entered Aslan's mind. His son yelled at him.
"What should I do to be the true owner of a system!?"
Aslan was speechless for a moment. He then giggled. "Oh, boy. What a needy child. I guess I should give him hints again."

chapters.title: Chapter 300 Outlaw Accidentally Turns Hero: Wanted Florida Man Turns Marathon Cop Chase into Terrorist Takedown
chapters.content:
Chapter 300 Outlaw Accidentally Turns Hero: Wanted Florida Man Turns Marathon Cop Chase into Terrorist Takedown
?300 Outlaw Accidentally Turns Hero: Wanted Florida Man Turns Marathon Cop Chase into Terrorist Takedown
Chapter 300 – Outlaw Accidentally Turns Hero: Wanted Florida Man Turns Marathon Cop Chase into Terrorist Takedown
"Who are you exactly?!" Leo asked Aslan for the nth time. He wanted an honest answer for once.
Aslan didn't answer Leo for a long time. It annoyed Leo as he could sense that the golem was still alive.
RUMBLE
While waiting for the answer, the Fate Stadium crumbled. Spotlights shut down, and darkness devoured the entire colony. Leo's eyes still shone in white light, illuminating the destroyed arena.
Floating alone in the darkness, Leo gave up waiting for Aslan's reply. He fluttered his four rainbow wings, preparing to blast his way out of this colony.
"I feel bad. Those little cat aliens and that weapon shop owner are gonna be pissed. Should I find them and get them to migrate to my planet instead?"
Leo looked below and noticed the gaps in cracked floors. He gathered more strength and stomped on the arena again.
The impact caused the ground and components underneath the stages to cave in as if a comet descended upon the colony.
BOOM
Because of the great force, the impact pushed the components apart like a drill digging through soft ground, puncturing through all metallic objects.
Finally, Leo could see the stars through the hole. He smiled and flew out of the colony.
After leaving the crumbling colony, Leo looked back and pursed his lips. He thought of the innocent people inside, especially the cute octopus-cats.
'Maybe, I should visit those cats one day. For now, I should find my way home.'
Leo reopened his system menu. Looking at the screen with a large X mark, he shook his head. The systems no longer worked. At best, Leo could open the screen to check its function.
He turned around and scanned the stars around him.
Suddenly, Leo sensed a chill running down his spine. He pulled the staff of singularity out of his chest and pointed at the empty void behind him. Without hesitation, he fired a beam cannon from his staff.
The rainbow beams radiated like the Sun. Even Leo narrowed his eyes.
BANG
The beam hit something at a distance. A second later, Leo widened his eyes and flapped his wings in urgent.
BOOM
A rainbow beam originating from the distance broke Leo's beam and passed through the area where Leo had been. It grazed the stadium and evaporated everything in its path.
Leo took a deep breath. He thought of the mysterious dark elf that he fought several days ago.
'This is gonna be a hard fight. I wish he was as strong as the previous guy. I guess it can't be helped. I have been running amok in this universe for so long. It's about time I run into a REAL powerhouse being.'
Preparing to fight with his life on the line, Leo removed his usual clothes and put on a set of armor and helmet, which he had obtained from Mao Miaomiao's clones. It was not the best, but a karmic sovereign's equipment was better than Leo's shabby skin suit.
The assailant from a distance transformed into a steak of light, blinking and flashing a thousand times within a split second. Instantly, it appeared behind Leo.
Leo sensed the mysterious light behind him. He also teleported and reappeared one light-year away from the previous location.
The mysterious light chased after Leo. It directly flew like a bullet and instantly hit Leo in the chest.
"Ugh!"
For the first time, Leo felt pain in the real world. The impact also broke Mao Miaomiao's plate mail and two of his ribcages. But after taking the hit, Leo finally identified the ambusher.
The assailant was a small eyeball with eight small wings. At a glance, it resembled the prosthetic eyeballs that Leo had once synthesized in the past. However, this one didn't actually have a physical appearance.
It was a mass of intense energy similar to Leo's dantian universe.
After hitting Leo in the chest, it backed away and transformed into a giant eyeball mass. Then, it projected an illusion of a galaxy behind it.
The eyeball's under eyelid curved up as if it mocked Leo.
"Nice to meet you, Florida Man. Now, DIE AND GIVE YOUR FATE CRYSTALS TO ME!!"
The galaxy illusion behind the eyeball manifested into the real universe. Over a trillion karmic sovereigns and entities flew out of the stars and chased after Leo.
Leo was stunned.
"DAMMIT! YOU CAN EVEN DO THAT?!"
Leo gnashed his teeth. As he didn't have enough confidence to fight so many karmic sovereigns and entities at once, he turned around and flew away.
His speed surpassed the pursuers. The karmic sovereigns and entities could, at best, fly at the speed of light. On the other hand, Leo traveled at 10-light-year worth of distance within a second.
WHOOSH
But he couldn't shake off one thing.
Behind Leo, the transparent eyeball kept up with his speed. The monstrous angel also laughed.
"HAHAHA! KEEP RUNNING, YOU COWARD! ARE YOU REALLY A TRANSCENDENT EXPERT?! YOU ARE JUST A CHICK!"
Leo frowned. He wished he could turn around and fight the mysterious monster, but he was wary of the guy's power and tricky abilities.
While fleeing, Leo guessed the monster's identity.
"You're Sieg, the master of the Fate Stadium, I assume."
Sieg cackled, "You are well informed. Though, I'm quite disappointed. I thought the son of the divine elf's top genius inherited half of his abilities. It seems that his son is a wastrel."
"…"
Leo ignored the taunt even though he was interested in the topic. He kept teleporting while he pondered a way to combat this monster.
10 seconds later, Leo ejected ten drops of his blood from his fingernails. After teleporting, he left behind one drop. Then, he vanished to another place.
Sieg reappeared at the place where the blood lingered. As Sieg was about to blink, the blood detonated.
Although the explosion was strong enough to erase Eleanor's body and soul, Sieg smirked.
"Petty trick!"
BOOM
The explosion engulfed the eyeball monster. However, the being jetted through the blast and continued chasing after Leo as if nothing had happened.
After another teleportation, Sieg found tree droplets of Leo's blood. The eyeball squinted.
BOOM
BOOM
BOOM
Facing three consecutive explosions, Sieg's teleportation rhythm was delayed by two seconds.
The eyeball came out from the blasts unharmed. It looked up and found Leo's life signature at the edge of his detection range.
"YOU CAN'T GET AWAY FROM ME!"
Sieg got serious. He accelerated and blinked. Instantly, he directly appeared in front of Leo.
Leo flinched when Sieg suddenly showed up in front of him. Still, everything went according to his plan.
Six droplets of blood shot out from Leo's palm and hit Sieg. They glowed in rainbow light.
"STOP WASTING MY TIME!" Sieg bellowed while his pupils dilated.
Leo snorted and vanished. A split second later, a rainbow beam came out from Sieg's pupil and vanished into the void.
The beam missed the target. Sieg turned around to search for Leo's life signature.
"Huh?"
The life signature was right behind Sieg.
"DAMMIT!"
Sieg transformed his eight wings into rainbow shields. One of them shapeshifted into a giant tree, which grew into a world tree.
Floating behind Sieg was Leo. He cut his left wrist with his nail and ejected a lot of transparent blood. He also pulled out a piece of his bone and turned it into a scythe.
The leaking blood transformed into white full plate armor, covering Leo from head to toe. Leo also swung his scythe down.
SWUA
Leo's scythe cut through the growing world tree and four layers of Sieg's shields. Unfortunately, the strike was too shallow. One layer of shield remained.
The destroyed world tree scattered a million golden apples everywhere. As if Sieg copied Leo's trick, they illuminated in rainbow light and bloated.
"Tsk!"
Leo vanished, teleporting away from the bloating apples.
BOOM
BOOM
BOOM
The apples exploded, generating supernova blasts.
Leo reappeared 10 light years of distance away from Sieg. He rubbed his wrist, which was already healed. His bone regenerated, and he still held his bone scythe and staff of singularity.
WHOOM
WHOOM
WHOOM
Suddenly, a billion portals were opened, surrounding Leo in every direction. The trillion karmic sovereigns and entities earlier emerged from the portals and charged at him.
"ARGH! ANNOYING!"
Leo grumbled and activated his domain, covering everybody. Then, he swung his scythe.
SWUA
In one swing, the trillion karmic sovereigns and entities were cleaved in half. The souls of the entities perished, but the karmic sovereigns ejected their souls and regenerated their fleshly bodies.
The distraction gave enough time for Sieg to catch up with Leo. The eyeball monster reappeared above Leo, and he came prepared.
CLANK
As soon as the eyeball locked his sight on Leo, the latter's domain shattered. Leo coughed blood!
"IT'S OVER! DIE!!"
Sieg transformed into a giant saber and hacked toward Leo's head.
Leo bellowed and swung his scythe. The weapon parried the giant saber, but the bone scythe was destroyed as a consequence.
He didn't give up. After pushing the saber away, Leo pointed his staff at the saber and fired another rainbow beam.
BOOM
It was a direct hit. The saber's blade was broken in half!
The transformation of Sieg was undone. His manifested soul physique reverted into a giant eyeball.
A change was noticeable. There was a huge scar in his pupils.
"YOU BASTARD! HOW DARE YOU CUT MY SOUL!?"
Leo panted, but he smirked. He mustered his strength and teleported away once more. Moreover, he also triggered more massive explosions, created from the vomited blood earlier.
BOOM
BOOM
This time, a thousand supernova blasts hit Sieg unprepared.
.
.
An hour later, the center of the explosion subsided. All karmic sovereigns under Sieg perished.
The eyeball lost 70% of its mass. It was in a trance, panting and staggering.
Despite the grave injuries, Sieg fumed in rage.
"FLORIDA MAN! ASLAN! I SWEAR, YOU AND YOUR ENTIRE FAMILY WILL PAY FOR THIS!"
10 seconds after the outburst, Sieg slowly restored his mass. However, his energy and aura weakened. His majestic presence of a transcendent entity was no more.
While recuperating, Sieg let out a long sigh. He gave up chasing after Leo or Aslan for now. He also let down his guard.
He temporarily forgot about his rival for a moment.
As if karma had eyes, a transcendent entity suddenly appeared behind Sieg. When he turned around, it was already too late.
Behind Sieg was a galaxy-sized rainbow phoenix.
"Wah!" Overlord Priscilla greeted her sworn enemy.
Sieg couldn't even utter a word. Her rainbow flame devoured his soul and evaporated his existence.

chapters.title: Chapter 301 Barely Clothed Floridian Lady Officially Upgrades Lost Child Encounter to Son-Adoption Level
chapters.content:
Chapter 301 Barely Clothed Floridian Lady Officially Upgrades Lost Child Encounter to Son-Adoption Level
﻿﻿301 Barely Clothed Floridian Lady Officially Upgrades Lost Child Encounter to Son-Adoption Level
Chapter 301 – Barely Clothed Floridian Lady Officially Upgrades Lost Child Encounter to Son-Adoption Level.
Priscilla watched Sieg's half-destroyed soul burning in a rainbow flame until the last speck of dust disappeared from the void. After confirming Sieg's true death, she loudly screeched.
RUMBLE
The screech created a sound shockwave, which revealed hidden karma strings and traces of the dead transcendent being. The space rippled, causing several elusive fate crystals to be visible.
The phoenix smiled and pulled a thousand crystals to herself. She hummed and sorted them in a good mood.
"Hehehe. Four freaking true entity fate crystals, 44 true heavenly fate crystals, and a thousand expendable junks. You have been working very hard, Sieg. Thanks for the hard work. I'll be taking them."
Sieg had been collecting and plundering fate crystals from many fate bearers by attracting them to the Fate Stadium. He also exploited his true entity fate crystals' power by infecting other players with his superior systems, binding their system functions to the Fate Stadium.
With him gone and the Fate Stadium destroyed, the virus would cease being active, allowing the other system users to be freed from the restrictions. However, the true fate crystals in Priscilla's hands could easily reseal everything.
Fortunately, that was not Priscilla's intention. She had other aims and goals.
"Finally, that stupid Fate Stadium can no longer trick innocent fate bearers into that death trap. With this, only two transcendent beings exist in universe 13. With me in charge, the next singularity ascension gathering won't be chaotic anymore… unless Ellen or Kishin Douji accidentally reach the transcendent stage."
Priscilla clicked her tongue as she had some concerns. From her point of view, there were still two variables that could complicate things in the long run – Ellen and the patriarch of the Kishin Clan 'Kishin Douji'.
"If it wasn't for the oath, I would have unalived those two. Well, I can leave them to my NEW son, can't I? It's his business now, not mine. Hahahaha!"
After the laughter, Priscilla collected all fate crystals in the dimensional pockets in her wings, but she left one true entity fate crystal out. Her beak caught it and held it there.
That crystal was not for her. It was for someone else.
"Come to think of it, that bratty elf bragged that the boy just got married recently. Well, I should at least give my illegitimate son something."
WHOOSH
Priscilla vanished.
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo freely floated in the void. He pressed his left hand on his chest while hyperventilating. Even though no oxygen was present in the void, polluted Qi and gas were still useful. Leo inhaled some of them and filtered them into useful Qi, restoring his energy.
His stamina almost ran out of the tank in the previous fight. Most of the stars in his dantian universe were barren except for the habitable planets of alligators and lizardmen.
After staying in space for a day, Leo removed Mao Miaomiao's broken armor and checked his wounds. Most of his injuries were healed except for some internal damages. The domain-
breaking backlash did a number on Leo.
Leo gazed at the dark void in a daze. He no longer sensed the life signature of Sieg and other pursuers, but he couldn't get rid of a dreadful feeling.
The fight took a toll on his psyche. He felt like he had just woken up from a hellish nightmare.
"How did I survive?"
Confused and flustered, Leo sought help from others. He opened the system menu to see if Sieg had already erased his power.
DING
The X-mark layer on top of the system screens was gone. His lifespan shop, the quest menu, the inventory menu, and the shopping mall system resumed functioning.
On the other hand, the PVP tabs were removed. All gacha banners were erased from the screens and menus.
Leo scratched his head as he realized the gravity of his current situation. He hated this development. Without the PVP tabs, Leo had no other method to find the way home!
"Crap. Where am I? How do I get home?"
Leo looked around, but he couldn't recognize any star around his vicinity. Moreover, the closest galaxy was at least 10,000 light years away, and it was an unknown star cluster.
As being panicked wouldn't help, Leo let out a long sigh and paced his breaths. His wings produced rainbow flame, illuminating a beacon in the darkness.
After setting up an SOS beacon, Leo closed his eyes and searched for his familiars.
Then, he found hope.
It was vague, but Aslan's presence was close by. He was just 800 light-years from Leo's current location. Moreover, he could sense the faint energy of a dragon dreadnaught that he had seen in the asteroid belt.
"Ah, there you are."
A smile finally appeared on Leo's face. He began his journey toward his subordinate.
…
Flying through space was easy as no gravity influenced Leo's movements and speed. Even the heaviest stars in the area were too far away to affect Leo's flight course and speed.
After flying for a day, Leo arrived at the place where he last sensed Aslan. He landed on a continent of white clouds in space.
Upon arrival, Leo knelt and scooped the clouds. Instead of catching air, he got solid sparkling silver sand on his palm.
Interested in the sands, Leo opened his inventory system. The screen sucked everything into the designated inventory slot. He totally forgot about Aslan and the emergency.
Time passed. Leo forgot about time as the cloud continent was too massive. Meanwhile, his item slot had a long string of numbers as the mysterious silver sands stacked into one item slot.
Leo hummed, "How many pills or artifacts I can make with these sands? What are these sands, actually? But anyway, I'm rich! Hehehehe."
"You're greedy, I see."
"Well, yes. I'm a capitalist. I loot. I steal. I collect resources. Then, I turn them into something valuable to sell them. Then, I make a lot of money!"
"What are you collecting the money for?"
"Of course, increasing my lifespan!"
"For what? Living longer?"
"Well, that isn't wrong… but why am I talking to you? Who the hell are you exactly…?"
Leo pursed his lips as he couldn't sense the presence of the speaker behind him. He stood up and turned around calmly.
Behind Leo was a unique gorgeous lady with rainbow long hair and four flame wings. Her humongous height of 5 meters and pale white jade skin forced Leo to look up in awe. But when he looked up, his face distorted.
The woman was stark naked. He could see everything.
Leo frowned, "Miss. I understand that you and I have a different culture, but I would like to sincerely ask you something rude. Is it your tradition that your race travel in space naked?"
The mysterious giant woman laughed, "Only small beings and overly critical races wear clothes. I'm a phoenix. I don't wear clothes. Actually, I transform into this form to hide my presence and Qi. Do you have a problem?"
Leo found it strange, but he nodded in understanding. In space, every alien was entitled to their culture and opinions. He couldn't enforce his standards on the others, especially strangers.
"No, miss. I have no issue with that. I'm just surprised."
"I'm glad you are quick to understand. You're smarter than you look."
"More like, everybody calls me I'm stupider than I appear to be."
"It's good to be humble, but you shouldn't call yourself stupid. You're berating your ancestors and families."
"…That's a unique take, but thank you for your advice."
Leo smiled and took a few steps back. He then cupped his fist and stopped talking randomly.
"My name is Florida Man, an Earthling. Well, truth be told, I'm lost. I'm looking for the planet by the name "Yan Empire", "Orlando", or something similar. Do you know any?"
The woman wryly smiled. She slightly shook her head.
"I take it back. You're stupid."
"…Thanks for the reminder, miss."
As Leo took the conversation seriously, the woman also introduced herself.
"I'm Priscilla, the Overlord of the Jewel Phoenix. Nice to meet you… son."
"…Son?" Leo widened his eyes. He pointed his finger at his face then pointed at Priscilla.
"Yeah. I'm your mother."
"…Mother? Huh?"
Leo's complexion turned dark. He didn't know if he should take her words seriously.
Seeing Leo's reaction, Priscilla giggled. She opened her mouth and spat out a clear white crystal as big as an adult man. It landed next to Leo.
Leo glanced at the dripping wet giant crystal. He broke a sweat and covered his nose.
It was nauseously rotten. Combined with Leo's sensitive nose, the smell intensified by a hundred folds.
Leo's facial color changed from black to white, from white to green, and from green to purple. He covered his nose and mouth.
Priscilla laughed, "Long story short, I heard you're getting married, so I've brought you a dowry gift. Also, this is the first time we have met. As a senior, I should give you something worthwhile. That crystal is my gift to you. Take care of it… son."
Leo looked up while he covered his nose. As he couldn't physically speak, he sent a sound transmission instead.
"Thank you for the gift, miss. But could you explain why you are my mother? Did my stupid father have another secret family or something?"
"HAHAHAHAHA!! I bet he wishes he did! Sorry to break this to you, but I've been single for a million years! Rather, I don't need a partner since I can lay eggs on my own!"
Leo's face was still purple, but his eyebrows were raised.
Seeing Leo's funny expression, Priscilla scolded him, "I know what you're thinking. My eggs don't need fertilization or seeds from male phoenixes. Also, I don't copulate with myself."
Leo flinched as Priscilla read his thoughts. He feinted ignorance, "What are you even talking about?"
"Was the first thought you had was like 'Is she a FUTA?' or 'Did she inseminate herself with her secret dick?' or something?"
Leo resumed pokerface. His expression and face color hardened. "So, are you a FUTA?"
"Of course not! What the hell is FUTA anyway?!"
"Too bad. You would have been popular in my world if you were."
"…" Priscilla covered her face with her palm. She regretted everything. "You're a cringe, son."
"Embrace the cringe, mother. Once you do, your life will be 100 times happier. Why so serious? Just throw away all logic and let your intrusive thoughts dominate you."
Priscilla gave up on Leo. She turned and fluttered her wings, preparing to leave.
"Well, good luck out there, son."
"WAIT!"
Leo realized his mistake. He teleported and reappeared in front of Priscilla, floating in front of her face.
"What?" Priscilla opened her mouth and yawned. She also released a mouthful of bad breath all over Leo's body.
Leo calmly swallowed his vomit. He sent another voice transmission to her.
"Since you're proclaiming that you're my mother, can you take me home? I'm lost."
"…"
"Please?"
"…"
Priscilla rolled her eyes. Then, she pointed at the void behind her.
Following Priscilla's direction, Leo looked at the direction. Then, he found the dreadnaught dragon ship 100 light years away.
WHOOSH
Priscilla vanished, leaving the giant crystal behind.

chapters.title: Chapter 302 Touching Reunion? Florida Man Found His Missing Father, Got Scolded for Not Inheriting His DNA
chapters.content:
Chapter 302 Touching Reunion? Florida Man Found His Missing Father, Got Scolded for Not Inheriting His DNA
﻿﻿302 Touching Reunion? Florida Man Found His Missing Father, Got Scolded for Not Inheriting His DNA
Chapter 302 – Touching Reunion? Florida Man Found His Missing Father, Got Scolded for Not Inheriting His DNA.
After Priscilla had gone, Leo dryly laughed and scratched his head. From the very beginning, he could tell that Priscilla was a lot stronger than Sieg as he couldn't even scan or measure her cultivation base.
He was relieved and confused. Judging from the conversation, the giant woman harbored no ill intent against Leo. On the contrary, she seemed to be his ally.
"When did I meet that woman? I ain't a protagonist in a novel. I never saved a son or a daughter of a super expert. Also, I don't remember having more than one mother… Or did my freaking father cheat mother?! That bastard!"
He stood there for an hour, cursing and yelling at his father.
…
Meanwhile, Aslan had been waiting for Leo in the dreadnaught mothership.
Earlier, he navigated the ship away from the floating cloud continent to give space for Leo and Priscilla to meet and talk. After Priscilla was gone, Aslan stayed with the ship, thinking of various excuses.
"ACHOOO!"
Even though Aslan was a golem, he could sneeze. After blowing his nose, the fisherman golem broke a sweat.
"What is he doing over there alone? Does his schizo act up again?"
Sometimes, Aslan was concerned about Leo's mental stability as the latter showed symptoms of a mental patient with ADHD, Schizophrenia, or autism. However, in many instances, Leo exhibited traits of OCD whenever he was alone.
Taking care of a weird son could be handy. Aslan deeply sighed and prayed that Leo could be normal one day.
…
After swearing and cussing his father enough, Leo resumed collecting silver sand from the cloud continent. He also grabbed the wet sticky fate crystal ball to examine it.
As soon as Leo touched the crystal ball, it transformed into a streak of light and entered Leo's body. It traveled into his dantian universe and merged with his soul.
As soon as the true entity fate crystal merged with his soul, it reformed the order and reshaped his soul physique.
"Eh?"
Leo could also feel the changes in his body and soul. He remembered the feeling as he once sensed it in the past.
It felt the same when Leo first obtained the alien ring.
DING
<Congratulations. Your soul has absorbed a True Entity Fate Crystal.>
<All system functions are now available.>
<Your system functions can no longer be influenced by external forces and other fate crystals.>
<You are now qualified to participate in the Karmic Ascension forces and other fate crystals.>
<You are now qualified to participate in the Karmic Ascension Event!>
<Due to the changes of ownership, the PVP systems and quest systems will be adjusted.>
<Error! Fate Stadium Not Found!>
<Removing PVP system…>
<Rebalancing quest system…>
"Err…"
Leo stared at the series of system messages in shock. He stroked his chin and whistled.
"Wow. Jackpot! Thanks, Mom! I love you now! Also, thanks, dad! The second mom rocks! You should have introduced me to your second wife earlier!"
Leo cackled and rubbed his hands. He immediately navigated his system menus to find a button to return home.
Unfortunately, the PVP system menu was removed. The 'Return Home' button no longer existed.
"FUUUUUUUUUUUU!!"
Realizing the changes, Leo collapsed to the ground, completing the OTL meme pose. He shed a tear of regret and desperation.
He wasn't worried about returning home. It was something else.
"How am I gonna complete my quests from now on? I need to fight one more PVP match to end the PHASE quests! What am I gonna do?!"
While Leo was screaming, the system finished updating Leo's systems.
DING
<Patching completed. New Phase Quests have been updated!>
<Please read the patch note for more information.>
Leo stopped making noise. He silently stood up and stared at the system screen with a hardened expression. While mimicking one of the Fist of the North Star characters' faces, Leo reopened his system menu to check the patch note.
A few minutes later, Leo's expression brightened. He chortled like Agent Smith in Matrix.
.
.
Six hours later, Rain Dragon Dreadnaught Mothership
Aslan was bored waiting for Leo. He warmed up his throat and prepared to send a sound transmission to his son.
As Aslan was about to speak, Leo directly teleported into the dreadnaught ship. He appeared in front of Aslan.
Upon seeing Aslan again, Leo widely grinned and spoke in a second voice.
"Oh, hi."
Aslan had a bad feeling about this. He knew that nothing good would come whenever Leo started talking in a high-pitched voice.
"Welcome back, master."
"Yup. It's good to be back." Leo widely grinned. He then patted Aslan's shoulders several times. "IT'S GREAT TO SEE YOU AGAIN! HAHAHAHAHA!!"
"…"
Aslan was not amused. He doubted why Leo was behaving this way.
Exploiting the perk of being Leo's subordinate, he sent a wisp of his consciousness to infiltrate Leo's mind to read his memory.
But as soon as he did, he ran into a problem.
.
In the sea of Leo's consciousness, Aslan found the array that he had planted to protect Leo's soul from being attacked by external entities. Cracks and traces of usage riddled the dome barrier.
Aslan frowned. He remembered that the barrier only activated once. However, the current barrier array looked like it had been through wars.
'What the hell happened here? Did he do something to the array? Or was Eleanor stronger than I estimated?'
Confused, Aslan approached the array and touched it.
CRACK
The barrier let out a rainbow lightning bolt and attacked Aslan!
"!!!"
Aslan narrowly dodged the lightning bolt, but the fragment of his consciousness almost died. He looked at the thunderbolt and turned his gaze at the barrier array in disbelief.
It had been tampered with by someone!
"Not good. Leo's mind and soul have been infiltrated. But who could have… Shit. It's my fault, huh.'
Aslan smacked his forehead while he gazed into the transparent dome. As he looked further, he found a rainbow fireball in the middle of the array.
That fireball was the signature flame of rainbow phoenixes. It was also Leo's origin of power, which Aslan had secretly implanted in Leo's physical body 50,000 years ago.
'No one tampered with this barrier. Priscilla didn't do it. That flame belongs to Leo. But how did he move it? I don't remember teaching him about the flame.'
Baffled, Aslan flew around the dome to see if he could learn something from the phoenix flame in Leo's sea of consciousness. It didn't take long for Aslan to notice the source of these changes.
At the bottom of the fireball, there was a thread of karma string. It connected Leo's soul with the core of the phoenix fireball and the barrier array. Moreover, the soul of Leo in the sea of consciousness formed a clear crystal shape similar to entity fate crystals.
Seeing the crystalized soul, Aslan understood everything. He shook his head and laughed.
"I didn't expect Priscilla to actually hand over a true entity fate crystal easily. I thought she would have taken everything back. I guess I called the right person for the job."
Aslan was no longer worried. The fragment of his soul left Leo's sea of consciousness.
.
Meanwhile, Leo gazed at Aslan's face. He narrowed his eyes and uttered.
"Identity."
Aslan who just returned his soul fragment from Leo's mind heard the word. He was taken aback.
"What did you say?"
Leo ignored Aslan and looked at the semi-transparent screen in front of him.
.
Name: Aslan Ariel
Alias: Kitten
Race: Soul Golem (Divine Elf)
Cultivation Base: Entity
Thoughts: Shocked, Concerned.
System Note: He's your father. Treat him nicely.
.
Leo deeply sighed and nodded in approval. He found the new features useful.
"Alright, my dear subordinate. I would like to hear your confession right now, but I want to go home ASAP. Can you bring me home? I miss my wife and my shopping mall. I have a lot of work to do."
Aslan came back to his senses. He continued pretending to be Leo's loyal henchman, "As you wish, master."
Leo raised his hand and lightly karate-chopped Aslan's head.
"Another order, could you stop calling me 'Master'? I don't want to hear it from your mouth."
Aslan was surprised. He lightly patted his head as the smack was neither painful nor light – It was enough to make him dizzy.
"What should I be calling you, then?"
Leo gargled his saliva and spat on the ground like an elderly Asian man. He then sat at the captain's seat and inclined on his chair.
"Okay, let's be real, dad. How long are you going to continue playing dumb?"
"…"
Aslan's expression turned stiff. He cleared his throat and asked his son.
"What did you just call me?"
"Didn't you hear me… DAD?"
"…"
Despite being a stone golem, tears dripped from Aslan's eyes. He celebrated, "You finally figure it out. I'm so proud of you. Finally, you graduate from being an autistic baby to a dumb boy."
"Oi!"
"We should celebrate! Let's have a party when we return!"
"OI!"
Leo widened his eyes and stared at his father. Aslan's reaction was not what Leo had expected.
"What do you mean 'Autistic Baby'?! Do you think I'm retarded?!"
Aslan snorted and berated Leo, "I told you many times that I'm your goddamn father, but you never believed me. How else should I evaluate you? A smartass jackshit? A dumb little shit? A moron who can't cook for shit?"
"HEY! What the hell?! Is that something a father should say to his filial son?!"
"Filial my ass. You caused so many problems that I had to wipe your ass every time! How do you think you survived that shit, huh? Who do you think I visited and groveled to save your life, huh?"
"…"
"Listen, you dumb duck. Now that you realize who I am, you'd better watch your language from now on! I want you to end your sentences with SIR every time you address me!"
"…I should have pretended not to notice."
"Too late, moron. Now, keep calling me DADDY! No more spoiling for you!"
"..."
Leo regretted exposing Aslan's secret. He wished he remained silent.

chapters.title: Chapter 303 Florida Man and Ohio Man Compare Their Balls’ Sizes in Public Transport. No One Has Been Blinded
chapters.content:
Chapter 303 Florida Man and Ohio Man Compare Their Balls’ Sizes in Public Transport. No One Has Been Blinded
﻿﻿303 Florida Man and Ohio Man Compare Their Balls’ Sizes in Public Transport. No One Has Been Blinded
Chapter 303 – Florida Man and Ohio Man Compare Their Balls' Sizes in Public Transport. No One Has Been Blinded.
Instead of going home, Aslan and Leo sat on the bridge, discussing their past and what Aslan had been doing.
Leo patiently listened to his father. After hours of narration, he finally summarized Aslan's excuses.
"So, Eleanor and Mao Miaomiao planned to kill you to steal my OLD physical body. You outsmarted them by transferring my soul to another experimental chimera homunculus you had created beforehand. Then, you crafted a special ring in my right hand and hid your soul in here to escape death?"
Leo pointed at the traces of his alien ring that had already merged with his skin.
Aslan grinned, "Aren't I a genius? Without my trick, you and I would have died. That bastard Mao Miaomiao and Eleanor didn't intend to let any human live, but we managed to minimize the damage to Earth and save our asses!"
"By putting me through 50,000 years of torture and random lightning strikes? Is that how you raise your son? Do you even know what I had been through to get here?"
"It's called 'Cultivating', not torturing. Also, the lightning is heavenly tribulation lightning. You normally get hit by one when you try to cultivate Qi when the planet's laws don't allow cultivators to exist. Earth's environment is pretty mild for an evolved planet."
When Aslan mentioned Heavenly Tribulation Lightning, Leo recalled that he and his subordinates rarely experienced tribulation lightning. He wondered why.
Although Leo was curious about the lightning tribulations, he was too absorbed in the banter. He continued quarreling with his father.
"Mild my ass! I freaking mutated and vomited blood ten thousand times before I could even cultivate Qi!"
"Bullshit. You devoured radiation like a starving baboon seeing a table of bananas! You pretty much ate Qi as breakfast!"
"Screw you! Nobody taught me that radiation is freaking Qi!"
"You never asked your goddamn ring!"
"Your goddamn ring never replied to my questions!"
"You forgot to enable the assistant option in the shopping menu option, you dumbass! Open your goddamn system and check it if you don't believe me!"
"…Huh?"
Leo was stunned. He opened the online shopping system menu and looked around the screen. As he paid attention to every detail, he noticed a small cog icon at the top right corner of the monitor. He pressed on it.
DING
An option menu appeared. It revealed options and abilities to adjust the screen size, sound, resolutions, subtitles, and popup tips. Upon checking the tips option, Leo found what Aslan had mentioned.
There was an option to enable "Helper".
"…Oh." Leo facepalmed. He couldn't believe that he spent 50,000 years on Earth without noticing this option.
Aslan smirked, "Had you enabled that option, I would have been able to chat with you and provide you cultivation tips and guides. Instead of spending 50,000 freaking years eating shit, you could have ascended to the karmic sovereign realm within a thousand years or so! Well, your effort wasn't in vain, though. Because of your stubbornness in eating random junk and raw food, your soul grows so much that it reaches the pinnacle of the transcendent realm! Most credits still belong to me though. Your body is my finest creation!"
Leo deeply sighed as he found Aslan more annoying than before. His frustration was directed at his father.
"Why didn't you enable it by default then!? My entire life would have been much better!"
"…Oh." Aslan flinched and broke a sweat. When he thought about it, he could have done so by tampering with the entity fate crystal a bit.
"See?! It's your freaking fault!"
"Dammit! Don't shift the blame, you autistic brat!"
The family banter continued…
.
.
Hours later, Leo and Aslan stopped talking about their past. The father decided to let Simba and Ester out of his dantian universe.
Finally, Ohio Man and Florida Man met again face to face.
Leo was surprised when the people that Leo had assumed dead suddenly appeared. He frowned and stared at his father.
"What now?"
Aslan coughed and reintroduced everybody.
"Leo, let me introduce you to your missing brother. This is Simba Ariel, your younger brother. As for the girl, she's Ester Sydin, his wife. Oh, here. Simba. This is your elder brother, Leonardo Ariel…"
"…"
"…"
"…"
Ester, Leo, and Simba awkwardly looked at each other and deeply frowned.
After a few seconds of silence, Simba broke the ice, "We meet again, bro."
Leo tilted his head. He remembered that he had a brother, but he forgot his face.
"Are you sure you're my brother?" Leo pointed at Simba and stared at Aslan.
Aslan coughed, "He's adopted."
"How nice of you. For a moment there, I thought you banged a black woman and stole her child."
"That's rude! Who do you think I am?!"
"A perverted elf who goes around to copulate with various races. You scored a white woman and a freaking giant phoenix. Why not a black woman?"
"…You." Aslan was speechless. He gave up correcting Leo's attitude and misunderstanding as his son was too dumb to understand his explanation.
Leo also gave up talking to his secretive father. He confronted Simba. "So, did you attack me to rescue your wife or something?"
Simba deeply sighed, "You seem stupid, but you're quick to pick up clues. Yes, I attacked you because I thought you imprisoned my wife."
"Fair enough. If you did the same to my wife, I would have blindly raided your planet too."
"So, are we cool?"
"If you say so…"
Leo shrugged and raised his fist. Simba smirked and gave him a fist bump. However, the latter had questions to ask Leo.
"Say, bro."
"Yeah?"
"Where's my son?"
"Your son… oh, that stupid black kid on my bed? I gave him to a cow-tit nanny. Do you want him back?"
"…Please."
Leo deeply sighed as he had another headache to worry about, "Fine. When we go back, I'll send him back to you."
"Thanks…"
"Oh, yeah. You said that your surname is Sydin?" Leo changed the subject and turned to Ester.
Ester nervously nodded, "Yes, senior."
"I…kinda remember your name. Esen said you framed her when you were kids. Did you do it?"
Ester was ashamed. She lowered her head.
Seeing that Leo pushed his wife, Simba stood in front of her and warned his brother, "That was 50,000 years ago, and they were kids at that time. How old do you think she was?"
"I dunno. Tell me."
"Five!"
"…"
"Bro, don't dwell in a kid's fight. Blame their mother which escalated the situation."
Leo pursed his lips and nodded in agreement. He turned around.
"Enough chatting. Let's go home. I have a lot of work to do."
Aslan agreed, "Yeah, we've wasted enough time. Let's go home and have a family reunion celebration!"
"Tsk."
.
.
An hour later…
WHOOSH
The entire dreadnaught mothership teleported to the asteroid belt where it once parked. The dragon ship curled its body and turned off its lights.
Leo, Simba, Aslan, and Ester were the only ones on the bridge. They gazed at the star system map hologram in the middle of the room.
Aslan smiled, "We're home."
Leo got up from his seat and teleported home without saying anything. As for Simba and Ester, they remained on the ship.
Simba asked his father for permission, "Can we stay on the ship?"
"Why?" Aslan was surprised.
"Although I want to live in Leo's world, I think his wife might still hold a grudge against Ester. I wish to avoid potential conflicts and dramas."
"…Are you sure? I can be the middle man and talk with her."
"It's fine. For peace of mind, let's live separately. I'll guard the ship for you."
Aslan gave Simba a meaningful look. Then, he deeply nodded.
"Well, I guess you're right. Oh, I almost forgot about this."
Aslan brought out a hand-sized crystal that he had seized from Simba. It was a smaller version of the true entity fate crystal.
"Instead of keeping it as a consumable weapon, why don't you absorb it? Your system is still down right?"
Reminded of his system, Simba rechecked his system screen.
Indeed, it was disabled.
"I didn't notice. Why is it disabled?"
"Your brother destroyed Fate Stadium and killed the owner of that place."
"W-What?"
"Anyway, things will get more complicated from now on. All previous system users will scour for entity fate crystals to reenable their system powers. Overlords will fight each other and galactic wars will be common. You have a completed true entity fate crystal in your hand, so you can get a head start."
Simba retrieved the crystal back. He rotated it in his palm and hesitated.
"My system only allows me to pinpoint and find people. I doubt it will be useful."
"Just merge it with your soul and think of what you really need. Entity Fate Crystals always respond to the owner's deepest desire."
"…R-Really?"
"Didn't you get what you wished? When you first got your entity fate crystal, you wished to find your lost family members. You got the search system as a result, right?"
Simba nodded, but he also had doubts, "But I couldn't find you or Leo when I used it. Why?"
Aslan shrugged, "Blame Sieg. That guy suppressed everybody's systems to limit their growth. He owned multiple true entity fate crystals so his system was quite powerful."
"…I see." Simba understood everything, but this topic got him curious. "What about Leo's wish? What is his system like?"
Aslan rolled his eyes, "That dumbass got too attached to the modern world's technologies. I still remember when he swiped my credit card to purchase weed."
"…"
"Anyway, stop worrying about your stupid brother. Ask yourself what you really need at the moment."
"…Right."
Simba gazed at the fate crystal in his hand. As his cultivation base was inferior to Leo's, he thought of a way to gain power.
DING
The true fate crystal radiated in response to Simba's wishes. It merged with his soul and prompted him with a series of messages.
<Detecting New Dao. Patching the system…>
<Removing PVP System and Gacha System…>
<Unpacking Completed. Your system has been updated.>
A dozen system screens appeared and surrounded Simba. The latter bitterly smiled and pressed on one of the floating windows, naming his new ability.
DING
<Congratulations! Gold Dragon Overlord System has been integrated with your soul!>

chapters.title: Chapter 304 Florida Man Who Discovers Another Dimension in the Universe Diagnosed with Schizophrenic
chapters.content:
Chapter 304 Florida Man Who Discovers Another Dimension in the Universe Diagnosed with Schizophrenic
﻿﻿304 Florida Man Who Discovers Another Dimension in the Universe Diagnosed with Schizophrenic
Chapter 304 – Florida Man Who Discovers Another Dimension in the Universe Diagnosed with Schizophrenic
"Hah, annoying."
Leo complained while he landed on the parking lot building's top floor.
Upon arrival, a dozen death knights and liches who were on guard duty on the top floor lowered their heads to Leo. One of them stepped up and relayed a message from Esen.
"Your Majesty. Her Majesty has been looking for you. Please visit her at your carriage."
Leo wasn't surprised. After the wedding, Esen got so clingy that she was comparable to the overly attached girlfriend meme in ancient legend, "Okay. Keep up the good work. I'll go see her now."
.
Everything proceeded as Leo had imagined: Esen threw a tantrum that Leo didn't consult with her before he left. It took him a few hours to pacify the angry wife. Like new lovebirds, they attached to each other for the rest of the day.
In the deep night, Esen was physically and mentally satisfied with Leo's love. She fell asleep, allowing Leo to do his things.
Leo reopened the system menu and reread his new abilities. After all, there was a lot to digest.
.
Patch Note – True Entity Fate Crystal 1.0
1. System Adjustments and New Feature Introduction
- Replace the PVP and Gacha system with the Fiefdom Design and Talent Scout system.
Instead of drawing characters and buildings from the lottery, you can directly purchase unique buildings and characters from the list. The buildings originate from your imagination and desire while the characters are reincarnators or real people in the universe.
- Online Shopping System Balance Adjustment
All items are upgradable by default, and the level cap has been fixed to 50. The item strength level increases by a major realm every 10 levels. For example, a level-11 gun has the power output of an earth celestial while a level-19 gun's destructive strength is as strong as a true immortal. Level-50 gun has the power of a transcendent being level 0.
- Domain System Balance Adjustment
Domain territory is no longer limited to the 1,000 x 1,000 grids or spaces from the free expansion tickets. Instead, your home planet will be your domain territory. You may construct, deconstruct, move, upgrade, or alter your system buildings and non-system buildings freely.
Secondly, the building level cap is now fixed at 50. All upgrade price remains the same.
- Home Planet Upgrade
Your home planet is automatically upgraded according to your cultivation base. For example, if you are a transcendent being at level 10, the highest cultivation base ceiling of your home planet will be the level 10 transcendent stage. This also applies to the strongest subordinates that you can scout to join your domain.
- Home Planet Protection
The removed newbie protection system shall be reinstated as the Home Planet Protection System. Your home planet will be immune to all attacks from karmic sovereigns and weaker cultivators. However, transcendent beings and 'Verified Players' can still damage your star and structures.
- Territory Expansion
Instead of using the PVP System to raid or conquer a planet, you may freely expand your territory by occupying any planet by subjugating the local lifeform by force, submission, or negotiation. When more than 70% territory of the occupying star or planet is under your control, the entire star or planet will automatically become one of your territory, and the local population can enjoy your domain's buffs and perks. You can also build another headquarters or establish your colony base there.
After conquering a new planet or star, you may impose taxes on the local population or lifeform in exchange for your protection, system blessings, or other perks.
2. Building Changes and Adjustment
- General Changes
The max level of all buildings has been increased to 50. All structures constructed by the local people can also be upgraded and changed into system buildings.
For example, a regular house can evolve into a 'Level 1 House'. Then, it will be upgradable. You can also move or adjust the building's location by using the domain management option.
- Shopping Mall > Shopping Complex Headquarters
Your 'Shopping Mall' has been renamed to 'Shopping Complex Headquarters'. At level 50, there will be a total of 50,000 slots for you to install various shops, facilities, factories, training centers, or workshops in the complex. All system buildings can now be moved into the Shopping Complex Headquarters.
In case of emergency, the Shopping Complex Headquarters can transform into a spaceship colony and evacuate from the home planet. By moving the Shopping Complex headquarters to another planet in your territory, you can change your home planet to a new location.
- Pylon Tower > Qi Generator
Your 'Pylon Tower' has been renamed to 'Qi Generator'. After installing any 'True' fate crystal into the generator, it will provide Qi to the local planet and fuel the local system buildings.
Instead of being limited to one per domain, you can now build multiple Qi Generators as long as you have enough True Fate Crystals.
- Mystic Realm Platform
Your 'Mysterious Realm Platform' has been renamed to 'Teleportation Center'. You can no longer explore random planets in the universe. Instead, this place will become an all-
purpose teleportation device for your subordinates to travel between stars in your domain.
- Farms, Quarries, Mines, and Strategic Resources
Instead of providing local resources, you can now designate the resources you need. However, the available resources are determined by the planet's level, location, environment, and historical background.
For example, a level-50 planet with a temperate climate cannot have extreme yin or yang-related natural resources. A polar climate can have abundant yin-related natural resources but it cannot have any yang-related natural resources.
In addition, the material and resource encyclopedia is available.
- Military Structures
New military structures and buildings have been added to purchasable system buildings, such as Spaceship Construction Centers, Anti-Meteor Cannons, and Planetary Shield Projectors.
Please be mindful of your mineral resources as military warships and related items can be expensive. Wars are money-
sinking after all.
3. Additional System Perks
- Identify Feature
This feature allows you to identify any person, item, or material by saying the keyword 'Identify'. The system will accurately evaluate them for you.
- Inventory System Sharing
You can now share items in your inventory with your spouses or trusted subordinates who own an inventory system. The number of available inventory slots is infinite.
…
There were more details, but Leo already got dizzy. After all, the system changed the scope of management from a simple 1,000 x 1,000 grid domain into a galactic enterprise. At this rate, he might as well expand his territory to conquer the universe!
"Can I just mind my own business and live in peace? What do you say, system?"
Leo had already enabled the system's advice. He asked the system, hoping to get a valid suggestion or criticism.
<There is more than one "Verified Player" in the universe. You should do everything in your power to increase your territory and military power for self-protection.>
"I know. But how many VERIFIED PLAYERS are we talking about here? Can you tell me?"
<Aside from you, there are two others: Overlord Priscilla of the Rainbow Phoenix Race and Overlord Seven Dipper of the Planet Eater Race. This doesn't include other players who aspire to become 'Verified Players'.>
<In addition, Verified Players are not the strongest transcendent beings in this universe. Beyond the void, there are higher dimensions that my power cannot reach.>
<In short, please do not be content with your current power. Otherwise, the entities from a higher place will eventually come down and take advantage of you and your people one day.>
That was not a piece of good news. Leo shook his head and almost screamed in frustration.
"Dammit! Are you saying there's stronger people than me and my family?! What the hell is this universe? A cliché wuxia novel? A multiverse bullshit story? Is the creator of his universe so lazy that he can't come up with something else? Like, oh my god, I'm running out of ideas on how to extend my freaking story. Oh, wait. Let's add a higher dimension so I can milk this story for one thousand more chapters!"
Leo was being sarcastic because of frustration. However, the system slammed him with another bucket of cold water.
<Please remember that "Fate Crystals" can make anybody's wish come true. Therefore, a simulation scenario in novel stories can occur because of such influences from the other crystals.>
<From my calculation, the higher dimension's existences are related to the Karmic Fate Crystals, which are stronger than True Entity Fate Crystals. Of course, there are still "True Karmic Fate Crystals" we have to look out for.>
Leo closed his eyes and got back in the bed. He was mentally exhausted.
For the day, he wanted to forget everything. He simply wished for quality time with his family and his loving wife.
"Say, system."
<Yes?>
"If I wish for a tranquil and peaceful life with my wife, what can you grant me?"
<The system will give you powers related to domain prosperity to fulfill the lifestyle of your dreams, but the system will also give you military power and helpers to ensure the domain's security and your privacy – Just like the current system features and powers.>
<Unless you wish to be the number-one strongest cultivator in the universe, the system will not grant you a self-
improvement-related system.>
<Would you like to change the policy to Self-Improvement instead of Tranquil-and-Peaceful Lifestyle?>
Leo didn't even need to think. He glanced at Esen and answered, "No. I want my family to prosper. I'm not alone anymore.
<Affirmative.>
<The system shall add another feature to secure and increase your family's overall strength.>
<The update will take time. Please be patient.>
"…Thanks.>
<You're welcome!>
Leo felt good talking to his system. At least, it was more direct than his suspicious and idiotic father.
.
.
Meanwhile, Simba had also been chatting with his system after the integration. He read the patch note of his version and asked for advice.
"What do I do with the dreadnaught ship?"
DING
<You can recruit crews using the Recruitment Feature. Upon using this feature, you will summon souls from this universe's karma river and reincarnate them into your subordinates.>
<After that, you can…>

chapters.title: Chapter 305 Florida Man Erects New Capsule Hotel INSIDE a Convenient Store
chapters.content:
Chapter 305 Florida Man Erects New Capsule Hotel INSIDE a Convenient Store
﻿﻿Chapter 305 – Florida Man Erects New Capsule Hotel INSIDE a Convenient Store.
At night, Leo slipped out of bed and visited the shopping mall in secret. As the mall was closed at night, nobody saw him entering.
In the shopping mall, worker mannequins tidied and cleaned the stores. As for Hua Taixu and his time chamber, it was still operating overnight as the sword saint's clone was still entertaining the guests.
Every mannequin worked hard even though it was past midnight. Even several workers from the recycling centers and warehouses came to help with mopping and floors.
Thinking of the workers, Leo levitated and avoided stepping on the floors with his shoes. Then, he toured the mall as it had been a long time since he last visited it.
The first floor was tidy and clean as usual as Qiang Qiang was there to intimidate guests. The fourth and fifth floors didn't need help due to the local alchemist mannequins, store managers, and Hua Taixu's influence.
On the other hand, the second and the third floors were a mess. As no system shop was open here, there were no golems to watch over these floors. As a result, countless rogue cultivators, local employees, and visiting merchants used this place as temporary resting spots.
Random litter, wet floors, broken containers, and dirty footsteps were all over the place. This didn't include the filth in washrooms and toilet stalls.
Leo looked at the mess left behind by the local population. He grumbled, "Didn't I tell the managers to let those local people set up their stores here for a fee? Why didn't they take care of this place? System, what did I do wrong?"
DING
<The Shopping Mall… or now 'Shopping Complex' emits strong yin-yang Qi which is beneficial to the local population. It emits the most in the free store slots. However, because of the high-
quality Qi, cultivators can often get intoxicated by the newfound power and get distracted from reality. Thus, inconsiderate cultivators usually ignore common sense and leave behind litter.>
"I guess I should ban them from cultivating here, then?"
<It is not recommended to drive your customers away because your job is uncomfortable or troublesome. Instead of that mindset, you should solve the issues with your management skills or using system perks, such as adding new facilities to your Shopping Complex.>
Leo agreed. Since the local people didn't treasure his building, there was no point in allowing them to use them freely. He might as well add more employees and stores to milk their lifespan to the last drop.
He opened the new Fiefdom Management System for the first time.
.
Domain and Fiefdom Design System
In this mode, you can freely move, rotate, redesign, or remove any system building within your territory. This system encourages you to improve your faction's military strength and endlessly expand your territory until you conquer the entire universe.
Your Shopping Complex Headquarters is the heart of the territory, and it must be protected at all costs. If your headquarters is destroyed, the Domain System will be erased along with some of the True Entity Fate Crystal.
This system functions similarly to your previous Shop Domain System, except for the addition of purchasable facilities and system buildings. The more planets or stars you conquer, the more facilities and buildings you can purchase.
Moreover, improving technologies and recruiting powerful subordinates play a powerful role in this system. Try experimenting with it to see the changes!
Fiefdom Status
Fiefdom Level: 1
Number of Stars/Planets Own: 5
Number of Hero Units: 0
Army Type: One-Man Army
Headquarters Status
Shopping Complex Level: 20
Number of Qi Generators: 0
Power Consumption / Power Generated: 13/10
Stored Lifespan: 953,606 Years
.
Aside from the explanation, Leo was curious about the headquarters status and the fiefdom's army-type details. He wryly smiled while he asked the system.
"One-man army? Really?"
<Aside from you, you have no other powerful subordinate that you can rely on. When a war occurs, you will likely be the only one who can make a difference. As for the rest, they will become your deadweights. Therefore, the evaluation is correct.>
"…You're harsh."
Although Leo disliked the fact, he appreciated the system's frankness. At least, it never mocked or made fun of Leo for being silly.
"About the power consumption in the headquarters status, what is that?"
<Your system facilities require Qi from your headquarters building to operate or function. Currently, your factories, workshops, restaurants, and service facilities consume 1 unit. The airport consumes 2 units, and your Tesseract Time Chamber consumes 5 units. And lastly, your workers consume 5 units.>
<In short, the headquarters require 13 units of energy to function. However, the headquarters, by default, can only generate 10 units of energy. Therefore, some of the buildings cannot function normally.>
<Please move or construct a Qi Generator to enable every facility and worker.>
Leo clapped his hands as he understood the explanation. He was familiar with this system as he remembered ancient real-
time strategy games of the pre-apocalypse era. Base-building games often ask players to build power plants or power generators to enable the other buildings or structures. The Qi Generator and the headquarters worked the same way.
