As this matter was urgent, Leo opened the map of his domain. Then, the world map showed up in the new system screen window.
Leo ignored the world map and pressed on the Pylon Tower, now renamed as Qi Generator. He moved it into the shopping complex, placing it on the third floor.
Five of the slots were occupied instantly. The rooms merged and created an alternate world inside.
Leo didn't stop there. He remembered that the maximum level of his headquarters increased to 50. He spent his abundant life force to upgrade it to the maximum level.
It was pricier than before. Increasing the headquarters level from 20 to 21 cost him 210,000 YOL. From 21 to 22 cost 210,000. Then, so on.
In the end, Leo spent a little over a million YOL to increase his headquarters level to 50.
Leo didn't mind the cost as a million years of lifespan was nothing to him.
RUMBLE
The Shopping Complex underwent an evolution. New floors were created on top of the old floors, and the entire building was transformed.
Rising on top of the previous building was a 10-story cylinder-
shaped building. New elevators linked the shopping complex's old floors to the condominium-like structure. Combining two buildings together, it became a 15-story building.
That was not all. The greenhouses on the shopping complex rooftop were swallowed by the headquarters and appeared on the second floor, taking up available slots.
Leo observed the internal changes. Aside from the relocation of the greenhouses, there was nothing worthy of his attention. He visited the rooftop to see the changes next.
On the cleared rooftop of the shopping complex, a large signboard was erected there.
It showed one message.
[Only entertainment facilities can be built here.]
Leo was bemused, "Only entertainment facility? What can I build here?"
<Water Parks, Public Gardens, and Theme Parks, and so on.>
"Ah, I get it."
He left the empty rooftop for the moment. He went to see the newly erected condominium building next. Then, surprises awaited him.
In the condominium building, the rooms were replaced with empty lots. A wooden signboard [Residential Building or Hotel Building Only] occupied every space.
"Huh? This too?"
<This area has been allocated as the residential district. You can move residential-related buildings to occupy the empty slots. This area consists of 25,000 slots, so you should plan carefully which system buildings you wish to put in here.>
"The heck?" Leo had a wild inspiration, "What if I put the hotel building in one of the slots, will the entire place fit in?!"
<Some buildings may require multiple slots. For example, a level 50 single house only requires one slot. A mansion requires two slots. A five-story apartment requires three slots. A ten-story condominium takes four slots. Anything higher than 10 floors takes five slots.>
"…Condominium-ception?"
<You guess it right. Yes, you can put a WHOLE CONDOMINIUM inside another condominium's room.>
"…Wait a second. The hotel has a similar perk like this. Their rooms and stores contain more pocket dimensions inside. If I put them there, will those pocket dimensions remain the same?"
<Yes.>
"…Wow. Dimension-ception! Are you Backrooms System?"
<I am a sophisticated system whose existence is programmed to serve you, not a random horror myth.>
Leo was convinced that his system was utterly broken. With this, a congested population might not be an issue.
As the condominium was geared toward residents, Leo had a clear idea of which system buildings he should incorporate into the free rooms. He opened the purchasable building list from the Online Shopping System menu.
Upon sorting the list, the most expensive buildings appeared first.
.
Space Colony (5 trillion square kilometers)
Price – One Billion YOL
.
Leo dryly laughed. He wanted one because it seemed funny.
"Say, system."
<Yes?>
"Will it take only 5 slots if I stuff THE WHOLE COLONY INSIDE?!"
<Yes. Broken, right?>
Leo burst into laughter. He reached out to press the button. However, the system gave him a warning message.
<Please note. The upgrading cost is equal to the purchasing price. Are you sure that you wish to spend 49 BILLION years of lifespan to upgrade it to the max level?!>
"…"
Leo sweated profusely. He pulled his finger back.
"On second thought, maybe not."
For the sake of his long-term investment, he postponed the residential plan. Leo returned to the shopping mall and invested in something else, which was more worthwhile.
After fiddling with the system, Leo upgraded the Vehicle Factory to level 50, which changed its name into "Land Vehicle Construction Yard". He also picked a few of the facilities and placed them on the shopping complex's fifth floor.
.
Spaceship Construction Yard
Price – 10 Million YOL
.
Tech Center
Price – 1 Million YOL

chapters.title: Chapter 306 Florida Man Prevents Customers from Entering Shopping Mall by Exposing the Smell of His Balls
chapters.content:
Chapter 306 Florida Man Prevents Customers from Entering Shopping Mall by Exposing the Smell of His Balls
?Chapter 306 – Florida Man Prevents Customers from Entering Shopping Mall by Exposing the Smell of His Balls
Early morning, merchants and rogue cultivators woke up early and visited Leo's domain as usual. They aimed to gather in the mall's second or third floor to cultivate free yang Qi or electric element Qi.
However, the shopping mall was totally different from before.
First, the physical appearance of the shopping mall seemed larger and taller. Glass windows, signboards, and cement exterior were replaced with seamless white metal as if they were the hull of a large warship.
On top of the building, a tall condominium replaced the sky elevator. The previously iconic sky continent, aka the Mystic Realm Platform, vanished from the sky along with the glass elevator.
And lastly, the front entrance automatic glass doors were changed into a metal gate of a nuclear bunker.
The crowd gazed at the gate in confusion, wondering why Leo changed his shopping mall's exterior design overnight.
RUMBLE
At 8 AM, the bunker gates automatically opened, pushing outward and revealing a massive hallway.
The cultivators rushed in, racing to get their cultivation spots. However, when they got inside, they were surprised yet again.
The walls, floor, and ceiling were all made of metal. Only brightly lit LED lights under the ceiling illuminated the dark hallway. In addition, the crowd came across a sealed gate of an airlock room ahead.
There was a large signboard.
.
Airlock Room
1. This room can only accommodate 50 adults at a time.
2. After entering this room, stay clear of the gate as it will automatically shut.
3. The airlock room will adjust the air pressure. Do not panic or cause a commotion when the air pressure changes.
4. When the air pressure adjustment has been completed, another door will open. Then, you can enter the Shopping Complex.
5. Allow everybody from the airlock room to leave first so that the traffic flow will not be interrupted.
6. DO NOT LINGER IN THE AIRLOCK ROOM! LEAVE WHEN THE DOOR IS OPEN!
.
"What's this for?" One of them read the instructions and was confused.
The others were also clueless. They stared at the giant gate in front of them as if they tried to comprehend a secret text behind the word [Airlock].
As people crowded in front of the airlock gate, visitors outside the shopping complex could not get in. They started making a commotion.
"HEY! STOP BLOCKING THE WAY! WE WANT TO GET IN!"
Being pressured by the people outside, the cultivators inside started scouring for a method to get in. Several of them rushed to the sealed door and tried to pry it open.
Fortunately, one of the visitors was a smart and cultured man. Wu Buyi was among the crowd.
"Tsk. I thought I would get some quick fried chicken and pizzas. If I knew I would get stuck here, I would have cooked the leftovers at home. Anyway…"
Wu Buyi found a square button inside a transparent plastic cover. He flipped the cover open and pressed the button.
WHOOSH
The sealed door smoothly opened, revealing a chamber of airlock room. Chilling air flowed outside the building.
"What?!"
Although the crowd got used to the shopping mall's air conditioners, the wind contained thick yin and yang essence. They got caught off guard and accidentally inhaled several mouthfuls of Qi into their systems. As most of them were weak mortals under the nascent soul realm, their bodies couldn't withstand the pressure.
Hundreds of visitors collapsed on their knees and panted. Some of them rushed out of the building to get some fresh air outside.
As the air reached outside, more people fell victim to the overwhelming yin and yang Qi from the complex's air conditioners. Their faces reddened as their blood vessels bloated.
"NOOOO!!"
Everybody was in despair, afraid of Qi deviation or self-explosion. In desperation, they released their Qi to expel the excess energy in their bodies. Hot and cold Qi exited their bodies and were released outside, creating ripples in the air.
After releasing excess Qi from their bodies, their complexion got a bit better, but they weren't safe yet. Everybody sat cross-legged and meditated, digesting and circulating their Qi.
Meanwhile, nascent soul cultivators and Wu Buyi were unaffected by the simple wind. The latter snorted.
"Meh, it's just a few drops of yin and yang essence. What's the big deal?"
The remark made the injured cultivators flinch. They cursed in their minds.
'A drop of essence is worth 100 years of cultivation, damn you!'
'This is the yin and yang essence we're talking about! Do you think it's easy to cultivate all five basic elements and unknown elements at the same time and maintain their harmony?! Do you think we can cultivate many elements like you?!'
'Damn it, Wu Buyi! We're not as blessed as you! Look at you, living in a house made by Lord Florida Man! If we got to live in the same house as you, my cultivation base would have surpassed yours!'
Their red eyes glared at Wu Buyi.
As for the rude alchemist, he slipped his hand into his pants and scratched his balls. He sniffed it. Then, his expression turned ugly.
"Damn it! It stinks."
Wu Buyi looked around and found a cultivator who was busy meditating. He wiped his hand on the guy's sleeve and entered the building. As for the unlucky guy, he almost vomited blood as he had seen everything.
Only 30 people got inside the airlock room. Most of them were frequent visitors, whose cultivation bases surpassed the nascent soul level. One of them even had the opportunity to train in the time chamber with Hua Taixu, and his cultivation reached the pinnacle quasi-immortal stage.
After everybody passed through the gate, Wu Buyi walked toward a console panel near the wall and pressed on it.
As if Wu Buyi had done this before, he pressed on the console, which opened a hologram screen in front of him. It prompted Wu Buyi with a message.
[Sealing Room. Please stay clear of the door.]
Wu Buyi translated the text out loud, "Stay away from the door, people. It should automatically close soon."
WHOOSH
As soon as Wu Buyi said it, the door behind everybody was closed. Then, the wind blew through the ventilation holes in the ceiling, filling the room with more yin and yang essence.
This time, 20 nascent soul cultivators stopped moving. They shut their eyes and stood still, meditating and digesting the dense Qi.
They were suffocating. The essence in the air was too thick that they couldn't breathe properly.
Seven soul formation cultivators also struggled. They sweated profusely, but they managed to hold on. However, judging from their complexion, they were about to give in like the nascent soul cultivators as well.
The two soul transformation cultivators looked pale as well. Although they could move around, their mouths and throats were dry. Their instinct cried that they had to leave this place ASAP or they might fall into a similar state.
Meanwhile, the sole quasi-immortal realm cultivator and Wu Buyi were unaffected. They gazed at the struggling people.
Wu Buyi advised them, "Y'all should wait in this room and wait for that gate to reopen. Once it does, leave."
The quasi-immortal cultivator gazed at Wu Buyi. He cupped his fist and politely asked him.
"Immortal Wu, do you know something about the changes? Why does this place suddenly emit stronger Qi than before?"
Wu Buyi shrugged, "I don't know the details. But judging from the transformation, Lord Florida Man must have upgraded his bases again. Don't be surprised if the shopping mall transforms into a world of deities."
"…I see. Thank you for the warning. I think I'll wait here and test my limits first."
"Suit yourself."
Wu Buyi glanced at the struggling cultivators and reread the instruction screens on the hologram. He pressed the [Open Exterior Door] to let the people out.
The same exit gate was opened again. Then, Wu Buyi ordered the people in the room.
"Leave while you still can. Also, tell everybody that nobody in the immortal realm should enter this place. The Qi inside is too hazardous for mortals."
His voice was crisp. Everybody outside the mall could also hear him.
The previous cultivators in the airlock room slowly dragged their feet outside while the people in the hallway suffered from another wave of thick yin and yang essence. They helped each other and dragged everybody outside.
One more quasi-immortal cultivator entered the airlock chamber. They turned around and looked at the leaving people in curiosity.
He was Tang San, a 19-year-old junior of the Tang Clan's branch which had just merged with the main Tang Clan's manor when Leo was away.
Tang San was 190cm tall, toned, and good-looking. His clothes were also unique as his robes looked like a coat on top of tight clothes. Unfortunately, his charm was inferior to Gao Yan because of his generic messy hairstyle and na?ve face.
"What happened here? Lord Wu, did you do that?"
Wu Buyi glanced at the young man and raised his eyebrows in astonishment. However, his expression reverted to normal instantly.
'Meh, just another lucky youth. Quasi-immortals are cabbages these days. In my days, they were powerhouses. I bet they are inexperienced in real combat. Typical nerd cultivators.'
Wu Buyi disregarded the man's talent and age. He nonchalantly answered.
"Lord Florida Man has upgraded his domain. It no longer supports mortals. Only immortals and probably quasi-
immortals like you can enter."
"I see!" Tang San was excited. "Actually, this is my first time visiting this place! I just moved in last month, and I was busy adjusting to the main house. Senior, can you recommend to me what I should be looking out for?"
"…WHAT DID YOU SAY?! FIRST TIME?!"
Wu Buyi and the quasi-immortal next to him stared at Tang San in shock.
There was a huge difference between frequent customers and new visitors. Newcomers tended to possess a lower cultivation base and weaker foundations. However, when the newcomers had a superior cultivation base than the locals, it told another story.
This guy didn't reach this stage by luck like the local cultivators!
This was a genuine heaven's chosen genius!
Wu Buyi couldn't contain his curiosity and excitement. He asked Tang San, "Who is your master?! How long have you been cultivating?! How old are you exactly!?"
"S-Senior, slow down!" Tang San dryly laughed. He coughed and decided not to tell Wu Buyi everything. "I don't have a master, actually. I self-taught myself."
The quasi-immortal next to Wu Buyi bellowed, "Bullshit! Even I relied on the Sword Saint's guidance that Time Chamber for a year before I broke the soul transformation stage's bottleneck! There's no way a brat like you can reach this far by yourself!"
Wu Buyi squinted his eyes and glanced at the elder. He raised his hand and stopped the guy.
"Let's not get overworked and pressure the kid, old man. Well, let me ask you one question at a time."
While interrogating the new guy, Wu Buyi shut the entrance door of the airlock room, trapping them inside the chamber. He delayed opening the interior door.
"What's your name?" Inquired Wu Buyi.
"Ah, I'm Tang San, senior."
"From the Tang Clan?"
"Yes, I'm from the subsidiary branch from the north. We migrate here because of the blizzard."
"…Strange."
Wu Buyi doubted the information as he knew what happened to the north. Leo and Esen often toured the northern region, but they never found any city or village there. Only ruins remained.
"Which city did you belong to?"
"My family lived in Xia Port, the north-most coast of the Yan Continent, senior."
"Huh?"
"Hahaha. It's not weird that you don't know. We're fishermen from the blizzard area. Nobody visits us anymore because of the extreme weather."
"…"
"Anyway, about my age, I'm 19 this year. As for how long I have been cultivating… that's about the same as my age, I guess?"
Tang San pursed his lips and fidgeted as if he was trying to hide his lies.
The quasi-immortal next to Wu Buyi still didn't believe in Tang San. He wanted to squeeze for more information, but he was afraid of the alchemist.
Meanwhile, Wu Buyi inwardly laughed. He had a theory in his mind.
'If I remember correctly, there's a trope in online novels I read. What was it? A master in a ring? A reincarnator? A regressor? A transmigrator from a higher realm possessing the frail body of a trashy young master? There's a lot of tropes that this guy fits in. Is he one of them?'
Wu Buyi swept his gaze over Tang San's clothes. Then, he saw a plain rusty ring necklace on Tang San's neck.
'Yup! A master in ring. I bet there's an entity inside giving this boy guidance. Man, they really exist.'
He shook his head and gave up asking Tang San. He turned around and opened the interior door for the two.
Dense yin and yang Qi gushed into the airlock chamber. The quasi-immortal elder immediately sat down and meditated as he couldn't withstand the Qi pressure anymore. As for Tang San and Wu Buyi, they were unfazed.
Wu Buyi smirked.
"Well, Mr. Main Character. Would you like me to give you a tour?"
"Main character?" Tang San tilted his head.

chapters.title: Chapter 307 Florida Man Purposely Orders a Barrel of Chicken Instead of a Bucket to Spread the Dao of Florida
chapters.content:
Chapter 307 Florida Man Purposely Orders a Barrel of Chicken Instead of a Bucket to Spread the Dao of Florida
﻿﻿Chapter 307 – Florida Man Purposely Orders a Barrel of Chicken Instead of a Bucket to Spread the Dao of Florida
Tang San and his mentor met six months ago.
The master's name was Kishin Douji. He was the famous overlord of the Oni race, and he was Mao Miaomiao's sworn brother.
Several months ago after Mao Miaomiao died, Kishin Douji mobilized his force to protect the devil race that Mao Miaomiao had created. Predicting that Eleanor might use this opportunity to overtake their home planets, they prepared for a preemptive strike from the DEZNUTS council.
Fate took a turn when the invader was not from Eleanor's forces but the Fate Stadium. Sieg personally visited them and tried to steal Kishin Douji's fate crystals.
A karmic sovereign like Kishin was not the transcendent being's match. His physical body was destroyed, and his soul was damaged. Fortunately, he managed to escape from the eyeball.
After the escape, his soul wandered the universe, and he stumbled upon Mao Miaomiao's karma. He followed the trace and found the planet of the Yan Empire.
As Kishin cultivated Yin, his soul entered the world and chose the northern region of the continent. As his soul required a container to recuperate, he picked a rusty spatial ring in the middle of a frozen river as a host. Then, he hid there.
It didn't take long for someone to pick it up.
A month later, Tang San fought with young cultivators from another clan. It was a desperate battle between a fledgling muscles tempering realm cultivator against five Qi condensation realm cultivators.
Kishin overheard their mockery. It appeared that Tang San's fiance had just broken the engagement with him to marry a prominent young master from the other continent. Then, the subordinates of the young master tried to dispose of him out of spite.
Tang San lost the fight and was thrown into the river, where he found the ring.
After witnessing everything, Kishin thought of possessing Tang San's body. However, he pitied him and used his last bits of Qi to save his life. Then, the two got to talk.
Kishin quickly learned of Tang San's complications. It turned out that Tang San had a unique constitution and dantian compatible with every type of Qi and essence. Because of the combination of Qi, his dantian was larger than everybody else by a thousand times. Therefore, Tang San's cultivation speed and development were slower than the others of his age.
In short, a 19-year-old who could not advance to the second stage was considered talentless in other people's eyes.
Kishin adopted Tang San as a disciple. He taught the young man the cultivation method of the Oni Clan. Then, the disciple didn't disappoint him. Within two months, his cultivation base shot up from the first stage to the 9th-stage.
The blizzard, the changing atmosphere, and the overwhelming Qi in the environment played a big part in the ascension.
But then, the weather of this world changed for the worse. The northern continent that Tang San's fiance had migrated into became a death zone as everybody was frozen to death. Even Tang San and his clansmen couldn't bear living there anymore. They migrated south. Then, they found Leo's domain.
.
Inside the shopping complex, bright yellowish light illuminated everything. After getting in, Wu Buyi and Tang San found Qiang Qiang's fountain statue in the lobby area. Nearby, a reception counter and a map were there, providing the new guests information.
Tang San was attracted to Qiang Qiang's statue. He walked toward her and drooled.
"Wow. This statue is so realistic and fine! I bet the artisan behind this is a master! Senior, do you know who made this statue?"
Wu Buyi held back his laughter, "You don't wanna know."
"Why?! Please tell me-"
Suddenly, Tang San flinched. A voice entered his mind and interrupted his words. Kishin warned him.
'That is not a man-made statue, disciple. That's a sentient golem, and she's a deity at that. Mind your manner. This place is not simple!'
Tang San shut his mouth. He gazed at Qiang Qiang's face again and noticed that she slowly looked back at him. Nervous and afraid, Tang San awkwardly saluted.
"H-Hi, senior. P-Please forgive my remarks earlier."
Qiang Qiang snorted and resumed her original posture, pretending to be a normal statue.
After getting ignored, Tang San wiped his face with his handkerchief. He let out a sigh of relief.
Seeing their interaction, Wu Buyi was surprised, "You caught on quickly. I thought for sure that you gonna get smacked for flirting with her."
Tang San almost cried, "Senior! You're cruel! How come you didn't warn me?!"
"I already did. I told you "YOU DON'T WANNA KNOW", didn't I? That's more than enough hint not to mess with her."
"But that's too vague!!"
Wu Buyi cackled. It had been a while since he last teased a junior like this.
Since he had a good impression of Tang San, he wondered if he could become an extra in this main character's story. He rubbed his hands.
"Well, then, Mr. Main Character. Do you think you need my guidance or are you going to wander around on your own here?"
Tang San's expression was rigid as he was skeptical about this. However, his mentor spirit urged him.
'Accept his proposal. Judging from the local's interaction earlier, this guy seems to be a respectable well-known figure. His cultivation base might be inferior to mine, but he seems trustworthy. It's better than running around in this mysterious place and accidentally offending a hidden expert here.'
His mentor's warning made sense. Although unwilling, Tang San cupped his fist and bowed to Wu Buyi.
"Please guide me, senior. I… don't want to provoke the locals."
Wu Buyi laughed, "Good choice! Well, come with me. I'll introduce you to the BEST fried chicken store!"
"…"
Wu Buyi hummed and walked toward the nearest "FFP", aka Florida Fried Chicken store. It was his favorite fast food chain served the best cockatrice chicken meat and the best dipping sauce.
.
At the shop, Wu Buyi quickly spent 299 essence stones by ordering the largest bucket of chickens. The store didn't take advantage of Wu Buyi. A few minutes later, the mannequins carried a barrel of freshly fried cockatrice chickens for him.
Cockatrices were large monsters. Even though their anatomy was almost the same as regular chickens, their massive size offered a lot of edible meat. The store cut them into several hand-sized pieces and sold them.
The wooden barrel, made of sacred wood, contained exactly a thousand pieces of chicken. Wu Buyi put the barrel next to his table and walked toward the sauce desk, where he could take the store's sauce to his table.
Tang San didn't order anything as he had no money. He simply stared at the barrel, smelling the pleasant scent of fried chickens and drooling.
His mentor whispered again.
'Those are the meat of 7th-stage cockatrices. Normally, you can't eat it because of the toxin. If you eat it raw, your body will, without fail, turn into a stone.'
"B-But they serve the monster meat…"
'Yes. It must have been cooked by the finest chef. I don't sense any poisonous substance or toxic Qi from the meat anymore. As a matter of fact, I think they contain a lot of purified yin and yang Qi. The yang Qi from the oil suppresses the rampaging yin Qi in the meat so well that yin and yang harmonize. Eating one of these should benefit you, Tang San.'
"R-Really?"
'I never lie. I estimate that you might gain at least 100 years' worth of Qi by just eating one.'
"What about the impurity? I thought hard food was not compatible with cultivators. When I first met you, you stopped me from hunting and eating regular food. Why now?"
'Those regular meals you had back then are food for commoners. If you eat too much of those, your body accumulates toxins that will deteriorate your physique in the long run. A cultivator defies logic. Therefore, we cultivate heavenly energy to become immortal. But this… they are different.'
The mysterious master of Tang San couldn't finish explaining to his disciple. Wu Buyi returned with a bowl of black and orange dipping sauces.
Wu Buyi sat down and cleaned his hand with his Qi. Then, he looked at Tang San's face.
"Aren't you buying anything?" Asked Wu Buyi.
"Erm, no. The store… is quite pricey. I don't have enough essence stones, let alone a thousand spirit stones."
Wu Buyi snickered, "Just pay them with your lifespan! What the hell? You're already a quasi-immortal. Don't be a cheapskate because you gain some life force. Spend some and improve your cultivation! You'll be wasting a thousand years cultivating anyway. Why don't you spend a few hundred now and get Qi and essence from food right away so you don't have to waste a thousand years sitting alone in a damp cave?"
"…"
Tang San was speechless. He wished to argue, but he couldn't come up with a response.
Wu Buyi continued to lecture him.
"In this place, we speed-run the whole energy-gathering process. Look at me. I'm now an immortal. But do you know what I was 6 months ago? I was a nascent soul nobody! Three months later, I reached the earth celestial realm. And now, I'm a freaking 5th stage immortal – a celestial warrior! Do you know what I do every day? Eating, sleeping, and watching virtual girls!"
"W-What?!"
This time, Kishin Douji was shocked as well.
Breaking through multiple stages at once wasn't something new to Kishin Douji as he had experienced it before. However, that privilege was only applicable to top talents who got the backing from their rich families.
From Kishin's perspective, Wu Buyi's foundation and meridians were subpar, yet he managed to advance to the immortal stages so quickly. It defied the common sense.
As Kishin's interest was piqued, he finally noticed something strange about the shopping complex.
The yin and yang Qi from the air conditioner was too pure! It resembled the fresh Qi that the world tree of his planet produced every day.
'Is this place… a sage realm? Is this the world of sages? But that's impossible! I thought this world was a newly evolved mortal world! Its Qi isn't supposed to be this thick!'
Tang San overheard his mentor's monologue. He whispered, "What's wrong, master?"
'It's nothing. Try asking that man who the owner of this place is.'
"O-Okay." Tang San caught and relayed the question, "Senior, who is the owner of this place? How come the Qi and essence in the environment are so dense?"
Wu Buyi proudly smiled and puffed his chest.
"My lord is the greatest cultivator of all time! His name is FLORIDA MAN who masters the dao of Florida! I've been cultivating the same dao recently, and I must say… it's incredible!"
"…Dao of Florida?"

chapters.title: Chapter 308 Florida Man Mistakenly Brings Youth to Slaughter House Instead of School
chapters.content:
Chapter 308 Florida Man Mistakenly Brings Youth to Slaughter House Instead of School
﻿﻿Chapter 308 – Florida Man Mistakenly Brings Youth to Slaughter House Instead of School
Both Kishin and Tang San were curious about this dao. The latter inquired further, "What does 'Florida' mean?"
"It has a profound meaning," Wu Buyi held back his laughter once again.
After Wu Buyi received a smartphone, he had been exploring the internet. He also learned modern knowledge and comprehended some of the memes, including FLORIDA MEMES.
At first, Wu Buyi was taken aback by the stupidity of these memes. However, as he studied deeper, he discovered the sophistication and the Floridians' ways of life.
Wu Buyi clarified in a simple term, "You can say that it relates to freedom of choices and consequences of your actions. For example, people who are only engrossed in negativity will never find happiness because of their trained minds. People with the power of positivity have more opportunities in life because of their mindset. However, there's a fine line between confidence and stupidity in life. Well, in short, if you F around, you will eventually find out."
Tang San was puzzled by the lecture, but Kishin understood it very well.
Because Tang San kept listening, Wu Buyi kept talking.
.
While Wu Buyi ran his mouth, several top workers of Florida Domain entered the shopping complex to explore the changes. Leading the group were Hua Jiashan and his elders, who already reached the immortal threshold.
When Hua Jiashan reached the airlock room, he figured out why people gathered outside the building instead of entering.
"Has the lord bored of the commoners and rogue cultivators? Why is he driving out his customers?" Hua Jiashan disagreed with the changes.
Dongfang Mei, his wife, followed after him. She inspected the thick metal gate and smacked her lips.
"The lord must have been preparing for another major conflict or something. Look at this gate and the surface of the wall. I can tell by just looking that they're a lot stronger than before. I doubt any immortal or deity from other worlds can put a dent in it anymore."
Hua Jiashan was enlightened. He turned around and inspected the wall with his Qi.
BZZZZ
The wall reacted to Hua Jiashan's Qi. It repelled his energy and zapped him.
"Hohoh. Indeed, it has a defensive mechanism. I think it reacts to every attack. If we launch a strong attack at the wall or the gate, this place will counterattack the assailant with the same amount of force. I probe the wall just now, and I just got stung by the same Qi."
"Are you sure that you're not guessing randomly?"
"Trust your husband, dear. Go ahead and lightly punch the wall. I bet you will get hit with the same punch."
"…"
Testing Hua Jiashan's theory, Dongfang Mei lightly punched the wall without using her Qi.
BZZZZ
The punch did nothing to the metal wall. On the other hand, an invisible fist came out of nowhere and hit Dongfang Mei in the face. Fortunately, it was light as Dongfang Mei didn't put too much force into her attack.
Dongfang Mei rubbed her nose. She clicked her tongue.
"Fine, you win. Let's get going."
Both husband and wife stopped testing the durability of Leo's bunker passageway. They activated the airlock room and filtered out the bad air.
In the room, Hua Jiashan's subordinates were all present. Tiger Swordsman, Han Hao, and Han Meng tagged along to play. Like their former leader, everybody was an immortal. The oppressive Qi of the shopping mall did nothing to them.
WHOOSH
The interior door was opened. All five cultivators walked with a long stride, visiting Qiang Qiang Fountain first. As if they were pre-coordinated, they saluted to her in unison.
Qiang Qiang glanced at them and nodded. She then ignored them.
This was everybody's routine whenever they visited Leo's shopping mall. By greeting the guardian statue first, they ensured that their visit would be welcomed.
After getting Qiang Qiang's approval, they walked toward the fountain and brought out a teaspoon. They scooped the fountain water and sipped it. Then, they put away the spoon and sat on the ledge of the fountain.
Five people sat there and closed their eyes to meditate.
The water from the fountain was none other than the holy water, made from the True Earth Fate Crystal. By drinking a sip of it every day, Hua Jiashan and his company increased their Qi volume by 1,000 years' worth of cultivation daily.
This was one of the perks of the shopping mall's employees. Leo told everybody that they could drink exactly one teaspoon of water each day to improve their foundation.
They once inquired why they couldn't drink more than one teaspoon. But Leo simply warned him.
"If you wish to explode, go ahead."
That warning was enough for everybody to be scared out of their wits. Since then, they had restrained their urge to drink more.
30 minutes later, they digested the Qi from the holy water. They stood up and bowed to Qiang Qiang once again. Then, they left.
The group proceeded to the fast food area, where Wu Buyi always lurked. When they passed the FFC store, they found Wu Buyi as they had predicted.
Hua Jiashan smiled, "There he is. He's fast today."
Han Hao rushed toward the obnoxious alchemist without saying anything. He grabbed a chair and sat at Wu Buyi's table. Then, he grabbed a piece of chicken and put it in his mouth as if it were his.
Wu Buyi stopped lecturing Tang San and glanced at Han Hao, "Are you broke or what?"
Han Hao smirked, "A friend's food is always more delicious than self-bought food."
"Scram, cheapskate! Didn't you get your pay after the wedding? Go buy your own chickens!"
"Nah, I'm broke. A few days ago, I bought two sword manuals from the bookstore. I have to rely on fasting pills again."
"Get your ass to work then! Stop freeloading me!"
"I will." Han Hao laughed as he teased Wu Buyi enough. He then shifted his attention to the youth at the same table. Then, he noticed Tang San's cultivation base.
"Hey, you're quite impressive for a youngster." Han Hao praised Tang San, "I thought all quasi-immortals are wussy. It's refreshing to see someone with a firm foundation for once. Buy say, I haven't seen your face before. Did you just come out from seclusion or the time chamber?"
Tang San didn't know what to answer. He glanced at the group of immortals in front of the store and gulped.
'W-Wow. Six immortals in one place?' Tang San thought.
Kishin Douji scoffed at his disciple, 'Immortals? Meh, they're just pushovers. Remember Tang San. Immortals and deities are nothing in this universe. Only karmic sovereigns reign supreme! Don't be satisfied or impressed by some locals!'
'But, master. They must have cultivated the mysterious FLORIDA DAO! We know nothing about this dao. I think we should respect the locals a little and learn more about them.'
'I know. This place is no longer some regular tavern full of delinquent youngsters. The whole building is a den of experts. DO NOT PROVOKE ANYONE! We don't want to die here.'
'…I know.'
Tang San gulped and stood up. He then cupped his fist and bowed.
"M-My name is Tang San. I'm from the Tang Clan's branch family!"
"Ah, the Tang Clan!" Han Hao slapped his knee and laughed, "Your patriarch Tang Xuan and Tang Tian are our friends. We visited the time chamber together twice! Sit down, boy. Let this uncle buy you a drink. Hey silly Wu. Go buy us some cokes."
Wu Buyi bored his fangs and fired a piece of chicken through the gaps of his teeth. The piece of chicken entered Han Hao's left nostril, which made him choke.
"Use your own money, damn broke!"
Because of Han Hao's shamelessness, Wu Buyi lost his appetite. He packed the chicken barrel in his storage ring and stood up to leave.
Han Hao managed to extract the piece of chicken from his nose. He dryly laughed, "That's disgusting, bro!"
"You're disgusting! Get lost!"
"Oh, come on! Let's go play together like the old time! How about another year in the time chamber?"
"SCRAM! I'm planning to study alchemy today! Don't interrupt me!"
In anger, Wu Buyi stormed out of the store while walking like a crap.
Tang San broke a sweat and bowed to the group of elders. Then, he followed Wu Buyi.
He wasn't confident in his survival in Hua Jiashan's group. Being with Wu Buyi was more comfortable even though he was a weirdo.
.
After Wu Buyi and Tang San had left, Hua Jiashan and his people sat in the same store and ordered a few pieces of chicken and burgers. Then, they sat at the same table.
As there were not many topics to chat, Tang San's appearance gave them something to talk about.
Hua Jiashan was still impressed by Tang San's foundation and talent.
"Is that boy actually a newcomer or a frequent visitor?"
Han Hao's expression changed. He crossed his arms and pondered, "Probably a newcomer. I always memorize every face around here to improve my memory capacity and calculation speed, but I've never seen him before. Also, his clothes are quite… unique."
Hua Jiashan and others had a solemn looks on their faces.
"If he was an old customer, his cultivation base and his achievement is nothing. But since he's a newcomer, I think we have to change how we approach things."
Dongfang Mei agreed, "Indeed. Someone under 20 years of age with that cultivation base is abnormal. I think we should report this to the lord or scout him."
"Let's seek the lord and report this. If we can draw him to our side, we might get another Gao Yan or Yao Qiqi."
"Speaking of Gao Yan…"
The elders thought of the youth who had two antler horns and a handsome face. They grinned and snickered, "What's his cultivation base right now? Has he surpassed us?"
Han Hao grinned, "I saw him, Jin Yong, Yao Qiqi, and Cat drag their feet out of the time chamber. I asked the manager that day. She said that it was their 10th visit."
"W-What? Ten already?!" The group was shocked. "Then, what about their strength?!"
"The pinnacle of the immortal realm, True Immortal!"
Han Hao puffed his chest, proud of the former disciple. He wondered how high the guy would reach under Leo's tutelage and his store's influence.
But Dongfang Mei had other concerns.
"What about Qiqi and Cat? How are they?"
"…"
Han Hao's expression changed. He deeply sighed and quietly muttered.
"Yao Qiqi and Jin Yong are true immortals like Gao Yan."
"Okay! What about Cat?"
"…27."
"27?" Everybody didn't understand.
"Cat is a 27 star deity."
"PFFFT!!?"
The crowd spat their drinks. They widened their eyes in disbelief.
"WHAT DID YOU SAY?! HOW STRONG WAS SHE?!"
If anybody else was a deity, none of them would have batted an eye. On the other hand, Cat's existence was another story.
After all, she was Leo's daughter figure and she had THAT personality. Everybody prayed that Cat wouldn't start bullying anybody soon.
.
.
On the fifth floor, Wu Buyi and Tang San reached the workshop area. They entered an alchemy workshop and entered one of the pill-making rooms.
Tang San was excited to see how the workshop taught alchemists and visitors. He wondered if he could become an alchemist as well.
But as soon as they entered the room, they found a refined young girl with dark skin and long ears. She had been sitting on the spectator stand and staring at the mannequin next to the cauldron.

chapters.title: Chapter 309 Florida Man Deviously Tricks Teens into Auditioning as Gourmet Cuisine for his Pampered Pet
chapters.content:
Chapter 309 Florida Man Deviously Tricks Teens into Auditioning as Gourmet Cuisine for his Pampered Pet
?Chapter 309 – Florida Man Deviously Tricks Teens into Auditioning as Gourmet Cuisine for His Pampered Pet
As the alchemy workshops operated 24/7, pills and the sweet, bitter scent of medical pills flooded this area, which was suitable for a plant monster to take as a nest. Cat had been living in this shopping mall since she had reached the deity stage. By inhaling the medical scent and pollution from the alchemy cauldrons, her physique grew stronger. Each day, she condensed a new star in her dantian universe, enhancing her foundation and getting ready to challenge the sage realm.
In addition, the automatons occasionally discarded bad pills and expired pills from the supermarket. Most of the discarded medicines were thrown into the workshops so that the local workers could refine them into low-graded pills. That was Cat's greatest opportunity. She stole those pills and devoured everything regardless of their expiry dates. Furthermore, she also plundered expired food and junk from the restaurants. In short, this shopping mall was her paradise. She no longer wandered outside to find prey.
As a plant, Cat always slept standing or sitting. Even when she was in her human transformation, her habits never changed. In addition, this workshop regularly produced Floridian Dantian Pills, so the Qi in this room was denser than in other places. She chose this place as her favorite bedroom.
From the onlooker's perspective, she was meditating with her eyes closed. Cat dozed off while she waited for the supermarket mannequin to fetch her another batch of expired pills. Meanwhile, Tang San was entranced by the girl's unique beauty. Even Kishin inwardly whistled in admiration.
Wu Buyi spotted Cat. He brightly grinned, "I'm glad I always visit FFC first. Hey, this one is on me. Next time, you pay for the tax, okay?"
"Huh?" Tang San was confused, "What tax?"
"This tax!" Wu Buyi fetched 10 pieces of chicken that he had bought earlier. He walked toward Cat and placed the food next to her seat. Then, he left her alone.
Tang San was baffled. "Why did you do that?! She's not an animal! If you want to give her food, you should at least put it on a plate or something clean! That's disrespectful!"
"Heh. You know nothing. Anyway, you shouldn't be staying here for too long. The Qi in this room is the thickest. I doubt your mortal foundation can last 10 minutes."
Again, Tang San couldn't understand anything. Frustrated, he walked toward Cat and brought out a wooden plate to use as a container. He reached out to grab a fried chicken.
Suddenly, Cat's arm moved. She grabbed Tang San's arm while she gradually opened her eyes.
"No Nom-Nom My food, Meow!"
"????"
Tang San raised his eyebrows and looked at the small hand of Cat. Because Tang San could not react or utter a word, Cat strengthened her grip and warned him again.
"Let go of my Nom-Nom, Meow!"
"OWWW!"
Tang San screamed in pain as Cat suddenly clenched her hand to the point that his bone cracked. Only then, did he release the chicken that he was holding.
Upon the release, Cat freed Tang San's arm and gently picked up the fried chickens. Without hesitation or etiquette, she widened her jaws like a snake and swallowed them whole.
BURP
Cat hiccupped and wiped her mouth. She glanced at Wu Buyi who waved at her.
"You're welcome, kiddo." Wu Buyi laughed.
Cat grinned and nodded at him. Repaying the favor, she opened her palm and sprouted a rainbow leaf. She plucked it and flickered it at the elder.
Wu Buyi gleefully received the rainbow leaf and stored it in his spatial ring. Their interactions didn't escape Kishin Douji's sense. He exclaimed.
'THAT WAS THE PRIMORDIAL LEAF OF THE VOID TREE! HOW DOES IT APPEAR HERE!?'
Tang San was stunned, "Primordial Leaf of Void Tree?"
Because Tang San suddenly uttered it out loud, Wu Buyi heard it. He smacked his lips, "As expected of a main character, you know a lot for a mortal. Anyway, an advice from a senior, you shouldn't disclose today's event anywhere if you value your life."
Tang San closed his mouth. Afraid to be left out, he secretly asked Kishin.
'Master, what's the primordial leaf? What's it for?'
Kishin had a heartache. He couldn't believe that the elusive void tree of legends had been hiding here.
'Void Trees are the origin of our universe. From the rumor, it is said that it's key to enter the higher dimension or the upper universe.'
'A-A higher dimension?'
'This matter is too early for you. Let's say this. I need that leaf. If you can get your hands on one, I'll teach you everything I know. I'll also guide you to my hidden stash in my star sector. Right, have you been begging me for a good weapon? I have a thousand good blades at home.'
'…M-Master?'
'Just get me a primordial leaf of the void tree, and I'll do everything in my power to repay you! Don't ask too much!'
'…'
Tang San was skeptical about this. He reluctantly sat next to Wu Buyi and asked him.
"Senior, if I bring fried chickens to her, will I get the same leaf?"
Wu Buyi scoffed as he could see through Tang San's intention, "Probably not. I've been paying taxes every day for half a year. Also, without me, she wouldn't have learned about this place. In a way, I'm her guardian, and she's my daughter. Well, she's actually the lord's daughter though. Hey, for your sake, do not attempt to woo her or you'll be eaten."
"…Eh? T-Then, how can I win her trust?"
Wu Buyi smirked as he had an inspiration. Since the guy was down bad for the leaf, he might as well scam him.
"Well, kid. Since you wish to get your hands on the leaf so bad, I'll tell you how. First, you must keep feeding her and follow her instructions. In my case, I've been with her since she was young. But in your case, it might take longer to win her trust. For a starter, how about working here as her servant?"
"…S-Servant? Me?"
"Well, yes! Normally, someone like you would have been promoted to an elite worker because of your natural talent and cultivation base. But you know, nobody has ever obtained the right to be the princess's personal servant, even me."
Tang San's eyes spun. He was bad at turning down offers, especially seniors who showed him goodwill.
Wu Buyi continued, "Since I'm generous, I'll use my connection with the lord to get you assigned to his daughter. How about it? Wanna work for our lord and become her servant?"
"Wait a second!" Tang San took a step back. Escaping from the conversation, he changed the topic, "You said 'Princess'? Is she… a real princess?!"
"Well," Wu Buyi shrugged. "As I said: She's our lord's daughter. If you mess with her, your head will fly. But if you are good to her, you get rewarded for your loyalty. THE LEAF, well, is one of them."
"…"
Tang San wanted to reject the offer. However, Kishin urged him again.
'Do everything necessary to get your hands on it. Even if you need to kill him, you must!'
'M-Master?!'
'It's that important!'
'…'
Sometimes, Tang San doubted his master because he was too ruthless. Without a choice, Tang San agreed.
"Senior, I agree. Please allow me to work here. Also, could I know your name?"
Wu Buyi burst into laughter and stroked his beard.
"I am Wu Buyi, an aspiring Florida Man!"
"F-Florida…Man?"
.
.
Leo hovered over his new shopping complex. He gazed at the waterpark, which he had installed last night.
"Heh, what an unnecessary facility. Anyway, time to invest in other stores."
He checked the list of facilities that he had recently built on the shopping complex's fifth floor. Leo kept 10 alchemy workshops, blacksmiths, and gunsmiths as the basic facilities. The rest was upgraded into factories, such as metallurgical factories, alchemy factories, and firearm factories.
After adding new system buildings, Leo got 10 factories of each type. The other slots were allocated to a different field. Five car manufacturing factories, five aerospace manufacturer factories, and ten spaceship factories took up more space on the fifth floor.
There were 450 slots available on the fifth floor, but Leo kept them empty for now. After all, he needed rooms to build Qi generators, and he planned to build them on this floor.
At the moment, most of the factories didn't have enough power supply. Leo deeply sighed and checked the number of fate crystals he had.
350 Earth Fate Crystals
111 Sky Fate Crystals
41 Heavenly Fate Crystals
2 Entity Fate Crystals
Leo tilted his head as he didn't remember when he acquired all of them. He could only recall that he killed so many entities when he confronted Sieg.
"I guess some of the crystals entered my soul back then. Welp, thanks for the loot."
350 earth fate crystals turned into 50 true earth fate crystals. Using them as a foundation for his shopping complex, he opened his system and purchased 50 Qi generators.
RUMBLE
50 generators occupied 50 slots on the fifth floor. At the same time, they filled the building with thick yin-yang essence. Leo visited one of the generator's rooms to see the interior.
Upon entering, he wasn't disappointed. Inside the room was a barren brown planet in another dimension. The same pylon tower stood tall, producing holy water nonstop. The purified water leaked into the ground. Then, black grasses sprouted from the barren land. Within a few minutes, the brown planet was painted black because of the surging immortal grasses. Some of them even bloomed flowers.
Looking at the field of immortal grasses reminded him of his early days here. He reminisced about the past.
"It all started because of these grasses. This takes me back."

chapters.title: Chapter 310 Florida Man Hires Sexy Strippers to Join Kid’s Parade in Public Shopping Mall
chapters.content:
Chapter 310 Florida Man Hires Sexy Strippers to Join Kid’s Parade in Public Shopping Mall
﻿﻿Chapter 310 – Florida Man Hires Sexy Strippers to Join Kid's Parade in Public Shopping Mall.
Leo left the Qi generator's planet alone. But when he returned, he told the manager of the fifth floor about the resources, ordering her to send someone to collect some grasses.
Unfortunately, the gacha system no longer existed. Leo's company was short on staff members again. He needed to designate this task to the local employees.
But there was a problem. As the employees from the Life Sword Sect were responsible for harvesting crops from the farms and transporting items from Orlando to warehouses. As the farms kept printing fruits and vegetables, a thousand disciples barely kept up.
The Tang Clan also had a lot of people, but most of them were sent to maintain order in the slum area. Without them, the vagrants and commoners-turned-cultivators might start rioting or bullying the commoners and merchants.
But then, Leo remembered that Meowmeow had scored so many wives that they overpopulated the mystic realm platform. There were also the guys from Esen's subordinates that he could use.
Leo started drafting his plan. He visited every generator and inspected the environment of each star.
Fortunately, all stars looked the same. The generators turned 50 barren wastelands into 50 realms full of immortal grasses and immortal flowers.
Leo called Meowmeow right away and assigned him a task. He sent the guy a sound transmission.
"Meowmeow, are your girls free?" Asked Leo.
Meowmeow replied, but his voice cracked. He was surprised.
"A-Are you asking me to share my wives, master?!"
"What the hell?! Of course not! I'm not a sicko like you. Who wants to hump those stone pussies anyway?! My foreskin would have been scratched and peeled from the scrubbing!"
Meowmeow was relieved, "If that's so. Well, that's a relief. What do you want them to do, master?"
"I'm merging the mystic realm platform with my shopping complex soon. Tell everybody to enter the main building and meet me on the fifth floor."
"Okay, boss!"
.
Five minutes later, Meowmeow and his 1,003 wives arrived. Some of the elves who refused to join the harem also followed them to join the meeting.
A total of 3,000 elves, including Meowmeow's wives showed up in total!
Leo was surprised to see so many people. He looked at the perverted golem.
"I told you to only bring your wives here. Why are you taking the outsiders with you?"
Meowmeow snickered, "They kind of follow us here. You know, master. These girls just want a job. As a gentleman, I can't deny their requests."
"I bet you put some weird conditions to the requests: For example, they must become your wives if I assign them a job and pay them wages."
Meowmeow sweated profusely even though he was a rock golem. He averted his eyes and looked away.
"I-I don't know what you're talking about, master."
"…"
Leo gave the perverted angel a meaningful look. He couldn't get used to this guy's antics.
"Fine. I want you to form 50 teams. Your girls shall work as supervisors while the other volunteers here will be your subordinates. Your main task is to protect the Qi generators and ensure the safety of the workers. As for your subordinates, they only have two jobs – Harvest immortal grasses and flowers. Then, transport them to the underground warehouse of this shopping complex. Any question?"
"Qi generator, master?"
Meowmeow raised his eyebrows and closed one eye to read Leo's memory. Instantly, he understood the new mechanism of Leo's new system.
"Alright. A team of 20, a total of 50 teams will be allocated to the new stars. The volunteering elves will follow us to harvest the immortal grasses and flowers, got it!"
Meowmeow turned around and relayed Leo's order. The high elves from Simba's planet cheered and followed the stone elves to the new workplaces.
.
The parade of the elves was noisy. Even Wu Buyi and Tang San in the workshops could hear them from inside the observation room.
Curious, Tang San exited the workshop. Then, he found a thousand beautiful elves passing by. Several of them looked like stone golems, but their gorgeous face and their sexy naked figure caught him off guard.
This was something that always annoyed Leo. The wives of Meowmeow never wore clothes. However, for Tang San, the stimulation was too much.
Tang San bent forward and pulled his crotch back to hide his boner, yet his eyes were glued to the sexy stone elves.
One of the girls noticed Tang San's reaction. She giggled and massaged her chest in front of the young man.
"!!!"
Tang San's face reddened. He fell on his butt and accidentally showed his pitched tent.
The elves turned around and saw him. The stone elves laughed while the high elves clicked their tongues in disgust. Then, they walked away.
Kishin Douji, on the other hand, was amused. He contemplated out loud, but only Tang San could hear him.
'How amusing. Who would have thought that the prideful elves of Eleanor have fallen this low?'
Tang San was surprised, "Master, do you know them?"
'More than that. Have I told you that I was once a consort of some queen?'
Tang San remembered, "Yes, you told me that you were a prince of the universe and the king of your race or something."
'Yeah, the queen that I used to date was the leader of those people. Her name was Eleanor, and she was an entity… Well, a karmic sovereign by now. I haven't chatted with her since my sworn brother joined her harem. I wonder if she's still out there trying to steal her daughter's body.'
"…"
Tang San had no comment as he wasn't familiar with a matriarchal country's system. In addition, the idea of a queen having many husbands disgusted him.
His respect toward Kishin slightly dropped due to this information. Still, he believed that his master was still the strongest entity out there.
Kishin changed the topic. "Anyway, associating with Eleanor's minions is not recommended. That wench is not trustworthy. Even though I'm her consort, she sent assassins after me to steal my fate crystals and seize my territory. I wish she died."
"…She sounds like a bad person."
'A very wicked woman, if I say it from my experience. Remember, don't join forces or befriend any elf. They're bad news.'
"…Got it, master."
Because of the conversation, Tang San's boner was killed. He managed to stand up straight and gazed at the naked stone elves without getting aroused.
While observing the elves, the corner of his eyes spotted the movements of two men. One of them was a stone golem like the others, but he was an angel. As for the other one, he was a refined and handsome middle-aged man who had a similar facial outline as the angel.
"Hmm?"
Because of Tang San's vision, Kishin Douji also noticed the duo. He found Leo and Meowmeow.
'Those men…'
Kishin Douji was astonished as he couldn't figure out Leo's cultivation base. Moreover, he gave off the same air as Sieg, who almost killed him.
Afraid of revealing his weaknesses, Kishin remained silent, not telling his disciples about Leo and Meowmeow.
As for Tang San, he was relieved to see more people here. As he wished to make friends with the locals, he approached the two to introduce himself.
"Sir, senior! Greetings, senior! I'm Tang San, a member of the Tang Clan. I've just moved in today, and this is the first time I've visited this place. Pleased to meet you!"
Meowmeow and Leo turned around and gazed at the young man.
Meanwhile, Wu Buyi was worried that Tang San might run into a problem. He exited the workshop and discovered the commotion.
"Oh, wow! Sexy! Nice fapping materials, hehehe!"
Wu Buyi scratched his balls in his pants. Then, he pulled his hand to his nose and sniffed it like how a culture monkey would.
While sniffing the foreskin of his balls, he looked around and found Tang San, Leo, and Meowmeow together.
"Oh, shit!"
.
.
Leo stared at the young man and knitted his eyebrows. He listened through Tang San's introduction and hesitatingly nodded.
"Okay?"
Meowmeow noticed Leo's dark expression. He coughed and warned Tang San.
"Hey, boy. You're not supposed to be rude in front of the lord. Fortunately, our lord is benevolent and kind. Otherwise, he would have beheaded you for this insolence! Got it?"
Tang San sweated profusely. He wondered what he did wrong.
"I-I'm sorry. I won't do it again."
Meowmeow teased him enough. He patted Tang San's shoulders and laughed, "Just kidding. Anyway, that attitude is very good. You introduce yourself to the adults, not waiting for the adults to ask for your name. That's how you climb up the ladders in life, boy!"
"…Haha."
Leo deeply sighed as his subordinate talked too much. He silently uttered.
"Identify."
DING
.
Name: Tang San
Alias: None
Race: Yan Human
Age: 19
Cultivation Base: Quasi-Immortal
Thoughts: Interested, Happy
System Note: This man was born under the bad stars: He was born with a unique constitution that rejected yin and yang essence in favor of the monster Qi. His parents engraved the fate crystal into Tang San's soul when he was a baby to seal his monster Qi. But by doing so, Tang San was fated to become a cripple for life.
For 18 years, Tang San was bullied because of his disabilities. He tried his best to cultivate and train, but his dantian and body kept rejecting Qi. After his parents passed away, his fiancé annulled their engagement in favor of marrying another prominent young master from a bigger family. Afterward, the young master sent his men to kill Tang San. He fought back, but he was beaten half-dead. Then, the assailants threw him into a frozen river.
As someone with a heavenly fate crystal, he was saved by destiny and great luck. While being in the bottom of the river, he stumbled upon a rusty ring. Miraculously, the ring was the secret hiding place of the Overlord of the Oni Tribe, Kishin Douji.
Kishin Douji saved Tang San's life and corrected his meridians. He also imparted the right cultivation method to him, allowing Tang San to refine yin and yang Qi into monster Qi.
Under Kishin Douji's guidance, Tang San's cultivation base soared. He surpassed his peers and overshadowed his fiancé and his rivals.
A year after the fateful comeback, Tang San migrated south and rejoined with the main clan. Then, he found you and your domain.
.
Leo appreciated the background information of this young man even though he didn't ask for it.
'Oh, boy. Why does his story sound like one of those cliché wuxia stories so much? Is he a protagonist or something? Wait, come to think of it, Gao Yan is similar to this guy except he wasn't as cliché… Welp, whatever. It's not like he's a threat to me or something.'
Leo shrugged and was about to chat with Tang San. However, Meowmeow interrupted him with a sound transmission.
'Master, every villain in those stories had the same thought as you. They were like 'He can't possibly do anything!' for a dozen chapters. Then, boom! The main character gets a power-up arc and returns to beat the hell out of those villains. Please don't treat this lightly.'
Leo rolled his eyes, 'Can he even reach the transcendent realm? He only has a heavenly fate crystal in his soul. It's not like his cultivation ceiling is superior to mine. I have the TRUE ENTITY FATE CRYSTAL, you know. The quality of luck and fate is different!'
'Just… don't look down on main characters, master. Sometimes, it's better to be overthinking or pessimistic. You can't be disappointed if you already expect the worst-case scenario.'
"…"
Leo shook his head as he disagreed with Meowmeow. He gazed at Tang San, who had been waiting for Leo's response.
"Tang San, is it?"
Tang San brightly smiled, "Yes, senior! I'm Tang San."
Leo glanced at the rusty ring necklace of Tang San. His mouth curved up into a grin.
"I'm Florida Man, the lord of this domain. Welcome to Florida!"
"T-Thank you, senior."
Tang San heard this term many times before, but he still couldn't figure out what the dao of Florida was.
Suddenly, Leo uttered something that shocked Tang San.
"Also, can you relay my greetings to your master in that ring? Kishin Douji, is this his name?"
"W-What?!"

chapters.title: Chapter 311 Florida Man Swindles Half of Tourist's Fortune for Exclusive Service as a Human Shield against the Law
chapters.content:
Chapter 311 Florida Man Swindles Half of Tourist's Fortune for Exclusive Service as a Human Shield against the Law
﻿﻿Chapter 311 – Florida Man Swindles Half of Tourist's Fortune for Exclusive Service as a Human Shield against the Law
Tang San clenched his fist and lowered his head. He looked at the rusty ring necklace on his neck.
'What should I answer, master? I think they know.'
Kishin Douji let out a long sigh. His soul exited the ring and manifested in the real world.
A 3-meter-tall semi-transparent body of a red Oni stood before Leo. He crossed his arms and stared at everybody.
Leo also crossed his arms and stared at the mysterious expert. Again, he appraised the soul.
'Identify.'
DING
.
Name: Kishin Douji
Alias: Demon God
Race: Blood Oni
Age: 935,970
Cultivation Base: 7-River Karmic Sovereign
Thoughts: Suspicious, Hostile
System Note: This demon god was the longest reigning ancestor of the Blood Oni Race and the former strongest entity in the universe. His reign lasted until the transcended being "Sieg" unveiled the secrets of the Void Tree and the hidden applications of the Void Tree's fruits, aka the fate crystals. After the fate crystals spread in the universe, new karmic sovereigns and transcended beings emerged. They quickly overthrew his kingdom and his people were hunted down.
Kishin Douji realized that he couldn't survive alone in the new era. Thus, he surrendered his kingdom to the rising civilization – The Divine Elf Kingdom. He ended up becoming Eleanor Sydin's consort even though she was weaker than him. Because of Eleanor's mighty army and her protection, his Blood Oni Clan survived the hunt.
In exchange for his clan's survival, Kishin later bestowed his seed to Eleanor, who gave birth to the first princess – Esen Sydin IV.
After giving birth to the first successor, Eleanor abandoned Kishin Douji in favor of the new consort, Mao Miaomiao. At first, Kishin befriended Mao Miaomiao and ended up becoming sworn brothers. But later on, their relationship gradually deteriorated and small conflicts between the Oni Clan and Divine Elf Clan were more frequent. The tension turned into a cold war between the two races.
While preparing for a full-scale war, his clan was ambushed by Sieg. His physical body was destroyed, forcing his soul to flee from his home world. He eventually found the Yan Empire's planet and hid his soul inside an abandoned spatial ring. Then, he found Tang San and ended up using him.
.
Leo slightly shook his head in astonishment. Getting information from both sides revealed a lot of hidden backstories. However, it was a pity that the system didn't show other information regarding Eleanor's kingdom and Mao Miaomiao's intervention.
Sarcastically, Leo greeted Kishin Douji. "Hello, there, father-in-law."
Kishin Douji narrowed his eyes, "I don't remember having a son-in-law."
"You do. I married your daughter."
"I don't have a daughter."
"You do. Eleanor gave birth to your daughter, didn't she?"
"Her children are not mine."
"But she carries your blood. To be honest, I'm surprised as well. I didn't expect you to be her actual father."
"…"
Kishin Douji didn't understand why Leo called him 'Father-In-Law'. He treated it as a joke and changed the topic.
"I see that you're a transcended being. What do you want from this helpless Oni?"
Leo smirked, "I just don't like lurkers, so I call you out. If you want to live here in my domain, you need to make your presence known."
"Understandable," Kishin Douji agreed with this idea, but he hadn't trusted Leo yet. "What else do you need?"
"It's the other way around. What are you planning to do with that boy? Are you trying to raise his cultivation base to match yours? Then, will you take over his body like a cliché villain would?"
Tang San widened his eyes in shock and took a step back by reflex. On the other hand, Kishin Douji was enraged.
"Preposterous! A karmic sovereign like me can regenerate my fleshly body anytime! I don't need to steal a fleshly body like Eleanor or Mao Miaomiao!"
Leo snickered. He lowered his arms and fetched a blank spatial ring in his pocket. Then, he passed it to Kishin Douji.
"That old ring you are using is about to break apart. Use this one instead. Also, if possible, regenerate your fleshly body and stay outside. That way, I won't suspect you for doing something shady to that boy over there."
Kishin Douji snorted, "If I had enough energy, I would have done so ages ago! I need to fully recuperate first. Otherwise, a transcendent being stronger than you will detect my presence and come for my life. If that man appears, even you will be in trouble!"
Being reminded of another transcended being, Leo recalled Sieg and his fate crystal obsession. Fortunately, his sugar mom 'Priscilla' already helped him greatly. Leo believed that Sieg might have already been dead.
"Sorry to bring it to you, but I think THAT GUY you mentioned is already dead."
"WHAT!?" Kishin Douji was flabbergasted, "IMPOSSIBLE! HE IS THE LORD OF FATE STADIUM! HE CONTROLS ALL SYSTEMS USERS!"
"I think he ran into another transcended being by the name 'Priscilla'. I ran into him a while back, and she saved me. Since he has been quiet, I think he's dead."
"…"
Kishin Douji knew of this 'Priscilla' person. After all, she was one of many enemies who wanted him dead in the past.
When Kishin Douji was the sole overlord of the universe, Priscilla was just a roaming monster that wasn't worth his attention. But when Priscilla managed to collect seven entity fate crystals, she gathered all her kin and established the Phoenix Clan. Afterward, her clan stood toe-to-toe with Sieg's Fate Stadium Army.
Realizing how big Leo's backer was, Kishin Douji ceased his ill thoughts. He grudgingly lowered his head.
"Then, please allow me to stay here and recuperate. When I'm fully recovered, I'll leave this place."
Leo brightly smiled and opened his palm. His ugly smile resurfaced.
"Of course, you can stay here, but you have to pay for the Nom-Nom Tax."
"…Nom-Nom Tax?" Kishin Douji was confused.
"Ah, please excuse the jargon. I mean you must give something equivalent in exchange for the trouble. I won't ask much. I just need 50% of your total life force… or lifespan."
"…What?"
Leo snapped his fingers and summoned the good-old lifespan status menu for Kishin Douji to see.
.
Name: Kishin Douji
Age: 935,970
Lifespan: 2,110,290,312 Years
.
Upon seeing the lifespan of Kishin Douji, Leo was impressed. As for Tang San, he gawked at the unbelievable status screen in front of his master.
"Wow, two billion years to live?! That's a lot of time to cultivate!" Tang San counted his fingers, imagining himself with that amount of time. He wondered what he would do in the next one billion years.
As for Kishin Douji, he didn't think much of his lifespan. After all, he was also a system user, and he could easily accumulate them back in a few years.
"Fine. A billion years of my lifespan for your protection, right?"
"Indeed. You're quick to understand."
"I'll pay. But make sure that nobody comes after me. If someone were to come here and pursue me, it's your job to fend off the invaders. I won't be doing anything or contributing anything to your cause."
"Fine by me."
Kishin Douji grumbled and regenerated his fleshly body. His semi-transparent body turned red while his face looked more savage. However, as he manifested his body from nothingness, there was nothing to hide his naked body.
The appearance of a giant red Oni with a huge asset surprised the elves, who hadn't entered their new workplace yet.
"Red Oni?!"
"Why is an Oni savage here?!"
"Dammit. I thought those losers were extinct. It appears that one of them survived."
"Yeah, that's terrible. I wish Lady Eleanor or that perverted eyeball Sieg killed them all. They're unnecessary."
The comments of the elves annoyed Kishin, but he got used to it. He bit the tip of his tongue and spat out his blood. The droplet of blood expanded and transformed into gold samurai armor, covering his skin from head to toe.
The gold samurai crossed his arms and stared at Leo again.
"How do I pay?"
Leo shrugged and fiddled with his system. A few seconds later, the system screen in front of Kishin Douji prompted him with a message.
DING
<Will you pay 50% of your lifespan in exchange for Florida Man's protection?>
Kishin snorted, "Yes!"
DING
CHA-CHING
His lifespan was halved. Meanwhile, Leo received a different message.
<You have collected a total of 1,055,145,156 years of lifespan.>
<Your total lifespan has exceeded 2,147,483,647 years. The excess will be stored in the system bank.>
<Your current bank balance is 1,913,040,276 years.>
Leo grinned, proud of his achievement so far. At this rate, he might be able to purchase and fully upgrade a colony to expand his domain's resident limit.
After paying Leo, Kishin Douji turned around and glanced at his disciple. As Tang San was no longer useful to him, he decisively made a declaration.
"Tang San. From now on, you're no longer my disciple. You can do whatever you want from now on."
"W-Wait, what?!" Tang San was shocked. "But why, master?! What did I do wrong? Why are you expelling me?"
"I don't need to hide anymore, so I don't need you as my eyes and ears."
"But I haven't mastered your cultivation method yet!"
"That's none of my business."
Ruthlessly, Kishin Douji cast Tang San aside and walked away. He left the shopping complex through the main gate and shocked the local people outside.
.
Tang San was speechless. He gazed at his departing ex-mentor in confusion.
Emotions overwhelmed him. He thought that Kishin Douji was a sincere and helpful master. But in reality, he was being used.
"In the end, there's nobody for me to trust but myself." Tang San lamented.
Meowmeow who had been silent during the whole interaction patted Tang San's shoulder.
"You're right. You can't trust anybody but yourself. Also, if I may borrow my master's words, there's a saying: There's no free meal in this world. So yeah, he helped you for a reason. Without a benefit, why should he help you in the first place?"
"…"
Tang San slowly nodded. He looked back at the golem in wary.
"So, will you use me as well?"
Meowmeow giggled, "You're right, but you're also wrong."
"Huh?"
Leo coughed and interrupted their conversation before things escalated for the worse. He elaborated.
"In this place, we make it clear what our relationship is. I'm a vendor, and you're a customer. You want something from me, and I'm willing to exchange it for some of your lifespan. Whatever you wish, I'll procure it for you as long as you have enough lifespan to pay."
lightsnοvεl "Eh?"
"Let me explain how my domain works…"
Leo laughed as he slowly explained what his business scheme was.

chapters.title: Chapter 312 Florida Man Takes ’Junior Executive’ to a Whole New Level: Appoints Minor as Store Manager - Now Offering Candy as Employee of the Month Bonus!
chapters.content:
Chapter 312 Florida Man Takes 'Junior Executive' to a Whole New Level: Appoints Minor as Store Manager - Now Offering Candy as Employee of the Month Bonus!
?Chapter 312 – Florida Man Takes 'Junior Executive' to a Whole New Level: Appoints Minor as Store Manager - Now Offering Candy as Employee of the Month Bonus!
Several minutes later, Tang San understood everything. He was interested in Leo's shopping mall.
"Can I roam this place freely? Really?!"
Tang San had visited a few sects before, and their culture was different. For example, the Northern Star Sect, where his ex-fiancé and her new husband joined, never allowed outsiders to roam their territory to protect their Qi and cultivation resources in the sect. On the other hand, Leo operated a public shopping mall, which allowed visitors to stay and absorb the Qi in the environment.
"Yeah, you can."
"Can I absorb the Qi of this place, too?"
"Yes, you can."
"So, if I don't have enough essence cores to pay for the goodies, I can pay it with my lifespan?"
"Yes, you can."
"And I can work here to earn essence cores?"
"Yes, you can."
"Do I get free food from the shops here as well?"
"NOPE! You gotta pay. Don't trick me, kid."
"Ehehe. It's worth trying. Anyway, I would like to work for you. What job do I do?"
Leo pondered. He needed miscellaneous workers who could coordinate with the other employees in the store, but Tang San was too new here.
As Tang San wasn't suited for the task, he thought of other vacant positions in his store. Then, he remembered that there were plenty of entry-level jobs that Tang San could do.
"Can you swim, boy?" Asked Leo.
"Yes, sir."
Leo was relieved. He pointed at escalators, which led to the waterpark on the upper floor.
"There's a waterpark on the upper floor. I need a janitor for that place. You will assist my golems in managing the waterslides, machines, and sales booths."
"A janitor?" Tang San was surprised. In other sects, most cultivators employed commoners to work in such positions. "Me? A janitor?"
"Yes, you."
"B-But, sir. I'm a cultivator."
"I know."
"Can't you just hire some weak disciples or trainees?"
Leo rolled his eyes and glanced at the entrance of the mall. Tang San also noticed his eyes and followed his gaze.
On the first floor, not many people managed to get in. Aside from the elders of the Life Sword Sect, Esen's subordinates and Taxi's gang showed up to inspect the new changes.
Seeing less than a hundred people in the large shopping mall, Tang San remembered something.
"Ah, crap! The environment and the yin-yang essence in the air!" Tang San exclaimed.
"Right. I purposely increased the air conditioner's Qi output. I need to weed out those freeloaders in the shopping mall and give them a push. Otherwise, they will be too lazy and take things for granted."
Tang San didn't know about the previous conditions of Leo's shopping mall. He tilted his head, "What happened in the past, sir?"
"I allowed commoners and rogue cultivators to enter this place and encouraged them to open their stores on the second and third floor. Do you know what happened? They used this place as a cultivation hub or some sort. They loitered around here, leeching on my shopping mall's Qi instead of buying my stuff and going home."
Tang San nodded, "Ah, understandable. Weak cultivators are poor. I can understand why they did that."
"Anyway," Leo changed the topic. "There might not be many customers from around here, but some experts from other worlds might show up regularly. Some of them might be deities, sages, or entities. An immortal or a quasi-immortal like you is nothing in their eyes. Therefore, you aren't qualified for a better role yet."
"W-What? Other worlds?! You mean, the people from a higher world?"
"Something like that."
Tang San was excited, "Master… I mean, my former master told me that he was from a higher realm. Could you teach me what kind of places they are?"
Leo was tired of talking to this boy. He chased Tang San away, "Go to the upper floor and learn your job first. I'll lecture you when I'm free. I'm busy right now."
"…Oh."
Tang San was dejected. He lowered his shoulders and dragged his feet toward the escalators to the waterpark's floor.
.
After Tang San had left, Leo returned his attention to Meowmeow and whispered.
"Keep your eyes on the guy. I think he's a main character or something."
"I can tell." Meowmeow nodded and vanished. He became invisible and secretly followed Tang San.
The troublemakers were gone, but there was another annoying subordinate who had been waiting for Leo.
"What's up, my lord!"
Wu Buyi waved his hands. He had been patiently waiting for Leo to finish.
The alchemist wasn't the only one who came here to see Leo. Hua Jiashan and his people also arrived. When Leo looked at them, they saluted.
"Lord Florida Man…"
"Oh, boy." Leo sighed. This might take a while to explain.
.
.
In the end, Leo held a meeting with the top executives of his domain.
Tang Xuan, Tang Tian, Hua Jiasha, Dongfang Mei, Xu Nuan, Han Hao, Han Meng, Tiger Swordsman, Wu Buyi, Taxi, Ricardo, Marc, Ivy, Beatrice, Gao Yan, and Jin Yong attended the gathering.
Several hours after the explanation, everybody understood why Leo increased the density of the shopping mall's Qi. They were also stunned when they learned about the Qi generators and the new sources of immortal grass.
"I guess we're going to get busy from here on out." Tang Xuan visualized the busy workshops and factories, which would chug out countless longevity pills for sale.
Tang Tian believed he found the flaws in Leo's business scheme. He pointed out and warned Leo.
"Isn't this a method to cheat lifespan? We consume longevity pills to infinitely increase our lifespan. Then, we can exchange them for Lord Florida Man's artifacts and books."
Leo was aware of that. He tried to explain.
"Do you know what the maximum lifespan a person can have?"
"How many, my lord?"
"Two billion years."
"Two… WHAT?!"
Everybody counted their fingers. Wu Buyi even brought out toothpicks to count as he wondered how many zeros were there.
Two billion years was a long time to live. As the oldest among them was merely a thousand years old, they couldn't imagine what they would do in such a long time.
Cultivating in seclusion?
Enjoying the worldly matters?
Getting married and having many kids?
They daydreamed for a while. But everybody was quickly disillusioned by the abrupt questions in their mind.
What would happen if they suddenly forgot about the time during their seclusion and came out a million years later? Would their families and friends would be around at that time? Would anybody remember them at all?
What if the Yan Empire Planet was destroyed?
What would they live if Leo's domain was gone?
Would they be able to survive alone in the universe?
