The thoughts frightened them. Many faces turned pale.
Leo snickered as he had gone through that phase before. He reminded them.
"Cultivation takes years. As for myself, I've lived over 50,000 years. I've seen a glorious civilization being reduced to ruins. I've seen a tiny cute rat mutated into a gigantic monstrosity. I've witnessed the sky changing color from white to red, to green, to rainbow, and to orange within a minute. I saw a humongous meteorite colliding with the ocean and creating an apocalyptic flame that devoured the world. I've dove into the deepest ocean floor and met the mutated creatures of myths. Well, life is about the exploration of the unknown. You shouldn't fear the immortality."
Everybody came back to their senses. They felt a lot better.
Leo reminded them, "Living a short and meaningful life is good and all, but you guys have the privilege that no mortal can have. You should enjoy it. Don't be afraid of living a long life even though it's such a pain sometimes."
The elders laughed as they understood it.
Tang Xuan's mood got a lot better. He came up with an idea.
"My lord. Since you're limiting access to your shopping complex, commoners and weak cultivators can no longer patronize your store. Without your help, their cultivation progress may likely stagnate due to the lack of cultivation resources. I would like to suggest that you should distribute the stores to the minor areas to expand your influence."
Leo tilted his head, "In short, you want me to open a branch for the commoners?"
"Yes. That's exactly what I'm trying to suggest."
Leo glanced at the others, "What about you guys? Do you want me to open new branches of my store in other places?"
Wu Buyi rubbed his hands, "Yes, of course! Your wares are too great to be kept exclusive in this place. There are still many islands and continents in this world that we haven't explored or visited. Just like you said, our life is long. We should explore everything and make it worth it!"
"…"
Leo frowned. He had flown around this planet several times, and he had already explored the map of this world. Aside from the Yan Continent, there were only three minor islands with civilizations.
Moreover, the islanders were mostly commoners. Even the local cultivators had a lower standard strength than the mainland.
"They are a bunch of commoners and weak cultivators, though."
"That's our point, my lord." Tang Xuan stressed, "We should increase the number of our customers and the strength of our world. By raising the commoners, you get more potential subordinates that you can employ in the future. Aren't you lacking helpers, my lord?"
"…"
Again, Tang Xuan hit his black heart. He couldn't help but agree.
"Alright. But who will be in charge of the new branch."
Suddenly, everybody raised their hands. Their eyes brightened as if they were kids who had found their favorite toys.
"Me!"
"Pick me!"
"Mine!"
"Me!"
Leo was speechless. He looked around and noticed that Gao Yan and Jin Yong also raised their hands.
"Even you?" Leo wryly smiled.
"Ehehe. We… just want to travel." Gao Yan bashfully laughed.
"…"
Leo had a headache. He couldn't decide as nobody seemed trustworthy enough for the job. After all, they all had an ulterior motive.
While Leo was in deep thought, Cat suddenly exited the alchemy workshop and walked toward Leo. She tugged his clothes.
"Papa, where nom-nom meow?"
"…"
Leo looked down and found Cat, who looked like a middle-grade schooler in the modern world. Because of her tanned skin and long ears, she looked like a cute dark elf.
Recognizing Cat, Leo patted her.
"Thanks for calling me 'Papa', Cat. But this daddy is busy."
"But my nom-nom?"
"Hmm."
Leo suddenly had an idea. He looked around and came up with an idea.
"If you take the role as the branch manager, you must take Cat along with you."
"EH?!"
The crowd was shocked. They looked at Cat in one direction.
Cat was also quick to learn. She mischievously grinned and urged Leo.
"Papa. I want someone kind and generous. I want nom-nom!"
"Oh hoh?"
Leo smirked. He had a clear idea who he could appoint as the new branch manager.

chapters.title: Chapter 313 Florida Man Accepts Celebrity’s Dinner Invitation, Promises to Leave the Alligators at Home (Maybe)
chapters.content:
Chapter 313 Florida Man Accepts Celebrity’s Dinner Invitation, Promises to Leave the Alligators at Home (Maybe)
?Chapter 313 – Florida Man Accepts Celebrity's Dinner Invitation, Promises to Leave the Alligators at Home (Maybe)
A day later…
In the early morning, Leo, Cat, Hua Jiashan, Tang Xuan, and the local elders visited the slum district.
Although this place was nicknamed as a slum, the buildings and the streets were clean and new. No beggars, hoodlums, or thieves roamed this place. Instead, wealthy merchants and cultivators could be seen everywhere.
Most of the buildings near the main roads ran a business. Street markets, stalls, brothels, pill pavilions, and miscellaneous service centers offered a variety of merchandise and services. 70% of the local goods were second-hand items that his customers had bought from his store. Still, the rest were items that the merchants procured from elsewhere.
Leo looked around and was amazed by the sheer volume of the second-hand goods. There were even knock-off stores that sold similar food as his FFC shop, but they used regular chickens.
"Wow. They're quite developed." Leo couldn't help but praise them.
Hua Jiashan bitterly smiled as he recognized some of the faces in the slum. The townsmen who lived near his former sect all migrated here, and they settled down here.
"If we count the population of Magpie City, there should be more than 20,000 people here." Hua Jiashan estimated.
Tang Xuan disagreed. As his clan managed this area, he knew the exact number. "120,000 people, actually. 30,000 are commoners. The rest are cultivators."
"That many?!" Leo was stunned.
Tang Xuan bitterly laughed. "You never visited us, so you weren't aware of the recent influx of immigrants. Also, there have been rumors about the changing climate recently. People from the north testified that the winter this year comes early."
Leo deeply frowned, "Wasn't the previous winter 4-5 months ago?"
"Yes. That's why people are panicking. They seek a warmer place because they thought that Yin monsters are emerging."
"How odd. I don't sense any strong monsters in the north though. I even flew to space several times during the past months, and I don't see any unusual creature."
"That's why we're treating this matter as unfounded rumors, but we have already dispatched an investigation team to investigate the climate last week. We hope to get an answer soon."
Leo nodded. He looked ahead while they were strolling on the main road.
"Let's change the topic. Since we chatted about the new branch yesterday, we need a suitable location for the local people."
"Yes. Let's secure the land in the middle of the town. I think the Shang Merchant Group owns it. We should be able to purchase his land and get the ideal location."
Leo flinched. He looked at Tang Xuan.
"I'm the freaking owner of this domain. Why the hell do I have to buy land from someone else?!"
Tang Xuan broke a sweat. He forgot about it.
"Please excuse my blunder. For a moment there, my old habit resurfaces. I thought I was still working for the Yan Emperor."
"…"
Leo waved his hand and disregarded the mistake. He deeply sighed.
"Welp. Since they claim my land as their own, I might as well avoid unnecessary conflicts."
"But I'm sure those commoners will return your land if you ask though."
"Meh. Then, I would have to clear the old buildings and redesign the paved stone roads here. They worked so hard to terraform a forest into a city. I should respect that."
Leo complained as he was too lazy to deal with the local people. However, to the local residents, his decision was an act of kindness. Some of the eavesdropping townsmen shed a tear of gratitude.
Tang Xuan also secretly cleaned his eyes with his clothes. He brightly smiled.
"As you wish, we will not touch the local people's properties and their hard work. But where should we establish the branch office, my lord?"
Leo deeply sighed and levitated to the sky.
Seeing that Leo took flight, all the elders followed him. They also looked around to see if there were any unclaimed land.
Unfortunately, all usable lands were occupied. Even the Magpie City's walls were torn down so that the slum could merge with the former city.
Tang Xuan checked the southern area, but he quickly abandoned the thoughts. Half of Leo's domain territory was his farmland, where his automatons cultivated unique vegetables and fruits. As they were the only source of alchemy ingredients and food, they were irreplaceable. Thus, replacing some of the farmland for a new office wasn't ideal.
Hua Jiashan flew further west to see the extent of the slum district, and he was surprised. Beyond the Magpie City to the west, Hua Jiashan saw a thousand groups of carpenters and merchants building roads and wooden structures to expand the city. He rushed back to report Leo.
"My lord. The western area of Magpie City should be suitable. The commoners are building a new town there. If we erect a new branch over there, we can accelerate their growth. Moreover, the citizens won't be congested near the main store where our immortals and deities reside. With this move, we can segregate the mortal zone from the immortal zone." Hua Jiashan suggested.
Tang Xuan agreed. "Indeed. If we look closer to the main roads, we can see dense traffic of carriages and wagons near the main store. But to the west area, the roads are almost empty. If we establish a branch there, the traffic will shift toward the new branch and relieve the traffic over here."
Leo was curious. He followed Hua Jiashan to the western outskirts of Magpie City. The group also tagged along with him.
Upon arrival, Leo saw what Hua Jiashan had seen, but he inspected further west. Beyond the land that Hua Jiashan had scouted was a tall mountain range. West of the mountains, the west coast of the continent and the sea blocked the town's expansion.
"Ah, a weird combination of mountains and sea," Leo smirked. He rubbed his chin and visited the mountain.
The mountain range emitted no Qi. Upon landing, Leo immediately spat on it and hoped to see some changes.
Unfortunately, nothing happened.
Leo tilted his head as he figured that the spit might not be enough. He shamelessly unzipped his pants and started spraying holy water.
"…"
Tang Xuan and the other followers froze. Their expressions darkened. On the other hand, Cat widened her eyes and complained.
"PAPA! WHAT A WASTE OF NOM-NOM MEOW! YOU SHOULD HAVE GIVEN THAT PRECIOUS NOM-NOM FERTILIZER TO ME, MEOW!"
"…"
Again, except for an individual, Cat's complaints stunned the crowd. Her words reminded them that she was originally a dryad, not a regular cultivator.
Wu Buyi was the only one laughing at Cat's remark. He teased her.
"Indeed, an adult's piss contains a lot of nutrition for a plant girl like you. If you suddenly open a toilet service and allow men to piss on you, I bet you will be so rich! BAHAHAHAHA!!"
"…"
The crowd glared at Wu Buyi for making such a sick joke. The girls were disgusted, but a certain follower of Esen secretly giggled.
The woman mustered her courage and embraced the shame. She approached Wu Buyi and chatted with him for the first time while Ivy and Marc dropped their jaws.
Beatrice floated next to Wu Buyi and gave him a faint smile.
"Sir Alchemist, your logic sounds interesting. I've been a death knight for over a thousand years, but I never encountered someone as shameless as you."
Wu Buyi puffed his chest, "Thanks for the compliment, lady!"
"Say, I would like to learn more about your unique wisdom. Would you like to join me for dinner so we can discuss daos?"
At that moment, all men especially Marc almost screamed from shock and disbelief.
Beatrice invited Wu Buyi for dinner?!
Was Hell frozen?! – The men thought.
Did it snow in summer?! – The women thought.
Was Thailand free of ladyboys?! – Wu Buyi thought.
Did Florida ban guns?! – Leo thought.
Although speechless, Wu Buyi regained his composure and changed his voice.
"I would love to, but I'm a busy man. I need to refine my alchemy skills by studying in the workshop. I'm afraid I don't have time for the conversation."
"What a shame." Beatrice sighed, "I reserved the hotel's buffet restaurant. I guess I might have to invite someone else-"
"Not necessary. I'll go. Hotel's buffet, right?" Wu Buyi changed his mind.
The hotel that they referred to was the hotel where Leo and Esen got officially married. The building was still at the same place and was operated by Dongfang Mei and Xu Nuan.
The hotel rooms were mostly vacant due to the high fees. However, several cultivators from the slum sometimes spent their hard-earned essence stones or lifespan to book a room, treating this place as a haven for cultivation and relaxation.
Wu Buyi also loved the hotel's facilities and their food. Although the sources of food came from the same places, the hotel offered a buffet service, which Wu Buyi enjoyed the most.
"Well, FFC was good for breakfast, but the hotel's buffet service is too good to ignore. If you insist, I would like to accept your invitation, my lady!"
Beatrice giggled, "Sure. Let's continue our chat tonight, okay?"
"Of course!"
Everyone stared at the two as if they were looking at emerging Godzilla giving birth to a dinosaur. Nobody could describe a word of their feeling.
Marc turned around and hugged Ivy. He sniffed and cried as he couldn't bear seeing his biological sister going after another man.
Ivy grinned and hugged Marc back. She then excused herself and brought the heartbroken boy to the hotel. While she was about to leave, she winked at Beatrice, who also secretly gave her a thumbs up.
No one among the crowd could foresee what Ivy would do to Marc, but they would learn about their new relationship in the future.
"AHEM!"
Leo had enough of the soap opera drama. He coughed and regained everybody's attention.
"I'm going to build the branch near the mountain. Also, I'll be building extra houses and other structures nearby. Be prepared for the changes!"

chapters.title: Chapter 314 Floridian Man Declares Independence from Obligations, Declines to Toss Precious Alchemy Ingredient into Lava Party
chapters.content:
Chapter 314 Floridian Man Declares Independence from Obligations, Declines to Toss Precious Alchemy Ingredient into Lava Party
﻿﻿Chapter 314 – Floridian Man Declares Independence from Obligations, Declines to Toss Precious Alchemy Ingredient into Lava Party
RUMBLE
The surface of the mountain absorbed Leo's fluid and underwent a transformation. The plain rocky mountain range turned black like the northern black mountain. The mineral spread like how spilled ink painted a sheet of white paper black.
However, the spread never stopped as the transformation process entered the next stage. The area where Leo had sprayed his urine glittered in rainbow color, evolving into the spiritual core of the entire mountain.
The core had a unique shape of a 2-inch thick and one square foot block. The surface of the square core was coarse and sharp. The needles of the core's skin were so tiny that regular humans couldn't see them with naked eyes.
Leo gazed at the mountain and waited for the transformation to finish. He also appraised the square core.
.
Spiritual Heart of Planet Eater
This spiritual heart has been created by the transcended being 'Florida Man'. It contains a portion of his bodily liquid and his daos, which transforms a clump of dirt into a sentient being.
This newborn spiritual heart has yet to gain intelligence even though it has just awakened its sentient. It also lacks a soul as its creator hasn't bestowed it a soul yet. Until it acquires a soul and links its karma with a karma river, it cannot function as a sentient being.
Although it lacks a soul and intelligence, the spiritual heart automatically absorbs yin and yang Qi in the area and uses them to transform the natural material around it into soul stones. However, should any non-material lifeform touch it, the spiritual heart can mistake the being as a source of Qi and attempt to consume the being as nutrition.
This precious resource is the key ingredient for Omnipresent Drive, which is the common standard engine for space colonies and dreadnaught-class battleships. If left alone, it will slowly consume everything on the planet and terraform everything into a soul stone star, which will eventually evolve into a galactic being 'Planet Eater'.
Actions Recommendations
1. This spiritual heart seems dangerous at a glance, but it is a rare resource that you can exploit. By sending inorganic life forms to mine it, you can extract a lot of soul stones from the converted minerals. However, it is recommended to return some materials to the spiritual heart so that it has something to convert. Otherwise, its survival instinct will drive it crazy and attack everybody on the planet for food.
2. This spiritual heart can be used in alchemy. The recipe is as follows;
[Seed of the Void Tree]
One spiritual heart
One million soul stones
One dantian crystal of a transcended being
One true entity fate crystal
.
Leo wryly smiled and shook his head. Sometimes, he was confused about how he managed to create something so weird out of the blue.
"I often pee everywhere, but I never turned anything into this… blasphemous rock! How the hell does my body work?!"
Because of Leo's comment, the others were curious about what Leo had just created.
"What's wrong, my lord?" Asked Han Hao.
"Ah, I just gave birth to a planet eater. I don't know how, but I think I might have to remove this thing after it's done transforming the entire mountain range into soul stones."
"S-Soul stones? W-What's that?" As Han Hao and others had never seen soul stones before, they wondered what they were.
"Well, imagine this. You have essence stones and spirit stones in your world, right?"
"Yes."
"Soul stones are like the higher tier of those stones. By combining a thousand essence stones together, you get one soul stone. It contains a lot more Qi than what you have. Got it?"
Han Hao and everybody were moved as they couldn't believe that Leo just created more cultivation resources for them. If they could grovel in the sky, they would have done so.
While everybody was overjoyed by the changes, Kishin Douji had another reaction. The Oni Overlord noticed the aura and flew by to take a look. But when he noticed the spiritual heart, his expression turned dark.
"What are you doing, Florida Man!? Why are you creating a planet eater here?! Are you trying to wage war with THAT overlord?!"
"That overlord? Who?"
Kishin Douji yelled, "The transcendent Overlord Planet Devourer! Those planet eaters are not something that you should take lightly! When I was governing the universe, they were the most troublesome race! Do you know that if you leave one of them alone for a year, they will devour a galaxy and evolve into a karmic sovereign?!"
Leo was surprised, but something didn't make sense there.
"If they could quickly evolve into karmic sovereigns, how the heck did you subdue them?"
Kishin Douji snorted, "During my reign, fate crystals weren't a thing. Those planet eaters move by instincts. I mixed some karma river of this universe with a random gas star and sent it their way. When they ate the poisoned star, the karma river digested them from the inside and melted them into gas!"
"Oh, so we can just easily kill them with this method, then."
Kishin Douji facepalmed, "Didn't you hear what I said? This method worked before fate crystals became a thing. Overlord Planet Devourer got his hands on an entity fate crystal, and he got a system. His system power, if I remember correctly, is the Arkachic Record System. He can read the past, present, and future whenever he wants. His prediction rate is close to 100%."
lightsnοvεl "…Whoa."
"Let me tell you a story, you idiot. Overlord Sieg of Fate Stadium and Overlord Priscilla of Rainbow Phoenixes once teamed up to eradicate the planet eaters under Overlord Planet Devourer. That bastard predicted the event and counterattacked. Do you know what happened? Priscilla and Sieg lost half of their soldiers and were forced to retreat!"
"…"
"That's not all. That fight took place 50,000 years ago. By now, they should have amassed at least a dozen transcendent beings among their ranks."
"…Then, why haven't they invaded the elves and the others yet if they are so strong?"
Kishin Douji flinched. He hesitated if he should reveal a piece of sensitive information. But after a few seconds of contemplation, Kishin confessed.
"The Void Tree."
"The Void Tree?"
This was the first time that Leo had heard about the Void Tree from someone else. He reread the alchemy recipe.
[Seed of Void Tree]
This piqued his interest. Leo probed for more information.
"What is the Void Tree?"
Kishin Douji snorted, "You know nothing, don't you? Fine, I'll teach you baboons a lesson. In the past before fate crystals exist, there was no such thing as 'Void Tree'. Only world trees exist in the universe, and the highest cultivation base ceiling was once the karmic sovereign realm."
The Oni Lord narrated a story.
.
.
Before Eleanor, Sieg, or Priscilla could become an overlord, Kishin Douji was the sole ruler of the universe. His force maintained order and peace in various worlds, so no individual could bully another weaker race.
But one day, a void tree suddenly appeared out of nowhere. The mushroom-like transparent tree instantly devoured several karma rivers of the universe and grew its size.
When Kishin Douji first saw it, it was already bigger than the Milky Way Galaxy, and it kept growing. At first, he thought it was another form of the uprising planet eaters, so he mobilized his force to subdue it.
The campaign failed before Kishin Douji's army could even touch the tree. When his troops got close, it revealed its aura of a transcended being, repelling everybody away. Then, Kishin Douji heard its voice.
"People of the lower dimension, hear me. I am the owner of the Void Tree, the Void Principality. I am from the higher dimension, and I am searching for candidates to join my universe."
The voice was so loud that everybody in the universe could hear it. Kishin Douji Army was the closest to the tree and got hit by the loud sound.
His people were critically injured. Everybody retreated to their headquarters while Kishin Douji remained behind to listen to the tree.
The Void Tree then produced countless fruits, which were known as fate crystals. It scattered the crystals to every corner of the universe.
"For fairness, I have scattered fate crystals in your universe. In the next 100,000 years, those who possess a leaf of this tree shall be qualified to enter my universe!"
That was the end of the message. Afterward, powerful experts emerged one after another. Kishin Douji and his army were besieged by all his enemies and rebels, forcing him to abdicate his throne and surrender to Eleanor.
.
.
After hearing the full story of the Void Tree, Leo and the elders were amazed.
"Wow, really? A higher dimension?" The humans and the Molgs were astonished.
Kishin Douji stared into Leo's eyes and then glanced at Cat. He wanted to say something, but he changed his mind. Instead, he continued with his story.
"At the moment, Overlord Devourer's forces surround the Void Tree and monopolize the area. From what I heard from Eleanor's minions, those guys attempted to eat the tree, but the tree fought back. Well, they're stupid enough to pick a fight with the hands that helped them."
"In short, they have a better prey." Leo summarized.
"Yes. That's why we shouldn't create another planet eater and get their attention! Just hurry and remove that seedling!"
"…"
Leo closed his eyes and was about to remove the seed. But then, he remembered the time when he listened to Hua Jiashan during the mushroom incident.
He hated being manipulated. In addition, Kishin Douji seemed like he was hiding something.
Mimicking a certain LOTR meme, Leo's face looked similar to Maxim Baldry's in the movie.
"No…"
"YOU!!"
Leo spat on the spiritual heart, accelerating its growth.
"Unfortunately, sir. My name is Florida Man. I am CHAOS! WE LIVE IN A SOCIETY!"
"YOU MANIAC!!"
RUMBLE
The heart rapidly expanded its reach. Instantly, the entire mountain became soul stones, and the soil turned dark.
Although Leo sounded crazy, he immediately pulled the heart off the ground before the expansion could reach the town. He stored the heart in his inventory and brightly grinned.
"Just kidding. Done!"
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 315 Florida Man Discovers Backyard Guest: Killer Whale Taking a Vacation from the Ocean!
chapters.content:
Chapter 315 Florida Man Discovers Backyard Guest: Killer Whale Taking a Vacation from the Ocean!
?Chapter 315 – Florida Man Discovers Backyard Guest: Killer Whale Taking a Vacation from the Ocean!
In the deepest void, known as the Abyssal Star Sector, the former territory of Kishin Douji was located there. However, his solar system was replaced by a galactic entity – The Void Tree.
The Void Tree was a giant semi-transparent purple tree floating in the middle of the void. It had already grown five times larger than what Kishin Douji had witnessed before.
The tree trunk was straight and smooth like a refined cylinder, but the top of the tree split into branches, which sprouted countless rainbow triangle leaves. Each was as large as Earth's total flat surface area.
Those were void leaves that Kishin Douji had mentioned. They were the tickets to the higher realm that the Void Principality had advertised.
On the branches of Void Tree, a million sparkling crystals of various sizes glittered, drawing anyone who had the opportunity to see them closer. However, nobody got the chance to admire them.
Surrounding the Void Tree were a thousand whales, which swam in the void. They had a hundred eyeballs. Each was two billion times bigger than the Solar System's Sun. In addition, their savage mouths were so wide that they could swallow any star whole, except for the Void Tree.
The space whales were known as the Planet Eaters. They were the mutated neutron stars, which absorbed enough Qi and waste from thoughtless cultivators and entities in the universe. They gained sentient and copied the emotions of every lifeform they ate.
Among the planet eaters, one was larger than the rest. It was as large as a billion-star galaxy. Unlike the others, its entire body was made of countless fleshy masses, animal limbs, eyeballs of various sizes, and crimson tentacles. This anomalous being nested on top of the Void Tree, claiming it as its home.
The giant planet eater was none other than Overlord Planet Devourer, one of the three transcended beings in the universe other than Leo and Priscilla.
Suddenly, Planet Devourer opened one of its million eyes and woke up from slumber. The eyeball shifted left and right as if it were searching for something.
"Was it my imagination?" Planet Devourer uttered.
He sensed the shift in the current timeline. His predicted future was off by 0.1%, causing some of the future images in his mind to glitch.
"Who was it that interfered with my future? My chance of ascension should be 100%, not 99.9%. Priscilla and Sieg are supposed to fight each other to the death. Eleanor should have killed Ellen and stolen her body. After she consumes Esen, she would have ascended as the fourth transcended being… Ah, right. That information was outdated. How long have I been sleeping?"
That prediction was over 50,000 years ago. He had been sleeping for a long time after he drove off Priscilla and Sieg's coalition forces.
Planet Devourer suffered from a similar symptom as any human cultivator. He was too absorbed in cultivation that he forgot about time. To him, repeating his Qi circulation was so addictive that he never wished to end it.
Still, that 0.1% change made him hesitate. Even if it was a one-in-a-thousand chance, the probability of him failing to ascend was too high.
Unless he could guarantee his ascension, he couldn't sleep peacefully.
Paranoid, Planet Devourer closed his eyes and activated his ultimate system ability – The Akashic Record System.
DING
<Please input your command.>
"Recalculate my chance of ascending to the higher realm!>
DING
<You have a 99.8% chance of entering the higher realm!>
The probability dropped again. This alarmed the overlord.
"Which factor or variable contributes to my failure of ascension?"
DING
<Individuals who possess at least one true entity fate crystal have emerged.>
The million eyes of the grotesque whale snapped open. It bellowed in anger.
<The following individuals are qualified as variables…>
<1. Overlord P. *Error* Data Redacted Due to True Fate Crystal.>
<2. Overlord E. *Error* Data Redacted Due to True Fate Crystal.>
<3. Overlord L. *Error* Data Redacted Due to True Fate Crystal.>
<4. Overlord S. *Error* Data Redacted Due to True Fate Crystal.>
Upon seeing the list, Planet Devourer narrowed his eyes. He spread his sense throughout the universe and read everybody's karma. The past events of the universe flashed in his mind as if he saw through countless memories of fallen souls.
Then, he saw the series of events involving Eleanor, who contributed to the changes the most. Then, the face of a male divine elf appeared.
He was none other than Aslan Ariel, who ensured the safety of his two children. However, the faces of the children blurred as if a higher power interfered with his calculation and memory reading.
Although Planet Devourer couldn't see their faces, he could still read someone else's memory to learn of their identities. He started following the movements of Aslan and Eleanor, whom he could read.
The names of two individuals came up – Leonardo Ariel and Simba Ariel.
"Heh. Akashic Record, is Overlord L. and Overlord S., by chance, Overlord Leonardo Ariel and Overlord Simba Ariel?" Planet Devourer asked the system.
<There is no evidence of those individuals being the same person.>
"Of course! True Entity Fate Crystals probably conceal their identity. Even you can't confirm it. But how about this? What are the chances that those people I listed are the same person?"
<The probability is 75%>
The percentage was not low, but it was not that high either. Despite the uncertainty, Planet Devourer was certain that they might be connected.
As he couldn't rely on the true entity fate crystal's system to reveal all information regarding other competitors, he could only rely on his ability. He continued calculating karma to find the truth.
Planet Devourer also changed his approach. Instead of following people around Simba and Leo, he spied on Priscilla and Sieg.
Again, as both transcendent beings possessed true entity fate crystals, there wasn't much to see. However, he witnessed the collapse of Fate Stadium and the brief moment when Sieg was killed by Priscilla.
"Aha! As I've predicted, they indeed killed each other in the end. But that's weird. One of them was supposed to be half-dead, but Priscilla are still in good condition. What did…"
Planet Devourer rewinded the video-like event memory to see what went wrong.
Then, a man with a blurred face came into the picture. He briefly made contact with Sieg, and they fought. At first, Sieg almost caught the person, but the man was too slippery. After a couple exchanges, Sieg fell into the man's trap and suffered a critical injury. Then, Priscilla ambushed Sieg and stole his fate crystals.
"Ah, so this was why the calculation went wrong. Priscilla survives the ordeal, and she is healthy enough to pose a minor threat to me. Well, I just need to get rid of her, and my chance should be 100% again!"
Planet Devourer burst into laughter. He simulated the future without Priscilla in his mind. While he was at it, he asked the system to help him calculate.
"What if I hunt down [Overlord P] and kill her first? What would my chance of ascension be?"
<After the variable 'Overlord P' is removed from the calculation, your chance of ascension is 99.9999999%>
"Ha! As I thought!"
Planet Devourer was relieved. Still, the probability was not 100%.
"So, the other variables are insignificant. Even if the three combine forces, they only have one in a billion chance to defeat me. I can just remove one more and ensure my safety. But then again, I should focus on Priscilla first. She's the strongest variable after all."
Planet Devourer slowly rose from the top of the void tree. He bellowed and commanded everybody.
"ASSEMBLE TROOPS! WE WILL LAUNCH A FULL-SCALE ASSAULT ON THE PHOENIX STAR SECTOR! THOSE BIRDS ARE DESTINED TO BE EXTINCT!"
The planet eaters jolted and gazed at their lord. They all turned around and swam in one direction in unison.
After sending his subordinates to attack Priscilla's territory, Planet Devourer smirked and closed his eyes. He used another ability of the Akashic Record System.
"Play me the future events when I and Priscilla fight. I want to see the results!"
DING
A thousand video clips of their fight played in Planet Devourer's mind.
Out of a thousand different fights, Planet Devourer came out as a victor 999 times. However, there was one future that he lost. The video was also glitchy and incomprehensible.
Planet Devourer opened his eyes and frowned. This wasn't the first time that glitched prediction appeared. Whenever it showed up, it implied that other variables intercepted that future.
"So, she got some help from other variables? That's annoying. But she is destined to die by my hands. Even if she manages to win, she can't possibly kill me! I have void leaves inside me! I can't possibly be killed by another transcendent being! HAHAHAHAHA!!"
Planet Devourer kicked the void tree and followed his subordinates, swimming the void toward his destination.
But suddenly, a faint signal from a faraway star pricked Planet Devourer's skin. One of his eyes shifted and gazed in the direction by reflex.
The eyeball squinted and transmitted the sense to the overlord's soul. Then, Planet Devourer stopped on his track and turned around in confusion.
"Huh? A newborn planet eater?"
For a minute, Planet Devourer hesitated. As his kin could never reproduce, new blood was more precious than fate crystals. However, he already ordered his troops to move. It would be illogical to personally travel across the universe and bring back a newborn baby at the moment.
"Tsk. I'll just send one of the soldiers to fetch it, then. Hey, number 47. Come here!"
HOOOOM
One of the eyeball whales turned around and stopped in front of Planet Devourer. The karmic sovereign monster beamed his boss with a heinous smile, showing ten thousand piercing sharp fangs full of cavities and grimes.
"See over there?" Planet Devourer pointed in the general direction of what he had sensed earlier.
The whale nodded and continued smiling.
"There's a newborn kin over there. Go fetch the new blood and come back to join the troops. Make sure to bring back some herb stars for the baby to eat. Remember, the more population on the stars, the better. Babies need memories and emotions of the living to grow."
The whale nodded again. He wagged his giant tail and swam through the void at light speed, vanishing into the distance.
After sending his servant off, Planet Devourer turned around and followed his troops.
"Hahahaha! It's over, Priscilla. Your fate crystals can't help you anymore! Once I'm done with your population, I'll mutate you into a seedbed for our kin. Then, we can populate this universe!"
.
.
Meanwhile, at the surface of a floating platform in the void, a giant naked woman sat in front of a divine elf, who was seated on a couch.
Ellen, the current queen of Divine Elf and the president of the DEZNUTS council had a private meeting with her new ally – Overlord Priscilla.
Next to Ellen, two entities sat on the same couch. They were Overlord Lucky and Overlord Xiaomao, who also formed a truce with the Divine Elf after the collapse of the Fate Stadium.
Priscilla gazed at the three. She smiled at Ellen.
"How was the true entity fate crystal? Is it useful?"
Ellen's expression grimaced. She understood the weight of the treasure.
Although unwilling, Ellen adhered to the promise, "As promised, the Divine Elf will cooperate with the Phoenix Race. We will join forces to fight Planet Eaters and secure the Void Tree together."
"Good. Now, about you two…"
Priscilla gazed at Overlord Xiaomao, who was an elderly fisherman.
"Overlord Xiaomao, would you like one of the true entity fate crystals as well? I can guarantee its usefulness."

chapters.title: Chapter 316 Hungry Killer Whale Mistakes Ohio Man as Takeout Special. Ohio Man Claims He’s Just Making a Protein Shake after Workout.
chapters.content:
Chapter 316 Hungry Killer Whale Mistakes Ohio Man as Takeout Special. Ohio Man Claims He's Just Making a Protein Shake after Workout.
?Chapter 316 – Hungry Killer Whale Mistakes Ohio Man as Takeout Special. Ohio Man Claims He's Just Making a Protein Shake after Workout.
Florida Domain
After converting the entire mountain range into a soul stone mine, Leo stopped messing around. He elevated a square kilometer of land and opened his online shopping system.
All system buildings were available for purchase. Leo handpicked the basic infrastructure-related items first.
A water supply system and electric generators were implemented first as they were necessary for the local population. Instantly, waterworks buildings occupied the land.
Two electric pylons stood at the edge of the land. Gigantic water curing tanks emerged. At the same time, it created a large water tunnel system underneath until it reached the nearest water source, aka the sea.
In front of the drainage tubes, a small array prevented small fish, sea creatures, and microorganisms from entering the factory. They got stuck in a transparent barrier and were pushed away by the current.
The pylon towers drained Qi in the environment to generate electricity, which the water curing factory required. The pumps absorbed seawater into the facility, where the desalination took place. Electric Qi from the pylon towers hasten the chemical reactions, extracting salt and substances from the seawater.
Within five seconds after the factory's creation, raw water was poured into the first storage tank. Then, the water underwent another curing process, making it safe for consumption.
Leo observed the automated facility and distributed status points to a few attributes. The facilities and equipment were upgraded, and the tank capacity was enhanced. 20 mannequins rose up from the ground and began managing the facilities and water tanks.
After setting up the basic infrastructure for the mortal town, Leo elevated more terrain and paved concrete roads, outlining the future city plan of this district. The roads extended to the expanding slum area and connected with their small streets.
Leo didn't stop there. He explored the logistical items in his shopping system and found an underground tunnel structure.
"Aha!"
He giggled and waved his hands, strengthening the ground underneath the slum district. Then, he inserted a new system structure under the town.
RUMBLE
An underground tunnel road manifested. The excess dirt, stones, and minerals transformed into reinforced pillars and walls, stabilizing the expressway.
Leo finalized the creation. He linked the entrance of the expressway to the main road of his shopping mall domain. The two roads automatically adjusted and connected together.
"Whoops. Underground drainages. I forgot."
As if Leo was possessed by Lloyd Frontera 'The Great Engineer', he meticulously adjusted the structures and ensured the safety and stability of the passageway. However, his expression wasn't as ugly as the original.
An hour passed. Leo wiped his face with a wet towel and admired the empty road.
"Alright. The logistic highway is completed. Now, I just invest in the general store, a warehouse, and other business ventures."
Leo rubbed his hands. His fingers moved like professional gamers in LOL tournaments, pressing a hundred buttons and purchasing a thousand items.
RUMBLE
A humble one-story shopping mall was erected in the middle of the empty land, 200 meters away from the main road. The front empty area turned into an open parking lot.
Behind the mall, a large warehouse appeared and linked with the shopping mall. As usual, mannequins emerged from the warehouse and assumed the role of the warehouse workers.
The store also got its employees. 20 automatons and five supervisor golems appeared to manage the store.
RUMBLE The inaugural upload of this chapter took place via /n/ov/el/b/in.
20 high-rise condominiums manifested around the block, surrounding the shopping mall. Each came with a parking lot building, allowing the residents to own land vehicles. Every building also received basic electricity and water supply from the factory, west of the second shopping mall.
Besides the skyscrapers, Leo purchased pre-made empty townhouses, just in case the new residents didn't like living in a tall building. Those houses were close to the main roads, which could be renovated into small stores in the future.
For the finishing touch, Leo planted small signboards and manually wrote the same sentences.
[FOR SALE! CONTACT FLORIDA MAN FOR DETAILS!]
Leo patted his hands and muttered in satisfaction.
"Done!"
The crowd gazed at the new structures in astonishment. Tang Xuan and Tang Tian gawked at the condominiums and drooled.
Both men had visited Leo's eastern hotel before. They knew how modern and comfortable the beds were, and they were envious of the new residents.
"S-Senior Florida Man," Tang Tian rubbed his hands. "Although we have already reached the celestial rank, can some of us live here?"
Leo rolled his eyes and pointed at the shopping complex's building, where another condominium stood on top of the mall.
"You geezers can't live here. If you want a condo room to live in, you can only buy a room and live there. Of course, each room contains a WHOLE ANOTHER WOLRD inside. Therefore, buying the entire room can be pricey. But if you don't mind living in a smaller quarter, I can allocate a place for you to establish a manor or a mansion inside that condo-verse."
"…Condo-verse?"
"You'll understand when you see those places." Leo sighed and changed the subject, "Cat! Come here!"
Cat jolted as she didn't expect Leo to call her over. She rushed to her father.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
Leo patted Cat's head, "No nom-nom at the moment. But it is time for you to learn how to earn some cash on your own. From now on, you will be the guardian of the second shopping mall over here."
Cat didn't actually understand her role. She tilted her head.
"Then, can I get some nom-nom?"
Leo explained, "You will receive food from the logistic officers every morning, afternoon, evening, and midnight. However, you will have to work to get those free food."
"EEEEEEHHHH?!"
Like any child, Cat didn't understand the adult concept and why she should work. If she wanted food, she could easily hunt some stray cockatrices, thunder caimans, or mad cows at the cow level.
"What's the point of working for Nom-Nom, meow?"
Leo deeply sighed, "If you work here, you will be worshiped as the local lord. The townsmen will naturally bring offerings for you in exchange for your protection. All you need to do is sit on top of the shopping mall and prevent mishaps from happening. For example, if an idiot tries to rob the store, you have the duty to catch and eat the thieves. Got it?"
"OH! So thieves can be NOM-NOMed?"
"Correct!"
"I love this job! Let me work and Nom-Nom everybody, meow!"
"Hey. You can't just eat anybody. Let them steal something first, then you can eat. Don't eat if they don't steal anything, okay? Also, some of those mortals might buy something from the shopping mall. Those guys aren't thieves. You need to know how to differentiate them."
"How, meow?"
"Simple! If they walk out of the store while holding plastic bags full of items from the store, they are not thieves. But if they secretly store our items in their storage rings and leave without paying, you catch that moron and eat them. Leave the rings behind, alright?"
"EASY, MEOW!"
The bystanders sweated profusely while they listened to the conversation. Their blood pressure spiked as they grew concerned over Cat's education and her future antics. At this rate, this little dryad would evolve into a bloodthirsty lunatic like her parent.
Leo clapped his hands and flew back to the Soul Stone Mountain. He then assigned his followers another task.
"Ladies and gentlemen, it's about time for me to announce the highlight of this trip. As you can see, we have a WHOLE mountain range full of soul stones. I think you know what I'm thinking, right?"
Everybody nodded and gulped.
Leo clarified their new tasks, "For starters, let's start mining this mountain! Grab a pickaxe, a shovel, a dynamite, or… your fist! Let's start hammering this mountain and break it into smaller rocks! Whatever you mined, you can keep half! Make sure to bring back half of what you mined to me when we're done here!"
The crowd cheered. Everybody scattered throughout the mountain range.
Leo crossed his arms and watched how his followers displayed their secret techniques, attacking the Soul Stone mountain range and breaking them into smaller pieces. He wasn't worried that he wouldn't get all the cultivation resources from here.
In fact, he wished for his followers to get stronger ASAP. With these soul stones, they would have enough cultivation resources to boost their inner Qi to a higher level.
Leo thought of the deity stage. According to the universal standard, this realm was the most important. Only the deities with the strongest foundation and largest dantian capacity had the chance to advance to the sage rank.
The sage stage was where karma strings and mandates came into play. Their power was enough to erase a solar system or a million deities with a thought.
Leo regretted that he didn't learn this power when he first arrived in this world. His life would have been a lot easier if he had known the basic power of the sage realm.
As Leo fell into a deep thought, he recalled that he had encountered Sieg once. Therefore, his system already recorded the transcendent being, and he could summon his clone to fight in the simulation mode.
"Right. I should start training too. I need to learn how to use my power as a transcendent."
Leo closed his eyes and meditated in mid-air. He sank his consciousness to his dantian universe.
.
.
RUMBLE
Planet Eater Number 47, or PEN47, was a karmic sovereign. Although he ate enough stars to gain sentient, his intelligence was still the same as a teenager, minus the sexual drive.
The monster only had one hobby – Eating! His diet consisted of gas stars and habitable planets. As for his favorite food, it was fate crystals!
After receiving a direct order from its overlord, PEN47 leisurely swam the universe at light speed, planning to snack on random stars on the way. As a result, his traveling speed was slower than usual.
After flying for an hour, its stomach growled. Because the void tree was out of its reach, it could no longer steal the tree's Qi to sustain its hunger.
Starved and famished, PEN47 picked up the speed. Instantly, it traveled across a galaxy and arrived at Leo's galaxy.
Colorful stars became visible. PEN47 salivated, unable to contain its hunger anymore.
HOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!
It roared and dashed toward the nearest helium star. By opening its mouth wide, it swallowed the entire gas star whole!
The gas exploded upon making contact with its digestive fluid and flame inside. The monster burped in satisfaction, but it hadn't had enough.
It wanted more.
The monster looked around to find another star to eat. This time, it wanted a solid star or a planet with many plants.
As it looked around, the corner of its eyes spotted a glowing dragon at a distance. Upon paying closer attention, it didn't look natural as the entire body of the dragon was made of minerals and man-made plate armor.
PEN47 smirked. It thought that it found the first challenger.
HOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!
Without hesitation, PEN47 charged at the golden dragon.

chapters.title: Chapter 317 Ohio Man Raises Giant Geckos to Surprise His Brother. The Geckos Are Florida Men in Gecko Clothing.
chapters.content:
Chapter 317 Ohio Man Raises Giant Geckos to Surprise His Brother. The Geckos Are Florida Men in Gecko Clothing.
﻿﻿Chapter 317 – Ohio Man Raises Giant Geckos to Surprise His Brother. The Geckos Are Florida Men in Gecko Cosplay.
In the dragon dreadnaught mothership's captain cabin, a half-naked man had been meditating after the night activity while his wife, Ester, fell asleep in bed.
Simba's body glittered in gold. His side muscles and back were covered in gold dragon scales while white glowing lines formed a tribal insignia on his chest.
The symbol resembled the head of a dragon in Western legends. Although it was just a white outline, the tattoo looked alive. Moreover, it emitted the unique aura of gold Qi, which was a variant of the virgin yang Qi.
The gold Qi was not as pure as Leo's virgin yang, and it was incompatible with virgin yin. In exchange for the disadvantage, gold Qi's nature became oppressive and domineering instead of the usual characteristics – Soft, holy, yet powerful.
Simba slowly opened his eyes and gazed at his palms. He clenched them, creating a disturbance in the air. Golden light radiated from his skin and palms.
DING
<Congratulations! You safely advanced to the transcendent realm!>
<You are currently a level-one transcendent being. To grow stronger, you must cultivate luck and gather life force from materials, minerals, and living beings. Every time you obtain or digest a droplet of luck essence, your level will increase by one.>
<It is recommended that you accumulate life force until your lifespan reaches the system ceiling. Then, spend all of them to automatically acquire the luck essence. If you manage to spend at least two billion years of lifespan, you can easily reach the pinnacle of the transcendent realm, which is level 10.>
<To advance to the higher realm, you must acquire a karmic fate crystal to unseal the limiter, posed by the creator of this universe. You can also substitute a karmic fate crystal with the essence of the void tree.>
<Currently, only one Void Tree exists in the universe, and it is protected by another VERIFIED PLAYER.>
Simba thoroughly read the messages twice. Five minutes later, he closed the message screen and glanced at his aura.
"So, this is the power of a transcendent…"
By just looking around, Simba could see countless karma threads in this universe. He could also see through walls and the dreadnaught battleship.
Simba's pupils flickered like a camera lens. He could see everything in the current galaxy as if he observed it from above. Moreover, he could see and hear everybody from the Yan Empire Planet.
It was a weird feeling. He felt like he was a god who observed every living being at once. His brain was overloaded with information, causing a slight discomfort.
Then, he witnessed a scene in a hotel building in Leo's domain. There was a teenage boy and a naked pretty lady on a bed, touching each other.
"S-Sister Ivy! I-I'm feeling weird down there."
"Don't worry, Marc. It's a natural reaction. Just lie down."
Instantly, Simba looked away as if he had accidentally witnessed a scene on the planet. As he was not into peeping, he was disgusted by the scene.
As Simba looked away, his focus shifted to the outer space. He sensed the presence of a million stars.
Every place contained different substances and minerals. However, most of them had the same foundation as the stars in his dantian universe. Even the cores of every star were identical.
Witnessing the truth of the universe, Simba was certain. He finally figured out the secret of this void.
"Heh. I guess we're living in the Matrix after all. This ain't new."
Simba let out a long sigh, spreading gold Qi into the ventilation system. His strands of gold Qi spread everywhere and caught microorganisms on the way. Dormant bacteria, dead cells, and space bugs were entangled by the golden strings and glowed in golden light.
10 seconds passed. The mutated microorganism creatures evolved and grew larger. The tiniest beings transformed into gold geckos, which started crawling toward Simba by instinct.
Simba also sensed them. He whispered.
"Gather in the cafeteria."
The geckos paused and turned around in unison. Although they didn't know where or what the destination was, they followed the golden light without hesitation. Without a minute, a thousand geckos swarmed the empty cafeteria hall.
The thread of gold Qi then entered their bodies. Transparent souls from Simba's dantian universe exited from his body and entered the creatures, possessing them.
The small animals evolved once again. A thousand souls regenerated their fleshly bodies and emerged.
The new creatures were humanoid dragonewts. Their dragon faces and skin still retained their ancestor's nature, but their two legs were strong enough to support their vertical physique. After standing on their three-joint legs, they moved their arms and warmed up their elbows.
One of the gold dragonewt opened and closed its four-fingered claws. He inspected the thick fingers and hardened scales for a moment.
Next to the gold dragonewt, a black dragonewt waved its dragon tail up and down. The sharp spikes on its back extended and shortened as his spinal cord was capable of hiding and extending a hundred pieces of bones at once.
FLAP
All dragonewts gradually warmed up their bodies and flapped their wings. Because of their large movements, chairs and tables tumbled and were pushed to the walls.
This group of dragonewts wasn't the only one on the ship. Another batch of geckos swarmed another large area and evolved into dragonewts as well. More souls from Simba's dantian universe came out and populated the dreadnaught battleship.
After getting the senses of their bodies back, the dragonewts exited the cafeterias and the spawning zone. Gold dragons rushed to the bridge, the engine rooms, and the weaponry operating rooms. Black dragons gathered at the hangar area and equipped themselves with the guns and arms in the armory.
The gold and the black dragons weren't the only population there. Every 100 new dragonewts was one white dragonewt. The white dragon-men also entered the hangar, but they boarded battleships and vessels on the mothership. They entered the bridge area and immediately sat on the captain's seat, assuming the leader role of each warship.
Red dragonewts also appeared after the first spawning batch. They followed the white dragonewts to their new ships and served as crewmates. Several pink ones also emerged, but they remained in the cafeterias, infirmaries, and residential areas as support units.
Although everybody seemed to be systematic, a few defects appeared as well. One of them was a rainbow dragonewt, who ignored everybody and strolled into the dreadnaught mothership's main deck. He calmly fetched a red coat and put it on. He smacked his left chest with his right fist as if he was saluting something. But the next words out of his mouth disappointed Simba.
"SASAGEYO! SASAGEYO!"
That guy actually sang a popular song in the past.
Simba saw everything. He was speechless.
'How did that idiot come to life? And why the hell is he the strongest man inside my universe!?'
The rainbow dragonewt's name was Cheese. Ironically, his behavior resembled Leo as if they shared the same brain. He was also a karmic sovereign, whose strength almost caught up to Simba.
That was not all. Simba didn't know how but this guy inherited a fragment of his entity fate crystal, which contributed to his abnormal growth and defective intelligence.
Curious about the guy, Simba exited his chamber and visited the rainbow dragonewt on the deck.
The rainbow dragonewt noticed his master's presence. He turned around and saluted.
"Creator!"
Simba nodded at Cheese. He gazed at the void.
"How is the air in the higher dimension?"
"Terrible, creator! I can only sense death here. I don't think this place's creator is as good as you."
"Right." Simba agreed. He didn't sense any presence of the universe's owner. On the contrary, it seemed abandoned. "The total karma rivers around here is only… three at most? I can't sense other rivers."
"In short, the owner of this universe is a major realm weaker than you, right?"
"Probably."
"Then, you can become the strongest creator in this realm, right?"
"No."
"Huh? Why?" Cheese was surprised.
"My elder brother is a lot stronger than me. There are also others that are stronger than him. We're not the top dogs here."
"…Wow."
Instead of being disappointed, Cheese was excited. He turned around and gazed into the distance, where he had sensed a weird Qi fluctuation earlier.
"So, how can we get stronger here, creator?"
Simba detected something from a distance. He followed Cheese's gaze and found an incoming space creature.
It was a massive whale, whose size was bigger than the Earth's entire Solar System. Moreover, it was swimming toward their dreadnaught mothership at full speed.
Not allowing the whale to get closer, Simba transformed into a gold dragonewt. However, his face didn't transform into a dragon head. His scales grew and molded into a horned helmet.
Cheese was astonished by the transformation. As his idol showed him something good, he followed Simba and rushed toward the whale as well.
.
.
"…"
After meditating for a few minutes, Leo raised his eyebrows and looked at the sky. His skin itched for an unknown reason.
While Leo was absentminded, Hua Jiashan returned from the Soul Stone mountain range, which already vanished from the area.
"Lord Florida Man! Please check the gains and allocate my earnings. I've collected a lot!"
Leo didn't pay attention to Hua Jiashan. He muttered and glanced at Kishin Douji.
"Do you feel it?"
Kishin Douji was puzzled for a moment. He looked up and scanned through the void to make sure. Instantly, he picked up the obnoxious aura of his nemesis.
"Planet Eater! Planet Eater is really coming here! This is your fault, Florida Man!" Kishin panicked.
"Yeah, nah. It's just a fish!"
"That fish alone is no longer the Planet Eater that I fought in the past! I can tell that it's stronger than your run-of-the-mill karmic sovereign! Do you sense it? It should have over 20 karma rivers inside its dantian. This doesn't include the void tree's leaves that boost its durability and destructive force! If it gets serious, this entire solar system will be erased instantly!"
Leo rolled his eyes. He tilted his neck from side to side and stretched his arms.
"I'll show you something nice."
WHOOSH
Leo vanished. He teleported toward the incoming foe.
.
.
lightsnοvεl WHOOSH
WHOOSH
"Hoh?"
"Hmm?"
Coincidentally, Simba and Leo teleported and appeared next to each other. They were 100,000km away from the whale.
"What are you doing here, bro?" Asked Leo.
Simba smirked, "Probably the same reason as you."
"Oh, whale hunting?"
"Yeah, whale hunting."
"It's illegal, though. Do you have a certification?"
"Pfft. At this day and age?"

chapters.title: Chapter 318 Florida Man Takes 'Whale of a Tale' Literally, Cooks Seafood Spectacle to Make Ohio Man Feel Like He's Missing Out on Oceanfront Dining
chapters.content:
Chapter 318 Florida Man Takes 'Whale of a Tale' Literally, Cooks Seafood Spectacle to Make Ohio Man Feel Like He's Missing Out on Oceanfront Dining
﻿﻿Chapter 318 – Florida Man Takes 'Whale of a Tale' Literally, Cooks Seafood Spectacle to Make Ohio Man Feel Like He's Missing Out on Oceanfront Dining
"By the way, you look nice in that transformation. Is that your second phase?" Leo teased Simba for his gold dragon transformation.
"This ain't soul games. I'm not some boss monster."
"But it's true. We ARE boss monsters in games if we talk about our current situation. We are inside the Metrix, so we are pretty much digital numbers."
"Don't remind me something depressing. I've just reached the transcendent stage. I need to stabilize my mental power."
"Heh. If mental power translates to power, I would have degraded to a muscle-tempering stage mortal. Why so serious?"
Simba had a headache. In the past, Leo wasn't this mental; He was a bright and smart boy who earned his respect and admiration. On the contrary, the present Leo was a loose cannon.
Cheese finally caught up with his creator. When he arrived, he found Leo floating next to Simba.
At first, Cheese was on guard. But when he noticed the pattern of Leo's rainbow aura, he sensed an unexplainable connection between him and Leo.
"Sir, you." Cheese greeted Leo.
"Hmm?" Leo turned around.
"You… You're a good man!"
"Thanks."
Leo wryly smiled. He glanced at the karma string of Cheese, which connected to Simba. Realizing his origins, Leo pointed at the guy and asked his brother.
"Care for the introduction? Is he yours?"
Simba deeply sighed and crossed his arms. He looked at Cheese and was about to introduce him to Leo.
HOOOOOOOOOOM!
Unfortunately, PEN47 was already 1,000 kilometers away. It would take no more than a split second to reach them.
Simba turned around and got into a combat stance. He gathered gold Qi around his arms, preparing to strike or parry the planet eater's incoming attack. Cheese also spread his wings and manifested a karma river into the real world, creating a stream of endless force.
"Eh, you guys are overreacting."
Leo picked his nose. He extracted a small piece of booger and flickered it toward the whale.
However, the booger was made from Leo's skin and a drop of his blood. As soon as Leo triggered it, the small piece of flesh transformed into the core of a magnetar, aka an exotic type of neutron star.
The magnetar's core traveled toward the whale at 1,000 times the speed of light!
PEN47 sensed it and mocked Leo in his mind.
'A magnetar? I have eaten a dozen black holes and dark matter before. This little magnet core can't do anything to me!'
Without hesitation, PEN47 swallowed it.
But as soon as it entered his stomach, its magnetic force erupted. The core's gravity increased and matched that of a black hole. Then, it pushed the inner stomach of PEN47 and dragged him along with its power and speed.
Suddenly getting dragged backward, PEN47 widened his eyes. He bellowed.
"DAMN PUNY STAR CAN'T DO ANYTHING TO ME!"
His stomach tightened and squeezed the newly evolved magnetar. Unfortunately, that was his mistake.
Leo, who had been controlling the magnetar, scratched the tip of his fingers and opened his mouth. He bit empty air and chewed the void. Although nothing was inside his mouth, something else was being crushed.
"Nom-Nom Meow! Get nom-nom taxed, motherhumper!" Leo laughed.
The magnetar in PEN47's stomach sucked the flesh and fluid into its mass like a black hole devouring passing-by asteroids. Moreover, the planet eater's soul was also affected.
"H-HOW?! IMPOSSIBLE!"
PEN47 shrank by 50% within five seconds while the glowing core inside him expanded and matched his size. Eventually, the star got bigger than the planet eater and made him bloated.
POP
Unable to figure out what hit him, the rainbow star broke out of PEN47's stomach and absorbed every drop of flesh and blood into its surface. Even PEN47's soul was not an exception.
"Hmm?"
"W-What?"
Simba and Cheese were perplexed by the development. They gazed at the rainbow magnetar, which consumed the planet eater from the inside.
The star's trajectory and speed gradually changed. It defied the momentum and the laws of physics as it suddenly paused and flew back toward Leo.
"DODGE!" Simba warned Leo and Cheese.
Cheese teleported away without a second thought while Simba reached out to Leo to grab him. However, after exerting his full strength, Simba failed to make Leo budge an inch.
"Relax, Simba. It's not like that thing can do anything to me." Leo snickered and raised his finger.
The gigantic star headed toward Leo and rapidly shrank. It turned into a glowing candy, which got stuck on his fingertip.
Leo put the rainbow candy in his mouth and chewed it in glee. His teeth crushed the former magnetic star into smaller pieces while his saliva instantly melted them.
It tasted like spicy soda.
DING
<You have obtained one entity fate crystal.>
<You have obtained three heavenly fate crystals.>
<You have obtained 30 sky fate crystals.>
<You have obtained 318 earth fate crystals.>
<You have obtained 10 leaves of Void Tree.>
Eating a planet eater's soul had its perks. Leo smirked and admired his gain.
'With this amount of fate crystals, I should be able to make multiple Qi generators or exchange them for some high-tier battleships or colonies. Also… Void Tree again?'
Leo pondered what he should do with the tree leaves. He planned to inspect it when he got home.
Meanwhile, Simba looked at Leo in disbelief. While frowning, he asked his brother, "What did you do?"
Leo shrugged, "Just testing a new skill."
"A new skill?"
"Yeah, I kinda copied this skill from Eleanor, actually."
"HAH?!" Simba removed his helmet and stared at Leo's face in shock, "YOU LEARN FROM WHO?!"
"Chill, man. Chill…"
Leo deeply sighed and explained how he learned this skill.
.
.
Several minutes earlier, Leo's consciousness was inside his dantian universe, operating the simulation mode. Taking advantage of the time dilation, he trained his heart out.
As Leo realized that his foundation was shaky and unstable, he fought every cultivator in the list at the max difficulty 10,000 times each. Mortals, immortals, deities, sages, and entities, nobody was an exception.
But when Leo fought clones whose original strength was at the karmic sovereign level or stronger, he started losing. Because of the max difficulty, their clones had a higher cultivation base, had more skills, and possessed superior artifacts, which made the fights almost impossible to win.
The most troublesome foes were his father, Aslan Ariel. In the past, the clones came out as an entity. But after Leo had learned more skills from other weaker cultivators, the clone of his father also received the upgrade bonuses, boosting his strength to the karmic sovereign realm.
That was not all. Even Elearnor's clone, who was supposed to be only a karmic sovereign, received the same buffs. The clones emerged as transcendent beings instead of karmic sovereigns.
As for Sieg's clones, it was out of Leo's reach. At the max difficulty, Sieg's cultivation base was pumped to a stage that Leo had never reached before – The Singularity Realm.
Without a choice, Leo retrained his basics by fighting entities, whose strength was upgraded to the karmic sovereign realm first. He exploited the blood bomb tactic and managed to copy their abilities.
Then, he came across several unique abilities and daos, which focused on stars in their dantian universes. This dao transformed a dark matter, a black hole, a pulsar star, a magnetar, or a neutron star into a weapon. Depending on each star's nature, Qi type, and personality of the star users, their nature varied.
Leo got inspiration from this dao. He tried mixing his flesh and blood into a summoned star and used it as a bomb. The result exceeded his imagination as it erased one of his galaxies in the universe by accident.
After regenerating the stars and resurrecting the population, Leo sealed this ability for safety. However, when he thought of Cat, he was enlightened.
Unfortunately, he didn't have enough time to test this ability. He ended up using it on PEN47 first.
.
.
"That's the gist of it," Leo concluded his explanation after revealing his simulation system abilities.
The sparkling eyes of Simba gazed at Leo in admiration. He praised, "Why couldn't I think of that?! Hold on, doesn't that mean you can freely summon my clones and test my skills?"
Again, Leo shrugged, "Yes. So?"
"Isn't that cheating? I mean, you can gauge anybody's abilities and copy their skills!"
"Yup! That's why you need multiple entity fate crystals to generate more system abilities!"
Simba smacked his forehead. He wished he had known about this 30,000 or 40,000 years ago.
"Now, I understand why Fate Stadium Overlord collects so many fate crystals. That's why." Simba was enlightened.
"Yeah. Come to think of it, how many fate crystals do you have?"
Simba counted his fingers and wryly smiled.
"One true entity fate, one entity fate, and three heavenly fate…"
"That sucks. Here, use this one."
Leo sank his hand into his chest and pulled out an entity fate crystal from his soul. It was a massive neutron star, emitting a bright silver flame.
Looking at the weird entity fate crystal, Leo raised his eyebrows, "Damn, it has already mutated. Never mind, you can have it."
.
Simba witnessed how Leo nonchalantly shoved his physical hand into the dimension inside his body and pulled out a white sun. His expression turned solemn.
'I need to be stronger! I can't be content with my current strength!'
Determined and motivated to be as strong as Leo, Simba looked at the neutron sun. He also asked about his system.
"System, if I consume that, will it grant another system ability?"
DING
<The entity fate crystal in front of you is a mutated one, created by crushing the soul of a karmic sovereign and mixing it together with a regular entity fate crystal. It contains the essences of star cores and the daos of star weaponry.>
<Back to the question. Yes, it has a 70% chance of granting your wish.>
"What about the other 30%?"
<There's a 20% chance of getting another wish granted and a 10% chance of getting a random ability.>
<Please note. No matter what system ability the fate crystal generates, it will be stronger than regular fate crystals. However, its authority will not exceed what a true entity fate crystal has.>
"Alright."
Simba flew toward the white sun and bathed in its flame. As it was a gas planet, Simba quickly entered its core and found a small crystal inside.
Upon touching the crystal, it entered Simba's soul.
Simba immediately prayed.
"I wish I had the same Simulation System that my brother has… I wish I could learn or copy other people's abilities and learn their fight techniques!"
DING
A gold system screen appeared, informing Simba of the result of his wish.
<Assimilating the entity fate crystal with your soul…>
<Assimilation completed. A new system has been generated!>
Simba's consciousness was pulled into his dantian universe. However, instead of being prompted by a clone summoning menu, the system gave him another ability.
<Please set up an opponent for the simulation mode.>
The screen allowed Simba to choose two fighters to fight each other instead of letting him fight a clone.
'Hmm?!'
Immediately, Simba noticed the oddity of this system. He could adjust the fighter's cultivation base, gears, and aptitudes. He could even change a mortal into a transcendent being!

chapters.title: Chapter 319 Florida Man Accidentally Becomes Real Estate Gurus for Immigrants after He Successfully Sold Overpriced House to Homeless Man
chapters.content:
Chapter 319 Florida Man Accidentally Becomes Real Estate Gurus for Immigrants after He Successfully Sold Overpriced House to Homeless Man
﻿﻿Chapter 319 – Florida Man Accidentally Becomes Real Estate Gurus for Immigrants after He Successfully Sold Overpriced House to Homeless Man.
<Please choose your fighters.>
<Fighter 1:…>
<Fighter 2:…>
Simba bitterly smiled while he assigned himself as the first fighter and Leo as the second fighter. He adjusted their strength variables to the [Full Condition], [Full Potential], and [Max Mastery].
'Show me what we can potentially do. I want to learn from you.'
Simba pressed the [Begin] button.
Two holograms of the two fighters appeared and initiated the duel. The clone of Simba transformed into a gold dragonewt and charged at Leo.
The clone of Leo spread two rainbow phoenix wings behind him and vanished. Simba's clone turned around and threw a punch at the empty void.
BOOM
His fist collided with an invisible dark matter, causing a huge explosion. The hologram of Simba braced the shockwave and threw another punch.
A golden ray flashed and illuminated the void, revealing the hidden figure of the invisible phoenix.
The beam contacted with a dome barrier of the phoenix's domain. Inside the barrier, Leo's revealed his new appearance as a giant phoenix. He flapped his wings and ejected a million rainbow flame feathers.
The feathers scattered everywhere in the void and expanded into white suns. The heat and the extreme temperature instantly melted the clone of Simba.
The clone of Simba ejected his soul out of his crushed fleshly body. He flew away from the million white suns in the void to recuperate.
That was when the clone of Leo dealt the final blow. One of the suns projected a new clone of Leo, who came out with a rainbow flame scythe. He activated a death knight domain and swung it.
The soul of Simba's clone was cleaved in half and dissipated into dust!
DING
<Simulation has been completed. Result: Leonardo Ariel Wins.>
Simba dryly laughed. He was impressed by this new system.
"It's different from what I've imagined, but this will be useful."
Simba pulled his consciousness back to reality. He gazed at Leo to confirm the usefulness of his new system.
"How was it?" Asked Leo.
"Very useful. I can simulate and investigate the abilities of my targets. It was eye-opening."
"Glad you like it. Now, then. I'll head back to work. I'm a busy man."
"Take care, Leo."
Leo nodded. He turned around and was about to leave. But then, he remembered that Simba never properly visited his domain.
"Say, where are you staying? In that stupid dragon spaceship?" Leo pointed at the dreadnaught battleship.
"Yeah. So?"
"My main system is a kingdom-building one. I can easily get my hands on colonies and good penthouses. Say, if you are bored of ship life, come see me. I'll buy you a house."
Simba was surprised by Leo's sudden offer. The corners of his mouth curved up into a faint smile.
'Right. He might have changed over the years, but his kind nature is still the same as that time.'
Showing his brother respect, Simba smirked and lightly slapped Leo's back. Then, he returned to his ship.
Leo flinched. The impact wasn't heavy, but it almost cracked his spinal cords and his bones. He grumbled and complained.
"Dammit, you ingrate! How could you hit me so hard after all I've done to protect you! Fine, no more colony for you! Stay in that stupid yellow snake forever. Humph!"
Frustrated, Leo returned to his world. He hoped that the brief fight didn't harm or affect the local people.
…
Upon arrival, Leo's followers already finished harvesting the soul stones. They presented their storage rings for Leo to inspect.
As promised, Leo took half of their collection. Then, he told the people to publish the new town that he had created.
The group dispersed and visited the slum district. Only Cat and Beatrice remained behind.
"Time to set up the store. Let's go."
.
.
Tang Xuan and Tang Tian were quick. They published the news of the newly erected town west of the slum district.
The rogue cultivators and the merchants were excited. They sent their representatives to the west to scout the area. Then, they found the modern skyscrapers, freeways, and luxury penthouses along the way.
"For sale?"
"I wonder how much…"
The rogue cultivators and merchants gawked at the houses and condominiums in awe. Some of them entered a building and was greeted by the mannequins behind the reception counter.
"Hello, sir!" The mannequins with an office lady attire bowed toward them. Then, she presented the group with a brochure. "Welcome to the Florida Estate Number 420. We have a total of 666 units for sale. Would you like to see the sample rooms, sir?"
One of an elderly rogue cultivator received a pamphlet brochure and read the content. At first, he couldn't understand the weird scriptures as it was written in English. But after staying inside the building for 10 seconds, the words were automatically translated in his mind.
"…Oh, I can read it."
He laughed and skimmed through the texts. However, when he noticed the price tag, he was shocked.
"Wait a second! The cheapest room is… HOW MUCH?!"
A receptionist folded her hands in front of her stomach and politely informed him, "A 300 square feet studio with one bathroom is 20,000 essence stones or 20,000 years of lifespan, sir."
"WHAT?!"
Everybody was speechless. Most of them barely earned 100 essence stones a month from their side-jobs or family businesses. Procuring 20,000 essence stones out of nowhere was impossible for them.
Still, a few merchants had a clever idea. They asked the receptionist, "Miss. Is this place operated by Lord Florida Man?"
"Yes."
"Then, can multiple buyers split the bill? For example, I bring a thousand people here and make everybody pay 20 years of lifespan."
"Yes. That payment method is possible."
"NICE!" The merchant laughed. Then, he asked another question. "Does every business and houses here belong to Lord Florida Man as well?"
"Yes."
"Good! Good! I understand everything. Have a nice day!"
The merchants smiled and left in glee. They scrambled toward large townhouses and big buildings near the main road to secure their potential front stores.
As condominium rooms and houses were different types of real estate, the price tag also differed according to the scale of land, luxury, utilities, and the locations. When the merchants found the price tag, they almost vomited blood.
"T-Two hundred million essence stones for a manor?! Are you kidding me?!"
"A-A 4-story building store next to the road is 15 million..."
"Wow. A single one-story wooden house is on sale for 700,000 essence stones? Why don't you just rob me?! I can build it myself!"
Many cultivators and merchants weren't familiar with the high price tags as they weren't as rich as Leo's employees. Still, several cultivators were smart enough to inspect the interior of these new buildings to measure their worth.
They weren't disappointed. Every house and building feature cultivation rooms suitable for seclusion training. The interior space was also a hundred times larger than the advertised pamphlets. By purchasing one small house, they would get a secret mansion, suitable to house a hundred servants!
Many rogue cultivators gulped and stared at the price tags, unwilling to give up the opportunity. They measured the pros and cons.
"How do I procure essence stones? How do I earn money!?"
"Dammit. I need a lot of money quick! What should I do?!"
"Should I sell my heirlooms? B-But that can barely fetch a thousand spirit stones at best!"
Everybody was at wits end. They inwardly screamed, lamenting their incompetency.
Everything went according to Leo's scheme. While everybody was in despair, several mannequins walked around and handed them a stack of A4 document papers.
Confused, the cultivators received them and read the content.
The mannequins smiled at them and explained.
"All real estates in this district can be purchased by installment. Depending on the length of the contract and the price of the property, the monthly installment can be as cheap as 100 essence stones per month or a million essence stones a month."
"Installment?"
The local cultivators weren't familiar with this term. They gazed at the mannequin girls, paying attention to their explanation.
"For example, this townhouse's price is 700,000 essence stones. If you agree to pay by installment for 100 years, we will charge the interest rate of 1% per year. Then, the total amount you have to pay monthly is only 923 essence stones!"
"OHHHHH!!"
The cultivators were astonished and excited.
"That's so affordable! Miss, I have a thousand essence stones on me! Can I buy one right now?!"
