The mannequin grinned, "Yes. As long as you sign the contract right here. Oh, you wish for the 100-year installment, am I right?"
"Yes, please!"
"Good. Please come with me."The inaugural upload of this chapter took place via /n/ov/el/b/in.
The cultivator followed the mannequin in glee while the others stared at the guy in astonishment and confusion.
While the cultivators were baffled by the development, the smart merchants brought out their abacus and calculated the total sum of the payment. Then, they sweated profusely.
"T-This is rip off!"
"T-That guy will pay more than 700,000 essence stones after 100 years! This is a scam!"
While several merchants shallowly looked at the increase in price after the 1% interest rate, the people of the Tang Clan had been lurking among the crowd. They also calculated and found the number.
Although they were surprised as well, they understood the price of opportunities. One of them rushed toward a large mansion near the main road and yelled.
"I WOULD LIKE TO BUY THIS BUILDING BY INSTALLMENT!"
The crowd was stunned once again. They looked at the price tag of that mansion.
It was whopping 100 million essence stone!
"B-Brother, are you sure?" One of the merchants were so shocked that his lips trembled.
The Tang Clan's member widely grinned. He turned around and revealed that he was none other than Tang Tian.
"Positive! This price is too cheap!"

chapters.title: Chapter 320 Florida Man Claims He Saved a Youth’s Life by Injecting Liquid into His Body. The Youth Was an Adult Doll.
chapters.content:
Chapter 320 Florida Man Claims He Saved a Youth’s Life by Injecting Liquid into His Body. The Youth Was an Adult Doll.
?Chapter 320 – Florida Man Claims He Saved a Youth's Life by Injecting Liquid into His Body. The Youth Was an Adult Doll.
One finger-sized soul stone could be traded for 1,000 essence stones. After breaking several boulders of soul stones into smaller ones, Tang Tian had over a million soul stones left.
In the end, Tang Tian paid 100,000 soul stones to the mannequin and acquired the deed. He immediately put on a Tang Clan Manor's signboard on the front and informed his other clan mates.
Tang Tian wasn't the only one who exploited their newly earned commission to buy a property. Han Meng, Han Hao, and Tiger Swordsman purchased a penthouse worth 30 million essence stones. After securing their big homes, they copied Tang Tian and put on the signboards of their names. Then, they bragged about their new houses to the other colleagues.
Hua Jiashan and Dongfang Mei were more modest. They chose a two-bedroom condominium room instead of a big house. Unlike their greedy colleagues, they had a better grasp of Leo's nature.
After purchasing the room, they visited the room and discovered that the usable interior space was wider than the advertised blueprint. Instead of getting only two bedrooms and one bathroom, the couple secured a three-story penthouse with a swimming pool.
Wu Buyi was different. He kept all his soul stones with him as he already had a house.
Beatrice also kept the soul stones. She returned to Leo's bus and gave everything to Esen instead of using them herself.
…
By the end of the day, a hundred cultivators purchased Leo's houses or condominium rooms. Only Leo's close aides paid in full. As for the rest, they fell for the installment scheme.
The mannequins brought the soul stones and essence stones to the bus and reported to Leo, who read the transaction reports.
Leo was disappointed.
"I gave them soul stones to cultivate, but those idiots use them to buy my land. Seriously, how long will they reach the entity realm and be useful for once?"
Giving up on the elders, Leo shifted his attention to Wu Buyi and young talents. He wondered if he should start accepting direct disciples to encourage the younger generations.
After a thorough contemplation, Leo decided to give the talented youngsters a push. He called Gao Yan, Tang San, Jin Yong, and Yao Qiqi over the next day morning.
…
The morning of the next day, Leo gathered Gao Yan, Jin Yong, Tang San, and Yao Qiqi at the waterpark of his shopping complex. Esen also tagged along as she had nothing better to do.
Leo inspected their cultivation base. Gao Yan and Jin Yong were already deities. Yao Qiqi stuck at the true immortal stage while Tang San was the weakest. On the other hand, Esen dual-cultivated with Leo a lot. She already condensed a million-star galaxy in her dantian universe, and she was ready to tackle the sage realm.
Seeing the promising youths and his wife, Leo announced.
"I'll be direct. You guys suck!"
"What?" Esen was annoyed, "You called us here to call us 'SUCK'?!"
The others were also taken aback. They lowered their gaze. Only Tang San tilted his head as he admitted that he was the worst here.
"No, I'm here to accelerate your growth. You kids take too long to grow!" Leo clarified.
Gao Yan and Jin Yong wryly smiled. By their standard, their growth rate was already superior to the local standard. As for Yao Qiqi, she pouted.
"Senior, are you looking down on us?" Yao Qiqi protested.
"Again, no." Leo sighed, "I'm saying that none of you are using the full potential of our facilities."
"Eh?" Everybody was interested.
"How many times have you used the Tessaract Time Chamber so far?"
Gao Yan laughed, "About seven? Maybe?"
Jin Yong clicked his tongue, "Six, senior."
Yao Qiqi pouted, "Only two."
Esen snorted, "Zero!"
Tang San dryly laughed, "What's the time chamber?"
Leo facepalmed. He was disappointed in them.
"None of you have exploited your privilege as my workers. If I were you, I would have queued in front of the time chamber whenever I have a day off."
"…"
Everybody but Tang San and Esen was embarrassed. They counted their hands and calculated how many times they could have spent their time in that time chamber.
Gao Yan whined, "I would have done so if the queue wasn't so long, senior! Do you know how long it is to get our queue these days? Only four people can enter at a time!"
Leo accepted the reason. However, at the moment, no line existed as commoners and rogue cultivators couldn't enter the shopping complex anymore.
"That was the past. But now, the time chamber is empty. It's about time we exclusively enter it and train y'all!"
Gao Yan and Jin Yong finally figured out why Leo repelled mortals and non-employees away from the shopping complex. They widely grinned and gave Leo a thumbs up.
"We thought you excluded the others because of the bad decision. We are so shortsighted!"
"Yeah, you're shortsighted, alright. So, here's the plan. I'm going to tutor you personally… starting from you, Tang San!"
"Me" Tang San pointed his fingertip at his face, confused.
"Come with me. Tomorrow, it's Gao Yan's queue. Next is Jin Yong, Yao Qiqi… and you too, wifey."
Esen frowned, "Do I have to?"
Leo shrugged, "You can't just sit at home and leech my energy every day. You need to practice how to use that new power, too. The time chamber provides a stage for that."
"Eh, how troublesome. Can I just stay home until I give birth?"
"…"
At that moment, everybody looked at Esen in shock.
"Give birth?"
Esen smirked and mocked Leo, "Congrats, husband. I'm pregnant. You're going to be a father."
"…"
Leo slightly dropped his jaw, flabbergasted. Then, he remembered that Ivy used to tell him before that their wedding day's deeds guaranteed her impregnation.
"I guess you can stay home and cultivate. No need to exercise." Leo changed his mind.
"Correct answer! Now, can I go home? I want to eat something spicy and sour."
"…Fine."
Esen giggled and left the meeting.
…
After Esen had left the meeting, the boys smiled at Leo, "Congratulations, Lord Florida Man! You're going to be a father!"
Yao Qiqi was also excited, "Am I going to be an elder sister soon?"
Leo was speechless. He deeply sighed and changed the topic.
"Enough with my personal life. Now, Tang San. Come with me to the time chamber. I'll guide you myself!"
"O-Okay!"
.
.
.
Tang San and Leo entered the time chamber together. As for Hua Taixu, Leo kicked him out and asked him to take a vacation.
Upon getting inside the time chamber, Leo explained the perks of this place and the prepared cultivation resources within the blank room.
Tang San was astonished. He was excited for the new life.
"Wow. This is even better than I imagined!" Tang San praised the facility.
"Enough with the praise. For now, I need to know what kind of cultivation method you are using. Then, I can guide you."
"Yes, master!"
Tang San sat cross-legged and began cultivating miasma and monster Qi. The yin-yang Qi in the environment was converted into dark miasma because of Tang San, and they entered his body.
Leo observed the nature of the miasma and discovered that they were similar to impure yin Qi. He frowned and inspected Tang San's internal organs and constitution.
His meridians entangled like messy computer wires and a bunch of wired earphones bundling together. Tang San's Qi ignored the meridians and enveloped his entire body like water seeping into a sponge.
After a while, the impure Qi transformed into nutrition for Tang San's muscles and bone marrow. The bundling meridians slowly merged together into one, but they were far from completion.
After a brief inspection, Leo asked the system.
'Is his current method good for him? If it's not so, what cultivation method should I teach this guy?'
DING
<No. The current cultivation method is only compatible with Oni Race. If Tang San continues using it, he will slowly mutate into a monster. Instead, it is recommended to impart him the Abyssal Black Tortoise bloodline to evolve his constitution before he reaches the immortal realm.>
Leo flinched. 'And how the hell can I get one of those bloodline from?'
<You can purchase it from the system.>
"…"
Finally, Leo realized how powerful his shopping system was. He opened the online shopping store and searched by the keyword 'Bloodline'.
A million items showed up. Each item's description disclosed the backgrounds of each race and creature.
Leo browsed the list for a while and found the origin of his bloodlines.
.
Prismatic Phoenix Bloodline (Transcendent Realm)
Price – One Billion Years of Lifespan
This vial of blood contains the blood essence of the transcendent being overlord "Priscilla". It can be consumed directly to integrate the bloodline into one's constitution. However, there are 95% chance that the host will mutate and die during the mutation process.
In case of succeeding, the host can evolve into a Prismatic Phoenix and utilize any type of yin and yang cultivation method, technique, or skill. It also boosts the host's defense and offense abilities equally. In short, this bloodline is considered the most versatile bloodline in the universe.
However, there was a downside. Whatever and whoever the host touches, they may mutate because of the suppressing yin and yang Qi. Most mutated objects and lifeforms usually turn into medicines, spiritual herbs, cultivation resources, or alchemy ingredients.
The bloodline is not compatible with the Gold Dragon Bloodline, Abyssal Black Tortoise Bloodline, and Hallowed White Tiger Bloodline. If mixed together, the bloodlines will cause the host to lose sanity.
.
Leo nodded. It indeed looked similar to what Leo had in his veins and heart.
After skimming through his bloodline power, he checked the details of the Abyssal Tortoise Bloodline next.
.
Abyssal Tortoise Bloodline (Transcendent Realm)
Price – One Billion Years of Lifespan
This vial of blood contains the blood essence of the deceased transcendent being overlord 'Etteswob'. It cannot be consumed directly due to its poisonous extreme yin nature. Only the top alchemist can concoct this bloodline into medicine, which can be used to cure broken meridian disabilities. However, people with the rare constitution "Monster Meridians Physique" can consume this directly to unlock their full potential.
Upon consumption, there are two results: the obvious one is being unalive. The second result is an ultimate evolution. The host with this bloodline will have a charming feminine physique even though he is a man, yet his defensive abilities will become unrivaled in this universe. In addition, the host can acquire the Dao of Gravity and Magnetic Force naturally. Thus, the best cultivation methods and techniques for the host with this bloodline are gravity and magnetic-related techniques.
The bloodline is not compatible with the Gold Dragon Bloodline, Prismatic Phoenix Bloodline, and Hallowed White Tiger Bloodline. If mixed together, the bloodlines will cause the host to lose sanity.
.
After reading through everything, Leo was confident that this bloodline suited Tang San better. He invested one billion years of lifespan to get the vial of black blood.
The black blood vial appeared in Leo's hands. He slightly shook it to check the content.
As soon as Leo waved it, the vial broke, and the mass of blood floated in mid-air. As if it was alive, it emitted killing intent toward Leo.
Leo smirked at the blob of blood, "Hey, what's the big deal?"
The blood mass didn't listen to Leo. It slowly floated toward Tang San for a moment. Then, it let out a scream of joy.
Tang San slowly opened his eyes as he sensed a weird gaze from an entity. Upon opening his eyes, he found a small mass of black liquid floating in front of his face.
Without letting Tang San react, the blood mass infiltrated Tang San's body through his nostrils. It instantly entered his brain and bone marrow.
"W-WHAT?!" Tang San panicked.
Leo crossed his arms and encouraged him, "Relax and absorb that bloodline. It will change your physique… in a good way."
"???"
"Oh, don't mind if you end up looking like a woman. Well, if anybody asks what your gender is, just say that you're non-
binary or some shit."
"Huh?"

chapters.title: Chapter 321 Florida Man Inflicts Max Emotional Damage to Muscle Builder by Forcing Him Through Gender Transformation Operation
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 321 – Florida Man Inflicts Max Emotional Damage to Muscle Builder by Forcing Him Through Gender Transformation Operation
Tang San couldn't complain as the evolution struck him. He shut his eyes and meditated, controlling the new blood inside him. His bone marrow quickly regenerated new blood cells into his blood circulation system while the old blood was devoured by the new blood cells. When the new blood took over the entire system, Tang San transformed.
His muscles and skeleton shrank. His coarse skin became as smooth as polished jade, and his skin tone was brighter. The six-packs vanished, replaced with a delicate soft, and smooth stomach. His muscular chest also formed a curve.
Tang San's face changed for the better (or worse). His handsome face was beautified by the extreme yin energy.
A day in the time chamber passed. Tang San opened his eyes and deeply frowned. On the other hand, Leo whistled and purchased a mirror from his system shop. He placed it in front of Tang San.
"Stand up and look at yourself. If I may comment, you are quite a charmer now."
"Huh?"
Tang San had a tinge of doubt when he looked down and found a pair of sizable mountains on his chest. He immediately touched the area on his crotch and discovered that his precious jewel was still there.
Still, the combination made him concerned about his future. He stood up and looked in the mirror.
There was a pretty long black-haired lady in the mirror. Despite having a gorgeous face and sexy hips, Tang San screamed in shock.
"HOW?! WHY?!"
Tang San touched his face and his arms. Then, he realized that they got softer.
"WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO ME?!"
Leo snorted and appraised Tang San's constitution using the system scan. Then, he asked the system.
"System. Can you show him what you show me?"
DING
<Yes. Would you like to enable this permission permanently or temporarily?>
"Temporary."
<Affirmative.>
DING
Two system screens appeared in front of Leo and Tang San. Both disclosed information on Tang San's new physique and cultivation potential.
.
Name: Tang San
Alias: None
Age: 19
Race: Abyssal Black Tortoise / Human
Cultivation Base: Quasi-Immortal
Bloodline: Abyssal Black Tortoise Bloodline
Biography: Tang San was born with a unique constitution that rejected yin and yang essence in favor of the monster Qi. His parents engraved a fate crystal into Tang San's soul when he was a baby to seal his rampaging monster Qi. But by doing so, Tang San's cultivation future was crippled.
Tang San encountered Overlord Kishin Douji who resuscitated his dantian, allowing him to cultivate monster Qi again even though the overlord's cultivation method was harmful to Tang San in the long run.
Fate guided him to Overlord Florida Man. The overlord removed the entangled meridians and weakened dantian of Tang San by injecting the rare bloodline of the extinct creature 'The Abyssal Black Tortoise' into Tang San's blood veins.
Tang San managed to digest the bloodline safely and emerged as a descendant of the great race. He now can cultivate the lost cultivation method of the Abyssal Black Tortoises, who were famous for their impenetrable defense.
.
After reading his own biography, Tang San was stunned. He looked behind him and touched his back, expecting to see a tortoise shell. However, he couldn't find one.
Tang San let out a long sigh of relief. He pursed his lips and gazed at his figure in the mirror once again. After turning around and admiring his physique from the sides, he grumbled.
"Am I a woman now?" Asked Tang San in a woman's voice.Leo teased him, "Depends on your definition. If you follow my advice and become a non-binary, you can call yourself whatever you want. Be it a two-spirited penguin, a lesbian, a futa, or a ladyboy, I have no F to give."
"B-But other people will see me as a woman now! I'M A MAN! I DON'T WANNA BE A WOMAN!"
"Do you still have that thing down there?" Leo pointed at Tang San's crotch.
"…"
Tang San looked down. He touched "IT" and confirmed that they were functional. He bitterly smiled.
"I still have them, senior."
Again, Leo shrugged, "Then, what do you want to call yourself? A man or a woman?"
"…I still want to remain as a man. Yes. I have it, so I'm still a man!"
"That's the answer! Your gender is whatever you want. Don't think too much about it."
"But about my future spouse and… my future wife? I wish to have a wife in the future, senior. How am I supposed to tell them that I'm a man if I have this physique?!"
"Just show them the D? Tell them that your boobs are bigger than theirs?"
"…"
Tang San was speechless for a minute. When he imagined the scenario, he burst into laughter. But a moment later, he was depressed.
Leo patted Tang San's back. He consoled the guy.
"Jokes aside. Your constitution is unofficially nicknamed "FUTA" in my world. It's nothing special."
"F-Futa?"
"Yes. Their appearance looked perfectly like other women's except for their genitals. Some even had both."
"B-BOTH?!"
"Yup! Don't think too much about it. You'll be surprised to see how some women actually prefer their mates feminine. They are actually more sickening freaks than the normal ones in our society, but we don't talk about it. Think of it in a positive way. You can enjoy fancy pretty dresses now. Nobody will scoff at you if you start wearing dresses tomorrow. Oh, you can still wear man's clothes if you want to, and no one will bat an eye. That's your privilege."
"…"
Tang San didn't know what to think. He gazed at the mirror again and admired his new face and appearance. He spins in front of the mirror as if he was dancing.
Although Tang San thought he didn't like it, the corners of his mouth slightly curved up because of the unexplainable excitement of his new gender.
"So, I'm a FUTA!"
"PFFT!"
Leo covered his mouth as he almost lost it. He crouched while his shoulders trembled, hiding his laughter.
"I'M BEAUTIFUL, AND I'M A FUTA!!"
"…"
Watching the young man experience five stages of grief entertained Leo. He secretly pinched his thighs to stop himself from laughing, showing respect to Tang San.
While Tang San celebrated his new identity, Leo consulted his system.
"Do you have a cultivation method book or manual for him in the store?"
DING
The system navigated Leo's system screen to the shopping menu and showed him the item.
.
- Abyssal Black Tortoise Cultivation Method (Mortal)
- Abyssal Black Tortoise Cultivation Method (Immortal)
- Abyssal Black Tortoise Cultivation Method (Deity)
…
The cultivation manuals were separated into many volumes, categorized by the cultivation realm. The names of the manuals were also easy to understand as no other variants existed.
Leo purchased the three first volumes. Unlike the bloodline, these manuals only cost him 111 years of lifespan.
"I should fight with a real abyssal black tortoise in the simulation mode later. Hey, system. If I never meet a black tortoise before, can I summon their clones in the simulation mode?"
DING
<No. The cloned target must be within the same galaxy as you to enable the summon.>
"Yeah, I figured."
Leo was disappointed. He wished he could learn more about the abyssal tortoises or copy their abilities.
Fortunately, his system was more useful than the imperfect system in his early days. It prompted him with a hint, which Leo didn't ask for.>
<The Abyssal Black Tortoises are extinct, but their souls are recycled in the karmic river. You may enlist them with your new recruitment system and enable the simulation mode's summoning permission.>
"Huh?!" Leo was surprised, "Wait, I can recruit souls from Karma River?!"
<Yes. You haven't explored all the new features yet. Please explore every system you have to take advantage of your true entity fate crystal.>
<Your system hopes you can be the strongest entity in this universe as the system's livelihood depends on your strength and survival. Your system will also remind you periodically in case you suffer from dementia.>
"…"
Somehow, Leo felt like the system low-key threw a shade at him.
Leo put the matter at the back of his head and skimmed through the manuals. Although everybody called him an idiot most of the time, he memorized every word after reading every page twice. Then, he passed the manuals to Tang San.
"Throw away the previous cultivation methods. Recultivate from the start by using these methods."
Tang San confusingly received the manuals, "R-Recultivate from the beginning, senior? You mean, I have to start over as a muscle tempering stage again?"
"For the foundation, yes."
"But it took a whole year to reach my current strength!"
"Don't worry. You'll surpass your current strength within… a month, I think."
"A MONTH?!"
The promise piqued Tang San's interest. He immediately opened the first volume of the manual and read it.
While reading, Tang San circulated his Qi according to the guide. As soon as he did, yin energy in the time chamber gushed toward Tang San like a tidal wave, entering his bodily pores and orifices against his will.
"!!!"
Tang San's body floated in mid-air as the gush of Qi turned into a tornado. His clothes shattered to pieces.
Black liquid seeped out from his physique as the extreme yin energy flushed out all the monster Qi impurity out of his body. However, the black liquid soon reentered his body because of the cultivation method.
The bad liquid turned into food for the abyssal tortoise's blood again. All blood cells were strengthened as a result, improving Tang San's condition and vitality.
The full-body Qi circulation was completed 7 times every one second. Every time a full-body Qi circulation was completed, Tang San could feel that his bones and muscles were strengthened by another level.
At first, Tang San's physical strength reverted back to when his cultivation base was at the bottom. But after cultivating the first verse, his cultivation base reached the final level of 1st stage instantly, yet his real strength surpassed any regular 3rd stage cultivator.
A minute later, Tang San broke through to the second stage. Two minutes later, he reached the third stage.
After an hour, the man regained his former cultivation base!
Leo stroked his chin, impressed with Tang San's cultivation speed.
"I guess one month is an understatement. You did it in an hour."
Tang San didn't respond as his mind focused on the Qi circulation. He slowly opened his eyes after two hours of cultivation.
Unfortunately, he couldn't advance to the next realm yet as he hadn't comprehended the entire first volume. He needed time to reread everything.
Tang San opened his eyes and landed on the ground. He inspected his body. Although his outward appearance never changed, his muscles became compact and sturdier than when he had a bulky physique. His every movement was brim with power and great force.
Testing his new strength, Tang San punched empty air.
BOOM
A loud sound followed his fist. Tang San widened his eyes in astonishment.
On the other hand, Leo glanced at something else as they jiggled hard. Leo stroked his chin and compared them with Esen's assets.
Esen's properties were soft and elastic. On the other hand, Tang San's mountains seemed firm and harder.
"Yup. It's a man's boob after all."
Tang San looked at Leo, "Did you say something, senior?"
"Nothing. Just admiring your punch."
"Oh…" Tang San looked down and realized that he was naked. Like normal men, he groped his chest and massaged them.
"…"
Tang San and Leo quietly stared at the assets. The former blushed in embarrassment while Leo started to miss his wife.
"God dammit. I shouldn't promised y'all to teach you here. Now, I want to cuddle with my wife." Leo complained.
"…Not my fault, senior." Tang San turned around and hid his chest by instinct.
"I don't want to look at your junk. Put on some clothes first. Also, mine is bigger than yours. There's no point looking at the tiny dragon."
"…"

chapters.title: Chapter 322 Crazy Florida Man Who Forcefully Performed Gender Transformation Operation to Youth Proves That Schizophrenic is Contagious
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 322 – Crazy Florida Man Who Forcefully Performed Gender Transformation Operation to Youth Proves That Schizophrenic is Contagious
After bestowing the bloodline and the right cultivation method to Tang San, Leo closed his eyes and entered the simulation mode. He then summoned Tang San to fight.
.
Name: Tang San
Race: Abyssal Black Tortoise
Cultivation Base: 65,536-Star Deity
Skills: Dao of Impenetrable Defense, Dao of Poison, Mandate Domain of Absolute Gravity
Specials: Extreme Yin Physique, Abyssal Black Tortoise Bloodline
Favorite Weaponry: Abyssal Shield
Potential Percentage: 1,000%
.
Leo was slightly disappointed as the capped potential of Tang San was only at the deity stage. Meanwhile, Esen was an immortal when Leo tested her ability, but her clone's max strength was the entity realm.
Still, everything went according to Leo's plan. He didn't bring Tang San or plan to bring the other talented youth here for no reason.
'It doesn't matter. Time to collect my investments.'
Leo started the simulation by summoning Tang San's clone to fight.
…
A day in the time chamber quickly passed. Tang San practiced some external martial arts and his special moves. Finally, he managed to get used to his new physique.
Meanwhile, Leo reaped some benefits. He crushed Tang San's clones 10,000 times, copying the junior's skills and obtaining his personal weapon.
Leo reopened his eyes on the second day in the time chamber. As he had nothing to earn from Tang San at his current potential, Leo attempted to stimulate the young man a bit.
"Boy! Come here!"
Tang San rushed to Leo and knelt. He smiled and reported.
"I've finally consolidated my foundation and stabilized my cultivation base, senior! Should I tackle the immortal stage today?"
"Yeah, I'm planning to. But first thing's first!"
Leo stretched his fingertip and reached out toward Tang San's forehead. It pierced into his head without causing physical harm!
Tang San widened his eyes in shock as Leo suddenly attacked him, yet he didn't resist. A few seconds later, Tang San figured that Leo didn't actually harm him, so he teased the master.
"Senior! Why are you 'FINGERING' me?!"
Leo broke a sweat, "PHRASING, you dipshit! That sounds so wrong!"
"But you're FINGERING ME!"
"God dammit! Shut up and stay still!" Leo grumbled while he searched for a certain object.
After wiggling his fingertip in Tang San's soul for a minute, Leo pulled out a small crystal. It was a lot smaller than regular crystals of the same type.
DING
<You have extracted a heavenly fate crystal from Tang San's soul.>
<Warning! By forcefully extracting a fate crystal from your people's souls, you are harming their cultivation foundation! Please do not mistreat your people as their faith will affect your future cultivation stages.>
Leo snorted and retorted, "I know. Man, I'm trying to unlock this brat's potential here. Be quiet for a moment."
After getting his hand on Tang San's heavenly fate crystal, he ejected six of his heavenly fate crystals from his soul and merged with Tang San's crystal.
The seven crystals shone so bright that they temporarily blinded Tang San. On the other hand, Leo saw through the radiant light and witnessed the seven heavenly fate crystals transforming into one fist-sized crystal ball.DING
<You have condensed a True Heavenly Fate Crystal!>
Although this was his first time creating a true heavenly fate crystal, Leo's expression remained indifferent. He already had a superior version of this.
"Identify!"
DING
.
True Heavenly Fate Crystal
This crystal can only be created by merging seven Heavenly Fate Crystals. Any True Heavenly Fate Crystal can be used as a consumable item, a socket item for system facilities, or an imprint on a soul.
By crushing this crystal, the owner can erase all system abilities from a nearby system user who has obtained their system abilities from heavenly fate crystals or inferior crystals.
If it is equipped in a system facility or system equipment's socket, it will grant a random blessing to the facility or the equipment. In case it is used to imprint a soul, a unique system will be generated and imprinted to the karmic soul. However, it will disappear if the true heavenly fate crystal's owner is killed by another true fate crystal's owner.
Hidden Feature (1): If any mortal under 20 years of age becomes the owner of this 'True Heavenly Fate Crystal', they will be blessed with absolute luck for 100 years or until their cultivation base reaches the ceiling of the current universe.
Hidden Feature (2): This True Heavenly Fate Crystal can generate one of the three following systems for the owner if it is imprinted to its owner's soul;
- Qi Stealing System (25%)
- Entity-Grade Armory System (50%)
- Passive Ability of an existing Entity (25%)
Hidden Feature (3): If this true heavenly fate crystal is the only fate crystal in the owner's soul, the owner's cultivation ceiling will be capped at the Transcendent Level 10. Otherwise, the owner's cultivation base is capped at the Entity Realm or this effect is overridden by a superior true fate crystal.
.
Leo scoffed at the fate crystal as it reminded him of many main characters in various stories.
"Yup. Sounds like a typical plot armor of a main character, alright."
If Leo shoved this crystal back into Tang San's soul, he could easily make the guy stronger instantly. However, he had a better idea.
Leo opened his shopping system and browsed the unique item list.
.
Soul Awakening Pro
Max Cultivation Base: Entity
Max Lifespan Capacity: 65,536 Years
Increase Cultivation Aptitude: B
Enable Dantian Universe
Enable System Hints & Quests
Dantian Universe Capacity: 65,536 Stars
Price: Heaven Fate Crystal + 30,000 Years of Lifespan.
.
Soul Enlightenment
Max Cultivation Base: Karmic Sovereign
Max Lifespan Capacity: 2,147,483,647 Years
Increase Cultivation Aptitude: A
Enable Dantian Universe & Karma River Hosting
Enable System Hints & Quests & System Shops
Dantian Universe Capacity: 4,294,967,296 Stars
Price: Heaven Fate Crystal + 50,000 Years of Lifespan.
.
The two items in the shop could only be purchased by exchanging fate crystals. However, it did not require the true heavenly fate crystal but a regular one.
As kind as he was, Leo wrote down the details of the true heavenly fate crystal's perks and the boons of the items in the shop for Tang San. Then, Leo presented the options to him.
"Pay attention, okay?"
"Yes?" Tang San was curious.
"Alright, Mr. Anderson. Here's a blue pill and a red pill. You can only take one. If you take the blue pill, aka the soul enlightenment option, you will obtain an assistant system. Your cultivation aptitude will greatly improve, and your cultivation ceiling will be higher."
"…Who is this Mr. An-Der-Son? Also, where are the pills?" Tang San didn't understand the meme.
Realizing that the meme was ineffective against locals, Leo stopped messing around. Leo explained.
"The crystal is the goddamn pill, you dum-dum. Here, you read what I wrote first."
"O-Okay?"
Tang San accepted the papers that Leo had just written. He skimmed through the details, but he was still confused.
"What's a system? What's a dantian universe?"
Leo sighed and took his time to explain without skipping the details.
…
Hours later, Leo finished the lecture. Meanwhile, Tang San was enlightened.
"Wow. So, I can create a planet inside me?"
"Not just one but many."
"Isn't this good? I love this! Can I choose the blue pill right away?"
"Don't you want to hear the red pill's details first?"
"…Oh. Okay, let's hear it."
Leo slightly shook his head and showed Tang San what he had copied from the system screen.
Tang San took the paper and read through it. But again, as an inexperienced mortal, he didn't understand the significance of its usage. He asked Leo once more.
"What's the point of this? This seems bad."
Leo rolled his eyes and pointed out the difference, "Didn't you read it properly? If you choose this path, your cultivation ceiling will be higher than the blue pill options."
"Then, this red pill is better?"
"Not really. You won't get the assist system to help you. You will also need to find a way to grow a dantian universe by yourself. In short, the blue pill is an easy mode that guarantees your success. The red pill is a challenger mode with more rewards."
Tang San widely grinned. He made his decision without batting an eye, "Then, I'll pick the path with more rewards, please!"
Leo shook his head, "You're greedy, I see."
"Greedy is always good. My master… I mean, Senior Kishin taught me that a person must be delusional first to become motivated. I'm a delusional aspiring cultivator who wishes to become the strongest man in the universe! Can't I take a little challenge?"
Leo inwardly laughed at Tang San's mindset as he approved it. After all, he wasn't wrong.
"Well, I don't know how that guy came up with this philosophy, but he's right. Every successful person must be delusional first before they start their journey! Without a grand goal, there is no inspiration and motivation! Take the goddamn blue pill, you sick protagonist!"
"…What's protagonist?"
"…Forget it."
Leo shoved the true heavenly fate crystal into Tang San's soul and burnt the papers. After returning the upgraded version of the fate crystal back, he let the guy digest the new information and his new power.
Tang San stood still while his eyes dimmed. His consciousness had already taken a trip to his sea of consciousness. From that day onward, he would see things that no one but Leo and other true fate crystal owners could see.
After confirming that Tang San received the true fate crystal properly, Leo left him alone. He returned to his meditation session, returning to his good old dantian universe.
…
Upon getting back, Leo checked the strength of Tang San's clones again.
This time, the detail drastically changed.
.
Name: Tang San
Race: Transcendent Divine Tortoise
Cultivation Base: Transcendent Level 10
Skills: Transcend Dao of Invincibility, Transcend Dao of Poison, Absolute Law of Implosion
Specials: Divine Yin Physique, Abyssal Black Tortoise Bloodline
Favorite Weaponry: Mirror of Divinity Negation
Potential Percentage: 1,000%
.
Leo wryly smiled as the guy exceeded his expectations. He was expecting a karmic sovereign, but this protagonist-like dude had the potential to catch up with Leo's strength.
"I take this as a challenge, then. Fine. I'll do my best to steal your skills and daos, boy!"
Although his chance of winning was slim, Leo tried it anyway. After all, nobody could teach him better martial arts techniques or combat tactics than real opponents.
Leo's journey to grow stronger and understand his full potential continued.

chapters.title: Chapter 323 Hallucinated Florida Man Feeds Youth a Vial of Alligator Blood to Make Him Mutant Ninja Version of John Wick
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 323 – Hallucinated Florida Man Feeds Youth a Vial of Alligator Blood to Make Him Mutant Ninja Version of John Wick
A year quickly passed.
Under Leo's guidance, Tang San managed to ascend to the deity realm. However, he only managed to condense 11 stars in his dantian universe.
On the other hand, Leo spent the year fighting Tang San's clones in simulation mode, enhancing his foundation as a transcendent being. Although he couldn't defeat the clones even once, his combat sense drastically improved.
Both men came out from the time chamber. When they got out, Gao Yan, Jin Yong, and Yao Qiqi rushed to meet them.
Upon seeing Tang San's new look, the group was taken aback, especially Jin Yong. The guy blushed as Tang San's pretty face and valiant demeanor were his type.
Tang San forgot that he had the appearance of a woman. He crossed his arms and smiled, "It has been a year, guys."
Gao Yan snickered as he knew how Tang San felt as the time chamber experience was addictive. He also wished that he could stay inside that room for a month to train.
"You look FINE!" Jin Yong whistled.
"Welcome back," Gao Yan ignored Tang San's appearance as he also got the antler horns after Leo helped him.
Yao Qiqi glanced at Tang San's chest and pouted. She wished she could grow up soon.
Leo looked at the trio. Although he had promised that he would take one of them to the time chamber next, he decided to postpone the schedule due to personal reasons.
"Come back tomorrow. I'm taking a day off."
"Oh…"
The group was dejected, but they dragged Tang San with them. The gang planned to ask the ladyboy about his progress.
…
Leo returned to his bus. Upon coming back, he went straight to Esen.
Esen was on the upper deck of the bus, relaxing on the beach. As Ivy, Beatrice, and Marc weren't there with her, she lay on the beach naked, enjoying the sunbath.
Sensing her husband's presence, Esen raised her head and looked at Leo.
"Oh, you're back."
Leo gazed at his wife's body and her stomach. Although she claimed that she was pregnant, it was still somewhat flat.
After ogling his wife's body, Leo's nostrils flared. He removed his clothes and got on top of her.
"I miss you."
Esen raised her eyebrows, "You only went out for a day. What's wrong?"
"You have no idea what kind of torture I've been through."
Because of Tang San's new sexy body, Leo had been suppressing his desire for a year. He kissed his wife and did his thing.
Esen was surprised, but she embraced him nonetheless. After all, they had dual-cultivated a dozen times before, and there was nothing to be embarrassed about anymore.
…
The morning of the next day, Leo ended the session, satisfied. His wife was also pleased with all the love and care.
"Let's do this again tomorrow." Leo proposed.
Esen giggled, "I might die at this rate. You're a monster!"
"That's one year's worth of saving. Anyway, get some rest."
After taking a bath, Leo returned to the time chamber to train another youngster.
.
.
In front of the time chamber, Tang San, Gao Yan, Jin Yong, and Yao Qiqi waited for Leo. They wondered what Leo would teach them next.Leo arrived and fulfilled his promise. He pointed at Gao Yan.
"You're up next, Gao Yan. Come with me!"
Jin Yong raised his hand as he was curious. "Lord Florida Man. The time chamber supports five people at a time. Can we enter the room together with you?"
"No."
Everybody was surprised and curious, "Why, sir?"
"Do you want me to disclose your cultivation secrets to your colleagues? Do you know that every cultivation method, dao, or technique isn't compatible with everybody? If you accidentally learn someone else's technique by accident, your dantian might become unstable because of the foreign incomplete daos. Do you want to experience those complications?"
"…No, sir."
"Then, stay out of it. One person at a time!"
Jin Yong and Yao Qiqi sighed and gave up entering the time chamber along with Gao Yan. Meanwhile, Tang San was grateful for the privacy.
As the youngsters had nothing else to do, they left the area and visited the bookstore to play.
Leo dragged Gao Yan to the time chamber and began his scheme.
…
Inside the time chamber, Leo repeated what he did to Tang San. First, he evaluated Gao Yan's status and biography.
.
Name: Gao Yan
Alias: None
Age: 17
Race: Yan Human
Cultivation Base: 202-Star Deity
Bloodline: Thunder Elemental Bloodline
Biography: Gao Yan was born a commoner, and raised by a family of farmers. After his parents died, he joined the Life Sword Sect as an outer disciple to survive. He learned the ways of the swords and fell in love with the sword dao. However, he lacked funds and cultivation resources to grow as a cultivator, so he always visited the local landmark site 'Sword Saint Boulder' to learn sword techniques.
At the age of 16, he encountered a rogue overlord "Florida Man" who bestowed him an opportunity and precious cultivation resources. Because of the overlord's support, Gao Yan's potential was unlocked, and he rapidly grew as a cultivator. Within less than a year, he ascended as the youngest deity.
.
There was nothing special about him except for his passion for the sword dao and his antler horns, aka the source of his thunder elemental bloodline. Leo wondered if he could stimulate his growth a bit.
"System, what's the best action to boost his strength and unlock his true potential?"
<As usual – Purchase an entity's bloodline and give it to him. In this case, you should bestow him another elemental bloodline to add versatility.>
"How about a better bloodline to upgrade his thunder one?"
<Specializing only one element can be a demerit in the higher realm. If Gao Yan cultivates multiple elements, such as Fire & Thunder, Wind & Thunder, or Light and Thunder, he can take advantage of the element synergy and develop his sword dao more efficiently. Moreover, he will have fewer weaknesses in the future.>
Leo was enlightened. He then explored the shopping system and explored the elemental bloodline section.
- (Deceased) Overlord Salagator Bloodline
- (Deceased) Overlord Garuda Bloodline
- Overlord Shuri Bloodline
The names varied. Leo deeply frowned as it was different from what he had imagined.
Leo pressed on the first dead overlord's name to see his details. Unfortunately, it was not something impressive as he was a dead entity, who specialized in fire element essence and flame dao. He was also a flame alligator, which was already extinct from the universe.
As he couldn't decide, Leo asked Gao Yan.
"Boy, if you have a chance to learn one special element, which one do you like the most? Fire, wind, or light?"
Gao Yan didn't understand the question, but he had a vague answer in his mind.
"I'm already good at electric and lightning. My Qi also generates heat well, but I'm not well-versed in fire manipulation. If I can choose, I would like to learn some fire techniques to go with my lightning attribute, please."
"Okay!"
Leo picked the Salagator choice and got a vial of crimson blood. He gave it to Gao Yan.
"Here is what you want. This is the bloodline of an extinct race, Salagator! If you consume this, you might… transform again."
"…"
Before Gao Yan changed his mind, Leo immediately brought out eight heavenly fate crystals and combined seven. The seven crystals merged into one, becoming another true heavenly fate crystal.
After getting the second true heavenly fate crystal, Leo appraised it.
DING
.
True Heavenly Fate Crystal
This crystal can only be created by merging seven Heavenly Fate Crystals. Any True Heavenly Fate Crystal can be used as a consumable item, a socket item for system facilities, or an imprint on a soul.
By crushing this crystal, the owner can erase all system abilities from a nearby system user who has obtained their system abilities from heavenly fate crystals or inferior crystals.
If it is equipped in a system facility or system equipment's socket, it will grant a random blessing to the facility or the equipment. In case it is used to imprint a soul, a unique system will be generated and imprinted to the karmic soul. However, it will disappear if the true heavenly fate crystal's owner is killed by another true fate crystal's owner.
Hidden Feature (1): If any sword practitioner under 20 years of age becomes the owner of this 'True Heavenly Fate Crystal', they will unlock the 'Sword God System'. Every time the fate crystal's owner kills an enemy with a sword, they acquire points, which can be exchanged to unlock new sword skills.
Hidden Feature (2): This True Heavenly Fate Crystal can boost one of the following attributes for the owner if it is imprinted on its owner's soul.
- Physical Strength (25%)
- Dexterity and Agility (25%)
- Sword Qi (50%)
Hidden Feature (3): If this true heavenly fate crystal is the only fate crystal in the owner's soul, the owner's cultivation ceiling will be capped at the Transcendent Level 10. Otherwise, the owner's cultivation base is capped at the Entity Realm or this effect is overridden by a superior true fate crystal.
.
The content was different from Tang San's true heavenly fate crystal. Still, Leo was surprised by its usefulness.
"I guess it's tailored for you, Gao Yan."
"What is that, senior?" Gao Yan was interested.
"Alright, come here. I'll explain."
Repeated what he had offered Tang San, Leo let Gao Yan choose between the two options – The easy mode and the hard mode.
Similar to Tang San, Gao Yan made the decision instantly, "I wish to take the long and arduous challenge, senior. I don't like the shortcut path. It sounds boring."
"If you say so."
Leo shoved the true heavenly fate crystal into Gao Yan's body and imprinted it on his soul. Afterward, he let Gao Yan digest the new information and his "Sword God System".
A system screen appeared in front of Gao Yan, informing the emergence of his sword system. He stared at it in astonishment for a while.
While Gao Yan didn't pay attention to him, Leo shoved the vial of blood into Gao Yan's mouth and poured its contents down his throat. After ensuring that Gao Yan consumed the blood properly, he let the youth manage the blood.
"S-Senior?"
"Work hard for me, boy. Also, don't end up like Tang San. I don't want to suffer a whole year watching some bouncing boobas."

chapters.title: Chapter 324 Florida Man Quit Playing with Firearms, Claims His Birthday Gun is More Useful in Bed Combat. His Neighbors Riot.
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 324 – Florida Man Quit Playing with Firearms, Claims His Birthday Gun is More Useful in Bed Combat. His Neighbors Riot.
Every minute in the time chamber, the time in Leo's dantian universe passed by a day. Every day, Leo in the dantian universe grew older by almost 4 years. Two years in the time chamber forced Leo to train for 2,880 years.
After the long and arduous training, Leo finally defeated Tang San for the first 1,000 times, earning him one of his skills.
"Finally." Leo celebrated. He was tired of the repeated defeat.
The clone of Tang San dissipated into nothingness while a void sword, made from a void leaf, was still stuck in Tang San's artificial soul. It vanished together along with the item.
The void leaf that disappeared restored its shape and Qi, returning to Leo's system inventory. Meanwhile, the system congratulated him.
<Congratulations! You have defeated Tang San's clone at the highest difficulty 1,000 times!>
<You have earned a special reward. Please choose one of Tang San's skills to learn.>
<Please note. The system skills only include basic memory and knowledge that the clones possess. It doesn't reward you the skill mastery.>
<Please note. If you defeat Tang San's clone at the highest difficulty 5,000 times, you can acquire all the clone's bloodlines and special physique perks.>
<Please note. If you defeat Tang San's clone at the highest difficulty 10,000 times, you can acquire the clone's special weapon. The item will be directly transferred to your inventory.>
"I know," Leo grinned. He swiped the new system screen and picked his reward.
DING
<You have learned a new skill "Transcend Dao of Invincibility".>
<Warning, you don't have the bloodline of Abyssal Black Tortoise. The dao is incomplete.>
"Tsk." Leo scoffed at the system message. Again, he was already aware of the shortcomings and the requirements. "I know."
WHOOSH
The system screen flashed and injected new memory into Leo's mind. It only lasted one second, but Leo felt like had dreamed for 10,000 years.
Opening his eyes, Leo looked left and right like someone who was confused from a long dream. He mumbled, "Who am I… Oh, yeah. I'm Leo, the Florida Man. What did I dream again?"
Leo's memory slowly returned. When he came to his senses, he concealed his aura and looked at the clock above the entrance gate of the time chamber.
It was the last day of Gao Yan's training schedule. They had to get out in two hours.
Leo averted his eyes from the clock and searched for Gao Yan. It wasn't hard to find the young man.
Gao Yan spread his yellow flame wings and levitated in the sky. His antler horns radiated in the same color, containing an absurd volume of lightning element essence. His long black hair fluttered by the wind, but his gold pupils glowed. Even his trimmed beard had a gold aura. He no longer looked like a teenager but an adult in his mid-20s with that messy hair and beard.
Furthermore, Gao Yan was no longer a regular deity who carried a few stars inside him. Instead, he hid a whopping 65,536 stars in his dantian universe. This didn't include his system's special skills and buffs.
In short, Gao Yan only needed one more push to advance to the sage realm. On this threshold, he would be able to create more stars inside his dantian and learn about karma.
"Gao Yan, prepare to leave. It's our last day here."
Hearing Leo's command, Gao Yan stopped cultivating. He concealed his wings and landed. After putting on his clothes, Gao Yan returned to Leo's side and reported his progress.
"Master, I've reached the bottleneck of the deity realm. I think I need another week or two to ascend."
"Do you still have the manuals I gave you?"
Gao Yan flinched and searched through his clothes and spatial rings. Upon locating the entrusted manuals, Gao Yan let out a long sigh of relief.
"I still have them, master."
"Here is your homework. After you go back, do not bother ascending until you completely prepare another room for the third element. This time, I'll let you absorb a yang-based element to reinforce your foundation. Think of the element you want to learn while you're at it. Come back to me when you're ready."
"The third element, master? I thought two were enough."
"Fool. The flame and thunder combination is redundant in this universe. You need to master at least seven elements before you tackle the sage realm. Only then, your foundation will be strong enough to support your growth."
"This disciple understands."
Their interaction changed over the year. Gao Yan no longer called Leo by "My Lord", or "Senior" anymore. Instead, he acknowledged Leo as his mentor.Both men removed the dirt and grime on their bodies and left the time chamber on time. As usual, when they came out from the facility, the main character gang was there to welcome them.
Tang San, Jin Yong, and Yao Qiqi grinned from ear to ear. They sized up Tang San for a moment. When they noticed the new demeanor and the improved cultivation base, the group was astonished.
Tang San praised Gao Yan, "Senior brother, I thought I caught up with your strength, but the gap is expanding again. I have to work harder!"
Jin Yong smacked his lips, "Lucky you, damn brat! I'm up next. Once I come out, my strength will surely surpass you!"
Yao Qiqi was indifferent. She only paid attention to Gao Yan's face.
"Senior brother, how was it? Did Lord Florida Man try to feminize you like senior brother Tang San?"
Gao Yan laughed, "Silly girl. Master Florida Man unlocks our potential. We change because of our new bloodline and our different physique."
"So, if I enter there with Lord Florida Man, will he awaken my potential, too?" Asked Yao Qiqi.
"Of course!"
"Yay!"
Yao Qiqi was excited. She wondered what kind of hidden potential she had.
Unfortunately for her, when she turned around to look for Leo, the guy already disappeared.
Yao Qiqi pouted, "Where is the Lord? He was here earlier!"
Gao Yan and Tang San looked at each other and shook their heads as they didn't pay attention. On the other hand, Jin Yong saw Leo teleport away.
"He probably goes back to rest? Maybe?" Jin Yong guessed.
"Aw…"
"Last time, he postponed the schedule to take a one-day break. He probably needs to recuperate after a year of training too." Tang San also guessed.
Since Leo wasn't around, the group dispersed. Although the four wanted to enter the time chamber while it was available, they were afraid of Leo, who might get angry at them.
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo was on the bus. He visited Esen once more.
Esen had been chilling on the bed, chatting with Ivy and Marc. They had been talking about their new relationship, and they wished to get married.
Leo entered his bedroom and found the three. He was slightly disappointed.
"Oh, you're back. Good timing. I need your permission to hold a wedding ceremony for my subordinates." Esen pointed at Marc and Ivy, introducing the new couple.
Leo glanced at the pair of lovebirds and raised his eyebrows. "Are you a pedo, Ivy?"
Ivy's expression turned dark while Esen laughed. The former complained.
"Of course not, Your Majesty. I am an upright woman! I don't date minors!"
"But your husband is a… boy?" Leo sized up Marc, who looked like a middle-schooler.
"He's over 10,000 years old, Your Majesty. We're all adults."
"But his physique…"
"Physique and appearance have nothing to do with our love, Your Majesty!"
"…"
Leo looked back and forth between Marc and Ivy. The dullahan kept looking down, avoiding eye contact as usual. As for Ivy, she embraced her husband from behind, encouraging him.
"A lich and a dullahan… what a pair." Leo sighed, "Fine. Wedding or whatever, you handle it for me, wifey."
Esen smirked, "Sure. Do you mind if I splurge some essence stones and some food in the warehouse?"
"How much do you need?"
"Not much. A million essence stones should be fine."
"Oh, that's cheap."
Leo had no issue forking a million essence stones from his pockets. As for Ivy and Marc, they almost vomited blood as those were a lot of money.
Getting Leo's approval, Esen's mood was lifted. She then noticed the shifty eyes of Leo and his awkward expression.
Realizing what Leo needed, Esen laughed and waved her hands, ordering her subordinates to leave.
"Leave us alone. I'll talk to you later. Also, you must tell me how you ended up together! I thought Marc would have married Beatrice for sure. But girl, you really SLAY!"
Ivy giggled and bowed to her boss. She dragged Marc away from Leo's room and left them alone.
Leo didn't waste his time. He threw away his clothes and got ready to jump his wife once more.
Esen couldn't stop laughing at Leo, "What happened to you? You look thirstier than Cat without nom-nom taxes."
Leo pressed Esen down and grumbled.
"You have no idea how lonely it is to live by myself for 1,440 years."
"But you were away for only a day."
"A day to you. A thousand years for me."
"How sweet."
Once more, Leo recharged his mental battery with the love of his wife.
…
The circle continued. The next day, Leo dragged Jin Yong into the time chamber and spent a day in reality there. When they came out, Jin Yong's cultivation base reached the same level as Gao Yan's.
Leo took a day off once more. He went home to hug his wife. A day later, he returned fresh and brought Yao Qiqi into the time chamber.
.
.
Meanwhile, far, far away from Leo's planet, the war between Divine Elf Alliance and Overlord Planet Devourer reached the climax stage.
Warships and dreadnaughts of Ellen Army finally took down the last of Planet Devourer's subordinates, but they also suffered a heavy casualty. 90% of the Divine Elf Kingdom's forces perished, and five million stars of her territory were forever lost. DEZNUTS council was dissolved as all senators and ministers fled from the scene.
Meanwhile, Priscilla's phoenix forces remained intact. They surrounded Overlord Devourer and managed to restrain him. However, after a week of combat, everybody was exhausted.
Overlord Devourer sneered at Priscilla, who hid behind her troops. He taunted her.
"Foolish phoenix! Your struggle is meaningless! No matter what you do, you cannot kill me! I've foreseen your plan!"
Priscilla in her rainbow phoenix appearance glared at the gigantic entity and bellowed.
"I don't believe you can outlast my power!"
Priscilla spread her wings and unleashed her rainbow flame, which engulfed the entire flesh monster. Some of his eyes were burnt to crisps.
The burnt eyes turned into dust, but new ones regenerated. Moreover, every newly regenerated body part was twice bigger than the destroyed parts. As a result, Overlord Planet Devourer's body slowly got bigger, which put a strain on the pheonix's sealing array.
The overlord sneered at Priscilla's futile attempt, "Keep burning me, little phoenix! Once I'm done with your minions, I'll capture you and experiment with your body! I don't believe that we, the planet eaters, can't reproduce with the other races!"
"You sick pervert!" Priscilla and the phoenixes were disgusted. They increased their power output and accelerated the burning process.
…
Watching the fight from a distance was Overlord Xiaomao who clenched his new fishing rod in anger. Next to him, Ellen also observed the fight.
Ellen glanced at her ally and noticed his nervous expression. She encouraged him.
"She will be fine. There's no way that monster can endure her flame array for a week straight."
Overlord Xiaomao, the fisherman, disagreed.
"I've calculated karma. We will lose this fight without fail."
"You… you're too pessimistic! If you give up right away, everybody here will die, including the Cathulhu Race that you have been protecting!"
"…"
Overlord Xiaomao gulped. He glanced at his new weapon and thought of his catopus friends. Letting out a long sigh, Overlord Xiaomao made his resolve. He injected half of his lifespan into the fishing rod.
"I should have consumed the fate crystal like you did, but…"
The fisherman rejected the fate crystal as he disliked systems. However, he still used it as a weapon.
The fishing rod was made from the entity fate crystal!
"No matter how strong you are, your soul can still be killed!"
Overlord Xiaomao cast the fishing hook toward Overlord Planet Devourer. It instantly hooked the monster's soul!
Priscilla and Planet Devourer flinched and looked at Overlord Xiaomao in unison.
"HAHAHAHAHA!!" Overlord Planet Devourer cackled, "You've finally lost it, Xiaomao! This is where you die!"
Overlord Xiaomao narrowed his eyes, "Not if I defy FATE AND KARMA!"
He pulled his fishing rod, causing the hook to latch onto Overlord Planet Devourer. However, the monster flesh also caught the fishing line and pulled Overlord Xiaomao closer.
"You're the one being fished, Xiaomao!"
"As if!"
The fisherman and the whale monster initiated their first exchange.

chapters.title: Chapter 325 Florida Man Mistakes Stranger Who is Being Robbed as His Father, Pulls a Gun, and Shoots Them Both
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 325 – Florida Man Mistakes Stranger Who is Being Robbed as His Father, Pulls a Gun, and Shoots Them Both
FLASHBACK
When Priscilla gathered Ellen, Xiaomao, and Lucky, she demonstrated how useful a true entity fate crystal was. Then, she gave one to Ellen.
Ellen was impressed by its ability and pledged allegiance to Priscilla. She also surrendered the territory of Divine Elf and DEZNUTS to the Phoenix race to survive.
"How about you, Overlord Xiaomao?"
Priscilla extended her offer to Overlord Xiaomao who ruled over the Cathulhu Race and their galaxy.
Xiaomao glanced at Ellen in reluctance. The old fisherman deeply sighed as he had no choice.
"Alright, but I will not absorb the true entity fate crystal into my soul. I'll transform it into a weapon instead."
A true entity fate crystal was usually designed to be used as a consumable item. However, Overlord Xiaomao's wisdom transcended his cultivation base, and he was aware of the other usages.
"Why?" Priscilla didn't understand Xiaomao.
Xiaomao bitterly laughed. He waved his arm and revealed his lifespan status screen to everybody.
Shockingly, he had two billion years to live like Leo. However, the number was deep red.
Ellen, Priscilla, and Lucky narrowed their eyes as they knew why the number had that color. They then turned to Xiaomao with an astonished look on their faces.
"Nu'Earthe…How many karmic souls did you tamper to get so many curses?!" Overlord Lucky was stunned.
Ellen paused for a while, figuring out why Overlord Xiaomao denied the fate crystal. She finally understood him.
"No matter what you do, you cannot ascend. The karma rivers of this universe curse you."
Xiaomao nodded, "Yes. That's why it's better to make a transcendent killing weapon instead of unlocking new talents. Also, if I can choose its owner, I can even pass it down to my successor… or my next reincarnation."
Priscilla shook her head, "Yeah, your current life is a lost cost. You have a time to serve. I hope your next reincarnation won't be a harsh one."
"You don't need to worry about me. If we all die here, there won't even be my next reincarnation. Let's focus on our plan first."
"Right." Priscilla agreed. She passed the last true entity fate crystal in her hands to Xiaomao.
The fisherman overlord brought out his fishing rod and merged it with the crystal. It radiated silver light for a few seconds and reverted to a normal-looking fishing rod.
Xiaomao gazed at his soul-bound weapon and bitterly smiled. He then put it away.
"You're not going to tell us what it can do?" Overlord Lucky glared at his rival.
"Let's say… it can instantly yoink anyone's soul out of their fleshy body regardless of their cultivation base. Its effect is exactly what I design."
Priscilla gave Xiaomao a meaningful look as she knew that the artifact had more abilities, yet she respected his privacy. The phoenix secretly sent the fisherman a sound transmission.
'Tell me the other effects after the meeting. I need to plan out our ambush strategy.'
Xiaomao maintained his gaze on Lucky while he responded.
'Understood. Sorry for the inconvenience. Lucky and I have a long history together. He destroyed my home planet, and I destroyed his. For the past 30,000 years, we tried to kill each other's underlings, and I went overboard… Well, you saw my curse. You can guess what I did.'
'I see. Did he have that curse, too?'
'No. Cathulhus aren't so weak that Lucky and his werewolf race can capture them. I'm the only one who abuses the karma rivers here.'
'Indeed, you went overboard. It doesn't matter. I'll personally ensure you a safe reincarnation after this mess.'
'Thank you.'
They stopped communicating and paid attention to Lucky, who was eager to get his true entity fate crystal.
But the next move of Priscilla surprised everybody once again. She handed a true heavenly fate crystal to Lucky instead.
"This is yours."
Lucky stared at the inferior fate crystal. Then, he bellowed in anger."He's got the entity fate crystal, but why I'm getting the heavenly one!"
Priscilla snorted, "You're weaker than him, obviously. Will you take it or not. If you don't want to take it, bring your people away and go hide in the corner of the universe!"
"YOU…"
Lucky was enraged and was envious of Overlord Xiaomao. He glanced at the fisherman and narrowed his eyes for a long time.
"Fine." Lucky surprised everybody, "I'll accept the offer and join your forces, but I want another true heavenly fate crystal. I know you have more!"
"Alright." Priscilla tossed another crystal at Overlord Lucky without hesitation.
The wolf received it and consumed both. He closed his eyes and digested the two systems.
DING
DING
Two system screens appeared in front of Lucky, and everybody around him could see them. Xiaomao glanced at them and let out a sigh.
One was a typical leveling system with upgradable classes, attribute points, and weird conditional system skills. As for the other system, it was named "Dantian Eater".
Xiaomao had a bad feeling about this while Ellen and Priscilla's expressions were indifferent. After all, Overlord Lucky was a weak entity like Xiaomao, who couldn't pose a threat to them after the war.
Overlord Lucky sneered at Xiaomao, "Just you wait, Nu'Earthe. After the war, we'll settle this!"
Xiaomao shook his head, "Focus on our plan first."
"Ha! Fine!"
Afterward, the group discussed the scheme and strategies to trap Overlord Planet Devourer and his karmic sovereign planet eaters.
.
.
PRESENT
Overlord Xiaomao gnashed his teeth and pulled the fishing rod with all his strength. A tip of Planet Devourer's soul slipped out of his body, but it quickly submerged into the abominable mass of flesh.
Fighting back, the flesh monster injected black Qi into the fishing line, which traveled toward Xiaomao.
Xiaomao saw the black Qi coming after him, but he could do nothing. He tightened his grip and braced for the attack.
The black Qi seeped into Xiaomao's arms and infiltrated his dantian universe. It instantly destroyed a million stars inside him.
Xiaomao was patient. He paced his breath and muttered.
"Sin of Gluttony… Devour them all."
RUMBLE
The stars in his dantian universe transformed into catfish, giant Cathulhus, and cute cat-octopi. They rushed toward the black Qi and devoured them.
The tiny creatures gnawed and swallowed the Qi of the transcendent being. Many exploded because of the backlashes, but no one showed fear. Instead, they ate the black Qi faster.
Some of the creatures bloated after they were full. A few seconds later, they split into two and two into four like one-cell microorganisms. The separated creatures then transformed into stars, replenishing the lost cultivation base.
That was not the end of Xiaomao's ability. He uttered another word.
"Sin of Sloth… Go to sleep."
The flow of Qi decelerated and slowly stopped circulating inside him. Moreover, Xiaomao inserted his Qi into his fishing rod and sent them toward the monster whale.
"Sin of Wrath… KILL!"
Xiaomao's white Qi turned red and traveled through the sea of black Qi like a bright ray of light in the dark. Instantly, it pierced into Overlord Planet Devourer's body.
The transcendent monster sensed a sharp pain in his body. It stung like an insect bite.
"Heh! I told you – Your effort is futile! A mere entity can't possibly harm me, a transcendent being!"
Xiaomao deeply exhaled while he sweated profusely. The corners of his mouth curved up into a smile.
A few kilometers behind Xiaomao, Lucky and Ellen were on standby. Both overlords glanced at the fisherman and smacked their lips.
"That whale is an idiot." Lucky was annoyed as he knew about Xiaomao's secret abilities and his power.
"As expected of Overlord Xiaomao. He's not nicknamed as the strongest entity in the universe for nothing. Who would have thought of converting the curse of seven sins into his power?" Ellen was impressed.
"If any idiot copies him, they will die a painful death."
"You sure know a lot about him, traitorous wolf."
"Same goes for you, traitorous princess."
They continued to observe the fight, allowing Xiaomao, Planet Devourer, and Priscilla to get tired first. While waiting, Lucky opened his system menu and allocated his status points, preparing for the next phase of combat.
Meanwhile, Ellen meditated and recuperated from her injuries. While she was at it, she scanned through the universe, searching for her surviving subordinates.
'Hmm?'
After scanning for a while, Ellen unexpectedly detected the presence of a mercenary, which had gone missing. He was several galaxies away from their location, but his aura was easy to detect.
The person's aura was bright, oppressive, and domineering like a dragon.
That was not all. Ellen detected the life signature of a transcendent being close by. Moreover, it had the same scent as Priscilla.
She had met that man before at the Fate Stadium. She recognized him well.
'Ah, Ohio Man? You're alive, I see. And that person… Florida Man?'
Ellen was baffled. When they met, she thought he was just one of many lurking karmic sovereigns. The fact that Leo was a transcendent being surprised her.
'Did he just break through? Or was it his true cultivation base all along? How did I miss this?'
Curious, she probed further by sending a fragment of her consciousness toward Leo to snoop on him.
But as the old saying – If you look into the darkness, the darkness looks back at you. Suddenly, the person that Ellen was peeking at looked up and stared at her.
"!!!"
Panicked, Ellen pulled her consciousness back and panted. For a moment, she thought that her soul was pulled out of her fleshly body.
'That was dangerous. Did he see me? I don't even detect his Qi usage!'
.
.
Yan Empire Planet
Leo gazed at the ceiling of his shopping complex and squinted his eyebrows. Pondering for a moment, he scratched his eyes and peeled a layer of his eye-boogers, which he smeared on an earth fate crystal.
The fate crystal glittered in response. A minute later, it turned green.
DING
<You have successfully upgraded an earth fate crystal into a sky fate crystal!>
<Please be careful. There is a 50% chance that the upgrade can fail. If you fail to upgrade a fate crystal, it will be destroyed!>
"I know."
Leo picked his nose and extracted a piece of booger. Again, he swiped it on the sky fate crystal in his hand. For a good measure, he spat on it.
The newly upgraded sky fate crystal changed color once again. It turned blue this time.
DING
<You have successfully upgraded a sky fate crystal into a heavenly fate crystal!>
<Please be careful. There is a 75% chance that the upgrade can fail. If you fail to upgrade a fate crystal, it will be destroyed!>
"I also know that."
Leo put the heavenly fate crystal away as he no longer had the ingredients to upgrade another one for the day. He brought out a leaf of void tree and put it in his mouth. Then, he ate it raw.
DING
<You have consumed a leaf of Void Tree.>
<For 24 hours, you will be blessed with great luck.>
Leo glanced at the clock and remembered the time. It was 1.19 PM.
"1.19 PM? Noted."
Leo tilted his head left and right before he cut his left palm with his nail. As soon as he cut it, a branch of a transparent tree came out and sprouted a purple leaf.
He plucked the branch and rubbed his wound, which was healed instantly. Leo then stored the small branch and the leaf away.
DING
<You have obtained a weak branch of Void Tree.>
<You have obtained a leaf of Void Tree.>
Leo snickered and shook his head. He liked the new ability.
"I should have searched for this thing earlier. This is such a HAX. Who would have thought that I could upgrade fate crystals twice a day by eating a stupid leaf? And what the hell, my body can reproduce that same leaf, too! I eat, I create, and I upgrade! What a cheat… Oh, wait. Should I start farming fate crystals? Can I plant these branches and let them grow more leaves? Hmm."
Leo stroked his chin and looked at the ceiling again. When he gazed beyond the ceiling, he saw the bright stars in the universe.
Looking at the stars reminded Leo of a snooper earlier. He stopped pondering about his future business plan and gazed further into the void.
'Who the hell snooped me earlier? Was it another enemy?'
Thinking of the previous giant whale, Leo thought of the loot that he got from it. He salivated, wondering what he might get if he could kill more monsters of the same type.
'Will there be more whales like that for the butcher? Let's see here.'
Leo focused his eyes and spread his sense far and wide, scanning the universe. A 3D hologram map appeared in Leo's mind like a radar, mapping the universe.
Within 10 seconds, the whole map of the universe was completed. He also detected the movements of space entities, spaceships, and objects.
Seeing everything in his mind was exhilarating. He felt like a kid learning about stars and spaces for the first time.
Unfortunately, his excitement died when he found a grand battle between super experts at the center of the universe. A flesh-like whale monster, bigger than the one Leo had met, was trapped by a group of phoenixes.
Leo also found Priscilla, Ellen, and Lucky. What surprised him the most was the presence of Overlord Xiaomao, who had the same look as one of his golems – Aslan.
'That man.'
The face of his obnoxious father overlapped with the overlord. At first, Leo disregarded the overlord as someone with the same face. However, when he saw the troubled expression of Xiaomao, Leo's expression changed.
It reminded him that his father had gone missing again. That scheming golem went off somewhere, and Leo hadn't seen him in the past week. He wondered if Aslan was in the battle.
"Dammit!"
Without hesitation, he teleported, traveling through material objects and the void toward the battle scene.
.
.
Meanwhile, Aslan was inside the cow level. As the cows overpopulated this realm, he worked hard to cull them, preventing the monsters from invading Leo's realm.
Suddenly, he sneezed. Aslan paused and wiped his nose.
"Odd. I'm a freaking statue. How did I sneeze?"

chapters.title: Chapter 326 Florida Man Rescues Endangered Killer Whale from Hunters, Shockingly Discovers His Mother Among Them, Prompts Pursuit to Murder the Escaped Whale
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 326 – Florida Man Rescues Endangered Killer Whale from Hunters, Shockingly Discovers His Mother Among Them, Prompts Pursuit to Murder the Escaped Whale.
CRACK
The sealing array surrounding Planet Devourer weakened. The flesh whale gradually consumed the flame of Priscilla and her minions' energy while he gathered strength to break the seal.
Priscilla's expression changed. She bellowed.
"HOLY FLAME!"
That was her ultimate system ability. By enveloping a target with her flame, it would erode the soul of the target from within regardless of cultivation base and strength difference. However, this power would also consume one to two billion years of her lifespan peruse.
"HAHAHAHA! YOU FINALLY USE ALL YOUR CARDS! NOW, MY TURN!" Planet Devourer cackled. "SYSTEM DESTRUCTION!"
Priscilla wasn't the only one with a system skill. Planet Devourer also had a trump card waiting for this occasion. He ejected seven entity fate crystals that he had been hiding in his flesh and merged them into a true entity fate crystal. Then, he crushed it.
CLANK!
As Planet Devourer had foreseen, by destroying the new entity fate crystal, he could cancel a system user's abilities and remove her power entirely! Moreover, everybody in the area would be affected.
BOOM
A shockwave blasted everybody around Planet Devourer. Lucky, Ellen, Priscilla, and the phoenixes were blown away. Only Xiaomao managed to resist the shockwave as he was tied to Planet Devourer with his fishing rod.
At the same time, Priscilla's ability reached Planet Devourer and struck his soul. Feeling the pain of soul flame, he screeched and thrashed around in pain.
DING
DING
DING
System messages appeared in front of everybody, informing them that their systems were being forcefully uninstalled!
Ellen, Lucky, Priscilla, and the phoenixes who owned system skills vomited blood as their souls and bodies were cut from the inside. The backlash degraded their cultivation base by a major realm!
Xiaomao, on the other hand, didn't receive a system message or a backlash as he didn't have any fate crystal in his soul. He only felt a strong gale pushing him backward.
The fisherman overlord looked around and realized the dire situation. He clicked his tongue.
"This is why you shouldn't implant fate crystals into your soul! No cultivator should rely on that shortcut!"
As everybody was critically injured, Xiaomao was the only capable fighter of their forces. He gathered his strength and increased his power output, stabbing Planet Devourer with his silver Qi.
"HAHAHAHAHA! YOU'RE BY YOURSELF NOW, CATHULHU OVERLORD!"
Planet Devourer cackled while he endured the remaining eroding flame in his soul. Half of him was burnt to a crisp, and he couldn't regenerate his flesh. However, his cultivation base never regressed because of several artifacts inside his stomach.
Suddenly, Planet Devourer spat 100,000 purple leaves from his mouth and burst into laughter.
"IT'S OVER! TASTE THE DESPAIR!"
All 100,000 void leaves dissipated into purple dust, which were assimilated with Planet Devourer's body. Instantly, his body and soul were completely healed. His dantian and energy were also restored.
Like a video game player who witnessed the final boss use a healing spell on himself, Xiaomao almost cursed gods and the items that Planet Devourer had just used.
"N…No way." Priscilla was still dazed by the previous attack. When she noticed how Planet Devourer restored his health and Qi to his prime, she lost the will to fight.
Lucky's face turned dark. He immediately turned his tail and flew away from the battlefield. As for Ellen, she still couldn't believe that her cultivation regressed to the entity realm.
"NOOOOOO!!" Ellen cried. She worked so hard to reach the karmic sovereign realm, but she lost all her progress. Moreover, her soul and dantian were in a mess that she wouldn't be able to recover her strength within 10,000 years.
The rest of the phoenixes were in disarray. Half of them fled in panic while the remaining half staggered in confusion.
Planet Devourer took his leisure time to break the weakened seal. He also slowly pulled Xiaomao's fishing line, which latched to his soul.
"That was fun, Priscilla. Too bad, our playtime is over. From now on, you shall become the seedbed for my reproduction experiment! As for your race and kin, I'll let them live for now since they might produce another fine woman like you! Hehehehe!"
"…"
Nobody uttered a word. Priscilla didn't even listen to Planet Devourer as she was still traumatized and shocked.Overlord Xiaomao glanced at Priscilla and Ellen. Upon noticing their expressions, he let out a long sigh. Then, he mustered his courage.
"Even if our chance of winning is one in a billion, I will not give up!"
The fisherman deeply inhaled and injected all his Qi and life force into his fishing rod. The fishing line glittered and multiplied into a trillion wire-like strings.
The strings detached from the finishing rods and began moving like snakes. They rushed toward Planet Devourer.
A billion threads pierced into the whale's body like hungry parasites. The rest of them turned into ropes, coiling and tying the massive body of the monster. Then, they tightened and threatened to cut Planet Devourer into pierces.
Planet Devourer ignored the attacks and shifted his eyes toward Overlord Xiaomao. He gave the old man a meaningful look.
"One in a billion, you say? You know what? Let me calculate that chance for you. I think one in a billion is an overstatement. Your chance should be even lower than that. Maybe… no chance at all? HAHAHAHAHA!"
