Planet Devourer closed his eyes and activated his system to predict the result of this fight one hour in the future. A thousand timelines of possible future turned into memory, which entered his mind.
"…Huh?"
Something strange occurred in the memory.
For some reason, they were all black. All predicted events were either blank or black as if the scenes were abruptly cut off.
"This is odd."
This was Planet Devourer's first time experiencing this. He stopped playing around and looked deeper, wondering what went wrong.
Again, all predictions showed as black scenes.
Planet Devourer opened his eyes as he sensed something amiss. He started asking his system.
"SYSTEM! FORECAST THE RESULT OF THIS WAR! WHO WILL BE THE VICTOR?!"
DING
<There is a 100% chance that Priscilla and her alliance will win this war.>
"WHAT?!" The answer shocked Planet Devourer. "BUT THAT'S IMPOSSIBLE! I'VE ALREADY CRIPPLED THEM ALL! WHO IS GOING TO DEFEAT ME?!"
DING
<The major contributor to this war is Florida Man.>
"???"
Planet Devourer paused for a few seconds. He wasn't familiar with the name. At the back of his head, he knew that he heard this name before, but he couldn't remember it.
"Who?"
<Leonardo 'Florida Man' Ariel, the son of Aslan Ariel.>
"!!!"
Finally, Planet Devourer remembered the name. After all, he had been stalking Aslan and Eleanor's events for a long time.
As this was the first time his system predicted his defeat, Planet Devourer panicked. He closed his eyes and calculated his future again. This time, he shortened the scan and calculated the next 10 minutes.
DING
New scenes entered his mind. A middle-aged man with a transparent scythe would appear in the next few seconds. They would fight, but all fights resulted in Planet Devourer's death.
Unable to believe in the predicted future, Planet Devourer opened his eyes and bellowed.
"FLORIDA MAN! I'LL BE SURE TO HUNT YOU DOWN!"
The giant whale rapidly shrank, escaping from Xiaomoa's restraints. After fleeing himself from the fishing lines, he vanished, fleeing toward the Void Tree.
…
WHOOSH
Leo arrived at the battlefield in space. He paused and looked around, checking the conditions of Priscilla and Xiaomao.
Upon seeing Overlord Xiaomao's face, Leo was disappointed.
"Oh, you're not my father. Sorry, I mistook you for the wrong person."
Xiaomao tilted his head in confusion. Although he was relieved that Planet Devourer suddenly retreated, he didn't let his guard down against Leo.
"Are you Overlord Florida Man of the Yan Empire Planet?"
Leo pursed his lips, "That nickname is cringe. Just call me Florida Man for short. No more prefixes or suffixes, please."
"…Okay."
"But before that…" Leo noticed the weird state of Priscilla, Ellen, and the phoenixes. He swept his gaze and searched for the perpetrator, "Where is that abomination that you fought earlier?"
"He… runs away."
"I see. Which direction?"
Xiaomao turned right and pointed in the general direction of the void tree. "Probably there. There's the Void Tree five galaxies away, but I doubt those planet eaters leave any star behind. You will have to fly through the dark."
"No problem."
Leo thanked Xiaomao and gazed in that direction. His eyes gleamed in green light while he scanned the entire universe with his senses.
PONG
Like a sonar wave, a silent and faint shockwave expanded and covered the entire space. The map of the universe appeared in Leo's mind, updating the information.
Then, Leo saw the Void Tree for the first time. He also found the mysterious flesh monster that attacked Xiaomao and Priscilla earlier.
While Leo mumbled to himself, Priscilla came back to her senses. When she saw Leo, she was surprised.
"You… why are you here?"
Hearing Priscilla's question, Leo smirked and messed with her, "Saving my foster mother's tits, what else?"
"…"
Instead of being angry, Priscilla reverted to her human form. She pulled Leo into her valley.
Because of the size difference, Leo was buried in the flesh mountains.
"Thank you! Your mother thought she would become that monster's meat slave for eternity. I'm glad my son is here to save me!"
Leo was annoyed, but her didn't reject the soft mountains. He slowly climbed out of the giant cleavage and coughed.
"Dearest mother, I'm married. We might be mother and son, but we're not actually related by blood."
"Bullshit. You have my blood essence. You are of my blood!"
"Then… you probably need to respect HIM as one of my fathers." Leo pointed at Xiaomao.
"Him?" Priscilla was confused for a moment. But then, she realized something absurd.
Leo had Xiaomao's bloodline in him as well. Although it was faint, Leo's dantian and blood carried a tinge of Xiaomao's unique dao – The Seven Sins Dao.
Priscilla was speechless. She glanced at Xiaomao in disgust.
"I can't believe I have to share my son with you, Overlord Xiaomao."
"Share what?" Xiaomao was clueless about this matter. He felt like Priscilla misunderstood him.
"Anyway," Leo stopped them from the internal fight. "I'm busy. I'm going to chase that abomination of a fish for a second."
"W-Wait! That's dangerous!" Priscilla flustered, worrying for Leo's safety.
Leo didn't listen to Priscilla. He vanished, flying through space as if he could teleport across the universe.
.
.
"I'm alive!"
Planet Devourer arrived at a perch of the Void Tree. He gnawed a branch, a million void leaves, and a thousand fate crystals at once.
After swallowing everything, Planet Devourer looked behind him. Upon seeing how Leo wasted his time talking with Priscilla and Xiaomao, he was relieved.
"Heh, idiot. You should have struck me when you had a chance! Now, what is the future? How do I defeat Florida Man!? Tell me, system!"
DING
<Calculating…>
<You have the advantage of fate crystal quantity. You should start combining fate crystals to produce at least one true entity fate crystal to help you fight against Florida Man.>
Planet Devourer was relieved. He started calculating his victory chance next.
Unfortunately, the result terrified Planet Devourer.
DING
<You have a 0% chance of victory against Florida Man!>
"WHAT?! THAT'S IMPOSSIBLE!!"
Planet Devourer couldn't believe it. A few days earlier, the possibility of him killing everybody in the universe was 99%. However, the new prediction didn't make sense.
Not giving up, Planet Devourer used the system to see into the future. He peeked into a million timelines in the next five minutes.
Unfortunately, he no longer had the time to do so.
WHOOSH
While Planet Devourer wasted his time calculating the future, Leo already arrived. He floated in front of the Void Tree, staring at the monster whale.
Leo grumbled and rotated his arms, warming up.
"Let's get this over with, you dork. I don't know you, but you probably know me. You sent your goon after my brother and me for some reason, and you bullied my foster mom. Therefore, I have a legitimate reason to shove oversized durian-smelled dynamites up your rectum and have them blown from the inside. Now, can you do me a favor and die quietly so that I can move on with my life?"
"…You." Planet Devourer had never seen a cocky and obnoxious human like Leo before. He was offended. "How dare you use that tone to me?! Who do you think you are?!"
"Who am I?" Leo coughed and deepened his voice. "I AM FLORIDA MAN!"
Leo ejected 10 void leaves from his soul and transformed them into a purple scythe.

chapters.title: Chapter 327 A Million Cat Found in Florida Man’s House, Claims He Gave Birth to All of Them
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 327 – A Million Cat Found in Florida Man's House, Claims He Gave Birth to All of Them.
"I REFUSE TO BELIEVE MY FATE! YOU WILL DIE HERE! FLORIDA MAN!!"
Planet Devourer screamed while countless eyeballs of his body split open, transforming into mouths. They bit and tore every void leaf and fate crystal on the tree. Absorbing the tree barks, branches, and leaves inside him, Planet Devourer's strength soared. His size doubled, matching the size of the gigantic tree.
Despite being eaten, the void tree restored its leaves, branches, and fate crystal fruits. Moreover, it learned from the crisis and reproduced more branches and leaves, struggling to survive.
The tree grew larger as a result. It also emanated purple poisonous miasma to protect itself.
Planet Devourer absorbed the miasma and laughed. He taunted Leo.
"I now have the strength of a hundred level 10 transcendence! You are no match to me-"
SWUA
While Planet Devourer was busy blabbering nonsense, Leo silently swung the scythe, cutting the void. A crack appeared in the dimension where Planet Devourer was.
The whale monster was split in half. Planet Devourer was flabbergasted as he couldn't see the attack.
Although he was surprised, some of his eyes peeked into the dimension crack. Then, they found a weird universe with no stars.
Stunned and panicked, Planet Devourer slipped into the crack and entered the strange void.
Leo snorted at the coward whale and waved his scythe. Upon the gesture, the crack was sealed, severing half of Planet Devourer's body.
Unfortunately, the whale was too fast. His soul and his dantian already entered the dimension crack. As for the remnant body parts, they were his discarded flesh.
The mass of flesh without an owner slowly bloated and glowed. They condensed monster Qi and initiated an ability that Leo also had.
The flesh and blood of Planet Devourer self-detonated!
"…"
BOOM
BOOM
BOOM
A thousand consecutive explosions generated the deadliest shockwave blast, destroying everything within a million light-years of distance.
When the explosions subsided and the dust settled, the void tree remained unharmed.
WHOOSH
Leo's invisible body emerged on top of the void tree after he had slipped through the gaps of shockwaves. Calmly, he unplugged a void leaf and sniffed it.
It smelled like the first batch of 10 leaves that he ate. They tasted like beer mixed with Red Bull.
"Seriously, this is good stuff. I wish I had known about this tree earlier. Oh, well."
Leo patted the tree and attempted to store it in his system inventory. However, the system warned him.
DING
<You cannot store KEY ITEMS.>
"…This is new."
Leo was slightly disappointed. Still, he used his scythe as a harvester, cleaving a dozen tree branches and collecting ten thousand void tree leaves at once. This time, he successfully stored them in his inventory slots.
Before chasing after the whale, Leo stretched his thumb and pinky finger, making a phone call gesture. He then licked the tip of his thumb and sent a sound transmission to Simba back home.
Without waiting for the dial tone, Leo started sending messages.
"Hey, yo, Simba! You still have that giant battleship with you, right? If I remember correctly, that thing has something called 'Omnipresent Drive' or something. If that thing is OMNIPRESENT, can you teleport the whole thing here at my coordinate? I need your help to bring something home."
A few seconds later, a gigantic dreadnaught mothership appeared and hovered over the void tree. A thousand battleships flew out of the gold dragon ship and surrounded it.
Simba and Cheese also flew out of the mothership and landed on top of the void tree. They inspected the purple entity and questioned Leo."Leo, what the hell is going on here?"
Simba used his system ability to locate Leo's location and piloted the dreadnaught mothership here. He thought that Leo was in trouble.
"Nothing much. I need you guys to drag this whole thing to our galaxy."
Simba wryly smiled, "Impossible. Do you know that this thing is bigger than our FREAKING GALAXY?!"
"If you can't, just take as many leaves and… crystals as you can."
Leo pointed at the fruits of the tree, which looked similar to the fate crystals that they had.
Simba frowned and looked down. He dove into the sea of leaves and landed on a giant perch.
At the tip of the perch, a massive fruit was hidden there. Simba got closer and discovered that it was larger than the Solar System's Sun.
"…Holy."
Simba knew what it was. That was an entity fate crystal, but its quality surpassed every fate crystal that he had seen. Without hesitation, he collected it and carried it with him.
Simba got back to the top of the tree while lifting a white sun with one arm. He showed his loot to Leo.
"Leo, look at this. Are you sure that you want us to bring THIS to our solar system?!"
"Yep! Oh, isn't that an entity fate crystal? You should collect them and put them in a safe place. I think I can upgrade it later."
"…WHAT?!"
Leo clapped his hands as his ADHD resurfaced. He stopped focusing on the tree and recalled what he had been doing.
"Sorry, I'm busy. I need to chase and kill a stupid monster first. I'll be right back, okay?"
"Huh? Wait! You haven't explained your plan!"
It was too late. After collecting the samples, Leo waved his scythe again, cutting open dimensions. Then, he entered the starless void, pursuing the coward whale.
Simba looked at the disappearing figure of his brother. He rubbed his brows, having a headache. He remembered why his brother left a deep impression on him.
"Right. I forgot. Leo was always… a troublemaker."
.
.
In the starless dimension, Planet Devourer flew randomly, searching for an object or star to use as a landmark. However, the dark void was so empty that it troubled him.
Without a landmark, Planet Devourer was lost.
"Where the hell am I?! Akashic Record, tell me! Where are we?!"
DING
<You are at the coordinate -327FBRY5381230, -114664GSH2339123, -2024JNW4640796.>
<This location is an uncharted universe where expanding galaxies and stars have never reached. If you travel 20NE-50PLUS for 937 light years using your full speed, you will find the belt of the universe.>
Although 937 light-years sounded short of Planet Devourer's standard, the system referred to his max speed, which transcended the speed of light. His thousand eyes narrowed in disbelief.
"In short, I'll be starving for 900 years."
DING
<System calculates that it is pointless to worry about being starved.>
<Warning! Danger approach! You will die in two minutes!>
"!!!"
Planet Devourer realized that he was not in the clear yet. He looked around, searching for Leo. He also realized that he was stupid.
If Leo could cut open dimensions and send him to the corner of the universe, he could also travel across the universe using the same technique!
SWUA
Without a warning, a dimensional crack appeared. Again, it appeared on top of Planet Devourer, beheading him in one slash.
Leo slipped through the crack of the void and landed on top of Planet Devourer's head.
"FLORDIA MAN!!"
Planet Devourer was still alive. His discarded body transformed into a billion space piranhas, rushing toward Leo.
Leo glanced at the piranhas and lightly snorted. Small rocks were ejected from his system inventory and were fired toward the small creatures like bullets.
The inventory screen acted as a machine gun, shooting down everything in sight. Because of the inhuman rate of fire, the billion piranhas shattered into floated in the void, turning into messing space sashimi.
Planet Devourer didn't give up. He bellowed and regenerated his entire mass instantly. Then, his body grew countless tentacles, which freely shape-shifted into animal limbs, weapons, and lewd objects. Everything chased after Leo.
Leo didn't move or react to the tentacles this time. He suddenly vomited a black marble and spat at Planet Devourer. The black rock softly landed on Planet Devourer's head, which sank into his flesh.
Although confused, Planet Devourer absorbed the marble into his flesh and attempted to dissolve it with his digestive fluid. Instantly, the marble melted into particles and entered Planet Devourer's blood circulation system.
WHOOSH
WHOOSH
The tentacles successfully wrapped around Leo and caught him. Leo also stored his scythe back in his inventory and let out a long sigh.
"Omae Wa Mou Shindeiru." Leo warned the whale.
Planet Devourer cackled in response, "You fool! I don't know what you're talking about, but this is the end! Nobody survives my precious tentacles! You know what? You're quite strong for a human! I'll transform your gender with my fluid, and I'll experiment on you instead! You will conceive my children!"
"…Err. How about no?"
"TOO LATE! YOU'RE MINE!"
One of Planet Devourer's tentacles transformed into a snake, which opened its mouth and was about to spray pink liquid on him. As it opened its mouth, it flinched.
Purple blood spread within Planet Devourer's body. At first, they consumed Planet Devourer's black blood as fertilizer. But when those purple blood cells matured, they evolved into purple seeds.
Planet Devourer's expression changed. He looked at his body in confusion.
"What is happening to me?!"
DING
<You are infected with Mutated Void Phoenix Parasites.>
<You will die in 100 milliseconds.>
<It was nice knowing you.>
"WHAT?!"
Planet Devourer couldn't comprehend anything. He forgot about his body condition and stared at the system screen in shock.
"YOU USELESS PIECE OF GARBAGE! YOU WERE SUPPOSED TO TELL ME HOW TO DEAL WITH MY ENEMIES!"
DING
<You will die in 80 milliseconds.>
<…70.>
<…60.>
By the time that Planet Devourer heard the countdown, the blood seeds inside him already sprouted rainbow flame leaves, which consumed Planet Devourer's Qi as fertilizer. A million leaves and sprouts shot up into small plants on top of the flesh monster.
<…50.>
Planet Devourer came back to his senses in the last few seconds. He remembered that he possessed so many entity fate crystals that he could use as a system bomb. He quickly merged a batch of seven entity fate crystals together.
<…40.>
A true entity fate crystal was condensed. Planet Devourer smirked and brought it out.
Suddenly, Leo phased through the restraints as if he were a ghost. He teleported and snatched the true entity fate crystal from Planet Devourer's hands in front of his massive face.
"Ah, I can't let you do that." Leo giggled.
<…30.>
"BASTARD!" Planet Devourer was enraged. He ejected all fate crystals from his soul at once and merged everything. A dozen batches of true entity fate crystals appeared.
<…20.>
"I don't believe that you can negate them all! DIIIIEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!"
Planet Devourer caught every true entity fate crystals with his tentacles and crushed them.
"Eh, I can't let you do that." Leo let out another long sigh and snapped his fingers.
CLICK-CLICK-CLICK
A time domain was erected, freezing everything around him, including Planet Devourer and a dozen true entity fate crystals.
Leo waved his hands and pulled all entity fate crystals toward him. He calmly collected everything in his system inventory.
<…10.>
Despite being frozen in time, Planet Devourer's system continued counting down as Leo's blood inside the monster didn't stop growing.
"NOOOOOO!!!"
It was too late for the whale king. By the time he managed to break Leo's domain and move, Leo's virus already matured.
BOOM
BOOM
BOOM
A million rainbow trees emerged from Planet Devourer's body while their roots latched into his soul, eating away his life force. The flame trees melted all goo, limbs, and eyes of the whale monster until no flesh remained behind.
One of the trees sank its roots into Planet Devourer's soul and stole every star in his dantian universe. It then evolved into a galactic-sized rainbow flame tree, floating in the void.
<…0.>
<Skill Issues.>
The last system message mocked Planet Devourer even though his consciousness already turned black as he had predicted.
DING
The true entity fate crystal was ejected from Planet Devourer's dried soul and floated in the void.
Leo smiled and reached out to catch it.
Unfortunately, the fate crystal disintegrated into dust before Leo could touch it.
"Oh."
Leo was disappointed. He thought he would have scored 14 true entity fate crystals from this trip.
"Shame. Anyway, I got so many goodies. What should I be doing with these… Cat's siblings?"
He gazed at the million rainbow trees, which turned the void into a space forest. One of them that absorbed the monster's dantian universe was also too big for Leo to bring it back home.
The trees didn't float there idly. As Leo granted them souls, they started gaining sentient. Their leader gradually transformed into a prismatic Alraune and shrank her size to match Leo's.
The new child greeted her creator with a bright smile.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
"…"
The million trees quickly copied their leader. They gained sentient and transformed into flower women as well. After gaining a feminine body, they surrounded Leo.
"Meow?"
"Nom-Nom?"
"Meow Meow?"
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
Everybody used Cat's former language.
Listening to these children, Leo got a migraine. He wondered if this was a curse.
"Why the hell do y'all speak a cat's language? I never taught you those!"

chapters.title: Chapter 328 Florida Man Turns Ohio Youth into Flower Fertilizer Because His Daughter MILKED Youth's Fluid
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 328 – Florida Man Turns Ohio Youth into Flower Fertilizer Because His Daughter MILKED Youth's Fluid.
Leo ended up guiding all Alraunes to the void tree. He cut open a dimension crack and used it to teleport everybody to the Void Tree.
When Leo arrived, Simba and his dragonewts already started extracting void leaves and fate crystals. However, their performance was questionable.
The void tree constantly regenerated and multiplied its body parts, troubling the extraction team. The more they cut, the more leaves and fate crystals appeared.
The dragonewts grumbled while they chopped the tree branches and transported them back to their cargo ship. No one bothered stealing a leaf or a fate crystal.
Everybody tried consuming a fate crystal or two. However, the fate crystals rejected them and left their souls.
Simba had a headache. He also tried storing the fate crystals in his soul, but his soul rejected raw fate crystals from the tree. Without a choice, he wasted his precious inventory system slots, storing the leaves and fate crystals to bring them home.
Leo arrived and checked Simba's progress. When he noticed how Simba used his system inventory instead, he got curious.
"Simba. Why don't you take in some fate crystals? If you consume some, you can gain a new system power."
Simba sighed, "Don't you think I tried?"
"You did?" Leo was surprised.
"How about you try it yourself and see what's going on?"
"…"
Curious, Leo plucked a moon-sized entity fate crystal from the void tree and tried to absorb it. Instantly, it was ejected from his body, and a system message told him the reason.
DING
<The Void Tree doesn't acknowledge you as its owner. You cannot consume its fruit.>
"Uh, what?"
Leo was confused. He remembered that Planet Devourer ate so many fate crystals, and it was fine.
Confused, Leo complained, "Hey, damn tree. That stupid monster ate your branches and fruits, but it was fine. But when I tried to eat one, you rejected me. What the hell, dude?"
Simba nodded as he also received a similar message. Then, he gazed at the crowd of Alraunes who tagged along with Leo.
"Care to introduce those plant girls?"
"Oh, them?" Leo looked behind him and wryly smiled, "What should I say? It's a long story."
Leo was embarrassed. During the fight, he used one of Cat's personal techniques, which was effective against giant monsters. He still remembered her clone's status.
.
Name: Cat
Race: Prismatic Dryad
Cultivation Base: 666-River Karmic Sovereign
Skills: Dao of Gluttony, Dao of Corruption, Dao of Void, Dao of Mother Tree, Dao of Mutation
Specials: Prismatic Dryad Bloodline, Florida Man Bloodline
Favorite Weaponry: Void Splitting Whips
Potential Percentage: 1,000%
.
Although Cat's final form wasn't as strong as Simba or other top experts, she had an interesting skillset. Leo already defeated her and learned all of her skills, which proved to be useful in the previous fight.
During the last fight, Leo mixed his blood essence with impurity in his body, utilizing the dao of the mother tree and producing an egg of Void Tree's parasites. Then, he infected Planet Devourer with it.
The result spoke for itself. The egg was consumed, causing the parasite babies to enter Planet Devourer's blood veins. The parasites absorbed the host's blood and Qi. In the end, they grew and matured as Void Trees, which later transformed into Alraunes.
After explaining to Simba how he created them, the former gave Leo a weird look."Do you, by chance, have a tree fetish? Come to think of it, Leo. When you were young, you sometimes climbed a tree naked and rubbed your butt on a thick perch. One day at night, I saw you hugging a tree while your pants were down. Did you-"
"NOPE! SUCH EVENTS NEVER HAPPENED! NOPE!"
Simba tilted his head, "Are you sure?"
"NOPE! I NEVER FERTILIZED A TREE WITH MY MILK, EVER!"
"…I didn't say that. I only imply-"
"AND I NEVER STUCK IT INSIDE A TREE, EVER! DUDE, IT WAS COARSE, DRY, AND HARD AS HELL. IT EVEN SCRATCHES MY FORESKIN! WHY SHOULD I HUMB A TREE'S PUSSY WHEN IT'S SO HARD!!"
"…"
Leo sweated profusely while Simba deeply frowned. The latter gave up digging deeper.
"Never mind. Pretend that I never asked."
Simba changed the subject while he inspected the Alraunes. He noticed that one of them was bigger and stronger than the others. When he paid closer attention, he realized that the Alraune sprouted rainbow leaves. However, her leaves and vines had the same scent as the Void Tree.
"Are they Void Trees, Leo?"
Leo came back to his senses. He looked at his creations and sighed.
"Not really. They're prismatic trees; A variant of Void Tree."
Both Leo and Simba gazed at the girls, wondering what they should do with them. They didn't need to think too long as they began to show what they could do.
One of the Alraunes flew toward the void tree and plucked a small fate crystal. She sniffed it for a while before she opened her mouth and crushed it with her teeth. She chewed it in glee and burped when she was done.
The Void Tree replenished the immature fate crystal fruit. Instead of restoring one, it created two.
The same Alraune salivated and wrapped her arms around the branch. Her body suddenly merged with the Void Tree, transforming into a parasite. The leaves and the growing fruits withered as the Alraunes stole its energy.
"!!!"
Leo and Simba witnessed everything. They widened their eyes in astonishment.
The other Alraunes learned from their kin. They swarmed the Void Tree and vanished into the tree trunk.
RUMBLE
The Void Tree wiggled as if it struggled to repel the symbiosis beings. Its purple color dimmed while its leaves fell off from the branches. All fate crystals on the tree were ejected from the tree and dimmed.
Simba realized something. He caught one of the fate crystals and reattempted to consume it.
DING
It worked this time, which confused Leo and Simba.
"It works!"
"Hah?"
Leo scratched his head. He collected the fallen leaves and fate crystals before the hungry Alraunes could eat them all.
RUMBLE
The Void Tree withered and shrank while a million rainbow flowers bloomed. On top of the flowers, the Alraunes came out and waved their hands at Leo and Simba.
The changes didn't end there. The biggest Alraune emerged from the top of the tree and replaced its roots with hers. Afterward, the entire void tree mutated into Prismatic Void Tree, which became a new home for Leo's creations.
"Meow!"
"Meow-Meow!"
They meowed and sang a weird cat's song together while the withered tree was replaced by a bigger and brighter tree trunk, created by their blood and Qi.
In the end, all one million Alraunes merged their roots as one and became one entity.
PLOP
PLOP
New tree leaves budded. Instead of producing semi-
transparent purple leaves, all leaves were diamond-like sparkling gemstones. Each radiated rainbow aura, similar to Leo's.
Leo tilted his head and inspected the new Void Tree.
"What the hell did I just give birth to?"
Simba shrugged, "You banged a tree. The tree gave birth to your daughters."
"…"
All dragonewts stopped working and observed the new void tree. They didn't dare to get closer because of the strange rainbow aura from the tree leaves.
Cheese was different. He tested the tree, plucking one of its gem leaves.
As soon as Chase pulled the leaf, the rainbow diamond leaf shapeshifted into a rainbow slime, biting Cheese's hand.
"OW-OW-OW-OW! GET OFF ME!"
Cheese threw the sime away. The rainbow slime got off Cheese's hand and returned to the tree, assuming the appearance of a diamond leaf.
The dragonewts flinched and backed away from the tree, afraid of the new leaves and the Alraunes.
Simba and Leo glanced at Cheese for a moment before they used their system perks in unison.
"Appraisal!" Said Simba.
"Identify!" Leo uttered.
DING
.
Prismatic Void Tree
This variant of Void Tree was born from Florida Man's blood essence and impurity. He created void tree seeds with the Dao of Mother Tree when he fought a transcendence-realm Overlord Planet Devourer. The Void Tree's seeds absorbed the overlord's blood and Qi, which mutated into a million prismatic void saplings. All saplings later merged as one, transforming into a completed Prismatic Void Tree.
This tree constantly produces Prismatic Leaves, which can be used to open a dimensional gate to the higher universe. However, after the usage, the used leaf will disappear.
When the tree bears fruits, all fruits will evolve into fate crystals. Depending on the size and Qi, they can become fate crystals of any quality. However, the fruits of this tree may reject the consumer if it contains a sentient being inside.
The Prismatic Void Tree can be considered a calamitous being as it grows by absorbing all Qi in the universe. The only way to stop it from consuming the entire universe as food is to offer a million young men with great vitality as a sacrifice once every 1,000 years. The parasitic Alraunes in the tree need yang Qi and a man's seed to sustain. Therefore, if the sacrificed men can constantly produce seeds for the Alraune parasites, the prismatic void tree will stay dormant.
.
Leo and Simba smacked their foreheads as they got themselves another headache. The former regretted creating these plant girls.
"What have I done?"
Simba groaned, "This is why Father always calls you a troublemaker."
"I didn't mean to create them!"
"Then, why the hell did you use that dao when you fought Planet Devourer whoever that was!?"
"But that's the only way to defeat a giant monster with the transcendent realm cultivation base!"
"…"
Again, both men sighed. They gazed at the void tree's Alraunes, who drooled and stared at the male draongewts nearby. One of them even opened her arms to seduce the young dragonkin.
"Meow Meow <3"
The dragonewt flinched and backed away. Seeing that her prey didn't fall for the honey trap, the Alraune cried.
"…"
The male dragonewt regretted making a girl cry. He fell for it and flew closer to the Alraune to console her. Unfortunately, she stopped shedding crocodile tears and pulled the male dragonewt into a hug. The massive flower petals underneath her closed while she pulled him into the tree trunk.
The male dragonewt resisted, but it was too late. He got sucked into the void tree and was trapped with the Alraune earlier. The surface of the closed petals trembled because the couple initiated their activity.
"…"
Leo and Simba witnessed everything from the beginning to the end. The latter pointed at the perverted Alraune and looked at his brother.
"Can you help my subordinate?"
"Do I have to? He is probably enjoying it right now."
"That plant girl won't kill him, right?"
"Look. Your subordinate is a freaking entity. What is my daughter? A freaking mortal monster! I should be the one asking your subordinate to show her mercy."
"Are you sure? Those girls don't look like mortals to me."
Leo pointed at the flower again. Its petals slowly opened, revealing the back and the wings of the male dragonewt. However, the boy refused to leave for some reason and pushed himself back into the void tree.
"See?" Leo smirked, "You should be the one disciplining your men."
"…"
"Anyway, we get ourselves the first sacrificial lamb. Can I borrow some of your dragonewts to seed my daughters?"
"…You sick fuck."
"Thanks!"
"That's not a compliment." Simba rolled his eyes.

chapters.title: Chapter 329 Florida Man Celebrates E-Sport Championship Tournament Victory by Showing Women His “Balls”
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 329 – Florida Man Celebrates E-Sport Championship Tournament Victory by Showing Women His "Balls".
In the end, Simba secured a total of 30,000 fate crystals of various qualities from the Void Tree. As for the newly grown fruits of the Prismatic Void Tree, both Leo and Simba left them alone.
The group brought the loot and visited Priscilla. When they arrived with the battleship fleet, Priscilla, Ellen, and Xiaomao welcomed their return.
Xiaomao smiled and saluted, "Congratulations on your victory, Overlord Florida Man. I believe you are now the strongest overlord in this universe."
Priscilla was still under the weather, but she was happy.
"Great job, little boy! You're the king of the universe now."
Ellen hesitated to say anything. But as a lowly entity whose cultivation base degraded from the karmic sovereign realm, she was no longer in the position of power. Thus, she accepted her fate and bowed.
"As a representative of divine elves, I hope you can show mercy to our people. We also would like to surrender to you if you allow us."
Simba exited the dreadnaught battleship and came out. Coincidentally, he saw Ellen surrendering to Leo.
Ellen also noticed Simba. Upon detecting his current cultivation base, she flinched. However, she didn't comment on his new appearance and why he was by Leo's side.
Leo dismissed the formality, "Relax. I'm here to clear up the mess. To be honest, I'm a peace-loving man. I hate bloodshed, and I hate wars. If we can co-exist in this universe, I'll be happy to cooperate with y'all."
Xiaomao widely grinned while Priscilla laughed. As for Ellen, she sighed, abandoning her ambition.
"So, what's next, my son?" Asked Priscilla, "You now have the entire universe for yourself. What's your next plan?"
Leo shrugged. "Nothing. I'll just sit at home and try to cultivate a karmic fate crystal, I guess."
"Karmic Fate Crystal? Do they even exist?" Priscilla, Ellen, and Xiaomao were interested.
"I don't know. That's why I have to try."
"I see. That's an interesting project." Priscilla smirked and turned around, looking at her surviving soldiers and subordinates. "Good luck with that. I'm gonna go checking on my men and resurrect some dead birds."
"Wait!" Leo waved his hand and stopped Priscilla from leaving.
"Hmm? What is it?" Priscilla turned around.
Leo looked at Simba who nodded and ejected seven star-sized entity fate crystals from his system inventory. Leo ordered them to merge in front of the crowd.
Seven stars collided, but they later transformed into a liquid, becoming one. When the evolution was completed, the fate crystal shrank until it became a small moon.
Priscilla widened her eyes in astonishment. She stuttered, "W-What did you do?"
Leo grinned, "I just created a true entity fate crystal for fun."
"…For fun?"
Xiaomao, Ellen, and Priscilla almost vomited blood. They struggled and fought for countless years before they could earn one fate crystal, but Leo easily procured a true entity fate crystal on the spot.
Life is not fair!
Leo directed the fate crystal toward Priscilla. He smiled and explained.
"You gave me fate crystals and helped me before. I'm here to return the favor."
"…"
Leo referred to the incident when Sieg and Leo fought. Fortunately, Priscilla appeared and murdered Sieg. Then, she gave his fate crystals to Leo.
That deed alone earned Leo a huge respect. He didn't forget what Priscilla had done.
Meanwhile, Priscilla's eyes were moist. She was so moved that she couldn't restrain her emotions.
"You're such a good little boy!"
Priscilla in her giant human form grabbed Leo and pushed him against her chest. Once again, Leo was buried in the holy valley.
"Seriously, if we weren't related by blood, I would have married you!" Priscilla laughed.
"No, thank you. I'm married." Leo dully stared at Priscilla's face."Aw, you're a party pooper. Of course, that was a joke."
"Please let it really be a joke."
Leo slipped through the valley and freed himself from the giant's hug. He looked at Xiaomao, changing the subject.
"Overlord Xiaomao…"
"Yes, Overlord Florida Man?"
Leo grinned, "Do you need a fate crystal too?"
Xiaomao laughed, "No. I've never really relied on the fate crystals. I used to have one, but it is already destroyed because of my curses."
"Curses?" Leo's interest was piqued, "What curses?"
"Nothing much, actually. I just drank a lot of Karma River's water and ate so many soul embryos when I was young. Because of my deeds, the unborn souls resent me for eating them. They converted my life force into poison to torment me."
"…Sounds like trouble."
"Not really. My lifespan simply decreases a thousand times the usual rate. For example, if I had 1,000 years to live, the actual remaining lifespan would be actually one year. Also, it takes a thousand times longer to gather Qi."
Leo felt bad for the fisherman overlord. Although they weren't friends or family, Leo wished to do something to help the man. After all, Aslan took his appearance, so his bloodline might be running in his veins like Priscilla's.
"What can I do to help you? How can I remove the curses?"
Xiaomao was surprised that Leo offered a helping hand. He was glad, but he didn't need it.
"It's fine. Nobody but myself can remove the curses. All I need to do is to enter a circle of reincarnation once."
"Cycle of reincarnation?"
"In short, I need to be reborn. However, I can't choose where or which body I will reincarnate into. I won't retain my memory either. In short, it's a complete start over."
Leo was inwardly horrified, thinking of the new reincarnation. The thoughts of abandoning all his strength, achievements, and memory were terrifying.
"…That sounds very scary."
"Right?" Xiaomao giggled and sighed. He glanced at the fishing rod in his hand, "That's why I don't need fate crystals. If I had one, I would rather turn them into something inheritable. I want my successors to live a better life than mine."
"…You're a good man, Overlord Xiaomao."
"Hahahaha! I'm just a cat dad who wishes for atonement."
Speaking of Cat Dad, Leo thought of Cat back in his world. He started to miss her. He also wondered how she would react if she saw the Prismatic Void Tree and her siblings.
"If you have time, come visit me. I have many toys in my store. Since you raise cats, I think you will like them."
Leo wrote the coordinates of his world and passed the note to Xiaomao who received it in glee.
Xiaomao saluted, "I'll be sure to visit you in the future. For now, please excuse these old bones. I miss my cute Cathulhus and Catopuses."
Leo nodded, "Godspeed, sir."
Xiaomao laughed and flew back home, bringing his deadliest fishing rod with him.
After Xiaomao was gone, Leo shifted his attention to the elf queen whose face resembled Eleanor and Esen.
"You there."
Ellen jolted, "Yes?"
"What was your name again?"
"It's Ellen, sir."
"…Ellen. Tsk. I can just identify you. System!"
DING
.
Name: Ellen Sydine
Alias: None
Race: Half Abyssal Black Tortoise / Divine Elf
Age: 9,977
Cultivation Base: 12-Galaxy Entity
Thoughts: Fear, Exhausted
System Note: Ellen Sydine was the seventh princess of Divine Elf Kingdom, one of many daughters of Eleanor Sydine. She inherited her father's bloodline, but Eleanor suppressed it to hide her father's identity. After the Abyssal Black Tortoise race was extinct, Eleanor gradually unsealed her bloodline, allowing her to improve her cultivation aptitude.
After gaining the opportunity, her cultivation progress surpassed all her siblings. She attained the karmic sovereign realm and an entity fate crystal with her own strength.
Unfortunately, her life wasn't paved with rose petals. Her mother schemed to cheat the Karma River Curses by forcefully reincarnating into her body, which would steal her identity and cultivation base. Ellen predicted it and sought shelter at Fate Stadium. Later on, Ellen returned to her kingdom and claimed the throne after Queen Eleanor's death.
Ellen rose up as the queen of the Divine Elf Kingdom. She then spread her influence to the Cathulhus by forming an alliance with Overlord Xiaomao. However, because of their growing army, they were dragged into the grand war between two transcendences – Overlord Planet Devourer and Overlord Priscilla.
The war consumed 90% of Ellen's forces and destroyed many galaxies. Moreover, Overlord Planet Devourer destroyed her fate crystals and degraded her cultivation base during combat.
The war abruptly ended when Overlord Florida Man rescued Priscilla and killed Planet Devourer. She then surrendered to him.
.
After reading the biography, Leo sympathized with Ellen. She grew up in a bad environment and had a bad mother. She didn't even know who her father was.
"Ellen. Since you're surrendering to me, I'm going to give you an order. It's an ultimatum, actually."
"Y-Yes, senior?" Ellen trembled, wondering what Leo would do to her. She prepared to surrender her body and live a miserable life.
"Go back and restore your kingdom or whatever your country is."
"…Eh?"
"Second order, you must not attempt to verbally, physically, or mentally harm Esen and her children. Your elder sister is my wife, you know. I can't let you hurt my family."
Simba overheard the conversation and coughed. He winked and nudged Leo, hinting at him.
Leo caught the gesture and elaborated.
"I forgot. This includes Ester and her child, too. She's my brother's wife after all."
Ellen wryly smiled and glanced at Simba. She knew Ester and Simba, but this was her first time learning that Leo and Simba were brothers.
"You have been hiding your brother, Ohio Man," Ellen bitterly laughed.
Simba shrugged, "I didn't. I actually searched for him. Hell, I even mistook him as an enemy and fought him when we first met."
"Hahaha. Is that so?" Ellen sighed as she was envious of Simba. She turned to Leo. "You have my words, Overlord Florida Man. I will never harm your family."
Leo nodded in approval, "Good. You're my sister-in-law, so I don't want to fight you either. Anyway, you should go back to your home world and help the survivors. They must be in trouble right now because of the war. Oh, I forgot again. Man, my memories are so bad. Simba, another fate crystal!"
Simba frowned as he didn't want to give Ellen a fate crystal. But since Leo asked for it, he had no choice. Again, he ejected seven entity fate crystals.
Leo noticed Simba's dark expression and caught the hint. Instead of merging them into one true entity fate crystal, he picked one and passed it to Ellen.
"I don't sense any fate crystal from you. Just take this and go recuperating. You need rest."
Ellen slowly nodded and gave Leo a meaningful look. After absorbing the fate crystal, she turned around and vanished, returning to her home planet.
Only Priscilla, Leo, and Simba were around. They looked at each other.
Leo waved his hand to end this meeting. He also returned the remaining six entity fate crystals to Simba and let him manage them.
"Let's go home. You, too, mOthER."
"Aye!" Priscilla giggled and flew away.
Leo turned around and flew to the dreadnaught battleship. Simba followed him.
While following his brother, Simba wondered about their future.
"Say, Leo. My system tells me that if we hold on to void leaves, an emissary from the higher universe will descend and pick us up. Do you know about this?"
Leo's eyes shifted as he tried to recall some memories. He remembered something related to cliché novels."
"I forgot. What was it again?" Leo pretended to be forgetful to hear the information from his brother.
Simba deeply inhaled and told Leo what he had learned. "The thing is, we aren't done yet. Above the sky, there are clouds. Above the clouds, there are stars. Well, above this whole shit, there's a freaking upper dimension or some sort. We're in the Matrix, Leo."
"Ah…"
Leo closed his eyes and thought of the movies. He bitterly laughed.
"I wish we weren't inside a tube in the upper dimension."
"We're probably inside someone's dantian universe… like how we created a dantian universe and populated it."
Leo thought about it as well, but his hunch told him otherwise.
"It's probably different this time. My guts is telling me that it won't be that simple."
"…"
The brothers looked back at the Prismatic Void Tree at a distance. They looked forward to the days when Void Principality would descend and show them the higher universe.

chapters.title: Chapter 330 Florida Man Tries to End His Life, Expresses Desire to Be Reborn as His Grandson
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 330 – Florida Man Tries to End His Life, Expresses Desire to Be Reborn as His Grandson
The dragon dreadnaught taxi sent Leo home. Before they parted, Simba transferred all void leaves and fate crystals to Leo. When Simba was asked, he answered that he had no intention to play with crystals anymore He remained on his ship with his wife and his men as he had other things to do.
Leo returned home and reunited with his wife as usual. Because of the recent activities and the confirmation of his status in the universe, Leo stopped worrying about random ambushers. He wished that he could enjoy living a slow life for the rest of eternity.
…
After Leo had returned, Kishin Douji secretly scanned the universe with his Qi sense and system ability. It was not difficult for him to detect the changes in the trend and Karma Rivers of this universe.
The influx of new souls entered the rivers of reincarnation because of the war. Divine elves, high elves, inferior elves, planet eaters, and phoenixes lost their origins and were forced to forget their past lives.
Kishin Douji was surprised and overjoyed.
"Finally, divine elves are no more. Whoever, the current queen of the divine elf is, she is no longer in power! I can reclaim my throne again!"
Ambition, pride, and greed blinded Kishin Douji. He calculated his plans and future in his mind.
Obliteration? Enslavement? Tortures? He imagined various scenarios that he could do to the divine elf race and their allies. However, as an experienced overlord, he quickly threw away the ambitious thoughts and considered the worst-case scenarios.
'No, I can't reclaim my throne. I know that either Priscilla or Planet Devourer reduced Ellen's forces to that state. If one of them is still alive, they can still destroy me. I have to continue hiding until I get more information.'
Determined to lurk in the shadow, Kishin Douji left Leo's territory and headed toward the north pole of the planet.
The weather and the temperature were as Kishin Douji had expected – Absolute freezing point. Extreme yin Qi was abundant, and the ice continent looked healthy. Only immortals and yin-specialist cultivators could live there.
As someone from the Oni Race, yin Qi, monster Qi, and miasma were his food. He laughed and erected an ice palace, building his new home. However, he hadn't realized yet that the entire planet was within Leo's domain.
.
.
Months went by. The development of the new town achieved its goal.
Local cultivators had no choice but to bow their heads and serve Leo as their lord. Some of them abandoned the dream of being a rogue cultivator because of a certain addiction.
Everybody was addicted to the convenience of a luxurious lifestyle, big houses, and private cultivation rooms in their residences. Everybody who bought a house, a flat, or a mansion could never return to their former lifestyle anymore.
This addition came with a disadvantage. As many cultivators couldn't afford to pay for the residents, they succumbed to the installment scheme, and they were forced to pay the loan to Leo every month. The monthly installment payment became an issue for the rogue cultivators and merchants. One after another, they failed to pay the bills.
Without a choice, they surrendered their future and bodies to Leo.
Leo's black company thrived because of the monetary circulation program. The employees helped Leo grow his territory and farmlands. He paid the employees. The employees purchased his items from both shopping malls and paid the loan. Leo got his money back to pay the employees the next month.
Life was good. His territory could self-sustain, and he got more time to play with Esen.
...
One day, Aslan visited Leo and Esen. He reintroduced himself to Esen and revealed who he really was.
Esen was flabbergasted to learn that Leo also had divine elf blood in him. She pouted and complained to Leo.
"I thought you were a chimera monster in human flesh. It turns out you're a perverted elf!"
Leo laughed and hugged her, "Aren't you happy that your husband is a descendent of a divine elf, prismatic phoenix, and a bunch of god-know-monsters-my-father-put-inside-me."
Aslan bitterly laughed. "Not all of them are random monsters, you know. I added so many bloodlines in your body – Overlord Xiaomao's, Cathulhus, Void Tree's Saps, Fenrir-"
"Hold up a second," Leo stopped Aslan when he heard the detail. "What did you put in me again?"
"Oh, do you want me to repeat it? Sure. Divine elf's bloodline, Overlord Xiaomao bloodline, Cathulhu bloodline, Fenrir Werewolf bloodline, Prismatic-"
"No, not those. There's something else other than the bloodline."
"You mean the Void Tree's saps?"
"…Yeah, that. Also, WHAT. THE. FUCK!?"
Leo stared at his father in shock. He couldn't believe that his father actually injected tree sap into his blood circulation. He wondered how he survived the experiment.
"HAHAHAHA!" Aslan was unable to suppress his laughter. He wiped his tears. "How else do you think that I made that body superior to the stolen one? What Mao Miaomiao had was an incomplete physique with four bloodlines. Without the Void Tree's sap and an entity fate crystal as a catalyst, he couldn't even use 10% of the body's strength."Leo deeply frowned. He regretted that he mutated the Void Tree before he could extract some saps for future alchemy experiments.
Thinking of the Void Tree, Leo recalled that he had so many Void Tree's leaves. However, because of the recent rapid development and influx of new employees, all alchemy workshops were jam-packed with alchemists-in-training, who would be assigned to new alchemy workshops and factories in the future.
"I should create a private workshop for myself one day." Leo took a mental note.
Esen also reminded Leo, "You also need to get us a better resident. I'm tired of living on a bus. Also, I have many subordinates. We need a lot of space and courtyards."
"…I see."
"A reminder, I should be giving birth in a couple of months. Make sure the new resident has enough room for an infant and the nanny."
Being a breadwinner for his family was not always smooth and easy. Sometimes, a wife's simple and reasonable demands could give the husband a headache.
"I'll keep that in mind."
Looking at their interaction, Aslan widely grinned. He clapped his hands and informed them of a piece of bad news.
"Leo, Esen. I'm going to enter the reincarnation circle tomorrow."
"WHAT?!" Leo and Esen widened their eyes and screamed in unison. "WHY?! WHAT HAPPENED?!"
Aslan scratched his cheek. He confessed, "I've been leeching Leo's life force for too long, and it's bad for my soul. It's about time for me to reincarnate and cleanse my soul. Otherwise, I might be cursed by the universe's karma river."
Leo didn't understand the laws of this universe. "But you're an entity. Entities and karmic sovereigns don't need to reincarnate, right? You've become independent from the Karma Rivers!"
Aslan revealed a mischievous smile. He concealed another secret that he couldn't tell Leo and Esen.
"…Not really. When we're tired of our current life, we can always reduce ourselves to any local karma river and reset our lives. Well, unlike the others, we get to retain our previous life's memory and quickly recover our former cultivation base."
"Oh, it's like a "NEW GAME+" thingy?"
"Correct. Also, if I have any fate crystals in my soul, I can bring them along with me. If I have an inventory system, all items in the inventory go along with me too! Isn't that exciting?"
Leo paused for a long time. He gave his father a meaningful look.
"You sound like you want to quit your job and ditch me."
"EXACTLY!"
"SCRAM, YOU DAMN LAZY BASTARD! YOU AIN'T GONNA GET YOUR VACATION ANY TIME SOON!"
Leo kicked Aslan out of the bus and shut the door. Aslan laughed and left obediently.
After his father had left, Leo sat on a couch and rested his forearm on his forehead. With a heavy sigh, Leo complained.
"He's a damn troll. I bet he just wants to mess with me again."
Esen sat next to Leo and giggled, "You two sure are close. I envy you."
Leo hugged Esen. As the topic was related to her family, Leo wondered what Esen's father was doing. He thought of Kishin Douji.
"Should I call your father to visit you once in a while?"
Esen pouted and shook her head, "I don't consider that Oni as my father. He denied my existence, and he didn't even help me when I was in jail."
"…Right."
Leo abandoned the thought. He closed his eyes and enjoyed the cuddling.
None of them realized that Aslan was serious. The next day, the fisherman golem turned into a regular stone statue and stopped moving forever.
.
.
The parting of Aslan became a huge news of Leo's domain. As the golem was a member of Leo's Four Heavenly Guardians, it shook the local's morale.
Aslan's statue was moved to the rooftop of the parking lot per Leo's request. As for the son, he knelt in front of the fisherman statue, biting his lower lips in anger and frustration.
Leo was saddened by the development. He regretted that he never treated Aslan nicely.
"I'm so stupid." Leo lamented. "Yeah, the old scholars said 'You only realize the importance of someone when they are gone'. They are absolutely correct. Why didn't I realize this?"
Esen stood behind Leo, watching over the depressed husband. Unable to come up with a consolation, Esen felt helpless in this situation.
Behind the wife, Leo's disciples, Ivy, Beatrice, Marc, Wu Buyi, and others stood in silence. They learned about Aslan's true identity later, and they were shocked as well. No one dared to utter a word.
For 48 days, Leo knelt in front of Aslan's statue in silence, thanking his father for saving his life and begging his father for forgiveness for his past mistakes.
On the 49th day, Ivy mustered her courage to speak to Leo as a new event forced her to. She knelt next to Leo and woke him from the trance.
"My lord! Her Majesty… It's urgent!"
"!!!" Hearing about Esen, Leo panicked. "What happened to her?!"
Ivy was glad that Leo had come back to his senses. Without saying anything, she guided him to the eastern hotel, where Dongfang Mei, Xu Nuan, and the girls had built a hospital nearby. They entered the building and stopped in front of a room with two large glass doors.
Leo didn't remember building this hospital, but he didn't question anybody. He looked at Ivy, "What happened here? Where is my wife?"
Ivy wryly smiled and pointed at the signboard in front of the room.
[Obstetrics and Gynecology]
Again, Leo deeply frowned. These words were modern medical terms, and they shouldn't have existed here.
Ivy read Leo's expressions and thoughts like a book. She explained, "Some of Molg girls purchased medical books from the bookstore and decided to put some of the medical knowledge to practice. Well, they built this place to treat commoners and mortals. As for this ward, it specializes in childbirth and women's disease."
"Ah… I see."
Leo finally figured out how this place resembled modern hospitals. It seemed that the random books in the bookstore featured modern medical technologies and knowledge.
"Wait a minute! Childbirth, you say?!"
Ivy giggled, "Yes. Her Majesty is in the room. The doctors are helping her at the moment."
"Dumbass! Do you think a freaking sage needs help for a simple childbirth?! Something is wrong here!"
Ivy wryly smiled and gestured Leo to enter the room, "Please."
"…"
Leo entered the room and found four female Molgs surrounding his pregnant wife. They shared their Qi with Esen and monitored her condition.
When everybody saw Leo, they panicked.
"Y-Your Majesty!"
Leo silently walked toward Esen who rested on a hospital bed and sweated profusely. Despite the pain, she smiled at him.
"Dear, my water broke."
"Don't say anything. I'm here." Leo held Esen's hand and looked at the doctors.
The Molgs nodded and proceeded with their treatment. Leo also provided his Qi to nourish his wife.
Strangely, the delivery process was slow. The child who was supposed to come out easily required a lot of the mother's effort.
Leo scanned Esen's stomach and noticed that the child was bigger than a regular infant. He detected a pair of wings on its back, which hindered the delivery. In addition, the infant already had a cultivation base, and he was born an immortal.
Giving his wife a helping hand, Leo created spiritual threads, which couldn't be touched by physical objects and life forms. A thousand strings entered Esen's stomach and wrapped around the infant.
Carefully, Leo used the spiritual strings around the infant so that the wings wouldn't get in the way. Then, he guided the child to come out.
With Leo's help, the boy came out safe. Esen was also relieved.
The nurses behind the doctors rushed over and supported the baby. They tended the umbilical cord and raised the infant upside down.
"It's a boy!" The nurse cheered and gently tapped the boy's butt.
Instead of crying like a newborn baby, the boy widened his eyes and looked around. When he saw Leo and Esen, the boy obnoxiously grinned. Strangely, he was capable of sending a sound transmission message.
Both husband and wife heard a familiar voice in their mind.
"What's up, bitch."
That was Aslan's voice!
"…"
Leo and Esen's expression turned dark. The former silently snatched the baby from the nurse and walked toward the window. Esen shook her head and deeply sighed.
"Don't kill our son."
Leo clicked his tongue, "Let me have a father-and-son talk."
"Sure. Remember, don't kill him."
"I know."
Leo grinned and looked at his supposed-to-be son. Aslan looked back at his "Father" and coughed out water from his lungs.
"Oh, you're choking, son. Here, let me help."
Leo laughed and flew out of the window. He twirled the boy and yeeted him to the sky.

chapters.title: Chapter 331 Florida Man Announces Retirement from Drug-Dealing Career to Police
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 331 – Florida Man Announces Retirement from Drug-Dealing Career to Police
Despite the anger, Leo retrieved Aslan before the baby could fly into space. He brought the boy back to his mother and gave his former father a meaningful look.
The nurse wrapped Aslan with warm towels and returned him to his mother. Esen carried her child and giggled at them.
"You're quite naughty, father-in-law. We thought you were dead. Was this your plan all along?"
Aslan yawned and shivered because of the previous skydiving. He closed his eyes in exhaustion and transmitted his sound to their mind instead of talking.
"Can I have a year or two of recuperating? I'll explain everything to you after that."
Leo scoffed, "How about no?"
Aslan slightly opened his eyes in annoyance. Ignoring his son, he shut them and fell asleep.
Realizing how fragile Aslan was, Leo smacked his lips while Esen was unable to contain her laughter. Their family's relationship was so absurd that it was hilarious to her.
"I can't believe your father wants to be your son, Leo."
Leo smacked his forehead and complained, "This motherhumper…"
"You're not wrong. He DID hump your mother, though."
"…"
.
.
In the end, Leo accepted the fact that Aslan wanted to be his son. He came to terms with it.
Leo sat in his bus, gazing at his newborn son in his wife's arms. As he looked down at the tiny bundle, he couldn't help but bitterly smile.
Aslan Jr. was his son's new name. Naming his son after his own father seemed like the right thing to do. Not only did it honor his father's memory, but it also made it easier for everyone to differentiate between the two generations of Aslans.
Excited to share the news with others, Leo made the announcement to the elders and the local cultivators of the town. They were touched by Leo's gesture, unaware of the true reason behind the name choice. To them, it was a beautiful tribute from a devoted son to his late father. Leo's actions were hailed as an example, and he became revered for his filial piety.
As time passed, the tale of Leo's devotion to his father's memory spread throughout the town. The story took on a life of its own, morphing into a legend of a disguised father who selflessly served his son as a trusted companion. People were awed at their relationship, and his reputation as a good son only grew stronger.
Despite the rumors and the fantastical fairy tale that circulated around him, Leo paid them little mind. His focus was on his growing family and their future. With the arrival of his son, Leo decided to invest in a space colony.
The colony was moderately small as it matched the Earth's size. Leo adjusted its flight course and followed the solar system. With the radiation from the sun and abundant soul stones as the source of energy, Leo didn't need to worry about the colony for a long time.
As this place required a new food source, Leo got busy. He purchased and built new farms, fish ponds, and ranches. After upgrading everything, he got new mannequin dolls to work for him. However, they weren't enough to take care of the cheating farms, which produced crops every hour.
He needed more helpers. Thus, he called for Esen's subordinates.
Ivy, Marc, a hundred Molgs, and undead soldiers that Esen had once created followed them to the new colony.
The undead soldiers were the population of Esen's dantian universe. She brought them out as she knew that Leo always lacked manpower whenever he expanded the territory.
Leo was also inspired by her. He employed lizardmen from his dantian universe to work for him in exchange for cultivation resources and cultivation methods.
The lizards readily agreed and worshiped Leo as their lord. The group also improved the fish pond as their primary diet was fish.
Esen was happy with the arrangement. Exploiting her authority, she forced Leo to build her a castle or a mansion for her and her son.
Leo couldn't reject Esen. He ended up purchasing a modern mansion and upgraded it to the maximum level, turning the resident into another small world inside. He also built another alchemy workshop, a blacksmith workshop, and a time chamber in the mansion for Esen's personal usage.
After a month of hard work, the new colony was fully functional and self-sufficient. Leo delegated the management to Esen and returned to the headquarters.
Upon arrival, Leo noticed that Beatrice remained in the store. When Leo asked Beatrice for the reason, she disclosed a shocking piece of news.
Beatrice and Wu Buyi were secretly dating, and they planned to marry in a few months!
Leo was baffled. He couldn't believe that the obnoxious nerd managed to charm the prettiest death knight. Nonetheless, he congratulated them.
After the series of investments, Leo rechecked his lifespan balance.
[Your current lifespan: 1,331,816,131 Years.]It dipped by a lot, and Leo already spent all the backup credits. Still, he had several millions of essence stones and soul stones in his inventory, so he could easily bounce back.
Most projects were already completed. It was about time for Leo to invest in the void leaf experiment and fate crystal upgrading. He opened his system inventory and scanned the available fate crystals.
- 1,800,000 Earth Fate Crystals
- 640,000 Sky Fate Crystals
- 47,000 Heavenly Fate Crystals
- 260 Entity Fate Crystals
Leo almost choked as he never paid attention to the number. When he realized how rich he was, he thought of Planet Devourer, who monopolized the Void Tree for a long time. He wondered how many fate crystals the guy had eaten and digested.
"This is going to take a long time." Leo laughed and wondered how long it would take to upgrade them all.
.
.
A year quickly passed by. Aslan grew up healthy, and his cultivation base improved. He became the first one-year-old boy who ascended to the deity stage.
In addition, Aslan's physique improved enough and allowed him to make a proper conversation. Thus, Leo, Esen, and Aslan gathered to have a heart-to-heart talk in the colony's mansion.
Leo stared at his ex-father and asked the most important question.
"What else are you hiding from me, father?"
Aslan brightly smiled and revealed his grand plan, "I'm planning to visit the higher realm."
"Oh, THAT higher universe?"
"Yeah."
Leo thought of the Void Tree and the Void Principality. He was curious about the upper realm as well, but he didn't feel like migrating or having another adventure.
He was content with this lifestyle. He had enough.
"You're actually older than me, father. Don't you have enough in this life?" Asked Leo.
"Look, you little shit. I got stuck inside you for 50-freaking-thousand years. I was so bored watching your life, and I wanted mine."
Leo understood the point, but he had other concerns.
"You raised me, protected me, and tempered with my bloodline. Then, you reincarnate as my son and reap the fruits that you sowed. Now, you want to go for an adventure outside the Matrix. Do you think you're ready right now?"
Aslan shrugged. He was aware of his shortcomings as his physique was still too young and too weak.
"I know. It's not like the gate to the higher universe will open any time soon. We just need to prepare for that day."
Leo deeply sighed, "Let me tell you this. I ain't going."
"Huh?!" Aslan was taken aback, "But you can get stronger. There are higher cultivation stages beyond the transcendence realm, you know?"
"I know. Singularity Realm, right?"
Leo snorted and walked toward the balcony. He opened his system inventory and pulled out a hand-sized crystal.
[True Karmic Fate Crystal]
Aslan widened his eyes as the system, created by his true entity Fate Crystal, informed him of its details. He couldn't believe his eyes.
"Wait a minute. I thought it never existed in this universe! How did you get that?! And what the hell? It's the TRUE version?!"
Leo snorted and pulled out a dozen crystals of the same appearance and quality. He juggled them while he stared at Aslan.
"Who do you think I am? Do you think I'm stupid enough to ignore the possibility of upgrading these crystals with my flesh and blood?"
"…Holy shit."
"Yeah, this body was made by you." Leo laughed, "Aren't you proud of your creation?"
"…Yeah, I'm proud of you."
Leo flickered a true karmic fate crystal to Aslan and stored the rest in his inventory. Aslan received it and glanced at Esen.
"Leo, have you given one to Esen?"
Aslan was concerned that Leo might be monopolizing the fate crystals and felt bad for Esen, whose cultivation base stagnated at the karmic sovereign realm.
Esen giggled and confessed, "Don't worry about me, father. I already have seven inside me."
"WHAT?! SEVEN?!" Aslan was shocked.
Esen opened her system menus and read what they could do.
"I have a Seven Virtue System. Whenever I do a good deed, I gain lifespan and improve my cultivation strength. The second system is the Good Wife System. If I please Leo in bed or do chores, I gain currency to exchange for some unusual artifacts from the higher universe. The next is-"
"WAIT A MINUTE!" Aslan shouted, "HIGHER UNIVERSE, YOU SAID?! YOU CAN ACCESS THEIR ITEMS?"
Leo and Esen looked at each other and laughed.
"I guess I have to reintroduce you to the current stage of our general store."
"???"
Leo and Esen brought Aslan out of the Colony and entered his headquarters planet – Aka the Florida Planet.
The local residents changed the planet's name to "FLORIDA" to fit the local daos. When Leo and his family arrived, they found a thousand flying vehicles in the sky, traveling across the snowy world.
Aslan hadn't seen Florida Planet for a year. When he saw the thick snow and white clouds, he deeply frowned. He complained.
"I sense thick yin Qi in this world. Did you mutate it into a monster realm or something?"
Leo shrugged, "Nope."
"Then, why am I sensing monster Qi and miasma from the north?"
"That's probably Kishin Douji's work, I guess. He somehow creates a monster army there and prepares for some idiotic crap." Leo gazed at the north while his cheeks twitched, "I'm planning to settle things with that idiot soon. You don't have to worry about it."
"…"
"Oh, have you consumed the true karmic fate crystal yet? You should eat it before Cat sees you. She will snatch it off your hands in a jiffy."
"…Right."
Being wary of Cat's gluttonous behavior, Aslan pushed the fate crystal into his chest and merged it with his soul. He closed his eyes, waiting for the crystal to generate a new system for him.
DING
<You have assimilated with True Karmic Fate Crystal.>
<Installing a new OS…>
<Installation completed. Opening the Bloodline Collector System!>
Aslan's mouth was agape when he saw the name of his new system. He read through the new perks and smiled.
"I guess I'm a protagonist now."
Leo scoffed, "Yeah, you probably are."
"Say, Leo. What about your system? You have a bunch of true karmic fate crystals with you. Do you get anything good?"
Leo paused and pondered for a moment. He looked around and mischievously grinned.
Esen noticed her husband's expression. She shook her head, "Don't destroy your headquarters."
"I know. Hehehe." Leo giggled and snapped his fingers.
Suddenly, a tremor shook the Florida Planet. The local population looked up as they sensed their lord's power. However, Leo and Esen already vanished.
Aslan came back to his senses and looked around. Unfortunately, he couldn't find his parents.
"Huh?"
A few minutes later, Leo and Esen returned and caught Aslan before he was exhausted flying alone. They smirked at the boy, showing their glossy skin and healthy faces.
Aslan sniffed and caught a sultry scent. He glared at them.
"What was that, Leo?!"
Leo and Esen giggled, but they didn't say anything. Both parents spoke in unison.
"That's a secret."
"???"
Nobody but Esen and Leo knew that both of them stopped the time of the entire universe for several years. The evidence of their lewd deeds was still fresh, and Esen was still sore from the marathon activities.

chapters.title: Chapter 332 Florida Parents Entrust One-Year-Old Child to Neighbor Nannies With Criminal Background. Next Day, Child Knows How to Assemble and Dissemble Guns.
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 332 – Florida Parents Entrust One-Year-Old Child to Neighbor Nannies With Criminal Background. Next Day, Child Knows How to Assemble and Dissemble Guns.
Leo carried Aslan and visited the general store branch, run by Cat. Upon arrival, the family found Cat, who dozed off on the rooftop.
The dryad's cultivation base already caught up with Esen's, but her appearance was still that of a middle-school dark elf. Her head and clothes were covered in snow while icicles froze her hair.
Esen rushed to Cat and poured yang Qi around Cat. After thawing the lazy dryad, Esen shook the girl.
"Cat, wake up. Your mom and dad are here."
Cat didn't respond. She slightly opened her eyes and returned to sleep.
Esen looked at Leo, asking for help, "Can you wake her up? She's going to turn into a snowman if she keeps sleeping here."
Leo shrugged and passed Aslan to Esen. He leaned forward and whispered to Cat.
"Nom-Nom time."
Cat's eyes snapped open. She shook the snow on her body and panted like a dog. "Where nom-nom, meow?"
Leo laughed and pulled out a truck-sized angler fish from his system inventory. He tossed it to Cat, who opened her mouth and sucked the entire creature into her throat.
A small dryad devouring a bigger creature in one gulp was nothing new here. Despite the weirdness of the situation, nobody around them bat an eye. Cars, flying ships, and cultivators continued their daily lives as if they had seen this a thousand times.
After feeding Cat, Leo patted her head and removed a few pieces of dirt in her hair.
"Are you bored, Cat?"
Cat shook her head, "Nope! Every day is the nom-nom day, meow. Our customers are generous. They gave me many nom-nom, meow!"
"Good. Oh, right. I need to introduce you to your new sibling." Leo smiled at Aslan, who broke a sweat.
Cat followed Leo's gaze and noticed Aslan. She sniffed and drooled.
"Is sibling edible?"
Leo and Esen widely grinned while Aslan sweated profusely. He regretted choosing Leo as his parent.
"Depends. If this little shit suddenly leaves by himself at night to woo a woman in the future, you are free to eat him."
Aslan cried, "You can't do this to me! I'm your father! Do you know how much I dedicate my life to protect you?!"
Leo laughed, "Don't worry, pops. I'm doing this for your own good. As long as Cat sees you as a potential food, nobody can harm you. She will guard you like a precious strawberry cake seasoned with top-quality weed."
"That's the point! She will see me as FOOD!"
"Oh, you just have to be stronger than her when you plan to move out, Dad. For the moment, she will only sniff and lick you. Right, Cat?"
Cat repeatedly nodded. She promised, "I'll do my best to lick him every day, meow. But if he doesn't comply to you, I'll gobble him!"
Leo and Esen giggled while Aslan gave up. The latter prayed to Void Principality to hurry and come down to bring him away.
After teasing Aslan enough, Leo brought his son to visit other places.
The slum area no longer existed as Leo's system buildings replaced them. Highways, infrastructures, and public facilities took a portion of the western land while residential buildings and commercial buildings mixed together like Japanese metropolitan cities. Because of the congested city plan, traffic on the roads was also busy, especially in the areas near Cat's store.
During the past year, the branch had been upgraded to another shopping complex, where only immortals could enter. Thus, all customers had a bit of lifespan and cash to spend.
The parking lot near Cat's store was always full of vehicles. Most of them were flying scooters as they were cheap, but some shoppers came with trucks, sedans, or small flying ships. Endless visitors entered the store and came out with packages of food, cultivation resources, furniture, or weapons.
Inside the store was similar to Leo's headquarters. All store slots were occupied and provided various services to the visitors. 90% of the stores were Leo's system facilities while the rest belonged to new sects and schools, which local cultivators found.
One of the local stores belonged to the lava badgers, who evolved and transformed into humans. They weaved their fur into fluffy dolls and fur coats, which were local cultivators' favorite as they provided warmth and mild yang Qi.
Aslan wasn't interested in the stores at first. But when Leo brought him to the headquarters, Aslan was startled by the new layouts of stores and items.
Formerly, only the first, the fourth, and the fifth floors were full. As for the present, every store slot was full, and every store provided different services and items. The workshops and factories were also gone, replaced by bookstores and tutoring centers. Moreover, the headquarters set the customer qualification to the deity realm or higher.
Aslan asked Leo to let him roam the shopping complex, and Leo allowed him to. The former rushed to the nearest gift shop on the second floor. Then, he picked up an item, which emitted a strange light.
Instantly, Aslan verified the item's details with his system..
Prismatic Ring of Heavenly Fate (One Use)
This ring is made by Jin Yong, the adept alchemist. Because of his imperfect skill, the ring's effects are limited and can only be used once, but the effect is guaranteed.
Guarantee a life-changing fortuitous encounter to the wearer within 30 days. The type of encounter is random. After the encounter, the ring will lose its power.
.
Aslan turned around and questioned Leo.
"Leo, isn't this a freaking heavenly fate crystal?!"
Leo cackled, "Nope! It's a lesser version of that. Did you see what it's made of?"
"…What about it?"
"Prismatic Void Leaf!"
"…And what the hell is that?!"
Leo shook his head and brought out a rainbow leaf, which he had extracted from the Prismatic Void Tree. He tossed it toward Aslan and let him appraise it.
.
Prismatic Void Leaf
Extracted from the Prismatic Void Tree. Void leaves are commonly acknowledged as a currency in the higher dimension "Great Void Universe". This Prismatic Void Leaf can be exchanged into 1,000 regular void leaves.
Because of its poisonous nature, it cannot be consumed. Whoever under the transcendence realm consumes it will suffer from excruciating pain and randomly mutates into a monster. Only someone with a dryad bloodline, an Alraune bloodline, or Leo's bloodline could eat them. However, if it is refined by a master alchemist, it can become a lesser entity fate crystal.
In case someone consumes the prismatic void leaf and survives, a completed entity fate crystal will be born in the person's soul. In addition, Prismatic Dryads and Prismatic Alraunes of the Great Void Universe regularly consume them as snacks because of their exquisite taste.
.
The detail disclosed some secrets in the higher dimension. Aslan drools, dying to learn more about the Great Void Universe.
Leo put the leaf away and lightly bonked Aslan's head. He warned the son, "Do not take the higher dimension lightly. The minimal cultivation base over there is transcendence realm level 10. The average is Singularity Level 30, and the top is level 100."
Aslan repeatedly nodded. He looked into Leo's eyes in curiosity.
"What about your current cultivation base? How strong are you now?"
Leo grinned, "Level 100."
"…Bull freaking shit."
"Suits yourself. I won't force you to believe me."
Aslan doubted that Leo could increase his cultivation base to the ceiling of the higher dimension while he remained in this universe. Testing Leo's information, he asked about his newly acquired system.
"System, can you verify my father's cultivation base?"
DING
<Leonardo "Florida Man" Ariel's cultivation base is Time Emperor Level 100.>
"W-What?!"
Aslan found it hard to believe. He asked another question.
"What the hell is Time Emperor?! How strong is it compared to the Singularity Realm?!"
<Time Tier is a major realm higher than the Singularity Tier. Singularity can bend and manipulate an entire universe at will, but Time Lords can manipulate, create, erase, or fix any timeline of the universe.>
<Unlike the other realms, Time Lord Realm is classified by five minor classes – Time Page, Time Priest, Time Sage, Time King, and Time Emperor.>
"…"
Aslan quietly turned to Leo, gazing at him in astonishment.
"How?"
Leo snorted and crossed his arms. "I'm that good."
"That's impossible! I know that you fucker is an autistic dementia dipshit! There's no way that you can surpass the Great Void Realm without visiting it!"
Leo rolled his eyes. He didn't bother explaining himself and dragged Aslan to another store.
When Leo arrived in front of the time chamber, he dropped Aslan in front of it. Then, he clapped his hands, summoning the guardian of this place.
An elderly swordsman and a youthful swordsman came out. The first one was Hua Taixu's clone while the other one was the original, aka the real sword saint. Both bolstered the strength of the entity realm.
Seeing the two sword saints, Aslan had a bad feeling about this. He pointed at the young saint.
"Leo, since when…"
Leo shrugged, "I've been busy. He just visited the store one day and decided to join us. Am I right, Taixu?"
The original sword saint stroked his long waving hair and showed his face. He was a handsome cat-eared man with a straight long nose. Because he carried the Cathulhu bloodline, there were small tentacles under his chin.
