He was the real Hua Taixu, who reincarnated as a half-Cathulhu and half-human. He also disliked it when anybody asked who his parents were and how they conceived him.
Hua Taixu, the original, glanced at Aslan and smirked.
"Is he yours, my lord?"
"Yeah, he's my son."
"How nice. Only one year old, and he's a deity. Your bloodline is really something, my lord."
Leo teased Hua Taixu, "Do you regret not being reincarnated as my child?"
Hua Taixu burst into laughter, "I like my tentacle beard and back arms. I have to decline."
"Ah, too bad. Anyway, about today's business." Leo picked up Aslan and tossed him to Hua Taixu, the clone.
The clone gazed at the boy. He widely smirked, "Him, train?"
"Yeah. Train him in there for a year and bring him back to me. Teach him a prismatic phoenix cultivation method and your sword daos. He's gonna need them in a few hundred years."
"ME, STRONK! ME, TRAIN, HIM! HE, SUPER STRONK!"
The clone laughed and dragged Aslan to the time chamber. Hua Taixu also turned around and was about to follow his clone. However, Leo stopped the cat man and gave him a spatial ring.
"I've stored some milk, cultivation resources, diapers, and a child's bed in there. Make sure he drinks the phoenix milk every three hours."
"Am I the nanny now?"
"Yup!"
Hua Taixu rubbed his brows. He complained, "I need a raise after this."
"Sure. Bring me the result, and I'll raise your wage by 20%."
"DEAL!"
Hua Taixu cackled and followed his clone. They entered the time chamber and locked the door.
After sending his child to a pair of lunatics, Leo shifted his attention to Esen. The wife smiled and stretched as if she had just gotten rid of a thorn by her side.
"So, we have a day of relaxation? What should we do for the day?"
Leo hugged her from behind and pointed to the fifth floor, where a cinema was located.
"How about a few movies? I bought some films from the other timelines, and I think it's interesting. It's about a gamer being forced to join god's trials based on horror games that he played."
"A thriller movie? Not a fantasy?"
"Fantasy is boring these days. The plots are too cliché and predictable. Let's watch something different."
"Sure!"
The husband and wife ditched their son and went out for a movie date.

chapters.title: Chapter 333 Florida Man Shoots Child Predator Who Attempted to Groom His Man-Eating Bonzi Plant
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 333 – Florida Man Shoots Child Predator Who Attempted to Groom His Man-Eating Bonzi Plant
While Leo and Esen enjoyed their movie date, Kishin Douji sneaked into the town and visited Cat. He hovered over her.
"Child," Kishin ejected the corpse of a giant ice tiger that he hunted, giving it to Cat. "There's your nom-nom tax."
Cat innocently smiled and received the corpse. However, she collected it in her ring and nodded at Kishin.
Kishin waited there, hoping for something back. Unfortunately, Cat didn't give him a void leaf. He was annoyed.
"Child."
Cat looked up and pouted, "Yeah?"
"Can I have a piece of leaf?"
Cat tilted her head and pursed her lips. "I don't have enough fertilizer and enough life force to make another one, meow. If you can wait for the next summer, I can make you one."
"…Summer? I can't wait that long."
Summer was impossible in Florida World as it had transformed into an ice planet. Most mortals already took shelter in Leo's system buildings while immortals harvested Qi to fight the cold. Meanwhile, deities lurked in the shopping malls, refusing the restore the world's temperature.
If Kishin Douji let nature correct itself, he might have to wait 10,000 years or more. As the promised date approached, he couldn't afford to wait anymore.
Cat was annoyed. She pointed at Leo's headquarters and chased Kishin away.
"If you want a void leaf, you should go buy it from the HQ, meow. If it's really urgent, you should ask my dad to make you one, meow."
Hearing that Leo could create void leaves, Kishin Douji was stunned. He started to doubt the man's origin.
"Tell me, who is Florida Man exactly?! How does he relate to the Void Tree or the higher universe?!"
Cat shrugged, "No idea, meow."
"Tsk. Useless kid."
Kishin Douji turned around and flew east, heading to Leo's HQ. However, when he reached halfway, he stopped and turned around, gazing at Cat's pretty face and cute physique.
Observing Cat's underdeveloped physique for a minute, Kishin Douji grinned and scratched his crotch. He muttered.
"She will grow up fine, perfect for a seedbed. Once I can ascend, I'll take her as a concubine!"
Laughing to himself, he headed to Leo's HQ.
Unbeknownst to him, someone could hear and see everything in this universe.
.
.
The Oni entered through the front door. He was greeted by the sci-fi airtight room.
A dozen deities entered the room with him while another group of customers holding bags of fresh food exited the shopping complex. Kishin Douji glanced at the surrounding cultivators and deeply frowned.
It had been a year since he last visited this place. When he was here, only a few thousand immortals existed. Seeing so many deities, he wondered where they came from.
Strangely, the deities didn't bother greeting or paying respect to each other like they used to. They simply smiled and nodded at each other as if their existence was insignificant here.
Seeing their interaction, Kishin Douji had so many questions. He was curious why they acted this way. Back in his galaxy, most deities and immortals always bragged and tried to spread their fame. 90% of them were troublemakers and overbearing as they treated their peers as rivals or stepping stones. But here, none of them showed a sign of aggression.
Their culture and behavior disappointed Kishin Douji. He doubted they had enough combat experience.
'Foolish cultivators. When shit hits the fan, they will quickly die because they are inexperienced in life-and-death combat! Soon, once a veteran shows up, these superficial people will piss their pants.'
Ignoring the humble customers, Kishin entered the shopping complex. The next thing he found was a reception desk, Qiang Qiang, and Meowmeow. Strangely, the four-armed statue was connected to the angel in a lewd way, but nobody around them bat an eye.
Kishin Douji frowned and stared at the statues. Although they didn't move, he sensed their subtle movements – They were fornicating in the middle of the public.
"How vulgar."
Kishin Douji shook his head and released his killing intent, glaring at Meowmeow.Meowmeow glanced at the Oni Overlord. He secretly sent a sound transmission to him.
"Mind your business, Oni."
Kishin Douji clicked his tongue, "Stop what you're doing, or I'll cut off your junk."
"Do you realize who you are provoking, bitch?"
Meowmeow patted Qiang Qiang's head and pulled her into his dantian universe. He turned around and armed himself with flame armor and two katanas. Kishin Douji also drew a white katana and prepared for a fight.
RUMBLE
Kishin Douji was a karmic sovereign and so did Meowmeow. Their aura collided, creating sparks and pushing nearby shoppers away.
CLICK
Suddenly, both top dogs flinched as they sensed an inconsistency in the air. They noticed a weird flow of Qi nearby, which always appeared when someone used the time law. However, unlike the time domains that they knew, they failed to notice the 4th dimension's time flow.
The next moment, Kishin Douji lowered his head. There was a hole in his chest, and his dantian universe was missing. His soul was also damaged beyond repair.
"H-How…?"
Kishin Douji collapsed while his soul was ejected from his body. Behind him, a small Cathulhu golem looked around in confusion.
"Munya? I remember that I was in Orlando World. Why am I here, munya?"
Meowmeow raised his brows, confused.
"Did you kill that Oni, Mu-Nyang?"
Mu-Nyang, the Cathulhu Golem shrugged, "That wasn't me, munya! I am framed!"
"Then who…?"
Both golems looked at each other in confusion. As they couldn't find the culprit, they looked up and sent their voice transmission to their master – Leo.
Before they could report the anomaly, Leo's voice entered their mind.
"That was me."
"…Wow." Meowmeow was impressed. "I didn't even notice your move, master! What dao domain did you use? Time Domain?"
"Yeah, just a simple time domain. Oh, before I forgot – Mu-
Nyang, I've brought you out here for a reason."
Mu-Nyang was startled. He straightened his posture, "Is there something you want me to do, munya?"
"Nothing much. Just consume that idiot's soul. Put him in your dantian universe and refine his manner for me, can you?"
Mu-Nyang and Meowmeow were surprised. Aside from Mao Miaomiao who committed grave crimes, no one else was tortured with this method. He wondered what Kishin Douji had done.
"Should I torture him, munya?" Asked Mu-Nyang.
"If I remember correctly, my father put Mao Miaomiao inside your dantian universe, right? Pit him against that fool and make them fight each other for the rest of eternity."
"But what did he ever do to you, munya? This is kinda cruel."
Leo's sigh could be heard. He dismissed them with one sentence.
"I only did what a parent should do to a child predator."
"???"
Leo cut the communication, leaving Meowmeow and Mu-
Nyang confused. Nevertheless, Mu-Nyang scooped the damaged soul of Kishin Douji and put him into the karma river in his dantian universe. After his next reincarnation, he would forget about his past life. His future fate would be forced to fight with Mao Miaomiao for endless years until they gave up struggling.
…
Another year passed. The Florida Planet officially entered its Ice Age. No mortal or creature in this world survived. Even the immortals struggled to deter the overwhelming yin Qi from the north.
Leo immediately erected a colony barrier to protect the residents from extreme yin Qi. While staying in the colony with Esen, he scanned the world and noticed the anomaly.
It was the atmosphere in the sky. Moreover, it reeked of his bodily fluid.
"Oh, boy."
Leo scratched his head after he realized his mistake.
"I guess I'll be busy again. I wish someone could replace me soon."
Without moving away from the colony, Leo wiggled his fingers and adjusted the atmosphere density, increasing the temperature.
.
.
While Leo was busy managing his world, Priscilla marched with her phoenix population. A fleet of phoenixes migrated from their original galaxy and visited the Cathulhu Galaxy, where Overlord Xiaomao resided.
Priscilla landed on a green planet. He found the elder fisherman, who minded his business near a lake.
She informed the fisherman, "Won't you visit Florida Man? Your lifespan is running low."
Xiaomao nodded as he was aware of his impending death. He sighed.
"Not yet. I have to remain here for a while. Those pesky werewolves are cooking something again."
"You mean, Lucky and Milo? Are those idiots trying to attack you again?"
"Probably. They have been eyeing my fishing rod for a while. The last time they visited, they offered five billion essence stones for my fishing rod. I rejected them, of course."
Priscilla glanced at Xiaomao's fishing rod. As it was the only artifact that was made from true entity fate crystal, it was so powerful that it could potentially kill a transcendent being. She too wished she could have one.
"Do you need a bodyguard?"
"No need. I can instantly kill both Milo and Lucky if they act up."
"But your people might suffer."
"…"
Xiaomao looked up and deeply sighed. He was also worried about the cats.
"You said to me long before. You're migrating to join your son, right?"
"Yeah."
That was the reason behind Priscilla's movements. She and her phoenixes planned to join forces with Leo since he was in control of the Prismatic Void Tree. Moreover, he was the strongest person in this universe.
"Can you bring half of my population there with you?"
Priscilla gave Xiaomao a meaningful look. But when she saw the gloomy face of the old man, she understood his feelings.
"I'll tell my son to help you. Be patient and don't die."
"…Thank you."
Priscilla left the planet and visited nearby Cathulhu planets. As entrusted by Xiaomao, she enlisted the local Catopuses and Cathulhus to join her migration.
Xiaomao gazed at the sky. He let out a long sigh and muttered.
"I guess I won't live long enough to see what the higher universe looks like."

chapters.title: Chapter 334 Florida Man Self-Proclaims as God’s Incarnation, Complains that Heaven is a Black Company, and Files a Lawsuit against God.
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 334 – Florida Man Self-Proclaims as God's Incarnation, Complains that Heaven is a Black Company, and Files a Lawsuit against God.
As Priscilla visited every galaxy during her trip, warlords, minor overlords, and cultivators of various races heard about Leo and his Florida Dao. As Leo was the strongest person in his galaxy, everybody called it "Florida Galaxy" to honor him.
Countless minor races were interested in Leo. They dispatched emissaries from their worlds to follow Priscilla to Florida Galaxy. Moreover, they contacted their trade partners and vessels, spreading the news of this discovery.
Soon, the words reached the ears of Lucky, who deserted from Ellen Faction. He and Milo reconciled and schemed to steal Overlord Xiaomao's fishing rod artifact. When the news reached them, Lucky and Milo reconsidered their plan.
The two werewolves had a private meeting in the middle of the void.
Lucky had a bright idea. He suggested to Milo, "You should send scouts to check the Void Tree. If he defeated Planet Devourer as the rumor said, his troops should be there protecting the tree. But if the rumor is false, planet eaters should be lingering there."
Milo agreed to the suggestion, but he disliked working alone. He also wanted Lucky to do something.
"While I'm leading my troops to check the tree, you should contribute something too. How about you initiate small skirmishes between our younglings and the Cathulhu's children. We can try playing a long game and nib the bud while we're recuperating our forces."
Lucky frowned as he disagreed. After the war, less than 3 million fenrir werewolves survived. On the other hand, Cathulhu never participated in any major battle, and their number reached over 200 trillion. This didn't include the unevolved children, aka the Catopus.
They were outnumbered!
"We don't have enough men to start another war. Without that Overlord Xiaomao's artifact, we can't touch the Cathulhu."
Milo smirked as he had a sick idea, "How about we round up the deserters, pirates, bounty hunters, and remnants of Mao Miaomiao's troops. Oh, I heard Kishin Douji is missing. If we run into Oni colonies, we can enslave them. The women can be our seedbeds to increase our number. As for the men, we make them our war slaves. How about that?"
Lucky was taken aback. Although he might be greedy, he disliked treating other races the same way Eleanor had treated them. Thus, he shut down the suggestion.
"No. You know what? Forget it. We will focus on recuperating our forces and establish an amicable relationship with Florida Man."
"Are you submitting to that NU'EARTHE?!" Milo yelled at Lucky.
"It is what it is. I used to call Eleanor a bitch, but we eventually surrendered to her. What's the difference between now and then?"
"…You disgust me, Milo. You sound like a bitch."
"…Heh. Maybe I was born with the wrong gender."
"Tsk! You know what? Screw this. I'm gonna go and check the void tree myself. If that Nu'Earthe is really that great, I'll snatch that geezer's fishing rod myself and rule the universe without you!"
"Good luck with that."
"…You coward."
Disgusted by Lucky's change of attitude, Milo turned around and left.
After Milo was gone, Lucky deeply sighed. Without a fate crystal, he couldn't view the status of his lifespan or use a system ability. He felt helpless and weak.
Still, Lucky was envious of Overlord Xiaomao. He also blamed Priscilla that she didn't give him a proper true entity fate crystal.
His mind was conflicted. Half of him urged him to quit dreaming and be content with what he had. The evil side of him sought riches, power, and authority. Moreover, his hatred toward the human race and its variants never faded from his heart.
Overwhelmed by conflicted emotions, Lucky had a headache. He returned to his people and commanded them not to seek trouble. He hoped that they could find peace in this chaotic universe.
.
.
In the depths of Karma River, souls floated aimlessly and rested in tranquility. The river washed away their previous life memory and cleansed their souls. Those who stayed the longest were washed clean and were chosen to start a new life in a random place.
Although Karma River erased dead people's memories, the souls of cultivators, monsters, and strong overlords sometimes resisted the river's effects. Karmic sovereigns were immune to this effect and could freely reincarnate anywhere they wanted to as long as a fragment of their soul existed.
During the last war between Planet Devourer and Priscilla Alliance, most of the elves were killed by planet eaters. When the planet eaters died, the consumed souls were freed and returned to the karma river.
Among the dead people, cultivators from the Yan Empire who had been abducted by Milo got caught in the crossfire. They entered the circle of reincarnation as well.
Amid systematic circulation, several soul fragments of planet eaters merged with the soul embryos of human souls. The planet eater consumed the human's soul and took over his place.
One of them belonged to the soul of a mortal. He was once a young master of the Ouyang Clan. Another one was once an expert from the Situ Clan. Several others copied the memories of dead angels, elves, werewolves, goblins, orcs, and other races.
The planet eaters consumed the human souls and stole their memories. When they regained their souls, they quickly escaped from the karma rivers. As soon as they escaped, they recreated their new fleshly bodies.
Some relied on the new memories to regenerate the fleshly body of that race. Meanwhile, a few lucky ones restored their former bodies. One after another, new planet eaters were reborn!The reincarnated planet eaters were not as smart as Planet Devourer. They began wandering in the universe, following their instinct. All of them moved in packs.
One of the packs traveled toward the direction of the Cathulhu Galaxy.
.
.
After the long movie, Leo yawned and left the cinema. Esen also rubbed her eyes as she wasn't used to watching a movie.
She complained, "It would have been more fun if I could read the protagonist's karma and predict his future. He sure was unlucky. I was surprised when the main character died in the first 3 minutes."
Leo shrugged, "That's the entertaining part of movies. You can't interfere with their fate, and you can only observe them."
"It's annoying."
"I know. But didn't you shriek when an Arachne jump-scared the protagonist and snapped his neck?"
"I-I didn't expect that development! I thought there was only one entity in that house!"
Esen pouted, but she grinned. The movie was fun.
As the couple was about to continue their date elsewhere, Leo suddenly sensed a strange flow of karma in the universe. He closed his left eye to spy on the universe trend.
Sounds of billion souls being swallowed and eaten by planet eaters entered his mind. Their desperation, anger, and other negative emotions reached him.
Leo staggered backward one step. His left eye bled and shed a bloody tear. But from the onlooker's perspective, it looked like Leo was crying because his blood and tears had the same color.
Esen noticed that Leo suddenly stopped. She turned around and saw the trail of transparent blood on Leo's face.
"What's wrong?"
Leo deeply inhaled and patted Esen's head.
"There's a group of runaway prisoners. I think I might need to reinforce this universe's karma rivers a bit. There has been an overpopulation issue recently."
Being a supreme emperor of this universe wasn't an easy job. Sometimes, the will of the Karma Rivers or the universe begged him for help. Many times, they showed the tragic events and let Leo feel the victims' emotions to motivate him.
This was the downside of carrying the same bloodline as the void tree. As the source of all Qi, luck, and fate, everything in the universe was linked to his entity.
In short, being a god was annoying.
"Your cultivation base already surpasses the limit of the universe. Does the universe still force you to help it?"
Esen was aware of Leo's duty as the Time Emperor. He often stopped time and disappeared somewhere without telling her. When he returned, his expressions and actions looked like someone who had been gone for several years.
"… I saw our timeline's future. It's not pleasant. I'm gonna need to alter it a bit."
"I see. How long will you be gone?"
"Not long. Probably five or six minutes in your time."
Esen bitterly smiled, "But from your perspective, it's going to be five or six thousand years, isn't it."
"Yeah. Restoring and expanding karma rivers take time."
Esen stroked Leo's face and kissed him. Both closed their eyes and savored their touches.
When their lips parted, Esen wished him well.
"I'll be waiting."
Leo smiled, "I'll be right back."
CLICK!
Esen could only hear a tick of a clock. Leo who was with her a second ago vanished into smoke.
The wife deeply exhaled. She turned around and pondered in her mind.
'I guess I'll need a new sexy lingerie. He was always desperate for a hug when he returned.'
To support her husband's mental health, Esen visited the clothing stores to pick some cosplay clothes and lingerie.
.
.
While the time in the universe was frozen, Leo teleported and appeared in the middle of the universe.
The Prismatic Void Tree was still healthy. However, about a few lightyears away, a pack of planet eaters were approaching. Fortunately, the absolute time emperor domain stopped their movements.
Leo grumbled and glared at the planet eaters.
"I guess Priscilla wasn't thorough with her job. How could she leave these mongrels around?"
Just by looking, Leo could see several billion souls inside each of them. These planet eaters had just swallowed a few planets, and they were about to come after the prismatic void tree.
Not allowing the planet eaters to eat his daughters, Leo waved his hand.
Instantly, the planet eaters' souls were erased from the universe. They would not be reincarnated again.
After removing the planet eaters, Leo closed his eyes and peeked into future timelines. Then, he saw the destruction of Cathulhu. Moreover, he detected countless newborn planet eaters and potential neutron stars, which were about to evolve into planet eaters too.
"Tsk. This is going to be a hassle."
Leo jotted down his task.
"Expand Karma Rivers, increase Karma Rivers, optimize the reincarnation process, kill all mother-humping planet eaters, destroy those mutating magnetars, and… fuck, reorganize the entire universe and galaxy's path! Five galaxies are going to collide because of that stupid mutt! Who was it? Milo? That fucking moron is still alive?!"
Leo scratched his head until it got messy. He sometimes wished he should have just destroyed the entire universe and ended this responsibility.
In the end, Leo returned to work. He located wandering planet eaters and erased them manually. It would take him a few thousand years to finish all tasks.

chapters.title: Chapter 335 Florida Billionaire Announces His Retirement and Passes His Forklift Certificate to His Daughter. She Eats It.
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 335 – Florida Billionaire Announces His Retirement and Passes His Forklift Certificate to His Daughter. She Eats It.
Not a split second passed, but a lone Florida Man was by himself, working behind the scenes to make the universe a better place. He removed newborn planet eaters and erased their souls, preventing them from coming back to life again.
Erasing someone was easy, but making sure that no neutron star would mutate into planet eaters was a challenging task. Leo finished removing planet eaters without dropping a sweat, but vaccinating a star core was energy-consuming – It required Leo a minute of his time to correct a star core's growth and expanding direction.
At the corner of the universe, a rural galaxy averagely consisted of 200 billion stars. Further into the center of the universe, galaxies, and star clusters were older, and their numbers were greater. Every galaxy had at least a trillion stars in their domain.
This didn't include private universes belonging to entities and karmic sovereigns. If they brought out their stars, the number would be higher.
Leo swallowed his pain and vaccinated the stars around the Prismatic Void Tree first.
2,000 years in Leo's time passed. Leo finished cleaning the billionth star, and he was mentally exhausted. He started to question why he was doing this when he could simply kill all planet eaters instantly.
He quickly changed his mind later when he returned to the Prismatic Void Tree and gazed at the expressions of the Alraunes. They might be naughty, lewd, and gluttonous. However, their smile reminded Leo of Cat and Esen back home. His heart palpitated, reminding him what he was working for.
Leo brightly smiled and clapped his hands. Motivated and determined, Leo resumed the cleansing process.
Although Leo promised Esen that he would only experience a few thousand years in this time-frozen universe, he ended up working in isolation for 10,000 years. Whenever he doubted his sanity or missed his wife, he simply returned to them to admire their faces. Then, he went back to work.
In the 20,000th year, Leo shifted his attention to the karma river to change the mood.
Fortunately, as Leo had multiple karma rivers inside him, he had experience of governing and tampering with the rivers before. He simply exchanged this universe's karma rivers with his and converted all souls to be linked with him. From that day on, whoever was reincarnated would have their fate linked to Leo. No matter what they did, they couldn't become stronger than him.
It was a tyrannical move, but this method was faster than manually fixing the chaotic rivers. After all, correcting a karma river in one's dantian universe was a lot easier.
His action caused the universe to start mutating new souls to have a tinge of Leo's bloodline and legacy. Most of them would inherit a lizardman or an alligator's instinct. As for the minority, they would carry on a prismatic phoenix bloodline, an angel bloodline, a fenrir werewolf bloodline, a cathulhu bloodline, or a void tree bloodline.
After leaving his seeds and legacy, Leo stopped working. He peeked into the future to make sure that his work would eliminate undesirable futures.
It worked. All dreadful and tragic timelines vanished, replaced with hopeful and joyful futures. Though conflict would never end, evildoers would eventually perish while Leo's friends and family would thrive. Main characters, heroes, and saviors would rise amid the chaos.
Even though he hadn't vaccinated all stars in the universe yet, he let fate work its way. Satisfied with his work, Leo resumed the flow of time and returned home.
While returning home, Leo looked back to the past timelines and noticed some inconsistencies. For example, Meowmeow knew about his future and that he would marry Esen. Also, there were strange prophesies about the four guardians' fates.
Killing his time while cruising home, Leo scanned his past to find the source of the weird prophesies. He wondered which time lord tampered with his fate.
It wasn't hard for Leo to find the culprit. Upon noticing the mysterious entity, Leo gazed at the Prismatic Void Tree and uttered his name.
"Dammit Void Principality. You knew about my emergence all along."
There was no answer from the mysterious entity. Leo smirked and shook his head.
"If you don't come down, I'll go up and find you."
Again, the entity didn't respond to Leo.
Leo changed his plan. He resumed the time flow to relieve the burden. Then, he grew a prismatic leaf from his fingertip.
DING
<Confirming the dimensional teleportation. Would you like to enter the Great Void Universe?>
Before Leo could utter a word, an archaic voice entered his mind. It was from the mysterious entity.
"I'll be visiting your domain and answering your questions in 100,000 years. Wait for me there."
Leo spat, "What if I go up myself?"
"You will destroy my universe. The Great Void Universe might be above you, but that doesn't mean that all residents here are cultivators like you. Some of us are mortals."
"Hoh?" Leo heard something interesting. He refuted, "But I already visited your universe several times before. Haven't you noticed my arrival?"
"You didn't. You probably went up somewhere other than my universe. Also, last year, I sensed that two of the great voids collapsed because someone tampered with their timelines. Was it you?"
Leo paused and averted his eyes. He flop-sweated.
"I don't know what you're talking about."
Void Principality deeply sighed. He warned Leo, "I know that your strength already surpasses us, the Singularities. I will invite others to visit your 'Stores' later. For now, spare us, please."Leo finally laughed. He was also relieved, "That's more like it. I thought for a second that you were looking for trouble."
"…"
"Tell me when you will be arriving. I'll hold a banquet to welcome you."
"…Many thanks."
The two lords continued exchanging pleasantries and chatted for a long time.
.
.
The death of planet eaters' souls didn't end the looming chaos. As only their souls were erased, their fleshly bodies remained. As a result, lucky passing-by wanderers harvested their bloodline and brought the whale's meat back home. As a consequence, planet eaters would be born from the residents of the universe, not from the stars.
Overlord Lucky was a part of the fortunate ones. He found a corpse that Leo had left behind and gave them to his subordinates.
Upon consumption, the werewolves realized that they gained new innate power. They reported this matter to Overlord Lucky and spread the news to Milo's men.
This caused an internal strife between Milo and Lucky. Milo who coveted Overlord Xiaomao's fishing rod began poaching Lucky's subordinates and initiated his crusade against the Cathulhu.
9 years after Leo had adjusted the Karma Rivers, the grand war between Milo's crusade army and the Cathulhu broke out.
Because of Milo, Lucky had no choice but to join the war. Armies of ragtag remnants of dead overlords gathered and invaded Overlord Xiaomao's territory.
The peace-loving big-head cats didn't expect the sudden invasion. Several habitable planets were destroyed and a billion innocent cats were murdered. This enraged Overlord Xiaomao.
Despite being almost out of lifespan, Xiaomao joined the war and asked Priscilla and Ellen for assistance.
…
Florida Planet
It was already midnight. All small stores in the main town were closed, but "Cat Mall" aka the first shopping mall branch that Cat managed was still open. The general manager of this place was none other than Cat.
The dryad in question was 10 years old this year. Despite being young, her humanoid physique looked the same as an adult. Her tanned skin, elf ears, and gorgeous face earned her the "Goddess of Florida" nickname. Men worshiped her as she was the most beautiful lady in this world, surpassing Beatrice and Esen.
Countless young adults wished to pursue her, but no one dared to do so because of Cat's current social status as Leo's adopted daughter. In addition, there were also other factors.
First, Priscilla arrived 9 years ago and submitted to Leo. They merged their forces and created formed a new country in this universe, which centered on the Florida Planet. They renamed their entire galaxy as Florida Galaxy. After they integrated their armies, Priscilla revealed herself as Leo's foster mother, increasing the fame of his family. As a result, Cat's status improved.
Secondly, Simba and Ester retrieved their son back and served Leo as an external army, guarding the entire galaxy against external threats. As they knew about Cat and Leo's weird bloodline, they left behind some of their dragonewt legions to protect Leo's headquarters. An all-female dragoon unit served Cat as her bodyguards, and no one was weaker than a karmic sovereign.
And lastly, Cat was no longer a deadweight. After receiving gifts and food from Leo, her cultivation caught up with the past him – the Transcendence Realm Level 10. Aside from Simba, Aslan, and Leo, nobody could defeat her in a 1v1 fight.
Cat was tired from the long day of work. She opened her system menu and deposited half of this month's total income to the "Family Pool", which Leo had created to share between his family members in case of emergency.
DING
<You have transferred 60 million years of lifespan.>
Cat stretched and yawned, ignoring a lone A4 paper that Leo had written. "STOP POCKETING MAD COW BEEF" was the message. She had been embezzling the shopping mall's income because of her glutton, and Leo kept reprimanding her.
"Time to hunt some cows, meow."
Cat left her office on the fifth floor and visited the store next door. Upon entering an office-like store, she was teleported to a mystic realm platform.
It was a plane in the middle of the void, but a hundred red portals were also active, allowing the visitors to play in the monster realms.
Cat ejected a prismatic void leaf from her storage ring and walked toward one of the portals. She paid the fee to the employee, who was a stone elf.
"Your Highness, please refrain from killing all mad cows in there. We've received complaints from our customers that they can barely hunt because you hogged all the monsters to yourself."
"Ehhh?" Cat pouted. "But I need to nom-nom, meow."
"P-Please, Your Highness."
"Meh, fine. I won't eat cows today. I'll go eat some angler fish in the Mariana Trench Realm."
The elf let out a sigh of relief. She nodded and guided Cat to the new portal.
While the elf guided Cat to the new place, the princess suddenly flinched. She rushed out to the exit and teleported back to the shopping mall in urgent.
Upon return, she sensed a spaceship fleet traveling across the universe toward Leo's galaxy. She got out of the shopping mall and flew to see them.
When Cat reached the fleet, she found a few dragon warships under Simba Army escorting the group. She sent a voice transmission to ask the soldiers.
"What happened here, meow?"
A few seconds later, the captain of the escort ship replied.
"Your Highness, we're escorting war refugees. They're Cathulhus under Overlord Xiaomao. A-Also, Overlord Xiaomao is here with them."
"Xiaomao, who?"

chapters.title: Chapter 336 Fisherman Calls Police After Florida Woman Catfishes Him and Steals His Fish
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 336 – Fisherman Calls Police After Florida Woman Catfishes Him and Steals His Fish
The war between Fenrir Werewolves and Cathulhus did not proceed as planned. Although Overlord Xiaomao and many Cathulhus were stronger than the invading forces, they got blindsided by small task forces from various races.
The angel race, who were born from Dr. Mao Miaomiao's dantian universe, was the greatest threat. They consumed their dead comrades and evolved into giant eyeballs, similar to Sieg. They coordinated with the werewolves and destroyed civilian planets. Then, the wicked angel turned dead Cathulhu civilians into giant sea creatures, such as tunas, angler fish, jellyfish, and sharks to terrorize Cathulhu's territory.
Ellen sent her forces to help the Cathulhu. She managed to wipe out half of the angel's forces while Overlord Xiaomao defeated the other half by himself. However, dealing with the roaming mutated Cathulhus was another story.
Giant sea creatures dispersed and roamed the universe after the major battle. Some peacefully integrated into the habitant's culture while the rest became wild space animals. They quickly bred with other races and gave birth to other space monsters.
In the end, the Cathulhu sensed that their home galaxy was no longer safe. As they heard about Leo's fame, some of them decided to migrate to Florida Galaxy.
As the leader of all Cathulhus, Overlord Xiaomao led the first immigrant fleet to visit Leo for the first time.
…
Because of Cat's presence, the escort fleet halted their advance. The immigration fleet also stopped. Xiaomao noticed the presence of a transcendent being. He left the ship to greet the expert.
But when the overlord came out and saw Cat's otherworldly beauty, his heart stuttered. Even though Xiaomao had lived and experienced the world for countless years, his body reacted to Cat's natural charm and beauty.
Overlord Xiaomao smacked his chest and regained his composure. He cupped his fist and saluted.
"Greetings, young lady. I'm Overlord Xiaomao from the Cathulhu Galaxy. We're here to migrate to Lord Florda Man's territory. I hope that you can show us mercy."
Cat tilted her head in confusion. As she didn't understand politics, she simply asked the overlord what she always taxed the others.
"Nom-Nom Meow?"
She might be 10 years old, but she still demanded nom-nom tax from strangers.
Xiaomao was unfazed by the sudden tongue language. As the Cathulhu also had a unique accent, the overlord was used to it. Her language was also easy to comprehend.
"What kind of food would you like? Animal meat, fish, humanoid beings, vegetables, fruits, or blood?"
Cat was overjoyed as this stranger was understanding, "Anything is Nom-Nom'able to me, meow!"
"I see," Xiaomao laughed and gave her the corpse of a mutated planet eater, which was in the form of a star-sized piranha.
Cat squealed and rushed to eat it. Her jaw detached as she expanded the size of her mouth. In one bite, the entire creature disappeared into her small stomach.
Although Xiaomao was familiar with Cathulhus, this was his first time witnessing an absurd glutton. He wondered what Cat's stomach was made of.
"You have a great appetite, I see." Xiaomao praised her.
"Thank you, meow! You're a good man, meow!"
Xiaomao straightened his back and asked her, "May I know who you are, miss?"
Cat puffed her chest. "I am Cat! My daoist name is Florida Girl!"
"F-Florida Dao?" Xiaomao was taken aback. He heard about this dao, but he still didn't understand what it was.
While they were chatting, a representative gold dragonewt of the escort troops flew toward the overlord. When he noticed Cat's presence, he quickly reminded the overlord who she was.
"Senior, this person is the first princess of Florida Galaxy, "Kat, the Florida Fairy". She is known to be the off-limited goddess. All men who once courted her suffered unforeseen demise. Please keep your distance and mind your boundary."
Xiaomao broke a sweat and whispered back. "I understand. But isn't she pitiful? She will never get married at this rate."
The dragonewt officer dryly laughed. "Sir, she's only 10 years old."
"…"
"I hope you're not interested in her. If you do, our lord might kill you."
"…"
Overlord Xiaomao almost slapped his face for the sinful thought. He marked the day as the blemish of his life.
After chatting with Cat and the officer for a while, Cat allowed everybody to enter the galaxy. She also used her authority to book the East Hotel to accommodate the delegates.
…A day later, Dongfang Mei who was still the general manager of the hotel arranged a schedule for the new visitors to meet Leo. In the afternoon, Leo visited the hotel's grand hall to greet the new guests.
Xiaomao and Leo met again. The latter welcomed the elder.
"I've been expecting you. How was the trip?"
Xiaomao bitterly laughed, "Terrible, sir. Our people have been murdered. We migrate as many Catopuses as we can, and they are lacking food. I hope that you can provide us an assistance. Oh, I heard you always exchange your merchandise for life force. I don't have much, but I'm willing to pay for them."
Leo raised his eyebrows and sighed, "Don't worry. I don't need any. I'll give them enough food that they will be fatter than J*bba, the H*t."
"J*bba?"
"Never mind. Anyway…"
Leo scanned Xiaomao's lifespan status. It did not look good – He only had less than 10 years to live.
"You've been living a hard life, friend," Leo felt bad for him. He wished he could extend the man's lifespan, but his fate was already predetermined.
Xiaomao faintly smiled as he didn't feel like it was. Instead, his life was already fulfilling, except he never got married.
"It's alright. I'll manage."
"…I see."
The two continued to discuss the immigration matter and settled an arrangement for the Cathulhu.
The negotiation was smooth as Leo already foresaw this event. He agreed to accommodate the cats and provide them with jobs and opportunities.
Xiaomao was grateful for Leo's help. He offered to give Leo his fishing rod, but Leo declined.
Leo was impressed by Xiaomao's positive attitude and honor. Instead of taking his items or lifespan, he decided to assist him and give him a better future. By waving his finger, Leo ejected a prismatic void pill, which was the latest masterpiece of his domain. He gave it to Xiaomao.
"What is this?" Asked Xiaomao.
"Prismatic Void Pill."
The bead pill glittered in rainbow light similar to Leo's aura in the past. It also contained various effects, but only Leo knew what it could do.
Leo urged Xiaomao, "Eat this pill before you return. You will be able to recover the strength and suppress the karma river's curse for a few years. After the pill's effects expire, you should be able to live for another 100 years or so."
Xiaomao was surprised. He laughed, "A hundred years is too long for me. I will eventually reincarnate anyway. I don't see the point of living miserably for longer."
"Hmm. But I think you might want to reconsider it, though."
"Why is that?"
"One day, your subordinates might bring you a piece of good news and bad news. They will leave behind a legacy and ask you for help."
"A legacy?"
Xiaomao pondered what legacy would be so important that required his help. All Cathulhus that he had interacted with in the past were mostly playful and idiotic. Only his disciple, Miao Damao, was more reliable.
Leo wished he could reveal what tragic event Overlord Xiaomao needed to face. For the sake of the final result, he chose not to disclose Xiaomao's future ordeal.
"That's all I can say. Come back when you are ready to reincarnate. I will prepare the parting gifts for your next life's journey."
Xiaomao gave Leo a meaningful look. He deeply bowed, "I'll never forget your kindness, Lord Florida Man."
"…It's my duty." Leo snickered.
…
After Overlord Xiaomao left, Leo summoned Mu-Nyang over.
Mu-Nyang rarely stayed in the Florida Domain as he mostly worked in Orlando. When Leo summoned him, he was overjoyed.
"What's up, munya?"
Leo gazed at Mu-Nyang and patted the walking statue. Feeling guilty for ignoring the guy, he asked the giant cat boy.
"Is there anything you want, Mu-Nyang? What is your dream?"
Mu-Nyang pursed his lips as the question came out of nowhere. He pondered about it and thought of Aslan.
"If I reincarnate, will I be able to remember you, munya?"
Leo shook his head, "You're a newborn soul that is attached to me. Once I let you go, you will forget about me and what we have done together."
"…That's sad, munya. I don't want to reincarnate anymore. I want to be with you, munya!"
Leo was happy, but there was a timeline that required Mu-
Nyang's cooperation. In that potential future, Mu-Nyang would live a good life, have a loving wife, and have many good friends. As Leo was the creator of Mu-Nyang, he wanted the child to live free as an adult.
"Even birds leave their nests one day. It's about time you have to spread your wings, Mu-Nyang."
Mu-Nyang was taken aback. He protested, "Do I really have to reincarnate, munya?! I don't want to go, munya! I love it here!"
"But what about your life? You can't live as a soulless golem forever. If I leave this universe for too long, you will turn into stone permanently."
"…Ugh," Mu-Nyang sulked. He was unwilling to leave. "Can't I be your subordinate forever, munya?"
Leo was at his wit's end. He was about to abandon this project, but he suddenly had an inspiration. Leo shared what he saw with Mu-Nyang.
Mu-Nyang fell into a trance. Although 10 seconds had passed, he experienced 10,000 years in his mind.
"M-Master?" Mu-Nyang stuttered in disbelief.
"Do you want that future to happen to the poor man?"
"O-Of course not! That would be too tragic, munya!"
"Then, can you help him for me?"
"…But I won't be able to remember you, munya."
"You won't be alone. I'll send Lucky and Meowmeow to be with you. I'll also visit you occasionally and create new memories together with you. Even though you might not remember me, I'll always remember you."
Mu-Nyang shed a tear. He sniffed and cried like a baby.
Leo hugged him and stayed with him for a whole year, playing with him 24/7.
A year later, Leo gathered Lucky, Meowmeow, and Mu-Nyang. He freed Lucky and Meowmeow's souls, sending them to Mu-
Nyang's dantian universe. Then, Leo personally implanted a true karmic fate crystal into Mu-Nyang's soul fragment and sent him off to the karma river.
.
.
In the end, Xiaomao left Florida Galaxy alone and left the Cathulhu immigrants behind. He returned to his galaxy to protect the other fighters and his disciples.
A few years later, Xiaomao understood why Leo mentioned "Legacy".
One day, his disciple "Miao Damao" brought his wife over for a visit. However, they were critically injured, and his wife had a baby. After a brief investigation, Miao Damao revealed that they were being hunted by Overlord Lucky and his men.
This enraged Xiaomao. He taunted Lucky and baited him into a fight.
Lucky fell for Xiaomao's scheme and attacked the fisherman. However, Overlord Xiaomao killed Lucky in one move.
After the brief fight, Miao Damao and his wife passed away. Xiaomao tried to resuscitate them, but he only managed to save the baby.
The baby of Miao Damao was none other than Mu-Nyang, whom Xiaomao unknowingly blessed with the same name. From that day on, Mu-Nyang became Xiaomao's adopted child.

chapters.title: Chapter 337 Florida Man, Armed to the Teeth, Raids Animal Shelter to Pet a Rescued Cat.
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 337 – Florida Man, Armed to the Teeth, Raids Animal Shelter to Pet a Rescued Cat.
After Mu-Nyang had been reincarnated, Leo secretly protected Overlord Xiaomao and Mu-Nyang from wandering creatures and Milo's troops.
The overlord discovered a new meaning of life and raised Mu-Nyang as his son. Meanwhile, Mu-Nyang got to enjoy a fresh new life without realizing that his dantian universe contained two of his former comrades and a couple prisoners there.
Unfortunately, Xiaomao's lifespan was limited. Eight years after Overlord Xiaomao had visited Leo, he returned to bid farewell to everybody.
…
Florida Planet
Leo welcomed Xiaomao and allowed him to rest at the hotel for free. However, Xiaomao declined and simply wished for a chat.
The fisherman overlord wearily cupped his fist and bowed for the last time before he entered the circle of reincarnation.
"Lord Florida Man. I've come to bid farewell."
Leo nodded. He glanced at Xiaomao's status and saw the latter's lifespan – It showed as 2,000 years, but he actually had two years to live.
"Do you need any help?" Asked Leo.
"Haha. Then, please protect my child Mu-Nyang. He's too innocent for our universe. I wish he could grow up and live a happy life, away from the politics and harsh environment."
"That's natural."
Xiaomao bitterly smiled and let out a long sigh. He bowed again, "Then, I'll be leaving. I can't leave the child for too long. He might wander off and accidentally stumble upon a roaming space creature or a vile werewolf."
"Hold on," Leo called Xiaomao to stop. He ejected a moon-sized entity fate crystal and gave it to Xiaomao, "Bring this home with you. Cut a piece of it and give the smaller piece to your child. As for the rest, put it in your soul before you enter the karma river."
Xiaomao hated fate crystals. He was reluctant to accept.
However, Leo read Xiaomao's thoughts and advised him, "It's not for you. It's for the child. If the child has a piece of it while you have the larger piece, you two will eventually reunite because the fate crystal naturally seeks each other, especially its fragments."
"Is there such a benefit? I thought it only granted the owner a useless system."
"Useless or not, it's not up to me or you to judge. You must experience it and judge it yourself."
"…"
Although unwilling, Xiaomao accepted the parting gift. He gave Leo a meaningful look. At first, Xiaomao wished to quietly leave and forget everything behind him. However, he suddenly remembered the face of the most beautiful person he had encountered in the past.
"Lord Florida Man, if I may ask, I wish to ask you something rude."
Leo grinned. "Ask away."
"Is your daughter married?"
Leo paused, and his eyebrows twitched, "Why do you ask?"
"Hahaha! Nothing much. As a dying old man, I just wish to complete my bucket list. I was wondering if I still had a chance in the next life."
As a father, Leo was protective over his children, especially his daughters. When an old man suddenly asked him if his daughters were married, a father like Leo could easily go berserk.
Still, Leo doubted Xiaomao had an ulterior motive. He invited Cat to the hotel so that they could meet.
30 minutes later, Cat arrived.
This year, Cat already reached the adulthood of 18 years old. Her appearance remained the same as eight years ago, except for her hip and chest size. In addition, she started putting on makeup whenever she was outside.
"Any nom-nom, dad?" Cat ran toward Leo and hugged his arm.
Leo sighed, "I'll feed you later. Anyway, can you chat with this gentleman for a few minutes?"
"Oh?"
Cat turned to Xiaomao who awkwardly laughed.
"H-Hello, miss."
"Who are you again, meow?" Cat didn't remember Xiaomao."Haha. It's okay. I just want to ask you a few questions if you don't mind."
"…Okay?"
"Are you seeing someone right now?"
Leo had goosebumps. Witnessing a dying old man courting his daughter was not a pleasant experience. If Leo never peeked into Xiaomao's future and discovered his important roles, he would have exploded the dude long ago.
Cat tilted her head as she was inexperienced in this matter. She then pointed at Leo.
"Yes. I'm seeing my dad right now, meow."
"W-What?!" Both Xiaomao and Leo were stunned.
Cat laughed and hugged Leo's waist. She then teased her father like she used to.
"I'm my father's girl! He's mine, meow!"
"…"
Xiaomao dropped his jaw while Leo repeatedly shook his head, denying the silly allegation. Seeing the man's reaction, Xiaomao chuckled.
"I understand, Lord Florida Man. You don't have to explain."
"…Seriously, this is a misunderstanding!"
"It's okay. This happened all the time. She was your creation, so it's natural for her to be attached to her creator. It's very understandable."
"…I said, this is a misunderstanding!"
Xiaomao burst into laughter. He saluted to both of them.
"I'm satisfied. Well, if fate allows it, let's chat again. I hope that I can be your customer in the next life."
Leo sighed and returned the salute, "I'll be waiting."
The fisherman left and returned to his home world.
…
After Xiaomao had left, Leo summoned his trusted disciples.
Gao Yan, Yao Qiqi, Jin Yong, and Tang San were all full-fledged adults. Everybody's cultivation base already reached the karmic sovereign realm.
Gao Yan and Jin Yong retained their youthful appearance. On the other hand, Tang San grew up and discarded the feminine physique. He became a beautiful man who attracted both genders. As for Yao Qiqi, she transformed into a charming MILF goddess.
The four knelt before Leo and Cat. Yao Qiqi smiled at her best friend while Cat winked back.
Gao Yan, the leader of the group, reported their arrival.
"Guardian Squad reporting in, master. What's your order?"
Leo opened his menu and showed them the coordinates of Xiaomao's home world. He tossed a platinum plate, which had a carving image of an AK47 on it.
"Contact my brother Ohio Man and give him the token. Ask him for a fleet. Then, take the troops to guard that planet. If Milo and their scrooges show up, kill them all."
The group smiled as they finally had a reason to head out and play in the void. The team took the token and vanished.
Cat stared at Leo and pouted. She wanted to go out and play too.
"Dad, I want to play, too. I also haven't had my nom-nom yet."
Leo deeply sighed and patted her head, "Go fetch your brother. Give him enough time to pack some food first. Then, I'll allow you to go out."
"YAY!"
Cat dashed out of the hotel to fetch Aslan, who always secluded himself in the time chamber.
Aslan had been doing well. The guy ended up marrying Sierra and returned Simba's son to the parents. Moreover, he already had five kids.
Leo watched how Cat ran like a little kid. He stroked his chin, wondering if he should ask Esen for another child.
'Should I reincarnate mother? It's been a while. I doubt she can still remember me since she's not even a cultivator.'
.
.
Two years after Xiaomao's last visit, the overlord quietly passed away, leaving his child by himself.
Leo and some of his people attended Xiaomao's funeral. They also met Mu-Nyang, who didn't even pay attention to them.
The poor white cat never stopped crying. Other Cathulhus tried to console him, but Mu-Nyang rejected everybody. In the end, the poor cat continued living in Xiaomao's small shack as it was the only place he treasured.
Leo secretly opened a new store on the same planet, but he set up the general store far away from Mu-Nyang's home. As for Gao Yan and others, they kept their distance from Mu-Nyang and protected him in secret.
One day, Esen visited Leo. As she was aware of Leo's weird arrangement and his foresight abilities, she came here to ask him what he was scheming.
As soon as Esen arrived, Leo answered her before she could utter a word.
"It's for the merge."
"Merge?" Esen was confused, "Merge for what?"
Leo looked at the sky and explained, "In less than 100,000 years, Void Principality and his people will migrate to the lower world. The arrangement for the ascension is a hoax."
"Huh?" Esen didn't understand, "Explain in detail, Leo."
"Haiz. Okay." Leo paused for a long time and started narrating what he saw. "In the higher dimension, there are multiple universes, and they often crash. Void Principality's universe will collide with another universe in 150,000 years, and that guy foresees it. Because he is desperate, he dispatches Void Trees to the lower universes like us to find a suitable universe to migrate into. And he has chosen us."
"Oh." Esen nodded and clapped her hands. "In short, you'll get new customers, right?"
"Yeah. But before we can welcome new guests, we need to clean house and train our residents first. Overlord Xiaomao, Mu-
Nyang, Meowmeow, and Lucky will play a big role."
Leo told a story to Esen. The story's protagonist was Meowmeow who was sent to Mu-Nyang's dantian universe. He would possess a clone of Mao Miaomiao, aka the prisoner that Aslan had trapped there. Meowmeow would assume the identity of Mao Miaomiao in the far future.
Esen giggled and listened to her husband. She was curious about what kind of adventure Mu-Nyang and Meowmeow would experience.
"Say, Leo. Can I snoop into Mu-Nyang's universe and see the drama?"
Leo rolled his eyes, "I'll compile them into a movie for you later. Don't interfere with their fate."
"Aw, stinky. But say… what's going to happen when the higher dimension's people come down?"
Leo's expression changed. He shifted his attention toward the Prismatic Void Tree and grumbled.
"Same old, same old. Annoying politics, conspiracy, and arrogant egotistic mortals."
"…Can't we kill them all?"
"Another thing – Overpopulating Karma Rivers."
"…Yikes."
"Yeah, yikes. It's gonna be a mess to manage. That's why I need multiple trustworthy people in this universe to bring some of the souls into their dantian universe. We can't keep them all."
The troubling future was far ahead, but Leo was already prepared for the worst.
.
.
Meanwhile, Mu-Nyang remained in his house. As he inherited Xiaomao's fishing rod, he became a big target that Milo and his allies wanted dead.
The news about Mu-Nyang possessing an ultimate artifact spread across the universe. New deities, sages, and entities of the younger generation heard about it and coveted the artifact. Soon, they traveled toward the old Cathulhu Galaxy in search of Mu-Nyang's whereabouts.

chapters.title: Chapter 338 Florida Man Accused of Cheating His Wife with Her Sisters and Mother, Claims He Only ‘Touched’ Them.
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 338 – Florida Man Accused of Cheating His Wife with Her Sisters and Mother, Claims He Only 'Touched' Them.
Mu-Nyang's Star, Cathulhu Galaxy
A lone cabin was situated in the middle of a plain sandwiched by a lake and a thick forest. Inside the resident hid a Cathulhu child by the name Mu-Nyang.
Inside the cabin was a bed, a workbench, and a wooden board full of photos. The Cathulhu child, who transformed into a white cat, sat on the workbench and admired the pictures of his foster father Xiaomao.
Missing his dead father, he shed a tear. Although he knew that Xiaomao's soul was inside his dantian universe, he couldn't bear the pain of losing him.
"Master, when will you come out? I'm lonely…"
While Mu-Nyang was drowning in sorrow, someone knocked on the front door.
Mu-Nyang wiped his tears and transformed his tail into a long tentacle. Twisting the doorknob, he opened the door to welcome his frequent guest.
In front of the cabin was a handsome middle-aged man, whose face looked similar to Mao Miaomiao, a vile soul who called himself Devil. Mu-Nyang had seen him many times in the past year.
"Senior Leonardo, munya?" Mu-Nyang recognized him. He faked his smile and asked, "Are you here to evict me again, munya?"
Leo who had been monitoring Mu-Nyang bitterly smiled. He offered the cat even though he knew that it would be rejected.
"Would you come to live with me? I'll prepare a better resident for you and your master. Living here alone is not safe."
Mu-Nyang didn't remember Leo in this life. He scoffed, "Please leave, munya! Also, I won't sell this house, ever, munya!"
"I see. Then, I'll leave today's supply here. Make sure to eat a lot since you're still growing, okay?"
"You're not my father, munya! Don't tell me what to eat!"
"Okay, okay." Leo laughed and left in silence. He glanced at the supply crate that he brought for Mu-Nyang.
Inside the crate were 1,000 Floridian Dantian pills, catnip powder, dried fish, and cultivation manuals. Next to the crate was a small package of Prismatic Void Pill.
.
Low-Grade Prismatic Void Pill
This pill has been concocted by the Time Emperor Florida Man. It has a similar effect as an entity fate crystal – Whoever consumes this pill will always be protected by the Prismatic Void Tree's blessing, which guarantees a fortuitous encounter or lucky streaks.
This pill is popular in the Florida Galaxy. The locals melt these pills on a spoon to inhale its unique smoke. This consumption method is banned in the Florida Galaxy, but many cultivators are addicted to it due to its hallucination side effect.
Pill Effects
- Increase Luck
- Increase Lifespan by 1,000 Years
- Expand Dantian Size
- Cleanse Physique and Bone Marrow
- Relieve Stress and Sore Muscles
- May Induce Hallucination if Consumed Incorrectly.
The pill effects are hidden from all systems users except for Singularities and Time Lords.
…
After leaving Mu-Nyang alone, Leo scanned the cat's dantian universe to check how Meowmeow and Lucky were doing.
Lucky's soul seemed to have undergone a mutation and his gender changed. He became a SHE, but her new soul was still queuing in Mu-Nyang's karma river. It would take a while for her to come back to life.
As for Meowmeow, his soul and Mao Miaomiao's soul got stuck together. As Dr. Mao Miaomiao forgot about his past and deeds, he lived according to the predetermined fate and got into conflict with Kishin Douji.
Everything went according to his plan. Within a thousand years, they would come out as entities. Leo looked forward to their next reunion.
.
.The next day, Simba carried a leather bag with him and visited the Cathulhu World. He ignored Mu-Nyang's cabin and went to the capital city of this planet.
The capital city was another branch of Leo's domain. A giant dome covered 600,000 square kilometers, which was occupied by the massive town. White skyscrapers, medium-sized buildings, sky roads, and plants were visible from outside.
Cathulhus in this city all wore a collar, which automatically transformed their bodies into a regular cat. In the city, adult cats walked on two feet. They wore modern clothes wandered around, and minded their businesses.
In the middle of the national park, Leo and Esen sat side-by-side while a cat curled into a ball and slept on Esen's lap. Esen giggled while stroking the Siamese cat while Leo scratched its chin.
Simba entered the city through the checkpoint and visited Leo in the park. He stood in front of them and put the leather bag on the ground.
Leo glanced at the bag and frowned. He forgot what he had ordered Simba to do since the life of this planet was peaceful.
"What's that?" Asked Leo.
Simba sighed and reported, "Our troops have found the rebel's hideout. We attacked them and managed to capture the ringleader. Some are still scattering in this universe though, but they are fated to die within 10 years according to the karma."
"Oh."
Leo rolled his eyes upward while he tried to recall his previous order. It sounded important. However, to him, it seemed so insignificant. Fortunately, his wife was nearby.
Esen reminded him, "You asked Simba to exterminate the remaining werewolves in this universe, did you not?"
"Oh, right." Leo finally remembered. "I forgot that werewolves are still around. Well, are they all dead yet?"
Simba deeply sighed, "Except for Milo, most of the werewolves are dead. By the way, you're a time lord. Can't you calculate the future yourself?"
"Meh, peeking at other timelines costs a lot of energy. If I get too close, I lose some of my lifespans, and our timeline will deviate from the right track. If possible, I'd rather avoid using this power."
Simba nodded in approval, "Agreed. Still, I'm curious. How did you cultivate your time domain that far? Also, from my experience and insight, the Singularity Realm seems to be the highest cultivation ceiling of our universe. How did you break through the bottleneck?"
Leo shrugged and revealed the universe's secret.
"You're right. Singularity Realm used to be the highest cultivation realm of all timelines. It's just that I broke the record."
"…How?"
"How do you think a cultivator was born? By the guidance of someone else? By bloodline? Nope! None of that. It's from the tenacity, stubbornness, and delusion of mortals who were lucky enough to discover a method to become immortal. Like them, I went ape-shit in the power of time and space because I want to snu-snu…"
Leo suddenly realized that Esen was next to him. He coughed and corrected his words before his wife could notice his ulterior motive.
"Ahem! I experimented with the power of time to expand my domain coverage. I researched so hard that I comprehended the dao of time and understood what the fourth dimension really is. Well, you can guess the rest."
Simba rubbed his chin when Leo muttered the fourth dimension. He recalled a famous scientist on Earth who mentioned this before.
"So, what is it like? I'm still living in the 3rd dimension. I can only move up, down, left, and right."
"Nah, you're pretty much in the 3.5D mode. You can blink and appear anywhere in the universe. You can phase through objects. In fact, I have a theory that Earth's scientists misunderstood the dimension orders…"
Both men exchanged philosophies and discussed dao for hours. Esen sat there and listened to the men while smiling. Still, she was the only one who paid attention to the leather bag.
When Leo and Simba stopped speaking, Esen pointed at the bag and asked.
"What's in that bag?"
"Ah," Simba dryly laughed. "A souvenir."
"Souvenir?" Esen carefully carried the Siamese cat and put it on Leo's lap. Then, she reached out to pick up the bag.
Upon opening the bag, she discovered a thousand storage rings in there. She pursed her lips, mimicking Leo's troubled expression.
"Rings? At this age?" She complained.
"What's wrong, sister-in-law?"
Esen sighed and opened her system menu. She navigated to the inventory system and showed it to Simba.
"Next time, use the transfer or trade menu. You can simply send these rings through the system. Don't you have a true karmic fate crystal in you?"
Simba was taken aback. He scratched his bald head and laughed, "I forgot."
"Seriously. You and Leo share the same brain cells."
Leo and Simba looked at each other and burst into laughter.
"Wifey, look. My geniusness knows no bounds. I even turned my delusion into reality! Can't you see that I'm the only time lord in the multiverse?"
Simba jeered at Leo, "Geniusness is not a word, you autistic coomer. You've gotten that far because you wanted to secretly molest clones of other women in your dantian universe!"
"Bullcrap! I never molest any woman other than my wife!"
Simba smirked, "But I read your karma a few years back. It said that you secretly summoned Eleanor, Ellen, and my wife's clone in your dantian universe to fight with them."
"Yeah, I fought them to learn their skills, so?"
"You set their skill levels to the lowest."
"…"
"What kind of skills did you learn when your opponents are weaker than you, Leo?"
"…Meh, you know nothing. I studied their bloodline so that I could come up with a new alchemy recipe! And…"
Leo stood up and was about to yell at Simba. However, Esen menacingly smiled at Leo and pulled his shirt.
"Hubby, care to explain? You did what?"
Both Esen and Simba knew about Leo's dantian universe and its nature as the guy once taught them about it. They, too, were capable of altering the time flow in their dantian universe. However, they couldn't summon clones like Leo.
Leo sweated profusely. He didn't cheat on Esen, but he indeed summoned her sisters' clones and her mother's clone to extract their blood for samples. But because of the suspicious activity, he didn't know how to explain it.
"Wife, I'm honest here. I didn't cheat on you."
Esen smirked, "Cheating or not, I'll see it for myself. Take me to your dantian universe! I'll investigate your karma in there!"
"…"
Leo deeply sighed and let Esen enter his dantian universe. She turned into a streak of light and vanished into his forehead.
After Esen entered his universe, Leo stared at Simba.
"You…"
Simba burst into laughter and teleported away, leaving the leather bag behind. He was satisfied after pranking Leo.
It would take Leo a while before he could reconcile with Esen and prove his innocence.
In the future, someone in Mu-Nyang's dantian universe would abuse a similar perk and ravish countless women with his time ability. He would also have a similar system ability to summon clones of others to fight in his dantian universe.

chapters.title: Chapter 339 Florida Man Prophesizes Doomsday, Claims Sexually Aggressive Demoness Would Enslave Men and Cats Would Be Our Saviors
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 339 – Florida Man Prophesizes Doomsday, Claims Sexually Aggressive Demoness Would Enslave Men and Cats Would Be Our Saviors.
Leo enjoyed the long years of peace and tranquility. However, he never forgot to visit Mu-Nyang every week to chat with him.
It only took 10 years of weekly visits for the cat to give in. Mu-Nyang finally invited Leo to enter his little house, but he still declined his offer.
Leo stood in front of Xiaomao's workbench and gazed at their family photos. Seeing a fragment of their happy memory, Leo pitied them.
'I should have been there with them. I guess he has found his new master now.'
Admiring the photos enough, Leo turned around and found Mu-Nyang sitting on a worn-out bed.
"Mu-Nyang, do you want me to improve your living conditions? I won't invite you to my domain anymore."
Mu-Nyang scoffed at Leo, "If you want my master's fishing rod, I won't give it to you no matter what, munya!"
"You misunderstood me. Oh, well."
Leo blinked his eyes twice, and the bed was replaced with a brand new spring bed with fluffy blankets and a cartoonish bed sheet. Another cat bed also appeared and landed next to the human bed.
Mu-Nyang widened his eyes in shock. Still, wary of Leo, he stored Xiaomao's fishing rod in his system inventory and warned the guest.
"No matter how many treasures you give me, I won't give it to you, munya!"
Leo rolled his eyes, "Seriously, you dumb cat. Had I coveted your fishing rod, I would have killed you long ago. Look here."
As the cat was too stubborn to understand his goodwill, Leo demonstrated something of an equivalent value – A true entity fate crystal.
The crystal was only a bead size, but its aura was the same as the fishing rod. Moreover, as Leo was the one who refined it, colorful light beamed from the crystal.
Mu-Nyang closed his eyes as the fate crystal was too bright. He complained, "What are you doing, munya!? Is this your true color?! I'll fight you to the death, munya!"
"…Hah."
Mu-Nyang turned around and extended his tail, transforming it into eight white tentacles.
Leo deeply sighed and flickered his finger. Instantly, Mu-Nyang could no longer move. Not allowing the cat to defend himself, Leo poked the animal's head with his fingertip.
"OW!"
Mu-Nyang could finally move again. Aside from the throbbing pain on his forehead, he was unharmed.
Leo didn't stop there. He shoved the entity fate crystal into Mu-Nyang's forehead. He also warned him.
"It's about time we do things my way. I'm going to show you why I'm doing this, okay?"
The entity Fate Crystal entered Mu-Nyang's dantian universe. Leo also deployed a fragment of his consciousness and sent it into the universe to control the fate crystal.
Instead of letting Mu-Nyang digest the crystal, he destroyed it, turning the true entity fate crystals into multiple heavenly fate crystals. He scattered it throughout Mu-Nyang's universe to hasten the population growth and standard strength.
After pulling his consciousness out of Mu-Nyang's dantian universe, Leo resumed the time flow. He grinned and patted the cat.
"It's going to be hectic in your dantian universe. Do your best to cultivate and grow stronger, okay?"
"????"
Mu-Nyang swatted Leo's hand away and adjusted his fur. He pouted and waved his paw in disgust.
"Go home, munya. Shoo! Shoo!"
"Heh, you ingrate cat. Once your old memory returns, be prepared for some punishment."
"P-Punish? What punishment, munya?! You're evil, munya. Get outta here!"
"Hahahahaha."
Leo burst into laughter and left Mu-Nyang alone. He returned to his domain branch and managed his territories.
.
.1,000 years quickly went by.
Although Simba's troops had been patrolling the Cathulhu and Florida Galaxy, roaming space beasts kept multiplying. It troubled Simba to the point that he requested Leo's aid to cull the space beast population.
Leo heeded Simba's warning and massacred 70% of the space beasts with just a snap of his fingers. Their carcasses were collected and distributed to all of Leo's ally solar systems as they were the finest source of food. Some of the fish meat was distributed to Mu-Nyang as well.
Cat, who had matured into a singularity, was transferred to Mu-Nyang's planet to take the post of the galaxy's deputy overlord. As soon as she arrived, she visited Mu-Nyang in her father's place as she was curious about what her father's former minion had become.
When Cat arrived at Mu-Nyang's front door, the cathulhu was astonished by her otherworldly beauty. For the first time, he fell in love.
"Umm, who are you, munya?" Asked Mu-Nyang.
Cat stared at Mu-Nyang for a long time and scoffed.
"Chonky cat."
"W-WHAT, MUNYA?!" Mu-Nyang's first love ended instantly. He was enraged, "HOW DARE YOU, MUNYA!"
Cat smirked and brought out a red pointer laser. She flipped the switch and waved it around Mu-Nyang's house.
The cathulhu's cat instinct kicked in. The white cat ran around the house, chasing after the red dot.
Several minutes later, Mu-Nyang regained his composure and yelled at Cat.
"THIS IS DISRESPECTFUL, MUNYA! WHY ARE YOU BULLYING ME?!"
Cat grinned and stuck out her tongue, "Because you hogged my father for 1,000 years, you idiot. Stay here and rot, chonky cat!"
"I'M NOT CHONKEY! YOU'RE CHONKY! YOUR WHOLE FAMILY IS CHONKY, MUNYA!"
Cat laughed and left Mu-Nyang, who seethed and panted due to the unexpected insult.
.
.
After Cat became the deputy overlord of the Cathulhu Galaxy, Leo stopped visiting Mu-Nyang. He visited Priscilla's star system and got busy with the new expansion.
Cat was brutal with her work. She conscripted 50% of adult cathulhus to join the CSDF, aka the Cathulhu Self-Defense Force in exchange for extra cultivation resources from Florida Galaxy.
At first, the locals cooperated as they had nothing to lose. Most male cathulhus spent their days sleeping, so the new overlord assigning them work was the right thing to do. Little did they know that they allowed a tyrant to control them.
After drafting troops, Cat extracted natural resources from the galaxy and transferred them to Leo's system factories and workshops. Forests were cut down. Beautiful natural minerals were dug out while greeneries withered.
The locals protested and demanded Cat to return their forests and natural resources. Riots and protesters roamed the capital city's streets.
Cat didn't do anything fancy to respond. She simply removed catnip from all local convenience stores and the Cathulhu Galaxy's shopping complex. Within a week, all cats suffered from withdrawal syndrome and stopped rioting.
The tyrant pushed forward. She demanded that all Cathulhus had two choices – Migrate to Florida Galaxy or remain here in the colony, waiting for supplies from the headquarters.
90% of the capital's population yielded as they couldn't live without Leo's special catnip. As for the remaining 10%, they either served in the local military or were too old to move.
As most cathulhus of the planet moved out, Mu-Nyang was left behind. Cat left him with a functional colony city to serve as a temporary depot for Leo's supplies, but her action devastated the world.
The rich green world turned into a wasteland. Lakes and seas dried up while local animals were extinct.
Mu-Nyang hated Leo and Cat. He swore that he would avenge their tyranny and rescue his people one day. However, he changed his mind when a new disaster struck.
One day, out of nowhere, a dimension rift appeared outside of the solar system and spat out a human-sized black hole.
The abyssal star sucked so many stars, planets, and asteroids into Cathulhu Galaxy and destroyed them. Among the victims, Mu-Nyang's planet was also within the star's gravity range. His world's orbital path shifted and floated away from the sun.
Fortunately, Simba's fleet was nearby. They suppressed the black hole and disabled its gravity forces before Simba compressed the entire black hole into a cube. He transported it back to Leo as if he knew what Leo needed it for.
Mu-Nyang's world was saved. Simba's troops also corrected Mu-Nyang planet's orbital course and rescued the remaining elderly cathulhus in the remaining cities. Fortunately, most cathulhus in the galaxy had already migrated to Florida Galaxy, so the casualty was minimal.
The event awakened Mu-Nyang. He wondered if Leo and Cat knew about the disaster.
.
.
Meanwhile, Leo sat at a desk and typed something on a floating computer console. He read what he had listed 1,000 years ago.
Year: 540FC
Issues: Shortage of Food throughout the universe due to insufficient food resources and logistic issues.
Status: Solved
Note: Populating space beasts and fish solves the issues. Every race can proactively hunt them for food while those beasts only eat plasma from the sun. It's a free real estate for everybody.
Year: 645FC
Issues: Goblin Overpopulation. Overlord Shuri grows her goblin population too fast and she will drive the divine elves to almost extinction if I don't intervene.
Status: Delayed.
Note: I already murdered Overlord Shuri and trapped goblins in a new universe crystal. It's a shame that Meowmeow will eventually seduce that goblin overlord and repopulate her goblin race before the reverse exodus calamity. I guess we have to wait and see.
Year: 999FC
Issues: Cathulhu Galaxy and Angel Galaxy will collide and cause a quadrillion casualty.
Status: Solved.
Note: Priscilla absorbed the entire galaxy into her dantian universe. I already replaced the lost stars by throwing some random stars from dead space beast's dantian universes here. This universe is still vast. Should I populate more stars and prepare for the reverse exodus?
Year: 1540FC <<< VERY IMPORTANT *CURRENT ISSUE*
Issues: A singularity slips through my foresight radar and is playing with fire. That moron slips into a black hole in my universe to test my strength. The Cathulhu Galaxy will be destroyed.
Status: Pending.
Note: Cat already helped me migrate most of the Cathulhus near the blast area to Florida Galaxy. I haven't dealt with those annoying pests from the higher dimension yet, but I'm about to do so. To Esen or whoever read this log, keep updating this record for me. I'll be back in a year or two.
Year: 2709FC
Issues: Succubi Emergence. Dr. Mao Miaomiao seems to leave behind his seeds, but those angels will mutate into succubi. Men from every race will fall prey to their charm.
Status: Pending
Note: Taxi and his gang will have a ball when the time comes.
Year: 2777FC
Issues: A female orc by the name of Sasha is expelled from the higher dimension here due to internal politics, and cocky singularities from there want her dead. She and I will meet during the conflict which accidentally causes a misunderstanding.
Status: Pending.
Note: This shouldn't even be an issue, but Esen will kill me. Esen, if you read this, stop being so yandere. I know what I'm doing, and I never cheat and will never cheat on you. Do you know that I saw five future timelines that you beheaded me and stuffed my head in a bag like you were a main character from a certain nice boat series? Stop that thought. GET SOME HELP!
.
.
There were more records and notes of future events. However, Leo stopped editing the note and closed the console.
"Hah. Time to visit the higher dimension again. The time dilation is a pain. I hope I can come back within a year."
Leo stretched and warmed up. A few minutes later, he vanished, teleporting to another universe.

chapters.title: Chapter 340 Epilogue
chapters.content:
﻿﻿Chapter 340 – Epilogue
75,340FC
Whoosh
Leo returned to Mu-Nyang's planet. He stood on the wasteland, where a lonely cabin stood out like a sore thumb.
DING
<Warning. Your lifespan has exceeded the limit of this universe. The excess life force will be stored in the time dimension.>
<Your current lifespan: 340 Undecillion.>
<Current stored lifespan: 763 Undecillion.>
Leo swiped his hand across the floating screens and closed them as he no longer regarded his life force as important. After all, his business thrived in multiple universes. This didn't include the destroyed universes which provoked him first.
With such an abundant system currency, Leo came here to ensure Mu-Nyang's safety and smooth cultivation life.
As soon as Leo arrived, he noticed that Cat's life signature was still in the cabin. He gently touched the doorknob, and the house's defensive mechanism was activated.
DING
<Welcome back, Administrator Leonardo.>
<Current Yin and Yang energy in the cabin: 35%>
"It's that time of the year again, right?"
Leo flickered his finger and ejected a singularity stone, which was the highest grade of currency that the higher dimensions commonly used.
